original: (AVŚ_1,1.1a) ye triṣaptāḥ pariyanti viśvā rūpāṇi bibhrataḥ /
analyzed: ye triṣaptāḥ pariyanti viśvā rūpāṇi bibhrataḥ

original: (AVŚ_1,1.1c) vācas patir balā teṣāṃ tanvo adya dadhātu me //1//
analyzed: vācaḥ patiḥ balā teṣām tanvaḥ adya dadhātu me

original: (AVŚ_1,1.2a) punar ehi vacas pate devena manasā saha /
analyzed: punar ehi vacas pate devena manasā saha

original: (AVŚ_1,1.2c) vasoṣ pate ni ramaya mayy evāstu mayi śrutam //2//
analyzed: vasoḥ pate ni ramaya mayi eva astu mayi śrutam

original: (AVŚ_1,1.3a) ihaivābhi vi tanūbhe ārtnī iva jyayā /
analyzed: iha eva abhi vi tanu ubhe ārtnī iva jyayā

original: (AVŚ_1,1.3c) vācas patir ni yachatu mayy evāstu mayi śrutam //3//
analyzed: vācaḥ patiḥ ni yacchatu mayi eva astu mayi śrutam

original: (AVŚ_1,1.4a) upahūto vācas patir upāsmān vācaspatir hvayatām /
analyzed: upahūtaḥ vācaḥ patiḥ upa asmān vācaspatiḥ hvayatām

original: (AVŚ_1,1.4c) saṃ śrutena gamemahi mā śrutena vi rādhiṣi //4//
analyzed: sam śrutena gamemahi mā śrutena vi rādhiṣi

original: (AVŚ_1,2.1a) vidmā śarasya pitaraṃ parjanyaṃ bhūridhāyasam /
analyzed: vidma śarasya pitaram parjanyam bhūri dhāyasam

original: (AVŚ_1,2.1c) vidmo ṣv asya mātaraṃ pṛthivīṃ bhūrivarpasam //1//
analyzed: vidma u su asya mātaram pṛthivīm bhūri varpasam

original: (AVŚ_1,2.2a) jyāke pari ṇo namāśmānaṃ tanvaṃ kṛdhi /
analyzed: jyāke pari naḥ nama aśmānam tanvam kṛdhi

original: (AVŚ_1,2.2c) vīḍur varīyo 'rātīr apa dveṣāṃsy ā kṛdhi //2//
analyzed: vīḍuḥ varīyaḥ rātīḥ apa dveṣāṃsi ā kṛdhi

original: (AVŚ_1,2.3a) vṛkṣaṃ yad gāvaḥ pariṣasvajānā anusphuraṃ śaraṃ arcanty ṛbhum /
analyzed: vṛkṣam yat gāvaḥ pariṣasvajānāḥ anusphuram śaram arcanti ṛbhum

original: (AVŚ_1,2.3c) śarum asmad yāvaya didyum indra //3//
analyzed: śarum asmat yāvaya didyum indra

original: (AVŚ_1,2.4a) yathā dyāṃ ca pṛthivīṃ cāntas tiṣṭhati tejanam /
analyzed: yathā dyām ca pṛthivīm ca antar tiṣṭhati tejanam

original: (AVŚ_1,2.4c) evā rogaṃ cāsrāvaṃ cāntas tiṣṭhatu muñja it //4//
analyzed: eva rogam ca āsrāvam ca antar tiṣṭhatu muñjaḥ id

original: (AVŚ_1,3.1a) vidmā śarasya pitaraṃ parjanyaṃ śatavṛṣṇyaṃ /
analyzed: vidma śarasya pitaram parjanyam śata vṛṣṇyam

original: (AVŚ_1,3.1c) tenā te tanve śaṃ karaṃ pṛthivyāṃ te niṣecanaṃ bahiṣ ṭe astu bāl iti //1//
analyzed: tena te tanve śam karam pṛthivyām te niṣecanam bahis te astu bāl iti

original: (AVŚ_1,3.2a) vidmā śarasya pitaraṃ mitraṃ śatavṛṣṇyaṃ /
analyzed: vidma śarasya pitaram mitram śata vṛṣṇyam

original: (AVŚ_1,3.2c) tenā te tanve śaṃ karaṃ pṛthivyāṃ te niṣecanaṃ bahiṣ ṭe astu bāl iti //2//
analyzed: tena te tanve śam karam pṛthivyām te niṣecanam bahis te astu bāl iti

original: (AVŚ_1,3.3a) vidmā śarasya pitaraṃ varuṇaṃ śatavṛṣṇyaṃ /
analyzed: vidma śarasya pitaram varuṇam śata vṛṣṇyam

original: (AVŚ_1,3.3c) tenā te tanve śaṃ karaṃ pṛthivyāṃ te niṣecanaṃ bahiṣ ṭe astu bāl iti //3//
analyzed: tena te tanve śam karam pṛthivyām te niṣecanam bahis te astu bāl iti

original: (AVŚ_1,3.4a) vidmā śarasya pitaraṃ candraṃ śatavṛṣṇyaṃ /
analyzed: vidma śarasya pitaram candram śata vṛṣṇyam

original: (AVŚ_1,3.4c) tenā te tanve śaṃ karaṃ pṛthivyāṃ te niṣecanaṃ bahiṣ ṭe astu bāl iti //4//
analyzed: tena te tanve śam karam pṛthivyām te niṣecanam bahis te astu bāl iti

original: (AVŚ_1,3.5a) vidmā śarasya pitaraṃ sūryaṃ śatavṛṣṇyaṃ /
analyzed: vidma śarasya pitaram sūryam śata vṛṣṇyam

original: (AVŚ_1,3.5c) tenā te tanve śaṃ karaṃ pṛthivyāṃ te niṣecanaṃ bahiṣ ṭe astu bāl iti //5//
analyzed: tena te tanve śam karam pṛthivyām te niṣecanam bahis te astu bāl iti

original: (AVŚ_1,3.6a) yad āntreṣu gavīnyor yad vastāv adhi saṃśritam /
analyzed: yat āntreṣu gavīnyoḥ yat vastau adhi saṃśritam

original: (AVŚ_1,3.6c) evā te mūtraṃ mucyatāṃ bahir bāl iti sarvakam //6//
analyzed: eva te mūtram mucyatām bahis bāl iti sarvakam

original: (AVŚ_1,3.7a) pra te bhinadmi mehanaṃ vartraṃ veśantyā iva /
analyzed: pra te bhinadmi mehanam vartram veśantyāḥ iva

original: (AVŚ_1,3.7c) evā te mūtraṃ mucyatāṃ bahir bāl iti sarvakam //7//
analyzed: eva te mūtram mucyatām bahis bāl iti sarvakam

original: (AVŚ_1,3.8a) viṣitaṃ te vastibilaṃ samudrasyodadher iva /
analyzed: viṣitam te vasti bilam samudrasya udadheḥ iva

original: (AVŚ_1,3.8c) evā te mūtraṃ mucyatāṃ bahir bāl iti sarvakam //8//
analyzed: eva te mūtram mucyatām bahis bāl iti sarvakam

original: (AVŚ_1,3.9a) yatheṣukā parāpatad avasṛṣṭādhi dhanvanaḥ /
analyzed: yathā iṣukā parāpatat avasṛṣṭā adhi dhanvanaḥ

original: (AVŚ_1,3.9c) evā te mūtraṃ mucyatāṃ bahir bāl iti sarvakam //9//
analyzed: eva te mūtram mucyatām bahis bāl iti sarvakam

original: (AVŚ_1,4.1a) ambayo yanty adhvabhir jāmayo adhvarīyatām /
analyzed: ambayaḥ yanti adhvabhiḥ jāmayaḥ adhvarīyatām

original: (AVŚ_1,4.1c) pṛñcatīr madhunā payaḥ //1//
analyzed: pṛñcatīḥ madhunā payaḥ

original: (AVŚ_1,4.2a) amūr yā upa sūrye yābhir vā sūryaḥ saha /
analyzed: amūḥ yāḥ upa sūrye yābhiḥ vā sūryaḥ saha

original: (AVŚ_1,4.2c) tā no hinvantv adhvaram //2//
analyzed: tāḥ naḥ hinvantu adhvaram

original: (AVŚ_1,4.3a) apo devīr upa hvaye yatra gāvaḥ pibanti naḥ /
analyzed: apaḥ devīḥ upa hvaye yatra gāvaḥ pibanti naḥ

original: (AVŚ_1,4.3c) sindhubhyaḥ kartvaṃ haviḥ //3//
analyzed: sindhubhyaḥ kartvam haviḥ

original: (AVŚ_1,4.4a) apsv antar amṛtam apsu bheṣajam /
analyzed: apsu antar amṛtam apsu bheṣajam

original: (AVŚ_1,4.4c) apām uta praśastibhir aśvā bhavatha vājino gāvo bhavatha vājinīḥ //4//
analyzed: apām uta praśastibhiḥ aśvāḥ bhavatha vājinaḥ gāvaḥ bhavatha vājinīḥ

original: (AVŚ_1,5.1a) āpo hi ṣṭhā mayobhuvas tā na ūrje dadhātana /
analyzed: āpaḥ hi stha mayobhuvaḥ tāḥ naḥ ūrje dadhātana

original: (AVŚ_1,5.1c) mahe raṇāya cakṣase //1//
analyzed: mahe raṇāya cakṣase

original: (AVŚ_1,5.2a) yo vaḥ śivatamo rasas tasya bhājayateha naḥ /
analyzed: yaḥ vaḥ śivatamaḥ rasaḥ tasya bhājayata iha naḥ

original: (AVŚ_1,5.2c) uśatīr iva mātaraḥ //2//
analyzed: uśatīḥ iva mātaraḥ

original: (AVŚ_1,5.3a) tasmā araṃ gamāma vo yasya kṣayāya jinvatha /
analyzed: tasmai aram gamāma vaḥ yasya kṣayāya jinvatha

original: (AVŚ_1,5.3c) āpo janayathā ca naḥ //3//
analyzed: āpaḥ janayatha ca naḥ

original: (AVŚ_1,5.4a) īśānā vāryāṇāṃ kṣayantīś carṣaṇīnām /
analyzed: īśānāḥ vāryāṇām kṣayantīḥ carṣaṇīnām

original: (AVŚ_1,5.4c) apo yācāmi bheṣajam //4//
analyzed: apaḥ yācāmi bheṣajam

original: (AVŚ_1,6.1a) śaṃ no devīr abhiṣṭaya āpo bhavantu pītaye /
analyzed: śam naḥ devīḥ abhiṣṭaye āpaḥ bhavantu pītaye

original: (AVŚ_1,6.1c) śaṃ yor abhi sravantu naḥ //1//
analyzed: śam yos abhi sravantu naḥ

original: (AVŚ_1,6.2a) apsu me somo abravīd antar viśvāni bheṣajā /
analyzed: apsu me somaḥ abravīt antar viśvāni bheṣajā

original: (AVŚ_1,6.2c) agniṃ ca viśvaśaṃbhuvam //2//
analyzed: agnim ca viśva śaṃbhuvam

original: (AVŚ_1,6.3a) āpaḥ pṛṇīta bheṣajaṃ varūthaṃ tanve mama /
analyzed: āpaḥ pṛṇīta bheṣajam varūtham tanve mama

original: (AVŚ_1,6.3c) jyok ca sūryaṃ dṛśe //3//
analyzed: jyok ca sūryam dṛśe

original: (AVŚ_1,6.4a) śaṃ na āpo dhanvanyāḥ śam u santv anūpyāḥ /
analyzed: śam naḥ āpaḥ dhanvanyāḥ śam u santu anūpyāḥ

original: (AVŚ_1,6.4c) śaṃ naḥ khanitrimā āpaḥ śam u yāḥ kumbha ābhṛtāḥ /
analyzed: śam naḥ khanitrimāḥ āpaḥ śam u yāḥ kumbhe ābhṛtāḥ

original: (AVŚ_1,6.4e) śivā naḥ santu vārṣikīḥ //4//
analyzed: śivāḥ naḥ santu vārṣikīḥ

original: (AVŚ_1,7.1a) stuvānam agna ā vaha yātudhānaṃ kimīdinam /
analyzed: stuvānam agne ā vaha yātudhānam kimīdinam

original: (AVŚ_1,7.1c) tvaṃ hi deva vandito hantā dasyor babhūvitha //1//
analyzed: tvam hi deva vanditaḥ hantā dasyoḥ babhūvitha

original: (AVŚ_1,7.2a) ājyasya parameṣṭhin jātavedas tanūvaśin /
analyzed: ājyasya parameṣṭhin jātavedaḥ tanū vaśin

original: (AVŚ_1,7.2c) agne taulasya prāśāna yātudhānān vi lāpaya //2//
analyzed: agne taulasya prāśāna yātudhānān vi lāpaya

original: (AVŚ_1,7.3a) vi lapantu yātudhānā attriṇo ye kimīdinaḥ /
analyzed: vi lapantu yātudhānāḥ attriṇaḥ ye kimīdinaḥ

original: (AVŚ_1,7.3c) athedam agne no havir indraś ca prati haryatam //3//
analyzed: atha idam agne naḥ haviḥ indraḥ ca prati haryatam

original: (AVŚ_1,7.4a) agniḥ pūrva ā rabhatāṃ prendro nudatu bāhumān /
analyzed: agniḥ pūrvaḥ ā rabhatām pra indraḥ nudatu bāhumān

original: (AVŚ_1,7.4c) bravītu sarvo yātumān ayam asmīty etya //4//
analyzed: bravītu sarvaḥ yātumān ayam asmi iti etya

original: (AVŚ_1,7.5a) paśyāma te vīryaṃ jātavedaḥ pra ṇo brūhi yātudhānān nṛcakṣaḥ /
analyzed: paśyāma te vīryam jātavedaḥ pra naḥ brūhi yātudhānān nṛ cakṣaḥ

original: (AVŚ_1,7.5c) tvayā sarve paritaptāḥ purastāt ta ā yantu prabruvāṇā upedam //5//
analyzed: tvayā sarve paritaptāḥ purastāt te ā yantu prabruvāṇāḥ upa idam

original: (AVŚ_1,7.6a) ā rabhasva jātavedo 'smākārthāya jajñiṣe /
analyzed: ā rabhasva jātavedaḥ sma akārthāya jajñiṣe

original: (AVŚ_1,7.6c) dūto no agne bhūtvā yātudhānān vi lāpaya //6//
analyzed: dūtaḥ naḥ agne bhūtvā yātudhānān vi lāpaya

original: (AVŚ_1,7.7a) tvam agne yātudhānān upabaddhāṃ ihā vaha /
analyzed: tvam agne yātudhānān upabaddhām iha ā vaha

original: (AVŚ_1,7.7c) athaiṣām indro vajreṇāpi śīrṣāṇi vṛścatu //7//
analyzed: atha eṣām indraḥ vajreṇa api śīrṣāṇi vṛścatu

original: (AVŚ_1,8.1a) idaṃ havir yātudhānān nādī phenam ivā vahat /
analyzed: idam haviḥ yātudhānān nādī phenam iva ā vahat

original: (AVŚ_1,8.1c) ya idaṃ strī pumān akar iha sa stuvatāṃ janaḥ //1//
analyzed: yaḥ idam strī pumān akaḥ iha sa stuvatām janaḥ

original: (AVŚ_1,8.2a) ayaṃ stuvāna āgamad imaṃ sma prati haryata /
analyzed: ayam stuvānaḥ āgamat imam sma prati haryata

original: (AVŚ_1,8.2c) bṛhaspate vaśe labdhvāgnīṣomā vi vidhyatam //2//
analyzed: bṛhaspate vaśe labdhvā agnīṣomā vi vidhyatam

original: (AVŚ_1,8.3a) yātudhānasya somapa jahi prajāṃ nayasva ca /
analyzed: yātudhānasya soma pa jahi prajām nayasva ca

original: (AVŚ_1,8.3c) ni stuvānasya pātaya param akṣy utāvaram //3//
analyzed: ni stuvānasya pātaya param akṣi uta avaram

original: (AVŚ_1,8.4a) yatraiṣām agne janimāni vettha guhā satām attriṇāṃ jātavedaḥ /
analyzed: yatra eṣām agne janimāni vettha guhā satām attriṇām jātavedaḥ

original: (AVŚ_1,8.4c) tāṃs tvaṃ brahmaṇā vāvṛdhāno jahy eṣāṃ śatatarham agne //4//
analyzed: tān tvam brahmaṇā vāvṛdhānaḥ jahi eṣām śatatarham agne

original: (AVŚ_1,9.1a) asmin vasu vasavo dhārayantv indraḥ pūṣā varuṇo mitro agniḥ /
analyzed: asmin vasu vasavaḥ dhārayantu indraḥ pūṣā varuṇaḥ mitraḥ agniḥ

original: (AVŚ_1,9.1c) imam ādityā uta viśve ca devā uttarasmin jyotiṣi dhārayantu //1//
analyzed: imam ādityāḥ uta viśve ca devāḥ uttarasmin jyotiṣi dhārayantu

original: (AVŚ_1,9.2a) asya devāḥ pradiśi jyotir astu sūryo agnir uta vā hiraṇyam /
analyzed: asya devāḥ pradiśi jyotiḥ astu sūryaḥ agniḥ uta vā hiraṇyam

original: (AVŚ_1,9.2c) sapatnā asmad adhare bhavantūttamaṃ nākam adhi rohayemam //2//
analyzed: sapatnāḥ asmat adhare bhavantu uttamam nākam adhi rohaya imam

original: (AVŚ_1,9.3a) yenendrāya samabharaḥ payāṃsy uttamena brahmaṇā jātavedaḥ /
analyzed: yena indrāya samabharaḥ payāṃsi uttamena brahmaṇā jātavedaḥ

original: (AVŚ_1,9.3c) tena tvam agna iha vardhayemaṃ sajātānāṃ śraiṣṭhya ā dhehy enam //3//
analyzed: tena tvam agne iha vardhaya imam sajātānām śraiṣṭhye ā dhehi enam

original: (AVŚ_1,9.4a) aiṣāṃ yajñam uta varco dade 'haṃ rāyas poṣam uta cittāny agne /
analyzed: ā eṣām yajñam uta varcaḥ dade ham rāyaḥ poṣam uta cittāni agne

original: (AVŚ_1,9.4c) sapatnā asmad adhare bhavantūttamaṃ nākam adhi rohayemam //4//
analyzed: sapatnāḥ asmat adhare bhavantu uttamam nākam adhi rohaya imam

original: (AVŚ_1,10.1a) ayaṃ devānām asuro vi rājati vaśā hi satyā varuṇasya rājñaḥ /
analyzed: ayam devānām asuraḥ vi rājati vaśā hi satyā varuṇasya rājñaḥ

original: (AVŚ_1,10.1c) tatas pari brahmaṇā śāśadāna ugrasya manyor ud imaṃ nayāmi //1//
analyzed: tatas pari brahmaṇā śāśadānaḥ ugrasya manyoḥ ud imam nayāmi

original: (AVŚ_1,10.2a) namas te rajan varuṇāstu manyave viśvaṃ hy ugra nicikeṣi drugdham /
analyzed: namaḥ te rajan varuṇa astu manyave viśvam hi ugra nicikeṣi drugdham

original: (AVŚ_1,10.2c) sahasram anyān pra suvāmi sākaṃ śataṃ jīvāti śaradas tavāyam //2//
analyzed: sahasram anyān pra suvāmi sākam śatam jīvāti śaradaḥ tava ayam

original: (AVŚ_1,10.3a) yad uvakthānṛtam jihvayā vṛjinaṃ bahu /
analyzed: yat uvaktha anṛtam jihvayā vṛjinam bahu

original: (AVŚ_1,10.3c) rājñas tvā satyadharmaṇo muñcāmi varuṇād aham //3//
analyzed: rājñaḥ tvā satya dharmaṇaḥ muñcāmi varuṇāt aham

original: (AVŚ_1,10.4a) muñcāmi tvā vaiśvānarād arṇavān mahatas pari /
analyzed: muñcāmi tvā vaiśvānarāt arṇavāt mahataḥ pari

original: (AVŚ_1,10.4c) sajātān ugrehā vada brahma cāpa cikīhi naḥ //4//
analyzed: sajātān ugra iha ā vada brahma ca apa cikīhi naḥ

original: (AVŚ_1,11.1a) vaṣaṭ te pūṣann asmint sūtāv aryamā hotā kṛṇotu vedhāḥ /
analyzed: vaṣaṭ te pūṣan asmin sūtau aryamā hotā kṛṇotu vedhāḥ

original: (AVŚ_1,11.1c) sisratāṃ nāry ṛtaprajātā vi parvāṇi jihatāṃ sūtavā u //1//
analyzed: sisratām nārī ṛta prajātā vi parvāṇi jihatām sūtavai u

original: (AVŚ_1,11.2a) catasro divaḥ pradiśaś catasro bhūmyā uta /
analyzed: catasraḥ divaḥ pradiśaḥ catasraḥ bhūmyāḥ uta

original: (AVŚ_1,11.2c) devā garbhaṃ sam airayan taṃ vy ūrṇuvantu sūtave //2//
analyzed: devāḥ garbham sam airayan tam vi ūrṇuvantu sūtave

original: (AVŚ_1,11.3a) sūṣā vy ūrṇotu vi yoniṃ hāpayāmasi /
analyzed: sūṣā vi ūrṇotu vi yonim hāpayāmasi

original: (AVŚ_1,11.3c) śrathayā sūṣaṇe tvam ava tvaṃ biṣkale sṛja //3//
analyzed: śrathaya sūṣaṇe tvam ava tvam biṣkale sṛja

original: (AVŚ_1,11.4a) neva māṃse na pīvasi neva majjasv āhatam /
analyzed: na iva māṃse na pīvasi na iva majjasu āhatam

original: (AVŚ_1,11.4c) avaitu pṛśni śevalaṃ śune jarāyv attave 'va jarāyu padyatām //4//
analyzed: avaitu pṛśni śevalam śune jarāyu attave va jarāyu padyatām

original: (AVŚ_1,11.5a) vi te bhinadmi mehanaṃ vi yoniṃ vi gavīnike /
analyzed: vi te bhinadmi mehanam vi yonim vi gavīnike

original: (AVŚ_1,11.5c) vi mātaraṃ ca putraṃ ca vi kumāraṃ jarāyuṇāva jarāyu padyatām //5//
analyzed: vi mātaram ca putram ca vi kumāram jarāyuṇā ava jarāyu padyatām

original: (AVŚ_1,11.6a) yathā vāto yathā mano yathā patanti pakṣiṇaḥ /
analyzed: yathā vātaḥ yathā manaḥ yathā patanti pakṣiṇaḥ

original: (AVŚ_1,11.6c) evā tvaṃ daśamāsya sākaṃ jarāyuṇā patāva jarāyu padyatām //6//
analyzed: eva tvam daśamāsya sākam jarāyuṇā pata ava jarāyu padyatām

original: (AVŚ_1,12.1a) jarāyujaḥ prathama usriyo vṛṣā vātābhrajā stanayann eti vṛṣṭyā /
analyzed: jarāyu jaḥ prathamaḥ usriyaḥ vṛṣā vāta abhra jāḥ stanayan eti vṛṣṭyā

original: (AVŚ_1,12.1c) sa no mṛḍāti tanva ṛjugo rujan ya ekam ojas tredhā vicakrame //1//
analyzed: sa naḥ mṛḍāti tanve ṛju gaḥ rujan yaḥ ekam ojaḥ tredhā vicakrame

original: (AVŚ_1,12.2a) aṅgeaṅge śociṣā śiśriyāṇaṃ namasyantas tvā haviṣā vidhema /
analyzed: aṅge aṅge śociṣā śiśriyāṇam namasyantaḥ tvā haviṣā vidhema

original: (AVŚ_1,12.2c) aṅkānt samaṅkān haviṣā vidhema yo agrabhīt parvāsyā grabhītā //2//
analyzed: aṅkān samaṅkān haviṣā vidhema yaḥ agrabhīt parvā asyāḥ grabhītā

original: (AVŚ_1,12.3a) muñca śīrṣaktyā uta kāsa enaṃ paruṣparur āviveśā yo asya /
analyzed: muñca śīrṣaktyāḥ uta kāsaḥ enam paruḥ paruḥ āviveśa ā yaḥ asya

original: (AVŚ_1,12.3c) yo abhrajā vātajā yaś ca śuṣmo vanaspatīnt sacatāṃ parvatāṃś ca //3//
analyzed: yaḥ abhra jāḥ vāta jāḥ yaḥ ca śuṣmaḥ vanaspatīn sacatām parvatān ca

original: (AVŚ_1,12.4a) śaṃ me parasmai gātrāya śam astv avarāya me /
analyzed: śam me parasmai gātrāya śam astu avarāya me

original: (AVŚ_1,12.4c) śaṃ me caturbhyo aṅgebhyaḥ śam astu tanve mama //4//
analyzed: śam me caturbhyaḥ aṅgebhyaḥ śam astu tanve mama

original: (AVŚ_1,13.1a) namas te astu vidyute namas te stanayitnave /
analyzed: namaḥ te astu vidyute namaḥ te stanayitnave

original: (AVŚ_1,13.1c) namas te astv aśmane yenā dūḍāśe asyasi //1//
analyzed: namaḥ te astu aśmane yena dūḍāśe asyasi

original: (AVŚ_1,13.2a) namas te pravato napād yatas tapaḥ samūhasi /
analyzed: namaḥ te pravataḥ napāt yatas tapaḥ samūhasi

original: (AVŚ_1,13.2c) mṛḍayā nas tanūbhyo mayas tokebhyas kṛdhi //2//
analyzed: mṛḍaya naḥ tanūbhyaḥ mayaḥ tokebhyaḥ kṛdhi

original: (AVŚ_1,13.3a) pravato napān nama evāstu tubhyaṃ namas te hetaye tapuṣe ca kṛṇmaḥ /
analyzed: pravataḥ napāt namaḥ eva astu tubhyam namaḥ te hetaye tapuṣe ca kṛṇmaḥ

original: (AVŚ_1,13.3c) vidma te dhāma paramaṃ guhā yat samudre antar nihitāsi nābhiḥ //3//
analyzed: vidma te dhāma paramam guhā yat samudre antar nihitā asi nābhiḥ

original: (AVŚ_1,13.4a) yāṃ tvā devā asṛjanta viśva iṣuṃ kṛṇvānā asanāya dhṛṣṇum /
analyzed: yām tvā devāḥ asṛjanta viśve iṣum kṛṇvānāḥ asanāya dhṛṣṇum

original: (AVŚ_1,13.4c) sā no mṛḍa vidathe gṛṇānā tasyai te namo astu devi //4//
analyzed: sā naḥ mṛḍa vidathe gṛṇānā tasyai te namaḥ astu devi

original: (AVŚ_1,14.1a) bhagam asyā varca ādiṣy adhi vṛkṣād iva srajam /
analyzed: bhagam asyāḥ varcaḥ ādiṣi adhi vṛkṣāt iva srajam

original: (AVŚ_1,14.1c) mahābudhna iva parvato jyok pitṛṣv āstām //1//
analyzed: mahā budhnaḥ iva parvataḥ jyok pitṛṣu āstām

original: (AVŚ_1,14.2a) eṣā te rājan kanyā vadhūr ni dhūyatām yama /
analyzed: eṣā te rājan kanyā vadhūḥ ni dhūyatām yama

original: (AVŚ_1,14.2c) sā mātur badhyatāṃ gṛhe 'tho bhrātur atho pituḥ //2//
analyzed: sā mātuḥ badhyatām gṛhe bhrātuḥ atha u pituḥ

original: (AVŚ_1,14.3a) eṣā te kulapā rājan tām u te pari dadmasi /
analyzed: eṣā te kulapā rājan tām u te pari dadmasi

original: (AVŚ_1,14.3c) jyok pitṛṣv āsātā ā śīrṣṇaḥ śamopyāt //3//
analyzed: jyok pitṛṣu āsātai ā śīrṣṇaḥ śamopyāt

original: (AVŚ_1,14.4a) asitasya te brahmaṇā kaśyapasya gayasya ca /
analyzed: asitasya te brahmaṇā kaśyapasya gayasya ca

original: (AVŚ_1,14.4c) antaḥkośam iva jāmayo 'pi nahyāmi te bhagam //4 //
analyzed: antaḥkośam iva jāmayaḥ pi nahyāmi te bhagam

original: (AVŚ_1,15.1a) saṃ saṃ sravantu sindhavaḥ saṃ vātāḥ saṃ patatriṇaḥ /
analyzed: sam sam sravantu sindhavaḥ sam vātāḥ sam patatriṇaḥ

original: (AVŚ_1,15.1c) imaṃ yajñaṃ pradivo me juṣantāṃ saṃsrāvyeṇa haviṣā juhomi //1//
analyzed: imam yajñam pradivaḥ me juṣantām saṃsrāvyeṇa haviṣā juhomi

original: (AVŚ_1,15.2a) ihaiva havam ā yāta ma iha saṃsrāvaṇā utemaṃ vardhayatā giraḥ /
analyzed: iha eva havam ā yāta me iha saṃsrāvaṇāḥ uta imam vardhayata giraḥ

original: (AVŚ_1,15.2c) ihaitu sarvo yaḥ paśur asmin tiṣṭhatu yā rayiḥ //2//
analyzed: iha etu sarvaḥ yaḥ paśuḥ asmin tiṣṭhatu rayiḥ

original: (AVŚ_1,15.3a) ye nadīnāṃ saṃsravanty utsāsaḥ sadam akṣitāḥ /
analyzed: ye nadīnām saṃsravanti utsāsaḥ sadam akṣitāḥ

original: (AVŚ_1,15.3c) tebhir me sarvaiḥ saṃsrāvair dhanaṃ saṃ srāvayāmasi //3//
analyzed: tebhiḥ me sarvaiḥ saṃsrāvaiḥ dhanam sam srāvayāmasi

original: (AVŚ_1,15.4a) ye sarpiṣaḥ saṃsravanti kṣīrasya codakasya ca
analyzed: ye sarpiṣaḥ saṃsravanti kṣīrasya ca udakasya ca

original: (AVŚ_1,15.4b) tebhir me sarvaiḥ saṃsrāvair dhanaṃ saṃ srāvayāmasi //4//
analyzed: tebhiḥ me sarvaiḥ saṃsrāvaiḥ dhanam sam srāvayāmasi

original: (AVŚ_1,16.1a) ye 'māvāsyāṃ rātrim udasthur vrājam attriṇaḥ /
analyzed: ye māvāsyām rātrim udasthuḥ vrājam attriṇaḥ

original: (AVŚ_1,16.1c) agnis turīyo yātuhā so asmabhyam adhi bravat //1//
analyzed: agniḥ turīyaḥ yātu hā saḥ asmabhyam adhi bravat

original: (AVŚ_1,16.2a) sīsāyādhy āha varuṇaḥ sīsāyāgnir upāvati /
analyzed: sīsāya adhi āha varuṇaḥ sīsāya agniḥ upāvati

original: (AVŚ_1,16.2c) sīsaṃ ma indraḥ prāyachat tad aṅga yātucātanam //2//
analyzed: sīsam me indraḥ prāyacchat tat aṅga yātu cātanam

original: (AVŚ_1,16.3a) idaṃ viṣkandhaṃ sahata idaṃ bādhate attriṇaḥ /
analyzed: idam viṣkandham sahate idam bādhate attriṇaḥ

original: (AVŚ_1,16.3c) anena viśvā sasahe yā jātāni piśācyāḥ //3//
analyzed: anena viśvā sasahe yā jātāni piśācyāḥ

original: (AVŚ_1,16.4a) yadi no gāṃ haṃsi yady aśvaṃ yadi pūruṣam /
analyzed: yadi naḥ gām haṃsi yadi aśvam yadi pūruṣam

original: (AVŚ_1,16.4c) taṃ tvā sīsena vidhyāmo yathā no 'so avīrahā //4//
analyzed: tam tvā sīsena vidhyāmaḥ yathā naḥ saḥ a vīra hā

original: (AVŚ_1,17.1a) amūr yā yanti yoṣito hirā lohitavāsasaḥ /
analyzed: amūḥ yāḥ yanti yoṣitaḥ hirāḥ lohita vāsasaḥ

original: (AVŚ_1,17.1c) abhrātara iva jāmayas tiṣṭhantu hatavarcasaḥ //1//
analyzed: a bhrātaraḥ iva jāmayaḥ tiṣṭhantu hata varcasaḥ

original: (AVŚ_1,17.2a) tiṣṭhāvare tiṣṭha para uta tvaṃ tiṣṭha madhyame /
analyzed: tiṣṭha avare tiṣṭha pare uta tvam tiṣṭha madhyame

original: (AVŚ_1,17.2c) kaniṣṭhikā ca tiṣṭhati tiṣṭhād id dhamanir mahī //2//
analyzed: kaniṣṭhikā ca tiṣṭhati tiṣṭhāt id dhamaniḥ mahī

original: (AVŚ_1,17.3a) śatasya dhamanīnāṃ sahasrasya hirāṇām /
analyzed: śatasya dhamanīnām sahasrasya hirāṇām

original: (AVŚ_1,17.3c) asthur in madhyamā imāḥ sākam antā araṃsata //3//
analyzed: asthuḥ id madhyamāḥ imāḥ sākam antāḥ araṃsata

original: (AVŚ_1,17.4a) pari vaḥ sikatāvatī dhanūr bṛhaty akramīt /
analyzed: pari vaḥ sikatāvatī dhanūḥ bṛhatī akramīt

original: (AVŚ_1,17.4c) tiṣṭhatelayatā su kam //4//
analyzed: tiṣṭhata ilayata su kam

original: (AVŚ_1,18.1a) nir lakṣmyaṃ lalāmyaṃ nir arātiṃ suvāmasi /
analyzed: niḥ lakṣmyam lalāmyam niḥ arātim suvāmasi

original: (AVŚ_1,18.1c) atha yā bhadrā tāni naḥ prajāyā arātiṃ nayāmasi //1//
analyzed: atha yā bhadrā tāni naḥ prajāyai arātim nayāmasi

original: (AVŚ_1,18.2a) nir araṇiṃ savitā sāviṣak pador nir hastayor varuṇo mitro aryamā /
analyzed: niḥ araṇim savitā sāviṣat padoḥ niḥ hastayoḥ varuṇaḥ mitraḥ aryamā

original: (AVŚ_1,18.2c) nir asmabhyam anumatī rarāṇā premāṃ devā asāviṣuḥ saubhagāya //2//
analyzed: niḥ asmabhyam anumatiḥ rarāṇā pra imām devāḥ asāviṣuḥ saubhagāya

original: (AVŚ_1,18.3a) yat ta ātmani tanvāṃ ghoram asti yad vā keśeṣu praticakṣaṇe vā /
analyzed: yat te ātmani tanvām ghoram asti yat vā keśeṣu praticakṣaṇe vā

original: (AVŚ_1,18.3c) sarvaṃ tad vācāpa hanmo vayaṃ devas tvā savitā sūdayatu //3//
analyzed: sarvam tat vācā apa hanmaḥ vayam devaḥ tvā savitā sūdayatu

original: (AVŚ_1,18.4a) riśyapadīṃ vṛṣadatīṃ goṣedhāṃ vidhamām uta /
analyzed: riśyapadīm vṛṣadatīm go sedhām vidhamām uta

original: (AVŚ_1,18.4c) vilīḍhyaṃ lalāmyaṃ tā asman nāśayāmasi //4//
analyzed: vilīḍhyam lalāmyam tāḥ asmat nāśayāmasi

original: (AVŚ_1,19.1a) mā no vidan vivyādhino mo abhivyādhino vidan /
analyzed: mā naḥ vidan vivyādhinaḥ mā u abhivyādhinaḥ vidan

original: (AVŚ_1,19.1c) ārāc charavyā asmad viṣūcīr indra pātaya //1//
analyzed: ārāt śaravyāḥ asmat viṣūcīḥ indra pātaya

original: (AVŚ_1,19.2a) viṣvañco asmac charavaḥ patantu ye astā ye cāsyāḥ /
analyzed: viṣvañcaḥ asmat śaravaḥ patantu ye astāḥ ye ca asyāḥ

original: (AVŚ_1,19.2c) daivīr manuṣyesavo mamāmitrān vi vidhyata //2//
analyzed: daivīḥ manuṣyesavaḥ mama amitrān vi vidhyata

original: (AVŚ_1,19.3a) yo naḥ svo yo araṇaḥ sajāta uta niṣṭyo yo asmāṃ abhidāsati /
analyzed: yaḥ naḥ svaḥ yaḥ araṇaḥ sajātaḥ uta niṣṭyaḥ yaḥ asmām abhidāsati

original: (AVŚ_1,19.3c) rudraḥ śaravyayaitān mamāmitrān vi vidhyatu //3//
analyzed: rudraḥ śaravyayā etān mama amitrān vi vidhyatu

original: (AVŚ_1,19.4a) yaḥ sapatno yo 'sapatno yaś ca dviṣan chapāti naḥ /
analyzed: yaḥ sapatnaḥ yaḥ sapatnaḥ yaḥ ca dviṣan śapāti naḥ

original: (AVŚ_1,19.4c) devās taṃ sarve dhūrvantu brahma varma mamāntaram //4//
analyzed: devāḥ tam sarve dhūrvantu brahma varma mama antaram

original: (AVŚ_1,20.1a) adārasṛd bhavatu deva somāsmin yajñe maruto mṛḍatā naḥ /
analyzed: a dāra sṛt bhavatu deva soma asmin yajñe marutaḥ mṛḍata naḥ

original: (AVŚ_1,20.1c) mā no vidad abhibhā mo aśastir mā no vidad vṛjinā dveṣyā yā //1//
analyzed: mā naḥ vidat abhibhā mā u aśastiḥ mā naḥ vidat vṛjinā dveṣyā yā

original: (AVŚ_1,20.2a) yo adya senyo vadho 'ghāyūnām udīrate /
analyzed: yaḥ adya senyaḥ vadhaḥ ghāyūnām udīrate

original: (AVŚ_1,20.2c) yuvaṃ taṃ mitrāvaruṇāv asmad yāvayataṃ pari //2//
analyzed: yuvam tam mitrāvaruṇau asmat yāvayatam pari

original: (AVŚ_1,20.3a) itaś ca yad amutaś ca yad vadhaṃ varuṇa yāvaya /
analyzed: itas ca yat amutas ca yat vadham varuṇa yāvaya

original: (AVŚ_1,20.3c) vi mahac charma yacha varīyo yāvayā vadham //3//
analyzed: vi mahat śarma yaccha varīyaḥ yāvaya vadham

original: (AVŚ_1,20.4a) śāsa itthā mahāṃ asy amitrasāho astṛtaḥ /
analyzed: śāsaḥ itthā mahān asi amitra sāhaḥ astṛtaḥ

original: (AVŚ_1,20.4c) na yasya hanyate sakhā na jīyate kadā cana //4//
analyzed: na yasya hanyate sakhā na jīyate kadā cana

original: (AVŚ_1,21.1a) svastidā viśāṃ patir vṛtrahā vimṛdho vaśī /
analyzed: svasti dāḥ viśām patiḥ vṛtra hā vimṛdhaḥ vaśī

original: (AVŚ_1,21.1c) vṛṣendraḥ pura etu naḥ somapā abhayaṃkaraḥ //1//
analyzed: vṛṣā indraḥ puras etu naḥ soma pāḥ abhayaṃkaraḥ

original: (AVŚ_1,21.2a) vi na indra mṛdho jahi nīcā yacha pṛtanyataḥ /
analyzed: vi naḥ indra mṛdhaḥ jahi nīcā yaccha pṛtanyataḥ

original: (AVŚ_1,21.2c) adhamaṃ gamayā tamo yo asmāṃ abhidāsati //2//
analyzed: adhamam gamaya tamaḥ yaḥ asmām abhidāsati

original: (AVŚ_1,21.3a) vi rakṣo vi mṛdho jahi vi vṛtrasya hanū ruja /
analyzed: vi rakṣaḥ vi mṛdhaḥ jahi vi vṛtrasya hanū ruja

original: (AVŚ_1,21.3c) vi manyum indra vṛtrahann amitrasyābhidāsataḥ //3//
analyzed: vi manyum indra vṛtrahan amitrasya abhidāsataḥ

original: (AVŚ_1,21.4a) apendra dviṣato mano 'pa jijyāsato vadham /
analyzed: apa indra dviṣataḥ mano pa jijyāsataḥ vadham

original: (AVŚ_1,21.4c) vi mahac charma yacha varīyo yāvayā vadham //4//
analyzed: vi mahat śarma yaccha varīyaḥ yāvaya vadham

original: (AVŚ_1,22.1a) anu sūryam ud ayatāṃ hṛddyoto harimā ca te /
analyzed: anu sūryam ud ayatām hṛddyotaḥ harimā ca te

original: (AVŚ_1,22.1c) go rohitasya varṇena tena tvā pari dadhmasi //1//
analyzed: go rohitasya varṇena tena tvā pari dadhmasi

original: (AVŚ_1,22.2a) pari tvā rohitair varṇair dīrghāyutvāya dadhmasi /
analyzed: pari tvā rohitaiḥ varṇaiḥ dīrgha āyu tvāya dadhmasi

original: (AVŚ_1,22.2c) yathāyam arapā asad atho aharito bhuvat //2//
analyzed: yathā ayam a rapāḥ asat atha u a haritaḥ bhuvat

original: (AVŚ_1,22.3a) yā rohiṇīr devatyā gāvo yā uta rohiṇīḥ /
analyzed: yāḥ rohiṇīḥ devatyāḥ gāvaḥ yāḥ uta rohiṇīḥ

original: (AVŚ_1,22.3c) rūpaṃrūpaṃ vayovayas tābhiṣ ṭvā pari dadhmasi //3//
analyzed: rūpam rūpam vayaḥ vayaḥ tābhiḥ tvā pari dadhmasi

original: (AVŚ_1,22.4a) śukeṣu te harimāṇaṃ ropaṇākāsu dadhmasi /
analyzed: śukeṣu te harimāṇam ropaṇākāsu dadhmasi

original: (AVŚ_1,22.4c) atho hāridraveṣu te harimāṇaṃ ni dadhmasi //4//
analyzed: atha u hāridraveṣu te harimāṇam ni dadhmasi

original: (AVŚ_1,23.1a) naktaṃjātāsi oṣadhe rāme kṛṣṇe asikni ca /
analyzed: naktaṃjātā asi oṣadhe rāme kṛṣṇe asikni ca

original: (AVŚ_1,23.1c) idaṃ rajani rajaya kilāsaṃ palitaṃ ca yat //1//
analyzed: idam rajani rajaya kilāsam palitam ca yat

original: (AVŚ_1,23.2a) kilāsaṃ ca palitaṃ ca nir ito nāśayā pṛṣat /
analyzed: kilāsam ca palitam ca niḥ itas nāśaya pṛṣat

original: (AVŚ_1,23.2c) ā tvā svo viśatāṃ varṇaḥ parā śuklāni pātaya //2//
analyzed: ā tvā svaḥ viśatām varṇaḥ parā śuklāni pātaya

original: (AVŚ_1,23.3a) asitaṃ te pralayanam āsthānam asitaṃ tava /
analyzed: asitam te pralayanam āsthānam asitam tava

original: (AVŚ_1,23.3c) asiknī asy oṣadhe nir ito nāśayā pṛṣat //3//
analyzed: asiknī asi oṣadhe niḥ itas nāśaya pṛṣat

original: (AVŚ_1,23.4a) asthijasya kilāsasya tanūjasya ca yat tvaci /
analyzed: asthi jasya kilāsasya tanū jasya ca yat tvaci

original: (AVŚ_1,23.4c) dūṣyā kṛtasya brahmaṇā lakṣma śvetam anīnaśam //4//
analyzed: dūṣyā kṛtasya brahmaṇā lakṣma śvetam anīnaśam

original: (AVŚ_1,24.1a) suparṇo jātaḥ prathamas tasya tvaṃ pittam āsitha /
analyzed: suparṇaḥ jātaḥ prathamaḥ tasya tvam pittam āsitha

original: (AVŚ_1,24.1c) tad āsurī yudhā jitā rūpaṃ cakre vanaspatīn //1//
analyzed: tat āsurī yudhā jitā rūpam cakre vanaspatīn

original: (AVŚ_1,24.2a) āsurī cakre prathamedaṃ kilāsabheṣajam idaṃ kilāsanāśanam /
analyzed: āsurī cakre prathamā idam kilāsa bheṣajam idam kilāsa nāśanam

original: (AVŚ_1,24.2c) anīnaśat kilāsaṃ sarūpām akarat tvacam //2//
analyzed: anīnaśat kilāsam sarūpām akarat tvacam

original: (AVŚ_1,24.3a) sarūpā nāma te mātā sarūpo nāma te pitā /
analyzed: sarūpā nāma te mātā sarūpaḥ nāma te pitā

original: (AVŚ_1,24.3c) sarūpakṛt tvam oṣadhe sā sarūpam idaṃ kṛdhi //3//
analyzed: sarūpa kṛt tvam oṣadhe sā sarūpam idam kṛdhi

original: (AVŚ_1,24.4a) śyāmā sarūpaṃkaraṇī pṛthivyā adhy udbhṛtā /
analyzed: śyāmā sarūpaṃkaraṇī pṛthivyāḥ adhi udbhṛtā

original: (AVŚ_1,24.4c) idam ū ṣu pra sādhaya punā rūpāṇi kalpaya //4//
analyzed: idam u su pra sādhaya punar rūpāṇi kalpaya

original: (AVŚ_1,25.1a) yad agnir āpo adahat praviśya yatrākṛṇvan dharmadhṛto namāṃsi /
analyzed: yat agniḥ apaḥ adahat praviśya yatra akṛṇvan dharma dhṛtaḥ namāṃsi

original: (AVŚ_1,25.1c) tatra ta āhuḥ paramaṃ janitraṃ sa naḥ saṃvidvān pari vṛṅgdhi takman //1//
analyzed: tatra te āhuḥ paramam janitram sa naḥ saṃvidvān pari vṛṅgdhi takman

original: (AVŚ_1,25.2a) yady arcir yadi vāsi śociḥ śakalyeṣi yadi vā te janitram /
analyzed: yadi arciḥ yadi vā asi śociḥ śakalyeṣi yadi vā te janitram

original: (AVŚ_1,25.2c) hrūḍur nāmāsi haritasya deva sa naḥ saṃvidvān pari vṛṅgdhi takman //2//
analyzed: hrūḍuḥ nāma asi haritasya deva sa naḥ saṃvidvān pari vṛṅgdhi takman

original: (AVŚ_1,25.3a) yadi śoko yadi vābhiśoko yadi vā rājño varuṇasyāsi putraḥ /
analyzed: yadi śokaḥ yadi vā abhiśokaḥ yadi vā rājñaḥ varuṇasya asi putraḥ

original: (AVŚ_1,25.3c) hrūḍur nāmāsi haritasya deva sa naḥ saṃvidvān pari vṛṅgdhi takman //3//
analyzed: hrūḍuḥ nāma asi haritasya deva sa naḥ saṃvidvān pari vṛṅgdhi takman

original: (AVŚ_1,25.4a) namaḥ śītāya takmane namo rūrāya śociṣe kṛṇomi /
analyzed: namaḥ śītāya takmane namaḥ rūrāya śociṣe kṛṇomi

original: (AVŚ_1,25.4c) yo anyedyur ubhayadyur abhyeti tṛtīyakāya namo astu takmane //4//
analyzed: yaḥ anyedyus ubhayadyus abhyeti tṛtīyakāya namaḥ astu takmane

original: (AVŚ_1,26.1a) āre 'sāv asmad astu hetir devāso asat /
analyzed: āre sau asmat astu hetiḥ devāsaḥ asat

original: (AVŚ_1,26.1c) āre aśmā yam asyatha //1//
analyzed: āre aśmā yam asyatha

original: (AVŚ_1,26.2a) sakhāsāv asmabhyam astu rātiḥ sakhendro bhagaḥ /
analyzed: sakhā asau asmabhyam astu rātiḥ sakhā indraḥ bhagaḥ

original: (AVŚ_1,26.2c) savitā citrarādhāḥ //2//
analyzed: savitā citra rādhāḥ

original: (AVŚ_1,26.3a) yūyam naḥ pravato napān marutaḥ sūryatvacasaḥ /
analyzed: yūyam naḥ pravataḥ napāt marutaḥ sūrya tvacasaḥ

original: (AVŚ_1,26.3c) śarma yachatha saprathāḥ //3//
analyzed: śarma yacchatha saprathāḥ

original: (AVŚ_1,26.4a) suṣūdata mṛḍata mṛḍayā nas tanūbhyo /
analyzed: suṣūdata mṛḍata mṛḍaya naḥ tanūbhyaḥ

original: (AVŚ_1,26.4c) mayas tokebhyas kṛdhi //4//
analyzed: mayaḥ tokebhyaḥ kṛdhi

original: (AVŚ_1,27.1a) amūḥ pāre pṛdākvas triṣaptā nirjarāyavaḥ /
analyzed: amūḥ pāre pṛdākvaḥ triṣaptāḥ nirjarāyavaḥ

original: (AVŚ_1,27.1c) tāsām jarāyubhir vayam akṣyāv api vyayāmasy aghāyoḥ paripanthinaḥ //1//
analyzed: tāsām jarāyubhiḥ vayam akṣyau api vyayāmasi aghāyoḥ paripanthinaḥ

original: (AVŚ_1,27.2a) viṣūcy etu kṛntatī pinākam iva bibhratī /
analyzed: viṣūcī etu kṛntatī pinākam iva bibhratī

original: (AVŚ_1,27.2c) viṣvak punarbhuvā mano 'samṛddhā aghāyavaḥ //2//
analyzed: viṣvak punarbhuvā mano samṛddhāḥ aghāyavaḥ

original: (AVŚ_1,27.3a) na bahavaḥ sam aśakan nārbhakā abhi dādhṛṣuḥ /
analyzed: na bahavaḥ sam aśakan na arbhakāḥ abhi dādhṛṣuḥ

original: (AVŚ_1,27.3c) veṇor adgā ivābhito 'samṛddhā aghāyavaḥ //3//
analyzed: veṇoḥ adgāḥ iva abhitas samṛddhāḥ aghāyavaḥ

original: (AVŚ_1,27.4a) pretaṃ pādau pra sphurataṃ vahataṃ pṛṇato gṛhān /
analyzed: pretam pādau pra sphuratam vahatam pṛṇataḥ gṛhān

original: (AVŚ_1,27.4c) indrāny etu prathamājītāmuṣitā puraḥ //4//
analyzed: indrānī etu prathamā a jītā a muṣitā puras

original: (AVŚ_1,28.1a) upa prāgād devo agnī rakṣohāmīvacātanaḥ /
analyzed: upa prāgāt devaḥ agniḥ rakṣaḥ hā amīva cātanaḥ

original: (AVŚ_1,28.1c) dahann apa dvayāvino yātudhānān kimīdinaḥ //1//
analyzed: dahan apa dvayāvinaḥ yātudhānān kimīdinaḥ

original: (AVŚ_1,28.2a) prati daha yātudhānān prati deva kimīdinaḥ /
analyzed: prati daha yātudhānān prati deva kimīdinaḥ

original: (AVŚ_1,28.2c) pratīcīḥ kṛṣṇavartane saṃ daha yātudhānyaḥ //2//
analyzed: pratīcīḥ kṛṣṇa vartane sam daha yātudhānyaḥ

original: (AVŚ_1,28.3a) yā śaśāpa śapanena yāghaṃ mūram ādadhe /
analyzed: yā śaśāpa śapanena yā agham mūram ādadhe

original: (AVŚ_1,28.3c) yā rasasya haraṇāya jātam ārebhe tokam attu sā //3//
analyzed: yā rasasya haraṇāya jātam ārebhe tokam attu sā

original: (AVŚ_1,28.4a) putram attu yātudhānīḥ svasāram uta naptyam /
analyzed: putram attu yātudhānīḥ svasāram uta naptyam

original: (AVŚ_1,28.4c) adhā mitho vikeśyo vi ghnatāṃ yātudhānyo vi tṛhyantām arāyyaḥ //4//
analyzed: adhā mithas vikeśyaḥ vi ghnatām yātudhānyaḥ vi tṛhyantām arāyyaḥ

original: (AVŚ_1,29.1a) abhīvartena maṇinā yenendro abhivavṛdhe /
analyzed: abhīvartena maṇinā yena indraḥ abhivavṛdhe

original: (AVŚ_1,29.1c) tenāsmān brahmaṇas pate 'bhi rāṣṭrāya vardhaya //1//
analyzed: tena asmān brahmaṇas pate bhi rāṣṭrāya vardhaya

original: (AVŚ_1,29.2a) abhivṛtya sapatnān abhi yā no arātayaḥ /
analyzed: abhivṛtya sapatnān abhi yāḥ naḥ arātayaḥ

original: (AVŚ_1,29.2c) abhi pṛtanyantaṃ tiṣṭhābhi yo no durasyati //2//
analyzed: abhi pṛtanyantam tiṣṭha abhi yaḥ naḥ durasyati

original: (AVŚ_1,29.3a) abhi tvā devaḥ savitābhi ṣomo avīvṛdhat /
analyzed: abhi tvā devaḥ savitā abhi somaḥ avīvṛdhat

original: (AVŚ_1,29.3c) abhi tvā viśvā bhūtāny abhīvarto yathāsasi //3//
analyzed: abhi tvā viśvā bhūtāni abhīvartaḥ yathā asasi

original: (AVŚ_1,29.4a) abhīvarto abhibhavaḥ sapatnakṣayaṇo maṇiḥ /
analyzed: abhīvartaḥ abhibhavaḥ sapatna kṣayaṇaḥ maṇiḥ

original: (AVŚ_1,29.4c) rāṣṭrāya mahyaṃ badhyatāṃ sapatnebhyaḥ parābhuve //4//
analyzed: rāṣṭrāya mahyam badhyatām sapatnebhyaḥ parābhuve

original: (AVŚ_1,29.5a) ud asau sūryo agād ud idaṃ māmakaṃ vacaḥ /
analyzed: ud asau sūryaḥ agāt ud idam māmakam vacaḥ

original: (AVŚ_1,29.5c) yathāhaṃ śatruho 'sāny asapatnaḥ sapatnahā //5//
analyzed: yathā aham śatru ho sāni asapatnaḥ sapatna hā

original: (AVŚ_1,29.6a) sapatnakṣayaṇo vṛṣābhiraṣṭro viṣāsahiḥ /
analyzed: sapatna kṣayaṇaḥ vṛṣā abhiraṣṭraḥ viṣāsahiḥ

original: (AVŚ_1,29.6c) yathāham eṣāṃ vīrāṇāṃ virājāni janasya ca //6//
analyzed: yathā aham eṣām vīrāṇām virājāni janasya ca

original: (AVŚ_1,30.1a) viśve devā vasavo rakṣatemam utādityā jāgṛta yūyam asmin /
analyzed: viśve devāḥ vasavaḥ rakṣata imam uta ādityāḥ jāgṛta yūyam asmin

original: (AVŚ_1,30.1c) memaṃ sanābhir uta vānyanābhir memaṃ prāpat pauruṣeyo vadho yaḥ //1//
analyzed: mā imam sanābhiḥ uta vā anya nābhiḥ mā imam prāpat pauruṣeyaḥ vadhaḥ yaḥ

original: (AVŚ_1,30.2a) ye vo devāḥ pitaro ye ca putrāḥ sacetaso me śṛṇutedam uktam /
analyzed: ye vaḥ devāḥ pitaraḥ ye ca putrāḥ sacetasaḥ me śṛṇuta idam uktam

original: (AVŚ_1,30.2c) sarvebhyo vaḥ pari dadāmy etaṃ svasty enaṃ jarase vahātha //2//
analyzed: sarvebhyaḥ vaḥ pari dadāmi etam svasti enam jarase vahātha

original: (AVŚ_1,30.3a) ye devā divi ṣṭha ye pṛthivyāṃ ye antarikṣa oṣadhīṣu paśuṣv apsv antaḥ /
analyzed: ye devāḥ divi ṣṭha ye pṛthivyām ye antarikṣe oṣadhīṣu paśuṣu apsu antar

original: (AVŚ_1,30.3c) te kṛṇuta jarasam āyur asmai śatam anyān pari vṛṇaktu mṛtyūn //3//
analyzed: te kṛṇuta jarasam āyuḥ asmai śatam anyān pari vṛṇaktu mṛtyūn

original: (AVŚ_1,30.4a) yeṣāṃ prayājā uta vānuyājā hutabhāgā ahutādaś ca devāḥ /
analyzed: yeṣām prayājāḥ uta vā anuyājāḥ huta bhāgāḥ a huta adaḥ ca devāḥ

original: (AVŚ_1,30.4c) yeṣāṃ vaḥ pañca pradiśo vibhaktās tān vo asmai satrasadaḥ kṛṇomi //4//
analyzed: yeṣām vaḥ pañca pradiśaḥ vibhaktāḥ tān vaḥ asmai satra sadaḥ kṛṇomi

original: (AVŚ_1,31.1a) āśānām āśāpālebhyaś caturbhyo amṛtebhyaḥ /
analyzed: āśānām āśā pālebhyaḥ caturbhyaḥ amṛtebhyaḥ

original: (AVŚ_1,31.1c) idaṃ bhūtasyādhyakṣebhyo vidhema haviṣā vayam //1//
analyzed: idam bhūtasya adhyakṣebhyaḥ vidhema haviṣā vayam

original: (AVŚ_1,31.2a) ya āśānām āśāpālāś catvāra sthana devāḥ /
analyzed: ye āśānām āśā pālāḥ catvāraḥ sthana devāḥ

original: (AVŚ_1,31.2c) te no nirṛtyāḥ pāśebhyo muñcatāṃhasoaṃhasaḥ //2//
analyzed: te naḥ nirṛtyāḥ pāśebhyaḥ muñcata aṃhasaḥ aṃhasaḥ

original: (AVŚ_1,31.3a) asrāmas tvā haviṣā yajāmy aśloṇas tvā ghṛtena juhomi /
analyzed: a srāmaḥ tvā haviṣā yajāmi a śloṇaḥ tvā ghṛtena juhomi

original: (AVŚ_1,31.3c) ya āśānām āśāpālas turīyo devaḥ sa naḥ subhūtam eha vakṣat //3//
analyzed: yaḥ āśānām āśā pālaḥ turīyaḥ devaḥ sa naḥ subhūtam ā iha vakṣat

original: (AVŚ_1,31.4a) svasti mātra uta pitre no astu svasti gobhyo jagate puruṣebhyaḥ /
analyzed: svasti mātre uta pitre naḥ astu svasti gobhyaḥ jagate puruṣebhyaḥ

original: (AVŚ_1,31.4c) viśvam subhūtam suvidatraṃ no astu jyog eva dṛśema sūryam //4//
analyzed: viśvam subhūtam suvidatram naḥ astu jyok eva dṛśema sūryam

original: (AVŚ_1,32.1a) idaṃ janāso vidatha mahad brahma vadiṣyati /
analyzed: idam janāsaḥ vidatha mahat brahma vadiṣyati

original: (AVŚ_1,32.1c) na tat pṛthivyāṃ no divi yena prāṇanti vīrudhaḥ //1//
analyzed: na tat pṛthivyām na u divi yena prāṇanti vīrudhaḥ

original: (AVŚ_1,32.2a) antarikṣa āsāṃ sthāma śrāntasadām iva /
analyzed: antarikṣe āsām sthāma śrānta sadām iva

original: (AVŚ_1,32.2c) āsthānam asya bhūtasya viduṣ ṭad vedhaso na vā //2//
analyzed: āsthānam asya bhūtasya viduḥ tat vedhasaḥ na vā

original: (AVŚ_1,32.3a) yad rodasī rejamāne bhūmiś ca niratakṣatam /
analyzed: yat rodasī rejamāne bhūmiḥ ca niratakṣatam

original: (AVŚ_1,32.3c) ārdraṃ tad adya sarvadā samudrasyeva śrotyāḥ //3//
analyzed: ārdram tat adya sarvadā samudrasya iva śrotyāḥ

original: (AVŚ_1,32.4a) viśvam anyām abhīvāra tad anyasyām adhi śritam /
analyzed: viśvam anyām abhīvāra tat anyasyām adhi śritam

original: (AVŚ_1,32.4c) dive ca viśvavedase pṛthivyai cākaraṃ namaḥ //4//
analyzed: dive ca viśva vedase pṛthivyai ca akaram namaḥ

original: (AVŚ_1,33.1a) hiraṇyavarṇāḥ śucayaḥ pāvakā yāsu jātaḥ savitā yāsv agniḥ /
analyzed: hiraṇya varṇāḥ śucayaḥ pāvakāḥ yāsu jātaḥ savitā yāsu agniḥ

original: (AVŚ_1,33.1c) yā agniṃ garbhaṃ dadhire suvarṇās tā na āpaḥ śaṃ syonā bhavantu //1//
analyzed: yāḥ agnim garbham dadhire su varṇāḥ tāḥ naḥ āpaḥ śam syonāḥ bhavantu

original: (AVŚ_1,33.2a) yāsāṃ rājā varuṇo yāti madhye satyānṛte avapaśyan janānām /
analyzed: yāsām rājā varuṇaḥ yāti madhye satya anṛte avapaśyan janānām

original: (AVŚ_1,33.2c) yā agniṃ garbhaṃ dadhire suvarṇās tā na āpaḥ śaṃ syonā bhavantu //2//
analyzed: yāḥ agnim garbham dadhire su varṇāḥ tāḥ naḥ āpaḥ śam syonāḥ bhavantu

original: (AVŚ_1,33.3a) yāsāṃ devā divi kṛṇvanti bhakṣaṃ yā antarikṣe bahudhā bhavanti /
analyzed: yāsām devāḥ divi kṛṇvanti bhakṣam yāḥ antarikṣe bahudhā bhavanti

original: (AVŚ_1,33.3c) yā agniṃ garbhaṃ dadhire suvarṇās tā na āpaḥ śaṃ syonā bhavantu //3//
analyzed: yāḥ agnim garbham dadhire su varṇāḥ tāḥ naḥ āpaḥ śam syonāḥ bhavantu

original: (AVŚ_1,33.4a) śivena mā cakṣuṣā paśyatāpaḥ śivayā tanvopa spṛśata tvacaṃ me /
analyzed: śivena mā cakṣuṣā paśyata apaḥ śivayā tanvā upa spṛśata tvacam me

original: (AVŚ_1,33.4c) ghṛtaścutaḥ śucayo yāḥ pāvakās tā na āpaḥ śaṃ syonā bhavantu //4//
analyzed: ghṛtaścutaḥ śucayaḥ yāḥ pāvakāḥ tāḥ naḥ āpaḥ śam syonāḥ bhavantu

original: (AVŚ_1,34.1a) iyaṃ vīrun madhujātā madhunā tvā khanāmasi /
analyzed: iyam vīrudh madhu jātā madhunā tvā khanāmasi

original: (AVŚ_1,34.1c) madhor adhi prajātāsi sā no madhumatas kṛdhi //1//
analyzed: madhoḥ adhi prajātā asi sā naḥ madhumataḥ kṛdhi

original: (AVŚ_1,34.2a) jihvāyā agre madhu me jihvāmūle madhūlakam /
analyzed: jihvāyāḥ agre madhu me jihvā mūle madhūlakam

original: (AVŚ_1,34.2c) mamed aha kratāv aso mama cittam upāyasi //2//
analyzed: mama id aha kratau asaḥ mama cittam upāyasi

original: (AVŚ_1,34.3a) madhuman me nikramaṇaṃ madhuman me parāyaṇam /
analyzed: madhumat me nikramaṇam madhumat me parāyaṇam

original: (AVŚ_1,34.3c) vācā vadāmi madhumad bhūyāsaṃ madhusaṃdṛśaḥ //3//
analyzed: vācā vadāmi madhumat bhūyāsam madhu saṃdṛśaḥ

original: (AVŚ_1,34.4a) madhor asmi madhutaro madughān madhumattaraḥ /
analyzed: madhoḥ asmi madhutaraḥ madughāt madhumattaraḥ

original: (AVŚ_1,34.4c) mām it kila tvaṃ vanāḥ śākhāṃ madhumatīm iva //4//
analyzed: mām id kila tvam vanāḥ śākhām madhumatīm iva

original: (AVŚ_1,34.5a) pari tvā paritatnunekṣuṇāgām avidviṣe /
analyzed: pari tvā paritatnunā ikṣuṇā agām a vidviṣe

original: (AVŚ_1,34.5c) yathā māṃ kaminy aso yathā man nāpagā asaḥ //5//
analyzed: yathā mām kaminī asaḥ yathā mat na āpagā asaḥ

original: (AVŚ_1,35.1a) yad ābadhnan dākṣāyaṇā hiraṇyaṃ śatānīkāya sumanasyamānāḥ /
analyzed: yat ābadhnan dākṣāyaṇāḥ hiraṇyam śatānīkāya sumanasyamānāḥ

original: (AVŚ_1,35.1c) tat te badnāmy āyuṣe varcase balāya dīrghāyutvāya śataśāradāya //1//
analyzed: tat te badnāmi āyuṣe varcase balāya dīrgha āyu tvāya śata śāradāya

original: (AVŚ_1,35.2a) nainaṃ rakṣāṃsi na piśācāḥ sahante devānām ojaḥ prathamajam hy etat /
analyzed: na enam rakṣāṃsi na piśācāḥ sahante devānām ojaḥ prathama jam hi etat

original: (AVŚ_1,35.2c) yo bibharti dākṣāyaṇaṃ hiraṇyaṃ sa jīveṣu kṛṇute dīrgham āyuḥ //2//
analyzed: yaḥ bibharti dākṣāyaṇam hiraṇyam sa jīveṣu kṛṇute dīrgham āyuḥ

original: (AVŚ_1,35.3a) apāṃ tejo jyotir ojo balaṃ ca vanaspatīnām uta vīryāṇi /
analyzed: apām tejaḥ jyotiḥ ojaḥ balam ca vanaspatīnām uta vīryāṇi

original: (AVŚ_1,35.3c) indra ivendriyāṇy adhi dhārayāmo asmin tad dakṣamāṇo bibharad dhiraṇyam //3//
analyzed: indraḥ iva indriyāṇi adhi dhārayāmaḥ asmin tat dakṣamāṇaḥ bibharat hiraṇyam

original: (AVŚ_1,35.4a) samānāṃ māsām ṛtubhiṣ ṭvā vayaṃ saṃvatsarasya payasā piparmi /
analyzed: samānām māsām ṛtubhiḥ tvā vayam saṃvatsarasya payasā piparmi

original: (AVŚ_1,35.4c) indrāgnī viśve devās te 'nu manyantām ahṛṇīyamānāḥ //4//
analyzed: indra agnī viśve devāḥ te nu manyantām a hṛṇīyamānāḥ

original: (AVŚ_2,1.1a) venas tat paśyat paramaṃ guhā yad yatra viśvaṃ bhavaty ekarūpam /
analyzed: venaḥ tat paśyat paramam guhā yat yatra viśvam bhavati eka rūpam

original: (AVŚ_2,1.1c) idaṃ pṛśnir aduhaj jāyamānāḥ svarvido abhy anūṣata vrāḥ //1//
analyzed: idam pṛśniḥ aduhat jāyamānāḥ svar vidaḥ abhī anūṣata vrāḥ

original: (AVŚ_2,1.2a) pra tad voced amṛtasya vidvān gandharvo dhāma paramaṃ guhā yat /
analyzed: pra tat vocet amṛtasya vidvān gandharvaḥ dhāma paramam guhā yat

original: (AVŚ_2,1.2c) trīṇi padāni nihitā guhāsya yas tāni veda sa pituṣ pitāsat //2//
analyzed: trīṇi padāni nihitā guhā asya yaḥ tāni veda sa pituḥ pitā asat

original: (AVŚ_2,1.3a) sa naḥ pitā janitā sa uta bandhur dhāmāni veda bhuvanāni viśvā /
analyzed: sa naḥ pitā janitā saḥ uta bandhuḥ dhāmāni veda bhuvanāni viśvā

original: (AVŚ_2,1.3c) yo devānāṃ nāmadha eka eva taṃ saṃpraśnaṃ bhuvanā yanti sarvā //3//
analyzed: yaḥ devānām nāmadhaḥ ekaḥ eva tam saṃpraśnam bhuvanā yanti sarvā

original: (AVŚ_2,1.4a) pari dyāvāpṛthivī sadya āyam upātiṣṭhe prathamajām ṛtasya /
analyzed: pari dyāvāpṛthivī sadyas ā ayam upātiṣṭhe prathama jām ṛtasya

original: (AVŚ_2,1.4c) vācam iva vaktari bhuvaneṣṭhā dhāsyur eṣa nanv eṣo agniḥ //4//
analyzed: vācam iva vaktari bhuvaneṣṭhāḥ dhāsyuḥ eṣa nanu eṣaḥ agniḥ

original: (AVŚ_2,1.5a) pari viśvā bhuvanāny āyam ṛtasya tantuṃ vitataṃ dṛśe kam /
analyzed: pari viśvā bhuvanāni āyam ṛtasya tantum vitatam dṛśe kam

original: (AVŚ_2,1.5c) yatra devā amṛtam ānaśānāḥ samāne yonāv adhy airayanta //5//
analyzed: yatra devāḥ amṛtam ānaśānāḥ samāne yonau adhi airayanta

original: (AVŚ_2,2.1a) divyo gandharvo bhuvanasya yas patir eka eva namasyo vikṣv īḍyaḥ /
analyzed: divyaḥ gandharvaḥ bhuvanasya yaḥ patiḥ ekaḥ eva namasyaḥ vikṣu īḍyaḥ

original: (AVŚ_2,2.1c) taṃ tvā yaumi brahmaṇā divya deva namas te astu divi te sadhastham //1//
analyzed: tam tvā yaumi brahmaṇā divya deva namaḥ te astu divi te sadhastham

original: (AVŚ_2,2.2a) divi spṛṣṭo yajataḥ sūryatvag avayātā haraso daivyasya /
analyzed: divi spṛṣṭaḥ yajataḥ sūrya tvac avayātā harasaḥ daivyasya

original: (AVŚ_2,2.2c) mṛḍāt gandharvo bhuvanasya yas patir eka eva namasyaḥ suśevāḥ //2//
analyzed: mṛḍāt gandharvaḥ bhuvanasya yaḥ patiḥ ekaḥ eva namasyaḥ suśevāḥ

original: (AVŚ_2,2.3a) anavadyābhiḥ sam u jagma ābhir apsarāsv api gandharva āsīt /
analyzed: anavadyābhiḥ sam u jagme ābhiḥ apsarāsu api gandharvaḥ āsīt

original: (AVŚ_2,2.3c) samudra āsāṃ sadanaṃ ma āhur yataḥ sadya ā ca parā ca yanti //3//
analyzed: samudre āsām sadanam me āhuḥ yatas sadyas ā ca parā ca yanti

original: (AVŚ_2,2.4a) abhriye didyun nakṣatriye yā viśvāvasuṃ gandharvaṃ sacadhve /
analyzed: abhriye didyut nakṣatriye yāḥ viśvāvasum gandharvam sacadhve

original: (AVŚ_2,2.4c) tābhyo vo devīr nama it kṛṇomi //4//
analyzed: tābhyaḥ vaḥ devīḥ namaḥ id kṛṇomi

original: (AVŚ_2,2.5a) yāḥ klandās tamiṣīcayo 'kṣakāmā manomuhaḥ /
analyzed: yāḥ klandāḥ tamiṣīcayaḥ kṣakāmāḥ manaḥ muhaḥ

original: (AVŚ_2,2.5c) tābhyo gandharvabhyo 'psarābhyo 'karam namaḥ //5//
analyzed: tābhyaḥ gandharvabhyaḥ psarābhyaḥ karam namaḥ

original: (AVŚ_2,3.1a) ado yad avadhāvaty avatkam adhi parvatāt /
analyzed: adaḥ yat avadhāvati avatkam adhi parvatāt

original: (AVŚ_2,3.1c) tat te kṛṇomi bheṣajaṃ subheṣajaṃ yathāsasi //1//
analyzed: tat te kṛṇomi bheṣajam su bheṣajam yathā asasi

original: (AVŚ_2,3.2a) ād aṅgā kuvid aṅga śataṃ yā bheṣajāni te /
analyzed: āt aṅga kuvid aṅga śatam yā bheṣajāni te

original: (AVŚ_2,3.2c) teṣām asi tvam uttamam anāsrāvam arogaṇam //2//
analyzed: teṣām asi tvam uttamam anāsrāvam arogaṇam

original: (AVŚ_2,3.3a) nīcaiḥ khananty asurā arusrāṇam idaṃ mahat /
analyzed: nīcais khananti asurāḥ arusrāṇam idam mahat

original: (AVŚ_2,3.3c) tad āsrāvasya bheṣajaṃ tad u rogam anīnaśat //3//
analyzed: tat āsrāvasya bheṣajam tat u rogam anīnaśat

original: (AVŚ_2,3.4a) upajīkā ud bharanti samudrād adhi bheṣajam /
analyzed: upajīkāḥ ud bharanti samudrāt adhi bheṣajam

original: (AVŚ_2,3.4c) tad āsrāvasya bheṣajaṃ tad u rogam aśīśamat //4//
analyzed: tat āsrāvasya bheṣajam tat u rogam aśīśamat

original: (AVŚ_2,3.5a) arusrāṇam idaṃ mahat pṛthivyā adhy udbhṛtam /
analyzed: arusrāṇam idam mahat pṛthivyāḥ adhi udbhṛtam

original: (AVŚ_2,3.5c) tad āsrāvasya bheṣajaṃ tad u rogam anīnaśat //5//
analyzed: tat āsrāvasya bheṣajam tat u rogam anīnaśat

original: (AVŚ_2,3.6a) śaṃ no bhavantv apa oṣadhayaḥ śivāḥ /
analyzed: śam naḥ bhavantu apaḥ oṣadhayaḥ śivāḥ

original: (AVŚ_2,3.6c) indrasya vajro apa hantu rakṣasa ārād visṛṣṭā iṣavaḥ patantu rakṣasām //6//
analyzed: indrasya vajraḥ apa hantu rakṣasaḥ ārāt visṛṣṭāḥ iṣavaḥ patantu rakṣasām

original: (AVŚ_2,4.1a) dīrghāyutvāya bṛhate raṇāyāriṣyanto dakṣamāṇāḥ sadaiva /
analyzed: dīrgha āyu tvāya bṛhate raṇāya a riṣyantaḥ dakṣamāṇāḥ sadā eva

original: (AVŚ_2,4.1c) maṇiṃ viṣkandhadūṣaṇaṃ jaṅgiḍaṃ bibhṛmo vayam //1//
analyzed: maṇim viṣkandha dūṣaṇam jaṅgiḍam bibhṛmaḥ vayam

original: (AVŚ_2,4.2a) jaṅgiḍo jambhād viśarād viṣkandhād abhiśocanāt /
analyzed: jaṅgiḍaḥ jambhāt viśarāt viṣkandhāt abhiśocanāt

original: (AVŚ_2,4.2c) maṇiḥ sahasravīryaḥ pari ṇaḥ pātu viśvataḥ //2//
analyzed: maṇiḥ sahasra vīryaḥ pari naḥ pātu viśvatas

original: (AVŚ_2,4.3a) ayaṃ viṣkandhaṃ sahate 'yaṃ bādhate attriṇaḥ /
analyzed: ayam viṣkandham sahate yam bādhate attriṇaḥ

original: (AVŚ_2,4.3c) ayaṃ no viśvabheṣajo jaṅgiḍaḥ pātv aṃhasaḥ //3//
analyzed: ayam naḥ viśva bheṣajaḥ jaṅgiḍaḥ pātu aṃhasaḥ

original: (AVŚ_2,4.4a) devair dattena maṇinā jaṅgiḍena mayobhuvā /
analyzed: devaiḥ dattena maṇinā jaṅgiḍena mayobhuvā

original: (AVŚ_2,4.4c) viṣkandhaṃ sarvā rakṣāṃsi vyāyāme sahāmahe //4//
analyzed: viṣkandham sarvā rakṣāṃsi vyāyāme sahāmahe

original: (AVŚ_2,4.5a) śaṇaś ca mā jaṅgiḍaś ca viṣkandhād abhi rakṣatām /
analyzed: śaṇaḥ ca mā jaṅgiḍaḥ ca viṣkandhāt abhi rakṣatām

original: (AVŚ_2,4.5c) araṇyād anya ābhṛtaḥ kṛṣyā anyo rasebhyaḥ //5//
analyzed: araṇyāt anyaḥ ābhṛtaḥ kṛṣyāḥ anyaḥ rasebhyaḥ

original: (AVŚ_2,4.6a) kṛtyādūṣir ayaṃ maṇir atho arātidūṣiḥ /
analyzed: kṛtyā dūṣiḥ ayam maṇiḥ atha u arāti dūṣiḥ

original: (AVŚ_2,4.6c) atho sahasvān jaṅgiḍaḥ pra ṇa āyuṃṣi tāriṣat //6//
analyzed: atha u sahasvān jaṅgiḍaḥ pra naḥ āyuṃṣi tāriṣat

original: (AVŚ_2,5.1a) indra juṣasva pra vahā yāhi śūra haribhyām /
analyzed: indra juṣasva pra vaha ā yāhi śūra haribhyām

original: (AVŚ_2,5.1c) pibā sutasya mater iha madhoś cakānaś cārur madāya //1//
analyzed: pibā sutasya mateḥ iha madhoḥ cakānaḥ cāruḥ madāya

original: (AVŚ_2,5.2a) indra jaṭharaṃ navyo na pṛṇasva madhor divo na /
analyzed: indra jaṭharam navyaḥ na pṛṇasva madhoḥ divaḥ na

original: (AVŚ_2,5.2c) asya sutasya svar ṇopa tvā madāḥ suvāco aguḥ //2//
analyzed: asya sutasya svar na upa tvā madāḥ su vācaḥ aguḥ

original: (AVŚ_2,5.3a) indras turāṣāṇ mitro vṛtraṃ yo jaghāna yatīr na /
analyzed: indraḥ turāṣāh mitraḥ vṛtram yaḥ jaghāna yatīḥ na

original: (AVŚ_2,5.3c) bibheda valaṃ bhṛgur na sasahe śatrūn made somasya //3//
analyzed: bibheda valam bhṛguḥ na sasahe śatrūn made somasya

original: (AVŚ_2,5.4a) ā tvā viśantu sutāsa indra pṛṇasva kukṣī viḍḍhi śakra dhiyehy ā naḥ /
analyzed: ā tvā viśantu sutāsaḥ indra pṛṇasva kukṣī viṣ śakra dhiyā ihi ā naḥ

original: (AVŚ_2,5.4c) śrudhī havaṃ giro me juṣasvendra svayugbhir matsveha mahe raṇāya //4//
analyzed: śrudhi havam giraḥ me juṣasva indra svayugbhiḥ matsva iha mahe raṇāya

original: (AVŚ_2,5.5a) indrasya nu pra vocaṃ vīryāṇi yāni cakāra prathamāni vajrī /
analyzed: indrasya nu pra vocam vīryāṇi yāni cakāra prathamāni vajrī

original: (AVŚ_2,5.5c) ahann ahim anu apas tatarda pra vakṣaṇā abhinat parvatānām //5//
analyzed: ahan ahim anu apaḥ tatarda pra vakṣaṇāḥ abhinat parvatānām

original: (AVŚ_2,5.6a) ahann ahiṃ parvate śiśriyāṇaṃ tvaṣṭāsmai vajraṃ svaryaṃ tatakṣa /
analyzed: ahan ahim parvate śiśriyāṇam tvaṣṭā asmai vajram svaryam tatakṣa

original: (AVŚ_2,5.6c) vāśrā iva dhenavaḥ syandamānā añjaḥ samudram ava jagmur āpaḥ //6//
analyzed: vāśrāḥ iva dhenavaḥ syandamānāḥ añjas samudram ava jagmuḥ āpaḥ

original: (AVŚ_2,5.7a) vṛṣāyamāṇo avṛṇīta somaṃ trikadrukeṣu apibat sutasya /
analyzed: vṛṣāyamāṇaḥ avṛṇīta somam trikadrukeṣu apibat sutasya

original: (AVŚ_2,5.7c) ā sāyakaṃ maghavādatta vajram ahann enaṃ prathamajām ahīnām //7//
analyzed: ā sāyakam maghavā adatta vajram ahan enam prathama jām ahīnām

original: (AVŚ_2,6.1a) samās tvāgna ṛtavo vardhayantu saṃvatsarā ṛṣayo yāni satyā /
analyzed: samāḥ tvā agne ṛtavaḥ vardhayantu saṃvatsarāḥ ṛṣayaḥ yāni satyā

original: (AVŚ_2,6.1c) saṃ divyena dīdihi rocanena viśvā ā māhi pradiśaś catasraḥ //1//
analyzed: sam divyena dīdihi rocanena viśvāḥ ā māhi pradiśaḥ catasraḥ

original: (AVŚ_2,6.2a) saṃ cedhyasvāgne pra ca vardhayemam uc ca tiṣṭha mahate saubhagāya /
analyzed: sam ca idhyasva agne pra ca vardhaya imam ud ca tiṣṭha mahate saubhagāya

original: (AVŚ_2,6.2c) mā te riṣann upasattāro agne brahmāṇas te yaśasaḥ santu mānye //2//
analyzed: mā te riṣan upasattāraḥ agne brahmāṇaḥ te yaśasaḥ santu mā anye

original: (AVŚ_2,6.3a) tvām agne vṛṇate brāhmaṇā ime śivo agne saṃvaraṇe bhavā naḥ /
analyzed: tvām agne vṛṇate brāhmaṇāḥ ime śivaḥ agne saṃvaraṇe bhava naḥ

original: (AVŚ_2,6.3c) sapatnahāgne abhimātijid bhava sve gaye jāgṛhy aprayuchan //3//
analyzed: sapatna hā agne abhimāti jit bhava sve gaye jāgṛhi aprayuchan

original: (AVŚ_2,6.4a) kṣatreṇāgne svena saṃ rabhasva mitreṇāgne mitradhā yatasva /
analyzed: kṣatreṇa agne svena sam rabhasva mitreṇa agne mitradhā yatasva

original: (AVŚ_2,6.4c) sajātānāṃ madhyameṣṭhā rājñām agne vihavyo dīdihīha //4//
analyzed: sajātānām madhyameṣṭhāḥ rājñām agne vihavyaḥ dīdihi iha

original: (AVŚ_2,6.5a) ati niho ati sṛdho 'ty acittīr ati dviṣaḥ /
analyzed: ati nihaḥ ati sṛdhaḥ ti acittīḥ ati dviṣaḥ

original: (AVŚ_2,6.5c) viśvā hy agne duritā tara tvam athāsmabhyaṃ sahavīraṃ rayiṃ dāḥ //5//
analyzed: viśvā hi agne duritā tara tvam atha asmabhyam saha vīram rayim dāḥ

original: (AVŚ_2,7.1a) aghadviṣṭā devajātā vīruc chapathayopanī /
analyzed: agha dviṣṭā deva jātā vīrudh śapathayopanī

original: (AVŚ_2,7.1c) āpo malam iva prāṇaikṣīt sarvān mac chapathāṃ adhi //1//
analyzed: āpaḥ malam iva prāṇaikṣīt sarvān mat śapathām adhi

original: (AVŚ_2,7.2a) yaś ca sāpatnaḥ śapatho jāmyāḥ śapathaś ca yaḥ /
analyzed: yaḥ ca sāpatnaḥ śapathaḥ jāmyāḥ śapathaḥ ca yaḥ

original: (AVŚ_2,7.2c) brahmā yan manyutaḥ śapāt sarvaṃ tan no adhaspadam //2//
analyzed: brahmā yat manyutaḥ śapāt sarvam tat naḥ adhaspadam

original: (AVŚ_2,7.3a) divo mūlam avatataṃ pṛthivyā adhy uttatam /
analyzed: divaḥ mūlam avatatam pṛthivyāḥ adhi uttatam

original: (AVŚ_2,7.3c) tena sahasrakāṇḍena pari ṇaḥ pāhi viśvataḥ //3//
analyzed: tena sahasra kāṇḍena pari naḥ pāhi viśvatas

original: (AVŚ_2,7.4a) pari māṃ pari me prajāṃ pari ṇaḥ pāhi yad dhanam /
analyzed: pari mām pari me prajām pari naḥ pāhi yat dhanam

original: (AVŚ_2,7.4c) arātir no mā tārīn mā nas tāriśur abhimātayaḥ //4//
analyzed: arātiḥ naḥ mā tārīt mā naḥ tāriśuḥ abhimātayaḥ

original: (AVŚ_2,7.5a) śaptāram etu śapatho yaḥ suhārt tena naḥ saha /
analyzed: śaptāram etu śapathaḥ yaḥ suhārd tena naḥ saha

original: (AVŚ_2,7.5c) cakṣurmantrasya durhārdaḥ pṛṣṭīr api śṛṇīmasi //5//
analyzed: cakṣuḥ mantrasya durhārdaḥ pṛṣṭīḥ api śṛṇīmasi

original: (AVŚ_2,8.1a) ud agātāṃ bhagavatī vicṛtau nāma tārake /
analyzed: ud agātām bhagavatī vicṛtau nāma tārake

original: (AVŚ_2,8.1c) vi kṣetriyasya muñcatām adhamaṃ pāśam uttamam //1//
analyzed: vi kṣetriyasya muñcatām adhamam pāśam uttamam

original: (AVŚ_2,8.2a) apeyaṃ rātry uchatv apochantv abhikṛtvarīḥ /
analyzed: apa iyam rātrī uchatu apa ucchantu abhikṛtvarīḥ

original: (AVŚ_2,8.2c) vīrut kṣetriyanāśany apa kṣetriyam uchatu //2//
analyzed: vīrudh kṣetriya nāśanī apa kṣetriyam uchatu

original: (AVŚ_2,8.3a) babhror arjunakāṇḍasya yavasya te palālyā tilasya tilapiñjyā /
analyzed: babhroḥ arjuna kāṇḍasya yavasya te palālyā tilasya tila piñjyā

original: (AVŚ_2,8.3c) vīrut kṣetriyanāśany apa kṣetriyam uchatu //3//
analyzed: vīrudh kṣetriya nāśanī apa kṣetriyam uchatu

original: (AVŚ_2,8.4a) namas te lāṅgalebhyo nama īṣāyugebhyaḥ /
analyzed: namaḥ te lāṅgalebhyaḥ namaḥ īṣā yugebhyaḥ

original: (AVŚ_2,8.4c) vīrut kṣetriyanāśany apa kṣetriyam uchatu //4//
analyzed: vīrudh kṣetriya nāśanī apa kṣetriyam uchatu

original: (AVŚ_2,8.5a) namaḥ sanisrasākṣebhyo namaḥ saṃdeśyebhyaḥ /
analyzed: namaḥ sanisrasa akṣebhyaḥ namaḥ saṃdeśyebhyaḥ

original: (AVŚ_2,8.5c) namaḥ kṣetrasya pataye vīrut kṣetriyanāśany apa kṣetriyam uchatu //5//
analyzed: namaḥ kṣetrasya pataye vīrudh kṣetriya nāśanī apa kṣetriyam uchatu

original: (AVŚ_2,9.1a) daśavṛkṣa muñcemaṃ rakṣaso grāhyā adhi yainaṃ jagrāha parvasu /
analyzed: daśa vṛkṣa muñca imam rakṣasaḥ grāhyāḥ adhi yā enam jagrāha parvasu

original: (AVŚ_2,9.1c) atho enam vanaspate jīvānāṃ lokam un naya //1//
analyzed: atha u enam vanaspate jīvānām lokam ud naya

original: (AVŚ_2,9.2a) āgād ud agād ayaṃ jīvānāṃ vrātam apy agāt /
analyzed: āgāt ud agāt ayam jīvānām vrātam api agāt

original: (AVŚ_2,9.2c) abhūd u putrāṇāṃ pitā nṛṇāṃ ca bhagavattamaḥ //2//
analyzed: abhūt u putrāṇām pitā nṛṇām ca bhagavattamaḥ

original: (AVŚ_2,9.3a) adhītīr adhy agād ayam adhi jīvapurā agān /
analyzed: adhītīḥ adhi agāt ayam adhi jīva purāḥ agān

original: (AVŚ_2,9.3c) śataṃ hy asya bhiṣajaḥ sahasram uta vīrudhaḥ //3//
analyzed: śatam hi asya bhiṣajaḥ sahasram uta vīrudhaḥ

original: (AVŚ_2,9.4a) devās te cītim avidan brahmāṇa uta vīrudhaḥ /
analyzed: devāḥ te cītim avidan brahmāṇaḥ uta vīrudhaḥ

original: (AVŚ_2,9.4c) cītiṃ te viśve devā avidan bhūmyām adhi //4//
analyzed: cītim te viśve devāḥ avidan bhūmyām adhi

original: (AVŚ_2,9.5a) yaś cakāra sa niṣ karat sa eva subhiṣaktamaḥ /
analyzed: yaḥ cakāra sa niḥ karat saḥ eva subhiṣaktamaḥ

original: (AVŚ_2,9.5c) sa eva tubhyaṃ bheṣajāni kṛṇavad bhiṣajā śuciḥ //5//
analyzed: saḥ eva tubhyam bheṣajāni kṛṇavat bhiṣajā śuciḥ

original: (AVŚ_2,10.1a) kṣetriyāt tvā nirṛtyā jāmiśaṃsād druho muñcāmi varuṇasya pāśāt /
analyzed: kṣetriyāt tvā nirṛtyāḥ jāmi śaṃsāt druhaḥ muñcāmi varuṇasya pāśāt

original: (AVŚ_2,10.1c) anāgasaṃ brahmaṇā tvā kṛṇomi śive te dyāvāpṛthivī ubhe stām //1//
analyzed: anāgasam brahmaṇā tvā kṛṇomi śive te dyāvāpṛthivī ubhe stām

original: (AVŚ_2,10.2a) śaṃ te agniḥ sahādbhir astu śaṃ somaḥ sahauṣadhībhiḥ /
analyzed: śam te agniḥ saha adbhiḥ astu śam somaḥ saha oṣadhībhiḥ

original: (AVŚ_2,10.2c) evāhaṃ tvāṃ kṣetriyān nirṛtyā jāmiśaṃsād druho muñcāmi varuṇasya pāśāt /
analyzed: eva aham tvām kṣetriyāt nirṛtyāḥ jāmi śaṃsāt druhaḥ muñcāmi varuṇasya pāśāt

original: (AVŚ_2,10.2e) anāgasaṃ brahmaṇā tvā kṛṇomi śive te dyāvāpṛthivī ubhe stām //2//

original: (AVŚ_2,27.4c) prāśaṃ pratiprāśo jahy arasān kṛṇv oṣadhe //4//

analyzed: prāśam pratiprāśaḥ jahi arasān kṛṇu oṣadhe

original: (AVŚ_2,27.6a) rudra jalāṣabheṣaja nīlaśikhaṇḍa karmakṛt /
(AVŚ_2,27.6c) prāśaṃ pratiprāśo jahy arasān kṛṇv oṣadhe //6//

original: (AVŚ_2,27.7c) adhi no brūhi śaktibhiḥ prāśi mām uttaraṃ kṛdhi //7//
