analyzed: rāyaḥ poṣam savitar ā suva asmai śatam jīvāti śaradaḥ tava ayam

original: (AVŚ_2,29.3a) āśīr ṇa ūrjam uta sauprajāstvaṃ dakṣaṃ dhattaṃ draviṇaṃ sacetasau /
analyzed: āśīḥ naḥ ūrjam uta sauprajāstvam dakṣam dhattam draviṇam sacetasau

original: (AVŚ_2,29.3c) jayam kṣetrāṇi sahasāyam indra kṛṇvāno anyān adharānt sapatnān //3//
analyzed: jayam kṣetrāṇi sahasā ayam indra kṛṇvānaḥ anyān adharān sapatnān

original: (AVŚ_2,29.4a) indreṇa datto varuṇena śiṣṭo marudbhir ugraḥ prahito no āgan /
analyzed: indreṇa dattaḥ varuṇena śiṣṭaḥ marudbhiḥ ugraḥ prahitaḥ naḥ āgan

original: (AVŚ_2,29.4c) eṣa vāṃ dyāvāpṛthivī upasthe mā kṣudhan mā tṛṣat //4//
analyzed: eṣa vām dyāvāpṛthivī upasthe mā kṣudhat mā tṛṣat

original: (AVŚ_2,29.5a) ūrjam asmā ūrjasvatī dhattaṃ payo asmai payasvatī dhattam /
analyzed: ūrjam asmai ūrjasvatī dhattam payaḥ asmai payasvatī dhattam

original: (AVŚ_2,29.5c) ūrjam asmai dyāvapṛthivī adhātāṃ viśve devā maruta ūrjam āpaḥ //5//
analyzed: ūrjam asmai dyāva pṛthivī adhātām viśve devāḥ marutaḥ ūrjam āpaḥ

original: (AVŚ_2,29.6a) śivābhiṣ ṭe hṛdayaṃ tarpayāmy anamīvo modiṣīṣṭhāḥ suvarcāḥ /
analyzed: śivābhiḥ te hṛdayam tarpayāmi anamīvaḥ modiṣīṣṭhāḥ su varcāḥ

original: (AVŚ_2,29.6c) savāsinau pibatāṃ mantham etam aśvino rūpaṃ paridhāya māyām //6//
analyzed: sa vāsinau pibatām mantham etam aśvinoḥ rūpam paridhāya māyām

original: (AVŚ_2,29.7a) indra etāṃ sasṛje viddho agra ūrjāṃ svadhām ajarāṃ sā ta eṣā /
analyzed: indraḥ etām sasṛje viddhaḥ agre ūrjām svadhām ajarām sā te eṣā

original: (AVŚ_2,29.7c) tayā tvaṃ jīva śaradaḥ suvarcā mā ta ā susrod bhiṣajas te akran //7//
analyzed: tayā tvam jīva śaradaḥ su varcāḥ mā te ā susrot bhiṣajaḥ te akran

original: (AVŚ_2,30.1a) yathedaṃ bhūmyā adhi tṛṇaṃ vāto mathāyati /
analyzed: yathā idam bhūmyāḥ adhi tṛṇam vātaḥ mathāyati

original: (AVŚ_2,30.1c) evā mathnāmi te mano yathā māṃ kāminy aso yathā man nāpagā asaḥ //1//
analyzed: eva mathnāmi te manaḥ yathā mām kāminī asaḥ yathā mat na āpagā asaḥ

original: (AVŚ_2,30.2a) saṃ cen nayātho aśvinā kāminā saṃ ca vakṣathaḥ /
analyzed: sam ced nayāthaḥ aśvinā kāminā sam ca vakṣathaḥ

original: (AVŚ_2,30.2c) saṃ vāṃ bhagāso agmata saṃ cittāni sam u vratā //2//
analyzed: sam vām bhagāsaḥ agmata sam cittāni sam u vratā

original: (AVŚ_2,30.3a) yat suparṇā vivakṣavo anamīvā vivakṣavaḥ /
analyzed: yat suparṇāḥ vivakṣavaḥ anamīvāḥ vivakṣavaḥ

original: (AVŚ_2,30.3c) tatra me gachatād dhavaṃ śalya iva kulmalaṃ yathā //3//
analyzed: tatra me gacchatāt dhavam śalyaḥ iva kulmalam yathā

original: (AVŚ_2,30.4a) yad antaraṃ tad bāhyaṃ yad bāhyaṃ tad antaram /
analyzed: yat antaram tat bāhyam yat bāhyam tat antaram

original: (AVŚ_2,30.4c) kanyānāṃ viśvarūpāṇāṃ mano gṛbhāyauṣadhe //4//
analyzed: kanyānām viśva rūpāṇām manaḥ gṛbhāya oṣadhe

original: (AVŚ_2,30.5a) eyam agan patikāmā janikāmo 'ham āgamam /
analyzed: ā iyam agan pati kāmā jani kāmaḥ ham āgamam

original: (AVŚ_2,30.5c) aśvaḥ kanikradad yathā bhagenāhaṃ sahāgamam //5//
analyzed: aśvaḥ kanikradat yathā bhagena aham saha agamam

original: (AVŚ_2,31.1a) indrasya yā mahī dṛṣat krimer viśvasya tarhaṇī /
analyzed: indrasya yā mahī dṛṣad krimeḥ viśvasya tarhaṇī

original: (AVŚ_2,31.1c) tayā pinaṣmi saṃ krimīn dṛṣadā khalvāṃ iva //1//
analyzed: tayā pinaṣmi sam krimīn dṛṣadā khalvān iva

original: (AVŚ_2,31.2a) dṛṣṭam adṛṣṭam atṛham atho kurūrum atṛham /
analyzed: dṛṣṭam a dṛṣṭam atṛham atho kurūrum atṛham

original: (AVŚ_2,31.2c) algaṇḍūnt sarvān chalunān krimīn vacasā jambhayāmasi //2//
analyzed: algaṇḍūn sarvān chalunān krimīn vacasā jambhayāmasi

original: (AVŚ_2,31.3a) algaṇḍūn hanmi mahatā vadhena dūnā adūnā arasā abhūvan /
analyzed: algaṇḍūn hanmi mahatā vadhena dūnāḥ a dūnāḥ arasāḥ abhūvan

original: (AVŚ_2,31.3c) śiṣṭān aśiṣṭān ni tirāmi vācā yathā krimīṇāṃ nakir uchiṣātai //3//
analyzed: śiṣṭān a śiṣṭān ni tirāmi vācā yathā krimīṇām nakir uchiṣātai

original: (AVŚ_2,31.4a) anvāntryaṃ śīrṣaṇyam atho pārṣṭeyaṃ krimīn /
analyzed: anvāntryam śīrṣaṇyam atha u pārṣṭeyam krimīn

original: (AVŚ_2,31.4c) avaskavaṃ vyadhvaraṃ krimīn vacasā jambhayāmasi //4//
analyzed: avaskavam vyadhvaram krimīn vacasā jambhayāmasi

original: (AVŚ_2,31.5a) ye krimayaḥ parvateśu vaneṣv oṣadhīṣu paśuṣv apsv antaḥ /
analyzed: ye krimayaḥ parvateṣu vaneṣu oṣadhīṣu paśuṣu apsu antar

original: (AVŚ_2,31.5c) ye asmākaṃ tanvam āviviśuḥ sarvaṃ tad dhanmi janima krimīṇām //5//
analyzed: ye asmākam tanvam āviviśuḥ sarvam tat dhanmi janima krimīṇām

original: (AVŚ_2,32.1a) udyann ādityaḥ krimīn hantu nimrocan hantu raśmibhiḥ /
analyzed: udyan ādityaḥ krimīn hantu nimrocan hantu raśmibhiḥ

original: (AVŚ_2,32.1c) ye antaḥ krimayo gavi //1//
analyzed: ye antar krimayaḥ gavi

original: (AVŚ_2,32.2a) viśvarūpaṃ caturakṣaṃ krimiṃ sāraṅgam arjunam /
analyzed: viśva rūpam catur akṣam krimim sāraṅgam arjunam

original: (AVŚ_2,32.2c) śṛṇāmy asya pṛṣṭīr api vṛścāmi yac chiraḥ //2//
analyzed: śṛṇāmi asya pṛṣṭīḥ api vṛścāmi yat śiraḥ

original: (AVŚ_2,32.3a) atrivad vaḥ krimayo hanmi kaṇvavaj jamadagnivat /
analyzed: atri vat vaḥ krimayaḥ hanmi kaṇva vat jamadagni vat

original: (AVŚ_2,32.3c) agastyasya brahmaṇā saṃ pinaṣmy ahaṃ krimīn //3//
analyzed: agastyasya brahmaṇā sam pinaṣmi aham krimīn

original: (AVŚ_2,32.4a) hato rājā krimīṇām utaiṣāṃ sthapatir hataḥ /
analyzed: hataḥ rājā krimīṇām uta eṣām sthapatiḥ hataḥ

original: (AVŚ_2,32.4c) hato hatamātā krimir hatabhrātā hatasvasā //4//
analyzed: hataḥ hata mātā krimiḥ hata bhrātā hata svasā

original: (AVŚ_2,32.5a) hatāso asya veśaso hatāsaḥ pariveśasaḥ /
analyzed: hatāsaḥ asya veśasaḥ hatāsaḥ pariveśasaḥ

original: (AVŚ_2,32.5c) atho ye kṣullakā iva sarve te krimayo hatāḥ //5//
analyzed: atho ye kṣullakāḥ iva sarve te krimayaḥ hatāḥ

original: (AVŚ_2,32.6a) pra te śṛṇāmi śṛṅge yābhyāṃ vitudāyasi /
analyzed: pra te śṛṇāmi śṛṅge yābhyām vitudāyasi

original: (AVŚ_2,32.6c) bhinādmi te kuṣumbhaṃ yas te viṣadhānaḥ //6//
analyzed: bhinādmi te kuṣumbham yaḥ te viṣa dhānaḥ

original: (AVŚ_2,33.1a) akṣībhyāṃ te nāsikābhyāṃ karṇābhyāṃ chubukād adhi /
analyzed: akṣībhyām te nāsikābhyām karṇābhyām chubukāt adhi

original: (AVŚ_2,33.1c) yakṣmaṃ śīrṣaṇyaṃ mastiṣkāj jihvāyā vi vṛhāmi te //1//
analyzed: yakṣmam śīrṣaṇyam mastiṣkāt jihvāyāḥ vi vṛhāmi te

original: (AVŚ_2,33.2a) grīvābhyas ta uṣṇihābhyaḥ kīkasābhyo anūkyāt /
analyzed: grīvābhyaḥ te uṣṇihābhyaḥ kīkasābhyaḥ anūkyāt

original: (AVŚ_2,33.2c) yakṣmaṃ doṣaṇyam aṃsābhyāṃ bāhubhyāṃ vi vṛhāmi te //2//
analyzed: yakṣmam doṣaṇyam aṃsābhyām bāhubhyām vi vṛhāmi te

original: (AVŚ_2,33.3a) hṛdayāt te pari klomno halīkṣṇāt pārśvābhyām /
analyzed: hṛdayāt te pari klomnaḥ halīkṣṇāt pārśvābhyām

original: (AVŚ_2,33.3c) yakṣmaṃ matasnābhyāṃ plīhno yaknas te vi vṛhāmasi //3//
analyzed: yakṣmam matasnābhyām plīhnaḥ yaknaḥ te vi vṛhāmasi

original: (AVŚ_2,33.4a) āntrebhyas te gudābhyo vaniṣṭhor udarād adhi /
analyzed: āntrebhyaḥ te gudābhyaḥ vaniṣṭhoḥ udarāt adhi

original: (AVŚ_2,33.4c) yakṣmaṃ kukṣibhyām plāśer nābhyā vi vṛhāmi te //4//
analyzed: yakṣmam kukṣibhyām plāśeḥ nābhyāḥ vi vṛhāmi te

original: (AVŚ_2,33.5a) ūrubhyāṃ te aṣṭhīvadbhyāṃ pārṣṇibhyāṃ prapadābhyām /
analyzed: ūrubhyām te aṣṭhīvadbhyām pārṣṇibhyām prapadābhyām

original: (AVŚ_2,33.5c) yakṣmaṃ bhasadyaṃ śroṇibhyāṃ bhāsadaṃ bhaṃsaso vi vṛhāmi te //5//
analyzed: yakṣmam bhasadyam śroṇibhyām bhāsadam bhaṃsasaḥ vi vṛhāmi te

original: (AVŚ_2,33.6a) asthibhyas te majjabhyaḥ snāvabhyo dhamanibhyaḥ /
analyzed: asthibhyaḥ te majjabhyaḥ snāvabhyaḥ dhamanibhyaḥ

original: (AVŚ_2,33.6c) yakṣmam pāṇibhyām aṅgulibhyo nakhebhyo vi vṛhāmi te //6//
analyzed: yakṣmam pāṇibhyām aṅgulibhyaḥ nakhebhyaḥ vi vṛhāmi te

original: (AVŚ_2,33.7a) aṅgeaṅge lomnilomni yas te parvaṇiparvaṇi /
analyzed: aṅge aṅge lomni lomni yaḥ te parvaṇi parvaṇi

original: (AVŚ_2,33.7c) yakṣmaṃ tvacasyaṃ te vayaṃ kaśyapasya vībarheṇa viṣvañcaṃ vi vṛhāmasi //7//
analyzed: yakṣmam tvacasyam te vayam kaśyapasya vībarheṇa viṣvañcam vi vṛhāmasi

original: (AVŚ_2,34.1a) ya īśe paśupatiḥ paśūnām catuṣpadām uta yo dvipadām /
analyzed: yaḥ īśe paśupatiḥ paśūnām catuṣpadām uta yaḥ dvipadām

original: (AVŚ_2,34.1c) niṣkrītaḥ sa yajñiyaṃ bhāgam etu rāyas poṣā yajamānaṃ sacantām //1//
analyzed: niṣkrītaḥ sa yajñiyam bhāgam etu rāyaḥ poṣāḥ yajamānam sacantām

original: (AVŚ_2,34.2a) pramuñcanto bhuvanasya reto gātuṃ dhatta yajamānāya devāḥ /
analyzed: pramuñcantaḥ bhuvanasya retaḥ gātum dhatta yajamānāya devāḥ

original: (AVŚ_2,34.2c) upākṛtaṃ śaśamānaṃ yad asthāt priyam devānām apy etu pāthaḥ //2//
analyzed: upākṛtam śaśamānam yat asthāt priyam devānām api etu pāthaḥ

original: (AVŚ_2,34.3a) ye badhyamānam anu dīdhyānā anvaikṣanta manasā cakṣuṣā ca /
analyzed: ye badhyamānam anu dīdhyānāḥ anvaikṣanta manasā cakṣuṣā ca

original: (AVŚ_2,34.3c) agniṣ ṭān agre pra mumoktu devo viśvakarmā prajayā saṃrarāṇaḥ //3//
analyzed: agniḥ tān agre pra mumoktu devaḥ viśva karmā prajayā saṃrarāṇaḥ

original: (AVŚ_2,34.4a) ye grāmyāḥ paśavo viśvarūpā virūpāḥ santo bahudhaikarūpāḥ /
analyzed: ye grāmyāḥ paśavaḥ viśva rūpāḥ virūpāḥ santaḥ bahudhā eka rūpāḥ

original: (AVŚ_2,34.4c) vāyuṣ ṭān agre pra mumoktu devaḥ prajāpatiḥ prajayā saṃrarāṇaḥ //4//
analyzed: vāyuḥ tān agre pra mumoktu devaḥ prajāpatiḥ prajayā saṃrarāṇaḥ

original: (AVŚ_2,34.5a) prajānantaḥ prati gṛhṇantu pūrve prāṇam aṅgebhyaḥ pary ācarantam /
analyzed: prajānantaḥ prati gṛhṇantu pūrve prāṇam aṅgebhyaḥ pari ācarantam

original: (AVŚ_2,34.5c) divaṃ gacha prati tiṣṭhā śarīraiḥ svargaṃ yāhi pathibhir devayānaiḥ //5//
analyzed: divam gacha prati tiṣṭha śarīraiḥ svargam yāhi pathibhiḥ deva yānaiḥ

original: (AVŚ_2,35.1a) ye bhakṣayanto na vasūny ānṛdhur yān agnayo anvatapyanta dhiṣṇyāḥ /
analyzed: ye bhakṣayantaḥ na vasūni ānṛdhuḥ yān agnayaḥ anvatapyanta dhiṣṇyāḥ

original: (AVŚ_2,35.1c) yā teṣām avayā duriṣṭiḥ sviṣṭiṃ nas tāṃ kṛṇavad viśvakarmā //1//
analyzed: yā teṣām avayā duriṣṭiḥ su iṣṭim naḥ tām kṛṇavat viśvakarmā

original: (AVŚ_2,35.2a) yajñapatim ṛṣayaḥ enasāhur nirbhaktaṃ prajā anutapyamānam /
analyzed: yajñapatim ṛṣayaḥ enasā āhuḥ nirbhaktam prajāḥ anutapyamānam

original: (AVŚ_2,35.2c) mathavyānt stokān apa yān rarādha saṃ naṣ ṭebhiḥ sṛjatu viśvakarmā //2//
analyzed: mathavyān stokān apa yān rarādha sam naḥ tebhiḥ sṛjatu viśvakarmā

original: (AVŚ_2,35.3a) adānyānt somapān manyamāno yajñasya vidvānt samaye na dhīraḥ /
analyzed: a dānyān soma pān manyamānaḥ yajñasya vidvān samaye na dhīraḥ

original: (AVŚ_2,35.3c) yad enaś cakṛvān baddha eṣa taṃ viśvakarman pra muñcā svastaye //3//
analyzed: yat enaḥ cakṛvān baddhaḥ eṣa tam viśvakarman pra muñca svastaye

original: (AVŚ_2,35.4a) ghorā ṛṣayo namo astv ebhyaś cakṣur yad eṣāṃ manasaś ca satyam /
analyzed: ghorāḥ ṛṣayaḥ namaḥ astu ebhyaḥ cakṣuḥ yat eṣām manasaḥ ca satyam

original: (AVŚ_2,35.4c) bṛhaspataye mahiṣa dyumann namo viśvakarman namas te pāhy asmān //4//
analyzed: bṛhaspataye mahiṣa dyuman namaḥ viśvakarman namaḥ te pāhi asmān

original: (AVŚ_2,35.5a) yajñasya cakṣuḥ prabhṛtir mukhaṃ ca vācā śrotreṇa manasā juhomi /
analyzed: yajñasya cakṣuḥ prabhṛtiḥ mukham ca vācā śrotreṇa manasā juhomi

original: (AVŚ_2,35.5c) imaṃ yajñaṃ vitataṃ viśvakarmaṇā devā yantu sumanasyamānāḥ //5//
analyzed: imam yajñam vitatam viśva karmaṇā devāḥ yantu sumanasyamānāḥ

original: (AVŚ_2,36.1a) ā no agne sumatiṃ saṃbhalo gamed imāṃ kumārīṃ saha no bhagena /
analyzed: ā naḥ agne sumatim saṃbhalaḥ gamet imām kumārīm saha naḥ bhagena

original: (AVŚ_2,36.1c) juṣṭā vareṣu samaneṣu valgur oṣaṃ patyā saubhagam astu asyai //1//
analyzed: juṣṭā vareṣu samaneṣu valguḥ oṣam patyā saubhagam astu asyai

original: (AVŚ_2,36.2a) somajuṣṭaṃ brahmajuṣṭam aryamnā saṃbhṛtaṃ bhagam /
analyzed: soma juṣṭam brahma juṣṭam aryamnā saṃbhṛtam bhagam

original: (AVŚ_2,36.2c) dhātur devasya satyena kṛṇomi pativedanam //2//
analyzed: dhātuḥ devasya satyena kṛṇomi pati vedanam

original: (AVŚ_2,36.3a) iyam agne nārī patim videṣṭa somo hi rājā subhagāṃ kṛṇoti /
analyzed: iyam agne nārī patim videṣṭa somaḥ hi rājā subhagām kṛṇoti

original: (AVŚ_2,36.3c) suvānā putrān mahiṣī bhavāti gatvā patiṃ subhagā vi rājatu //3//
analyzed: suvānā putrān mahiṣī bhavāti gatvā patim subhagā vi rājatu

original: (AVŚ_2,36.4a) yathākharo maghavaṃś cārur eṣa priyo mṛgāṇāṃ suṣadā babhūva /
analyzed: yathā ākharaḥ maghavan cāruḥ eṣa priyaḥ mṛgāṇām suṣadā babhūva

original: (AVŚ_2,36.4c) evā bhagasya juṣṭeyam astu nārī saṃpriyā patyāvirādhayantī //4//
analyzed: eva bhagasya juṣṭā iyam astu nārī saṃpriyā patyā a virādhayantī

original: (AVŚ_2,36.5a) bhagasya nāvam ā roha pūrṇām anupadasvatīm /
analyzed: bhagasya nāvam ā roha pūrṇām anupadasvatīm

original: (AVŚ_2,36.5c) tayopapratāraya yo varaḥ pratikāmyaḥ //5//
analyzed: tayā upapratāraya yaḥ varaḥ pratikāmyaḥ

original: (AVŚ_2,36.6a) ā krandaya dhanapate varam āmanasaṃ kṛṇu /
analyzed: ā krandaya dhana pate varam āmanasam kṛṇu

original: (AVŚ_2,36.6c) sarvaṃ pradakṣiṇaṃ kṛṇu yo varaḥ pratikāmyaḥ //6//
analyzed: sarvam pradakṣiṇam kṛṇu yaḥ varaḥ pratikāmyaḥ

original: (AVŚ_2,36.7a) idaṃ hiraṇyaṃ gulgulv ayam aukṣo atho bhagaḥ /
analyzed: idam hiraṇyam gulgulū ayam aukṣaḥ atha u bhagaḥ

original: (AVŚ_2,36.7c) ete patibhyas tvām aduḥ pratikāmāya vettave //7
analyzed: ete patibhyaḥ tvām aduḥ pratikāmāya vettave

original: (AVŚ_2,36.7e) ā te nayatu savitā nayatu patir yaḥ pratikāmyaḥ /
analyzed: ā te nayatu savitā nayatu patiḥ yaḥ pratikāmyaḥ

original: (AVŚ_3,1.1a) agnir naḥ śatrūn praty etu vidvān pratidahann abhiśastim arātim /
analyzed: agniḥ naḥ śatrūn prati etu vidvān pratidahan abhiśastim arātim

original: (AVŚ_3,1.1c) sa senāṃ mohayatu pareṣāṃ nirhastāṃś ca kṛṇavaj jātavedāḥ //1//
analyzed: sa senām mohayatu pareṣām nirhastān ca kṛṇavat jātavedāḥ

original: (AVŚ_3,1.2a) yūyam ugrā maruta īdṛśe sthābhi preta mṛṇata sahadhvam /
analyzed: yūyam ugrāḥ marutaḥ īdṛśe stha abhi preta mṛṇata sahadhvam

original: (AVŚ_3,1.2c) amīmṛṇan vasavo nāthitā ime agnir hy eṣāṃ dūtaḥ pratyetu vidvān //2//
analyzed: amīmṛṇan vasavaḥ nāthitāḥ ime agniḥ hi eṣām dūtaḥ pratyetu vidvān

original: (AVŚ_3,1.3a) amitrasenāṃ maghavann asmān chatrūyatīm abhi /
analyzed: amitra senām maghavan asmān śatrūyatīm abhi

original: (AVŚ_3,1.3c) yuvaṃ tām indra vṛtrahann agniś ca dahataṃ prati //3//
analyzed: yuvam tām indra vṛtrahan agniḥ ca dahatam prati

original: (AVŚ_3,1.4a) prasūta indra pravatā haribhyāṃ pra te vajraḥ pramṛṇann etu śatrūn /
analyzed: prasūtaḥ indra pravatā haribhyām pra te vajraḥ pramṛṇan etu śatrūn

original: (AVŚ_3,1.4c) jahi pratīco anūcaḥ parāco viṣvak satyaṃ kṛṇuhi cittam eṣām //4//
analyzed: jahi pratīcaḥ anūcaḥ parācaḥ viṣvak satyam kṛṇuhi cittam eṣām

original: (AVŚ_3,1.5a) indra senāṃ mohayāmitrāṇām /
analyzed: indra senām mohaya amitrāṇām

original: (AVŚ_3,1.5c) agner vātasya dhrājyā tān viṣūco vi nāśaya //5//
analyzed: agneḥ vātasya dhrājyā tān viṣūcaḥ vi nāśaya

original: (AVŚ_3,1.6a) indraḥ senāṃ mohayatu maruto ghnantv ojasā /
analyzed: indraḥ senām mohayatu marutaḥ ghnantu ojasā

original: (AVŚ_3,1.6c) cakṣūṃsy agnir ā dattāṃ punar etu parājitā //6//
analyzed: cakṣūṃsi agniḥ ā dattām punar etu parājitā

original: (AVŚ_3,2.1a) agnir no dūtaḥ pratyetu vidvān pratidahann abhiśastim arātim /
analyzed: agniḥ naḥ dūtaḥ pratyetu vidvān pratidahan abhiśastim arātim

original: (AVŚ_3,2.1c) sa cittāni mohayatu pareṣāṃ nirhastāṃś ca kṛṇavaj jātavedāḥ //1//
analyzed: sa cittāni mohayatu pareṣām nirhastān ca kṛṇavat jātavedāḥ

original: (AVŚ_3,2.2a) ayam agnir amūmuhad yāni cittāni vo hṛdi /
analyzed: ayam agniḥ amūmuhat yāni cittāni vaḥ hṛdi

original: (AVŚ_3,2.2c) vi vo dhamatv okasaḥ pra vo dhamatu sarvataḥ //2//
analyzed: vi vaḥ dhamatu okasaḥ pra vaḥ dhamatu sarvatas

original: (AVŚ_3,2.3a) indra cittāni mohayann arvāṅ ākūtyā cara /
analyzed: indra cittāni mohayan arvāṅ ākūtyā cara

original: (AVŚ_3,2.3c) agner vātasya dhrājyā tān viṣūco vi nāśaya //3//
analyzed: agneḥ vātasya dhrājyā tān viṣūcaḥ vi nāśaya

original: (AVŚ_3,2.4a) vy ākūtaya eṣām itātho cittāni muhyata /
analyzed: vi ākūtayaḥ eṣām ita atha u cittāni muhyata

original: (AVŚ_3,2.4c) atho yad adyaiṣāṃ hṛdi tad eṣāṃ pari nir jahi //4//
analyzed: atha u yat adya eṣām hṛdi tat eṣām pari niḥ jahi

original: (AVŚ_3,2.5a) amīṣāṃ cittāni pratimohayantī gṛhāṇāṅgāny apve parehi /
analyzed: amīṣām cittāni pratimohayantī gṛhāṇa aṅgāni apve parehi

original: (AVŚ_3,2.5c) abhi prehi nir daha hṛtsu śokair grāhyāmitrāṃs tamasā vidhya śatrūn //5//
analyzed: abhi prehi niḥ daha hṛtsu śokaiḥ grāhya amitrān tamasā vidhya śatrūn

original: (AVŚ_3,2.6a) asau yā senā marutaḥ pareṣām asmān aity abhy ojasā spardhamānā /
analyzed: asau yā senā marutaḥ pareṣām asmān aiti abhī ojasā spardhamānā

original: (AVŚ_3,2.6c) tām vidhyata tamasāpavratena yathaiṣām anyo anyaṃ na jānāt //6//
analyzed: tām vidhyata tamasā apavratena yathā eṣām anyaḥ anyam na jānāt

original: (AVŚ_3,3.1a) acikradat svapā iha bhuvad agne vy acasva rodasī urūcī /
analyzed: acikradat su apāḥ iha bhuvat agne vi acasva rodasī urūcī

original: (AVŚ_3,3.1c) yuñjantu tvā maruto viśvavedasa āmuṃ naya namasā rātahavyam //1//
analyzed: yuñjantu tvā marutaḥ viśva vedasaḥ ā amum naya namasā rāta havyam

original: (AVŚ_3,3.2a) dūre cit santam aruṣāsa indram ā cyāvayantu sakhyāya vipram /
analyzed: dūre cit santam aruṣāsaḥ indram ā cyāvayantu sakhyāya vipram

original: (AVŚ_3,3.2c) yad gāyatrīṃ bṛhatīm arkam asmai sautrāmaṇyā dadhṛṣanta devāḥ //2//
analyzed: yat gāyatrīm bṛhatīm arkam asmai sautrāmaṇyā dadhṛṣanta devāḥ

original: (AVŚ_3,3.3a) adbhyas tvā rāja varuṇo hvayatu somas tvā hvayatu parvatebhyaḥ /
analyzed: adbhyaḥ tvā rāja varuṇaḥ hvayatu somaḥ tvā hvayatu parvatebhyaḥ

original: (AVŚ_3,3.3c) indras tvā hvayatu viḍbhya ābhyaḥ śyeno bhūtvā viśa ā patemāḥ //3// {4}
analyzed: indraḥ tvā hvayatu viḍbhyaḥ ābhyaḥ śyenaḥ bhūtvā viśaḥ ā pata imāḥ

original: (AVŚ_3,3.4a) śyeno havyaṃ nayatv ā parasmād anyakṣetre aparuddhaṃ carantam /
analyzed: śyenaḥ havyam nayatu ā parasmāt anya kṣetre aparuddham carantam

original: (AVŚ_3,3.4c) aśvinā panthāṃ kṛṇutāṃ sugaṃ ta imaṃ sajātā abhisaṃviśadhvam //4// {5}
analyzed: aśvinā panthām kṛṇutām su gam te imam sajātāḥ abhisaṃviśadhvam

original: (AVŚ_3,3.5a) hvayantu tvā pratijanāḥ prati mitrā avṛṣata /
analyzed: hvayantu tvā pratijanāḥ prati mitrāḥ avṛṣata

original: (AVŚ_3,3.5c) indrāgnī viśve devās te viśi kṣemam adīdharan //5// {6}
analyzed: indra agnī viśve devāḥ te viśi kṣemam adīdharan  /

original: (AVŚ_3,3.6a) yas te havaṃ vivadat sajāto yaś ca niṣṭyaḥ /
analyzed: yaḥ te havam vivadat sajātaḥ yaḥ ca niṣṭyaḥ

original: (AVŚ_3,3.6c) apāñcam indra taṃ kṛtvāthemam ihāva gamaya //6// {7}
analyzed: apāñcam indra tam kṛtvā atha imam iha ava gamaya

original: (AVŚ_3,4.1a) ā tvā gan rāṣtraṃ saha varcasod ihi prāṅ viśāṃ patir ekarāṭ tvaṃ vi rāja /
analyzed: ā tvā gan rāṣtram saha varcasā ud ihi prāṅ viśām patiḥ eka rāj tvam vi rāja

original: (AVŚ_3,4.1c) sarvās tvā rājan pradiśo hvayantūpasadyo namasyo bhaveha //1//
analyzed: sarvāḥ tvā rājan pradiśaḥ hvayantu upasadyaḥ namasyaḥ bhava iha

original: (AVŚ_3,4.2a) tvāṃ viśo vṛṇatāṃ rājyāya tvām imāḥ pradiśaḥ pañca devīḥ /
analyzed: tvām viśaḥ vṛṇatām rājyāya tvām imāḥ pradiśaḥ pañca devīḥ

original: (AVŚ_3,4.2c) varṣman rāṣṭrasya kakudi śrayasva tato na ugro vi bhajā vasūni //2//
analyzed: varṣman rāṣṭrasya kakudi śrayasva tatas naḥ ugraḥ vi bhaja vasūni

original: (AVŚ_3,4.3a) acha tvā yantu havinaḥ sajātā agnir dūto ajiraḥ saṃ carātai /
analyzed: acha tvā yantu havinaḥ sajātāḥ agniḥ dūtaḥ ajiraḥ sam carātai

original: (AVŚ_3,4.3c) jāyāḥ putrāḥ sumanaso bhavantu bahuṃ baliṃ prati paśyāsā ugraḥ //3//
analyzed: jāyāḥ putrāḥ sumanasaḥ bhavantu bahum balim prati paśyāsai ugraḥ

original: (AVŚ_3,4.4a) aśvinā tvāgre mitrāvaruṇobhā viśve devā marutas tvā hvayantu /
analyzed: aśvinā tvā agre mitrāvaruṇā ubhā viśve devāḥ marutaḥ tvā hvayantu

original: (AVŚ_3,4.4c) adhā mano vasudeyāya kṛṇuṣva tato na ugro vi bhajā vasūni //4//
analyzed: adhā manaḥ vasu deyāya kṛṇuṣva tatas naḥ ugraḥ vi bhaja vasūni

original: (AVŚ_3,4.5a) ā pra drava paramasyāḥ parāvataḥ śive te dyāvāpṛthivī ubhe stām /
analyzed: ā pra drava paramasyāḥ parāvataḥ śive te dyāvāpṛthivī ubhe stām

original: (AVŚ_3,4.5c) tad ayaṃ rājā varuṇas tathāha sa tvāyam ahvat sa upedam ehi //5//
analyzed: tat ayam rājā varuṇaḥ tathā āha sa tvā ayam ahvat saḥ upa idam ehi

original: (AVŚ_3,4.6a) indrendra manuṣyāḥ parehi saṃ hy ajñāsthā varuṇaiḥ saṃvidānaḥ /
analyzed: indra indra manuṣyāḥ parehi sam hi ajñāsthāḥ varuṇaiḥ saṃvidānaḥ

original: (AVŚ_3,4.6c) sa tvāyam ahvat sve sadhasthe sa devān yakṣat sa u kalpayad viśaḥ //6//
analyzed: sa tvā ayam ahvat sve sadhasthe sa devān yakṣat saḥ u kalpayat viśaḥ

original: (AVŚ_3,4.7a) pathyā revatīr bahudhā virūpāḥ sarvāḥ saṃgatya varīyas te akran /
analyzed: pathyāḥ revatīḥ bahudhā virūpāḥ sarvāḥ saṃgatya varīyaḥ te akran

original: (AVŚ_3,4.7c) tās tvā sarvāḥ saṃvidānā hvayantu daśamīm ugraḥ sumanā vaśeha //7//
analyzed: tāḥ tvā sarvāḥ saṃvidānāḥ hvayantu daśamīm ugraḥ sumanāḥ vaśā iha

original: (AVŚ_3,5.1a) āyam agan parṇamaṇir balī balena pramṛṇant sapatnān /
analyzed: ā ayam agan parṇa maṇiḥ balī balena pramṛṇan sapatnān

original: (AVŚ_3,5.1c) ojo devānāṃ paya oṣadhīnāṃ varcasā mā jinvantv aprayāvan //1//
analyzed: ojaḥ devānām payaḥ oṣadhīnām varcasā mā jinvantu a prayāvan

original: (AVŚ_3,5.2a) mayi kṣatraṃ parṇamaṇe mayi dhārayatād rayim /
analyzed: mayi kṣatram parṇa maṇe mayi dhārayatāt rayim

original: (AVŚ_3,5.2c) ahaṃ rāṣṭrasyābhīvarge nijo bhūyāsam uttamaḥ //2//
analyzed: aham rāṣṭrasya abhīvarge nijaḥ bhūyāsam uttamaḥ

original: (AVŚ_3,5.3a) yaṃ nidadhur vanaspatau guhyaṃ devāḥ priyaṃ maṇim /
analyzed: yam nidadhuḥ vanaspatau guhyam devāḥ priyam maṇim

original: (AVŚ_3,5.3c) tam asmabhyaṃ sahāyuṣā devā dadatu bhartave //3//
analyzed: tam asmabhyam saha āyuṣā devāḥ dadatu bhartave

original: (AVŚ_3,5.4a) somasya parṇaḥ saha ugram āgann indreṇa datto varuṇena śiṣṭaḥ /
analyzed: somasya parṇaḥ sahaḥ ugram āgan indreṇa dattaḥ varuṇena śiṣṭaḥ

original: (AVŚ_3,5.4c) taṃ priyāsaṃ bahu rocamāno dīrghāyutvāya śataśāradāya //4//
analyzed: tam priyāsam bahu rocamānaḥ dīrgha āyu tvāya śata śāradāya

original: (AVŚ_3,5.5a) ā mārukṣat parṇamaṇir mahyā ariṣṭatātaye /
analyzed: ā mā ārukṣat parṇa maṇiḥ mahyai ariṣṭatātaye

original: (AVŚ_3,5.5c) yathāham uttaro 'sāny aryamṇa uta saṃvidaḥ //5//
analyzed: yathā aham uttaraḥ sāni aryamṇaḥ uta saṃvidaḥ

original: (AVŚ_3,5.6a) ye dhīvāno rathakārāḥ karmārā ye manīṣiṇaḥ /
analyzed: ye dhīvānaḥ rathakārāḥ karmārāḥ ye manīṣiṇaḥ

original: (AVŚ_3,5.6c) upastīn parṇa mahyaṃ tvaṃ sarvān kṛṇv abhito janān //6//
analyzed: upastīn parṇa mahyam tvam sarvān kṛṇu abhitas janān

original: (AVŚ_3,5.7a) ye rājāno rājakṛtaḥ sūtā grāmaṇyaś ca ye /
analyzed: ye rājānaḥ rāja kṛtaḥ sūtāḥ grāmaṇyaḥ ca ye

original: (AVŚ_3,5.7c) upastīn parṇa mahyaṃ tvaṃ sarvān kṛṇv abhito janān //7//
analyzed: upastīn parṇa mahyam tvam sarvān kṛṇu abhitas janān

original: (AVŚ_3,5.8a) parṇo 'si tanūpānaḥ sayonir vīro vīreṇa mayā /
analyzed: parṇaḥ si tanū pānaḥ sa yoniḥ vīraḥ vīreṇa mayā

original: (AVŚ_3,5.8c) saṃvatsarasya tejasā tena badhnāmi tvā maṇe //8//
analyzed: saṃvatsarasya tejasā tena badhnāmi tvā maṇe

original: (AVŚ_3,6.1a) pumān puṃsaḥ parijāto 'śvatthaḥ khadirād adhi /
analyzed: pumān puṃsaḥ parijātaḥ śvatthaḥ khadirāt adhi

original: (AVŚ_3,6.1c) sa hantu śatrūn māmakān yān ahaṃ dveṣmi ye ca mām //1//
analyzed: sa hantu śatrūn māmakān yān aham dveṣmi ye ca mām

original: (AVŚ_3,6.2a) tān aśvattha niḥ śṛṇīhi śatrūn vaibādhadodhataḥ /
analyzed: tān aśvattha niḥ śṛṇīhi śatrūn vaibādha dodhataḥ

original: (AVŚ_3,6.2c) indreṇa vṛtraghnā medī mitreṇa varuṇena ca //2//
analyzed: indreṇa vṛtra ghnā medī mitreṇa varuṇena ca

original: (AVŚ_3,6.3a) yathāśvattha nirabhano 'ntar mahaty arṇave /
analyzed: yathā aśvattha antar mahati arṇave

original: (AVŚ_3,6.3c) evā tānt sarvān nir bhaṅgdhi yān ahaṃ dveṣmi ye ca mām //3//
analyzed: eva tān sarvān niḥ bhaṅgdhi yān aham dveṣmi ye ca mām

original: (AVŚ_3,6.4a) yaḥ sahamānaś carasi sāsahāna iva ṛṣabhaḥ /
analyzed: yaḥ sahamānaḥ carasi sāsahānaḥ iva ṛṣabhaḥ

original: (AVŚ_3,6.4c) tenāśvattha tvayā vayaṃ sapatnānt sahiṣīmahi //4//
analyzed: tena aśvattha tvayā vayam sapatnān sahiṣīmahi

original: (AVŚ_3,6.5a) sinātv enān nirṛtir mṛtyoḥ pāśair amokyaiḥ /
analyzed: sinātu enān nirṛtiḥ mṛtyoḥ pāśaiḥ amokyaiḥ

original: (AVŚ_3,6.5c) aśvattha śatrūn māmakān yān ahaṃ dveṣmi ye ca mām //5//
analyzed: aśvattha śatrūn māmakān yān aham dveṣmi ye ca mām

original: (AVŚ_3,6.6a) yathāśvattha vānaspatyān ārohan kṛṇuṣe 'dharān /
analyzed: yathā aśvattha vānaspatyān ārohan kṛṇuṣe dharān

original: (AVŚ_3,6.6c) evā me śatror mūrdhānaṃ viṣvag bhinddhi sahasva ca //6//
analyzed: eva me śatroḥ mūrdhānam viṣvak bhinddhi sahasva ca

original: (AVŚ_3,6.7a) te 'dharāñcaḥ pra plavantāṃ chinnā naur iva bandhanāt /
analyzed: te dharāñcaḥ pra plavantām chinnā nauḥ iva bandhanāt

original: (AVŚ_3,6.7c) na vaibādhapraṇuttānāṃ punar asti nivartanam //7//
analyzed: na vaibādha praṇuttānām punar asti nivartanam

original: (AVŚ_3,6.8a) praiṇān nude manasā pra cittenota brahmaṇā /
analyzed: pra enān nude manasā pra cittena uta brahmaṇā

original: (AVŚ_3,6.8c) praiṇān vṛkṣasya śākhayāśvatthasya nudāmahe //8//
analyzed: pra enān vṛkṣasya śākhayā aśvatthasya nudāmahe

original: (AVŚ_3,7.1a) hariṇasya raghuṣyado 'dhi śīrṣaṇi bheṣajam /
analyzed: hariṇasya raghuṣyadaḥ dhi śīrṣaṇi bheṣajam

original: (AVŚ_3,7.1c) sa kṣetriyaṃ viṣāṇayā viṣūcīnam anīnaśat //1//
analyzed: sa kṣetriyam viṣāṇayā viṣūcīnam anīnaśat

original: (AVŚ_3,7.2a) anu tvā hariṇo vṛṣā padbhiś caturbhir akramīt /
analyzed: anu tvā hariṇaḥ vṛṣā padbhiḥ caturbhiḥ akramīt

original: (AVŚ_3,7.2c) viṣāṇe vi ṣya guṣpitaṃ yad asya kṣetriyaṃ hṛdi //2//
analyzed: viṣāṇe vi sya guṣpitam yat asya kṣetriyam hṛdi

original: (AVŚ_3,7.3a) ado yad avarocate catuṣpakṣam iva chadiḥ /
analyzed: adaḥ yat avarocate catuṣpakṣam iva chadiḥ

original: (AVŚ_3,7.3c) tenā te sarvaṃ kṣetriyam aṅgebhyo nāśayāmasi //3//
analyzed: tena te sarvam kṣetriyam aṅgebhyaḥ nāśayāmasi

original: (AVŚ_3,7.4a) amū ye divi subhage vicṛtau nāma tārake /
analyzed: amū ye divi subhage vicṛtau nāma tārake

original: (AVŚ_3,7.4c) vi kṣetriyasya muñcatām adhamaṃ pāśam uttamam //4//
analyzed: vi kṣetriyasya muñcatām adhamam pāśam uttamam

original: (AVŚ_3,7.5a) āpa id vā u bheṣajīr āpo amīvacātanīḥ /
analyzed: āpaḥ id vai u bheṣajīḥ āpaḥ amīva cātanīḥ

original: (AVŚ_3,7.5c) āpo viśvasya bheṣajīs tās tvā muñcantu kṣetriyāt //5//
analyzed: āpaḥ viśvasya bheṣajīḥ tāḥ tvā muñcantu kṣetriyāt

original: (AVŚ_3,7.6a) yad āsuteḥ kriyamānāyāḥ kṣetriyaṃ tvā vyānaśe /
analyzed: yat āsuteḥ kriyamāṇāyāḥ kṣetriyam tvā vyānaśe

original: (AVŚ_3,7.6c) vedāhaṃ tasya bheṣajaṃ kṣetriyaṃ nāśayāmi tvat //6//
analyzed: veda aham tasya bheṣajam kṣetriyam nāśayāmi tvat

original: (AVŚ_3,7.7a) apavāse nakṣatrāṇām apavāsa uṣasām uta /
analyzed: apavāse nakṣatrāṇām apavāse uṣasām uta

original: (AVŚ_3,7.7c) apāsmat sarvaṃ durbhūtam apa kṣetriyam uchatu //7//
analyzed: apa asmat sarvam durbhūtam apa kṣetriyam uchatu

original: (AVŚ_3,8.1a) ā yātu mitra ṛtubhiḥ kalpamānaḥ saṃveśayan pṛthivīm usriyābhiḥ /
analyzed: ā yātu mitraḥ ṛtubhiḥ kalpamānaḥ saṃveśayan pṛthivīm usriyābhiḥ

original: (AVŚ_3,8.1c) athāsmabhyam varuṇo vāyur agnir bṛhad rāṣṭraṃ saṃveśyam dadhātu //1//
analyzed: atha asmabhyam varuṇaḥ vāyuḥ agniḥ bṛhat rāṣṭram saṃveśyam dadhātu

original: (AVŚ_3,8.2a) dhātā rātiḥ savitedaṃ juśantām indras tvaṣṭā prati haryantu me vacaḥ /
analyzed: dhātā rātiḥ savitā idam juśantām indraḥ tvaṣṭā prati haryantu me vacaḥ

original: (AVŚ_3,8.2c) huve devīm aditiṃ śūraputrāṃ sajātānāṃ madhyameṣṭhā yathāsāni //2//
analyzed: huve devīm aditim śūra putrām sajātānām madhyameṣṭhāḥ yathā asāni

original: (AVŚ_3,8.3a) huve somaṃ savitāraṃ namobhir viśvān ādityāṃ aham uttaratve /
analyzed: huve somam savitāram namobhiḥ viśvān ādityān aham uttara tve

original: (AVŚ_3,8.3c) ayam agnir dīdāyad dīrgham eva sajātair iddho 'pratibruvadbhiḥ //3//
analyzed: ayam agniḥ dīdāyat dīrgham eva sajātaiḥ id ha u pratibruvadbhiḥ

original: (AVŚ_3,8.4a) ihed asātha na paro gamātheryo gopāḥ puṣṭapatir va ājat /
analyzed: iha id asātha na paras gamātha iryaḥ gopāḥ puṣṭa patiḥ vaḥ ājat

original: (AVŚ_3,8.4c) asmai kāmāyopa kāminīr viśve vo devā upasaṃyantu //4//
analyzed: asmai kāmāya upa kāminīḥ viśve vaḥ devāḥ upasaṃyantu

original: (AVŚ_3,8.5a) saṃ vo manāṃsi saṃ vratā sam ākūtīr namāmasi /
analyzed: sam vaḥ manāṃsi sam vratā sam ākūtīḥ namāmasi

original: (AVŚ_3,8.5c) amī ye vivratā sthana tān vaḥ saṃ namayāmasi //5//
analyzed: amī ye vivratāḥ sthana tān vaḥ sam namayāmasi

original: (AVŚ_3,8.6a) ahaṃ gṛbhṇāmi manasā manāṃsi mama cittam anu cittebhir eta /
analyzed: aham gṛbhṇāmi manasā manāṃsi mama cittam anu cittebhiḥ eta

original: (AVŚ_3,8.6c) mama vaśeṣu hṛdayāni vaḥ kṛṇomi mama yātam anuvartmāna eta //6//
analyzed: mama vaśeṣu hṛdayāni vaḥ kṛṇomi mama yātam anuvartmānaḥ eta

original: (AVŚ_3,9.1a) karśaphasya viśaphasya dyauḥ pitā pṛthivī mātā /
analyzed: karśaphasya viśaphasya dyauḥ pitā pṛthivī mātā

original: (AVŚ_3,9.1c) yathābhicakra devās tathāpa kṛṇutā punaḥ //1//
analyzed: yathā abhicakra devāḥ tathā apa kṛṇutā punar

original: (AVŚ_3,9.2a) aśreṣmāṇo adhārayan tathā tan manunā kṛtam /
analyzed: aśreṣmāṇaḥ adhārayan tathā tat manunā kṛtam

original: (AVŚ_3,9.2c) kṛṇomi vadhri viṣkandhaṃ muṣkābarho gavām iva //2//
analyzed: kṛṇomi vadhri viṣkandham muṣkābarhaḥ gavām iva

original: (AVŚ_3,9.3a) piśaṅge sūtre khṛgalaṃ tad ā badhnanti vedhasaḥ /
analyzed: piśaṅge sūtre khṛgalam tat ā badhnanti vedhasaḥ

original: (AVŚ_3,9.3c) śravasyuṃ śuṣmaṃ kābavaṃ vadhriṃ kṛṇvantu bandhuraḥ //3//
analyzed: śravasyum śuṣmam kābavam vadhrim kṛṇvantu bandhuraḥ

original: (AVŚ_3,9.4a) yenā śravasyavaś caratha devā ivāsuramāyayā /
analyzed: yena śravasyavaḥ caratha devāḥ iva asura māyayā

original: (AVŚ_3,9.4c) śunāṃ kapir iva dūṣaṇo bandhurā kābavasya ca //4//
analyzed: śunām kapiḥ iva dūṣaṇaḥ bandhurā kābavasya ca

original: (AVŚ_3,9.5a) duṣṭyai hi tvā bhatsyāmi dūṣayiṣyāmi kābavam /
analyzed: duṣṭyai hi tvā dūṣayiṣyāmi kābavam

original: (AVŚ_3,9.5c) ud āśavo rathā iva śapathebhiḥ sariṣyatha //5//
analyzed: ud āśavaḥ rathāḥ iva śapathebhiḥ sariṣyatha

original: (AVŚ_3,9.6a) ekaśataṃ viṣkandhāni viṣṭhitā pṛthivīm anu /
analyzed: ekaśatam viṣkandhāni viṣṭhitā pṛthivīm anu

original: (AVŚ_3,9.6c) teṣāṃ tvām agre uj jaharur maṇiṃ viṣkandhadūṣaṇam //6//
analyzed: teṣām tvām agre ud jaharuḥ maṇim viṣkandha dūṣaṇam

original: (AVŚ_3,10.1a) prathamā ha vy uvāsa sā dhenur abhavad yame /
analyzed: prathamā ha vi uvāsa sā dhenuḥ abhavat yame

original: (AVŚ_3,10.1c) sā naḥ payasvatī duhām uttarāmuttarām samām //1//
analyzed: sā naḥ payasvatī duhām uttarām uttarām samām

original: (AVŚ_3,10.2a) yāṃ devāḥ pratinandanti rātrim dhenum upāyatīm /
analyzed: yām devāḥ pratinandanti rātrim dhenum upāyatīm

original: (AVŚ_3,10.2c) saṃvatsarasya yā patnī sā no astu sumaṅgalī //2//
analyzed: saṃvatsarasya yā patnī sā naḥ astu su maṅgalī

original: (AVŚ_3,10.3a) saṃvatsarasya pratimāṃ yāṃ tvā rātry upāsmahe /
analyzed: saṃvatsarasya pratimām yām tvā rātri upāsmahe

original: (AVŚ_3,10.3c) sā na āyuṣmatīṃ prajāṃ rāyas poṣeṇa saṃ sṛja //3//
analyzed: sā naḥ āyuṣmatīm prajām rāyaḥ poṣeṇa sam sṛja

original: (AVŚ_3,10.4a) iyam eva sā yā prathamā vyauchad āsv itarāsu carati praviṣṭā /
analyzed: iyam eva sā yā prathamā vyauchat āsu itarāsu carati praviṣṭā

original: (AVŚ_3,10.4c) mahānto asyāṃ mahimāno antar vadhūr jigāya navagaj janitrī //4//
analyzed: mahāntaḥ asyām mahimānaḥ antar vadhūḥ jigāya navagat janitrī

original: (AVŚ_3,10.5a) vānaspatyā grāvāṇo ghoṣam akrata haviṣ kṛṇvantaḥ parivatsarīṇam /
analyzed: vānaspatyāḥ grāvāṇaḥ ghoṣam akrata haviṣ kṛṇvantaḥ parivatsarīṇam

original: (AVŚ_3,10.5c) ekāṣṭake suprajasaḥ suvīrā vayaṃ syāma patayo rayīṇām //5//
analyzed: ekāṣṭake suprajasaḥ su vīrāḥ vayam syāma patayaḥ rayīṇām

original: (AVŚ_3,10.6a) iḍāyās padaṃ ghṛtavat sarīsṛpaṃ jātavedaḥ prati havyā gṛbhāya /
analyzed: iḍāyāḥ padam ghṛtavat sarīsṛpam jātavedaḥ prati havyā gṛbhāya

original: (AVŚ_3,10.6c) ye grāmyāḥ paśavo viśvarūpās teṣāṃ saptānāṃ mayi rantir astu //6//
analyzed: ye grāmyāḥ paśavaḥ viśva rūpāḥ teṣām saptānām mayi rantiḥ astu

original: (AVŚ_3,10.7a) ā mā puṣṭe ca poṣe ca rātri devānāṃ sumatau syāma /
analyzed: ā mā puṣṭe ca poṣe ca rātri devānām sumatau syāma

original: (AVŚ_3,10.7c) pūrṇā darve parā pata supūrṇā punar ā pata /
analyzed: pūrṇā darve parā pata su pūrṇā punar ā pata

original: (AVŚ_3,10.7e) sarvān yajñānt saṃbhuñjatīṣam ūrjaṃ na ā bhara //7//
analyzed: sarvān yajñān saṃbhuñjatī iṣam ūrjam naḥ ā bhara

original: (AVŚ_3,10.8a) āyam agant saṃvatsaraḥ patir ekāṣṭake tava /
analyzed: ā ayam agan saṃvatsaraḥ patiḥ ekāṣṭake tava

original: (AVŚ_3,10.8c) sā na āyuṣmatīṃ prajāṃ rāyas poṣeṇa saṃ sṛja //8//
analyzed: sā naḥ āyuṣmatīm prajām rāyaḥ poṣeṇa sam sṛja

original: (AVŚ_3,10.9a) ṛtūn yaja ṛtupatīn ārtavān uta hāyanān /
analyzed: ṛtūn yaje ṛtu patīn ārtavān uta hāyanān

original: (AVŚ_3,10.9c) samāḥ saṃvatsarān māsān bhūtasya pataye yaje //9//
analyzed: samāḥ saṃvatsarān māsān bhūtasya pataye yaje

original: (AVŚ_3,10.10a) ṛtubhyaṣ ṭvārtavebhyo mādbhyaḥ saṃvatsarebhyaḥ /
analyzed: ṛtubhyaḥ tvā ārtavebhyaḥ mādbhyaḥ saṃvatsarebhyaḥ

original: (AVŚ_3,10.10c) dhātre vidhātre samṛdhe bhūtasya pataye yaje //10//
analyzed: dhātre vidhātre samṛdhe bhūtasya pataye yaje

original: (AVŚ_3,10.11a) iḍayā juhvato vayaṃ devān ghṛtavatā yaje /
analyzed: iḍayā juhvataḥ vayam devān ghṛtavatā yaje

original: (AVŚ_3,10.11c) gṛhān alubhyato vayaṃ saṃ viśemopa gomataḥ //11//
analyzed: gṛhān a lubhyataḥ vayam sam viśema upa gomataḥ

original: (AVŚ_3,10.12a) ekāṣṭakā tapasā tapyamānā jajāna garbhaṃ mahimānam indram /
analyzed: ekāṣṭakā tapasā tapyamānā jajāna garbham mahimānam indram

original: (AVŚ_3,10.12c) tena devā vy asahanta śatrūn hantā dasyūnām abhavac chacīpatiḥ //12//
analyzed: tena devāḥ vi asahanta śatrūn hantā dasyūnām abhavat śacīpatiḥ

original: (AVŚ_3,10.13a) indraputre somaputre duhitāsi prajāpateḥ /
analyzed: indra putre soma putre duhitā asi prajāpateḥ

original: (AVŚ_3,10.13c) kāmān asmākaṃ pūraya prati gṛhṇāhi no haviḥ //13//
analyzed: kāmān asmākam pūraya prati gṛhṇāhi naḥ haviḥ

original: (AVŚ_3,11.1a) muñcāmi tvā haviṣā jīvanāya kam ajñātayakṣmād uta rājayakṣmāt /
analyzed: muñcāmi tvā haviṣā jīvanāya kam a jñāta yakṣmāt uta rājayakṣmāt

original: (AVŚ_3,11.1c) grāhir jagrāha yady etad enaṃ tasyā indrāgnī pra mumuktam enam //1//
analyzed: grāhiḥ jagrāha yadī etat enam tasyāḥ indra agnī pra mumuktam enam

original: (AVŚ_3,11.2a) yadi kṣitāyur yadi vā pareto yadi mṛtyor antikaṃ eva /
analyzed: yadi kṣita āyuḥ yadi vā paretaḥ yadi mṛtyoḥ antikam eva

original: (AVŚ_3,11.2c) tam ā harāmi nirṛter upasthād aspārśam enaṃ śataśāradāya //2//
analyzed: tam ā harāmi nirṛteḥ upasthāt aspārśam enam śata śāradāya

original: (AVŚ_3,11.3a) sahasrākṣeṇa śatavīryeṇa śatāyuṣā haviṣāhārṣam enam /
analyzed: sahasra akṣeṇa śata vīryeṇa śata āyuṣā haviṣā ahārṣam enam

original: (AVŚ_3,11.3c) indro yathainaṃ śarado nayāty ati viśvasya duritasya pāram //3//
analyzed: indraḥ yathā enam śaradaḥ nayāti ati viśvasya duritasya pāram

original: (AVŚ_3,11.4a) śataṃ jīva śarado vardhamānaḥ śataṃ hemantān chatam u vasantān /
analyzed: śatam jīva śaradaḥ vardhamānaḥ śatam hemantān śatam u vasantān

original: (AVŚ_3,11.4c) śataṃ te indro agniḥ savitā bṛhaspatiḥ śatāyuṣā haviṣāhārṣam enam //4//
analyzed: śatam te indraḥ agniḥ savitā bṛhaspatiḥ śata āyuṣā haviṣā ahārṣam enam

original: (AVŚ_3,11.5a) pra viśataṃ prāṇāpānāv anaḍvāhāv iva vrajam /
analyzed: pra viśatam prāṇa apānau anaḍvāhau iva vrajam

original: (AVŚ_3,11.5c) vy anye yantu mṛtyavo yān āhur itarān chatam //5//
analyzed: vi anye yantu mṛtyavaḥ yān āhuḥ itarān śatam

original: (AVŚ_3,11.6a) ihaiva staṃ prāṇāpānau māpa gātam ito yuvam /
analyzed: iha eva stam prāṇa apānau mā apa gātam itas yuvam

original: (AVŚ_3,11.6c) śarīram asyāṅgāni jarase vahataṃ punaḥ //6//
analyzed: śarīram asya aṅgāni jarase vahatam punar

original: (AVŚ_3,11.7a) jarāyai tvā pari dadāmi jarāyai ni dhuvāmi tvā /
analyzed: jarāyai tvā pari dadāmi jarāyai ni dhuvāmi tvā

original: (AVŚ_3,11.7c) jarā tvā bhadrā neṣṭa vy anye yantu mṛtyavo yān āhur itarān chatam //7//
analyzed: jarā tvā bhadrā neṣṭa vi anye yantu mṛtyavaḥ yān āhuḥ itarān śatam

original: (AVŚ_3,11.8a) abhi tvā jarimāhita gām ukṣaṇam iva rajjvā /
analyzed: abhi tvā jarimā ahita gām ukṣaṇam iva rajjvā

original: (AVŚ_3,11.8c) yas tvā mṛtyur abhyadhatta jāyamānaṃ supāśayā /
analyzed: yaḥ tvā mṛtyuḥ abhyadhatta jāyamānam su pāśayā

original: (AVŚ_3,11.8e) taṃ te satyasya hastābhyām ud amuñcad bṛhaspatiḥ //8//
analyzed: tam te satyasya hastābhyām ud amuñcat bṛhaspatiḥ

original: (AVŚ_3,12.1a) ihaiva dhruvāṃ ni minomi śālāṃ kṣeme tiṣṭhāti ghṛtam ukṣamāṇā /
analyzed: iha eva dhruvām ni minomi śālām kṣeme tiṣṭhāti ghṛtam ukṣamāṇā

original: (AVŚ_3,12.1c) tāṃ tvā śāle sarvavīrāḥ suvīrā ariṣṭavīrā upa saṃ carema //1//
analyzed: tām tvā śāle sarva vīrāḥ su vīrāḥ ariṣṭa vīrāḥ upa sam carema

original: (AVŚ_3,12.2a) ihaiva dhruvā prati tiṣṭha śāle 'śvāvatī gomatī sūnṛtāvatī /
analyzed: iha eva dhruvā prati tiṣṭha śāle śvāvatī gomatī sūnṛtāvatī

original: (AVŚ_3,12.2c) ūrjasvatī ghṛtavatī payasvaty uc chrayasva mahate saubhagāya //2//
analyzed: ūrjasvatī ghṛtavatī payasvatī ud śrayasva mahate saubhagāya

original: (AVŚ_3,12.3a) dharuṇy asi śāle bṛhachandāḥ pūtidhānyā /
analyzed: dharuṇī asi śāle bṛhat chandāḥ pūti dhānyā

original: (AVŚ_3,12.3c) ā tvā vatso gamed ā kumāra ā dhenavaḥ sāyam āspandamānāḥ //3//
analyzed: ā tvā vatsaḥ gamet ā kumāraḥ ā dhenavaḥ sāyam āspandamānāḥ

original: (AVŚ_3,12.4a) imāṃ śālāṃ savitā vāyur indro bṛhaspatir ni minotu prajānan /
analyzed: imām śālām savitā vāyuḥ indraḥ bṛhaspatiḥ ni minotu prajānan

original: (AVŚ_3,12.4c) ukṣantūdnā maruto ghṛtena bhago no rājā ni kṛṣiṃ tanotu //4//
analyzed: ukṣantu udnā marutaḥ ghṛtena bhagaḥ naḥ rājā ni kṛṣim tanotu

original: (AVŚ_3,12.5a) mānasya patni śaraṇā syonā devī devebhir nimitāsy agre /
analyzed: mānasya patni śaraṇā syonā devī devebhiḥ nimitā asi agre

original: (AVŚ_3,12.5c) tṛṇaṃ vasānā sumanā asas tvam athāsmabhyaṃ sahavīraṃ rayiṃ dāḥ //5//
analyzed: tṛṇam vasānā sumanāḥ asaḥ tvam atha asmabhyam saha vīram rayim dāḥ

original: (AVŚ_3,12.6a) ṛtena sthūṇām adhi roha vaṃśogro virājann apa vṛṅkṣva śatrūn /
analyzed: ṛtena sthūṇām adhi roha vaṃśa ugraḥ virājan apa vṛṅkṣva śatrūn

original: (AVŚ_3,12.6c) mā te riṣann upasattāro gṛhāṇāṃ śāle śataṃ jīvema śaradaḥ sarvavīrāḥ //6//
analyzed: mā te riṣan upasattāraḥ gṛhāṇām śāle śatam jīvema śaradaḥ sarva vīrāḥ

original: (AVŚ_3,12.7a) emāṃ kumāras taruṇa ā vatso jagatā saha /
analyzed: ā imām kumāraḥ taruṇaḥ ā vatsaḥ jagatā saha

original: (AVŚ_3,12.7c) emām parisrutaḥ kumbha ā dadhnaḥ kalaśair aguḥ //7//
analyzed: ā imām parisrutaḥ kumbhaḥ ā dadhnaḥ kalaśaiḥ aguḥ

original: (AVŚ_3,12.8a) pūrṇaṃ nāri pra bhara kumbham etaṃ ghṛtasya dhārām amṛtena saṃbhṛtām /
analyzed: pūrṇam nāri pra bhara kumbham etam ghṛtasya dhārām amṛtena saṃbhṛtām

original: (AVŚ_3,12.8c) imāṃ pātṝn amṛtena sam aṅgdhīṣṭāpūrtam abhi rakṣāty enām //8//
analyzed: imām pātṝn amṛtena sam aṅgdhi iṣṭāpūrtam abhi rakṣāti enām

original: (AVŚ_3,12.9a) imā āpaḥ pra bharāmy ayakṣmā yakṣmanāśanīḥ /
analyzed: imāḥ āpaḥ pra bharāmi ayakṣmāḥ yakṣma nāśanīḥ

original: (AVŚ_3,12.9c) gṛhān upa pra sīdāmy amṛtena sahāgninā //9//
analyzed: gṛhān upa pra sīdāmi amṛtena saha agninā

original: (AVŚ_3,13.1a) yad adaḥ saṃprayatīr ahāv anadatā hate /
analyzed: yat adaḥ saṃprayatīḥ ahau anadata hate

original: (AVŚ_3,13.1c) tasmād ā nadyo nāma stha tā vo nāmāni sindhavaḥ //1//
analyzed: tasmāt ā nadyaḥ nāma stha tā vaḥ nāmāni sindhavaḥ

original: (AVŚ_3,13.2a) yat preṣitā varuṇenāc chībham samavalgata /
analyzed: yat preṣitāḥ varuṇenāt śībham samavalgata

original: (AVŚ_3,13.2c) tad āpnod indro vo yatīs tasmād āpo anu ṣṭhana //2//
analyzed: tat āpnot indraḥ vaḥ yatīḥ tasmāt āpaḥ anu sthana

original: (AVŚ_3,13.3a) apakāmaṃ syandamānā avīvarata vo hi kam /
analyzed: apakāmam syandamānāḥ avīvarata vaḥ hi kam

original: (AVŚ_3,13.3c) indro vaḥ śaktibhir devīs tasmād vār nāma vo hitam //3//
analyzed: indraḥ vaḥ śaktibhiḥ devīḥ tasmāt vār nāma vaḥ hitam

original: (AVŚ_3,13.4a) ekaḥ vo devo 'py atiṣṭhat syandamānā yathāvaśam /
analyzed: ekaḥ vaḥ devaḥ u pi atiṣṭhat syandamānāḥ yathāvaśam

original: (AVŚ_3,13.4c) ud āniṣur mahīr iti tasmād udakam ucyate //4//
analyzed: ud āniṣuḥ mahīḥ iti tasmāt udakam ucyate

original: (AVŚ_3,13.5a) āpo bhadrā ghṛtam id āpa āsann agnīṣomau bibhraty āpa it tāḥ /
analyzed: āpaḥ bhadrāḥ ghṛtam id āpaḥ āsan agnīṣomau bibhrati āpaḥ id tāḥ

original: (AVŚ_3,13.5c) tīvro raso madhupṛcām araṃgama ā mā prāṇena saha varcasā gamet //5//
analyzed: tīvraḥ rasaḥ madhu pṛcām araṃgamaḥ ā mā prāṇena saha varcasā gamet

original: (AVŚ_3,13.6a) ād it paśyāmy uta vā śṛṇomy ā mā ghoṣo gachati vāṅ māsām /
analyzed: āt id paśyāmi uta vā śṛṇomi ā mā ghoṣaḥ gacchati vāc mā āsām

original: (AVŚ_3,13.6c) manye bhejāno amṛtasya tarhi hiraṇyavarṇā atṛpaṃ yadā vaḥ //6//
analyzed: manye bhejānaḥ amṛtasya tarhi hiraṇya varṇāḥ atṛpam yadā vaḥ

original: (AVŚ_3,13.7a) idaṃ va āpo hṛdayam ayaṃ vatsa ṛtāvarīḥ /
analyzed: idam vaḥ āpaḥ hṛdayam ayam vatsaḥ ṛtāvarīḥ

original: (AVŚ_3,13.7c) ihettham eta śakvarīr yatredaṃ veśayāmi vaḥ //7//
analyzed: iha ittham eta śakvarīḥ yatra idam veśayāmi vaḥ

original: (AVŚ_3,14.1a) saṃ vo goṣṭhena suṣadā saṃ rayyā saṃ subhūtyā /
analyzed: sam vaḥ goṣṭhena suṣadā sam rayyā sam su bhūtyā

original: (AVŚ_3,14.1c) aharjātasya yan nāma tenā vaḥ saṃ sṛjāmasi //1//
analyzed: ahar jātasya yat nāma tena vaḥ sam sṛjāmasi

original: (AVŚ_3,14.2a) saṃ vaḥ sṛjatv aryamā saṃ pūṣā saṃ bṛhaspatiḥ /
analyzed: sam vaḥ sṛjatu aryamā sam pūṣā sam bṛhaspatiḥ

original: (AVŚ_3,14.2c) sam indro yo dhanaṃjayo mayi puṣyata yad vasu //2//
analyzed: sam indraḥ yaḥ dhanaṃjayaḥ mayi puṣyata yat vasu

original: (AVŚ_3,14.3a) saṃjagmānā abibhyuṣīr asmin goṣṭhe karīṣiṇīḥ /
analyzed: saṃjagmānāḥ a bibhyuṣīḥ asmin goṣṭhe karīṣiṇīḥ

original: (AVŚ_3,14.3c) bibhratīḥ somyaṃ madhv anamīvā upetana //3//
analyzed: bibhratīḥ somyam madhu anamīvāḥ upetana

original: (AVŚ_3,14.4a) ihaiva gāva etaneho śakeva puṣyata /
analyzed: iha eva gāvaḥ etana iha u śakā iva puṣyata

original: (AVŚ_3,14.4c) ihaivota pra jāyadhvaṃ mayi saṃjñānam astu vaḥ //4//
analyzed: iha eva uta pra jāyadhvam mayi saṃjñānam astu vaḥ

original: (AVŚ_3,14.5a) śivo vo goṣṭho bhavatu śāriśākeva puṣyata /
analyzed: śivaḥ vaḥ goṣṭhaḥ bhavatu śāriśākā iva puṣyata

original: (AVŚ_3,14.5c) ihaivota pra jāyadhvaṃ mayā vaḥ saṃ sṛjāmasi //5//
analyzed: iha eva uta pra jāyadhvam mayā vaḥ sam sṛjāmasi

original: (AVŚ_3,14.6a) mayā gāvo gopatinā sacadhvam ayaṃ vo goṣṭha iha poṣayiṣṇuḥ /
analyzed: mayā gāvaḥ gopatinā sacadhvam ayam vaḥ goṣṭhaḥ iha poṣayiṣṇuḥ

original: (AVŚ_3,14.6c) rāyas poṣeṇa bahulā bhavantīr jīvā jīvantīr upa vaḥ sadema //6//
analyzed: rāyaḥ poṣeṇa bahulāḥ bhavantīḥ jīvāḥ jīvantīḥ upa vaḥ sadema

original: (AVŚ_3,15.1a) indram ahaṃ vaṇijaṃ codayāmi sa na aitu puraetā no astu /
analyzed: indram aham vaṇijam codayāmi sa naḥ aitu puraetā naḥ astu

original: (AVŚ_3,15.1c) nudann arātiṃ paripanthinaṃ mṛgaṃ sa īśāno dhanadā astu mahyam //1//
analyzed: nudan arātim paripanthinam mṛgam saḥ īśānaḥ dhana dāḥ astu mahyam

original: (AVŚ_3,15.2a) ye panthāno bahavo devayānā antarā dyāvāpṛthivī saṃcaranti /
analyzed: ye panthānaḥ bahavaḥ deva yānāḥ antarā dyāvāpṛthivī saṃcaranti

original: (AVŚ_3,15.2c) te mā juṣantāṃ payasā ghṛtena yathā krītvā dhanam āharāṇi //2//
analyzed: te mā juṣantām payasā ghṛtena yathā krītvā dhanam āharāṇi

original: (AVŚ_3,15.3a) idhmenāgna ichamāno ghṛtena juhomi havyaṃ tarase balāya /
analyzed: idhmena agne icchamānaḥ ghṛtena juhomi havyam tarase balāya

original: (AVŚ_3,15.3c) yāvad īśe brahmaṇā vandamāna imāṃ dhiyaṃ śataseyāya devīm //3//
analyzed: yāvat īśe brahmaṇā vandamānaḥ imām dhiyam śata seyāya devīm

original: (AVŚ_3,15.4a) imām agne śaraṇiṃ mīmṛṣo no yam adhvānam agāma dūram /
analyzed: imām agne śaraṇim mīmṛṣaḥ naḥ yam adhvānam agāma dūram

original: (AVŚ_3,15.4c) śunaṃ no astu prapaṇo vikrayaś ca pratipaṇaḥ phalinaṃ mā kṛṇotu /
analyzed: śunam naḥ astu prapaṇaḥ vikrayaḥ ca pratipaṇaḥ phalinam mā kṛṇotu

original: (AVŚ_3,15.4e) idaṃ havyaṃ saṃvidānau juṣethāṃ śunaṃ no astu caritam utthitaṃ ca //4//
analyzed: idam havyam saṃvidānau juṣethām śunam naḥ astu caritam utthitam ca

original: (AVŚ_3,15.5a) yena dhanena prapaṇaṃ carāmi dhanena devā dhanam ichamānaḥ /
analyzed: yena dhanena prapaṇam carāmi dhanena devāḥ dhanam ichamānaḥ

original: (AVŚ_3,15.5c) tan me bhūyo bhavatu mā kanīyo 'gne sātaghno devān haviṣā ni ṣedha //5//
analyzed: tat me bhūyaḥ bhavatu mā kanīyaḥ gne sāta ghnas devān haviṣā ni sedha

original: (AVŚ_3,15.6a) yena dhanena prapaṇaṃ carāmi dhanena devā dhanam ichamānaḥ /
analyzed: yena dhanena prapaṇam carāmi dhanena devāḥ dhanam ichamānaḥ

original: (AVŚ_3,15.6c) tasmin ma indro rucim ā dadhātu prajāpatiḥ savitā somo agniḥ //6//
analyzed: tasmin me indraḥ rucim ā dadhātu prajāpatiḥ savitā somaḥ agniḥ

original: (AVŚ_3,15.7a) upa tvā namasā vayaṃ hotar vaiśvānara stumaḥ /
analyzed: upa tvā namasā vayam hotar vaiśvānara stumaḥ

original: (AVŚ_3,15.7c) sa naḥ prajāsv ātmasu goṣu prāṇeṣu jāgṛhi //7//
analyzed: sa naḥ prajāsu ātmasu goṣu prāṇeṣu jāgṛhi

original: (AVŚ_3,15.8a) viśvāhā te sadam id bharemāśvāyeva tiṣṭhate jātavedaḥ /
analyzed: viśvāhā te sadam id bharema aśvāya iva tiṣṭhate jātavedaḥ

original: (AVŚ_3,15.8c) rāyas poṣeṇa sam iṣā madanto mā te agne prativeśā riṣāma //8//
analyzed: rāyaḥ poṣeṇa sam iṣā madantaḥ mā te agne prativeśāḥ riṣāma

original: (AVŚ_3,16.1a) prātar agniṃ prātar indram havāmahe prātar mitrāvaruṇā prātar aśvinā /
analyzed: prātar agnim prātar indram havāmahe prātar mitrāvaruṇā prātar aśvinā

original: (AVŚ_3,16.1c) prātar bhagaṃ pūṣaṇaṃ brahmaṇas patiṃ prātaḥ somam uta rudraṃ havāmahe //1//
analyzed: prātar bhagam pūṣaṇam brahmaṇaḥ patim prātar somam uta rudram havāmahe

original: (AVŚ_3,16.2a) prātarjitaṃ bhagam ugram havāmahe vayaṃ putram aditer yo vidhartā /
analyzed: prātar jitam bhagam ugram havāmahe vayam putram aditeḥ yaḥ vidhartā

original: (AVŚ_3,16.2c) ādhraś cid yaṃ manyamānas turaś cid rājā cid yaṃ bhagaṃ bhakṣīty āha //2//
analyzed: ādhraḥ cit yam manyamānaḥ turaḥ cit rājā cit yam bhagam bhakṣi iti āha

original: (AVŚ_3,16.3a) bhaga praṇetar bhaga satyarādho bhagemāṃ dhiyam ud avā dadan naḥ /
analyzed: bhaga praṇetar bhaga satya rādhaḥ bhaga imām dhiyam ud ava dadan naḥ

original: (AVŚ_3,16.3c) bhaga pra ṇo janaya gobhir aśvair bhaga pra nṛbhir nṛvantaḥ syāma //3//
analyzed: bhaga pra naḥ janaya gobhiḥ aśvaiḥ bhaga pra nṛbhiḥ nṛvantaḥ syāma

original: (AVŚ_3,16.4a) utedānīṃ bhagavantaḥ syāmota prapitva uta madhye ahnām /
analyzed: uta idānīm bhagavantaḥ syāma uta prapitve uta madhye ahnām

original: (AVŚ_3,16.4c) utoditau maghavant sūryasya vayaṃ devānāṃ sumatau syāma //4//
analyzed: uta uditau maghavan sūryasya vayam devānām sumatau syāma

original: (AVŚ_3,16.5a) bhaga eva bhagavāṃ astu devas tenā vayaṃ bhagavantaḥ syāma /
analyzed: bhagaḥ eva bhagavān astu devaḥ tena vayam bhagavantaḥ syāma

original: (AVŚ_3,16.5c) taṃ tvā bhaga sarva ij johavīmi sa no bhaga puraetā bhaveha //5//
analyzed: tam tvā bhaga sarvaḥ id johavīmi sa naḥ bhaga puraetā bhava iha

original: (AVŚ_3,16.6a) sam adhvarāyoṣaso namanta dadhikrāveva śucaye padāya /
analyzed: sam adhvarāya uṣasaḥ namanta dadhikrāvā iva śucaye padāya

original: (AVŚ_3,16.6c) arvācīnaṃ vasuvidaṃ bhagaṃ me ratham ivāśvā vājina ā vahantu //6//
analyzed: arvācīnam vasu vidam bhagam me ratham iva aśvāḥ vājinaḥ ā vahantu

original: (AVŚ_3,16.7a) aśvāvatīr gomatīr na uṣāso vīravatīḥ sadam uchantu bhadrāḥ /
analyzed: aśvāvatīḥ gomatīḥ naḥ uṣāsaḥ vīravatīḥ sadam ucchantu bhadrāḥ

original: (AVŚ_3,16.7c) ghṛtaṃ duhānā viśvataḥ prapītā yūyaṃ pāta svastibhiḥ sadā naḥ //7//
analyzed: ghṛtam duhānāḥ viśvatas prapītāḥ yūyam pāta svastibhiḥ sadā naḥ

original: (AVŚ_3,17.1a) sīrā yuñjanti kavayo yugā vi tanvate pṛthak /
analyzed: sīrā yuñjanti kavayaḥ yugā vi tanvate pṛthak

original: (AVŚ_3,17.1c) dhīrā deveṣu sumnayau //1//
analyzed: dhīrāḥ deveṣu sumnayau

original: (AVŚ_3,17.2a) yunakta sīrā vi yugā tanota kṛte yonau vapateha bījam /
analyzed: yunakta sīrā vi yugā tanota kṛte yonau vapata iha bījam

original: (AVŚ_3,17.2c) virājaḥ śnuṣṭiḥ sabharā asan no nedīya it sṛṇyaḥ pakvam ā yavan //2//
analyzed: virājaḥ śnuṣṭiḥ sabharāḥ asat naḥ nedīyaḥ id sṛṇyaḥ pakvam ā yavan

original: (AVŚ_3,17.3a) lāṅgalaṃ pavīravat suśīmaṃ somasatsaru /
analyzed: lāṅgalam pavīravat suśīmam soma satsaru

original: (AVŚ_3,17.3c) ud id vapatu gām aviṃ prasthāvad rathavāhanaṃ pībarīṃ ca prapharvyam //3//
analyzed: ud id vapatu gām avim prasthāvat rathavāhanam pībarīm ca prapharvyam

original: (AVŚ_3,17.4a) indraḥ sītāṃ ni gṛhṇātu tāṃ pūṣābhi rakṣatu /
analyzed: indraḥ sītām ni gṛhṇātu tām pūṣā abhi rakṣatu

original: (AVŚ_3,17.4c) sā naḥ payasvatī duhām uttarāmuttarāṃ samām //4//
analyzed: sā naḥ payasvatī duhām uttarām uttarām samām

original: (AVŚ_3,17.5a) śunaṃ suphālā vi tudantu bhūmiṃ śunaṃ kīnāśā anu yantu vāhān /
analyzed: śunam su phālāḥ vi tudantu bhūmim śunam kīnāśāḥ anu yantu vāhān

original: (AVŚ_3,17.5c) śunāsīrā haviṣā tośamānā supippalā oṣadhīḥ kartam asmai //5//
analyzed: śunāsīrā haviṣā tośamānā su pippalāḥ oṣadhīḥ kartam asmai

original: (AVŚ_3,17.6a) śunaṃ vāhāḥ śunaṃ naraḥ śunaṃ kṛṣatu lāṅgalam /
analyzed: śunam vāhāḥ śunam naraḥ śunam kṛṣatu lāṅgalam

original: (AVŚ_3,17.6c) śunaṃ varatrā badhyantāṃ śunam aṣṭrām ud iṅgaya //6//
analyzed: śunam varatrāḥ badhyantām śunam aṣṭrām ud iṅgaya

original: (AVŚ_3,17.7a) śunāsīreha sma me juṣethām /
analyzed: śunāsīrā iha sma me juṣethām

original: (AVŚ_3,17.7c) yad divi cakrathuḥ payas tenemām upa siñcatam //7//
analyzed: yat divi cakrathuḥ payaḥ tena imām upa siñcatam

original: (AVŚ_3,17.8a) sīte vandāmahe tvārvācī subhage bhava /
analyzed: sīte vandāmahe tvā arvācī subhage bhava

original: (AVŚ_3,17.8c) yathā naḥ sumanā aso yathā naḥ suphalā bhuvaḥ //8//
analyzed: yathā naḥ sumanāḥ asaḥ yathā naḥ su phalā bhuvaḥ

original: (AVŚ_3,17.9a) ghṛtena sītā madhunā samaktā viśvair devair anumatā marudbhiḥ /
analyzed: ghṛtena sītā madhunā samaktā viśvaiḥ devaiḥ anumatā marudbhiḥ

original: (AVŚ_3,17.9c) sā naḥ sīte payasābhyāvavṛtsvorjasvatī ghṛtavat pinvamānā //9//
analyzed: sā naḥ sīte payasā abhyāvavṛtsva ūrjasvatī ghṛtavat pinvamānā

original: (AVŚ_3,18.1a) imāṃ khanāmy oṣadhiṃ vīrudhāṃ balavattamām /
analyzed: imām khanāmi oṣadhim vīrudhām balavattamām

original: (AVŚ_3,18.1c) yayā sapatnīṃ bādhate yayā saṃvindate patim //1//
analyzed: yayā sapatnīm bādhate yayā saṃvindate patim

original: (AVŚ_3,18.2a) uttānaparṇe subhage devajūte sahasvati /
analyzed: uttāna parṇe subhage deva jūte sahasvati

original: (AVŚ_3,18.2c) sapatnīṃ me parā ṇuda patiṃ me kevalaṃ kṛdhi //2//
analyzed: sapatnīm me parā nuda patim me kevalam kṛdhi

original: (AVŚ_3,18.3a) nahi te nāma jagrāha no asmin ramase patau /
analyzed: nahi te nāma jagrāha na u asmin ramase patau

original: (AVŚ_3,18.3c) parām eva parāvataṃ sapatnīṃ gamayāmasi //3//
analyzed: parām eva parāvatam sapatnīm gamayāmasi

original: (AVŚ_3,18.4a) uttarāham uttara uttared uttarābhyaḥ /
analyzed: uttarā aham uttaraḥ uttaret uttarābhyaḥ

original: (AVŚ_3,18.4c) adhaḥ sapatnī yā mamādharā sādharābhyaḥ //4//
analyzed: adhas sapatnī yā mama adharā sā adharābhyaḥ

original: (AVŚ_3,18.5a) aham asmi sahamānātho tvam asi sāsahiḥ /
analyzed: aham asmi sahamānā atha u tvam asi sāsahiḥ

original: (AVŚ_3,18.5c) ubhe sahasvatī bhūtvā sapatnīṃ me sahāvahai //5//
analyzed: ubhe sahasvatī bhūtvā sapatnīm me sahāvahai

original: (AVŚ_3,18.6a) abhi te 'dhāṃ sahamānām upa te 'dhāṃ sahīyasīm /
analyzed: abhi te dhām sahamānām upa te dhām sahīyasīm

original: (AVŚ_3,18.6c) mām anu pra te mano vatsaṃ gaur iva dhāvatu pathā vār iva dhāvatu //6//
analyzed: mām anu pra te manaḥ vatsam gauḥ iva dhāvatu pathā vār iva dhāvatu

original: (AVŚ_3,19.1a) saṃśitaṃ ma idaṃ brahma saṃśitaṃ vīryaṃ balam /
analyzed: saṃśitam me idam brahma saṃśitam vīryam balam

original: (AVŚ_3,19.1c) saṃśitaṃ kṣatram ajaram astu jiṣṇur yeṣām asmi purohitaḥ //1//
analyzed: saṃśitam kṣatram ajaram astu jiṣṇuḥ yeṣām asmi purohitaḥ

original: (AVŚ_3,19.2a) sam aham eṣāṃ rāṣṭraṃ syāmi sam ojo vīryaṃ balam /
analyzed: sam aham eṣām rāṣṭram syāmi sam ojaḥ vīryam balam

original: (AVŚ_3,19.2c) vṛścāmi śatrūṇāṃ bāhūn anena haviṣā aham //2//
analyzed: vṛścāmi śatrūṇām bāhūn anena haviṣā aham

original: (AVŚ_3,19.3a) nīcaiḥ padyantām adhare bhavantu ye naḥ sūriṃ maghavānaṃ pṛtanyān /
analyzed: nīcais padyantām adhare bhavantu ye naḥ sūrim maghavānam pṛtanyān

original: (AVŚ_3,19.3c) kṣiṇāmi brahmaṇāmitrān un nayāmi svān aham //3//
analyzed: kṣiṇāmi brahmaṇā amitrān ud nayāmi svān aham

original: (AVŚ_3,19.4a) tīkṣṇīyāṃsaḥ paraśor agnes tīkṣṇatarā uta /
analyzed: tīkṣṇīyāṃsaḥ paraśoḥ agneḥ tīkṣṇatarāḥ uta

original: (AVŚ_3,19.4c) indrasya vajrāt tīkṣṇīyāṃso yeṣām asmi purohitaḥ //4//
analyzed: indrasya vajrāt tīkṣṇīyāṃsaḥ yeṣām asmi purohitaḥ

original: (AVŚ_3,19.5a) eṣām aham āyudhā saṃ syāmy eṣāṃ rāṣṭraṃ suvīraṃ vardhayāmi /
analyzed: eṣām aham āyudhā sam syāmi eṣām rāṣṭram su vīram vardhayāmi

original: (AVŚ_3,19.5c) eṣām kṣatram ajaram astu jiṣṇv eṣāṃ cittaṃ viśve 'vantu devāḥ //5//
analyzed: eṣām kṣatram ajaram astu jiṣṇu eṣām cittam viśve vantu devāḥ

original: (AVŚ_3,19.6a) ud dharṣantāṃ maghavan vājināny ud vīrāṇāṃ jayatām etu ghoṣaḥ /
analyzed: ud harṣantām maghavan vājināni ud vīrāṇām jayatām etu ghoṣaḥ

original: (AVŚ_3,19.6c) pṛthag ghoṣā ululayaḥ ketumanta ud īratām /
analyzed: pṛthak ghoṣāḥ ululayaḥ ketumantaḥ ud īratām

original: (AVŚ_3,19.6e) devā indrajyeṣṭhā maruto yantu senayā //6//
analyzed: devāḥ indra jyeṣṭhāḥ marutaḥ yantu senayā

original: (AVŚ_3,19.7a) pretā jayatā nara ugrā vaḥ santu bāhavaḥ /
analyzed: pra ita jayata naraḥ ugrāḥ vaḥ santu bāhavaḥ

original: (AVŚ_3,19.7c) tīkṣṇeṣavo 'baladhanvano hatogrāyudhā abalān ugrabāhavaḥ //7//
analyzed: tīkṣṇa iṣavaḥ baladhanvanaḥ hata ugra āyudhāḥ abalān ugra bāhavaḥ

original: (AVŚ_3,19.8a) avasṛṣṭā parā pata śaravye brahmasaṃśite /
analyzed: avasṛṣṭā parā pata śaravye brahma saṃśite

original: (AVŚ_3,19.8c) jaya amitrān pra padyasva jahy eṣāṃ varaṃvaraṃ māmīṣāṃ moci kaś cana //8//
analyzed: jaya amitrān pra padyasva jahi eṣām varaṃvaram mā amīṣām moci kaḥ cana

original: (AVŚ_3,20.1a) ayaṃ te yonir ṛtviyo yato jāto arocathāḥ /
analyzed: ayam te yoniḥ ṛtviyaḥ yatas jātaḥ arocathāḥ

original: (AVŚ_3,20.1c) taṃ jānann agna ā rohādhā no vardhaya rayim //1//
analyzed: tam jānan agne ā roha adhā naḥ vardhaya rayim

original: (AVŚ_3,20.2a) agne achā vadeha naḥ pratyaṅ naḥ sumanā bhava /
analyzed: agne achā vada iha naḥ pratyaṅ naḥ su manāḥ bhava

original: (AVŚ_3,20.2c) pra ṇo yacha viśāṃ pate dhanadā asi nas tvam //2//
analyzed: pra naḥ yaccha viśām pate dhana dāḥ asi naḥ tvam

original: (AVŚ_3,20.3a) pra ṇo yachatv aryamā pra bhagaḥ pra bṛhaspatiḥ /
analyzed: pra naḥ yacchatu aryamā pra bhagaḥ pra bṛhaspatiḥ

original: (AVŚ_3,20.3c) pra devīḥ prota sūnṛtā rayiṃ devī dadhātu me //3//
analyzed: pra devīḥ pra uta sūnṛtāḥ rayim devī dadhātu me

original: (AVŚ_3,20.4a) somaṃ rājānam avase 'gniṃ gīrbhir havāmahe /
analyzed: somam rājānam avase gnim gīrbhiḥ havāmahe

original: (AVŚ_3,20.4c) ādityam viṣṇum sūryaṃ brahmāṇaṃ ca bṛhaspatim //4//
analyzed: ādityam viṣṇum sūryam brahmāṇam ca bṛhaspatim

original: (AVŚ_3,20.5a) tvaṃ no agne agnibhir brahma yajñaṃ vardhaya /
analyzed: tvam naḥ agne agnibhiḥ brahma yajñam vardhaya

original: (AVŚ_3,20.5c) tvaṃ no deva dātave rayiṃ dānāya codaya //5//
analyzed: tvam naḥ deva dātave rayim dānāya codaya

original: (AVŚ_3,20.6a) indravāyū ubhāv iha suhaveha havāmahe /
analyzed: indra vāyū ubhau iha su havā iha havāmahe

original: (AVŚ_3,20.6c) yathā naḥ sarva ij janaḥ saṃgatyāṃ sumanā asad dānakāmaś ca no bhuvat //6//
analyzed: yathā naḥ sarvaḥ id janaḥ saṃgatyām sumanāḥ asat dāna kāmaḥ ca naḥ bhuvat

original: (AVŚ_3,20.7a) aryamaṇaṃ bṛhaspatim indraṃ dānāya codaya /
analyzed: aryamaṇam bṛhaspatim indram dānāya codaya

original: (AVŚ_3,20.7c) vātaṃ viṣṇuṃ sarasvatīṃ savitāraṃ ca vājinam //7//
analyzed: vātam viṣṇum sarasvatīm savitāram ca vājinam

original: (AVŚ_3,20.8a) vājasya nu prasave saṃ babhūvimemā ca viśvā bhuvanāni antaḥ /
analyzed: vājasya nu prasave sam babhūvima imā ca viśvā bhuvanāni antar

original: (AVŚ_3,20.8c) utāditsantaṃ dāpayatu prajānan rayiṃ ca naḥ sarvavīraṃ ni yacha //8//
analyzed: uta a ditsantam dāpayatu prajānan rayim ca naḥ sarva vīram ni yaccha

original: (AVŚ_3,20.9a) duhrām me pañca pradiṣo duhrām urvīr yathābalam /
analyzed: duhrām me pañca pradiṣaḥ duhrām urvīḥ yathābalam

original: (AVŚ_3,20.9c) prāpeyaṃ sarvā ākūtīr manasā hṛdayena ca //9//
analyzed: prāpeyam sarvāḥ ākūtīḥ manasā hṛdayena ca

original: (AVŚ_3,20.10a) gosaniṃ vācam udeyaṃ varcasā mābhyudihi /
analyzed: go sanim vācam udeyam varcasā mā abhyudihi

original: (AVŚ_3,20.10c) ā rundhāṃ sarvato vāyus tvaṣṭā poṣaṃ dadhātu me //10//
analyzed: ā rundhām sarvatas vāyuḥ tvaṣṭā poṣam dadhātu me

original: (AVŚ_3,21.1a) ye agnayo apsv antar ye vṛtre ye puruṣe ye aśmasu /
analyzed: ye agnayaḥ apsu antar ye vṛtre ye puruṣe ye aśmasu

original: (AVŚ_3,21.1c) ya āviveśoṣadhīr yo vanaspatīṃs tebhyo agnibhyo hutam astv etat //1//
analyzed: yaḥ āviveśa oṣadhīḥ yaḥ vanaspatīn tebhyaḥ agnibhyaḥ hutam astu etat

original: (AVŚ_3,21.2a) yaḥ some antar yo goṣv antar ya āviṣṭo vayaḥsu yo mṛgeṣu /
analyzed: yaḥ some antar yaḥ goṣu antar yaḥ āviṣṭaḥ vayaḥsu yaḥ mṛgeṣu

original: (AVŚ_3,21.2c) ya āviveśa dvipado yas catuṣpadas tebhyo agnibhyo hutam astv etat //2//
analyzed: yaḥ āviveśa dvipadaḥ yaḥ catuṣpadaḥ tebhyaḥ agnibhyaḥ hutam astu etat

original: (AVŚ_3,21.3a) ya indreṇa sarathaṃ yāti devo vaiśvānara uta viśvadāvyaḥ /
analyzed: yaḥ indreṇa sa ratham yāti devaḥ vaiśvānaraḥ uta viśvadāvyaḥ

original: (AVŚ_3,21.3c) yaṃ johavīmi pṛtanāsu sāsahiṃ tebhyo agnibhyo hutam astv etat //3//
analyzed: yam johavīmi pṛtanāsu sāsahim tebhyaḥ agnibhyaḥ hutam astu etat

original: (AVŚ_3,21.4a) yo devo viśvād yam u kāmam āhur yaṃ dātāraṃ pratigṛhṇantam āhuḥ /
analyzed: yaḥ devaḥ viśva ad yam u kāmam āhuḥ yam dātāram pratigṛhṇantam āhuḥ

original: (AVŚ_3,21.4c) yo dhīraḥ śakraḥ paribhūr adābhyas tebhyo agnibhyo hutam astv etat //4//
analyzed: yaḥ dhīraḥ śakraḥ paribhūḥ adābhyaḥ tebhyaḥ agnibhyaḥ hutam astu etat

original: (AVŚ_3,21.5a) yaṃ tvā hotāraṃ manasābhi saṃvidus trayodaśa bhauvanāḥ pañca mānavāḥ /
analyzed: yam tvā hotāram manasā abhi saṃviduḥ trayodaśa bhauvanāḥ pañca mānavāḥ

original: (AVŚ_3,21.5c) varcodhase yaśase sūnṛtāvate tebhyo agnibhyo hutam astv etat //5//
analyzed: varcaḥ dhase yaśase sūnṛtāvate tebhyaḥ agnibhyaḥ hutam astu etat

original: (AVŚ_3,21.6a) ukṣānnāya vaśānnāya somapṛṣṭhāya vedhase /
analyzed: ukṣa annāya vaśā annāya soma pṛṣṭhāya vedhase

original: (AVŚ_3,21.6c) vaiśvānarajyeṣṭhebhyas tebhyo agnibhyo hutam astv etat //6//
analyzed: vaiśvānara jyeṣṭhebhyaḥ tebhyaḥ agnibhyaḥ hutam astu etat

original: (AVŚ_3,21.7a) divaṃ pṛthivīm anv antarikṣam ye vidyutam anusaṃcaranti /
analyzed: divam pṛthivīm anu antarikṣam ye vidyutam anusaṃcaranti

original: (AVŚ_3,21.7c) ye dikṣv antar ye vāte antas tebhyo agnibhyo hutam astv etat //7//
analyzed: ye dikṣu antar ye vāte antar tebhyaḥ agnibhyaḥ hutam astu etat

original: (AVŚ_3,21.8a) hiraṇyapāṇiṃ savitāram indraṃ bṛhaspatiṃ varuṇaṃ mitram agnim /
analyzed: hiraṇya pāṇim savitāram indram bṛhaspatim varuṇam mitram agnim

original: (AVŚ_3,21.8c) viśvān devān aṅgiraso havāmahe imaṃ kravyādaṃ śamayantv agnim //8//
analyzed: viśvān devān aṅgirasaḥ havāmahe imam kravyādam śamayantu agnim

original: (AVŚ_3,21.9a) śānto agniḥ kravyāc chāntaḥ puruṣareṣaṇaḥ /
analyzed: śāntaḥ agniḥ kravyād śāntaḥ puruṣa reṣaṇaḥ

original: (AVŚ_3,21.9c) atho yo viśvadāvyas taṃ kravyādam aśīśamam //9//
analyzed: atho yaḥ viśvadāvyaḥ tam kravyādam aśīśamam

original: (AVŚ_3,21.10a) ye parvatāḥ somapṛṣṭhā āpa uttānaśīvarīḥ /
analyzed: ye parvatāḥ soma pṛṣṭhāḥ āpaḥ uttāna śīvarīḥ

original: (AVŚ_3,21.10c) vātaḥ parjanya ād agnis te kravyādam aśīśaman //10//
analyzed: vātaḥ parjanyaḥ āt agniḥ te kravyādam aśīśaman

original: (AVŚ_3,22.1a) hastivarcasaṃ prathatāṃ bṛhad yaśo adityā yat tanvaḥ saṃbabhūva /
analyzed: hasti varcasam prathatām bṛhat yaśaḥ adityāḥ yat tanvaḥ saṃbabhūva

original: (AVŚ_3,22.1c) tat sarve sam adur mahyam etad viśve devā aditiḥ sajoṣāḥ //1//
analyzed: tat sarve sam aduḥ mahyam etat viśve devāḥ aditiḥ sajoṣāḥ

original: (AVŚ_3,22.2a) mitraś ca varuṇaś cendro rudraś ca cetatu /
analyzed: mitraḥ ca varuṇaḥ ca indraḥ rudraḥ ca cetatu

original: (AVŚ_3,22.2c) devāso viśvadhāyasas te māñjantu varcasā //2//
analyzed: devāsaḥ viśva dhāyasaḥ te mā añjantu varcasā

original: (AVŚ_3,22.3a) yena hastī varcasā saṃbabhūva yena rājā manuṣyesv apsv antaḥ /
analyzed: yena hastī varcasā saṃbabhūva yena rājā manuṣyesu apsu antar

original: (AVŚ_3,22.3c) yena devā devatām agra āyan tena mām adya varcasāgne varcasvinaṃ kṛṇu //3//
analyzed: yena devāḥ deva tām agre āyan tena mām adya varcasā agne varcasvinam kṛṇu

original: (AVŚ_3,22.4a) yat te varco jātavedo bṛhad bhavaty āhuteḥ /
analyzed: yat te varcaḥ jātavedaḥ bṛhat bhavati āhuteḥ

original: (AVŚ_3,22.4c) yāvat sūryasya varca āsurasya ca hastinaḥ /
analyzed: yāvat sūryasya varcaḥ āsurasya ca hastinaḥ

original: (AVŚ_3,22.4e) tāvan me aśvinā varca ā dhattāṃ puṣkarasrajā //4//
analyzed: tāvat me aśvinā varcaḥ ā dhattām puṣkarasrajā

original: (AVŚ_3,22.5a) yāvac catasraḥ pradiśaś cakṣur yāvat samaśnute /
analyzed: yāvat catasraḥ pradiśaḥ cakṣuḥ yāvat samaśnute

original: (AVŚ_3,22.5c) tāvat samaitv indriyaṃ mayi tad dhastivarcasam //5//
analyzed: tāvat samaitu indriyam mayi tat hasti varcasam

original: (AVŚ_3,22.6a) hastī mṛgāṇāṃ suṣadām atiṣṭhāvān babhūva hi /
analyzed: hastī mṛgāṇām suṣadām atiṣṭhāvān babhūva hi

original: (AVŚ_3,22.6c) tasya bhagena varcasābhi ṣiñcāmi mām aham //6//
analyzed: tasya bhagena varcasā abhi siñcāmi mām aham

original: (AVŚ_3,23.1a) yena vehad babhūvitha nāśayāmasi tat tvat /
analyzed: yena vehat babhūvitha nāśayāmasi tat tvat

original: (AVŚ_3,23.1c) idaṃ tad anyatra tvad apa dūre ni dadhmasi //1//
analyzed: idam tat anyatra tvat apa dūre ni dadhmasi

original: (AVŚ_3,23.2a) ā te yoniṃ garbha etu pumān bāṇa iveṣudhim /
analyzed: ā te yonim garbhaḥ etu pumān bāṇaḥ iva iṣudhim

original: (AVŚ_3,23.2c) ā vīro 'tra jāyatāṃ putras te daśamāsyaḥ //2//
analyzed: ā vīro tra jāyatām putraḥ te daśamāsyaḥ

original: (AVŚ_3,23.3a) pumāṃsaṃ putraṃ janaya taṃ pumān anu jāyatām /
analyzed: pumāṃsam putram janaya tam pumān anu jāyatām

original: (AVŚ_3,23.3c) bhavāsi putrāṇāṃ mātā jātānāṃ janayāś ca yān //3//
analyzed: bhavāsi putrāṇām mātā jātānām janayāḥ ca yān

original: (AVŚ_3,23.4a) yāni badrāṇi bījāny ṛṣabhā janayanti ca /
analyzed: yāni badrāṇi bījāni ṛṣabhāḥ janayanti ca

original: (AVŚ_3,23.4c) tais tvaṃ putraṃ vindasva sā prasūr dhenukā bhava //4//
analyzed: taiḥ tvam putram vindasva sā prasūḥ dhenukā bhava

original: (AVŚ_3,23.5a) kṛṇomi te prājāpatyam ā yoniṃ garbha etu te /
analyzed: kṛṇomi te prājāpatyam ā yonim garbhaḥ etu te

original: (AVŚ_3,23.5c) vindasva tvaṃ putraṃ nāri yas tubhyaṃ śam asac cham u tasmai tvam bhava //5//
analyzed: vindasva tvam putram nāri yaḥ tubhyam śam asat śam u tasmai tvam bhava

original: (AVŚ_3,23.6a) yāsām dyauḥ pitā pṛthivī mātā samudro mūlaṃ vīrudhāṃ babhūva /
analyzed: yāsām dyauḥ pitā pṛthivī mātā samudraḥ mūlam vīrudhām babhūva

original: (AVŚ_3,23.6c) tās tvā putravidyāya daivīḥ prāvantv oṣadhayaḥ //6//
analyzed: tāḥ tvā putra vidyāya daivīḥ prāvantu oṣadhayaḥ

original: (AVŚ_3,24.1a) payasvatīr oṣadhayaḥ payasvan māmakaṃ vacaḥ /
analyzed: payasvatīḥ oṣadhayaḥ payasvat māmakam vacaḥ

original: (AVŚ_3,24.1c) atho payasvatīnām ā bhare 'haṃ sahasraśaḥ //1//
analyzed: atho payasvatīnām ā bhare ham sahasraśas

original: (AVŚ_3,24.2a) vedāhaṃ payasvantaṃ cakāra dhānyam bahu /
analyzed: veda aham payasvantam cakāra dhānyam bahu

original: (AVŚ_3,24.2c) saṃbhṛtvā nāma yo devas taṃ vayaṃ havāmahe yoyo ayajvano gṛhe //2//
analyzed: saṃbhṛtvā nāma yaḥ devaḥ tam vayam havāmahe yaḥ yaḥ ayajvanaḥ gṛhe

original: (AVŚ_3,24.3a) imā yāḥ pañca pradiśo mānavīḥ pañca kṛṣṭayaḥ /
analyzed: imāḥ yāḥ pañca pradiśaḥ mānavīḥ pañca kṛṣṭayaḥ

original: (AVŚ_3,24.3c) vṛṣṭe śāpaṃ nadīr iveha sphātiṃ samāvahān //3//
analyzed: vṛṣṭe śāpam nadīḥ iva iha sphātim samāvahān

original: (AVŚ_3,24.4a) ud utsaṃ śatadhāraṃ sahasradhāram akṣitam /
analyzed: ud utsam śata dhāram sahasra dhāram akṣitam

original: (AVŚ_3,24.4c) evāsmākedaṃ dhānyaṃ sahasradhāram akṣitam //4//
analyzed: eva asmāka idam dhānyam sahasra dhāram akṣitam

original: (AVŚ_3,24.5a) śatahasta samāhara sahasrahasta saṃ kira /
analyzed: śata hasta samāhara sahasra hasta sam kira

original: (AVŚ_3,24.5c) kṛtasya kāryasya ceha sphātiṃ samāvaha //5//
analyzed: kṛtasya kāryasya ca iha sphātim samāvaha

original: (AVŚ_3,24.6a) tisro mātrā gandharvāṇāṃ catasro gṛhapatnyāḥ /
analyzed: tisraḥ mātrāḥ gandharvāṇām catasraḥ gṛha patnyāḥ

original: (AVŚ_3,24.6c) tāsāṃ yā sphātimattamā tayā tvābhi mṛśāmasi //6//
analyzed: tāsām yā sphātimattamā tayā tvā abhi mṛśāmasi

original: (AVŚ_3,24.7a) upohaś ca samūhaś ca kṣattārau te prajāpate /
analyzed: upohaḥ ca samūhaḥ ca kṣattārau te prajāpate

original: (AVŚ_3,24.7c) tāv ihā vahatāṃ sphātiṃ bahuṃ bhūmānam akṣitam //7//
analyzed: tau iha ā vahatām sphātim bahum bhūmānam akṣitam

original: (AVŚ_3,25.1a) uttudas tvot tudatu mā dhṛthāḥ śayane sve /
analyzed: uttudaḥ tvā ud tudatu mā dhṛthāḥ śayane sve

original: (AVŚ_3,25.1c) iṣuḥ kāmasya yā bhīmā tayā vidhyāmi tvā hṛdi //1//
analyzed: iṣuḥ kāmasya yā bhīmā tayā vidhyāmi tvā hṛdi

original: (AVŚ_3,25.2a) ādhīparṇāṃ kāmaśalyām iṣuṃ saṃkalpakulmalām /
analyzed: ādhīparṇām kāma śalyām iṣum saṃkalpa kulmalām

original: (AVŚ_3,25.2c) tāṃ susaṃnatāṃ kṛtvā kāmo vidhyatu tvā hṛdi //2//
analyzed: tām su saṃnatām kṛtvā kāmaḥ vidhyatu tvā hṛdi

original: (AVŚ_3,25.3a) yā plīhānaṃ śoṣayati kāmasyeṣuḥ susaṃnatā /
analyzed: yā plīhānam śoṣayati kāmasya iṣuḥ su saṃnatā

original: (AVŚ_3,25.3c) prācīnapakṣā vyoṣā tayā vidhyāmi tvā hṛdi //3//
analyzed: prācīna pakṣā vyoṣā tayā vidhyāmi tvā hṛdi

original: (AVŚ_3,25.4a) śucā viddhā vyoṣayā śuṣkāsyābhi sarpa mā /
analyzed: śucā viddhā vyoṣayā śuṣka āsyā abhi sarpa mā

original: (AVŚ_3,25.4c) mṛdur nimanyuḥ kevalī priyavādiny anuvratā //4//
analyzed: mṛduḥ nimanyuḥ kevalī priya vādinī anuvratā

original: (AVŚ_3,25.5a) ājāmi tvājanyā pari mātur atho pituḥ /
analyzed: ājāmi tvā ajanyā pari mātuḥ atha u pituḥ

original: (AVŚ_3,25.5c) yathā mama kratāv aso mama cittam upāyasi //5//
analyzed: yathā mama kratau asaḥ mama cittam upāyasi

original: (AVŚ_3,25.6a) vy asyai mitrāvaruṇau hṛdaś cittāny asyatam /
analyzed: vi asyai mitrāvaruṇau hṛdaḥ cittāni asyatam

original: (AVŚ_3,25.6c) athainām akratuṃ kṛtvā mamaiva kṛṇutaṃ vaśe //6//
analyzed: atha enām a kratum kṛtvā mama eva kṛṇutam vaśe

original: (AVŚ_3,26.1a) ye 'syāṃ stha prācyāṃ diśi hetayo nāma devās teṣāṃ vo agnir iṣavaḥ /
analyzed: ye syām stha prācyām diśi hetayaḥ nāma devāḥ teṣām vaḥ agniḥ iṣavaḥ

original: (AVŚ_3,26.1c) te no mṛḍata te no 'dhi brūta tebhyo vo namas tebhyo vaḥ svāhā //1//
analyzed: te naḥ mṛḍata te naḥ dhi brūta tebhyaḥ vaḥ namaḥ tebhyaḥ vaḥ svāhā

original: (AVŚ_3,26.2a) ye 'syāṃ stha dakṣiṇāyāṃ diśy aviṣyavo nāma devās teṣāṃ vaḥ kāma iṣavaḥ /
analyzed: ye syām stha dakṣiṇāyām diśi aviṣyavaḥ nāma devāḥ teṣām vaḥ kāmaḥ iṣavaḥ

original: (AVŚ_3,26.2c) te no mṛḍata te no 'dhi brūta tebhyo vo namas tebhyo vaḥ svāhā //2//
analyzed: te naḥ mṛḍata te naḥ dhi brūta tebhyaḥ vaḥ namaḥ tebhyaḥ vaḥ svāhā

original: (AVŚ_3,26.3a) ye 'syāṃ stha pratīcyāṃ diśi vairājā nāma devās teṣāṃ va āpa iṣavaḥ /
analyzed: ye syām stha pratīcyām diśi vairājāḥ nāma devāḥ teṣām vaḥ āpaḥ iṣavaḥ

original: (AVŚ_3,26.3c) te no mṛḍata te no 'dhi brūta tebhyo vo namas tebhyo vaḥ svāhā //3//
analyzed: te naḥ mṛḍata te naḥ dhi brūta tebhyaḥ vaḥ namaḥ tebhyaḥ vaḥ svāhā

original: (AVŚ_3,26.4a) ye 'syāṃ sthodīcyāṃ diśi pravidhyanto nāma devās teṣāṃ vo vāta iṣavaḥ /
analyzed: ye syām stha udīcyām diśi pravidhyantaḥ nāma devāḥ teṣām vaḥ vātaḥ iṣavaḥ

original: (AVŚ_3,26.4c) te no mṛḍata te no 'dhi brūta tebhyo vo namas tebhyo vaḥ svāhā //4//
analyzed: te naḥ mṛḍata te naḥ dhi brūta tebhyaḥ vaḥ namaḥ tebhyaḥ vaḥ svāhā

original: (AVŚ_3,26.5a) ye 'syāṃ stha dhruvāyāṃ diśi nilimpā nāma devās teṣāṃ va oṣadhīr iṣavaḥ /
analyzed: ye syām stha dhruvāyām diśi nilimpāḥ nāma devāḥ teṣām vaḥ oṣadhīḥ iṣavaḥ

original: (AVŚ_3,26.5c) te no mṛḍata te no 'dhi brūta tebhyo vo namas tebhyo vaḥ svāhā //5//
analyzed: te naḥ mṛḍata te naḥ dhi brūta tebhyaḥ vaḥ namaḥ tebhyaḥ vaḥ svāhā

original: (AVŚ_3,26.6a) ye 'syāṃ sthordhvāyāṃ diśy avasvanto nāma devās teṣāṃ vo bṛhaspatir iṣavaḥ /
analyzed: ye syām stha ūrdhvāyām diśi avasvantaḥ nāma devāḥ teṣām vaḥ bṛhaspatiḥ iṣavaḥ

original: (AVŚ_3,26.6c) te no mṛḍata te no 'dhi brūta tebhyo vo namas tebhyo vaḥ svāhā //6//
analyzed: te naḥ mṛḍata te naḥ dhi brūta tebhyaḥ vaḥ namaḥ tebhyaḥ vaḥ svāhā

original: (AVŚ_3,27.1a) prācī dig agnir adhipatir asito rakṣitādityā iṣavaḥ /
analyzed: prācī diś agniḥ adhipatiḥ asitaḥ rakṣitā ādityāḥ iṣavaḥ

original: (AVŚ_3,27.1c) tebhyo namo 'dhipatibhyo namo rakṣitṛbhyo nama iṣubhyo nama ebhyo astu /
analyzed: tebhyaḥ namaḥ dhipatibhyaḥ namaḥ rakṣitṛbhyaḥ namaḥ iṣubhyaḥ namaḥ ebhyaḥ astu

original: (AVŚ_3,27.1e) yo 'smān dveṣṭi yaṃ vayaṃ dviṣmas taṃ vo jambhe dadhmaḥ //1//
analyzed: yaḥ smān dveṣṭi yam vayam dviṣmaḥ tam vaḥ jambhe dadhmaḥ

original: (AVŚ_3,27.2a) dakṣiṇā dig indro 'dhipatis tiraścirājī rakṣitā pitara iṣavaḥ /
