original: (AVŚ_4,1.7c) tvaṃ viśveṣāṃ janitā yathāsaḥ kavir devo na dabhāyat svadhāvān //7//
analyzed: tvam viśveṣām janitā yathā asaḥ kaviḥ devaḥ na dabhāyat svadhāvān

original: (AVŚ_4,2.1a) ya ātmadā baladā yasya viśva upāsate praśiṣaṃ yasya devāḥ /
analyzed: yaḥ ātma dāḥ bala dāḥ yasya viśve upāsate praśiṣam yasya devāḥ

original: (AVŚ_4,2.1c) yo 'syeśe dvipado yaś catuṣpadaḥ kasmai devāya haviṣā vidhema //1//
analyzed: yaḥ sya īśe dvipadaḥ yaḥ catuṣpadaḥ kasmai devāya haviṣā vidhema

original: (AVŚ_4,2.2a) yaḥ prāṇato nimiṣato mahitvaiko rājā jagato babhūva /
analyzed: yaḥ prāṇataḥ nimiṣataḥ mahitvā ekaḥ rājā jagataḥ babhūva

original: (AVŚ_4,2.2c) yasya chāyāmṛtaṃ yasya mṛtyuḥ kasmai devāya haviṣā vidhema //2//
analyzed: yasya chāyā amṛtam yasya mṛtyuḥ kasmai devāya haviṣā vidhema

original: (AVŚ_4,2.3a) yaṃ krandasī avataś caskabhāne bhiyasāne rodasī ahvayethām /
analyzed: yam krandasī avataḥ caskabhāne bhiyasāne rodasī ahvayethām

original: (AVŚ_4,2.3c) yasyāsau panthā rajaso vimānaḥ kasmai devāya haviṣā vidhema //3//
analyzed: yasya asau panthāḥ rajasaḥ vimānaḥ kasmai devāya haviṣā vidhema

original: (AVŚ_4,2.4a) yasya dyaur urvī pṛthivī ca mahī yasyāda urv antarikṣam /
analyzed: yasya dyauḥ urvī pṛthivī ca mahī yasya adaḥ uru antarikṣam

original: (AVŚ_4,2.4c) yasyāsau sūro vitato mahitvā kasmai devāya haviṣā vidhema //4//
analyzed: yasya asau sūraḥ vitataḥ mahitvā kasmai devāya haviṣā vidhema

original: (AVŚ_4,2.5a) yasya viśve himavanto mahitvā samudre yasya rasām id āhuḥ /
analyzed: yasya viśve himavantaḥ mahitvā samudre yasya rasām id āhuḥ

original: (AVŚ_4,2.5c) imāś ca pradiśo yasya bāhū kasmai devāya haviṣā vidhema //5//
analyzed: imāḥ ca pradiśaḥ yasya bāhū kasmai devāya haviṣā vidhema

original: (AVŚ_4,2.6a) āpo agre viśvam āvan garbhaṃ dadhānā amṛtā ṛtajñāḥ /
analyzed: āpaḥ agre viśvam āvan garbham dadhānāḥ amṛtāḥ ṛta jñāḥ

original: (AVŚ_4,2.6c) yāsu devīṣv adhi deva āsīt kasmai devāya haviṣā vidhema //6//
analyzed: yāsu devīṣu adhi devaḥ āsīt kasmai devāya haviṣā vidhema

original: (AVŚ_4,2.7a) hiraṇyagarbhaḥ sam avartatāgre bhūtasya jātaḥ patir eka āsīt /
analyzed: hiraṇya garbhaḥ sam avartata agre bhūtasya jātaḥ patiḥ ekaḥ āsīt

original: (AVŚ_4,2.7c) sa dādhāra pṛthivīm uta dyāṃ kasmai devāya haviṣā vidhema //7//
analyzed: sa dādhāra pṛthivīm uta dyām kasmai devāya haviṣā vidhema

original: (AVŚ_4,2.8a) āpo vatsaṃ janayantīr garbham agre sam airayan /
analyzed: āpaḥ vatsam janayantīḥ garbham agre sam airayan

original: (AVŚ_4,2.8c) tasyota jāyamānasyolba āsīd dhiraṇyayaḥ kasmai devāya haviṣā vidhema //8//
analyzed: tasya uta jāyamānasya ulbaḥ āsīt hiraṇyayaḥ kasmai devāya haviṣā vidhema

original: (AVŚ_4,3.1a) ud itas trayo akraman vyāghraḥ puruṣo vṛkaḥ /
analyzed: ud itas trayaḥ akraman vyāghraḥ puruṣaḥ vṛkaḥ

original: (AVŚ_4,3.1c) hirug ghi yanti sindhavo hirug devo vanaspatir hiruṅ namantu śatravaḥ //1//
analyzed: hiruk ghi yanti sindhavaḥ hiruk devaḥ vanaspatiḥ hiruk namantu śatravaḥ

original: (AVŚ_4,3.2a) pareṇaitu pathā vṛkaḥ parameṇota taskaraḥ /
analyzed: pareṇa etu pathā vṛkaḥ parameṇa uta taskaraḥ

original: (AVŚ_4,3.2c) pareṇa datvatī rajjuḥ pareṇāghāyur arṣatu //2//
analyzed: pareṇa datvatī rajjuḥ pareṇa aghāyuḥ arṣatu

original: (AVŚ_4,3.3a) akṣyau ca te mukhaṃ ca te vyāghra jambhayāmasi /
analyzed: akṣyau ca te mukham ca te vyāghra jambhayāmasi

original: (AVŚ_4,3.3c) āt sarvān viṃśatiṃ nakhān //3//
analyzed: āt sarvān viṃśatim nakhān

original: (AVŚ_4,3.4a) vyāghraṃ datvatāṃ vayaṃ prathamaṃ jambhayāmasi /
analyzed: vyāghram datvatām vayam prathamam jambhayāmasi

original: (AVŚ_4,3.4c) ād u ṣṭenam atho ahiṃ yātudhānam atho vṛkam //4//
analyzed: āt u stenam atha u ahim yātudhānam atha u vṛkam

original: (AVŚ_4,3.5a) yo adya stena āyati sa saṃpiṣṭo apāyati /
analyzed: yaḥ adya stenaḥ āyati sa saṃpiṣṭaḥ apāyati

original: (AVŚ_4,3.5c) pathām apadhvaṃsenaitv indro vajreṇa hantu tam //5//
analyzed: pathām apadhvaṃsena etu indraḥ vajreṇa hantu tam

original: (AVŚ_4,3.6a) mūrṇā mṛgasya dantā apiśīrṇā u pṛṣṭayaḥ /
analyzed: mūrṇāḥ mṛgasya dantāḥ apiśīrṇāḥ u pṛṣṭayaḥ

original: (AVŚ_4,3.6c) nimruk te godhā bhavatu nīcāyac chaśayur mṛgaḥ //6//
analyzed: nimruc te godhā bhavatu nīcāyat śaśayuḥ mṛgaḥ

original: (AVŚ_4,3.7a) yat saṃyamo na vi yamo vi yamo yan na saṃyamaḥ /
analyzed: yat saṃyamaḥ na vi yamaḥ vi yamaḥ yat na saṃyamaḥ

original: (AVŚ_4,3.7c) indrajāḥ somajā ātharvaṇam asi vyāghrajambhanam //7//
analyzed: indra jāḥ soma jāḥ ātharvaṇam asi vyāghra jambhanam

original: (AVŚ_4,4.1a) yāṃ tvā gandharvo akhanad varuṇāya mṛtabhraje /
analyzed: yām tvā gandharvaḥ akhanat varuṇāya mṛta bhraje

original: (AVŚ_4,4.1c) tāṃ tvā vayaṃ khanāmasy oṣadhiṃ śepaharṣaṇīm //1//
analyzed: tām tvā vayam khanāmasi oṣadhim śepa harṣaṇīm

original: (AVŚ_4,4.2a) ud uṣā ud u sūrya ud idaṃ māmakaṃ vacaḥ /
analyzed: ud uṣāḥ ud u sūryaḥ ud idam māmakam vacaḥ

original: (AVŚ_4,4.2c) ud ejatu prajāpatir vṛṣā śuṣmeṇa vājinā //2//
analyzed: ud ejatu prajāpatiḥ vṛṣā śuṣmeṇa vājinā

original: (AVŚ_4,4.3a) yathā sma te virohato 'bhitaptam ivānati /
analyzed: yathā sma te virohataḥ bhitaptam iva anati

original: (AVŚ_4,4.3c) tatas te śuṣmavattaram iyaṃ kṛṇotv oṣadhiḥ //3//
analyzed: tatas te śuṣmavattaram iyam kṛṇotu oṣadhiḥ

original: (AVŚ_4,4.4a) uc chuṣmauṣadhīnāṃ sārā ṛṣabhāṇām /
analyzed: ud śuṣma oṣadhīnām sārāḥ ṛṣabhāṇām

original: (AVŚ_4,4.4c) saṃ puṃsām indra vṛṣṇyam asmin dhehi tanūvaśin //4//
analyzed: sam puṃsām indra vṛṣṇyam asmin dhehi tanū vaśin

original: (AVŚ_4,4.5a) apāṃ rasaḥ prathamajo 'tho vanaspatīnām /
analyzed: apām rasaḥ prathama jaḥ vanaspatīnām

original: (AVŚ_4,4.5c) uta somasya bhrātāsy utārśam asi vṛṣṇyam //5//
analyzed: uta somasya bhrātā asi uta arśam asi vṛṣṇyam

original: (AVŚ_4,4.6a) adyāgne adya savitar adya devi sarasvati /
analyzed: adya agne adya savitar adya devi sarasvati

original: (AVŚ_4,4.6c) adyāsya brahmaṇas pate dhanur ivā tānayā pasaḥ //6//
analyzed: adya asya brahmaṇaḥ pate dhanuḥ iva ā tānaya pasaḥ

original: (AVŚ_4,4.7a) āhaṃ tanomi te paso adhi jyām iva dhanvani /
analyzed: ā aham tanomi te pasaḥ adhi jyām iva dhanvani

original: (AVŚ_4,4.7c) kramasvarśa iva rohitam anavaglāyatā sadā //7//
analyzed: kramasva ṛśaḥ iva rohitam an avaglāyatā sadā

original: (AVŚ_4,4.8a) aśvasyāśvatarasyājasya petvasya ca /
analyzed: aśvasya aśvatarasya ajasya petvasya ca

original: (AVŚ_4,4.8c) atha ṛṣabhasya ye vājās tān asmin dhehi tanūvaśin //8//
analyzed: atha ṛṣabhasya ye vājāḥ tān asmin dhehi tanū vaśin

original: (AVŚ_4,5.1a) sahasraśṛṅgo vṛṣabho yaḥ samudrād udācarat /
analyzed: sahasra śṛṅgaḥ vṛṣabhaḥ yaḥ samudrāt udācarat

original: (AVŚ_4,5.1c) tenā sahasyenā vayaṃ ni janānt svāpayāmasi //1//
analyzed: tena sahasyena vayam ni janān svāpayāmasi

original: (AVŚ_4,5.2a) na bhūmiṃ vāto ati vāti nāti paśyati kaś cana /
analyzed: na bhūmim vātaḥ ati vāti na ati paśyati kaḥ cana

original: (AVŚ_4,5.2c) striyaś ca sarvāḥ svāpaya śunaś cendrasakhā caran //2//
analyzed: striyaḥ ca sarvāḥ svāpaya śunaḥ ca indra sakhā caran

original: (AVŚ_4,5.3a) proṣṭheśayās talpeśayā nārīr yā vahyaśīvarīḥ /
analyzed: proṣṭheśayāḥ talpeśayāḥ nārīḥ yāḥ vahya śīvarīḥ

original: (AVŚ_4,5.3c) striyo yāḥ puṇyagandhayas tāḥ sarvāḥ svāpayāmasi //3//
analyzed: striyaḥ yāḥ puṇya gandhayaḥ tāḥ sarvāḥ svāpayāmasi

original: (AVŚ_4,5.4a) ejadejad ajagrabhaṃ cakṣuḥ prāṇam ajagrabham /
analyzed: ejat ejat ajagrabham cakṣuḥ prāṇam ajagrabham

original: (AVŚ_4,5.4c) aṅgāny ajagrabhaṃ sarvā rātrīṇām atiśarvare //4//
analyzed: aṅgāni ajagrabham sarvā rātrīṇām atiśarvare

original: (AVŚ_4,5.5a) ya āste yaś carati yaś ca tiṣṭhan vipaśyati /
analyzed: yaḥ āste yaḥ carati yaḥ ca tiṣṭhan vipaśyati

original: (AVŚ_4,5.5c) teṣāṃ saṃ dadhmo akṣīṇi yathedaṃ harmyaṃ tathā //5//
analyzed: teṣām sam dadhmaḥ akṣīṇi yathā idam harmyam tathā

original: (AVŚ_4,5.6a) svaptu mātā svaptu pitā svaptu śvā svaptu viśpatiḥ /
analyzed: svaptu mātā svaptu pitā svaptu śvā svaptu viśpatiḥ

original: (AVŚ_4,5.6c) svapantv asyai jñātayaḥ svaptv ayam abhito janaḥ //6//
analyzed: svapantu asyai jñātayaḥ svaptu ayam abhitas janaḥ

original: (AVŚ_4,5.7a) svapna svapnābhikaraṇena sarvaṃ ni svāpayā janam /
analyzed: svapna svapna abhikaraṇena sarvam ni svāpaya janam

original: (AVŚ_4,5.7c) otsūryam anyānt svāpayāvyuṣaṃ jāgṛtād aham indra ivāriṣṭo akṣitaḥ //7//
analyzed: ā utsūryam anyān svāpaya āvyuṣam jāgṛtāt aham indraḥ iva ariṣṭaḥ akṣitaḥ

original: (AVŚ_4,6.1a) brāhmaṇo jajñe prathamo daśaśīrṣo daśāsyaḥ /
analyzed: brāhmaṇaḥ jajñe prathamaḥ daśa śīrṣaḥ daśa āsyaḥ

original: (AVŚ_4,6.1c) sa somaṃ prathamaḥ papau sa cakārārasaṃ viṣam //1//
analyzed: sa somam prathamaḥ papau sa cakāra arasam viṣam

original: (AVŚ_4,6.2a) yāvatī dyāvāpṛthivī varimṇā yāvat sapta sindhavo vitaṣṭhire /
analyzed: yāvatī dyāvāpṛthivī varimṇā yāvat sapta sindhavaḥ vitaṣṭhire

original: (AVŚ_4,6.2c) vācaṃ viṣasya dūṣaṇīṃ tām ito nir avādiṣam //2//
analyzed: vācam viṣasya dūṣaṇīm tām itas niḥ avādiṣam

original: (AVŚ_4,6.3a) suparṇas tvā garutmān viṣa prathamam āvayat /
analyzed: suparṇaḥ tvā garutmān viṣa prathamam āvayat

original: (AVŚ_4,6.3c) nāmīmado nārūrupa utāsmā abhavaḥ pituḥ //3//
analyzed: na amīmadaḥ na arūrupaḥ uta asmai abhavaḥ pituḥ

original: (AVŚ_4,6.4a) yas ta āsyat pañcāṅgurir vakrāc cid adhi dhanvanaḥ /
analyzed: yaḥ te āsyat pañca aṅguriḥ vakrāt cit adhi dhanvanaḥ

original: (AVŚ_4,6.4c) apaskambhasya śalyān nir avocam ahaṃ viṣam //4//
analyzed: apaskambhasya śalyān niḥ avocam aham viṣam

original: (AVŚ_4,6.5a) śalyād viṣaṃ nir avocam prāñjanād uta parṇadheḥ /
analyzed: śalyāt viṣam niḥ avocam prāñjanāt uta parṇadheḥ

original: (AVŚ_4,6.5c) apāṣṭhāc chṛṅgāt kulmalān nir avocam aham viṣam //5//
analyzed: apāṣṭhāt śṛṅgāt kulmalāt niḥ avocam aham viṣam

original: (AVŚ_4,6.6a) arasas ta iṣo śalyo 'tho te arasaṃ viṣam /
analyzed: arasaḥ te iṣaḥ śalyaḥ tho te arasam viṣam

original: (AVŚ_4,6.6c) utārasasya vṛkṣasya dhanuṣ ṭe arasārasam //6//
analyzed: uta arasasya vṛkṣasya dhanuḥ te arasa arasam

original: (AVŚ_4,6.7a) ye apīṣan ye adihan ya āsyan ye avāsṛjan /
analyzed: ye apīṣan ye adihan ye āsyan ye avāsṛjan

original: (AVŚ_4,6.7c) sarve te vadhrayaḥ kṛtā vadhrir viṣagiriḥ kṛtaḥ //7//
analyzed: sarve te vadhrayaḥ kṛtāḥ vadhriḥ viṣa giriḥ kṛtaḥ

original: (AVŚ_4,6.8a) vadhrayas te khanitāro vadhris tvam asy oṣadhe /
analyzed: vadhrayaḥ te khanitāraḥ vadhriḥ tvam asi oṣadhe

original: (AVŚ_4,6.8c) vadhriḥ sa parvato girir yato jātam idaṃ viṣam //8//
analyzed: vadhriḥ sa parvataḥ giriḥ yatas jātam idam viṣam

original: (AVŚ_4,7.1a) vār idam vārayātai varaṇāvatyām adhi /
analyzed: vār idam vārayātai varaṇāvatyām adhi

original: (AVŚ_4,7.1c) tatrāmṛtasyāsiktaṃ tenā te vāraye viṣam //1//
analyzed: tatra amṛtasya āsiktam tena te vāraye viṣam

original: (AVŚ_4,7.2a) arasaṃ prācyaṃ viṣam arasaṃ yad udīcyam /
analyzed: a rasam prācyam viṣam a rasam yat udīcyam

original: (AVŚ_4,7.2c) athedam adharācyaṃ karambheṇa vi kalpate //2//
analyzed: atha idam adharācyam karambheṇa vi kalpate

original: (AVŚ_4,7.3a) karambhaṃ kṛtvā tiryaṃ pībaspākam udārathim /
analyzed: karambham kṛtvā tiryam pībaspākam udārathim

original: (AVŚ_4,7.3c) kṣudhā kila tvā duṣṭano jakṣivānt sa na rūrupaḥ //3//
analyzed: kṣudhā kila tvā duṣṭano jakṣivān sa na rūrupaḥ

original: (AVŚ_4,7.4a) vi te madaṃ madāvati śaram iva pātayāmasi /
analyzed: vi te madam madāvati śaram iva pātayāmasi

original: (AVŚ_4,7.4c) pra tvā carum iva yeṣantaṃ vacasā sthāpayāmasi //4//
analyzed: pra tvā carum iva yeṣantam vacasā sthāpayāmasi

original: (AVŚ_4,7.5a) pari grāmam ivācitaṃ vacasā sthāpayāmasi /
analyzed: pari grāmam iva ācitam vacasā sthāpayāmasi

original: (AVŚ_4,7.5c) tiṣṭhā vṛkṣa iva sthāmny abhrikhāte na rūrupaḥ //5//
analyzed: tiṣṭha vṛkṣaḥ iva sthāmni abhri khāte na rūrupaḥ

original: (AVŚ_4,7.6a) pavastais tvā pary akrīṇan dūrśebhir ajinair uta /
analyzed: pavastaiḥ tvā pari akrīṇan dūrśebhiḥ ajinaiḥ uta

original: (AVŚ_4,7.6c) prakrīr asi tvam oṣadhe 'bhrikhāte na rūrupaḥ //6//
analyzed: prakrīḥ asi tvam oṣadhe bhrikhāte na rūrupaḥ

original: (AVŚ_4,7.7a) anāptā ye vaḥ prathamā yāni karmāṇi cakrire /
analyzed: an āptāḥ ye vaḥ prathamā yāni karmāṇi cakrire

original: (AVŚ_4,7.7c) vīrān no atra mā dabhan tad va etat puro dadhe //7//
analyzed: vīrān naḥ atra mā dabhan tat vaḥ etat puras dadhe

original: (AVŚ_4,8.1a) bhūto bhūteṣu paya ā dadhāti sa bhūtānām adhipatir babhūva /
analyzed: bhūtaḥ bhūteṣu payaḥ ā dadhāti sa bhūtānām adhipatiḥ babhūva

original: (AVŚ_4,8.1c) tasya mṛtyuś carati rājasūyaṃ sa rājā anu manyatām idaṃ //1//
analyzed: tasya mṛtyuḥ carati rājasūyam sa rājā anu manyatām idam

original: (AVŚ_4,8.2a) abhi prehi māpa vena ugraś cettā sapatnahā /
analyzed: abhi prehi mā apa venaḥ ugraḥ cettā sapatna hā

original: (AVŚ_4,8.2c) ā tiṣṭha mitravardhana tubhyam devā adhi bruvan //2//
analyzed: ā tiṣṭha mitra vardhana tubhyam devāḥ adhi bruvan

original: (AVŚ_4,8.3a) ātiṣṭhantaṃ pari viśve abhūṣaṃ chriyaṃ vasānaś carati svarociḥ /
analyzed: ātiṣṭhantam pari viśve abhūṣam chriyam vasānaḥ carati sva rociḥ

original: (AVŚ_4,8.3c) mahat tad vṛṣṇo asurasya nāmā viśvarūpo amṛtāni tasthau //3//
analyzed: mahat tat vṛṣṇaḥ asurasya nāma ā viśva rūpaḥ amṛtāni tasthau

original: (AVŚ_4,8.4a) vyāghro adhi vaiyāghre vi kramasva diśo mahīḥ /
analyzed: vyāghraḥ adhi vaiyāghre vi kramasva diśaḥ mahīḥ

original: (AVŚ_4,8.4c) viśas tvā sarvā vāñchantv āpo divyāḥ payasvatīḥ //4//
analyzed: viśaḥ tvā sarvāḥ vāñchantu āpaḥ divyāḥ payasvatīḥ

original: (AVŚ_4,8.5a) yā āpo divyāḥ payasā madanty antarikṣa uta vā pṛthivyām /
analyzed: yāḥ āpaḥ divyāḥ payasā madanti antarikṣe uta vā pṛthivyām

original: (AVŚ_4,8.5c) tāsāṃ tvā sarvāsām apām abhi ṣiñcāmi varcasā //5//
analyzed: tāsām tvā sarvāsām apām abhi siñcāmi varcasā

original: (AVŚ_4,8.6a) abhi tvā varcasāsicann āpo divyāḥ payasvatīḥ /
analyzed: abhi tvā varcasā asican āpaḥ divyāḥ payasvatīḥ

original: (AVŚ_4,8.6c) yathāso mitravardhanas tathā tvā savitā karat //6//
analyzed: yathā asaḥ mitra vardhanaḥ tathā tvā savitā karat

original: (AVŚ_4,8.7a) enā vyāghraṃ pariṣasvajānāḥ siṃhaṃ hinvanti mahate saubhagāya /
analyzed: enā vyāghram pariṣasvajānāḥ siṃham hinvanti mahate saubhagāya

original: (AVŚ_4,8.7c) samudraṃ na subhuvas tasthivāṃsaṃ marmṛjyante dvīpinam apsv antaḥ //7//
analyzed: samudram na subhuvaḥ tasthivāṃsam marmṛjyante dvīpinam apsu antar

original: (AVŚ_4,9.1a) ehi jīvaṃ trāyamāṇaṃ parvatasyāsy akṣyam /
analyzed: ehi jīvam trāyamāṇam parvatasya asi akṣyam

original: (AVŚ_4,9.1c) viśvebhir devair dattaṃ paridhir jīvanāya kam //1//
analyzed: viśvebhiḥ devaiḥ dattam paridhiḥ jīvanāya kam

original: (AVŚ_4,9.2a) paripāṇaṃ puruṣāṇāṃ paripāṇaṃ gavāṃ asi /
analyzed: paripāṇam puruṣāṇām paripāṇam gavām asi

original: (AVŚ_4,9.2c) aśvānām arvatām paripāṇāya tasthiṣe //2//
analyzed: aśvānām arvatām paripāṇāya tasthiṣe

original: (AVŚ_4,9.3a) utāsi paripāṇam yātujambhanam āñjana /
analyzed: uta asi paripāṇam yātu jambhanam āñjana

original: (AVŚ_4,9.3c) utāmṛtasya tvaṃ vetthātho asi jīvabhojanam atho haritabheṣajam //3//
analyzed: uta amṛtasya tvam vettha atha u asi jīva bhojanam atha u harita bheṣajam

original: (AVŚ_4,9.4a) yasyāñjana prasarpasy aṅgamaṅgam paruṣparuḥ /
analyzed: yasya āñjana prasarpasi aṅgam aṅgam paruḥ paruḥ

original: (AVŚ_4,9.4c) tato yakṣmaṃ vi bādhasa ugro madhyamaśīr iva //4//
analyzed: tatas yakṣmam vi bādhase ugraḥ madhyamaśīḥ iva

original: (AVŚ_4,9.5a) nainaṃ prāpnoti śapatho na kṛtyā nābhiśocanam /
analyzed: na enam prāpnoti śapathaḥ na kṛtyā na abhiśocanam

original: (AVŚ_4,9.5c) nainaṃ viṣkandham aśnute yas tvā bibharty āñjana //5//
analyzed: na enam viṣkandham aśnute yaḥ tvā bibharti āñjana

original: (AVŚ_4,9.6a) asanmantrād duṣvapnyād duṣkṛtāc chamalād uta /
analyzed: a sat mantrāt duṣvapnyāt duṣkṛtāt śamalāt uta

original: (AVŚ_4,9.6c) durhārdaś cakṣuṣo ghorāt tasmān naḥ pāhy āñjana //6//
analyzed: durhārdaḥ cakṣuṣaḥ ghorāt tasmāt naḥ pāhi āñjana

original: (AVŚ_4,9.7a) idaṃ vidvān āñjana satyaṃ vakṣyāmi nānṛtam /
analyzed: idam vidvān āñjana satyam vakṣyāmi na anṛtam

original: (AVŚ_4,9.7c) saneyam aśvaṃ gām aham ātmānaṃ tava pūruṣa //7//
analyzed: saneyam aśvam gām aham ātmānam tava pūruṣa

original: (AVŚ_4,9.8a) trayo dāsā āñjanasya takmā balāsa ād ahiḥ /
analyzed: trayaḥ dāsāḥ āñjanasya takmā balāsaḥ āt ahiḥ

original: (AVŚ_4,9.8c) varṣiṣṭhaḥ parvatānāṃ trikakun nāma te pitā //8//
analyzed: varṣiṣṭhaḥ parvatānām trikakud nāma te pitā

original: (AVŚ_4,9.9a) yad āñjanaṃ traikakudam jātaṃ himavatas pari /
analyzed: yat āñjanam traikakudam jātam himavataḥ pari

original: (AVŚ_4,9.9c) yātūṃś ca sarvāñ jambhayat sarvāś ca yātudhānyaḥ //9//
analyzed: yātūn ca sarvām jambhayat sarvāḥ ca yātudhānyaḥ

original: (AVŚ_4,9.10a) yadi vāsi traikakudaṃ yadi yāmunam ucyase /
analyzed: yadi vā asi traikakudam yadi yāmunam ucyase

original: (AVŚ_4,9.10c) ubhe te bhadre nāmnī tābhyāṃ naḥ pāhy āñjana //10//
analyzed: ubhe te bhadre nāmnī tābhyām naḥ pāhi āñjana

original: (AVŚ_4,10.1a) vātāj jāto antarikṣād vidyuto jyotiṣas pari /
analyzed: vātāt jātaḥ antarikṣāt vidyutaḥ jyotiṣaḥ pari

original: (AVŚ_4,10.1c) sa no hiraṇyajāḥ śaṅkhaḥ kṛśanaḥ pātv aṃhasaḥ //1//
analyzed: sa naḥ hiraṇya jāḥ śaṅkhaḥ kṛśanaḥ pātu aṃhasaḥ

original: (AVŚ_4,10.2a) yo agrato rocanānāṃ samudrād adhi jajñiṣe /
analyzed: yaḥ agratas rocanānām samudrāt adhi jajñiṣe

original: (AVŚ_4,10.2c) śaṅkhena hatvā rakṣāṃsy attriṇo vi ṣahāmahe //2//
analyzed: śaṅkhena hatvā rakṣāṃsi attriṇaḥ vi sahāmahe

original: (AVŚ_4,10.3a) śaṅkhenāmīvām amatiṃ śaṅkhenota sadānvāḥ /
analyzed: śaṅkhena amīvām amatim śaṅkhena uta sadānvāḥ

original: (AVŚ_4,10.3c) śaṅkho no viśvabheṣajaḥ kṛśanaḥ pātv aṃhasaḥ //3//
analyzed: śaṅkhaḥ naḥ viśva bheṣajaḥ kṛśanaḥ pātu aṃhasaḥ

original: (AVŚ_4,10.4a) divi jātaḥ samudrajaḥ sindhutas pary ābhṛtaḥ /
analyzed: divi jātaḥ samudra jaḥ sindhutaḥ pari ābhṛtaḥ

original: (AVŚ_4,10.4c) sa no hiraṇyajāḥ śaṅkha āyuṣprataraṇo maṇiḥ //4//
analyzed: sa naḥ hiraṇya jāḥ śaṅkhaḥ āyuḥ prataraṇaḥ maṇiḥ

original: (AVŚ_4,10.5a) samudrāj jāto maṇir vṛtrāj jāto divākaraḥ /
analyzed: samudrāt jātaḥ maṇiḥ vṛtrāt jātaḥ divākaraḥ

original: (AVŚ_4,10.5c) so asmānt sarvataḥ pātu hetyā devāsurebhyaḥ //5//
analyzed: saḥ asmān sarvatas pātu hetyā deva asurebhyaḥ

original: (AVŚ_4,10.6a) hiraṇyānām eko 'si somāt tvam adhi jajñiṣe /
analyzed: hiraṇyānām ekaḥ si somāt tvam adhi jajñiṣe

original: (AVŚ_4,10.6c) rathe tvam asi darśata iṣudhau rocanas tvaṃ pra ṇa āyūṃṣi tāriṣat //6//
analyzed: rathe tvam asi darśate iṣudhau rocanaḥ tvam pra naḥ āyūṃṣi tāriṣat

original: (AVŚ_4,10.7a) devānām asthi kṛśanaṃ babhūva tad ātmanvac caraty apsv antaḥ /
analyzed: devānām asthi kṛśanam babhūva tat ātmanvat carati apsu antar

original: (AVŚ_4,10.7c) tat te badhnāmy āyuṣe varcase balāya dīrghāyutvāya śataśāradāya kārśanas tvābhi rakṣatu //7//
analyzed: tat te badhnāmi āyuṣe varcase balāya dīrgha āyu tvāya śata śāradāya kārśanaḥ tvā abhi rakṣatu

original: (AVŚ_4,11.1a) anaḍvān dādhāra pṛthivīm uta dyām anaḍvān dādhārorv antarikṣam /
analyzed: anaḍvān dādhāra pṛthivīm uta dyām anaḍvān dādhāra uru antarikṣam

original: (AVŚ_4,11.1c) anaḍvān dādhāra pradiśaḥ ṣaḍ urvīr anaḍvān viśvaṃ bhuvanam ā viveśa //1//
analyzed: anaḍvān dādhāra pradiśaḥ ṣaḍ urvīḥ anaḍvān viśvam bhuvanam ā viveśa

original: (AVŚ_4,11.2a) anaḍvān indraḥ sa paśubhyo vi caṣṭe trayāṃ chakro vi mimīte adhvanaḥ /
analyzed: anaḍvān indraḥ sa paśubhyaḥ vi caṣṭe trayām śakraḥ vi mimīte adhvanaḥ

original: (AVŚ_4,11.2c) bhūtaṃ bhaviṣyad bhuvanā duhānaḥ sarvā devānām carati vratāni //2//
analyzed: bhūtam bhaviṣyat bhuvanā duhānaḥ sarvā devānām carati vratāni

original: (AVŚ_4,11.3a) indro jāto manuṣyeṣv antar gharmas taptaś carati śośucānaḥ /
analyzed: indraḥ jātaḥ manuṣyeṣu antar gharmaḥ taptaḥ carati śośucānaḥ

original: (AVŚ_4,11.3c) suprajāḥ sant sa udāre na sarṣad yo nāśnīyād anaḍuho vijānan //3//
analyzed: su prajāḥ san saḥ udāre na sarṣat yaḥ na aśnīyāt anaḍuhaḥ vijānan

original: (AVŚ_4,11.4a) anaḍvān duhe sukṛtasya loka ainaṃ pyāyayati pavamānaḥ purastāt /
analyzed: anaḍvān duhe sukṛtasya loke ā enam pyāyayati pavamānaḥ purastāt

original: (AVŚ_4,11.4c) parjanyo dhārā maruta ūdho asya yajñaḥ payo dakṣiṇā doho asya //4//
analyzed: parjanyaḥ dhārā marutaḥ ūdhar asya yajñaḥ payaḥ dakṣiṇā dohaḥ asya

original: (AVŚ_4,11.5a) yasya neśe yajñapatir na yajño nāsya dāteśe na pratigrahītā /
analyzed: yasya na īśe yajñapatiḥ na yajñaḥ na asya dātā īśe na pratigrahītā

original: (AVŚ_4,11.5c) yo viśvajid viśvabhṛd viśvakarmā gharmaṃ no brūta yatamaś catuṣpāt //5//
analyzed: yaḥ viśva jit viśva bhṛt viśva karmā gharmam naḥ brūta yatamaḥ catuṣpād

original: (AVŚ_4,11.6a) yena devāḥ svar āruruhur hitvā śarīram amṛtasya nābhim /
analyzed: yena devāḥ svar āruruhuḥ hitvā śarīram amṛtasya nābhim

original: (AVŚ_4,11.6c) tena geṣma sukṛtasya lokaṃ gharmasya vratena tapasā yaśasyavaḥ //6//
analyzed: tena geṣma sukṛtasya lokam gharmasya vratena tapasā yaśasyavaḥ

original: (AVŚ_4,11.7a) indro rūpeṇāgnir vahena prajāpatiḥ parameṣṭhī virāṭ /
analyzed: indraḥ rūpeṇa agniḥ vahena prajāpatiḥ parameṣṭhī virāj

original: (AVŚ_4,11.7c) viśvānare akramata vaiśvānare akramatānaduhy akramata /
analyzed: viśvānare akramata vaiśvānare akramata anaduhi akramata

original: (AVŚ_4,11.7e) so 'dṛṃhayata so 'dhārayata //7//
analyzed: saḥ dṛṃhayata saḥ dhārayata

original: (AVŚ_4,11.8a) madhyam etad anaḍuho yatraiṣa vaha āhitaḥ /
analyzed: madhyam etat anaḍuhaḥ yatra eṣa vahaḥ āhitaḥ

original: (AVŚ_4,11.8c) etāvad asya prācīnaṃ yāvān pratyaṅ samāhitaḥ //8//
analyzed: etāvat asya prācīnam yāvān pratyaṅ samāhitaḥ

original: (AVŚ_4,11.9a) yo vedānaduho dohān saptānupadasvataḥ /
analyzed: yaḥ veda anaduhaḥ dohān sapta anupadasvataḥ

original: (AVŚ_4,11.9c) prajāṃ ca lokaṃ cāpnoti tathā saptaṛṣayo viduḥ //9//
analyzed: prajām ca lokam ca āpnoti tathā sapta ṛṣayaḥ viduḥ

original: (AVŚ_4,11.10a) padbhiḥ sedim avakrāmann irāṃ jaṅghābhir utkhidan /
analyzed: padbhiḥ sedim avakrāman irām jaṅghābhiḥ utkhidan

original: (AVŚ_4,11.10c) srameṇānaḍvān kīlālaṃ kīnāśaś cābhi gachataḥ //10//
analyzed: srameṇa anaḍvān kīlālam kīnāśaḥ ca abhi gacchataḥ

original: (AVŚ_4,11.11a) dvādaśa vā etā rātrīr vratyā āhuḥ prajāpateḥ /
analyzed: dvādaśa vai etāḥ rātrīḥ vratyāḥ āhuḥ prajāpateḥ

original: (AVŚ_4,11.11c) tatropa brahma yo veda tad vā anaḍuho vratam //11//
analyzed: tatra upa brahma yaḥ veda tat vai anaḍuhaḥ vratam

original: (AVŚ_4,11.12a) duhe sāyaṃ duhe prātar duhe madhyaṃdinaṃ pari /
analyzed: duhe sāyam duhe prātar duhe madhyaṃdinam pari

original: (AVŚ_4,11.12c) dohā ye asya saṃyanti tān vidmānupadasvataḥ //12//
analyzed: dohāḥ ye asya saṃyanti tān vidma anupadasvataḥ

original: (AVŚ_4,12.1a) rohaṇy asi rohaṇy asthnaś chinnasya rohaṇī /
analyzed: rohaṇī asi rohaṇī asthnaḥ chinnasya rohaṇī

original: (AVŚ_4,12.1c) rohayedam arundhati //1//
analyzed: rohaya idam arundhati

original: (AVŚ_4,12.2a) yat te riṣṭaṃ yat te dyuttam asti peṣṭraṃ ta ātmani /
analyzed: yat te riṣṭam yat te dyuttam asti peṣṭram te ātmani

original: (AVŚ_4,12.2c) dhātā tad bhadrayā punaḥ saṃ dadhat paruṣā paruḥ //2//
analyzed: dhātā tat bhadrayā punar sam dadhat paruṣā paruḥ

original: (AVŚ_4,12.3a) saṃ te majjā majjñā bhavatu sam u te paruṣā paruḥ /
analyzed: sam te majjā majjñā bhavatu sam u te paruṣā paruḥ

original: (AVŚ_4,12.3c) saṃ te māṃsasya visrastaṃ sam asthy api rohatu //3//
analyzed: sam te māṃsasya visrastam sam asthi api rohatu

original: (AVŚ_4,12.4a) majjā majñā saṃ dhīyatāṃ carmaṇā carma rohatu /
analyzed: majjā majñā sam dhīyatām carmaṇā carma rohatu

original: (AVŚ_4,12.4c) asṛk te asthi rohatu māṃsaṃ māṃsena rohatu //4//
analyzed: asṛk te asthi rohatu māṃsam māṃsena rohatu

original: (AVŚ_4,12.5a) loma lomnā saṃ kalpayā tvacā saṃ kalpayā tvacam /
analyzed: loma lomnā sam kalpaya tvacā sam kalpaya tvacam

original: (AVŚ_4,12.5c) asṛk te asthi rohatu chinnaṃ saṃ dhehy oṣadhe //5//
analyzed: asṛk te asthi rohatu chinnam sam dhehi oṣadhe

original: (AVŚ_4,12.6a) sa ut tiṣṭha prehi pra drava rathaḥ sucakraḥ /
analyzed: saḥ ud tiṣṭha prehi pra drava rathaḥ su cakraḥ

original: (AVŚ_4,12.6c) supaviḥ sunābhiḥ prati tiṣṭhordhvaḥ //6//
analyzed: su paviḥ su nābhiḥ prati tiṣṭha ūrdhvaḥ

original: (AVŚ_4,12.7a) yadi kartaṃ patitvā saṃśaśre yadi vāśmā prahṛto jaghāna /
analyzed: yadi kartam patitvā saṃśaśre yadi vā aśmā prahṛtaḥ jaghāna

original: (AVŚ_4,12.7c) ṛbhū rathasyevāṅgāni saṃ dadhat paruṣā paruḥ //7//
analyzed: ṛbhuḥ rathasya iva aṅgāni sam dadhat paruṣā paruḥ

original: (AVŚ_4,13.1a) uta devā avahitaṃ devā un nayathā punaḥ /
analyzed: uta devāḥ avahitam devāḥ ud nayathā punar

original: (AVŚ_4,13.1c) utāgaś cakruṣaṃ devā devā jīvayathā punaḥ //1//
analyzed: uta āgaḥ cakruṣam devāḥ devāḥ jīvayathā punar

original: (AVŚ_4,13.2a) dvāv imau vātau vāta ā sindhor ā parāvataḥ /
analyzed: dvau imau vātau vātaḥ ā sindhoḥ ā parāvataḥ

original: (AVŚ_4,13.2c) dakṣaṃ te anya āvātu vy anyo vātu yad rapaḥ //2//
analyzed: dakṣam te anyaḥ ā vātu vi anyaḥ vātu yat rapaḥ

original: (AVŚ_4,13.3a) ā vāta vāhi bheṣajaṃ vi vāta vāhi yad rapaḥ /
analyzed: ā vāta vāhi bheṣajam vi vāta vāhi yat rapaḥ

original: (AVŚ_4,13.3c) tvaṃ hi viśvabheṣaja devānāṃ dūta īyase //3//
analyzed: tvam hi viśva bheṣaja devānām dūtaḥ īyase

original: (AVŚ_4,13.4a) trāyantām imaṃ devās trāyantāṃ marutāṃ gaṇāḥ /
analyzed: trāyantām imam devāḥ trāyantām marutām gaṇāḥ

original: (AVŚ_4,13.4c) trāyantāṃ viśvā bhūtāni yathāyam arapā asat //4//
analyzed: trāyantām viśvā bhūtāni yathā ayam arapāḥ asat

original: (AVŚ_4,13.5a) ā tvāgamaṃ śaṃtātibhir atho ariṣṭatātibhiḥ /
analyzed: ā tvā agamam śaṃtātibhiḥ atho ariṣṭatātibhiḥ

original: (AVŚ_4,13.5c) dakṣaṃ ta ugram ābhāriṣaṃ parā yakṣmaṃ suvāmi te //5//
analyzed: dakṣam te ugram ābhāriṣam parā yakṣmam suvāmi te

original: (AVŚ_4,13.6a) ayaṃ me hasto bhagavān ayaṃ me bhagavattaraḥ /
analyzed: ayam me hastaḥ bhagavān ayam me bhagavattaraḥ

original: (AVŚ_4,13.6c) ayaṃ me viśvabheṣajo 'yaṃ śivābhimarśanaḥ //6//
analyzed: ayam me viśva bheṣajaḥ yam śiva abhimarśanaḥ

original: (AVŚ_4,13.7a) hastābhyāṃ daśaśākhābhyāṃ jihvā vācaḥ purogavī /
analyzed: hastābhyām daśa śākhābhyām jihvā vācaḥ purogavī

original: (AVŚ_4,13.7c) anāmayitnubhyāṃ hastābhyāṃ tābhyāṃ tvābhi mṛśāmasi //7//
analyzed: anāmayitnubhyām hastābhyām tābhyām tvā abhi mṛśāmasi

original: (AVŚ_4,14.1a) ajo hy agner ajaniṣṭa śokāt so apaśyaj janitāram agre /
analyzed: ajaḥ hi agneḥ ajaniṣṭa śokāt saḥ apaśyat janitāram agre

original: (AVŚ_4,14.1c) tena devā devatām agrā āyan tena rohān ruruhur medhyāsaḥ //1//
analyzed: tena devāḥ deva tām agrāḥ āyan tena rohān ruruhuḥ medhyāsaḥ

original: (AVŚ_4,14.2a) kramadhvam agninā nākam ukhyān hasteṣu bibhrataḥ /
analyzed: kramadhvam agninā nākam ukhyān hasteṣu bibhrataḥ

original: (AVŚ_4,14.2c) divas pṛṣṭhaṃ svar gatvā miśrā devebhir ādhvam //2//
analyzed: divaḥ pṛṣṭham svar gatvā miśrāḥ devebhiḥ ādhvam

original: (AVŚ_4,14.3a) pṛṣṭhāt pṛthivyā aham antarikṣam āruham antarikṣād divam āruham /
analyzed: pṛṣṭhāt pṛthivyāḥ aham antarikṣam āruham antarikṣāt divam āruham

original: (AVŚ_4,14.3c) divo nākasya pṛṣṭhāt svar jyotir agām aham //3//
analyzed: divaḥ nākasya pṛṣṭhāt svar jyotiḥ agām aham

original: (AVŚ_4,14.4a) svar yanto nāpekṣanta ā dyāṃ rohanti rodasī /
analyzed: svar yantaḥ na apekṣante ā dyām rohanti rodasī

original: (AVŚ_4,14.4c) yajñaṃ ye viśvatodhāraṃ suvidvāṃso vitenire //4//
analyzed: yajñam ye viśvatas dhāram su vidvāṃsaḥ vitenire

original: (AVŚ_4,14.5a) agne prehi prathamo devatānāṃ cakṣur devānām uta mānuṣānām /
analyzed: agne prehi prathamaḥ devatānām cakṣuḥ devānām uta mānuṣānām

original: (AVŚ_4,14.5c) iyakṣamāṇā bhṛgubhiḥ sajoṣāḥ svar yantu yajamānāḥ svasti //5//
analyzed: iyakṣamāṇāḥ bhṛgubhiḥ sajoṣāḥ svar yantu yajamānāḥ svasti

original: (AVŚ_4,14.6a) ajam anajmi payasā ghṛtena divyaṃ suparnaṃ payasaṃ bṛhantam /
analyzed: ajam anajmi payasā ghṛtena divyam suparnam payasam bṛhantam

original: (AVŚ_4,14.6c) tena geṣma sukṛtasya lokaṃ svar ārohanto abhi nākam uttamam //6//
analyzed: tena geṣma sukṛtasya lokam svar ārohantaḥ abhi nākam uttamam

original: (AVŚ_4,14.7a) pañcaudanaṃ pañcabhir aṅgulibhir darvyoddhara pañcadhaitam odanam /
analyzed: pañca odanam pañcabhiḥ aṅgulibhiḥ darvyā uddhara pañcadhā etam odanam

original: (AVŚ_4,14.7c) prācyāṃ diśi śiro ajasya dhehi dakṣiṇāyāṃ diśi dakṣiṇaṃ dhehi pārśvam //7//
analyzed: prācyām diśi śiraḥ ajasya dhehi dakṣiṇāyām diśi dakṣiṇam dhehi pārśvam

original: (AVŚ_4,14.8a) pratīcyāṃ diśi bhasadam asya dhehy uttarasyāṃ diśy uttaraṃ dhehi pārśvam /
analyzed: pratīcyām diśi bhasadam asya dhehi uttarasyām diśi uttaram dhehi pārśvam

original: (AVŚ_4,14.8c) ūrdhvāyāṃ diśy ajasyānūkaṃ dhehi diśi dhruvāyāṃ dhehi pājasyam antarikṣe madhyato madhyam asya //8//
analyzed: ūrdhvāyām diśi ajasya anūkam dhehi diśi dhruvāyām dhehi pājasyam antarikṣe madhyatas madhyam asya

original: (AVŚ_4,14.9a) śṛtam ajaṃ śṛtayā prorṇuhi tvacā sarvair aṅgaiḥ saṃbhṛtaṃ viśvarūpam /
analyzed: śṛtam ajam śṛtayā prorṇuhi tvacā sarvaiḥ aṅgaiḥ saṃbhṛtam viśva rūpam

original: (AVŚ_4,14.9c) sa ut tisṭheto abhi nākam uttamaṃ padbhiś caturbhiḥ prati tiṣṭha dikṣu //9//
analyzed: saḥ ud tisṭha itas abhi nākam uttamam padbhiḥ caturbhiḥ prati tiṣṭha dikṣu

original: (AVŚ_4,15.1a) samutpatantu pradiśo nabhasvatīḥ sam abhrāṇi vātajūtāni yantu /
analyzed: samutpatantu pradiśaḥ nabhasvatīḥ sam abhrāṇi vāta jūtāni yantu

original: (AVŚ_4,15.1c) mahaṛṣabhasya nadato nabhasvato vāśrā āpaḥ pṛthivīṃ tarpayantu //1//
analyzed: maha ṛṣabhasya nadataḥ nabhasvataḥ vāśrāḥ āpaḥ pṛthivīm tarpayantu

original: (AVŚ_4,15.2a) sam īkṣayantu taviṣāḥ sudānavo 'pāṃ rasā oṣadhībhiḥ sacantām /
analyzed: sam īkṣayantu taviṣāḥ sudānavaḥ u pām rasāḥ oṣadhībhiḥ sacantām

original: (AVŚ_4,15.2c) varṣasya sargā mahayantu bhūmiṃ pṛthag jāyantām oṣadhayo viśvarūpāḥ //2//
analyzed: varṣasya sargāḥ mahayantu bhūmim pṛthak jāyantām oṣadhayaḥ viśva rūpāḥ

original: (AVŚ_4,15.3a) sam īkṣayasva gāyato nabhāṃsy apām vegāsaḥ pṛthag ud vijantām /
analyzed: sam īkṣayasva gāyataḥ nabhāṃsi apām vegāsaḥ pṛthak ud vijantām

original: (AVŚ_4,15.3c) varṣasya sargā mahayantu bhūmiṃ pṛthag jāyantām vīrudho viśvarūpāḥ //3//
analyzed: varṣasya sargāḥ mahayantu bhūmim pṛthak jāyantām vīrudhaḥ viśva rūpāḥ

original: (AVŚ_4,15.4a) gaṇās tvopa gāyantu mārutāḥ parjanya ghoṣiṇaḥ pṛthak /
analyzed: gaṇāḥ tvā upa gāyantu mārutāḥ parjanya ghoṣiṇaḥ pṛthak

original: (AVŚ_4,15.4c) sargā varṣasya varṣato varṣantu pṛthivīm anu //4//
analyzed: sargāḥ varṣasya varṣataḥ varṣantu pṛthivīm anu

original: (AVŚ_4,15.5a) ud īrayata marutaḥ samudratas tveṣo arko nabha ut pātayātha /
analyzed: ud īrayata marutaḥ samudrataḥ tveṣaḥ arkaḥ nabhaḥ ud pātayātha

original: (AVŚ_4,15.5c) mahaṛṣabhasya nadato nabhasvato vāśrā āpaḥ pṛthivīṃ tarpayantu //5//
analyzed: maha ṛṣabhasya nadataḥ nabhasvataḥ vāśrāḥ āpaḥ pṛthivīm tarpayantu

original: (AVŚ_4,15.6a) abhi kranda stanayārdayodadhiṃ bhūmiṃ parjanya payasā sam aṅdhi /
analyzed: abhi kranda stanaya ardaya udadhim bhūmim parjanya payasā sam aṅdhi

original: (AVŚ_4,15.6c) tvayā sṛṣṭaṃ bahulam aitu varṣam āśāraiṣī kṛśagur etv astam //6//
analyzed: tvayā sṛṣṭam bahulam aitu varṣam āśā raiṣī kṛśaguḥ etu astam

original: (AVŚ_4,15.7a) saṃ vo 'vantu sudānava utsā ajagarā uta /
analyzed: sam vaḥ vantu sudānavaḥ utsāḥ ajagarāḥ uta

original: (AVŚ_4,15.7c) marudbhiḥ pracyutā meghā varṣantu pṛthivīm anu //7//
analyzed: marudbhiḥ pracyutāḥ meghāḥ varṣantu pṛthivīm anu

original: (AVŚ_4,15.8a) āśāmāśāṃ vi dyotatāṃ vātā vāntu diśodiśaḥ /
analyzed: āśām āśām vi dyotatām vātāḥ vāntu diśaḥ diśaḥ

original: (AVŚ_4,15.8c) marudbhiḥ pracyutā meghāḥ saṃ yantu pṛthivīm anu //8//
analyzed: marudbhiḥ pracyutāḥ meghāḥ sam yantu pṛthivīm anu

original: (AVŚ_4,15.9a) āpo vidyud abhraṃ varṣaṃ saṃ vo 'vantu sudānava utsā ajagarā uta /
analyzed: āpaḥ vidyut abhram varṣam sam vaḥ vantu sudānavaḥ utsāḥ ajagarāḥ uta

original: (AVŚ_4,15.9c) marudbhiḥ pracyutā meghāḥ prāvantu pṛthivīm anu //9//
analyzed: marudbhiḥ pracyutāḥ meghāḥ prāvantu pṛthivīm anu

original: (AVŚ_4,15.10a) apām agnis tanūbhiḥ saṃvidāno ya oṣadhīnām adhipā babhūva /
analyzed: apām agniḥ tanūbhiḥ saṃvidānaḥ yaḥ oṣadhīnām adhipāḥ babhūva

original: (AVŚ_4,15.10c) sa no varṣaṃ vanutāṃ jātavedāḥ prāṇaṃ prajābhyo amṛtaṃ divas pari //10//
analyzed: sa naḥ varṣam vanutām jātavedāḥ prāṇam prajābhyaḥ amṛtam divaḥ pari

original: (AVŚ_4,15.11a) prajāpatiḥ salilād ā samudrād āpa īrayann udadhim ardayāti /
analyzed: prajāpatiḥ salilāt ā samudrāt ā apaḥ īrayan udadhim ardayāti

original: (AVŚ_4,15.11c) pra pyāyatāṃ vṛṣṇo aśvasya reto 'rvān etena stanayitnunehi //11//
analyzed: pra pyāyatām vṛṣṇaḥ aśvasya retaḥ rvān etena stanayitnunā ihi

original: (AVŚ_4,15.12a) apo niṣiñcann asuraḥ pitā naḥ śvasantu gargarā apāṃ varuṇāva nīcīr apaḥ sṛja /
analyzed: apaḥ niṣiñcan asuraḥ pitā naḥ śvasantu gargarāḥ apām varuṇa ava nīcīḥ apaḥ sṛja

original: (AVŚ_4,15.12c) vadantu pṛśnibāhavo maṇḍūkā iriṇānu //12//
analyzed: vadantu pṛśni bāhavaḥ maṇḍūkāḥ iriṇā anu

original: (AVŚ_4,15.13a) saṃvatsaraṃ śaśayānā brāhmaṇā vratacāriṇaḥ /
analyzed: saṃvatsaram śaśayānāḥ brāhmaṇāḥ vrata cāriṇaḥ

original: (AVŚ_4,15.13c) vācam parjanyajinvitāṃ pra maṇdūkā avādiṣuḥ //13//
analyzed: vācam parjanya jinvitām pra maṇdūkāḥ avādiṣuḥ

original: (AVŚ_4,15.14a) upapravada maṇḍūki varṣaṃ ā vada tāduri /
analyzed: upapravada maṇḍūki varṣam ā vada tāduri

original: (AVŚ_4,15.14c) madhye hradasya plavasva vigṛhya caturaḥ padaḥ //14//
analyzed: madhye hradasya plavasva vigṛhya caturaḥ padaḥ

original: (AVŚ_4,15.15a) khaṇvakhā3i khaimakhā3i madhye taduri /
analyzed: R madhye taduri

original: (AVŚ_4,15.15c) varṣaṃ vanudhvaṃ pitaro marutāṃ mana ichata //15//
analyzed: varṣam vanudhvam pitaraḥ marutām manaḥ ichata

original: (AVŚ_4,15.16a) mahāntaṃ kośam ud acābhi ṣiñca savidyutaṃ bhavatu vātu vātaḥ /
analyzed: mahāntam kośam ud aca abhi siñca savidyutam bhavatu vātu vātaḥ

original: (AVŚ_4,15.16c) tanvatāṃ yajñaṃ bahudhā visṛṣṭā ānandinīr oṣadhayo bhavantu //16//
analyzed: tanvatām yajñam bahudhā visṛṣṭāḥ ānandinīḥ oṣadhayaḥ bhavantu

original: (AVŚ_4,16.1a) bṛhann eṣām adhiṣṭhātā antikād iva paśyati /
analyzed: bṛhan eṣām adhiṣṭhātā antikāt iva paśyati

original: (AVŚ_4,16.1c) ya stāyan manyate carant sarvaṃ devā idaṃ viduḥ //1//
analyzed: yaḥ stāyan manyate caran sarvam devāḥ idam viduḥ

original: (AVŚ_4,16.2a) yas tiṣṭhati carati yaś ca vañcati yo nilāyaṃ carati yaḥ prataṅkam /
analyzed: yaḥ tiṣṭhati carati yaḥ ca vañcati yaḥ nilāyam carati yaḥ prataṅkam

original: (AVŚ_4,16.2c) dvau saṃniṣadya yan mantrayete rājā tad veda varuṇas tṛtīyaḥ //2//
analyzed: dvau saṃniṣadya yat mantrayete rājā tat veda varuṇaḥ tṛtīyaḥ

original: (AVŚ_4,16.3a) uteyaṃ bhūmir varuṇasya rājña utāsau dyaur bṛhatī dūreantā /
analyzed: uta iyam bhūmiḥ varuṇasya rājñaḥ uta asau dyauḥ bṛhatī dūreantā

original: (AVŚ_4,16.3c) uto samudrau varuṇasya kukṣī utāsminn alpa udake nilīnaḥ //3//
analyzed: uta u samudrau varuṇasya kukṣī uta asmin alpe udake nilīnaḥ

original: (AVŚ_4,16.4a) uta yo dyām atisarpāt parastān na sa mucyātai varuṇasya rājñaḥ /
analyzed: uta yaḥ dyām atisarpāt parastāt na sa mucyātai varuṇasya rājñaḥ

original: (AVŚ_4,16.4c) diva spaśaḥ pra carantīdam asya sahasrākṣā ati paśyanti bhūmim //4//
analyzed: divaḥ spaśaḥ pra caranti idam asya sahasra akṣāḥ ati paśyanti bhūmim

original: (AVŚ_4,16.5a) sarvaṃ tad rājā varuṇo vi caṣṭe yad antarā rodasī yat parastāt /
analyzed: sarvam tat rājā varuṇaḥ vi caṣṭe yat antarā rodasī yat parastāt

original: (AVŚ_4,16.5c) saṃkhyātā asya nimiṣo janānām akṣān iva śvaghnī ni minoti tāni //5//
analyzed: saṃkhyātāḥ asya nimiṣaḥ janānām akṣān iva śvaghnī ni minoti tāni

analyzed: ye te pāśāḥ varuṇa sapta sapta tredhā tiṣṭhanti viṣitāḥ ruṣantaḥ

original: (AVŚ_4,16.6c) chinantu sarve anṛtaṃ vadantaṃ yaḥ satyavādy ati taṃ sṛjantu //6//

original: (AVŚ_4,16.7a) śatena pāśair abhi dhehi varuṇainaṃ mā te mocy anṛtavāṅ nṛcakṣaḥ /

original: (AVŚ_4,16.7c) āstāṃ jālma udaraṃ śraṃśayitvā kośa ivābandhaḥ parikṛtyamānaḥ //7//

analyzed: yaḥ samābhyaḥ varuṇaḥ yaḥ vyābhyaḥ yaḥ saṃdeśyaḥ varuṇaḥ yaḥ videśyaḥ

original: (AVŚ_4,16.8c) yo daivo varuṇo yaś ca mānuṣaḥ //8//

analyzed: taiḥ tvā sarvaiḥ abhi syāmi pāśaiḥ asau āmuṣyāyaṇa amuṣyāḥ putra

original: (AVŚ_4,16.9c) tān u te sarvān anusaṃdiśāmi //9//
analyzed: tān u te sarvān anusaṃdiśāmi

original: (AVŚ_4,17.1a) īśāṇāṃ tvā bheṣajānām ujjeṣa ā rabhāmahe /
analyzed: īśānām tvā bheṣajānām ujjeṣe ā rabhāmahe

original: (AVŚ_4,17.1c) cakre sahasravīryam sarvasmā oṣadhe tvā //1//

original: (AVŚ_4,17.2a) satyajitaṃ śapathayāvanīṃ sahamānāṃ punaḥsarām /
analyzed: satya jitam śapatha yāvanīm sahamānām punaḥsarām

original: (AVŚ_4,17.2c) sarvāḥ sam ahvy oṣadhīr ito naḥ pārayād iti //2//

original: (AVŚ_4,17.3a) yā śaśāpa śapanena yāghaṃ mūram ādadhe /
analyzed: yā śaśāpa śapanena yā agham mūram ādadhe

original: (AVŚ_4,17.3c) yā rasasya haraṇāya jātam ārebhe tokam attu sā //3//
analyzed: yā rasasya haraṇāya jātam ārebhe tokam attu sā

analyzed: yām te cakruḥ āme pātre yām cakruḥ nīla lohite

original: (AVŚ_4,17.4c) āme māṃse kṛtyāṃ yāṃ cakrus tayā kṛtyākṛto jahi //4//
analyzed: āme māṃse kṛtyām yām cakruḥ tayā kṛtyā kṛtaḥ jahi

original: (AVŚ_4,17.5a) dauṣvapnyaṃ daurjīvityaṃ rakṣo abhvam arāyyaḥ /
analyzed: dauṣvapnyam daurjīvityam rakṣaḥ abhvam arāyyaḥ

original: (AVŚ_4,17.5c) durṇāmnīḥ sarvā durvācas tā asman nāśayāmasi //5//
analyzed: durṇāmnīḥ sarvāḥ durvācaḥ tāḥ asmat nāśayāmasi

original: (AVŚ_4,17.6a) kṣudhāmāraṃ tṛṣṇāmāram agotām anapatyatām /
analyzed: kṣudhā māram tṛṣṇā māram a go tām an apatya tām

original: (AVŚ_4,17.6c) apāmārga tvayā vayaṃ sarvaṃ tad apa mṛjmahe //6//
analyzed: apāmārga tvayā vayam sarvam tat apa mṛjmahe

original: (AVŚ_4,17.7a) tṛṣṇāmāraṃ kṣudhāmāraṃ atho akṣaparājayam /
analyzed: tṛṣṇā māram kṣudhā māram atho akṣa parājayam

original: (AVŚ_4,17.7c) apāmārga tvayā vayaṃ sarvaṃ tad apa mṛjmahe //7//
analyzed: apāmārga tvayā vayam sarvam tat apa mṛjmahe

original: (AVŚ_4,17.8a) apāmārga oṣadhīnāṃ sarvāsām eka id vaśī /
analyzed: apāmārgaḥ oṣadhīnām sarvāsām ekaḥ id vaśī

original: (AVŚ_4,17.8c) tena te mṛjma āsthitam atha tvam agadaś cara //8//
analyzed: tena te mṛjmaḥ āsthitam atha tvam agadaḥ cara

original: (AVŚ_4,18.1a) samaṃ jyotiḥ sūryeṇāhnā rātrī samāvatī /
analyzed: samam jyotiḥ sūryeṇa ahnā rātrī samāvatī

original: (AVŚ_4,18.1c) kṛṇomi satyam ūtaye 'rasāḥ santu kṛtvarīḥ //1//
analyzed: kṛṇomi satyam ūtaye rasāḥ santu kṛtvarīḥ

original: (AVŚ_4,18.2a) yo devāḥ kṛtyāṃ kṛtvā harād aviduṣo gṛham /
analyzed: yaḥ devāḥ kṛtyām kṛtvā harāt a viduṣaḥ gṛham

original: (AVŚ_4,18.2c) vatso dhārur iva mātaraṃ taṃ pratyag upa padyatām //2//
analyzed: vatsaḥ dhāruḥ iva mātaram tam pratyak upa padyatām

original: (AVŚ_4,18.3a) amā kṛtvā pāpmānaṃ yas tenānyaṃ jighāṃsati /
analyzed: amā kṛtvā pāpmānam yaḥ tena anyam jighāṃsati

original: (AVŚ_4,18.3c) aśmānas tasyāṃ dagdhāyāṃ bahulāḥ phaṭ karikrati //3//
analyzed: aśmānaḥ tasyām dagdhāyām bahulāḥ phaṭ karikrati

original: (AVŚ_4,18.4a) sahasradhāman viśikhān vigrīvāṃ chāyayā tvam /
analyzed: sahasra dhāman viśikhān vigrīvām chāyaya tvam

original: (AVŚ_4,18.4c) prati sma cakruṣe kṛtyāṃ priyāṃ priyāvate hara //4//
analyzed: prati sma cakruṣe kṛtyām priyām priyāvate hara

original: (AVŚ_4,18.5a) anayāham oṣadhyā sarvāḥ kṛtyā adūduṣam /
analyzed: anayā aham oṣadhyā sarvāḥ kṛtyāḥ adūduṣam

original: (AVŚ_4,18.5c) yāṃ kṣetre cakrur yāṃ goṣu yāṃ vā te puruṣeṣu //5//
analyzed: yām kṣetre cakruḥ yām goṣu yām vā te puruṣeṣu

analyzed: yaḥ cakāra na śaśāka kartum śaśre pādam aṅgurim

original: (AVŚ_4,18.6c) cakāra bhadram asmabhyam ātmane tapanam tu saḥ //6//
analyzed: cakāra bhadram asmabhyam ātmane tapanam tu saḥ

original: (AVŚ_4,18.7a) apāmārgo 'pa mārṣṭu kṣetriyaṃ śapathaś ca yaḥ /
analyzed: apāmārgaḥ u pa mārṣṭu kṣetriyam śapathaḥ ca yaḥ

original: (AVŚ_4,18.7c) apāha yātudhānīr apa sarvā arāyyaḥ //7//
analyzed: apa aha yātudhānīḥ apa sarvāḥ arāyyaḥ

original: (AVŚ_4,18.8a) apamṛjya yātudhānān apa sarvā arāyyaḥ /
analyzed: apamṛjya yātudhānān apa sarvāḥ arāyyaḥ

original: (AVŚ_4,18.8c) apāmārga tvayā vayaṃ sarvaṃ tad apa mṛjmahe //8//
analyzed: apāmārga tvayā vayam sarvam tat apa mṛjmahe

original: (AVŚ_4,19.1a) uto asy abandhukṛd uto asi nu jāmikṛt /
analyzed: uta u asi abandhu kṛt uta u asi nu jāmi kṛt

original: (AVŚ_4,19.1c) uto kṛtyākṛtaḥ prajāṃ nadam ivā chindhi vārṣikam //1//
analyzed: uta u kṛtyā kṛtaḥ prajām nadam iva ā chinddhi vārṣikam

analyzed: brāhmaṇena paryuktā asi kaṇvena nārṣadena

original: (AVŚ_4,19.2c) senevaiṣi tviṣīmatī na tatra bhayam asti yatra prāpnoṣy oṣadhe //2//
analyzed: senā iva eṣi tviṣīmatī na tatra bhayam asti yatra prāpnoṣi oṣadhe

original: (AVŚ_4,19.3a) agram eṣy oṣadhīnāṃ jyotiṣevābhidīpayan /
analyzed: agram eṣi oṣadhīnām jyotiṣā iva abhidīpayan

original: (AVŚ_4,19.3c) uta trātāsi pākasyātho hantāsi rakṣasaḥ //3//
analyzed: uta trātā asi pākasya atha u hantā asi rakṣasaḥ

original: (AVŚ_4,19.4a) yad ado devā asurāṃs tvayāgre nirakurvata /
analyzed: yat adaḥ devāḥ asurān tvayā agre nirakurvata

original: (AVŚ_4,19.4c) tatas tvam adhy oṣadhe 'pāmārgo ajāyathāḥ //4//
analyzed: tatas tvam adhi oṣadhe pāmārgaḥ ajāyathāḥ

original: (AVŚ_4,19.5a) vibhindatī śataśākhā vibhindan nāma te pitā /
analyzed: vibhindatī śata śākhā vibhindan nāma te pitā

original: (AVŚ_4,19.5c) pratyag vi bhindhi tvaṃ taṃ yo asmāṃ abhidāsati //5//
analyzed: pratyak vi bhindhi tvam tam yaḥ asmām abhidāsati

original: (AVŚ_4,19.6a) asad bhūmyāḥ sam abhavat tad yām eti mahad vyacaḥ /
analyzed: asat bhūmyāḥ sam abhavat tat yām eti mahat vyacaḥ

original: (AVŚ_4,19.6c) tad vai tato vidhūpāyat pratyak kartāram ṛchatu //6//
analyzed: tat vai tatas vidhūpāyat pratyak kartāram ṛchatu

original: (AVŚ_4,19.7a) pratyaṅ hi saṃbabhūvitha pratīcīnaphalas tvam /
analyzed: pratyaṅ hi saṃbabhūvitha pratīcīna phalaḥ tvam

original: (AVŚ_4,19.7c) sarvān mac chapathām adhi varīyo yāvayā vadham //7//
analyzed: sarvān mat śapathām adhi varīyaḥ yāvaya vadham

original: (AVŚ_4,19.8a) śatena mā pari pāhi sahasreṇābhi rakṣā mā /
analyzed: śatena mā pari pāhi sahasreṇa abhi rakṣa mā

original: (AVŚ_4,19.8c) indras te vīrudhāṃ pata ugra ojmānam ā dadhat //8//
analyzed: indraḥ te vīrudhām pate ugraḥ ojmānam ā dadhat

original: (AVŚ_4,20.1a) ā paśyati prati paśyati parā paśyati paśyati /
analyzed: ā paśyati prati paśyati parā paśyati paśyati

original: (AVŚ_4,20.1c) divam antarikṣam ād bhūmiṃ sarvaṃ tad devi paśyati //1//
analyzed: divam antarikṣam āt bhūmim sarvam tat devi paśyati

original: (AVŚ_4,20.2a) tisro divas tisraḥ pṛthivīḥ ṣaṭ cemāḥ pradiśāḥ pṛthak /
analyzed: tisraḥ divaḥ tisraḥ pṛthivīḥ ṣaḍ ca imāḥ pradiśāḥ pṛthak

original: (AVŚ_4,20.2c) tvayāhaṃ sarvā bhūtāni paśyāni devy oṣadhe //2//
analyzed: tvayā aham sarvā bhūtāni paśyāni devi oṣadhe

original: (AVŚ_4,20.3a) divyasya suparṇasya tasya hāsi kanīnikā /
analyzed: divyasya suparṇasya tasya ha asi kanīnikā

original: (AVŚ_4,20.3c) sā bhūmim ā rurohitha vahyaṃ śrāntā vadhūr iva //3//
analyzed: sā bhūmim ā rurohitha vahyam śrāntā vadhūḥ iva

original: (AVŚ_4,20.4a) tāṃ me sahasrākṣo devo dakṣiṇe hasta ā dadhat /
analyzed: tām me sahasrākṣaḥ devaḥ dakṣiṇe haste ā dadhat

original: (AVŚ_4,20.4c) tayāhaṃ sarvaṃ paśyāmi yaś ca śūdra utāryaḥ //4//
analyzed: tayā aham sarvam paśyāmi yaḥ ca śūdraḥ uta āryaḥ

original: (AVŚ_4,20.5a) āviṣ kṛṇuṣva rūpāni mātmānam apa gūhathāḥ /
analyzed: āvis kṛṇuṣva rūpāni mā ātmānam apa gūhathāḥ

original: (AVŚ_4,20.5c) atho sahasracakṣo tvaṃ prati paśyāḥ kimīdinaḥ //5//
analyzed: atha u sahasra cakṣo tvam prati paśyāḥ kimīdinaḥ

original: (AVŚ_4,20.6a) darśaya mā yātudhānān darśaya yātudhānyaḥ /
analyzed: darśaya mā yātudhānān darśaya yātudhānyaḥ

original: (AVŚ_4,20.6c) piśācānt sarvān darśayeti tvā rabha oṣadhe //6//
analyzed: piśācān sarvān darśaya iti tvā rabhe oṣadhe

original: (AVŚ_4,20.7a) kaśyapasya cakṣur asi śunyāś ca caturakṣyāḥ /
analyzed: kaśyapasya cakṣuḥ asi śunyāḥ ca catur akṣyāḥ

original: (AVŚ_4,20.7c) vīdhre sūryam iva sarpantaṃ mā piśācaṃ tiras karaḥ //7//
analyzed: vīdhre sūryam iva sarpantam mā piśācam tiras karaḥ

original: (AVŚ_4,20.8a) ud agrabhaṃ paripāṇād yātudhānaṃ kimīdinam /
analyzed: ud agrabham paripāṇāt yātudhānam kimīdinam

original: (AVŚ_4,20.8c) tenāhaṃ sarvaṃ paśyāmy uta śūdram utāryam //8//
analyzed: tena aham sarvam paśyāmi uta śūdram uta āryam

original: (AVŚ_4,20.9a) yo antarikṣeṇa patati divam yaś ca atisarpati /
analyzed: yaḥ antarikṣeṇa patati divam yaḥ ca atisarpati

original: (AVŚ_4,20.9c) bhūmiṃ yo manyate nāthaṃ taṃ piśācam pra darśaya //9//
analyzed: bhūmim yaḥ manyate nātham tam piśācam pra darśaya

original: (AVŚ_4,21.1a) ā gāvo agmann uta bhadram akrant sīdantu goṣṭhe raṇayantv asme /
analyzed: ā gāvaḥ agman uta bhadram akran sīdantu goṣṭhe raṇayantu asme

original: (AVŚ_4,21.1c) prajāvatīḥ pururūpā iha syur indrāya pūrvīr uṣaso duhānāḥ //1//
analyzed: prajāvatīḥ puru rūpāḥ iha syuḥ indrāya pūrvīḥ uṣasaḥ duhānāḥ

original: (AVŚ_4,21.2a) indro yajvane gṛṇate ca śikṣata uped dadāti na svaṃ muṣāyati /
analyzed: indraḥ yajvane gṛṇate ca śikṣate upa id dadāti na svam muṣāyati

original: (AVŚ_4,21.2c) bhūyobhūyo rayim id asya vardhayann abhinne khilye ni dadhāti devayum //2//
analyzed: bhūyas bhūyas rayim id asya vardhayan abhinne khilye ni dadhāti devayum

original: (AVŚ_4,21.3a) na tā naśanti na dabhāti taskaro nāsām āmitro vyathir ā dadharṣati /
analyzed: na tāḥ naśanti na dabhāti taskaraḥ na āsām āmitraḥ vyathiḥ ā dadharṣati

original: (AVŚ_4,21.3c) devāṃś ca yābhir yajate dadāti ca jyog it tābhiḥ sacate gopatiḥ saha //3//
analyzed: devān ca yābhiḥ yajate dadāti ca jyok id tābhiḥ sacate gopatiḥ saha

original: (AVŚ_4,21.4a) na tā arvā reṇukakāṭo 'śnute na saṃskṛtatram upa yanti tā abhi /
analyzed: na tāḥ arvā reṇu kakāṭaḥ śnute na saṃskṛtatram upa yanti tāḥ abhi

original: (AVŚ_4,21.4c) urugāyam abhayaṃ tasya tā anu gāvo martasya vi caranti yajvanaḥ //4//
analyzed: uru gāyam abhayam tasya tāḥ anu gāvaḥ martasya vi caranti yajvanaḥ

original: (AVŚ_4,21.5a) gāvo bhago gāva indro ma ichād gāva somasya prathamasya bhakṣaḥ /
analyzed: gāvaḥ bhagaḥ gāvaḥ indraḥ me ichāt gāvaḥ somasya prathamasya bhakṣaḥ

original: (AVŚ_4,21.5c) imā yā gāvaḥ sa janāsa indra ichāmi hṛdā manasā cid indram //5//
analyzed: imāḥ yāḥ gāvaḥ sa janāsaḥ indraḥ ichāmi hṛdā manasā cit indram

original: (AVŚ_4,21.6a) yūyaṃ gāvo medayatha kṛśaṃ cid aśrīraṃ cit kṛṇuthā supratīkam /
analyzed: yūyam gāvaḥ medayatha kṛśam cit aśrīram cit kṛṇutha su pratīkam

original: (AVŚ_4,21.6c) bhadraṃ gṛhaṃ kṛṇutha bhadravāco bṛhad vo vaya ucyate sabhāsu //6//
analyzed: bhadram gṛham kṛṇutha bhadra vācaḥ bṛhat vaḥ vayaḥ ucyate sabhāsu

original: (AVŚ_4,21.7a) prajāvatīḥ sūyavase ruśantīḥ śuddhā apaḥ suprapāṇe pibantīḥ /
analyzed: prajāvatīḥ sūyavase ruśantīḥ śuddhāḥ apaḥ su prapāṇe pibantīḥ

original: (AVŚ_4,21.7c) mā va stena īśata māghaśaṃsaḥ pari vo rudrasya hetir vṛṇaktu //7//
analyzed: mā vaḥ stenaḥ īśata mā agha śaṃsaḥ pari vaḥ rudrasya hetiḥ vṛṇaktu

original: (AVŚ_4,22.1a) imam indra vardhaya kṣatriyaṃ me imaṃ viśām ekavṛṣaṃ kṛṇu tvam /
analyzed: imam indra vardhaya kṣatriyam me imam viśām eka vṛṣam kṛṇu tvam

original: (AVŚ_4,22.1c) nir amitrān akṣṇuhy asya sarvāṃs tān randhayāsmā ahamuttareṣu //1//
analyzed: niḥ amitrān akṣṇuhi asya sarvān tān randhaya asmai ahamuttareṣu

original: (AVŚ_4,22.2a) emaṃ bhaja grāme aśveṣu goṣu niṣ ṭaṃ bhaja yo amitro asya /
analyzed: ā imam bhaja grāme aśveṣu goṣu niḥ tam bhaja yaḥ amitraḥ asya

original: (AVŚ_4,22.2c) varṣma kṣatrāṇām ayam astu rājendra śatruṃ randhaya sarvam asmai //2//
analyzed: varṣma kṣatrāṇām ayam astu rāja indra śatrum randhaya sarvam asmai

original: (AVŚ_4,22.3a) ayam astu dhanapatir dhanānām ayaṃ viśāṃ viśpatir astu rājā /
analyzed: ayam astu dhana patiḥ dhanānām ayam viśām viśpatiḥ astu rājā

original: (AVŚ_4,22.3c) asminn indra mahi varcāṃsi dhehy avarcasaṃ kṛṇuhi śatrum asya //3//
analyzed: asmin indra mahi varcāṃsi dhehi avarcasam kṛṇuhi śatrum asya

original: (AVŚ_4,22.4a) asmai dyāvāpṛthivī bhūri vāmaṃ duhāthāṃ gharmadughe iva dhenū /
analyzed: asmai dyāvāpṛthivī bhūri vāmam duhāthām gharma dughe iva dhenū

original: (AVŚ_4,22.4c) ayaṃ rājā priya indrasya bhūyāt priyo gavām oṣadhīnāṃ paśūnām //4//
analyzed: ayam rājā priyaḥ indrasya bhūyāt priyaḥ gavām oṣadhīnām paśūnām

original: (AVŚ_4,22.5a) yunajmi ta uttarāvantam indraṃ yena jayanti na parājayante /
analyzed: yunajmi te uttarāvantam indram yena jayanti na parājayante

original: (AVŚ_4,22.5c) yas tvā karad ekavṛṣaṃ janānām uta rājñām uttamaṃ mānavānām //5//
analyzed: yaḥ tvā karat ekavṛṣam janānām uta rājñām uttamam mānavānām

original: (AVŚ_4,22.6a) uttaras tvam adhare te sapatnā ye ke ca rājan pratiśatravas te /
analyzed: uttaraḥ tvam adhare te sapatnāḥ ye ke ca rājan pratiśatravaḥ te

original: (AVŚ_4,22.6c) ekavṛṣa indrasakhā jigīvāṃ chatrūyatām ā bharā bhojanāni //6//
analyzed: ekavṛṣaḥ indra sakhā jigīvān śatrūyatām ā bhara bhojanāni

original: (AVŚ_4,22.7a) siṃhapratīko viśo addhi sarvā vyāghrapratīko 'va bādhasva śatrūn /
analyzed: siṃha pratīkaḥ viśaḥ addhi sarvāḥ vyāghra pratīkaḥ vaḥ bādhasva śatrūn

original: (AVŚ_4,22.7c) ekavṛṣa indrasakhā jigīvāṃ chatrūyatām ā khidā bhojanāni //7//
analyzed: ekavṛṣaḥ indra sakhāḥ jigīvān śatrūyatām ā khida bhojanāni

original: (AVŚ_4,23.1a) agner manve prathamasya pracetasaḥ pāñcajanyasya bahudhā yam indhate /
analyzed: agneḥ manve prathamasya pracetasaḥ pāñcajanyasya bahudhā yam indhate

original: (AVŚ_4,23.1c) viśoviśaḥ praviśivāṃsam īmahe sa no muñcatv aṃhasaḥ //1//
analyzed: viśaḥ viśaḥ praviśivāṃsam īmahe sa naḥ muñcatu aṃhasaḥ

original: (AVŚ_4,23.2a) yathā havyaṃ vahasi jātavedo yathā yajñaṃ kalpayasi prajānan /
analyzed: yathā havyam vahasi jātavedaḥ yathā yajñam kalpayasi prajānan

original: (AVŚ_4,23.2c) evā devebhyaḥ sumatiṃ na ā vaha sa no muñcatv aṃhasaḥ //2//
analyzed: eva devebhyaḥ sumatim naḥ ā vaha sa naḥ muñcatu aṃhasaḥ

original: (AVŚ_4,23.3a) yāmanyāmann upayuktaṃ vahiṣṭhaṃ karmaṅkarmann ābhagam agnim īḍe /
analyzed: yāman yāman upayuktam vahiṣṭham karman karman ābhagam agnim īḍe

original: (AVŚ_4,23.3c) rakṣohaṇaṃ yajñavṛdhaṃ ghṛtāhutaṃ sa no muñcatv aṃhasaḥ //3//
analyzed: rakṣaḥ haṇam yajña vṛdham ghṛta āhutam sa naḥ muñcatu aṃhasaḥ

original: (AVŚ_4,23.4a) sujātaṃ jātavedasam agniṃ vaiśvānaraṃ vibhum /
analyzed: su jātam jātavedasam agnim vaiśvānaram vibhum

original: (AVŚ_4,23.4c) havyavāhaṃ havāmahe sa no muñcatv aṃhasaḥ //4//
analyzed: havyavāham havāmahe sa naḥ muñcatu aṃhasaḥ

original: (AVŚ_4,23.5a) yena ṛṣayo balam adyotayan yujā yenāsurāṇām ayuvanta māyāḥ /
analyzed: yena ṛṣayaḥ balam adyotayan yujā yena asurāṇām ayuvanta māyāḥ

original: (AVŚ_4,23.5c) yenāgninā paṇīn indro jigāya sa no muñcatv aṃhasaḥ //5//
analyzed: yena agninā paṇīn indraḥ jigāya sa naḥ muñcatu aṃhasaḥ

original: (AVŚ_4,23.6a) yena devā amṛtam anvavindan yenauṣadhīr madhumatīr akṛṇvan /
analyzed: yena devāḥ amṛtam anvavindan yena oṣadhīḥ madhumatīḥ akṛṇvan

original: (AVŚ_4,23.6c) yena devāḥ svar ābharant sa no muñcatv aṃhasaḥ //6//
analyzed: yena devāḥ svar ābharan sa naḥ muñcatu aṃhasaḥ

original: (AVŚ_4,23.7a) yasyedaṃ pradiśi yad virocate yaj jātaṃ janitavyaṃ ca kevalam /
analyzed: yasya idam pradiśi yat virocate yat jātam janitavyam ca kevalam

original: (AVŚ_4,23.7c) staumy agniṃ nāthito johavīmi sa no muñcatv aṃhasaḥ //7//
analyzed: staumi agnim nāthitaḥ johavīmi sa naḥ muñcatu aṃhasaḥ

original: (AVŚ_4,24.1a) indrasya manmahe śaśvad id asya manmahe vṛtraghna stomā upa mema āguḥ /
analyzed: indrasya manmahe śaśvat id asya manmahe vṛtra ghnaḥ stomāḥ upa mā ime ā aguḥ

original: (AVŚ_4,24.1c) yo dāśuṣaḥ sukṛto havam eti sa no muñcatv aṃhasaḥ //1//
analyzed: yaḥ dāśuṣaḥ su kṛtaḥ havam eti sa naḥ muñcatu aṃhasaḥ

original: (AVŚ_4,24.2a) ya ugrīṇām ugrabāhur yayur yo dānavānāṃ balam āruroja /
analyzed: yaḥ ugrīṇām ugra bāhuḥ yayuḥ yaḥ dānavānām balam āruroja

original: (AVŚ_4,24.2c) yena jitāḥ sindhavo yena gāvaḥ sa no muñcatv aṃhasaḥ //2//
analyzed: yena jitāḥ sindhavaḥ yena gāvaḥ sa naḥ muñcatu aṃhasaḥ

original: (AVŚ_4,24.3a) yaś carṣaṇipro vṛṣabhaḥ svarvid yasmai grāvāṇaḥ pravadanti nṛmṇam /
analyzed: yaḥ carṣaṇi praḥ vṛṣabhaḥ svar vid yasmai grāvāṇaḥ pravadanti nṛmṇam

original: (AVŚ_4,24.3c) yasyādhvaraḥ saptahotā madiṣṭhaḥ sa no muñcatv aṃhasaḥ //3//
analyzed: yasya adhvaraḥ sapta hotā madiṣṭhaḥ sa naḥ muñcatu aṃhasaḥ

original: (AVŚ_4,24.4a) yasya vaśāsa ṛṣabhāsa ukṣaṇo yasmai mīyante svaravaḥ svarvide /
analyzed: yasya vaśāsaḥ ṛṣabhāsaḥ ukṣaṇaḥ yasmai mīyante svaravaḥ svarvide

original: (AVŚ_4,24.4c) yasmai śukraḥ pavate brahmaśumbhitaḥ sa no muñcatv aṃhasaḥ //4//
analyzed: yasmai śukraḥ pavate brahma śumbhitaḥ sa naḥ muñcatu aṃhasaḥ

original: (AVŚ_4,24.5a) yasya juṣṭiṃ sominaḥ kāmayante yaṃ havanta iṣumantaṃ gaviṣṭau /
analyzed: yasya juṣṭim sominaḥ kāmayante yam havante iṣumantam gaviṣṭau

original: (AVŚ_4,24.5c) yasminn arkaḥ śiśriye yasminn ojaḥ sa no muñcatv aṃhasaḥ //5//
analyzed: yasmin arkaḥ śiśriye yasmin ojaḥ sa naḥ muñcatu aṃhasaḥ

original: (AVŚ_4,24.6a) yaḥ prathamaḥ karmakṛtyāya jajñe yasya vīryam prathamasyānubuddham /
analyzed: yaḥ prathamaḥ karma kṛtyāya jajñe yasya vīryam prathamasya anubuddham

original: (AVŚ_4,24.6c) yenodyato vajro 'bhyāyatāhiṃ sa no muñcatv aṃhasaḥ //6//
analyzed: yena udyataḥ vajraḥ bhyāyata ahim sa naḥ muñcatu aṃhasaḥ

original: (AVŚ_4,24.7a) yaḥ saṃgrāmān nayati saṃ yudhe vaśī yaḥ puṣṭāni saṃsṛjati dvayāni /
analyzed: yaḥ saṃgrāmān nayati sam yudhe vaśī yaḥ puṣṭāni saṃsṛjati dvayāni

original: (AVŚ_4,24.7c) staumīndraṃ nāthito johavīmi sa no muñcatv aṃhasaḥ //7//
analyzed: staumi indram nāthitaḥ johavīmi sa naḥ muñcatu aṃhasaḥ

original: (AVŚ_4,25.1a) vāyoḥ savitur vidathāni manmahe yāv ātmanvad viśatho yau ca rakṣathaḥ /
analyzed: vāyoḥ savituḥ vidathāni manmahe yau ātmanvat viśathaḥ yau ca rakṣathaḥ

original: (AVŚ_4,25.1c) yau viśvasya paribhū babhūvathus tau no muñcatam aṃhasaḥ //1//
analyzed: yau viśvasya paribhū babhūvathuḥ tau naḥ muñcatam aṃhasaḥ

original: (AVŚ_4,25.2a) yayoḥ saṃkhyātā varimā pārhivāni yābhyāṃ rajo yupitam antarikṣe /
analyzed: yayoḥ saṃkhyātā varimā pārhivāni yābhyām rajaḥ yupitam antarikṣe

original: (AVŚ_4,25.2c) yayoḥ prāyaṃ nānv ānaśe kaś cana tau no muñcatam aṃhasaḥ //2//
analyzed: yayoḥ prāyam na anu ānaśe kaḥ cana tau naḥ muñcatam aṃhasaḥ

original: (AVŚ_4,25.3a) tava vrate ni viśante janāsas tvayy udite prerate citrabhāno /
analyzed: tava vrate ni viśante janāsaḥ tvayi udite prerate citrabhāno

original: (AVŚ_4,25.3c) yuvaṃ vāyo savitā ca bhuvanāni rakṣathas tau no muñcatam aṃhasaḥ //3//
analyzed: yuvam vāyo savitā ca bhuvanāni rakṣathaḥ tau naḥ muñcatam aṃhasaḥ

original: (AVŚ_4,25.4a) apeto vāyo savitā ca duṣkṛtam apa rakṣāṃsi śimidāṃ ca sedhatam /
analyzed: apa itas vāyo savitā ca duṣkṛtam apa rakṣāṃsi śimidām ca sedhatam

original: (AVŚ_4,25.4c) saṃ hy ūrjayā sṛjathaḥ saṃ balena tau no muñcatam aṃhasaḥ //4//
analyzed: sam hi ūrjayā sṛjathaḥ sam balena tau naḥ muñcatam aṃhasaḥ

original: (AVŚ_4,25.5a) rayiṃ me poṣaṃ savitota vāyus tanū dakṣam ā suvatāṃ suśevam /
analyzed: rayim me poṣam savitā uta vāyuḥ tanū dakṣam ā suvatām su śevam

original: (AVŚ_4,25.5c) ayakṣmatātiṃ maha iha dhattaṃ tau no muñcatam aṃhasaḥ //5//
analyzed: a yakṣmatātim mahaḥ iha dhattam tau naḥ muñcatam aṃhasaḥ

original: (AVŚ_4,25.6a) pra sumatiṃ savitar vāya ūtaye mahasvantaṃ matsaraṃ mādayāthaḥ /
analyzed: pra sumatim savitar vāyo ūtaye mahasvantam matsaram mādayāthaḥ

original: (AVŚ_4,25.6c) arvāg vāmasya pravato ni yachataṃ tau no muñcatam aṃhasaḥ //6//
analyzed: arvāk vāmasya pravataḥ ni yacchatam tau naḥ muñcatam aṃhasaḥ

original: (AVŚ_4,25.7a) upa śreṣṭhā na āśiṣo devayor dhāmann asthiran /
analyzed: upa śreṣṭhāḥ naḥ āśiṣaḥ devayoḥ dhāman asthiran

original: (AVŚ_4,25.7c) staumi devaṃ savitāraṃ ca vāyuṃ tau no muñcantv aṃhasaḥ //7//
analyzed: staumi devam savitāram ca vāyum tau naḥ muñcantu aṃhasaḥ

original: (AVŚ_4,26.1a) manve vāṃ dyāvāpṛthivī subhojasau sacetasau ye aprathethām amitā yojanāni /
analyzed: manve vām dyāvāpṛthivī subhojasau sacetasau ye aprathethām amitā yojanāni

original: (AVŚ_4,26.1c) pratiṣṭhe hy abhavataṃ vasūnāṃ te no muñcatam aṃhasaḥ //1//
analyzed: pratiṣṭhe hi abhavatam vasūnām te naḥ muñcatam aṃhasaḥ

original: (AVŚ_4,26.2a) pratiṣṭhe hy abhavataṃ vasūnāṃ pravṛddhe devī subhage urūcī /
analyzed: pratiṣṭhe hi abhavatam vasūnām pravṛddhe devī subhage urūcī

original: (AVŚ_4,26.2c) dyāvāpṛthivī bhavataṃ me syone te no muñcatam aṃhasaḥ //2//
analyzed: dyāvāpṛthivī bhavatam me syone te naḥ muñcatam aṃhasaḥ

original: (AVŚ_4,26.3a) asantāpe sutapasau huve 'ham urvī gambhīre kavibhir namasye /
analyzed: a santāpe su tapasau huve ham urvī gambhīre kavibhiḥ namasye

original: (AVŚ_4,26.3c) dyāvāpṛthivī bhavataṃ me syone te no muñcatam aṃhasaḥ //3//
analyzed: dyāvāpṛthivī bhavatam me syone te naḥ muñcatam aṃhasaḥ

original: (AVŚ_4,26.4a) ye amṛtaṃ bibhṛtho ye havīṃṣi ye srotyā bibhṛtho ye manuṣyān /
analyzed: ye amṛtam bibhṛthaḥ ye havīṃṣi ye srotyāḥ bibhṛthaḥ ye manuṣyān

original: (AVŚ_4,26.4c) dyāvāpṛthivī bhavataṃ me syone te no muñcatam aṃhasaḥ //4//
analyzed: dyāvāpṛthivī bhavatam me syone te naḥ muñcatam aṃhasaḥ

original: (AVŚ_4,26.5a) ye usriyā bibhṛtho ye vanaspatīn yayor vāṃ viśvā bhuvanāny antaḥ /
analyzed: ye usriyāḥ bibhṛthaḥ ye vanaspatīn yayoḥ vām viśvā bhuvanāni antar

original: (AVŚ_4,26.5c) dyāvāpṛthivī bhavataṃ me syone te no muñcatam aṃhasaḥ //5//
analyzed: dyāvāpṛthivī bhavatam me syone te naḥ muñcatam aṃhasaḥ

original: (AVŚ_4,26.6a) ye kīlālena tarpayatho ye ghṛtena yābhyām ṛte na kiṃ cana śaknuvanti /
analyzed: ye kīlālena tarpayathaḥ ye ghṛtena yābhyām ṛte na kim cana śaknuvanti

original: (AVŚ_4,26.6c) dyāvāpṛthivī bhavataṃ me syone te no muñcatam aṃhasaḥ //6//
analyzed: dyāvāpṛthivī bhavatam me syone te naḥ muñcatam aṃhasaḥ

original: (AVŚ_4,26.7a) yan medam abhiśocati yenayena vā kṛtaṃ pauruṣeyān na daivāt /
analyzed: yat mā idam abhiśocati yena yena vā kṛtam pauruṣeyāt na daivāt

original: (AVŚ_4,26.7c) staumi dyāvāpṛthivī nāthito johavīmi te no muñcatam aṃhasaḥ //7//
analyzed: staumi dyāvāpṛthivī nāthitaḥ johavīmi te naḥ muñcatam aṃhasaḥ

original: (AVŚ_4,27.1a) marutāṃ manve adhi me bruvantu premaṃ vājaṃ vājasāte avantu /
analyzed: marutām manve adhi me bruvantu pra imam vājam vājasāte avantu

original: (AVŚ_4,27.1c) āśūn iva suyamān ahva ūtaye te no muñcantv aṃhasaḥ //1//
analyzed: āśūn iva su yamān ahve ūtaye te naḥ muñcantu aṃhasaḥ

original: (AVŚ_4,27.2a) utsam akṣitaṃ vyacanti ye sadā ya āsiñcanti rasam oṣadhīṣu /
analyzed: utsam akṣitam vyacanti ye sadā ye āsiñcanti rasam oṣadhīṣu

original: (AVŚ_4,27.2c) puro dadhe marutaḥ pṛśnimātṝṃs te no muñcantv aṃhasaḥ //2//
analyzed: puras dadhe marutaḥ pṛśni mātṝn te naḥ muñcantu aṃhasaḥ

original: (AVŚ_4,27.3a) payo dhenūnāṃ rasam oṣadhīnāṃ javam arvatāṃ kavayo ya invatha /
analyzed: payaḥ dhenūnām rasam oṣadhīnām javam arvatām kavayaḥ ye invatha

original: (AVŚ_4,27.3c) śagmā bhavantu maruto naḥ syonās te no muñcantv aṃhasaḥ //3//
analyzed: śagmāḥ bhavantu marutaḥ naḥ syonāḥ te naḥ muñcantu aṃhasaḥ

analyzed: apaḥ samudrāt divam ud vahanti divaḥ pṛthivīm abhi ye sṛjanti

original: (AVŚ_4,27.4c) ye adbhir īśānā marutaś caranti te no muñcantv aṃhasaḥ //4//
analyzed: ye adbhiḥ īśānāḥ marutaḥ caranti te naḥ muñcantu aṃhasaḥ

original: (AVŚ_4,27.5a) ye kīlālena tarpayanti ye ghṛtena ye vā vayo medasā saṃsṛjanti /
analyzed: ye kīlālena tarpayanti ye ghṛtena ye vā vayaḥ medasā saṃsṛjanti

analyzed: ye adbhiḥ īśānāḥ marutaḥ varṣayanti te naḥ muñcantu aṃhasaḥ

analyzed: yadi id idam marutaḥ mārutena yadi devāḥ daivyena īdṛś āra

original: (AVŚ_4,27.6c) yūyam īśidhve vasavas tasya niṣkṛtes te no muñcantv aṃhasaḥ //6//
analyzed: yūyam īśidhve vasavaḥ tasya niṣkṛteḥ te naḥ muñcantu aṃhasaḥ

original: (AVŚ_4,27.7a) tigmam anīkam viditaṃ sahasvan mārutaṃ śardhaḥ pṛtanāsūgram /
analyzed: tigmam anīkam viditam sahasvat mārutam śardhaḥ pṛtanāsu ugram

original: (AVŚ_4,27.7c) staumi maruto nāthito johavīmi te no muñcantv aṃhasaḥ //7//
analyzed: staumi marutaḥ nāthitaḥ johavīmi te naḥ muñcantu aṃhasaḥ

original: (AVŚ_4,28.1a) bhavāśarvau manve vāṃ tasya vittaṃ yayor vām idaṃ pradiśi yad virocate /
analyzed: bhavāśarvau manve vām tasya vittam yayoḥ vām idam pradiśi yat virocate

original: (AVŚ_4,28.1c) yāv asyeśāthe dvipado yau catuṣpadas tau no muñcatam aṃhasaḥ //1//
analyzed: yau asya īśāthe dvipadaḥ yau catuṣpadaḥ tau naḥ muñcatam aṃhasaḥ

original: (AVŚ_4,28.2a) yayor abhyabhva uta yad dūre cid yau viditāv iṣubhṛtām asiṣṭhau /
analyzed: yayoḥ abhi abhve uta yat dūre cit yau viditau iṣubhṛtām asiṣṭhau

original: (AVŚ_4,28.2c) yāv asyeśathe dvipado yau catuṣpadas tau no muñcatam aṃhasaḥ //2//
analyzed: yau asya īśathe dvipadaḥ yau catuṣpadaḥ tau naḥ muñcatam aṃhasaḥ

original: (AVŚ_4,28.3a) sahasrākṣau vṛtrahanā huvehaṃ dūregavyūtī stuvann emy ugrau /
analyzed: sahasra akṣau vṛtra hanā huve iham dūregavyūtī stuvan emi ugrau

original: (AVŚ_4,28.3c) yāv asyeśathe dvipado yau catuṣpadas tau no muñcatam aṃhasaḥ //3//
analyzed: yau asya īśathe dvipadaḥ yau catuṣpadaḥ tau naḥ muñcatam aṃhasaḥ

original: (AVŚ_4,28.4a) yāv ārebhāthe bahu sākam agre pra ced asrāṣṭram abhibhāṃ janeṣu /
analyzed: yau ārebhāthe bahu sākam agre pra ced asrāṣṭram abhibhām janeṣu

original: (AVŚ_4,28.4c) yāv asyeśathe dvipado yau catuṣpadas tau no muñcatam aṃhasaḥ //4//
analyzed: yau asya īśathe dvipadaḥ yau catuṣpadaḥ tau naḥ muñcatam aṃhasaḥ

original: (AVŚ_4,28.5a) yayor vadhān nāpapadyate kaś canāntar deveṣūta mānuṣeṣu /
analyzed: yayoḥ vadhāt na apapadyate kaḥ cana antar deveṣu uta mānuṣeṣu

original: (AVŚ_4,28.5c) yāv asyeśathe dvipado yau catuṣpadas tau no muñcatam aṃhasaḥ //5//
analyzed: yau asya īśathe dvipadaḥ yau catuṣpadaḥ tau naḥ muñcatam aṃhasaḥ

original: (AVŚ_4,28.6a) yaḥ kṛtyākṛn mūlakṛd yātudhāno ni tasmin dhattaṃ vajram ugrau /

original: (AVŚ_4,28.6c) yāv asyeśathe dvipado yau catuṣpadas tau no muñcatam aṃhasaḥ //6//
analyzed: yau asya īśathe dvipadaḥ yau catuṣpadaḥ tau naḥ muñcatam aṃhasaḥ

original: (AVŚ_4,28.7a) adhi no brūtaṃ pṛtanāsūgrau saṃ vajreṇa sṛjataṃ yaḥ kimīdī /
analyzed: adhi naḥ brūtam pṛtanāsu ugrau sam vajreṇa sṛjatam yaḥ kimīdī

original: (AVŚ_4,28.7c) staumi bhavāśarvau nāthito johavīmi tau no muñcatam aṃhasaḥ //7//
analyzed: staumi bhavāśarvau nāthitaḥ johavīmi tau naḥ muñcatam aṃhasaḥ

original: (AVŚ_4,29.1a) manve vāṃ mitrāvaruṇāv ṛtāvṛdhau sacetasau druhvaṇo yau nudethe /

original: (AVŚ_4,29.7c) staumi mitrāvaruṇau nāthito johavīmi tau no muñcatam aṃhasaḥ //7//
analyzed: staumi mitrāvaruṇau nāthitaḥ johavīmi tau naḥ muñcatam aṃhasaḥ

analyzed: aham rudrebhiḥ vasubhiḥ carāmi aham ādityaiḥ uta viśvadevaiḥ

analyzed: aham mitrāvarunā ubhā bibharmi aham indra agnī aham aśvinā ubhā

original: (AVŚ_4,30.2a) ahaṃ rāṣṭrī saṃgamanī vasūnāṃ cikituṣī prathamā yajñiyānām /
analyzed: aham rāṣṭrī saṃgamanī vasūnām cikituṣī prathamā yajñiyānām

original: (AVŚ_4,30.3a) aham eva svayam idaṃ vadāmi juṣṭaṃ devānām uta mānuṣāṇām /
analyzed: aham eva svayam idam vadāmi juṣṭam devānām uta mānuṣāṇām

original: (AVŚ_4,30.3c) yaṃ kāmaye tantam ugraṃ kṛṇomi taṃ brahmāṇaṃ tam ṛṣiṃ taṃ sumedhām //3//
analyzed: yam kāmaye tantam ugram kṛṇomi tam brahmāṇam tam ṛṣim tam su medhām

original: (AVŚ_4,30.4a) mayā so 'nnam atti yo vipaśyati yaḥ prāṇati ya īm śṛṇoty uktam /
analyzed: mayā saḥ annam atti yaḥ vipaśyati yaḥ prāṇati yaḥ īm śṛṇoti uktam

original: (AVŚ_4,30.4c) amantavo māṃ ta upa kṣiyanti śrudhi śruta śruddheyaṃ te vadāmi //4//
analyzed: amantavaḥ mām te upa kṣiyanti śrudhi śruta śruddhā iyam te vadāmi

original: (AVŚ_4,30.5a) ahaṃ rudrāya dhanur ā tanomi brahmadviṣe śarave hantavā u /
analyzed: aham rudrāya dhanuḥ ā tanomi brahma dviṣe śarave hantavai u

original: (AVŚ_4,30.5c) ahaṃ janāya samadaṃ kṛṇomi aham dyāvāpṛthivī ā viveśa //5//
analyzed: aham janāya samadam kṛṇomi aham dyāvāpṛthivī ā viveśa

analyzed: aham somam āhanasam bibharmi aham tvaṣṭāram uta pūṣaṇam bhagam

original: (AVŚ_4,30.6c) ahaṃ dadhāmi draviṇā haviṣmate suprāvyā yajamānāya sunvate //6//
analyzed: aham dadhāmi draviṇā haviṣmate suprāvyāḥ yajamānāya sunvate

original: (AVŚ_4,30.7a) ahaṃ suve pitaram asya mūrdhan mama yonir apsv antaḥ samudre /
analyzed: aham suve pitaram asya mūrdhan mama yoniḥ apsu antar samudre

original: (AVŚ_4,30.7c) tato vi tiṣṭhe bhuvanāni viśvotāmūṃ dyāṃ varṣmaṇopa spṛśāmi //7//

original: (AVŚ_4,30.8a) aham eva vātaiva pra vāmy ārabhamāṇā bhuvanāni viśvā /
analyzed: aham eva vātā eva pra vāmi ārabhamāṇā bhuvanāni viśvā

original: (AVŚ_4,30.8c) paro divā para enā pṛthivyaitāvatī mahimnā saṃ babhūva //8//
analyzed: paras divā paras enā pṛthivyā etāvatī mahimnā sam babhūva

original: (AVŚ_4,31.1a) tvayā manyo saratham ārujanto harṣamāṇā hṛṣitāso marutvan /
analyzed: tvayā manyo sa ratham ārujantaḥ harṣamāṇāḥ hṛṣitāsaḥ marutvan

original: (AVŚ_4,31.1c) tigmeṣava āyudhā saṃśiśānā upa pra yantu naro agnirūpāḥ //1//
analyzed: tigma iṣavaḥ āyudhā saṃśiśānāḥ upa pra yantu naraḥ agni rūpāḥ

analyzed: agniḥ iva manyo tviṣitaḥ sahasva senā nīḥ naḥ sahure hūtaḥ edhi

analyzed: hatvāya śatrūn vi bhajasva vedaḥ ojaḥ mimānaḥ vi mṛdhaḥ nudasva

original: (AVŚ_4,31.3a) sahasva manyo abhimātim asmai rujan mṛṇan pramṛṇan prehi śatrūn /
analyzed: sahasva manyo abhimātim asmai rujan mṛṇan pramṛṇan prehi śatrūn

original: (AVŚ_4,31.3c) ugraṃ te pājo nanv ā rurudhre vaśī vaśaṃ nayāsā ekaja tvam //3//
analyzed: ugram te pājaḥ nanu ā rurudhre vaśī vaśam nayāsai eka ja tvam

original: (AVŚ_4,31.4a) eko bahūnām asi manya īḍitā viśaṃviśam yuddhāya saṃ śiśādhi /
analyzed: ekaḥ bahūnām asi manye īḍitā viśam viśam yuddhāya sam śiśādhi

original: (AVŚ_4,31.4c) akṛttaruk tvayā yujā vayaṃ dyumantaṃ ghoṣam vijayāya kṛṇmasi //4//
analyzed: a kṛtta ruc tvayā yujā vayam dyumantam ghoṣam vijayāya kṛṇmasi

original: (AVŚ_4,31.5a) vijeṣakṛd indra ivānavabravo 'smākaṃ manyo adhipā bhaveha /
analyzed: vijeṣa kṛt indraḥ iva anavabravaḥ smākam manyo adhipāḥ bhava iha

original: (AVŚ_4,31.5c) priyaṃ te nāma sahure gṛṇīmasi vidmā tam utsaṃ yata ābabhūtha //5//
analyzed: priyam te nāma sahure gṛṇīmasi vidma tam utsam yatas ābabhūtha

original: (AVŚ_4,31.6a) ābhūtyā sahajā vajra sāyaka saho bibharṣi sahabhūta uttaram /
analyzed: ābhūtyā sahajāḥ vajra sāyaka sahaḥ bibharṣi sahabhūtaḥ uttaram

original: (AVŚ_4,31.6c) kratvā no manyo saha medy edhi mahādhanasya puruhūta saṃsṛji //6//
analyzed: kratvā naḥ manyo saha medī edhi mahā dhanasya puru hūta saṃsṛji

original: (AVŚ_4,31.7a) saṃsṛṣṭaṃ dhanam ubhayaṃ samākṛtam asmabhyaṃ dhattāṃ varuṇaś ca manyuḥ /
analyzed: saṃsṛṣṭam dhanam ubhayam samākṛtam asmabhyam dhattām varuṇaḥ ca manyuḥ

original: (AVŚ_4,31.7c) bhiyo dadhānā hṛdayeṣu śatravaḥ parājitāso apa ni layantām //7//
analyzed: bhiyaḥ dadhānāḥ hṛdayeṣu śatravaḥ parājitāsaḥ apa ni layantām

original: (AVŚ_4,32.1a) yas te manyo 'vidhad vajra sāyaka saha ojaḥ puṣyati viśvam ānuṣak /
analyzed: yaḥ te manyo vidhat vajra sāyaka sahaḥ ojaḥ puṣyati viśvam ānuṣak

original: (AVŚ_4,32.1c) sāhyāma dāsam āryaṃ tvayā yujā vayaṃ sahaskṛtena sahasā sahasvatā //1//
analyzed: sāhyāma dāsam āryam tvayā yujā vayam sahaskṛtena sahasā sahasvatā

original: (AVŚ_4,32.2a) manyur indro manyur evāsa devo manyur hotā varuṇo jātavedāḥ /
analyzed: manyuḥ indraḥ manyuḥ eva āsa devaḥ manyuḥ hotā varuṇaḥ jātavedāḥ

original: (AVŚ_4,32.2c) manyuṃ viśa īḍate mānuṣīr yāḥ pahi no manyo tapasā sajoṣāḥ //2//
analyzed: manyum viśaḥ īḍate mānuṣīḥ yāḥ pahi naḥ manyo tapasā sajoṣāḥ

original: (AVŚ_4,32.3a) abhīhi manyo tavasas tavīyān tapasā yujā vi jahi śatrūn /
analyzed: abhīhi manyo tavasaḥ tavīyān tapasā yujā vi jahi śatrūn

original: (AVŚ_4,32.3c) amitrahā vṛtrahā dasyuhā ca viśvā vasūny ā bharā tvaṃ naḥ //3//
analyzed: amitra hā vṛtra hā dasyu hā ca viśvā vasūni ā bhara tvam naḥ

original: (AVŚ_4,32.4a) tvaṃ hi manyo abhibhūtyojāḥ svayaṃbhūr bhāmo abhimātiṣāhaḥ /
analyzed: tvam hi manyo abhibhūti ojāḥ svayaṃbhūḥ bhāmaḥ abhimātiṣāhaḥ

original: (AVŚ_4,32.4c) viśvacarṣaṇiḥ sahuriḥ sahīyān asmāsv ojaḥ pṛtanāsu dhehi //4//
analyzed: viśvacarṣaṇiḥ sahuriḥ sahīyān asmāsu ojaḥ pṛtanāsu dhehi

original: (AVŚ_4,32.5a) abhāgaḥ sann apa pareto asmi tava kratvā taviṣasya pracetaḥ /
analyzed: a bhāgaḥ san apa paretaḥ asmi tava kratvā taviṣasya pracetaḥ

original: (AVŚ_4,32.5c) taṃ tvā manyo akratur jihīḍāhaṃ svā tanūr baladāvā na ehi //5//
analyzed: tam tvā manyo akratuḥ jihīḍa aham svā tanūḥ bala dāvā naḥ ehi

original: (AVŚ_4,32.6a) ayaṃ te asmy upa na ehy arvāṅ pratīcīnaḥ sahure viśvadāvan /
analyzed: ayam te asmi upa naḥ ehi arvāṅ pratīcīnaḥ sahure viśva dāvan

original: (AVŚ_4,32.6c) manyo vajrinn abhi na ā vavṛtsva hanāva dasyūṃr uta bodhy āpeḥ //6//
analyzed: manyo vajrin abhi naḥ ā vavṛtsva hanāva dasyūṃr uta bodhi āpeḥ

original: (AVŚ_4,32.7a) abhi prehi dakṣiṇato bhavā no 'dhā vṛtrāṇi jaṅghanāva bhūri /
analyzed: abhi prehi dakṣiṇatas bhava naḥ dhāḥ vṛtrāṇi jaṅghanāva bhūri

original: (AVŚ_4,32.7c) juhomi te dharuṇaṃ madhvo agram ubhāv upāṃśu prathamā pibāva //7//
analyzed: juhomi te dharuṇam madhvaḥ agram ubhau upāṃśu prathamā pibāva

original: (AVŚ_4,33.1a) apa naḥ śośucad agham agne śuśugdhy ā rayim /
analyzed: apa naḥ śośucat agham agne śuśugdhi ā rayim

original: (AVŚ_4,33.1c) apa naḥ śośucad agham //1//
analyzed: apa naḥ śośucat agham

original: (AVŚ_4,33.2a) sukṣetriyā sugātuyā vasūyā ca yajāmahe /
analyzed: sukṣetriyā sugātuyā vasūyā ca yajāmahe

original: (AVŚ_4,33.2c) apa naḥ śośucad agham //2//
analyzed: apa naḥ śośucat agham

original: (AVŚ_4,33.3a) pra yad bhandiṣṭha eṣāṃ prāsmākāsaś ca sūrayaḥ /
analyzed: pra yat bhandiṣṭhaḥ eṣām pra asmākāsaḥ ca sūrayaḥ

original: (AVŚ_4,33.3c) apa naḥ śośucad agham //3//
analyzed: apa naḥ śośucat agham

original: (AVŚ_4,33.4a) pra yat te agne sūrayo jāyemahi pra te vayam /
analyzed: pra yat te agne sūrayaḥ jāyemahi pra te vayam

original: (AVŚ_4,33.4c) apa naḥ śośucad agham //4//
analyzed: apa naḥ śośucat agham

original: (AVŚ_4,33.5a) pra yad agneḥ sahasvato viśvato yanti bhānavaḥ /
analyzed: pra yat agneḥ sahasvataḥ viśvatas yanti bhānavaḥ

original: (AVŚ_4,33.5c) apa naḥ śośucad agham //5//
analyzed: apa naḥ śośucat agham

original: (AVŚ_4,33.6a) tvaṃ hi viśvatomukha viśvataḥ paribhūr asi /
analyzed: tvam hi viśvatomukha viśvatas paribhūḥ asi

original: (AVŚ_4,33.6c) apa naḥ śośucad agham //6//
analyzed: apa naḥ śośucat agham

original: (AVŚ_4,33.7a) dviṣo no viśvatomukhāti nāveva pāraya /
analyzed: dviṣaḥ naḥ viśvatomukha ati nāvā iva pāraya

original: (AVŚ_4,33.7c) apa naḥ śośucad agham //7//
analyzed: apa naḥ śośucat agham

original: (AVŚ_4,33.8a) sa naḥ sindhum iva nāvāti parṣa svastaye /
analyzed: sa naḥ sindhum iva nāvāti parṣa svastaye

original: (AVŚ_4,33.8c) apa naḥ śośucad agham //8//
analyzed: apa naḥ śośucat agham

original: (AVŚ_4,34.1a) brahmāsya śīrṣaṃ bṛhad asya pṛṣṭhaṃ vāmadevyam udaram odanasya /
analyzed: brahma asya śīrṣam bṛhat asya pṛṣṭham vāmadevyam udaram odanasya

original: (AVŚ_4,34.1c) chandāṃsi pakṣau mukham asya satyaṃ viṣṭārī jātas tapaso'dhi yajñaḥ //1//
analyzed: chandāṃsi pakṣau mukham asya satyam viṣṭārī jātaḥ tapasā ūdhi yajñaḥ

original: (AVŚ_4,34.2a) anasthāḥ pūtāḥ pavanena śuddhāḥ śucayaḥ śucim api yanti lokam /
analyzed: anasthāḥ pūtāḥ pavanena śuddhāḥ śucayaḥ śucim api yanti lokam

original: (AVŚ_4,34.2c) naiṣāṃ śiśnaṃ pra dahati jātavedāḥ svarge loke bahu straiṇam eṣām //2//
analyzed: na eṣām śiśnam pra dahati jātavedāḥ svarge loke bahu straiṇam eṣām

original: (AVŚ_4,34.3a) viṣṭāriṇam odanaṃ ye pacanti nainān avartiḥ sacate kadā cana /
analyzed: viṣṭāriṇam odanam ye pacanti na enān avartiḥ sacate kadā cana

original: (AVŚ_4,34.3c) āste yama upa yāti devānt saṃ gandharvair madate somyebhiḥ //3//
analyzed: āste yamaḥ upa yāti devān sam gandharvaiḥ madate somyebhiḥ

original: (AVŚ_4,34.4a) viṣṭāriṇam odanam ye pacanti nainān yamaḥ pari muṣṇāti retaḥ /
analyzed: viṣṭāriṇam odanam ye pacanti na enān yamaḥ pari muṣṇāti retaḥ

original: (AVŚ_4,34.4c) rathī ha bhūtvā rathayāna īyate pakṣī ha bhūtvāti divaḥ sam eti //4//
analyzed: rathī ha bhūtvā rathayānaḥ īyate pakṣī ha bhūtvā ati divaḥ sam eti

original: (AVŚ_4,34.5a) eṣa yajñānāṃ vitato vahiṣṭho viṣṭāriṇaṃ paktvā divam ā viveśa /
analyzed: eṣa yajñānām vitataḥ vahiṣṭhaḥ viṣṭāriṇam paktvā divam ā viveśa

original: (AVŚ_4,34.5c) āṇḍīkaṃ kumudaṃ saṃ tanoti bisaṃ śālūkaṃ śaphako mulālī /
analyzed: āṇḍīkam kumudam sam tanoti bisam śālūkam śaphakaḥ mulālī

original: (AVŚ_4,34.5e) etās tvā dhārā upa yantu sarvāḥ svarge loke madhumat pinvamānā upa tvā tiṣṭhantu puṣkariṇīḥ samantāḥ //5//
analyzed: etāḥ tvā dhārāḥ upa yantu sarvāḥ svarge loke madhumat pinvamānāḥ upa tvā tiṣṭhantu puṣkariṇīḥ samantāḥ

original: (AVŚ_4,34.6a) ghṛtahradā madhukūlāḥ surodakāḥ kṣīreṇa pūrṇā udakena dadhnā /
analyzed: ghṛta hradāḥ madhu kūlāḥ surā udakāḥ kṣīreṇa pūrṇāḥ udakena dadhnā

original: (AVŚ_4,34.6c) etās tvā dhārā upa yantu sarvāḥ svarge loke madhumat pinvamānā upa tvā tiṣṭhantu puṣkariṇīḥ samantāḥ //6//
analyzed: etāḥ tvā dhārāḥ upa yantu sarvāḥ svarge loke madhumat pinvamānāḥ upa tvā tiṣṭhantu puṣkariṇīḥ samantāḥ

original: (AVŚ_4,34.7a) caturaḥ kumbhāṃś caturdhā dadāmi kṣīreṇa pūrnāṃ udakena dadhnā /
analyzed: caturaḥ kumbhān caturdhā dadāmi kṣīreṇa udakena dadhnā

original: (AVŚ_4,34.7c) etās tvā dhārā upa yantu sarvāḥ svarge loke madhumat pinvamānā upa tvā tiṣṭhantu puṣkariṇīḥ samantāḥ //7//
analyzed: etāḥ tvā dhārāḥ upa yantu sarvāḥ svarge loke madhumat pinvamānāḥ upa tvā tiṣṭhantu puṣkariṇīḥ samantāḥ

original: (AVŚ_4,34.8a) imam odanaṃ ni dadhe brāhmaṇeṣu viṣṭāriṇaṃ lokajitaṃ svargam /
analyzed: imam odanam ni dadhe brāhmaṇeṣu viṣṭāriṇam loka jitam svargam

original: (AVŚ_4,34.8c) sa me mā kṣeṣṭa svadhayā pinvamāno viśvarūpā dhenuḥ kāmadughā me astu //8//
analyzed: sa me mā kṣeṣṭa svadhayā pinvamānaḥ viśva rūpā dhenuḥ kāmadughā me astu

original: (AVŚ_4,35.1a) yam odanaṃ prathamajā ṛtasya prajāpatis tapasā brahmaṇe 'pacat /
analyzed: yam odanam prathama jāḥ ṛtasya prajāpatiḥ tapasā brahmaṇe pacat

original: (AVŚ_4,35.1c) yo lokānāṃ vidhṛtir nābhireṣāt tenaudanenāti tarāṇi mṛtyum //1//
analyzed: yaḥ lokānām vidhṛtiḥ na abhireṣāt tena odanena ati tarāṇi mṛtyum

original: (AVŚ_4,35.2a) yenātaran bhūtakṛto 'ti mṛtyuṃ yam anvavindan tapasā śrameṇa /
analyzed: yena ataran bhūta kṛtaḥ u ti mṛtyum yam anvavindan tapasā śrameṇa

original: (AVŚ_4,35.2c) yaṃ papāca brahmaṇe brahma pūrvaṃ tenaudanenāti tarāṇi mṛtyum //2//

original: (AVŚ_4,35.3a) yo dādhāra pṛthivīṃ viśvabhojasaṃ yo antarikṣam āpṛṇād rasena /
analyzed: yaḥ dādhāra pṛthivīm viśva bhojasam yaḥ antarikṣam āpṛṇāt rasena

original: (AVŚ_4,35.3c) yo astabhnād divam ūrdhvo mahimnā tenaudanenāti tarāṇi mṛtyum //3//
analyzed: yaḥ astabhnāt divam ūrdhvaḥ mahimnā tena odanena ati tarāṇi mṛtyum

original: (AVŚ_4,35.4a) yasmān māsā nirmitās triṃśadarāḥ saṃvatsaro yasmān nirmito dvādaśāraḥ /
analyzed: yasmāt māsāḥ nirmitāḥ triṃśat arāḥ saṃvatsaraḥ yasmāt nirmitaḥ dvādaśa araḥ

original: (AVŚ_4,35.4c) ahorātrā yaṃ pariyanto nāpus tenaudanenāti tarāṇi mṛtyum //4//
analyzed: ahar rātrāḥ yam pariyantaḥ na āpuḥ tena odanena ati tarāṇi mṛtyum

analyzed: yaḥ prāṇa daḥ babhūva yasmai lokāḥ ghṛtavantaḥ kṣaranti

original: (AVŚ_4,35.5c) jyotiṣmatīḥ pradiśo yasya sarvās tenaudanenāti tarāṇi mṛtyum //5//
analyzed: jyotiṣmatīḥ pradiśaḥ yasya sarvāḥ tena odanena ati tarāṇi mṛtyum

original: (AVŚ_4,35.6a) yasmāt pakvād amṛtaṃ saṃbabhūva yo gāyatryā adhipatir babhūva /
analyzed: yasmāt pakvāt amṛtam saṃbabhūva yaḥ gāyatryāḥ adhipatiḥ babhūva

original: (AVŚ_4,35.6c) yasmin vedā nihitā viśvarūpās tenaudanenāti tarāṇi mṛtyum //6//
analyzed: yasmin vedāḥ nihitāḥ viśva rūpāḥ tena odanena ati tarāṇi mṛtyum

original: (AVŚ_4,35.7a) ava bādhe dviṣantaṃ devapīyuṃ sapatnā ye me 'pa te bhavantu /
analyzed: ava bādhe dviṣantam deva pīyum sapatnāḥ ye me pa te bhavantu

original: (AVŚ_4,35.7c) brahmaudanaṃ viśvajitaṃ pacāmi śṛṇvantu me śraddadhānasya devāḥ //7//

original: (AVŚ_4,36.1a) tānt satyaujāḥ pra dahatv agnir vaiśvānaro vṛṣā /
analyzed: tān satya ojāḥ pra dahatu agniḥ vaiśvānaraḥ vṛṣā

original: (AVŚ_4,36.1c) yo no durasyād dipsāc cātho yo no arātiyāt //1//
analyzed: yaḥ naḥ durasyāt dipsāt ca atha u yaḥ naḥ arātiyāt

original: (AVŚ_4,36.2a) yo no dipsād adipsato dipsato yaś ca dipsati /
analyzed: yaḥ naḥ dipsāt a dipsataḥ dipsataḥ yaḥ ca dipsati

original: (AVŚ_4,36.2c) vaiśvānarasya daṃṣṭrayor agner api dadhāmi tam //2//
analyzed: vaiśvānarasya daṃṣṭrayoḥ agneḥ api dadhāmi tam

original: (AVŚ_4,36.3a) ya āgare mṛgayante pratikrośe 'māvāsye /
analyzed: ye āgare mṛgayante pratikrośe māvāsye

original: (AVŚ_4,36.3c) kravyādo anyān dipsataḥ sarvāṃs tānt sahasā sahe //3//
analyzed: kravya adaḥ anyān dipsataḥ sarvān tān sahasā sahe

original: (AVŚ_4,36.4a) sahe piśācānt sahasaiṣāṃ draviṇaṃ dade /
analyzed: sahe piśācān sahasā eṣām draviṇam dade

original: (AVŚ_4,36.4c) sarvān durasyato hanmi saṃ ma ākūtir ṛdhyatām //4//
analyzed: sarvān durasyataḥ hanmi sam me ākūtiḥ ṛdhyatām

original: (AVŚ_4,36.5a) ye devās tena hāsante sūryeṇa mimate javam /
analyzed: ye devāḥ tena ha āsante sūryeṇa mimate javam

original: (AVŚ_4,36.5c) nadīṣu parvateṣu ye saṃ taiḥ paśubhir vide //5//
analyzed: nadīṣu parvateṣu ye sam taiḥ paśubhiḥ vide

original: (AVŚ_4,36.6a) tapano asmi piśācānāṃ vyāghro gomatām iva /
analyzed: tapanaḥ asmi piśācānām vyāghraḥ gomatām iva

original: (AVŚ_4,36.6c) śvānaḥ siṃham iva dṛṣṭvā te na vindante nyañcanam //6//
analyzed: śvānaḥ siṃham iva dṛṣṭvā te na vindante nyañcanam

original: (AVŚ_4,36.7a) na piśācaiḥ saṃ śaknomi na stenaiḥ na vanargubhiḥ /
analyzed: na piśācaiḥ sam śaknomi na stenaiḥ na vanargubhiḥ

original: (AVŚ_4,36.7c) piśācās tasmān naśyanti yam ahaṃ grāmam āviśe //7//
analyzed: piśācāḥ tasmāt naśyanti yam aham grāmam āviśe

original: (AVŚ_4,36.8a) yaṃ grāmam āviśata idam ugraṃ saho mama /
analyzed: yam grāmam āviśataḥ idam ugram sahaḥ mama

original: (AVŚ_4,36.8c) piśācās tasmān naśyanti na pāpam upa jānate //8//
analyzed: piśācāḥ tasmāt naśyanti na pāpam upa jānate

original: (AVŚ_4,36.9a) ye mā krodhayanti lapitā hastinaṃ maśakā iva /
analyzed: ye mā krodhayanti lapitāḥ hastinam maśakāḥ iva

original: (AVŚ_4,36.9c) tān ahaṃ manye durhitān jane alpaśayūn iva //9//
analyzed: tān aham manye durhitān jane alpa śayūn iva

original: (AVŚ_4,36.10a) abhi taṃ nirṛtir dhattām aśvam iva aśvābhidhānyā /
analyzed: abhi tam nirṛtiḥ dhattām aśvam iva aśva abhidhānyā

original: (AVŚ_4,36.10c) malvo yo mahyaṃ krudhyati sa u pāśān na mucyate //10//
analyzed: malvaḥ yaḥ mahyam krudhyati saḥ u pāśāt na mucyate

original: (AVŚ_4,37.1a) tvayā pūrvam atharvāṇo jaghnū rakṣāṃsy oṣadhe /
analyzed: tvayā pūrvam atharvāṇaḥ jaghnuḥ rakṣāṃsi oṣadhe

original: (AVŚ_4,37.1c) tvayā jaghāna kaśyapas tvayā kaṇvo agastyaḥ //1//
analyzed: tvayā jaghāna kaśyapaḥ tvayā kaṇvaḥ agastyaḥ

original: (AVŚ_4,37.2a) tvayā vayam apsaraso gandharvāṃs cātayāmahe /
analyzed: tvayā vayam apsarasaḥ gandharvān cātayāmahe

original: (AVŚ_4,37.2c) ajaśṛṅgy aja rakṣaḥ sarvān gandhena nāśaya //2//
analyzed: ajaśṛṅgi aja rakṣaḥ sarvān gandhena nāśaya

original: (AVŚ_4,37.3a) nadīṃ yantv apsaraso 'pāṃ tāram avaśvasam /
analyzed: nadīm yantu apsarasaḥ pām tāram avaśvasam

original: (AVŚ_4,37.3c) gulgulūḥ pīlā nalady aukṣagandhiḥ pramandanī /
(AVŚ_4,37.3e) tat paretāpsarasaḥ pratibuddhā abhūtana //3//
analyzed: tat parā ita apsarasaḥ pratibuddhāḥ abhūtana

original: (AVŚ_4,37.4a) yatrāśvatthā nyagrodhā mahāvṛkṣāḥ śikhaṇḍinaḥ /
analyzed: yatra aśvatthāḥ nyagrodhāḥ mahā vṛkṣāḥ śikhaṇḍinaḥ

original: (AVŚ_4,37.4c) tat paretāpsarasaḥ pratibuddhā abhūtana //4//
analyzed: tat parā ita apsarasaḥ pratibuddhāḥ abhūtana

original: (AVŚ_4,37.5a) yatra vaḥ preṅkhā haritā arjunā uta yatrāghātāḥ karkaryaḥ saṃvadanti /
analyzed: yatra vaḥ preṅkhāḥ haritāḥ arjunāḥ uta yatra āghātāḥ karkaryaḥ saṃvadanti

original: (AVŚ_4,37.5c) tat paretāpsarasaḥ pratibuddhā abhūtana //5//
analyzed: tat parā ita apsarasaḥ pratibuddhāḥ abhūtana

original: (AVŚ_4,37.6a) eyam agann oṣadhīnāṃ vīrudhām vīryāvatī /
analyzed: ā iyam agan oṣadhīnām vīrudhām vīryāvatī

original: (AVŚ_4,37.6c) ajaśṛṅgy arāṭakī tīkṣṇaśṛṅgī vyṛṣatu //6//
analyzed: aja śṛṅgī arāṭakī tīkṣṇa śṛṅgī vyṛṣatu

original: (AVŚ_4,37.7a) ānṛtyataḥ śikhaṇḍino gandharvasyāpsarāpateḥ /

analyzed: tābhiḥ haviḥ adān gandharvān avaka ādān vyṛṣatu

analyzed: glahe kṛtāni gṛhṇānām apsarām tām iha huve

original: (AVŚ_4,38.5a) sūryasya raśmīn anu yāḥ sañcaranti marīcīr vā yā anusañcaranti /
