original: (AVŚ_4,39.4e) āyuḥ prathamaṃ prajāṃ poṣaṃ rayiṃ svāhā //4//
analyzed: āyuḥ prathamam prajām poṣam rayim svāhā

original: (AVŚ_4,39.6e) āyuḥ prathamaṃ prajāṃ poṣaṃ rayiṃ svāhā //6//

analyzed: a vyanat ca vyanat ca sasni sam te navanta prabhṛtāḥ madeṣu

analyzed: svadoḥ svādīyaḥ svādunā sṛja sam adaḥ su madhu madhunā abhi yodhīḥ

analyzed: yadi cit nu tvā dhanā jayantam raṇeraṇe anumadanti viprāḥ

original: (AVŚ_5,2.4c) ojīyaḥ śuṣmint sthiram ā tanuṣva mā tvā dabhan durevāsaḥ kaśokāḥ //4//
analyzed: ojīyaḥ śuṣmin sthiram ā tanuṣva mā tvā dabhan durevāsaḥ kaśokāḥ

original: (AVŚ_5,2.5a) tvayā vayaṃ śāśadmahe raṇeṣu prapaśyanto yudhenyāni bhūri /
analyzed: tvayā vayam śāśadmahe raṇeṣu prapaśyantaḥ yudhenyāni bhūri

original: (AVŚ_5,2.5c) codayāmi ta āyudhā vacobhiḥ saṃ te śiśāmi brahmaṇā vayāṃsi //5//
analyzed: codayāmi te āyudhā vacobhiḥ sam te śiśāmi brahmaṇā vayāṃsi

original: (AVŚ_5,2.6a) ni tad dadhiṣe 'vare pare ca yasminn āvithāvasā duroṇe /
analyzed: ni tat dadhiṣe vare pare ca yasmin āvitha avasā duroṇe

original: (AVŚ_5,2.6c) ā sthāpayata mātaraṃ jigatnum ata invata karvarāṇi bhūri //6//
analyzed: ā sthāpayata mātaram jigatnum atas invata karvarāṇi bhūri

original: (AVŚ_5,2.7a) stuṣva varṣman puruvartmānaṃ sam ṛbhvāṇam inatamam āptam āptyānām /
analyzed: stuṣva varṣman puru vartmānam sam ṛbhvāṇam inatamam āptam āptyānām

original: (AVŚ_5,2.7c) ā darśati śavasā bhūryojāḥ pra sakṣati pratimānaṃ pṛthivyāḥ //7//
analyzed: ā darśati śavasā bhūri ojāḥ pra sakṣati pratimānam pṛthivyāḥ

original: (AVŚ_5,2.8a) imā brahma bṛhaddivaḥ kṛṇavad indrāya śūṣam agriyaḥ svarṣāḥ /
analyzed: imā brahma bṛhaddivaḥ kṛṇavat indrāya śūṣam agriyaḥ svarṣāḥ

original: (AVŚ_5,2.8c) maho gotrasya kṣayati svarājā turaś cid viśvam arṇavat tapasvān //8//
analyzed: mahaḥ gotrasya kṣayati sva rājā turaḥ cit viśvam arṇavat tapasvān

original: (AVŚ_5,2.9a) evā mahān bṛhaddivo atharvāvocat svāṃ tanvam indram eva /
analyzed: eva mahān bṛhaddivaḥ atharvā avocat svām tanvam indram eva

original: (AVŚ_5,2.9c) svasārau mātaribhvarī aripre hinvanti caine śavasā vardhayanti ca //9//
analyzed: svasārau mātaribhvarī aripre hinvanti ca ene śavasā vardhayanti ca

original: (AVŚ_5,3.1a) mamāgne varco vihaveṣv astu vayaṃ tvendhānās tanvam puṣema /
analyzed: mama agne varcaḥ vihaveṣu astu vayam tvā indhānāḥ tanvam puṣema

original: (AVŚ_5,3.1c) mahyaṃ namantāṃ pradiśaś catasras tvayādhyakṣeṇa pṛtanā jayema //1//
analyzed: mahyam namantām pradiśaḥ catasraḥ tvayā adhyakṣeṇa pṛtanāḥ jayema

original: (AVŚ_5,3.2a) agne manyuṃ pratinudan pareṣāṃ tvaṃ no gopāḥ pari pāhi viśvataḥ /
analyzed: agne manyum pratinudan pareṣām tvam naḥ gopāḥ pari pāhi viśvatas

original: (AVŚ_5,3.2c) apāñco yantu nivatā durasyavo 'maiṣāṃ cittaṃ prabudhāṃ vi neśat //2//
analyzed: apāñcaḥ yantu nivatā durasyavaḥ mā eṣām cittam prabudhām vi neśat

original: (AVŚ_5,3.3a) mama devā vihave santu sarva indravanto maruto viṣṇur agniḥ /
analyzed: mama devāḥ vihave santu sarve indravantaḥ marutaḥ viṣṇuḥ agniḥ

original: (AVŚ_5,3.3c) mamāntarikṣam urulokam astu mahyaṃ vātaḥ pavatāṃ kāmāyāsmai //3//
analyzed: mama antarikṣam uru lokam astu mahyam vātaḥ pavatām kāmāya asmai

original: (AVŚ_5,3.4a) mahyaṃ yajantāṃ mama yānīṣṭākūtiḥ satyā manaso me astu /
analyzed: mahyam yajantām mama yāni iṣṭā ākūtiḥ satyā manasaḥ me astu

original: (AVŚ_5,3.4c) eno mā ni gāṃ katamac canāhaṃ viśve devā abhi rakṣantu meha //4//
analyzed: enaḥ mā ni gām katamat cana aham viśve devāḥ abhi rakṣantu mā iha

original: (AVŚ_5,3.5a) mayi devā draviṇam ā yajantāṃ mayi āśīr astu mayi devahūtiḥ /
analyzed: mayi devāḥ draviṇam ā yajantām mayi āśīḥ astu mayi deva hūtiḥ

original: (AVŚ_5,3.5c) daivāḥ hotāraḥ saniṣan na etad ariṣṭāḥ syāma tanvā suvīrāḥ //5//
analyzed: daivāḥ hotāraḥ saniṣan naḥ etat ariṣṭāḥ syāma tanvā su vīrāḥ

original: (AVŚ_5,3.6a) daivīḥ ṣaḍ urvīr uru naḥ kṛṇota viśve devāsa iha mādayadhvam /
analyzed: daivīḥ ṣaḍ urvīḥ uru naḥ kṛṇota viśve devāsaḥ iha mādayadhvam

original: (AVŚ_5,3.6c) mā no vidad abhibhā mo aśastir mā no vidad vṛjinā dveṣyā yā //6//
analyzed: mā naḥ vidat abhibhā mā u aśastiḥ mā naḥ vidat vṛjinā dveṣyā yā

original: (AVŚ_5,3.7a) tisro devīr mahi naḥ śarma yachata prajāyai nas tanve yac ca puṣṭam /
analyzed: tisraḥ devīḥ mahi naḥ śarma yacchata prajāyai naḥ tanve yat ca puṣṭam

original: (AVŚ_5,3.7c) mā hāsmahi prajayā mā tanūbhir mā radhāma dviṣate soma rājan //7//
analyzed: mā hāsmahi prajayā mā tanūbhiḥ mā radhāma dviṣate soma rājan

original: (AVŚ_5,3.8a) uruvyacā no mahiṣaḥ śarma yachatv asmin have puruhūtaḥ purukṣu /
analyzed: uru vyacāḥ naḥ mahiṣaḥ śarma yacchatu asmin have puru hūtaḥ purukṣu

original: (AVŚ_5,3.8c) sa naḥ prajāyai haryaśva mṛḍendra mā no rīriṣo mā parā dāḥ //8//
analyzed: sa naḥ prajāyai hari aśva mṛḍa indra mā naḥ rīriṣaḥ mā parā dāḥ

original: (AVŚ_5,3.9a) dhātā vidhātā bhuvanasya yas patir devaḥ savitābhimātiṣāhaḥ /
analyzed: dhātā vidhātā bhuvanasya yaḥ patiḥ devaḥ savitā abhimātiṣāhaḥ

original: (AVŚ_5,3.9c) ādityā rudrā aśvinobhā devāḥ pāntu yajamānaṃ nirṛthāt //9//
analyzed: ādityāḥ rudrāḥ aśvinā ubhā devāḥ pāntu yajamānam nirṛthāt

original: (AVŚ_5,3.10a) ye naḥ sapatnā apa te bhavantv indrāgnibhyām ava bādhāmaha enān /
analyzed: ye naḥ sapatnāḥ apa te bhavantu indra agnibhyām ava bādhāmahe enān

original: (AVŚ_5,3.10c) ādityā rudrā uparispṛśo no ugraṃ cettāram adhirājam akrata //10//
analyzed: ādityāḥ rudrāḥ uparispṛśaḥ naḥ ugram cettāram adhirājam akrata

original: (AVŚ_5,3.11a) arvāñcam indram amuto havāmahe yo gojid dhanajid aśvajid yaḥ /
analyzed: arvāñcam indram amutas havāmahe yaḥ go jit dhana jit aśva jit yaḥ

original: (AVŚ_5,3.11c) imaṃ no yajñaṃ vihave śṛṇotv asmākam abhūr haryaśva medī //11//
analyzed: imam naḥ yajñam vihave śṛṇotu asmākam abhūḥ hari aśva medī

original: (AVŚ_5,4.1a) yo giriṣv ajāyathā vīrudhāṃ balavattamaḥ /
analyzed: yaḥ giriṣu ajāyathāḥ vīrudhām balavattamaḥ

original: (AVŚ_5,4.1c) kuṣṭhehi takmanāśana takmānaṃ nāśayann itaḥ //1//
analyzed: kuṣṭhehi takma nāśana takmānam nāśayan itas

original: (AVŚ_5,4.2a) suparṇasuvane girau jātaṃ himavatas pari /
analyzed: suparṇa suvane girau jātam himavataḥ pari

original: (AVŚ_5,4.2c) dhanair abhi śrutvā yanti vidur hi takmanāśanam //2//
analyzed: dhanaiḥ abhi śrutvā yanti viduḥ hi takma nāśanam

original: (AVŚ_5,4.3a) aśvattho devasadanas tṛtīyasyām ito divi /
analyzed: aśvatthaḥ deva sadanaḥ tṛtīyasyām itas divi

original: (AVŚ_5,4.3c) tatrāmṛtasya cakṣaṇaṃ devāḥ kuṣṭham avanvata //3//
analyzed: tatra amṛtasya cakṣaṇam devāḥ kuṣṭham avanvata

original: (AVŚ_5,4.4a) hiraṇyayī naur acarad dhiraṇyabandhanā divi /
analyzed: hiraṇyayī nauḥ acarat hiraṇya bandhanā divi

original: (AVŚ_5,4.4c) tatrāmṛtasya puṣpaṃ devāḥ kuṣṭham avanvata //4//
analyzed: tatra amṛtasya puṣpam devāḥ kuṣṭham avanvata

original: (AVŚ_5,4.5a) hiraṇyayāḥ panthāna āsann aritrāṇi hiraṇyayā /
analyzed: hiraṇyayāḥ panthānaḥ āsan aritrāṇi hiraṇyayā

original: (AVŚ_5,4.5c) nāvo hiraṇyayīr āsan yābhiḥ kuṣṭhaṃ nirāvahan //5//
analyzed: nāvaḥ hiraṇyayīḥ āsan yābhiḥ kuṣṭham nirāvahan

original: (AVŚ_5,4.6a) imaṃ me kuṣṭha pūruṣaṃ tam ā vaha taṃ niṣ kuru /
analyzed: imam me kuṣṭha pūruṣam tam ā vaha tam niḥ kuru

original: (AVŚ_5,4.6c) tam u me agadaṃ kṛdhi //6//
analyzed: tam u me agadam kṛdhi

original: (AVŚ_5,4.7a) devebhyo adhi jāto 'si somasyāsi sakhā hitaḥ /
analyzed: devebhyaḥ adhi jātaḥ si somasya asi sakhā hitaḥ

original: (AVŚ_5,4.7c) sa prāṇāya vyānāya cakṣuṣe me asmai mṛḍa //7//
analyzed: sa prāṇāya vyānāya cakṣuṣe me asmai mṛḍa

original: (AVŚ_5,4.8a) udaṅ jāto himavataḥ sa prācyāṃ nīyase janam /
analyzed: udaṅ jātaḥ himavataḥ sa prācyām nīyase janam

original: (AVŚ_5,4.8c) tatra kuṣṭhasya nāmāny uttamāni vi bhejire //8//
analyzed: tatra kuṣṭhasya nāmāni uttamāni vi bhejire

original: (AVŚ_5,4.9a) uttamo nāma kuṣṭhasy uttamo nāma te pitā /
analyzed: uttamaḥ nāma kuṣṭhasi uttamaḥ nāma te pitā

original: (AVŚ_5,4.9c) yakṣmaṃ ca sarvaṃ nāśaya takmānaṃ cārasaṃ kṛdhi //9//

analyzed: śīrṣa āmayam upahatyām akṣyoḥ tanvaḥ rapaḥ

original: (AVŚ_5,4.10c) kuṣṭhas tat sarvaṃ niṣ karad daivaṃ samaha vṛṣṇyam //10//

original: (AVŚ_5,5.1a) rātrī mātā nabhaḥ pitāryamā te pitāmahaḥ /
analyzed: rātrī mātā nabhaḥ pitā aryamā te pitāmahaḥ

original: (AVŚ_5,5.1c) silācī nāma vā asi sā devānām asi svasā //1//

original: (AVŚ_5,5.2a) yas tvā pibati jīvati trāyase puruṣaṃ tvam /
analyzed: yaḥ tvā pibati jīvati trāyase puruṣam tvam

original: (AVŚ_5,5.2c) bhartrī hi śaśvatām asi janānāṃ ca nyañcanī //2//
analyzed: bhartrī hi śaśvatām asi janānām ca nyañcanī

original: (AVŚ_5,5.3a) vṛkṣaṃvṛkṣam ā rohasi vṛṣaṇyantīva kanyalā /
analyzed: vṛkṣam vṛkṣam ā rohasi vṛṣaṇyantī iva kanyalā

original: (AVŚ_5,5.3c) jayantī pratyātiṣṭhantī sparaṇī nāma vā asi //3//

original: (AVŚ_5,5.4a) yad daṇḍena yad iṣvā yad vārur harasā kṛtam /
analyzed: yat daṇḍena yat iṣvā yat vā aruḥ harasā kṛtam

original: (AVŚ_5,5.4c) tasya tvam asi niṣkṛtiḥ semaṃ niṣ kṛdhi pūruṣam //4//
analyzed: tasya tvam asi niṣkṛtiḥ sā imam niḥ kṛdhi pūruṣam

analyzed: bhadrāt plakṣāt niḥ tiṣṭhasi aśvatthāt khadirāt dhavāt

original: (AVŚ_5,5.5c) bhadrān nyagrodhāt parṇāt sā na ehy arundhati //5//
analyzed: bhadrāt nyagrodhāt parṇāt sā naḥ ehi arundhati

original: (AVŚ_5,5.6a) hiraṇyavarṇe subhage sūryavarṇe vapuṣṭame /
analyzed: hiraṇya varṇe subhage sūrya varṇe vapuṣṭame

original: (AVŚ_5,5.6c) rutaṃ gachāsi niṣkṛte niṣkṛtir nāma vā asi //6//

analyzed: hiraṇya varṇe subhage śuṣme lomaśa vakṣane

original: (AVŚ_5,5.7c) apām asi svasā lākṣe vāto hātmā babhūva te //7//
analyzed: apām asi svasā lākṣe vātaḥ ha ātmā babhūva te

original: (AVŚ_5,5.8a) silācī nāma kānīno 'jababhru pitā tava /
analyzed: silācī nāma kānīnaḥ jababhru pitā tava

original: (AVŚ_5,5.8c) aśvo yamasya yaḥ śyāvas tasya hāsnāsy ukṣitā //8//
analyzed: aśvaḥ yamasya yaḥ śyāvaḥ tasya hāsnā asi ukṣitā

original: (AVŚ_5,5.9a) aśvasyāsnaḥ saṃpatitā sā vṛkṣāṃ abhi siṣyade /
analyzed: aśvasya asnaḥ saṃpatitā sā abhi siṣyade

original: (AVŚ_5,5.9c) sarā patatriṇī bhūtvā sā na ehy arundhati //9//
analyzed: sarā patatriṇī bhūtvā sā naḥ ehi arundhati

analyzed: brahma jajñānam prathamam purastāt vi sīmataḥ su rucaḥ venaḥ āvaḥ

original: (AVŚ_5,6.1c) sa budhnyā upamā asya viṣṭhāḥ sataś ca yonim asataś ca vi vaḥ //1//
analyzed: sa budhnyāḥ upamāḥ asya viṣṭhāḥ sataḥ ca yonim asataḥ ca vi var

original: (AVŚ_5,6.2a) anāptā ye vaḥ prathamā yāni karmāṇi cakrire /
analyzed: an āptāḥ ye vaḥ prathamā yāni karmāṇi cakrire

original: (AVŚ_5,6.2c) vīrān no atra mā dabhan tad va etat puro dadhe //2//
analyzed: vīrān naḥ atra mā dabhan tat vaḥ etat puras dadhe

original: (AVŚ_5,6.3a) sahasradhāra eva te sam asvaran divo nāke madhujihvā asaścataḥ /
analyzed: sahasra dhāre eva te sam asvaran divaḥ nāke madhu jihvāḥ asaścataḥ

original: (AVŚ_5,6.4a) pary ū ṣu pra dhanvā vājasātaye pari vṛtrāṇi sakṣaṇiḥ /
analyzed: pari u su pra dhanva vāja sātaye pari vṛtrāṇi sakṣaṇiḥ

original: (AVŚ_5,6.4c) dviṣas tad adhy arṇaveneyase sanisraso nāmāsi trayodaśo māsa indrasya gṛhaḥ //4//
analyzed: dviṣaḥ tat adhi arṇavena īyase sanisrasaḥ nāma asi trayodaśaḥ māsaḥ indrasya gṛhaḥ

original: (AVŚ_5,6.5a) nv etenārātsīr asau svāhā /
analyzed: nu etena arātsīḥ asau svāhā

original: (AVŚ_5,6.5c) tigmāyudhau tigmahetī suśevau somārudrāv iha su mṛḍataṃ naḥ //5//
analyzed: tigma āyudhau tigma hetī su śevau somārudrau iha su mṛḍatam naḥ

original: (AVŚ_5,6.6a) avaitenārātsīr asau svāhā /
analyzed: ava etena arātsīḥ asau svāhā

original: (AVŚ_5,6.6c) tigmāyudhau tigmahetī suśevau somārudrāv iha su mṛḍataṃ naḥ //6//
analyzed: tigma āyudhau tigma hetī su śevau somārudrau iha su mṛḍatam naḥ

original: (AVŚ_5,6.7a) apaitenārātsīr asau svāhā /
analyzed: apa etena arātsīḥ asau svāhā

original: (AVŚ_5,6.7c) tigmāyudhau tigmahetī suśevau somārudrāv iha su mṛḍataṃ naḥ //7//
analyzed: tigma āyudhau tigma hetī su śevau somārudrau iha su mṛḍatam naḥ

original: (AVŚ_5,6.8a) mumuktam asmān duritād avadyāj juṣethām yajñam amṛtam asmāsu dhattam //8//
analyzed: mumuktam asmān duritāt avadyāt juṣethām yajñam amṛtam asmāsu dhattam

original: (AVŚ_5,6.9a) cakṣuṣo hete manaso hete brahmaṇo hete tapasaś ca hete /
analyzed: cakṣuṣaḥ hete manasaḥ hete brahmaṇaḥ hete tapasaḥ ca hete

original: (AVŚ_5,6.9c) menyā menir asy amenayas te santu ye 'smāṃ abhyaghāyanti //9//
analyzed: menyāḥ meniḥ asi a menayaḥ te santu ye smām abhyaghāyanti

analyzed: yaḥ smān cakṣuṣā manasā citti ākūtyā ca yaḥ aghāyuḥ abhidāsāt

original: (AVŚ_5,6.10c) tvaṃ tān agne menyāmenīn kṛṇu svāhā //10//
analyzed: tvam tān agne menyā a menīn kṛṇu svāhā

original: (AVŚ_5,6.11a) indrasya gṛho 'si /
analyzed: indrasya gṛhaḥ si

original: (AVŚ_5,6.11c) taṃ tvā pra padye taṃ tvā pra viśāmi sarvaguḥ sarvapūruṣaḥ sarvātmā sarvatanūḥ saha yan me 'sti tena //11//
analyzed: tam tvā pra padye tam tvā pra viśāmi sarvaguḥ sarva pūruṣaḥ sarva ātmā sarva tanūḥ saha yat me sti tena

original: (AVŚ_5,6.12a) indrasya śarmāsi /
analyzed: indrasya śarma asi

original: (AVŚ_5,6.12c) taṃ tvā pra padye taṃ tvā pra viśāmi sarvaguḥ sarvapūruṣaḥ sarvātmā sarvatanūḥ saha yan me 'sti tena //12//
analyzed: tam tvā pra padye tam tvā pra viśāmi sarvaguḥ sarva pūruṣaḥ sarva ātmā sarva tanūḥ saha yat me sti tena

original: (AVŚ_5,6.13a) indrasya varmāsi /
analyzed: indrasya varmā asi

original: (AVŚ_5,6.13c) taṃ tvā pra padye taṃ tvā pra viśāmi sarvaguḥ sarvapūruṣaḥ sarvātmā sarvatanūḥ saha yan me 'sti tena //13//
analyzed: tam tvā pra padye tam tvā pra viśāmi sarvaguḥ sarva pūruṣaḥ sarva ātmā sarva tanūḥ saha yat me sti tena

original: (AVŚ_5,6.14a) indrasya varūtham asi /
analyzed: indrasya varūtham asi

original: (AVŚ_5,6.14c) taṃ tvā pra padye taṃ tvā pra viśāmi sarvaguḥ sarvapūruṣaḥ sarvātmā sarvatanūḥ saha yan me 'sti tena //14//
analyzed: tam tvā pra padye tam tvā pra viśāmi sarvaguḥ sarva pūruṣaḥ sarva ātmā sarva tanūḥ saha yat me sti tena

original: (AVŚ_5,7.1a) ā no bhara mā pari ṣṭhā arāte mā no rakṣīr dakṣiṇāṃ nīyamānām /

original: (AVŚ_5,7.5c) śraddhā tam adya vindatu dattā somena babhruṇā //5//
analyzed: śraddhā tam adya vindatu dattā somena babhruṇā

analyzed: yam amī purodadhire brahmāṇam apabhūtaye

analyzed: dive svāhā

analyzed: ā yajate upāke uṣāsānaktā sadatām ni yonau

original: (AVŚ_5,12.6c) divye yoṣaṇe bṛhatī surukme adhi śriyaṃ śukrapiśaṃ dadhāne //6//

original: (AVŚ_5,12.11a) sadyo jāto vy amimīta yajñam agnir devānām abhavat purogāḥ /

original: (AVŚ_5,12.11c) asya hotuḥ praśiṣy ṛtasya vāci svāhākṛtaṃ havir adantu devāḥ //11//

analyzed: āligī ca viligī ca pitā ca matā ca

original: (AVŚ_5,17.7a) ye garbhā avapadyante jagad yac cāpalupyate /
analyzed: ye garbhāḥ avapadyante jagat yat ca apalupyate

original: (AVŚ_5,17.7c) vīrā ye tṛhyante mitho brahmajāyā hinasti tān //7//
analyzed: vīrāḥ ye tṛhyante mithas brahma jāyā hinasti tān

original: (AVŚ_5,17.8a) uta yat patayo daśa striyāḥ pūrve abrāhmaṇāḥ /
analyzed: uta yat patayaḥ daśa striyāḥ pūrve a brāhmaṇāḥ

original: (AVŚ_5,17.8c) brahmā ced dhastam agrahīt sa eva patir ekadhā //8//
analyzed: brahmā ced hastam agrahīt saḥ eva patiḥ ekadhā

original: (AVŚ_5,17.9a) brāhmaṇa eva patir na rājanyo na vaiśyaḥ /
analyzed: brāhmaṇaḥ eva patiḥ na rājanyaḥ na vaiśyaḥ

original: (AVŚ_5,17.9c) tat sūryaḥ prabruvann eti pañcabhyo mānavebhyaḥ //9//
analyzed: tat sūryaḥ prabruvan eti pañcabhyaḥ mānavebhyaḥ

original: (AVŚ_5,17.10a) punar vai devā adaduḥ punar manuṣyā adaduḥ /
analyzed: punar vai devāḥ adaduḥ punar manuṣyāḥ adaduḥ

original: (AVŚ_5,17.10c) rājānaḥ satyaṃ gṛhṇānā brahmajāyāṃ punar daduḥ //10//
analyzed: rājānaḥ satyam gṛhṇānāḥ brahma jāyām punar daduḥ

original: (AVŚ_5,17.11a) punardāya brahmajāyāṃ kṛtvā devair nikilbiṣam /
analyzed: punar dāya brahma jāyām kṛtvā devaiḥ nikilbiṣam

original: (AVŚ_5,17.11c) ūrjaṃ pṛthivyā bhaktvorugāyam upāsate //11//
analyzed: ūrjam pṛthivyāḥ bhaktvā urugāyam upāsate

original: (AVŚ_5,17.12a) nāsya jāyā śatavāhī kalyāṇī talpam ā śaye /
analyzed: na asya jāyā śatavāhī kalyāṇī talpam ā śaye

original: (AVŚ_5,17.12c) yasmin rāṣṭre nirudhyate brahmajāyācittyā //12//
analyzed: yasmin rāṣṭre nirudhyate brahma jāyā acittyā

original: (AVŚ_5,17.13a) na vikarṇaḥ pṛthuśirās tasmin veśmani jāyate /
analyzed: na vikarṇaḥ pṛthu śirāḥ tasmin veśmani jāyate

original: (AVŚ_5,17.13c) yasmin rāṣṭre nirudhyate brahmajāyācittyā //13//
analyzed: yasmin rāṣṭre nirudhyate brahma jāyā acittyā

original: (AVŚ_5,17.14a) nāsya kṣattā niṣkagrīvaḥ sūnānām ety agrataḥ /
analyzed: na asya kṣattā niṣka grīvaḥ sūnānām eti agratas

original: (AVŚ_5,17.14c) yasmin rāṣṭre nirudhyate brahmajāyācittyā //14//
analyzed: yasmin rāṣṭre nirudhyate brahma jāyā acittyā

original: (AVŚ_5,17.15a) nāsya śvetaḥ kṛṣṇakarṇo dhuri yukto mahīyate /
analyzed: na asya śvetaḥ kṛṣṇa karṇaḥ dhuri yuktaḥ mahīyate

original: (AVŚ_5,17.15c) yasmin rāṣṭre nirudhyate brahmajāyācittyā //15//
analyzed: yasmin rāṣṭre nirudhyate brahma jāyā acittyā

original: (AVŚ_5,17.16a) nāsya kṣetre puṣkariṇī nāṇḍīkaṃ jāyate bisam /
analyzed: na asya kṣetre puṣkariṇī na āṇḍīkam jāyate bisam

original: (AVŚ_5,17.16c) yasmin rāṣṭre nirudhyate brahmajāyācittyā //16//
analyzed: yasmin rāṣṭre nirudhyate brahma jāyā acittyā

original: (AVŚ_5,17.17a) nāsmai pṛśniṃ vi duhanti ye 'syā doham upāsate /
analyzed: na asmai pṛśnim vi duhanti ye syāḥ doham upāsate

original: (AVŚ_5,17.17c) yasmin rāṣṭre nirudhyate brahmajāyācittyā //17//
analyzed: yasmin rāṣṭre nirudhyate brahma jāyā acittyā

original: (AVŚ_5,17.18a) nāsya dhenuḥ kalyāṇī nānaḍvānt sahate dhuram /
analyzed: na asya dhenuḥ kalyāṇī na anaḍvān sahate dhuram

original: (AVŚ_5,17.18c) vijānir yatra brahmaṇo rātriṃ vasati pāpayā //18//
analyzed: vijāniḥ yatra brahmaṇaḥ rātrim vasati pāpayā

original: (AVŚ_5,18.1a) naitāṃ te devā adadus tubhyaṃ nṛpate attave /
analyzed: na etām te devāḥ adaduḥ tubhyam nṛpate attave

original: (AVŚ_5,18.1c) mā brāhmaṇasya rājanya gāṃ jighatso anādyām //1//
analyzed: mā brāhmaṇasya rājanya gām jighatsaḥ anādyām

original: (AVŚ_5,18.2a) akṣadrugdho rājanyaḥ pāpa ātmaparājitaḥ /
analyzed: akṣa drugdhaḥ rājanyaḥ pāpaḥ ātma parājitaḥ

original: (AVŚ_5,18.2c) sa brāhmaṇasya gām adyād adya jīvāni mā śvaḥ //2//
analyzed: sa brāhmaṇasya gām adyāt adya jīvāni mā śvas

original: (AVŚ_5,18.3a) āviṣṭitāghaviṣā pṛdākūr iva carmaṇā /
analyzed: āviṣṭitā agha viṣā pṛdākūḥ iva carmaṇā

original: (AVŚ_5,18.3c) sā brāhmaṇasya rājanya tṛṣṭaiṣā gaur anādyā //3//
analyzed: sā brāhmaṇasya rājanya tṛṣṭā eṣā gauḥ anādyā

original: (AVŚ_5,18.4a) nir vai kṣatraṃ nayati hanti varco 'gnir ivārabdho vi dunoti sarvam /
analyzed: niḥ vai kṣatram nayati hanti varcaḥ gniḥ iva ārabdhaḥ vi dunoti sarvam

original: (AVŚ_5,18.4c) yo brāhmaṇaṃ manyate annam eva sa viṣasya pibati taimātasya //4//
analyzed: yaḥ brāhmaṇam manyate annam eva sa viṣasya pibati taimātasya

original: (AVŚ_5,18.5a) ya enaṃ hanti mṛduṃ manyamāno devapīyur dhanakāmo na cittāt /
analyzed: yaḥ enam hanti mṛdum manyamānaḥ deva pīyuḥ dhana kāmaḥ na cittāt

original: (AVŚ_5,18.5c) saṃ tasyendro hṛdaye 'gnim indhe ubhe enaṃ dviṣṭo nabhasī carantam //5//
analyzed: sam tasya indraḥ hṛdaye gnim indhe ubhe enam dviṣṭaḥ nabhasī carantam

original: (AVŚ_5,18.6a) na brāhmaṇo hiṃsitavyo 'gniḥ priyatanor iva /
analyzed: na brāhmaṇaḥ hiṃsitavyaḥ gniḥ priya tanoḥ iva

original: (AVŚ_5,18.6c) somo hy asya dāyāda indro asyābhiśastipāḥ //6//
analyzed: somaḥ hi asya dāyādaḥ indraḥ asya abhiśasti pāḥ

original: (AVŚ_5,18.7a) śatāpāṣṭhāṃ ni girati tāṃ na śaknoti niḥkhidam /
analyzed: śata apāṣṭhām ni girati tām na śaknoti niḥkhidam

original: (AVŚ_5,18.7c) annaṃ yo brahmaṇām malvaḥ svādv admīti manyate //7//
analyzed: annam yaḥ brahmaṇām malvaḥ svādu admi iti manyate

original: (AVŚ_5,18.8a) jihvā jyā bhavati kulmalaṃ vāṅ nāḍīkā dantās tapasābhidigdhāḥ /
analyzed: jihvā jyā bhavati kulmalam vāc nāḍīkāḥ dantāḥ tapasā abhidigdhāḥ

original: (AVŚ_5,18.8c) tebhir brahmā vidhyati devapīyūn hṛdbalair dhanurbhir devajūtaiḥ //8//
analyzed: tebhiḥ brahmā vidhyati deva pīyūn hṛd balaiḥ dhanurbhiḥ deva jūtaiḥ

original: (AVŚ_5,18.9a) tīkṣṇeṣavo brāhmaṇā hetimanto yām asyanti śaravyāṃ na sā mṛṣā /
analyzed: tīkṣṇa iṣavaḥ brāhmaṇāḥ hetimantaḥ yām asyanti śaravyām na sā mṛṣā

original: (AVŚ_5,18.9c) anuhāya tapasā manyunā cota durād ava bhindanty enam //9//
analyzed: anuhāya tapasā manyunā ca uta durāt ava bhindanti enam

original: (AVŚ_5,18.10a) ye sahasram arājann āsan daśaśatā uta /
analyzed: ye sahasram arājan āsan daśaśatāḥ uta

original: (AVŚ_5,18.10c) te brāhmaṇasya gāṃ jagdhvā vaitahavyāḥ parābhavan //10//
analyzed: te brāhmaṇasya gām jagdhvā vaitahavyāḥ parābhavan

original: (AVŚ_5,18.11a) gaur eva tān hanyamānā vaitahavyāṃ avātirat /
analyzed: gauḥ eva tān hanyamānā vaitahavyām avātirat

original: (AVŚ_5,18.11c) ye kesaraprābandhāyāś caramājām apeciran //11//
analyzed: ye kesaraprābandhāyāḥ carama ajām apeciran

original: (AVŚ_5,18.12a) ekaśataṃ tā janatā yā bhūmir vyadhūnuta /
analyzed: ekaśatam tāḥ janatāḥ yāḥ bhūmiḥ vyadhūnuta

original: (AVŚ_5,18.12c) prajāṃ hiṃsitvā brāhmaṇīm asaṃbhavyaṃ parābhavan //12//
analyzed: prajām hiṃsitvā brāhmaṇīm asaṃbhavyam parābhavan

original: (AVŚ_5,18.13a) devapīyuś carati martyeṣu garagīrṇo bhavaty asthibhūyān /
analyzed: deva pīyuḥ carati martyeṣu gara gīrṇaḥ bhavati asthi bhūyān

original: (AVŚ_5,18.13c) yo brāhmaṇaṃ devabandhuṃ hinasti na sa pitṛyāṇam apy eti lokam //13//
analyzed: yaḥ brāhmaṇam deva bandhum hinasti na sa pitṛyāṇam api eti lokam

original: (AVŚ_5,18.14a) agnir vai naḥ padavāyaḥ somo dāyāda ucyate /
analyzed: agniḥ vai naḥ padavāyaḥ somaḥ dāyādaḥ ucyate

original: (AVŚ_5,18.14c) hantābhiśastendras tathā tad vedhaso viduḥ //14//
analyzed: hantā abhiśastā indraḥ tathā tat vedhasaḥ viduḥ

original: (AVŚ_5,18.15a) iṣur iva digdhā nṛpate pṛdākūr iva gopate /
analyzed: iṣuḥ iva digdhā nṛpate pṛdākūḥ iva gopate

original: (AVŚ_5,18.15c) sā brāhmaṇasyeṣur ghorā tayā vidhyati pīyataḥ //15//
analyzed: sā brāhmaṇasya iṣuḥ ghorā tayā vidhyati pīyataḥ

original: (AVŚ_5,19.1a) atimātram avardhanta nod iva divam aspṛśan /
analyzed: atimātram avardhanta na ud iva divam aspṛśan

original: (AVŚ_5,19.1c) bhṛguṃ hiṃsitvā sṛñjayā vaitahavyāḥ parābhavan //1//
analyzed: bhṛgum hiṃsitvā sṛñjayāḥ vaitahavyāḥ parābhavan

original: (AVŚ_5,19.2a) ye bṛhatsāmānam āṅgirasam ārpayan brāhmaṇaṃ janāḥ /
analyzed: ye bṛhatsāmānam āṅgirasam ārpayan brāhmaṇam janāḥ

original: (AVŚ_5,19.2c) petvas teṣām ubhayādam avis tokāny āvayat //2//
analyzed: petvaḥ teṣām ubhayādam aviḥ tokāni āvayat

original: (AVŚ_5,19.3a) ye brāhmaṇaṃ pratyaṣṭhīvan ye vāsmiñ chulkam īṣire /
analyzed: ye brāhmaṇam pratyaṣṭhīvan ye vā asmin śulkam īṣire

original: (AVŚ_5,19.3c) asnas te madhye kulyāyāḥ keśān khādanta āsate //3//
analyzed: asnaḥ te madhye kulyāyāḥ keśān khādantaḥ āsate

original: (AVŚ_5,19.4a) brahmagavī pacyamānā yāvat sābhi vijaṅgahe /
analyzed: brahma gavī pacyamānā yāvat sā abhi vijaṅgahe

original: (AVŚ_5,19.4c) tejo rāṣṭrasya nir hanti na vīro jāyate vṛṣā //4//
analyzed: tejaḥ rāṣṭrasya niḥ hanti na vīraḥ jāyate vṛṣā

original: (AVŚ_5,19.5a) krūram asyā āśasanaṃ tṛṣṭaṃ piśitam asyate /
analyzed: krūram asyāḥ āśasanam tṛṣṭam piśitam asyate

original: (AVŚ_5,19.5c) kṣīraṃ yad asyāḥ pīyate tad vai pitṛṣu kilbiṣam //5//
analyzed: kṣīram yat asyāḥ pīyate tat vai pitṛṣu kilbiṣam

original: (AVŚ_5,19.6a) ugro rājā manyamāno brāhmaṇaṃ yo jighatsati /
analyzed: ugraḥ rājā manyamānaḥ brāhmaṇam yaḥ jighatsati

original: (AVŚ_5,19.6c) parā tat sicyate rāṣṭraṃ brāhmaṇo yatra jīyate //6//
analyzed: parā tat sicyate rāṣṭram brāhmaṇaḥ yatra jīyate

original: (AVŚ_5,19.7a) aṣṭāpadī caturakṣī catuḥśrotrā caturhanuḥ /
analyzed: aṣṭāpadī catur akṣī catur śrotrā catur hanuḥ

original: (AVŚ_5,19.7c) dvyāsyā dvijihvā bhūtvā sā rāṣṭram ava dhūnute brahmajyasya //7//
analyzed: dvi āsyā dvi jihvā bhūtvā sā rāṣṭram ava dhūnute brahmajyasya

original: (AVŚ_5,19.8a) tad vai rāṣṭram ā sravati nāvaṃ bhinnām ivodakam /
analyzed: tat vai rāṣṭram ā sravati nāvam bhinnām iva udakam

original: (AVŚ_5,19.8c) brahmāṇaṃ yatra hiṃsanti tad rāṣṭraṃ hanti duchunā //8//
analyzed: brahmāṇam yatra hiṃsanti tat rāṣṭram hanti duchunā

original: (AVŚ_5,19.9a) taṃ vṛkṣā apa sedhanti chāyāṃ no mopa gā iti /
analyzed: tam vṛkṣāḥ apa sedhanti chāyām naḥ mā upa gāḥ iti

original: (AVŚ_5,19.9c) yo brāhmaṇasya sad dhanam abhi nārada manyate //9//
analyzed: yaḥ brāhmaṇasya sat dhanam abhi nārada manyate

original: (AVŚ_5,19.10a) viṣam etad devakṛtaṃ rājā varuṇo 'bravīt /
analyzed: viṣam etat deva kṛtam rājā varuṇaḥ bravīt

original: (AVŚ_5,19.10c) na brāhmaṇasya gāṃ jagdhvā rāstre jāgāra kaś cana //10//
analyzed: na brāhmaṇasya gām jagdhvā rāstre jāgāra kaḥ cana

original: (AVŚ_5,19.11a) navaiva tā navatayo yā bhūmir vyadhūnuta /
analyzed: nava eva tāḥ navatayaḥ yāḥ bhūmiḥ vyadhūnuta

original: (AVŚ_5,19.11c) prajāṃ hiṃsitvā brāhmaṇīm asaṃbhavyaṃ parābhavan //11//
analyzed: prajām hiṃsitvā brāhmaṇīm asaṃbhavyam parābhavan

original: (AVŚ_5,19.12a) yām mṛtāyānubadhnanti kūdyaṃ padayopanīm /
analyzed: yām mṛtāya anubadhnanti kūdyam pada yopanīm

original: (AVŚ_5,19.12c) tad vai brahmajya te devā upastaraṇam abruvan //12//
analyzed: tat vai brahmajya te devāḥ upastaraṇam abruvan

original: (AVŚ_5,19.13a) aśrūṇi kṛpamānasya yāni jītasya vāvṛtuḥ /
analyzed: aśrūṇi kṛpamānasya yāni jītasya vāvṛtuḥ

original: (AVŚ_5,19.13c) taṃ vai brahmajya te devā apāṃ bhāgam adhārayan //13//
analyzed: tam vai brahmajya te devāḥ apām bhāgam adhārayan

original: (AVŚ_5,19.14a) yena mṛtaṃ snapayanti śmaśrūṇi yenondate /
analyzed: yena mṛtam snapayanti śmaśrūṇi yena undate

original: (AVŚ_5,19.14c) taṃ vai brahmajya te devā apāṃ bhāgam adhārayan //14//
analyzed: tam vai brahmajya te devāḥ apām bhāgam adhārayan

original: (AVŚ_5,19.15a) na varṣaṃ maitrāvaruṇaṃ brahmajyam abhi varṣati /
analyzed: na varṣam maitrāvaruṇam brahmajyam abhi varṣati

original: (AVŚ_5,19.15c) nāsmai samitiḥ kalpate na mitraṃ nayate vaśam //15//
analyzed: na asmai samitiḥ kalpate na mitram nayate vaśam

original: (AVŚ_5,20.1a) uccairghoṣo dundubhiḥ satvanāyan vānaspatyaḥ saṃbhṛta usṛiyābhiḥ /
analyzed: uccairghoṣaḥ dundubhiḥ satvanāyan vānaspatyaḥ saṃbhṛtaḥ usṛiyābhiḥ

original: (AVŚ_5,20.1c) vācaṃ kṣuṇuvāno damayant sapatnānt siṃha iva jeṣyann abhi taṃstanīhi //1//
analyzed: vācam kṣuṇuvānaḥ damayan sapatnān siṃhaḥ iva jeṣyan abhi taṃstanīhi

original: (AVŚ_5,20.2a) siṃha ivāstānīd druvayo vibaddho 'bhikrandann ṛṣabho vāsitām iva /
analyzed: siṃhaḥ iva astānīt druvayaḥ vibaddhaḥ bhikrandan ṛṣabhaḥ vāśitām iva

original: (AVŚ_5,20.2c) vṛṣā tvaṃ vadhrayas te sapatnā aindras te śuṣmo abhimātiṣāhaḥ //2//
analyzed: vṛṣā tvam vadhrayaḥ te sapatnāḥ aindraḥ te śuṣmaḥ abhimātiṣāhaḥ

original: (AVŚ_5,20.3a) vṛṣeva yūthe sahasā vidāno gavyann abhi ruva saṃdhanājit /
analyzed: vṛṣā iva yūthe sahasā vidānaḥ gavyan abhi ruva saṃdhanājit

original: (AVŚ_5,20.3c) śucā vidhya hṛdayaṃ pareṣāṃ hitvā grāmān pracyutā yantu śatravaḥ //3//
analyzed: śucā vidhya hṛdayam pareṣām hitvā grāmān pracyutāḥ yantu śatravaḥ

original: (AVŚ_5,20.4a) saṃjayan pṛtanā ūrdhvamāyur gṛhyā gṛhṇāno bahudhā vi cakṣva /
analyzed: saṃjayan pṛtanāḥ ūrdhva māyuḥ gṛhyā gṛhṇānaḥ bahudhā vi cakṣva

original: (AVŚ_5,20.4c) daivīṃ vācaṃ dundubha ā gurasva vedhāḥ śatrūṇām upa bharasva vedaḥ //4//
analyzed: daivīm vācam dundubhe ā gurasva vedhāḥ śatrūṇām upa bharasva vedaḥ

original: (AVŚ_5,20.5a) dundubher vācaṃ prayatāṃ vadantīm āśṛṇvatī nāthitā ghoṣabuddhā /
analyzed: dundubheḥ vācam prayatām vadantīm āśṛṇvatī nāthitā ghoṣa buddhā

original: (AVŚ_5,20.5c) nārī putraṃ dhāvatu hastagṛhyāmitrī bhītā samare vadhānām //5//
analyzed: nārī putram dhāvatu hasta gṛhya āmitrī bhītā samare vadhānām

original: (AVŚ_5,20.6a) pūrvo dundubhe pra vadāsi vācaṃ bhūmyāḥ pṛṣṭhe vada rocamānaḥ /
analyzed: pūrvaḥ dundubhe pra vadāsi vācam bhūmyāḥ pṛṣṭhe vada rocamānaḥ

original: (AVŚ_5,20.6c) amitrasenām abhijañjabhāno dyumad vada dundubhe sūnṛtāvat //6//
analyzed: amitra senām abhijañjabhānaḥ dyumat vada dundubhe sūnṛtāvat

original: (AVŚ_5,20.7a) antareme nabhasī ghoṣo astu pṛthak te dhvanayo yantu śībham /
analyzed: antarā ime nabhasī ghoṣaḥ astu pṛthak te dhvanayaḥ yantu śībham

original: (AVŚ_5,20.7c) abhi kranda stanayotpipānaḥ ślokakṛn mitratūryāya svardhī //7//
analyzed: abhi kranda stanaya utpipānaḥ śloka kṛt mitra tūryāya svardhī

original: (AVŚ_5,20.8a) dhībhiḥ kṛtaḥ pra vadāti vācam ud dharṣaya satvanām āyudhāni /
analyzed: dhībhiḥ kṛtaḥ pra vadāti vācam ud dharṣaya satvanām āyudhāni

original: (AVŚ_5,20.8c) indramedī satvano ni hvayasva mitrair amitrāṃ ava jaṅghanīhi //8//
analyzed: indra medī satvanaḥ ni hvayasva mitraiḥ amitrān ava jaṅghanīhi

original: (AVŚ_5,20.9a) saṃkrandanaḥ pravado dhṛṣṇuṣeṇaḥ pravedakṛd bahudhā grāmaghoṣī /
analyzed: saṃkrandanaḥ pravadaḥ dhṛṣṇuṣeṇaḥ praveda kṛt bahudhā grāma ghoṣī

original: (AVŚ_5,20.9c) śriyo vanvano vayunāni vidvān kīrtim bahubhyo vi hara dvirāje //9//

original: (AVŚ_5,20.10a) śreyaḥketo vasujit sahīyānt saṃgrāmajit saṃśito brahmaṇāsi /

original: (AVŚ_5,20.11a) śatrūṣāṇ nīṣād abhimātiṣāho gaveṣaṇaḥ sahamāna udbhit /

original: (AVŚ_5,20.11c) vāgvīva mantraṃ pra bharasva vācam sāṃgrāmajityāyeṣam ud vadeha //11//

analyzed: udvepamānāḥ manasā cakṣuṣā hṛdayena ca

original: (AVŚ_5,21.2c) dhāvantu bibhyato 'mitrāḥ pratrāsenājye hute //2//

analyzed: pratrāsam amitrebhyaḥ vada ājyena abhighāritaḥ

original: (AVŚ_5,21.4a) yathā mṛgāḥ saṃvijanta āraṇyāḥ puruṣād adhi /
analyzed: yathā mṛgāḥ saṃvijante āraṇyāḥ puruṣāt adhi

original: (AVŚ_5,21.4c) eva tvaṃ dundubhe 'mitrān abhi kranda pra trāsayātho cittāni mohaya //4//
analyzed: eva tvam dundubhe mitrān abhi kranda pra trāsaya atho cittāni mohaya

original: (AVŚ_5,21.5a) yathā vṛkād ajāvayo dhāvanti bahu bibhyatīḥ /
analyzed: yathā vṛkāt aja avayaḥ dhāvanti bahu bibhyatīḥ

original: (AVŚ_5,21.5c) eva tvaṃ dundubhe 'mitrān abhi kranda pra trāsayātho cittāni mohaya //5//
analyzed: eva tvam dundubhe mitrān abhi kranda pra trāsaya atho cittāni mohaya

original: (AVŚ_5,21.6a) yathā śyenāt patatriṇaḥ saṃvijante ahardivi siṃhasya stanathor yathā /
analyzed: yathā śyenāt patatriṇaḥ saṃvijante ahardivi siṃhasya stanathoḥ yathā

original: (AVŚ_5,21.6c) eva tvaṃ dundubhe 'mitrān abhi kranda pra trāsayātho cittāni mohaya //6//
analyzed: eva tvam dundubhe mitrān abhi kranda pra trāsaya atho cittāni mohaya

original: (AVŚ_5,21.7a) parāmitrān dundubhinā hariṇasyājinena ca /
analyzed: parā amitrān dundubhinā hariṇasya ajinena ca

original: (AVŚ_5,21.8a) yair indraḥ prakrīḍate padghoṣaiś chāyayā saha /

original: (AVŚ_5,21.8c) tair amitrās trasantu no 'mī ye yanty anīkaśaḥ //8//
analyzed: taiḥ amitrāḥ trasantu naḥ mī ye yanti anīkaśas

original: (AVŚ_5,21.9a) jyāghoṣā dundubhayo 'bhi krośantu yā diśaḥ /

original: (AVŚ_5,21.10a) āditya cakṣur ā datsva marīcayo 'nu dhāvata /

original: (AVŚ_5,21.10c) patsaṅginīr ā sajantu vigate bāhuvīrye //10//

analyzed: etāḥ deva senāḥ sūrya ketavaḥ sacetasaḥ

original: (AVŚ_5,21.12c) amitrān no jayantu svāhā //12//

analyzed: agniḥ takmānam apa bādhatām itas somaḥ grāvā varuṇaḥ pūta dakṣāḥ

original: (AVŚ_5,22.1c) vedir barhiḥ samidhaḥ śośucānā apa dveṣāṃsy amuyā bhavantu //1//

original: (AVŚ_5,22.2a) ayaṃ yo viśvān haritān kṛṇoṣy ucchocayann agnir ivābhidunvan /
analyzed: ayam yaḥ viśvān haritān kṛṇoṣi ucchocayan agniḥ iva abhidunvan

original: (AVŚ_5,22.2c) adhā hi takmann araso hi bhūyā adhā nyaṅṅ adharān vā parehi //2//

original: (AVŚ_5,22.3a) yaḥ paruṣaḥ pāruṣeyo 'vadhvaṃsa ivāruṇaḥ /
analyzed: yaḥ paruṣaḥ pāruṣeyaḥ vadhvaṃsaḥ iva aruṇaḥ

original: (AVŚ_5,22.4a) adharāñcam pra hiṇomi namaḥ kṛtvā takmane /
analyzed: adharāñcam pra hiṇomi namaḥ kṛtvā takmane

analyzed: śakambharasya muṣṭi hā punar etu mahāvṛṣān

original: (AVŚ_5,22.5a) oko asya mūjavanta oko asya mahāvṛṣāḥ /

original: (AVŚ_5,22.6a) takman vyāla vi gada vyaṅga bhūri yāvaya /

original: (AVŚ_5,23.4c) babhruś ca babhrukarṇaś ca gṛdhraḥ kokaś ca te hatāḥ //4//

analyzed: asmin brahmaṇi asmin karmaṇi asyām purodhāyām asyām pratiṣṭhāyām asyām

original: (AVŚ_5,24.2e) cittyām asyām ākūtyām asyām āśiṣy asyāṃ devahūtyāṃ svāhā //2//
analyzed: cittyām asyām ākūtyām asyām āśiṣi asyām deva hūtyām svāhā

analyzed: dyāvāpṛthivī dātṝṇām adhipatiḥ sa mā avatu

original: (AVŚ_5,24.3c) asmin brahmaṇy asmin karmaṇy asyāṃ purodhāyām asyāṃ pratiṣṭhāyām asyāṃ /

original: (AVŚ_5,24.3e) cittyām asyām ākūtyām asyām āśiṣy asyāṃ devahūtyāṃ svāhā //3//
analyzed: cittyām asyām ākūtyām asyām āśiṣi asyām deva hūtyām svāhā

original: (AVŚ_5,24.4c) asmin brahmaṇy asmin karmaṇy asyāṃ purodhāyām asyāṃ pratiṣṭhāyām asyāṃ /
analyzed: asmin brahmaṇi asmin karmaṇi asyām purodhāyām asyām pratiṣṭhāyām asyām

original: (AVŚ_5,24.4e) cittyām asyām ākūtyām asyām āśiṣy asyāṃ devahūtyāṃ svāhā //4//
analyzed: cittyām asyām ākūtyām asyām āśiṣi asyām deva hūtyām svāhā

original: (AVŚ_5,24.5c) asmin brahmaṇy asmin karmaṇy asyāṃ purodhāyām asyāṃ pratiṣṭhāyām asyāṃ /
analyzed: asmin brahmaṇi asmin karmaṇi asyām purodhāyām asyām pratiṣṭhāyām asyām

original: (AVŚ_5,24.5e) cittyām asyām ākūtyām asyām āśiṣy asyāṃ devahūtyāṃ svāhā //5//

original: (AVŚ_5,28.1c) harite trīṇi rajate trīṇy ayasi trīṇi tapasāviṣṭitāni //1//
analyzed: harite trīṇi rajate trīṇi ayasi trīṇi tapasā āviṣṭitāni

original: (AVŚ_5,28.2a) agniḥ sūryaś candramā bhūmir āpo dyaur antarikṣaṃ pradiśo diśaś ca /
analyzed: agniḥ sūryaḥ candramāḥ bhūmiḥ āpaḥ dyauḥ antarikṣam pradiśaḥ diśaḥ ca

original: (AVŚ_5,28.2c) ārtavā ṛtubhiḥ saṃvidānā anena mā trivṛtā pārayantu //2//
analyzed: ārtavāḥ ṛtubhiḥ saṃvidānāḥ anena mā trivṛtā pārayantu

original: (AVŚ_5,28.3a) trayaḥ poṣās trivṛti śrayantām anaktu pūṣā payasā ghṛtena /
analyzed: trayaḥ poṣāḥ trivṛti śrayantām anaktu pūṣā payasā ghṛtena

original: (AVŚ_5,28.3c) annasya bhūmā puruṣasya bhūmā bhūmā paśūnāṃ ta iha śrayantām //3//
analyzed: annasya bhūmā puruṣasya bhūmā bhūmā paśūnām te iha śrayantām

original: (AVŚ_5,28.4a) imam ādityā vasunā sam ukṣatemam agne vardhaya vavṛdhānaḥ /
analyzed: imam ādityāḥ vasunā sam ukṣata imam agne vardhaya vavṛdhānaḥ

original: (AVŚ_5,28.4c) imam indra saṃ sṛja vīryeṇāsmin trivṛc chrayatāṃ poṣayiṣṇu //4//
analyzed: imam indra sam sṛja vīryeṇa asmin trivṛt śrayatām poṣayiṣṇu

original: (AVŚ_5,28.5a) bhūmiṣ ṭvā pātu haritena viśvabhṛd agniḥ pipartv ayasā sajoṣāḥ /
analyzed: bhūmiḥ tvā pātu haritena viśva bhṛt agniḥ pipartu ayasā sajoṣāḥ

original: (AVŚ_5,28.5c) vīrudbhiṣ ṭe arjunaṃ saṃvidānaṃ dakṣaṃ dadhātu sumanasyamānam //5//
analyzed: vīrudbhiḥ te arjunam saṃvidānam dakṣam dadhātu sumanasyamānam

original: (AVŚ_5,28.6a) tredhā jātam janmanedaṃ hiraṇyam agner ekaṃ priyatamaṃ babhūva somasyaikaṃ hiṃsitasya parāpatat /
analyzed: tredhā jātam janmanā idam hiraṇyam agneḥ ekam priyatamam babhūva somasya ekam hiṃsitasya parāpatat

original: (AVŚ_5,28.6c) apām ekaṃ vedhasāṃ reta āhus tat te hiraṇyaṃ trivṛd astv āyuṣe //6//
analyzed: apām ekam vedhasām retaḥ āhuḥ tat te hiraṇyam trivṛt astu āyuṣe

original: (AVŚ_5,28.7a) tryāyuṣaṃ jamadagneḥ kaśyapasya tryāyuṣam /
analyzed: tri āyuṣam jamadagneḥ kaśyapasya tri āyuṣam

original: (AVŚ_5,28.7c) tredhāmṛtasya cakṣaṇaṃ trīṇy āyūṃṣi te 'karam //7//
analyzed: tredhā amṛtasya cakṣaṇam trīṇi āyūṃṣi te karam

original: (AVŚ_5,28.8a) trayaḥ suparṇās trivṛtā yad āyann ekākṣaram abhisaṃbhūya śakrāḥ /
analyzed: trayaḥ suparṇāḥ trivṛtā yat āyan eka akṣaram abhisaṃbhūya śakrāḥ

original: (AVŚ_5,28.8c) praty auhan mṛtyum amṛtena sākam antardadhānā duritāni viśvā //8//
analyzed: prati auhat mṛtyum amṛtena sākam antardadhānāḥ duritāni viśvā

original: (AVŚ_5,28.9a) divas tvā pātu haritaṃ madhyāt tvā pātv arjunam /
analyzed: divaḥ tvā pātu haritam madhyāt tvā pātu arjunam

original: (AVŚ_5,28.9c) bhūmyā ayasmayaṃ pātu prāgād devapurā ayam //9//
analyzed: bhūmyāḥ ayasmayam pātu prāgāt deva purā ayam

original: (AVŚ_5,28.10a) imās tisro devapurās tās tvā rakṣantu sarvataḥ /
analyzed: imāḥ tisraḥ deva purāḥ tāḥ tvā rakṣantu sarvatas

original: (AVŚ_5,28.10c) tās tvaṃ bibhrad varcasvy uttaro dviṣatāṃ bhava //10//
analyzed: tāḥ tvam bibhrat varcasvī uttaraḥ dviṣatām bhava

original: (AVŚ_5,28.11a) puraṃ devānām amṛtaṃ hiraṇyam ya ābedhe prathamo devo agre /
analyzed: puram devānām amṛtam hiraṇyam yaḥ ābedhe prathamaḥ devaḥ agre

original: (AVŚ_5,28.11c) tasmai namo daśa prācīḥ kṛṇomy anu manyatāṃ trivṛd ābadhe me //11//
analyzed: tasmai namaḥ daśa prācīḥ kṛṇomi anu manyatām trivṛt ābadhe me

original: (AVŚ_5,28.12a) ā tvā cṛtatv aryamā pūṣā bṛhaspatiḥ /
analyzed: ā tvā cṛtatu aryamā pūṣā bṛhaspatiḥ

original: (AVŚ_5,28.12c) aharjātasya yan nāma tena tvāti cṛtāmasi //12//
analyzed: ahar jātasya yat nāma tena tvā ati cṛtāmasi

original: (AVŚ_5,28.13a) ṛtubhiṣ ṭvārtavair āyuṣe varcase tvā /
analyzed: ṛtubhiḥ tvā ārtavaiḥ āyuṣe varcase tvā

original: (AVŚ_5,28.13c) saṃvatsarasya tejasā tena saṃhanu kṛṇmasi //13//
analyzed: saṃvatsarasya tejasā tena saṃhanu kṛṇmasi

original: (AVŚ_5,28.14a) ghṛtād ulluptam madhunā samaktaṃ bhūmidṛṃham acyutam pārayiṣṇu /
analyzed: ghṛtāt ulluptam madhunā samaktam bhūmidṛṃham acyutam pārayiṣṇu

original: (AVŚ_5,28.14c) bhindat sapatnān adharāṃś ca kṛṇvad ā mā roha mahate saubhagāya //14//
analyzed: bhindat sapatnān adharān ca kṛṇvat ā mā roha mahate saubhagāya

original: (AVŚ_5,29.1a) purastād yukto vaha jātavedo 'gne viddhi kriyamāṇam yathedam /
analyzed: purastāt yuktaḥ vaha jātavedaḥ gne viddhi kriyamāṇam yathā idam

original: (AVŚ_5,29.1c) tvaṃ bhiṣag bheṣajasyāsi kartā tvayā gām aśvaṃ puruṣaṃ sanema //1//
analyzed: tvam bhiṣaj bheṣajasya asi kartā tvayā gām aśvam puruṣam sanema

original: (AVŚ_5,29.2a) tathā tad agne kṛṇu jātavedo viśvebhir devaiḥ saha saṃvidānaḥ /
analyzed: tathā tat agne kṛṇu jātavedaḥ viśvebhiḥ devaiḥ saha saṃvidānaḥ

original: (AVŚ_5,29.2c) yo no dideva yatamo jaghāsa yathā so asya paridhiṣ patāti //2//
analyzed: yaḥ naḥ dideva yatamaḥ jaghāsa yathā saḥ asya paridhiḥ patāti

original: (AVŚ_5,29.3a) yathā so asya paridhiṣ patāti tathā tad agne kṛṇu jātavedaḥ /
analyzed: yathā saḥ asya paridhiḥ patāti tathā tat agne kṛṇu jātavedaḥ

original: (AVŚ_5,29.3c) viśvebhir devair saha saṃvidānaḥ //3//
analyzed: viśvebhiḥ devaiḥ saha saṃvidānaḥ

original: (AVŚ_5,29.4a) akṣyau ni vidhya hṛdayaṃ ni vidhya jihvāṃ ni tṛnddhi pra dato mṛṇīhi /
analyzed: akṣyau ni vidhya hṛdayam ni vidhya jihvām ni tṛnddhi pra dataḥ mṛṇīhi

original: (AVŚ_5,29.4c) piśāco asya yatamo jaghāsāgne yaviṣṭha prati śṛṇīhi //4//
analyzed: piśācaḥ asya yatamaḥ jaghāsa agne yaviṣṭha prati śṛṇīhi

original: (AVŚ_5,29.5a) yad asya hṛtaṃ vihṛtaṃ yat parābhṛtam ātmano jagdhaṃ yatamat piśācaiḥ /
analyzed: yat asya hṛtam vihṛtam yat parābhṛtam ātmanaḥ jagdham yatamat piśācaiḥ

original: (AVŚ_5,29.5c) tad agne vidvān punar ā bhara tvaṃ śarīre māṃsam asum erayāmaḥ //5//
analyzed: tat agne vidvān punar ā bhara tvam śarīre māṃsam asum erayāmaḥ

original: (AVŚ_5,29.6a) āme supakve śabale vipakve yo mā piśāco aśane dadambha /
analyzed: āme su pakve śabale vipakve yaḥ mā piśācaḥ aśane dadambha

original: (AVŚ_5,29.6c) tad ātmanā prajayā piśācā vi yātayantām agado 'yam astu //6//
analyzed: tat ātmanā prajayā piśācāḥ vi yātayantām agadaḥ yam astu

original: (AVŚ_5,29.7a) kṣire mā manthe yatamo dadambhākṛṣṭapacye aśane dhānye yaḥ /
analyzed: kṣire mā manthe yatamaḥ dadambha akṛṣṭapacye aśane dhānye yaḥ

original: (AVŚ_5,29.7c) tad ātmanā prajayā piśācā vi yātayantām agado 'yam astu //7//
analyzed: tat ātmanā prajayā piśācāḥ vi yātayantām agadaḥ yam astu

original: (AVŚ_5,29.8a) apāṃ mā pāne yatamo dadambha kravyād yātūnām śayane śayānam /
analyzed: apām mā pāne yatamaḥ dadambha kravyād yātūnām śayane śayānam

original: (AVŚ_5,29.8c) tad ātmanā prajayā piśācā vi yātayantām agado 'yam astu //8//
analyzed: tat ātmanā prajayā piśācāḥ vi yātayantām agadaḥ yam astu

original: (AVŚ_5,29.9a) divā mā naktaṃ yatamo dadambha kravyād yātūnām śayane śayānam /
analyzed: divā mā naktam yatamaḥ dadambha kravyād yātūnām śayane śayānam

original: (AVŚ_5,29.9c) tad ātmanā prajayā piśācā vi yātayantām agado 'yam astu //9//
analyzed: tat ātmanā prajayā piśācāḥ vi yātayantām agadaḥ yam astu

original: (AVŚ_5,29.10a) kravyādam agne rudhiraṃ piśācaṃ manohanaṃ jahi jātavedaḥ /
analyzed: kravya adam agne rudhiram piśācam manaḥ hanam jahi jātavedaḥ

original: (AVŚ_5,29.10c) tam indro vājī vajreṇa hantu chinattu somaḥ śiro asya dhṛṣṇuḥ //10//
analyzed: tam indraḥ vājī vajreṇa hantu chinattu somaḥ śiraḥ asya dhṛṣṇuḥ

original: (AVŚ_5,29.11a) sanād agne mṛṇasi yātudhānān na tvā rakṣāṃsi pṛtanāsu jigyuḥ /
analyzed: sanāt agne mṛṇasi yātudhānān na tvā rakṣāṃsi pṛtanāsu jigyuḥ

original: (AVŚ_5,29.11c) sahamūrān anu daha kravyādo mā te hetyā mukṣata daivyāyāḥ //11//
analyzed: sahamūrān anu daha kravyādaḥ mā te hetyāḥ mukṣata daivyāyāḥ

original: (AVŚ_5,29.12a) samāhara jātavedo yad dhṛtaṃ yat parābhṛtam /
analyzed: samāhara jātavedaḥ yat dhṛtam yat parābhṛtam

original: (AVŚ_5,29.12c) gātrāṇy asya vardhantām aṃśur ivā pyāyatām ayam //12//
analyzed: gātrāṇi asya vardhantām aṃśuḥ iva ā pyāyatām ayam

original: (AVŚ_5,29.13a) somasyeva jātavedo aṃśur ā pyāyatām ayam /
analyzed: somasya iva jātavedaḥ aṃśuḥ ā pyāyatām ayam

original: (AVŚ_5,29.13c) agne virapśinaṃ medhyam ayakṣmaṃ kṛṇu jīvatu //13//
analyzed: agne virapśinam medhyam ayakṣmam kṛṇu jīvatu

original: (AVŚ_5,29.14a) etās te agne samidhaḥ piśācajambhanīḥ /
analyzed: etāḥ te agne samidhaḥ piśāca jambhanīḥ

original: (AVŚ_5,29.14c) tās tvaṃ juṣasva prati cainā gṛhāṇa jātavedaḥ //14//
analyzed: tāḥ tvam juṣasva prati ca enāḥ gṛhāṇa jātavedaḥ

original: (AVŚ_5,29.15a) tārṣṭāghīr agne samidhaḥ prati gṛhṇāhy arciṣā /
analyzed: tārṣṭāghīḥ agne samidhaḥ prati gṛhṇāhi arciṣā

original: (AVŚ_5,29.15c) jahātu kravyād rūpaṃ yo asya māṃsaṃ jihīrṣati //15//
analyzed: jahātu kravyād rūpam yaḥ asya māṃsam jihīrṣati

original: (AVŚ_5,30.1a) āvatas ta āvataḥ parāvatas ta āvataḥ /
analyzed: āvataḥ te āvataḥ parāvataḥ te āvataḥ

original: (AVŚ_5,30.1c) ihaiva bhava mā nu gā mā pūrvān anu gāḥ pitṝn asuṃ badhnāmi te dṛḍham //1//
analyzed: iha eva bhava mā nu gāḥ mā pūrvān anu gāḥ pitṝn asum badhnāmi te dṛḍham

original: (AVŚ_5,30.2a) yat tvābhiceruḥ puruṣaḥ svo yad araṇo janaḥ /
analyzed: yat tvā abhiceruḥ puruṣaḥ svaḥ yat araṇaḥ janaḥ

original: (AVŚ_5,30.2c) unmocanapramocane ubhe vācā vadāmi te //2//
analyzed: unmocana pramocane ubhe vācā vadāmi te

original: (AVŚ_5,30.3a) yad dudrohitha śepiṣe striyai puṃse acittyā /
analyzed: yat dudrohitha śepiṣe striyai puṃse acittyā

original: (AVŚ_5,30.3c) unmocanapramocane ubhe vācā vadāmi te //3//
analyzed: unmocana pramocane ubhe vācā vadāmi te

original: (AVŚ_5,30.4a) yat enaso mātṛkṛtāc cheṣe pitṛkṛtāc ca yat /
analyzed: yat enasaḥ mātṛ kṛtāt śeṣe pitṛ kṛtāt ca yat

original: (AVŚ_5,30.4c) unmocanapramocane ubhe vācā vadāmi te //4//
analyzed: unmocana pramocane ubhe vācā vadāmi te

original: (AVŚ_5,30.5a) yat te mātā yat te pitā jamir bhrātā ca sarjataḥ /
analyzed: yat te mātā yat te pitā jamiḥ bhrātā ca sarjataḥ

original: (AVŚ_5,30.5c) pratyak sevasva bheṣajaṃ jaradaṣṭiṃ kṛṇomi tvā //5//
analyzed: pratyak sevasva bheṣajam jaradaṣṭim kṛṇomi tvā

original: (AVŚ_5,30.6a) ihaidhi puruṣa sarveṇa manasā saha /
analyzed: iha edhi puruṣa sarveṇa manasā saha

original: (AVŚ_5,30.6c) dūtau yamasya mānu gā adhi jīvapurā ihi //6//
analyzed: dūtau yamasya mā anu gāḥ adhi jīva purā ihi

original: (AVŚ_5,30.7a) anuhūtaḥ punar ehi vidvān udayanaṃ pathaḥ /
analyzed: anuhūtaḥ punar ehi vidvān udayanam pathaḥ

original: (AVŚ_5,30.7c) ārohaṇam ākramaṇaṃ jīvatojīvato 'yanam //7//
analyzed: ārohaṇam ākramaṇam jīvataḥ jīvataḥ yanam

original: (AVŚ_5,30.8a) mā bibher na mariṣyasi jaradaṣṭiṃ kṛṇomi tvā /
analyzed: mā bibheḥ na mariṣyasi jaradaṣṭim kṛṇomi tvā

original: (AVŚ_5,30.8c) nir avocam ahaṃ yakṣmam aṅgebhyo aṅgajvaraṃ tava //8//
analyzed: niḥ avocam aham yakṣmam aṅgebhyaḥ aṅga jvaram tava

original: (AVŚ_5,30.9a) aṅgabhedo aṅgajvaro yaś ca te hṛdayāmayaḥ /
analyzed: aṅga bhedaḥ aṅga jvaraḥ yaḥ ca te hṛdaya āmayaḥ

original: (AVŚ_5,30.9c) yakṣmaḥ śyena iva prāpaptad vacā sāḍhaḥ parastarām //9//
analyzed: yakṣmaḥ śyenaḥ iva prāpaptat vacā sāḍhaḥ parastarām

original: (AVŚ_5,30.10a) ṛṣī bodhapratībodhāv asvapno yaś ca jāgṛviḥ /
analyzed: ṛṣī bodha pratībodhau asvapnaḥ yaḥ ca jāgṛviḥ

original: (AVŚ_5,30.10c) tau te prāṇasya goptārau divā naktaṃ ca jāgṛtām //10//
analyzed: tau te prāṇasya goptārau divā naktam ca jāgṛtām

original: (AVŚ_5,30.11a) ayam agnir upasadya iha sūrya ud etu te /
analyzed: ayam agniḥ upasadyaḥ iha sūryaḥ ud etu te

original: (AVŚ_5,30.11c) udehi mṛtyor gambhīrāt kṛṣṇāc cit tamasas pari //11//
analyzed: udehi mṛtyoḥ gambhīrāt kṛṣṇāt cit tamasaḥ pari

original: (AVŚ_5,30.12a) namo yamāya namo astu mṛtyave namaḥ pitṛbhya uta ye nayanti /
analyzed: namaḥ yamāya namaḥ astu mṛtyave namaḥ pitṛbhyaḥ uta ye nayanti

original: (AVŚ_5,30.12c) utpāraṇasya yo veda tam agniṃ puro dadhe 'smā ariṣṭatātaye //12//
analyzed: utpāraṇasya yaḥ veda tam agnim puras dadhe smaḥ ariṣṭatātaye

original: (AVŚ_5,30.13a) aitu prāṇa aitu mana aitu cakṣur atho balam /
analyzed: aitu prāṇa aitu manaḥ aitu cakṣuḥ atha u balam

original: (AVŚ_5,30.13c) śarīram asya sam vidāṃ tat padbhyāṃ prati tiṣṭhatu //13//
analyzed: śarīram asya sam tat padbhyām prati tiṣṭhatu

original: (AVŚ_5,30.14a) prāṇenāgne cakṣuṣā saṃ sṛjemaṃ sam īraya tanvā saṃ balena /
analyzed: prāṇena agne cakṣuṣā sam sṛja imam sam īraya tanvā sam balena

original: (AVŚ_5,30.14c) vetthāmṛtasya mā nu gān mā nu bhūmigṛho bhuvat //14//
analyzed: vettha amṛtasya mā nu gāt mā nu bhūmi gṛhaḥ bhuvat

original: (AVŚ_5,30.15a) mā te prāṇa upa dasan mo apāno 'pi dhāyi te /
analyzed: mā te prāṇaḥ upa dasat mā u apānaḥ pi dhāyi te

original: (AVŚ_5,30.15c) sūryas tvādhipatir mṛtyor udāyachatu raśmibhiḥ //15//
analyzed: sūryaḥ tvā adhipatiḥ mṛtyoḥ udāyacchatu raśmibhiḥ

original: (AVŚ_5,30.16a) iyam antar vadati jihvā baddhā paniṣpadā /
analyzed: iyam antar vadati jihvā baddhā paniṣpadā

original: (AVŚ_5,30.16c) tvayā yakṣmam nir avocaṃ śataṃ ropīś ca takmanaḥ //16//
analyzed: tvayā yakṣmam niḥ avocam śatam ropīḥ ca takmanaḥ

original: (AVŚ_5,30.17a) ayaṃ lokaḥ priyatamo devānām aparājitaḥ /
analyzed: ayam lokaḥ priyatamaḥ devānām aparājitaḥ

original: (AVŚ_5,30.17c) yasmai tvam iha mṛtyave diṣṭaḥ puruṣa jajñiṣe /
analyzed: yasmai tvam iha mṛtyave diṣṭaḥ puruṣa jajñiṣe

original: (AVŚ_5,30.17e) sa ca tvānu hvayāmasi mā purā jaraso mṛthāḥ //17//
analyzed: sa ca tvā anu hvayāmasi mā purā jarasaḥ mṛthāḥ

original: (AVŚ_5,31.1a) yāṃ te cakrur āme pātre yāṃ cakrur miśradhānye /
analyzed: yām te cakruḥ āme pātre yām cakruḥ miśra dhānye

original: (AVŚ_5,31.1c) āme māṃse kṛtyāṃ yāṃ cakruḥ punaḥ prati harāmi tām //1//
analyzed: āme māṃse kṛtyām yām cakruḥ punar prati harāmi tām

original: (AVŚ_5,31.2a) yāṃ te cakruḥ kṛkavākāv aje vā yāṃ kurīriṇi /
analyzed: yām te cakruḥ kṛkavākau aje vā yām kurīriṇi

original: (AVŚ_5,31.2c) avyāṃ te kṛtyāṃ yām cakruḥ punaḥ prati harāmi tām //2//
analyzed: avyām te kṛtyām yām cakruḥ punar prati harāmi tām

original: (AVŚ_5,31.3a) yāṃ te cakrur ekaśaphe paśūnām ubhayādati /
analyzed: yām te cakruḥ ekaśaphe paśūnām ubhayādati

original: (AVŚ_5,31.3c) gardabhe kṛtyāṃ yāṃ cakruḥ punaḥ prati harāmi tām //3//
analyzed: gardabhe kṛtyām yām cakruḥ punar prati harāmi tām

original: (AVŚ_5,31.4a) yāṃ te cakrur amūlāyāṃ valagaṃ vā narācyām /
analyzed: yām te cakruḥ amūlāyām valagam vā narācyām

original: (AVŚ_5,31.4c) kṣetre te kṛtyāṃ yāṃ cakruḥ punaḥ prati harāmi tām //4//
analyzed: kṣetre te kṛtyām yām cakruḥ punar prati harāmi tām

original: (AVŚ_5,31.5a) yāṃ te cakrur gārhapatye pūrvāgnāv uta duścitaḥ /
analyzed: yām te cakruḥ gārhapatye pūrva agnau uta duścitaḥ

original: (AVŚ_5,31.5c) śālāyāṃ kṛtyāṃ yām cakruḥ punaḥ prati harāmi tām //5//
analyzed: śālāyām kṛtyām yām cakruḥ punar prati harāmi tām

original: (AVŚ_5,31.6a) yāṃ te cakruḥ sabhāyāṃ yām cakrur adhidevane /
analyzed: yām te cakruḥ sabhāyām yām cakruḥ adhidevane

original: (AVŚ_5,31.6c) akṣeṣu kṛtyāṃ yāṃ cakruḥ punaḥ prati harāmi tām //6//
analyzed: akṣeṣu kṛtyām yām cakruḥ punar prati harāmi tām

original: (AVŚ_5,31.7a) yāṃ te cakruḥ senāyāṃ yāṃ cakrur iṣvāyudhe /
analyzed: yām te cakruḥ senāyām yām cakruḥ iṣu āyudhe

original: (AVŚ_5,31.7c) dundubhau kṛtyāṃ yāṃ cakruḥ punaḥ prati harāmi tām //7//
analyzed: dundubhau kṛtyām yām cakruḥ punar prati harāmi tām

original: (AVŚ_5,31.8a) yāṃ te kṛtyām kūpe 'vadadhuḥ śmaśāne vā nicakhnuḥ /
analyzed: yām te kṛtyām kūpe vadadhuḥ śmaśāne vā nicakhnuḥ

original: (AVŚ_5,31.8c) sadmani kṛtyām yāṃ cakruḥ punaḥ prati harāmi tām //8//
analyzed: sadmani kṛtyām yām cakruḥ punar prati harāmi tām

original: (AVŚ_5,31.9a) yāṃ te cakruḥ puruṣāsthe agnau saṃkasuke ca yām /
analyzed: yām te cakruḥ puruṣa asthe agnau saṃkasuke ca yām

original: (AVŚ_5,31.9c) mrokaṃ nirdāhaṃ kravyādaṃ punaḥ prati harāmi tām //9//
analyzed: mrokam nirdāham kravyādam punar prati harāmi tām

original: (AVŚ_5,31.10a) apathenā jabhāraināṃ tāṃ pathetaḥ pra hiṇmasi /
analyzed: a pathena jabhāra enām tām pathā itas pra hiṇmasi

original: (AVŚ_5,31.10c) adhīro maryādhīrebhyaḥ saṃ jabhārācittyā //10//
analyzed: adhīraḥ marya adhīrebhyaḥ sam jabhāra acittyā

original: (AVŚ_5,31.11a) yaś cakāra na śaśāka kartuṃ śaśre pādam aṅgurim /
analyzed: yaḥ cakāra na śaśāka kartum śaśre pādam aṅgurim

original: (AVŚ_5,31.11c) cakāra bhadram asmabhyam abhago bhagavadbhyaḥ //11//
analyzed: cakāra bhadram asmabhyam abhagaḥ bhagavadbhyaḥ

original: (AVŚ_5,31.12a) kṛtyākṛtaṃ valaginaṃ mūlinaṃ śapatheyyam /
analyzed: kṛtyā kṛtam valaginam mūlinam śapatheyyam

original: (AVŚ_5,31.12c) indras taṃ hantu mahatā vadhenāgnir vidhyatv astayā //12//
analyzed: indraḥ tam hantu mahatā vadhena agniḥ vidhyatu astayā

original: (AVŚ_6,1.1a) doṣo gāya bṛhad gāya dyumad dhehi /
analyzed: doṣaḥ gāya bṛhat gāya dyumat dhehi

original: (AVŚ_6,1.1c) ātharvaṇa stuhi devaṃ savitāram //1//
analyzed: ātharvaṇa stuhi devam savitāram

original: (AVŚ_6,1.2a) tam u ṣṭuhi yo antaḥ sindhau sūnuḥ /
analyzed: tam u stuhi yaḥ antar sindhau sūnuḥ

original: (AVŚ_6,1.2c) satyasya yuvānam adroghavācaṃ suśevam //2//
analyzed: satyasya yuvānam adrogha vācam su śevam

original: (AVŚ_6,1.3a) sa ghā no devaḥ savitā sāviṣad amṛtāni bhūri /
analyzed: sa gha naḥ devaḥ savitā sāviṣat amṛtāni bhūri

original: (AVŚ_6,1.3c) ubhe suṣṭutī sugātave //3//
analyzed: ubhe suṣṭutī sugātave

original: (AVŚ_6,2.1a) indrāya somam ṛtvijaḥ sunotā ca dhāvata /
analyzed: indrāya somam ṛtvijaḥ sunota ca dhāvata

original: (AVŚ_6,2.1c) stotur yo vacaḥ śṛṇavad dhavaṃ ca me //1//
analyzed: stotuḥ yaḥ vacaḥ śṛṇavat havam ca me

original: (AVŚ_6,2.2a) ā yaṃ viśantīndavo vayo na vṛkṣam andhasaḥ /
analyzed: ā yam viśanti indavaḥ vayaḥ na vṛkṣam andhasaḥ

original: (AVŚ_6,2.2c) virapśin vi mṛdho jahi rakṣasvinīḥ //2//
analyzed: virapśin vi mṛdhaḥ jahi rakṣasvinīḥ

original: (AVŚ_6,2.3a) sunotā somapāvne somam indrāya vajriṇe /
analyzed: sunota soma pāvne somam indrāya vajriṇe

original: (AVŚ_6,2.3c) yuvā jeteśānaḥ sa puruṣṭutaḥ //3//
analyzed: yuvā jetā īśānaḥ sa puruṣṭutaḥ

original: (AVŚ_6,3.1a) pātaṃ na indrāpūṣaṇāditiḥ pāntu marutaḥ /
analyzed: pātam naḥ indrāpūṣaṇā aditiḥ pāntu marutaḥ

original: (AVŚ_6,3.1c) apāṃ napāt sindhavaḥ sapta pātana pātu no viṣṇur uta dyauḥ //1//
analyzed: apām napāt sindhavaḥ sapta pātana pātu naḥ viṣṇuḥ uta dyauḥ

original: (AVŚ_6,3.2a) pātāṃ no dyāvāpṛthivī abhiṣṭaye pātu grāvā pātu somo no aṃhasaḥ /
analyzed: pātām naḥ dyāvāpṛthivī abhiṣṭaye pātu grāvā pātu somaḥ naḥ aṃhasaḥ

original: (AVŚ_6,3.2c) pātu no devī subhagā sarasvatī pātv agniḥ śivā ye asya pāyavaḥ //2//
analyzed: pātu naḥ devī subhagā sarasvatī pātu agniḥ śivāḥ ye asya pāyavaḥ

original: (AVŚ_6,3.3a) pātām no devāśvinā śubhas patī uṣāsānaktota na uruṣyatām /
analyzed: pātām naḥ deva aśvinā śubhas patī uṣāsānaktā uta naḥ uruṣyatām

original: (AVŚ_6,3.3c) apāṃ napād abhihrutī gayasya cid deva tvaṣṭar vardhaya sarvatātaye //3//
analyzed: apām napāt abhihrutī gayasya cit deva tvaṣṭar vardhaya sarvatātaye

original: (AVŚ_6,4.1a) tvaṣṭā me daivyaṃ vacaḥ parjanyo brahmaṇas patiḥ /
analyzed: tvaṣṭā me daivyam vacaḥ parjanyaḥ brahmaṇaḥ patiḥ

original: (AVŚ_6,4.1c) putrair bhrātṛbhir aditir nu pātu no duṣṭaraṃ trāyamāṇaṃ sahaḥ //1//
analyzed: putraiḥ bhrātṛbhiḥ aditiḥ nu pātu naḥ duṣṭaram trāyamāṇam sahaḥ

original: (AVŚ_6,4.2a) aṃśo bhago varuṇo mitro aryamāditiḥ pāntu marutaḥ /
analyzed: aṃśaḥ bhagaḥ varuṇaḥ mitraḥ aryamā aditiḥ pāntu marutaḥ

original: (AVŚ_6,4.2c) apa tasya dveṣo gamed abhihruto yāvayac chatrum antitam //2//
analyzed: apa tasya dveṣaḥ gamet abhihrutaḥ yāvayat śatrum anti tam

original: (AVŚ_6,4.3a) dhiye sam aśvinā prāvataṃ na uruṣyā ṇa urujmann aprayuchan /
analyzed: dhiye sam aśvinā prāvatam naḥ uruṣyā naḥ uru jman aprayuchan

original: (AVŚ_6,4.3c) dyauṣ pitar yāvaya duchunā yā //3//
analyzed: dyauḥ pitar yāvaya duchunā yā

original: (AVŚ_6,5.1a) ud enam uttaraṃ nayāgne ghṛtenāhuta /
analyzed: ud enam uttaram naya agne ghṛtena āhuta

original: (AVŚ_6,5.1c) sam enaṃ varcasā sṛja prajayā ca bahuṃ kṛdhi //1//
analyzed: sam enam varcasā sṛja prajayā ca bahum kṛdhi

original: (AVŚ_6,5.2a) indremaṃ prataraṃ kṛdhi sajātānām asad vaśī /
analyzed: indra imam prataram kṛdhi sajātānām asat vaśī

original: (AVŚ_6,5.2c) rāyas poṣeṇa saṃ sṛja jīvātave jarase naya //2//
analyzed: rāyaḥ poṣeṇa sam sṛja jīvātave jarase naya

original: (AVŚ_6,5.3a) yasya kṛṇmo havir gṛhe tam agne vardhayā tvam /
analyzed: yasya kṛṇmaḥ haviḥ gṛhe tam agne vardhaya tvam

original: (AVŚ_6,5.3c) tasmai somo adhi bravad ayaṃ ca brahmaṇas patiḥ //3//
analyzed: tasmai somaḥ adhi bravat ayam ca brahmaṇaḥ patiḥ

original: (AVŚ_6,6.1a) yo 'smān brahmaṇas pate 'devo abhimanyate /
analyzed: yaḥ smān brahmaṇas pate devaḥ abhimanyate

original: (AVŚ_6,6.1c) sarvaṃ tam randhayāsi me yajamānāya sunvate //1//
analyzed: sarvam tam randhayāsi me yajamānāya sunvate

original: (AVŚ_6,6.2a) yo naḥ soma suśaṃsino duḥśaṃsa ādideśati /
analyzed: yaḥ naḥ soma su śaṃsinaḥ duḥśaṃsaḥ ādideśati

original: (AVŚ_6,6.2c) vajreṇāsya mukhe jahi sa saṃpiṣṭo apāyati //2//
analyzed: vajreṇa asya mukhe jahi sa saṃpiṣṭaḥ apāyati

original: (AVŚ_6,6.3a) yo naḥ somābhidāsati sanābhir yaś ca niṣṭyaḥ /
analyzed: yaḥ naḥ soma abhidāsati sanābhiḥ yaḥ ca niṣṭyaḥ

original: (AVŚ_6,6.3c) apa tasya balaṃ tira mahīva dyaur vadhatmanā //3//
analyzed: apa tasya balam tira mahī iva dyauḥ vadhatmanā

original: (AVŚ_6,7.1a) yena somāditiḥ pathā mitrā vā yanty adruhaḥ /
analyzed: yena soma aditiḥ pathā mitrāḥ vā yanti adruhaḥ

original: (AVŚ_6,7.1c) tenā no 'vasā gahi //1//
analyzed: tena naḥ vasā gahi

original: (AVŚ_6,7.2a) yena soma sāhantyāsurān randhayāsi naḥ /
analyzed: yena soma sāhantyā asurān randhayāsi naḥ

original: (AVŚ_6,7.2c) tenā no adhi vocata //2//
analyzed: tena naḥ adhi vocata

original: (AVŚ_6,7.3a) yena devā asurāṇām ojāṃsy avṛṇīdhvam /
analyzed: yena devāḥ asurāṇām ojāṃsi avṛṇīdhvam

original: (AVŚ_6,7.3c) tenā naḥ śarma yachata //3//
analyzed: tena naḥ śarma yacchata

original: (AVŚ_6,8.1a) yathā vṛkṣaṃ libujā samantaṃ pariṣasvaje /
analyzed: yathā vṛkṣam libujā samantam pariṣasvaje

original: (AVŚ_6,8.1c) evā pari ṣvajasva māṃ yathā māṃ kāminy aso yathā man nāpagā asaḥ //1//
analyzed: eva pari svajasva mām yathā mām kāminī asaḥ yathā mat na āpagā asaḥ

original: (AVŚ_6,8.2a) yathā suparṇaḥ prapatan pakṣau nihanti bhūmyām /
analyzed: yathā suparṇaḥ prapatan pakṣau nihanti bhūmyām

original: (AVŚ_6,8.2c) evā ni hanmi te mano yathā māṃ kāminy aso yathā man nāpagā asaḥ //2//
analyzed: eva ni hanmi te manaḥ yathā mām kāminī asaḥ yathā mat na āpagā asaḥ

original: (AVŚ_6,8.3a) yatheme dyāvāpṛthivī sadyaḥ paryeti sūryaḥ /
analyzed: yathā ime dyāvāpṛthivī sadyas paryeti sūryaḥ

original: (AVŚ_6,8.3c) evā pary emi te mano yathā māṃ kāminy aso yathā man nāpagā asaḥ //3//
analyzed: eva pari emi te manaḥ yathā mām kāminī asaḥ yathā mat na āpagā asaḥ

original: (AVŚ_6,9.1a) vāñcha me tanvaṃ pādau vāñchākṣyau vāñcha sakthyau /
analyzed: vāñcha me tanvam pādau vāñcha akṣyau vāñcha sakthyau

original: (AVŚ_6,9.1c) akṣyau vṛṣaṇyantyāḥ keśā māṃ te kāmena śuṣyantu //1//
analyzed: akṣyau vṛṣaṇyantyāḥ keśāḥ mām te kāmena śuṣyantu

original: (AVŚ_6,9.2a) mama tvā doṣaṇiśriṣaṃ kṛṇomi hṛdayaśriṣam /
analyzed: mama tvā doṣaṇiśriṣam kṛṇomi hṛdaya śriṣam

original: (AVŚ_6,9.2c) yathā mama kratāv aso mama cittam upāyasi //2//
analyzed: yathā mama kratau asaḥ mama cittam upāyasi

original: (AVŚ_6,9.3a) yāsāṃ nābhir ārehaṇaṃ hṛdi saṃvananaṃ kṛtam gāvo ghṛtasya mātaro 'mūṃ saṃ vānayantu me //3//
analyzed: yāsām nābhiḥ ārehaṇam hṛdi saṃvananam kṛtam gāvaḥ ghṛtasya mātaraḥ mūm sam vānayantu me

original: (AVŚ_6,10.1a) pṛthivyai śrotrāya vanaspatibhyo 'gnaye 'dhipataye svāhā //1//
analyzed: pṛthivyai śrotrāya vanaspatibhyaḥ gnaye dhipataye svāhā

original: (AVŚ_6,10.2a) prāṇāyāntarikṣāya vayobhyo vāyave 'dhipataye svāhā //2//
analyzed: prāṇāya antarikṣāya vayobhyaḥ vāyave dhipataye svāhā

original: (AVŚ_6,10.3a) dive cakṣuṣe nakṣatrebhyaḥ sūryāyādhipataye svāhā //3//
analyzed: dive cakṣuṣe nakṣatrebhyaḥ sūryāya adhipataye svāhā

original: (AVŚ_6,11.1a) śamīm aśvattha ārūḍhas tatra puṃsuvanaṃ kṛtam /
analyzed: śamīm aśvatthaḥ ārūḍhaḥ tatra puṃsuvanam kṛtam

original: (AVŚ_6,11.1c) tad vai putrasya vedanaṃ tat strīṣv ā bharāmasi //1//
analyzed: tat vai putrasya vedanam tat strīṣu ā bharāmasi

original: (AVŚ_6,11.2a) puṃsi vai reto bhavati tat striyām anu ṣicyate /
analyzed: puṃsi vai retaḥ bhavati tat striyām anu sicyate

original: (AVŚ_6,11.2c) tad vai putrasya vedanaṃ tat prajāpatir abravīt //2//
analyzed: tat vai putrasya vedanam tat prajāpatiḥ abravīt

original: (AVŚ_6,11.3a) prajāpatir anumatiḥ sinīvāly acīkḷpat /
analyzed: prajāpatiḥ anumatiḥ sinīvālī acīkḷpat

original: (AVŚ_6,11.3c) straiṣūyam anyatra dadhat pumāṃsam u dadhat iha //3//
analyzed: straiṣūyam anyatra dadhat pumāṃsam u dadhat iha

original: (AVŚ_6,12.1a) pari dyām iva sūryo 'hīnāṃ janimāgamam /
analyzed: pari dyām iva sūryaḥ hīnām janimā agamam

original: (AVŚ_6,12.1c) rātrī jagad ivānyad dhaṃsāt tenā te vāraye viṣam //1//
analyzed: rātrī jagat iva anyat haṃsāt tena te vāraye viṣam

original: (AVŚ_6,12.2a) yad brahmabhir yad ṛṣibhir yad devair viditaṃ purā /
analyzed: yat brahmabhiḥ yat ṛṣibhiḥ yat devaiḥ viditam purā

original: (AVŚ_6,12.2c) yad bhūtaṃ bhavyam āsanvat tenā te vāraye viṣam //2//
analyzed: yat bhūtam bhavyam āsanvat tena te vāraye viṣam

original: (AVŚ_6,12.3a) madhvā pṛñce nadyaḥ parvatā girayo madhu /
analyzed: madhvā pṛñce nadyaḥ parvatāḥ girayaḥ madhu

original: (AVŚ_6,12.3c) madhu paruṣṇī śīpālā śam āsne astu śaṃ hṛde //3//
analyzed: madhu paruṣṇī śīpālā śam āsne astu śam hṛde

original: (AVŚ_6,13.1a) namo devavadhebhyo namo rājavadhebhyaḥ /
analyzed: namaḥ deva vadhebhyaḥ namaḥ rāja vadhebhyaḥ

original: (AVŚ_6,13.1c) atho ye viśyānāṃ vadhās tebhyo mṛtyo namo 'stu te //1//
analyzed: atho ye viśyānām vadhāḥ tebhyaḥ mṛtyo namaḥ stu te

original: (AVŚ_6,13.2a) namas te adhivākāya parāvākāya te namaḥ /
analyzed: namaḥ te adhivākāya parāvākāya te namaḥ

original: (AVŚ_6,13.2c) sumatyai mṛtyo te namo durmatyai te idaṃ namaḥ //2//
analyzed: sumatyai mṛtyo te namaḥ durmatyai te idam namaḥ

original: (AVŚ_6,13.3a) namas te yātudhānebhyo namas te bheṣajebhyaḥ /
analyzed: namaḥ te yātudhānebhyaḥ namaḥ te bheṣajebhyaḥ

original: (AVŚ_6,13.3c) namas te mṛtyo mūlebhyo brāhmaṇebhya idaṃ namaḥ //3//
analyzed: namaḥ te mṛtyo mūlebhyaḥ brāhmaṇebhyaḥ idam namaḥ

original: (AVŚ_6,14.1a) asthisraṃsaṃ parusraṃsam āsthitam hṛdayāmayam /
analyzed: asthi sraṃsam paru sraṃsam āsthitam hṛdaya āmayam

original: (AVŚ_6,14.1c) balāsaṃ sarvaṃ nāśayāṅgeṣṭhā yaś ca parvasu //1//
analyzed: balāsam sarvam nāśaya aṅgeṣṭhāḥ yaḥ ca parvasu

original: (AVŚ_6,14.2a) nir balāsaṃ balāsinaḥ kṣiṇomi muṣkaraṃ yathā /
analyzed: niḥ balāsam balāsinaḥ kṣiṇomi muṣkaram yathā

original: (AVŚ_6,14.2c) chinadmy asya bandhanaṃ mūlam urvārvā iva //2//
analyzed: chinadmi asya bandhanam mūlam urvārvā iva

original: (AVŚ_6,14.3a) nir balāsetaḥ pra patāśuṅgaḥ śiśuko yathā /
analyzed: niḥ balāsa itas pra pata aśuṅgaḥ śiśukaḥ yathā

original: (AVŚ_6,14.3c) atho ita iva hāyano 'pa drāhy avīrahā //3//
analyzed: atha u itas iva hāyana u pa drāhi a vīra hā

original: (AVŚ_6,15.1a) uttamo asy oṣadhīnāṃ tava vṛkṣā upastayaḥ /
analyzed: uttamaḥ asi oṣadhīnām tava vṛkṣāḥ upastayaḥ

original: (AVŚ_6,15.1c) upastir astu so 'smākaṃ yo asmāṃ abhidāsati //1//
analyzed: upastiḥ astu saḥ smākam yaḥ asmām abhidāsati

original: (AVŚ_6,15.2a) sabandhuś cāsabandhuś ca yo asmāṃ abhidāsati /
analyzed: sabandhuḥ ca a sabandhuḥ ca yaḥ asmām abhidāsati

original: (AVŚ_6,15.2c) teṣāṃ sā vṛkṣāṇām ivāhaṃ bhūyāsam uttamaḥ //2//
analyzed: teṣām sā vṛkṣāṇām iva aham bhūyāsam uttamaḥ

original: (AVŚ_6,15.3a) yathā soma oṣadhīnām uttamo haviṣāṃ kṛtaḥ /
analyzed: yathā somaḥ oṣadhīnām uttamaḥ haviṣām kṛtaḥ

original: (AVŚ_6,15.3c) talāśā vṛkṣāṇām ivāhaṃ bhūyāsam uttamaḥ //3//
analyzed: talāśāḥ vṛkṣāṇām iva aham bhūyāsam uttamaḥ

original: (AVŚ_6,16.1a) ābayo anābayo rasas ta ugra ābayo /
analyzed: ābayo anābayo rasaḥ te ugraḥ ābayo

original: (AVŚ_6,16.1c) ā te karambham admasi //1//
analyzed: ā te karambham admasi

original: (AVŚ_6,16.2a) vihahlo nāma te pitā madāvatī nāma te mātā /
analyzed: vihahlaḥ nāma te pitā madāvatī nāma te mātā

original: (AVŚ_6,16.2c) sa hina tvam asi yas tvam ātmānam āvayaḥ //2//
analyzed: sa hina tvam asi yaḥ tvam ātmānam āvayaḥ

original: (AVŚ_6,16.3a) tauvilike 'velayāvāyam ailaba ailayīt /
analyzed: tauvilike velayā ava ayam ailabaḥ ailayīt

original: (AVŚ_6,16.3c) babhruś ca babhrukarṇaś cāpehi nir āla //3//
analyzed: babhruḥ ca babhru karṇaḥ ca apehi niḥ āla

original: (AVŚ_6,16.4a) alasālāsi pūrva silāñjālāsy uttarā /
analyzed: alasālā asi silāñjālā asi uttarā

original: (AVŚ_6,16.4c) nīlāgalasāla //4//
analyzed: nīlāgalasāla

original: (AVŚ_6,17.1a) yatheyam pṛthivī mahī bhūtānāṃ garbham ādadhe /
analyzed: yathā iyam pṛthivī mahī bhūtānām garbham ādadhe

original: (AVŚ_6,17.1c) evā te dhriyatāṃ garbho anu sūtuṃ savitave //1//
analyzed: eva te dhriyatām garbhaḥ anu sūtum savitave

original: (AVŚ_6,17.2a) yatheyaṃ pṛthivī mahī dādhāremān vanaspatīn /
analyzed: yathā iyam pṛthivī mahī dādhāra imān vanaspatīn

original: (AVŚ_6,17.2c) evā te dhriyatāṃ garbho anu sūtuṃ savitave //2//
analyzed: eva te dhriyatām garbhaḥ anu sūtum savitave

original: (AVŚ_6,17.3a) yatheyaṃ pṛthivī mahī dādhāra parvatān girīn /
analyzed: yathā iyam pṛthivī mahī dādhāra parvatān girīn

original: (AVŚ_6,17.3c) evā te dhriyatāṃ garbho anu sūtuṃ savitave //3//
analyzed: eva te dhriyatām garbhaḥ anu sūtum savitave

original: (AVŚ_6,17.4a) yatheyaṃ pṛthivī mahī dādhāra viṣṭhitaṃ jagat /
analyzed: yathā iyam pṛthivī mahī dādhāra viṣṭhitam jagat

original: (AVŚ_6,17.4c) evā te dhriyatāṃ garbho anu sūtuṃ savitave //4//
analyzed: eva te dhriyatām garbhaḥ anu sūtum savitave

original: (AVŚ_6,18.1a) īrṣyāyā dhrājiṃ prathamāṃ prathamasyā utāparām /
analyzed: īrṣyāyāḥ dhrājim prathamām prathamasyāḥ uta aparām

original: (AVŚ_6,18.1c) agniṃ hṛdayyaṃ śokaṃ taṃ te nir vāpayāmasi //1//
analyzed: agnim hṛdayyam śokam tam te niḥ vāpayāmasi

original: (AVŚ_6,18.2a) yathā bhūmir mṛtamanā mṛtān mṛtamanastarā /
analyzed: yathā bhūmiḥ mṛta manāḥ mṛtāt mṛtamanastarā

original: (AVŚ_6,18.2c) yathota mamruṣo mana everṣyor mṛtaṃ manaḥ //2//
analyzed: yathā uta mamruṣaḥ manaḥ eva īrṣyoḥ mṛtam manaḥ

original: (AVŚ_6,18.3a) ado yat te hṛdi śritaṃ manaskaṃ patayiṣṇukam /
analyzed: adaḥ yat te hṛdi śritam manaskam patayiṣṇukam

original: (AVŚ_6,18.3c) tatas ta īrṣyāṃ muñcāmi nir ūṣmāṇaṃ dṛter iva //3//
analyzed: tatas te īrṣyām muñcāmi niḥ ūṣmāṇam dṛteḥ iva

original: (AVŚ_6,19.1a) punantu mā devajanāḥ punantu manavo dhiyā /
analyzed: punantu mā deva janāḥ punantu manavaḥ dhiyā

original: (AVŚ_6,19.1c) punantu viśvā bhūtāni pavamānaḥ punātu mā //1//
analyzed: punantu viśvā bhūtāni pavamānaḥ punātu mā

original: (AVŚ_6,19.2a) pavamānaḥ punātu mā kratve dakṣāya jīvase /
analyzed: pavamānaḥ punātu mā kratve dakṣāya jīvase

original: (AVŚ_6,19.2c) atho ariṣṭatātaye //2//
analyzed: atha u ariṣṭatātaye

original: (AVŚ_6,19.3a) ubhābhyāṃ deva savitaḥ pavitreṇa savena ca /
analyzed: ubhābhyām deva savitar pavitreṇa savena ca

original: (AVŚ_6,19.3c) asmān punīhi cakṣase //3//
analyzed: asmān punīhi cakṣase

original: (AVŚ_6,20.1a) agner ivāsya dahata eti śuṣmiṇa uteva matto vilapann apāyati /
analyzed: agneḥ iva asya dahataḥ eti śuṣmiṇaḥ uta iva mattaḥ vilapan apāyati

original: (AVŚ_6,20.1c) anyam asmad ichatu kaṃ cid avratas tapurvadhāya namo astu takmane //1//
analyzed: anyam asmat icchatu kam cit avrataḥ tapuḥ vadhāya namaḥ astu takmane

original: (AVŚ_6,20.2a) namo rudrāya namo astu takmane namo rājñe varuṇāya tviṣīmate /
analyzed: namaḥ rudrāya namaḥ astu takmane namaḥ rājñe varuṇāya tviṣīmate

original: (AVŚ_6,20.2c) namo dive namaḥ pṛthivyai nama oṣadhībhyaḥ //2//
analyzed: namaḥ dive namaḥ pṛthivyai namaḥ oṣadhībhyaḥ

original: (AVŚ_6,20.3a) ayaṃ yo abhiśocayiṣṇur viśvā rūpāṇi haritā kṛṇoṣi /
analyzed: ayam yaḥ abhiśocayiṣṇuḥ viśvā rūpāṇi haritā kṛṇoṣi

original: (AVŚ_6,20.3c) tasmai te 'ruṇāya babhrave namaḥ kṛṇomi vanyāya takmane //3//
analyzed: tasmai te ruṇāya babhrave namaḥ kṛṇomi vanyāya takmane

original: (AVŚ_6,21.1a) imā yās tisraḥ pṛthivīs tāsāṃ ha bhūmir uttamā /
analyzed: imāḥ yāḥ tisraḥ pṛthivīḥ tāsām ha bhūmiḥ uttamā

original: (AVŚ_6,21.1c) tāsām adhi tvaco ahaṃ bheṣajaṃ sam u jagrabham //1//
analyzed: tāsām adhi tvacaḥ aham bheṣajam sam u jagrabham

original: (AVŚ_6,21.2a) śreṣṭham asi bheṣajānāṃ vasiṣṭhaṃ vīrudhānām /
analyzed: śreṣṭham asi bheṣajānām vasiṣṭham vīrudhānām

original: (AVŚ_6,21.2c) somo bhaga iva yāmeṣu deveṣu varuṇo yathā //2//
analyzed: somaḥ bhagaḥ iva yāmeṣu deveṣu varuṇaḥ yathā

original: (AVŚ_6,21.3a) revatīr anādhṛṣaḥ siṣāsavaḥ siṣāsatha /
analyzed: revatīḥ anādhṛṣaḥ siṣāsavaḥ siṣāsatha

original: (AVŚ_6,21.3c) uta stha keśadṛmhaṇīr atho ha keśavardhanīḥ //3//
analyzed: uta stha keśa dṛmhaṇīḥ atha u ha keśa vardhanīḥ

original: (AVŚ_6,22.1a) kṛṣṇaṃ niyānaṃ harayaḥ suparṇā apo vasānā divam ut patanti /
analyzed: kṛṣṇam niyānam harayaḥ suparṇāḥ apaḥ vasānāḥ divam ud patanti

original: (AVŚ_6,22.1c) ta āvavṛtrant sadanād ṛtasyād id ghṛtena pṛthivīṃ vy ūduḥ //1//
analyzed: te āvavṛtran sadanāt ṛtasya āt id ghṛtena pṛthivīm vi ūduḥ

original: (AVŚ_6,22.2a) payasvatīḥ kṛṇuthāpa oṣadhīḥ śivā yad ejathā maruto rukmavakṣasaḥ /
analyzed: payasvatīḥ kṛṇutha apaḥ oṣadhīḥ śivāḥ yat ejatha marutaḥ rukma vakṣasaḥ

original: (AVŚ_6,22.2c) ūrjaṃ ca tatra sumatiṃ ca pinvata yatrā naro marutaḥ siñcathā madhu //2//
analyzed: ūrjam ca tatra sumatim ca pinvata yatra naraḥ marutaḥ siñcatha madhu

original: (AVŚ_6,22.3a) udapruto marutas tāṃ iyarta vṛṣṭir yā viśvā nivatas pṛṇāti /
analyzed: uda prutaḥ marutaḥ tām iyarta vṛṣṭiḥ yā viśvāḥ nivataḥ pṛṇāti

original: (AVŚ_6,22.3c) ejāti glahā kanyeva tunnairuṃ tundānā patyeva jāyā //3//
analyzed: ejāti glahā kanyā iva tunnā erum tundānā patyā iva jāyā

original: (AVŚ_6,23.1a) sasruṣīs tad apaso divā naktaṃ ca sasruṣīḥ /
analyzed: sasruṣīḥ tat apasaḥ divā naktam ca sasruṣīḥ

original: (AVŚ_6,23.1c) vareṇyakratur aham apo devīr upa hvaye //1//
analyzed: vareṇya kratuḥ aham apaḥ devīḥ upa hvaye

original: (AVŚ_6,23.2a) otā āpaḥ karmaṇyā muñcantv itaḥ praṇītaye /
analyzed: otāḥ āpaḥ karmaṇyāḥ muñcantu itas praṇītaye

original: (AVŚ_6,23.2c) sadyaḥ kṛṇvantv etave //2//
analyzed: sadyas kṛṇvantu etave

original: (AVŚ_6,23.3a) devasya savituḥ save karma kṛṇvantu mānuṣāḥ /
analyzed: devasya savituḥ save karma kṛṇvantu mānuṣāḥ

original: (AVŚ_6,23.3c) śaṃ no bhavantv apa oṣadhīḥ śivāḥ //3//
analyzed: śam naḥ bhavantu apaḥ oṣadhīḥ śivāḥ

original: (AVŚ_6,24.1a) himavataḥ pra sravanti sindhau samaha saṅgamaḥ /
analyzed: himavataḥ pra sravanti sindhau samaha saṅgamaḥ

original: (AVŚ_6,24.1c) āpo ha mahyaṃ tad devīr dadan hṛddyotabheṣajam //1//
analyzed: āpaḥ ha mahyam tat devīḥ dadan hṛddyota bheṣajam

original: (AVŚ_6,24.2a) yan me akṣyor ādidyota pārṣṇyoḥ prapadoś ca yat /
analyzed: yat me akṣyoḥ ādidyota pārṣṇyoḥ prapadoḥ ca yat

original: (AVŚ_6,24.2c) āpas tat sarvaṃ niṣ karan bhiṣajāṃ subhiṣaktamāḥ //2//
analyzed: āpaḥ tat sarvam niḥ karan bhiṣajām su bhiṣaktamāḥ

original: (AVŚ_6,24.3a) sindhupatnīḥ sindhurājñīḥ sarvā yā nadya sthana /
analyzed: sindhu patnīḥ sindhu rājñīḥ sarvāḥ yāḥ nadyaḥ sthana

original: (AVŚ_6,24.3c) datta nas tasya bheṣajaṃ tenā vo bhunajāmahai //3//
analyzed: datta naḥ tasya bheṣajam tena vaḥ bhunajāmahai

original: (AVŚ_6,25.1a) pañca ca yāḥ pañcāśac ca saṃyanti manyā abhi /
analyzed: pañca ca yāḥ pañcāśat ca saṃyanti manyāḥ abhi

original: (AVŚ_6,25.1c) itas tāḥ sarvā naśyantu vākā apacitām iva //1//
analyzed: itas tāḥ sarvāḥ naśyantu vākāḥ apacitām iva

original: (AVŚ_6,25.2a) sapta ca yāḥ saptatiś ca saṃyanti graivyā abhi /
analyzed: sapta ca yāḥ saptatiḥ ca saṃyanti graivyāḥ abhi

original: (AVŚ_6,25.2c) itas tāḥ sarvā naśyantu vākā apacitām iva //2//
analyzed: itas tāḥ sarvāḥ naśyantu vākāḥ apacitām iva

original: (AVŚ_6,25.3a) nava ca yā navatiś ca saṃyanti skandhyā abhi /
analyzed: nava ca yāḥ navatiḥ ca saṃyanti skandhyāḥ abhi

original: (AVŚ_6,25.3c) itas tāḥ sarvā naśyantu vākā apacitām iva //3//
analyzed: itas tāḥ sarvāḥ naśyantu vākāḥ apacitām iva

original: (AVŚ_6,26.1a) ava mā pāpmant sṛja vaśī san mṛdayāsi naḥ /
analyzed: ava mā pāpman sṛja vaśī san mṛdayāsi naḥ

original: (AVŚ_6,26.1c) ā mā bhadrasya loke pāpman dhehy avihrutam //1//
analyzed: ā mā bhadrasya loke pāpman dhehi a vihrutam

original: (AVŚ_6,26.2a) yo naḥ pāpman na jahāsi tam u tvā jahimo vayam /
analyzed: yaḥ naḥ pāpman na jahāsi tam u tvā jahimaḥ vayam

original: (AVŚ_6,26.2c) pathām anu vyāvartane 'nyaṃ pāpmānu padyatām //2//
analyzed: pathām anu vyāvartane nyam pāpmā anu padyatām

original: (AVŚ_6,26.3a) anyatrāsman ny ucyatu sahasrākṣo amartyaḥ /
analyzed: anyatra asmat ni ucyatu sahasra akṣaḥ amartyaḥ

original: (AVŚ_6,26.3c) yaṃ dveṣāma tam ṛchatu yam u dviṣmas tam ij jahi //3//
analyzed: yam dveṣāma tam ṛchatu yam u dviṣmaḥ tam id jahi

original: (AVŚ_6,27.1a) devāḥ kapota iṣito yad ichan dūto nirṛtyā idam ājagāma /
analyzed: devāḥ kapotaḥ iṣitaḥ yat ichan dūtaḥ nirṛtyāḥ idam ājagāma

original: (AVŚ_6,27.1c) tasmā arcāma kṛṇavāma niṣkṛtiṃ śaṃ no astu dvipade śaṃ catuṣpade //1//
analyzed: tasmai arcāma kṛṇavāma niṣkṛtim śam naḥ astu dvipade śam catuṣpade

original: (AVŚ_6,27.2a) śivaḥ kapota iṣito no astv anāgā devāḥ śakuno gṛhaṃ naḥ /
analyzed: śivaḥ kapotaḥ iṣitaḥ naḥ astu anāgāḥ devāḥ śakunaḥ gṛham naḥ

original: (AVŚ_6,27.2c) agnir hi vipro juṣatām havir naḥ pari hetiḥ pakṣiṇī no vṛṇaktu //2//
analyzed: agniḥ hi vipraḥ juṣatām haviḥ naḥ pari hetiḥ pakṣiṇī naḥ vṛṇaktu

original: (AVŚ_6,27.3a) hetiḥ pakṣiṇī na dabhāty asmān āṣṭrī padaṃ kṛṇute agnidhāne /
analyzed: hetiḥ pakṣiṇī na dabhāti asmān āṣṭrī padam kṛṇute agnidhāne

original: (AVŚ_6,27.3c) śivo gobhya uta puruṣebhyo no astu mā no devā iha hiṃsīt kapota //3//
analyzed: śivaḥ gobhyaḥ uta puruṣebhyaḥ naḥ astu mā naḥ devāḥ iha hiṃsīt kapota

original: (AVŚ_6,28.1a) ṛcā kapotaṃ nudata praṇodam iṣaṃ madantaḥ pari gāṃ nayāmaḥ /
analyzed: ṛcā kapotam nudata praṇodam iṣam madantaḥ pari gām nayāmaḥ

original: (AVŚ_6,28.1c) saṃlobhayanto duritā padāni hitvā na ūrjaṃ pra padāt pathiṣṭhaḥ //1//
analyzed: saṃlobhayantaḥ duritā padāni hitvā naḥ ūrjam pra padāt

original: (AVŚ_6,28.2a) parīme 'gnim arṣata parīme gām aneṣata /
analyzed: pari ime gnim pari ime gām aneṣata

original: (AVŚ_6,28.2c) deveṣv akrata śravaḥ ka imāṃ ā dadharṣati //2//
analyzed: deveṣu akrata śravaḥ kaḥ imān ā dadharṣati

original: (AVŚ_6,28.3a) yaḥ prathamaḥ pravatam āsasāda bahubhyaḥ panthām anupaspaśānaḥ /
analyzed: yaḥ prathamaḥ pravatam āsasāda bahubhyaḥ panthām anupaspaśānaḥ

original: (AVŚ_6,28.3c) yo 'syeśe dvipado yaś catuṣpadas tasmai yamāya namo astu mṛtyave //3//
analyzed: yaḥ sya īśe dvipadaḥ yaḥ catuṣpadaḥ tasmai yamāya namaḥ astu mṛtyave

original: (AVŚ_6,29.1a) amūn hetiḥ patatriṇī ny etu yad ulūko vadati mogham etat /
analyzed: amūn hetiḥ patatriṇī ni etu yat ulūkaḥ vadati mogham etat

original: (AVŚ_6,29.1c) yad vā kapota padam agnau kṛṇoti //1//
analyzed: yat vā kapota padam agnau kṛṇoti

original: (AVŚ_6,29.2a) yau te dūtau nirṛta idam eto 'prahitau prahitau vā gṛhaṃ naḥ /
analyzed: yau te dūtau nirṛte idam prahitau prahitau vā gṛham naḥ

original: (AVŚ_6,29.2c) kapotolūkābhyām apadaṃ tad astu //2//
analyzed: kapota ulūkābhyām a padam tat astu

original: (AVŚ_6,29.3a) avairahatyāyedam ā papatyāt suvīratāyā idam ā sasadyāt /
analyzed: a vaira hatyāya idam ā papatyāt su vīra tāyai idam ā sasadyāt

original: (AVŚ_6,29.3c) parāṅ eva parā vada parācīm anu saṃvatam /
analyzed: parāṅ eva parā vada parācīm anu saṃvatam

original: (AVŚ_6,29.3e) yathā yamasya tvā gṛhe 'rasaṃ praticākaśān ābhūkaṃ praticākaśān //3//
analyzed: yathā yamasya tvā gṛhe rasam praticākaśān ābhūkam praticākaśān

original: (AVŚ_6,30.1a) devā imaṃ madhunā saṃyutaṃ yavaṃ sarasvatyām adhi maṇāv acarkṛṣuḥ /
analyzed: devāḥ imam madhunā saṃyutam yavam sarasvatyām adhi maṇau acarkṛṣuḥ

original: (AVŚ_6,30.1c) indra āsīt sīrapatiḥ śatakratuḥ kīnāśā āsan marutaḥ sudānavaḥ //1//
analyzed: indraḥ āsīt sīra patiḥ śatakratuḥ kīnāśāḥ āsan marutaḥ sudānavaḥ

original: (AVŚ_6,30.2a) yas te mado 'vakeśo vikeśo yenābhihasyaṃ puruṣaṃ kṛṇoṣi /
analyzed: yaḥ te madaḥ vakeśaḥ vikeśaḥ yena abhihasyam puruṣam kṛṇoṣi

original: (AVŚ_6,30.2c) ārāt tvad anyā vanāni vṛkṣi tvaṃ śami śatavalśā vi roha //2//
analyzed: ārāt tvat anyā vanāni vṛkṣi tvam śami śata valśā vi roha

original: (AVŚ_6,30.3a) bṛhatpalāśe subhage varṣavṛddha ṛtāvari /
analyzed: bṛhat palāśe subhage varṣa vṛddhe ṛtāvari

original: (AVŚ_6,30.3c) māteva putrebhyo mṛḍa keśebhyaḥ śami //3//
analyzed: mātā iva putrebhyaḥ mṛḍa keśebhyaḥ śami

original: (AVŚ_6,31.1a) āyaṃ gauḥ pṛśnir akramīd asadan mātaram puraḥ /
analyzed: ā ayam gauḥ pṛśniḥ akramīt asadat mātaram puras

original: (AVŚ_6,31.1c) pitaram ca prayant svaḥ //1//
analyzed: pitaram ca prayan svar

original: (AVŚ_6,31.2a) antaś carati rocanā asya prāṇād apānataḥ /
analyzed: antar carati rocanā asya prāṇāt apānataḥ

original: (AVŚ_6,31.2c) vy akhyan mahiṣaḥ svaḥ //2//
analyzed: vi akhyat mahiṣaḥ svar

original: (AVŚ_6,31.3a) triṃśad dhāmā vi rājati vāk pataṅgo aśiśriyat /
analyzed: triṃśat dhāmā vi rājati vāc pataṅgaḥ aśiśriyat

original: (AVŚ_6,31.3c) prati vastor ahar dyubhiḥ //3//
analyzed: prati vastoḥ ahar dyubhiḥ

original: (AVŚ_6,32.1a) antardāve juhuta sv etad yātudhānakṣayaṇaṃ ghṛtena /
analyzed: antardāve juhuta su etat yātudhāna kṣayaṇam ghṛtena

original: (AVŚ_6,32.1c) ārād rakṣāṃsi prati daha tvam agne na no gṛhāṇām upa tītapāsi //1//
analyzed: ārāt rakṣāṃsi prati daha tvam agne na naḥ gṛhāṇām upa tītapāsi

original: (AVŚ_6,32.2a) rudro vo grīvā aśarait piśācāḥ pṛṣṭīr vo 'pi śṛṇātu yātudhānāḥ /
analyzed: rudraḥ vaḥ grīvāḥ aśarait piśācāḥ pṛṣṭīḥ vaḥ pi śṛṇātu yātudhānāḥ

original: (AVŚ_6,32.2c) vīrud vo viśvatovīryā yamena sam ajīgamat //2//
analyzed: vīrudh vaḥ viśvatas vīryā yamena sam ajīgamat

original: (AVŚ_6,32.3a) abhayaṃ mitrāvaruṇāv ihāstu no 'rciṣāttriṇo nudataṃ pratīcaḥ /
analyzed: abhayam mitrāvaruṇau iha astu naḥ rciṣā attriṇaḥ nudatam pratīcaḥ

original: (AVŚ_6,32.3c) mā jñātāraṃ mā pratiṣṭhāṃ vidanta mitho vighnānā upa yantu mṛtyum //3//
analyzed: mā jñātāram mā pratiṣṭhām vidanta mithas vighnānāḥ upa yantu mṛtyum

original: (AVŚ_6,33.1a) yasyedam ā rajo yujas tuje janā navaṃ svaḥ /
analyzed: yasya idam ā rajaḥ yujaḥ tuje janāḥ navam svar

original: (AVŚ_6,33.1c) indrasya rantyaṃ bṛhat //1//
analyzed: indrasya rantyam bṛhat

original: (AVŚ_6,33.2a) nādhṛṣa ā dadhṛṣate dhṛṣāṇo dhṛṣitaḥ śavaḥ /
analyzed: na ādhṛṣe ā dadhṛṣate dhṛṣāṇaḥ dhṛṣitaḥ śavaḥ

original: (AVŚ_6,33.2c) purā yathā vyathiḥ śrava indrasya nādhṛṣe śavaḥ //2//
analyzed: purā yathā vyathiḥ śravaḥ indrasya na ādhṛṣe śavaḥ

original: (AVŚ_6,33.3a) sa no dadātu tāṃ rayim uruṃ piśaṅgasaṃdṛśam /
analyzed: sa naḥ dadātu tām rayim urum piśaṅga saṃdṛśam

original: (AVŚ_6,33.3c) indraḥ patis tuviṣṭamo janeṣv ā //3//
analyzed: indraḥ patiḥ tuviṣṭamaḥ janeṣu ā

original: (AVŚ_6,34.1a) prāgnaye vācam īraya vṛṣabhāya kṣitīnām /
analyzed: pra agnaye vācam īraya vṛṣabhāya kṣitīnām

original: (AVŚ_6,34.1c) sa naḥ parṣad ati dviṣaḥ //1//
analyzed: sa naḥ parṣat ati dviṣaḥ

original: (AVŚ_6,34.2a) yo rakṣāṃsi nijūrvaty agnis tigmena śociṣā /
analyzed: yaḥ rakṣāṃsi nijūrvati agniḥ tigmena śociṣā

original: (AVŚ_6,34.2c) sa naḥ parṣad ati dviṣaḥ //2//
analyzed: sa naḥ parṣat ati dviṣaḥ

original: (AVŚ_6,34.3a) yaḥ parasyāḥ parāvatas tiro dhanvātirocate /
analyzed: yaḥ parasyāḥ parāvataḥ tiras dhanva atirocate

original: (AVŚ_6,34.3c) sa naḥ parṣad ati dviṣaḥ //3//
analyzed: sa naḥ parṣat ati dviṣaḥ

original: (AVŚ_6,34.4a) yo viśvābhi vipaśyati bhuvanā saṃ ca paśyati /
analyzed: yaḥ viśvā abhi vipaśyati bhuvanā sam ca paśyati

original: (AVŚ_6,34.4c) sa naḥ parṣad ati dviṣaḥ //4//
analyzed: sa naḥ parṣat ati dviṣaḥ

original: (AVŚ_6,34.5a) yo asya pāre rajasaḥ śukro agnir ajāyata /
analyzed: yaḥ asya pāre rajasaḥ śukraḥ agniḥ ajāyata

original: (AVŚ_6,34.5c) sa naḥ parṣad ati dviṣaḥ //5//
analyzed: sa naḥ parṣat ati dviṣaḥ

original: (AVŚ_6,35.1a) vaiśvānaro na ūtaya ā pra yātu parāvataḥ /
analyzed: vaiśvānaraḥ naḥ ūtaye ā pra yātu parāvataḥ

original: (AVŚ_6,35.1c) agnir naḥ suṣṭutīr upa //1//
analyzed: agniḥ naḥ suṣṭutīḥ upa

original: (AVŚ_6,35.2a) vaiśvānaro na āgamad imaṃ yajñaṃ sajūr upa /
analyzed: vaiśvānaraḥ naḥ āgamat imam yajñam sajūs upa

original: (AVŚ_6,35.2c) agnir uktheṣv aṃhasu //2//
analyzed: agniḥ uktheṣu aṃhaḥsu

original: (AVŚ_6,35.3a) vaiśvānaro 'ṅgirasāṃ stomam ukthaṃ ca cākḷpat /
analyzed: vaiśvānaraḥ ṅgirasām stomam uktham ca cākḷpat

original: (AVŚ_6,35.3c) aiṣu dyumnaṃ svar yamat //3//
analyzed: ā eṣu dyumnam svar yamat

original: (AVŚ_6,36.1a) ṛtāvānaṃ vaiśvānaram ṛtasya jyotiṣas patim /
analyzed: ṛtāvānam vaiśvānaram ṛtasya jyotiṣaḥ patim

original: (AVŚ_6,36.1c) ajasraṃ gharmam īmahe //1//
analyzed: ajasram gharmam īmahe

original: (AVŚ_6,36.2a) sa viśvā prati cākḷpa ṛtūṃr ut sṛjate vaśī /
analyzed: sa viśvā prati cākḷpe ṛtūṃr ud sṛjate vaśī

original: (AVŚ_6,36.2c) yajñasya vaya uttiran //2//
analyzed: yajñasya vayaḥ uttiran

original: (AVŚ_6,36.3a) agniḥ pareṣu dhāmasu kāmo bhūtasya bhavyasya /
analyzed: agniḥ pareṣu dhāmasu kāmaḥ bhūtasya bhavyasya

original: (AVŚ_6,36.3c) samrād eko vi rājati //3//
analyzed: ekaḥ vi rājati

original: (AVŚ_6,37.1a) upa prāgāt sahasrākṣo yuktvā śapatho ratham /
analyzed: upa prāgāt sahasra akṣaḥ yuktvā śapathaḥ ratham

original: (AVŚ_6,37.1c) śaptāram anvichan mama vṛka ivāvimato gṛham //1//
analyzed: śaptāram anvicchan mama vṛkaḥ iva a vimataḥ gṛham

original: (AVŚ_6,37.2a) pari ṇo vṛṅgdhi śapatha hradam agnir ivā dahan /
analyzed: pari naḥ vṛṅgdhi śapatha hradam agniḥ iva ā dahan

original: (AVŚ_6,37.2c) śaptāram atra no jahi divo vṛkṣam ivāśaniḥ //2//
