original: (AVŚ_6,37.3a) yo naḥ śapād aśapataḥ śapato yaś ca naḥ śapāt /
analyzed: yaḥ naḥ śapāt a śapataḥ śapataḥ yaḥ ca naḥ śapāt

original: (AVŚ_6,37.3c) śune peṣṭram ivāvakṣāmaṃ taṃ praty asyāmi mṛtyave //3//
analyzed: śune peṣṭram iva avakṣāmam tam prati asyāmi mṛtyave

original: (AVŚ_6,38.1a) siṃhe vyāghra uta yā pṛdākau tviṣir agnau brāhmaṇe sūrye yā /
analyzed: siṃhe vyāghre uta yā pṛdākau tviṣiḥ agnau brāhmaṇe sūrye yā

original: (AVŚ_6,38.1c) indraṃ yā devī subhagā jajāna sā na aitu varcasā saṃvidānā //1//
analyzed: indram yā devī subhagā jajāna sā naḥ aitu varcasā saṃvidānā

original: (AVŚ_6,38.2a) yā hastini dvīpini yā hiraṇye tviṣir apsu goṣu yā puruṣeṣu /
analyzed: yā hastini dvīpini yā hiraṇye tviṣiḥ apsu goṣu yā puruṣeṣu

original: (AVŚ_6,38.2c) indraṃ yā devī subhagā jajāna sā na aitu varcasā saṃvidānā //2//
analyzed: indram yā devī subhagā jajāna sā naḥ aitu varcasā saṃvidānā

original: (AVŚ_6,38.3a) rathe akṣeṣv ṛṣabhasya vāje vāte parjanye varuṇasya śuṣme /
analyzed: rathe akṣeṣu ṛṣabhasya vāje vāte parjanye varuṇasya śuṣme

original: (AVŚ_6,38.3c) indram yā devī subhagā jajāna sā na aitu varcasā saṃvidānā //3//
analyzed: indram yā devī subhagā jajāna sā na aitu varcasā saṃvidānā

original: (AVŚ_6,38.4a) rājanye dundubhāv āyatāyām aśvasya vāje puruṣasya māyau /
analyzed: rājanye dundubhau āyatāyām aśvasya vāje puruṣasya māyau

original: (AVŚ_6,38.4c) indram yā devī subhagā jajāna sā na aitu varcasā samvidānā //4//
analyzed: indram yā devī subhagā jajāna sā na aitu varcasā samvidānā

original: (AVŚ_6,39.1a) yaśo havir vardhatām indrajūtaṃ sahasravīryaṃ subhṛtaṃ sahaskṛtam /
analyzed: yaśaḥ haviḥ vardhatām indra jūtam sahasra vīryam su bhṛtam sahaskṛtam

original: (AVŚ_6,39.1c) prasarsrāṇam anu dīrghāya cakṣase haviṣmantaṃ mā vardhaya jyeṣṭhatātaye //1//

original: (AVŚ_6,39.2a) achā na indraṃ yaśasaṃ yaśobhir yaśasvinaṃ namasānā vidhema /
analyzed: achā naḥ indram yaśasam yaśobhiḥ yaśasvinam namasānāḥ vidhema

original: (AVŚ_6,39.2c) sa no rāsva rāṣṭram indrajūtaṃ tasya te rātau yaśasaḥ syāma //2//
analyzed: sa naḥ rāsva rāṣṭram indra jūtam tasya te rātau yaśasaḥ syāma

original: (AVŚ_6,39.3a) yaśā indro yaśā agnir yaśāḥ somo ajāyata /
analyzed: yaśāḥ indraḥ yaśāḥ agniḥ yaśāḥ somaḥ ajāyata

original: (AVŚ_6,39.3c) yaśā viśvasya bhūtasya aham asmi yaśastamaḥ //3//
analyzed: yaśāḥ viśvasya bhūtasya aham asmi yaśastamaḥ

original: (AVŚ_6,40.1a) abhayaṃ dyāvāpṛthivī ihāstu no 'bhayaṃ somaḥ savitā naḥ kṛṇotu /

original: (AVŚ_6,40.2c) aśatrv indro abhayaṃ naḥ kṛṇotv anyatra rājñām abhi yātu manyuḥ //2//
analyzed: a śatru indraḥ abhayam naḥ kṛṇotu anyatra rājñām abhi yātu manyuḥ

original: (AVŚ_6,40.3a) anamitraṃ no adharād anamitraṃ na uttarāt /
analyzed: anamitram naḥ adharāt anamitram naḥ uttarāt

original: (AVŚ_6,40.3c) indrānamitraṃ naḥ paścād anamitraṃ puras kṛdhi //3//
analyzed: indra anamitram naḥ paścāt anamitram puras kṛdhi

original: (AVŚ_6,41.1a) manase cetase dhiya ākūtaya uta cittaye /
analyzed: manase cetase dhiye ākūtaye uta cittaye

original: (AVŚ_6,41.1c) matyai śrutāya cakṣase vidhema haviṣā vayam //1//
analyzed: matyai śrutāya cakṣase vidhema haviṣā vayam

original: (AVŚ_6,41.2a) apānāya vyānāya prāṇāya bhūridhāyase /
analyzed: apānāya vyānāya prāṇāya bhūri dhāyase

original: (AVŚ_6,41.2c) sarasvatyā uruvyace vidhema haviṣā vayam //2//
analyzed: sarasvatyai uruvyace vidhema haviṣā vayam

original: (AVŚ_6,41.3a) mā no hāsiṣur ṛṣayo daivyā ye tanūpā ye nas tanvas tanūjāḥ /
analyzed: mā naḥ hāsiṣuḥ ṛṣayaḥ daivyāḥ ye tanū pāḥ ye naḥ tanvaḥ tanū jāḥ

analyzed: amartyāḥ martyām abhi naḥ sacadhvam āyuḥ dhatta prataram jīvase naḥ

analyzed: ava jyām iva dhanvanaḥ manyum tanomi te hṛdaḥ

original: (AVŚ_6,42.1c) yathā saṃmanasau bhūtvā sakhāyāv iva sacāvahai //1//
analyzed: yathā saṃmanasau bhūtvā sakhāyau iva sacāvahai

analyzed: sakhāyau iva sacāvahai ava manyum tanomi te

original: (AVŚ_6,42.2c) adhas te aśmano manyum upāsyāmasi yo guruḥ //2//

original: (AVŚ_6,42.3a) abhi tiṣṭhāmi te manyuṃ pārṣṇyā prapadena ca /

original: (AVŚ_6,42.3c) yathāvaśo na vādiṣo mama cittam upāyasi //3//
analyzed: yathā avaśaḥ na vādiṣaḥ mama cittam upāyasi

original: (AVŚ_6,43.1c) manyor vimanyukasyāyaṃ manyuśamana ucyate //1//

analyzed: darbhaḥ pṛthivyāḥ utthitaḥ manyu śamanaḥ ucyate

original: (AVŚ_6,43.3a) vi te hanavyāṃ śaraṇiṃ vi te mukhyāṃ nayāmasi /
analyzed: vi te hanavyām śaraṇim vi te mukhyām nayāmasi

original: (AVŚ_6,43.3c) yathāvaśo na vādiṣo mama cittam upāyasi //3//
analyzed: yathā avaśaḥ na vādiṣaḥ mama cittam upāyasi

original: (AVŚ_6,44.1a) asthād dyaur asthāt pṛthivy asthād viśvam idaṃ jagat /
analyzed: asthāt dyauḥ asthāt pṛthivī asthāt viśvam idam jagat

original: (AVŚ_6,44.1c) asthur vṛkṣā ūrdhvasvapnās tiṣṭhād rogo ayaṃ tava //1//

original: (AVŚ_6,44.2a) śataṃ yā bheṣajāni te sahasraṃ saṃgatāni ca /
analyzed: śatam yā bheṣajāni te sahasram saṃgatāni ca

original: (AVŚ_6,44.2c) śreṣṭham āsrāvabheṣajaṃ vasiṣṭhaṃ roganāśanam //2//
analyzed: śreṣṭham āsrāva bheṣajam vasiṣṭham roga nāśanam

original: (AVŚ_6,44.3a) rudrasya mūtram asy amṛtasya nābhiḥ /
analyzed: rudrasya mūtram asi amṛtasya nābhiḥ

original: (AVŚ_6,44.3c) viṣāṇakā nāma vā asi pitṝṇāṃ mūlād utthitā vātīkṛtanāśanī //3//

original: (AVŚ_6,45.1a) paro 'pehi manaspāpa kim aśastāni śaṃsasi /
analyzed: parā u pehi manaspāpa kim aśastāni śaṃsasi

original: (AVŚ_6,45.1c) parehi na tvā kāmaye vṛkṣāṃ vanāni saṃ cara gṛheṣu goṣu me manaḥ //1//
analyzed: parehi na tvā kāmaye vanāni sam cara gṛheṣu goṣu me manaḥ

original: (AVŚ_6,45.2a) avaśasā niḥśasā yat parāśasopārima jāgrato yat svapantaḥ /
analyzed: avaśasā niḥśasā yat parāśasā upārima jāgrataḥ yat svapantaḥ

original: (AVŚ_6,45.2c) agnir viśvāny apa duṣkṛtāny ajuṣṭāny āre asmad dadhātu //2//
analyzed: agniḥ viśvāni apa duṣkṛtāni a juṣṭāni āre asmat dadhātu

original: (AVŚ_6,45.3a) yad indra brahmaṇas pate 'pi mṛṣā carāmasi /
analyzed: yat indra brahmaṇas pate pi mṛṣā carāmasi

original: (AVŚ_6,45.3c) pracetā na āṅgiraso duritāt pātv aṃhasaḥ //3//
analyzed: pracetāḥ naḥ āṅgirasaḥ duritāt pātu aṃhasaḥ

original: (AVŚ_6,46.1a) yo na jīvo 'si na mṛto devānām amṛtagarbho 'si svapna /
analyzed: yaḥ na jīvaḥ si na mṛtaḥ devānām amṛta garbhaḥ si svapna

original: (AVŚ_6,46.1c) varuṇānī te mātā yamaḥ pitārarur nāmāsi //1//
analyzed: varuṇānī te mātā yamaḥ pitā araruḥ nāma asi

analyzed: vidma te svapna janitram deva jāmīnām putraḥ si yamasya karaṇaḥ

original: (AVŚ_6,46.2c) antako 'si mṛtyur asi taṃ tvā svapna tathā saṃ vidma sa naḥ svapna duṣvapnyāt pāhi //2//

original: (AVŚ_6,46.3a) yathā kalāṃ yathā śaphaṃ yatharṇaṃ saṃnayanti /
analyzed: yathā kalām yathā śapham yathā ṛṇam saṃnayanti

original: (AVŚ_6,46.3c) evā duṣvapnyaṃ sarvaṃ dviṣate saṃ nayāmasi //3//
analyzed: eva duṣvapnyam sarvam dviṣate sam nayāmasi

analyzed: agniḥ prātaḥsavane pātu asmān vaiśvānaraḥ viśva kṛt viśva śaṃbhūḥ

original: (AVŚ_6,47.1c) sa naḥ pāvako draviṇe dadhātv āyuṣmantaḥ sahabhakṣāḥ syāma //1//

analyzed: viśve devāḥ marutaḥ indraḥ asmān asmin dvitīye savane na jahyuḥ

original: (AVŚ_6,47.2c) āyuṣmantaḥ priyam eṣāṃ vadanto vayaṃ devānāṃ sumatau syāma //2//
analyzed: āyuṣmantaḥ priyam eṣām vadantaḥ vayam devānām sumatau syāma

original: (AVŚ_6,47.3a) idaṃ tṛtīyaṃ savanaṃ kavīnām ṛtena ye camasam airayanta /
analyzed: idam tṛtīyam savanam kavīnām ṛtena ye camasam airayanta

original: (AVŚ_6,47.3c) te saudhanvanāḥ svar ānaśānāḥ sviṣṭiṃ no abhi vasyo nayantu //3//
analyzed: te saudhanvanāḥ svar ānaśānāḥ su iṣṭim naḥ abhi vasyaḥ nayantu

original: (AVŚ_6,48.1a) śyeno 'si gāyatrachandā anu tvā rabhe /
analyzed: śyenaḥ si gāyatra chandāḥ anu tvā rabhe

original: (AVŚ_6,48.1c) svasti mā saṃ vahāsya yajñasyodṛci svāhā //1//
analyzed: svasti mā sam vaha asya yajñasya udṛci svāhā

original: (AVŚ_6,48.2a) ṛbhur asi jagachandā anu tvā rabhe /
analyzed: ṛbhuḥ asi jaga chandāḥ anu tvā rabhe

original: (AVŚ_6,48.2c) svasti mā saṃ vahāsya yajñasyodṛci svāhā //2//
analyzed: svasti mā sam vaha asya yajñasya udṛci svāhā

original: (AVŚ_6,48.3a) vṛṣāsi triṣṭupchandā anu tvā rabhe /
analyzed: vṛṣā asi triṣṭubh chandāḥ anu tvā rabhe

original: (AVŚ_6,48.3c) svasti mā saṃ vahāsya yajñasyodṛci svāhā //3//
analyzed: svasti mā sam vaha asya yajñasya udṛci svāhā

original: (AVŚ_6,49.1a) nahi te agne tanvaḥ krūram ānaṃśa martyaḥ /
analyzed: nahi te agne tanvaḥ krūram ānaṃśa martyaḥ

original: (AVŚ_6,49.1c) kapir babhasti tejanaṃ svaṃ jarāyu gaur iva //1//
analyzed: kapiḥ babhasti tejanam svam jarāyu gauḥ iva

original: (AVŚ_6,49.2a) meṣa iva vai saṃ ca vi corv acyase yad uttaradrāv uparaś ca khādataḥ /
analyzed: meṣaḥ iva vai sam ca vi ca uru acyase yat uttara drau uparaḥ ca khādataḥ

original: (AVŚ_6,49.2c) śīrṣṇā śiro 'psasāpso ardayann aṃśūn babhasti haritebhir āsabhiḥ //2//
analyzed: śīrṣṇā śiraḥ psasā apsaḥ ardayan aṃśūn babhasti haritebhiḥ āsabhiḥ

original: (AVŚ_6,49.3a) suparṇā vācam akratopa dyavy ākhare kṛṣṇā iṣirā anartiṣuḥ /
analyzed: suparṇāḥ vācam akrata upa dyavi ākhare kṛṣṇāḥ iṣirāḥ anartiṣuḥ

original: (AVŚ_6,49.3c) ni yan niyanti uparasya niṣkṛtiṃ purū reto dadhire sūryaśritaḥ //3//
analyzed: ni yat niyanti uparasya niṣkṛtim purū retaḥ dadhire sūrya śritaḥ

original: (AVŚ_6,50.1a) hataṃ tardaṃ samaṅkam ākhum aśvinā chintaṃ śiro api pṛṣṭīḥ śṛṇītam /
analyzed: hatam tardam samaṅkam ākhum aśvinā chintam śiraḥ api pṛṣṭīḥ śṛṇītam

original: (AVŚ_6,50.1c) yavān ned adān api nahyataṃ mukham athābhayaṃ kṛṇutaṃ dhānyāya //1//
analyzed: yavān na id adān api nahyatam mukham atha abhayam kṛṇutam dhānyāya

original: (AVŚ_6,50.2a) tarda hai pataṅga hai jabhya hā upakvasa /
analyzed: tarda hai pataṅga hai jabhya hā upakvasa

original: (AVŚ_6,50.2c) brahmevāsaṃsthitaṃ havir anadanta imān yavān ahiṃsanto apodita //2//
analyzed: brahma iva asaṃsthitam haviḥ a nadantaḥ imān yavān a hiṃsantaḥ apodita

original: (AVŚ_6,50.3a) tardāpate vaghāpate tṛṣṭajambhā ā śṛṇota me /
analyzed: tardā pate vaghā pate tṛṣṭa jambhāḥ ā śṛṇota me

original: (AVŚ_6,50.3c) ya āraṇyā vyadvarā ye ke ca stha vyadvarās tānt sarvān jambhayāmasi //3//
analyzed: ye āraṇyāḥ vyadvarāḥ ye ke ca stha vyadvarāḥ tān sarvān jambhayāmasi

original: (AVŚ_6,51.1a) vāyoḥ pūtaḥ pavitreṇa pratyaṅ somo ati drutaḥ /
analyzed: vāyoḥ pūtaḥ pavitreṇa pratyaṅ somaḥ ati drutaḥ

original: (AVŚ_6,51.1c) indrasya yujaḥ sakhā //1//
analyzed: indrasya yujaḥ sakhā

original: (AVŚ_6,51.2a) āpo asmān mātaraḥ sūdayantu ghṛtena no ghṛtapvaḥ punantu /
analyzed: āpaḥ asmān mātaraḥ sūdayantu ghṛtena naḥ ghṛta pvaḥ punantu

original: (AVŚ_6,51.2c) viśvaṃ hi ripraṃ pravahanti devīr ud id ābhyaḥ śucir ā pūta emi //2//
analyzed: viśvam hi ripram pravahanti devīḥ ud id ābhyaḥ śuciḥ ā pūtaḥ emi

original: (AVŚ_6,51.3a) yat kiṃ cedaṃ varuṇa daivye jane 'bhidrohaṃ manuṣyāś caranti /
analyzed: yat kim ca idam varuṇa daivye jane bhidroham manuṣyāḥ caranti

original: (AVŚ_6,51.3c) acittyā cet tava dharma yuyopima mā nas tasmād enaso deva rīriṣaḥ //3//
analyzed: acittyā ced tava dharma yuyopima mā naḥ tasmāt enasaḥ deva rīriṣaḥ

original: (AVŚ_6,52.1a) ut sūryo diva eti puro rakṣāṃsi nijūrvan /
analyzed: ud sūryaḥ divaḥ eti puras rakṣāṃsi nijūrvan

original: (AVŚ_6,52.1c) ādityaḥ parvatebhyo viśvadṛṣṭo adṛṣṭahā //1//
analyzed: ādityaḥ parvatebhyaḥ viśva dṛṣṭaḥ adṛṣṭa hā

original: (AVŚ_6,52.2a) ni gāvo goṣṭhe asadan ni mṛgāso avikṣata /
analyzed: ni gāvaḥ goṣṭhe asadan ni mṛgāsaḥ avikṣata

original: (AVŚ_6,52.2c) ny ūrmayo nadīnaṃ ny adṛṣṭā alipsata //2//
analyzed: ni ūrmayaḥ nadīnam ni adṛṣṭāḥ alipsata

original: (AVŚ_6,52.3a) āyurdadaṃ vipaścitaṃ śrutāṃ kaṇvasya vīrudham /
analyzed: āyurdadam vipaścitam śrutām kaṇvasya vīrudham

original: (AVŚ_6,52.3c) ābhāriṣaṃ viśvabheṣajīm asyādṛṣṭān ni śamayat //3//
analyzed: ābhāriṣam viśva bheṣajīm asya adṛṣṭān ni śamayat

original: (AVŚ_6,53.1a) dyauś ca ma idaṃ pṛthivī ca pracetasau śukro bṛhan dakṣiṇayā pipartu /
analyzed: dyauḥ ca me idam pṛthivī ca pracetasau śukraḥ bṛhan dakṣiṇayā pipartu

original: (AVŚ_6,53.1c) anu svadhā cikitāṃ somo agnir vāyur naḥ pātu savitā bhagaś ca //1//
analyzed: anu svadhā cikitām somaḥ agniḥ vāyuḥ naḥ pātu savitā bhagaḥ ca

original: (AVŚ_6,53.2a) punaḥ prāṇaḥ punar ātmā na aitu punaś cakṣuḥ punar asur na aitu /
analyzed: punar prāṇaḥ punar ātmā naḥ aitu punar cakṣuḥ punar asuḥ naḥ aitu

original: (AVŚ_6,53.2c) vaiśvānaro no adabdhas tanūpā antas tiṣṭhāti duritāni viśvā //2//
analyzed: vaiśvānaraḥ naḥ adabdhaḥ tanū pāḥ antar tiṣṭhāti duritāni viśvā

original: (AVŚ_6,53.3a) saṃ varcasā payasā saṃ tanūbhir aganmahi manasā saṃ śivena /
analyzed: sam varcasā payasā sam tanūbhiḥ aganmahi manasā sam śivena

original: (AVŚ_6,53.3c) tvaṣṭā no atra varīyaḥ kṛṇotv anu no mārṣṭu tanvo yad viriṣṭam //3//
analyzed: tvaṣṭā naḥ atra varīyaḥ kṛṇotu anu naḥ mārṣṭu tanvaḥ yat viriṣṭam

original: (AVŚ_6,54.1a) idaṃ tad yuja uttaram indraṃ śumbhāmy aṣṭaye /
analyzed: idam tat yujaḥ uttaram indram śumbhāmi aṣṭaye

original: (AVŚ_6,54.1c) asya kṣatraṃ śriyaṃ mahīṃ vṛṣṭir iva vardhayā tṛṇam //1//
analyzed: asya kṣatram śriyam mahīm vṛṣṭiḥ iva vardhaya tṛṇam

original: (AVŚ_6,54.2a) asmai kṣatram agnīṣomāv asmai dhārayataṃ rayim /
analyzed: asmai kṣatram agnīṣomau asmai dhārayatam rayim

original: (AVŚ_6,54.2c) imaṃ rāṣṭrasyābhīvarge kṛṇutam yuja uttaram //2//
analyzed: imam rāṣṭrasya abhīvarge kṛṇutam yujaḥ uttaram

original: (AVŚ_6,54.3a) sabandhuś cāsabandhuś ca yo asmāṃ abhidāsati /
analyzed: sabandhuḥ ca a sabandhuḥ ca yaḥ asmām abhidāsati

original: (AVŚ_6,54.3c) sarvaṃ taṃ randhayāsi me yajamānāya sunvate //3//
analyzed: sarvam tam randhayāsi me yajamānāya sunvate

original: (AVŚ_6,55.1a) ye panthāno bahavo devayānā antarā dyāvāpṛthivī saṃcaranti /
analyzed: ye panthānaḥ bahavaḥ deva yānāḥ antarā dyāvāpṛthivī saṃcaranti

original: (AVŚ_6,55.1c) teṣām ajyāniṃ yatamo vahāti tasmai mā devāḥ pari datteha sarve //1//
analyzed: teṣām ajyānim yatamaḥ vahāti tasmai mā devāḥ pari datta iha sarve

original: (AVŚ_6,55.2a) grīṣmo hemantaḥ śiśiro vasantaḥ śarad varṣāḥ svite no dadhāta /
analyzed: grīṣmaḥ hemantaḥ śiśiraḥ vasantaḥ śarad varṣāḥ svite naḥ dadhāta

original: (AVŚ_6,55.2c) ā no goṣu bhajatā prajāyāṃ nivāta id vaḥ śaraṇe syāma //2//
analyzed: ā naḥ goṣu bhajata prajāyām nivāte id vaḥ śaraṇe syāma

original: (AVŚ_6,55.3a) idāvatsarāya parivatsarāya saṃvatsarāya kṛṇutā bṛhan namaḥ /
analyzed: idāvatsarāya parivatsarāya saṃvatsarāya kṛṇuta bṛhat namaḥ

original: (AVŚ_6,55.3c) teṣāṃ vayaṃ sumatau yajñiyānām api bhadre sau manase syāma //3//
analyzed: teṣām vayam sumatau yajñiyānām api bhadre sau manase syāma

original: (AVŚ_6,56.1a) mā no devā ahir vadhīt satokānt sahapuruṣān /
analyzed: mā naḥ devāḥ ahiḥ vadhīt sa tokān saha puruṣān

original: (AVŚ_6,56.1c) samyataṃ na vi ṣparad vyāttaṃ na saṃ yaman namo devajanebhyaḥ /
analyzed: samyatam na vi sparat vyāttam na sam yaman namaḥ deva janebhyaḥ

original: (AVŚ_6,56.2a) namo 'stv asitāya namas tiraścirājaye /
analyzed: namaḥ stu asitāya namaḥ tiraścirājaye

original: (AVŚ_6,56.2c) svajāya babhrave namo namo devajanebhyaḥ //2//
analyzed: svajāya babhrave namaḥ namaḥ deva janebhyaḥ

original: (AVŚ_6,56.3a) saṃ te hanmi datā dataḥ sam u te hanvā hanū /
analyzed: sam te hanmi datā dataḥ sam u te hanvā hanū

original: (AVŚ_6,56.3c) saṃ te jihvayā jihvāṃ sam v āsnāha āsyam //3//
analyzed: sam te jihvayā jihvām sam u āsnā ahe āsyam

original: (AVŚ_6,57.1a) idam id vā u bheṣajam idaṃ rudrasya bheṣajam /
analyzed: idam id vai u bheṣajam idam rudrasya bheṣajam

original: (AVŚ_6,57.1c) yeneṣum ekatejanāṃ śataśalyām apabravat //1//
analyzed: yena iṣum eka tejanām śata śalyām apabravat

original: (AVŚ_6,57.2a) jālāṣeṇābhi ṣiñcata jālāṣeṇopa siñcata /
analyzed: jālāṣeṇa abhi siñcata jālāṣeṇa upa siñcata

original: (AVŚ_6,57.2c) jālāṣam ugraṃ bheṣajaṃ tena no mṛḍa jīvase //2//
analyzed: jālāṣam ugram bheṣajam tena naḥ mṛḍa jīvase

original: (AVŚ_6,57.3a) śaṃ ca no mayaś ca no mā ca naḥ kiṃ canāmamat /
analyzed: śam ca naḥ mayaḥ ca naḥ mā ca naḥ kim cana amamat

original: (AVŚ_6,57.3c) kṣamā rapo viśvaṃ no astu bheṣajaṃ sarvaṃ no astu bheṣajam //3//
analyzed: kṣamā rapaḥ viśvam naḥ astu bheṣajam sarvam naḥ astu bheṣajam

original: (AVŚ_6,58.1a) yaśasaṃ mendro maghavān kṛṇotu yaśasaṃ dyāvāpṛthivī ubhe ime /
analyzed: yaśasam mā indraḥ maghavān kṛṇotu yaśasam dyāvāpṛthivī ubhe ime

original: (AVŚ_6,58.1c) yaśasaṃ mā devaḥ savitā kṛṇotu priyo dātur dakṣiṇāyā iha syām //1//
analyzed: yaśasam mā devaḥ savitā kṛṇotu priyaḥ dātuḥ dakṣiṇāyāḥ iha syām

original: (AVŚ_6,58.2a) yathendro dyāvāpṛthivyor yaśasvān yathāpa oṣadhīṣu yaśasvatīḥ /
analyzed: yathā indraḥ dyāvāpṛthivyoḥ yaśasvān yathā āpaḥ oṣadhīṣu yaśasvatīḥ

original: (AVŚ_6,58.2c) evā viśveṣu deveṣu vayaṃ sarveṣu yaśasaḥ syāma //2//
analyzed: eva viśveṣu deveṣu vayam sarveṣu yaśasaḥ syāma

original: (AVŚ_6,58.3a) yaśā indro yaśā agnir yaśāḥ somo ajāyata /
analyzed: yaśāḥ indraḥ yaśāḥ agniḥ yaśāḥ somaḥ ajāyata

original: (AVŚ_6,58.3c) yaśā viśvasya bhūtasyāham asmi yaśastamaḥ //3//
analyzed: yaśāḥ viśvasya bhūtasya aham asmi yaśastamaḥ

original: (AVŚ_6,59.1a) anaḍudbhyas tvaṃ prathamaṃ dhenubhyas tvam arundhati /
analyzed: anaḍudbhyaḥ tvam prathamam dhenubhyaḥ tvam arundhati

original: (AVŚ_6,59.1c) adhenave vayase śarma yacha catuṣpade //1//
analyzed: a dhenave vayase śarma yaccha catuṣpade

original: (AVŚ_6,59.2a) śarma yachatv oṣadhiḥ saha devīr arundhatī /
analyzed: śarma yacchatu oṣadhiḥ saha devīḥ arundhatī

original: (AVŚ_6,59.2c) karat payasvantaṃ goṣṭham ayakṣmāṃ uta pūruṣān //2//
analyzed: karat payasvantam goṣṭham ayakṣmān uta pūruṣān

original: (AVŚ_6,59.3a) viśvarūpāṃ subhagām achāvadāmi jīvalām /
analyzed: viśva rūpām subhagām achāvadāmi jīvalām

original: (AVŚ_6,59.3c) sā no rudrasyāstāṃ hetiṃ dūraṃ nayatu gobhyaḥ //3//
analyzed: sā naḥ rudrasya astām hetim dūram nayatu gobhyaḥ

original: (AVŚ_6,60.1a) ayam ā yāty aryamā purastād viṣitastupaḥ /
analyzed: ayam ā yāti aryamā purastāt viṣita stupaḥ

original: (AVŚ_6,60.1c) asyā ichann agruvai patim uta jāyām ajānaye //1//
analyzed: asyai icchan agruvai patim uta jāyām a jānaye

original: (AVŚ_6,60.2a) aśramad iyam aryamann anyāsāṃ samanaṃ yatī /
analyzed: aśramat iyam aryaman anyāsām samanam yatī

original: (AVŚ_6,60.2c) aṅgo nv aryamann asyā anyāḥ samanam āyati //2//
analyzed: aṅga u nu aryaman asyāḥ anyāḥ samanam āyati

original: (AVŚ_6,60.3a) dhātā dādhāra pṛthivīm dhātā dyām uta sūryam /
analyzed: dhātā dādhāra pṛthivīm dhātā dyām uta sūryam

original: (AVŚ_6,60.3c) dhātāsyā agruvai patim dadhātu pratikāmyam //3//
analyzed: dhātā asyai agruvai patim dadhātu pratikāmyam

original: (AVŚ_6,61.1a) mahyam āpo madhumad erayantāṃ mahyaṃ sūro abharaj jyotiṣe kam /
analyzed: mahyam āpaḥ madhumat erayantām mahyam sūraḥ abharat jyotiṣe kam

original: (AVŚ_6,61.1c) mahyaṃ devā uta viśve tapojā mahyaṃ devaḥ savitā vyaco dhāt //1//
analyzed: mahyam devāḥ uta viśve tapaḥ jāḥ mahyam devaḥ savitā vyacaḥ dhāt

original: (AVŚ_6,61.2a) ahaṃ viveca pṛthivīm uta dyām aham ṛtūṃr ajanayaṃ sapta sākam /
analyzed: aham viveca pṛthivīm uta dyām aham ṛtūṃr ajanayam sapta sākam

original: (AVŚ_6,61.2c) ahaṃ satyam anṛtaṃ yad vadāmy ahaṃ daivīṃ pari vācam viśaś ca //2//
analyzed: aham satyam anṛtam yat vadāmi aham daivīm pari vācam viśaḥ ca

original: (AVŚ_6,61.3a) ahaṃ jajāna pṛthivīm uta dyām aham ṛtūṃr ajanayaṃ sapta sindhūn /
analyzed: aham jajāna pṛthivīm uta dyām aham ṛtūṃr ajanayam sapta sindhūn

original: (AVŚ_6,61.3c) ahaṃ satvam anṛtaṃ yad vadāmi yo agnīṣomāv ajuṣe sakhāyā //3//
analyzed: aham satvam anṛtam yat vadāmi yaḥ agnīṣomau ajuṣe sakhāyā

original: (AVŚ_6,62.1a) vaiśvānaro raśmibhir naḥ punātu vātaḥ prāṇeneṣiro nabhobhiḥ /
analyzed: vaiśvānaraḥ raśmibhiḥ naḥ punātu vātaḥ prāṇena iṣiraḥ nabhobhiḥ

original: (AVŚ_6,62.1c) dyāvāpṛthivī payasā payasvatī ṛtāvarī yajñiye na punītām //1//
analyzed: dyāvāpṛthivī payasā payasvatī ṛtāvarī yajñiye na punītām

original: (AVŚ_6,62.2a) vaiśvānarīṃ sūnṛtām ā rabhadhvaṃ yasyā āśās tanvo vītapṛṣṭhāḥ /
analyzed: vaiśvānarīm sūnṛtām ā rabhadhvam yasyāḥ āśāḥ tanvaḥ vīta pṛṣṭhāḥ

original: (AVŚ_6,62.2c) tayā gṛṇantaḥ sadhamādeṣu vayaṃ syāma patayo rayīnām //2//
analyzed: tayā gṛṇantaḥ sadhamādeṣu vayam syāma patayaḥ rayīnām

original: (AVŚ_6,62.3a) vaiśvānarīṃ varcasa ā rabhadhvaṃ śuddhā bhavantaḥ śucayaḥ pāvakāḥ /
analyzed: vaiśvānarīm varcase ā rabhadhvam śuddhāḥ bhavantaḥ śucayaḥ pāvakāḥ

original: (AVŚ_6,62.3c) iheḍayā sadhamādaṃ madanto jyok paśyema sūryam uccarantam //3//
analyzed: iha iḍayā sadhamādam madantaḥ jyok paśyema sūryam uccarantam

original: (AVŚ_6,63.1a) yat te devī nirṛtir ābabandha dāma grīvāsv avimokyaṃ yat /
analyzed: yat te devī nirṛtiḥ ābabandha dāma grīvāsu avimokyam yat

original: (AVŚ_6,63.1c) tat te vi ṣyāmy āyuṣe varcase balāyādomadam annam addhi prasūtaḥ //1//
analyzed: tat te vi syāmi āyuṣe varcase balāya adomadam annam addhi prasūtaḥ

original: (AVŚ_6,63.2a) namo 'stu te nirṛte tigmatejo 'yasmayān vi cṛtā bandhapāśān /
analyzed: namaḥ stu te nirṛte tigma tejaḥ yasmayān vi cṛta bandha pāśān

original: (AVŚ_6,63.2c) yamo mahyam punar it tvām dadāti tasmai yamāya namo astu mṛtyave //2//
analyzed: yamaḥ mahyam punar id tvām dadāti tasmai yamāya namaḥ astu mṛtyave

original: (AVŚ_6,63.3a) ayasmaye drupade bedhiṣa ihābhihito mṛtyubhir ye sahasram /
analyzed: ayasmaye drupade bedhiṣe iha abhihitaḥ mṛtyubhiḥ ye sahasram

original: (AVŚ_6,63.3c) yamena tvaṃ pitṛbhiḥ saṃvidāna uttamaṃ nākam adhi rohayemam //3//
analyzed: yamena tvam pitṛbhiḥ saṃvidānaḥ uttamam nākam adhi rohaya imam

original: (AVŚ_6,63.4a) saṃsam id yuvase vṛṣann agne viśvāny arya ā /
analyzed: saṃsam id yuvase vṛṣan agne viśvāni aryaḥ ā

original: (AVŚ_6,63.4c) iḍas pade sam idhyase sa no vasūny ā bhara //4//
analyzed: iḍaḥ pade sam idhyase sa naḥ vasūni ā bhara

original: (AVŚ_6,64.1a) saṃ jānīdhvaṃ saṃ pṛcyadhvaṃ saṃ vo manāṃsi jānatām /
analyzed: sam jānīdhvam sam pṛcyadhvam sam vaḥ manāṃsi jānatām

original: (AVŚ_6,64.1c) devā bhāgaṃ yathā pūrve samjānānā upāsate //1//
analyzed: devāḥ bhāgam yathā pūrve samjānānāḥ upāsate

original: (AVŚ_6,64.2a) samāno mantraḥ samitiḥ samānī samānaṃ vrataṃ saha cittam eṣām /
analyzed: samānaḥ mantraḥ samitiḥ samānī samānam vratam saha cittam eṣām

original: (AVŚ_6,64.2c) samānena vo haviṣā juhomi samānaṃ ceto abhisaṃviśadhvam //2//
analyzed: samānena vaḥ haviṣā juhomi samānam cetaḥ abhisaṃviśadhvam

original: (AVŚ_6,64.3a) samānī va ākūtiḥ samānā hṛdayāni vaḥ /
analyzed: samānī vaḥ ākūtiḥ samānā hṛdayāni vaḥ

original: (AVŚ_6,64.3c) samānam astu vo manaḥ yathā vaḥ susahāsati //3//
analyzed: samānam astu vaḥ manaḥ yathā vaḥ su sahā asati

original: (AVŚ_6,65.1a) ava manyur avāyatāva bāhū manoyujā /
analyzed: ava manyuḥ avāyata ava bāhū manaḥ yujā

original: (AVŚ_6,65.1c) parāśara tvaṃ teṣām parāñcaṃ śuṣmam ardayādhā no rayim ā kṛdhi //1//
analyzed: parāśara tvam teṣām parāñcam śuṣmam ardaya adha naḥ rayim ā kṛdhi

original: (AVŚ_6,65.2a) nirhastebhyo nairhastam yaṃ devāḥ śarum asyatha /
analyzed: nirhastebhyaḥ nairhastam yam devāḥ śarum asyatha

original: (AVŚ_6,65.2c) vṛścāmi śatrūṇāṃ bāhūn anena haviṣā 'ham //2//
analyzed: vṛścāmi śatrūṇām bāhūn anena haviṣā ham

original: (AVŚ_6,65.3a) indraś cakāra prathamaṃ nairhastam asurebhyaḥ /
analyzed: indraḥ cakāra prathamam nairhastam asurebhyaḥ

original: (AVŚ_6,65.3c) jayantu satvāno mama sthireṇendreṇa medinā //3//
analyzed: jayantu satvānaḥ mama sthireṇa indreṇa medinā

original: (AVŚ_6,66.1a) nirhastaḥ śatrur abhidāsann astu ye senābhir yudham āyanty asmān /
analyzed: nirhastaḥ śatruḥ abhidāsan astu ye senābhiḥ yudham āyanti asmān

original: (AVŚ_6,66.1c) sam arpayendra mahatā vadhena drātv eṣām aghahāro vividdhaḥ //1//
analyzed: sam arpaya indra mahatā vadhena drātu eṣām agha hāraḥ vividdhaḥ

original: (AVŚ_6,66.2a) ātanvānā āyachanto 'syanto ye ca dhāvatha /
analyzed: ātanvānāḥ āyacchantaḥ syantaḥ ye ca dhāvatha

original: (AVŚ_6,66.2c) nirhastāḥ śatravaḥ sthanendro vo 'dya parāśarīt //2//
analyzed: nirhastāḥ śatravaḥ sthana indraḥ vaḥ dya parāśarīt

original: (AVŚ_6,66.3a) nirhastāḥ santu śatravo 'ṅgaiṣāṃ mlāpayāmasi /
analyzed: nirhastāḥ santu śatravaḥ ṅga eṣām mlāpayāmasi

original: (AVŚ_6,66.3c) athaiṣām indra vedāṃsi śataśo vi bhajāmahai //3//
analyzed: atha eṣām indra vedāṃsi śataśas vi bhajāmahai

original: (AVŚ_6,67.1a) pari vartmāni sarvata indraḥ pūṣā ca sasratuḥ /
analyzed: pari vartmāni sarvatas indraḥ pūṣā ca sasratuḥ

original: (AVŚ_6,67.1c) muhyantv adyāmūḥ senā amitrāṇāṃ parastarām //1//
analyzed: muhyantu adya amūḥ senāḥ amitrāṇām parastarām

original: (AVŚ_6,67.2a) mūḍhā amitrāś caratāśīrṣāṇa ivāhayaḥ /
analyzed: mūḍhāḥ amitrāḥ carata a śīrṣāṇaḥ iva ahayaḥ

original: (AVŚ_6,67.2c) teṣāṃ vo agnimūḍhānām indro hantu varaṃvaram //2//
analyzed: teṣām vaḥ agni mūḍhānām indraḥ hantu varaṃvaram

original: (AVŚ_6,67.3a) aiṣu nahya vṛṣājinaṃ hariṇasya bhiyaṃ kṛdhi /
analyzed: ā eṣu nahya vṛṣā ajinam hariṇasya bhiyam kṛdhi

original: (AVŚ_6,67.3c) parāṅ amitra eṣatv arvācī gaur upeṣatu //3//
analyzed: parāṅ amitraḥ eṣatu arvācī gauḥ upeṣatu

original: (AVŚ_6,68.1a) āyam agant savitā kṣureṇoṣṇena vāya udakenehi /
analyzed: ā ayam agan savitā kṣureṇa uṣṇena vāyo udakena ihi

original: (AVŚ_6,68.1c) ādityā rudrā vasava undantu sacetasaḥ somasya rājño vapata pracetasaḥ //1//
analyzed: ādityāḥ rudrāḥ vasavaḥ undantu sacetasaḥ somasya rājñaḥ vapata pracetasaḥ

original: (AVŚ_6,68.2a) aditiḥ śmaśru vapatv āpa undantu varcasā /
analyzed: aditiḥ śmaśru vapatu āpaḥ undantu varcasā

original: (AVŚ_6,68.2c) cikitsatu prajāpatir dīrghāyutvāya cakṣase //2//
analyzed: cikitsatu prajāpatiḥ dīrgha āyu tvāya cakṣase

original: (AVŚ_6,68.3a) yenāvapat savitā kṣureṇa somasya rājño varuṇasya vidvān /
analyzed: yena avapat savitā kṣureṇa somasya rājñaḥ varuṇasya vidvān

original: (AVŚ_6,68.3c) tena brahmāṇo vapatedam asya gomān aśvavān ayam astu prajāvān //3//
analyzed: tena brahmāṇaḥ vapata idam asya gomān aśvavān ayam astu prajāvān

original: (AVŚ_6,69.1a) girāv aragarāṭeṣu hiranye goṣu yad yaśaḥ /
analyzed: girau aragarāṭeṣu hiranye goṣu yat yaśaḥ

original: (AVŚ_6,69.1c) surāyāṃ sicyamānāyāṃ kīlāle madhu tan mayi //1//
analyzed: surāyām sicyamānāyām kīlāle madhu tat mayi

original: (AVŚ_6,69.2a) aśvinā sāragheṇa mā madhunāṅktaṃ śubhas patī /
analyzed: aśvinā sāragheṇa mā madhunā aṅktam śubhaḥ patī

original: (AVŚ_6,69.2c) yathā bhargasvatīṃ vācam āvadāni janāṃ anu //2//
analyzed: yathā bhargasvatīm vācam āvadāni janān anu

original: (AVŚ_6,69.3a) mayi varco atho yaśo 'tho yajñasya yat payaḥ /
analyzed: mayi varcaḥ atha u yaśaḥ tha u yajñasya yat payaḥ

original: (AVŚ_6,69.3c) tan mayi prajāpatir divi dyām iva dṛṃhatu //3//
analyzed: tat mayi prajāpatiḥ divi dyām iva dṛṃhatu

original: (AVŚ_6,70.1a) yathā māṃsam yathā surā yathākṣā adhidevane /
analyzed: yathā māṃsam yathā surā yathā akṣāḥ adhidevane

original: (AVŚ_6,70.1c) yathā puṃso vṛṣaṇyata striyāṃ nihanyate manaḥ /
analyzed: yathā puṃsaḥ vṛṣaṇyataḥ striyām nihanyate manaḥ

original: (AVŚ_6,70.1e) evā te aghnye mano 'dhi vatse ni hanyatām //1//
analyzed: eva te aghnye manaḥ dhi vatse ni hanyatām

original: (AVŚ_6,70.2a) yathā hastī hastinyāḥ padena padam udyuje /
analyzed: yathā hastī hastinyāḥ padena padam

original: (AVŚ_6,70.2c) yathā puṃso vṛṣaṇyata striyāṃ nihanyate manaḥ /
analyzed: yathā puṃsaḥ vṛṣaṇyataḥ striyām nihanyate manaḥ

original: (AVŚ_6,70.2e) evā te aghnye mano 'dhi vatse ni hanyatām //2//
analyzed: eva te aghnye manaḥ dhi vatse ni hanyatām

original: (AVŚ_6,70.3a) yathā pradhir yathopadhir yathā nabhyaṃ pradhāv adhi /
analyzed: yathā pradhiḥ yathā upadhiḥ yathā nabhyam pradhau adhi

original: (AVŚ_6,70.3c) yathā puṃso vṛṣaṇyata striyāṃ nihanyate manaḥ /
analyzed: yathā puṃsaḥ vṛṣaṇyataḥ striyām nihanyate manaḥ

original: (AVŚ_6,70.3e) evā te aghnye mano 'dhi vatse ni hanyatām //3//
analyzed: eva te aghnye manaḥ dhi vatse ni hanyatām

original: (AVŚ_6,71.1a) yad annam admi bahudhā virūpaṃ hiraṇyam aśvam uta gām ajām avim /
analyzed: yat annam admi bahudhā virūpam hiraṇyam aśvam uta gām ajām avim

original: (AVŚ_6,71.1c) yad eva kiṃ ca pratijagrahāham agniṣ ṭad dhotā suhutaṃ kṛnotu //1//
analyzed: yat eva kim ca pratijagraha aham agniḥ tat hotā su hutam kṛnotu

original: (AVŚ_6,71.2a) yan mā hutam ahutam ājagāma dattaṃ pitṛbhir anumataṃ manuṣyaiḥ /
analyzed: yat mā hutam a hutam ājagāma dattam pitṛbhiḥ anumatam manuṣyaiḥ

original: (AVŚ_6,71.2c) yasmān me mana ud iva rārajīty agniṣ ṭad dhotā suhutaṃ kṛṇotu //2//
analyzed: yasmāt me manaḥ ud iva rāraji iti agniḥ tat hotā su hutam kṛṇotu

original: (AVŚ_6,71.3a) yad annam admy anṛtena devā dāsyann adāsyann uta saṃgṛṇāmi /
analyzed: yat annam admi anṛtena devāḥ dāsyan a dāsyan uta saṃgṛṇāmi

original: (AVŚ_6,71.3c) vaiśvānarasya mahato mahimnā śivaṃ mahyaṃ madhumad astv annam //3//
analyzed: vaiśvānarasya mahataḥ mahimnā śivam mahyam madhumat astu annam

original: (AVŚ_6,72.1a) yathāsitaḥ prathayate vaśām anu vapūṃṣi kṛṇvann asurasya māyayā /
analyzed: yathā asitaḥ prathayate vaśām anu vapūṃṣi kṛṇvan asurasya māyayā

original: (AVŚ_6,72.1c) evā te śepaḥ sahasāyam arko 'ṅgenāṅgaṃ saṃsamakaṃ kṛṇotu //1//
analyzed: eva te śepaḥ sahasā ayam arkaḥ ṅgena aṅgam saṃsamakam kṛṇotu

original: (AVŚ_6,72.2a) yathā pasas tāyādaraṃ vātena sthūlabhaṃ kṛtam /
analyzed: yathā pasaḥ tāyā ādaram vātena sthūlabham kṛtam

original: (AVŚ_6,72.2c) yāvat parasvataḥ pasas tāvat te vardhatāṃ pasaḥ //2//
analyzed: yāvat parasvataḥ pasaḥ tāvat te vardhatām pasaḥ

original: (AVŚ_6,72.3a) yāvadaṅgīnaṃ pārasvataṃ hāstinaṃ gārdabham ca yat /
analyzed: yāvadaṅgīnam pārasvatam hāstinam gārdabham ca yat

original: (AVŚ_6,72.3c) yāvad aśvasya vājinas tāvat te vardhatāṃ pasaḥ //3//
analyzed: yāvat aśvasya vājinaḥ tāvat te vardhatām pasaḥ

original: (AVŚ_6,73.1a) eha yātu varuṇaḥ somo agnir bṛhaspatir vasubhir eha yātu /
analyzed: ā iha yātu varuṇaḥ somaḥ agniḥ bṛhaspatiḥ vasubhiḥ ā iha yātu

original: (AVŚ_6,73.1c) asya śriyam upasaṃyāta sarva ugrasya cettuḥ saṃmanasaḥ sajātāḥ //1//
analyzed: asya śriyam upasaṃyāta sarve ugrasya cettuḥ saṃmanasaḥ sajātāḥ

original: (AVŚ_6,73.2a) yo vaḥ śuṣmo hṛdayeṣv antar ākūtir yā vo manasi praviṣṭā /
analyzed: yaḥ vaḥ śuṣmaḥ hṛdayeṣu antar ākūtiḥ yā vaḥ manasi praviṣṭā

original: (AVŚ_6,73.2c) tānt sīvayāmi haviṣā ghṛtena mayi sajātā ramatir vo astu //2//
analyzed: tān sīvayāmi haviṣā ghṛtena mayi sajātā ramatiḥ vaḥ astu

original: (AVŚ_6,73.3a) ihaiva sta māpa yātādhy asmat pūṣā parastād apatham vaḥ kṛṇotu /
analyzed: iha eva sta mā apa yāta adhi asmat pūṣā parastāt apatham vaḥ kṛṇotu

original: (AVŚ_6,73.3c) vāstoṣ patir anu vo johavītu mayi sajātā ramatiḥ vo astu //3//
analyzed: vāstoḥ patiḥ anu vaḥ johavītu mayi sajātā ramatiḥ vaḥ astu

original: (AVŚ_6,74.1a) saṃ vaḥ pṛcyantāṃ tanvaḥ saṃ manāṃsi sam u vratā /
analyzed: sam vaḥ pṛcyantām tanvaḥ sam manāṃsi sam u vratā

original: (AVŚ_6,74.1c) sam vo 'yam brahmaṇas patir bhagaḥ saṃ vo ajīgamat //1//
analyzed: sam vaḥ yam brahmaṇaḥ patiḥ bhagaḥ sam vaḥ ajīgamat

original: (AVŚ_6,74.2a) samjñapanaṃ vo manaso 'tho samjñapanam hṛdaḥ /
analyzed: samjñapanam vaḥ manasaḥ samjñapanam hṛdaḥ

original: (AVŚ_6,74.2c) atho bhagasya yac chrāntaṃ tena saṃjñapayāmi vaḥ //2//
analyzed: atha u bhagasya yat śrāntam tena saṃjñapayāmi vaḥ

original: (AVŚ_6,74.3a) yathādityā vasubhiḥ sambabhūvur marudbhir ugrā ahṛṇīyamānāḥ /
analyzed: yathā ādityāḥ vasubhiḥ sambabhūvuḥ marudbhiḥ ugrāḥ a hṛṇīyamānāḥ

original: (AVŚ_6,74.3c) evā triṇāmann ahṛṇīyamāna imān janānt saṃmanasas kṛdhīha //3//
analyzed: eva tri nāman a hṛṇīyamānaḥ imān janān saṃmanasaḥ kṛdhī iha

original: (AVŚ_6,75.1a) nir amuṃ nuda okasaḥ sapatno yaḥ pṛtanyati /
analyzed: niḥ amum nude okasaḥ sapatnaḥ yaḥ pṛtanyati

original: (AVŚ_6,75.1c) nairbādhyena haviṣendra enaṃ parāśarīt //1//
analyzed: nairbādhyena haviṣā indraḥ enam parāśarīt

original: (AVŚ_6,75.2a) paramāṃ taṃ parāvatam indro nudatu vṛtrahā /
analyzed: paramām tam parāvatam indraḥ nudatu vṛtrahā

original: (AVŚ_6,75.2c) yato na punar āyati śaśvatībhyaḥ samābhyaḥ //2//
analyzed: yatas na punar āyati śaśvatībhyaḥ samābhyaḥ

original: (AVŚ_6,75.3a) etu tisraḥ parāvata etu pañca janāṃ ati /
analyzed: etu tisraḥ parāvataḥ etu pañca janān ati

original: (AVŚ_6,75.3c) etu tisro 'ti rocanā yato na punar āyati /
analyzed: etu tisraḥ ti rocanā yatas na punar āyati

original: (AVŚ_6,75.3e) śaśvatībhyaḥ samābhyo yāvat sūryo asad divi //3//
analyzed: śaśvatībhyaḥ samābhyaḥ yāvat sūryaḥ asat divi

original: (AVŚ_6,76.1a) ya enaṃ pariṣīdanti samādadhati cakṣase /
analyzed: ye enam pariṣīdanti samādadhati cakṣase

original: (AVŚ_6,76.1c) saṃpreddho agnir jihvābhir ud etu hṛdayād adhi //1//
analyzed: saṃpreddhaḥ agniḥ jihvābhiḥ ud etu hṛdayāt adhi

original: (AVŚ_6,76.2a) agneḥ sāmtapanasyāham āyuṣe padam ā rabhe /
analyzed: agneḥ sāmtapanasya aham āyuṣe padam ā rabhe

original: (AVŚ_6,76.2c) addhātir yasya paśyati dhūmam udyantam āsyataḥ //2//
analyzed: addhātiḥ yasya paśyati dhūmam udyantam āsyataḥ

original: (AVŚ_6,76.3a) yo asya samidhaṃ veda kṣatriyeṇa samāhitām /
analyzed: yaḥ asya samidham veda kṣatriyeṇa samāhitām

original: (AVŚ_6,76.3c) nābhihvāre padaṃ ni dadhāti sa mṛtyave //3//
analyzed: na abhihvāre padam ni dadhāti sa mṛtyave

original: (AVŚ_6,76.4a) nainaṃ ghnanti paryāyiṇo na sannāṃ ava gachati /
analyzed: na enam ghnanti paryāyiṇaḥ na sannām ava gacchati

original: (AVŚ_6,76.4c) agner yaḥ kṣatriyo vidvān nāma gṛhnāti āyuṣe //4//
analyzed: agneḥ yaḥ kṣatriyaḥ vidvān nāma gṛhnāti āyuṣe

original: (AVŚ_6,77.1a) asthād dyaur asthāt pṛthivy asthād viśvam idaṃ jagat /
analyzed: asthāt dyauḥ asthāt pṛthivī asthāt viśvam idam jagat

original: (AVŚ_6,77.1c) āsthāne parvatā asthu sthāmny aśvāṃ atiṣṭhipam //1//
analyzed: āsthāne parvatāḥ asthuḥ sthāmni aśvām atiṣṭhipam

original: (AVŚ_6,77.2a) ya udānat parāyaṇaṃ ya udānaṇ nyāyanam /
analyzed: yaḥ udānat parāyaṇam yaḥ udānat nyāyanam

original: (AVŚ_6,77.2c) āvartanam nivartanaṃ yo gopā api taṃ huve //2//
analyzed: āvartanam nivartanam yaḥ gopāḥ api tam huve

original: (AVŚ_6,77.3a) jātavedo ni vartaya śataṃ te santv āvṛtaḥ /
analyzed: jātavedaḥ ni vartaya śatam te santu āvṛtaḥ

original: (AVŚ_6,77.3c) sahasraṃ ta upāvṛtas tābhir naḥ punar ā kṛdhi //3//
analyzed: sahasram te upāvṛtaḥ tābhiḥ naḥ punar ā kṛdhi

original: (AVŚ_6,78.1a) tena bhūtena haviṣāyam ā pyāyatāṃ punaḥ /
analyzed: tena bhūtena haviṣā ayam ā pyāyatām punar

original: (AVŚ_6,78.1c) jāyām yām asmā āvākṣus tām rasenābhi vardhatām //1//
analyzed: jāyām yām asmai āvākṣuḥ tām rasena abhi vardhatām

original: (AVŚ_6,78.2a) abhi vardhatāṃ payasābhi rāṣṭreṇa vardhatām /
analyzed: abhi vardhatām payasā abhi rāṣṭreṇa vardhatām

original: (AVŚ_6,78.2c) rayyā sahasravarcasemau stām anupakṣitau //2//
analyzed: rayyā sahasra varcasā imau stām an upakṣitau

original: (AVŚ_6,78.3a) tvaṣṭā jāyām ajanayat tvaṣṭāsyai tvāṃ patim /
analyzed: tvaṣṭā jāyām ajanayat tvaṣṭā asyai tvām patim

original: (AVŚ_6,78.3c) tvaṣṭā sahasram āyuṃṣi dīrgham āyuḥ kṛṇotu vām //3//
analyzed: tvaṣṭā sahasram āyuṃṣi dīrgham āyuḥ kṛṇotu vām

original: (AVŚ_6,79.1a) ayaṃ no nabhasas patiḥ saṃsphāno abhi rakṣatu /
analyzed: ayam naḥ nabhasaḥ patiḥ saṃsphānaḥ abhi rakṣatu

original: (AVŚ_6,79.1c) asamātim gṛheṣu naḥ //1//
analyzed: asamātim gṛheṣu naḥ

original: (AVŚ_6,79.2a) tvaṃ no nabhasas pate ūrjaṃ gṛhesu dhāraya /
analyzed: tvam naḥ nabhasaḥ pate ūrjam gṛhesu dhāraya

original: (AVŚ_6,79.2c) ā puṣṭam etv ā vasu //2//
analyzed: ā puṣṭam etu ā vasu

original: (AVŚ_6,79.3a) deva saṃsphāna sahasrāpoṣasyeśiṣe /
analyzed: deva saṃsphāna sahasrāpoṣasya īśiṣe

original: (AVŚ_6,79.3c) tasya no rāsva tasya no dhehi tasya te bhaktivāmsaḥ syāma //3//
analyzed: tasya naḥ rāsva tasya naḥ dhehi tasya te bhaktivāmsaḥ syāma

original: (AVŚ_6,80.1a) antarikṣeṇa patati viśvā bhūtāvacākaśat /
analyzed: antarikṣeṇa patati viśvā bhūtā avacākaśat

original: (AVŚ_6,80.1c) śuno divyasya yan mahas tenā te haviṣā vidhema //1//
analyzed: śunaḥ divyasya yat mahaḥ tena te haviṣā vidhema

original: (AVŚ_6,80.2a) ye trayaḥ kālakāñjā divi devā iva śritāḥ /
analyzed: ye trayaḥ kālakāñjāḥ divi devāḥ iva śritāḥ

original: (AVŚ_6,80.2c) tānt sarvān ahva ūtaye 'smā ariṣṭatātaye //2//
analyzed: tān sarvān ahve ūtaye smaḥ ariṣṭatātaye

original: (AVŚ_6,80.3a) apsu te janma divi te sadhasthaṃ samudre antar mahimā te pṛthivyām /
analyzed: apsu te janma divi te sadhastham samudre antar mahimā te pṛthivyām

original: (AVŚ_6,80.3c) śuno divyasya yan mahas tenā te haviṣā vidhema //3//
analyzed: śunaḥ divyasya yat mahaḥ tena te haviṣā vidhema

original: (AVŚ_6,81.1a) yantāsi yachase hastāv apa rakṣāṃsi sedhasi /
analyzed: yantāsi yacchase hastau apa rakṣāṃsi sedhasi

original: (AVŚ_6,81.1c) prajāṃ dhanaṃ ca gṛhṇānaḥ parihasto abhūd ayam //1//
analyzed: prajām dhanam ca gṛhṇānaḥ parihastaḥ abhūt ayam

original: (AVŚ_6,81.2a) parihasta vi dhāraya yoniṃ garbhāya dhātave /
analyzed: parihasta vi dhāraya yonim garbhāya dhātave

original: (AVŚ_6,81.2c) maryāde putram ā dhehi taṃ tvam ā gamayāgame //2//
analyzed: maryāde putram ā dhehi tam tvam ā gamaya āgame

original: (AVŚ_6,81.3a) yaṃ parihastam abibhar aditiḥ putrakāmyā /
analyzed: yam parihastam abibhar aditiḥ putra kāmyā

original: (AVŚ_6,81.3c) tvaṣṭā tam asyā ā badhnād yathā putraṃ janād //3//
analyzed: tvaṣṭā tam asyai ā badhnāt yathā putram janāt

original: (AVŚ_6,82.1a) āgachata āgatasya nāma gṛhṇāmy āyataḥ /
analyzed: āgacchataḥ āgatasya nāma gṛhṇāmi āyataḥ

original: (AVŚ_6,82.1c) indrasya vṛtraghno vanve vāsavasya śatakratoḥ //1//
analyzed: indrasya vṛtra ghnaḥ vanve vāsavasya śatakratoḥ

original: (AVŚ_6,82.2a) yena sūryāṃ sāvitrīm aśvinohatuḥ pathā /
analyzed: yena sūryām sāvitrīm aśvinā ūhatuḥ pathā

original: (AVŚ_6,82.2c) tena mām abravīd bhago jayām ā vahatād iti //2//
analyzed: tena mām abravīt bhagaḥ jayām ā vahatāt iti

original: (AVŚ_6,82.3a) yas te 'ṅkuśo vasudāno bṛhann indra hiraṇyayaḥ /
analyzed: yaḥ te ṅkuśaḥ vasu dānaḥ bṛhan indra hiraṇyayaḥ

original: (AVŚ_6,82.3c) tenā janiyate jāyāṃ mahyaṃ dhehi śacīpate //3//
analyzed: tena ā janiyate jāyām mahyam dhehi śacīpate

original: (AVŚ_6,83.1a) apacitaḥ pra patata suparṇo vasater iva /
analyzed: apacitaḥ pra patata suparṇaḥ vasateḥ iva

original: (AVŚ_6,83.1c) sūryaḥ kṛṇotu bheṣajaṃ candramā vo 'pochatu //1//
analyzed: sūryaḥ kṛṇotu bheṣajam candramāḥ vaḥ pochatu

original: (AVŚ_6,83.2a) eny ekā śyeny ekā kṛṣṇaikā rohiṇī dve /
analyzed: enī ekā śyenī ekā kṛṣṇā ekā rohiṇī dve

original: (AVŚ_6,83.2c) sarvāsām agrabhaṃ nāmāvīraghnīr apetana //2//
analyzed: sarvāsām agrabham nāma a vīra ghnīḥ apetana

original: (AVŚ_6,83.3a) asūtikā rāmāyaṇy apacit pra patiṣyati /
analyzed: a sūtikā rāmāyaṇī apacit pra patiṣyati

original: (AVŚ_6,83.3c) glaur itaḥ pra patiṣyati sa galunto naśiṣyati //3//
analyzed: glauḥ itas pra patiṣyati sa galuntaḥ naśiṣyati

original: (AVŚ_6,83.4a) vīhi svām āhutiṃ juṣāno manasā svāhā manasā yad idaṃ juhomi //4//
analyzed: vīhi svām āhutim juṣānaḥ manasā svāhā manasā yat idam juhomi

original: (AVŚ_6,84.1a) yasyās ta āsani ghore juhomy eṣāṃ baddhānām avasarjanāya kam /
analyzed: yasyāḥ te āsani ghore juhomi eṣām baddhānām avasarjanāya kam

original: (AVŚ_6,84.1c) bhūmir iti tvābhipramanvate janā nirṛtir iti tvāhaṃ pari veda sarvataḥ //1//
analyzed: bhūmiḥ iti tvā abhipramanvate janāḥ nirṛtiḥ iti tvā aham pari veda sarvatas

original: (AVŚ_6,84.2a) bhūte haviṣmatī bhavaiṣa te bhāgo yo asmāsu /
analyzed: bhūte haviṣmatī bhava eṣa te bhāgaḥ yaḥ asmāsu

original: (AVŚ_6,84.2c) muñcemān amūn enasaḥ svāhā //2//
analyzed: muñca imān amūn enasaḥ svāhā

original: (AVŚ_6,84.3a) evo ṣv asman nirṛte 'nehā tvam ayasmayān vi cṛtā bandhapāśān /
analyzed: eva u su asmat nirṛte na iha ā iha tvam ayasmayān vi cṛta bandha pāśān

original: (AVŚ_6,84.3c) yamo mahyaṃ punar it tvāṃ dadāti tasmai yamāya namo astu mṛtyave //3//
analyzed: yamaḥ mahyam punar id tvām dadāti tasmai yamāya namaḥ astu mṛtyave

original: (AVŚ_6,84.4a) ayasmaye drupade bedhiṣa ihābhihito mṛtyubhir ye sahasram /
analyzed: ayasmaye drupade bedhiṣe iha abhihitaḥ mṛtyubhiḥ ye sahasram

original: (AVŚ_6,84.4c) yamena tvaṃ pitṛbhiḥ saṃvidāna uttamaṃ nākam adhi rohayemam //4//
analyzed: yamena tvam pitṛbhiḥ saṃvidānaḥ uttamam nākam adhi rohaya imam

original: (AVŚ_6,85.1a) varaṇo vārayātā ayaṃ devo vanaspatiḥ /
analyzed: varaṇaḥ vārayātai ayam devaḥ vanaspatiḥ

original: (AVŚ_6,85.1c) yakṣmo yo asminn āviṣṭas tam u devā avīvaran //1//
analyzed: yakṣmaḥ yaḥ asmin āviṣṭaḥ tam u devāḥ avīvaran

original: (AVŚ_6,85.2a) indrasya vacasā vayaṃ mitrasya varuṇasya ca /
analyzed: indrasya vacasā vayam mitrasya varuṇasya ca

original: (AVŚ_6,85.2c) devānāṃ sarveṣāṃ vācā yakṣmaṃ te vārayāmahe //2//
analyzed: devānām sarveṣām vācā yakṣmam te vārayāmahe

original: (AVŚ_6,85.3a) yathā vṛtra imā āpas tastambha viśvadhā yatīḥ /
analyzed: yathā vṛtraḥ imāḥ āpaḥ tastambha viśvadhā yatīḥ

original: (AVŚ_6,85.3c) evā te agninā yakṣmaṃ vaiśvānareṇa vāraye //3//
analyzed: eva te agninā yakṣmam vaiśvānareṇa vāraye

original: (AVŚ_6,86.1a) vṛṣendrasya vṛṣā divo vṛsā pṛthivyā ayam /
analyzed: vṛṣā indrasya vṛṣā divaḥ vṛsā pṛthivyāḥ ayam

original: (AVŚ_6,86.1c) vṛṣā viśvasya bhūtasya tvam ekavṛṣo bhava //1//
analyzed: vṛṣā viśvasya bhūtasya tvam eka vṛṣaḥ bhava

original: (AVŚ_6,86.2a) samudra īśe sravatām agniḥ pṛthivyā vaśī /
analyzed: samudraḥ īśe sravatām agniḥ pṛthivyāḥ vaśī

original: (AVŚ_6,86.2c) candramā nakṣatrāṇām īśe tvam ekavṛṣo bhava //2//
analyzed: candramāḥ nakṣatrāṇām īśe tvam eka vṛṣaḥ bhava

original: (AVŚ_6,86.3a) samrāḍ asy asurāṇāṃ kakun manuṣyānām /
analyzed: samrāj asi asurāṇām kakud manuṣyānām

original: (AVŚ_6,86.3c) devānām ardhabhāg asi tvam ekavṛṣo bhava //3//
analyzed: devānām ardha bhāj asi tvam eka vṛṣaḥ bhava

original: (AVŚ_6,87.1a) ā tvāhārṣam antar abhūr dhruvas tiṣṭhāvicācalat /
analyzed: ā tvā ahārṣam antar abhūḥ dhruvaḥ tiṣṭha a vicācalat

original: (AVŚ_6,87.1c) viśas tvā sarvā vāñchantu mā tvad rāṣṭram adhi bhraśat //1//
analyzed: viśaḥ tvā sarvāḥ vāñchantu mā tvat rāṣṭram adhi bhraśat

original: (AVŚ_6,87.2a) ihaivaidhi māpa cyoṣṭhāḥ parvata ivāvicācalat /
analyzed: iha eva edhi mā apa cyoṣṭhāḥ parvataḥ iva a vicācalat

original: (AVŚ_6,87.2c) indra iveha dhruvas tiṣṭheha rāṣṭram u dhāraya //2//
analyzed: indraḥ iva iha dhruvaḥ tiṣṭha iha rāṣṭram u dhāraya

original: (AVŚ_6,87.3a) indra etam adīdharat dhruvaṃ dhruveṇa haviṣā /
analyzed: indraḥ etam adīdharat dhruvam dhruveṇa haviṣā

original: (AVŚ_6,87.3c) tasmai somo adhi bravad ayaṃ ca brahmaṇas patiḥ //3//
analyzed: tasmai somaḥ adhi bravat ayam ca brahmaṇaḥ patiḥ

original: (AVŚ_6,88.1a) dhruvā dyaur dhruvā pṛthivī dhruvaṃ viśvam idaṃ jagat /
analyzed: dhruvā dyauḥ dhruvā pṛthivī dhruvam viśvam idam jagat

original: (AVŚ_6,88.1c) dhruvāsaḥ parvatā ime dhruvo rājā viśām ayam //1//
analyzed: dhruvāsaḥ parvatāḥ ime dhruvaḥ rājā viśām ayam

original: (AVŚ_6,88.2a) dhruvaṃ te rājā varuṇo dhruvam devo bṛhaspatiḥ /
analyzed: dhruvam te rājā varuṇaḥ dhruvam devaḥ bṛhaspatiḥ

original: (AVŚ_6,88.2c) dhruvaṃ ta indraś cāgniś ca rāṣṭraṃ dhārayatāṃ dhruvam //2//
analyzed: dhruvam te indraḥ ca agniḥ ca rāṣṭram dhārayatām dhruvam

original: (AVŚ_6,88.3a) dhruvo 'cyutaḥ pra mṛṇīhi śatrūn chatrūyato 'dharān pādayasva /
analyzed: dhruvo cyutaḥ pra mṛṇīhi śatrūn śatrūyataḥ dharān pādayasva

original: (AVŚ_6,88.3c) sarvā diśaḥ saṃmanasaḥ sadhrīcīr dhruvāya te samitiḥ kalpatām iha //3//
analyzed: sarvāḥ diśaḥ saṃmanasaḥ sadhrīcīḥ dhruvāya te samitiḥ kalpatām iha

original: (AVŚ_6,89.1a) idaṃ yat preṇyaḥ śiro dattaṃ somena vṛṣṇyam /
analyzed: idam yat preṇyaḥ śiraḥ dattam somena vṛṣṇyam

original: (AVŚ_6,89.1c) tataḥ pari prajātena hārdiṃ te śocayāmasi //1//
analyzed: tatas pari prajātena hārdim te śocayāmasi

original: (AVŚ_6,89.2a) śocayāmasi te hārdiṃ śocayāmasi te manaḥ /
analyzed: śocayāmasi te hārdim śocayāmasi te manaḥ

original: (AVŚ_6,89.2c) vātaṃ dhūma iva sadhryaṅ mām evānv etu ye manaḥ //2//
analyzed: vātam dhūmaḥ iva sadhryak mām eva anu etu ye manaḥ

original: (AVŚ_6,89.3a) mahyaṃ tvā mitrāvaruṇau mahyaṃ devī sarasvatī /
analyzed: mahyam tvā mitrāvaruṇau mahyam devī sarasvatī

original: (AVŚ_6,89.3c) mahyaṃ tvā madhyaṃ bhūmyā ubhāv antau sam asyatām //3//
analyzed: mahyam tvā madhyam bhūmyāḥ ubhau antau sam asyatām

original: (AVŚ_6,90.1a) yāṃ te rudra iṣum āsyad aṅgebhyo hṛdayāya ca /
analyzed: yām te rudraḥ iṣum āsyat aṅgebhyaḥ hṛdayāya ca

original: (AVŚ_6,90.1c) idaṃ tām adya tvad vayaṃ viṣūcīṃ vi vṛhāmasi //1//
analyzed: idam tām adya tvat vayam viṣūcīm vi vṛhāmasi

original: (AVŚ_6,90.2a) yās te śataṃ dhamanayo 'ṅgāny anu viṣṭhitāḥ /
analyzed: yāḥ te śatam dhamanayaḥ ṅgāni anu viṣṭhitāḥ

original: (AVŚ_6,90.2c) tāsāṃ te sarvāsām vayaṃ nir viṣāṇi hvayāmasi //2//
analyzed: tāsām te sarvāsām vayam niḥ viṣāṇi hvayāmasi

original: (AVŚ_6,90.3a) namas te rudrāsyate namaḥ pratihitāyai /
analyzed: namaḥ te rudra asyate namaḥ pratihitāyai

original: (AVŚ_6,90.3c) namo visṛjyamānāyai namo nipatitāyai //3//
analyzed: namaḥ visṛjyamānāyai namaḥ nipatitāyai

original: (AVŚ_6,91.1a) imaṃ yavam aṣṭāyogaiḥ ṣadyogebhir acarkṛṣuḥ /
analyzed: imam yavam aṣṭāyogaiḥ ṣadyogebhiḥ acarkṛṣuḥ

original: (AVŚ_6,91.1c) tenā te tanvo rapo 'pācīnam apa vyaye //1//
analyzed: tena te tanvaḥ rapaḥ pācīnam apa vyaye

original: (AVŚ_6,91.2a) nyag vāto vāti nyak tapati sūryaḥ /
analyzed: nyak vātaḥ vāti nyak tapati sūryaḥ

original: (AVŚ_6,91.2c) nīcīnam aghnyā duhe nyag bhavatu te rapaḥ //2//
analyzed: nīcīnam aghnyā duhe nyak bhavatu te rapaḥ

original: (AVŚ_6,91.3a) āpa id vā u bheṣajīr āpo amīvacātanīḥ /
analyzed: āpaḥ id vai u bheṣajīḥ āpaḥ amīva cātanīḥ

original: (AVŚ_6,91.3c) āpo viśvasya bheṣajīs tās te kṛṇvantu bheṣajam //3//
analyzed: āpaḥ viśvasya bheṣajīḥ tāḥ te kṛṇvantu bheṣajam

original: (AVŚ_6,92.1a) vātaraṃhā bhava vājin yujamāna indrasya yāhi prasave manojavāḥ /
analyzed: vāta raṃhāḥ bhava vājin yujamānaḥ indrasya yāhi prasave manaḥ javāḥ

original: (AVŚ_6,92.1c) yuñjantu tvā maruto viśvavedasa ā te tvastā patsu javaṃ dadhātu //1//
analyzed: yuñjantu tvā marutaḥ viśva vedasaḥ ā te tvastā patsu javam dadhātu

original: (AVŚ_6,92.2a) javas te arvan nihito guhā yaḥ śyene vāte uta yo 'carat parīttaḥ /
analyzed: javaḥ te arvan nihitaḥ guhā yaḥ śyene vāte uta yaḥ carat parīttaḥ

original: (AVŚ_6,92.2c) tena tvaṃ vājin balavān balenājiṃ jaya samane parayiṣṇuḥ //2//
analyzed: tena tvam vājin balavān balena ājim jaya samane parayiṣṇuḥ

original: (AVŚ_6,92.3a) tanūṣ ṭe vājin tanvaṃ nayantī vāmam asmabhyaṃ dhāvatu śarma tubhyam /
analyzed: tanūḥ te vājin tanvam nayantī vāmam asmabhyam dhāvatu śarma tubhyam

original: (AVŚ_6,92.3c) ahruto maho dharuṇāya devo divīva jyotiḥ svam ā mimīyāt //3//
analyzed: ahrutaḥ mahaḥ dharuṇāya devaḥ divi iva jyotiḥ svam ā mimīyāt

original: (AVŚ_6,93.1a) yamo mṛtyur aghamāro nirṛtho babhruḥ śarvo 'stā nīlaśikhaṇḍaḥ /
analyzed: yamaḥ mṛtyuḥ agha māraḥ nirṛthaḥ babhruḥ stā nīla śikhaṇḍaḥ

original: (AVŚ_6,93.1c) devajanāḥ senayottasthivāṃsas te asmākaṃ pari vṛñjantu vīrān //1//
analyzed: deva janāḥ senayā uttasthivāṃsaḥ te asmākam pari vṛñjantu vīrān

original: (AVŚ_6,93.2a) manasā homair harasā ghṛtena śarvāyāstra uta rājñe bhavāya /
analyzed: manasā homaiḥ harasā ghṛtena śarvāya astre uta rājñe bhavāya

original: (AVŚ_6,93.2c) namasyebhyo nama ebhyaḥ kṛṇomy anyatrāsmad aghaviṣā nayantu //2//
analyzed: namasyebhyaḥ namaḥ ebhyaḥ kṛṇomi anyatra asmat agha viṣāḥ nayantu

original: (AVŚ_6,93.3a) trāyadhvaṃ no aghaviṣābhyo vadhād viśve devā maruto viśvavedasaḥ /
analyzed: trāyadhvam naḥ agha viṣābhyaḥ vadhāt viśve devāḥ marutaḥ viśva vedasaḥ

original: (AVŚ_6,93.3c) agnīṣomā varuṇaḥ pūtadakṣā vātāparjanyayoḥ sumatau syāma //3//
analyzed: agnīṣomāḥ varuṇaḥ pūta dakṣāḥ vātāparjanyayoḥ sumatau syāma

original: (AVŚ_6,94.1a) saṃ vo manāṃsi saṃ vratā sam ākūtīr namāmasi /
analyzed: sam vaḥ manāṃsi sam vratā sam ākūtīḥ namāmasi

original: (AVŚ_6,94.1c) amī ye vivratā sthana tān vaḥ saṃ namayāmasi //1//
analyzed: amī ye vivratāḥ sthana tān vaḥ sam namayāmasi

original: (AVŚ_6,94.2a) ahaṃ gṛbhṇāmi manasā manāṃsi mama cittam anu cittebhir eta /
analyzed: aham gṛbhṇāmi manasā manāṃsi mama cittam anu cittebhiḥ eta

original: (AVŚ_6,94.2c) mama vaśeṣu hṛdayāni vaḥ kṛṇomi mama yātam anuvartmāna eta //2//
analyzed: mama vaśeṣu hṛdayāni vaḥ kṛṇomi mama yātam anuvartmānaḥ eta

original: (AVŚ_6,94.3a) ote me dyāvāpṛthivī otā devī sarasvatī /
analyzed: ote me dyāvāpṛthivī otā devī sarasvatī

original: (AVŚ_6,94.3c) otau ma indraś cāgniś ca rdhyāsmedaṃ sarasvati //3//
analyzed: otau me indraḥ ca agniḥ ca ṛdhyā asma idam sarasvati

original: (AVŚ_6,95.1a) aśvattho devasadanas tṛtīyasyām ito divi /
analyzed: aśvatthaḥ deva sadanaḥ tṛtīyasyām itas divi

original: (AVŚ_6,95.1c) tatrāmṛtasya cakṣaṇam devāḥ kuṣṭham avanvata //1//
analyzed: tatra amṛtasya cakṣaṇam devāḥ kuṣṭham avanvata

original: (AVŚ_6,95.2a) hiraṇyayī naur acarad dhiraṇyabandhanā divi /
analyzed: hiraṇyayī nauḥ acarat hiraṇya bandhanā divi

original: (AVŚ_6,95.2c) tatrāmṛtasya puṣpaṃ devāḥ kuṣṭham avanvata //2//
analyzed: tatra amṛtasya puṣpam devāḥ kuṣṭham avanvata

original: (AVŚ_6,95.3a) garbho asy oṣadhīnāṃ garbho himavatām uta /
analyzed: garbhaḥ asi oṣadhīnām garbhaḥ himavatām uta

original: (AVŚ_6,95.3c) garbho viśvasya bhūtasyemaṃ me agadaṃ kṛdhi //3//
analyzed: garbhaḥ viśvasya bhūtasya imam me agadam kṛdhi

original: (AVŚ_6,96.1a) yā oṣadhayaḥ somarājñīr bahvīḥ śatavicakṣaṇāḥ /
analyzed: yāḥ oṣadhayaḥ soma rājñīḥ bahvīḥ śata vicakṣaṇāḥ

original: (AVŚ_6,96.1c) bṛhaspatiprasūtās tā no muñcantv aṃhasaḥ //1//
analyzed: bṛhaspati prasūtāḥ tāḥ naḥ muñcantu aṃhasaḥ

original: (AVŚ_6,96.2a) muñcantu mā śapathyād atho varuṇyād uta /
analyzed: muñcantu mā śapathyāt atha u varuṇyāt uta

original: (AVŚ_6,96.2c) atho yamasya paḍvīśād viśvasmād devakilbiṣāt //2//
analyzed: atha u yamasya paḍvīśāt viśvasmāt deva kilbiṣāt

original: (AVŚ_6,96.3a) yac cakṣuṣā manasā yac ca vācopārima jāgrato yat svapantaḥ /
analyzed: yat cakṣuṣā manasā yat ca vācā upārima jāgrataḥ yat svapantaḥ

original: (AVŚ_6,96.3c) somas tāni svadhayā naḥ punātu //3//
analyzed: somaḥ tāni svadhayā naḥ punātu

original: (AVŚ_6,97.1a) abhibhūr yajño abhibhūr agnir abhibhūḥ somo abhibhūr indraḥ /
analyzed: abhibhūḥ yajñaḥ abhibhūḥ agniḥ abhibhūḥ somaḥ abhibhūḥ indraḥ

original: (AVŚ_6,97.1c) abhy ahaṃ viśvāḥ pṛtanā yathāsāny evā vidhemāgnihotrā idaṃ haviḥ //1//
analyzed: abhi aham viśvāḥ pṛtanāḥ yathā asāni eva vidhema agni hotrā idam haviḥ

original: (AVŚ_6,97.2a) svadhāstu mitrāvaruṇā vipaścitā prajāvat kṣatraṃ madhuneha pinvatam /
analyzed: svadhā astu mitrāvaruṇā vipaścitā prajāvat kṣatram madhunā iha pinvatam

original: (AVŚ_6,97.2c) bādhethāṃ dūraṃ nirṛtiṃ parācaiḥ kṛtaṃ cid enaḥ pra mumuktam asmat //2//
analyzed: bādhethām dūram nirṛtim parācais kṛtam cit enaḥ pra mumuktam asmat

original: (AVŚ_6,97.3a) imaṃ vīram anu harṣadhvam ugram indraṃ sakhāyo anu saṃ rabhadhvam /
analyzed: imam vīram anu harṣadhvam ugram indram sakhāyaḥ anu sam rabhadhvam

original: (AVŚ_6,97.3c) grāmajitaṃ gojitaṃ vajrabāhuṃ jayantam ajma pramṛṇantam ojasā //3//
analyzed: grāma jitam go jitam vajra bāhum jayantam ajma pramṛṇantam ojasā

original: (AVŚ_6,98.1a) indro jayāti na parā jayātā adhirājo rājasu rājayātai /
analyzed: indraḥ jayāti na parā jayātai adhirājaḥ rājasu rājayātai

original: (AVŚ_6,98.1c) carkṛtya īḍyo vandyaś copasadyo namasyś bhaveha //1//
analyzed: carkṛtyaḥ īḍyaḥ vandyaḥ ca upasadyaḥ namasyuḥ bhava iha

original: (AVŚ_6,98.2a) tvam indrādhirājaḥ śravasyus tvaṃ bhūr abhibhūtir janānām /
analyzed: tvam indra adhirājaḥ śravasyuḥ tvam bhūḥ abhibhūtiḥ janānām

original: (AVŚ_6,98.2c) tvaṃ daivīr viśa imā vi rājāyuṣmat kṣatram ajaraṃ te astu //2//
analyzed: tvam daivīḥ viśaḥ imāḥ vi rāja āyuṣmat kṣatram ajaram te astu

original: (AVŚ_6,98.3a) prācyā diśas tvam indrāsi rājotodīcyā diśo vṛtrahan chatruho 'si /
analyzed: prācyāḥ diśaḥ tvam indra asi rājā uta udīcyāḥ diśaḥ vṛtrahan śatru ho si

original: (AVŚ_6,98.3c) yatra yanti srotyās taj jitaṃ te dakṣiṇato vṛṣabha eṣi havyaḥ //3//
analyzed: yatra yanti srotyāḥ tat jitam te dakṣiṇatas vṛṣabhaḥ eṣi havyaḥ

original: (AVŚ_6,99.1a) abhi tvendra varimataḥ purā tvāṃhūraṇād dhuve /
analyzed: abhi tvā indra varimataḥ purā tvā aṃhūraṇāt dhuve

original: (AVŚ_6,99.1c) hvayāmy ugraṃ cettāraṃ puruṇāmānam ekajam //1//
analyzed: hvayāmi ugram cettāram puruṇāmānam ekajam

original: (AVŚ_6,99.2a) yo adya senyo vadho jighāṃsan na udīrate /
analyzed: yaḥ adya senyaḥ vadhaḥ jighāṃsan naḥ udīrate

original: (AVŚ_6,99.2c) indrasya tatra bāhū samantaṃ pari dadmaḥ //2//
analyzed: indrasya tatra bāhū samantam pari dadmaḥ

original: (AVŚ_6,99.3a) pari dadma indrasya bāhū samantaṃ trātus trāyatāṃ naḥ /
analyzed: pari dadmaḥ indrasya bāhū samantam trātuḥ trāyatām naḥ

original: (AVŚ_6,99.3c) deva savitaḥ soma rājant sumanasaṃ mā kṛṇu svastaye //3//
analyzed: deva savitar soma rājan sumanasam mā kṛṇu svastaye

original: (AVŚ_6,100.1a) devā aduḥ sūryo dyaur adāt pṛthivy adāt /
analyzed: devāḥ aduḥ sūryaḥ dyauḥ adāt pṛthivī adāt

original: (AVŚ_6,100.1c) tisraḥ sarasvatir aduḥ sacittā viṣadūṣaṇam //1//
analyzed: tisraḥ sarasvatiḥ aduḥ sa cittāḥ viṣa dūṣaṇam

original: (AVŚ_6,100.2a) yad vo devā upajīkā āsiñcan dhanvany udakam /
analyzed: yat vaḥ devāḥ upajīkāḥ āsiñcan dhanvani udakam

original: (AVŚ_6,100.2c) tena devaprasūtenedaṃ dūṣayatā viṣam //2//
analyzed: tena deva prasūtena idam dūṣayatā viṣam

original: (AVŚ_6,100.3a) asurāṇāṃ duhitāsi sā devānām asi svasā /
analyzed: asurāṇām duhitā asi sā devānām asi svasā

original: (AVŚ_6,100.3c) divas pṛthivyāḥ saṃbhūtā sā cakarthārasaṃ viṣam //3//
analyzed: divaḥ pṛthivyāḥ saṃbhūtā sā cakartha arasam viṣam

original: (AVŚ_6,101.1a) ā vṛṣāyasva śvasihi vardhasva prathayasva ca /
analyzed: ā vṛṣāyasva śvasihi vardhasva prathayasva ca

original: (AVŚ_6,101.1c) yathāṅgaṃ vardhatāṃ śepas tena yoṣitam ij jahi //1//
analyzed: yathā aṅgam vardhatām śepaḥ tena yoṣitam id jahi

original: (AVŚ_6,101.2a) yena kṛṣaṃ vājayanti yena hinvanty āturam /
analyzed: yena kṛṣam vājayanti yena hinvanti āturam

original: (AVŚ_6,101.2c) tenāsya brahmaṇas pate dhanur ivā tānayā pasaḥ //2//
analyzed: tena asya brahmaṇaḥ pate dhanuḥ iva ā tānaya pasaḥ

original: (AVŚ_6,101.3a) āhaṃ tanomi te paso adhi jyām iva dhanvani /
analyzed: ā aham tanomi te pasaḥ adhi jyām iva dhanvani

original: (AVŚ_6,101.3c) kramasva ṛṣa iva rohitam anavaglāyatā sadā //3//
analyzed: kramasva ṛṣaḥ iva rohitam an avaglāyatā sadā

original: (AVŚ_6,102.1a) yathāyaṃ vāho aśvinā samaiti saṃ ca vartate /
analyzed: yathā ayam vāhaḥ aśvinā samaiti sam ca vartate

original: (AVŚ_6,102.1c) evā mām abhi te manaḥ samaitu saṃ ca vartatām //1//
analyzed: eva mām abhi te manaḥ samaitu sam ca vartatām

original: (AVŚ_6,102.2a) āhaṃ khidāmi te mano rājāśvaḥ pṛṣṭyām iva /
analyzed: ā aham khidāmi te manaḥ rāja aśvaḥ pṛṣṭyām iva

original: (AVŚ_6,102.2c) reṣmachinnam yathā tṛṇaṃ mayi te veṣṭatāṃ manaḥ //2//
analyzed: reṣma chinnam yathā tṛṇam mayi te veṣṭatām manaḥ

original: (AVŚ_6,102.3a) āñjanasya madughasya kuṣṭhasya naladasya ca /
analyzed: āñjanasya madughasya kuṣṭhasya naladasya ca

original: (AVŚ_6,102.3c) turo bhagasya hastābhyām anurodhanam ud bhare //3//
analyzed: turaḥ bhagasya hastābhyām anurodhanam ud bhare

original: (AVŚ_6,103.1a) saṃdānaṃ vo bṛhaspatiḥ saṃdānaṃ savitā karat /
analyzed: saṃdānam vaḥ bṛhaspatiḥ saṃdānam savitā karat

original: (AVŚ_6,103.1c) saṃdānaṃ mitro aryamā saṃdānaṃ bhago aśvinā //1//
analyzed: saṃdānam mitraḥ aryamā saṃdānam bhagaḥ aśvinā

original: (AVŚ_6,103.2a) sam paramānt sam avamān atho saṃ dyāmi madhyamān /
analyzed: sam paramān sam avamān atha u sam dyāmi madhyamān

original: (AVŚ_6,103.2c) indras tān pary ahār dāmnā tān agne saṃ dyā tvam //2//
analyzed: indraḥ tān pari ahār dāmnā tān agne sam dya tvam

original: (AVŚ_6,103.3a) amī ye yudham āyanti ketūn kṛtvānīkaśaḥ /
analyzed: amī ye yudham āyanti ketūn kṛtvā anīkaśas

original: (AVŚ_6,103.3c) indras tān pary ahār dāmna tān agne saṃ dyā tvam //3//
analyzed: indraḥ tān pari ahār dāmnaḥ tān agne sam dya tvam

original: (AVŚ_6,104.1a) ādānena saṃdānenāmitrān ā dyāmasi /
analyzed: ādānena saṃdānena amitrān ā dyāmasi

original: (AVŚ_6,104.1c) apānā ye caiṣāṃ prāṇā asunāsūnt sam achidan //1//
analyzed: apānāḥ ye ca eṣām prāṇāḥ asunā asūn sam achidan

original: (AVŚ_6,104.2a) idam ādānam akaraṃ tapasendreṇa saṃśitam /
analyzed: idam ādānam akaram tapasā indreṇa saṃśitam

original: (AVŚ_6,104.2c) amitrā ye 'tra naḥ santi tān agna ā dyā tvam //2//
analyzed: amitrāḥ ye tra naḥ santi tān agne ā dya tvam

original: (AVŚ_6,104.3a) ainān dyatām indrāgnī somo rājā ca medinau /
analyzed: ā enān dyatām indra agnī somaḥ rājā ca medinau

original: (AVŚ_6,104.3c) indro marutvān ādānam amitrebhyaḥ kṛṇotu naḥ //3//
analyzed: indraḥ marutvān ādānam amitrebhyaḥ kṛṇotu naḥ

original: (AVŚ_6,105.1a) yathā mano manasketaiḥ parāpataty āśumat /
analyzed: yathā manaḥ manasketaiḥ parāpatati āśumat

original: (AVŚ_6,105.1c) evā tvaṃ kāse pra pata manaso 'nu pravāyyam //1//
analyzed: eva tvam kāse pra pata manasaḥ nu pravāyyam

original: (AVŚ_6,105.2a) yathā bāṇaḥ susaṃśitaḥ parāpataty āśumat /
analyzed: yathā bāṇaḥ su saṃśitaḥ parāpatati āśumat

original: (AVŚ_6,105.2c) evā tvaṃ kāse pra pata pṛthivyā anu saṃvatam //2//
analyzed: eva tvam kāse pra pata pṛthivyāḥ anu saṃvatam

original: (AVŚ_6,105.3a) yathā sūryasya raśmayaḥ parāpatanty āśumat /
analyzed: yathā sūryasya raśmayaḥ parāpatanti āśumat

original: (AVŚ_6,105.3c) evā tvaṃ kāse pra pata samudrasyānu vikṣaram //3//
analyzed: eva tvam kāse pra pata samudrasya anu vikṣaram

original: (AVŚ_6,106.1a) āyane te parāyane dūrvā rohantu puṣpiṇīḥ /
analyzed: āyane te parāyane dūrvāḥ rohantu puṣpiṇīḥ

original: (AVŚ_6,106.1c) utso vā tatra jāyatām hrado vā puṇḍarīkavān //1//
analyzed: utsaḥ vā tatra jāyatām hradaḥ vā puṇḍarīkavān

original: (AVŚ_6,106.2a) apām idaṃ nyayanaṃ samudrasya niveśanam /
analyzed: apām idam nyayanam samudrasya niveśanam

original: (AVŚ_6,106.2c) madhye hradasya no gṛhāḥ parācīnā mukhā kṛdhi //2//
analyzed: madhye hradasya naḥ gṛhāḥ parācīnā mukhā kṛdhi

original: (AVŚ_6,106.3a) himasya tvā jarāyuṇā śāle pari vyayāmasi /
analyzed: himasya tvā jarāyuṇā śāle pari vyayāmasi

original: (AVŚ_6,106.3c) śītahradā hi no bhuvo 'gniṣ kṛṇotu bheṣajam //3//
analyzed: śīta hradā hi naḥ bhuvaḥ gniḥ kṛṇotu bheṣajam

original: (AVŚ_6,107.1a) viśvajit trāyamāṇāyai mā pari dehi /
analyzed: viśva jit trāyamāṇāyai mā pari dehi

original: (AVŚ_6,107.1c) trāyamāṇe dvipāc ca sarvaṃ no rakṣa catuṣpāḍ yac ca naḥ svam //1//
analyzed: trāyamāṇe dvi pād ca sarvam naḥ rakṣa catuṣpād yat ca naḥ svam

original: (AVŚ_6,107.2a) trāyamāṇe viśvajite mā pari dehi /
analyzed: trāyamāṇe viśva jite mā pari dehi

original: (AVŚ_6,107.2c) viśvajid dvipāc ca sarvaṃ no rakṣa catuṣpāḍ yac ca naḥ svam //2//
analyzed: viśva jit dvi pād ca sarvam naḥ rakṣa catuṣpād yat ca naḥ svam

original: (AVŚ_6,107.3a) viśvajit kalyāṇyai mā pari dehi /
analyzed: viśva jit kalyāṇyai mā pari dehi

original: (AVŚ_6,107.3c) kalyāṇi dvipāc ca sarvaṃ no rakṣa catuṣpāḍ yac ca naḥ svam //3//
analyzed: kalyāṇi dvi pād ca sarvam naḥ rakṣa catuṣpād yat ca naḥ svam

original: (AVŚ_6,107.4a) kalyāṇi sarvavide mā pari dehi /
analyzed: kalyāṇi sarva vide mā pari dehi

original: (AVŚ_6,107.4c) sarvavid dvipāc ca sarvaṃ no rakṣa catuṣpāḍ yac ca naḥ svam //4//
analyzed: sarva vid dvi pād ca sarvam naḥ rakṣa catuṣpād yat ca naḥ svam

original: (AVŚ_6,108.1a) tvaṃ no medhe prathamā gobhir aśvebhir ā gahi /
analyzed: tvam naḥ medhe prathamā gobhiḥ aśvebhiḥ ā gahi

original: (AVŚ_6,108.1c) tvaṃ sūryasya raśmibhis tvam no asi yajñiyā //1//
analyzed: tvam sūryasya raśmibhiḥ tvam naḥ asi yajñiyā

original: (AVŚ_6,108.2a) medhām ahaṃ prathamāṃ brahmaṇvatīṃ brahmajūtām ṛṣiṣṭutām /
analyzed: medhām aham prathamām brahmaṇvatīm brahma jūtām ṛṣiṣṭutām

original: (AVŚ_6,108.2c) prapītāṃ brahmacāribhir devānām avase huve //2//
analyzed: prapītām brahmacāribhiḥ devānām avase huve

original: (AVŚ_6,108.3a) yāṃ medhām ṛbhavo vidur yāṃ medhām asurā viduḥ /
analyzed: yām medhām ṛbhavaḥ viduḥ yām medhām asurāḥ viduḥ

original: (AVŚ_6,108.3c) ṛṣayo bhadrāṃ medhāṃ yāṃ vidus tāṃ mayy ā veśayāmasi //3//
analyzed: ṛṣayaḥ bhadrām medhām yām viduḥ tām mayi ā veśayāmasi

original: (AVŚ_6,108.4a) yām ṛṣayo bhūtakṛto medhāṃ medhāvino viduḥ /
analyzed: yām ṛṣayaḥ bhūta kṛtaḥ medhām medhāvinaḥ viduḥ

original: (AVŚ_6,108.4c) tayā mām adya medhayāgne medhāvinaṃ kṛṇu //4//
analyzed: tayā mām adya medhayā agne medhāvinam kṛṇu

original: (AVŚ_6,108.5a) medhāṃ sāyaṃ medhāṃ prātar medhāṃ madhyandinaṃ pari /
analyzed: medhām sāyam medhām prātar medhām madhyandinam pari

original: (AVŚ_6,108.5c) medhāṃ sūryasya raśmibhir vacasā veśayāmahe //5//
analyzed: medhām sūryasya raśmibhiḥ vacasā veśayāmahe

original: (AVŚ_6,109.1a) pippalī kṣiptabheṣajy utātividdhabheṣajī /
analyzed: pippalī kṣipta bheṣajī uta atividdha bheṣajī

original: (AVŚ_6,109.1c) tāṃ devāḥ sam akalpayann iyaṃ jīvitavā alam //1//
analyzed: tām devāḥ sam akalpayan iyam jīvitavai alam

original: (AVŚ_6,109.2a) pippalyaḥ sam avadantāyatīr jananād adhi /
analyzed: pippalyaḥ sam avadanta āyatīḥ jananāt adhi

original: (AVŚ_6,109.2c) yaṃ jīvam aśnavāmahai na sa riṣyāti pūruṣaḥ //2//
analyzed: yam jīvam aśnavāmahai na sa riṣyāti pūruṣaḥ

original: (AVŚ_6,109.3a) asurās tvā ny akhanan devās tvod avapan punaḥ /
analyzed: asurāḥ tvā ni akhanan devāḥ tvā ud avapan punar

original: (AVŚ_6,109.3c) vātīkṛtasya bheṣajīm atho kṣiptasya bheṣajīm //3//
analyzed: vātīkṛtasya bheṣajīm atha u kṣiptasya bheṣajīm

original: (AVŚ_6,110.1a) pratno hi kam īḍyo adhvareṣu sanāc ca hotā navyaś ca satsi /
analyzed: pratnaḥ hi kam īḍyaḥ adhvareṣu sanāt ca hotā navyaḥ ca satsi

original: (AVŚ_6,110.1c) svām cāgne tanvaṃ piprāyasvāsmabhyaṃ ca saubhagam ā yajasva //1//
analyzed: svām ca agne tanvam piprāyasva asmabhyam ca saubhagam ā yajasva

original: (AVŚ_6,110.2a) jyeṣṭhaghnyāṃ jāto vicṛtor yamasya mūlabarhaṇāt pari pāhy enam /
analyzed: jyeṣṭhaghnyām jātaḥ vicṛtoḥ yamasya mūla barhaṇāt pari pāhi enam

original: (AVŚ_6,110.2c) aty enam neṣad duritāni viśvā dīrghāyutvāya śataśāradāya //2//
analyzed: ati enam neṣat duritāni viśvā dīrgha āyu tvāya śata śāradāya

original: (AVŚ_6,110.3a) vyāghre 'hny ajaniṣṭa vīro nakṣatrajā jāyamānaḥ suvīraḥ /
analyzed: vyāghre hni ajaniṣṭa vīraḥ nakṣatra jāḥ jāyamānaḥ su vīraḥ

original: (AVŚ_6,110.3c) sa mā vadhīt pitaraṃ vardhamāno mā mātaraṃ pra minīj janitrīm //3//
analyzed: sa mā vadhīt pitaram vardhamānaḥ mā mātaram pra minīt janitrīm

original: (AVŚ_6,111.1a) imam me agne puruṣam mumugdhy ayaṃ yo baddhaḥ suyato lālapīti /
analyzed: imam me agne puruṣam mumugdhi ayam yaḥ baddhaḥ su yataḥ lālapīti

original: (AVŚ_6,111.1c) ato 'dhi te kṛṇavad bhāgadheyaṃ yadānunmadito 'sati //1//
analyzed: atas hi te kṛṇavat bhāgadheyam yadā an unmaditaḥ sati

original: (AVŚ_6,111.2a) agniṣ ṭe ni śamayatu yadi te mana udyutam /
analyzed: agniḥ te ni śamayatu yadi te manaḥ udyutam

original: (AVŚ_6,111.2c) kṛṇomi vidvān bheṣajaṃ yathānunmadito 'sasi //2//
analyzed: kṛṇomi vidvān bheṣajam yathā an unmaditaḥ sasi

original: (AVŚ_6,111.3a) devainasād unmaditam unmattam rakṣasas pari /
analyzed: deva enasāt unmaditam unmattam rakṣasaḥ pari

original: (AVŚ_6,111.3c) kṛṇomi vidvān bheṣajaṃ yadānunmadito 'sati //3//
analyzed: kṛṇomi vidvān bheṣajam sati

original: (AVŚ_6,111.4a) punas tvā dur apsarasaḥ punar indraḥ punar bhagaḥ /
analyzed: punar tvā duḥ apsarasaḥ punar indraḥ punar bhagaḥ

original: (AVŚ_6,111.4c) punas tvā dur viśve devā yathānunmadito 'sasi //4//
analyzed: punar tvā duḥ viśve devāḥ yathā an unmaditaḥ sasi

original: (AVŚ_6,112.1a) mā jyeṣṭhaṃ vadhīd ayam agna eṣām mūlabarhaṇāt pari pāhy enam /
analyzed: mā jyeṣṭham vadhīt ayam agne eṣām mūla barhaṇāt pari pāhi enam

original: (AVŚ_6,112.1c) sa grāhyāḥ pāśān vi cṛta prajānan tubhyaṃ devā anu jānantu viśve //1//
analyzed: sa grāhyāḥ pāśān vi cṛta prajānan tubhyam devāḥ anu jānantu viśve

original: (AVŚ_6,112.2a) un muñca pāśāṃs tvam agna eṣāṃ trayas tribhir utsitā yebhir āsan /
analyzed: ud muñca pāśān tvam agne eṣām trayaḥ tribhiḥ utsitāḥ yebhiḥ āsan

original: (AVŚ_6,112.2c) sa grāhyāḥ pāśān vi cṛta prajānan pitāputrau mātaraṃ muñca sarvān //2//
analyzed: sa grāhyāḥ pāśān vi cṛta prajānan pitāputrau mātaram muñca sarvān

original: (AVŚ_6,112.3a) yebhiḥ pāśaiḥ parivitto vibaddho 'ṅgeaṅga ārpita utsitaś ca /
analyzed: yebhiḥ pāśaiḥ parivittaḥ vibaddhaḥ ṅgeaṅgaḥ ārpitaḥ utsitaḥ ca

original: (AVŚ_6,112.3c) vi te mucyantaṃ vimuco hi santi bhrūṇaghni pūṣan duritāni mṛkṣva //3//
analyzed: vi te mucyantam vimucaḥ hi santi bhrūṇa ghni pūṣan duritāni mṛkṣva

original: (AVŚ_6,113.1a) trite devā amṛjataitad enas trita enan manuṣyeṣu mamṛje /
analyzed: trite devāḥ amṛjata etat enaḥ trite enat manuṣyeṣu mamṛje

original: (AVŚ_6,113.1c) tato yadi tvā grāhir ānaśe tāṃ te devā brahmaṇā nāśayantu //1//
analyzed: tatas yadi tvā grāhiḥ ānaśe tām te devāḥ brahmaṇā nāśayantu

original: (AVŚ_6,113.2a) marīcīr dhūmān pra viśānu pāpmann udārān gachota vā nīhārān /
analyzed: marīcīḥ dhūmān pra viśa anu pāpman udārān gacha uta vā nīhārān

original: (AVŚ_6,113.2c) nadīnaṃ phenāṃ anu tān vi naśya bhrūṇaghni pūṣan duritāni mṛkṣva //2//
analyzed: nadīnam phenām anu tān vi naśya bhrūṇa ghni pūṣan duritāni mṛkṣva

original: (AVŚ_6,113.3a) dvādaśadhā nihitaṃ tritasyāpamṛṣṭam manuṣyainasāni /
analyzed: dvādaśadhā nihitam tritasya apamṛṣṭam manuṣya enasāni

original: (AVŚ_6,113.3c) tato yadi tvā grāhir ānaśe tāṃ te devā brahmaṇā nāśayantu //3//
analyzed: tatas yadi tvā grāhiḥ ānaśe tām te devāḥ brahmaṇā nāśayantu

original: (AVŚ_6,114.1a) yad devā devaheḍanaṃ devāsaś cakṛma vayam /
analyzed: yat devāḥ deva heḍanam devāsaḥ cakṛma vayam

original: (AVŚ_6,114.1c) ādityās tasmān no yuyam ṛtasya ṛtena muñcata //1//
analyzed: ādityāḥ tasmāt naḥ yuyam ṛtasya ṛtena muñcata

original: (AVŚ_6,114.2a) ṛtasya ṛtenādityā yajatrā muñcateha naḥ /
analyzed: ṛtasya ṛtena ādityāḥ yajatrāḥ muñcata iha naḥ

original: (AVŚ_6,114.2c) yajñaṃ yad yajñavāhasaḥ śikṣanto nopaśekima //2//
analyzed: yajñam yat yajña vāhasaḥ śikṣantaḥ na upaśekima

original: (AVŚ_6,114.3a) medasvatā yajamānāḥ srucājyāni juhvataḥ /
analyzed: medasvatā yajamānāḥ srucā ājyāni juhvataḥ

original: (AVŚ_6,114.3c) akāmā viśve vo devāḥ śikṣanto nopa śekima //3//
analyzed: akāmāḥ viśve vaḥ devāḥ śikṣantaḥ na upa śekima

original: (AVŚ_6,115.1a) yad vidvāṃso yad avidvāṃsa enāṃsi cakṛmā vayam /
analyzed: yat vidvāṃsaḥ yat a vidvāṃsaḥ enāṃsi cakṛma vayam

original: (AVŚ_6,115.1c) yūyaṃ nas tasmān muñcata viśve devāḥ sajoṣasaḥ //1//
analyzed: yūyam naḥ tasmāt muñcata viśve devāḥ sajoṣasaḥ

original: (AVŚ_6,115.2a) yadi jāgrad yadi svapann ena enasyo 'karam /
analyzed: yadi jāgrat yadi svapan enaḥ enasya u karam

original: (AVŚ_6,115.2c) bhūtaṃ mā tasmād bhavyaṃ ca drupadād iva muñcatām //2//
analyzed: bhūtam mā tasmāt bhavyam ca drupadāt iva muñcatām

original: (AVŚ_6,115.3a) drupadād iva mumucānaḥ svinnaḥ snātvā malād iva /
analyzed: drupadāt iva mumucānaḥ svinnaḥ snātvā malāt iva

original: (AVŚ_6,115.3c) pūtaṃ pavitreṇevājyaṃ viśve śumbhantu mainasaḥ //3//
analyzed: pūtam pavitreṇa iva ājyam viśve śumbhantu mā enasaḥ

original: (AVŚ_6,116.1a) yad yāmaṃ cakrur nikhananto agre kārṣīvaṇā annavido na vidyayā /
analyzed: yat yāmam cakruḥ nikhanantaḥ agre kārṣīvaṇāḥ anna vidaḥ na vidyayā

original: (AVŚ_6,116.1c) vaivasvate rājani taj juhomy atha yajñiyaṃ madhumad astu no 'nnam //1//
analyzed: vaivasvate rājani tat juhomi atha yajñiyam madhumat astu naḥ nnam

original: (AVŚ_6,116.2a) vaivasvataḥ kṛṇavad bhāgadheyaṃ madhubhāgo madhunā saṃ sṛjāti /
analyzed: vaivasvataḥ kṛṇavat bhāgadheyam madhu bhāgaḥ madhunā sam sṛjāti

original: (AVŚ_6,116.2c) mātur yad ena iṣitaṃ na āgan yad vā pitā 'parāddho jihīde //2//
analyzed: mātuḥ yat enaḥ iṣitam naḥ āgan yat vā pitā parāddhaḥ jihīde

original: (AVŚ_6,116.3a) yadīdaṃ mātur yadi pitur naḥ pari bhrātuḥ putrāc cetasa ena āgan /
analyzed: yadi idam mātuḥ yadi pituḥ naḥ pari bhrātuḥ putrāt cetasaḥ enaḥ āgan

original: (AVŚ_6,116.3c) yāvanto asmān pitaraḥ sacante teṣāṃ sarveṣāṃ śivo astu manyuḥ //3//
analyzed: yāvantaḥ asmān pitaraḥ sacante teṣām sarveṣām śivaḥ astu manyuḥ

original: (AVŚ_6,117.1a) apamityam apratīttaṃ yad asmi yamasya yena balinā carāmi /
analyzed: apamityam apratīttam yat asmi yamasya yena balinā carāmi

original: (AVŚ_6,117.1c) idaṃ tad agne anṛṇo bhavāmi tvaṃ pāśān vicṛtaṃ vettha sarvān //1//
analyzed: idam tat agne anṛṇaḥ bhavāmi tvam pāśān vicṛtam vettha sarvān

original: (AVŚ_6,117.2a) ihaiva santaḥ prati dadma enaj jīvā jīvebhyo ni harāma enat /
analyzed: iha eva santaḥ prati dadmaḥ enat jīvāḥ jīvebhyaḥ ni harāmaḥ enat

original: (AVŚ_6,117.2c) apamitya dhānyaṃ yaj jaghasāham idaṃ tad agne anṛṇo bhavāmi //2//
analyzed: apamitya dhānyam yat jaghasa aham idam tat agne anṛṇaḥ bhavāmi

original: (AVŚ_6,117.3a) anṛṇā asminn anṛṇāḥ parasmin tṛtīye loke anṛṇāḥ syāma /
analyzed: anṛṇāḥ asmin anṛṇāḥ parasmin tṛtīye loke anṛṇāḥ syāma

original: (AVŚ_6,117.3c) ye devayānāḥ pitṛyāṇaś ca lokāḥ sarvān patho anṛṇā ā kṣiyema //3//
analyzed: ye deva yānāḥ pitṛyāṇaḥ ca lokāḥ sarvān pathaḥ anṛṇāḥ ā kṣiyema

original: (AVŚ_6,118.1a) yad dhastābhyāṃ cakṛma kilbiṣāṇy akṣāṇāṃ gatnum upalipsamānāḥ /
analyzed: yat hastābhyām cakṛma kilbiṣāṇi akṣāṇām gatnum upalipsamānāḥ

original: (AVŚ_6,118.1c) ugraṃpaśye ugrajitau tad adyāpsarasāv anu dattām ṛṇaṃ naḥ //1//
analyzed: ugraṃpaśye ugrajitau tat adya apsarasau anu dattām ṛṇam naḥ

original: (AVŚ_6,118.2a) ugraṃpaśye rāṣṭrabhṛt kilbiṣāṇi yad akṣavṛttam anu dattam na etat /
analyzed: ugraṃpaśye rāṣṭrabhṛt kilbiṣāṇi yat akṣa vṛttam anu dattam naḥ etat

original: (AVŚ_6,118.2c) ṛṇān no na ṛṇam ertsamāno yamasya loke adhirajjur āyat //2//
analyzed: ṛṇāt naḥ naḥ ṛṇam ertsamānaḥ yamasya loke adhirajjuḥ āyat

original: (AVŚ_6,118.3a) yasmā ṛṇaṃ yasya jāyām upaimi yaṃ yācamāno abhyaimi devāḥ /
analyzed: yasmai ṛṇam yasya jāyām upaimi yam yācamānaḥ abhyaimi devāḥ

original: (AVŚ_6,118.3c) te vācaṃ vādiṣur mottarāṃ mad devapatnī apsarasāv adhītam //3//
analyzed: te vācam vādiṣuḥ mā uttarām mat deva patnī apsarasau adhītam

original: (AVŚ_6,119.1a) yad adīvyann ṛṇam ahaṃ kṛṇomy adāsyann agne uta saṃgṛṇāmi /
analyzed: yat a dīvyan ṛṇam aham kṛṇomi a dāsyan agne uta saṃgṛṇāmi

original: (AVŚ_6,119.1c) vaiśvānaro no adhipā vasiṣṭha ud in nayāti sukṛtasya lokam //1//
analyzed: vaiśvānaraḥ naḥ adhipāḥ vasiṣṭhaḥ ud id nayāti sukṛtasya lokam

original: (AVŚ_6,119.2a) vaiśvānarāya prati vedayāmi yadi ṛṇaṃ saṃgaro devatāsu /
analyzed: vaiśvānarāya prati vedayāmi yadi ṛṇam saṃgaraḥ devatāsu

original: (AVŚ_6,119.2c) sa etān pāśān vicṛtam veda sarvān atha pakvena saha saṃ bhavema //2//
analyzed: saḥ etān pāśān vicṛtam veda sarvān atha pakvena saha sam bhavema

original: (AVŚ_6,119.3a) vaiśvānaraḥ pavitā mā punātu yat saṃgaram abhidhāvāmy āśām /
analyzed: vaiśvānaraḥ pavitā mā punātu yat saṃgaram abhidhāvāmi āśām

original: (AVŚ_6,119.3c) anājānan manasā yācamāno yat tatraino apa tat suvāmi //3//
analyzed: an ājānan manasā yācamānaḥ yat tatra enaḥ apa tat suvāmi

original: (AVŚ_6,120.1a) yad antarikṣaṃ pṛthivīm uta dyām yan mātaraṃ pitaraṃ vā jihiṃsima /
analyzed: yat antarikṣam pṛthivīm uta dyām yat mātaram pitaram vā jihiṃsima

original: (AVŚ_6,120.1c) ayaṃ tasmād gārhapatyo no agnir ud in nayāti sukṛtasya lokam //1//
analyzed: ayam tasmāt gārhapatyaḥ naḥ agniḥ ud id nayāti sukṛtasya lokam

original: (AVŚ_6,120.2a) bhūmir mātāditir no janitraṃ bhrātāntarikṣam abhiśastyā naḥ /
analyzed: bhūmiḥ mātā aditiḥ naḥ janitram bhrātā antarikṣam abhiśastyāḥ naḥ

original: (AVŚ_6,120.2c) dyaur naḥ pitā pitryāc chaṃ bhavāti jāmim ṛtvā māva patsi lokāt //2//
analyzed: dyauḥ naḥ pitā pitryāt śam bhavāti jāmim ṛtvā mā ava patsi lokāt

original: (AVŚ_6,120.3a) yatrā suhārdaḥ sukṛto madanti vihāya rogaṃ tanvaḥ svāyāḥ /
analyzed: yatrā suhārdaḥ su kṛtaḥ madanti vihāya rogam tanvaḥ svāyāḥ

original: (AVŚ_6,120.3c) aślonā aṅgair ahrutāḥ svarge tatra paśyema pitarau ca putrān //3//
analyzed: aślonāḥ aṅgaiḥ ahrutāḥ svarge tatra paśyema pitarau ca putrān

original: (AVŚ_6,121.1a) viṣāṇā pāśān vi ṣyādhy asmad ya uttamā adhamā vāruṇā ye /
analyzed: viṣāṇā pāśān vi syādhi asmat ye uttamāḥ adhamāḥ vāruṇāḥ ye

original: (AVŚ_6,121.1c) duṣvapnyaṃ duritaṃ ni ṣvāsmad atha gachema sukṛtasya lokam //1//
analyzed: duṣvapnyam duritam ni sva asmat atha gacchema sukṛtasya lokam

original: (AVŚ_6,121.2a) yad dāruṇi badhyase yac ca rajjvāṃ yad bhūmyāṃ badhyase yac ca vācā /
analyzed: yat dāruṇi badhyase yat ca rajjvām yat bhūmyām badhyase yat ca vācā

original: (AVŚ_6,121.2c) ayaṃ tasmād gārhapatyo no agnir ud in nayāti sukṛtasya lokam //2//
analyzed: ayam tasmāt gārhapatyaḥ naḥ agniḥ ud id nayāti sukṛtasya lokam

original: (AVŚ_6,121.3a) ud agātāṃ bhagavatī vicṛtau nāma tārake /
analyzed: ud agātām bhagavatī vicṛtau nāma tārake

original: (AVŚ_6,121.3c) prehāmṛtasya yachatāṃ praitu baddhakamocanam //3//
analyzed: preha amṛtasya yat śatām praitu baddhaka mocanam

original: (AVŚ_6,121.4a) vi jihīṣva lokam kṛṇu bandhān muñcāsi baddhakam /
analyzed: vi jihīṣva lokam kṛṇu bandhān muñcāsi baddhakam

original: (AVŚ_6,121.4c) yonyā iva pracyuto garbhaḥ pathaḥ sarvāṃ anu kṣiya //4//
analyzed: yonyāḥ iva pracyutaḥ garbhaḥ pathaḥ sarvān anu kṣiya

original: (AVŚ_6,122.1a) etaṃ bhāgaṃ pari dadāmi vidvān viśvakarman prathamajā ṛtasya /
analyzed: etam bhāgam pari dadāmi vidvān viśvakarman prathama jāḥ ṛtasya

original: (AVŚ_6,122.1c) asmābhir dattaṃ jarasaḥ parastād achinnaṃ tantum anu saṃ tarema //1//
analyzed: asmābhiḥ dattam jarasaḥ parastāt a chinnam tantum anu sam tarema

original: (AVŚ_6,122.2a) tataṃ tantum anv eke taranti yeṣāṃ dattaṃ pitryam āyanena /
analyzed: tatam tantum anu eke taranti yeṣām dattam pitryam āyanena

original: (AVŚ_6,122.2c) abandhv eke dadataḥ prayachanto dātuṃ cec chikṣānt sa svarga eva //2//
analyzed: a bandhu eke dadataḥ prayacchantaḥ dātum ced śikṣān sa svargaḥ eva

original: (AVŚ_6,122.3a) anvārabhethām anusaṃrabhethām etaṃ lokaṃ śraddadhānāḥ sacante /
analyzed: anvārabhethām anusaṃrabhethām etam lokam śraddadhānāḥ sacante

original: (AVŚ_6,122.3c) yad vāṃ pakvaṃ pariviṣṭam agnau tasya guptaye dampatī saṃ śrayethām //3//
analyzed: yat vām pakvam pariviṣṭam agnau tasya guptaye dampatī sam śrayethām

original: (AVŚ_6,122.4a) yajñam yantaṃ manasā bṛhantam anvārohāmi tapasā sayoniḥ /
analyzed: yajñam yantam manasā bṛhantam anvārohāmi tapasā sa yoniḥ

original: (AVŚ_6,122.4c) upahūtā agne jarasaḥ parastāt tṛtīye nāke sadhamādaṃ madema //4//
analyzed: upahūtāḥ agne jarasaḥ parastāt tṛtīye nāke sadhamādam madema

original: (AVŚ_6,122.5a) śuddhāḥ pūtā yoṣito yajñiyā imā brahmaṇāṃ hasteṣu prapṛthak sādayāmi /
analyzed: śuddhāḥ pūtāḥ yoṣitaḥ yajñiyāḥ imāḥ brahmaṇām hasteṣu prapṛthak sādayāmi

original: (AVŚ_6,122.5c) yatkāma idaṃ abhiṣiñcāmi vo 'haṃ indro marutvānt sa dadātu tan me //5//
analyzed: yad kāmaḥ idam abhiṣiñcāmi vaḥ haṃ indraḥ marutvān sa dadātu tat me

original: (AVŚ_6,123.1a) etaṃ sadhasthāḥ pari vo dadāmi yaṃ śevadhim āvahāj jātavedaḥ /
analyzed: etam sadhasthāḥ pari vaḥ dadāmi yam śevadhim āvahāt jātavedaḥ

original: (AVŚ_6,123.1c) anvāgantā yajamānaḥ svasti taṃ sma jānīta parame vyoman //1//
analyzed: anvāgantā yajamānaḥ svasti tam sma jānīta parame vyoman

original: (AVŚ_6,123.2a) jānīta smainaṃ parame vyoman devāḥ sadhasthā vida lokam atra /
analyzed: jānīta sma enam parame vyoman devāḥ sadhasthāḥ vida lokam atra

original: (AVŚ_6,123.2c) anvāgantā yajamānaḥ svastīṣṭāpūrtaṃ sma kṛṇutāvir asmai //2//
analyzed: anvāgantā yajamānaḥ svasti iṣṭāpūrtam sma kṛṇuta āvis asmai

original: (AVŚ_6,123.3a) devāḥ pitaraḥ pitaro devāḥ /
analyzed: devāḥ pitaraḥ pitaraḥ devāḥ

original: (AVŚ_6,123.3c) yo asmi so asmi //3//
analyzed: yaḥ asmi saḥ asmi

original: (AVŚ_6,123.4a) sa pacāmi sa dadāmi /
analyzed: sa pacāmi sa dadāmi

original: (AVŚ_6,123.4c) sa yaje sa dattān mā yūṣam //4//
analyzed: sa yaje sa dattāt mā yūṣam

original: (AVŚ_6,123.5a) nāke rājan prati tiṣṭha tatraitat prati tiṣṭhatu /
analyzed: nāke rājan prati tiṣṭha tatra etat prati tiṣṭhatu

original: (AVŚ_6,123.5c) viddhi pūrtasya no rājant sa deva sumanā bhava //5//
analyzed: viddhi pūrtasya naḥ rājan sa deva su manāḥ bhava

original: (AVŚ_6,124.1a) divo nu mām bṛhato antarikṣād apāṃ stoko abhy apaptad rasena /
analyzed: divaḥ nu mām bṛhataḥ antarikṣāt apām stokaḥ abhī apaptat rasena

original: (AVŚ_6,124.1c) sam indriyena payasāham agne chandobhir yajñaiḥ sukṛtāṃ kṛtena //1//
analyzed: sam indriyena payasā aham agne chandobhiḥ yajñaiḥ su kṛtām kṛtena

original: (AVŚ_6,124.2a) yadi vṛkṣād abhyapaptat phalaṃ tad yady antarikṣāt sa u vāyur eva /
analyzed: yadi vṛkṣāt abhyapaptat phalam tat yadi antarikṣāt saḥ u vāyuḥ eva

original: (AVŚ_6,124.2c) yatrāspṛkṣat tanvo yac ca vāsasa āpo nudantu nirṛtiṃ parācaiḥ //2//
analyzed: yatra aspṛkṣat tanvaḥ yat ca vāsasaḥ āpaḥ nudantu nirṛtim parācais

original: (AVŚ_6,124.3a) abhyañjanaṃ surabhi sā samṛddhir hiraṇyaṃ varcas tad u pūtrimam eva /
analyzed: abhyañjanam surabhi sā samṛddhiḥ hiraṇyam varcaḥ tat u pūtrimam eva

original: (AVŚ_6,124.3c) sarvā pavitrā vitatādhy asmat tan mā tārīn nirṛtir mo arātiḥ //3//
analyzed: sarvā pavitrā vitatā adhi asmat tat mā tārīt nirṛtiḥ mā u arātiḥ

original: (AVŚ_6,125.1a) vanaspate vīḍvaṅgo hi bhūyā asmatsakhā prataraṇaḥ suvīraḥ /
analyzed: vanaspate vīḍu aṅgaḥ hi bhūyāḥ asmad sakhā prataraṇaḥ su vīraḥ

original: (AVŚ_6,125.1c) gobhiḥ saṃnaddho asi vīḍayasvāsthātā te jayatu jetvāni //1//
analyzed: gobhiḥ saṃnaddhaḥ asi vīḍayasva āsthātā te jayatu jetvāni

original: (AVŚ_6,125.2a) divas pṛthivyāḥ pary oja udbhṛtaṃ vanaspatibhyaḥ pary ābhṛtaṃ sahaḥ /
analyzed: divaḥ pṛthivyāḥ pari ojaḥ udbhṛtam vanaspatibhyaḥ pari ābhṛtam sahaḥ

original: (AVŚ_6,125.2c) apām ojmānaṃ pari gobhir āvṛtam indrasya vajraṃ haviṣā rathaṃ yaja //2//
analyzed: apām ojmānam pari gobhiḥ āvṛtam indrasya vajram haviṣā ratham yaja

original: (AVŚ_6,125.3a) indrasyaujo marutām anīkaṃ mitrasya garbho varuṇasya nābhiḥ /
analyzed: indrasya ojaḥ marutām anīkam mitrasya garbhaḥ varuṇasya nābhiḥ

original: (AVŚ_6,125.3c) sa imāṃ no havyadātiṃ juṣāṇo deva ratha prati havyā gṛbhāya //3//
analyzed: saḥ imām naḥ havya dātim juṣāṇaḥ deva ratha prati havyā gṛbhāya

original: (AVŚ_6,126.1a) upa śvāsaya pṛthivīm uta dyaṃ purutrā te vanvatāṃ viṣṭhitam jagat /
analyzed: upa śvāsaya pṛthivīm uta dyam purutrā te vanvatām viṣṭhitam jagat

original: (AVŚ_6,126.1c) sa dundubhe sajūr indreṇa devair dūrād davīyo apa sedha śatrūn //1//
analyzed: sa dundubhe sajūs indreṇa devaiḥ dūrāt davīyaḥ apa sedha śatrūn

original: (AVŚ_6,126.2a) ā krandaya balam ojo na ā dhā abhi ṣṭana duritā bādhamānaḥ /
analyzed: ā krandaya balam ojaḥ naḥ ā dhāḥ abhi stana duritā bādhamānaḥ

original: (AVŚ_6,126.2c) apa sedha dundubhe duchunām ita indrasya muṣṭir asi vīḍayasva //2//
analyzed: apa sedha dundubhe duchunām itas indrasya muṣṭiḥ asi vīḍayasva

original: (AVŚ_6,126.3a) prāmūṃ jayābhīme jayantu ketumad dundubhir vāvadītu /
analyzed: pra amūm jaya abhīme jayantu ketumat dundubhiḥ vāvadītu

original: (AVŚ_6,126.3c) sam aśvaparṇāḥ patantu no naro 'smākam indra rathino jayantu //3//
analyzed: sam aśva parṇāḥ patantu naḥ naraḥ smākam indra rathinaḥ jayantu

original: (AVŚ_6,127.1a) vidradhasya balāsasya lohitasya vanaspate /
analyzed: vidradhasya balāsasya lohitasya vanaspate

original: (AVŚ_6,127.1c) visalpakasyauṣadhe moc chiṣaḥ piśitaṃ cana //1//
analyzed: visalpakasya auṣadhe mā ud śiṣaḥ piśitam cana

original: (AVŚ_6,127.2a) yau te balāsa tiṣṭhataḥ kakṣe muṣkāv apaśritau /
analyzed: yau te balāsa tiṣṭhataḥ kakṣe muṣkau apaśritau

original: (AVŚ_6,127.2c) vedāhaṃ tasya bheṣajaṃ cīpudrur abhicakṣaṇam //2//
analyzed: veda aham tasya bheṣajam cīpudruḥ abhicakṣaṇam

original: (AVŚ_6,127.3a) yo aṅgyo yaḥ karṇyo yo akṣyor visalpakaḥ /
analyzed: yaḥ aṅgyaḥ yaḥ karṇyaḥ yaḥ akṣyoḥ visalpakaḥ

original: (AVŚ_6,127.3c) vi vṛhāmo visalpakaṃ vidradhaṃ hṛdayāmayam /
analyzed: vi vṛhāmaḥ visalpakam vidradham hṛdaya āmayam

original: (AVŚ_6,127.3e) parā tam ajñātam yakṣmam adharāñcaṃ suvāmasi //3//
analyzed: parā tam a jñātam yakṣmam adharāñcam suvāmasi

original: (AVŚ_6,128.1a) śakadhūmaṃ nakṣatrāṇi yad rājānam akurvata /
analyzed: śakadhūmam nakṣatrāṇi yat rājānam akurvata

original: (AVŚ_6,128.1c) bhadrāham asmai prāyachan idaṃ rāṣṭram asād iti //1//
analyzed: bhadrā aham asmai prāyacchan idam rāṣṭram asāt iti

original: (AVŚ_6,128.2a) bhadrāhaṃ no madhyaṃdine bhadrāhaṃ sāyam astu naḥ /
analyzed: bhadrā aham naḥ madhyaṃdine bhadrā aham sāyam astu naḥ
