original: (AVŚ_6,128.2c) bhadrāhaṃ no ahnāṃ prātā rātrī bhadrāham astu naḥ //2//
analyzed: bhadrā aham naḥ ahnām prātā rātrī bhadrā aham astu naḥ

original: (AVŚ_6,128.3a) ahorātrābhyāṃ nakṣatrebhyaḥ suryācandramasābhyām /
analyzed: ahar rātrābhyām nakṣatrebhyaḥ suryācandramasābhyām

original: (AVŚ_6,128.3c) bhadrāham asmabhyaṃ rājan chakadhūma tvaṃ kṛdhi //3//
analyzed: bhadrā aham asmabhyam rājan śakadhūma tvam kṛdhi

original: (AVŚ_6,128.4a) yo no bhadrāham akaraḥ sāyaṃ naktam atho divā /
analyzed: yaḥ naḥ bhadrā aham akaraḥ sāyam naktam atha u divā

original: (AVŚ_6,128.4c) tasmai te nakṣatrarāja śakadhūma sadā namaḥ //4//
analyzed: tasmai te nakṣatra rāja śakadhūma sadā namaḥ

original: (AVŚ_6,129.1a) bhagena mā śāṃśapena sākam indreṇa medinā /
analyzed: bhagena mā śāṃśapena sākam indreṇa medinā

original: (AVŚ_6,129.1c) kṛṇomi bhaginaṃ māpa drāntv arātayaḥ //1//
analyzed: kṛṇomi bhaginam mā apa drāntu arātayaḥ

original: (AVŚ_6,129.2a) yena vṛkṣāṃ abhyabhavo bhagena varcasā saha /
analyzed: yena vṛkṣān abhyabhavaḥ bhagena varcasā saha

original: (AVŚ_6,129.2c) tena mā bhaginaṃ kṛṇv apa drāntv arātayaḥ //2//
analyzed: tena mā bhaginam kṛṇu apa drāntu arātayaḥ

original: (AVŚ_6,129.3a) yo andho yaḥ punaḥsaro bhago vṛkṣeṣv āhitaḥ /
analyzed: yaḥ andhaḥ yaḥ punaḥsaraḥ bhagaḥ vṛkṣeṣu āhitaḥ

original: (AVŚ_6,129.3c) tena mā bhaginaṃ kṛṇv apa drāntv arātayaḥ //3//
analyzed: tena mā bhaginam kṛṇu apa drāntu arātayaḥ

original: (AVŚ_6,130.1a) rathajitāṃ rāthajiteyīnām apsarasām ayaṃ smaraḥ /
analyzed: ratha jitām rāthajiteyīnām apsarasām ayam smaraḥ

original: (AVŚ_6,130.1c) devāḥ pra hiṇuta smaram asau mām anu śocatu //1//
analyzed: devāḥ pra hiṇuta smaram asau mām anu śocatu

original: (AVŚ_6,130.2a) asau me smaratād iti priyo me smaratād iti /
analyzed: asau me smaratāt iti priyaḥ me smaratāt iti

original: (AVŚ_6,130.2c) devāḥ pra hiṇuta smaram asau mām anu śocatu //2//
analyzed: devāḥ pra hiṇuta smaram asau mām anu śocatu

original: (AVŚ_6,130.3a) yathā mama smarād asau nāmuṣyāhaṃ kadā cana /
analyzed: yathā mama smarāt asau na amuṣya aham kadā cana

original: (AVŚ_6,130.3c) devāḥ pra hiṇuta smaram asau mām anu śocatu //3//
analyzed: devāḥ pra hiṇuta smaram asau mām anu śocatu

original: (AVŚ_6,130.4a) un mādayata maruta ud antarikṣa mādaya /
analyzed: ud mādayata marutaḥ ud antarikṣa mādaya

original: (AVŚ_6,130.4c) agna un mādayā tvam asau mām anu śocatu //4//
analyzed: agne ud mādaya tvam asau mām anu śocatu

original: (AVŚ_6,131.1a) ni śīrṣato ni pattata ādhyo ni tirāmi te /
analyzed: ni śīrṣataḥ ni pattataḥ ādhyaḥ ni tirāmi te

original: (AVŚ_6,131.1c) devāḥ pra hiṇuta smaram asau mām anu śocatu //1//
analyzed: devāḥ pra hiṇuta smaram asau mām anu śocatu

original: (AVŚ_6,131.2a) anumate 'nv idaṃ manyasvākute sam idaṃ namaḥ /
analyzed: anumate nu idam manyasva akute sam idam namaḥ

original: (AVŚ_6,131.2c) devāḥ pra hiṇuta smaram asau mām anu śocatu //2//
analyzed: devāḥ pra hiṇuta smaram asau mām anu śocatu

original: (AVŚ_6,131.3a) yad dhāvasi triyojanaṃ pañcayojanam āśvinam /
analyzed: yat dhāvasi tri yojanam pañca yojanam āśvinam

original: (AVŚ_6,131.3c) tatas tvaṃ punar āyasi putrāṇāṃ no asaḥ pitā //3//
analyzed: tatas tvam punar āyasi putrāṇām naḥ asaḥ pitā

original: (AVŚ_6,132.1a) yaṃ devāḥ smaram asiñcann apsv antaḥ śośucānaṃ sahādhyā /
analyzed: yam devāḥ smaram asiñcan apsu antar śośucānam saha ādhyā

original: (AVŚ_6,132.1c) taṃ te tapāmi varuṇasya dharmaṇā //1//
analyzed: tam te tapāmi varuṇasya dharmaṇā

original: (AVŚ_6,132.2a) yaṃ viśve devāḥ smaram asiñcann apsv antaḥ śośucānaṃ sahādhyā /
analyzed: yam viśve devāḥ smaram asiñcan apsu antar śośucānam saha ādhyā

original: (AVŚ_6,132.2c) taṃ te tapāmi varuṇasya dharmaṇā //2//
analyzed: tam te tapāmi varuṇasya dharmaṇā

original: (AVŚ_6,132.3a) yam indrāṇī smaram asiñcad apsv antaḥ śośucānaṃ sahādhyā /
analyzed: yam indrāṇī smaram asiñcat apsu antar śośucānam saha ādhyā

original: (AVŚ_6,132.3c) taṃ te tapāmi varuṇasya dharmaṇā //3//
analyzed: tam te tapāmi varuṇasya dharmaṇā

original: (AVŚ_6,132.4a) yam indrāgnī smaram asiñcatām apsv antaḥ śośucānaṃ sahādhyā /
analyzed: yam indra agnī smaram asiñcatām apsu antar śośucānam saha ādhyā

original: (AVŚ_6,132.4c) taṃ te tapāmi varuṇasya dharmaṇā //4//
analyzed: tam te tapāmi varuṇasya dharmaṇā

original: (AVŚ_6,132.5a) yam mitrāvaruṇau smaram asiñcatām apsv antaḥ śośucānaṃ sahādhyā /
analyzed: yam mitrāvaruṇau smaram asiñcatām apsu antar śośucānam saha ādhyā

original: (AVŚ_6,132.5c) taṃ te tapāmi varuṇasya dharmaṇā //5//
analyzed: tam te tapāmi varuṇasya dharmaṇā

original: (AVŚ_6,133.1a) ya imāṃ devo mekhalām ābabandha yaḥ saṃnanāha ya u no yuyoja /
analyzed: yaḥ imām devaḥ mekhalām ābabandha yaḥ saṃnanāha yaḥ u naḥ yuyoja

original: (AVŚ_6,133.1c) yasya devasya praśiṣā carāmaḥ sa pāram ichāt sa u no vi muñcāt //1//
analyzed: yasya devasya praśiṣā carāmaḥ sa pāram ichāt saḥ u naḥ vi muñcāt

original: (AVŚ_6,133.2a) āhutāsy abhihuta ṛṣīṇām asy āyudham /
analyzed: āhutā asi abhihutaḥ ṛṣīṇām asi āyudham

original: (AVŚ_6,133.2c) pūrvā vratasya prāśnatī vīraghnī bhava mekhale //2//
analyzed: pūrvā vratasya prāśnatī vīra ghnī bhava mekhale

original: (AVŚ_6,133.3a) mṛtyor ahaṃ brahmacārī yad asmi niryācan bhūtāt puruṣaṃ yamāya /
analyzed: mṛtyoḥ aham brahmacārī yat asmi niryācan bhūtāt puruṣam yamāya

original: (AVŚ_6,133.3c) tam ahaṃ brahmaṇā tapasā śrameṇānayainaṃ mekhalayā sināmi //3//
analyzed: tam aham brahmaṇā tapasā śrameṇa anayā enam mekhalayā sināmi

original: (AVŚ_6,133.4a) śraddhāyā duhitā tapaso 'dhi jātā svasā ṛṣīṇāṃ bhūtakṛtāṃ babhūva /
analyzed: śraddhāyāḥ duhitā tapasaḥ dhi jātā svasā ṛṣīṇām bhūta kṛtām babhūva

original: (AVŚ_6,133.4c) sā no mekhale matim ā dhehi medhām atho no dhehi tapa indriyaṃ ca //4//
analyzed: sā naḥ mekhale matim ā dhehi medhām atha u naḥ dhehi tapaḥ indriyam ca

original: (AVŚ_6,133.5a) yāṃ tvā pūrve bhūtakṛta ṛṣayaḥ paribedhire /
analyzed: yām tvā pūrve bhūta kṛtaḥ ṛṣayaḥ paribedhire

original: (AVŚ_6,133.5c) sā tvaṃ pari ṣvajasva māṃ dīrghāyutvāya mekhale //5//
analyzed: sā tvam pari svajasva mām dīrgha āyu tvāya mekhale

original: (AVŚ_6,134.1a) ayaṃ vajras tarpayatām ṛtasyāvāsya rāṣṭram apa hantu jīvitam /
analyzed: ayam vajraḥ tarpayatām ṛtasya ava asya rāṣṭram apa hantu jīvitam

original: (AVŚ_6,134.1c) śṛṇātu grīvāḥ pra śṛṇātūṣṇihā vṛtrasyeva śacīpatiḥ //1//
analyzed: śṛṇātu grīvāḥ pra śṛṇātu uṣṇihāḥ vṛtrasya iva śacīpatiḥ

original: (AVŚ_6,134.2a) adharo'dhara uttarebhyo gūḍhaḥ pṛthivyā mot sṛpat /
analyzed: adharodharaḥ uttarebhyaḥ gūḍhaḥ pṛthivyāḥ mā ud sṛpat

original: (AVŚ_6,134.2c) vajreṇāvahataḥ śayām //2//
analyzed: vajreṇa avahataḥ śayām

original: (AVŚ_6,134.3a) yo jināti tam anvicha yo jināti tam ij jahi /
analyzed: yaḥ jināti tam anvicha yaḥ jināti tam id jahi

original: (AVŚ_6,134.3c) jinato vajra tvaṃ sīmantam anvañcam anu pātaya //3//
analyzed: jinataḥ vajra tvam sīmantam anvañcam anu pātaya

original: (AVŚ_6,135.1a) yad aśnāmi balaṃ kurva itthaṃ vajram ā dade /
analyzed: yat aśnāmi balam kurve ittham vajram ā dade

original: (AVŚ_6,135.1c) skandhān amuṣya śātayan vṛtrasyeva śacīpatiḥ //1//
analyzed: skandhān amuṣya śātayan vṛtrasya iva śacīpatiḥ

original: (AVŚ_6,135.2a) yat pibāmi saṃ pibāmi samudra iva saṃpibaḥ /
analyzed: yat pibāmi sam pibāmi samudraḥ iva saṃpibaḥ

original: (AVŚ_6,135.2c) prāṇān amuṣya saṃpāya saṃ pibāmo amuṃ vayam //2//
analyzed: prāṇān amuṣya saṃpāya sam pibāmaḥ amum vayam

original: (AVŚ_6,135.3a) yad girāmi saṃ girāmi samudra iva saṃgiraḥ /
analyzed: yat girāmi sam girāmi samudraḥ iva saṃgiraḥ

original: (AVŚ_6,135.3c) prāṇān amuṣya saṃgīrya saṃ girāmo amum vayam //3//
analyzed: prāṇān amuṣya saṃgīrya sam girāmaḥ amum vayam

original: (AVŚ_6,136.1a) devī devyām adhi jātā pṛthivyām asy oṣadhe /
analyzed: devī devyām adhi jātā pṛthivyām asi oṣadhe

original: (AVŚ_6,136.1c) tāṃ tvā nitatni keśebhyo dṛṃhaṇāya khanāmasi //1//

original: (AVŚ_6,136.2a) dṛṃha pratnān janayājātān jātān u varṣīyasas kṛdhi //2//
analyzed: dṛṃha pratnān janaya a jātān jātān u varṣīyasaḥ kṛdhi

original: (AVŚ_6,136.3a) yas te keśo 'vapadyate samūlo yaś ca vṛścate /
analyzed: yaḥ te keśaḥ vapadyate sa mūlaḥ yaḥ ca vṛścate

original: (AVŚ_6,136.3c) idaṃ taṃ viśvabheṣajyābhi ṣiñcāmi vīrudhā //3//
analyzed: idam tam viśva bheṣajyā abhi siñcāmi vīrudhā

original: (AVŚ_6,137.1a) yāṃ jamadagnir akhanad duhitre keśavardhanīm /
analyzed: yām jamadagniḥ akhanat duhitre keśa vardhanīm

original: (AVŚ_6,137.1c) tāṃ vītahavya ābharad asitasya gṛhebhyaḥ //1//

original: (AVŚ_6,137.2a) abhīśunā meyā āsan vyāmenānumeyāḥ /
analyzed: abhīśunā meyāḥ āsan vyāmena anumeyāḥ

original: (AVŚ_6,137.2c) keśā naḍā iva vardhantāṃ śīrṣṇas te asitāḥ pari //2//

analyzed: dṛṃha mūlam ā agram yaccha vi madhyam yāmaya auṣadhe

original: (AVŚ_6,137.3c) keśā naḍā iva vardhantām śīrṣṇas te asitāḥ pari //3//
analyzed: keśāḥ naḍāḥ iva vardhantām śīrṣṇaḥ te asitāḥ pari

original: (AVŚ_6,138.1a) tvaṃ vīrudhāṃ śreṣṭhatamābhiśrutāsy oṣadhe /
analyzed: tvam vīrudhām śreṣṭhatamā abhiśrutā asi oṣadhe

original: (AVŚ_6,138.1c) imaṃ me adya puruṣaṃ klībam opaśinaṃ kṛdhi //1//
analyzed: imam me adya puruṣam klībam opaśinam kṛdhi

original: (AVŚ_6,138.2a) klībaṃ kṛdhy opaśinam atho kurīriṇaṃ kṛdhi /
analyzed: klībam kṛdhī opaśinam atha u kurīriṇam kṛdhi

original: (AVŚ_6,138.2c) athāsyendro grāvabhyām ubhe bhinattv āṇḍyau //2//
analyzed: atha asya indraḥ grāvabhyām ubhe bhinattu āṇḍyau

original: (AVŚ_6,138.3a) klība klībaṃ tvākaraṃ vadhre vadhriṃ tvākaram arasārasaṃ tvākaram /
analyzed: klība klībam tvā akaram vadhre vadhrim tvā akaram arasa arasam tvā akaram

original: (AVŚ_6,138.3c) kurīram asya śīrṣaṇi kumbaṃ cādhinidadhmasi //3//
analyzed: kurīram asya śīrṣaṇi kumbam ca adhinidadhmasi

original: (AVŚ_6,138.4a) ye te nādyau devakṛte yayos tiṣṭhati vṛṣṇyam /
analyzed: ye te na adyau deva kṛte yayoḥ tiṣṭhati vṛṣṇyam

original: (AVŚ_6,138.4c) te te bhinadmi śamyayāmuṣyā adhi muṣkayoḥ //4//
analyzed: te te bhinadmi śamyayā amuṣyāḥ adhi muṣkayoḥ

original: (AVŚ_6,138.5a) yathā naḍam kaśipune striyo bhindanty aśmanā /
analyzed: yathā naḍam kaśipune striyaḥ bhindanti aśmanā

original: (AVŚ_6,138.5c) evā bhinadmi te śepo 'muṣyā adhi muṣkayoḥ //5//
analyzed: eva bhinadmi te śepaḥ muṣyāḥ adhi muṣkayoḥ

original: (AVŚ_6,139.1a) nyastikā rurohitha subhagaṃkaraṇī mama /
analyzed: nyastikā rurohitha subhagaṃkaraṇī mama

original: (AVŚ_6,139.1c) śataṃ tava pratānās trayastriṃśan nitānāḥ //
analyzed: śatam tava pratānāḥ trayastriṃśat nitānāḥ

original: (AVŚ_6,139.1e) tayā sahasraparṇyā hṛdayaṃ śoṣayāmi te //1//
analyzed: tayā sahasraparṇyā hṛdayam śoṣayāmi te

original: (AVŚ_6,139.2a) śuṣyatu mayi te hṛdayam atho śuṣyatv āsyam /
analyzed: śuṣyatu mayi te hṛdayam atha u śuṣyatu āsyam

original: (AVŚ_6,139.2c) atho ni śuṣya māṃ kāmenātho śuṣkāsyā cara //2//
analyzed: atha u ni śuṣya mām kāmena atha u śuṣka āsyā cara

original: (AVŚ_6,139.3a) saṃvananī samuṣpalā babhru kalyāṇi saṃ nuda /
analyzed: saṃvananī sa muṣpalā babhru kalyāṇi sam nuda

original: (AVŚ_6,139.3c) amūṃ ca māṃ ca saṃ nuda samānaṃ hṛdayaṃ kṛdhi //3//
analyzed: amūm ca mām ca sam nuda samānam hṛdayam kṛdhi

original: (AVŚ_6,139.4a) yathodakam apapuṣo 'paśuṣyaty āsyam /
analyzed: yathā udakam a papuṣaḥ paśuṣyati āsyam

original: (AVŚ_6,139.4c) evā ni śuṣya māṃ kāmenātho śuṣkāsyā cara //4//
analyzed: eva ni śuṣya mām kāmena atha u śuṣka āsyā cara

original: (AVŚ_6,139.5a) yathā nakulo vichidya saṃdadhāty ahiṃ punaḥ /
analyzed: yathā nakulaḥ vichidya saṃdadhāti ahim punar

original: (AVŚ_6,139.5c) evā kāmasya vichinnaṃ saṃ dhehi vīryāvati //5//
analyzed: eva kāmasya vichinnam sam dhehi vīryāvati

original: (AVŚ_6,140.1a) yau vyāghrāv avarūdhau jighatsataḥ pitaraṃ mātaraṃ ca /
analyzed: yau vyāghrau avarūdhau jighatsataḥ pitaram mātaram ca

original: (AVŚ_6,140.1c) tau dantaṃ brahmaṇas pate śivau kṛṇu jātavedaḥ //1//
analyzed: tau dantam brahmaṇaḥ pate śivau kṛṇu jātavedaḥ

original: (AVŚ_6,140.2a) vrīhim attaṃ yavam attam atho māṣam atho tilam /
analyzed: vrīhim attam yavam attam atha u māṣam atha u tilam

original: (AVŚ_6,140.2c) eṣa vāṃ bhāgo nihito ratnadheyāya dantau mā hiṃsiṣṭaṃ pitaram mātaraṃ ca //2//
analyzed: eṣa vām bhāgaḥ nihitaḥ ratna dheyāya dantau mā hiṃsiṣṭam pitaram mātaram ca

original: (AVŚ_6,140.3a) upahūtau sayujau syonau dantau sumaṅgalau /
analyzed: upahūtau sayujau syonau dantau su maṅgalau

original: (AVŚ_6,140.3c) anyatra vāṃ ghoraṃ tanvaḥ paraitu dantau mā hiṃsiṣṭaṃ pitaraṃ mātaraṃ ca //3//
analyzed: anyatra vām ghoram tanvaḥ paraitu dantau mā hiṃsiṣṭam pitaram mātaram ca

original: (AVŚ_6,141.1a) vāyur enāḥ samākarat tvaṣṭā poṣāya dhriyatām /
analyzed: vāyuḥ enāḥ samākarat tvaṣṭā poṣāya dhriyatām

original: (AVŚ_6,141.1c) indra ābhyo adhi bravad rudro bhūmne cikitsatu //1//
analyzed: indraḥ ābhyaḥ adhi bravat rudraḥ bhūmne cikitsatu

original: (AVŚ_6,141.2a) lohitena svadhitinā mithunaṃ karṇayoḥ kṛdhi /
analyzed: lohitena svadhitinā mithunam karṇayoḥ kṛdhi

original: (AVŚ_6,141.2c) akartām aśvinā lakṣma tad astu prajayā bahu //2//
analyzed: akartām aśvinā lakṣma tat astu prajayā bahu

original: (AVŚ_6,141.3a) yathā cakrur devāsurā yathā manuṣyā uta /
analyzed: yathā cakruḥ deva asurāḥ yathā manuṣyāḥ uta

original: (AVŚ_6,141.3c) evā sahasrapoṣāya kṛṇutaṃ lakṣmāśvinā //3//
analyzed: eva sahasra poṣāya kṛṇutam lakṣma aśvinā

original: (AVŚ_6,142.1a) uc chrayasva bahur bhava svena mahasā yava /
analyzed: ud śrayasva bahuḥ bhava svena mahasā yava

original: (AVŚ_6,142.1c) mṛṇīhi viśvā pātrāṇi mā tvā divyāśanir vadhīt //1//
analyzed: mṛṇīhi viśvā pātrāṇi mā tvā divyā aśaniḥ vadhīt

original: (AVŚ_6,142.2a) āśṛṇvantaṃ yavaṃ devaṃ yatra tvāchāvadāmasi /
analyzed: āśṛṇvantam yavam devam yatra tvā achāvadāmasi

original: (AVŚ_6,142.2c) tad uc chrayasva dyaur iva samudra ivaidhy akṣitaḥ //2//
analyzed: tat ud śrayasva dyauḥ iva samudraḥ iva edhi akṣitaḥ

original: (AVŚ_6,142.3a) akṣitās ta upasado 'kṣitāḥ santu rāśayaḥ /
analyzed: akṣitāḥ te upasadaḥ kṣitāḥ santu rāśayaḥ

original: (AVŚ_6,142.3c) pṛṇanto akṣitāḥ santv attāraḥ santv akṣitāḥ //3//
analyzed: pṛṇantaḥ akṣitāḥ santu attāraḥ santu akṣitāḥ

original: (AVŚ_7,1.1a) dhītī vā ye anayan vāco agraṃ manasā vā ye 'vadann ṛtāni /
analyzed: dhītī vā ye anayan vācaḥ agram manasā vā ye vadan ṛtāni

original: (AVŚ_7,1.1c) tṛtīyena brahmaṇā vāvṛdhānās turīyeṇāmanvata nāma dhenoḥ //1//
analyzed: tṛtīyena brahmaṇā vāvṛdhānāḥ turīyeṇa amanvata nāma dhenoḥ

original: (AVŚ_7,1.2a) sa veda putraḥ pitaraṃ sa mātaraṃ sa sūnur bhuvat sa bhuvat punarmaghaḥ /
analyzed: sa veda putraḥ pitaram sa mātaram sa sūnuḥ bhuvat sa bhuvat punarmaghaḥ

original: (AVŚ_7,1.2c) sa dyām aurṇod antarikṣaṃ svaḥ sa idaṃ viśvam abhavat sa ābharat //2//
analyzed: sa dyām aurṇot antarikṣam svar saḥ idam viśvam abhavat saḥ ābharat

original: (AVŚ_7,2.1a) atharvāṇaṃ pitaraṃ devabandhuṃ mātur garbhaṃ pitur asuṃ yuvānam /
analyzed: atharvāṇam pitaram deva bandhum mātuḥ garbham pituḥ asum yuvānam

original: (AVŚ_7,2.1c) ya imaṃ yajñam manasā ciketa pra ṇo vocas tam iheha bravaḥ //1//
analyzed: yaḥ imam yajñam manasā ciketa pra naḥ vocaḥ tam iha iha bravaḥ

original: (AVŚ_7,3.1a) ayā viṣṭhā janayan karvarāṇi sa hi ghṛṇir urur varāya gātuḥ /
analyzed: ayā viṣṭhā janayan karvarāṇi sa hi ghṛṇiḥ uruḥ varāya gātuḥ

original: (AVŚ_7,3.1c) sa pratyudaid dharuṇaṃ madhvo agraṃ svayā tanvā tanvam airayata //1//
analyzed: sa pratyudait dharuṇam madhvaḥ agram svayā tanvā tanvam airayata

original: (AVŚ_7,4.1a) ekayā ca daśabhiś ca suhute dvābhyām iṣṭaye viṃśatyā ca /
analyzed: ekayā ca daśabhiḥ ca su hute dvābhyām iṣṭaye viṃśatyā ca

original: (AVŚ_7,4.1c) tisṛbhiś ca vahase triṃśatā ca viyugbhir vāya iha tā vi muñca //1//
analyzed: tisṛbhiḥ ca vahase triṃśatā ca viyugbhiḥ vāyo iha tāḥ vi muñca

original: (AVŚ_7,5.1a) yajñena yajñam ayajanta devās tāni dharmāṇi prathamāny āsan /
analyzed: yajñena yajñam ayajanta devāḥ tāni dharmāṇi prathamāni āsan

original: (AVŚ_7,5.1c) te ha nākaṃ mahimānaḥ sacanta yatra pūrve sādhyāḥ santi devāḥ //1//
analyzed: te ha nākam mahimānaḥ sacanta yatra pūrve sādhyāḥ santi devāḥ

original: (AVŚ_7,5.2a) yajño babhūva sa ā babhūva sa pra jajñe sa u vāvṛdhe punaḥ /
analyzed: yajñaḥ babhūva saḥ ā babhūva sa pra jajñe saḥ u vāvṛdhe punar

original: (AVŚ_7,5.2c) sa devānām adhipatir babhūva so asmāsu draviṇam ā dadhātu //2//
analyzed: sa devānām adhipatiḥ babhūva saḥ asmāsu draviṇam ā dadhātu

original: (AVŚ_7,5.3a) yad devā devān haviṣā 'yajantāmartyān manasā martyena /
analyzed: yat devāḥ devān haviṣā yajanta amartyān manasā martyena

original: (AVŚ_7,5.3c) madema tatra parame vyoman paśyema tad uditau sūryasya //3//
analyzed: madema tatra parame vyoman paśyema tat uditau sūryasya

original: (AVŚ_7,5.4a) yat puruṣeṇa haviṣā yajñaṃ devā atanvata /
analyzed: yat puruṣeṇa haviṣā yajñam devāḥ atanvata

original: (AVŚ_7,5.4c) asti nu tasmād ojīyo yad vihavyenejire //4//
analyzed: asti nu tasmāt ojīyaḥ yat vihavyena ījire

original: (AVŚ_7,5.5a) mugdhā devā uta śunā 'yajantota gor aṅgaiḥ purudhā 'yajanta /
analyzed: mugdhāḥ devāḥ uta śunā yajanta uta goḥ aṅgaiḥ purudhā yajanta

original: (AVŚ_7,5.5c) ya imaṃ yajñaṃ manasā ciketa pra ṇo vocas tam iheha bravaḥ //5//
analyzed: yaḥ imam yajñam manasā ciketa pra naḥ vocaḥ tam iha iha bravaḥ

original: (AVŚ_7,6.1a) aditir dyaur aditir antarikṣam aditir mātā sa pitā sa putraḥ /
analyzed: aditiḥ dyauḥ aditiḥ antarikṣam aditiḥ mātā sa pitā sa putraḥ

original: (AVŚ_7,6.1c) viśve devā aditir pañca janā aditir jātam aditir janitvam //1//
analyzed: viśve devāḥ aditiḥ pañca janāḥ aditiḥ jātam aditiḥ janitvam

original: (AVŚ_7,6.2a) mahīm ū ṣu mātaraṃ suvratānām ṛtasya patnīm avase havāmahe /
analyzed: mahīm u su mātaram suvratānām ṛtasya patnīm avase havāmahe

original: (AVŚ_7,6.2c) tuvikṣatrām ajarantīm urūcīṃ suśarmāṇam aditiṃ supraṇītim //2//
analyzed: tuvi kṣatrām a jarantīm urūcīm su śarmāṇam aditim su praṇītim

original: (AVŚ_7,6.3a) sutrāmāṇaṃ pṛthivīṃ dyām anehasaṃ suśarmāṇam aditiṃ supraṇītim /
analyzed: su trāmāṇam pṛthivīm dyām anehasam su śarmāṇam aditim su praṇītim

original: (AVŚ_7,6.3c) daivīṃ nāvaṃ svaritrām anāgaso asravantīm ā ruhemā svastaye //1//
analyzed: daivīm nāvam su aritrām anāgasaḥ a sravantīm ā ruhema svastaye

original: (AVŚ_7,6.4a) vājasya nu prasave mātaraṃ mahīm aditiṃ nāma vacasā karāmahe /
analyzed: vājasya nu prasave mātaram mahīm aditim nāma vacasā karāmahe

original: (AVŚ_7,6.4c) yasyā upastha urv antarikṣaṃ sā naḥ śarma trivarūthaṃ ni yachāt //2//
analyzed: yasyāḥ upasthe uru antarikṣam sā naḥ śarma tri varūtham ni yacchāt

original: (AVŚ_7,7.1a) diteḥ putrāṇām aditer akāriṣam ava devānāṃ bṛhatām anarmaṇām /
analyzed: diteḥ putrāṇām aditeḥ akāriṣam ava devānām bṛhatām a narmaṇām

original: (AVŚ_7,7.1c) teṣāṃ hi dhāma gabhiṣak samudriyaṃ nainān namasā paro asti kaścana //1//
analyzed: teṣām hi dhāma gabhiṣak samudriyam na enān namasā paraḥ asti kaścana

original: (AVŚ_7,8.1a) bhadrād adhi śreyaḥ prehi bṛhaspatiḥ puraetā te astu /
analyzed: bhadrāt adhi śreyaḥ prehi bṛhaspatiḥ puraetā te astu

original: (AVŚ_7,8.1c) athemam asyā vara ā pṛthivyā āreśatruṃ kṛṇuhi sarvavīram //1//
analyzed: atha imam asyāḥ vare ā pṛthivyāḥ āreśatrum kṛṇuhi sarva vīram

original: (AVŚ_7,9.1a) prapathe pathām ajaniṣṭa pūṣā prapathe divaḥ prapathe pṛthivyāḥ /
analyzed: prapathe pathām ajaniṣṭa pūṣā prapathe divaḥ prapathe pṛthivyāḥ

original: (AVŚ_7,9.1c) ubhe abhi priyatame sadhasthe ā ca parā ca carati prajānan //1//
analyzed: ubhe abhi priyatame sadhasthe ā ca parā ca carati prajānan

original: (AVŚ_7,9.2a) pūṣemā āśā anu veda sarvāḥ so asmāṃ abhayatamena neṣat /
analyzed: pūṣā imāḥ āśāḥ anu veda sarvāḥ saḥ asmām abhayatamena neṣat

original: (AVŚ_7,9.2c) svastidā āghṛṇiḥ sarvavīro 'prayuchan pura etu prajānan //2//
analyzed: svasti dāḥ āghṛṇiḥ sarva vīraḥ prayuchan puras etu prajānan

original: (AVŚ_7,9.3a) pūṣan tava vrate vayaṃ na riṣyema kadā cana /
analyzed: pūṣan tava vrate vayam na riṣyema kadā cana

original: (AVŚ_7,9.3c) stotāras ta iha smasi //3//
analyzed: stotāraḥ te iha smasi

original: (AVŚ_7,9.4a) pari pūṣā parastād dhastaṃ dadhātu dakṣiṇam /
analyzed: pari pūṣā parastāt hastam dadhātu dakṣiṇam

original: (AVŚ_7,9.4c) punar no naṣṭam ājatu saṃ naṣṭena gamemahi //4//
analyzed: punar naḥ naṣṭam ājatu sam naṣṭena gamemahi

original: (AVŚ_7,10.1a) yas te stanaḥ śaśayur yo mayobhūr yaḥ sumnayuḥ suhavo yaḥ sudatraḥ /
analyzed: yaḥ te stanaḥ śaśayuḥ yaḥ mayobhūḥ yaḥ sumnayuḥ su havaḥ yaḥ su datraḥ

original: (AVŚ_7,10.1c) yena viśvā puṣyasi vāryāṇi sarasvati tam iha dhātave kaḥ //1//
analyzed: yena viśvā puṣyasi vāryāṇi sarasvati tam iha dhātave kaḥ

original: (AVŚ_7,11.1a) yas te pṛthu stanayitnur ya ṛṣvo daivaḥ ketur viśvam ābhūṣatīdam /
analyzed: yaḥ te pṛthuḥ stanayitnuḥ yaḥ ṛṣvaḥ daivaḥ ketuḥ viśvam ābhūṣati idam

original: (AVŚ_7,11.1c) mā no vadhīr vidyutā deva sasyaṃ mota vadhī raśmibhiḥ sūryasya //1//
analyzed: mā naḥ vadhīḥ vidyutā deva sasyam mā uta vadhīḥ raśmibhiḥ sūryasya

original: (AVŚ_7,12.1a) sabhā ca mā samitiś cāvatāṃ prajāpater duhitarau saṃvidāne /
analyzed: sabhā ca mā samitiḥ ca avatām prajāpateḥ duhitarau saṃvidāne

original: (AVŚ_7,12.1c) yenā saṃgachā upa mā sa śikṣāc cāru vadāni pitaraḥ saṃgateṣu //1//
analyzed: yena saṃgacchāḥ upa mā sa śikṣāt cāru vadāni pitaraḥ saṃgateṣu

original: (AVŚ_7,12.2a) vidma te sabhe nāma nariṣṭā nāma vā asi /
analyzed: vidma te sabhe nāma nariṣṭā nāma vai asi

original: (AVŚ_7,12.2c) ye te ke ca sabhāsadas te me santu savācasaḥ //2//
analyzed: ye te ke ca sabhāsadaḥ te me santu savācasaḥ

original: (AVŚ_7,12.3a) eṣām ahaṃ samāsīnānāṃ varco vijñānam ā dade /
analyzed: eṣām aham samāsīnānām varcaḥ vijñānam ā dade

original: (AVŚ_7,12.3c) asyāḥ sarvasyāḥ saṃsado mām indra bhaginaṃ kṛṇu //3//
analyzed: asyāḥ sarvasyāḥ saṃsadaḥ mām indra bhaginam kṛṇu

original: (AVŚ_7,12.4a) yad vo manaḥ parāgataṃ yad baddham iha veha vā /
analyzed: yat vaḥ manaḥ parāgatam yat baddham iha vā iha vā

original: (AVŚ_7,12.4c) tad va ā vartayāmasi mayi vo ramatāṃ manaḥ //4//
analyzed: tat vaḥ ā vartayāmasi mayi vaḥ ramatām manaḥ

original: (AVŚ_7,13.1a) yathā sūryo nakṣatrāṇām udyaṃs tejāṃsy ādade /
analyzed: yathā sūryaḥ nakṣatrāṇām udyan tejāṃsi ādade

original: (AVŚ_7,13.1c) evā strīṇāṃ ca puṃsāṃ ca dviṣatāṃ varca ā dade //1//
analyzed: eva strīṇām ca puṃsām ca dviṣatām varcaḥ ā dade

original: (AVŚ_7,13.2a) yāvanto mā sapatnānām āyantaṃ pratipaśyatha /
analyzed: yāvantaḥ mā sapatnānām āyantam pratipaśyatha

original: (AVŚ_7,13.2c) udyant sūrya iva suptānāṃ dviṣatām varca ā dade //2//
analyzed: udyan sūryaḥ iva suptānām dviṣatām varcaḥ ā dade

original: (AVŚ_7,14.1a) abhi tyaṃ devaṃ savitāram oṇyoḥ kavikratum /
analyzed: abhi tyam devam savitāram oṇyoḥ kavi kratum

original: (AVŚ_7,14.1c) arcāmi satyasavaṃ ratnadhām abhi priyaṃ matim //1//
analyzed: arcāmi satya savam ratna dhām abhi priyam matim

original: (AVŚ_7,14.2a) urdhvā yasyāmatir bhā adidyutat savīmani /
analyzed: urdhvā yasya amatiḥ bhās adidyutat savīmani

original: (AVŚ_7,14.2c) hiraṇyapāṇir amimīta sukratuḥ kṛpāt svaḥ //2//
analyzed: hiraṇya pāṇiḥ amimīta su kratuḥ kṛpāt svar

original: (AVŚ_7,14.3a) sāvīr hi deva prathamāya pitre varṣmāṇam asmai varimāṇam asmai /
analyzed: sāvīḥ hi deva prathamāya pitre varṣmāṇam asmai varimāṇam asmai

original: (AVŚ_7,14.3c) athāsmabhyaṃ savitar vāryāṇi divodiva ā suvā bhūri paśvaḥ //3//
analyzed: atha asmabhyam savitar vāryāṇi divaḥ divaḥ ā suva bhūri paśvaḥ

original: (AVŚ_7,14.4a) damūnā devaḥ savitā vareṇyo dadhad ratnaṃ pitṛbhya āyūṃṣi /
analyzed: damūnāḥ devaḥ savitā vareṇyaḥ dadhat ratnam pitṛbhyaḥ āyūṃṣi

original: (AVŚ_7,14.4c) pibāt somaṃ mamadad enam iṣṭe parijmā cit kramate asya dharmaṇi //4//
analyzed: pibāt somam mamadat enam iṣṭe parijmā cit kramate asya dharmaṇi

original: (AVŚ_7,15.1a) tāṃ savitaḥ satyasavāṃ sucitrām āhaṃ vṛṇe sumatiṃ viśvavārām /
analyzed: tām savitar satya savām su citrām ā aham vṛṇe sumatim viśva vārām

original: (AVŚ_7,15.1c) yām asya kaṇvo aduhat prapīnāṃ sahasradhārāṃ mahiṣo bhagāya //1//
analyzed: yām asya kaṇvaḥ aduhat prapīnām sahasra dhārām mahiṣaḥ bhagāya

original: (AVŚ_7,16.1a) bṛhaspate savitar vardhayainaṃ jyotayainaṃ mahate saubhagāya /
analyzed: bṛhaspate savitar vardhaya enam jyotaya enam mahate saubhagāya

original: (AVŚ_7,16.1c) saṃśitaṃ cit saṃtaraṃ saṃ śiśādhi viśva enam anu madantu devāḥ //1//
analyzed: saṃśitam cit saṃtaram sam śiśādhi viśve enam anu madantu devāḥ

original: (AVŚ_7,17.1a) dhātā dadhātu no rayim īśāno jagatas patiḥ /
analyzed: dhātā dadhātu naḥ rayim īśānaḥ jagataḥ patiḥ

original: (AVŚ_7,17.1c) sa naḥ pūrṇena yachatu //1//
analyzed: sa naḥ pūrṇena yacchatu

original: (AVŚ_7,17.2a) dhātā dadhātu dāśuṣe prācīṃ jīvātum akṣitām /
analyzed: dhātā dadhātu dāśuṣe prācīm jīvātum akṣitām

original: (AVŚ_7,17.2c) vayam devasya dhīmahi sumatiṃ viśvarādhasaḥ //2//
analyzed: vayam devasya dhīmahi sumatim viśva rādhasaḥ

original: (AVŚ_7,17.3a) dhātā viśvā vāryā dadhātu prajākāmāya dāśuṣe duroṇe /
analyzed: dhātā viśvā vāryā dadhātu prajā kāmāya dāśuṣe duroṇe

original: (AVŚ_7,17.3c) tasmai devā amṛtaṃ saṃ vyayantu viśve devā aditiḥ sajoṣāḥ //3//
analyzed: tasmai devāḥ amṛtam sam vyayantu viśve devāḥ aditiḥ sajoṣāḥ

original: (AVŚ_7,17.4a) dhātā rātiḥ savitedaṃ juṣantāṃ prajāpatir nidhipatir no agniḥ /
analyzed: dhātā rātiḥ savitā idam juṣantām prajāpatiḥ nidhi patiḥ naḥ agniḥ

original: (AVŚ_7,17.4c) tvaṣṭā viṣṇuḥ prajayā saṃrarāṇo yajamānāya draviṇaṃ dadhātu //4//
analyzed: tvaṣṭā viṣṇuḥ prajayā saṃrarāṇaḥ yajamānāya draviṇam dadhātu

original: (AVŚ_7,18.1a) pra nabhasva pṛthivi bhinddhīdaṃ divyaṃ nabhaḥ /
analyzed: pra nabhasva pṛthivi bhinddhi idam divyam nabhaḥ

original: (AVŚ_7,18.1c) udno divyasya no dhātar īśāno vi ṣyā dṛtim //1//
analyzed: udnaḥ divyasya naḥ dhātar īśānaḥ vi sya dṛtim

original: (AVŚ_7,18.2a) na ghraṃs tatāpa na himo jaghāna pra nabhatāṃ pṛthivī jīradānuḥ /
analyzed: na ghraṃs tatāpa na himaḥ jaghāna pra nabhatām pṛthivī jīra dānuḥ

original: (AVŚ_7,18.2c) āpaś cid asmai ghṛtam it kṣaranti yatra somaḥ sadam it tatra bhadram //2//
analyzed: āpaḥ cit asmai ghṛtam id kṣaranti yatra somaḥ sadam id tatra bhadram

original: (AVŚ_7,19.1a) prajāpatir janayati prajā imā dhātā dadhātu sumanasyamānaḥ /
analyzed: prajāpatiḥ janayati prajāḥ imāḥ dhātā dadhātu sumanasyamānaḥ

original: (AVŚ_7,19.1c) saṃjānānāḥ saṃmanasaḥ sayonayo mayi puṣṭaṃ puṣṭapatir dadhātu //1//
analyzed: saṃjānānāḥ saṃmanasaḥ sa yonayaḥ mayi puṣṭam puṣṭa patiḥ dadhātu

original: (AVŚ_7,20.1a) anv adya no 'numatir yajñaṃ deveṣu manyatām /
analyzed: anu adya naḥ numatiḥ yajñam deveṣu manyatām

original: (AVŚ_7,20.1c) agniś ca havyavāhano bhavatāṃ dāśuṣe mama //1//
analyzed: agniḥ ca havya vāhanaḥ bhavatām dāśuṣe mama

original: (AVŚ_7,20.2a) anv id anumate tvaṃ maṃsase śaṃ ca nas kṛdhi /
analyzed: anu id anumate tvam maṃsase śam ca naḥ kṛdhi

original: (AVŚ_7,20.2c) juṣasva havyam āhutaṃ prajāṃ devi rarāsva naḥ //2//
analyzed: juṣasva havyam āhutam prajām devi rarāsva naḥ

original: (AVŚ_7,20.3a) anu manyatām anumanyamānaḥ prajāvantaṃ rayim akṣīyamāṇam /
analyzed: anu manyatām anumanyamānaḥ prajāvantam rayim a kṣīyamāṇam

original: (AVŚ_7,20.3c) tasya vayaṃ heḍasi māpi bhūma sumṛḍīke asya sumatau syāma //3//
analyzed: tasya vayam heḍasi mā api bhūma su mṛḍīke asya sumatau syāma

original: (AVŚ_7,20.4a) yat te nāma suhavaṃ supraṇīte 'numate anumataṃ sudānu /
analyzed: yat te nāma su havam su praṇīte numate anumatam sudānu

original: (AVŚ_7,20.4c) tenā no yajñaṃ pipṛhi viśvavāre rayiṃ no dhehi subhage suvīram //4//
analyzed: tena naḥ yajñam pipṛhi viśva vāre rayim naḥ dhehi subhage su vīram

original: (AVŚ_7,20.5a) emaṃ yajñam anumatir jagāma sukṣetratāyai suvīratāyai sujātam /
analyzed: ā imam yajñam anumatiḥ jagāma su kṣetra tāyai su vīra tāyai su jātam

original: (AVŚ_7,20.5c) bhadrā hy asyāḥ pramatir babhūva semam yajñam avatu devagopā //5//
analyzed: bhadrā hi asyāḥ pramatiḥ babhūva sā imam yajñam avatu deva gopā

original: (AVŚ_7,20.6a) anumatiḥ sarvam idaṃ babhūva yat tiṣṭhati carati yad u ca viśvam ejati /
analyzed: anumatiḥ sarvam idam babhūva yat tiṣṭhati carati yat u ca viśvam ejati

original: (AVŚ_7,20.6c) tasyās te devi sumatau syāmānumate anu hi maṃsase naḥ //6//
analyzed: tasyāḥ te devi sumatau syāma anumate anu hi maṃsase naḥ

original: (AVŚ_7,21.1a) sameta viśve vacasā patiṃ diva eko vibhūr atithir janānām /
analyzed: sameta viśve vacasā patim divaḥ ekaḥ vibhūḥ atithiḥ janānām

original: (AVŚ_7,21.1c) sa pūrvyo nūtanam āvivāsat taṃ vartanir anu vāvṛta ekam it puru //1//
analyzed: sa pūrvyaḥ nūtanam āvivāsat tam vartaniḥ anu vāvṛte ekam id puru

original: (AVŚ_7,22.1a) ayaṃ sahasram ā no dṛśe kavīnāṃ matir jyotir vidharmaṇi //1//
analyzed: ayam sahasram ā naḥ dṛśe kavīnām matiḥ jyotiḥ vidharmaṇi

analyzed: bradhnaḥ samīcīḥ uṣasaḥ sam airayan

original: (AVŚ_7,22.2c) arepasaḥ sacetasaḥ svasare manyumattamāś cite goḥ //2//
analyzed: arepasaḥ sacetasaḥ svasare manyumattamāḥ cite goḥ

original: (AVŚ_7,23.1a) dauṣvapnyam daurjīvityaṃ rakṣo abhvam arāyyaḥ /

original: (AVŚ_7,23.1c) durṇāmnīḥ sarvā durvācas tā asman nāśayāmasi //1//

original: (AVŚ_7,24.1a) yan na indro akhanad yad agnir viśve devā maruto yat svarkāḥ /

analyzed: yayoḥ ojasā skabhitā rajāṃsi yau vīryaiḥ vīratamā śaviṣṭhā

analyzed: parāvataḥ ā jagamyāt parasyāḥ

original: (AVŚ_7,26.4c) samūḍham asya paṃsure //4//
analyzed: samūḍham asya paṃsure

original: (AVŚ_7,26.5a) trīṇi padā vi cakrame viṣṇur gopā adābhyaḥ /
analyzed: trīṇi padā vi cakrame viṣṇuḥ gopāḥ adābhyaḥ

original: (AVŚ_7,26.5c) ito dharmāṇi dhārayan //5//
analyzed: itas dharmāṇi dhārayan

original: (AVŚ_7,26.6c) indrasya yujyaḥ sakhā //6//
analyzed: indrasya yujyaḥ sakhā

original: (AVŚ_7,26.7a) tad viṣṇoḥ paramaṃ padaṃ sadā paśyanti sūrayaḥ /
analyzed: tat viṣṇoḥ paramam padam sadā paśyanti sūrayaḥ

original: (AVŚ_7,26.7c) divīva cakṣur ātatam //7//
analyzed: divi iva cakṣuḥ ātatam

analyzed: iḍā eva asmān anu vastām vratena yasyāḥ pade punate devayantaḥ

analyzed: agneḥ iva asya dahataḥ dāvasya dahataḥ pṛthak

analyzed: etām etasya īrṣyām udra agnim iva śamaya

original: (AVŚ_7,46.1a) sinīvāli pṛthuṣṭuke yā devānām asi svasā /
analyzed: sinīvāli pṛthuṣṭuke yā devānām asi svasā

original: (AVŚ_7,46.1c) juṣasva havyam āhutaṃ prajāṃ devi didiḍḍhi naḥ //1//
analyzed: juṣasva havyam āhutam prajām devi didiḍḍhi naḥ

original: (AVŚ_7,46.2a) yā subāhuḥ svaṅguriḥ suṣūmā bahusūvarī /
analyzed: yā su bāhuḥ su aṅguriḥ suṣūmā bahusūvarī

original: (AVŚ_7,46.2c) tasyai viśpatnyai haviḥ sinīvālyai juhotana //2//
analyzed: tasyai viś patnyai haviḥ sinīvālyai juhotana

original: (AVŚ_7,46.3a) yā viśpatnīndram asi pratīcī sahasrastukābhiyantī devī /
analyzed: yā viśpatnī indram asi pratīcī sahasra stukā abhiyantī devī

original: (AVŚ_7,46.3c) viṣṇoḥ patni tubhyaṃ rātā havīṃṣi patiṃ devi rādhase codayasva //3//
analyzed: viṣṇoḥ patni tubhyam rātā havīṃṣi patim devi rādhase codayasva

original: (AVŚ_7,47.1a) kuhūṃ devīṃ sukṛtaṃ vidmanāpasam asmin yajñe suhavā johavīmi /
analyzed: kuhūm devīm su kṛtam vidmanā apasam asmin yajñe su havā johavīmi

original: (AVŚ_7,47.1c) sā no rayiṃ viśvavāraṃ ni yachād dadātu vīram śatadāyam ukthyam //1//
analyzed: sā naḥ rayim viśva vāram ni yacchāt dadātu vīram śatadāyam ukthyam

original: (AVŚ_7,47.2a) kuhūr devānām amṛtasya patnī havyā no asya haviṣo juṣeta /
analyzed: kuhūḥ devānām amṛtasya patnī havyā naḥ asya haviṣaḥ juṣeta

original: (AVŚ_7,47.2c) śṛnotu yajñam uśatī no adya rāyas poṣaṃ cikituṣī dadhātu //2//
analyzed: śṛnotu yajñam uśatī naḥ adya rāyaḥ poṣam cikituṣī dadhātu

original: (AVŚ_7,48.1a) rākām ahaṃ suhavā suṣṭutī huve śṛṇotu naḥ subhagā bodhatu tmanā /
analyzed: rākām aham su havā suṣṭutī huve śṛṇotu naḥ subhagā bodhatu tmanā

original: (AVŚ_7,48.1c) sīvyatv apaḥ sūcyāchidyamānayā dadātu vīraṃ śatadāyam ukthyam //1//
analyzed: sīvyatu apaḥ sūcyā a chidyamānayā dadātu vīram śatadāyam ukthyam

original: (AVŚ_7,48.2a) yās te rāke sumatayaḥ supeśaso yābhir dadāsi dāśuṣe vasūni /
analyzed: yāḥ te rāke sumatayaḥ supeśasaḥ yābhiḥ dadāsi dāśuṣe vasūni

original: (AVŚ_7,48.2c) tābhir no adya sumanā upāgahi sahasrāpoṣam subhage rarāṇā //2//
analyzed: tābhiḥ naḥ adya sumanāḥ upāgahi sahasrāpoṣam subhage rarāṇā

original: (AVŚ_7,49.1a) devānāṃ patnīr uśatīr avantu naḥ prāvantu nas tujaye vājasātaye /
analyzed: devānām patnīḥ uśatīḥ avantu naḥ prāvantu naḥ tujaye vājasātaye

original: (AVŚ_7,49.1c) yāḥ pārthivāso yā apām api vrate tā no devīḥ suhavāḥ śarma yachantu //1//
analyzed: yāḥ pārthivāsaḥ yāḥ apām api vrate tāḥ naḥ devīḥ su havāḥ śarma yacchantu

original: (AVŚ_7,49.2a) uta gnā vyantu devapatnīr indrāṇy agnāyy aśvinī rāṭ /
analyzed: uta gnāḥ vyantu deva patnīḥ indrāṇī agnāyī aśvinī rāj

original: (AVŚ_7,49.2c) ā rodasī varunānī śṛṇotu vyantu devīr ya ṛtur janīnām //2//
analyzed: ā rodasī varunānī śṛṇotu vyantu devīḥ yaḥ ṛtuḥ janīnām

original: (AVŚ_7,50.1a) yathā vṛkṣam aśanir viśvāhā hanty aprati /
analyzed: yathā vṛkṣam aśaniḥ viśvāhā hanti aprati

original: (AVŚ_7,50.1c) evāham adya kitavān akṣair badhyāsam aprati //1//
analyzed: eva aham adya kitavān akṣaiḥ badhyāsam aprati

original: (AVŚ_7,50.2a) turāṇām aturāṇāṃ viśām avarjuṣīṇām /
analyzed: turāṇām a turāṇām viśām a varjuṣīṇām

original: (AVŚ_7,50.2c) samaitu viśvato bhago antarhastaṃ kṛtaṃ mama //2//
analyzed: samaitu viśvatas bhagaḥ antar hastam kṛtam mama

original: (AVŚ_7,50.3a) īḍe agniṃ svāvasuṃ namobhir iha prasakto vi cayat kṛtaṃ naḥ /
analyzed: īḍe agnim svāvasum namobhiḥ iha prasaktaḥ vi cayat kṛtam naḥ

original: (AVŚ_7,50.3c) rathair iva pra bhare vājayadbhiḥ pradakṣiṇaṃ marutāṃ stomam ṛdhyām //3//
analyzed: rathaiḥ iva pra bhare vājayadbhiḥ pradakṣiṇam marutām stomam ṛdhyām

original: (AVŚ_7,50.4a) vayaṃ jayema tvayā yujā vṛtam asmākam aṃśam ud ava bharebhare /
analyzed: vayam jayema tvayā yujā vṛtam asmākam aṃśam ud ava bharebhare

original: (AVŚ_7,50.4c) asmabhyam indra varīyaḥ sugaṃ kṛdhi pra śatrūṇāṃ maghavan vṛṣṇyā ruja //4//
analyzed: asmabhyam indra varīyaḥ sugam kṛdhi pra śatrūṇām maghavan vṛṣṇyā ruja

original: (AVŚ_7,50.5a) ajaiṣaṃ tvā saṃlikhitam ajaiṣam uta saṃrudham /
analyzed: ajaiṣam tvā saṃlikhitam ajaiṣam uta saṃrudham

original: (AVŚ_7,50.5c) aviṃ vṛko yathā mathad evā mathnāmi te kṛtam //5//
analyzed: avim vṛkaḥ yathā mathat eva mathnāmi te kṛtam

original: (AVŚ_7,50.6a) uta prahām atidīvā jayati kṛtam iva śvaghnī vi cinoti kāle /
analyzed: uta prahām atidīvāḥ jayati kṛtam iva śvaghnī vi cinoti kāle

original: (AVŚ_7,50.6c) yo devakāmo na dhanam ruṇaddhi sam it taṃ rāyaḥ sṛjati svadhābhiḥ //6//
analyzed: yaḥ deva kāmaḥ na dhanam ruṇaddhi sam id tam rāyaḥ sṛjati svadhābhiḥ

original: (AVŚ_7,50.7a) gobhiṣ ṭaremāmatiṃ durevāṃ yavena vā kṣudhaṃ puruhūta viśve /
analyzed: gobhiḥ tarema amatim durevām yavena vā kṣudham puruhūta viśve

original: (AVŚ_7,50.7c) vayaṃ rājasu prathamā dhanāny ariṣṭāso vṛjanībhir jayema //7//
analyzed: vayam rājasu prathamā dhanāni ariṣṭāsaḥ vṛjanībhiḥ jayema

original: (AVŚ_7,50.8a) kṛtaṃ me dakṣiṇe haste jayo me savya āhitaḥ /
analyzed: kṛtam me dakṣiṇe haste jayaḥ me savye āhitaḥ

original: (AVŚ_7,50.8c) gojid bhūyāsam aśvajid dhanaṃjayo hiraṇyajit //8//
analyzed: go jit bhūyāsam aśva jit dhanaṃjayaḥ hiraṇya jit

original: (AVŚ_7,50.9a) akṣāḥ phalavatīm dyuvaṃ datta gāṃ kṣīriṇīm iva /
analyzed: akṣāḥ phalavatīm dyuvam datta gām kṣīriṇīm iva

original: (AVŚ_7,50.9c) saṃ mā kṛtasya dhārayā dhanuḥ snāvneva nahyata //9//
analyzed: sam mā kṛtasya dhārayā dhanuḥ snāvnā iva nahyata

original: (AVŚ_7,51.1a) bṛhaspatir naḥ pari pātu paścād utottarasmād adharād aghayoḥ /
analyzed: bṛhaspatiḥ naḥ pari pātu paścāt uta uttarasmāt adharāt aghayoḥ

original: (AVŚ_7,51.1c) indraḥ purastād uta madhyato naḥ sakhā sakhibhyo varīyaḥ kṛṇotu //1//
analyzed: indraḥ purastāt uta madhyatas naḥ sakhā sakhibhyaḥ varīyaḥ kṛṇotu

original: (AVŚ_7,52.1a) saṃjñānaṃ naḥ svebhiḥ saṃjñānam araṇebhiḥ /
analyzed: saṃjñānam naḥ svebhiḥ saṃjñānam araṇebhiḥ

original: (AVŚ_7,52.1c) saṃjñānam aśvinā yuvam ihāsmāsu ni yachatam //1//
analyzed: saṃjñānam aśvinā yuvam iha asmāsu ni yacchatam

original: (AVŚ_7,52.2a) saṃ jānāmahai manasā saṃ cikitvā mā yuṣmahi manasā daivyena /
analyzed: sam jānāmahai manasā sam cikitvā mā yuṣmahi manasā daivyena

original: (AVŚ_7,52.2c) mā ghoṣā ut sthur bahule vinirhate meṣuḥ paptad indrasyāhany āgate //2//
analyzed: mā ghoṣāḥ ud sthuḥ bahule vinirhate mā iṣuḥ paptat indrasya ahani āgate

original: (AVŚ_7,53.1a) amutrabhūyād adhi yad yamasya bṛhaspate abhiśaster amuñcaḥ /
analyzed: amutrabhūyāt adhi yat yamasya bṛhaspate abhiśasteḥ amuñcaḥ

original: (AVŚ_7,53.1c) praty auhatām aśvinā mṛtyum asmad devānām agne bhiṣajā śacībhiḥ //1//
analyzed: prati auhatām aśvinā mṛtyum asmat devānām agne bhiṣajā śacībhiḥ

original: (AVŚ_7,53.2a) saṃ krāmataṃ mā jahītaṃ śarīraṃ prāṇāpānau te sayujāv iha stām /
analyzed: sam krāmatam mā jahītam śarīram prāṇa apānau te sayujau iha stām

original: (AVŚ_7,53.2c) śataṃ jīva śarado vardhamāno 'gniṣ ṭe gopā adhipā vasiṣṭhaḥ //2//
analyzed: śatam jīva śaradaḥ vardhamānaḥ gniḥ te gopāḥ adhipāḥ vasiṣṭhaḥ

original: (AVŚ_7,53.3a) āyur yat te atihitaṃ parācair apānaḥ prāṇaḥ punar ā tāv itām /
analyzed: āyuḥ yat te atihitam parācais apānaḥ prāṇaḥ punar ā tau itām

original: (AVŚ_7,53.3c) agniṣ ṭad āhār nirṛter upasthāt tad ātmani punar ā veśayāmi te //3//
analyzed: agniḥ tat āhār nirṛteḥ upasthāt tat ātmani punar ā veśayāmi te

original: (AVŚ_7,53.4a) memaṃ prāṇo hāsīn mo apāno 'vahāya parā gāt /
analyzed: mā imam prāṇaḥ hāsīt mā u apānaḥ vahāya parā gāt

original: (AVŚ_7,53.4c) saptarṣibhya enaṃ pari dadāmi te enaṃ svasti jarase vahantu //4//
analyzed: saptarṣibhyaḥ enam pari dadāmi te enam svasti jarase vahantu

original: (AVŚ_7,53.5a) pra viṣataṃ prāṇāpānāv anaḍvāhāv iva vrajam /
analyzed: pra viṣatam prāṇa apānau anaḍvāhau iva vrajam

original: (AVŚ_7,53.5c) ayaṃ jarimnaḥ śevadhir ariṣṭa iha vardhatām //5//
analyzed: ayam jarimnaḥ śevadhiḥ ariṣṭaḥ iha vardhatām

original: (AVŚ_7,53.6a) ā te prāṇaṃ suvāmasi parā yakṣmaṃ suvāmi te /
analyzed: ā te prāṇam suvāmasi parā yakṣmam suvāmi te

original: (AVŚ_7,53.6c) āyur no viśvato dadhad ayam agnir vareṇyaḥ //6//
analyzed: āyuḥ naḥ viśvatas dadhat ayam agniḥ vareṇyaḥ

original: (AVŚ_7,53.7a) ud vayaṃ tamasas pari rohanto nākam uttamam /
analyzed: ud vayam tamasaḥ pari rohantaḥ nākam uttamam

original: (AVŚ_7,53.7c) devaṃ devatrā sūryam aganma jyotir uttamam //7//
analyzed: devam devatrā sūryam aganma jyotiḥ uttamam

original: (AVŚ_7,54.1a) ṛcaṃ sāma yajāmahe yābhyāṃ karmāṇi kurvate /
analyzed: ṛcam sāma yajāmahe yābhyām karmāṇi kurvate

original: (AVŚ_7,54.1c) ete sadasi rājato yajñaṃ deveṣu yachataḥ //1//
analyzed: ete sadasi rājataḥ yajñam deveṣu yacchataḥ

original: (AVŚ_7,54.2a) ṛcaṃ sāma yad aprākṣaṃ havir ojo yajur balam /
analyzed: ṛcam sāma yat aprākṣam haviḥ ojaḥ yajuḥ balam

original: (AVŚ_7,54.2c) eṣa mā tasmān mā hiṃsīd vedaḥ pṛṣṭaḥ śacīpate //1//
analyzed: eṣa mā tasmāt mā hiṃsīt vedaḥ pṛṣṭaḥ śacīpate

original: (AVŚ_7,55.1a) ye te panthāno 'va divo yebhir viśvam airayaḥ /
analyzed: ye te panthānaḥ vaḥ divaḥ yebhiḥ viśvam airayaḥ

original: (AVŚ_7,55.1c) tebhiḥ sumnayā dhehi no vaso //2//
analyzed: tebhiḥ sumnayā dhehi naḥ vaso

original: (AVŚ_7,56.1a) tiraścirājer asitāt pṛdākoḥ pari saṃbhṛtam /
analyzed: tiraścirājeḥ asitāt pṛdākoḥ pari saṃbhṛtam

original: (AVŚ_7,56.1c) tat kaṅkaparvaṇo viṣam iyaṃ vīrud anīnaśat //1//
analyzed: tat kaṅkaparvaṇaḥ viṣam iyam vīrudh anīnaśat

original: (AVŚ_7,56.2a) iyaṃ vīrun madhujātā madhuścun madhulā madhūḥ /
analyzed: iyam vīrudh madhu jātā madhuścut madhulā madhūḥ

original: (AVŚ_7,56.2c) sā vihrutasya bheṣajy atho maśakajambhanī //2//
analyzed: sā vihrutasya bheṣajī atha u maśaka jambhanī

original: (AVŚ_7,56.3a) yato daṣṭaṃ yato dhītaṃ tatas te nir hvayāmasi /
analyzed: yatas daṣṭam yatas dhītam tatas te niḥ hvayāmasi

original: (AVŚ_7,56.3c) arbhasya tṛpradaṃśino maśakasyārasaṃ viṣam //3//
analyzed: arbhasya tṛ pradaṃśinaḥ maśakasya arasam viṣam

original: (AVŚ_7,56.4a) ayaṃ yo vakro viparur vyaṅgo mukhāni vakrā vṛjinā kṛṇoṣi /
analyzed: ayam yaḥ vakraḥ viparuḥ vyaṅgaḥ mukhāni vakrā vṛjinā kṛṇoṣi

original: (AVŚ_7,56.4c) tāni tvaṃ brahmaṇas pate iṣīkām iva saṃ namaḥ //4//
analyzed: tāni tvam brahmaṇaḥ pate iṣīkām iva sam namaḥ

original: (AVŚ_7,56.5a) arasasya śarkoṭasya nīcīnasyopasarpataḥ /
analyzed: a rasasya śarkoṭasya nīcīnasya upasarpataḥ

original: (AVŚ_7,56.5c) viṣaṃ hy asyādiṣy atho enam ajījabham //5//
analyzed: viṣam hi asya adiṣi atha u enam ajījabham

original: (AVŚ_7,56.6a) na te bāhvor balam asti na śīrṣe nota madhyataḥ /
analyzed: na te bāhvoḥ balam asti na śīrṣe na uta madhyataḥ

original: (AVŚ_7,56.6c) atha kiṃ pāpayā 'muyā puche bibharṣy arbhakam //6//
analyzed: atha kim pāpayā muyā puche bibharṣi arbhakam

original: (AVŚ_7,56.7a) adanti tvā pipīlikā vi vṛścanti mayūryaḥ /
analyzed: adanti tvā pipīlikāḥ vi vṛścanti mayūryaḥ

original: (AVŚ_7,56.7c) sarve bhala bravātha śārkoṭam arasaṃ viṣam //7//
analyzed: sarve bhala bravātha śārkoṭam a rasam viṣam

original: (AVŚ_7,56.8a) ya ubhābhyāṃ praharasi puchena cāsyena ca /
analyzed: yaḥ ubhābhyām praharasi puchena ca āsyena ca

original: (AVŚ_7,56.8c) āsye na te viṣaṃ kim u te puchadhāv asat //8//
analyzed: āsye na te viṣam kim u te puchadhau asat

original: (AVŚ_7,57.1a) yad āśasā vadato me vicukṣubhe yad yācamānasya carato janāṃ anu /
analyzed: yat āśasā vadataḥ me vicukṣubhe yat yācamānasya carataḥ janān anu

original: (AVŚ_7,57.1c) yad ātmani tanvo me viriṣṭaṃ sarasvatī tad ā pṛṇad ghṛtena //1//
analyzed: yat ātmani tanvaḥ me viriṣṭam sarasvatī tat ā pṛṇat ghṛtena

original: (AVŚ_7,57.2a) sapta kṣaranti siśave marutvate pitre putrāso apy avīvṛtann ṛtāni /
analyzed: sapta kṣaranti siśave marutvate pitre putrāsaḥ api avīvṛtan ṛtāni

original: (AVŚ_7,57.2c) ubhe id asyobhe asya rājata ubhe yatete ubhe asya puṣyataḥ //2//
analyzed: ubhe id asya ubhe asya rājataḥ ubhe yatete ubhe asya puṣyataḥ

original: (AVŚ_7,58.1a) indrāvaruṇā sutapāv imaṃ sutaṃ somaṃ pibataṃ madyaṃ dhṛtavratau /
analyzed: indrāvaruṇā suta pau imam sutam somam pibatam madyam dhṛtavratau

original: (AVŚ_7,58.1c) yuvo ratho adhvaro devavītaye prati svasaram upa yātu pītaye //1//
analyzed: yuvoḥ rathaḥ adhvaraḥ deva vītaye prati svasaram upa yātu pītaye

original: (AVŚ_7,58.2a) indrāvaruṇā madhumattamasya vṛṣṇaḥ somasya vṛṣaṇā vṛṣethām /
analyzed: indrāvaruṇāḥ madhumattamasya vṛṣṇaḥ somasya vṛṣaṇā vṛṣethām

original: (AVŚ_7,58.2c) idaṃ vām andhaḥ pariṣiktam āsadyāsmin barhiṣi mādayethām //2//
analyzed: idam vām andhaḥ pariṣiktam āsadya asmin barhiṣi mādayethām

original: (AVŚ_7,59.1a) yo naḥ śapād aśapataḥ śapato yaś ca naḥ śapāt /
analyzed: yaḥ naḥ śapāt a śapataḥ śapataḥ yaḥ ca naḥ śapāt

original: (AVŚ_7,59.1c) vṛkṣa iva vidyutā hata ā mūlād anu śuṣyatu //1//
analyzed: vṛkṣaḥ iva vidyutā hataḥ ā mūlāt anu śuṣyatu

original: (AVŚ_7,60.1a) ūrjaṃ bibhrad vasuvaniḥ sumedhā aghoreṇa cakṣuṣā mitriyeṇa /
analyzed: ūrjam bibhrat vasu vaniḥ sumedhāḥ aghoreṇa cakṣuṣā mitriyeṇa

original: (AVŚ_7,60.1c) gṛhān aimi sumanā vandamāno ramadhvam mā bibhīta mat //1//
analyzed: gṛhān aimi sumanāḥ vandamānaḥ ramadhvam mā bibhīta mat

original: (AVŚ_7,60.2a) ime gṛhā mayobhuva ūrjasvantaḥ payasvantaḥ /
analyzed: ime gṛhāḥ mayobhuvaḥ ūrjasvantaḥ payasvantaḥ

original: (AVŚ_7,60.2c) pūrṇā vāmena tiṣṭhantas te no jānantv āyataḥ //2//
analyzed: pūrṇāḥ vāmena tiṣṭhantaḥ te naḥ jānantu āyataḥ

original: (AVŚ_7,60.3a) yeṣām adhyeti pravasan yeṣu saumanaso bahuḥ /
analyzed: yeṣām adhyeti pravasan yeṣu saumanasaḥ bahuḥ

original: (AVŚ_7,60.3c) gṛhān upa hvayāmahe te no jānantv āyataḥ //3//
analyzed: gṛhān upa hvayāmahe te naḥ jānantu āyataḥ

original: (AVŚ_7,60.4a) upahūtā bhūridhanāḥ sakhāyaḥ svādusaṃmudaḥ /
analyzed: upahūtāḥ bhūri dhanāḥ sakhāyaḥ svādu saṃmudaḥ

original: (AVŚ_7,60.4c) akṣudhyā atṛṣyā sta gṛhā māsmad bibhītana //4//
analyzed: akṣudhyāḥ atṛṣyāḥ sta gṛhāḥ mā asmat bibhītana

original: (AVŚ_7,60.5a) upahūtā iha gāva upahūtā ajāvayaḥ /
analyzed: upahūtāḥ iha gāvaḥ upahūtāḥ aja avayaḥ

original: (AVŚ_7,60.5c) atho annasya kīlāla upahūto gṛheṣu //5//
analyzed: atha u annasya kīlālaḥ upahūtaḥ gṛheṣu

original: (AVŚ_7,60.6a) sūnṛtāvantaḥ subhagā irāvanto hasāmudāḥ /
analyzed: sūnṛtāvantaḥ subhagāḥ irāvantaḥ hasāmudāḥ

original: (AVŚ_7,60.6c) atṛṣyā akṣudhyā sta gṛhā māsmad bibhītana //6//
analyzed: atṛṣyāḥ akṣudhyāḥ sta gṛhāḥ mā asmat bibhītana

original: (AVŚ_7,60.7a) ihaiva sta mānu gāta viśvā rūpāṇi puṣyata /
analyzed: iha eva sta mā anu gāta viśvā rūpāṇi puṣyata

original: (AVŚ_7,60.7c) aiṣyāmi bhadreṇā saha bhūyāṃso bhavatā mayā //7//

analyzed: yat agne tapasā tapaḥ upatapyāmahe tapaḥ

original: (AVŚ_7,61.2a) agne tapas tapyāmaha upa tapyāmahe tapaḥ /

analyzed: śrutāni śṛṇvantaḥ vayam āyuṣmantaḥ sumedhasaḥ

original: (AVŚ_7,62.1a) ayam agniḥ satpatir vṛddhavṛṣṇo rathīva pattīn ajayat purohitaḥ /
analyzed: ayam agniḥ sat patiḥ vṛddha vṛṣṇaḥ rathī iva pattīn ajayat purohitaḥ

original: (AVŚ_7,63.1c) sa naḥ parṣad ati durgāṇi viśvā kṣāmad devo 'ti duritāny agniḥ //1//

analyzed: pratīcīna phalaḥ hi tvam apāmārga rurohitha

analyzed: sarvān mat śapathām adhi varīyaḥ yavaya itas

analyzed: sarasvati vrateṣu te divyeṣu devi dhāmasu

original: (AVŚ_7,68.3c) mā te yuyoma saṃdṛśaḥ //1//
analyzed: mā te yuyoma saṃdṛśaḥ

analyzed: śam naḥ vātaḥ vātu śam naḥ tapatu sūryaḥ

original: (AVŚ_7,69.1c) ahāni śaṃ bhavantu naḥ śaṃ rātrī prati dhīyatāṃ /

analyzed: agneḥ ghorasya manyunā tena vadhiṣam haviḥ

analyzed: pada jñāḥ stha ramatayaḥ saṃhitāḥ viśva nāmnīḥ

original: (AVŚ_7,75.2e) imaṃ goṣṭham idaṃ sado ghṛtenāsmānt sam ukṣata //2//
analyzed: imam goṣṭham idam sadaḥ ghṛtena asmān sam ukṣata

analyzed: ā susrasaḥ susrasaḥ asatībhyaḥ asattarāḥ

analyzed: sehoḥ a rasatarāḥ havaṇāt vikledīyasīḥ

original: (AVŚ_7,76.2c) vijāmni yā apacitaḥ svayaṃsrasaḥ //2//

analyzed: yaḥ kīkasāḥ praśṛṇāti talīdyam avatiṣṭhati

original: (AVŚ_7,76.3c) nir hās taṃ sarvaṃ jāyānyam yaḥ kaś ca kakudi śritaḥ //3//
analyzed: niḥ ha āḥ tam sarvam jāyānyam yaḥ kaḥ ca kakudi śritaḥ

analyzed: katham ha tatra tvam hanaḥ yasya kṛṇmaḥ haviḥ gṛhe

original: (AVŚ_7,76.6a) dhṛṣat piba kalaśe somam indra vṛtrahā śūra samare vasūnām /
analyzed: dhṛṣat piba kalaśe somam indra vṛtra hā śūra samare vasūnām

original: (AVŚ_7,76.6c) mādhyandine savana ā vṛṣasva rayiṣṭhāno rayim asmāsu dhehi //2//
analyzed: mādhyandine savane ā vṛṣasva rayiṣṭhānaḥ rayim asmāsu dhehi

original: (AVŚ_7,77.1a) sāṃtapanā idaṃ havir marutas taj jujuṣṭana /
analyzed: sāṃtapanāḥ idam haviḥ marutaḥ tat jujuṣṭana

original: (AVŚ_7,77.1c) asmākotī riśādasaḥ //1//
analyzed: asmākā ūtī riśādasaḥ

original: (AVŚ_7,77.2a) yo no marto maruto durhṛṇāyus tiraś cittāni vasavo jighāṃsati /
analyzed: yaḥ naḥ martaḥ marutaḥ durhṛṇāyuḥ tiras cittāni vasavaḥ jighāṃsati

original: (AVŚ_7,77.2c) druhaḥ pāśān prati muñcatāṃ sas tapiṣṭhena tapasā hantanā tam //2//
analyzed: druhaḥ pāśān prati muñcatām saḥ tapiṣṭhena tapasā hantana tam

original: (AVŚ_7,77.3a) samvatsarīṇā marutaḥ svarkā urukṣayāḥ sagaṇā mānuṣāsaḥ /
analyzed: samvatsarīṇāḥ marutaḥ su arkāḥ uru kṣayāḥ sa gaṇāḥ mānuṣāsaḥ

original: (AVŚ_7,77.3c) te asmat pāśān pra muñcantv enasas sāṃtapanā matsarā mādayiṣṇavaḥ //3//
analyzed: te asmat pāśān pra muñcantu enasaḥ sāṃtapanāḥ matsarāḥ mādayiṣṇavaḥ

original: (AVŚ_7,78.1a) vi te muñcāmi raśanāṃ vi yoktraṃ vi niyojanam /
analyzed: vi te muñcāmi raśanām vi yoktram vi niyojanam

original: (AVŚ_7,78.1c) ihaiva tvam ajasra edhy agne //1//
analyzed: iha eva tvam ajasraḥ edhi agne

original: (AVŚ_7,78.2a) asmai kṣatrāṇi dhārayantam agne yunajmi tvā brahmaṇā daivyena /
analyzed: asmai kṣatrāṇi dhārayantam agne yunajmi tvā brahmaṇā daivyena

original: (AVŚ_7,78.2c) dīdihy asmabhyaṃ draviṇeha bhadraṃ premaṃ voco havirdām devatāsu //2//
analyzed: dīdihi asmabhyam draviṇā iha bhadram pra imam vocaḥ haviḥ dām devatāsu

original: (AVŚ_7,79.1a) yat te devā akṛṇvan bhāgadheyam amāvāsye saṃvasanto mahitvā /
analyzed: yat te devāḥ akṛṇvan bhāgadheyam amāvāsye saṃvasantaḥ mahitvā

original: (AVŚ_7,79.1c) tenā no yajñaṃ pipṛhi viśvavāre rayiṃ no dhehi subhage suvīram //1//
analyzed: tena naḥ yajñam pipṛhi viśva vāre rayim naḥ dhehi subhage su vīram

original: (AVŚ_7,79.2a) aham evāsmy amāvāsyā mām ā vasanti sukṛto mayīme /
analyzed: aham eva asmi amāvāsyā mām ā vasanti su kṛtaḥ mayi ime

original: (AVŚ_7,79.2c) mayi devā ubhaye sādyāś cendrajyeṣṭhāḥ sam agachanta sarve //2//
analyzed: mayi devāḥ ubhaye sādyāḥ ca indra jyeṣṭhāḥ sam agacchanta sarve

original: (AVŚ_7,79.3a) āgan rātrī saṅgamanī vasūnām ūrjaṃ puṣṭaṃ vasv āveśayantī /
analyzed: āgan rātrī saṅgamanī vasūnām ūrjam puṣṭam vasū āveśayantī

original: (AVŚ_7,79.3c) amāvāsyāyai haviṣa vidhemorjaṃ duhānā payasā na āgan //3//
analyzed: amāvāsyāyai haviṣe vidhema ūrjam duhānā payasā naḥ āgan

original: (AVŚ_7,79.4a) amāvāsye na tvad etāny anyo viśvā rūpāṇi paribhūr jajāna /
analyzed: amāvāsye na tvat etāni anyaḥ viśvā rūpāṇi paribhūḥ jajāna

original: (AVŚ_7,79.4c) yatkāmās te juhumas tan no astu vayaṃ syāma patayo rayiṇām //4//
analyzed: yad kāmāḥ te juhumaḥ tat naḥ astu vayam syāma patayaḥ rayiṇām

original: (AVŚ_7,80.1a) paurṇamāsī jigāya /
analyzed: paurṇamāsī jigāya

original: (AVŚ_7,80.1c) tasyāṃ devaiḥ saṃvasanto mahitvā nākasya pṛṣṭhe sam iṣā madema //1//
analyzed: tasyām devaiḥ saṃvasantaḥ mahitvā nākasya pṛṣṭhe sam iṣā madema

original: (AVŚ_7,80.2a) vṛṣabhaṃ vājinaṃ vayaṃ paurṇamāsaṃ yajāmahe /
analyzed: vṛṣabham vājinam vayam paurṇamāsam yajāmahe

original: (AVŚ_7,80.2c) sa no dadātv akṣitāṃ rayim anupadasvatīm //2//
analyzed: sa naḥ dadātu a kṣitām rayim anupadasvatīm

original: (AVŚ_7,80.3a) prajāpate na tvad etāny anyo viśvā rūpāṇi paribhūr jajāna /
analyzed: prajāpate na tvat etāni anyaḥ viśvā rūpāṇi paribhūḥ jajāna

original: (AVŚ_7,80.3c) yatkāmās te juhumas tan no astu vayaṃ syāma patayo rayīṇām //3//
analyzed: yad kāmāḥ te juhumaḥ tat naḥ astu vayam syāma patayaḥ rayīṇām

original: (AVŚ_7,80.4a) paurṇamāsī prathamā yajñiyāsīd ahnāṃ rātrīṇām atiśarvareṣu /
analyzed: paurṇamāsī prathamā yajñiyā āsīt ahnām rātrīṇām atiśarvareṣu

original: (AVŚ_7,80.4c) ye tvām yajñair yajñiye ardhayanty amī te nāke sukṛtaḥ praviṣṭāḥ //4//
analyzed: ye tvām yajñaiḥ yajñiye ardhayanti amī te nāke su kṛtaḥ praviṣṭāḥ

original: (AVŚ_7,81.1a) pūrvāparaṃ carato mayayaitau śiśū krīḍantau pari yāto 'rṇavam /
analyzed: pūrva aparam carataḥ śiśū krīḍantau pari yātaḥ rṇavam

original: (AVŚ_7,81.1c) viśvānyo bhuvanā vicaṣṭa ṛtūṃr anyo vidadhaj jāyase navaḥ //1//
analyzed: viśvā anyaḥ bhuvanā vicaṣṭe ṛtūṃr anyaḥ vidadhat jāyase navaḥ

original: (AVŚ_7,81.2a) navonavo bhavasi jāyamāno 'hnāṃ ketur uṣasām eṣy agram /
analyzed: navaḥ navaḥ bhavasi jāyamānaḥ hnām ketuḥ uṣasām eṣi agram

original: (AVŚ_7,81.2c) bhāgaṃ devebhyo vi dadhāsy āyan pra candramas tirase dhīrgham āyuḥ //2//
analyzed: bhāgam devebhyaḥ vi dadhāsi āyan pra candramaḥ tirase dhīrgham āyuḥ

original: (AVŚ_7,81.3a) somasyāmśo yudhāṃ pate 'nūno nāma vā asi /
analyzed: somasya amśas yudhām pate nūnar nāma vai asi

original: (AVŚ_7,81.3c) anūnam darśa mā kṛdhi prajayā ca dhanena ca //3//
analyzed: anūnam darśa mā kṛdhi prajayā ca dhanena ca

original: (AVŚ_7,81.4a) darśo 'si darśato 'si samagro 'si samantaḥ /
analyzed: darśaḥ si darśataḥ si samagraḥ si samantaḥ

original: (AVŚ_7,81.4c) samagraḥ samanto bhūyāsaṃ gobhir aśvaiḥ prajayā paśubhir gṛhair dhanena //4//
analyzed: samagraḥ samantaḥ bhūyāsam gobhiḥ aśvaiḥ prajayā paśubhiḥ gṛhaiḥ dhanena

original: (AVŚ_7,81.5a) yo 'smān dveṣṭi yaṃ vayaṃ dviṣmas tasya tvaṃ prāṇenā pyāyasva /
analyzed: yaḥ smān dveṣṭi yam vayam dviṣmaḥ tasya tvam prāṇena ā pyāyasva

original: (AVŚ_7,81.5c) ā vayaṃ pyāsiṣīmahi gobhir aśvaiḥ prajayā paśubhir gṛhair dhanena //5//
analyzed: ā vayam pyāsiṣīmahi gobhiḥ aśvaiḥ prajayā paśubhiḥ gṛhaiḥ dhanena

original: (AVŚ_7,81.6a) yaṃ devā aṃśum āpyāyayanti yam akṣitam akṣitā bhakṣayanti /
analyzed: yam devāḥ aṃśum āpyāyayanti yam akṣitam akṣitāḥ bhakṣayanti

original: (AVŚ_7,81.6c) tenāsmān indro varuṇo bṛhaspatir ā pyāyayantu bhuvanasya gopāḥ //6//
analyzed: tena asmān indraḥ varuṇaḥ bṛhaspatiḥ ā pyāyayantu bhuvanasya gopāḥ

original: (AVŚ_7,82.1a) abhy arcata suṣṭutiṃ gavyam ājim asmāsu bhadrā draviṇāni dhatta /
analyzed: abhī arcata suṣṭutim gavyam ājim asmāsu bhadrā draviṇāni dhatta

original: (AVŚ_7,82.1c) imaṃ yajñaṃ nayata devatā no ghṛtasya dhārā madhumat pavantām //1//
analyzed: imam yajñam nayata devatāḥ naḥ ghṛtasya dhārāḥ madhumat pavantām

original: (AVŚ_7,82.2a) mayy agre agniṃ gṛhṇāmi saha kṣatreṇa varcasā balena /
analyzed: mayi agre agnim gṛhṇāmi saha kṣatreṇa varcasā balena

original: (AVŚ_7,82.2c) mayi prajāṃ mayy āyur dadhāmi svāhā mayy agnim //2//
analyzed: mayi prajām mayi āyuḥ dadhāmi svāhā mayi agnim

original: (AVŚ_7,82.3a) ihaivāgne adhy dhārayā rayim mā tvā ni kran pūrvacittā nikāriṇaḥ /
analyzed: iha eva agne adhi dhāraya rayim mā tvā ni kran pūrva cittāḥ nikāriṇaḥ

original: (AVŚ_7,82.3c) kṣatreṇāgne suyamam astu tubhyam upasattā vardhatāṃ te aniṣṭṛtaḥ //3//
analyzed: kṣatreṇa agne suyamam astu tubhyam upasattā vardhatām te a niṣṭṛtaḥ

original: (AVŚ_7,82.4a) anv agnir uṣasām agram akhyad anv ahāni prathamo jātavedāḥ /
analyzed: anu agniḥ uṣasām agram akhyat anu ahāni prathamaḥ jātavedāḥ

original: (AVŚ_7,82.4c) anu sūrya uṣaso anu raśmīn anu dyāvāpṛthivī ā viveśa //4//

original: (AVŚ_7,82.5a) praty agnir uṣasām agram akhyat prati ahāni prathamo jātavedāḥ /
analyzed: prati agniḥ uṣasām agram akhyat prati ahāni prathamaḥ jātavedāḥ

original: (AVŚ_7,82.5c) prati sūryasya purudhā ca raśmīn prati dyāvāpṛthivī ā tatāna //5//
analyzed: prati sūryasya purudhā ca raśmīn prati dyāvāpṛthivī ā tatāna

original: (AVŚ_7,82.6a) ghṛtaṃ te agne divye sadhasthe ghṛtena tvāṃ manur adyā sam indhe /
analyzed: ghṛtam te agne divye sadhasthe ghṛtena tvām manuḥ adyā sam indhe

original: (AVŚ_7,83.1a) apsu te rājan varuṇa gṛho hiraṇyayo mitaḥ /
analyzed: apsu te rājan varuṇa gṛhaḥ hiraṇyayaḥ mitaḥ

analyzed: tatas dhṛtavrataḥ rājā sarvā dhāmāni muñcatu

original: (AVŚ_7,83.2a) dāmnodāmno rājann ito varuṇa muñca naḥ /

original: (AVŚ_7,83.2c) yad āpo aghnyā iti varuṇeti yad ūcima tato varuṇa muñca naḥ //2//

original: (AVŚ_7,84.1c) viśvā amīvāḥ pramuñcan mānuṣībhiḥ śivābhir adya pari pāhi no gayam //1//

analyzed: mṛgaḥ na bhīmaḥ kucaraḥ giriṣṭhāḥ parāvataḥ ā jagamyāt parasyāḥ

analyzed: sṛkam saṃśāya pavim indra tigmam vi śatrūn tāḍhi vi mṛdhaḥ nudasva

original: (AVŚ_7,85.1a) tyam ū ṣu vājinaṃ devajūtaṃ sahovānaṃ tarutāraṃ rathānām /
analyzed: tyam u su vājinam deva jūtam sahovānam tarutāram rathānām

original: (AVŚ_7,85.1c) ariṣṭanemiṃ pṛtanājim āśuṃ svastaye tārkṣyam ihā huvema //1//
analyzed: ariṣṭa nemim pṛtanā ājim āśum svastaye tārkṣyam iha ā huvema

analyzed: trātāram indram avitāram indram havehave su havam śūram indram

analyzed: huve nu śakram puru hūtam indram svasti naḥ indraḥ maghavān kṛṇotu

original: (AVŚ_7,87.1a) yo agnau rudro yo apsv antar ya oṣadhīr vīrudha āviveśa /
analyzed: yaḥ agnau rudraḥ yaḥ apsu antar yaḥ oṣadhīḥ vīrudhaḥ āviveśa

original: (AVŚ_7,88.1a) apehy arir asy arir vā asi viṣe viṣam apṛkthā viṣam id vā apṛkthāḥ /
analyzed: apehi ariḥ asi ariḥ vai asi viṣe viṣam apṛkthāḥ viṣam id vai apṛkthāḥ

analyzed: ahim eva abhi apehi tam jahi

original: (AVŚ_7,89.1a) apo divyā acāyiṣam rasena sam apṛkṣmahi /
analyzed: apaḥ divyāḥ acāyiṣam rasena sam apṛkṣmahi

original: (AVŚ_7,89.2c) vidyur me asya devā indro vidyāt saha ṛṣibhiḥ //2//
analyzed: vidyuḥ me asya devāḥ indraḥ vidyāt saha ṛṣibhiḥ

original: (AVŚ_7,89.3a) idam āpaḥ pra vahatāvadyaṃ ca malaṃ ca yat /
analyzed: idam āpaḥ pra vahata avadyam ca malam ca yat

original: (AVŚ_7,89.3c) yac cābhidudrohānṛtaṃ yac ca śepe abhīruṇam //3//
analyzed: yat ca abhidudroha anṛtam yat ca śepe abhīruṇam

original: (AVŚ_7,89.4a) edho 'sy edhiṣīya samid asi sam edhiṣīya /
analyzed: edhaḥ si edhiṣīya samidh asi sam edhiṣīya

original: (AVŚ_7,89.4c) tejo 'si tejo mayi dhehi //4//
analyzed: tejaḥ si tejaḥ mayi dhehi

original: (AVŚ_7,90.1a) api vṛśca purāṇavad vratater iva guṣpitam /
analyzed: api vṛśca purāṇa vat vratateḥ iva guṣpitam

original: (AVŚ_7,90.1c) ojo dāsasya dambhaya //1//
analyzed: ojaḥ dāsasya dambhaya

original: (AVŚ_7,90.2a) vayaṃ tad asya sambhṛtaṃ vasv indrena vi bhajāmahai /
analyzed: vayam tat asya sambhṛtam vasu indrena vi bhajāmahai

original: (AVŚ_7,90.2c) mlāpayāmi bhrajaḥ śibhraṃ varuṇasya vratena te //2//
analyzed: mlāpayāmi bhrajaḥ śibhram varuṇasya vratena te

original: (AVŚ_7,90.3a) yathā śepo apāyātai strīṣu cāsad anāvayāḥ /
analyzed: yathā śepaḥ apāyātai strīṣu ca asat anāvayāḥ

original: (AVŚ_7,90.3c) avasthasya knadīvataḥ śāṅkurasya nitodinaḥ /
analyzed: avasthasya knadīvataḥ śāṅkurasya nitodinaḥ

original: (AVŚ_7,90.3e) yad ātatam ava tat tanu yad uttataṃ ni tat tanu //3//
analyzed: yat ātatam ava tat tanu yat uttatam ni tat tanu

original: (AVŚ_7,91.1a) indraḥ sutrāmā svavāṃ avobhiḥ sumṛḍīko bhavatu viśvavedāḥ /
analyzed: indraḥ sutrāmā svavān avobhiḥ su mṛḍīkaḥ bhavatu viśva vedāḥ

original: (AVŚ_7,91.1c) bādhatāṃ dveṣo abhayaṃ naḥ kṛṇotu suvīryasya patayaḥ syāma //1//
analyzed: bādhatām dveṣaḥ abhayam naḥ kṛṇotu su vīryasya patayaḥ syāma

analyzed: sa sutrāmā svavān indraḥ asmat ārāt cit dveṣaḥ sanutar yuyotu

original: (AVŚ_7,92.1c) tasya vayaṃ sumatau yajñiyasyāpi bhadre saumanase syāma //1//
analyzed: tasya vayam sumatau yajñiyasya api bhadre saumanase syāma

original: (AVŚ_7,93.1a) indreṇa manyunā vayam abhi ṣyāma pṛtanyataḥ /
analyzed: indreṇa manyunā vayam abhi syāma pṛtanyataḥ

original: (AVŚ_7,93.1c) ghnanto vṛtrāṇy aprati //1//
analyzed: ghnantaḥ vṛtrāṇi aprati

original: (AVŚ_7,94.1a) dhruvaṃ dhruveṇa haviṣāva somaṃ nayāmasi /
analyzed: dhruvam dhruveṇa haviṣā ava somam nayāmasi

original: (AVŚ_7,94.1c) yathā na indraḥ kevalīr viśaḥ saṃmanasas karat //1//
analyzed: yathā naḥ indraḥ kevalīḥ viśaḥ saṃmanasaḥ karat

original: (AVŚ_7,95.1a) ud asya śyāvau vithurau gṛdhrau dyām iva petatuḥ /
analyzed: ud asya śyāvau vithurau gṛdhrau dyām iva petatuḥ

original: (AVŚ_7,95.1c) ucchocanapraśocanav asyocchocanau hṛdaḥ //1//
analyzed: ucchocana praśocanau asya ucchocanau hṛdaḥ

original: (AVŚ_7,95.2a) aham enāv ud atiṣṭhipaṃ gāvau śrāntasadāv iva /
analyzed: aham enau ud atiṣṭhipam gāvau śrānta sadau iva

original: (AVŚ_7,95.2c) kurkurāv iva kūjantāv udavantau vṛkāv iva //2//
analyzed: kurkurau iva kūjantau udavantau vṛkau iva

original: (AVŚ_7,95.3a) ātodinau nitodināv atho saṃtodināv uta /
analyzed: ātodinau nitodinau atha u saṃtodinau uta

original: (AVŚ_7,95.3c) api nahyāmy asya meḍhraṃ ya itaḥ strī pumān jabhāra //3//
analyzed: api nahyāmi asya meḍhram yaḥ itas strī pumān jabhāra

original: (AVŚ_7,96.1a) asadan gāvaḥ sadane 'paptad vasatiṃ vayaḥ /
analyzed: asadan gāvaḥ sadane paptat vasatim vayaḥ

original: (AVŚ_7,96.1c) āsthāne parvatā asthuḥ sthāmni vṛkkāv atiṣṭhipam //1//
analyzed: āsthāne parvatāḥ asthuḥ sthāmni vṛkkau atiṣṭhipam

original: (AVŚ_7,97.1a) yad adya tvā prayati yajñe asmin hotaś cikitvann avṛṇīmahīha /
analyzed: yat adya tvā prayati yajñe asmin hotar cikitvan avṛṇīmahi iha

original: (AVŚ_7,97.1c) dhruvam ayo dhruvam utā śaviṣṭhaipravidvān yajñam upa yāhi somam //1//
analyzed: dhruvam ayaḥ dhruvam uta śaviṣṭhai pravidvān yajñam upa yāhi somam

original: (AVŚ_7,97.2a) sam indra no manasā neṣa gobhiḥ saṃ sūribhir harivant saṃ svastyā /
analyzed: sam indra naḥ manasā gobhiḥ sam sūribhiḥ harivan sam svastyā

original: (AVŚ_7,97.2c) saṃ brahmaṇā devahitaṃ yad asti saṃ devānāṃ sumatau yajñiyānām //2//
analyzed: sam brahmaṇā deva hitam yat asti sam devānām sumatau yajñiyānām

original: (AVŚ_7,97.3a) yān āvaha uśato deva devāṃs tān preraya sve agne sadhasthe /
analyzed: yān āvahaḥ uśataḥ deva devān tān preraya sve agne sadhasthe

original: (AVŚ_7,97.3c) jakṣivāṃsaḥ papivāṃso madhūny asmai dhatta vasavo vasūni //3//
analyzed: jakṣivāṃsaḥ papivāṃsaḥ madhūni asmai dhatta vasavaḥ vasūni

original: (AVŚ_7,97.4a) sugā vo devāḥ sadanā akarma ya ājagma savane mā juṣāṇāḥ /
analyzed: sugā vaḥ devāḥ sadanā akarma ye ājagma savane mā juṣāṇāḥ

original: (AVŚ_7,97.4c) vahamānā bharamāṇāḥ svā vasūni vasuṃ gharmaṃ divam ā rohatānu //4//
analyzed: vahamānāḥ bharamāṇāḥ svā vasūni vasum gharmam divam ā rohata anu

original: (AVŚ_7,97.5a) yajña yajñaṃ gacha yajñapatiṃ gacha /
analyzed: yajña yajñam gacha yajñapatim gacha

original: (AVŚ_7,97.5c) svāṃ yoniṃ gacha svāhā //5//
analyzed: svām yonim gacha svāhā

original: (AVŚ_7,97.6a) eṣa te yajño yajñapate sahasūktavākaḥ /
analyzed: eṣa te yajñaḥ yajñapate sahasūktavākaḥ

original: (AVŚ_7,97.6c) suvīryaḥ svāhā //6//
analyzed: su vīryaḥ svāhā

original: (AVŚ_7,97.7a) vaṣaḍ dhutebhyo vaṣaḍ ahutebhyaḥ /
analyzed: vaṣaṭ dhutebhyaḥ vaṣaṭ ahutebhyaḥ

original: (AVŚ_7,97.7c) devā gātuvido gātuṃ vittvā gātum ita //7//
analyzed: devāḥ gātu vidaḥ gātum vittvā gātum ita

original: (AVŚ_7,97.8a) manasas pata imaṃ no divi deveṣu yajñam /
analyzed: manasaḥ pate imam naḥ divi deveṣu yajñam

original: (AVŚ_7,97.8c) svāhā divi svāhā pṛthivyāṃ svāhāntarikṣe svāhā vāte dhāṃ svāhā //8//
analyzed: svāhā divi svāhā pṛthivyām svāhā antarikṣe svāhā vāte dhām svāhā

original: (AVŚ_7,98.1a) saṃ barhir aktaṃ haviṣā ghṛtena sam indreṇa vasunā saṃ marudbhiḥ /
analyzed: sam barhiḥ aktam haviṣā ghṛtena sam indreṇa vasunā sam marudbhiḥ

original: (AVŚ_7,98.1c) saṃ devair viśvadevebhir aktam indraṃ gachatu haviḥ svāhā //1//
analyzed: sam devaiḥ viśva devebhiḥ aktam indram gacchatu haviḥ svāhā

original: (AVŚ_7,99.1a) pari stṛṇīhi pari dhehi vediṃ mā jāmiṃ moṣīr amuyā śayānām /
analyzed: pari stṛṇīhi pari dhehi vedim mā jāmim moṣīḥ amuyā śayānām

original: (AVŚ_7,99.1c) hotṛṣadanam haritaṃ hiraṇyayaṃ niṣkā ete yajamānasya loke //1//
analyzed: hotṛṣadanam haritam hiraṇyayam niṣkāḥ ete yajamānasya loke

original: (AVŚ_7,100.1a) paryāvarte duṣvapnyāt pāpāt svapnyād abhūtyāḥ /
analyzed: paryāvarte duṣvapnyāt pāpāt svapnyāt abhūtyāḥ

original: (AVŚ_7,100.1c) brahmāham antaraṃ kṛṇve parā svapnamukhāḥ śucaḥ //1//
analyzed: brahma aham antaram kṛṇve parā svapna mukhāḥ śucaḥ

original: (AVŚ_7,101.1a) yat svapne annam aśnāmi na prātar adhigamyate /
analyzed: yat svapne annam aśnāmi na prātar adhigamyate

original: (AVŚ_7,101.1c) sarvaṃ tad astu me śivaṃ nahi tad dṛṣyate divā //1//
analyzed: sarvam tat astu me śivam nahi tat dṛṣyate divā

original: (AVŚ_7,102.1a) namaskṛtya dyāvāpṛthivībhyām antarikṣāya mṛtyave /
analyzed: namaskṛtya dyāvāpṛthivībhyām antarikṣāya mṛtyave

original: (AVŚ_7,102.1c) mekṣāmy ūrdhvas tiṣṭhan mā mā hiṃsiṣur īśvarāḥ //1//
analyzed: mekṣāmi ūrdhvaḥ tiṣṭhat mā mā hiṃsiṣuḥ īśvarāḥ

original: (AVŚ_7,103.1a) ko asyā no druho 'vadyavatyā un neṣyati kṣatriyo vasya ichan /
analyzed: kaḥ asyāḥ naḥ druhaḥ vadyavatyāḥ ud neṣyati kṣatriyaḥ vasyaḥ ichan

original: (AVŚ_7,103.1c) ko yajñakāmaḥ ka u pūrtikāmaḥ ko deveṣu vanute dīrgham āyuḥ //1//
analyzed: kaḥ yajña kāmaḥ kaḥ u pūrti kāmaḥ kaḥ deveṣu vanute dīrgham āyuḥ

original: (AVŚ_7,104.1a) kaḥ pṛśniṃ dhenuṃ varuṇena dattām atharvane sudughāṃ nityavatsām /
analyzed: kaḥ pṛśnim dhenum varuṇena dattām atharvane su dughām nitya vatsām

original: (AVŚ_7,104.1c) bṛhaspatinā sakhyaṃ juṣaṇo yathāvaśaṃ tanvaḥ kalpayāti //1//
analyzed: bṛhaspatinā sakhyam juṣaṇaḥ yathāvaśam tanvaḥ kalpayāti

original: (AVŚ_7,105.1a) apakrāman pauruṣeyād vṛṇāno daivyaṃ vacaḥ /
analyzed: apakrāman pauruṣeyāt vṛṇānaḥ daivyam vacaḥ

original: (AVŚ_7,105.1c) praṇītīr abhyāvartasva viśvebhiḥ sakhibhiḥ saha //1//
analyzed: praṇītīḥ abhyāvartasva viśvebhiḥ sakhibhiḥ saha

original: (AVŚ_7,106.1a) yad asmṛti cakṛma kiṃ cid agna upārima caraṇe jātavedaḥ /
analyzed: yat asmṛti cakṛma kim cit agne upārima caraṇe jātavedaḥ

original: (AVŚ_7,106.1c) tataḥ pāhi tvaṃ naḥ pracetaḥ śubhe sakhibhyo amṛtatvam astu naḥ //1//
analyzed: tatas pāhi tvam naḥ pracetaḥ śubhe sakhibhyaḥ amṛta tvam astu naḥ

original: (AVŚ_7,107.1a) ava divas tārayanti sapta sūryasya raśmayaḥ /
analyzed: ava divaḥ tārayanti sapta sūryasya raśmayaḥ

original: (AVŚ_7,107.1c) āpaḥ samudriyā dhārās tās śalyam asisrasan //1//
analyzed: āpaḥ samudriyāḥ dhārāḥ tāḥ śalyam asisrasan

original: (AVŚ_7,108.1a) yo na stāyad dipsati yo na āviḥ svo vidvān araṇo vā no agne /
analyzed: yaḥ naḥ stāyat dipsati yaḥ naḥ āvis svaḥ vidvān araṇaḥ vā naḥ agne

original: (AVŚ_7,108.1c) pratīcy etv araṇī datvatī tān maiṣām agne vāstu bhūn mo apatyam //1//
analyzed: pratīcī etu araṇī datvatī tān mā eṣām agne vāstu bhūt mā u apatyam

original: (AVŚ_7,108.2a) yo naḥ suptān jāgrato vābhidāsāt tiṣṭhato vā carato jātavedaḥ /
analyzed: yaḥ naḥ suptān jāgrataḥ vā abhidāsāt tiṣṭhataḥ vā carataḥ jātavedaḥ

original: (AVŚ_7,108.2c) vaiśvānareṇa sayujā sajoṣās tān pratīco nir daha jātavedaḥ //2//
analyzed: vaiśvānareṇa sayujā sajoṣāḥ tān pratīcaḥ niḥ daha jātavedaḥ

original: (AVŚ_7,109.1a) idam ugrāya babhrave namo yo akṣeṣu tanūvaśī /
analyzed: idam ugrāya babhrave namaḥ yaḥ akṣeṣu tanū vaśī

original: (AVŚ_7,109.1c) ghṛtena kaliṃ śikṣāmi sa no mṛḍātīdṛśe //1//
analyzed: ghṛtena kalim śikṣāmi sa naḥ mṛḍāti īdṛśe

original: (AVŚ_7,109.2a) ghṛtam apsarābhyo vaha tvam agne pāṃsūn akṣebhyaḥ sikatā apaś ca /
analyzed: ghṛtam apsarābhyaḥ vaha tvam agne pāṃsūn akṣebhyaḥ sikatāḥ apaḥ ca

original: (AVŚ_7,109.2c) yathābhagaṃ havyadātiṃ juṣāṇā madanti devā ubhayāni havyā //2//
analyzed: yathā bhagam havya dātim juṣāṇāḥ madanti devāḥ ubhayāni havyā

analyzed: apsarasaḥ sadhamādam madanti havirdhānam antarā sūryam ca

original: (AVŚ_7,109.3c) tā me hastau saṃ sṛjantu ghṛtena sapatnaṃ me kitavam randhayantu //3//
analyzed: tāḥ me hastau sam sṛjantu ghṛtena sapatnam me kitavam randhayantu

analyzed: ādinavam pratidīvne ghṛtena asmān abhi kṣara

original: (AVŚ_7,109.4c) vṛkṣam ivāśanyā jahi yo asmān pratidīvyati //4//
analyzed: vṛkṣam iva aśanyā jahi yaḥ asmān pratidīvyati

original: (AVŚ_7,109.5a) yo no dyuve dhanam idaṃ cakāra yo akṣāṇāṃ glahanaṃ śeṣaṇaṃ ca /
analyzed: yaḥ naḥ dhanam idam cakāra yaḥ akṣāṇām glahanam śeṣaṇam ca

analyzed: sa naḥ devaḥ haviḥ idam juṣāṇaḥ gandharvebhiḥ sadhamādam madema

analyzed: saṃvasavaḥ iti vaḥ nāmadheyam ugraṃpaśyāḥ rāṣṭra bhṛtaḥ hi akṣāḥ

analyzed: devān yat nāthitaḥ huve brahmacaryam yat ūṣima

original: (AVŚ_7,109.7c) akṣān yad babhrūn ālabhe te no mṛḍantv īdṛśe //7//

original: (AVŚ_7,110.1a) agna indraś ca dāśuṣe hato vṛtrāṇy aprati /
analyzed: agne indraḥ ca dāśuṣe hataḥ vṛtrāṇi aprati

original: (AVŚ_7,110.1c) ubhā hi vṛtrahantamā //1//
analyzed: ubhā hi vṛtra hantamā

original: (AVŚ_7,110.2a) yābhyām ajayant svar agra eva yāv ātasthatur bhuvanāni viśvā /
analyzed: yābhyām ajayan svar agre eva yau ātasthatuḥ bhuvanāni viśvā

original: (AVŚ_7,110.2c) pra carṣaṇīvṛṣaṇā vajrabāhū agnim indram vṛtrahaṇā huve 'ham //2//
analyzed: pra carṣaṇīvṛṣaṇā vajrabāhū agnim indram vṛtra haṇā huve ham

analyzed: upa tvā devaḥ agramīt camasena bṛhaspatiḥ

original: (AVŚ_7,110.3c) indra gīrbhir na ā viśa yajamānāya sunvate //3//
analyzed: indra gīrbhiḥ naḥ ā viśa yajamānāya sunvate

original: (AVŚ_7,111.1a) indrasya kukṣir asi somadhāna ātmā devānām uta mānuṣāṇām /
analyzed: indrasya kukṣiḥ asi soma dhānaḥ ātmā devānām uta mānuṣāṇām

original: (AVŚ_7,111.1c) iha prajā janaya yās ta āsu yā anyatreha tās te ramantām //1//
analyzed: iha prajāḥ janaya yāḥ te āsu yāḥ anyatra iha tāḥ te ramantām

original: (AVŚ_7,112.1a) śumbhanī dyāvāpṛthivī antisumne mahivrate /
analyzed: śumbhanī dyāvāpṛthivī antisumne mahi vrate

original: (AVŚ_7,112.1c) āpaḥ sapta susruvur devīs tā no muñcantv aṃhasaḥ //1//
analyzed: āpaḥ sapta susruvuḥ devīḥ tāḥ naḥ muñcantu aṃhasaḥ

original: (AVŚ_7,112.2a) muñcantu mā śapathyād atho varuṇyād uta /
analyzed: muñcantu mā śapathyāt atha u varuṇyāt uta

original: (AVŚ_7,112.2c) atho yamasya paḍvīśād viśvasmād devakilbiṣāt //2//
