original: (AVŚ_7,113.1a) tṛṣṭike tṛṣṭavandana ud amūṃ chindhi tṛṣṭike /
analyzed: tṛṣṭike tṛṣṭa vandana ud amūm chinddhi tṛṣṭike

original: (AVŚ_7,113.1c) yathā kṛtadviṣṭāso 'muṣmai śepyāvate //1//
analyzed: yathā kṛta dviṣṭāsaḥ muṣmai śepyāvate

original: (AVŚ_7,113.2a) tṛṣṭāsi tṛṣṭikā viṣā viṣātaky asi /
analyzed: tṛṣṭā asi tṛṣṭikā viṣā viṣātakī asi

original: (AVŚ_7,113.2c) parivṛktā yathāsasy ṛṣabhasya vaśeva //2//
analyzed: parivṛktā yathā asasi ṛṣabhasya vaśā iva

original: (AVŚ_7,114.1a) ā te dade vakṣaṇābhya ā te 'haṃ hṛdayād dade /
analyzed: ā te dade vakṣaṇābhyaḥ ā te ham hṛdayāt dade

original: (AVŚ_7,114.1c) ā te mukhasya saṅkāśāt sarvaṃ te varca ā dade //1//
analyzed: ā te mukhasya saṅkāśāt sarvam te varcaḥ ā dade

original: (AVŚ_7,114.2a) preto yantu vyādhyaḥ prānudhyāḥ pro aśastayaḥ /
analyzed: pra itas yantu vyādhyaḥ pra anudhyāḥ pra u aśastayaḥ

original: (AVŚ_7,114.2c) agnī rakṣasvinīr hantu somo hantu durasyatīḥ //2//
analyzed: agniḥ rakṣasvinīḥ hantu somaḥ hantu durasyatīḥ

original: (AVŚ_7,115.1a) pra patetaḥ pāpi lakṣmi naśyetaḥ prāmutaḥ pata /
analyzed: pra pata itas pāpi lakṣmi naśya itas pra amutas pata

original: (AVŚ_7,115.1c) ayasmayenāṅkena dviṣate tvā sajāmasi //1//
analyzed: ayasmayena aṅkena dviṣate tvā sajāmasi

original: (AVŚ_7,115.2a) yā mā lakṣmīḥ patayālūr ajuṣṭābhicaskanda vandaneva vṛkṣam /
analyzed: yā mā lakṣmīḥ patayālūḥ ajuṣṭā abhicaskanda vandanā iva vṛkṣam

original: (AVŚ_7,115.2c) anyatrāsmat savitas tām ito dhā hiraṇyahasto vasu no rarāṇaḥ //2//
analyzed: anyatra asmat savitar tām itas dhāḥ hiraṇya hastaḥ vasu naḥ rarāṇaḥ

original: (AVŚ_7,115.3a) ekaśataṃ lakṣmyo martyasya sākaṃ tanvā januṣo 'dhi jātāḥ /
analyzed: ekaśatam lakṣmyaḥ martyasya sākam tanvā januṣaḥ dhi jātāḥ

original: (AVŚ_7,115.3c) tāsāṃ pāpiṣṭhā nir itaḥ pra hiṇmaḥ śivā asmabhyaṃ jātavedo niyacha //3//
analyzed: tāsām pāpiṣṭhāḥ niḥ itas pra hiṇmaḥ śivāḥ asmabhyam jātavedaḥ niyaccha

original: (AVŚ_7,115.4a) etā enā vyākaraṃ khile gā viṣṭhitā iva /
analyzed: etāḥ enāḥ vyākaram khile gāḥ viṣṭhitāḥ iva

original: (AVŚ_7,115.4c) ramantāṃ puṇyā lakṣmīr yāḥ pāpīs tā anīnaśam //4//
analyzed: ramantām puṇyāḥ lakṣmīḥ yāḥ pāpīḥ tāḥ anīnaśam

original: (AVŚ_7,116.1a) namo rūrāya cyavanāya nodanāya dhṛṣṇave /
analyzed: namaḥ rūrāya cyavanāya nodanāya dhṛṣṇave

original: (AVŚ_7,116.1c) namaḥ śītāya pūrvakāmakṛtvane //1//
analyzed: namaḥ śītāya pūrva kāma kṛtvane

original: (AVŚ_7,116.2a) yo anyedyur ubhayadyur abhyetīmaṃ maṇḍūkam /
analyzed: yaḥ anyedyus ubhayadyus abhyeti imam maṇḍūkam

original: (AVŚ_7,116.2c) abhy etv avrataḥ //2//
analyzed: abhī etu avrataḥ

original: (AVŚ_7,117.1a) ā mandrair indra haribhir yāhi mayūraromabhiḥ /
analyzed: ā mandraiḥ indra haribhiḥ yāhi mayūra romabhiḥ

original: (AVŚ_7,117.1c) mā tvā ke cid vi yaman viṃ na pāśino 'ti dhanveva tāṃ ihi //1//
analyzed: mā tvā ke cit vi yaman vim na pāśinaḥ ti dhanvā iva tām ihi

original: (AVŚ_7,118.1a) marmāṇi te varmaṇā chādayāmi somas tvā rājāmṛtenānu vastām /
analyzed: marmāṇi te varmaṇā chādayāmi somaḥ tvā rājā amṛtena anu vastām

original: (AVŚ_7,118.1c) uror varīyo varuṇas te kṛṇotu jayantaṃ tvānu devā madantu //1//
analyzed: uroḥ varīyaḥ varuṇaḥ te kṛṇotu jayantam tvā anu devāḥ madantu

original: (AVŚ_8,1.1a) antakāya mṛtyave namaḥ prānā apānā iha te ramantām /
analyzed: antakāya mṛtyave namaḥ prānāḥ apānāḥ iha te ramantām

original: (AVŚ_8,1.1c) ihāyam astu puruṣaḥ sahāsunā sūryasya bhāge amṛtasya loke //1//
analyzed: iha ayam astu puruṣaḥ saha asunā sūryasya bhāge amṛtasya loke

original: (AVŚ_8,1.2a) ud enaṃ bhago agrabhīd ud enaṃ somo aṃśumān /
analyzed: ud enam bhagaḥ agrabhīt ud enam somaḥ aṃśumān

original: (AVŚ_8,1.2c) ud enaṃ maruto devā ud indrāgnī svastaye //2//
analyzed: ud enam marutaḥ devāḥ ud indra agnī svastaye

original: (AVŚ_8,1.3a) iha te 'sur iha prāṇa ihāyur iha te manaḥ /
analyzed: iha te suḥ iha prāṇaḥ iha āyuḥ iha te manaḥ

original: (AVŚ_8,1.3c) ut tvā nirṛtyāḥ pāśebhyo daivyā vacā bharāmasi //3//
analyzed: ud tvā nirṛtyāḥ pāśebhyaḥ daivyā vacāḥ bharāmasi

original: (AVŚ_8,1.4a) ut krāmātaḥ puruṣa māva patthā mṛtyoḥ paḍvīṣam avamuñcamānaḥ /
analyzed: ud krāma atas puruṣa mā ava patthāḥ mṛtyoḥ paḍvīṣam avamuñcamānaḥ

original: (AVŚ_8,1.4c) mā chitthā asmāl lokād agneḥ sūryasya saṃdṛśaḥ //4//
analyzed: mā chitthāḥ asmāt lokāt agneḥ sūryasya saṃdṛśaḥ

original: (AVŚ_8,1.5a) tubhyaṃ vātaḥ pavatāṃ mātariśvā tubhyaṃ varṣantv amṛtāny āpaḥ /
analyzed: tubhyam vātaḥ pavatām mātariśvā tubhyam varṣantu amṛtāni āpaḥ

original: (AVŚ_8,1.5c) sūryas te tanve śaṃ tapāti tvām mṛtyur dayatāṃ mā pra meṣṭhāḥ //5//
analyzed: sūryaḥ te tanve śam tapāti tvām mṛtyuḥ dayatām mā pra meṣṭhāḥ

original: (AVŚ_8,1.6a) udyānaṃ te puruṣa nāvayānaṃ jīvātuṃ te dakṣatātiṃ kṛnomi /
analyzed: udyānam te puruṣa na avayānam jīvātum te dakṣatātim kṛnomi

original: (AVŚ_8,1.6c) ā hi rohemam amṛtaṃ sukhaṃ ratham atha jirvir vidatham ā vadāsi //6//
analyzed: ā hi roha imam amṛtam sukham ratham atha jirviḥ vidatham ā vadāsi

original: (AVŚ_8,1.7a) mā te manas tatra gān mā tiro bhūn mā jīvebhyaḥ pra mado mānu gāḥ pitṝn /
analyzed: mā te manaḥ tatra gāt mā tiras bhūt mā jīvebhyaḥ pra madaḥ mā anu gāḥ pitṝn

original: (AVŚ_8,1.7c) viśve devā abhi rakṣantu tveha //7//
analyzed: viśve devāḥ abhi rakṣantu tvā iha

original: (AVŚ_8,1.8a) mā gatānām ā dīdhīthā ye nayanti parāvatam /
analyzed: mā gatānām ā dīdhīthāḥ ye nayanti parāvatam

original: (AVŚ_8,1.8c) ā roha tamaso jyotir ehy ā te hastau rabhāmahe //8//
analyzed: ā roha tamasaḥ jyotiḥ ehi ā te hastau rabhāmahe

original: (AVŚ_8,1.9a) śyāmaś ca tvā mā śabalaś ca preṣitau yamasya yau pathirakṣī śvānau /
analyzed: śyāmaḥ ca tvā mā śabalaḥ ca preṣitau yamasya yau pathirakṣī śvānau

original: (AVŚ_8,1.9c) arvāṅ ehi mā vi dīdhyo mātra tiṣṭhaḥ parāṅmanāḥ //9//
analyzed: arvāṅ ehi mā vi dīdhyaḥ mā atra tiṣṭhaḥ parāc manāḥ

original: (AVŚ_8,1.10a) maitaṃ panthām anu gā bhīma eṣa yena pūrvaṃ neyatha taṃ bravīmi /
analyzed: mā etam panthām anu gāḥ bhīmaḥ eṣa yena pūrvam na iyatha tam bravīmi

original: (AVŚ_8,1.10c) tama etat puruṣa mā pra patthā bhayaṃ parastād abhayaṃ te arvāk //10// {1}
analyzed: tamaḥ etat puruṣa mā pra patthāḥ bhayam parastāt abhayam te arvāk

original: (AVŚ_8,1.11a) rakṣantu tvāgnayo ye apsv antā rakṣatu tvā manuṣyā yam indhate /
analyzed: rakṣantu tvā agnayaḥ ye apsu antar rakṣatu tvā manuṣyāḥ yam indhate

original: (AVŚ_8,1.11c) vaiśvānaro rakṣatu jātavedā divyas tvā mā pra dhāg vidyutā saha //11//
analyzed: vaiśvānaraḥ rakṣatu jātavedāḥ divyaḥ tvā mā pra dhāk vidyutā saha

original: (AVŚ_8,1.12a) mā tvā kravyād abhi maṃstārāt saṃkasukāc cara rakṣatu tvā dyau rakṣatu /
analyzed: mā tvā kravyād abhi maṃsta ārāt saṃkasukāt cara rakṣatu tvā dyauḥ rakṣatu

original: (AVŚ_8,1.12c) pṛthivī sūryaś ca tvā rakṣatāṃ candramāś ca /
analyzed: pṛthivī sūryaḥ ca tvā rakṣatām candramāḥ ca

original: (AVŚ_8,1.12e) antarikṣaṃ rakṣatu devahetyāḥ //12//
analyzed: antarikṣam rakṣatu deva hetyāḥ

original: (AVŚ_8,1.13a) bodhaś ca tvā pratibodhaś ca rakṣatām asvapnaś ca tvānavadrāṇaś ca rakṣatām /
analyzed: bodhaḥ ca tvā pratibodhaḥ ca rakṣatām asvapnaḥ ca tvā anavadrāṇaḥ ca rakṣatām

original: (AVŚ_8,1.13c) gopāyaṃś ca tvā jāgṛviś ca rakṣatām //13//
analyzed: gopāyan ca tvā jāgṛviḥ ca rakṣatām

original: (AVŚ_8,1.14a) te tvā rakṣantu te tvā gopāyantu tebhyo namas tebhyaḥ svāhā //14//
analyzed: te tvā rakṣantu te tvā gopāyantu tebhyaḥ namaḥ tebhyaḥ svāhā

original: (AVŚ_8,1.15a) jīvebhyas tvā samude vāyur indro dhātā dadhātu savitā trāyamāṇaḥ /
analyzed: jīvebhyaḥ tvā sa mude vāyuḥ indraḥ dhātā dadhātu savitā trāyamāṇaḥ

original: (AVŚ_8,1.15c) mā tvā prāṇo balaṃ hāsīd asuṃ te 'nu hvayāmasi //15//
analyzed: mā tvā prāṇaḥ balam hāsīt asum te nu hvayāmasi

original: (AVŚ_8,1.16a) mā tvā jambhaḥ saṃhanur mā tamo vidan mā jihvā barhis pramayuḥ kathā syāḥ /
analyzed: mā tvā jambhaḥ saṃhanuḥ mā tamaḥ vidat mā jihvā barhiḥ pramayuḥ kathā syāḥ

original: (AVŚ_8,1.16c) ut tvādityā vasavo bharantūd indrāgnī svastaye //16//
analyzed: ud tvā ādityāḥ vasavaḥ bharantu ud indra agnī svastaye

original: (AVŚ_8,1.17a) ut tvā dyaur ut pṛthivy ut prajāpatir agrabhīt /
analyzed: ud tvā dyauḥ ud pṛthivī ud prajāpatiḥ agrabhīt

original: (AVŚ_8,1.17c) ut tvā mṛtyor oṣadhayaḥ somarājñīr apīparan //17//
analyzed: ud tvā mṛtyoḥ oṣadhayaḥ soma rājñīḥ apīparan

original: (AVŚ_8,1.18a) ayaṃ devā ihaivāstv ayaṃ māmutra gād itaḥ /
analyzed: ayam devāḥ iha eva astu ayam mā amutra gāt itas

original: (AVŚ_8,1.18c) imaṃ sahasravīryeṇa mṛtyor ut pārayāmasi //18//
analyzed: imam sahasra vīryeṇa mṛtyoḥ ud pārayāmasi

original: (AVŚ_8,1.19a) ut tvā mṛtyor apīparaṃ saṃ dhamantu vayodhasaḥ /
analyzed: ud tvā mṛtyoḥ apīparam sam dhamantu vayodhasaḥ

original: (AVŚ_8,1.19c) mā tvā vyastakeśyo mā tvāgharudo rudan //19//
analyzed: mā tvā vyasta keśyaḥ mā tvā agharudaḥ rudan

original: (AVŚ_8,1.20a) āhārṣam avidaṃ tvā punar āgāḥ punarṇavaḥ /
analyzed: āhārṣam avidam tvā punar āgāḥ punarṇavaḥ

original: (AVŚ_8,1.20c) sarvāṅga sarvaṃ te cakṣuḥ sarvam āyuś ca te 'vidam //20//
analyzed: sarva aṅga sarvam te cakṣuḥ sarvam āyuḥ ca te vidam

original: (AVŚ_8,1.21a) vy avāt te jyotir abhūd apa tvat tamo akramīt /
analyzed: vi avāt te jyotiḥ abhūt apa tvat tamaḥ akramīt

original: (AVŚ_8,1.21c) apa tvan mṛtyuṃ nirṛtim apa yakṣmaṃ ni dadhmasi //21// {2}
analyzed: apa tvat mṛtyum nirṛtim apa yakṣmam ni dadhmasi

original: (AVŚ_8,2.1a) ā rabhasvemām amṛtasya śnuṣṭim achidyamānā jaradaṣṭir astu te /
analyzed: ā rabhasva imām amṛtasya śnuṣṭim a chidyamānā jaradaṣṭiḥ astu te

original: (AVŚ_8,2.1c) asuṃ ta āyuḥ punar ā bharāmi rajas tamo mopa gā mā pra meṣṭhāḥ //1//
analyzed: asum te āyuḥ punar ā bharāmi rajaḥ tamaḥ mā upa gāḥ mā pra meṣṭhāḥ

original: (AVŚ_8,2.2a) jīvatāṃ jyotir abhyehy arvāṅ ā tvā harāmi śataśāradāya /
analyzed: jīvatām jyotiḥ abhyehi arvāṅ ā tvā harāmi śata śāradāya

original: (AVŚ_8,2.2c) avamuñcan mṛtyupāśān aśastiṃ drāghīya āyuḥ prataraṃ te dadhāmi //2//
analyzed: avamuñcan mṛtyu pāśān aśastim drāghīyaḥ āyuḥ prataram te dadhāmi

original: (AVŚ_8,2.3a) vātāt te prānam avidaṃ sūryāc cakṣur ahaṃ tava /
analyzed: vātāt te prānam avidam sūryāt cakṣuḥ aham tava

original: (AVŚ_8,2.3c) yat te manas tvayi tad dhārayāmi saṃ vitsvāṅgair vada jihvayālapan //3//
analyzed: yat te manaḥ tvayi tat dhārayāmi sam vitsva aṅgaiḥ vada jihvayā a lapan

original: (AVŚ_8,2.4a) prāṇena tvā dvipadāṃ catuṣpadām agnim iva jātam abhi saṃ dhamāmi /
analyzed: prāṇena tvā dvipadām catuṣpadām agnim iva jātam abhi sam dhamāmi

original: (AVŚ_8,2.4c) namas te mṛtyo cakṣuṣe namaḥ prāṇāya te 'karam //4//
analyzed: namaḥ te mṛtyo cakṣuṣe namaḥ prāṇāya te karam

original: (AVŚ_8,2.5a) ayaṃ jīvatu mā mṛtemaṃ sam īrayāmasi /
analyzed: ayam jīvatu mā mṛta imam sam īrayāmasi

original: (AVŚ_8,2.5c) kṛṇomy asmai bheṣajaṃ mṛtyo mā puruṣaṃ vadhīḥ //5//
analyzed: kṛṇomi asmai bheṣajam mṛtyo mā puruṣam vadhīḥ

original: (AVŚ_8,2.6a) jīvalāṃ naghāriṣāṃ jīvantīm oṣadhīm aham /
analyzed: jīvalām naghāriṣām jīvantīm oṣadhīm aham

original: (AVŚ_8,2.6c) trāyamāṇāṃ sahamānāṃ sahasvatīm iha huve 'smā ariṣṭatātaye //6//
analyzed: trāyamāṇām sahamānām sahasvatīm iha huve smaḥ ariṣṭatātaye

original: (AVŚ_8,2.7a) adhi brūhi mā rabhathāḥ sṛjemaṃ tavaiva sant sarvahāyāḥ ihāstu /
analyzed: adhi brūhi mā rabhathāḥ sṛja imam tava eva san sarva hāyāḥ iha astu

original: (AVŚ_8,2.7c) bhavāśarvau mṛḍataṃ śarma yachatam apasidhya duritaṃ dhattam āyuḥ //7//
analyzed: bhavāśarvau mṛḍatam śarma yacchatam apasidhya duritam dhattam āyuḥ

original: (AVŚ_8,2.8a) asmai mṛtyo adhi brūhīmaṃ dayasvod ito 'yam etu /
analyzed: asmai mṛtyo adhi brūhi imam dayasva ud itas yam etu

original: (AVŚ_8,2.8c) ariṣṭaḥ sarvāṅgaḥ suśruj jarasā śatahāyana ātmanā bhujam aśnutām //8//
analyzed: ariṣṭaḥ sarva aṅgaḥ su śrut jarasā śata hāyanaḥ ātmanā bhujam aśnutām

original: (AVŚ_8,2.9a) devānāṃ hetiḥ pari tvā vṛṇaktu pārayāmi tvā rajasa ut tvā mṛtyor apīparam /
analyzed: devānām hetiḥ pari tvā vṛṇaktu pārayāmi tvā rajasaḥ ud tvā mṛtyoḥ apīparam

original: (AVŚ_8,2.9c) ārād agniṃ kravyādaṃ nirūhaṃ jīvātave te paridhiṃ dadhāmi //9//
analyzed: ārāt agnim kravya adam nirūham jīvātave te paridhim dadhāmi

original: (AVŚ_8,2.10a) yat te niyānaṃ rajasaṃ mṛtyo anavadharṣyam /
analyzed: yat te niyānam rajasam mṛtyo anavadharṣyam

original: (AVŚ_8,2.10c) patha imaṃ tasmād rakṣanto brahmāsmai varma kṛṇmasi //10// {3}
analyzed: pathaḥ imam tasmāt rakṣantaḥ brahma asmai varma kṛṇmasi

original: (AVŚ_8,2.11a) kṛṇomi te prāṇāpānau jarāṃ mṛtyuṃ dīrgham āyuḥ svasti /
analyzed: kṛṇomi te prāṇa apānau jarām mṛtyum dīrgham āyuḥ svasti

original: (AVŚ_8,2.11c) vaivasvatena prahitān yamadūtāṃś carato 'pa sedhāmi sarvān //11//
analyzed: vaivasvatena prahitān yama dūtān carataḥ u sedhāmi sarvān

original: (AVŚ_8,2.12a) ārād arātiṃ nirṛtiṃ paro grāhiṃ kravyādaḥ piśācān /
analyzed: ārāt arātim nirṛtim paras grāhim kravya adaḥ piśācān

original: (AVŚ_8,2.12c) rakṣo yat sarvaṃ durbhūtaṃ tat tama ivāpa hanmasi //12//
analyzed: rakṣaḥ yat sarvam durbhūtam tat tamaḥ iva apa hanmasi

original: (AVŚ_8,2.13a) agneṣ ṭa prānam amṛtād āyuṣmato vanve jātavedasaḥ /
analyzed: agneḥ te prānam amṛtāt āyuṣmataḥ vanve jātavedasaḥ

original: (AVŚ_8,2.13c) yathā na riṣyā amṛtaḥ sajūr asas tat te kṛṇomi tad u te sam ṛdhyatām //13//
analyzed: yathā na riṣyāḥ amṛtaḥ sajūs asaḥ tat te kṛṇomi tat u te sam ṛdhyatām

original: (AVŚ_8,2.14a) śive te stāṃ dyāvāpṛthivī asaṃtāpe abhiśriyau /
analyzed: śive te stām dyāvāpṛthivī a saṃtāpe abhiśriyau

original: (AVŚ_8,2.14c) śaṃ te sūrya ā tapatu śaṃ vāto vātu te hṛde /
analyzed: śam te sūryaḥ ā tapatu śam vātaḥ vātu te hṛde

original: (AVŚ_8,2.14e) śivā abhi kṣarantu tvāpo divyāḥ payasvatīḥ //14//
analyzed: śivāḥ abhi kṣarantu tvā apaḥ divyāḥ payasvatīḥ

original: (AVŚ_8,2.15a) śivās te santv oṣadhaya ut tvāhārṣam adharasyā uttarāṃ pṛthivīm abhi /
analyzed: śivāḥ te santu oṣadhayaḥ ud tvā ahārṣam adharasyāḥ uttarām pṛthivīm abhi

original: (AVŚ_8,2.15c) tatra tvādityau rakṣatāṃ sūryācandramasāv ubhā //15//
analyzed: tatra tu ādityau rakṣatām sūryācandramasau ubhā

original: (AVŚ_8,2.16a) yat te vāsaḥ paridhānaṃ yāṃ nīviṃ kṛṇuṣe tvam /
analyzed: yat te vāsaḥ paridhānam yām nīvim kṛṇuṣe tvam

original: (AVŚ_8,2.16c) śivaṃ te tanve tat kṛṇmaḥ saṃsparśe 'drūkṣṇam astu te //16//
analyzed: śivam te tanve tat kṛṇmaḥ saṃsparśe drūkṣṇam astu te

original: (AVŚ_8,2.17a) yat kṣureṇa marcayatā sutejasā vaptā vapasi keśaśmaśru /
analyzed: yat kṣureṇa marcayatā su tejasā vaptā vapasi keśa śmaśru

original: (AVŚ_8,2.17c) śubhaṃ mukhaṃ mā na āyuḥ pra moṣīḥ //17//
analyzed: śubham mukham mā naḥ āyuḥ pra moṣīḥ

original: (AVŚ_8,2.18a) śivau te stāṃ vrīhiyavāv abalāsāv adomadhau /
analyzed: śivau te stām vrīhi yavau a balāsau adomadhau

original: (AVŚ_8,2.18c) etau yakṣmaṃ vi bādhete etau muñcato aṃhasaḥ //18//
analyzed: etau yakṣmam vi bādhete etau muñcataḥ aṃhasaḥ

original: (AVŚ_8,2.19a) yad aśnāsi yat pibasi dhānyaṃ kṛṣyāḥ payaḥ /
analyzed: yat aśnāsi yat pibasi dhānyam kṛṣyāḥ payaḥ

original: (AVŚ_8,2.19c) yad ādyaṃ yad anādyaṃ sarvaṃ te annam aviṣaṃ kṛṇomi //19//
analyzed: yat ādyam yat anādyam sarvam te annam aviṣam kṛṇomi

original: (AVŚ_8,2.20a) ahne ca tvā rātraye cobhābhyāṃ pari dadmasi /
analyzed: ahne ca tvā rātraye ca ubhābhyām pari dadmasi

original: (AVŚ_8,2.20c) arāyebhyo jighatsubhya imaṃ me pari rakṣata //20// {4}
analyzed: arāyebhyaḥ jighatsubhyaḥ imam me pari rakṣata

original: (AVŚ_8,2.21a) śataṃ te 'yutaṃ hāyanān dve yuge trīṇi catvāri kṛṇmaḥ /
analyzed: śatam te yutam hāyanān dve yuge trīṇi catvāri kṛṇmaḥ

original: (AVŚ_8,2.21c) indrāgnī viśve devās te 'nu manyantām ahṛṇīyamānāḥ //21//
analyzed: indra agnī viśve devāḥ te nu manyantām a hṛṇīyamānāḥ

original: (AVŚ_8,2.22a) śarade tvā hemantāya vasantāya grīṣmāya pari dadmasi /
analyzed: śarade tvā hemantāya vasantāya grīṣmāya pari dadmasi

original: (AVŚ_8,2.22c) varṣāṇi tubhyaṃ syonāni yeṣu vardhanta oṣadhīḥ //22//
analyzed: varṣāṇi tubhyam syonāni yeṣu vardhante oṣadhīḥ

original: (AVŚ_8,2.23a) mṛtyur īśe dvipadāṃ mṛtyur īśe catuṣpadām /
analyzed: mṛtyuḥ īśe dvipadām mṛtyuḥ īśe catuṣpadām

original: (AVŚ_8,2.23c) tasmāt tvāṃ mṛtyor gopater ud bharāmi sa mā bibheḥ //23//
analyzed: tasmāt tvām mṛtyoḥ go pateḥ ud bharāmi sa mā bibheḥ

original: (AVŚ_8,2.24a) so 'riṣṭa na mariṣyasi na mariṣyasi mā bibheḥ /
analyzed: saḥ riṣṭa na mariṣyasi na mariṣyasi mā bibheḥ

original: (AVŚ_8,2.24c) na vai tatra mriyante no yanti adhamaṃ tamaḥ //24//
analyzed: na vai tatra mriyante na u yanti adhamam tamaḥ

original: (AVŚ_8,2.25a) sarvo vai tatra jīvati gaur aśvaḥ puruṣaḥ paśuḥ /
analyzed: sarvaḥ vai tatra jīvati gauḥ aśvaḥ puruṣaḥ paśuḥ

original: (AVŚ_8,2.25c) yatredaṃ brahma kriyate paridhir jīvanāya kam //25//
analyzed: yatra idam brahma kriyate paridhiḥ jīvanāya kam

original: (AVŚ_8,2.26a) pari tvā pātu samānebhyo 'bhicārāt sabandhubhyaḥ /
analyzed: pari tvā pātu samānebhyaḥ bhicārāt sabandhubhyaḥ

original: (AVŚ_8,2.26c) amamrir bhavāmṛto 'tijīvo mā te hāsiṣur asavaḥ śarīram //26//
analyzed: amamriḥ bhava amṛtaḥ tijīvaḥ mā te hāsiṣuḥ asavaḥ śarīram

original: (AVŚ_8,2.27a) ye mṛtyava ekaśataṃ yā nāṣṭrā atitāryāḥ /
analyzed: ye mṛtyavaḥ eka śatam yāḥ nāṣṭrāḥ atitāryāḥ

original: (AVŚ_8,2.27c) muñcantu tasmāt tvāṃ devā agner vaiśvānarād adhi //27//
analyzed: muñcantu tasmāt tvām devāḥ agneḥ vaiśvānarāt adhi

original: (AVŚ_8,2.28a) agneḥ śarīram asi pārayiṣṇu rakṣohāsi sapatnahā /
analyzed: agneḥ śarīram asi pārayiṣṇu rakṣaḥ hā asi sapatna hā

original: (AVŚ_8,2.28c) atho amīvacātanaḥ pūtudrur nāma bheṣajam //28// {5}
analyzed: atha u amīva cātanaḥ pūtudruḥ nāma bheṣajam

original: (AVŚ_8,3.1a) rakṣohaṇaṃ vājinam ā jigharmi mitraṃ prathiṣṭham upa yāmi śarma /
analyzed: rakṣaḥ haṇam vājinam ā jigharmi mitram prathiṣṭham upa yāmi śarma

original: (AVŚ_8,3.1c) śiśāno agniḥ kratubhiḥ samiddhaḥ sa no divā sa riṣaḥ pātu naktam //1//
analyzed: śiśānaḥ agniḥ kratubhiḥ samiddhaḥ sa naḥ divā sa riṣaḥ pātu naktam

original: (AVŚ_8,3.2a) ayodaṃṣṭro arciṣā yātudhānān upa spṛśa jātavedaḥ samiddhaḥ /
analyzed: ayaḥ daṃṣṭraḥ arciṣā yātudhānān upa spṛśa jātavedaḥ samiddhaḥ

original: (AVŚ_8,3.2c) ā jihvayā mūradevān rabhasva kravyādo vṛṣṭvāpi dhatsvāsan //2//
analyzed: ā jihvayā mūradevān rabhasva kravyādaḥ vṛṣṭvā api dhatsva āsan

original: (AVŚ_8,3.3a) ubhobhayāvinn upa dhehi daṃṣṭrau hiṃsraḥ śiśāno 'varaṃ paraṃ ca /
analyzed: ubhā ubhayāvin upa dhehi daṃṣṭrau hiṃsraḥ śiśānaḥ varam param ca

original: (AVŚ_8,3.3c) utāntarikṣe pari yāhy agne jambhaiḥ saṃ dhehy abhi yātudhānān //3//
analyzed: uta antarikṣe pari yāhi agne jambhaiḥ sam dhehi abhi yātudhānān

original: (AVŚ_8,3.4a) agne tvacaṃ yātudhānasya bhindhi hiṃsrāśanir harasā hantv enam /
analyzed: agne tvacam yātudhānasya bhindhi hiṃsra aśaniḥ harasā hantu enam

original: (AVŚ_8,3.4c) pra parvāṇi jātavedaḥ śṛṇīhi kravyāt kraviṣṇur vi cinotv enam //4//
analyzed: pra parvāṇi jātavedaḥ śṛṇīhi kravyād kraviṣṇuḥ vi cinotu enam

original: (AVŚ_8,3.5a) yatredānīṃ paśyasi jātavedas tiṣṭhantam agna uta vā carantam /
analyzed: yatra idānīm paśyasi jātavedaḥ tiṣṭhantam agne uta vā carantam

original: (AVŚ_8,3.5c) utāntarikṣe patantaṃ yātudhānaṃ tam astā vidhya śarvā śiśānaḥ //5//
analyzed: uta antarikṣe patantam yātudhānam tam astā vidhya śarvā śiśānaḥ

original: (AVŚ_8,3.6a) yajñair iṣūḥ saṃnamamāno agne ivācā śalyāṃ aśanibhir dihānaḥ /
analyzed: yajñaiḥ iṣūḥ saṃnamamānaḥ agne iva acā śalyām aśanibhiḥ dihānaḥ

original: (AVŚ_8,3.6c) tābhir vidhya hṛdaye yātudhānān pratīco bāhūn prati bhaṅgdhy eṣām //6//
analyzed: tābhiḥ vidhya hṛdaye yātudhānān pratīcaḥ bāhūn prati bhaṅgdhi eṣām

original: (AVŚ_8,3.7a) utārabdhānt spṛnuhi jātaveda utārebhāṇāṃ ṛṣṭibhir yātudhānān /
analyzed: uta ārabdhān spṛnuhi jātavedaḥ ṛṣṭibhiḥ yātudhānān

original: (AVŚ_8,3.7c) agne pūrvo ni jahi śośucāna āmādaḥ kṣviṅkās tam adantv enīḥ //7//
analyzed: agne pūrvaḥ ni jahi śośucānaḥ āmādaḥ kṣviṅkāḥ tam adantu enīḥ

original: (AVŚ_8,3.8a) iha pra brūhi yatamaḥ so agne yātudhāno ya idaṃ kṛṇoti /
analyzed: iha pra brūhi yatamaḥ saḥ agne yātudhānaḥ yaḥ idam kṛṇoti

original: (AVŚ_8,3.8c) tam ā rabhasva samidhā yaviṣṭha nṛcakṣasaś cakṣuṣe randhayainam //8//
analyzed: tam ā rabhasva samidhā yaviṣṭha nṛ cakṣasaḥ cakṣuṣe randhaya enam

original: (AVŚ_8,3.9a) tīkṣṇenāgne cakṣuṣā rakṣa yajñaṃ prāñcaṃ vasubhyaḥ pra ṇaya pracetaḥ /
analyzed: tīkṣṇena agne cakṣuṣā rakṣa yajñam prāñcam vasubhyaḥ pra naya pracetaḥ

original: (AVŚ_8,3.9c) hiṃsraṃ rakṣāṃsy abhi śośucānaṃ mā tvā dabhan yātudhānā nṛcakṣaḥ //9//
analyzed: hiṃsram rakṣāṃsi abhi śośucānam mā tvā dabhan yātudhānāḥ nṛ cakṣaḥ

original: (AVŚ_8,3.10a) nṛcakṣā rakṣaḥ pari paśya vikṣu tasya trīṇi prati śṛṇīhy agrā /
analyzed: nṛ cakṣāḥ rakṣaḥ pari paśya vikṣu tasya trīṇi prati śṛṇīhi agrā

original: (AVŚ_8,3.10c) tasyāgne pṛṣṭīr harasā śṛṇīhi tredhā mūlaṃ yātudhānasya vṛśca //10// {6}
analyzed: tasya agne pṛṣṭīḥ harasā śṛṇīhi tredhā mūlam yātudhānasya vṛśca

original: (AVŚ_8,3.11a) trir yātudhānaḥ prasitiṃ ta etv ṛtaṃ yo agne anṛtena hanti /
analyzed: tris yātudhānaḥ prasitim te etu ṛtam yaḥ agne anṛtena hanti

original: (AVŚ_8,3.11c) tam arciṣā sphūrjayan jātavedaḥ samakṣam enam gṛṇate ni yuṅgdhi //11//
analyzed: tam arciṣā sphūrjayan jātavedaḥ samakṣam enam gṛṇate ni yuṅgdhi

original: (AVŚ_8,3.12a) yad agne adya mithunā śapāto yad vācas tṛṣṭaṃ janayanta rebhāḥ /
analyzed: yat agne adya mithunā śapātaḥ yat vācaḥ tṛṣṭam janayanta rebhāḥ

original: (AVŚ_8,3.12c) manyor manasaḥ śaravyā jāyate yā tayā vidhya hṛdaye yātudhānān //12//
analyzed: manyoḥ manasaḥ śaravyā jāyate yā tayā vidhya hṛdaye yātudhānān

original: (AVŚ_8,3.13a) parā śṛṇīhi tapasā yātudhānān parāgne rakṣo harasā śṛṇīhi /
analyzed: parā śṛṇīhi tapasā yātudhānān parā agne rakṣaḥ harasā śṛṇīhi

original: (AVŚ_8,3.13c) parārciṣā mūradevān chṛṇīhi parāsutṛpaḥ śośucataḥ śṛṇīhi //13//
analyzed: parā arciṣā mūradevān śṛṇīhi parā asutṛpaḥ śośucataḥ śṛṇīhi

original: (AVŚ_8,3.14a) parādya devā vṛjinaṃ śṛṇantu pratyag enaṃ śapathā yantu sṛṣṭāḥ /
analyzed: parā adya devāḥ vṛjinam śṛṇantu pratyak enam śapathāḥ yantu sṛṣṭāḥ

original: (AVŚ_8,3.14c) vācāstenaṃ śarava ṛchantu marman viśvasyaitu prasitiṃ yātudhānaḥ //14//

original: (AVŚ_8,3.15a) yaḥ pauruṣeyeṇa kraviṣā samaṅkte yo aśvyena paśunā yātudhānaḥ /
analyzed: yaḥ pauruṣeyeṇa kraviṣā samaṅkte yaḥ aśvyena paśunā yātudhānaḥ

original: (AVŚ_8,3.15c) yo aghnyāyā bharati kṣīram agne teṣāṃ śīrṣāṇi harasāpi vṛśca //15//
analyzed: yaḥ aghnyāyāḥ bharati kṣīram agne teṣām śīrṣāṇi harasā api vṛśca

original: (AVŚ_8,3.16a) viṣaṃ gavāṃ yātudhānā bharantām ā vṛścantām aditaye durevāḥ /

original: (AVŚ_8,3.16c) paraiṇān devaḥ savitā dadātu parā bhāgam oṣadhīnāṃ jayantām //16//

original: (AVŚ_8,3.17a) saṃvatsarīṇaṃ paya usriyāyās tasya māśīd yātudhāno nṛcakṣaḥ /
analyzed: saṃvatsarīṇam payaḥ usriyāyāḥ tasya mā aśīt yātudhānaḥ nṛ cakṣaḥ

original: (AVŚ_8,3.17c) pīyūṣam agne yatamas titṛpsāt taṃ pratyañcam arciṣā vidhya marmaṇi //17//

original: (AVŚ_8,3.18a) sanād agne mṛṇasi yātudhānān na tvā rakṣāṃsi pṛtanāsu jigyuḥ /
analyzed: sanāt agne mṛṇasi yātudhānān na tvā rakṣāṃsi pṛtanāsu jigyuḥ

original: (AVŚ_8,3.18c) sahamūrān anu daha kravyādo mā te hetyā mukṣata daivyāyāḥ //18//
analyzed: sahamūrān anu daha kravyādaḥ mā te hetyāḥ mukṣata daivyāyāḥ

original: (AVŚ_8,3.19a) tvaṃ no agne adharād udaktas tvaṃ paścād uta rakṣā purastāt /
analyzed: tvam naḥ agne adharāt udaktas tvam paścāt uta rakṣa purastāt

analyzed: prati tye te ajarāsaḥ tapiṣṭhāḥ agha śaṃsam śośucataḥ dahantu

analyzed: paścāt purastāt adharāt uta uttarāt kaviḥ kāvyena pari pāhi agne

original: (AVŚ_8,3.20c) sakhā sakhāyam ajaro jarimne agne martāṃ amartyas tvaṃ naḥ //20// {7}
analyzed: sakhā sakhāyam ajaraḥ jarimne agne martām amartyaḥ tvam naḥ  /

original: (AVŚ_8,3.21a) tad agne cakṣuḥ prati dhehi rebhe śaphārujo yena paśyasi yātudhānān /
analyzed: tat agne cakṣuḥ prati dhehi rebhe śaphārujaḥ yena paśyasi yātudhānān

original: (AVŚ_8,3.21c) atharvavaj jyotiṣā daivyena satyaṃ dhūrvantam acitaṃ nyoṣa //21//
analyzed: atharva vat jyotiṣā daivyena satyam dhūrvantam acitam nyoṣa

original: (AVŚ_8,3.22a) pari tvāgne puraṃ vayaṃ vipraṃ sahasya dhīmahi /
analyzed: pari tvā agne puram vayam vipram sahasya dhīmahi

original: (AVŚ_8,3.22c) dhṛṣadvarṇaṃ divedive hantāraṃ bhaṅgurāvataḥ //22//
analyzed: dhṛṣat varṇam dive dive hantāram bhaṅgurāvataḥ

original: (AVŚ_8,3.23a) viṣeṇa bhaṅgurāvataḥ prati sma rakṣaso jahi /
analyzed: viṣeṇa bhaṅgurāvataḥ prati sma rakṣasaḥ jahi

original: (AVŚ_8,3.23c) agne tigmena śociṣā tapuragrābhir arcibhiḥ //23//
analyzed: agne tigmena śociṣā tapuḥ agrābhiḥ arcibhiḥ

original: (AVŚ_8,3.24a) vi jyotiṣā bṛhatā bhāty agnir āvir viśvāni kṛṇute mahitvā /

analyzed: ye te śṛṅge ajare jātavedaḥ tigma hetī brahma saṃśite

original: (AVŚ_8,3.25c) tābhyāṃ durhārdam abhidāsantaṃ kimīdinaṃ /
analyzed: tābhyām durhārdam abhidāsantam kimīdinam

original: (AVŚ_8,3.25e) pratyañcam arciṣā jātavedo vi nikṣva //25//
analyzed: pratyañcam arciṣā jātavedaḥ vi nikṣva

original: (AVŚ_8,3.26a) agnī rakṣāṃsi sedhati śukraśocir amartyaḥ /
analyzed: agniḥ rakṣāṃsi sedhati śukra śociḥ amartyaḥ

original: (AVŚ_8,3.26c) śuciḥ pāvaka īḍyaḥ //26// {8}
analyzed: śuciḥ pāvakaḥ īḍyaḥ

original: (AVŚ_8,4.1a) indrāsomā tapataṃ rakṣa ubjataṃ ny arpayataṃ vṛṣaṇā tamovṛdhaḥ /
analyzed: indrāsomā tapatam rakṣaḥ ubjatam ni arpayatam vṛṣaṇā tamaḥ vṛdhaḥ

original: (AVŚ_8,4.1c) parā śṛṇītam acito ny oṣataṃ hataṃ nudethāṃ ni śiśītam attriṇaḥ //1//
analyzed: parā śṛṇītam acitaḥ ni oṣatam hatam nudethām ni śiśītam attriṇaḥ

original: (AVŚ_8,4.2a) indrāsomā sam aghaśaṃsam abhy aghaṃ tapur yayastu carur agnimāṃ iva /
analyzed: indrāsomā sam agha śaṃsam abhī agham tapuḥ yayastu caruḥ agni mān iva

original: (AVŚ_8,4.2c) brahmadviṣe kravyāde ghoracakṣase dveṣo dhattam anavāyaṃ kimīdine //2//
analyzed: brahma dviṣe kravya ade ghora cakṣase dveṣaḥ dhattam anavāyam kimīdine

original: (AVŚ_8,4.3a) indrāsomā duṣkṛto vavre antar anārambhaṇe tamasi pra vidhyatam /
analyzed: indrāsomā duṣkṛtaḥ vavre antar an ārambhaṇe tamasi pra vidhyatam

original: (AVŚ_8,4.3c) yato naiṣāṃ punar ekaś canodayat tad vām astu sahase manyumac chavaḥ //3//
analyzed: yatas na eṣām punar ekaḥ cana udayat tat vām astu sahase manyumat śavaḥ

original: (AVŚ_8,4.4a) indrāsomā vartayataṃ divo vadhaṃ saṃ pṛthivyā aghaśaṃsāya tarhaṇam /
analyzed: indrāsomā vartayatam divaḥ vadham sam pṛthivyāḥ agha śaṃsāya tarhaṇam

original: (AVŚ_8,4.4c) ut takṣataṃ svaryaṃ1 parvatebhyo yena rakṣo vāvṛdhānaṃ nijūrvathaḥ //4//
analyzed: ud takṣatam svaryam parvatebhyaḥ yena rakṣaḥ vāvṛdhānam nijūrvathaḥ

original: (AVŚ_8,4.5a) indrāsomā vartayataṃ divas pary agnitaptebhir yuvam aśmahanmabhiḥ /
analyzed: indrāsomā vartayatam divaḥ pari agni taptebhiḥ yuvam aśma hanmabhiḥ

original: (AVŚ_8,4.5c) tapurvadhebhir ajarebhir attriṇo ni parśāne vidhyataṃ yantu nisvaram //5//
analyzed: tapuḥ vadhebhiḥ ajarebhiḥ attriṇaḥ ni parśāne vidhyatam yantu nisvaram

original: (AVŚ_8,4.6a) indrāsomā pari vāṃ bhūtu viśvata iyaṃ matiḥ kakṣyāśveva vājinā /
analyzed: indrāsomā pari vām bhūtu viśvatas iyam matiḥ kakṣyā aśvā iva vājinā

original: (AVŚ_8,4.6c) yāṃ vāṃ hotrāṃ parihinomi medhayemā brahmāṇi nṛpatī iva jinvatam //6//
analyzed: yām vām hotrām parihinomi medhayā imā brahmāṇi nṛpatī iva jinvatam

original: (AVŚ_8,4.7a) prati smarethāṃ tujayadbhir evair hataṃ druho rakṣaso bhaṅgurāvataḥ /
analyzed: prati smarethām tujayadbhiḥ evaiḥ hatam druhaḥ rakṣasaḥ bhaṅgurāvataḥ

original: (AVŚ_8,4.7c) indrāsomā duṣkṛte mā sugaṃ bhūd yo mā kadā cid abhidāsati druhuḥ //7//
