original: (AVŚ_8,4.8a) yo mā pākena manasā carantam abhicaṣṭe anṛtebhir vacobhiḥ /
analyzed: yaḥ mā pākena manasā carantam abhicaṣṭe anṛtebhiḥ vacobhiḥ

original: (AVŚ_8,4.8c) āpa iva kāśinā samgṛbhītā asann astv asataḥ indra vaktā //8//
analyzed: āpaḥ iva kāśinā samgṛbhītāḥ asan astu asataḥ indra vaktā

original: (AVŚ_8,4.9a) ye pākaśaṃsaṃ viharanta evair ye vā bhadraṃ dūṣayanti svadhābhiḥ /
analyzed: ye pāka śaṃsam viharante evaiḥ ye vā bhadram dūṣayanti svadhābhiḥ

original: (AVŚ_8,4.9c) ahaye vā tān pradadātu soma ā vā dadhātu nirṛter upaṣṭhe //9//
analyzed: ahaye vā tān pradadātu somaḥ ā vā dadhātu nirṛteḥ upaṣṭhe

original: (AVŚ_8,4.10a) yo no rasaṃ dipsati pitvo agne aśvānāṃ gavāṃ yas tanūnām /
analyzed: yaḥ naḥ rasam dipsati pitvaḥ agne aśvānām gavām yaḥ tanūnām

original: (AVŚ_8,4.10c) ripu stena steyakṛd dabhram etu ni ṣa hīyatāṃ tanvā tanā ca //10// {9}
analyzed: ripuḥ stenaḥ steya kṛt dabhram etu ni sa hīyatām tanvā tanā ca

original: (AVŚ_8,4.11a) paraḥ so astu tanvā tanā ca tisraḥ pṛthivīr adho astu viśvāḥ /
analyzed: paras saḥ astu tanvā tanā ca tisraḥ pṛthivīḥ adhas astu viśvāḥ

original: (AVŚ_8,4.11c) prati śuṣyatu yaśo asya devā yo mā divā dipsati yaś ca naktam //11//
analyzed: prati śuṣyatu yaśaḥ asya devāḥ yaḥ mā divā dipsati yaḥ ca naktam

original: (AVŚ_8,4.12a) suvijñānaṃ cikituṣe janāya sac cāsac ca vacasī paspṛdhāte /
analyzed: su vijñānam cikituṣe janāya sat ca asat ca vacasī paspṛdhāte

original: (AVŚ_8,4.12c) tasyor yat satyaṃ yatarad ṛjīyas tad it somo 'vati hanty asat //12//
analyzed: tasyoḥ yat satyam yatarad ṛjīyaḥ tat id somaḥ vati hanti asat

original: (AVŚ_8,4.13a) na vā u somo vṛjinaṃ hinoti na kṣatriyam mithuyā dhārayantam /
analyzed: na vai u somaḥ vṛjinam hinoti na kṣatriyam mithuyā dhārayantam

original: (AVŚ_8,4.13c) hanti rakṣo hanty āsad vadantam ubhāv indrasya prasitau śayāte //13//
analyzed: hanti rakṣaḥ hanti asat vadantam ubhau indrasya prasitau śayāte

original: (AVŚ_8,4.14a) yadi vāham anṛtadevo asmi moghaṃ vā devāṃ apyūhe agne /
analyzed: yadi vā aham anṛta devaḥ asmi mogham vā devān api ūhe agne

original: (AVŚ_8,4.14c) kim asmabhyaṃ jātavedo hṛṇīṣe droghavācas te nirṛthaṃ sacantām //14//
analyzed: kim asmabhyam jātavedaḥ hṛṇīṣe drogha vācaḥ te nirṛtham sacantām

original: (AVŚ_8,4.15a) adyā murīya yadi yātudhāno asmi yadi vāyus tatapa puruṣasya /
analyzed: adya murīya yadi yātudhānaḥ asmi yadi vā āyuḥ tatapa puruṣasya

original: (AVŚ_8,4.15c) adhā sa vīrair daśabhir vi yūyā yo mā moghaṃ yātudhānety āha //15//
analyzed: adhā sa vīraiḥ daśabhiḥ vi yūyāḥ yaḥ mā mogham yātudhāna iti āha

original: (AVŚ_8,4.16a) yo māyātuṃ yātudhānety āha yo vā rakṣāḥ śicir asmīty āha /
analyzed: yaḥ mā a yātum yātudhāna iti āha yaḥ vā rakṣāḥ śiciḥ asmi iti āha

original: (AVŚ_8,4.16c) indras taṃ hantu mahatā vadhena viśvasya jantor adhamas padīṣṭa //16//
analyzed: indraḥ tam hantu mahatā vadhena viśvasya jantoḥ adhamaḥ padīṣṭa

original: (AVŚ_8,4.17a) pra yā jigāti khargaleva naktam apa druhus tanvaṃ1 gūhamānā /
analyzed: pra yā jigāti khargalā iva naktam apa druhuḥ tanvam gūhamānā

original: (AVŚ_8,4.17c) vavram anantam ava sā padīṣṭia grāvāṇo ghnantu rakṣasa upabdaiḥ //17//
analyzed: vavram anantam ava sā grāvāṇaḥ ghnantu rakṣasaḥ upabdaiḥ

original: (AVŚ_8,4.18a) vi tiṣṭhadhvam maruto vikṣv ichata gṛbhāyata rakṣasaḥ saṃ pinaṣṭan /
analyzed: vi tiṣṭhadhvam marutaḥ vikṣu ichata gṛbhāyata rakṣasaḥ sam pinaṣṭan

original: (AVŚ_8,4.18c) vayo ye bhūtvā patayanti naktabhir ye vā ripo dadhire deve adhvare //18//
analyzed: vayaḥ ye bhūtvā patayanti naktabhiḥ ye vā ripaḥ dadhire deve adhvare

original: (AVŚ_8,4.19a) pra vartaya divo 'śmānam indra somaśitaṃ maghavant saṃ śiśādhi /
analyzed: pra vartaya divaḥ śmānam indra soma śitam maghavan sam śiśādhi

original: (AVŚ_8,4.19c) prākto apākto adharād udakto 'bhi jahi rakṣasaḥ parvatena //19//
analyzed: prāktas apāktas adharāt udaktas bhi jahi rakṣasaḥ parvatena

original: (AVŚ_8,4.20a) eta u tye patayanti śvayātava indraṃ dipsanti dipsavo 'dābhyam /
analyzed: ete u tye patayanti śvayātavaḥ indram dipsanti dipsavaḥ dābhyam

original: (AVŚ_8,4.20c) śiśīte śakraḥ piśunebhyo vadhaṃ nunaṃ sṛjad aśaniṃ yātumadbhyaḥ //20// {10}
analyzed: śiśīte śakraḥ piśunebhyaḥ vadham nunam sṛjat aśanim yātumadbhyaḥ

original: (AVŚ_8,4.21a) indro yātūnām abhavat parāśaro havirmathīnām abhy āvivāsatām /
analyzed: indraḥ yātūnām abhavat parāśaraḥ havirmathīnām abhi āvivāsatām

original: (AVŚ_8,4.21c) abhīd u śakraḥ paraśur yathā vanaṃ pātreva bhindant sata etu rakṣasaḥ //21//
analyzed: abhi id u śakraḥ paraśuḥ yathā vanam pātrā iva bhindan satas etu rakṣasaḥ

original: (AVŚ_8,4.22a) ulūkayātuṃ śuśulūkayātuṃ jahi śvayātum uta kokayātum /
analyzed: ulūka yātum śuśulūka yātum jahi śva yātum uta koka yātum

original: (AVŚ_8,4.22c) suparṇayātum uta gṛdhrayātuṃ dṛṣadeva pra mṛṇa rakṣa indra //22//
analyzed: suparṇa yātum uta gṛdhra yātum dṛṣadā iva pra mṛṇa rakṣaḥ indra

original: (AVŚ_8,4.23a) mā no rakṣo abhi naḍ yātumāvad apochantu mithunā ye kimīdinaḥ /
analyzed: mā naḥ rakṣaḥ abhi naṭ yātumāvat apochantu mithunā ye kimīdinaḥ

original: (AVŚ_8,4.23c) pṛthivī naḥ pārthivāt pātv aṃhaso 'ntarikṣaṃ divyāt pātv asmān //23//
analyzed: pṛthivī naḥ pārthivāt pātu aṃhasaḥ ntarikṣam divyāt pātu asmān

original: (AVŚ_8,4.24a) indra jahi pumāṃsaṃ yātudhānam uta striyaṃ māyayā śāśadānām /
analyzed: indra jahi pumāṃsam yātudhānam uta striyam māyayā śāśadānām

original: (AVŚ_8,4.24c) vigrīvāso mūradevā ṛdantu mā te dṛśant sūryam uccarantam //24//
analyzed: vigrīvāsaḥ mūradevāḥ ṛdantu mā te dṛśan sūryam uccarantam

original: (AVŚ_8,4.25a) prati cakṣva vi cakṣvendraś ca soma jāgṛtam /
analyzed: prati cakṣva vi cakṣva indraḥ ca soma jāgṛtam

original: (AVŚ_8,4.25c) rakṣobhyo vadham asyatam aśaniṃ yātumadbhyaḥ //25// {11}
analyzed: rakṣobhyaḥ vadham asyatam aśanim yātumadbhyaḥ

original: (AVŚ_8,5.1a) ayaṃ pratisaro maṇir vīro vīrāya badhyate /
analyzed: ayam pratisaraḥ maṇiḥ vīraḥ vīrāya badhyate

original: (AVŚ_8,5.1c) vīryavānt sapatnahā śūravīraḥ paripāṇaḥ sumaṅgalaḥ //1//
analyzed: vīryavān sapatna hā śūra vīraḥ paripāṇaḥ su maṅgalaḥ

original: (AVŚ_8,5.2a) ayaṃ maṇiḥ sapatnahā suvīraḥ sahasvān vājī sahamāna ugraḥ /
analyzed: ayam maṇiḥ sapatna hā su vīraḥ sahasvān vājī sahamānaḥ ugraḥ

original: (AVŚ_8,5.2c) pratyak kṛtyā dūṣayann eti vīraḥ //2//
analyzed: pratyak kṛtyāḥ dūṣayan eti vīraḥ

original: (AVŚ_8,5.3a) anenendro maṇinā vṛtram ahann anenāsurān parābhāvayan manīṣī /
analyzed: anena indraḥ maṇinā vṛtram ahan anena asurān parābhāvayat manīṣī

original: (AVŚ_8,5.3c) anenājayad dyāvāpṛthivī ubhe ime anenājayat pradiśaś catasraḥ //3//
analyzed: anena ajayat dyāvāpṛthivī ubhe ime anena ajayat pradiśaḥ catasraḥ

original: (AVŚ_8,5.4a) ayaṃ srāktyo maṇiḥ pratīvartaḥ pratisaraḥ /
analyzed: ayam srāktyaḥ maṇiḥ pratīvartaḥ pratisaraḥ

original: (AVŚ_8,5.4c) ojasvān vimṛdho vaśī so asmān pātu sarvataḥ //4//
analyzed: ojasvān vimṛdhaḥ vaśī saḥ asmān pātu sarvatas

original: (AVŚ_8,5.5a) tad agnir āha tad u soma āha bṛhaspatiḥ savitā tad indraḥ /
analyzed: tat agniḥ āha tat u somaḥ āha bṛhaspatiḥ savitā tat indraḥ

original: (AVŚ_8,5.5c) te me devāḥ purohitāḥ pratīcīḥ kṛtyāḥ pratisarair ajantu //5//
analyzed: te me devāḥ purohitāḥ pratīcīḥ kṛtyāḥ pratisaraiḥ ajantu

original: (AVŚ_8,5.6a) antar dadhe dyāvāpṛthivī utāhar uta sūryam /
analyzed: antar dadhe dyāvāpṛthivī uta ahar uta sūryam

original: (AVŚ_8,5.6c) te me devāḥ purohitāḥ pratīcīḥ kṛtyāḥ pratisarair ajantu //6//
analyzed: te me devāḥ purohitāḥ pratīcīḥ kṛtyāḥ pratisaraiḥ ajantu

original: (AVŚ_8,5.7a) ye srāktyaṃ maṇiṃ janā varmāṇi kṛṇvate /
analyzed: ye srāktyam maṇim janāḥ varmāṇi kṛṇvate

original: (AVŚ_8,5.7c) sūrya iva divam āruhya vi kṛtyā bādhate vaśī //7//
analyzed: sūryaḥ iva divam āruhya vi kṛtyāḥ bādhate vaśī

original: (AVŚ_8,5.8a) srāktyena maṇinā ṛṣiṇeva manīṣiṇā /
analyzed: srāktyena maṇinā ṛṣiṇā iva manīṣiṇā

original: (AVŚ_8,5.8c) ajaiṣaṃ sarvāḥ pṛtanā vi mṛdho hanmi rakṣasaḥ //8//
analyzed: ajaiṣam sarvāḥ pṛtanāḥ vi mṛdhaḥ hanmi rakṣasaḥ

original: (AVŚ_8,5.9a) yāḥ kṛtyā āṅgirasīr yāḥ kṛtyā āsurīr yāḥ /
analyzed: yāḥ kṛtyāḥ āṅgirasīḥ yāḥ kṛtyāḥ āsurīḥ yāḥ

original: (AVŚ_8,5.9c) kṛtyāḥ svayaṃkṛtā yā u cānyebhir ābhṛtāḥ /
analyzed: kṛtyāḥ svayaṃkṛtāḥ yāḥ u ca anyebhiḥ ābhṛtāḥ

original: (AVŚ_8,5.9e) ubhayīs tāḥ parā yantu parāvato navatiṃ nāvyā ati //9//
analyzed: ubhayīḥ tāḥ parāḥ yantu parāvataḥ navatim nāvyāḥ ati

original: (AVŚ_8,5.10a) asmai maṇiṃ varma badhnantu devā indro viṣṇuḥ savitā rudro agniḥ /
analyzed: asmai maṇim varma badhnantu devāḥ indraḥ viṣṇuḥ savitā rudraḥ agniḥ

original: (AVŚ_8,5.10c) prajāpatiḥ parameṣṭhī virāḍ vaiśvānara ṛṣayaś ca sarve //10// {12}
analyzed: prajāpatiḥ parameṣṭhī virāj vaiśvānaraḥ ṛṣayaḥ ca sarve

original: (AVŚ_8,5.11a) uttamo asy oṣadhīnām anaḍvān jagatām iva vyāghraḥ śvapadām iva /
analyzed: uttamaḥ asi oṣadhīnām anaḍvān jagatām iva vyāghraḥ śvapadām iva

original: (AVŚ_8,5.11ḍ) yam aichāmāvidāma taṃ pratispāśanam antitam //11//
analyzed: yam aichāma avidāma tam pratispāśanam

original: (AVŚ_8,5.12a) sa id vyāghro bhavaty atho siṃho atho vṛṣā /
analyzed: saḥ id vyāghraḥ bhavati atha u siṃhaḥ atha u vṛṣā

original: (AVŚ_8,5.12c) atho sapatnakarśano yo bibhartīmaṃ maṇim //12//
analyzed: atho sapatna karśanaḥ yaḥ bibharti imam maṇim

original: (AVŚ_8,5.13a) nainaṃ ghnanty apsaraso na gandharvā na martyāḥ /
analyzed: na enam ghnanti apsarasaḥ na gandharvāḥ na martyāḥ

original: (AVŚ_8,5.13c) sarvā diśo vi rājati yo bibhartīmaṃ maṇim //13//
analyzed: sarvāḥ diśaḥ vi rājati yaḥ bibharti imam maṇim

original: (AVŚ_8,5.14a) kaśyapas tvām asṛjata kaśyapas tvā sam airayat /
analyzed: kaśyapaḥ tvām asṛjata kaśyapaḥ tvā sam airayat

original: (AVŚ_8,5.14c) abibhas tvendro mānuṣe bibhrat saṃśreṣiṇe 'jayat /
analyzed: abibhar tvā indraḥ mānuṣe bibhrat saṃśreṣiṇe jayat

original: (AVŚ_8,5.14e) maṇiṃ sahasravīryaṃ varma devā akṛṇvata //14//
analyzed: maṇim sahasra vīryam varma devāḥ akṛṇvata

original: (AVŚ_8,5.15a) yas tvā kṛtyābhir yas tvā dīkṣābhir yajñair yas tvā jighāṃsati /
analyzed: yaḥ tvā kṛtyābhiḥ yaḥ tvā dīkṣābhiḥ yajñaiḥ yaḥ tvā jighāṃsati

original: (AVŚ_8,5.15c) pratyak tvam indra taṃ jahi vajreṇa śataparvaṇā //15//
analyzed: pratyak tvam indra tam jahi vajreṇa śata parvaṇā

original: (AVŚ_8,5.16a) ayam id vai pratīvarta ojasvān saṃjayo maṇiḥ /
analyzed: ayam id vai pratīvartaḥ ojasvān saṃjayaḥ maṇiḥ

original: (AVŚ_8,5.16c) prajāṃ dhanaṃ ca rakṣatu paripāṇaḥ sumaṅgalaḥ //16//
analyzed: prajām dhanam ca rakṣatu paripāṇaḥ su maṅgalaḥ

original: (AVŚ_8,5.17a) asapatnaṃ no adharād asapatnaṃ na uttarāt /
analyzed: asapatnam naḥ adharāt asapatnam naḥ uttarāt

original: (AVŚ_8,5.17c) indrāsapatnaṃ naḥ paścāj jyotiḥ śūra puras kṛdhi //17//
analyzed: indra asapatnam naḥ paścāt jyotiḥ śūra puras kṛdhi

original: (AVŚ_8,5.18a) varma me dyāvāpṛthivī varmāhar varma sūryaḥ /
analyzed: varma me dyāvāpṛthivī varma ahar varma sūryaḥ

original: (AVŚ_8,5.18c) varma ma indraś cāgniś ca varma dhātā dadhātu me //18//
analyzed: varma me indraḥ ca agniḥ ca varma dhātā dadhātu me

original: (AVŚ_8,5.19a) aindrāgnaṃ varma bahulaṃ yad ugraṃ viśve devā nātividhyanti sarve /
analyzed: aindrāgnam varma bahulam yat ugram viśve devāḥ na atividhyanti sarve

original: (AVŚ_8,5.19c) tan me tanvaṃ trāyatāṃ sarvato bṛhad āyuṣmāṃ jaradaṣṭir yathāsāni //19//
analyzed: tat me tanvam trāyatām sarvatas bṛhat āyuṣmām jaradaṣṭiḥ yathā asāni

original: (AVŚ_8,5.20a) ā mārukṣad devamaṇir mahyā ariṣṭatātaye /
analyzed: ā mā ārukṣat deva maṇiḥ mahyai ariṣṭatātaye

original: (AVŚ_8,5.20c) imaṃ methim abhisaṃviśadhvaṃ tanūpānaṃ trivarūtham ojase //20//
analyzed: imam methim abhisaṃviśadhvam tanū pānam tri varūtham ojase

original: (AVŚ_8,5.21a) asminn indro ni dadhātu nṛmṇam imaṃ devāso abhisaṃviśadhvam /
analyzed: asmin indraḥ ni dadhātu nṛmṇam imam devāsaḥ abhisaṃviśadhvam

original: (AVŚ_8,5.21c) dīrghāyutvāya śataśāradāyāyuṣmān jaradaṣṭir yathāsat //21//
analyzed: dīrgha āyu tvāya śata śāradāya āyuṣmān jaradaṣṭiḥ yathā asat

original: (AVŚ_8,5.22a) svastidā viśāṃ patir vṛtrahā vimṛdho vaśī /
analyzed: svasti dāḥ viśām patiḥ vṛtra hā vimṛdhaḥ vaśī

original: (AVŚ_8,5.22c) indro badhnātu te maṇiṃ jigīvāṃ aparājitaḥ /
analyzed: indraḥ badhnātu te maṇim jigīvān aparājitaḥ

original: (AVŚ_8,5.22e) somapā abhayaṅkaro vṛṣā /
analyzed: soma pāḥ abhayaṅkaraḥ vṛṣā

original: (AVŚ_8,6.1a) yau te mātonmamārja jātāyāḥ pativedanau /
analyzed: yau te mātā unmamārja jātāyāḥ pati vedanau

original: (AVŚ_8,6.1c) durṇāmā tatra mā gṛdhad aliṃśa uta vatsapaḥ //1//
analyzed: durṇāmā tatra mā gṛdhat aliṃśaḥ uta vatsapaḥ

original: (AVŚ_8,6.2a) palālānupalālau śarkuṃ kokaṃ malimlucaṃ palījakam /
analyzed: palāla anupalālau śarkum kokam malimlucam palījakam

original: (AVŚ_8,6.2c) āśreṣaṃ vavrivāsasam ṛkṣagrīvaṃ pramīlinam //2//
analyzed: āśreṣam vavrivāsasam ṛkṣagrīvam pramīlinam

original: (AVŚ_8,6.3a) mā saṃ vṛto mopa sṛpa ūrū māva sṛpo 'ntarā /
analyzed: mā sam vṛtaḥ mā upa sṛpaḥ ūrū mā ava sṛpaḥ ntarā

original: (AVŚ_8,6.3c) kṛṇomy asyai bheṣajaṃ bajaṃ durṇāmacātanam //3//
analyzed: kṛṇomi asyai bheṣajam bajam durṇāma cātanam

original: (AVŚ_8,6.4a) durṇāmā ca sunāmā cobhā samvṛtam ichataḥ /
analyzed: durṇāmā ca sunāmā ca ubhā samvṛtam ichataḥ

original: (AVŚ_8,6.4c) arāyān apa hanmaḥ sunāmā straiṇam ichatām //4//
analyzed: arāyān apa hanmaḥ sunāmā straiṇam ichatām

original: (AVŚ_8,6.5a) yaḥ kṛṣṇaḥ keśy asura stambaja uta tuṇḍikaḥ /
analyzed: yaḥ kṛṣṇaḥ keśī asuraḥ stamba jaḥ uta tuṇḍikaḥ

original: (AVŚ_8,6.5c) arāyān asyā muṣkābhyāṃ bhaṃsaso 'pa hanmasi //5//
analyzed: arāyān asyāḥ muṣkābhyām bhaṃsasā u hanmasi

original: (AVŚ_8,6.6a) anujighraṃ pramṛśantaṃ kravyādam uta reriham /
analyzed: anujighram pramṛśantam kravyādam uta reriham

original: (AVŚ_8,6.6c) arāyāṃ chvakiṣkiṇo bajaḥ piṅgo anīnaśat //6//
analyzed: arāyām chvakiṣkiṇaḥ bajaḥ piṅgaḥ anīnaśat

original: (AVŚ_8,6.7a) yas tvā svapne nipadyate bhrātā bhūtvā piteva ca /
analyzed: yaḥ tvā svapne nipadyate bhrātā bhūtvā pitā iva ca

original: (AVŚ_8,6.7c) bajas tānt sahatām itaḥ klībarūpāṃs tirīṭinaḥ //7//
analyzed: bajaḥ tān sahatām itas klība rūpān tirīṭinaḥ

original: (AVŚ_8,6.8a) yas tvā svapantīṃ tsarati yas tvā dipsati jāgratīm /
analyzed: yaḥ tvā svapantīm tsarati yaḥ tvā dipsati jāgratīm

original: (AVŚ_8,6.8c) chāyām iva pra tānt sūryaḥ parikrāmann anīnaśat //8//
analyzed: chāyām iva pra tān sūryaḥ parikrāman anīnaśat

original: (AVŚ_8,6.9a) yaḥ kṛṇoti mṛtavatsām avatokām imāṃ striyam /
analyzed: yaḥ kṛṇoti mṛta vatsām avatokām imām striyam

original: (AVŚ_8,6.9c) tam oṣadhe tvaṃ nāśayāsyāḥ kamalam añjivam //9//
analyzed: tam oṣadhe tvam nāśaya asyāḥ kamalam añjivam

original: (AVŚ_8,6.10a) ye śālāḥ parinṛtyanti sāyaṃ gardabhanādinaḥ /
analyzed: ye śālāḥ parinṛtyanti sāyam gardabha nādinaḥ

original: (AVŚ_8,6.10c) kusūlā ye ca kukṣilāḥ kakubhāḥ karumāḥ srimāḥ /
analyzed: kusūlāḥ ye ca kukṣilāḥ kakubhāḥ karumāḥ srimāḥ

original: (AVŚ_8,6.10e) tān oṣadhe tvaṃ gandhena viṣūcīnān vi nāśaya //10// {14}
analyzed: tān oṣadhe tvam gandhena viṣūcīnān vi nāśaya

original: (AVŚ_8,6.11a) ye kukundhāḥ kukirabhāḥ kṛttīr dūrśāni bibhrati /
analyzed: ye kukundhāḥ kukirabhāḥ kṛttīḥ dūrśāni bibhrati

original: (AVŚ_8,6.11c) klībā iva pranṛtyanto vane ye kurvate ghoṣaṃ tān ito nāśayāmasi //11//
analyzed: klībāḥ iva pranṛtyantaḥ vane ye kurvate ghoṣam tān itas nāśayāmasi

original: (AVŚ_8,6.12a) ye sūryaṃ na titikṣanta ātapantam amuṃ divaḥ /
analyzed: ye sūryam na titikṣante ātapantam amum divaḥ

original: (AVŚ_8,6.12c) arāyān bastavāsino durgandhīṃl lohitāsyān makakān nāśayāmasi //12//
analyzed: arāyān basta vāsinaḥ durgandhīn lohita āsyān makakān nāśayāmasi

original: (AVŚ_8,6.13a) ya ātmānam atimātram aṃsa ādhāya bibhrati /
analyzed: ye ātmānam atimātram aṃse ādhāya bibhrati

original: (AVŚ_8,6.13c) strīṇāṃ śroṇipratodina indra rakṣāṃsi nāśaya //13//
analyzed: strīṇām śroṇi pratodinaḥ indra rakṣāṃsi nāśaya

original: (AVŚ_8,6.14a) ye pūrve badhvo yanti haste śṛṅgāni bibhrataḥ /
analyzed: ye pūrve badhvaḥ yanti haste śṛṅgāni bibhrataḥ

original: (AVŚ_8,6.14c) āpākesthāḥ prahāsina stambe ye kurvate jyotis tān ito nāśayāmasi //14//
analyzed: āpākesthāḥ prahāsinaḥ stambe ye kurvate jyotiḥ tān itas nāśayāmasi

original: (AVŚ_8,6.15a) yeṣām paścāt prapadāni puraḥ pārṣṇīḥ puro mukhā /
analyzed: yeṣām paścāt prapadāni puras pārṣṇīḥ puras mukhā

original: (AVŚ_8,6.15c) khalajāḥ śakadhūmajā uruṇḍā ye ca maṭmaṭāḥ kumbhamuṣkā ayāśavaḥ /
analyzed: khala jāḥ śaka dhūma jāḥ uruṇḍāḥ ye ca maṭmaṭāḥ kumbha muṣkāḥ ayāśavaḥ

original: (AVŚ_8,6.15e) tān asyā brahmaṇas pate pratībodhena nāśaya //15//
analyzed: tān asyāḥ brahmaṇas pate pratībodhena nāśaya

original: (AVŚ_8,6.16a) paryastākṣā apracaṅkaśā astraiṇāḥ santu paṇḍagāḥ /
analyzed: paryasta akṣāḥ apracaṅkaśāḥ astraiṇāḥ santu paṇḍagāḥ

original: (AVŚ_8,6.16c) ava bheṣaja pādaya ya imāṃ saṃvivṛtsaty apatiḥ svapatiṃ striyam //16//
analyzed: ava bheṣaja pādaya yaḥ imām saṃvivṛtsati a patiḥ sva patim striyam

original: (AVŚ_8,6.17a) uddharṣiṇaṃ munikeśaṃ jambhayantaṃ marīmṛśam /
analyzed: uddharṣiṇam muni keśam jambhayantam marīmṛśam

original: (AVŚ_8,6.17c) upeṣantam udumbalaṃ tuṇḍelam uta śāluḍam /
analyzed: upeṣantam udumbalam tuṇḍelam uta śāluḍam

original: (AVŚ_8,6.17e) padā pra vidhya pārṣṇyā sthālīṃ gaur iva spandanā //17//
analyzed: padā pra vidhya pārṣṇyā sthālīm gauḥ iva spandanā

original: (AVŚ_8,6.18a) yas te garbhaṃ pratimṛśāj jātaṃ vā mārayāti te /
analyzed: yaḥ te garbham pratimṛśāt jātam vā mārayāti te

original: (AVŚ_8,6.18c) piṅgas tam ugradhanvā kṛṇotu hṛdayāvidham //18//
analyzed: piṅgaḥ tam ugra dhanvā kṛṇotu hṛdayāvidham

original: (AVŚ_8,6.19a) ye amno jatān mārayanti sūtikā anuśerate /
analyzed: ye amnas jatān mārayanti sūtikāḥ anuśerate

original: (AVŚ_8,6.19c) strībhāgān piṅgo gandharvān vāto abhram ivājatu //19//
analyzed: strī bhāgān piṅgaḥ gandharvān vātaḥ abhram iva ajatu

original: (AVŚ_8,6.20a) parisṛṣṭaṃ dharayatu yad dhitaṃ māva pādi tat /
analyzed: parisṛṣṭam dharayatu yat hitam mā ava pādi tat

original: (AVŚ_8,6.20c) garbhaṃ ta ugrau rakṣatām bheṣajau nīvibhāryau //20// {15}
analyzed: garbham te ugrau rakṣatām bheṣajau nīvi bhāryau

original: (AVŚ_8,6.21a) pavīnasāt taṅgalvāc chāyakād uta nagnakāt /
analyzed: pavīnasāt taṅgalvāt chāyakāt uta nagnakāt

original: (AVŚ_8,6.21c) prajāyai patye tvā piṅgaḥ pari pātu kimīdinaḥ //21//
analyzed: prajāyai patye tvā piṅgaḥ pari pātu kimīdinaḥ

original: (AVŚ_8,6.22a) dvyāsyāc caturakṣāt pañcapadād anaṅgureḥ /
analyzed: dvi āsyāt catur akṣāt pañca padāt an aṅgureḥ

original: (AVŚ_8,6.22c) vṛntād abhi prasarpataḥ pari pāhi varīvṛtāt //22//
analyzed: vṛntāt abhi prasarpataḥ pari pāhi varīvṛtāt

original: (AVŚ_8,6.23a) ya āmaṃ māṃsam adanti pauruṣeyaṃ ca ye kraviḥ /
analyzed: ye āmam māṃsam adanti pauruṣeyam ca ye kraviḥ

original: (AVŚ_8,6.23c) garbhān khādanti keśavās tān ito nāśayāmasi //23//
analyzed: garbhān khādanti keśavāḥ tān itas nāśayāmasi

original: (AVŚ_8,6.24a) ye sūryāt parisarpanti snuṣeva śvaśurād adhi /
analyzed: ye sūryāt parisarpanti snuṣā iva śvaśurāt adhi

original: (AVŚ_8,6.24c) bajaś ca teṣāṃ piṅgaś ca hṛdaye 'dhi ni vidhyatām //24//
analyzed: bajaḥ ca teṣām piṅgaḥ ca hṛdaye dhi ni vidhyatām

original: (AVŚ_8,6.25a) piṅga rakṣa jāyamānaṃ mā pumāṃsaṃ striyaṃ kran /
analyzed: piṅga rakṣa jāyamānam mā pumāṃsam striyam kran

original: (AVŚ_8,6.25c) āṇḍādo garbhān mā dabhan bādhasvetaḥ kimīdinaḥ //25//
analyzed: āṇḍa adaḥ garbhān mā dabhan bādhasva itas kimīdinaḥ

original: (AVŚ_8,6.26a) aprajāstvaṃ mārtavatsam ād rodam agham āvayam /
analyzed: aprajāstvam mārtavatsam āt rodam agham āvayam

original: (AVŚ_8,6.26c) vṛkṣād iva srajam kṛtvāpriye prati muñca tat //26// {16}
analyzed: vṛkṣāt iva srajam kṛtvā apriye prati muñca tat

original: (AVŚ_8,7.1a) yā babhravo yāś ca śukrā rohiṇīr uta pṛśnayaḥ /
analyzed: yāḥ babhravaḥ yāḥ ca śukrāḥ rohiṇīḥ uta pṛśnayaḥ

original: (AVŚ_8,7.1c) asiknīḥ kṛṣṇā oṣadhīḥ sarvā achāvadāmasi //1//
analyzed: asiknīḥ kṛṣṇāḥ oṣadhīḥ sarvāḥ achāvadāmasi

original: (AVŚ_8,7.2a) trāyantām imaṃ purusaṃ yakṣmād deveṣitād adhi /
analyzed: trāyantām imam purusam yakṣmāt deva iṣitāt adhi

original: (AVŚ_8,7.2c) yāsām dyauḥ pitā pṛthivī mātā samudro mūlaṃ vīrudhāṃ babhūva //2//
analyzed: yāsām dyauḥ pitā pṛthivī mātā samudraḥ mūlam vīrudhām babhūva

original: (AVŚ_8,7.3a) āpo agraṃ divyā oṣadhayaḥ /
analyzed: āpaḥ agram divyāḥ oṣadhayaḥ

original: (AVŚ_8,7.3c) tās te yakṣmam enasyam aṅgādaṅgād anīnaśan //3//
analyzed: tāḥ te yakṣmam enasyam aṅgāt aṅgāt anīnaśan

original: (AVŚ_8,7.4a) prastṛṇatī stambinīr ekaśuṅgāḥ pratanvatīr oṣadhīr ā vadāmi /
analyzed: prastṛṇatī stambinīḥ eka śuṅgāḥ pratanvatīḥ oṣadhīḥ ā vadāmi

original: (AVŚ_8,7.4c) aṃśumatīḥ kaṇḍinīr yā viśākhā hvayāmi te vīrudho vaiśvadevīr ugrāḥ puruṣajīvanīḥ //4//
analyzed: aṃśumatīḥ kaṇḍinīḥ yāḥ viśākhāḥ hvayāmi te vīrudhaḥ vaiśvadevīḥ ugrāḥ puruṣa jīvanīḥ

original: (AVŚ_8,7.5a) yad vaḥ sahaḥ sahamānā vīryaṃ1 yac ca vo balam /
analyzed: yat vaḥ sahaḥ sahamānāḥ vīryam yat ca vaḥ balam

original: (AVŚ_8,7.5c) tenemam asmād yakṣmāt puruṣaṃ muñcatauṣadhīr atho kṛṇomi bheṣajam //5//
analyzed: tena imam asmāt yakṣmāt puruṣam muñcata auṣadhīḥ atha u kṛṇomi bheṣajam

original: (AVŚ_8,7.6a) jīvalāṃ naghāriṣāṃ jīvantīm oṣadhīm aham /
analyzed: jīvalām naghāriṣām jīvantīm oṣadhīm aham

original: (AVŚ_8,7.6c) arundhatīm unnayantīṃ puṣpām madhumatīm iha huve 'smā ariṣṭatātaye //6//
analyzed: arundhatīm unnayantīm puṣpām madhumatīm iha huve sma ariṣṭatātaye

original: (AVŚ_8,7.7a) ihā yantu pracetaso medinīr vacaso mama /
analyzed: iha ā yantu pracetasaḥ medinīḥ vacasaḥ mama

original: (AVŚ_8,7.7c) yathemaṃ pārayāmasi puruṣaṃ duritād adhi //7//
analyzed: yathā imam pārayāmasi puruṣam duritāt adhi

original: (AVŚ_8,7.8a) agner ghāso apāṃ garbho yā rohanti punarṇavāḥ /
analyzed: agneḥ ghāsaḥ apām garbhaḥ yāḥ rohanti punarṇavāḥ

original: (AVŚ_8,7.8c) dhruvāḥ sahasranāmnīr bheṣajīḥ santv ābhṛtāḥ //8//
analyzed: dhruvāḥ sahasra nāmnīḥ bheṣajīḥ santu ābhṛtāḥ

original: (AVŚ_8,7.9a) avakolbā udakātmāna oṣadhayaḥ /
analyzed: avaka ulbāḥ udaka ātmānaḥ oṣadhayaḥ

original: (AVŚ_8,7.9c) vyṛṣantu duritaṃ tīkṣṇaśṛṅgyaḥ //9//
analyzed: vyṛṣantu duritam tīkṣṇa śṛṅgyaḥ

original: (AVŚ_8,7.10a) unmuñcantīr vivaruṇā ugrā yā viṣadūṣanīḥ /
analyzed: unmuñcantīḥ vivaruṇāḥ ugrāḥ yāḥ viṣa dūṣanīḥ

original: (AVŚ_8,7.10c) atho balāsanāśanīḥ kṛtyādūṣaṇīś ca yās tā ihā yantv oṣadhīḥ //10// {17}
analyzed: atha u balāsa nāśanīḥ kṛtyā dūṣaṇīḥ ca yāḥ tāḥ iha ā yantu oṣadhīḥ

original: (AVŚ_8,7.11a) apakrītāḥ sahīyasīr vīrudho yā abhiṣṭutāḥ /
analyzed: apakrītāḥ sahīyasīḥ vīrudhaḥ yāḥ abhiṣṭutāḥ

original: (AVŚ_8,7.11c) trāyantām asmin grāme gām aśvaṃ puruṣaṃ paśum //11//
analyzed: trāyantām asmin grāme gām aśvam puruṣam paśum

original: (AVŚ_8,7.12a) madhuman mūlaṃ madhumad agram āsām madhuman madhyaṃ vīrudhāṃ babhūva /
analyzed: madhumat mūlam madhumat agram āsām madhumat madhyam vīrudhām babhūva

original: (AVŚ_8,7.12c) madhumat parṇaṃ madhumat puṣpam āsāṃ madhoḥ sambhaktā amṛtasya bhakṣo ghṛtam annaṃ duhratāṃ gopurogavam //12//
analyzed: madhumat parṇam madhumat puṣpam āsām madhoḥ sambhaktāḥ amṛtasya bhakṣaḥ ghṛtam annam duhratām go purogavam

original: (AVŚ_8,7.13a) yāvatīḥ kiyatīś cemāḥ pṛthivyām adhy oṣadhīḥ /
analyzed: yāvatīḥ kiyatīḥ ca imāḥ pṛthivyām adhi oṣadhīḥ

original: (AVŚ_8,7.13c) tā mā sahasraparṇyo mṛtyor muñcantv aṃhasaḥ //13//
analyzed: tāḥ mā sahasra parṇyaḥ mṛtyoḥ muñcantu aṃhasaḥ

original: (AVŚ_8,7.14a) vaiyāghro maṇir vīrudhāṃ trāyamāno 'bhiśastipāḥ /
analyzed: vaiyāghraḥ maṇiḥ vīrudhām trāyamānaḥ bhiśasti pāḥ

original: (AVŚ_8,7.14c) amīvāḥ sarvā rakṣāṃsy apa hantv adhi dūram asmat //14//
analyzed: amīvāḥ sarvāḥ rakṣāṃsi apa hantu adhi dūram asmat

original: (AVŚ_8,7.15a) siṃhasyeva stanathoḥ saṃ vijante 'gner iva vijante ābhṛtābhyaḥ /
analyzed: siṃhasya iva stanathoḥ sam vijante gneḥ iva vijante ābhṛtābhyaḥ

original: (AVŚ_8,7.15c) gavāṃ yakṣmaḥ puruṣāṇāṃ vīrudbhir atinutto nāvyā etu srotyāḥ //15//
analyzed: gavām yakṣmaḥ puruṣāṇām vīrudbhiḥ atinuttaḥ nāvyāḥ etu srotyāḥ

original: (AVŚ_8,7.16a) mumucānā oṣadhayo 'gner vaiśvānarād adhi /
analyzed: mumucānāḥ oṣadhayaḥ gneḥ vaiśvānarāt adhi

original: (AVŚ_8,7.16c) bhūmiṃ saṃtanvatīr ita yāsāṃ rājā vanaspatiḥ //16//
analyzed: bhūmim saṃtanvatīḥ ita yāsām rājā vanaspatiḥ

original: (AVŚ_8,7.17a) yā rohanty āṅgirasīḥ parvateṣu sameṣu ca /
analyzed: yāḥ rohanti āṅgirasīḥ parvateṣu sameṣu ca

original: (AVŚ_8,7.17c) tā naḥ payasvatīḥ śivā oṣadhīḥ santu śaṃ hṛde //17//
analyzed: tāḥ naḥ payasvatīḥ śivāḥ oṣadhīḥ santu śam hṛde

original: (AVŚ_8,7.18a) yāś cāhaṃ veda vīrudho yāś ca paśyāmi cakṣuṣā /
analyzed: yāḥ ca aham veda vīrudhaḥ yāḥ ca paśyāmi cakṣuṣā

original: (AVŚ_8,7.18c) ajñātā jānīmaś ca yā yāsu vidma ca saṃbhṛtam //18//
analyzed: ajñātāḥ jānīmaḥ ca yāḥ yāsu vidma ca saṃbhṛtam

original: (AVŚ_8,7.19a) sarvāḥ samagrā oṣadhīr bodhantu vacaso mama /
analyzed: sarvāḥ samagrāḥ oṣadhīḥ bodhantu vacasaḥ mama

original: (AVŚ_8,7.19c) yathemaṃ pārayāmasi puruṣam duritād adhi //19//
analyzed: yathā imam pārayāmasi puruṣam duritāt adhi

original: (AVŚ_8,7.20a) aśvattho darbho vīrudhāṃ somo rājāmṛtaṃ haviḥ /
analyzed: aśvatthaḥ darbhaḥ vīrudhām somaḥ rājā amṛtam haviḥ

original: (AVŚ_8,7.20c) vrīhir yavaś ca bheṣajau divasi putrāv amartyau //20// {18}
analyzed: vrīhiḥ yavaḥ ca bheṣajau divasi putrau amartyau

original: (AVŚ_8,7.21a) uj jihīdhve stanayaty abhikrandaty oṣadhīḥ /
analyzed: ud jihīdhve stanayati abhikrandati oṣadhīḥ

original: (AVŚ_8,7.21c) yadā vaḥ pṛśnimātaraḥ parjanyo retasāvati //21//
analyzed: yadā vaḥ pṛśni mātaraḥ parjanyaḥ retasā avati

original: (AVŚ_8,7.22a) tasyāmṛtasyemaṃ balaṃ puruṣaṃ payayāmasi /
analyzed: tasya amṛtasya imam balam puruṣam payayāmasi

original: (AVŚ_8,7.22c) atho kṛṇomi bheṣajaṃ yathāsac chatahāyanaḥ //22//
analyzed: atha u kṛṇomi bheṣajam yathā asat śata hāyanaḥ

original: (AVŚ_8,7.23a) varāho veda vīrudhaṃ nakulo veda bheṣajīm /
analyzed: varāhaḥ veda vīrudham nakulaḥ veda bheṣajīm

original: (AVŚ_8,7.23c) sarpā gandharvā yā vidus tā asmā avase huve //23//
analyzed: sarpāḥ gandharvāḥ yāḥ viduḥ tāḥ asmai avase huve

original: (AVŚ_8,7.24a) yāḥ suparṇā āṅgirasīr divyā yā raghato viduḥ /
analyzed: yāḥ suparṇāḥ āṅgirasīḥ divyāḥ yāḥ raghataḥ viduḥ

original: (AVŚ_8,7.24c) vayāṃsi haṃsā yā vidur yās ca sarve patatriṇaḥ /
analyzed: vayāṃsi haṃsāḥ yāḥ viduḥ yāḥ ca sarve patatriṇaḥ

original: (AVŚ_8,7.24e) mṛgā yā vidur oṣadhīs tā asmā avase huve //24//
analyzed: mṛgāḥ yāḥ viduḥ oṣadhīḥ tāḥ asmai avase huve

original: (AVŚ_8,7.25a) yāvatīnām oṣadhīnāṃ gāvaḥ prāśnanty aghnyā yavatīnām ajāvayaḥ /
analyzed: yāvatīnām oṣadhīnām gāvaḥ prāśnanti aghnyāḥ yavatīnām aja avayaḥ

original: (AVŚ_8,7.25c) tāvatīs tubhyam oṣadhīḥ śarma yachantv ābhṛtāḥ //25//
analyzed: tāvatīḥ tubhyam oṣadhīḥ śarma yacchantu ābhṛtāḥ

original: (AVŚ_8,7.26a) yāvatīṣu manuṣyā bheṣajaṃ bhiṣajo viduḥ /
analyzed: yāvatīṣu manuṣyāḥ bheṣajam bhiṣajaḥ viduḥ

original: (AVŚ_8,7.26c) tāvatīr viśvabheṣajīr ā bharāmi tvām abhi //26//
analyzed: tāvatīḥ viśva bheṣajīḥ ā bharāmi tvām abhi

original: (AVŚ_8,7.27a) puṣpavatīḥ prasūmatīḥ phalinīr aphalā uta /
analyzed: puṣpavatīḥ prasūmatīḥ phalinīḥ aphalāḥ uta

original: (AVŚ_8,7.27c) saṃmātara iva duhrām asmā ariṣṭatātaye //27//
analyzed: saṃ mātaraḥ iva duhrām asmai ariṣṭatātaye

original: (AVŚ_8,7.28a) ut tvāhārṣaṃ pañcaśalād atho daśaśalād uta /
analyzed: ud tvā ahārṣam pañca śalāt atha u daśa śalāt uta

original: (AVŚ_8,7.28c) atho yamasya paḍvīśād viśvasmād devakilbiṣāt //28// {19}
analyzed: atha u yamasya paḍvīśāt viśvasmāt deva kilbiṣāt

original: (AVŚ_8,8.1a) indro manthatu manthitā śakraḥ śūraḥ puraṃdaraḥ /
analyzed: indraḥ manthatu manthitā śakraḥ śūraḥ puraṃdaraḥ

original: (AVŚ_8,8.1c) yathā hanāma senā amitrāṇāṃ sahasraśaḥ //1//
analyzed: yathā hanāma senāḥ amitrāṇām sahasraśas

original: (AVŚ_8,8.2a) pūtirajjur upadhmānī pūtiṃ senāṃ kṛṇotv amūm /
analyzed: pūti rajjuḥ upadhmānī pūtim senām kṛṇotu amūm

original: (AVŚ_8,8.2c) dhūmam agnim parādṛśyā 'mitrā hṛtsv ā dadhatāṃ bhayam //2//
analyzed: dhūmam agnim parādṛśyāḥ mitrāḥ hṛtsu ā dadhatām bhayam

original: (AVŚ_8,8.3a) amūn aśvattha niḥ śṛṇīhi khādāmūn khadirājiram /
analyzed: amūn aśvattha niḥ śṛṇīhi khāda amūn khadira ajiram

original: (AVŚ_8,8.3c) tājadbhaṅga iva bhajantāṃ hantv enān vadhako vadhaiḥ //3//
analyzed: tājat bhaṅgaḥ iva bhajantām hantu enān vadhakaḥ vadhaiḥ

original: (AVŚ_8,8.4a) paruṣān amūn paruṣāhvaḥ kṛṇotu hantv enān vadhako vadhaiḥ /
analyzed: paruṣān amūn paruṣa āhvaḥ kṛṇotu hantu enān vadhakaḥ vadhaiḥ

original: (AVŚ_8,8.4c) kṣipraṃ śara iva bhajantāṃ bṛhajjālena saṃditāḥ //4//
analyzed: kṣipram śaraḥ iva bhajantām bṛhat jālena saṃditāḥ

original: (AVŚ_8,8.5a) antarikṣaṃ jālam āsīj jāladaṇḍā diśo mahīḥ /
analyzed: antarikṣam jālam āsīt jāla daṇḍāḥ diśaḥ mahīḥ

original: (AVŚ_8,8.5c) tenābhidhāya dasyūnāṃ śakraḥ senām apāvapat //5//
analyzed: tena abhidhāya dasyūnām śakraḥ senām apāvapat

original: (AVŚ_8,8.6a) bṛhad dhi jālaṃ bṛhataḥ śakrasya vājinīvataḥ /
analyzed: bṛhat hi jālam bṛhataḥ śakrasya vājinīvataḥ

original: (AVŚ_8,8.6c) tena śatrūn abhi sarvān ny ubja yathā na mucyātai katamaś canaiṣām //6//
analyzed: tena śatrūn abhi sarvān ni ubja yathā na mucyātai katamaḥ cana eṣām

original: (AVŚ_8,8.7a) bṛhat te jālaṃ bṛhata indra śūra sahasrārghasya śatavīryasya /
analyzed: bṛhat te jālam bṛhataḥ indra śūra sahasra arghasya śata vīryasya

original: (AVŚ_8,8.7c) tena śataṃ sahasram ayutaṃ nyarbudaṃ jaghāna śakro dasyūnām abhidhāya senayā //7//
analyzed: tena śatam sahasram ayutam nyarbudam jaghāna śakraḥ dasyūnām abhidhāya senayā

original: (AVŚ_8,8.8a) ayaṃ loko jālam āsīc chakrasya mahato mahān /
analyzed: ayam lokaḥ jālam āsīt śakrasya mahataḥ mahān

original: (AVŚ_8,8.8c) tenāham indrajālenāmūṃs tamasābhi dadhāmi sarvān //8//
analyzed: tena aham indrajālena amūn tamasā abhi dadhāmi sarvān

original: (AVŚ_8,8.9a) sedir ugrā vyṛddhir ārtiś cānapavācanā /
analyzed: sediḥ ugrā vyṛddhiḥ ārtiḥ ca anapavācanā

original: (AVŚ_8,8.9c) śramas tandrīś ca mohaś ca tair amūn abhi dadhāmi sarvān //9//
analyzed: śramaḥ tandrīḥ ca mohaḥ ca taiḥ amūn abhi dadhāmi sarvān

original: (AVŚ_8,8.10a) mṛtyave 'mūn pra yachāmi mṛtyupāśair amī sitāḥ /
analyzed: mṛtyave mūn pra yacchāmi mṛtyu pāśaiḥ amī sitāḥ

original: (AVŚ_8,8.10c) mṛtyor ye aghalā dūtās tebhya enān prati nayāmi baddhvā //10// {20}
analyzed: mṛtyoḥ ye aghalāḥ dūtāḥ tebhyaḥ enān prati nayāmi baddhvā

original: (AVŚ_8,8.11a) nayatāmūn mṛtyudūtā yamadūtā apombhata /
analyzed: nayata amūn mṛtyu dūtāḥ yama dūtāḥ apombhata

original: (AVŚ_8,8.11c) paraḥsahasrā hanyantāṃ tṛṇeḍhv enān matyaṃ bhavasya //11//
analyzed: paraḥsahasrāḥ hanyantām enān matyam bhavasya

original: (AVŚ_8,8.12a) sādhyā ekaṃ jāladaṇḍam udyatya yanty ojasā /
analyzed: sādhyāḥ ekam jāla daṇḍam udyatya yanti ojasā

original: (AVŚ_8,8.12c) rudrā ekaṃ vasava ekam ādityair eka udyataḥ //12//
analyzed: rudrāḥ ekam vasavaḥ ekam ādityaiḥ ekaḥ udyataḥ

original: (AVŚ_8,8.13a) viśve devāḥ upariṣṭād ubjanto yantv ojasā /
analyzed: viśve devāḥ upariṣṭāt ubjantaḥ yantu ojasā

original: (AVŚ_8,8.13c) madhyena ghnanto yantu senām aṅgiraso mahīm //13//
analyzed: madhyena ghnantaḥ yantu senām aṅgirasaḥ mahīm

original: (AVŚ_8,8.14a) vanaspatīn vānaspatyān oṣadhīr uta vīrudhaḥ /
analyzed: vanaspatīn vānaspatyān oṣadhīḥ uta vīrudhaḥ

original: (AVŚ_8,8.14c) dvipāc catuṣpād iṣṇāmi yathā senām amūṃ hanan //14//
analyzed: dvipād catuṣpād iṣṇāmi yathā senām amūm hanan

original: (AVŚ_8,8.15a) gandharvāpsarasaḥ sarpān devān puṇyajanān pitṝn /
analyzed: gandharva apsarasaḥ sarpān devān puṇyajanān pitṝn

original: (AVŚ_8,8.15c) dṛṣṭān adṛṣṭān iṣṇāmi yathā senām amūṃ hanan //15//
analyzed: dṛṣṭān adṛṣṭān iṣṇāmi yathā senām amūm hanan

original: (AVŚ_8,8.16a) ima uptā mṛtyupāśā yān ākramya na mucyase /
analyzed: ime uptāḥ mṛtyu pāśāḥ yān ākramya na mucyase

original: (AVŚ_8,8.16c) amuṣyā hantu senāyā idaṃ kūṭaṃ sahasraśaḥ //16//
analyzed: amuṣyāḥ hantu senāyāḥ idam kūṭam sahasraśas

original: (AVŚ_8,8.17a) gharmaḥ samiddho agnināyaṃ homaḥ sahasrahaḥ /
analyzed: gharmaḥ samiddhaḥ agninā ayam homaḥ sahasrahaḥ

original: (AVŚ_8,8.17c) bhavaś ca pṛśnibāhuś ca śarva senām amūṃ hatam //17//
analyzed: bhavaḥ ca pṛśnibāhuḥ ca śarva senām amūm hatam

original: (AVŚ_8,8.18a) mṛtyor āṣam ā padyantāṃ kṣudhaṃ sediṃ vadham bhayam /
analyzed: mṛtyoḥ āṣam ā padyantām kṣudham sedim vadham bhayam

original: (AVŚ_8,8.18c) indraś cākṣujālābhyāṃ śarva senām amūṃ hatam //18//
analyzed: indraḥ ca akṣu jālābhyām śarva senām amūm hatam

original: (AVŚ_8,8.19a) parājitāḥ pra trasatāmitrā nuttā dhāvata brahmaṇā /
analyzed: parājitāḥ pra trasata amitrāḥ nuttāḥ dhāvata brahmaṇā

original: (AVŚ_8,8.19c) bṛhaspatipranuttānāṃ māmīṣāṃ moci kaś cana //19//
analyzed: bṛhaspati pranuttānām mā amīṣām moci kaḥ cana

original: (AVŚ_8,8.20a) ava padyantām eṣām āyudhāni mā śakan pratidhām iṣum /
analyzed: ava padyantām eṣām āyudhāni mā śakan pratidhām iṣum

original: (AVŚ_8,8.20c) athaiṣāṃ bahu bibhyatām iṣavaḥ ghnantu marmaṇi //20//
analyzed: atha eṣām bahu bibhyatām iṣavaḥ ghnantu marmaṇi

original: (AVŚ_8,8.21a) saṃ krośatām enān dyāvāpṛthivī sam antarikṣaṃ saha devatābhiḥ /
analyzed: sam krośatām enān dyāvāpṛthivī sam antarikṣam saha devatābhiḥ

original: (AVŚ_8,8.21c) mā jñātāraṃ mā pratiṣṭhāṃ vidanta mitho vighnānā upa yantu mṛtyum //21//
analyzed: mā jñātāram mā pratiṣṭhām vidanta mithas vighnānāḥ upa yantu mṛtyum

original: (AVŚ_8,8.22a) diśaś catasro 'śvataryo devarathasya purodāśāḥ śaphā antarikṣam uddhiḥ /
analyzed: diśaḥ catasraḥ śvataryaḥ deva rathasya purodāśāḥ śaphāḥ antarikṣam uddhiḥ

original: (AVŚ_8,8.22c) dyāvāpṛthivī pakṣasī ṛtavo 'bhīśavo 'ntardeśāḥ kimkarā vāk parirathyam //22//
analyzed: dyāvāpṛthivī pakṣasī ṛtavaḥ bhīśavaḥ ntardeśāḥ kimkarāḥ vāc parirathyam

original: (AVŚ_8,8.23a) saṃvatsaro rathaḥ parivatsaro rathopastho virāḍ īṣāgnī rathamukham /
analyzed: saṃvatsaraḥ rathaḥ parivatsaraḥ rathopasthaḥ virāj īṣā agniḥ ratha mukham

original: (AVŚ_8,8.23c) indraḥ savyaṣṭhāś candramāḥ sārathiḥ //23//
analyzed: indraḥ savyaṣṭhāḥ candramāḥ sārathiḥ

original: (AVŚ_8,8.24a) ito jayeto vi jaya saṃ jaya jaya svāhā /
analyzed: itas jaya itas vi jaya sam jaya jaya svāhā

original: (AVŚ_8,8.24c) ime jayantu parāmī jayantāṃ svāhaibhyo durāhāmībhyaḥ /
analyzed: ime jayantu parā amī jayantām svāhā ebhyaḥ durāhā amībhyaḥ

original: (AVŚ_8,8.24e) nīlalohitenāmūn abhyavatanomi //24// {21}
analyzed: nīla lohitena amūn abhyavatanomi

original: (AVŚ_8,9.1a) kutas tau jātau katamaḥ so ardhaḥ kasmāl lokāt katamasyāḥ pṛthivyāḥ /
analyzed: kutas tau jātau katamaḥ saḥ ardhaḥ kasmāt lokāt katamasyāḥ pṛthivyāḥ

original: (AVŚ_8,9.1c) vatsau virājaḥ salilād ud aitāṃ tau tvā pṛchāmi katareṇa dugdhā //1//
analyzed: vatsau virājaḥ salilāt ud aitām tau tvā pṛcchāmi katareṇa dugdhā

original: (AVŚ_8,9.2a) yo akrandayat salilaṃ mahitvā yoniṃ kṛtvā tribhujaṃ śayānaḥ /
analyzed: yaḥ akrandayat salilam mahitvā yonim kṛtvā tri bhujam śayānaḥ

original: (AVŚ_8,9.2c) vatsaḥ kāmadugho virājaḥ sa guhā cakre tanvaḥ parācaiḥ //2//
analyzed: vatsaḥ kāmadughaḥ virājaḥ sa guhā cakre tanvaḥ parācais

original: (AVŚ_8,9.3a) yāni trīṇi bṛhanti yeṣāṃ caturthaṃ viyunakti vācam /
analyzed: yāni trīṇi bṛhanti yeṣām caturtham viyunakti vācam

original: (AVŚ_8,9.3c) brahmainad vidyāt tapasā vipaścid yasminn ekaṃ yujyate yasminn ekam //3//
analyzed: brahma enat vidyāt tapasā vipaścit yasmin ekam yujyate yasmin ekam

original: (AVŚ_8,9.4a) bṛhataḥ pari sāmāni ṣaṣṭhāt pañcādhi nirmitā /
analyzed: bṛhataḥ pari sāmāni ṣaṣṭhāt pañca adhi nirmitā

original: (AVŚ_8,9.4c) bṛhad bṛhatyā nirmitaṃ kuto 'dhi bṛhatī mitā //4//
analyzed: bṛhat bṛhatyā nirmitam kutas hi bṛhatī mitā

original: (AVŚ_8,9.5a) bṛhatī pari mātrāyā mātur mātrādhi nirmitā /
analyzed: bṛhatī pari mātrāyāḥ mātuḥ mātrā adhi nirmitā

original: (AVŚ_8,9.5c) māyā ha jajñe māyāyā māyāyā mātalī pari //5//
analyzed: māyā ha jajñe māyāyāḥ māyāyāḥ mātalī pari

original: (AVŚ_8,9.6a) vaiśvānarasya pratimopari dyaur yāvad rodasī vibabādhe agniḥ /
analyzed: vaiśvānarasya pratimā upari dyauḥ yāvat rodasī vibabādhe agniḥ

original: (AVŚ_8,9.6c) tataḥ ṣaṣṭhād āmuto yanti stomā ud ito yanty abhi ṣaṣṭham ahnaḥ //6//
analyzed: tatas ṣaṣṭhāt ā amutas yanti stomāḥ ud itas yanti abhi ṣaṣṭham ahnaḥ

original: (AVŚ_8,9.7a) ṣaṭ tvā pṛchāma ṛṣayaḥ kaśyapeme tvaṃ hi yuktaṃ yuyukṣe yogyaṃ ca /
analyzed: ṣaṭ tvā pṛcchāmaḥ ṛṣayaḥ kaśyapa ime tvam hi yuktam yuyukṣe yogyam ca

original: (AVŚ_8,9.7c) virājam āhur brahmaṇaḥ pitaraṃ tāṃ no vi dhehi yatidhā sakhibhyaḥ //7//
analyzed: virājam āhuḥ brahmaṇaḥ pitaram tām naḥ vi dhehi yatidhā sakhibhyaḥ

original: (AVŚ_8,9.8a) yāṃ pracyutām anu yajñāḥ pracyavanta upatiṣṭhanta upatiṣṭhamānām /
analyzed: yām pracyutām anu yajñāḥ pracyavante upatiṣṭhante upatiṣṭhamānām

original: (AVŚ_8,9.8c) yasyā vrate prasave yakṣam ejati sā virāṭ ṛṣayaḥ parame vyoman //8//
analyzed: yasyāḥ vrate prasave yakṣam ejati sā virāj ṛṣayaḥ parame vyoman

original: (AVŚ_8,9.9a) aprāṇaiti prāṇena prāṇatīnāṃ virāṭ svarājam abhy eti paścāt /
analyzed: a prāṇaiti prāṇena prāṇatīnām virāj svarājam abhī eti paścāt

original: (AVŚ_8,9.9c) viśvaṃ mṛśantīm abhirūpāṃ virājaṃ paśyanti tve na tve paśyanty enām //9//
analyzed: viśvam mṛśantīm abhirūpām virājam paśyanti tve na tve paśyanti enām

original: (AVŚ_8,9.10a) ko virājo mithunatvaṃ pra veda ka ṛtūn ka u kalpam asyāḥ /
analyzed: kaḥ virājaḥ mithuna tvam pra veda kaḥ ṛtūn kaḥ u kalpam asyāḥ

original: (AVŚ_8,9.10c) kramān ko asyāḥ katidhā vidugdhān ko asyā dhāma katidhā vyuṣṭīḥ //10// {22}
analyzed: kramān kaḥ asyāḥ katidhā vidugdhān kaḥ asyāḥ dhāma katidhā vyuṣṭīḥ

original: (AVŚ_8,9.11a) iyam eva sā yā prathamā vyauchad āsv itarāsu carati praviṣṭā /
analyzed: iyam eva sā yā prathamā vyauchat āsu itarāsu carati praviṣṭā

original: (AVŚ_8,9.11c) mahānto asyāṃ mahimāno antar vadhūr jigāya navagaj janitrī //11//
analyzed: mahāntaḥ asyām mahimānaḥ antar vadhūḥ jigāya navagat janitrī

original: (AVŚ_8,9.12a) chandaḥpakṣe uṣasā pepiśāne samānaṃ yonim anu saṃ careme /
analyzed: chandaḥ pakṣe uṣasā pepiśāne samānam yonim anu sam cara ime

original: (AVŚ_8,9.12c) sūryapatnī saṃ carataḥ prajānatī ketumatī ajare bhūriretasā //12//
analyzed: sūrya patnī sam carataḥ prajānatī ketumatī ajare bhūri retasā

original: (AVŚ_8,9.13a) ṛtasya panthām anu tisra āgus trayo gharmā anu reta āguḥ /
analyzed: ṛtasya panthām anu tisraḥ āguḥ trayaḥ gharmāḥ anu retaḥ āguḥ

original: (AVŚ_8,9.13c) prajām ekā jinvaty ūrjam ekā rāṣṭram ekā rakṣati devayūnām //13//
analyzed: prajām ekā jinvati ūrjam ekā rāṣṭram ekā rakṣati devayūnām

original: (AVŚ_8,9.14a) agnīṣomāv adadhur yā turīyāsīd yajñasya pakṣāv ṛṣayaḥ kalpayantaḥ /
analyzed: agnīṣomau adadhuḥ yā turīyā āsīt yajñasya pakṣau ṛṣayaḥ kalpayantaḥ

original: (AVŚ_8,9.14c) gāyatrīṃ triṣṭubhaṃ jagatīm anuṣṭubhaṃ bṛhadarkīṃ yajamānāya svar ābharantīm //14//
analyzed: gāyatrīm triṣṭubham jagatīm anuṣṭubham bṛhadarkīm yajamānāya svar ābharantīm

original: (AVŚ_8,9.15a) pañca vyuṣṭīr anu pañca dohā gāṃ pañcanāmnīm ṛtavo 'nu pañca /
analyzed: pañca vyuṣṭīḥ anu pañca dohāḥ gām pañca nāmnīm ṛtavaḥ nu pañca

original: (AVŚ_8,9.15c) pañca diśaḥ pañcadaśena kḷptās tā ekamūrdhnīr abhi lokam ekam //15//
analyzed: pañca diśaḥ pañcadaśena kḷptāḥ tāḥ eka mūrdhnīḥ abhi lokam ekam

original: (AVŚ_8,9.16a) ṣaṭ jātā bhūtā prathamajā ṛtasya ṣaṭ u sāmāni ṣaṭahaṃ vahanti /
analyzed: ṣaḍ jātā bhūtā prathama jāḥ ṛtasya ṣaḍ u sāmāni ṣaṭaham vahanti

original: (AVŚ_8,9.16c) ṣaṭyogaṃ sīram anu sāmasāma ṣaṭ āhur dyāvāpṛthivīḥ ṣaṭ urvīḥ //16//
analyzed: ṣaṣ yogam sīram anu sāma sāma ṣaḍ āhuḥ dyāvāpṛthivīḥ ṣaḍ urvīḥ

original: (AVŚ_8,9.17a) ṣaḍ āhuḥ śītān ṣaḍ u māsa uṣṇān ṛtuṃ no brūta yatamo 'tiriktaḥ /
analyzed: ṣaṭ āhuḥ śītān ṣaṭ u māsaḥ uṣṇān ṛtum naḥ brūta yatamaḥ u tiriktaḥ

original: (AVŚ_8,9.17c) sapta suparṇāḥ kavayo ni ṣeduḥ sapta chandāṃsy anu sapta dīkṣāḥ //17//
analyzed: sapta suparṇāḥ kavayaḥ ni seduḥ sapta chandāṃsi anu sapta dīkṣāḥ

original: (AVŚ_8,9.18a) sapta homāḥ samidho ha sapta madhūni sapta ṛtavo ha sapta /
analyzed: sapta homāḥ samidhaḥ ha sapta madhūni sapta ṛtavaḥ ha sapta

original: (AVŚ_8,9.18c) saptājyāni pari bhūtam āyan tāḥ saptagṛdhrā iti śuśrumā vayam //18//
analyzed: sapta ājyāni pari bhūtam āyan tāḥ sapta gṛdhrāḥ iti śuśruma vayam

original: (AVŚ_8,9.19a) sapta chandāṃsi caturuttarāṇy anyo anyasminn adhy ārpitāni /
analyzed: sapta chandāṃsi catur uttarāṇi anyaḥ anyasmin adhi ārpitāni

original: (AVŚ_8,9.19c) kathaṃ stomāḥ prati tiṣṭhanti teṣu tāni stomeṣu katham ārpitāni //19//
analyzed: katham stomāḥ prati tiṣṭhanti teṣu tāni stomeṣu katham ārpitāni

original: (AVŚ_8,9.20a) kathaṃ gāyatrī trivṛtaṃ vy āpa kathaṃ triṣṭup pañcadaśena kalpate /
analyzed: katham gāyatrī trivṛtam vi āpa katham triṣṭubh pañcadaśena kalpate

original: (AVŚ_8,9.20c) trayastriṃśena jagatī katham anuṣṭup katham ekaviṃśaḥ //20// {23}
analyzed: trayastriṃśena jagatī katham anuṣṭubh katham ekaviṃśaḥ  /

original: (AVŚ_8,9.21a) aṣṭa jātā bhūtā prathamajā ṛtasyāṣṭendra ṛtvijo daivyā ye /
analyzed: aṣṭa jātā bhūtā prathama jāḥ ṛtasya aṣṭa indraḥ ṛtvijaḥ daivyāḥ ye

original: (AVŚ_8,9.21c) aṣṭayonir aditir aṣṭaputrāstamīṃ rātrim abhi havyam eti //21//
analyzed: aṣṭa yoniḥ aditiḥ aṣṭa putrā astamīm rātrim abhi havyam eti

original: (AVŚ_8,9.22a) itthaṃ śreyo manyamānedam āgamaṃ yuṣmākaṃ sakhye aham asmi śevā /
analyzed: ittham śreyaḥ manyamānā idam āgamam yuṣmākam sakhye aham asmi śevā

original: (AVŚ_8,9.22c) samānajanmā kratur asti vaḥ śivaḥ sa vaḥ sarvāḥ saṃ carati prajānan //22//
analyzed: samāna janmā kratuḥ asti vaḥ śivaḥ sa vaḥ sarvāḥ sam carati prajānan

original: (AVŚ_8,9.23a) aṣṭendrasya ṣaḍ yamasya ṛṣīṇāṃ sapta saptadhā /
analyzed: aṣṭa indrasya ṣaṣ yamasya ṛṣīṇām sapta saptadhā

original: (AVŚ_8,9.23c) apo manuṣyān oṣadhīs tāṃ u pañcānu secire //23//
analyzed: apaḥ manuṣyān oṣadhīḥ tām u pañca anu secire

original: (AVŚ_8,9.24a) kevalīndrāya duduhe hi gṛṣṭir vaśam pīyūṣaṃ prathamaṃ duhānā /
analyzed: kevalī indrāya duduhe hi gṛṣṭiḥ vaśam pīyūṣam prathamam duhānā

original: (AVŚ_8,9.24c) athātarpayac caturaś caturdhā devān manuṣyāṃ asurān uta ṛṣīn //24//
analyzed: atha atarpayat caturaḥ caturdhā devān manuṣyān asurān uta ṛṣīn

original: (AVŚ_8,9.25a) ko nu gauḥ ka ekaṛṣiḥ kim u dhāma kā āśiṣaḥ /
analyzed: kaḥ nu gauḥ kaḥ eka ṛṣiḥ kim u dhāma kāḥ āśiṣaḥ

original: (AVŚ_8,9.25c) yakṣam pṛthivyām ekavṛd ekartuḥ katamo nu saḥ //25//
analyzed: yakṣam pṛthivyām ekavṛt ekartuḥ katamaḥ nu saḥ

original: (AVŚ_8,9.26a) eko gaur eka ekaṛṣir ekaṃ dhāmaikadhāśiṣaḥ /
analyzed: ekaḥ gauḥ ekaḥ eka ṛṣiḥ ekam dhāma ekadhā āśiṣaḥ

original: (AVŚ_8,9.26c) yakṣaṃ pṛthivyām ekavṛd ekartur nāti ricyate //26// {24}
analyzed: yakṣam pṛthivyām ekavṛt eka rtuḥ na ati ricyate

original: (AVŚ_8,10.1a) virāḍ vā idam agra āsīt tasyā jātāyāḥ sarvam abibhed iyam evedaṃ bhaviṣyatīti //1//
analyzed: virāj vai idam agre āsīt tasyāḥ jātāyāḥ sarvam abibhet iyam eva idam bhaviṣyati iti

original: (AVŚ_8,10.2a) sod akrāmat sā gārhapatye ny akrāmat /
analyzed: sā ud akrāmat sā gārhapatye ni akrāmat

original: (AVŚ_8,10.2c) gṛhamedhī gṛhapatir bhavati ya evaṃ veda //2//
analyzed: gṛhamedhī gṛhapatiḥ bhavati yaḥ evam veda

original: (AVŚ_8,10.3a) sod akrāmat sāhavanīye ny akrāmat /
analyzed: sā ud akrāmat sā āhavanīye ni akrāmat

original: (AVŚ_8,10.3c) yanty asya devā devahūtiṃ priyo devānāṃ bhavati ya evaṃ veda //3//
analyzed: yanti asya devāḥ deva hūtim priyaḥ devānām bhavati yaḥ evam veda

original: (AVŚ_8,10.4a) sod akrāmat sā dakṣiṇāgnau ny akrāmat /
analyzed: sā ud akrāmat sā dakṣiṇāgnau ni akrāmat

original: (AVŚ_8,10.4c) yajñarto dakṣiṇīyo vāsateyo bhavati ya evaṃ veda //4//
analyzed: yajña ṛtaḥ dakṣiṇīyaḥ vāsateyaḥ bhavati yaḥ evam veda

original: (AVŚ_8,10.5a) sod akrāmat sā sabhāyāṃ ny akrāmat /
analyzed: sā ud akrāmat sā sabhāyām ni akrāmat

original: (AVŚ_8,10.5c) yanty asya sabhāṃ sabhyo bhavati ya evaṃ veda //5//
analyzed: yanti asya sabhām sabhyaḥ bhavati yaḥ evam veda

original: (AVŚ_8,10.6a) sod akrāmat sā samitau ny akrāmat /
analyzed: sā ud akrāmat sā samitau ni akrāmat

original: (AVŚ_8,10.6c) yanty asya samitiṃ sāmityo bhavati ya evaṃ veda //6//
analyzed: yanti asya samitim sāmityaḥ bhavati yaḥ evam veda

original: (AVŚ_8,10.7a) sod akrāmat sāmantraṇe ny akrāmat /
analyzed: sā ud akrāmat sā āmantraṇe ni akrāmat

original: (AVŚ_8,10.7c) yanty asyāmantraṇam āmantraṇīyo bhavati ya evaṃ veda //7// {25}
analyzed: yanti asya āmantraṇam āmantraṇīyaḥ bhavati yaḥ evam veda

original: (AVŚ_8,10.8a) sod akrāmat sāntarikṣe caturdhā vikrāntātiṣṭhat //8//
analyzed: sā ud akrāmat sā antarikṣe caturdhā vikrāntā atiṣṭhat

original: (AVŚ_8,10.9a) tāṃ devamanuṣyā abruvann iyam eva tad veda yad ubhaya upajīvememām upa hvayāmahā iti //9//
analyzed: tām deva manuṣyāḥ abruvan iyam eva tat veda yat ubhaye upajīvema imām upa hvayāmahai iti

original: (AVŚ_8,10.10a) tām upāhvayanta //10//
analyzed: tām upāhvayanta

original: (AVŚ_8,10.11a) ūrja ehi svadha ehi sūnṛta ehīrāvaty ehīti //11//
analyzed: ūrje ehi svadhe ehi sūnṛte ehi irāvati ehi iti

original: (AVŚ_8,10.12a) tasyā indro vatsa āsīd gāyatry abhidhāny abhram ūdhaḥ //12//
analyzed: tasyāḥ indraḥ vatsaḥ āsīt gāyatrī abhidhānī abhram ūdhar

original: (AVŚ_8,10.13a) bṛhac ca rathaṃtaraṃ ca dvau stanāv āstāṃ yajñāyajñiyaṃ ca vāmadevyaṃ ca dvau //13//
analyzed: bṛhat ca rathaṃtaram ca dvau stanau āstām yajñāyajñiyam ca vāmadevyam ca dvau

original: (AVŚ_8,10.14a) oṣadhīr eva rathaṃtareṇa devā aduhran vyaco bṛhatā //14//
analyzed: oṣadhīḥ eva rathaṃtareṇa devāḥ aduhran vyacaḥ bṛhatā

original: (AVŚ_8,10.15a) apo vāmadevyena yajñaṃ yajñāyajñiyena //15//
analyzed: apaḥ vāmadevyena yajñam yajñāyajñiyena

original: (AVŚ_8,10.16a) oṣadhīr evāsmai rathaṃtaraṃ duhe vyaco bṛhat //16//
analyzed: oṣadhīḥ eva asmai rathaṃtaram duhe vyacaḥ bṛhat

original: (AVŚ_8,10.17a) apo vāmadevyaṃ yajñaṃ yajñāyajñiyaṃ ya veda //17// {26}
analyzed: apaḥ vāmadevyam yajñam yajñāyajñiyam ya veda

original: (AVŚ_8,10.18a) sod akrāmat sā vanaspatīn āgachat tāṃ vanaspatayo 'ghnata sā saṃvatsare sam abhavat /
analyzed: sā ud akrāmat sā vanaspatīn āgacchat tām vanaspatayaḥ ghnata sā saṃvatsare sam abhavat

original: (AVŚ_8,10.18c) tasmād vanaspatīnāṃ saṃvatsare vṛkṇam api rohati vṛścate 'syāpriyo bhrātṛvyo ya evaṃ veda //18//
analyzed: tasmāt vanaspatīnām saṃvatsare vṛkṇam api rohati vṛścate sya apriyaḥ bhrātṛvyaḥ yaḥ evam veda

original: (AVŚ_8,10.19a) sod akrāmat sā pitṝn āgachat tāṃ pitaro 'ghnata sā māsi sam abhavat /
analyzed: sā ud akrāmat sā pitṝn āgacchat tām pitaraḥ ghnata sā māsi sam abhavat

original: (AVŚ_8,10.19c) tasmāt pitṛbhyo māsy upamāsyaṃ dadati pra pitṛyāṇaṃ panthāṃ jānāti ya evaṃ veda //19//
analyzed: tasmāt pitṛbhyaḥ māsi upamāsyam dadati pra pitṛyāṇam panthām jānāti yaḥ evam veda

original: (AVŚ_8,10.20a) sod akrāmat sā devān āgachat tāṃ devā aghnata sārdhamāse sam abhavat /
analyzed: sā ud akrāmat sā devān āgacchat tām devāḥ aghnata sā ardha māse sam abhavat

original: (AVŚ_8,10.20c) tasmād devebhyo 'rdhamāse vaṣaṭ kurvanti pra devayānaṃ panthāṃ jānāti ya evaṃ veda //20//
analyzed: tasmāt devebhyaḥ ṛdha māse vaṣaṭ kurvanti pra deva yānam panthām jānāti yaḥ evam veda

original: (AVŚ_8,10.21a) sod akrāmat sā manuṣyān āgachat tāṃ manuṣyā aghnata sā sadyaḥ sam abhavat /
analyzed: sā ud akrāmat sā manuṣyān āgacchat tām manuṣyāḥ aghnata sā sadyas sam abhavat

original: (AVŚ_8,10.21c) tasmān manuṣyebhya ubhayadyur upa haranty upāsya gṛhe haranti ya evaṃ veda //21// {27}
analyzed: tasmāt manuṣyebhyaḥ ubhayadyus upa haranti upa asya gṛhe haranti yaḥ evam veda

original: (AVŚ_8,10.22a) sod akrāmat sāsurān āgachat tām asurā upāhvayanta māya ehīti /
analyzed: sā ud akrāmat sā asurān āgacchat tām asurāḥ upāhvayanta māye ehi iti

original: (AVŚ_8,10.22c) tasyā virocanaḥ prāhrādir vatsa āsīd ayaspātraṃ pātram /
analyzed: tasyāḥ virocanaḥ prāhrādiḥ vatsaḥ āsīt ayaspātram pātram

original: (AVŚ_8,10.22e) tāṃ dvimūrdhārtvyo 'dhok tāṃ māyām evādhok //
analyzed: tām dvimūrdhā ārtvyaḥ dhok tām māyām eva adhok

original: (AVŚ_8,10.22g) tāṃ māyām asurā upa jīvanty upajīvanīyo bhavati ya evaṃ veda //22//
analyzed: tām māyām asurāḥ upa jīvanti upajīvanīyaḥ bhavati yaḥ evam veda

original: (AVŚ_8,10.23a) sod akrāmat sā pitṝn āgachat tāṃ pitara upāhvayanta svadha ehīti /
analyzed: sā ud akrāmat sā pitṝn āgacchat tām pitaraḥ upāhvayanta svadhe ehi iti

original: (AVŚ_8,10.23c) tasyā yamo rājā vatsa āsīd rajatapātraṃ pātram /
analyzed: tasyāḥ yamaḥ rājā vatsaḥ āsīt rajata pātram pātram

original: (AVŚ_8,10.23e) tām antako mārtyavo 'dhok tāṃ svadhām evādhok /
analyzed: tām antakaḥ mārtyavaḥ dhok tām svadhām eva adhok

original: (AVŚ_8,10.23g) tāṃ svadhāṃ pitara upa jīvanty upajīvanīyo bhavati ya evaṃ veda //23//
analyzed: tām svadhām pitaraḥ upa jīvanti upajīvanīyaḥ bhavati yaḥ evam veda

original: (AVŚ_8,10.24a) sod akrāmat sā manuṣyān āgachat tāṃ manuṣyā upāhvayanterāvaty ehīti /
analyzed: sā ud akrāmat sā manuṣyān āgacchat tām manuṣyāḥ upāhvayanta irāvati ehi iti

original: (AVŚ_8,10.24c) tasyā manur vaivasvato vatsa āsīt pṛthivī pātram /
analyzed: tasyāḥ manuḥ vaivasvataḥ vatsaḥ āsīt pṛthivī pātram

original: (AVŚ_8,10.24e) tāṃ pṛthī vainyo 'dhok tāṃ kṛṣiṃ ca sasyaṃ cādhok /
analyzed: tām pṛthī vainyaḥ dhok tām kṛṣim ca sasyam ca adhok

original: (AVŚ_8,10.24g) te svadhāṃ kṛṣiṃ ca sasyaṃ ca manuṣyā upa jīvanti kṛṣṭarādhir upajīvanīyo bhavati ya evaṃ veda //24//
analyzed: te svadhām kṛṣim ca sasyam ca manuṣyāḥ upa jīvanti kṛṣṭa rādhiḥ upajīvanīyaḥ bhavati yaḥ evam veda

original: (AVŚ_8,10.25a) sod akrāmat sā saptaṛṣīn āgachat tāṃ saptaṛṣaya upāhvayanta brahmaṇvaty ehīti /
analyzed: sā ud akrāmat sā sapta ṛṣīn āgacchat tām sapta ṛṣayaḥ upāhvayanta brahmaṇvati ehi iti

original: (AVŚ_8,10.25c) tasyāḥ somo rājā vatsa āsīc chandaḥ pātram /
analyzed: tasyāḥ somaḥ rājā vatsaḥ āsīt chandaḥ pātram

original: (AVŚ_8,10.25e) tāṃ bṛhaspatir āṅgiraso 'dhok tāṃ brahma ca tapaś cādhok /
analyzed: tām bṛhaspatiḥ āṅgirasaḥ dhok tām brahma ca tapaḥ ca adhok

original: (AVŚ_8,10.25g) tad brahma ca tapaś ca saptaṛṣaya upa jīvanti brahmavarcasy upajīvanīyo bhavati ya evaṃ veda //25// {28}
analyzed: tat brahma ca tapaḥ ca sapta ṛṣayaḥ upa jīvanti brahmavarcasī upajīvanīyaḥ bhavati yaḥ evam veda

original: (AVŚ_8,10.26a) sod akrāmat sā devān āgachat tāṃ devā upāhvayantorja ehīti /
analyzed: sā ud akrāmat sā devān āgacchat tām devāḥ upāhvayanta ūrje ehi iti

original: (AVŚ_8,10.26c) tasyā indro vatsa āsīc camasaḥ pātram /
analyzed: tasyāḥ indraḥ vatsaḥ āsīt camasaḥ pātram

original: (AVŚ_8,10.26e) tāṃ devaḥ savitādhok tām ūrjām evādhok /
analyzed: tām devaḥ savitā adhok tām ūrjām eva adhok

original: (AVŚ_8,10.26g) tāṃ ūrjāṃ devā upa jīvanty upajīvanīyo bhavati ya evaṃ veda //26//
analyzed: tām ūrjām devāḥ upa jīvanti upajīvanīyaḥ bhavati yaḥ evam veda

original: (AVŚ_8,10.27a) sod akrāmat sā gandharvāpsarasa āgachat tāṃ gandharvāpsarasa upāhvayanta puṇyagandha ehīti /
analyzed: sā ud akrāmat sā gandharva apsarasaḥ āgacchat tām gandharva apsarasaḥ upāhvayanta puṇya gandhe ehi iti

original: (AVŚ_8,10.27c) tasyāś citrarathaḥ sauryavarcaso vatsa āsīt puṣkaraparṇaṃ pātram /
analyzed: tasyāḥ citrarathaḥ saurya varcasaḥ vatsaḥ āsīt puṣkara parṇam pātram

original: (AVŚ_8,10.27e) tāṃ vasuruciḥ sauryavarcaso 'dhok tāṃ puṇyam eva gandham adhok /
analyzed: tām vasuruciḥ saurya varcasaḥ dhok tām puṇyam eva gandham adhok

original: (AVŚ_8,10.27g) taṃ puṇyaṃ gandhaṃ gandharvāpsarasa upa jīvanti puṇyagandhir upajīvanīyo bhavati ya evaṃ veda //27//
analyzed: tam puṇyam gandham gandharva apsarasaḥ upa jīvanti puṇya gandhiḥ upajīvanīyaḥ bhavati yaḥ evam veda

original: (AVŚ_8,10.28a) sod akrāmat setarajanān āgachat tām itarajanā upāhvayanta tirodha ehīti /
analyzed: sā ud akrāmat sā itarajanān āgacchat tām itarajanāḥ upāhvayanta tirodhe ehi iti

original: (AVŚ_8,10.28c) tasyāḥ kubero vaiśravaṇo vatsa āsīd āmapātraṃ pātram /
analyzed: tasyāḥ kuberaḥ vaiśravaṇaḥ vatsaḥ āsīt āma pātram pātram

original: (AVŚ_8,10.28e) tāṃ rajatanābhiḥ kaberako 'dhok tāṃ tirodhām evādhok /
analyzed: tām rajata nābhiḥ kaberakaḥ dhok tām tirodhām eva adhok

original: (AVŚ_8,10.28g) tāṃ tirodhām atirajanā pitara upa jīvanti tiro dhatte sarvaṃ pāpmānam upajīvanīyo bhavati ya evaṃ veda //28//
analyzed: tām tirodhām atirajanā pitaraḥ upa jīvanti tiras dhatte sarvam pāpmānam upajīvanīyaḥ bhavati yaḥ evam veda

original: (AVŚ_8,10.29a) sod akrāmat sā sarpān āgachat tāṃ sarpā upāhvayanta viṣavaty ehīti /
analyzed: sā ud akrāmat sā sarpān āgacchat tām sarpāḥ upāhvayanta viṣavati ehi iti

original: (AVŚ_8,10.29c) tasyās takṣako vaiśaleyo vatsa āsīd alābupātraṃ pātraṃ /
analyzed: tasyāḥ takṣakaḥ vaiśaleyaḥ vatsaḥ āsīt alābu pātram pātram

original: (AVŚ_8,10.29e) tāṃ dhṛtarāṣṭra airāvato 'dhok tāṃ viṣam evādhok /
analyzed: tām dhṛtarāṣṭraḥ airāvataḥ dhok tām viṣam eva adhok

original: (AVŚ_8,10.29g) tad viṣaṃ sarvā upa jīvanty upajīvanīyo bhavati ya evaṃ veda //29// {29}
analyzed: tat viṣam sarvāḥ upa jīvanti upajīvanīyaḥ bhavati yaḥ evam veda

original: (AVŚ_8,10.30a) tad yasmā evaṃ viduṣe 'lābunābhiṣiñcet pratyāhanyāt //30//
analyzed: tat yasmai evam viduṣe lābunā abhiṣiñcet pratyāhanyāt

original: (AVŚ_8,10.31a) na ca pratyāhanyān manasā tvā pratyāhanmīti pratyāhanyāt //31//
analyzed: na ca pratyāhanyāt manasā tvā pratyāhanmi iti pratyāhanyāt

original: (AVŚ_8,10.32a) yat pratyāhanti viṣam eva tat pratyāhanti //32//
analyzed: yat pratyāhanti viṣam eva tat pratyāhanti

original: (AVŚ_8,10.33a) viṣam evāsyāpriyaṃ bhrātṛvyam anuviṣicyate ya evaṃ veda //33// {30}
analyzed: viṣam eva asya apriyam bhrātṛvyam anuviṣicyate yaḥ evam veda

original: (AVŚ_9,1.1a) divas pṛthivyā antarikṣāt samudrād agner vātān madhukaśā hi jajñe /
analyzed: divaḥ pṛthivyāḥ antarikṣāt samudrāt agneḥ vātāt madhu kaśā hi jajñe

original: (AVŚ_9,1.1c) tāṃ cāyitvāmṛtaṃ vasānāṃ hṛdbhiḥ prajāḥ prati nandanti sarvāḥ //1//
analyzed: tām cāyitvā amṛtam vasānām hṛdbhiḥ prajāḥ prati nandanti sarvāḥ

original: (AVŚ_9,1.2a) mahat payo viśvarūpam asyāḥ samudrasya tvota reta āhuḥ /
analyzed: mahat payaḥ viśva rūpam asyāḥ samudrasya tvā uta retaḥ āhuḥ

original: (AVŚ_9,1.2c) yata aiti madhukaśā rarāṇā tat prāṇas tad amṛtaṃ niviṣṭam //2//
analyzed: yatas aiti madhu kaśā rarāṇā tat prāṇaḥ tat amṛtam niviṣṭam

original: (AVŚ_9,1.3a) paśyanty asyāś caritaṃ pṛthivyāṃ pṛthaṅ naro bahudhā mīmāṃsamānāḥ /
analyzed: paśyanti asyāḥ caritam pṛthivyām pṛthak naraḥ bahudhā mīmāṃsamānāḥ

original: (AVŚ_9,1.3c) agner vātān madhukaśā hi jajñe marutām ugrā naptiḥ //3//
analyzed: agneḥ vātāt madhu kaśā hi jajñe marutām ugrā naptiḥ

original: (AVŚ_9,1.4a) mātādityānāṃ duhitā vasūnāṃ prāṇaḥ prajānām amṛtasya nābhiḥ /
analyzed: mātā ādityānām duhitā vasūnām prāṇaḥ prajānām amṛtasya nābhiḥ

original: (AVŚ_9,1.4c) hiraṇyavarṇā madhukaśā ghṛtācī mahān bhargaś carati martyeṣu //4//
analyzed: hiraṇya varṇā madhu kaśā ghṛtācī mahān bhargaḥ carati martyeṣu

original: (AVŚ_9,1.5a) madhoḥ kaśām ajanayanta devās tasyā garbho abhavad viśvarūpaḥ /
analyzed: madhoḥ kaśām ajanayanta devāḥ tasyāḥ garbhaḥ abhavat viśva rūpaḥ

original: (AVŚ_9,1.5c) taṃ jātaṃ taruṇaṃ piparti mātā sa jāto viśvā bhuvanā vi caṣṭe //5//
analyzed: tam jātam taruṇam piparti mātā sa jātaḥ viśvā bhuvanā vi caṣṭe

original: (AVŚ_9,1.6a) kas taṃ pra veda ka u taṃ ciketa yo asyā hṛdaḥ kalaśaḥ somadhāno akṣitaḥ /
analyzed: kaḥ tam pra veda kaḥ u tam ciketa yaḥ asyāḥ hṛdaḥ kalaśaḥ soma dhānaḥ a kṣitaḥ

original: (AVŚ_9,1.6c) brahmā sumedhāḥ so asmin madeta //6//
analyzed: brahmā sumedhāḥ saḥ asmin madeta

original: (AVŚ_9,1.7a) sa tau pra veda sa u tau ciketa yāv asyāḥ stanau sahasradhārāv akṣitau /
analyzed: sa tau pra veda saḥ u tau ciketa yau asyāḥ stanau sahasra dhārau akṣitau

original: (AVŚ_9,1.7c) ūrjaṃ duhāte anapasphurantau //7//
analyzed: ūrjam duhāte an apasphurantau

original: (AVŚ_9,1.8a) hiṅkarikratī bṛhatī vayodhā uccairghoṣābhyeti yā vratam /
analyzed: hiṅkarikratī bṛhatī vayaḥ dhāḥ uccairghoṣā abhyeti yā vratam

original: (AVŚ_9,1.8c) trīn gharmān abhi vāvaśānā mimāti māyuṃ payate payobhiḥ //8//
analyzed: trīn gharmān abhi vāvaśānā mimāti māyum payate payobhiḥ

original: (AVŚ_9,1.9a) yām āpīnām upasīdanty āpaḥ śākvarā vṛṣabhā ye svarājaḥ /
analyzed: yām āpīnām upasīdanti āpaḥ śākvarāḥ vṛṣabhāḥ ye sva rājaḥ

original: (AVŚ_9,1.9c) te varṣanti te varṣayanti tadvide kāmam ūrjam āpaḥ //9//
analyzed: te varṣanti te varṣayanti tad vide kāmam ūrjam āpaḥ

original: (AVŚ_9,1.10a) stanayitnus te vāk prajāpate vṛṣā śuṣmaṃ kṣipasi bhūmyām adhi /
analyzed: stanayitnuḥ te vāc prajāpate vṛṣā śuṣmam kṣipasi bhūmyām adhi

original: (AVŚ_9,1.10c) agner vātān madhukaśā hi jajñe marutām ugrā naptiḥ //10// {1}
analyzed: agneḥ vātāt madhu kaśā hi jajñe marutām ugrā naptiḥ

original: (AVŚ_9,1.11a) yathā somaḥ prātaḥsavane aśvinor bhavati priyaḥ /
analyzed: yathā somaḥ prātaḥsavane aśvinoḥ bhavati priyaḥ

original: (AVŚ_9,1.11c) evā me aśvinā varca ātmani dhriyatām //11//
analyzed: eva me aśvinā varcaḥ ātmani dhriyatām

original: (AVŚ_9,1.12a) yathā somo dvitīye savana indrāgnyor bhavati priyaḥ /
analyzed: yathā somaḥ dvitīye savane indra agnyoḥ bhavati priyaḥ

original: (AVŚ_9,1.12c) evā ma indrāgnī varca ātmani dhriyatām //12//
analyzed: eva me indra agnī varcaḥ ātmani dhriyatām

original: (AVŚ_9,1.13a) yathā somas tṛtīye savana ṛbhūṇāṃ bhavati priyaḥ /
analyzed: yathā somaḥ tṛtīye savane ṛbhūṇām bhavati priyaḥ

original: (AVŚ_9,1.13c) evā ma ṛbhavo varca ātmani dhriyatām //13//
analyzed: eva me ṛbhavaḥ varcaḥ ātmani dhriyatām

original: (AVŚ_9,1.14a) madhu janiṣīya madhu vaṃsiṣīya /
analyzed: madhu janiṣīya madhu vaṃsiṣīya

original: (AVŚ_9,1.14c) payasvān agna āgamaṃ taṃ mā saṃ sṛja varcasā //14//
analyzed: payasvān agne āgamam tam mā sam sṛja varcasā

original: (AVŚ_9,1.15a) saṃ māgne varcasā sṛja saṃ prajayā sam āyuṣā /
analyzed: sam mā agne varcasā sṛja sam prajayā sam āyuṣā

original: (AVŚ_9,1.15c) vidyur me asya devā indro vidyāt saha ṛṣibhiḥ //15//
analyzed: vidyuḥ me asya devāḥ indraḥ vidyāt saha ṛṣibhiḥ

original: (AVŚ_9,1.16a) yathā madhu madhukṛtaḥ saṃbharanti madhāv adhi /
analyzed: yathā madhu madhukṛtaḥ saṃbharanti madhau adhi

original: (AVŚ_9,1.16c) evā me aśvinā varca ātmani dhriyatām //16//
analyzed: eva me aśvinā varcaḥ ātmani dhriyatām

original: (AVŚ_9,1.17a) yathā makṣāḥ idaṃ madhu nyañjanti madhāv adhi /
analyzed: yathā makṣāḥ idam madhu nyañjanti madhau adhi

original: (AVŚ_9,1.17c) evā me aśvinā varcas tejo balam ojaś ca dhriyatām //17//
analyzed: eva me aśvinā varcaḥ tejaḥ balam ojaḥ ca dhriyatām

original: (AVŚ_9,1.18a) yad giriṣu parvateṣu goṣv aśveṣu yan madhu /
analyzed: yat giriṣu parvateṣu goṣu aśveṣu yat madhu

original: (AVŚ_9,1.18c) surāyāṃ sicyamānāyāṃ yat tatra madhu tan mayi //18//
analyzed: surāyām sicyamānāyām yat tatra madhu tat mayi

original: (AVŚ_9,1.19a) aśvinā sāragheṇa mā madhunāṅktaṃ śubhas patī /
analyzed: aśvinā sāragheṇa mā madhunā aṅktam śubhaḥ patī

original: (AVŚ_9,1.19c) yathā varcasvatīṃ vācam āvadāni janāṃ anu //19//
analyzed: yathā varcasvatīm vācam āvadāni janān anu

original: (AVŚ_9,1.20a) stanayitnus te vāk prajāpate vṛṣā śuṣmaṃ kṣipasi bhūmyāṃ divi /
analyzed: stanayitnuḥ te vāc prajāpate vṛṣā śuṣmam kṣipasi bhūmyām divi

original: (AVŚ_9,1.20c) tāṃ paśava upa jīvanti sarve teno seṣam ūrjaṃ piparti //20//
analyzed: tām paśavaḥ upa jīvanti sarve tena u sā iṣam ūrjam piparti

original: (AVŚ_9,1.21a) pṛthivī daṇḍo 'ntarikṣaṃ garbho dyauḥ kaśā vidyut prakaśo hiraṇyayo binduḥ //21//
analyzed: pṛthivī daṇḍaḥ ntarikṣam garbhaḥ dyauḥ kaśā vidyut prakaśaḥ hiraṇyayaḥ binduḥ

original: (AVŚ_9,1.22a) yo vai kaśāyāḥ sapta madhūni veda madhumān bhavati /
analyzed: yaḥ vai kaśāyāḥ sapta madhūni veda madhumān bhavati

original: (AVŚ_9,1.22c) brāhmaṇaś ca rājā ca dhenuś cānaḍvāṃś ca vrīhiś ca yavaś ca madhu saptamam //22//
analyzed: brāhmaṇaḥ ca rājā ca dhenuḥ ca anaḍvān ca vrīhiḥ ca yavaḥ ca madhu saptamam

original: (AVŚ_9,1.23a) madhumān bhavati madhumad asyāhāryaṃ bhavati /
analyzed: madhumān bhavati madhumat asya āhāryam bhavati

original: (AVŚ_9,1.23c) madhumato lokān jayati ya evaṃ veda //23//
analyzed: madhumataḥ lokān jayati yaḥ evam veda

original: (AVŚ_9,1.24a) yad vīdhre stanayati prajāpatir eva tat prajābhyaḥ prādur bhavati /
analyzed: yat vīdhre stanayati prajāpatiḥ eva tat prajābhyaḥ prādur bhavati

original: (AVŚ_9,1.24c) tasmāt prācīnopavītas tiṣṭhe prajāpate 'nu mā budhyasveti /
analyzed: tasmāt prācīna upavītaḥ tiṣṭhe prajāpate nu mā budhyasva iti

original: (AVŚ_9,1.24e) anv enaṃ prajā anu prajāpatir budhyate ya evaṃ veda //24// {2}
analyzed: anu enam prajāḥ anu prajāpatiḥ budhyate yaḥ evam veda

original: (AVŚ_9,2.1a) sapatnahanam ṛṣabhaṃ ghṛtena kāmaṃ śikṣāmi haviṣājyena /
analyzed: sapatna hanam ṛṣabham ghṛtena kāmam śikṣāmi haviṣā ājyena

original: (AVŚ_9,2.1c) nīcaiḥ sapatnān mama padaya tvam abhiṣṭuto mahatā vīryeṇa //1//
analyzed: nīcaiḥ sapatnān mama tvam abhiṣṭutaḥ mahatā vīryeṇa

original: (AVŚ_9,2.2a) yan me manaso na priyaṃ cakṣuṣo yan me babhasti nābhinandati /
analyzed: yat me manasaḥ na priyam cakṣuṣaḥ yat me babhasti na abhinandati

original: (AVŚ_9,2.2c) tad duṣvapnyaṃ prati muñcāmi sapatne kāmaṃ stutvod ahaṃ bhideyam //2//
analyzed: tat duṣvapnyam prati muñcāmi sapatne kāmam stutvā ud aham bhideyam

original: (AVŚ_9,2.3a) duṣvapnyaṃ kāma duritaṃ ca kamāprajastām asvagatām avartim /
analyzed: duṣvapnyam kāma duritam ca kama aprajastām avartim

original: (AVŚ_9,2.3c) ugra īśānaḥ prati muñca tasmin yo asmabhyam aṃhūraṇā cikitsāt //3//
analyzed: ugraḥ īśānaḥ prati muñca tasmin yaḥ asmabhyam aṃhūraṇā cikitsāt

original: (AVŚ_9,2.4a) nudasva kāma pra ṇudasva kāmāvartiṃ yantu mama ye sapatnāḥ /
analyzed: nudasva kāma pra nudasva kāma avartim yantu mama ye sapatnāḥ

original: (AVŚ_9,2.4c) teṣāṃ nuttānām adhamā tamāṃsy agne vāstūni nir daha tvam //4//
analyzed: teṣām nuttānām adhamā tamāṃsi agne vāstūni niḥ daha tvam

original: (AVŚ_9,2.5a) sā te kāma duhitā dhenur ucyate yām āhur vācaṃ kavayo virājam /
analyzed: sā te kāma duhitā dhenuḥ ucyate yām āhuḥ vācam kavayaḥ virājam

original: (AVŚ_9,2.5c) tayā sapatnān pari vṛṅgdhi ye mama pary enān prāṇaḥ paśavo jīvanaṃ vṛṇaktu //5//
analyzed: tayā sapatnān pari vṛṅgdhi ye mama pari enān prāṇaḥ paśavaḥ jīvanam vṛṇaktu

original: (AVŚ_9,2.6a) kāmasyendrasya varuṇasya rājño viṣṇor balena savituḥ savena /
analyzed: kāmasya indrasya varuṇasya rājñaḥ viṣṇoḥ balena savituḥ savena

original: (AVŚ_9,2.6c) agner hotreṇa pra ṇude sapatnāṃ chambīva nāvam udakeṣu dhīraḥ //6//
analyzed: agneḥ hotreṇa pra nude sapatnām chambī iva nāvam udakeṣu dhīraḥ

original: (AVŚ_9,2.7a) adhyakṣo vājī mama kāma ugraḥ kṛṇotu mahyam asapatnam eva /
analyzed: adhyakṣaḥ vājī mama kāmaḥ ugraḥ kṛṇotu mahyam asapatnam eva

original: (AVŚ_9,2.7c) viśve devā mama nāthaṃ bhavantu sarve devā havam ā yantu ma imam //7//
analyzed: viśve devāḥ mama nātham bhavantu sarve devāḥ havam ā yantu me imam

original: (AVŚ_9,2.8a) idam ājyaṃ ghṛtavaj juṣāṇāḥ kāmajyeṣṭhā iha mādayadhvam /
analyzed: idam ājyam ghṛtavat juṣāṇāḥ kāma jyeṣṭhāḥ iha mādayadhvam

original: (AVŚ_9,2.8c) kṛṇvanto mahyam asapatnam eva //8//
analyzed: kṛṇvantaḥ mahyam asapatnam eva

original: (AVŚ_9,2.9a) indrāgnī kāma sarathaṃ hi bhūtvā nīcaiḥ sapatnān mama pādayāthaḥ /
analyzed: indra agnī kāma sa ratham hi bhūtvā nīcaiḥ sapatnān mama pādayāthaḥ

original: (AVŚ_9,2.9c) teṣāṃ pannānām adhamā tamāṃsy agne vāstūny anunirdaha tvam //9//
analyzed: teṣām pannānām adhamā tamāṃsi agne vāstūni anunirdaha tvam

original: (AVŚ_9,2.10a) jahi tvam kāma mama ye sapatnā andhā tamāṃsy ava pādayainān /
analyzed: jahi tvam kāma mama ye sapatnāḥ andhā tamāṃsi ava pādaya enān

original: (AVŚ_9,2.10c) nirindriyā arasāḥ santu sarve mā te jīviṣuḥ katamac canāhaḥ //10// {3}
analyzed: nirindriyāḥ arasāḥ santu sarve mā te jīviṣuḥ katamat cana ahar

original: (AVŚ_9,2.11a) avadhīt kāmo mama ye sapatnā uruṃ lokam akaran mahyam edhatum /
analyzed: avadhīt kāmaḥ mama ye sapatnāḥ urum lokam akarat mahyam edhatum

original: (AVŚ_9,2.11c) mahyaṃ namantāṃ pradiśaś catasro mahyaṃ ṣaḍ urvīr ghṛtam ā vahantu //11//
analyzed: mahyam namantām pradiśaḥ catasraḥ mahyam ṣaḍ urvīḥ ghṛtam ā vahantu

original: (AVŚ_9,2.12a) te 'dharāñcaḥ pra plavantāṃ chinnā naur iva bandhanāt /
analyzed: te dharāñcaḥ pra plavantām chinnā nauḥ iva bandhanāt

original: (AVŚ_9,2.12c) na sāyakapraṇuttānāṃ punar asti nivartanam //12//
analyzed: na sāyaka praṇuttānām punar asti nivartanam

original: (AVŚ_9,2.13a) agnir yava indro yavaḥ somo yavaḥ /
analyzed: agniḥ yavaḥ indraḥ yavaḥ somaḥ yavaḥ

original: (AVŚ_9,2.13c) yavayāvāno devā yavayantv enam //13//
analyzed: yava yāvānaḥ devāḥ yavayantu enam

original: (AVŚ_9,2.14a) asarvavīraś caratu praṇutto dveṣyo mitrānāṃ parivargyaḥ svānām /
analyzed: a sarva vīraḥ caratu praṇuttaḥ dveṣyaḥ mitrānām parivargyaḥ svānām

original: (AVŚ_9,2.14c) uta pṛthivyām ava syanti vidyuta ugro vo devaḥ pra mṛṇat sapatnān //14//
analyzed: uta pṛthivyām ava syanti vidyutaḥ ugraḥ vaḥ devaḥ pra mṛṇat sapatnān

original: (AVŚ_9,2.15a) cyutā ceyaṃ bṛhaty acyutā ca vidyud bibharti stanayitnūṃś ca sarvān /
analyzed: cyutā ca iyam bṛhatī acyutā ca vidyut bibharti stanayitnūn ca sarvān

original: (AVŚ_9,2.15c) udyann ādityo draviṇena tejasā nīcaiḥ sapatnān nudatāṃ me sahasvān //15//
analyzed: udyan ādityaḥ draviṇena tejasā nīcaiḥ sapatnān nudatām me sahasvān

original: (AVŚ_9,2.16a) yat te kāma śarma trivarūtham udbhu brahma varma vitatam anativyādhyaṃ kṛtam /
analyzed: yat te kāma śarma tri varūtham udbhu brahma varma vitatam an ativyādhyam kṛtam

original: (AVŚ_9,2.16c) tena sapatnān pari vṛṅgdhi ye mama pary enān prāṇaḥ paśavo jīvanaṃ vṛṇaktu //16//
analyzed: tena sapatnān pari vṛṅgdhi ye mama pari enān prāṇaḥ paśavaḥ jīvanam vṛṇaktu

original: (AVŚ_9,2.17a) yena devā asurān prāṇudanta yenendro dasyūn adhamaṃ tamo nināya /
analyzed: yena devāḥ asurān prāṇudanta yena indraḥ dasyūn adhamam tamaḥ nināya

original: (AVŚ_9,2.17c) tena tvaṃ kāma mama ye sapatnās tān asmāl lokāt pra ṇudasva dūram //17//
analyzed: tena tvam kāma mama ye sapatnāḥ tān asmāt lokāt pra nudasva dūram

original: (AVŚ_9,2.18a) yathā devā asurān prāṇudanta yathendro dasyūn adhamaṃ tamo babādhe /
analyzed: yathā devāḥ asurān prāṇudanta yathā indraḥ dasyūn adhamam tamaḥ babādhe

original: (AVŚ_9,2.18c) tathā tvaṃ kāma mama ye sapatnās tān asmāl lokāt pra ṇudasva dūram //18//
analyzed: tathā tvam kāma mama ye sapatnāḥ tān asmāt lokāt pra nudasva dūram

original: (AVŚ_9,2.19a) kāmo jajñe prathamo nainaṃ devā āpuḥ pitaro na martyāḥ /
analyzed: kāmaḥ jajñe prathamaḥ na enam devāḥ āpuḥ pitaraḥ na martyāḥ

original: (AVŚ_9,2.19c) tatas tvam asi jyāyān viśvahā mahāṃs tasmai te kāma nama it kṛnomi //19//
analyzed: tatas tvam asi jyāyān viśvahā mahān tasmai te kāma namaḥ id kṛnomi

original: (AVŚ_9,2.20a) yāvatī dyāvāpṛthivī varimṇā yāvad āpaḥ siṣyadur yāvad agniḥ /
analyzed: yāvatī dyāvāpṛthivī varimṇā yāvat āpaḥ siṣyaduḥ yāvat agniḥ

original: (AVŚ_9,2.20c) tatas tvam asi jyāyān viśvahā mahāṃs tasmai te kāma nama it kṛṇomi //20// {4}
analyzed: tatas tvam asi jyāyān viśvahā mahān tasmai te kāma namaḥ id kṛṇomi

original: (AVŚ_9,2.21a) yāvatīr diśaḥ pradiśo viṣūcīr yāvatīr āśā abhicakṣaṇā divaḥ /
analyzed: yāvatīḥ diśaḥ pradiśaḥ viṣūcīḥ yāvatīḥ āśāḥ abhicakṣaṇāḥ divaḥ

original: (AVŚ_9,2.21c) tatas tvam asi jyāyān viśvahā mahāṃs tasmai te kāma nama it kṛṇomi //21//
analyzed: tatas tvam asi jyāyān viśvahā mahān tasmai te kāma namaḥ id kṛṇomi

original: (AVŚ_9,2.22a) yāvatīr bhṛṅgā jatvaḥ kurūravo yāvatīr vaghā vṛkṣasarpyo babhūvuḥ /
analyzed: yāvatīḥ bhṛṅgāḥ jatvaḥ kurūravaḥ yāvatīḥ vaghāḥ vṛkṣasarpyaḥ babhūvuḥ

original: (AVŚ_9,2.22c) tatas tvam asi jyāyān viśvahā mahāṃs tasmai te kāma nama it kṛṇomi //22//
analyzed: tatas tvam asi jyāyān viśvahā mahān tasmai te kāma namaḥ id kṛṇomi

original: (AVŚ_9,2.23a) jyāyān nimiṣato 'si tiṣṭhato jyāyānt samudrād asi kāma manyo /
analyzed: jyāyān nimiṣataḥ si tiṣṭhataḥ jyāyān samudrāt asi kāma manyo

original: (AVŚ_9,2.23c) tatas tvam asi jyāyān viśvahā mahāṃs tasmai te kāma nama it kṛnomi //23//
analyzed: tatas tvam asi jyāyān viśvahā mahān tasmai te kāma namaḥ id kṛnomi

original: (AVŚ_9,2.24a) na vai vātaś cana kāmam āpnoti nāgniḥ sūryo nota candramāḥ /
analyzed: na vai vātaḥ cana kāmam āpnoti na agniḥ sūryaḥ na uta candramāḥ

original: (AVŚ_9,2.24c) tatas tvam asi jyāyān viśvahā mahāṃs tasmai te kāma nama it kṛṇomi //24//
analyzed: tatas tvam asi jyāyān viśvahā mahān tasmai te kāma namaḥ id kṛṇomi

original: (AVŚ_9,2.25a) yās te śivās tanvaḥ kāma bhadrā yābhiḥ satyaṃ bhavati yad vṛṇiṣe /
analyzed: yāḥ te śivāḥ tanvaḥ kāma bhadrāḥ yābhiḥ satyam bhavati yat vṛṇiṣe

original: (AVŚ_9,2.25c) tābhiṣ ṭvam asmāṃ abhisaṃviśasvānyatra pāpīr apa veśayā dhiyaḥ //25// {5}
analyzed: tābhiḥ tvam asmām abhisaṃviśasva anyatra pāpīḥ apa veśaya dhiyaḥ

original: (AVŚ_9,3.1a) upamitāṃ pratimitām atho parimitām uta /
analyzed: upamitām pratimitām atha u parimitām uta

original: (AVŚ_9,3.1c) śālāyā viśvavārāyā naddhāni vi cṛtāmasi //1//
analyzed: śālāyāḥ viśva vārāyāḥ naddhāni vi cṛtāmasi

original: (AVŚ_9,3.2a) yat te naddhaṃ viśvavāre pāśo granthiś ca yaḥ kṛtaḥ /
analyzed: yat te naddham viśva vāre pāśaḥ granthiḥ ca yaḥ kṛtaḥ

original: (AVŚ_9,3.2c) bṛhaspatir ivāhaṃ balaṃ vācā vi sraṃsayāmi tat //2//
analyzed: bṛhaspatiḥ iva aham balam vācā vi sraṃsayāmi tat

original: (AVŚ_9,3.3a) ā yayāma saṃ babarha granthīṃś cakāra te dṛḍhān /
analyzed: ā yayāma sam babarha granthīn cakāra te dṛḍhān

original: (AVŚ_9,3.3c) parūṃṣi vidvāṃ chastevendreṇa vi cṛtāmasi //3//
analyzed: parūṃṣi vidvān śastā iva indreṇa vi cṛtāmasi

original: (AVŚ_9,3.4a) vaṃśānāṃ te nahanānāṃ prāṇāhasya tṛṇasya ca /
analyzed: vaṃśānām te nahanānām prāṇāhasya tṛṇasya ca

original: (AVŚ_9,3.4c) pakṣāṇāṃ viśvavāre te naddhāni vi cṛtāmasi //4//
analyzed: pakṣāṇām viśva vāre te naddhāni vi cṛtāmasi

original: (AVŚ_9,3.5a) saṃdaṃśānāṃ paladānāṃ pariṣvañjalyasya ca /
analyzed: saṃdaṃśānām paladānām pariṣvañjalyasya ca

original: (AVŚ_9,3.5c) idaṃ mānasya patnyā naddhāni vi cṛtāmasi //5//
analyzed: idam mānasya patnyāḥ naddhāni vi cṛtāmasi

original: (AVŚ_9,3.6a) yāni te 'ntaḥ śikyāny ābedhū raṇyāya kam /
analyzed: yāni te ntar śikyāni ābedhuḥ raṇyāya kam

original: (AVŚ_9,3.6c) pra te tāni cṛtāmasi śivā mānasya patni na uddhitā tanve bhava //6//
analyzed: pra te tāni cṛtāmasi śivā mānasya patni naḥ uddhitā tanve bhava

original: (AVŚ_9,3.7a) havirdhānam agniśālaṃ patnīnāṃ sadanaṃ sadaḥ /
analyzed: havirdhānam agni śālam patnīnām sadanam sadaḥ

original: (AVŚ_9,3.7c) sado devānām asi devi śāle //7//
analyzed: sadaḥ devānām asi devi śāle

original: (AVŚ_9,3.8a) akṣum opaśaṃ vitataṃ sahasrākṣaṃ viṣūvati /
analyzed: akṣum opaśam vitatam sahasra akṣam viṣūvati

original: (AVŚ_9,3.8c) avanaddham abhihitaṃ brahmaṇā vi cṛtāmasi //8//
analyzed: avanaddham abhihitam brahmaṇā vi cṛtāmasi

original: (AVŚ_9,3.9a) yas tvā śāle pratigṛhṇāti yena cāsi mitā tvam /
analyzed: yaḥ tvā śāle pratigṛhṇāti yena ca asi mitā tvam

original: (AVŚ_9,3.9c) ubhau mānasya patni tau jīvatāṃ jaradaṣṭī //9//
analyzed: ubhau mānasya patni tau jīvatām jaradaṣṭī

original: (AVŚ_9,3.10a) amutrainam ā gachatād dṛḍhā naddhā pariṣkṛtā /
analyzed: amutra enam ā gacchatāt dṛḍhā naddhā pariṣkṛtā

original: (AVŚ_9,3.10c) yasyās te vicṛtāmasy aṅgamaṅgaṃ paruṣparuḥ //10// {6}
analyzed: yasyāḥ te vicṛtāmasi aṅgam aṅgam paruḥ paruḥ

original: (AVŚ_9,3.11a) yas tvā śāle nimimāya saṃjabhāra vanaspatīn /
analyzed: yaḥ tvā śāle nimimāya saṃjabhāra vanaspatīn

original: (AVŚ_9,3.11c) prajāyai cakre tvā śāle parameṣṭhī prajāpatiḥ //11//
analyzed: prajāyai cakre tvā śāle parameṣṭhī prajāpatiḥ

original: (AVŚ_9,3.12a) namas tasmai namo dātre śālāpataye ca kṛṇmaḥ /
analyzed: namaḥ tasmai namaḥ dātre śālā pataye ca kṛṇmaḥ

original: (AVŚ_9,3.12c) namo 'gnaye pracarate puruṣāya ca te namaḥ //12//
analyzed: namaḥ gnaye pracarate puruṣāya ca te namaḥ

original: (AVŚ_9,3.13a) gobhyo aśvebhyo namo yac chālāyāṃ vijāyate /
analyzed: gobhyaḥ aśvebhyaḥ namaḥ yat śālāyām vijāyate

original: (AVŚ_9,3.13c) vijāvati prajāvati vi te pāśāṃś cṛtāmasi //13//
analyzed: vijāvati prajāvati vi te pāśān cṛtāmasi

original: (AVŚ_9,3.14a) agnim antaś chādayasi puruṣān paśubhiḥ saha /

analyzed: ā naya etam ā rabhasva sukṛtām lokam api gacchatu prajānan

analyzed: indrāya bhāgam pari tvā nayāmi asmin yajñe yajamānāya sūrim

analyzed: ye naḥ dviṣanti anu tān rabhasva anāgasaḥ yajamānasya vīrāḥ

analyzed: tīrtvā tamāṃsi bahudhā vipaśyan ajaḥ nākam ā kramatām tṛtīyam

analyzed: ṛcā kumbhīm adhi agnau śrayāmi ā siñca udakam ava dhehi enam
