original: (AVŚ_9,5.7a) ajo agnir ajam u jyotir āhur ajaṃ jīvatā brahmaṇe deyam āhuḥ /
analyzed: ajaḥ agniḥ ajam u jyotiḥ āhuḥ ajam jīvatā brahmaṇe deyam āhuḥ

original: (AVŚ_9,5.7c) ajas tamāṃsy apa hanti dūram asmiṃl loke śraddadhānena dattaḥ //7//
analyzed: ajaḥ tamāṃsi apa hanti dūram asmin loke śraddadhānena dattaḥ

original: (AVŚ_9,5.8a) pañcaudanaḥ pañcadhā vi kramatām ākraṃsyamānas trīṇi jyotīṃṣi /
analyzed: pañca odanaḥ pañcadhā vi kramatām ākraṃsyamānaḥ trīṇi jyotīṃṣi

original: (AVŚ_9,5.8c) ījānānāṃ sukṛtāṃ prehi madhyaṃ tṛtīye nāke adhi vi śrayasva //8//
analyzed: ījānānām su kṛtām prehi madhyam tṛtīye nāke adhi vi śrayasva

original: (AVŚ_9,5.9a) ajā roha sukṛtāṃ yatra lokaḥ śarabho na catto 'ti durgāny eṣaḥ /
analyzed: aja ā roha su kṛtām yatra lokaḥ śarabhaḥ na durgāni eṣaḥ

original: (AVŚ_9,5.9c) pañcaudano brahmaṇe dīyamānaḥ sa dātāraṃ tṛptyā tarpayāti //9//
analyzed: pañca odanaḥ brahmaṇe dīyamānaḥ sa dātāram tṛptyā tarpayāti

original: (AVŚ_9,5.10a) ajas trināke tridive tripṛṣṭhe nākasya pṛṣṭhe dadivāṃsaṃ dadhāti /
analyzed: ajaḥ tri nāke tridive tri pṛṣṭhe nākasya pṛṣṭhe dadivāṃsam dadhāti

original: (AVŚ_9,5.10c) pañcaudano brahmaṇe dīyamāno viśvarūpā dhenuḥ kāmadughāsy ekā //10// {11}
analyzed: pañca odanaḥ brahmaṇe dīyamānaḥ viśva rūpā dhenuḥ kāmadughā asi ekā  /

original: (AVŚ_9,5.11a) etad vo jyotiḥ pitaras tṛtīyaṃ pañcaudanaṃ brahmaṇe 'jaṃ dadāti /
analyzed: etat vaḥ jyotiḥ pitaraḥ tṛtīyam pañca odanam brahmaṇe jam dadāti

original: (AVŚ_9,5.11c) ajas tamāṃsy apa hanti dūram asmiṃl loke śraddadhānena dattaḥ //11//
analyzed: ajaḥ tamāṃsi apa hanti dūram asmin loke śraddadhānena dattaḥ

original: (AVŚ_9,5.12a) ījānānāṃ sukṛtāṃ lokam īpsan pañcaudanaṃ brahmaṇe 'jaṃ dadāti /
analyzed: ījānānām sukṛtām lokam īpsan pañca odanam brahmaṇe jam dadāti

original: (AVŚ_9,5.12c) sa vyāptim abhi lokaṃ jayaitaṃ śivo 'smabhyaṃ pratigṛhīto astu //12//
analyzed: sa vyāptim abhi lokam jaya etam śivaḥ smabhyam pratigṛhītaḥ astu

original: (AVŚ_9,5.13a) ajo hy agner ajaniṣṭa śokād vipro viprasya sahaso vipaścit /
analyzed: ajaḥ hi agneḥ ajaniṣṭa śokāt vipraḥ viprasya sahasaḥ vipaścit

original: (AVŚ_9,5.13c) iṣṭaṃ pūrtam abhipūrtaṃ vaṣaṭkṛtaṃ tad devā ṛtuśaḥ kalpayantu //13//
analyzed: iṣṭam pūrtam abhipūrtam vaṣaṭkṛtam tat devāḥ ṛtuśas kalpayantu

original: (AVŚ_9,5.14a) amotaṃ vāso dadyād dhiraṇyam api dakṣiṇām /
analyzed: amā ūtam vāsaḥ dadyāt hiraṇyam api dakṣiṇām

original: (AVŚ_9,5.14c) tathā lokānt sam āpnoti ye divyā ye ca pārthivāḥ //14//
analyzed: tathā lokān sam āpnoti ye divyāḥ ye ca pārthivāḥ

original: (AVŚ_9,5.15a) etās tvājopa yantu dhārāḥ somyā devīr ghṛtapṛṣṭhā madhuścutaḥ /
analyzed: etāḥ tvā aja upa yantu dhārāḥ somyāḥ devīḥ ghṛta pṛṣṭhāḥ madhuścutaḥ

original: (AVŚ_9,5.15c) stabhān pṛthivīm uta dyāṃ nākasya pṛṣṭhe 'dhi saptaraśmau //15//
analyzed: stabhān pṛthivīm uta dyām nākasya pṛṣṭhe dhi sapta raśmau

original: (AVŚ_9,5.16a) ajo 'sy aja svargo 'si tvayā lokam aṅgirasaḥ prājānan /
analyzed: ajaḥ si aja svargaḥ si tvayā lokam aṅgirasaḥ prājānan

original: (AVŚ_9,5.16c) taṃ lokaṃ puṇyaṃ pra jñeṣam //16//
analyzed: tam lokam puṇyam pra jñeṣam

original: (AVŚ_9,5.17a) yenā sahasraṃ vahasi yenāgne sarvavedasam /
analyzed: yena sahasram vahasi yena agne sarvavedasam

original: (AVŚ_9,5.17c) tenemaṃ yajñaṃ no vaha svar deveṣu gantave //17//
analyzed: tena imam yajñam naḥ vaha svar deveṣu gantave

original: (AVŚ_9,5.18a) ajaḥ pakvaḥ svarge loke dadhāti pañcaudano nirṛtiṃ bādhamānaḥ /
analyzed: ajaḥ pakvaḥ svarge loke dadhāti pañca odanaḥ nirṛtim bādhamānaḥ

original: (AVŚ_9,5.18c) tena lokānt sūryavato jayema //18//
analyzed: tena lokān sūryavataḥ jayema

original: (AVŚ_9,5.19a) yaṃ brāhmaṇe nidadhe yaṃ ca vikṣu yā vipruṣa odanānām ajasya /
analyzed: yam brāhmaṇe nidadhe yam ca vikṣu yāḥ vipruṣaḥ odanānām ajasya

original: (AVŚ_9,5.19c) sarvaṃ tad agne sukṛtasya loke jānītān naḥ saṃgamane pathīnām //19//
analyzed: sarvam tat agne sukṛtasya loke jānītāt naḥ saṃgamane pathīnām

original: (AVŚ_9,5.20a) ajo vā idam agne vy akramata tasyora iyam abhavad dyauḥ pṛṣṭiham /
analyzed: ajaḥ vai idam agne vi akramata tasya uraḥ iyam abhavat dyauḥ pṛṣṭiham

original: (AVŚ_9,5.20c) antarikṣaṃ madhyam diśaḥ pārśve samudrau kukṣī //20// {12}
analyzed: antarikṣam madhyam diśaḥ pārśve samudrau kukṣī

original: (AVŚ_9,5.21a) satyaṃ ca rtaṃ ca cakṣuṣī viśvaṃ satyaṃ śraddhā prāṇo virāṭ śiraḥ /
analyzed: satyam ca ṛtam ca cakṣuṣī viśvam satyam śraddhā prāṇaḥ virāj śiraḥ

original: (AVŚ_9,5.21c) eṣa vā aparimito yajño yad ajaḥ pañcaudanaḥ //21//
analyzed: eṣa vai aparimitaḥ yajñaḥ yat ajaḥ pañca odanaḥ

original: (AVŚ_9,5.22a) aparimitam eva yajñam āpnoty aparimitaṃ lokam ava runddhe /
analyzed: aparimitam eva yajñam āpnoti aparimitam lokam ava runddhe

original: (AVŚ_9,5.22c) yo 'jaṃ pañcaudanaṃ dakṣiṇājyotiṣaṃ dadāti //22//
analyzed: yaḥ jam pañca odanam dakṣiṇā jyotiṣam dadāti

original: (AVŚ_9,5.23a) nāsyāsthīni bhindyān na majjño nir dhayet /
analyzed: na asya asthīni bhindyāt na majjñaḥ niḥ dhayet

original: (AVŚ_9,5.23c) sarvam enaṃ samādāyedamidaṃ pra veśayet //23//
analyzed: sarvam enam samādāya idam idam pra veśayet

original: (AVŚ_9,5.24a) idamidam evāsya rūpaṃ bhavati tenainaṃ saṃ gamayati /
analyzed: idam idam eva asya rūpam bhavati tena enam sam gamayati

original: (AVŚ_9,5.24c) iṣaṃ maha ūrjam asmai duhe yo 'jaṃ pañcaudanam dakṣiṇājyotiṣaṃ dadāti //24//
analyzed: iṣam mahaḥ ūrjam asmai duhe yaḥ jam pañca odanam dakṣiṇā jyotiṣam dadāti

original: (AVŚ_9,5.25a) pañca rukmā pañca navāni vastrā pañcāsmai dhenavaḥ kāmadughā bhavanti /
analyzed: pañca rukmā pañca navāni vastrā pañca asmai dhenavaḥ kāmadughāḥ bhavanti

original: (AVŚ_9,5.25c) yo 'jaṃ pañcaudanaṃ dakṣiṇājyotiṣaṃ dadāti //25//
analyzed: yaḥ jam pañca odanam dakṣiṇā jyotiṣam dadāti

original: (AVŚ_9,5.26a) pañca rukmā jyotir asmai bhavanti varma vāsāṃsi tanve bhavanti /
analyzed: pañca rukmāḥ jyotiḥ asmai bhavanti varma vāsāṃsi tanve bhavanti

original: (AVŚ_9,5.26c) svargaṃ lokam aśnute yo 'jaṃ pañcaudanaṃ dakṣiṇājyotiṣam dadāti //26//
analyzed: svargam lokam aśnute yaḥ jam pañca odanam dakṣiṇā jyotiṣam dadāti

original: (AVŚ_9,5.27a) yā pūrvaṃ patiṃ vittvā 'thānyaṃ vindate 'param /
analyzed: yā pūrvam patim vittvā thā anyam vindate param

original: (AVŚ_9,5.27c) pañcaudanaṃ ca tāv ajaṃ dadāto na vi yoṣataḥ //27//
analyzed: pañca odanam ca tau ajam dadātaḥ na vi yoṣataḥ

original: (AVŚ_9,5.28a) samānaloko bhavati punarbhuvāparaḥ patiḥ /
analyzed: samāna lokaḥ bhavati punarbhuvā aparaḥ patiḥ

original: (AVŚ_9,5.28c) yo 'jaṃ pañcaudanam dakṣiṇājyotiṣaṃ dadāti //28//
analyzed: yaḥ jam pañca odanam dakṣiṇā jyotiṣam dadāti

original: (AVŚ_9,5.29a) anupūrvavatsāṃ dhenum anaḍvāham upabarhaṇam /
analyzed: anupūrva vatsām dhenum anaḍvāham upabarhaṇam

original: (AVŚ_9,5.29c) vāso hiraṇyaṃ dattvā te yanti divam uttamām //29//
analyzed: vāsaḥ hiraṇyam dattvā te yanti divam uttamām

original: (AVŚ_9,5.30a) ātmānaṃ pitaraṃ putraṃ pautraṃ pitāmaham /
analyzed: ātmānam pitaram putram pautram pitāmaham

original: (AVŚ_9,5.30c) jāyāṃ janitrīṃ mātaraṃ ye priyās tān upa hvaye //30// {13}
analyzed: jāyām janitrīm mātaram ye priyāḥ tān upa hvaye

original: (AVŚ_9,5.31a) yo vai naidāghaṃ nāma rtuṃ veda /
analyzed: yaḥ vai naidāgham nāma ṛtum veda

original: (AVŚ_9,5.31c) eṣa vai naidāgho nāma rtur yad ajaḥ pañcaudanaḥ /
analyzed: eṣa vai naidāghaḥ nāma rtuḥ yat ajaḥ pañca odanaḥ

original: (AVŚ_9,5.31e) nir evāpriyasya bhrātṛvyasya śriyaṃ dahati bhavaty ātmanā /
analyzed: niḥ eva apriyasya bhrātṛvyasya śriyam dahati bhavati ātmanā

original: (AVŚ_9,5.32a) yo vai kurvantaṃ nāma rtuṃ veda /
analyzed: yaḥ vai kurvantam nāma ṛtum veda

original: (AVŚ_9,5.32c) kurvatīṃkurvatīm evāpriyasya bhrātṛvyasya śriyaṃ ā datte /
analyzed: kurvatīm kurvatīm eva apriyasya bhrātṛvyasya śriyam ā datte

original: (AVŚ_9,5.32e) eṣa vai kurvan nāma rtur yad ajaḥ pañcaudanaḥ /
analyzed: eṣa vai kurvan nāma rtuḥ yat ajaḥ pañca odanaḥ

original: (AVŚ_9,5.33a) yo vai saṃyantaṃ nāma rtuṃ veda /
analyzed: yaḥ vai saṃyantam nāma ṛtum veda

original: (AVŚ_9,5.33c) saṃyatīṃsaṃyatīm evāpriyasya bhrātṛvyasya śriyaṃ ā datte /
analyzed: saṃyatīm saṃyatīm eva apriyasya bhrātṛvyasya śriyam ā datte

original: (AVŚ_9,5.33e) eṣa vai saṃyan nāma rtur yad ajaḥ pañcaudanaḥ /
analyzed: eṣa vai saṃyat nāma rtuḥ yat ajaḥ pañca odanaḥ

original: (AVŚ_9,5.34a) yo vai pinvantaṃ nāma rtum veda /
analyzed: yaḥ vai pinvantam nāma ṛtum veda

original: (AVŚ_9,5.34c) pinvatīṃpinvatīm evāpriyasya bhrātṛvyasya śriyaṃ ā datte /
analyzed: pinvatīm pinvatīm eva apriyasya bhrātṛvyasya śriyam ā datte

original: (AVŚ_9,5.34e) eṣa vai pinvan nāma rtur yad ajaḥ pañcaudanaḥ /
analyzed: eṣa vai pinvan nāma rtuḥ yat ajaḥ pañca odanaḥ

original: (AVŚ_9,5.35a) yo vā udyantaṃ nāma rtuṃ veda /
analyzed: yaḥ vai udyantam nāma ṛtum veda

original: (AVŚ_9,5.35c) udyatīṃudyatīm evāpriyasya bhrātṛvyasya śriyaṃ ā datte /
analyzed: udyatīm udyatīm eva apriyasya bhrātṛvyasya śriyam ā datte

original: (AVŚ_9,5.35e) eṣa vā udyann nāma rtur yad ajaḥ pañcaudanaḥ /
analyzed: eṣa vai udyan nāma rtuḥ yat ajaḥ pañca odanaḥ

original: (AVŚ_9,5.36a) yo vā abhibhuvaṃ nāma rtuṃ veda /
analyzed: yaḥ vai abhibhuvam nāma rtum veda

original: (AVŚ_9,5.36c) abhibhavantīmabhibhavantīm evāpriyasya bhrātṛvyasya śriyaṃ ā datte /
analyzed: abhibhavantīm abhibhavantīm eva apriyasya bhrātṛvyasya śriyam ā datte

original: (AVŚ_9,5.36e) eṣa vā abhibhūr nāma rtur yad ajaḥ pañcaudanaḥ /
analyzed: eṣa vai abhibhūḥ nāma rtuḥ yat ajaḥ pañca odanaḥ

original: (AVŚ_9,5.37a) ajaṃ ca pacata pañca caudanān /
analyzed: ajam ca pacata pañca ca odanān

original: (AVŚ_9,5.37c) sarvā diśaḥ saṃmanasaḥ sadhrīcīḥ sāntardeśāḥ prati gṛhnantu ta etam //37//
analyzed: sarvāḥ diśaḥ saṃmanasaḥ sadhrīcīḥ sa antardeśāḥ prati gṛhnantu te etam

original: (AVŚ_9,5.38a) tās te rakṣantu tava tubhyam etaṃ tābhya ājyaṃ havir idaṃ juhomi //38// {14}
analyzed: tāḥ te rakṣantu tava tubhyam etam tābhyaḥ ājyam haviḥ idam juhomi

original: (AVŚ_9,6.1a) yo vidyād brahma pratyakṣaṃ parūṃṣi yasya saṃbhārā ṛco yasyānūkyam //1//
analyzed: yaḥ vidyāt brahma pratyakṣam parūṃṣi yasya saṃbhārāḥ ṛcaḥ yasya anūkyam

original: (AVŚ_9,6.2a) sāmāni yasya lomāni yajur hṛdayam ucyate paristaraṇam id dhaviḥ //2//
analyzed: sāmāni yasya lomāni yajuḥ hṛdayam ucyate paristaraṇam id haviḥ

original: (AVŚ_9,6.3a) yad vā atithipatir atithīn pratipaśyati devayajanaṃ prekṣate //3//
analyzed: yat vai atithi patiḥ atithīn pratipaśyati devayajanam prekṣate

original: (AVŚ_9,6.4a) yad abhivadati dīkṣām upaiti yad udakaṃ yācaty apaḥ pra ṇayati //4//
analyzed: yat abhivadati dīkṣām upaiti yat udakam yācati apaḥ pra nayati

original: (AVŚ_9,6.5a) yā eva yajña āpaḥ praṇīyante tā eva tāḥ //5//
analyzed: yāḥ eva yajñe āpaḥ praṇīyante tāḥ eva tāḥ

original: (AVŚ_9,6.6a) yat tarpaṇam āharanti ya evāgnīṣomīyaḥ paśur badhyate sa eva saḥ //6//
analyzed: yat tarpaṇam āharanti yaḥ eva agnīṣomīyaḥ paśuḥ badhyate saḥ eva saḥ

original: (AVŚ_9,6.7a) yad āvasathān kalpayanti sadohavirdhānāny eva tat kalpayanti //7//
analyzed: yat āvasathān kalpayanti sadaḥ havirdhānāni eva tat kalpayanti

original: (AVŚ_9,6.8a) yad upastṛṇanti barhir eva tat //8//
analyzed: yat upastṛṇanti barhiḥ eva tat

original: (AVŚ_9,6.9a) yad upariśayanam āharanti svargam eva tena lokam ava runddhe //9//
analyzed: yat upariśayanam āharanti svargam eva tena lokam ava runddhe

original: (AVŚ_9,6.10a) yat kaśipūpabarhaṇam āharanti paridhaya eva te //10//
analyzed: yat kaśipu upabarhaṇam āharanti paridhayaḥ eva te

original: (AVŚ_9,6.11a) yad āñjanābhyañjanam āharanty ājyam eva tat //11//
analyzed: yat āñjana abhyañjanam āharanti ājyam eva tat

original: (AVŚ_9,6.12a) yat purā pariveṣāt svādam āharanti purodāśāv eva tau //12//
analyzed: yat purā pariveṣāt svādam āharanti purodāśau eva tau

original: (AVŚ_9,6.13a) yad aśanakṛtaṃ hvayanti haviṣkṛtam eva tad dhvayanti //13//
analyzed: yat aśana kṛtam hvayanti haviṣkṛtam eva tat dhvayanti

original: (AVŚ_9,6.14a) ye vrīhayo yavā nirupyante 'ṃśava eva te //14//
analyzed: ye vrīhayaḥ yavāḥ nirupyante ṃśavaḥ eva te

original: (AVŚ_9,6.15a) yāny ulūkhalamusalāni grāvāṇa eva te //15//
analyzed: yāni ulūkhala musalāni grāvāṇaḥ eva te

original: (AVŚ_9,6.16a) śūrpaṃ pavitraṃ tuṣā ṛjīṣābhiṣavaṇīr āpaḥ //16//
analyzed: śūrpam pavitram tuṣāḥ ṛjīṣa abhiṣavaṇīḥ āpaḥ

original: (AVŚ_9,6.17a) srug darvir nekṣaṇam āyavanaṃ droṇakalaśāḥ kumbhyo vāyavyāni pātrāṇīyam eva kṛṣṇājinam //17// {15}
analyzed: sruc darviḥ nekṣaṇam āyavanam droṇakalaśāḥ kumbhyaḥ vāyavyāni pātrāṇi iyam eva kṛṣṇājinam

original: (AVŚ_9,6.18a) yajamānabrāhmaṇaṃ vā etad atithipatiḥ kurute yad āhāryāṇi prekṣata idaṃ bhūyā3 idā3m iti //18//
analyzed: yajamāna brāhmaṇam vai etat atithi patiḥ kurute yat āhāryāṇi prekṣate idam bhūyāḥ iti

original: (AVŚ_9,6.19a) yad āha bhūya ud dhareti prāṇam eva tena varṣīyāṃsaṃ kurute //19//
analyzed: yat āha bhūyaḥ ud hara iti prāṇam eva tena varṣīyāṃsam kurute

original: (AVŚ_9,6.20a) upa harati havīṃṣy ā sādayati //20//
analyzed: upa harati havīṃṣi ā sādayati

original: (AVŚ_9,6.21a) teṣām āsannānām atithir ātman juhoti //21//
analyzed: teṣām āsannānām atithiḥ ātman juhoti

original: (AVŚ_9,6.22a) srucā hastena prāṇe yūpe srukkāreṇa vaṣaṭkāreṇa //22//
analyzed: srucā hastena prāṇe yūpe srukkāreṇa vaṣaṭkāreṇa

original: (AVŚ_9,6.23a) ete vai priyāś cāpriyāś ca rtvijaḥ svargaṃ lokaṃ gamayanti yad atithayaḥ //23//
analyzed: ete vai priyāḥ ca apriyāḥ ca ṛtvijaḥ svargam lokam gamayanti yat atithayaḥ

original: (AVŚ_9,6.24a) sa ya evaṃ vidvān na dviṣann aśnīyān na dviṣato 'nnam aśnīyān na mīmāṃsitasya na mīmāṃsamānasya //24//
analyzed: sa yaḥ evam vidvān na dviṣan aśnīyāt na dviṣataḥ annam aśnīyāt na mīmāṃsitasya na mīmāṃsamānasya

original: (AVŚ_9,6.25a) sarvo vā eṣa jagdhapāpmā yasyānnam aśnanti //25//
analyzed: sarvaḥ vai eṣa jagdha pāpmā yasya annam aśnanti

original: (AVŚ_9,6.26a) sarvo vā eso 'jagdhapāpmā yasyānnam nāśnanti //26//
analyzed: sarvaḥ vai eṣaḥ jagdha pāpmā yasya annam na aśnanti

original: (AVŚ_9,6.27a) sarvadā vā eṣa yuktagrāvārdrapavitro vitatādhvara āhṛtayajñakratur ya upaharati //27//
analyzed: sarvadā vai eṣa yukta grāvā ārdra pavitraḥ vitata adhvaraḥ āhṛta yajña kratuḥ yaḥ upaharati

original: (AVŚ_9,6.28a) prājāpatyo vā etasya yajño vitato ya upaharati //28//

original: (AVŚ_9,8.4c) sarvaṃ śīrṣanyaṃ te rogaṃ bahir nir mantrayāmahe //4//

analyzed: apaśyam gopām a nipadyamānam ā ca parā ca pathibhiḥ carantam

original: (AVŚ_9,10.11c) sa sadhrīcīḥ sa viṣūcīr vasāna ā varīvarti bhuvaneṣv antaḥ //11//
analyzed: sa sadhrīcīḥ sa viṣūcīḥ vasānaḥ ā varīvarti bhuvaneṣu antar

original: (AVŚ_9,10.12a) dyaur naḥ pitā janitā nābhir atra bandhur no mātā pṛthivī mahīyam /
analyzed: dyauḥ naḥ pitā janitā nābhiḥ atra bandhuḥ naḥ mātā pṛthivī mahī iyam

original: (AVŚ_9,10.12c) uttānayoś camvor yonir antar atrā pitā duhitur garbham ādhāt //12//
analyzed: uttānayoḥ camvoḥ yoniḥ antar atrā pitā duhituḥ garbham ādhāt

original: (AVŚ_9,10.13a) pṛchāmi tvā param antaṃ pṛthivyāḥ pṛchāmi vṛṣṇo aśvasya retaḥ /
analyzed: pṛcchāmi tvā param antam pṛthivyāḥ pṛcchāmi vṛṣṇaḥ aśvasya retaḥ

original: (AVŚ_9,10.13c) pṛchāmi viśvasya bhuvanasya nābhiṃ pṛchāmi vācaḥ paramaṃ vyoma //13//
analyzed: pṛcchāmi viśvasya bhuvanasya nābhim pṛcchāmi vācaḥ paramam vyoma

original: (AVŚ_9,10.14a) iyaṃ vediḥ paro antaḥ pṛthivyā ayaṃ somo vṛṣṇo aśvasya retaḥ /
analyzed: iyam vediḥ paraḥ antaḥ pṛthivyāḥ ayam somaḥ vṛṣṇaḥ aśvasya retaḥ

original: (AVŚ_9,10.14c) ayaṃ yajño viśvasya bhuvanasya nābhir brahmāyaṃ vācaḥ paramaṃ vyoma //14//
analyzed: ayam yajñaḥ viśvasya bhuvanasya nābhiḥ brahmā ayam vācaḥ paramam vyoma

original: (AVŚ_9,10.15a) na vi jānāmi yad ivedam asmi niṇyaḥ saṃnaddho manasā carāmi /
analyzed: na vi jānāmi yat iva idam asmi niṇyaḥ saṃnaddhaḥ manasā carāmi

original: (AVŚ_9,10.15c) yadā māgan prathamajā ṛtasyād id vāco aśnuve bhāgam asyāḥ //15//
analyzed: yadā mā agan prathama jāḥ ṛtasya āt id vācaḥ aśnuve bhāgam asyāḥ

original: (AVŚ_9,10.16a) apāṅ prāṅ eti svadhayā gṛbhīto 'martyo martyenā sayoniḥ /
analyzed: apāṅ prāṅ eti svadhayā gṛbhītaḥ martyaḥ martyena sa yoniḥ

original: (AVŚ_9,10.16c) tā śaśvantā viṣūcīnā viyantā ny anyaṃ cikyur na ni cikyur anyam //16//

original: (AVŚ_9,10.17a) saptārdhagarbhā bhuvanasya reto viṣṇos tiṣṭhanti pradiśā vidharmaṇi /
analyzed: sapta ardha garbhāḥ bhuvanasya retaḥ viṣṇoḥ tiṣṭhanti pradiśā vidharmaṇi

original: (AVŚ_9,10.17c) te dhītibhir manasā te vipaścitaḥ paribhuvaḥ pari bhavanti viśvataḥ //17//
analyzed: te dhītibhiḥ manasā te vipaścitaḥ paribhuvaḥ pari bhavanti viśvatas

original: (AVŚ_9,10.18a) ṛco akṣare parame vyoman yasmin devā adhi viśve niṣeduḥ /
analyzed: ṛcaḥ akṣare parame vyoman yasmin devāḥ adhi viśve niṣeduḥ

original: (AVŚ_9,10.18c) yas tan na veda kim ṛcā kariṣyati ya it tad vidus te amī sam āsate //18//
analyzed: yaḥ tat na veda kim ṛcā kariṣyati ye id tat viduḥ te amī sam āsate

original: (AVŚ_9,10.19a) ṛcaḥ padaṃ mātrayā kalpayanto 'rdharcena cakḷpur viśvam ejat /

original: (AVŚ_9,10.19c) tripād brahma pururūpaṃ vi taṣṭhe tena jīvanti pradiśaś catasraḥ //19//
analyzed: tri pād brahma puru rūpam vi taṣṭhe tena jīvanti pradiśaḥ catasraḥ

original: (AVŚ_9,10.20a) sūyavasād bhagavatī hi bhūyā adhā vayaṃ bhagavantaḥ syāma /
analyzed: sūyavasāt bhagavatī hi bhūyāḥ adha vayam bhagavantaḥ syāma

original: (AVŚ_9,10.20c) addhi tṛṇam aghnye viśvadānīṃ piba śuddham udakam ācarantī //20// {27}
analyzed: addhi tṛṇam aghnye viśvadānīm piba śuddham udakam ācarantī

original: (AVŚ_9,10.21a) gaur in mimāya salilāni takṣatī ekapadī dvipadī sā catuṣpadī /
analyzed: gauḥ id mimāya salilāni takṣatī ekapadī dvipadī sā catuṣpadī

original: (AVŚ_9,10.21c) aṣṭāpadī navapadī babhūvuṣī sahasrākṣarā bhuvanasya paṅktis tasyāḥ samudrā adhi vi kṣaranti //21//
analyzed: aṣṭāpadī navapadī sahasra akṣarā bhuvanasya paṅktiḥ tasyāḥ samudrāḥ adhi vi kṣaranti

original: (AVŚ_9,10.22a) kṛṣṇaṃ niyānaṃ harayaḥ suparṇā apo vasānā divam ut patanti /
analyzed: kṛṣṇam niyānam harayaḥ suparṇāḥ apaḥ vasānāḥ divam ud patanti

original: (AVŚ_9,10.22c) taṃ āvavṛtrant sadanād ṛtasyād id ghṛtena pṛthivīṃ vy ūduḥ //22//
analyzed: tam āvavṛtran sadanāt ṛtasya āt id ghṛtena pṛthivīm vi ūduḥ

analyzed: a pād eti prathamā padvatīnām kaḥ tat vām mitrāvaruṇā ciketa

original: (AVŚ_9,10.23c) garbho bhāraṃ bharaty ā cid asyā ṛtaṃ piparti anṛtaṃ ni pāti //23//

original: (AVŚ_9,10.24a) virāḍ vāg virāṭ pṛthivī virāḍ antarikṣaṃ virāṭ prajāpatiḥ /
analyzed: virāj vāc virāj pṛthivī virāj antarikṣam virāj prajāpatiḥ

original: (AVŚ_9,10.24c) virāṇ mṛtyuḥ sādhyānām adhirājo babhūva tasya bhūtaṃ bhavyaṃ vaśe sa me bhūtaṃ bhavyaṃ vaśe kṛṇotu //24//
analyzed: virāj mṛtyuḥ sādhyānām adhirājaḥ babhūva tasya bhūtam bhavyam vaśe sa me bhūtam bhavyam vaśe kṛṇotu

original: (AVŚ_9,10.25a) śakamayaṃ dhūmam ārād apaśyaṃ viṣūvatā para enāvareṇa /
analyzed: śaka mayam dhūmam ārāt apaśyam viṣūvatā paras enā avareṇa

original: (AVŚ_9,10.25c) ukṣāṇaṃ pṛśnim apacanta vīrās tāni dharmāṇi prathamāny āsan //25//

original: (AVŚ_9,10.26a) trayaḥ keśina ṛtuthā vi cakṣate saṃvatsare vapata eka eṣām /
analyzed: trayaḥ keśinaḥ ṛtuthā vi cakṣate saṃvatsare vapate ekaḥ eṣām

original: (AVŚ_9,10.26c) viśvam anyo abhicaṣṭe śacībhir dhrājir ekasya dadṛśe na rūpam //26//
analyzed: viśvam anyaḥ abhicaṣṭe śacībhiḥ dhrājiḥ ekasya dadṛśe na rūpam

original: (AVŚ_9,10.27a) catvāri vāk parimitā padāni tāni vidur brāhmaṇā ye manīṣiṇaḥ /
analyzed: catvāri vāc parimitā padāni tāni viduḥ brāhmaṇāḥ ye manīṣiṇaḥ

analyzed: guhā trīṇi nihitā na iṅgayanti turīyam vācaḥ manuṣyāḥ vadanti

original: (AVŚ_9,10.28a) indraṃ mitraṃ varuṇam agnim āhur atho divyaḥ sa suparṇo garutmān /
analyzed: indram mitram varuṇam agnim āhuḥ atha u divyaḥ sa suparṇaḥ garutmān

original: (AVŚ_9,10.28c) ekaṃ sad viprā bahudhā vadanty agniṃ yamaṃ mātariśvānam āhuḥ //28// {28}
analyzed: ekam sat viprāḥ bahudhā vadanti agnim yamam mātariśvānam āhuḥ

original: (AVŚ_10,1.1a) yāṃ kalpayanti vahatau vadhūm iva viśvarūpāṃ hastakṛtāṃ cikitsavaḥ /
analyzed: yām kalpayanti vahatau vadhūm iva viśva rūpām hasta kṛtām cikitsavaḥ

original: (AVŚ_10,1.1c) sārād etv apa nudāma enām //1//
analyzed: sārāt etu apa nudāmaḥ enām

original: (AVŚ_10,1.2a) śīrṣaṇvatī nasvatī karṇiṇī kṛtyākṛtā saṃbhṛtā viśvarūpā /
analyzed: śīrṣaṇvatī nasvatī karṇiṇī kṛtyā kṛtā saṃbhṛtā viśva rūpā

original: (AVŚ_10,1.2c) sārād etv apa nudāma enām //2//
analyzed: sārāt etu apa nudāmaḥ enām

original: (AVŚ_10,1.3a) śūdrakṛtā rājakṛtā strīkṛtā brahmabhiḥ kṛtā /
analyzed: śūdra kṛtā rāja kṛtā strī kṛtā brahmabhiḥ kṛtā

original: (AVŚ_10,1.4a) anayāham oṣadhyā sarvāḥ kṛtyā adūduṣam /
analyzed: anayā aham oṣadhyā sarvāḥ kṛtyāḥ adūduṣam

original: (AVŚ_10,1.4c) yāṃ kṣetre cakrur yāṃ goṣu yāṃ vā te puruṣeṣu //4//

analyzed: agham astu agha kṛte śapathaḥ śapathīyate

original: (AVŚ_10,1.13c) evā mat sarvaṃ durbhūtaṃ brahmanuttam apāyati //13//
analyzed: eva mat sarvam durbhūtam brahma anuttam apāyati

original: (AVŚ_10,1.14a) apa krāma nānadatī vinaddhā gardabhīva /
analyzed: apa krāma nānadatī vinaddhā gardabhī iva

original: (AVŚ_10,1.14c) kartṝn nakṣasveto nuttā brahmaṇā vīryāvatā //14//

analyzed: parāk te jyotiḥ apatham te arvāk anyatra asmat ayanā kṛṇuṣva

original: (AVŚ_10,1.16c) pareṇehi navatiṃ nāvyā ati durgāḥ srotyā mā kṣaṇiṣṭhāḥ parehi //16//

original: (AVŚ_10,1.17a) vāta iva vṛkṣān ni mṛṇīhi pādaya mā gām aśvaṃ puruṣam uc chiṣa eṣām /
analyzed: vātaḥ iva vṛkṣān ni mṛṇīhi pādaya mā gām aśvam puruṣam ud śiṣaḥ eṣām

original: (AVŚ_10,1.18c) agnau vā tvā gārhapatye 'bhiceruḥ pākaṃ santaṃ dhīratarā anāgasam //18//

original: (AVŚ_10,1.19a) upāhṛtam anubuddhaṃ nikhātaṃ vairaṃ tsāry anv avidāma kartram /
analyzed: upāhṛtam anubuddham nikhātam vairam tsāri anu avidāma kartram

original: (AVŚ_10,1.19c) tad etu yata ābhṛtaṃ tatrāśva iva vi vartatāṃ hantu kṛtyākṛtaḥ prajām //19//

original: (AVŚ_10,1.20a) svāyasā asayaḥ santi no gṛhe vidmā te kṛtye yatidhā parūṃṣi /

original: (AVŚ_10,1.20c) ut tiṣṭhaiva parehīto 'jñāte kim ihechasi //20// {2}
analyzed: ud tiṣṭha eva parehi itas jñāte kim iha ichasi

original: (AVŚ_10,1.21a) grīvās te kṛtye pādau cāpi kartsyāmi nir drava /
analyzed: grīvāḥ te kṛtye pādau ca api kartsyāmi niḥ drava

original: (AVŚ_10,1.21c) indrāgnī asmān rakṣatāṃ yau prajānāṃ prajāvatī //21//
analyzed: indra agnī asmān rakṣatām yau prajānām prajāvatī

original: (AVŚ_10,1.22a) somo rājādhipā mṛḍitā ca bhūtasya naḥ patayo mṛḍayantu //22//
analyzed: somaḥ rājā adhipāḥ mṛḍitā ca bhūtasya naḥ patayaḥ mṛḍayantu

original: (AVŚ_10,1.23a) bhavāśarvāv asyatāṃ pāpakṛte kṛtyākṛte /
analyzed: bhavāśarvau asyatām pāpa kṛte kṛtyā kṛte

original: (AVŚ_10,1.23c) duṣkṛte vidyutaṃ devahetim //23//
analyzed: duṣkṛte vidyutam deva hetim

original: (AVŚ_10,1.24a) yady eyatha dvipadī catuṣpadī kṛtyākṛtā saṃbhṛtā viśvarūpā /

original: (AVŚ_10,1.24c) seto 'ṣṭāpadī bhūtvā punaḥ parehi duchune //24//
analyzed: sā itas ṣṭāpadī bhūtvā punar parehi duchune

analyzed: abhyaktā aktā su araṃkṛtā sarvam bharantī duritam parehi

original: (AVŚ_10,1.25c) jānīhi kṛtye kartāraṃ duhiteva pitaraṃ svam //25//
analyzed: jānīhi kṛtye kartāram duhitā iva pitaram svam

original: (AVŚ_10,1.26a) parehi kṛtye mā tiṣṭho viddhasyeva padaṃ naya /
analyzed: parehi kṛtye mā tiṣṭhaḥ viddhasya iva padam naya

original: (AVŚ_10,1.26c) mṛgaḥ sa mṛgayus tvaṃ na tvā nikartum arhati //26//

original: (AVŚ_10,1.27c) uta pūrvasya nighnato ni hanty aparaḥ prati //27//
analyzed: uta pūrvasya nighnataḥ ni hanti aparaḥ prati

original: (AVŚ_10,1.28a) etad dhi śṛṇu me vaco 'thehi yata eyatha /
analyzed: etat hi śṛṇu me vacaḥ thehi yatas eyatha

original: (AVŚ_10,1.28c) yas tvā cakāra taṃ prati //28//
analyzed: yaḥ tvā cakāra tam prati

original: (AVŚ_10,1.29a) anāgohatyā vai bhīmā kṛtye mā no gām aśvaṃ puruṣaṃ vadhīḥ /
analyzed: anāgaḥ hatyā vai bhīmā kṛtye mā naḥ gām aśvam puruṣam vadhīḥ

original: (AVŚ_10,1.29c) yatrayatrāsi nihitā tatas tvot thāpayāmasi parṇāl laghīyasī bhava //29//
analyzed: yatra yatra asi nihitā tatas tvā ud thāpayāmasi parṇāt laghīyasī bhava

original: (AVŚ_10,1.30a) yadi stha tamasāvṛtā jālenabhihitā iva /
analyzed: yadi stha tamasā āvṛtāḥ jālena abhihitāḥ iva

original: (AVŚ_10,1.30c) sarvāḥ saṃlupyetaḥ kṛtyāḥ punaḥ kartre pra hiṇmasi //30//
analyzed: sarvāḥ saṃlupya itas kṛtyāḥ punar kartre pra hiṇmasi

original: (AVŚ_10,1.31a) kṛtyākṛto valagino 'bhiniṣkāriṇaḥ prajām /
analyzed: kṛtyā kṛtaḥ valaginaḥ bhiniṣkāriṇaḥ prajām

original: (AVŚ_10,1.31c) mṛṇīhi kṛtye moc chiṣo 'mūn kṛtyākṛto jahi //31//
analyzed: mṛṇīhi kṛtye mā ud śiṣaḥ mūn kṛtyā kṛtaḥ jahi

original: (AVŚ_10,1.32a) yathā sūryo mucyate tamasas pari rātriṃ jahāty uṣasaśca ketūn /
analyzed: yathā sūryaḥ mucyate tamasaḥ pari rātrim jahāti uṣasaḥ ca ketūn

original: (AVŚ_10,1.32c) evāhaṃ sarvaṃ durbhūtaṃ kartraṃ kṛtyākṛtā kṛtaṃ hastīva rajo duritaṃ jahāmi //32// {3}
analyzed: eva aham sarvam durbhūtam kartram kṛtyā kṛtā kṛtam hastī iva rajaḥ duritam jahāmi

original: (AVŚ_10,2.1a) kena pārṣṇī ābhṛte pūruṣasya kena māṃsaṃ saṃbhṛtaṃ kena gulphau /
analyzed: kena pārṣṇī ābhṛte pūruṣasya kena māṃsam saṃbhṛtam kena gulphau

original: (AVŚ_10,2.1c) kenāṅgulīḥ peśanīḥ kena khāni kenocchlaṅkhau madhyataḥ kaḥ pratiṣṭhām //1//
analyzed: kena aṅgulīḥ peśanīḥ kena khāni kena ucchlaṅkhau madhyataḥ kaḥ pratiṣṭhām

original: (AVŚ_10,2.2a) kasmān nu gulphāv adharāv akṛṇvann aṣṭhīvantāv uttarau puruṣasya /
analyzed: kasmāt nu gulphau adharau akṛṇvan aṣṭhīvantau uttarau puruṣasya

original: (AVŚ_10,2.2c) jaṅghe nirṛtya ny adadhuḥ kva svij jānunoḥ saṃdhī ka u tac ciketa //2//
analyzed: jaṅghe nirṛtya ni adadhuḥ kva svid jānunoḥ saṃdhī kaḥ u tat ciketa

original: (AVŚ_10,2.3a) catuṣṭayaṃ yujate saṃhitāntaṃ jānubhyām ūrdhvaṃ śithiraṃ kabandham /
analyzed: catuṣṭayam yujate saṃhita antam jānubhyām ūrdhvam śithiram kabandham

original: (AVŚ_10,2.3c) śroṇī yad ūrū ka u taj jajāna yābhyāṃ kusindhaṃ sudṛḍhaṃ babhūva //3//
analyzed: śroṇī yat ūrū kaḥ u tat jajāna yābhyām kusindham su dṛḍham babhūva

original: (AVŚ_10,2.4a) kati devāḥ katame ta āsan ya uro grīvāś cikyuḥ puruṣasya /
analyzed: kati devāḥ katame te āsan ye uraḥ grīvāḥ cikyuḥ puruṣasya

original: (AVŚ_10,2.4c) kati stanau vy adadhuḥ kaḥ kaphodau kati skandhān kati pṛṣṭīr acinvan //4//
analyzed: kati stanau vi adadhuḥ kaḥ kapha udau kati skandhān kati pṛṣṭīḥ acinvan

original: (AVŚ_10,2.5a) ko asya bāhū sam abharad vīryāṃ karavād iti /
analyzed: kaḥ asya bāhū sam abharat vīryām karavāt iti

original: (AVŚ_10,2.5c) aṃsau ko asya tad devaḥ kusindhe adhy ā dadhau //5//
analyzed: aṃsau kaḥ asya tat devaḥ kusindhe adhi ā dadhau

original: (AVŚ_10,2.6a) kaḥ sapta khāni vi tatarda śīrṣaṇi karṇāv imau nāsike cakṣaṇī mukham /
analyzed: kaḥ sapta khāni vi tatarda śīrṣaṇi karṇau imau nāsike cakṣaṇī mukham

original: (AVŚ_10,2.6c) yeṣāṃ purutrā vijayasya mahnani catuṣpādo dvipado yanti yāmam //6//
analyzed: yeṣām purutrā vijayasya mahnani catuṣpādaḥ dvipadaḥ yanti yāmam

original: (AVŚ_10,2.7a) hanvor hi jihvām adadhāt purūcīm adhā mahīm adhi śiśrāya vācam /
analyzed: hanvoḥ hi jihvām adadhāt purūcīm adhā mahīm adhi śiśrāya vācam

original: (AVŚ_10,2.7c) sa ā varīvarti bhuvaneṣv antar apo vasānaḥ ka u tac ciketa //7//
analyzed: saḥ ā varīvarti bhuvaneṣu antar apaḥ vasānaḥ kaḥ u tat ciketa

original: (AVŚ_10,2.8a) mastiṣkam asya yatamo lalātaṃ kakāṭikāṃ prathamo yaḥ kapālam /
analyzed: mastiṣkam asya yatamaḥ lalātam kakāṭikām prathamaḥ yaḥ kapālam

original: (AVŚ_10,2.8c) citvā cityaṃ hanvoḥ pūruṣasya divaṃ ruroha katamaḥ sa devaḥ //8//
analyzed: citvā cityam hanvoḥ pūruṣasya divam ruroha katamaḥ sa devaḥ

original: (AVŚ_10,2.9a) priyāpriyāṇi bahulā svapnaṃ saṃbādhatandyaḥ /
analyzed: priya apriyāṇi bahulā svapnam saṃbādha tandyaḥ

original: (AVŚ_10,2.9c) ānandān ugro nandāṃś ca kasmād vahati pūruṣaḥ //9//
analyzed: ānandān ugraḥ nandān ca kasmāt vahati pūruṣaḥ

original: (AVŚ_10,2.10a) ārtir avartir nirṛtiḥ kuto nu puruṣe 'matiḥ /
analyzed: ārtiḥ avartiḥ nirṛtiḥ kutas nu puruṣe matiḥ

original: (AVŚ_10,2.10c) rāddhiḥ samṛddhir avyṛddhir matir uditayaḥ kutaḥ //10// {4}
analyzed: rāddhiḥ samṛddhiḥ a vyṛddhiḥ matiḥ uditayaḥ kutas

original: (AVŚ_10,2.11a) ko asminn āpo vy adadhāt viṣūvṛtaḥ purūvṛtaḥ sindhusṛtyāya jātāḥ /
analyzed: kaḥ asmin āpaḥ vi adadhāt viṣūvṛtaḥ purūvṛtaḥ sindhu sṛtyāya jātāḥ

original: (AVŚ_10,2.11c) tīvrā aruṇā lohinīs tāmradhūmrā ūrdhvā avācīḥ puruṣe tiraścīḥ //11//
analyzed: tīvrāḥ aruṇāḥ lohinīḥ tāmra dhūmrāḥ ūrdhvāḥ avācīḥ puruṣe tiraścīḥ

original: (AVŚ_10,2.12a) ko asmin rūpam adadhāt ko mahmānaṃ ca nāma ca /
analyzed: kaḥ asmin rūpam adadhāt kaḥ mahmānam ca nāma ca

original: (AVŚ_10,2.12c) gātuṃ ko asmin kaḥ ketuṃ kaś caritrāni puruṣe //12//
analyzed: gātum kaḥ asmin kaḥ ketum kaḥ caritrāni puruṣe

original: (AVŚ_10,2.13a) ko asmin prāṇaṃ avayat ko apānaṃ vyānam u /
analyzed: kaḥ asmin prāṇam avayat kaḥ apānam vyānam u

original: (AVŚ_10,2.13c) samānam asmin ko devo 'dhi śiśrāya puruṣe //13//
analyzed: samānam asmin kaḥ devaḥ dhi śiśrāya puruṣe

original: (AVŚ_10,2.14a) ko asmin yajñam adadhād eko devo 'dhi puruṣe /
analyzed: kaḥ asmin yajñam adadhāt ekaḥ devaḥ dhi puruṣe

original: (AVŚ_10,2.14c) ko asmint satyaṃ ko 'nṛtaṃ kuto mṛtyuḥ kuto 'mṛtam //14//
analyzed: kaḥ asmin satyam kaḥ nṛtam kutas mṛtyuḥ kutas mṛtam

original: (AVŚ_10,2.15a) ko asmai vāsaḥ pary adadhāt ko asyāyur akalpayat /
analyzed: kaḥ asmai vāsaḥ pari adadhāt kaḥ asya āyuḥ akalpayat

original: (AVŚ_10,2.15c) balaṃ ko asmai prāyachat ko asyākalpayaj javam //15//

original: (AVŚ_10,2.16a) kenāpo anv atanuta kenāhar akarod ruce /
analyzed: kena apaḥ anu atanuta kena ahar akarot ruce

original: (AVŚ_10,2.16c) uṣasaṃ kenānv ainddha kena sāyaṃbhavaṃ dade //16//
analyzed: uṣasam kena anu ainddha kena sāyaṃbhavam dade

original: (AVŚ_10,2.17a) ko asmin reto ny adadhāt tantur ā tāyatām iti /
analyzed: kaḥ asmin retaḥ ni adadhāt tantuḥ ā tāyatām iti

original: (AVŚ_10,2.17c) medhāṃ ko asminn adhy auhat ko bāṇaṃ ko nṛto dadhau //17//
analyzed: medhām kaḥ asmin adhi auhat kaḥ bāṇam kaḥ nṛto dadhau

original: (AVŚ_10,2.18a) kenemāṃ bhūmim aurṇot kena pary abhavad divam /
analyzed: kena imām bhūmim aurṇot kena pari abhavat divam

original: (AVŚ_10,2.18c) kenābhi mahnā parvatān kena karmāṇi puruṣaḥ //18//
analyzed: kena abhi mahnā parvatān kena karmāṇi puruṣaḥ

original: (AVŚ_10,2.19a) kena parjanyam anv eti kena somaṃ vicakṣaṇam /
analyzed: kena parjanyam anu eti kena somam vicakṣaṇam

original: (AVŚ_10,2.19c) kena yajñam ca śraddhāṃ ca kenāsmin nihitaṃ manaḥ //19//
analyzed: kena yajñam ca śraddhām ca kena asmin nihitam manaḥ

original: (AVŚ_10,2.20a) kena śrotriyam āpnoti kenemaṃ parameṣṭhinam /
analyzed: kena śrotriyam āpnoti kena imam parameṣṭhinam

original: (AVŚ_10,2.20c) kenemam agniṃ pūruṣaḥ kena saṃvatsaraṃ mame //20// {5}
analyzed: kena imam agnim pūruṣaḥ kena saṃvatsaram mame  /

original: (AVŚ_10,2.21a) brahma śrotriyam āpnoti brahmemaṃ parameṣṭhinam /
analyzed: brahma śrotriyam āpnoti brahma imam parameṣṭhinam

original: (AVŚ_10,2.21c) brahmemam agniṃ pūruṣo brahma saṃvatsaraṃ mame //21//
analyzed: brahma imam agnim pūruṣaḥ brahma saṃvatsaram mame

original: (AVŚ_10,2.22a) kena devāṃ anu kṣiyati kena daivajanīr viśaḥ /
analyzed: kena devān anu kṣiyati kena daivajanīḥ viśaḥ

original: (AVŚ_10,2.22c) kenedam anyan nakṣatraṃ kena sat kṣatram ucyate //22//
analyzed: kena idam anyat nakṣatram kena sat kṣatram ucyate

original: (AVŚ_10,2.23a) brahma devāṃ anu kṣiyati brahma daivajanīr viśaḥ /
analyzed: brahma devān anu kṣiyati brahma daivajanīḥ viśaḥ

original: (AVŚ_10,2.23c) brahmedam anyan nakṣatraṃ brahma sat kṣatram ucyate //23//
analyzed: brahma idam anyat nakṣatram brahma sat kṣatram ucyate

original: (AVŚ_10,2.24a) keneyaṃ bhūmir vihitā kena dyaur uttarā hitā /
analyzed: kena iyam bhūmiḥ vihitā kena dyauḥ uttarā hitā

original: (AVŚ_10,2.24c) kenedam ūrdhvaṃ tiryak cāntarikṣam vyaco hitam //24//
analyzed: kena idam ūrdhvam tiryak ca antarikṣam vyacaḥ hitam

original: (AVŚ_10,2.25a) brahmaṇā bhūmir vihitā brahma dyaur uttarā hitā /
analyzed: brahmaṇā bhūmiḥ vihitā brahma dyauḥ uttarā hitā

original: (AVŚ_10,2.25c) brahmedam ūrdhvaṃ tiryak cāntarikṣaṃ vyaco hitam //25//
analyzed: brahma idam ūrdhvam tiryak ca antarikṣam vyacaḥ hitam

original: (AVŚ_10,2.26a) mūrdhānam asya saṃsīvyātharvā hṛdayaṃ ca yat /
analyzed: mūrdhānam asya saṃsīvya atharvā hṛdayam ca yat

original: (AVŚ_10,2.26c) mastiṣkād ūrdhvaḥ prairayat pavamāno 'dhi śīrṣataḥ //26//
analyzed: mastiṣkāt ūrdhvaḥ prairayat pavamānaḥ dhi śīrṣataḥ

original: (AVŚ_10,2.27a) tad vā atharvaṇaḥ śiro devakośaḥ samubjitaḥ /
analyzed: tat vai atharvaṇaḥ śiraḥ deva kośaḥ samubjitaḥ

original: (AVŚ_10,2.27c) tat prāṇo abhi rakṣati śiro annam atho manaḥ //27//
analyzed: tat prāṇaḥ abhi rakṣati śiraḥ annam atha u manaḥ

original: (AVŚ_10,2.28a) ūrdhvo nu sṛṣṭā3s tiryaṅ nu sṛṣṭā3s sarvā diśaḥ puruṣa ā babhūvā3ṃ /
analyzed: ūrdhvaḥ nu tiryak nu sarvāḥ diśaḥ puruṣaḥ ā

original: (AVŚ_10,2.28c) puraṃ yo brahmaṇo veda yasyāḥ puruṣa ucyate //28//
analyzed: puram yaḥ brahmaṇaḥ veda yasyāḥ puruṣaḥ ucyate

original: (AVŚ_10,2.29a) yo vai tāṃ brahmaṇo vedāmṛtenāvṛtāṃ puram /
analyzed: yaḥ vai tām brahmaṇaḥ veda amṛtena āvṛtām puram

original: (AVŚ_10,2.29c) tasmai brahma ca brāhmāś ca cakṣuḥ prāṇaṃ prajāṃ daduḥ //29//
analyzed: tasmai brahma ca brāhmāḥ ca cakṣuḥ prāṇam prajām daduḥ

original: (AVŚ_10,2.30a) na vai tam cakṣur jahāti na prāṇo jarasaḥ purā /
analyzed: na vai tam cakṣuḥ jahāti na prāṇaḥ jarasaḥ purā

original: (AVŚ_10,2.30c) puraṃ yo brahmaṇo veda yasyāḥ puruṣa ucyate //30//
analyzed: puram yaḥ brahmaṇaḥ veda yasyāḥ puruṣaḥ ucyate

original: (AVŚ_10,2.31a) aṣṭācakrā navadvārā devānāṃ pūr ayodhyā /
analyzed: aṣṭācakrā nava dvārā devānām pūḥ a yodhyā

original: (AVŚ_10,2.31c) tasyāṃ hiraṇyayaḥ kośaḥ svargo jyotiṣāvṛtaḥ //31//
analyzed: tasyām hiraṇyayaḥ kośaḥ svargaḥ jyotiṣā āvṛtaḥ

original: (AVŚ_10,2.32a) tasmin hiraṇyaye kośe tryare tripratiṣṭhite /
analyzed: tasmin hiraṇyaye kośe tri are tri pratiṣṭhite

original: (AVŚ_10,2.32c) tasmin yad yakṣam ātmanvat tad vai brahmavido viduḥ //32//
analyzed: tasmin yat yakṣam ātmanvat tat vai brahma vidaḥ viduḥ

original: (AVŚ_10,2.33a) prabhrājamānāṃ hariṇīṃ yaśasā saṃparīvṛtām /
analyzed: prabhrājamānām hariṇīm yaśasā saṃparīvṛtām

original: (AVŚ_10,2.33c) puraṃ hiraṇyayīṃ brahmā viveśāparājitām //33// {6}
analyzed: puram hiraṇyayīm brahmā viveśa aparājitām

original: (AVŚ_10,3.1a) ayaṃ me varaṇo maṇiḥ sapatnakṣayaṇo vṛṣā /
analyzed: ayam me varaṇaḥ maṇiḥ sapatna kṣayaṇaḥ vṛṣā

original: (AVŚ_10,3.1c) tenā rabhasva tvaṃ śatrūn pra mṛṇīhi durasyataḥ //1//
analyzed: tena ā rabhasva tvam śatrūn pra mṛṇīhi durasyataḥ

original: (AVŚ_10,3.2a) praiṇān chṛṇīhi pra mṛṇā rabhasva maṇis te astu puraetā purastāt /
analyzed: pra eṇān śṛṇīhi pra mṛṇa ā rabhasva maṇiḥ te astu puraetā purastāt

original: (AVŚ_10,3.2c) avārayanta varaṇena devā abhyācāram asurāṇāṃ śvaḥśvaḥ //2//
analyzed: avārayanta varaṇena devāḥ abhyācāram asurāṇām śvas śvas

original: (AVŚ_10,3.3a) ayaṃ maṇir varaṇo viśvabheṣajaḥ sahasrākṣo harito hiraṇyayaḥ /
analyzed: ayam maṇiḥ varaṇaḥ viśva bheṣajaḥ sahasra akṣaḥ haritaḥ hiraṇyayaḥ

original: (AVŚ_10,3.3c) sa te śatrūn adharān pādayāti pūrvas tān dabhnuhi ye tvā dviṣanti //3//
analyzed: sa te śatrūn adharān pādayāti pūrvaḥ tān dabhnuhi ye tvā dviṣanti

original: (AVŚ_10,3.4a) ayaṃ te kṛtyāṃ vitatām pauruṣeyād ayaṃ bhayāt /
analyzed: ayam te kṛtyām vitatām pauruṣeyāt ayam bhayāt

original: (AVŚ_10,3.4c) ayaṃ tvā sarvasmāt pāpād varaṇo vārayiṣyate //4//
analyzed: ayam tvā sarvasmāt pāpāt varaṇaḥ vārayiṣyate

original: (AVŚ_10,3.5a) varaṇo vārayātā ayaṃ devo vanaspatiḥ /
analyzed: varaṇaḥ vārayātai ayam devaḥ vanaspatiḥ

original: (AVŚ_10,3.5c) yakṣmo yo asminn āviṣṭas tam u devā avīvaran //5//
analyzed: yakṣmaḥ yaḥ asmin āviṣṭaḥ tam u devāḥ avīvaran

original: (AVŚ_10,3.6a) svapnaṃ suptvā yadi paśyāsi pāpaṃ mṛgaḥ sṛtiṃ yati dhāvād ajuṣṭām /
analyzed: svapnam suptvā yadi paśyāsi pāpam mṛgaḥ sṛtim yati dhāvāt ajuṣṭām

original: (AVŚ_10,3.6c) parikṣavāc chakuneḥ pāpavādād ayaṃ maṇir varaṇo vārayiṣyate //6//
analyzed: parikṣavāt śakuneḥ pāpa vādāt ayam maṇiḥ varaṇaḥ vārayiṣyate

original: (AVŚ_10,3.7a) arātyās tvā nirṛtyā abhicārād atho bhayāt /
analyzed: arātyāḥ tvā nirṛtyāḥ abhicārāt atha u bhayāt

original: (AVŚ_10,3.7c) mṛtyor ojīyaso vadhād varaṇo vārayiṣyate //7//
analyzed: mṛtyoḥ ojīyasaḥ vadhāt varaṇaḥ vārayiṣyate

original: (AVŚ_10,3.8a) yan me mātā yan me pitā bhrātaro yac ca me svā yad enaś cakṛmā vayam /
analyzed: yat me mātā yat me pitā bhrātaraḥ yat ca me svāḥ yat enaḥ cakṛma vayam

original: (AVŚ_10,3.8c) tato no vārayiṣyate 'yaṃ devo vanaspatiḥ //8//
analyzed: tatas naḥ vārayiṣyate yam devaḥ vanaspatiḥ

original: (AVŚ_10,3.9a) varaṇena pravyathitā bhrātṛvyā me sabandhavaḥ /
analyzed: varaṇena pravyathitāḥ bhrātṛvyāḥ me sa bandhavaḥ

original: (AVŚ_10,3.9c) asūrtaṃ rajo apy agus te yantv adhamaṃ tamaḥ //9//
analyzed: asūrtam rajaḥ api aguḥ te yantu adhamam tamaḥ

original: (AVŚ_10,3.10a) ariṣṭo 'ham ariṣṭagur āyuṣmānt sarvapūruṣaḥ /
analyzed: ariṣṭaḥ ham ariṣṭaguḥ āyuṣmān sarva pūruṣaḥ

original: (AVŚ_10,3.10c) tam māyaṃ varaṇo maṇiḥ pari pātu diśodiśaḥ //10// {7}
analyzed: tam mā ayam varaṇaḥ maṇiḥ pari pātu diśaḥ diśaḥ

original: (AVŚ_10,3.11a) ayaṃ me varaṇa urasi rājā devo vanaspatiḥ /
analyzed: ayam me varaṇaḥ urasi rājā devaḥ vanaspatiḥ

original: (AVŚ_10,3.11c) sa me śatrūn vi bādhatām indro dasyūn ivāsurān //11//
analyzed: sa me śatrūn vi bādhatām indraḥ dasyūn iva asurān

original: (AVŚ_10,3.12a) imaṃ bibharmi varaṇam āyuṣmān chataśāradaḥ /
analyzed: imam bibharmi varaṇam āyuṣmān śata śāradaḥ

original: (AVŚ_10,3.12c) sa me rāṣṭraṃ ca kṣatraṃ ca paśūn ojaś ca me dadhat //12//
analyzed: sa me rāṣṭram ca kṣatram ca paśūn ojaḥ ca me dadhat

original: (AVŚ_10,5.41c) te me draviṇaṃ yachantu te me brāhmaṇavarcasam //41//
