analyzed: kasmin aṅge tapaḥ asya adhi tiṣṭhati kasmin aṅge ṛtam asya adhi āhitam

original: (AVŚ_10,7.1c) kva vrataṃ kva śraddhāsya tiṣṭhati kasminn aṅge satyam asya pratiṣṭhitam //1//
analyzed: kva vratam kva śraddhā asya tiṣṭhati kasmin aṅge satyam asya pratiṣṭhitam

original: (AVŚ_10,7.2a) kasmād aṅgād dīpyate agnir asya kasmād aṅgāt pavate mātariśva /
analyzed: kasmāt aṅgāt dīpyate agniḥ asya kasmāt aṅgāt pavate mātariśva

original: (AVŚ_10,7.2c) kasmād aṅgād vi mimīte 'dhi candramā maha skambhasya mimāno aṅgam //2//
analyzed: kasmāt aṅgāt vi mimīte dhi candramāḥ mahaḥ skambhasya mimānaḥ aṅgam

original: (AVŚ_10,7.3a) kasminn aṅge tiṣṭhati bhūmir asya kasminn aṅge tiṣṭhaty antarikṣam /
analyzed: kasmin aṅge tiṣṭhati bhūmiḥ asya kasmin aṅge tiṣṭhati antarikṣam

original: (AVŚ_10,7.3c) kasminn aṅge tiṣṭhaty āhitā dyauḥ kasminn aṅge tiṣṭhaty uttaraṃ divaḥ //3//
analyzed: kasmin aṅge tiṣṭhati āhitā dyauḥ kasmin aṅge tiṣṭhati uttaram divaḥ

original: (AVŚ_10,7.4a) kva prepsan dīpyata ūrdhvo agniḥ kva prepsan pavate mātariśvā /
analyzed: kva prepsan dīpyate ūrdhvaḥ agniḥ kva prepsan pavate mātariśvā

original: (AVŚ_10,7.4c) yatra prepsantīr abhiyanty āvṛtaḥ skambhaṃ taṃ brūhi katamaḥ svid eva saḥ //4//
analyzed: yatra prepsantīḥ abhiyanti āvṛtaḥ skambham tam brūhi katamaḥ svid eva saḥ

original: (AVŚ_10,7.5a) kvārdhamāsāḥ kva yanti māsāḥ saṃvatsareṇa saha saṃvidānāḥ /
analyzed: kva ardha māsāḥ kva yanti māsāḥ saṃvatsareṇa saha saṃvidānāḥ

original: (AVŚ_10,7.5c) yatra yanty ṛtavo yatrārtavāḥ skambhaṃ taṃ brūhi katamaḥ svid eva saḥ //5//
analyzed: yatra yanti ṛtavaḥ yatra ārtavāḥ skambham tam brūhi katamaḥ svid eva saḥ

original: (AVŚ_10,7.6a) kva prepsantī yuvatī virūpe ahorātre dravataḥ saṃvidāne /
analyzed: kva prepsantī yuvatī virūpe ahorātre dravataḥ saṃvidāne

original: (AVŚ_10,7.6c) yatra prepsantīr abhiyanty āpaḥ skambhaṃ taṃ brūhi katamaḥ svid eva saḥ //6//
analyzed: yatra prepsantīḥ abhiyanti āpaḥ skambham tam brūhi katamaḥ svid eva saḥ

original: (AVŚ_10,7.7a) yasmint stabdhvā prajāpatir lokānt sarvāṃ adhārayat /
analyzed: yasmin stabdhvā prajāpatiḥ lokān sarvān adhārayat

original: (AVŚ_10,7.7c) skambhaṃ taṃ brūhi katamaḥ svid eva saḥ //7//
analyzed: skambham tam brūhi katamaḥ svid eva saḥ

original: (AVŚ_10,7.8a) yat paramam avamam yac ca madhyamaṃ prajāpatiḥ sasṛje viśvarūpam /
analyzed: yat paramam avamam yat ca madhyamam prajāpatiḥ sasṛje viśva rūpam

original: (AVŚ_10,7.8c) kiyatā skambhaḥ pra viveśa tatra yan na prāviśat kiyat tad babhūva //8//
analyzed: kiyatā skambhaḥ pra viveśa tatra yat na prāviśat kiyat tat babhūva

original: (AVŚ_10,7.9a) kiyatā skambhaḥ pra viveśa bhūtam kiyad bhaviṣyad anvāśaye 'sya /
analyzed: kiyatā skambhaḥ pra viveśa bhūtam kiyat bhaviṣyat anvāśaye sya

original: (AVŚ_10,7.9c) ekaṃ yad aṅgam akṛṇot sahasradhā kiyatā skambhaḥ pra viveśa tatra //9//
analyzed: ekam yat aṅgam akṛṇot sahasradhā kiyatā skambhaḥ pra viveśa tatra

original: (AVŚ_10,7.10a) yatra lokāmś ca kośāṃś cāpo brahma janā viduḥ /
analyzed: yatra lokān ca kośān ca apaḥ brahma janāḥ viduḥ

original: (AVŚ_10,7.10c) asac ca yatra sac cānta skambhaṃ taṃ brūhi katamaḥ svid eva saḥ //10// {22}
analyzed: asat ca yatra sat ca antar skambham tam brūhi katamaḥ svid eva saḥ

original: (AVŚ_10,7.11a) yatra tapaḥ parākramya vrataṃ dhārayaty uttaram /
analyzed: yatra tapaḥ parākramya vratam dhārayati uttaram

original: (AVŚ_10,7.11c) ṛtaṃ ca yatra śraddhā cāpo brahma samāhitāḥ skambhaṃ taṃ brūhi katamaḥ svid eva saḥ //11//
analyzed: ṛtam ca yatra śraddhā ca apaḥ brahma samāhitāḥ skambham tam brūhi katamaḥ svid eva saḥ

original: (AVŚ_10,7.12a) yasmin bhūmir antarikṣaṃ dyaur yasminn adhy āhitā /
analyzed: yasmin bhūmiḥ antarikṣam dyauḥ yasmin adhi āhitā

original: (AVŚ_10,7.12c) yatrāgniś candramāḥ sūryo vātas tiṣṭhanty ārpitāḥ skambhaṃ taṃ brūhi katamaḥ svid eva saḥ //12//
analyzed: yatra agniḥ candramāḥ sūryaḥ vātaḥ tiṣṭhanti ā arpitāḥ skambham tam brūhi katamaḥ svid eva saḥ

original: (AVŚ_10,7.13a) yasya trayastriṃśad devā aṅge sarve samāhitāḥ /
analyzed: yasya trayastriṃśat devāḥ aṅge sarve samāhitāḥ

original: (AVŚ_10,7.13c) skambhaṃ taṃ brūhi katamaḥ svid eva saḥ //13//
analyzed: skambham tam brūhi katamaḥ svid eva saḥ

original: (AVŚ_10,7.14a) yatra ṛṣayaḥ prathamajā ṛcaḥ sāma yajur mahī /
analyzed: yatra ṛṣayaḥ prathama jāḥ ṛcaḥ sāma yajuḥ mahī

original: (AVŚ_10,7.14c) ekarṣir yasminn ārpitaḥ skambhaṃ taṃ brūhi katamaḥ svid eva saḥ //14//
analyzed: eka ṛṣiḥ yasmin ā arpitaḥ skambham tam brūhi katamaḥ svid eva saḥ

original: (AVŚ_10,7.15a) yatrāmṛtaṃ ca mṛtyuś ca puruṣe 'dhi samāhite /
analyzed: yatra amṛtam ca mṛtyuḥ ca puruṣe dhi samāhite

original: (AVŚ_10,7.15c) samudro yasya nāḍyaḥ puruṣe 'dhi samāhitāḥ skambhaṃ taṃ brūhi katamaḥ svid eva saḥ //15//
analyzed: samudraḥ yasya nāḍyaḥ puruṣe dhi samāhitāḥ skambham tam brūhi katamaḥ svid eva saḥ

original: (AVŚ_10,7.16a) yasya catasraḥ pradiśo nāḍyas tiṣṭhanti prathamāḥ /
analyzed: yasya catasraḥ pradiśaḥ nāḍyaḥ tiṣṭhanti prathamāḥ

original: (AVŚ_10,7.16c) yajño yatra parākrāntaḥ skambhaṃ taṃ brūhi katamaḥ svid eva saḥ //16//
analyzed: yajñaḥ yatra parākrāntaḥ skambham tam brūhi katamaḥ svid eva saḥ

original: (AVŚ_10,7.17a) ye puruṣe brahma vidus te viduḥ parameṣṭhinam /
analyzed: ye puruṣe brahma viduḥ te viduḥ parameṣṭhinam

original: (AVŚ_10,7.17c) yo veda parameṣṭhinaṃ yaś ca veda prajāpatim /
analyzed: yaḥ veda parameṣṭhinam yaḥ ca veda prajāpatim

original: (AVŚ_10,7.17e) jyeṣṭhaṃ ye brāhmaṇaṃ vidus te skambham anusaṃviduḥ //17//
analyzed: jyeṣṭham ye brāhmaṇam viduḥ te skambham anusaṃviduḥ

original: (AVŚ_10,7.18a) yasya śiro vaiśvānaraś cakṣur aṅgiraso 'bhavan /
analyzed: yasya śiraḥ vaiśvānaraḥ cakṣuḥ aṅgirasaḥ bhavan

original: (AVŚ_10,7.18c) aṅgāni yasya yātavaḥ skambhaṃ taṃ brūhi katamaḥ svid eva saḥ //18//
analyzed: aṅgāni yasya yātavaḥ skambham tam brūhi katamaḥ svid eva saḥ

original: (AVŚ_10,7.19a) yasya brahma mukham āhur jihvāṃ madhukaśām uta /
analyzed: yasya brahma mukham āhuḥ jihvām madhu kaśām uta

original: (AVŚ_10,7.19c) virājam ūdho yasyāhuḥ skambhaṃ taṃ brūhi katamaḥ svid eva saḥ //19//
analyzed: virājam ūdhaḥ yasya āhuḥ skambham tam brūhi katamaḥ svid eva saḥ

original: (AVŚ_10,7.20a) yasmād ṛco apātakṣan yajur yasmād apākaṣan /
analyzed: yasmāt ṛcaḥ apātakṣan yajuḥ yasmāt apākaṣan

original: (AVŚ_10,7.20c) sāmāni yasya lomāny atharvāṅgiraso mukhaṃ skambhaṃ taṃ brūhi katamaḥ svid eva saḥ //20// {23}
analyzed: sāmāni yasya lomāni atharva aṅgirasaḥ mukham skambham tam brūhi katamaḥ svid eva saḥ

original: (AVŚ_10,7.21a) asaccākhāṃ pratiṣṭhantīṃ paramam iva janā viduḥ /
analyzed: asat cākhām pratiṣṭhantīm paramam iva janāḥ viduḥ

original: (AVŚ_10,7.21c) uto san manyante 'vare ye te śākhām upāsate //21//
analyzed: uta u sat manyante vare ye te śākhām upāsate

original: (AVŚ_10,7.22a) yatrādityāś ca rudrāś ca vasavaś ca samāhitāḥ /
analyzed: yatra ādityāḥ ca rudrāḥ ca vasavaḥ ca samāhitāḥ

original: (AVŚ_10,7.22c) bhūtaṃ ca yatra bhavyaṃ ca sarve lokāḥ pratiṣṭhitāḥ skambhaṃ taṃ brūhi katamaḥ svid eva saḥ //22//
analyzed: bhūtam ca yatra bhavyam ca sarve lokāḥ pratiṣṭhitāḥ skambham tam brūhi katamaḥ svid eva saḥ

original: (AVŚ_10,7.23a) yasya trayastriṃśad devā nidhiṃ rakṣanti sarvadā /
analyzed: yasya trayastriṃśat devāḥ nidhim rakṣanti sarvadā

original: (AVŚ_10,7.23c) nidhiṃ tam adya ko veda yaṃ devā abhirakṣatha //23//
analyzed: nidhim tam adya kaḥ veda yam devāḥ abhirakṣatha

original: (AVŚ_10,7.24a) yatra devā brahmavido brahma jyeṣṭham upāsate /
analyzed: yatra devāḥ brahma vidaḥ brahma jyeṣṭham upāsate

original: (AVŚ_10,7.24c) yo vai tān vidyāt pratyakṣaṃ sa brahmā veditā syāt //24//
analyzed: yaḥ vai tān vidyāt pratyakṣam sa brahmā veditā syāt

original: (AVŚ_10,7.25a) bṛhanto nāma te devā ye 'sataḥ pari jajñire /
analyzed: bṛhantaḥ nāma te devāḥ ye sataḥ pari jajñire

original: (AVŚ_10,7.25c) ekaṃ tad aṅgaṃ skambhasyāsad āhuḥ paro janāḥ //25//
analyzed: ekam tat aṅgam skambhasya asat āhuḥ paras janāḥ

original: (AVŚ_10,7.26a) yatra skambhaḥ prajanayan purāṇaṃ vyavartayat /
analyzed: yatra skambhaḥ prajanayan purāṇam vyavartayat

original: (AVŚ_10,7.26c) ekaṃ tad aṅgaṃ skambhasya purāṇam anusaṃviduḥ //26//
analyzed: ekam tat aṅgam skambhasya purāṇam anusaṃviduḥ

original: (AVŚ_10,7.27a) yasya trayastriṃśad devā aṅge gātrā vibhejire /
analyzed: yasya trayastriṃśat devāḥ aṅge gātrā vibhejire

original: (AVŚ_10,7.27c) tān vai trayastriṃśad devān eke brahamvido viduḥ //27//
analyzed: tān vai trayastriṃśat devān eke brahamvidaḥ viduḥ

original: (AVŚ_10,7.28a) hiraṇyagarbham paramam anatyudyaṃ janā viduḥ /
analyzed: hiraṇya garbham paramam an atyudyam janāḥ viduḥ

original: (AVŚ_10,7.28c) skambhas tad agre prāsiñcad dhiraṇyaṃ loke antarā //28//
analyzed: skambhaḥ tat agre prāsiñcat hiraṇyam loke antarā

original: (AVŚ_10,7.29a) skambhe lokāḥ skambhe tapaḥ skambhe 'dhy ṛtam āhitam /
analyzed: skambhe lokāḥ skambhe tapaḥ skambhe dhi ṛtam āhitam

original: (AVŚ_10,7.29c) skambha tvā veda pratyakṣam indre sarvaṃ samāhitam //29//
analyzed: skambha tvā veda pratyakṣam indre sarvam samāhitam

original: (AVŚ_10,7.30a) indre lokā indre tapa indre 'dhy ṛtam āhitam /
analyzed: indre lokāḥ indre tapaḥ indre dhi ṛtam āhitam

original: (AVŚ_10,7.30c) indraṃ tvā veda pratyakṣaṃ skambhe sarvaṃ pratiṣṭhitam //30// {24}
analyzed: indram tvā veda pratyakṣam skambhe sarvam pratiṣṭhitam

original: (AVŚ_10,7.31a) nāma nāmnā johavīti purā sūryāt puroṣasaḥ /
analyzed: nāma nāmnā johavīti purā sūryāt purā uṣasaḥ

original: (AVŚ_10,7.31c) yad ajaḥ prathamaṃ saṃbabhūva sa ha tat svarājyam iyāya yasmān nānyat param asti bhūtam //31//
analyzed: yat ajaḥ prathamam saṃbabhūva sa ha tat svarājyam iyāya yasmāt na anyat param asti bhūtam

original: (AVŚ_10,7.32a) yasya bhūmiḥ pramāntarikṣam utodaram /
analyzed: yasya bhūmiḥ pramā antarikṣam uta udaram

original: (AVŚ_10,7.32c) divaṃ yaś cakre mūrdhānaṃ tasmai jyeṣṭhāya brahmaṇe namaḥ //32//
analyzed: divam yaḥ cakre mūrdhānam tasmai jyeṣṭhāya brahmaṇe namaḥ

original: (AVŚ_10,7.33a) yasya sūryaś cakṣuś candramāś ca punarṇavaḥ /
analyzed: yasya sūryaḥ cakṣuḥ candramāḥ ca punarṇavaḥ

original: (AVŚ_10,7.33c) agniṃ yaś cakra āsyaṃ tasmai jyeṣṭhāya brahmaṇe namaḥ //33//
analyzed: agnim yaḥ cakre āsyam tasmai jyeṣṭhāya brahmaṇe namaḥ

original: (AVŚ_10,7.34a) yasya vātaḥ prāṇāpānau cakṣur aṅgiraso 'bhavan /
analyzed: yasya vātaḥ prāṇa apānau cakṣuḥ aṅgirasaḥ bhavan

original: (AVŚ_10,7.34c) diśo yaś cakre prajñānīs tasmai jyeṣṭhāya brahmaṇe namaḥ //34//
analyzed: diśaḥ yaḥ cakre prajñānīḥ tasmai jyeṣṭhāya brahmaṇe namaḥ

original: (AVŚ_10,7.35a) skambho dādhāra dyāvāpṛthivī ubhe ime skambho dādhārorv antarikṣam /
analyzed: skambhaḥ dādhāra dyāvāpṛthivī ubhe ime skambhaḥ dādhāra uru antarikṣam

original: (AVŚ_10,7.35c) skambho dādhāra pradiśaḥ ṣaḍ urvīḥ skambha idaṃ viśvaṃ bhuvanam ā viveśa //35//
analyzed: skambhaḥ dādhāra pradiśaḥ ṣaḍ urvīḥ skambhaḥ idam viśvam bhuvanam ā viveśa

original: (AVŚ_10,7.36a) yaḥ śramāt tapaso jāto lokānt sarvānt samānaśe /
analyzed: yaḥ śramāt tapasaḥ jātaḥ lokān sarvān samānaśe

original: (AVŚ_10,7.36c) somaṃ yaś cakre kevalaṃ tasmai jyeṣṭhāya brahmaṇe namaḥ //36//
analyzed: somam yaḥ cakre kevalam tasmai jyeṣṭhāya brahmaṇe namaḥ

original: (AVŚ_10,7.37a) kathaṃ vāto nelayati kathaṃ na ramate manaḥ /
analyzed: katham vātaḥ na ilayati katham na ramate manaḥ

original: (AVŚ_10,7.37c) kim āpaḥ satyaṃ prepsantīr nelayanti kadā cana //37//
analyzed: kim āpaḥ satyam prepsantīḥ na ilayanti kadā cana

original: (AVŚ_10,7.38a) mahad yakṣaṃ bhuvanasya madhye tapasi krāntaṃ salilasya pṛṣṭhe /
analyzed: mahat yakṣam bhuvanasya madhye tapasi krāntam salilasya pṛṣṭhe

original: (AVŚ_10,7.38c) tasmin chrayante ya u ke ca devā vṛkṣasya skandhaḥ parita iva śākhāḥ //38//
analyzed: tasmin śrayante ye u ke ca devāḥ vṛkṣasya skandhaḥ paritas iva śākhāḥ

original: (AVŚ_10,7.39a) yasmai hastābhyāṃ pādābhyāṃ vācā śrotreṇa cakṣuṣā /
analyzed: yasmai hastābhyām pādābhyām vācā śrotreṇa cakṣuṣā

original: (AVŚ_10,7.39c) yasmai devāḥ sadā baliṃ prayachanti vimite 'mitaṃ skambhaṃ taṃ brūhi katamaḥ svid eva saḥ //39//
analyzed: yasmai devāḥ sadā balim prayacchanti vimite mitam skambham tam brūhi katamaḥ svid eva saḥ

original: (AVŚ_10,7.40a) apa tasya hataṃ tamo vyāvṛttaḥ sa pāpmanā /
analyzed: apa tasya hatam tamaḥ vyāvṛttaḥ sa pāpmanā

original: (AVŚ_10,7.40c) sarvāṇi tasmin jyotīṃṣi yāni trīṇi prajāpatau //40//
analyzed: sarvāṇi tasmin jyotīṃṣi yāni trīṇi prajāpatau

original: (AVŚ_10,7.41a) yo vetasaṃ hiraṇyayaṃ tiṣṭhantaṃ salile veda /
analyzed: yaḥ vetasam hiraṇyayam tiṣṭhantam salile veda

original: (AVŚ_10,7.41c) sa vai guhyaḥ prajāpatiḥ //41//
analyzed: sa vai guhyaḥ prajāpatiḥ

original: (AVŚ_10,7.42a) tantram eke yuvatī virūpe abhyākrāmaṃ vayataḥ ṣaṇmayūkham /
analyzed: tantram eke yuvatī virūpe abhyākrāmam vayataḥ ṣaṣ mayūkham

original: (AVŚ_10,7.42c) prānyā tantūṃs tirate dhatte anyā nāpa vṛñjāte na gamāto antam //42//
analyzed: pra anyā tantūn tirate dhatte anyā na apa vṛñjāte na gamātaḥ antam

original: (AVŚ_10,7.43a) tayor ahaṃ parinṛtyantyor iva na vi jānāmi yatarā parastāt /
analyzed: tayoḥ aham parinṛtyantyoḥ iva na vi jānāmi yatarā parastāt

original: (AVŚ_10,7.43c) pumān enad vayaty ud gṛṇanti pumān enad vi jabhārādhi nāke //43//
analyzed: pumān enat vayati ud gṛṇanti pumān enat vi jabhārā adhi nāke

original: (AVŚ_10,7.44a) ime mayūkhā upa tastabhur divaṃ sāmāni cakrus tasarāṇi vātave //44// {25}
analyzed: ime mayūkhāḥ upa tastabhuḥ divam sāmāni cakruḥ tasarāṇi vātave

original: (AVŚ_10,8.1a) yo bhūtaṃ ca bhavyaṃ ca sarvaṃ yaś cādhitiṣṭhati /
analyzed: yaḥ bhūtam ca bhavyam ca sarvam yaḥ ca adhitiṣṭhati

original: (AVŚ_10,8.1c) sv aryasya ca kevalaṃ tasmai jyeṣṭhāya brahmaṇe namaḥ //1//
analyzed: su aryasya ca kevalam tasmai jyeṣṭhāya brahmaṇe namaḥ

original: (AVŚ_10,8.2a) skambheneme viṣṭabhite dyauś ca bhūmiś ca tiṣṭhataḥ /
analyzed: skambhena ime viṣṭabhite dyauḥ ca bhūmiḥ ca tiṣṭhataḥ

original: (AVŚ_10,8.2c) skambha idaṃ sarvam ātmanvad yat prāṇan nimiṣac ca yat //2//
analyzed: skambhe idam sarvam ātmanvat yat prāṇat nimiṣat ca yat

original: (AVŚ_10,8.3a) tisro ha prajā atyāyam āyan ny anyā arkam abhito 'viśanta /
analyzed: tisraḥ ha prajāḥ atyāyam āyan ni anyāḥ arkam abhitas viśanta

original: (AVŚ_10,8.3c) bṛhan ha tasthau rajaso vimāno harito hariṇīr ā viveśa //3//
analyzed: bṛhan ha tasthau rajasaḥ vimānaḥ haritaḥ hariṇīḥ ā viveśa

original: (AVŚ_10,8.4a) dvādaśa pradhayaś cakram ekaṃ trīṇi nabhyāni ka u tac ciketa /
analyzed: dvādaśa pradhayaḥ cakram ekam trīṇi nabhyāni kaḥ u tat ciketa

original: (AVŚ_10,8.4c) tatrāhatās trīṇi śatāni śaṅkavaḥ ṣaṣṭiś ca khīlā avicācalā ye //4//
analyzed: tatra āhatāḥ trīṇi śatāni śaṅkavaḥ ṣaṣṭiḥ ca khīlāḥ avicācalāḥ ye

original: (AVŚ_10,8.5a) idaṃ savitar vi jānīhi ṣaḍ yamā eka ekajaḥ /
analyzed: idam savitar vi jānīhi ṣaṭ yamāḥ ekaḥ ekajaḥ

original: (AVŚ_10,8.5c) tasmin hāpitvam ichante ya eṣām eka ekajaḥ //5//
analyzed: tasmin ha apitvam ichante yaḥ eṣām ekaḥ ekajaḥ

original: (AVŚ_10,8.6a) āviḥ san nihitaṃ guhā jaran nāma mahat padam /
analyzed: āvis san nihitam guhā jarat nāma mahat padam

original: (AVŚ_10,8.6c) tatredaṃ sarvam ārpitam ejat prāṇat pratiṣṭhitam //6//
analyzed: tatra idam sarvam ā arpitam ejat prāṇat pratiṣṭhitam

original: (AVŚ_10,8.7a) ekacakraṃ vartata ekanemi sahasrākṣaraṃ pra puro ni paścā /
analyzed: eka cakram vartate eka nemi sahasra akṣaram pra puras ni paścā

original: (AVŚ_10,8.7c) ardhena viśvaṃ bhuvanaṃ jajāna yad asyārdhaṃ kva tad babhūva //7//
analyzed: ardhena viśvam bhuvanam jajāna yat asya ardham kva tat babhūva

original: (AVŚ_10,8.8a) pañcavāhī vahatyagram eṣāṃ praṣṭayo yuktā anusaṃvahanti /
analyzed: pañca vāhī vahati agram eṣām praṣṭayaḥ yuktāḥ anusaṃvahanti

original: (AVŚ_10,8.8c) ayātam asya dadṛśe na yātaṃ paraṃ nedīyo 'varaṃ davīyaḥ //8//
analyzed: a yātam asya dadṛśe na yātam param nedīyaḥ varam davīyaḥ

original: (AVŚ_10,8.9a) tiryagbilaś camasa ūrdhvabudhnas tasmin yaśo nihitaṃ viśvarūpam /
analyzed: tiryak bilaḥ camasaḥ ūrdhva budhnaḥ tasmin yaśaḥ nihitam viśva rūpam

original: (AVŚ_10,8.9c) tad āsata ṛṣayaḥ sapta sākaṃ ye asya gopā mahato babhūvuḥ //9//
analyzed: tat āsate ṛṣayaḥ sapta sākam ye asya gopāḥ mahataḥ babhūvuḥ

original: (AVŚ_10,8.10a) yā purastād yujyate yā ca paścād yā viśvato yujyate yā ca sarvataḥ /
analyzed: yā purastāt yujyate yā ca paścāt yā viśvatas yujyate yā ca sarvatas

original: (AVŚ_10,8.10c) yayā yajñaḥ prāṅ tāyate tāṃ tvā pṛchāmi katamā sā ṛcām //10// {26}
analyzed: yayā yajñaḥ prāṅ tāyate tām tvā pṛcchāmi katamā sā ṛcām

original: (AVŚ_10,8.11a) yad ejati patati yac ca tiṣṭhati prāṇad aprāṇan nimiṣac ca yad bhuvat /
analyzed: yat ejati patati yat ca tiṣṭhati prāṇat a prāṇat nimiṣat ca yat bhuvat

original: (AVŚ_10,8.11c) tad dādhāra pṛthivīṃ viśvarūpaṃ tat saṃbhūya bhavaty ekam eva //11//
analyzed: tat dādhāra pṛthivīm viśva rūpam tat saṃbhūya bhavati ekam eva

original: (AVŚ_10,8.12a) anantaṃ vitataṃ purutrānantam antavac cā samante /
analyzed: anantam vitatam purutrā anantam antavat ca samante

original: (AVŚ_10,8.12c) te nākapālaś carati vicinvan vidvān bhūtam uta bhavyam asya //12//
analyzed: te nāka pālaḥ carati vicinvan vidvān bhūtam uta bhavyam asya

original: (AVŚ_10,8.13a) prajāpatiś carati garbhe antar adṛśyamāno bahudhā vi jāyate /
analyzed: prajāpatiḥ carati garbhe antar adṛśyamānaḥ bahudhā vi jāyate

original: (AVŚ_10,8.13c) ardhena viśvaṃ bhuvanaṃ jajāna yad asyārdhaṃ katamaḥ sa ketuḥ //13//
analyzed: ardhena viśvam bhuvanam jajāna yat asya ardham katamaḥ sa ketuḥ

original: (AVŚ_10,8.14a) ūrdhvaṃ bharantam udakaṃ kumbhenevodahāryam /
analyzed: ūrdhvam bharantam udakam kumbhena iva udahāryam

original: (AVŚ_10,8.14c) paśyanti sarve cakṣuṣā na sarve manasā viduḥ //14//
analyzed: paśyanti sarve cakṣuṣā na sarve manasā viduḥ

original: (AVŚ_10,8.15a) dūre pūrṇena vasati dūra ūnena hīyate /
analyzed: dūre pūrṇena vasati dūre ūnena hīyate

original: (AVŚ_10,8.15c) mahad yakṣaṃ bhuvanasya madhye tasmai baliṃ rāṣṭrabhṛto bharanti //15//
analyzed: mahat yakṣam bhuvanasya madhye tasmai balim rāṣṭrabhṛtaḥ bharanti

original: (AVŚ_10,8.16a) yataḥ sūryaḥ udety astaṃ yatra ca gachati /
analyzed: yatas sūryaḥ udeti astam yatra ca gacchati

original: (AVŚ_10,8.16c) tad eva manye 'haṃ jyeṣṭhaṃ tad u nāty eti kiṃ cana //16//
analyzed: tat eva manye ham jyeṣṭham tat u na ati eti kim cana

original: (AVŚ_10,8.17a) ye arvāṅ madhya uta vā purāṇaṃ vedaṃ vidvāṃsam abhito vadanti /
analyzed: ye arvāk madhye uta vā purāṇam vedam vidvāṃsam abhitas vadanti

original: (AVŚ_10,8.17c) ādityam eva te pari vadanti sarve agniṃ dvitīyaṃ trivṛtaṃ ca haṃsam //17//
analyzed: ādityam eva te pari vadanti sarve agnim dvitīyam trivṛtam ca haṃsam

original: (AVŚ_10,8.18a) sahasrāhṇyaṃ viyatāv asya pakṣau harer haṃsasya patataḥ svargam /
analyzed: sahasrāhṇyam viyatau asya pakṣau hareḥ haṃsasya patataḥ svargam

original: (AVŚ_10,8.18c) sa devānt sarvān urasy upadadya saṃpaśyan yāti bhuvanāni viśvā //18//
analyzed: sa devān sarvān urasi upadadya saṃpaśyan yāti bhuvanāni viśvā

original: (AVŚ_10,8.19a) satyenordhvas tapati brahmaṇārvāṅ vi paśyati /
analyzed: satyena ūrdhvaḥ tapati brahmaṇā arvāṅ vi paśyati

original: (AVŚ_10,8.19c) prāṇena tiryaṅ prāṇati yasmin jyeṣṭham adhi śritam //19//
analyzed: prāṇena tiryaṅ prāṇati yasmin jyeṣṭham adhi śritam

original: (AVŚ_10,8.20a) yo vai te vidyād araṇī yābhyāṃ nirmathyate vasu /
analyzed: yaḥ vai te vidyāt araṇī yābhyām nirmathyate vasu

original: (AVŚ_10,8.20c) sa vidvān jyeṣṭhaṃ manyeta sa vidyād brāhmaṇaṃ mahat //20// {27}
analyzed: sa vidvān jyeṣṭham manyeta sa vidyāt brāhmaṇam mahat

original: (AVŚ_10,8.21a) apād agre sam abhavat so agre svar ābharat /
analyzed: a pād agre sam abhavat saḥ agre svar ābharat

original: (AVŚ_10,8.21c) catuṣpād bhūtvā bhogyaḥ sarvam ādatta bhojanam //21//
analyzed: catuṣpād bhūtvā bhogyaḥ sarvam ādatta bhojanam

original: (AVŚ_10,8.22a) bhogyo bhavad atho annam adad bahu /
analyzed: bhogyaḥ bhavat atha u annam adat bahu

original: (AVŚ_10,8.22c) yo devam uttarāvantam upāsātai sanātanam //22//
analyzed: yaḥ devam uttarāvantam upāsātai sanātanam

original: (AVŚ_10,8.23a) sanātanam enam āhur utādya syāt punarṇavaḥ /
analyzed: sanātanam enam āhuḥ uta adya syāt punarṇavaḥ

original: (AVŚ_10,8.23c) ahorātre pra jāyete anyo anyasya rūpayoḥ //23//
analyzed: ahorātre pra jāyete anyaḥ anyasya rūpayoḥ

original: (AVŚ_10,8.24a) śataṃ sahasram ayutaṃ nyarbudam asaṃkhyeyaṃ svam asmin niviṣṭam /
analyzed: śatam sahasram ayutam nyarbudam asaṃkhyeyam svam asmin niviṣṭam

original: (AVŚ_10,8.24c) tad asya ghnanty abhipaśyata eva tasmād devo rocat eṣa etat //24//
analyzed: tat asya ghnanti abhipaśyataḥ eva tasmāt devaḥ rocat eṣaḥ etat

original: (AVŚ_10,8.25a) bālād ekam aṇīyaskam utaikaṃ neva dṛśyate /
analyzed: bālāt ekam aṇīyaskam uta ekam na iva dṛśyate

original: (AVŚ_10,8.25c) tataḥ pariṣvajīyasī devatā sā mama priyā //25//
analyzed: tatas pariṣvajīyasī devatā sā mama priyā

original: (AVŚ_10,8.26a) iyaṃ kalyāṇy ajarā martyasyāmṛtā gṛhe /
analyzed: iyam kalyāṇī ajarā martyasya amṛtā gṛhe

original: (AVŚ_10,8.26c) yasmai kṛtā śaye sa yaś cakāra jajāra saḥ //26//
analyzed: yasmai kṛtā śaye sa yaḥ cakāra jajāra saḥ

original: (AVŚ_10,8.27a) tvaṃ strī tvaṃ pumān asi tvaṃ kumāra uta vā kumārī//
analyzed: tvam strī tvam pumān asi tvam kumāraḥ uta vā kumārī

original: (AVŚ_10,8.27b) tvaṃ jīrṇo daṇḍena vañcasi tvaṃ jāto bhavasi viśvatomukhaḥ //27//
analyzed: tvam jīrṇaḥ daṇḍena vañcasi tvam jātaḥ bhavasi viśvatomukhaḥ

original: (AVŚ_10,8.28a) utaiṣāṃ pitota vā putra eṣām utaiṣāṃ jyeṣṭha uta vā kaniṣṭhaḥ /
analyzed: uta eṣām pitā uta vā putraḥ eṣām uta eṣām jyeṣṭhaḥ uta vā kaniṣṭhaḥ

original: (AVŚ_10,8.28c) eko ha devo manasi praviṣṭaḥ prathamo jātaḥ sa u garbhe antaḥ //28//
analyzed: ekaḥ ha devaḥ manasi praviṣṭaḥ prathamaḥ jātaḥ saḥ u garbhe antar

original: (AVŚ_10,8.29a) pūrṇāt pūrṇam ud acati pūrṇaṃ pūrṇena sicyate /
analyzed: pūrṇāt pūrṇam ud acati pūrṇam pūrṇena sicyate

original: (AVŚ_10,8.29c) uto tad adya vidyāma yatas tat pariṣicyate //29//
analyzed: uta u tat adya vidyāma yatas tat pariṣicyate

original: (AVŚ_10,8.30a) eṣā sanatnī sanam eva jātaiṣā purāṇī pari sarvaṃ babhūva /
analyzed: eṣā sanatnī sanam eva jātā eṣā purāṇī pari sarvam babhūva

original: (AVŚ_10,8.30c) mahī devy uṣaso vibhātī saikenaikena miṣatā vi caṣṭe //30// {28}
analyzed: mahī devī uṣasaḥ vibhātī sā ekena ekena miṣatā vi caṣṭe  /

original: (AVŚ_10,8.31a) avir vai nāma devatartenāste parīvṛtā /
analyzed: aviḥ vai nāma devatā ṛtena āste parīvṛtā

original: (AVŚ_10,8.31c) tasyā rūpeṇeme vṛkṣā haritā haritasrajaḥ //31//
analyzed: tasyāḥ rūpeṇa ime vṛkṣāḥ haritāḥ harita srajaḥ

original: (AVŚ_10,8.32a) anti santaṃ na jahāty anti santaṃ na paśyati /
analyzed: anti santam na jahāti anti santam na paśyati

original: (AVŚ_10,8.32c) devasya paśya kāvyaṃ na mamāra na jīryati //32//
analyzed: devasya paśya kāvyam na mamāra na jīryati

original: (AVŚ_10,8.33a) apūrveṇeṣitā vācas tā vadanti yathāyatham /
analyzed: apūrveṇa iṣitāḥ vācaḥ tāḥ vadanti yathāyatham

original: (AVŚ_10,8.33c) vadantīr yatra gachanti tad āhur brāhmaṇaṃ mahat //33//
analyzed: vadantīḥ yatra gacchanti tat āhuḥ brāhmaṇam mahat

original: (AVŚ_10,8.34a) yatra devāś ca manuṣyāś cārā nābhāv iva śritāḥ /
analyzed: yatra devāḥ ca manuṣyāḥ ca arāḥ nābhau iva śritāḥ

original: (AVŚ_10,8.34c) apāṃ tvā puṣpaṃ pṛchāmi yatra tan māyayā hitam //34//
analyzed: apām tvā puṣpam pṛcchāmi yatra tat māyayā hitam

original: (AVŚ_10,8.35a) yebhir vāta iṣitaḥ pravāti ye dadante pañca diśaḥ sadhrīcīḥ /
analyzed: yebhiḥ vātaḥ iṣitaḥ pravāti ye dadante pañca diśaḥ sadhrīcīḥ

original: (AVŚ_10,8.35c) ya āhutim atyamanyanta devā apāṃ netāraḥ katame ta āsan //35//
analyzed: ye āhutim atyamanyanta devāḥ apām netāraḥ katame te āsan

original: (AVŚ_10,8.36a) imām eṣāṃ pṛthivīṃ vasta eko 'ntarikṣaṃ pary eko babhūva /
analyzed: imām eṣām pṛthivīm vaste ekaḥ ntarikṣam pari ekaḥ babhūva

original: (AVŚ_10,8.36c) divam eṣāṃ dadate yo vidhartā viśvā āśāḥ prati rakṣanty eke //36//
analyzed: divam eṣām dadate yaḥ vidhartā viśvāḥ āśāḥ prati rakṣanti eke

original: (AVŚ_10,8.37a) yo vidyāt sūtraṃ vitataṃ yasminn otāḥ prajā imāḥ /
analyzed: yaḥ vidyāt sūtram vitatam yasmin otāḥ prajāḥ imāḥ

original: (AVŚ_10,8.37c) sūtraṃ sūtrasya yo vidyād sa vidyād brāhmaṇaṃ mahat //37//
analyzed: sūtram sūtrasya yaḥ vidyāt sa vidyāt brāhmaṇam mahat

original: (AVŚ_10,8.38a) vedāhaṃ sūtraṃ vitataṃ yasminn otāḥ prajā imāḥ /
analyzed: veda aham sūtram vitatam yasmin otāḥ prajāḥ imāḥ

original: (AVŚ_10,8.38c) sūtraṃ sūtrasyāhaṃ vedātho yad brāhmaṇaṃ mahad //38//
analyzed: sūtram sūtrasya aham veda atha u yat brāhmaṇam mahat

original: (AVŚ_10,8.39a) yad antarā dyāvāpṛthivī agnir ait pradahan viśvadāvyaḥ /
analyzed: yat antarā dyāvāpṛthivī agniḥ ait pradahan viśvadāvyaḥ

original: (AVŚ_10,8.39c) yatrātiṣṭhann ekapatnīḥ parastāt kvevāsīn mātariśvā tadānīm //39//
analyzed: yatra atiṣṭhan ekapatnīḥ parastāt kva iva āsīt mātariśvā tadānīm

original: (AVŚ_10,8.40a) apsv āsīn mātariśvā praviṣṭaḥ praviṣṭā devāḥ salilāny āsan//
analyzed: apsu āsīt mātariśvā praviṣṭaḥ praviṣṭāḥ devāḥ salilāni āsan

original: (AVŚ_10,8.40b) bṛhan ha tasthau rajaso vimānaḥ pavamāno harita ā viveśa //40//
analyzed: bṛhan ha tasthau rajasaḥ vimānaḥ pavamānaḥ haritaḥ ā viveśa

original: (AVŚ_10,8.41a) uttareṇeva gayatrīm amṛte 'dhi vi cakrame /
analyzed: uttareṇa iva gayatrīm amṛte dhi vi cakrame

original: (AVŚ_10,8.41c) sāmnā ye sāma saṃvidur ajas tad dadṛśe kva //41//
analyzed: sāmnā ye sāma saṃviduḥ ajaḥ tat dadṛśe kva

original: (AVŚ_10,8.42a) niveśanaḥ saṃgamano vasūnāṃ deva iva savitā satyadharmā /
analyzed: niveśanaḥ saṃgamanaḥ vasūnām devaḥ iva savitā satya dharmā

original: (AVŚ_10,8.42c) indro na tasthau samare dhanānām //42//
analyzed: indraḥ na tasthau samare dhanānām

original: (AVŚ_10,8.43a) puṇḍarīkaṃ navadvāraṃ tribhir guṇebhir āvṛtam /
analyzed: puṇḍarīkam nava dvāram tribhiḥ guṇebhiḥ āvṛtam

original: (AVŚ_10,8.43c) tasmin yad yakṣam ātmanvat tad vai brahmavido viduḥ //43//
analyzed: tasmin yat yakṣam ātmanvat tat vai brahma vidaḥ viduḥ

original: (AVŚ_10,8.44a) akāmo dhīro amṛtaḥ svayaṃbhū rasena tṛpto na kutaś canonaḥ /
analyzed: akāmaḥ dhīraḥ amṛtaḥ svayaṃbhūḥ rasena tṛptaḥ na kutas cana ūnaḥ

original: (AVŚ_10,8.44c) tam eva vidvān na bibhāya mṛtyor ātmānaṃ dhīram ajaraṃ yuvānam //44// {29}
analyzed: tam eva vidvān na bibhāya mṛtyoḥ ātmānam dhīram ajaram yuvānam

original: (AVŚ_10,9.1a) aghāyatām api nahyā mukhāni sapatneṣu vajram arpayaitam /
analyzed: aghāyatām api nahyāḥ mukhāni sapatneṣu vajram arpaya etam

original: (AVŚ_10,9.1c) indreṇa dattā prathamā śataudanā bhrātṛvyaghnī yajamānasya gātuḥ //1//
analyzed: indreṇa dattā prathamā śata odanā bhrātṛvya ghnī yajamānasya gātuḥ

original: (AVŚ_10,9.2a) vediṣ ṭe carma bhavatu barhir lomāni yāni te /
analyzed: vediḥ te carma bhavatu barhiḥ lomāni yāni te

original: (AVŚ_10,9.2c) eṣā tvā raśanāgrabhīd grāvā tvaiṣo 'dhi nṛtyatu //2//
analyzed: eṣā tvā raśanā agrabhīt grāvā tvā eṣaḥ dhi nṛtyatu

original: (AVŚ_10,9.3a) bālās te prokṣaṇīḥ santu jīhvā saṃ mārṣṭu aghnye /
analyzed: bālāḥ te prokṣaṇīḥ santu jīhvā sam mārṣṭu aghnye

original: (AVŚ_10,9.3c) śuddhā tvaṃ yajñiyā bhūtvā divaṃ prehi śataudane //3//
analyzed: śuddhā tvam yajñiyā bhūtvā divam prehi śata odane

original: (AVŚ_10,9.4a) yaḥ śataudanāṃ pacati kāmapreṇa sa kalpate /
analyzed: yaḥ śata odanām pacati kāmapreṇa sa kalpate

original: (AVŚ_10,9.4c) prītā hy asya ṛtvijaḥ sarve yanti yathāyatham //4//
analyzed: prītāḥ hi asya ṛtvijaḥ sarve yanti yathāyatham

original: (AVŚ_10,9.5a) sa svargam ā rohati yatrādas tridivaṃ divaḥ /
analyzed: sa svargam ā rohati yatra adaḥ tridivam divaḥ

original: (AVŚ_10,9.5c) apūpanābhiṃ kṛtvā yo dadāti śataudanām //5//
analyzed: apūpa nābhim kṛtvā yaḥ dadāti śata odanām

original: (AVŚ_10,9.6a) sa tāṃl lokānt sam āpnoti ye divyā ye ca pārthivāḥ /
analyzed: sa tān lokān sam āpnoti ye divyāḥ ye ca pārthivāḥ

original: (AVŚ_10,9.6c) hiraṇyajyotiṣaṃ kṛtvā yo dadāti śataudanām //6//
analyzed: hiraṇya jyotiṣam kṛtvā yaḥ dadāti śata odanām

original: (AVŚ_10,9.7a) ye te devi śamitāraḥ paktāro ye ca te janāḥ /
analyzed: ye te devi śamitāraḥ paktāraḥ ye ca te janāḥ

original: (AVŚ_10,9.7c) te tvā sarve gopsyanti maibhyo bhaiṣīḥ śataudane //7//
analyzed: te tvā sarve gopsyanti mā ebhyaḥ bhaiṣīḥ śata odane

original: (AVŚ_10,9.8a) vasavas tvā dakṣiṇata uttarān marutas tvā /
analyzed: vasavaḥ tvā dakṣiṇatas uttarāt marutaḥ tvā

original: (AVŚ_10,9.8c) ādityāḥ paścād gopsyanti sāgniṣṭomam ati drava //8//
analyzed: ādityāḥ paścāt gopsyanti sā agniṣṭomam ati drava

original: (AVŚ_10,9.9a) devāḥ pitaro manuṣyā gandharvāpsarasaś ca ye /
analyzed: devāḥ pitaraḥ manuṣyāḥ gandharva apsarasaḥ ca ye

original: (AVŚ_10,9.9c) te tvā sarve gopsyanti sātirātram ati drava //9//
analyzed: te tvā sarve gopsyanti sā atirātram ati drava

original: (AVŚ_10,9.10a) antarikṣaṃ divaṃ bhūmim ādityān maruto diśaḥ /
analyzed: antarikṣam divam bhūmim ādityān marutaḥ diśaḥ

original: (AVŚ_10,9.10c) lokānt sa sarvān āpnoti yo dadāti śataudanām //10// {30}
analyzed: lokān sa sarvān āpnoti yaḥ dadāti śata odanām

original: (AVŚ_10,9.11a) ghṛtaṃ prokṣantī subhagā devī devān gamiṣyati /
analyzed: ghṛtam prokṣantī subhagā devī devān gamiṣyati

original: (AVŚ_10,9.11c) paktāram aghnye mā hiṃsīr divaṃ prehi śataudane //11//
analyzed: paktāram aghnye mā hiṃsīḥ divam prehi śata odane

original: (AVŚ_10,9.12a) ye devā diviṣado antarikṣasadaś ca ye ye ceme bhūmyām adhi /
analyzed: ye devāḥ diviṣadaḥ antarikṣa sadaḥ ca ye ye ca ime bhūmyām adhi

original: (AVŚ_10,9.12c) tebhyas tvaṃ dhukṣva sarvadā kṣīraṃ sarpir atho madhu //12//
analyzed: tebhyaḥ tvam dhukṣva sarvadā kṣīram sarpiḥ atha u madhu

original: (AVŚ_10,9.13a) yat te śiro yat te mukhaṃ yau karṇau ye ca te hanū /
analyzed: yat te śiraḥ yat te mukham yau karṇau ye ca te hanū

original: (AVŚ_10,9.13c) āmikṣāṃ duhratāṃ dātre kṣīraṃ sarpir atho madhu //13//
analyzed: āmikṣām duhratām dātre kṣīram sarpiḥ atha u madhu

original: (AVŚ_10,9.14a) yau ta oṣṭhau ye nāsike ye śṛṅge ye ca te 'kṣiṇī /
analyzed: yau te oṣṭhau ye nāsike ye śṛṅge ye ca te kṣiṇī

original: (AVŚ_10,9.14c) āmikṣāṃ duhratāṃ dātre kṣīraṃ sarpir atho madhu //14//
analyzed: āmikṣām duhratām dātre kṣīram sarpiḥ atha u madhu

original: (AVŚ_10,9.15a) yat te klomā yad dhṛdayaṃ purītat sahakaṇṭhikā /
analyzed: yat te klomā yat hṛdayam purītat sahakaṇṭhikā

original: (AVŚ_10,9.15c) āmikṣāṃ duhratāṃ dātre kṣīraṃ sarpir atho madhu //15//
analyzed: āmikṣām duhratām dātre kṣīram sarpiḥ atha u madhu

original: (AVŚ_10,9.16a) yat te yakṛd ye matasne yad āntram yāś ca te gudāḥ /
analyzed: yat te yakṛt ye matasne yat āntram yāḥ ca te gudāḥ

original: (AVŚ_10,9.16c) āmikṣāṃ duhratāṃ dātre kṣīraṃ sarpir atho madhu //16//
analyzed: āmikṣām duhratām dātre kṣīram sarpiḥ atha u madhu

original: (AVŚ_10,9.17a) yas te plāśir yo vaniṣṭhur yau kukṣī yac ca carma te /
analyzed: yaḥ te plāśiḥ yaḥ vaniṣṭhuḥ yau kukṣī yat ca carma te

original: (AVŚ_10,9.17c) āmikṣāṃ duhratāṃ dātre kṣīraṃ sarpir atho madhu //17//
analyzed: āmikṣām duhratām dātre kṣīram sarpiḥ atha u madhu

original: (AVŚ_10,9.18a) yat te majjā yad asthi yan maṃsaṃ yac ca lohitam /
analyzed: yat te majjā yat asthi yat maṃsam yat ca lohitam

original: (AVŚ_10,9.18c) āmikṣāṃ duhratāṃ dātre kṣīraṃ sarpir atho madhu //18//
analyzed: āmikṣām duhratām dātre kṣīram sarpiḥ atha u madhu

original: (AVŚ_10,9.19a) yau te bāhū ye doṣaṇī yāv aṃsau yā ca te kakut /
analyzed: yau te bāhū ye doṣaṇī yau aṃsau yā ca te kakud

original: (AVŚ_10,9.19c) āmikṣāṃ duhratāṃ dātre kṣīraṃ sarpir atho madhu //19//
analyzed: āmikṣām duhratām dātre kṣīram sarpiḥ atha u madhu

original: (AVŚ_10,9.20a) yās te grīvā ye skandhā yāḥ pṛṣṭīr yāś ca parśavaḥ /
analyzed: yāḥ te grīvāḥ ye skandhāḥ yāḥ pṛṣṭīḥ yāḥ ca parśavaḥ

original: (AVŚ_10,9.20c) āmikṣāṃ duhratāṃ dātre kṣīraṃ sarpir atho madhu //20// {31}
analyzed: āmikṣām duhratām dātre kṣīram sarpiḥ atha u madhu

original: (AVŚ_10,9.21a) yau ta urū aṣṭhīvantau ye śroṇī yā ca te bhasat /
analyzed: yau te urū aṣṭhīvantau ye śroṇī yā ca te bhasad

original: (AVŚ_10,9.21c) āmikṣāṃ duhratāṃ dātre kṣīraṃ sarpir atho madhu //21//
analyzed: āmikṣām duhratām dātre kṣīram sarpiḥ atha u madhu

original: (AVŚ_10,9.22a) yat te puchaṃ ye te bālā yad ūdho ye ca te stanāḥ /
analyzed: yat te pucham ye te bālāḥ yat ūdhar ye ca te stanāḥ

original: (AVŚ_10,9.22c) āmikṣāṃ duhratāṃ dātre kṣīraṃ sarpir atho madhu //22//
analyzed: āmikṣām duhratām dātre kṣīram sarpiḥ atha u madhu

original: (AVŚ_10,9.23a) yās te jaṅghāḥ yāḥ kuṣṭhikā ṛcharā ye ca te śaphāḥ /
analyzed: yāḥ te jaṅghāḥ yāḥ kuṣṭhikāḥ ṛcharāḥ ye ca te śaphāḥ

original: (AVŚ_10,9.23c) āmikṣāṃ duhratāṃ dātre kṣīraṃ sarpir atho madhu //23//
analyzed: āmikṣām duhratām dātre kṣīram sarpiḥ atha u madhu

original: (AVŚ_10,9.24a) yat te carma śataudane yāni lomāny aghnye /
analyzed: yat te carma śata odane yāni lomāni aghnye

original: (AVŚ_10,9.24c) āmikṣāṃ duhratāṃ dātre kṣīraṃ sarpir atho madhu //24//
analyzed: āmikṣām duhratām dātre kṣīram sarpiḥ atha u madhu

original: (AVŚ_10,9.25a) kroḍau te stāṃ purodāśāv ājyenābhighāritau /
analyzed: kroḍau te stām purodāśau ājyena abhighāritau

original: (AVŚ_10,9.25c) tau pakṣau devi kṛtvā sā paktāraṃ divaṃ vaha //25//
analyzed: tau pakṣau devi kṛtvā sā paktāram divam vaha

original: (AVŚ_10,9.26a) ulūkhale musale yaś ca carmaṇi yo vā śūrpe taṇḍulaḥ kaṇaḥ /
analyzed: ulūkhale musale yaḥ ca carmaṇi yaḥ vā śūrpe taṇḍulaḥ kaṇaḥ

original: (AVŚ_10,9.26c) yaṃ vā vāto mātariśvā pavamāno mamāthāgniṣ ṭad dhotā suhutaṃ kṛṇotu //26//
analyzed: yam vā vātaḥ mātariśvā pavamānaḥ mamātha agniḥ tat hotā su hutam kṛṇotu

original: (AVŚ_10,9.27a) apo devīr madhumatīr ghṛtaścuto brahmaṇāṃ hasteṣu prapṛthak sādayāmi /
analyzed: apaḥ devīḥ madhumatīḥ ghṛtaścutaḥ brahmaṇām hasteṣu prapṛthak sādayāmi

original: (AVŚ_10,9.27c) yatkāma idam abhiṣiñcāmi vo 'haṃ tan me sarvaṃ saṃ padyatāṃ vayaṃ syāma patayo rayīṇām //27// {32}
analyzed: yad kāmaḥ idam abhiṣiñcāmi vaḥ ham tat me sarvam sam padyatām vayam syāma patayaḥ rayīṇām

original: (AVŚ_10,10.1a) namas te jāyamānāyai jātāyā uta te namaḥ /
analyzed: namaḥ te jāyamānāyai jātāyai uta te namaḥ

original: (AVŚ_10,10.1c) bālebhyaḥ śaphebhyo rūpāyāghnye te namaḥ //1//
analyzed: bālebhyaḥ śaphebhyaḥ rūpāya aghnye te namaḥ

original: (AVŚ_10,10.2a) yo vidyāt sapta pravataḥ sapta vidyāt parāvataḥ /
analyzed: yaḥ vidyāt sapta pravataḥ sapta vidyāt parāvataḥ

original: (AVŚ_10,10.2c) śiro yajñasya yo vidyāt sa vaśāṃ prati gṛhṇīyāt //2//
analyzed: śiraḥ yajñasya yaḥ vidyāt sa vaśām prati gṛhṇīyāt

original: (AVŚ_10,10.3a) vedāhaṃ sapta pravataḥ sapta veda parāvataḥ /
analyzed: veda aham sapta pravataḥ sapta veda parāvataḥ

original: (AVŚ_10,10.3c) śiro yajñasyāhaṃ veda somaṃ cāsyāṃ vicakṣaṇam //3//
analyzed: śiraḥ yajñasya aham veda somam ca asyām vicakṣaṇam

original: (AVŚ_10,10.4a) yayā dyaur yayā pṛthivī yayāpo gupitā imāḥ /
analyzed: yayā dyauḥ yayā pṛthivī yayā apaḥ gupitāḥ imāḥ

original: (AVŚ_10,10.4c) vaśāṃ sahasradhārāṃ brahmaṇāchāvadāmasi //4//
analyzed: vaśām sahasra dhārām brahmaṇā achāvadāmasi

original: (AVŚ_10,10.5a) śataṃ kaṃsāḥ śataṃ dogdhāraḥ śataṃ goptāro adhi pṛṣṭhe asyāḥ /
analyzed: śatam kaṃsāḥ śatam dogdhāraḥ śatam goptāraḥ adhi pṛṣṭhe asyāḥ

original: (AVŚ_10,10.5c) ye devās tasyāṃ prāṇanti te vaśāṃ vidur ekadhā //5//
analyzed: ye devāḥ tasyām prāṇanti te vaśām viduḥ ekadhā

original: (AVŚ_10,10.6a) yajñapadīrākṣīrā svadhāprāṇā mahīlukā /
analyzed: svadhā prāṇā mahīlukā

original: (AVŚ_10,10.6c) vaśā parjanyapatnī devāṃ apy eti brahmaṇā //6//
analyzed: vaśā parjanya patnī devān api eti brahmaṇā

original: (AVŚ_10,10.7a) anu tvāgniḥ prāviśad anu somo vaśe tvā /
analyzed: anu tvā agniḥ prāviśat anu somaḥ vaśe tvā

original: (AVŚ_10,10.7c) ūdhas te bhadre parjanyo vidyutas te stanā vaśe //7//
analyzed: ūdhar te bhadre parjanyaḥ vidyutaḥ te stanāḥ vaśe

original: (AVŚ_10,10.8a) apas tvaṃ dhukṣe prathamā urvarā aparā vaśe /
analyzed: apaḥ tvam dhukṣe prathamāḥ urvarāḥ aparāḥ vaśe

original: (AVŚ_10,10.8c) tṛtīyaṃ rāṣṭraṃ dhukṣe 'nnaṃ kṣīraṃ vaśe tvam //8//
analyzed: tṛtīyam rāṣṭram dhukṣe nnam kṣīram vaśe tvam

original: (AVŚ_10,10.9a) yad ādityair hūyamānopātiṣṭha ṛtavari /
analyzed: yat ādityaiḥ hūyamānā upātiṣṭhe ṛtavari

original: (AVŚ_10,10.9c) indraḥ sahasraṃ pātrānt somaṃ tvāpāyayad vaśe //9//
analyzed: indraḥ sahasram pātrān somam tvā apāyayat vaśe

original: (AVŚ_10,10.10a) yad anūcīndram air āt tvā ṛṣabho 'hvayat /
analyzed: yat anūci indram aiḥ āt tvā ṛṣabhaḥ hvayat

original: (AVŚ_10,10.10c) tasmāt te vṛtrahā payaḥ kṣīraṃ kruddho 'harad vaśe //10// {33}
analyzed: tasmāt te vṛtrahā payaḥ kṣīram kruddhaḥ harat vaśe

original: (AVŚ_10,10.11a) yat te kruddho dhanapatir ā kṣīram aharad vaśe /
analyzed: yat te kruddhaḥ dhanapatiḥ ā kṣīram aharat vaśe

original: (AVŚ_10,10.11c) idaṃ tad adya nākas triṣu pātreṣu rakṣati //11//
analyzed: idam tat adya nākaḥ triṣu pātreṣu rakṣati

original: (AVŚ_10,10.12a) triṣu pātreṣu taṃ somam ā devy aharad vaśā /
analyzed: triṣu pātreṣu tam somam ā devī aharat vaśā

original: (AVŚ_10,10.12c) atharvā yatra dīkṣito barhiṣy āsta hiraṇyaye //12//
analyzed: atharvā yatra dīkṣitaḥ barhiṣi āsta hiraṇyaye

original: (AVŚ_10,10.13a) saṃ hi somenāgata sam u sarveṇa padvatā /
analyzed: sam hi somena agata sam u sarveṇa padvatā

original: (AVŚ_10,10.13c) vaśā samudram adhy aṣṭhad gandharvaiḥ kalibhiḥ saha //13//
analyzed: vaśā samudram adhi aṣṭhat gandharvaiḥ kalibhiḥ saha

original: (AVŚ_10,10.14a) saṃ hi vātenāgata sam u sarvaiḥ patatribhiḥ /
analyzed: sam hi vātena agata sam u sarvaiḥ patatribhiḥ

original: (AVŚ_10,10.14c) vaśā samudre prānṛtyad ṛcaḥ sāmāni bibhratī //14//
analyzed: vaśā samudre prānṛtyat ṛcaḥ sāmāni bibhratī

original: (AVŚ_10,10.15a) saṃ hi sūryeṇāgata sam u sarveṇa cakṣuṣā /
analyzed: sam hi sūryeṇa agata sam u sarveṇa cakṣuṣā

original: (AVŚ_10,10.15c) vaśā samudram aty akhyad bhadrā jyotīṃṣi bibhratī //15//
analyzed: vaśā samudram ati akhyat bhadrā jyotīṃṣi bibhratī

original: (AVŚ_10,10.16a) abhīvṛtā hiraṇyena yad atiṣṭha ṛtāvari /
analyzed: abhīvṛtā hiraṇyena yat atiṣṭhaḥ ṛtāvari

original: (AVŚ_10,10.16c) aśvaḥ samudro bhūtvādhy askandad vaśe tvā //16//
analyzed: aśvaḥ samudraḥ bhūtvā adhi askandat vaśe tvā

original: (AVŚ_10,10.17a) tad bhadrāḥ sam agachanta vaśā deṣṭry atho svadhā /
analyzed: tat bhadrāḥ sam agachanta vaśā deṣṭrī atha u svadhā

original: (AVŚ_10,10.17c) atharvā yatra dīkṣito barhiṣy āsta hiraṇyaye //17//
analyzed: atharvā yatra dīkṣitaḥ barhiṣi āsta hiraṇyaye

original: (AVŚ_10,10.18a) vaśā mātā rājanyasya vaśā mātā svadhe tava /
analyzed: vaśā mātā rājanyasya vaśā mātā svadhe tava

original: (AVŚ_10,10.18c) vaśāyā yajña āyudhaṃ tataś cittam ajāyata //18//
analyzed: vaśāyāḥ yajñaḥ āyudham tatas cittam ajāyata

original: (AVŚ_10,10.19a) ūrdhvo bindur ud acarad brahmaṇaḥ kakudād adhi /
analyzed: ūrdhvaḥ binduḥ ud acarat brahmaṇaḥ kakudāt adhi

original: (AVŚ_10,10.19c) tatas tvaṃ jajñiṣe vaśe tato hotājāyata //19//
analyzed: tatas tvam jajñiṣe vaśe tatas hotā ajāyata

original: (AVŚ_10,10.20a) āsnas te gāthā abhavann uṣṇihābhyo balaṃ vaśe /
analyzed: āsnaḥ te gāthāḥ abhavan uṣṇihābhyaḥ balam vaśe

original: (AVŚ_10,10.20c) pājasyāj jajñe yajña stanebhyo raśmayas tava //20// {34}
analyzed: pājasyāt jajñe yajña stanebhyaḥ raśmayaḥ tava

original: (AVŚ_10,10.21a) īrmābhyām ayanaṃ jātaṃ sakthibhyāṃ ca vaśe tava /
analyzed: īrmābhyām ayanam jātam sakthibhyām ca vaśe tava

original: (AVŚ_10,10.21c) āntrebhyo jajñire atrā udarād adhi vīrudhaḥ //21//
analyzed: āntrebhyaḥ jajñire atrāḥ udarāt adhi vīrudhaḥ

original: (AVŚ_10,10.22a) yad udaraṃ varuṇasyānuprāviśathā vaśe /
analyzed: yat udaram varuṇasya anuprāviśathāḥ vaśe

original: (AVŚ_10,10.22c) tatas tvā brahmod ahvayat sa hi netram avet tava //22//
analyzed: tatas tvā brahmā ud ahvayat sa hi netram avet tava

original: (AVŚ_10,10.23a) sarve garbhād avepanta jāyamānād asūsvaḥ /
analyzed: sarve garbhāt avepanta jāyamānāt asūsvaḥ

original: (AVŚ_10,10.23c) sasūva hi tām āhu vaśeti brahmabhiḥ kḷptaḥ sa hy asyā bandhuḥ //23//
analyzed: sasūva hi tām āhuḥ vaśā iti brahmabhiḥ kḷptaḥ sa hi asyāḥ bandhuḥ

original: (AVŚ_10,10.24a) yudha ekaḥ saṃ sṛjati yo asyā eka id vaśī /
analyzed: yudhaḥ ekaḥ sam sṛjati yaḥ asyāḥ ekaḥ id vaśī

original: (AVŚ_10,10.24c) tarāṃsi yajñā abhavan tarasāṃ cakṣur abhavad vaśā //24//
analyzed: tarāṃsi yajñāḥ abhavan tarasām cakṣuḥ abhavat vaśā

original: (AVŚ_10,10.25a) vaśā yajñaṃ praty agṛhṇād vaśā sūryam adhārayat /
analyzed: vaśā yajñam prati agṛhṇāt vaśā sūryam adhārayat

original: (AVŚ_10,10.25c) vaśāyām antar aviśad odano brahmaṇā saha //25//
analyzed: vaśāyām antar aviśat odanaḥ brahmaṇā saha

original: (AVŚ_10,10.26a) vaśām evāmṛtam āhur vaśāṃ mṛtyum upāsate /
analyzed: vaśām eva amṛtam āhuḥ vaśām mṛtyum upāsate

original: (AVŚ_10,10.26c) vaśedaṃ sarvam abhavad devā manuṣyā asurāḥ pitara ṛṣayaḥ //26//
analyzed: vaśā idam sarvam abhavat devāḥ manuṣyāḥ asurāḥ pitaraḥ ṛṣayaḥ

original: (AVŚ_10,10.27a) ya evaṃ vidyāt sa vaśāṃ prati gṛhṇīyāt /
analyzed: yaḥ evam vidyāt sa vaśām prati gṛhṇīyāt

original: (AVŚ_10,10.27c) tathā hi yajñaḥ sarvapād duhe dātre 'napasphuran //27//
analyzed: tathā hi yajñaḥ sarva pād duhe dātre na apasphuran

original: (AVŚ_10,10.28a) tisro jihvā varuṇasyāntar dīdyaty āsani /
analyzed: tisraḥ jihvāḥ varuṇasya antar dīdyati āsani

original: (AVŚ_10,10.28c) tāsāṃ yā madhye rājati sā vaśā duṣpratigrahā //28//
analyzed: tāsām yā madhye rājati sā vaśā duṣpratigrahā

original: (AVŚ_10,10.29a) caturdhā reto abhavad vaśāyāḥ /
analyzed: caturdhā retaḥ abhavat vaśāyāḥ

original: (AVŚ_10,10.29c) āpas turīyam amṛtaṃ turīyaṃ yajñas turīyaṃ paśavas turīyam //29//
analyzed: āpaḥ turīyam amṛtam turīyam yajñaḥ turīyam paśavaḥ turīyam

original: (AVŚ_10,10.30a) vaśā dyaur vaśā pṛthivī vaśā viṣṇuḥ prajāpatiḥ /
analyzed: vaśā dyauḥ vaśā pṛthivī vaśā viṣṇuḥ prajāpatiḥ

original: (AVŚ_10,10.30c) vaśāyā dugdham apibant sādhyā vasavaś ca ye //30//
analyzed: vaśāyāḥ dugdham apiban sādhyāḥ vasavaḥ ca ye

original: (AVŚ_10,10.31a) vaśāyā dugdhaṃ pītvā sādhyā vasavaś ca ye /
analyzed: vaśāyāḥ dugdham pītvā sādhyāḥ vasavaḥ ca ye

original: (AVŚ_10,10.31c) te vai bradhnasya viṣṭapi payo asyā upāsate //31//
analyzed: te vai bradhnasya viṣṭapi payaḥ asyāḥ upāsate

original: (AVŚ_10,10.32a) somam enām eke duhre ghṛtam eka upāsate /
analyzed: somam enām eke duhre ghṛtam eke upāsate

original: (AVŚ_10,10.32c) ya evaṃ viduṣe vaśāṃ dadus te gatās tridivaṃ divaḥ //32//
analyzed: ye evam viduṣe vaśām daduḥ te gatāḥ tridivam divaḥ

original: (AVŚ_10,10.33a) brāhmaṇebhyo vaśāṃ dattvā sarvāṃl lokānt sam aśnute /
analyzed: brāhmaṇebhyaḥ vaśām dattvā sarvān lokān sam aśnute

original: (AVŚ_10,10.33c) ṛtaṃ hy asyām ārpitam api brahmātho tapaḥ //33//
analyzed: ṛtam hi asyām ā arpitam api brahma atha u tapaḥ

original: (AVŚ_10,10.34a) vaśāṃ devā upa jīvanti vaśāṃ manuṣyā uta /
analyzed: vaśām devāḥ upa jīvanti vaśām manuṣyāḥ uta

original: (AVŚ_10,10.34c) vaśedaṃ sarvam abhavad yāvat sūryo vipaśyati //34// {35}
analyzed: vaśā idam sarvam abhavat yāvat sūryaḥ vipaśyati

original: (AVŚ_11,1.1a) agne jāyasvāditir nāthiteyaṃ brahmaudanaṃ pacati putrakāmā /
analyzed: agne jāyasva aditiḥ nāthitā iyam brahmaudanam pacati putra kāmā

original: (AVŚ_11,1.1c) saptaṛṣayo bhūtakṛtas te tvā manthantu prajayā saheha //1//
analyzed: sapta ṛṣayaḥ bhūta kṛtaḥ te tvā manthantu prajayā saha iha

original: (AVŚ_11,1.2a) kṛṇuta dhūmaṃ vṛṣaṇaḥ sakhāyo 'droghāvitā vācam acha /
analyzed: kṛṇuta dhūmam vṛṣaṇaḥ sakhāyaḥ droghāvitāḥ vācam acha

original: (AVŚ_11,1.2c) ayam agniḥ pṛtanāṣāṭ suvīro yena devā asahanta dasyūn //2//
analyzed: ayam agniḥ pṛtanāṣāh su vīraḥ yena devāḥ asahanta dasyūn

original: (AVŚ_11,1.3a) agne 'janiṣṭhā mahate vīryāya brahmaudanāya paktave jātavedaḥ /
analyzed: agne janiṣṭhāḥ mahate vīryāya brahmaudanāya paktave jātavedaḥ

original: (AVŚ_11,1.3c) saptaṛṣayo bhūtakṛtas te tvājījanann asyai rayiṃ sarvavīraṃ ni yacha //3//
analyzed: sapta ṛṣayaḥ bhūta kṛtaḥ te tvā ajījanan asyai rayim sarva vīram ni yaccha

original: (AVŚ_11,1.4a) samiddho agne samidhā sam idhyasva vidvān devān yajñiyāṃ eha vakṣaḥ /
analyzed: samiddhaḥ agne samidhā sam idhyasva vidvān devān yajñiyān ā iha vakṣaḥ

original: (AVŚ_11,1.4c) tebhyo haviḥ śrapayaṃ jātaveda uttamaṃ nākam adhi rohayemam //4//
analyzed: tebhyaḥ haviḥ śrapayan jātavedaḥ uttamam nākam adhi rohaya imam

original: (AVŚ_11,1.5a) tredhā bhāgo nihito yaḥ purā vo devānāṃ pitṝṇāṃ martyānām /
analyzed: tredhā bhāgaḥ nihitaḥ yaḥ purā vaḥ devānām pitṝṇām martyānām

original: (AVŚ_11,1.5c) aṃśāṃ jānīdhvaṃ vi bhajāmi tān vo yo devānāṃ sa imāṃ pārayāti //5//
analyzed: aṃśām jānīdhvam vi bhajāmi tān vaḥ yaḥ devānām saḥ imām pārayāti

original: (AVŚ_11,1.6a) agne sahasvān abhibhūr abhīd asi nīco ny ubja dviṣataḥ sapatnān /
analyzed: agne sahasvān abhibhūḥ abhi id asi nīcaḥ ni ubja dviṣataḥ sapatnān

original: (AVŚ_11,1.6c) iyaṃ mātrā mīyamānā mitā ca sajātāṃs te balihṛtaḥ kṛṇotu //6//
analyzed: iyam mātrā mīyamānā mitā ca sajātān te bali hṛtaḥ kṛṇotu

original: (AVŚ_11,1.7a) sākaṃ sajātaiḥ payasā sahaidhy ud ubjaināṃ mahate vīryāya /
analyzed: sākam sajātaiḥ payasā saha edhi ud ubja enām mahate vīryāya

original: (AVŚ_11,1.7c) ūrdhvo nākasyādhi roha viṣṭapaṃ svargo loka iti yaṃ vadanti //7//
analyzed: ūrdhvaḥ nākasya adhi roha viṣṭapam svargaḥ lokaḥ iti yam vadanti

original: (AVŚ_11,1.8a) iyaṃ mahī prati gṛhṇātu carma pṛthivī devī sumanasyamānā /
analyzed: iyam mahī prati gṛhṇātu carma pṛthivī devī sumanasyamānā

original: (AVŚ_11,1.8c) atha gachema sukṛtasya lokam //8//
analyzed: atha gacchema sukṛtasya lokam

original: (AVŚ_11,1.9a) etau grāvāṇau sayujā yuṅdhi carmaṇi nirbindhy aṃśūn yajamānāya sādhu /
analyzed: etau grāvāṇau sayujā yuṅdhi carmaṇi nirbindhi aṃśūn yajamānāya sādhu

original: (AVŚ_11,1.9c) avaghnatī ni jahi ya imāṃ pṛtanyava ūrdhvaṃ prajām udbharanty ud ūha //9//
analyzed: avaghnatī ni jahi ye imām pṛtanyavaḥ ūrdhvam prajām udbharantī ud ūha

original: (AVŚ_11,1.10a) gṛhāṇa grāvāṇau sakṛtau vīra hasta ā te devā yajñiyā yajñam aguḥ /
analyzed: gṛhāṇa grāvāṇau sakṛtau vīra haste ā te devāḥ yajñiyāḥ yajñam aguḥ

original: (AVŚ_11,1.10c) trayo varā yatamāṃs tvaṃ vṛṇīṣe tās te samṛddhīr iha rādhayāmi //10// {1}
analyzed: trayaḥ varāḥ yatamān tvam vṛṇīṣe tāḥ te samṛddhīḥ iha rādhayāmi

original: (AVŚ_11,1.11a) iyaṃ te dhītir idam u te janitraṃ gṛhṇātu tvām aditiḥ śūraputrā /
analyzed: iyam te dhītiḥ idam u te janitram gṛhṇātu tvām aditiḥ śūra putrā

original: (AVŚ_11,1.11c) parā punīhi ya imāṃ pṛtanyavo 'syai rayiṃ sarvavīraṃ ni yacha //11//
analyzed: parā punīhi ye imām pṛtanyavaḥ syai rayim sarva vīram ni yaccha

original: (AVŚ_11,1.12a) upaśvase druvaye sīdatā yūyaṃ vi vicyadhvaṃ yajñiyāsas tuṣaiḥ /
analyzed: upaśvase druvaye sīdata yūyam vi vicyadhvam yajñiyāsaḥ tuṣaiḥ

original: (AVŚ_11,1.12c) śriyā samānān ati sarvānt syāmādhaspadaṃ dviṣatas pādayāmi //12//
analyzed: śriyā samānān ati sarvān syāma adhaspadam dviṣataḥ pādayāmi

original: (AVŚ_11,1.13a) parehi nāri punar ehi kṣipram apāṃ tvā goṣṭho adhy arukṣad bharāya /
analyzed: parehi nāri punar ehi kṣipram apām tvā goṣṭhaḥ adhi arukṣat bharāya

original: (AVŚ_11,1.13c) tāsāṃ gṛhṇītād yatamā yajñiyā asan vibhājya dhīrītarā jahītāt //13//
analyzed: tāsām gṛhṇītāt yatamāḥ yajñiyāḥ asan vibhājya dhīrītarā jahītāt

original: (AVŚ_11,1.14a) emā agur yoṣitaḥ śumbhamānā ut tiṣṭha nāri tavasaṃ rabhasva /
analyzed: ā imāḥ aguḥ yoṣitaḥ śumbhamānāḥ ud tiṣṭha nāri tavasam rabhasva

original: (AVŚ_11,1.14c) supatnī patyā prajayā prajāvaty ā tvāgan yajñaḥ prati kumbhaṃ gṛbhāya //14//
analyzed: su patnī patyā prajayā prajāvatī ā tvā agan yajñaḥ prati kumbham gṛbhāya

original: (AVŚ_11,1.15a) ūrjo bhāgo nihito yaḥ purā va ṛṣipraśiṣṭāpa ā bharaitāḥ /
analyzed: ūrjaḥ bhāgaḥ nihitaḥ yaḥ purā vaḥ ṛṣi praśiṣṭa apaḥ ā bhara etāḥ

original: (AVŚ_11,1.15c) ayaṃ yajño gātuvin nāthavit prajāvid ugraḥ paśuvid vīravid vo astu //15//
analyzed: ayam yajñaḥ gātu vid nātha vid prajā vid ugraḥ paśu vid vīra vid vaḥ astu

original: (AVŚ_11,1.16a) agne carur yajñiyas tvādhy arukṣac chucis tapiṣṭhas tapasā tapainam /
analyzed: agne caruḥ yajñiyaḥ tvā adhi arukṣat śuciḥ tapiṣṭhaḥ tapasā tapa enam

original: (AVŚ_11,1.16c) ārṣeyā daivā abhisaṃgatya bhāgam imaṃ tapiṣṭhā ṛtubhis tapantu //16//
analyzed: ārṣeyāḥ daivāḥ abhisaṃgatya bhāgam imam tapiṣṭhāḥ ṛtubhiḥ tapantu

original: (AVŚ_11,1.17a) śuddhāḥ pūtā yoṣito yajñiyā imā āpaś carum ava sarpantu śubhrāḥ /
analyzed: śuddhāḥ pūtāḥ yoṣitaḥ yajñiyāḥ imāḥ āpaḥ carum ava sarpantu śubhrāḥ

original: (AVŚ_11,1.17c) aduḥ prajāṃ bahulāṃ paśūn naḥ paktaudanasya sukṛtām etu lokam //17//
analyzed: aduḥ prajām bahulām paśūn naḥ paktā odanasya su kṛtām etu lokam

original: (AVŚ_11,1.18a) brahmaṇā śuddhā uta pūtā ghṛtena somasyāṃśavas taṇḍulā yajñiyā ime /
analyzed: brahmaṇā śuddhāḥ uta pūtāḥ ghṛtena somasya aṃśavaḥ taṇḍulāḥ yajñiyāḥ ime

original: (AVŚ_11,1.18c) apaḥ pra viśata prati gṛhṇātu vaś carur imaṃ paktvā sukṛtām eta lokam //18//
analyzed: apaḥ pra viśata prati gṛhṇātu vaḥ caruḥ imam paktvā su kṛtām eta lokam

original: (AVŚ_11,1.19a) uruḥ prathasva mahatā mahimnā sahasrapṛṣṭhaḥ sukṛtasya loke /
analyzed: uruḥ prathasva mahatā mahimnā sahasra pṛṣṭhaḥ sukṛtasya loke

original: (AVŚ_11,1.19c) pitāmahāḥ pitaraḥ prajopajāhaṃ paktā pañcadaśas te asmi //19//

original: (AVŚ_11,1.20a) sahasrapṛṣṭhaḥ śatadhāro akṣito brahmaudano devayānaḥ svargaḥ /
analyzed: sahasra pṛṣṭhaḥ śata dhāraḥ akṣitaḥ brahmaudanaḥ deva yānaḥ svar gaḥ

original: (AVŚ_11,1.20c) amūṃs ta ā dadhāmi prajayā reṣayainān balihārāya mṛḍatān mahyam eva //20// {2}
analyzed: amūn te ā dadhāmi prajayā reṣaya enān bali hārāya mṛḍatāt mahyam eva

original: (AVŚ_11,1.21a) udehi vediṃ prajayā vardhayaināṃ nudasva rakṣaḥ prataraṃ dhehy enām /
analyzed: udehi vedim prajayā vardhaya enām nudasva rakṣaḥ prataram dhehi enām

original: (AVŚ_11,1.21c) śriyā samānān ati sarvānt syāmādhaspadaṃ dviṣatas pādayāmi //21//
analyzed: śriyā samānān ati sarvān syāma adhaspadam dviṣataḥ pādayāmi

original: (AVŚ_11,1.22a) abhyāvartasva paśubhiḥ sahaināṃ pratyaṅṅ enāṃ devatābhiḥ sahaidhi /
analyzed: abhyāvartasva paśubhiḥ saha enām pratyaṅ enām devatābhiḥ saha edhi

original: (AVŚ_11,1.22c) mā tvā prāpac chapatho mābhicāraḥ sve kṣetre anamīvā vi rāja //22//
analyzed: mā tvā prāpat śapathaḥ mā abhicāraḥ sve kṣetre anamīvā vi rāja

original: (AVŚ_11,1.23a) ṛtena taṣṭā manasā hitaiṣā brahmaudanasya vihitā vedir agre /
analyzed: ṛtena taṣṭā manasā hitā eṣā brahmaudanasya vihitā vediḥ agre

original: (AVŚ_11,1.23c) aṃsadhrīṃ śuddhām upa dhehi nāri tatraudanaṃ sādaya daivānām //23//

original: (AVŚ_11,1.24a) aditer hastāṃ srucam etāṃ dvitīyāṃ saptaṛṣayo bhūtakṛto yām akṛṇvan /
analyzed: aditeḥ hastām srucam etām dvitīyām sapta ṛṣayaḥ bhūta kṛtaḥ yām akṛṇvan

original: (AVŚ_11,1.24c) sā gātrāṇi viduṣy odanasya darvir vedyām adhy enaṃ cinotu //24//

original: (AVŚ_11,1.25c) somena pūto jaṭhare sīda brahmaṇām ārṣeyās te mā riṣan prāśitāraḥ //25//

analyzed: soma rājan saṃjñānam ā vapa ebhyaḥ su brāhmaṇāḥ yatame tvā upasīdān

original: (AVŚ_11,1.26c) ṛṣīn ārṣeyāṃs tapaso 'dhi jātān brahmaudane suhavā johavīmi //26//

original: (AVŚ_11,1.27a) śuddhāḥ pūtā yoṣito yajñiyā imā brahmaṇāṃ hasteṣu prapṛthak sādayāmi /
analyzed: śuddhāḥ pūtāḥ yoṣitaḥ yajñiyāḥ imāḥ brahmaṇām hasteṣu prapṛthak sādayāmi

analyzed: idam me jyotiḥ amṛtam hiraṇyam pakvam kṣetrāt kāmadughā me eṣā

original: (AVŚ_11,1.28c) idaṃ dhanaṃ ni dadhe brāhmaṇeṣu kṛṇve panthāṃ pitṛṣu yaḥ svargaḥ //28//

original: (AVŚ_11,1.29a) agnau tuṣān ā vapa jātavedasi paraḥ kambūkāṃ apa mṛḍḍhi dūram /
analyzed: agnau tuṣān ā vapa jātavedasi paras kambūkām apa mṛḍḍhi dūram

original: (AVŚ_11,1.29c) etaṃ śuśruma gṛharājasya bhāgam atho vidma nirṛter bhāgadheyam //29//
analyzed: etam śuśruma gṛha rājasya bhāgam atha u vidma nirṛteḥ bhāgadheyam

original: (AVŚ_11,1.30a) śrāmyataḥ pacato viddhi sunvataḥ panthāṃ svargam adhi rohayainam /
analyzed: śrāmyataḥ pacataḥ viddhi sunvataḥ panthām svargam adhi rohaya enam

original: (AVŚ_11,1.30c) yena rohāt param āpadya yad vaya uttamaṃ nākaṃ paramaṃ vyoma //30// {3}
analyzed: yena rohāt param āpadya yat vayaḥ uttamam nākam paramam vyoma

original: (AVŚ_11,1.31a) babhrer adhvaryo mukham etad vi mṛḍḍhy ājyāya lokaṃ kṛṇuhi pravidvān /
analyzed: babhreḥ adhvaryo mukham etat vi mṛḍḍhi ājyāya lokam kṛṇuhi pravidvān

original: (AVŚ_11,1.31c) ghṛtena gātrānu sarvā vi mṛḍḍhi kṛṇve panthāṃ pitṛṣu yaḥ svargaḥ //31//
analyzed: ghṛtena gātrā anu sarvā vi mṛḍḍhi kṛṇve panthām pitṛṣu yaḥ svar gaḥ

original: (AVŚ_11,1.32a) babhre rakṣaḥ samadam ā vapaibhyo 'brāhmaṇā yatame tvopasīdān /
analyzed: babhre rakṣaḥ samadam ā vapa ebhyaḥ brāhmaṇāḥ yatame tvā upasīdān

original: (AVŚ_11,1.32c) purīṣiṇaḥ prathamānāḥ purastād ārṣeyās te mā riṣan prāśitāraḥ //32//
analyzed: purīṣiṇaḥ prathamānāḥ purastāt ārṣeyāḥ te mā riṣan prāśitāraḥ

original: (AVŚ_11,1.33a) ārṣeyeṣu ni dadha odana tvā nānārṣeyāṇām apy asty atra /
analyzed: ārṣeyeṣu ni dadhe odana tvā na anārṣeyāṇām api asti atra

original: (AVŚ_11,1.33c) agnir me goptā marutaś ca sarve viśve devā abhi rakṣantu pakvam //33//
analyzed: agniḥ me goptā marutaḥ ca sarve viśve devāḥ abhi rakṣantu pakvam

original: (AVŚ_11,1.34a) yajñaṃ duhānaṃ sadam it prapīnaṃ pumāṃsaṃ dhenuṃ sadanaṃ rayīṇām /
analyzed: yajñam duhānam sadam id prapīnam pumāṃsam dhenum sadanam rayīṇām

original: (AVŚ_11,1.34c) prajāmṛtatvam uta dīrgham āyū rāyaś ca poṣair upa tvā sadema //34//
analyzed: prajā amṛta tvam uta dīrgham āyuḥ rāyaḥ ca poṣaiḥ upa tvā sadema

original: (AVŚ_11,1.35a) vṛṣabho 'si svarga ṛṣīn ārṣeyān gacha /
analyzed: vṛṣabhaḥ u si svarga ṛṣīn ārṣeyān gacha

original: (AVŚ_11,1.35c) sukṛtāṃ loke sīda tatra nau saṃskṛtam //35//
analyzed: sukṛtām loke sīda tatra nau saṃskṛtam

original: (AVŚ_11,1.36a) samācinuṣvānusaṃprayāhy agne pathaḥ kalpaya devayānān /
analyzed: samācinuṣva anusaṃprayāhi agne pathaḥ kalpaya deva yānān

original: (AVŚ_11,1.36c) etaiḥ sukṛtair anu gachema yajñaṃ nāke tiṣṭhantam adhi saptaraśmau //36//
analyzed: etaiḥ su kṛtaiḥ anu gacchema yajñam nāke tiṣṭhantam adhi sapta raśmau

original: (AVŚ_11,1.37a) yena devā jyotiṣā dyām udāyan brahmaudanaṃ paktvā sukṛtasya lokam /
analyzed: yena devāḥ jyotiṣā dyām udāyan brahmaudanam paktvā sukṛtasya lokam

original: (AVŚ_11,1.37c) tena geṣma sukṛtasya lokaṃ svar ārohanto abhi nākam uttamam //37// {4}
analyzed: tena geṣma sukṛtasya lokam svar ārohantaḥ abhi nākam uttamam

original: (AVŚ_11,2.1a) bhavāśarvau mṛḍataṃ mābhi yātaṃ bhūtapatī paśupatī namo vām /
analyzed: bhavāśarvau mṛḍatam mā abhi yātam bhūtapatī paśupatī namaḥ vām

original: (AVŚ_11,2.1c) pratihitām āyatāṃ mā vi srāṣṭaṃ mā no hiṃsiṣṭaṃ dvipado mā catuṣpadaḥ //1//
analyzed: pratihitām āyatām mā vi srāṣṭam mā naḥ hiṃsiṣṭam dvipadaḥ mā catuṣpadaḥ

original: (AVŚ_11,2.2a) śune kroṣṭre mā śarīrāṇi kartam aliklavebhyo gṛdhrebhyo ye ca kṛṣṇā aviṣyavaḥ /
analyzed: śune kroṣṭre mā śarīrāṇi kartam aliklavebhyaḥ gṛdhrebhyaḥ ye ca kṛṣṇāḥ aviṣyavaḥ

original: (AVŚ_11,2.2c) makṣikās te paśupate vayāṃsi te vighase mā vidanta //2//
analyzed: makṣikāḥ te paśupate vayāṃsi te vighase mā vidanta

original: (AVŚ_11,2.3a) krandāya te prāṇāya yāś ca te bhava ropayaḥ /
analyzed: krandāya te prāṇāya yāḥ ca te bhava ropayaḥ

original: (AVŚ_11,2.3c) namas te rudra kṛṇmaḥ sahasrākṣāyāmartya //3//
analyzed: namaḥ te rudra kṛṇmaḥ sahasra akṣāya amartya

original: (AVŚ_11,2.4a) purastāt te namaḥ kṛṇma uttarād adharād uta /
analyzed: purastāt te namaḥ kṛṇmaḥ uttarāt adharāt uta

original: (AVŚ_11,2.4c) abhīvargād divas pary antarikṣāya te namaḥ //4//
analyzed: abhīvargāt divaḥ pari antarikṣāya te namaḥ

original: (AVŚ_11,2.5a) mukhāya te paśupate yāni cakṣūṃṣi te bhava /
analyzed: mukhāya te paśupate yāni cakṣūṃṣi te bhava

original: (AVŚ_11,2.5c) tvace rūpāya saṃdṛśe pratīcīnāya te namaḥ //5//
analyzed: tvace rūpāya saṃdṛśe pratīcīnāya te namaḥ

original: (AVŚ_11,2.6a) aṅgebhyas ta udarāya jihvāyā āsyāya te /
analyzed: aṅgebhyaḥ te udarāya jihvāyai āsyāya te

original: (AVŚ_11,2.6c) dadbhyo gandhāya te namaḥ //6//
analyzed: dadbhyaḥ gandhāya te namaḥ

original: (AVŚ_11,2.7a) astrā nīlaśikhaṇḍena sahasrākṣeṇa vājinā /
analyzed: astrā nīla śikhaṇḍena sahasra akṣeṇa vājinā

original: (AVŚ_11,2.7c) rudreṇārdhakaghātinā tena mā sam arāmahi //7//
analyzed: rudreṇa ardhaka ghātinā tena mā sam arāmahi

original: (AVŚ_11,2.8a) sa no bhavaḥ pari vṛṇaktu viśvata āpa ivāgniḥ pari vṛṇaktu no bhavaḥ /
analyzed: sa naḥ bhavaḥ pari vṛṇaktu viśvatas āpaḥ iva agniḥ pari vṛṇaktu naḥ bhavaḥ

original: (AVŚ_11,2.8c) mā no 'bhi māṃsta namo astv asmai //8//
analyzed: mā naḥ bhi māṃsta namaḥ astu asmai

original: (AVŚ_11,2.9a) catur namo aṣṭakṛtvo bhavāya daśa kṛtvaḥ paśupate namas te /
analyzed: catuḥ namaḥ aṣṭa kṛtvas bhavāya daśa kṛtvas paśupate namaḥ te

original: (AVŚ_11,2.9c) taveme pañca paśavo vibhaktā gāvo aśvāḥ puruṣā ajāvayaḥ //9//
analyzed: tava ime pañca paśavaḥ vibhaktāḥ gāvaḥ aśvāḥ puruṣāḥ aja avayaḥ

original: (AVŚ_11,2.10a) tava catasraḥ pradiśas tava dyaus tava pṛthivī tavedam ugrorv antarikṣam /
analyzed: tava catasraḥ pradiśaḥ tava dyauḥ tava pṛthivī tava idam ugra uru antarikṣam

original: (AVŚ_11,2.10c) tavedaṃ sarvam ātmanvad yat prāṇat pṛthivīm anu //10// {5}
analyzed: tava idam sarvam ātmanvat yat prāṇat pṛthivīm anu

original: (AVŚ_11,2.11a) uruḥ kośo vasudhānas tavāyaṃ yasminn imā viśvā bhuvanāny antaḥ /
analyzed: uruḥ kośaḥ vasu dhānaḥ tava ayam yasmin imā viśvā bhuvanāni antar

original: (AVŚ_11,2.11c) sa no mṛḍa paśupate namas te paraḥ kroṣṭāro abhibhāḥ śvānaḥ paro yantv agharudo vikeśyaḥ //11//
analyzed: sa naḥ mṛḍa paśupate namaḥ te paras kroṣṭāraḥ abhibhāḥ śvānaḥ paras yantu agharudaḥ vikeśyaḥ

original: (AVŚ_11,2.12a) dhanur bibharṣi haritaṃ hiraṇyayaṃ sahasraghniṃ śatavadhaṃ śikhaṇḍin /
analyzed: dhanuḥ bibharṣi haritam hiraṇyayam sahasraghnim śata vadham śikhaṇḍin

original: (AVŚ_11,2.12c) rudrasyeṣuś carati devahetis tasyai namo yatamasyāṃ diśītaḥ //12//
analyzed: rudrasya iṣuḥ carati deva hetiḥ tasyai namaḥ yatamasyām diśi itas

original: (AVŚ_11,2.13a) yo 'bhiyāto nilayate tvāṃ rudra nicikīrṣati /
analyzed: yaḥ bhiyātaḥ nilayate tvām rudra nicikīrṣati

original: (AVŚ_11,2.13c) paścād anuprayuṅkṣe taṃ viddhasya padanīr iva //13//
analyzed: paścāt anuprayuṅkṣe tam viddhasya padanīḥ iva

original: (AVŚ_11,2.14a) bhavārudrau sayujā saṃvidānāv ubhāv ugrau carato vīryāya /
analyzed: bhavārudrau sayujā saṃvidānau ubhau ugrau carataḥ vīryāya

original: (AVŚ_11,2.14c) tābhyāṃ namo yatamasyāṃ diśītaḥ //14//
analyzed: tābhyām namaḥ yatamasyām diśi itas

original: (AVŚ_11,2.15a) namas te astv āyate namo astu parāyate /
analyzed: namaḥ te astu āyate namaḥ astu parāyate

original: (AVŚ_11,2.15c) namas te rudra tiṣṭhata āsīnāyota te namaḥ //15//
analyzed: namaḥ te rudra tiṣṭhate āsīnāya uta te namaḥ

original: (AVŚ_11,2.16a) namaḥ sāyaṃ namaḥ prātar namo rātryā namo divā /
analyzed: namaḥ sāyam namaḥ prātar namaḥ rātryā namaḥ divā

original: (AVŚ_11,2.16c) bhavāya ca śarvāya cobhābhyām akaraṃ namaḥ //16//
analyzed: bhavāya ca śarvāya ca ubhābhyām akaram namaḥ

original: (AVŚ_11,2.17a) sahasrākṣam atipaśyaṃ purastād rudram asyantaṃ bahudhā vipaścitam /
analyzed: sahasra akṣam atipaśyam purastāt rudram asyantam bahudhā vipaścitam

original: (AVŚ_11,2.17c) mopārāma jihvayeyamānam //17//
analyzed: mā upārāma jihvayā iyamānam

original: (AVŚ_11,2.18a) śyāvāśvaṃ kṛṣṇam asitaṃ mṛṇantaṃ bhīmaṃ rathaṃ keśinaḥ pādayantam /
analyzed: śyāva aśvam kṛṣṇam asitam mṛṇantam bhīmam ratham keśinaḥ pādayantam

original: (AVŚ_11,2.18c) pūrve pratīmo namo astv asmai //18//
analyzed: pūrve pratīmaḥ namaḥ astu asmai

original: (AVŚ_11,2.19a) mā no 'bhi srā matyaṃ devahetiṃ mā naḥ krudhaḥ paśupate namas te /
analyzed: mā naḥ bhi srāḥ matyam deva hetim mā naḥ krudhaḥ paśupate namaḥ te

original: (AVŚ_11,2.19c) anyatrāsmad divyāṃ śākhāṃ vi dhūnu //19//
analyzed: anyatra asmat divyām śākhām vi dhūnu

original: (AVŚ_11,2.20a) mā no hiṃsīr adhi no brūhi pari ṇo vṛṅdhi mā krudhaḥ /
analyzed: mā naḥ hiṃsīḥ adhi naḥ brūhi pari naḥ vṛṅdhi mā krudhaḥ

original: (AVŚ_11,2.20c) mā tvayā sam arāmahi //20// {6}
analyzed: mā tvayā sam arāmahi

original: (AVŚ_11,2.21a) mā no goṣu puruṣeṣu mā gṛdho no ajāviṣu /
analyzed: mā naḥ goṣu puruṣeṣu mā gṛdhaḥ naḥ aja aviṣu

original: (AVŚ_11,2.21c) anyatrogra vi vartaya piyārūṇāṃ prajāṃ jahi //21//
analyzed: anyatra ugra vi vartaya piyārūṇām prajām jahi

original: (AVŚ_11,2.22a) yasya takmā kāsikā hetir ekam aśvasyeva vṛṣaṇaḥ kranda eti /
analyzed: yasya takmā kāsikā hetiḥ ekam aśvasya iva vṛṣaṇaḥ krandaḥ eti

original: (AVŚ_11,2.22c) abhipūrvaṃ nirṇayate namo astv asmai //22//
analyzed: abhipūrvam nirṇayate namaḥ astu asmai

original: (AVŚ_11,2.23a) yo 'ntarikṣe tiṣṭhati viṣṭabhito 'yajvanaḥ pramṛṇan devapīyūn /
analyzed: yaḥ ntarikṣe tiṣṭhati viṣṭabhitaḥ yajvanaḥ pramṛṇan deva pīyūn

original: (AVŚ_11,2.23c) tasmai namo daśabhiḥ śakvarībhiḥ //23//
analyzed: tasmai namaḥ daśabhiḥ śakvarībhiḥ

original: (AVŚ_11,2.24a) tubhyam āraṇyāḥ paśavo mṛgā vane hitā haṃsāḥ suparṇāḥ śakunā vayāṃsi /
analyzed: tubhyam āraṇyāḥ paśavaḥ mṛgāḥ vane hitāḥ haṃsāḥ suparṇāḥ śakunāḥ vayāṃsi

original: (AVŚ_11,2.24c) tava yakṣaṃ paśupate apsv antas tubhyaṃ kṣaranti divyā āpo vṛdhe //24//

original: (AVŚ_11,2.25a) śiṃśumārā ajagarāḥ purīkayā jaṣā matsyā rajasā yebhyo asyasi /
analyzed: śiṃśumārāḥ ajagarāḥ purīkayāḥ jaṣāḥ matsyāḥ rajasāḥ yebhyaḥ asyasi

original: (AVŚ_11,2.25c) na te dūraṃ na pariṣṭhāsti te bhava sadyaḥ sarvāṃ pari paśyasi bhūmiṃ pūrvasmād dhaṃsy uttarasmint samudre //25//
analyzed: na te dūram na pariṣṭhā asti te bhava sadyas sarvām pari paśyasi bhūmim pūrvasmāt haṃsi uttarasmin samudre

original: (AVŚ_11,2.26a) mā no rudra takmanā mā viṣeṇa mā naḥ saṃ srā divyenāgninā /
analyzed: mā naḥ rudra takmanā mā viṣeṇa mā naḥ sam srāḥ divyena agninā

original: (AVŚ_11,2.26c) anyatrāsmad vidyutaṃ pātayaitām //26//
analyzed: anyatra asmat vidyutam pātaya etām

original: (AVŚ_11,2.27a) bhavo divo bhava īśe pṛthivyā bhava ā papra urv antarikṣam /
analyzed: bhavaḥ divaḥ bhavaḥ īśe pṛthivyāḥ bhavaḥ ā papre uru antarikṣam

original: (AVŚ_11,2.27c) tasyai namo yatamasyāṃ diśītaḥ //27//
analyzed: tasyai namaḥ yatamasyām diśi itas

analyzed: bhava rājan yajamānāya mṛḍa paśūnām hi paśupatiḥ babhūtha

analyzed: mā naḥ mahāntam uta mā naḥ arbhakam mā naḥ vahantam uta mā naḥ vakṣyataḥ

analyzed: namaḥ te ghoṣiṇībhyaḥ namaḥ te keśinībhyaḥ

original: (AVŚ_11,2.31c) namo namaskṛtābhyo namaḥ saṃbhuñjatībhyaḥ /
analyzed: namaḥ namaskṛtābhyaḥ namaḥ saṃbhuñjatībhyaḥ

original: (AVŚ_11,3.1a) tasyaudanasya bṛhaspatiḥ śiro brahma mukham //1//

original: (AVŚ_11,3.9a) khalaḥ pātraṃ sphyāv aṃsāv īṣe anūkye //9//

original: (AVŚ_11,3.19a) odanena yajñavataḥ sarve lokāḥ samāpyāḥ //19//

original: (AVŚ_11,3.20a) yasmint samudro dyaur bhūmis trayo 'varaparaṃ śritāḥ //20//

original: (AVŚ_11,3.21a) yasya devā akalpantocchiṣṭe ṣaḍ aśītayaḥ //21//

original: (AVŚ_11,3.23a) sa ya odanasya mahimānaṃ vidyāt //23//

original: (AVŚ_11,3.24a) nālpa iti brūyān nānupasecana iti nedaṃ ca kiṃ ceti //24//
analyzed: na alpaḥ iti brūyāt na anupasecanaḥ iti na idam ca kim ca iti

original: (AVŚ_11,3.25a) yāvad dātābhimanasyeta tan nāti vadet //25//
analyzed: yāvat dātā abhimanasyeta tat na ati vadet

original: (AVŚ_11,3.27a) tvam odanaṃ prāśī3s tvām odanā3 iti //27//
analyzed: tvam odanam tvām odanaḥ iti

original: (AVŚ_11,3.28a) parāñcaṃ cainaṃ prāśīḥ prāṇās tvā hāsyantīty enam āha //28//

original: (AVŚ_11,3.29a) pratyañcaṃ cainaṃ prāśīr apānās tvā hāsyantīty enam āha //29//

original: (AVŚ_11,3.30a) naivāham odanaṃ na mām odanaḥ //30//
analyzed: na eva aham odanam na mām odanaḥ

original: (AVŚ_11,3.31a) odana evaudanaṃ prāśīt //31// {8}
analyzed: odanaḥ eva odanam prāśīt

original: (AVŚ_11,3.32[4.1]a) tataś cainam anyena śīrṣṇā prāśīr yena caitaṃ pūrva ṛṣayaḥ prāśnan /
analyzed: tatas ca enam anyena śīrṣṇā prāśīḥ yena ca etam pūrve ṛṣayaḥ prāśnan

original: (AVŚ_11,3.32[4.1]b) jyeṣṭhatas te prajā mariṣyatīty enam āha /
analyzed: jyeṣṭhatas te prajā mariṣyati iti enam āha

original: (AVŚ_11,3.32[4.1]c) taṃ vā ahaṃ nārvāñcaṃ na parāñcaṃ na pratyañcam /
analyzed: tam vai aham na arvāñcam na parāñcam na pratyañcam

original: (AVŚ_11,3.32[4.1]d) bṛhaspatinā śīrṣṇā /
analyzed: bṛhaspatinā śīrṣṇā

original: (AVŚ_11,3.32[4.1]e) tenainaṃ prāśiṣaṃ tenainam ajīgamam /
analyzed: tena enam prāśiṣam tena enam ajīgamam

original: (AVŚ_11,3.32[4.1]f) eṣa vā odanaḥ sarvāṅgaḥ sarvaparuḥ sarvatanūḥ /
analyzed: eṣa vai odanaḥ sarva aṅgaḥ sarva paruḥ sarva tanūḥ

analyzed: sarva aṅgaḥ eva sarva paruḥ sarva tanūḥ sam bhavati yaḥ evam veda

analyzed: tatas ca enam anyābhyām śrotrābhyām prāśīḥ yābhyām ca etam pūrve ṛṣayaḥ prāśnan

original: (AVŚ_11,3.33[4.2]b) badhiro bhaviṣyasīty enam āha /
analyzed: badhiraḥ bhaviṣyasi iti enam āha

original: (AVŚ_11,3.33[4.2]c) taṃ vā ahaṃ nārvāñcaṃ na parāñcaṃ na pratyañcam /
analyzed: tam vai aham na arvāñcam na parāñcam na pratyañcam

original: (AVŚ_11,3.33[4.2]d) dyāvāpṛthivībhyāṃ śrotrābhyām /
analyzed: dyāvāpṛthivībhyām śrotrābhyām

original: (AVŚ_11,3.33[4.2]e) tābhyām enaṃ prāśiṣaṃ tābhyām enam ajīgamam /
analyzed: tābhyām enam prāśiṣam tābhyām enam ajīgamam

original: (AVŚ_11,3.33[4.2]f) eṣa vā odanaḥ sarvāṅgaḥ sarvaparuḥ sarvatanūḥ /
analyzed: eṣa vai odanaḥ sarva aṅgaḥ sarva paruḥ sarva tanūḥ

original: (AVŚ_11,3.33[4.2]g) sarvāṅga eva sarvaparuḥ sarvatanūḥ saṃ bhavati ya evaṃ veda //33// [2]
analyzed: sarva aṅgaḥ eva sarva paruḥ sarva tanūḥ sam bhavati yaḥ evam veda

original: (AVŚ_11,3.34[4.3]a) tataś cainam anyābhyām akṣībhyāṃ prāśīr yābhyāṃ caitaṃ pūrva ṛṣayaḥ prāśnan /
analyzed: tatas ca enam anyābhyām akṣībhyām prāśīḥ yābhyām ca etam pūrve ṛṣayaḥ prāśnan

original: (AVŚ_11,3.34[4.3]b) andho bhaviṣyasīty enam āha /
analyzed: andhaḥ bhaviṣyasi iti enam āha

original: (AVŚ_11,3.34[4.3]c) taṃ vā ahaṃ nārvāñcaṃ na parāñcaṃ na pratyañcam /
analyzed: tam vai aham na arvāñcam na parāñcam na pratyañcam

analyzed: eṣa vai odanaḥ sarva aṅgaḥ sarva paruḥ sarva tanūḥ

original: (AVŚ_11,3.48[4.17]g) sarvāṅga eva sarvaparuḥ sarvatanūḥ saṃ bhavati ya evaṃ veda //48// [17]

original: (AVŚ_11,3.49[4.18]b) apratiṣṭhāno 'nāyatano mariṣyasīty enam āha /

original: (AVŚ_11,3.49[4.18]c) taṃ vā ahaṃ nārvāñcaṃ na parāñcaṃ na pratyañcam /
analyzed: tam vai aham na arvāñcam na parāñcam na pratyañcam

original: (AVŚ_11,3.49[4.18]d) satye pratiṣṭhāya /
analyzed: satye pratiṣṭhāya

original: (AVŚ_11,3.49[4.18]e) tayainaṃ prāśiṣaṃ tayainam ajīgamam /
analyzed: tayā enam prāśiṣam tayā enam ajīgamam

original: (AVŚ_11,3.49[4.18]f) eṣa vā odanaḥ sarvāṅgaḥ sarvaparuḥ sarvatanūḥ /
analyzed: eṣa vai odanaḥ sarva aṅgaḥ sarva paruḥ sarva tanūḥ

original: (AVŚ_11,3.49[4.18]g) sarvāṅga eva sarvaparuḥ sarvatanūḥ saṃ bhavati ya evaṃ veda //49// [18] {9}
analyzed: sarva aṅgaḥ eva sarva paruḥ sarva tanūḥ sam bhavati yaḥ evam veda  /

original: (AVŚ_11,3.50[5.1]a) etad vai bradhnasya viṣṭapaṃ yad odanaḥ //50// [1]
analyzed: etat vai bradhnasya viṣṭapam yat odanaḥ

analyzed: bradhna lokaḥ bhavati bradhnasya viṣṭapi śrayate yaḥ evam veda

original: (AVŚ_11,3.52[5.3]a) etasmād vā odanāt trayastriṃśataṃ lokān nir amimīta prajāpatiḥ //52// [3]
analyzed: etasmāt vai odanāt trayastriṃśatam lokān niḥ amimīta prajāpatiḥ

original: (AVŚ_11,3.53[5.4]a) teṣāṃ prajñānāya yajñam asṛjata //53// [4]
analyzed: teṣām prajñānāya yajñam asṛjata

original: (AVŚ_11,4[6].1a) prāṇāya namo yasya sarvam idaṃ vaśe /
analyzed: prāṇāya namaḥ yasya sarvam idam vaśe

analyzed: namaḥ te prāṇa krandāya namaḥ te stanayitnave

original: (AVŚ_11,4[6].2c) namas te prāṇa vidyute namas te prāṇa varṣate //2//

original: (AVŚ_11,4[6].4c) sarvaṃ tadā pra modate yat kiṃ ca bhūmyām adhi //4//

original: (AVŚ_11,4[6].6a) abhivṛṣṭā oṣadhayaḥ prāṇena sam avādiran /
analyzed: abhivṛṣṭāḥ oṣadhayaḥ prāṇena sam avādiran

original: (AVŚ_11,4[6].6c) āyur vai naḥ prātītaraḥ sarvā naḥ surabhīr akaḥ //6//
analyzed: āyuḥ vai naḥ prātītaraḥ sarvāḥ naḥ surabhīḥ akaḥ

analyzed: namaḥ te astu āyate namaḥ astu parāyate

original: (AVŚ_11,4[6].9c) atho yad bheṣajaṃ tava tasya no dhehi jīvase //9//

analyzed: prāṇaḥ prajāḥ anu vaste pitā putram iva priyam

original: (AVŚ_11,4[6].10c) prāṇo ha sarvasyeśvaro yac ca prāṇati yac ca na //10// {11}
analyzed: prāṇaḥ ha sarvasya īśvaraḥ yat ca prāṇati yat ca na

analyzed: prāṇaḥ ha satya vādinam uttame loke ā dadhat

analyzed: prāṇaḥ virāj prāṇaḥ deṣṭrī prāṇam sarve upāsate

analyzed: prāṇaḥ ha sūryaḥ candramāḥ prāṇam āhuḥ prajāpatim

analyzed: prāṇa apānau vrīhi yavau anaḍvān prāṇaḥ ucyate

analyzed: apānati prāṇati puruṣaḥ garbhe antarā

analyzed: ātharvaṇīḥ āṅgirasīḥ daivīḥ manuṣya jāḥ uta

analyzed: ūrdhvaḥ supteṣu jāgāra nanu tiryaṅ ni padyate

analyzed: prāṇa mā mat paryāvṛtaḥ na mat anyaḥ bhaviṣyasi

analyzed: brahmacārīṣṇan carati rodasī ubhe tasmin devāḥ saṃmanasaḥ bhavanti

analyzed: brahmacāriṇam pitaraḥ deva janāḥ pṛthak devāḥ anusaṃyanti sarve

original: (AVŚ_11,5[7].2c) gandharvā enam anv āyan trayastriṃśat triśatāḥ ṣaṭsahasrāḥ sarvānt sa devāṃs tapasā piparti //2//
analyzed: gandharvāḥ enam anu āyan trayastriṃśat tri śatāḥ ṣaṣ sahasrāḥ sarvān sa devān tapasā piparti

analyzed: ācāryaḥ upanayamānaḥ brahmacāriṇam kṛṇute garbham antar

analyzed: iyam samidh pṛthivī dyauḥ dvitīyā uta antarikṣam samidhā pṛṇāti

analyzed: brahmacārī samidhā mekhalayā śrameṇa lokān tapasā piparti

original: (AVŚ_11,5[7].5a) pūrvo jāto brahmaṇo brahmacārī gharmaṃ vasānas tapasod atiṣṭhat /
analyzed: pūrvaḥ jātaḥ brahmaṇaḥ brahmacārī gharmam vasānaḥ tapasā ud atiṣṭhat

original: (AVŚ_11,5[7].5c) tasmāj jātaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ brahma jyeṣṭhaṃ devāś ca sarve amṛtena sākam //5//
analyzed: tasmāt jātam brāhmaṇam brahma jyeṣṭham devāḥ ca sarve amṛtena sākam

original: (AVŚ_11,5[7].6a) brahmacāry eti samidhā samiddhaḥ kārṣṇaṃ vasāno dīkṣito dīrghaśmaśruḥ /
analyzed: brahmacārī eti samidhā samiddhaḥ kārṣṇam vasānaḥ dīkṣitaḥ dīrgha śmaśruḥ

original: (AVŚ_11,5[7].6c) sa sadya eti pūrvasmād uttaraṃ samudraṃ lokānt saṃgṛbhya muhur ācarikrat //6//

analyzed: brahmacārī janayan brahma apaḥ lokam prajāpatim parameṣṭhinam virājam

original: (AVŚ_11,5[7].7c) garbho bhūtvāmṛtasya yonāv indro ha bhūtvāsurāṃs tatarha //7//
analyzed: garbhaḥ bhūtvā amṛtasya yonau indraḥ ha bhūtvā surān tatarha

original: (AVŚ_11,5[7].8a) ācāryas tatakṣa nabhasī ubhe ime urvī gambhīre pṛthivīṃ divaṃ ca /
analyzed: ācāryaḥ tatakṣa nabhasī ubhe ime urvī gambhīre pṛthivīm divam ca

original: (AVŚ_11,5[7].8c) te rakṣati tapasā brahmacārī tasmin devāḥ saṃmanaso bhavanti //8//
analyzed: te rakṣati tapasā brahmacārī tasmin devāḥ saṃmanasaḥ bhavanti

original: (AVŚ_11,5[7].9a) imāṃ bhūmiṃ pṛthivīṃ brahmacārī bhikṣām ā jabhāra prathamo divaṃ ca /
analyzed: imām bhūmim pṛthivīm brahmacārī bhikṣām ā jabhāra prathamaḥ divam ca

original: (AVŚ_11,5[7].9c) te kṛtvā samidhāv upāste tayor ārpitā bhuvanāni viśvā //9//
