original: (AVŚ_11,5[7].10a) arvāg anyaḥ paro anyo divas pṛṣṭhād guhā nidhī nihitau brāhmaṇasya /
analyzed: arvāk anyaḥ paras anyaḥ divaḥ pṛṣṭhāt guhā nidhī nihitau brāhmaṇasya

original: (AVŚ_11,5[7].10c) tau rakṣati tapasā brahmacārī tat kevalaṃ kṛṇute brahma vidvān //10// {14}
analyzed: tau rakṣati tapasā brahmacārī tat kevalam kṛṇute brahma vidvān

original: (AVŚ_11,5[7].11a) arvāg anya ito anyaḥ pṛthivyā agnī sameto nabhasī antareme /
analyzed: arvāk anyaḥ itas anyaḥ pṛthivyāḥ agnī sametaḥ nabhasī antarā ime

original: (AVŚ_11,5[7].11c) tayoḥ śrayante raśmayo 'dhi dṛḍhās tān ā tiṣṭhati tapasā brahmacārī //11//
analyzed: tayoḥ śrayante raśmayaḥ dhi dṛḍhāḥ tān ā tiṣṭhati tapasā brahmacārī

original: (AVŚ_11,5[7].12a) abhikrandan stanayann aruṇaḥ śitiṅgo bṛhac chepo 'nu bhūmau jabhāra /
analyzed: abhikrandan stanayan aruṇaḥ śitiṅgaḥ bṛhat śepaḥ nu bhūmau jabhāra

original: (AVŚ_11,5[7].12c) brahmacārī siñcati sānau retaḥ pṛthivyāṃ tena jīvanti pradiśaś catasraḥ //12//
analyzed: brahmacārī siñcati sānau retaḥ pṛthivyām tena jīvanti pradiśaḥ catasraḥ

original: (AVŚ_11,5[7].13a) agnau sūrye candramasi mātariśvan brahmacāry apsu samidham ā dadhāti /
analyzed: agnau sūrye candramasi mātariśvan brahmacārī apsu samidham ā dadhāti

original: (AVŚ_11,5[7].13c) tāsām arcīṃṣi pṛthag abhre caranti tāsām ājyaṃ puruṣo varṣam āpaḥ //13//
analyzed: tāsām arcīṃṣi pṛthak abhre caranti tāsām ājyam puruṣaḥ varṣam āpaḥ

original: (AVŚ_11,5[7].14a) ācāryo mṛtyur varuṇaḥ soma oṣadhayaḥ payaḥ /
analyzed: ācāryaḥ mṛtyuḥ varuṇaḥ somaḥ oṣadhayaḥ payaḥ

original: (AVŚ_11,5[7].14c) jīmūtā āsant satvānas tair idaṃ svar ābhṛtam //14//
analyzed: jīmūtāḥ āsan satvānaḥ taiḥ idam svar ābhṛtam

original: (AVŚ_11,5[7].15a) amā ghṛtaṃ kṛṇute kevalam ācāryo bhūtvā varuṇaḥ /
analyzed: amā ghṛtam kṛṇute kevalam ācāryaḥ bhūtvā varuṇaḥ

original: (AVŚ_11,5[7].15c) yadyad aichat prajāpatau tad brahmacārī prāyachat svān mitro adhy ātmanaḥ //15//
analyzed: yat yat aichat prajāpatau tat brahmacārī prāyacchat svāt mitraḥ adhi ātmanaḥ

original: (AVŚ_11,5[7].16a) ācāryo brahmacārī brahmacārī prajāpatiḥ /
analyzed: ācāryaḥ brahmacārī brahmacārī prajāpatiḥ

original: (AVŚ_11,5[7].16c) prajāpatir vi rājati virāḍ indro 'bhavad vaśī //16//
analyzed: prajāpatiḥ vi rājati virāj indraḥ bhavat vaśī

original: (AVŚ_11,5[7].17a) brahmacaryeṇa tapasā rājā rāṣṭraṃ vi rakṣati /
analyzed: brahmacaryeṇa tapasā rājā rāṣṭram vi rakṣati

original: (AVŚ_11,5[7].17c) ācāryo brahmacaryeṇa brahmacāriṇam ichate //17//
analyzed: ācāryaḥ brahmacaryeṇa brahmacāriṇam ichate

original: (AVŚ_11,5[7].18a) brahmacaryeṇa kanyā yuvānaṃ vindate patim /
analyzed: brahmacaryeṇa kanyā yuvānam vindate patim

original: (AVŚ_11,5[7].18c) anaḍvān brahmacaryeṇāśvo ghāsaṃ jigīṣati //18//
analyzed: anaḍvān brahmacaryeṇa aśvaḥ ghāsam jigīṣati

original: (AVŚ_11,5[7].19a) brahmacaryeṇa tapasā devā mṛtyum apāghnata /
analyzed: brahmacaryeṇa tapasā devāḥ mṛtyum apāghnata

original: (AVŚ_11,5[7].19c) indro ha brahmacaryeṇa devebhyaḥ svar ābharat //19//
analyzed: indraḥ ha brahmacaryeṇa devebhyaḥ svar ābharat

original: (AVŚ_11,5[7].20a) oṣadhayo bhūtabhavyam ahorātre vanaspatiḥ /
analyzed: oṣadhayaḥ bhūta bhavyam ahar rātre vanaspatiḥ

original: (AVŚ_11,5[7].20c) saṃvatsaraḥ saha ṛtubhis te jātā brahmacāriṇaḥ //20// {15}
analyzed: saṃvatsaraḥ saha ṛtubhiḥ te jātāḥ brahmacāriṇaḥ

original: (AVŚ_11,5[7].21a) pārthivā divyāḥ paśava āraṇyā grāmyāś ca ye /
analyzed: pārthivāḥ divyāḥ paśavaḥ āraṇyāḥ grāmyāḥ ca ye

original: (AVŚ_11,5[7].21c) apakṣāḥ pakṣiṇaś ca ye te jātā brahmacāriṇaḥ //21//
analyzed: apakṣāḥ pakṣiṇaḥ ca ye te jātāḥ brahmacāriṇaḥ

original: (AVŚ_11,5[7].22a) pṛthak sarve prājāpatyāḥ prāṇān ātmasu bibhrati /
analyzed: pṛthak sarve prājāpatyāḥ prāṇān ātmasu bibhrati

original: (AVŚ_11,5[7].22c) tānt sarvān brahma rakṣati brahmacāriṇy ābhṛtam //22//
analyzed: tān sarvān brahma rakṣati brahmacāriṇi ābhṛtam

original: (AVŚ_11,5[7].23a) devānām etat pariṣūtam anabhyārūḍhaṃ carati rocamānam /
analyzed: devānām etat pariṣūtam an abhyārūḍham carati rocamānam

original: (AVŚ_11,5[7].23c) tasmāj jātaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ brahma jyeṣṭhaṃ devāś ca sarve amṛtena sākam //23//
analyzed: tasmāt jātam brāhmaṇam brahma jyeṣṭham devāḥ ca sarve amṛtena sākam

original: (AVŚ_11,5[7].24a) brahmacārī brahma bhrājad bibharti tasmin devā adhi viśve samotāḥ /
analyzed: brahmacārī brahma bhrājat bibharti tasmin devāḥ adhi viśve samotāḥ

original: (AVŚ_11,5[7].24c) prāṇāpānau janayann ād vyānaṃ vācaṃ mano hṛdayaṃ brahma medhām //24//
analyzed: prāṇa apānau janayan āt vyānam vācam manaḥ hṛdayam brahma medhām

original: (AVŚ_11,5[7].25a) cakṣuḥ śrotraṃ yaśo asmāsu dhehy annaṃ reto lohitam udaram //25//
analyzed: cakṣuḥ śrotram yaśaḥ asmāsu dhehi annam retaḥ lohitam udaram

original: (AVŚ_11,5[7].26a) tāni kalpan brahmacārī salilasya pṛṣṭhe tapo 'tiṣṭhat tapyamānaḥ samudre /
analyzed: tāni kalpan brahmacārī salilasya pṛṣṭhe tapo tiṣṭhat tapyamānaḥ samudre

original: (AVŚ_11,5[7].26c) sa snāto babhruḥ piṅgalaḥ pṛthivyāṃ bahu rocate //26// {16}
analyzed: sa snātaḥ babhruḥ piṅgalaḥ pṛthivyām bahu rocate

original: (AVŚ_11,6[8].1a) agniṃ brūmo vanaspatīn oṣadhīr uta vīrudhaḥ /
analyzed: agnim brūmaḥ vanaspatīn oṣadhīḥ uta vīrudhaḥ

original: (AVŚ_11,6[8].1c) indraṃ bṛhaspatiṃ sūryaṃ te no muñcantv aṃhasaḥ //1//
analyzed: indram bṛhaspatim sūryam te naḥ muñcantu aṃhasaḥ

original: (AVŚ_11,6[8].2a) brūmo rājānaṃ varuṇaṃ mitraṃ viṣṇum atho bhagam /
analyzed: brūmaḥ rājānam varuṇam mitram viṣṇum atha u bhagam

original: (AVŚ_11,6[8].2c) aṃśaṃ vivasvantaṃ brūmas te no muñcantv aṃhasaḥ //2//
analyzed: aṃśam vivasvantam brūmaḥ te naḥ muñcantu aṃhasaḥ

original: (AVŚ_11,6[8].3a) brūmo devaṃ savitāraṃ dhātāram uta pūṣaṇam /
analyzed: brūmaḥ devam savitāram dhātāram uta pūṣaṇam

original: (AVŚ_11,6[8].3c) tvaṣṭāram agriyaṃ brūmas te no muñcantv aṃhasaḥ //3//
analyzed: tvaṣṭāram agriyam brūmaḥ te naḥ muñcantu aṃhasaḥ

original: (AVŚ_11,6[8].4a) gandharvāpsaraso brūmo aśvinā brahmaṇaspatim /
analyzed: gandharva apsarasaḥ brūmaḥ aśvinā brahmaṇaspatim

original: (AVŚ_11,6[8].4c) aryamā nāma yo devas te no muñcantv aṃhasaḥ //4//
analyzed: aryamā nāma yaḥ devaḥ te naḥ muñcantu aṃhasaḥ

original: (AVŚ_11,6[8].5a) ahorātre idaṃ brūmaḥ sūryācandramasāv ubhā /
analyzed: ahorātre idam brūmaḥ sūryācandramasau ubhā

original: (AVŚ_11,6[8].5c) viśvān ādityān brūmas te no muñcantv aṃhasaḥ //5//
analyzed: viśvān ādityān brūmaḥ te naḥ muñcantu aṃhasaḥ

original: (AVŚ_11,6[8].6a) vātaṃ brūmaḥ parjanyam antarikṣam atho diśaḥ /
analyzed: vātam brūmaḥ parjanyam antarikṣam atha u diśaḥ

original: (AVŚ_11,6[8].6c) āśāś ca sarvā brūmas te no muñcantv aṃhasaḥ //6//
analyzed: āśāḥ ca sarvāḥ brūmaḥ te naḥ muñcantu aṃhasaḥ

original: (AVŚ_11,6[8].7a) muñcantu mā śapathyād ahorātre atho uṣāḥ /
analyzed: muñcantu mā śapathyāt ahorātre atha u uṣāḥ

original: (AVŚ_11,6[8].7c) somo mā devo muñcatu yam āhuś candramā iti //7//
analyzed: somaḥ mā devaḥ muñcatu yam āhuḥ candramāḥ iti

original: (AVŚ_11,6[8].8a) pārthivā divyāḥ paśava āraṇyā uta ye mṛgāḥ /
analyzed: pārthivāḥ divyāḥ paśavaḥ āraṇyāḥ uta ye mṛgāḥ

original: (AVŚ_11,6[8].8c) śakuntān pakṣiṇo brūmas te no muñcantv aṃhasaḥ //8//
analyzed: śakuntān pakṣiṇaḥ brūmaḥ te naḥ muñcantu aṃhasaḥ

original: (AVŚ_11,6[8].9a) bhavāśarvāv idaṃ brūmo rudraṃ paśupatiś ca yaḥ /
analyzed: bhavāśarvau idam brūmaḥ rudram paśupatiḥ ca yaḥ

original: (AVŚ_11,6[8].9c) iṣūr yā eṣāṃ saṃvidma tā naḥ santu sadā śivāḥ //9//
analyzed: iṣūḥ yāḥ eṣām saṃvidma tāḥ naḥ santu sadā śivāḥ

original: (AVŚ_11,6[8].10a) divaṃ brūmo nakṣatrāṇi bhūmiṃ yakṣāṇi parvatān /
analyzed: divam brūmaḥ nakṣatrāṇi bhūmim yakṣāṇi parvatān

original: (AVŚ_11,6[8].10c) samudrā nadyo veśantās te no muñcantv aṃhasaḥ //10// {17}
analyzed: samudrāḥ nadyaḥ veśantāḥ te naḥ muñcantu aṃhasaḥ

original: (AVŚ_11,6[8].11a) saptaṛṣīn vā idaṃ brūmo 'po devīḥ prajāpatim /
analyzed: sapta ṛṣīn vai idam brūmaḥ u parā u devīḥ prajāpatim

original: (AVŚ_11,6[8].11c) pitṝn yamaśreṣṭhān brūmas te no muñcantv aṃhasaḥ /11//
analyzed: pitṝn yama śreṣṭhān brūmaḥ te naḥ muñcantu aṃhasaḥ

original: (AVŚ_11,6[8].12a) ye devā diviṣado antarikṣasadaś ca ye /
analyzed: ye devāḥ diviṣadaḥ antarikṣa sadaḥ ca ye

original: (AVŚ_11,6[8].12c) pṛthivyāṃ śakrā ye śritās te no muñcantv aṃhasaḥ //12//
analyzed: pṛthivyām śakrāḥ ye śritāḥ te naḥ muñcantu aṃhasaḥ

original: (AVŚ_11,6[8].13a) ādityā rudrā vasavo divi devā atharvāṇaḥ /
analyzed: ādityāḥ rudrāḥ vasavaḥ divi devāḥ atharvāṇaḥ

original: (AVŚ_11,6[8].13c) aṅgiraso manīṣiṇas te no muñcantv aṃhasaḥ //13//
analyzed: aṅgirasaḥ manīṣiṇaḥ te naḥ muñcantu aṃhasaḥ

original: (AVŚ_11,6[8].14a) yajñaṃ brūmo yajamānam ṛcaḥ sāmāni bheṣajā /
analyzed: yajñam brūmaḥ yajamānam ṛcaḥ sāmāni bheṣajā

original: (AVŚ_11,6[8].14c) yajūṃṣi hotrā brūmas te no muñcantv aṃhasaḥ //14//
analyzed: yajūṃṣi hotrā brūmaḥ te naḥ muñcantu aṃhasaḥ

original: (AVŚ_11,6[8].15a) pañca rājyāni vīrudhāṃ somaśreṣṭhāni brūmaḥ /
analyzed: pañca rājyāni vīrudhām soma śreṣṭhāni brūmaḥ

original: (AVŚ_11,6[8].15c) darbho bhaṅgo yavaḥ sahas te no muñcantv aṃhasaḥ //15//
analyzed: darbhaḥ bhaṅgaḥ yavaḥ sahaḥ te naḥ muñcantu aṃhasaḥ

original: (AVŚ_11,6[8].16a) arāyān brūmo rakṣāṃsi sarpān puṇyajanān pitṝn /
analyzed: arāyān brūmaḥ rakṣāṃsi sarpān puṇyajanān pitṝn

original: (AVŚ_11,6[8].16c) mṛtyūn ekaśataṃ brūmas te no muñcantv aṃhasaḥ //16//
analyzed: mṛtyūn eka śatam brūmaḥ te naḥ muñcantu aṃhasaḥ

original: (AVŚ_11,6[8].17a) ṛtūn brūma ṛtupatīn ārtavān uta hāyanān /
analyzed: ṛtūn brūmaḥ ṛtu patīn ārtavān uta hāyanān

original: (AVŚ_11,6[8].17c) samāḥ saṃvatsarān māsāṃs te no muñcantv aṃhasaḥ //17//
analyzed: samāḥ saṃvatsarān māsān te naḥ muñcantu aṃhasaḥ

original: (AVŚ_11,6[8].18a) eta devā dakṣiṇataḥ paścāt prāñca udeta /
analyzed: eta devāḥ dakṣiṇatas paścāt prāñcaḥ udeta

original: (AVŚ_11,6[8].18c) purastād uttarāc chakrā viśve devāḥ sametya te no muñcantv aṃhasaḥ //18//
analyzed: purastāt uttarāt śakrāḥ viśve devāḥ sametya te naḥ muñcantu aṃhasaḥ

original: (AVŚ_11,6[8].19a) viśvān devān idaṃ brūmaḥ satyasandhān ṛtāvṛdhaḥ /
analyzed: viśvān devān idam brūmaḥ satya sandhān ṛtāvṛdhaḥ

original: (AVŚ_11,6[8].19c) viśvābhiḥ patnībhiḥ saha te no muñcantv aṃhasaḥ //19//
analyzed: viśvābhiḥ patnībhiḥ saha te naḥ muñcantu aṃhasaḥ

original: (AVŚ_11,6[8].20a) sarvān devān idaṃ brūmaḥ satyasandhān ṛtāvṛdhaḥ /
analyzed: sarvān devān idam brūmaḥ satya sandhān ṛtāvṛdhaḥ

original: (AVŚ_11,6[8].20c) sarvābhiḥ patnībhiḥ saha te no muñcantv aṃhasaḥ //20//
analyzed: sarvābhiḥ patnībhiḥ saha te naḥ muñcantu aṃhasaḥ

original: (AVŚ_11,6[8].21a) bhūtaṃ brūmo bhūtapatiṃ bhūtānām uta yo vaśī /
analyzed: bhūtam brūmaḥ bhūtapatim bhūtānām uta yaḥ vaśī

original: (AVŚ_11,6[8].21c) bhūtāni sarvā saṃgatya te no muñcantv aṃhasaḥ //21//
analyzed: bhūtāni sarvā saṃgatya te naḥ muñcantu aṃhasaḥ

original: (AVŚ_11,6[8].22a) yā devīḥ pañca pradiśo ye devā dvādaśa ṛtavaḥ /
analyzed: yāḥ devīḥ pañca pradiśaḥ ye devāḥ dvādaśa ṛtavaḥ

original: (AVŚ_11,6[8].22c) saṃvatsarasya ye daṃṣṭrās te naḥ santu sadā śivāḥ //22//
analyzed: saṃvatsarasya ye daṃṣṭrāḥ te naḥ santu sadā śivāḥ

original: (AVŚ_11,6[8].23a) yan mātalī rathakrītam amṛtaṃ veda bheṣajam /
analyzed: yat mātalī ratha krītam amṛtam veda bheṣajam

original: (AVŚ_11,6[8].23c) tad indro apsu prāveśayat tad āpo datta bheṣajam //23// {18}
analyzed: tat indraḥ apsu prāveśayat tat āpaḥ datta bheṣajam

original: (AVŚ_11,7[9].1a) ucchiṣṭe nāma rūpaṃ cocchiṣṭe loka āhitaḥ /
analyzed: ucchiṣṭe nāma rūpam ca ucchiṣṭe lokaḥ āhitaḥ

original: (AVŚ_11,7[9].1c) ucchiṣṭa indraś cāgniś ca viśvam antaḥ samāhitam //1//
analyzed: ucchiṣṭaḥ indraḥ ca agniḥ ca viśvam antar samāhitam

original: (AVŚ_11,7[9].2a) ucchiṣṭe dyāvāpṛthivī viśvaṃ bhūtaṃ samāhitam /
analyzed: ucchiṣṭe dyāvāpṛthivī viśvam bhūtam samāhitam

original: (AVŚ_11,7[9].2c) āpaḥ samudra ucchiṣṭe candramā vāta āhitaḥ //2//
analyzed: āpaḥ samudre ucchiṣṭe candramāḥ vāte āhitaḥ

original: (AVŚ_11,7[9].3a) sann ucchiṣṭe asaṃś cobhau mṛtyur vājaḥ prajāpatiḥ /
analyzed: san ucchiṣṭe asan ca ubhau mṛtyuḥ vājaḥ prajāpatiḥ

original: (AVŚ_11,7[9].3c) laukyā ucchiṣṭa āyattā vraś ca draś cāpi śrīr mayi //3//
analyzed: laukyāḥ ucchiṣṭe āyattāḥ ca draḥ ca api śrīḥ mayi

original: (AVŚ_11,7[9].4a) dṛḍho dṛṃha sthiro nyo brahma viśvasṛjo daśa /
analyzed: dṛḍhaḥ dṛṃha sthiraḥ nyaḥ brahma viśva sṛjaḥ daśa

original: (AVŚ_11,7[9].4c) nābhim iva sarvataś cakram ucchiṣṭe devatāḥ śritāḥ //4//
analyzed: nābhim iva sarvatas cakram ucchiṣṭe devatāḥ śritāḥ

original: (AVŚ_11,7[9].5a) ṛk sāma yajur ucchiṣṭa udgīthaḥ prastutaṃ stutam /
analyzed: ṛk sāma yajuḥ ucchiṣṭaḥ udgīthaḥ prastutam stutam

original: (AVŚ_11,7[9].5c) hiṅkāra ucchiṣṭe svaraḥ sāmno meḍiś ca tan mayi //5//
analyzed: hiṅkāraḥ ucchiṣṭe svaraḥ sāmnaḥ mā iḍiḥ ca tat mayi

original: (AVŚ_11,7[9].6a) aindrāgnaṃ pāvamānaṃ mahānāmnīr mahāvratam /
analyzed: aindrāgnam pāvamānam mahānāmnīḥ mahāvratam

original: (AVŚ_11,7[9].6c) ucchiṣṭe yajñasyāṅgāny antar garbha iva mātari //6//
analyzed: ucchiṣṭe yajñasya aṅgāni antar garbhe iva mātari

original: (AVŚ_11,7[9].7a) rājasūyaṃ vājapeyam agniṣṭomaṣ tad adhvaraḥ /
analyzed: rājasūyam vājapeyam agniṣṭomaḥ tat adhvaraḥ

original: (AVŚ_11,7[9].7c) arkāśvamedhāv ucchiṣṭe jīvabarhir madintamaḥ //7//
analyzed: arka aśvamedhau ucchiṣṭe jīva barhiḥ madintamaḥ

original: (AVŚ_11,7[9].8a) agnyādheyam atho dīkṣā kāmapraś chandasā saha /
analyzed: agnyādheyam atha u dīkṣā kāmapraḥ chandasā saha

original: (AVŚ_11,7[9].8c) utsannā yajñāḥ satrāṇy ucchiṣṭe 'dhi samāhitāḥ //8//
analyzed: utsannāḥ yajñāḥ satrāṇi ucchiṣṭe dhi samāhitāḥ

original: (AVŚ_11,7[9].9a) agnihotraṃ ca śraddhā ca vaṣaṭkāro vrataṃ tapaḥ /
analyzed: agnihotram ca śraddhā ca vaṣaṭkāraḥ vratam tapaḥ

original: (AVŚ_11,7[9].9c) dakṣiṇeṣṭaṃ pūrtaṃ cocchiṣṭe 'dhi samāhitāḥ //9//
analyzed: dakṣiṇā iṣṭam pūrtam ca ucchiṣṭe dhi samāhitāḥ

original: (AVŚ_11,7[9].10a) ekarātro dvirātraḥ sadyaḥkrīḥ prakrīr ukthyaḥ /
analyzed: eka rātraḥ dvi rātraḥ sadyaḥkrīḥ prakrīḥ ukthyaḥ

original: (AVŚ_11,7[9].10c) otaṃ nihitam ucchiṣṭe yajñasyāṇūni vidyayā //10// {19}
analyzed: otam nihitam ucchiṣṭe yajñasya aṇūni vidyayā

original: (AVŚ_11,7[9].11a) catūrātraḥ pañcarātraḥ ṣaḍrātraś cobhayaḥ saha /
analyzed: catur rātraḥ pañca rātraḥ ṣaṣ rātraḥ ca ubhayaḥ saha

original: (AVŚ_11,7[9].11c) ṣoḍaśī saptarātraś cocchiṣṭāj jajñire sarve ye yajñā amṛte hitāḥ //11//
analyzed: ṣoḍaśī saptarātraḥ ca ucchiṣṭāt jajñire sarve ye yajñāḥ amṛte hitāḥ

original: (AVŚ_11,7[9].12a) pratīhāro nidhanaṃ viśvajic cābhijic ca yaḥ /
analyzed: pratīhāraḥ nidhanam viśvajit ca abhijit ca yaḥ

original: (AVŚ_11,7[9].12c) sāhnātirātrāv ucchiṣṭe dvādaśāho 'pi tan mayi //12//
analyzed: sa ahnā atirātrau ucchiṣṭe tat mayi

original: (AVŚ_11,7[9].13a) sūnṛtā saṃnatiḥ kṣemaḥ svadhorjāmṛtaṃ sahaḥ /
analyzed: sūnṛtā saṃnatiḥ kṣemaḥ svadhā ūrjā amṛtam sahaḥ

original: (AVŚ_11,7[9].13c) ucchiṣṭe sarve pratyañcaḥ kāmāḥ kāmena tātṛpuḥ //13//
analyzed: ucchiṣṭe sarve pratyañcaḥ kāmāḥ kāmena tātṛpuḥ

original: (AVŚ_11,7[9].14a) nava bhūmīḥ samudrā ucchiṣṭe 'dhi śritā divaḥ /
analyzed: nava bhūmīḥ samudrāḥ ucchiṣṭe dhi śritāḥ divaḥ

original: (AVŚ_11,7[9].14c) ā sūryo bhāty ucchiṣṭe 'horātre api tan mayi //14//
analyzed: ā sūryaḥ bhāti ucchiṣṭe horātre api tat mayi

original: (AVŚ_11,7[9].15a) upahavyaṃ viṣūvantaṃ ye ca yajñā guhā hitāḥ /
analyzed: upahavyam viṣūvantam ye ca yajñāḥ guhā hitāḥ

original: (AVŚ_11,7[9].15c) bibharti bhartā viśvasyocchiṣṭo janituḥ pitā //15//
analyzed: bibharti bhartā viśvasya ucchiṣṭaḥ janituḥ pitā

original: (AVŚ_11,7[9].16a) pitā janitur ucchiṣṭo 'soḥ pautraḥ pitāmahaḥ /
analyzed: pitā janituḥ pautraḥ pitāmahaḥ

original: (AVŚ_11,7[9].16c) sa kṣiyati viśvasyeśāno vṛṣā bhūmyām atighnyaḥ //16//
analyzed: sa kṣiyati viśvasya īśānaḥ vṛṣā bhūmyām atighnyaḥ

original: (AVŚ_11,7[9].17a) ṛtaṃ satyaṃ tapo rāṣṭraṃ śramo dharmaś ca karma ca /
analyzed: ṛtam satyam tapaḥ rāṣṭram śramaḥ dharmaḥ ca karma ca

original: (AVŚ_11,7[9].17c) bhūtaṃ bhaviṣyad ucchiṣṭe vīryaṃ lakṣmīr balaṃ bale //17//
analyzed: bhūtam bhaviṣyat ucchiṣṭe vīryam lakṣmīḥ balam bale

original: (AVŚ_11,7[9].18a) samṛddhir oja ākūtiḥ kṣatraṃ rāṣṭraṃ ṣaḍ urvyaḥ /
analyzed: samṛddhiḥ ojaḥ ākūtiḥ kṣatram rāṣṭram ṣaḍ urvyaḥ

original: (AVŚ_11,7[9].18c) saṃvatsaro 'dhy ucchiṣṭa iḍā praiṣā grahā haviḥ //18//
analyzed: saṃvatsaraḥ dhi ucchiṣṭaḥ iḍā praiṣāḥ grahāḥ haviḥ

original: (AVŚ_11,7[9].19a) caturhotāra āpriyaś cāturmāsyāni nīvidaḥ /
analyzed: caturhotāraḥ āpriyaḥ cāturmāsyāni nīvidaḥ

original: (AVŚ_11,7[9].19c) ucchiṣṭe yajñā hotrāḥ paśubandhās tad iṣṭayaḥ //19//
analyzed: ucchiṣṭe yajñāḥ hotrāḥ paśubandhāḥ tat iṣṭayaḥ

original: (AVŚ_11,7[9].20a) ardhamāsāś ca māsāś cārtavā ṛtubhiḥ saha /
analyzed: ardha māsāḥ ca māsāḥ ca ārtavāḥ ṛtubhiḥ saha

original: (AVŚ_11,7[9].20c) ucchiṣṭe ghoṣiṇīr āpa stanayitnuḥ śrutir mahī //20// {20}
analyzed: ucchiṣṭe ghoṣiṇīḥ āpaḥ stanayitnuḥ śrutiḥ mahī

original: (AVŚ_11,7[9].21a) śarkarāḥ sikatā aśmāna oṣadhayo vīrudhas tṛṇā /
analyzed: śarkarāḥ sikatāḥ aśmānaḥ oṣadhayaḥ vīrudhaḥ tṛṇā

original: (AVŚ_11,7[9].21c) abhrāṇi vidyuto varṣam ucchiṣṭe saṃśritā śritā //21//
analyzed: abhrāṇi vidyutaḥ varṣam ucchiṣṭe saṃśritā śritā

original: (AVŚ_11,7[9].22a) rāddhiḥ prāptiḥ samāptir vyāptir maha edhatuḥ /
analyzed: rāddhiḥ prāptiḥ samāptiḥ vyāptiḥ mahaḥ edhatuḥ

original: (AVŚ_11,7[9].22c) atyāptir ucchiṣṭe bhūtiś cāhitā nihitā hitā //22//
analyzed: atyāptiḥ ucchiṣṭe bhūtiḥ ca ahitā nihitā hitā

original: (AVŚ_11,7[9].23a) yac ca prāṇati prāṇena yac ca paśyati cakṣuṣā /
analyzed: yat ca prāṇati prāṇena yat ca paśyati cakṣuṣā

original: (AVŚ_11,7[9].23c) ucchiṣṭāj jajñire sarve divi devā diviśritaḥ //23//
analyzed: ucchiṣṭāt jajñire sarve divi devāḥ

original: (AVŚ_11,7[9].24a) ṛcaḥ sāmāni chandāṃsi purāṇaṃ yajuṣā saha /
analyzed: ṛcaḥ sāmāni chandāṃsi purāṇam yajuṣā saha

original: (AVŚ_11,7[9].24c) ucchiṣṭāj jajñire sarve divi devā diviśritaḥ //24//
analyzed: ucchiṣṭāt jajñire sarve divi devāḥ

original: (AVŚ_11,7[9].25a) prāṇāpānau cakṣuḥ śrotram akṣitiś ca kṣitiś ca yā /
analyzed: prāṇa apānau cakṣuḥ śrotram akṣitiḥ ca kṣitiḥ ca yā

original: (AVŚ_11,7[9].25c) ucchiṣṭāj jajñire sarve divi devā diviśritaḥ //25//
analyzed: ucchiṣṭāt jajñire sarve divi devāḥ

original: (AVŚ_11,7[9].26a) ānandā modāḥ pramudo 'bhīmodamudaś ca ye /
analyzed: ānandāḥ modāḥ pramudaḥ bhīma uda mudaḥ ca ye

original: (AVŚ_11,7[9].26c) ucchiṣṭāj jajñire sarve divi devā diviśritaḥ //26//
analyzed: ucchiṣṭāt jajñire sarve divi devāḥ

original: (AVŚ_11,7[9].27a) devāḥ pitaro manuṣyā gandharvāpsarasaś ca ye /
analyzed: devāḥ pitaraḥ manuṣyāḥ gandharva apsarasaḥ ca ye

original: (AVŚ_11,7[9].27c) ucchiṣṭāj jajñire sarve divi devā diviśritaḥ //27// {21}
analyzed: ucchiṣṭāt jajñire sarve divi devāḥ

original: (AVŚ_11,8[10].1a) yan manyur jāyām āvahat saṃkalpasya gṛhād adhi /
analyzed: yat manyuḥ jāyām āvahat saṃkalpasya gṛhāt adhi

original: (AVŚ_11,8[10].1c) ka āsaṃ janyāḥ ke varāḥ ka u jyeṣṭhavaro 'bhavat //1//
analyzed: kaḥ āsam janyāḥ ke varāḥ kaḥ u jyeṣṭha varaḥ bhavat

original: (AVŚ_11,8[10].2a) tapaś caivāstāṃ karma cāntar mahaty arṇave /
analyzed: tapaḥ ca eva āstām karma ca antar mahati arṇave

original: (AVŚ_11,8[10].2c) ta āsaṃ janyās te varā brahma jyeṣṭhavaro 'bhavat //2//
analyzed: te āsam janyāḥ te varāḥ brahma jyeṣṭha varaḥ bhavat

original: (AVŚ_11,8[10].3a) daśa sākam ajāyanta devā devebhyaḥ purā /
analyzed: daśa sākam ajāyanta devāḥ devebhyaḥ purā

original: (AVŚ_11,8[10].3c) yo vai tān vidyāt pratyakṣaṃ sa vā adya mahad vadet //3//
analyzed: yaḥ vai tān vidyāt pratyakṣam sa vai adya mahat vadet

original: (AVŚ_11,8[10].4a) prāṇāpānau cakṣuḥ śrotram akṣitiś ca kṣitiś ca yā /
analyzed: prāṇa apānau cakṣuḥ śrotram akṣitiḥ ca kṣitiḥ ca yā

original: (AVŚ_11,8[10].4c) vyānodānau vāṅ manas te vā ākūtim āvahan //4//
analyzed: vyāna udānau vāc manaḥ te vai ākūtim āvahan

original: (AVŚ_11,8[10].5a) ajātā āsann ṛtavo 'tho dhātā bṛhaspatiḥ /
analyzed: a jātāḥ āsan ṛtavaḥ thaḥ dhātā bṛhaspatiḥ

original: (AVŚ_11,8[10].5c) indrāgnī aśvinā tarhi kaṃ te jyeṣṭham upāsata //5//
analyzed: indra agnī aśvinā tarhi kam te jyeṣṭham upāsata

original: (AVŚ_11,8[10].6a) tapaś caivāstāṃ karma cāntar mahaty arṇave /
analyzed: tapaḥ ca eva āstām karma ca antar mahati arṇave

original: (AVŚ_11,8[10].6c) tapo ha jajñe karmaṇas tat te jyeṣṭham upāsata //6//
analyzed: tapaḥ ha jajñe karmaṇaḥ tat te jyeṣṭham upāsata

original: (AVŚ_11,8[10].7a) yeta āsīd bhūmiḥ pūrvā yām addhātaya id viduḥ /
analyzed: yā itas āsīt bhūmiḥ pūrvā yām addhātayaḥ id viduḥ

original: (AVŚ_11,8[10].7c) yo vai tāṃ vidyān nāmathā sa manyeta purāṇavit //7//
analyzed: yaḥ vai tām vidyāt na amathā sa manyeta purāṇa vid

original: (AVŚ_11,8[10].8a) kuta indraḥ kutaḥ somaḥ kuto agnir ajāyata /
analyzed: kutas indraḥ kutas somaḥ kutas agniḥ ajāyata

original: (AVŚ_11,8[10].8c) kutas tvaṣṭā sam abhavat kuto dhātājāyata //8//
analyzed: kutas tvaṣṭā sam abhavat kutas dhātā ajāyata

original: (AVŚ_11,8[10].9a) indrād indraḥ somāt somo agner agnir ajāyata /
analyzed: indrāt indraḥ somāt somaḥ agneḥ agniḥ ajāyata

original: (AVŚ_11,8[10].9c) tvaṣṭā ha jajñe tvaṣṭur dhātur dhātājāyata //9//
analyzed: tvaṣṭā ha jajñe tvaṣṭuḥ dhātuḥ dhātā ajāyata

original: (AVŚ_11,8[10].10a) ye ta āsan daśa jātā devā devebhyaḥ purā /
analyzed: ye te āsan daśa jātāḥ devāḥ devebhyaḥ purā

original: (AVŚ_11,8[10].10c) putrebhyo lokaṃ dattvā kasmiṃs te loka āsate //10// {22}
analyzed: putrebhyaḥ lokam dattvā kasmin te loke āsate  /

original: (AVŚ_11,8[10].11a) yadā keśān asthi snāva māṃsaṃ majjānam ābharat /
analyzed: yadā keśān asthi snāva māṃsam majjānam ābharat

original: (AVŚ_11,8[10].11c) śarīraṃ kṛtvā pādavat kaṃ lokam anu prāviśat //11//
analyzed: śarīram kṛtvā pāda vat kam lokam anu prāviśat

original: (AVŚ_11,8[10].12a) kutaḥ keśān kutaḥ snāva kuto asthīny ābharat /
analyzed: kutas keśān kutas snāva kutas asthīni ābharat

original: (AVŚ_11,8[10].12c) aṅgā parvāṇi majjānaṃ ko māṃsaṃ kuta ābharat //12//
analyzed: aṅgā parvāṇi majjānam kaḥ māṃsam kutas ābharat

original: (AVŚ_11,8[10].13a) saṃsico nāma te devā ye saṃbhārānt samabharan /
analyzed: saṃsicaḥ nāma te devāḥ ye saṃbhārān samabharan

original: (AVŚ_11,8[10].13c) sarvaṃ saṃsicya martyaṃ devāḥ puruṣam āviśan //13//
analyzed: sarvam saṃsicya martyam devāḥ puruṣam āviśan

original: (AVŚ_11,8[10].14a) ūrū pādāv aṣṭhīvantau śiro hastāv atho mukham /
analyzed: ūrū pādau aṣṭhīvantau śiraḥ hastau atho mukham

original: (AVŚ_11,8[10].14c) pṛṣṭīr barjahye pārśve kas tat sam adadhād ṛṣiḥ //14//
analyzed: pṛṣṭīḥ barjahye pārśve kaḥ tat sam adadhāt ṛṣiḥ

original: (AVŚ_11,8[10].15a) śiro hastāv atho mukhaṃ jihvāṃ grīvāś ca kīkasāḥ /
analyzed: śiraḥ hastau atho mukham jihvām grīvāḥ ca kīkasāḥ

original: (AVŚ_11,8[10].15c) tvacā prāvṛtya sarvaṃ tat saṃdhā sam adadhān mahī //15//
analyzed: tvacā prāvṛtya sarvam tat saṃdhā sam adadhāt mahī

original: (AVŚ_11,8[10].16a) yat tac charīram aśayat saṃdhayā saṃhitaṃ mahat /
analyzed: yat tat śarīram aśayat saṃdhayā saṃhitam mahat

original: (AVŚ_11,8[10].16c) yenedam adya rocate ko asmin varṇam ābharat //16//
analyzed: yena idam adya rocate kaḥ asmin varṇam ābharat

original: (AVŚ_11,8[10].17a) sarve devā upāśikṣan tad ajānād vadhūḥ satī /
analyzed: sarve devāḥ upāśikṣan tat ajānāt vadhūḥ satī

original: (AVŚ_11,8[10].17c) īśā vaśasya yā jāyā sāsmin varṇam ābharat //17//
analyzed: īśā vaśasya yā jāyā sā asmin varṇam ābharat

original: (AVŚ_11,8[10].18a) yadā tvaṣṭā vyatṛṇat pitā tvaṣṭur ya uttaraḥ /
analyzed: yadā tvaṣṭā vyatṛṇat pitā tvaṣṭuḥ yaḥ uttaraḥ

original: (AVŚ_11,8[10].18c) gṛhaṃ kṛtvā martyaṃ devāḥ puruṣam āviśan //18//
analyzed: gṛham kṛtvā martyam devāḥ puruṣam āviśan

original: (AVŚ_11,8[10].19a) svapno vai tandrīr nirṛtiḥ pāpmāno nāma devatāḥ /
analyzed: svapnaḥ vai tandrīḥ nirṛtiḥ pāpmānaḥ nāma devatāḥ

original: (AVŚ_11,8[10].19c) jarā khālatyaṃ pālityaṃ śarīram anu prāviśan //19//
analyzed: jarā khālatyam pālityam śarīram anu prāviśan

original: (AVŚ_11,8[10].20a) steyaṃ duṣkṛtaṃ vṛjinaṃ satyaṃ yajño yaśo bṛhat /
analyzed: steyam duṣkṛtam vṛjinam satyam yajñaḥ yaśaḥ bṛhat

original: (AVŚ_11,8[10].20c) balaṃ ca kṣatram ojaś ca śarīram anu prāviśan //20// {23}
analyzed: balam ca kṣatram ojaḥ ca śarīram anu prāviśan

original: (AVŚ_11,8[10].21a) bhūtiś ca vā abhūtiś ca rātayo 'rātayaś ca yāḥ /
analyzed: bhūtiḥ ca vai abhūtiḥ ca rātayaḥ rātayaḥ ca yāḥ

original: (AVŚ_11,8[10].21c) kṣudhaś ca sarvās tṛṣṇāś ca śarīram anu prāviśan //21//
analyzed: kṣudhaḥ ca sarvāḥ tṛṣṇāḥ ca śarīram anu prāviśan

original: (AVŚ_11,8[10].22a) nindāś ca vā anindāś ca yac ca hanteti neti ca /
analyzed: nindāḥ ca vai anindāḥ ca yat ca hantā iti na iti ca

original: (AVŚ_11,8[10].22c) śarīraṃ śraddhā dakṣiṇāśraddhā cānu prāviśan //22//
analyzed: śarīram śraddhā dakṣiṇā aśraddhā ca anu prāviśan

original: (AVŚ_11,8[10].23a) vidyāś ca vā avidyāś ca yac cānyad upadeśyam /
analyzed: vidyāḥ ca vai avidyāḥ ca yat ca anyat upadeśyam

original: (AVŚ_11,8[10].23c) śarīraṃ brahma prāviśad ṛcaḥ sāmātho yajuḥ //23//
analyzed: śarīram brahma prāviśat ṛcaḥ sāma atha u yajuḥ

original: (AVŚ_11,8[10].24a) ānandā modāḥ pramudo 'bhīmodamudaś ca ye /
analyzed: ānandāḥ modāḥ pramudaḥ bhīma uda mudaḥ ca ye

original: (AVŚ_11,8[10].24c) haso nariṣṭā nṛttāni śarīram anu prāviśan //24//
analyzed: hasaḥ nariṣṭāḥ nṛttāni śarīram anu prāviśan

original: (AVŚ_11,8[10].25a) ālāpāś ca pralāpāś cābhīlāpalapaś ca ye /
analyzed: ālāpāḥ ca pralāpāḥ ca abhīlāpa lapaḥ ca ye

original: (AVŚ_11,8[10].25c) śarīraṃ sarve prāviśann āyujaḥ prayujo yujaḥ //25//
analyzed: śarīram sarve prāviśan āyujaḥ prayujaḥ yujaḥ

original: (AVŚ_11,8[10].26a) prāṇāpānau cakṣuḥ śrotram akṣitiś ca kṣitiś ca yā /
analyzed: prāṇa apānau cakṣuḥ śrotram akṣitiḥ ca kṣitiḥ ca yā

original: (AVŚ_11,8[10].26c) vyānodānau vāṅ manaḥ śarīreṇa ta īyante //26//
analyzed: vyāna udānau vāc manaḥ śarīreṇa te īyante

original: (AVŚ_11,8[10].27a) āśiṣaś ca praśiṣaś ca saṃśiṣo viśiṣaś ca yāḥ /
analyzed: āśiṣaḥ ca praśiṣaḥ ca saṃśiṣaḥ viśiṣaḥ ca yāḥ

original: (AVŚ_11,8[10].27c) cittāni sarve saṃkalpāḥ śarīram anu prāviśan //27//
analyzed: cittāni sarve saṃkalpāḥ śarīram anu prāviśan

original: (AVŚ_11,8[10].28a) āsteyīś ca vāsteyīś ca tvaraṇāḥ kṛpaṇāś ca yāḥ /
analyzed: āsteyīḥ ca vāsteyīḥ ca tvaraṇāḥ kṛpaṇāḥ ca yāḥ

original: (AVŚ_11,8[10].28c) guhyāḥ śukrā sthūlā apas tā bībhatsāv asādayan //28//
analyzed: guhyāḥ śukrāḥ sthūlāḥ apaḥ tāḥ bībhatsau asādayan

original: (AVŚ_11,8[10].29a) asthi kṛtvā samidhaṃ tad aṣṭāpo asādayan /
analyzed: asthi kṛtvā samidham tat aṣṭau apaḥ asādayan

original: (AVŚ_11,8[10].29c) retaḥ kṛtvājyaṃ devāḥ puruṣam āviśan //29//
analyzed: retaḥ kṛtvā ājyam devāḥ puruṣam āviśan

original: (AVŚ_11,8[10].30a) yā āpo yāś ca devatā yā virāḍ brahmaṇā saha /
analyzed: yāḥ āpaḥ yāḥ ca devatāḥ yā virāj brahmaṇā saha

original: (AVŚ_11,8[10].30c) śarīraṃ brahma prāviśac charīre 'dhi prajāpatiḥ //30//
analyzed: śarīram brahma prāviśat śarīre dhi prajāpatiḥ

original: (AVŚ_11,8[10].31a) sūryaś cakṣur vātaḥ prāṇaṃ puruṣasya vi bhejire /
analyzed: sūryaḥ cakṣuḥ vātaḥ prāṇam puruṣasya vi bhejire

original: (AVŚ_11,8[10].31c) athāsyetaram ātmānaṃ devāḥ prāyachann agnaye //31//
analyzed: atha asya itaram ātmānam devāḥ prāyacchan agnaye

original: (AVŚ_11,8[10].32a) tasmād vai vidvān puruṣam idaṃ brahmeti manyate /
analyzed: tasmāt vai vidvān puruṣam idam brahma iti manyate

original: (AVŚ_11,8[10].32c) sarvā hy asmin devatā gāvo goṣṭha ivāsate //32//
analyzed: sarvāḥ hi asmin devatāḥ gāvaḥ goṣṭhe iva āsate

original: (AVŚ_11,8[10].33a) prathamena pramāreṇa tredhā viṣvaṅ vi gachati /
analyzed: prathamena pramāreṇa tredhā viṣvaṅ vi gacchati

original: (AVŚ_11,8[10].33c) ada ekena gachaty ada ekena gachatīhaikena ni ṣevate //33//
analyzed: adaḥ ekena gacchati adaḥ ekena gacchati iha ekena ni sevate

original: (AVŚ_11,8[10].34a) apsu stīmāsu vṛddhāsu śarīram antarā hitam /
analyzed: apsu stīmāsu vṛddhāsu śarīram antarā hitam

original: (AVŚ_11,8[10].34c) tasmiṃ chavo 'dhy antarā tasmāc chavo 'dhy ucyate //34// {24}
analyzed: tasmin chavaḥ dhi antarā tasmāt śavaḥ dhi ucyate

original: (AVŚ_11,9[11].1a) ye bāhavo yā iṣavo dhanvanāṃ vīryāṇi ca /
analyzed: ye bāhavaḥ yāḥ iṣavaḥ dhanvanām vīryāṇi ca

original: (AVŚ_11,9[11].1c) asīn paraśūn āyudhaṃ cittākūtaṃ ca yad dhṛdi /
analyzed: asīn paraśūn āyudham citta ākūtam ca yat hṛdi

original: (AVŚ_11,9[11].1e) sarvaṃ tad arbude tvam amitrebhyo dṛśe kurūdārāṃś ca pra darśaya //1//
analyzed: sarvam tat arbude tvam amitrebhyaḥ dṛśe kuru udārān ca pra darśaya

original: (AVŚ_11,9[11].2a) ut tiṣṭhata saṃ nahyadhvaṃ mitrā devajanā yūyam /
analyzed: ud tiṣṭhata sam nahyadhvam mitrāḥ deva janāḥ yūyam

original: (AVŚ_11,9[11].2c) saṃdṛṣṭā guptā vaḥ santu yā no mitrāṇy arbude //2//
analyzed: saṃdṛṣṭāḥ guptāḥ vaḥ santu yā naḥ mitrāṇi arbude

original: (AVŚ_11,9[11].3a) ut tiṣṭhatam ā rabhetām ādānasaṃdānābhyām /
analyzed: ud tiṣṭhatam ā rabhetām ādāna saṃdānābhyām

original: (AVŚ_11,9[11].3c) amitrāṇāṃ senā abhi dhattam arbude //3//
analyzed: amitrāṇām senāḥ abhi dhattam arbude

original: (AVŚ_11,9[11].4a) arbudir nāma yo deva īśānaś ca nyarbudiḥ /
analyzed: arbudiḥ nāma yaḥ devaḥ īśānaḥ ca nyarbudiḥ

original: (AVŚ_11,9[11].4c) yābhyām antarikṣam āvṛtam iyaṃ ca pṛthivī mahī /
analyzed: yābhyām antarikṣam āvṛtam iyam ca pṛthivī mahī

original: (AVŚ_11,9[11].4e) tābhyām indramedibhyām ahaṃ jitam anv emi senayā //4//
analyzed: tābhyām indra medibhyām aham jitam anu emi senayā

original: (AVŚ_11,9[11].5a) ut tiṣṭha tvaṃ devajanārbude senayā saha /
analyzed: ud tiṣṭha tvam deva jana arbude senayā saha

original: (AVŚ_11,9[11].5c) bhañjann amitrāṇāṃ senāṃ bhogebhiḥ pari vāraya //5//
analyzed: bhañjan amitrāṇām senām bhogebhiḥ pari vāraya

original: (AVŚ_11,9[11].6a) sapta jātān nyarbuda udārāṇāṃ samīkṣayan /
analyzed: sapta jātān nyarbudaḥ udārāṇām samīkṣayan

original: (AVŚ_11,9[11].6c) tebhiṣ ṭvam ājye hute sarvair ut tiṣṭha senayā //6//
analyzed: tebhiḥ tvam ājye hute sarvaiḥ ud tiṣṭha senayā

original: (AVŚ_11,9[11].7a) pratighnānāśrumukhī kṛdhukarṇī ca krośatu /
analyzed: ca krośatu

original: (AVŚ_11,9[11].7c) vikeśī puruṣe hate radite arbude tava //7//
analyzed: vikeśī puruṣe hate radite arbude tava

original: (AVŚ_11,9[11].8a) saṃkarṣantī karūkaraṃ manasā putram ichantī /
analyzed: saṃkarṣantī karūkaram manasā putram ichantī

original: (AVŚ_11,9[11].8c) patiṃ bhrātaram āt svān radite arbude tava //8//
analyzed: patim bhrātaram āt svān radite arbude tava

original: (AVŚ_11,9[11].9a) aliklavā jāṣkamadā gṛdhrāḥ śyenāḥ patatriṇaḥ /
analyzed: aliklavāḥ jāṣkamadāḥ gṛdhrāḥ śyenāḥ patatriṇaḥ

original: (AVŚ_11,9[11].9c) dhvāṅkṣāḥ śakunayas tṛpyantv amitreṣu samīkṣayan radite arbude tava //9//
analyzed: dhvāṅkṣāḥ śakunayaḥ tṛpyantu amitreṣu samīkṣayan radite arbude tava

original: (AVŚ_11,9[11].10a) atho sarvaṃ śvāpadaṃ makṣikā tṛpyatu krimiḥ /
analyzed: atho sarvam śvāpadam makṣikā tṛpyatu krimiḥ

original: (AVŚ_11,9[11].10c) pauruṣeye 'dhi kuṇape radite arbude tava //10// {25}
analyzed: pauruṣeye dhi kuṇape radite arbude tava  /

original: (AVŚ_11,9[11].11a) ā gṛhṇītaṃ saṃ bṛhataṃ prāṇāpānān nyarbude /
analyzed: ā gṛhṇītam sam bṛhatam prāṇa apānān nyarbude

original: (AVŚ_11,9[11].11c) nivāśā ghoṣāḥ saṃ yantv amitreṣu samīkṣayan radite arbude tava //11//
analyzed: nivāśāḥ ghoṣāḥ sam yantu amitreṣu samīkṣayan radite arbude tava

original: (AVŚ_11,9[11].12a) ud vepaya saṃ vijantāṃ bhiyāmitrānt saṃ sṛja /
analyzed: ud vepaya sam vijantām bhiyā amitrān sam sṛja

original: (AVŚ_11,9[11].12c) urugrāhair bāhvaṅkair vidhyāmitrān nyarbude //12//
analyzed: uru grāhaiḥ bāhu aṅkaiḥ vidhya amitrān nyarbude

original: (AVŚ_11,9[11].13a) muhyantv eṣāṃ bāhavaś cittākūtaṃ ca yad dhṛdi /
analyzed: muhyantu eṣām bāhavaḥ citta ākūtam ca yat hṛdi

original: (AVŚ_11,9[11].13c) maiṣām uc cheṣi kiṃ cana radite arbude tava //13//
analyzed: mā eṣām ud śeṣi kim cana radite arbude tava

original: (AVŚ_11,9[11].14a) pratighnānāḥ saṃ dhāvantūraḥ paṭaurāv āghnānāḥ /
analyzed: pratighnānāḥ sam paṭaurau āghnānāḥ

original: (AVŚ_11,9[11].14c) aghāriṇīr vikeśyo rudatyaḥ puruṣe hate radite arbude tava //14//
analyzed: aghāriṇīḥ vikeśyaḥ rudatyaḥ puruṣe hate radite arbude tava

original: (AVŚ_11,9[11].15a) śvanvatīr apsaraso rūpakā utārbude /
analyzed: śvanvatīḥ apsarasaḥ rūpakāḥ uta arbude

original: (AVŚ_11,9[11].15c) antaḥpātre rerihatīṃ riśāṃ durṇihitaiṣiṇīm /
analyzed: antaḥpātre rerihatīm riśām durṇihita eṣiṇīm

original: (AVŚ_11,9[11].15e) sarvās tā arbude tvam amitrebhyo dṛśe kurūdārāṃś ca pra darśaya //15//
analyzed: sarvāḥ tāḥ arbude tvam amitrebhyaḥ dṛśe kuru udārān ca pra darśaya

original: (AVŚ_11,9[11].16a) khaḍūre 'dhicaṅkramāṃ kharvikāṃ kharvavāsinīm /
analyzed: khaḍūre dhicaṅkramām kharvikām kharva vāsinīm

original: (AVŚ_11,9[11].16c) ya udārā antarhitā gandharvāpsarasaś ca ye /
analyzed: ye udārāḥ antarhitāḥ gandharva apsarasaḥ ca ye

original: (AVŚ_11,9[11].16e) sarpā itarajanā rakṣāṃsi //16//
analyzed: sarpāḥ itarajanāḥ rakṣāṃsi

original: (AVŚ_11,9[11].17a) caturdaṃṣṭrāṃ chyāvadataḥ kumbhamuṣkāṃ asṛṅmukhān /
analyzed: catur daṃṣṭrām śyāva dataḥ kumbha muṣkām asṛj mukhān

original: (AVŚ_11,9[11].17c) svabhyasā ye codbhyasāḥ //17//
analyzed: su abhyasāḥ ye ca udbhyasāḥ

original: (AVŚ_11,9[11].18a) ud vepaya tvam arbude 'mitrāṇām amūḥ sicaḥ /
analyzed: ud vepaya tvam arbude mitrāṇām amūḥ sicaḥ

original: (AVŚ_11,9[11].18c) jayaṃś ca jiṣṇuś cāmitrāṃ jayatām indramedinau //18//
analyzed: jayan ca jiṣṇuḥ ca amitrām jayatām indra medinau

original: (AVŚ_11,9[11].19a) prablīno mṛditaḥ śayāṃ hato 'mitro nyarbude /
analyzed: prablīnaḥ mṛditaḥ śayām hataḥ mitraḥ nyarbude

original: (AVŚ_11,9[11].19c) agnijihvā dhūmaśikhā jayantīr yantu senayā //19//
analyzed: agni jihvāḥ dhūma śikhāḥ jayantīḥ yantu senayā

original: (AVŚ_11,9[11].20a) tayārbude praṇuttānām indro hantu varaṃvaram /
analyzed: tayā arbude praṇuttānām indraḥ hantu varaṃvaram

original: (AVŚ_11,9[11].20c) amitrāṇāṃ śacīpatir māmīṣāṃ moci kaś cana //20// {26}
analyzed: amitrāṇām śacīpatiḥ mā amīṣām moci kaḥ cana

original: (AVŚ_11,9[11].21a) ut kasantu hṛdayāny ūrdhvaḥ prāṇa ud īṣatu /
analyzed: ud kasantu hṛdayāni ūrdhvaḥ prāṇaḥ ud īṣatu

original: (AVŚ_11,9[11].21c) śauṣkāsyam anu vartatām amitrān mota mitriṇaḥ //21//
analyzed: śauṣkāsyam anu vartatām amitrān mā uta mitriṇaḥ

original: (AVŚ_11,9[11].22a) ye ca dhīrā ye cādhīrāḥ parāñco badhirāś ca ye /
analyzed: ye ca dhīrāḥ ye ca adhīrāḥ parāñcaḥ badhirāḥ ca ye

original: (AVŚ_11,9[11].22c) tamasā ye ca tūparā atho bastābhivāsinaḥ /
analyzed: tamasāḥ ye ca tūparāḥ atho basta abhivāsinaḥ

original: (AVŚ_11,9[11].22e) sarvāṃs tāṃ arbude tvam amitrebhyo dṛśe kurūdārāṃś ca pra darśaya //22//
analyzed: sarvān tām arbude tvam amitrebhyaḥ dṛśe kuru udārān ca pra darśaya

original: (AVŚ_11,9[11].23a) arbudiś ca triṣandhiś cāmitrān no vi vidhyatām /
analyzed: arbudiḥ ca triṣandhiḥ ca amitrān naḥ vi vidhyatām

original: (AVŚ_11,9[11].23c) yathaiṣām indra vṛtrahan hanāma śacīpate 'mitrāṇāṃ sahasraśaḥ //23//
analyzed: yathā eṣām indra vṛtrahan hanāma śacīpate mitrāṇām sahasraśas

original: (AVŚ_11,9[11].24a) vanaspatīn vānaspatyān oṣadhīr uta vīrudhaḥ /
analyzed: vanaspatīn vānaspatyān oṣadhīḥ uta vīrudhaḥ

original: (AVŚ_11,9[11].24c) gandharvāpsarasaḥ sarpān devān puṇyajanān pitṝn /
analyzed: gandharva apsarasaḥ sarpān devān puṇyajanān pitṝn

original: (AVŚ_11,9[11].24e) sarvāṃs tāṃ arbude tvam amitrebhyo dṛśe kurūdārāṃś ca pra darśaya //24//
analyzed: sarvān tām arbude tvam amitrebhyaḥ dṛśe kuru udārān ca pra darśaya

original: (AVŚ_11,9[11].25a) īśāṃ vo maruto deva ādityo brahmaṇaspatiḥ /
analyzed: īśām vaḥ marutaḥ devaḥ ādityaḥ brahmaṇaspatiḥ

original: (AVŚ_11,9[11].25c) īśāṃ va indraś cāgniś ca dhātā mitraḥ prajāpatiḥ /
analyzed: īśām vaḥ indraḥ ca agniḥ ca dhātā mitraḥ prajāpatiḥ

original: (AVŚ_11,9[11].25e) īśāṃ va ṛṣayaś cakrur amitreṣu samīkṣayan radite arbude tava //25//
analyzed: īśām vaḥ ṛṣayaḥ cakruḥ amitreṣu samīkṣayan radite arbude tava

original: (AVŚ_11,9[11].26a) teṣāṃ sarveṣām īśānā ut tiṣṭhata saṃ nahyadhvam /
analyzed: teṣām sarveṣām īśānāḥ ud tiṣṭhata sam nahyadhvam

original: (AVŚ_11,9[11].26c) mitrā devajanā yūyam imaṃ saṃgrāmaṃ saṃjitya yathālokaṃ vi tiṣṭhadhvam //26// {27}
