original: (AVŚ_11,10[12].1a) ut tiṣṭhata saṃ nahyadhvam udārāḥ ketubhiḥ saha /
analyzed: ud tiṣṭhata sam nahyadhvam udārāḥ ketubhiḥ saha

original: (AVŚ_11,10[12].1c) sarpā itarajanā rakṣāṃsy amitrān anu dhāvata //1//
analyzed: sarpāḥ itarajanāḥ rakṣāṃsi amitrān anu dhāvata

original: (AVŚ_11,10[12].2a) īśāṃ vo veda rājyaṃ triṣandhe aruṇaiḥ ketubhiḥ saha /
analyzed: īśām vaḥ veda rājyam triṣandhe aruṇaiḥ ketubhiḥ saha

original: (AVŚ_11,10[12].2c) ye antarikṣe ye divi pṛthivyāṃ ye ca mānavāḥ /
analyzed: ye antarikṣe ye divi pṛthivyām ye ca mānavāḥ

original: (AVŚ_11,10[12].2e) triṣandhes te cetasi durṇāmāna upāsatām //2//
analyzed: triṣandheḥ te cetasi durṇāmānaḥ upāsatām

original: (AVŚ_11,10[12].3a) ayomukhāḥ sūcīmukhā atho vikaṅkatīmukhāḥ /
analyzed: ayaḥ mukhāḥ sūcī mukhāḥ atha u vikaṅkatī mukhāḥ

original: (AVŚ_11,10[12].3c) kravyādo vātaraṃhasa ā sajantv amitrān vajreṇa triṣandhinā //3//
analyzed: kravya adaḥ vāta raṃhasaḥ ā sajantu amitrān vajreṇa triṣandhinā

original: (AVŚ_11,10[12].4a) antar dhehi jātaveda āditya kuṇapaṃ bahu /
analyzed: antar dhehi jātavedaḥ āditya kuṇapam bahu

original: (AVŚ_11,10[12].4c) triṣandher iyaṃ senā suhitāstu me vaśe //4//
analyzed: triṣandheḥ iyam senā su hitā astu me vaśe

original: (AVŚ_11,10[12].5a) ut tiṣṭha tvaṃ devajanārbude senayā saha /
analyzed: ud tiṣṭha tvam deva jana arbude senayā saha

original: (AVŚ_11,10[12].5c) ayaṃ balir va āhutas triṣandher āhutiḥ priyā //5//
analyzed: ayam baliḥ vaḥ āhutaḥ triṣandheḥ āhutiḥ priyā

original: (AVŚ_11,10[12].6a) śitipadī saṃ dyatu śaravyeyaṃ catuṣpadī /
analyzed: śitipadī sam dyatu śaravyā iyam catuṣpadī

original: (AVŚ_11,10[12].6c) kṛtye 'mitrebhyo bhava triṣandheḥ saha senayā //6//
analyzed: kṛtye mitrebhyaḥ bhava triṣandheḥ saha senayā

original: (AVŚ_11,10[12].7a) dhūmākṣī saṃ patatu kṛdhukarṇī ca krośatu /
analyzed: dhūma akṣī sam patatu kṛdhu karṇī ca krośatu

original: (AVŚ_11,10[12].7c) triṣandheḥ senayā jite aruṇāḥ santu ketavaḥ //7//
analyzed: triṣandheḥ senayā jite aruṇāḥ santu ketavaḥ

original: (AVŚ_11,10[12].8a) avāyantāṃ pakṣiṇo ye vayāṃsy antarikṣe divi ye caranti /
analyzed: avāyantām pakṣiṇaḥ ye vayāṃsi antarikṣe divi ye caranti

original: (AVŚ_11,10[12].8c) śvāpado makṣikāḥ saṃ rabhantām āmādo gṛdhrāḥ kuṇape radantām //8//
analyzed: śvāpadaḥ makṣikāḥ sam rabhantām āmādaḥ gṛdhrāḥ kuṇape radantām

original: (AVŚ_11,10[12].9a) yām indreṇa saṃdhāṃ samadhatthā brahmaṇā ca bṛhaspate /
analyzed: yām indreṇa saṃdhām samadhatthāḥ brahmaṇā ca bṛhaspate

original: (AVŚ_11,10[12].9c) tayāham indrasaṃdhayā sarvān devān iha huva ito jayata māmutaḥ //9//
analyzed: tayā aham indra saṃdhayā sarvān devān iha huve itas jayata mā amutas

original: (AVŚ_11,10[12].10a) bṛhaspatir āṅgirasa ṛṣayo brahmasaṃśitāḥ /
analyzed: bṛhaspatiḥ āṅgirasaḥ ṛṣayaḥ brahma saṃśitāḥ

original: (AVŚ_11,10[12].10c) asurakṣayaṇaṃ vadhaṃ triṣandhiṃ divy āśrayan //10// {28}
analyzed: asura kṣayaṇam vadham triṣandhim divi āśrayan

original: (AVŚ_11,10[12].11a) yenāsau gupta āditya ubhāv indraś ca tiṣṭhataḥ /
analyzed: yena asau guptaḥ ādityaḥ ubhau indraḥ ca tiṣṭhataḥ

original: (AVŚ_11,10[12].11c) triṣandhiṃ devā abhajantaujase ca balāya ca //11//
analyzed: triṣandhim devāḥ abhajanta ojase ca balāya ca

original: (AVŚ_11,10[12].12a) sarvāṃl lokānt sam ajayan devā āhutyānayā /
analyzed: sarvān lokān sam ajayan devāḥ āhutyā anayā

original: (AVŚ_11,10[12].12c) bṛhaspatir āṅgiraso vajraṃ yam asiñcatāsurakṣayaṇaṃ vadham //12//
analyzed: bṛhaspatiḥ āṅgirasaḥ vajram yam asiñcata asura kṣayaṇam vadham

original: (AVŚ_11,10[12].13a) bṛhaspatir āṅgiraso vajraṃ yam asiñcatāsurakṣayaṇaṃ vadham /
analyzed: bṛhaspatiḥ āṅgirasaḥ vajram yam asiñcata asura kṣayaṇam vadham

original: (AVŚ_11,10[12].13c) tenāham amūṃ senāṃ ni limpāmi bṛhaspate 'mitrān hanmy ojasā //13//
analyzed: tena aham amūm senām ni limpāmi bṛhaspate mitrān hanmi ojasā

original: (AVŚ_11,10[12].14a) sarve devā atyāyanti ye aśnanti vaṣaṭkṛtam /
analyzed: sarve devāḥ atyāyanti ye aśnanti vaṣaṭkṛtam

original: (AVŚ_11,10[12].14c) imāṃ juṣadhvam āhutim ito jayata māmutaḥ //14//
analyzed: imām juṣadhvam āhutim itas jayata mā amutas

original: (AVŚ_11,10[12].15a) sarve devā atyāyantu triṣandher āhutiḥ priyā /
analyzed: sarve devāḥ atyāyantu triṣandheḥ āhutiḥ priyā

original: (AVŚ_11,10[12].15c) saṃdhāṃ mahatīṃ rakṣata yayāgre asurā jitāḥ //15//
analyzed: saṃdhām mahatīm rakṣata yayā agre asurāḥ jitāḥ

original: (AVŚ_11,10[12].16a) vāyur amitrāṇām iṣvagrāṇy āñcatu /
analyzed: vāyuḥ amitrāṇām iṣu agrāṇi āñcatu

original: (AVŚ_11,10[12].16c) indra eṣāṃ bāhūn prati bhanaktu mā śakan pratidhām iṣum /
analyzed: indraḥ eṣām bāhūn prati bhanaktu mā śakan pratidhām iṣum

original: (AVŚ_11,10[12].16e) āditya eṣām astraṃ vi nāśayatu candramā yutām agatasya panthām //16//
analyzed: ādityaḥ eṣām astram vi nāśayatu candramāḥ yutām a gatasya panthām

original: (AVŚ_11,10[12].17a) yadi preyur devapurā brahma varmāṇi cakrire /
analyzed: yadi preyuḥ deva purā brahma varmāṇi cakrire

original: (AVŚ_11,10[12].17c) tanūpānaṃ paripāṇaṃ kṛṇvānā yad upocire sarvaṃ tad arasaṃ kṛdhi //17//
analyzed: tanū pānam paripāṇam kṛṇvānāḥ yat upocire sarvam tat arasam kṛdhi

original: (AVŚ_11,10[12].18a) kravyādānuvartayan mṛtyunā ca purohitam /
analyzed: kravyādā anuvartayan mṛtyunā ca purohitam

original: (AVŚ_11,10[12].18c) triṣandhe prehi senayā jayāmitrān pra padyasva //18//
analyzed: triṣandhe prehi senayā jaya amitrān pra padyasva

original: (AVŚ_11,10[12].19a) triṣandhe tamasā tvam amitrān pari vāraya /
analyzed: triṣandhe tamasā tvam amitrān pari vāraya

original: (AVŚ_11,10[12].19c) pṛṣadājyapraṇuttānāṃ māmīṣāṃ moci kaś cana //19//
analyzed: pṛṣadājya praṇuttānām mā amīṣām moci kaḥ cana

original: (AVŚ_11,10[12].20a) śitipadī saṃ patatv amitrāṇām amūḥ sicaḥ /
analyzed: śitipadī sam patatu amitrāṇām amūḥ sicaḥ

original: (AVŚ_11,10[12].20c) muhyantv adyāmūḥ senā amitrāṇāṃ nyarbude //20// {29}
analyzed: muhyantu adya amūḥ senāḥ amitrāṇām nyarbude

original: (AVŚ_11,10[12].21a) mūḍhā amitrā nyarbude jahy eṣāṃ varaṃvaram /
analyzed: mūḍhāḥ amitrāḥ nyarbude jahi eṣām varaṃvaram

original: (AVŚ_11,10[12].21c) anayā jahi senayā //21//
analyzed: anayā jahi senayā

original: (AVŚ_11,10[12].22a) yaś ca kavacī yaś cākavaco 'mitro yaś cājmani /
analyzed: yaḥ ca kavacī yaḥ ca akavacaḥ mitraḥ yaḥ ca ajmani

original: (AVŚ_11,10[12].22c) jyāpāśaiḥ kavacapāśair ajmanābhihataḥ śayām //22//
analyzed: jyā pāśaiḥ kavaca pāśaiḥ ajmanā abhihataḥ śayām

original: (AVŚ_11,10[12].23a) ye varmiṇo ye 'varmāṇo amitrā ye ca varmiṇaḥ /
analyzed: ye varmiṇaḥ ye varmāṇaḥ amitrāḥ ye ca varmiṇaḥ

original: (AVŚ_11,10[12].23c) sarvāṃs tāṃ arbude hatāṃ chvāno 'dantu bhūmyām //23//
analyzed: sarvān tām arbude hatām śvānaḥ dantu bhūmyām

original: (AVŚ_11,10[12].24a) ye rathino ye arathā asādā ye ca sādinaḥ /
analyzed: ye rathinaḥ ye a rathāḥ a sādāḥ ye ca sādinaḥ

original: (AVŚ_11,10[12].24c) sarvān adantu tān hatān gṛdhrāḥ śyenāḥ patatriṇaḥ //24//
analyzed: sarvān adantu tān hatān gṛdhrāḥ śyenāḥ patatriṇaḥ

original: (AVŚ_11,10[12].25a) sahasrakuṇapā śetām āmitrī senā samare vadhānām /
analyzed: sahasra kuṇapā śetām āmitrī senā samare vadhānām

original: (AVŚ_11,10[12].25c) vividdhā kakajākṛtā //25//
analyzed: vividdhā kakajākṛtā

original: (AVŚ_11,10[12].26a) marmāvidhaṃ roruvataṃ suparṇair adantu duścitaṃ mṛditaṃ śayānam /
analyzed: marmāvidham roruvatam suparṇaiḥ adantu duścitam mṛditam śayānam

original: (AVŚ_11,10[12].26c) ya imāṃ pratīcīm āhutim amitro no yuyutsati //26//
analyzed: yaḥ imām pratīcīm āhutim amitraḥ naḥ yuyutsati

original: (AVŚ_11,10[12].27a) yāṃ devā anutiṣṭhanti yasyā nāsti virādhanam /
analyzed: yām devāḥ anutiṣṭhanti yasyāḥ na asti virādhanam

original: (AVŚ_11,10[12].27c) tayendro hantu vṛtrahā vajreṇa triṣandhinā //27// {30}
analyzed: tayā indraḥ hantu vṛtrahā vajreṇa triṣandhinā

original: (AVŚ_12,1.1a) satyaṃ bṛhad ṛtam ugraṃ dīkṣā tapo brahma yajñaḥ pṛthivīṃ dhārayanti /
analyzed: satyam bṛhat ṛtam ugram dīkṣā tapaḥ brahma yajñaḥ pṛthivīm dhārayanti

original: (AVŚ_12,1.1c) sā no bhūtasya bhavyasya patny uruṃ lokaṃ pṛthivī naḥ kṛṇotu //1//
analyzed: sā naḥ bhūtasya bhavyasya patnī urum lokam pṛthivī naḥ kṛṇotu

original: (AVŚ_12,1.2a) asaṃbādhaṃ madhyato mānavānāṃ yasyā udvataḥ pravataḥ samaṃ bahu /
analyzed: asaṃbādham madhyatas mānavānām yasyāḥ udvataḥ pravataḥ samam bahu

original: (AVŚ_12,1.2c) nānāvīryā oṣadhīr yā bibharti pṛthivī naḥ prathatāṃ rādhyatāṃ naḥ //2//
analyzed: nānā vīryāḥ oṣadhīḥ yā bibharti pṛthivī naḥ prathatām rādhyatām naḥ

original: (AVŚ_12,1.3a) yasyāṃ samudra uta sindhur āpo yasyām annaṃ kṛṣṭayaḥ saṃbabhūvuḥ /
analyzed: yasyām samudraḥ uta sindhuḥ āpaḥ yasyām annam kṛṣṭayaḥ saṃbabhūvuḥ

original: (AVŚ_12,1.3c) yasyām idaṃ jinvati prāṇad ejat sā no bhūmiḥ pūrvapeye dadhātu //3//
analyzed: yasyām idam jinvati prāṇat ejat sā naḥ bhūmiḥ pūrvapeye dadhātu

original: (AVŚ_12,1.4a) yasyāś catasraḥ pradiśaḥ pṛthivyā yasyām annam kṛṣṭayaḥ saṃbabhūvuḥ /
analyzed: yasyāḥ catasraḥ pradiśaḥ pṛthivyāḥ yasyām annam kṛṣṭayaḥ saṃbabhūvuḥ

original: (AVŚ_12,1.4c) yā bibharti bahudhā prāṇad ejat sā no bhūmir goṣv apy anne dadhātu //4//
analyzed: yā bibharti bahudhā prāṇat ejat sā naḥ bhūmiḥ goṣu api anne dadhātu

original: (AVŚ_12,1.5a) yasyāṃ pūrve pūrvajanā vicakrire yasyāṃ devā asurān abhyavartayan /
analyzed: yasyām pūrve pūrva janāḥ vicakrire yasyām devāḥ asurān abhyavartayan

original: (AVŚ_12,1.5c) gavām aśvānāṃ vayasaś ca viṣṭhā bhagaṃ varcaḥ pṛthivī no dadhātu //5//
analyzed: gavām aśvānām vayasaḥ ca viṣṭhā bhagam varcaḥ pṛthivī naḥ dadhātu

original: (AVŚ_12,1.6a) viśvaṃbharā vasudhānī pratiṣṭhā hiraṇyavakṣā jagato niveśanī /
analyzed: viśvaṃbharāḥ vasu dhānī pratiṣṭhā hiraṇya vakṣāḥ jagataḥ niveśanī

original: (AVŚ_12,1.6c) vaiśvānaraṃ bibhratī bhūmir agnim indraṛṣabhā draviṇe no dadhātu //6//
analyzed: vaiśvānaram bibhratī bhūmiḥ agnim indra ṛṣabhā draviṇe naḥ dadhātu

original: (AVŚ_12,1.7a) yāṃ rakṣanty asvapnā viśvadānīṃ devā bhūmiṃ pṛthivīm apramādam /
analyzed: yām rakṣanti asvapnāḥ viśvadānīm devāḥ bhūmim pṛthivīm apramādam

original: (AVŚ_12,1.7c) sā no madhu priyaṃ duhām atho ukṣatu varcasā //7//
analyzed: sā naḥ madhu priyam duhām atha u ukṣatu varcasā

original: (AVŚ_12,1.8a) yārṇave 'dhi salilam agra āsīt yāṃ māyābhir anvacaran manīṣiṇaḥ /
analyzed: yā arṇave dhi salilam agre āsīt yām māyābhiḥ anvacaran manīṣiṇaḥ

original: (AVŚ_12,1.8c) yasyā hṛdayaṃ parame vyomant satyenāvṛtam amṛtaṃ pṛthivyāḥ /
analyzed: yasyāḥ hṛdayam parame vyoman satyena āvṛtam amṛtam pṛthivyāḥ

original: (AVŚ_12,1.8e) sā no bhūmis tviṣiṃ balaṃ rāṣṭre dadhātūttame //8//
analyzed: sā naḥ bhūmiḥ tviṣim balam rāṣṭre dadhātu uttame

original: (AVŚ_12,1.9a) yasyām āpaḥ paricarāḥ samānīr ahorātre apramādaṃ kṣaranti /
analyzed: yasyām āpaḥ paricarāḥ samānīḥ ahorātre apramādam kṣaranti

original: (AVŚ_12,1.9c) sā no bhūmir bhūridhārā payo duhām atho ukṣatu varcasā //9//
analyzed: sā naḥ bhūmiḥ bhūri dhārā payaḥ duhām atha u ukṣatu varcasā

original: (AVŚ_12,1.10a) yām aśvināv amimātāṃ viṣṇur yasyāṃ vicakrame /
analyzed: yām aśvinau amimātām viṣṇuḥ yasyām vicakrame

original: (AVŚ_12,1.10c) indro yāṃ cakra ātmane 'namitrāṃ śacīpatiḥ /
analyzed: indraḥ yām cakre ātmane namitrām śacīpatiḥ

original: (AVŚ_12,1.10e) sā no bhūmir vi sṛjatāṃ mātā putrāya me payaḥ //10// {1}
analyzed: sā naḥ bhūmiḥ vi sṛjatām mātā putrāya me payaḥ

original: (AVŚ_12,1.11a) girayas te parvatā himavanto 'raṇyaṃ te pṛthivi syonam astu /
analyzed: girayaḥ te parvatāḥ himavantaḥ raṇyam te pṛthivi syonam astu

original: (AVŚ_12,1.11c) babhruṃ kṛṣṇāṃ rohiṇīṃ viśvarūpāṃ dhruvāṃ bhūmiṃ pṛthivīm indraguptām /
analyzed: babhrum kṛṣṇām rohiṇīm viśva rūpām dhruvām bhūmim pṛthivīm indra guptām

original: (AVŚ_12,1.11e) ajīto 'hato akṣato 'dhy aṣṭhām pṛthivīm aham //11//
analyzed: a jītaḥ hataḥ a kṣataḥ dhi aṣṭhām pṛthivīm aham

original: (AVŚ_12,1.12a) yat te madhyaṃ pṛthivi yac ca nabhyaṃ yās ta ūrjas tanvaḥ saṃbabhūvuḥ /
analyzed: yat te madhyam pṛthivi yat ca nabhyam yāḥ te ūrjaḥ tanvaḥ saṃbabhūvuḥ

original: (AVŚ_12,1.12c) tāsu no dhehy abhi naḥ pavasva mātā bhūmiḥ putro ahaṃ pṛthivyāḥ parjanyaḥ pitā sa u naḥ pipartu //12//
analyzed: tāsu naḥ dhehi abhi naḥ pavasva mātā bhūmiḥ putraḥ aham pṛthivyāḥ parjanyaḥ pitā saḥ u naḥ pipartu

original: (AVŚ_12,1.13a) yasyāṃ vediṃ parigṛhṇanti bhūmyāṃ yasyāṃ yajñaṃ tanvate viśvakarmāṇaḥ /
analyzed: yasyām vedim parigṛhṇanti bhūmyām yasyām yajñam tanvate viśva karmāṇaḥ

original: (AVŚ_12,1.13c) yasyāṃ mīyante svaravaḥ pṛthivyām ūrdhvāḥ śukrā āhutyāḥ purastāt /
analyzed: yasyām mīyante svaravaḥ pṛthivyām ūrdhvāḥ śukrāḥ āhutyāḥ purastāt

original: (AVŚ_12,1.13e) sā no bhūmir vardhayad vardhamānā //13//
analyzed: sā naḥ bhūmiḥ vardhayat vardhamānā

original: (AVŚ_12,1.14a) yo no dveṣat pṛthivi yaḥ pṛtanyād yo 'bhidāsān manasā yo vadhena /
analyzed: yaḥ naḥ dveṣat pṛthivi yaḥ pṛtanyāt yaḥ bhidāsāt manasā yaḥ vadhena

original: (AVŚ_12,1.14c) taṃ no bhūme randhaya pūrvakṛtvari //14//
analyzed: tam naḥ bhūme randhaya pūrva kṛtvari

original: (AVŚ_12,1.15a) tvaj jātās tvayi caranti martyās tvaṃ bibharṣi dvipadas tvaṃ catuṣpadaḥ /
analyzed: tvat jātāḥ tvayi caranti martyāḥ tvam bibharṣi dvipadaḥ tvam catuṣpadaḥ

original: (AVŚ_12,1.15c) taveme pṛthivi pañca mānavā yebhyo jyotir amṛtaṃ martyebhya udyant sūryo raśmibhir ātanoti //15//
analyzed: tava ime pṛthivi pañca mānavāḥ yebhyaḥ jyotiḥ amṛtam martyebhyaḥ udyan sūryaḥ raśmibhiḥ ātanoti

original: (AVŚ_12,1.16a) tā naḥ prajāḥ saṃ duhratāṃ samagrā vāco madhu pṛthivi dhehi mahyam //16//
analyzed: tāḥ naḥ prajāḥ sam duhratām samagrāḥ vācaḥ madhu pṛthivi dhehi mahyam

original: (AVŚ_12,1.17a) viśvasvaṃ mātaram oṣadhīnāṃ dhruvāṃ bhūmiṃ pṛthivīṃ dharmaṇā dhṛtām /
analyzed: viśvasvam mātaram oṣadhīnām dhruvām bhūmim pṛthivīm dharmaṇā dhṛtām

original: (AVŚ_12,1.17c) śivāṃ syonām anu carema viśvahā //17//
analyzed: śivām syonām anu carema viśvahā

original: (AVŚ_12,1.18a) mahat sadhasthaṃ mahatī babhūvitha mahān vega ejathur vepathuṣ ṭe /
analyzed: mahat sadhastham mahatī babhūvitha mahān vegaḥ ejathuḥ vepathuḥ te

original: (AVŚ_12,1.18c) mahāṃs tvendro rakṣaty apramādam /
analyzed: mahān tvā indraḥ rakṣati apramādam

original: (AVŚ_12,1.18e) sā no bhūme pra rocaya hiraṇyasyeva saṃdṛśi mā no dvikṣata kaś cana //18//
analyzed: sā naḥ bhūme pra rocaya hiraṇyasya iva saṃdṛśi mā naḥ dvikṣata kaḥ cana

original: (AVŚ_12,1.19a) agnir bhūmyām oṣadhīṣv agnim āpo bibhraty agnir aśmasu /
analyzed: agniḥ bhūmyām oṣadhīṣu agnim āpaḥ bibhrati agniḥ aśmasu

original: (AVŚ_12,1.19c) agnir antaḥ puruṣeṣu goṣv aśveṣv agnayaḥ //19//
analyzed: agniḥ antar puruṣeṣu goṣu aśveṣu agnayaḥ

original: (AVŚ_12,1.20a) agnir diva ā tapaty agner devasyorv antarikṣam /
analyzed: agniḥ divaḥ ā tapati agneḥ devasya uru antarikṣam

original: (AVŚ_12,1.20c) agniṃ martāsa indhate havyavāhaṃ ghṛtapriyam //20// {2}
analyzed: agnim martāsaḥ indhate havyavāham ghṛta priyam

original: (AVŚ_12,1.21a) agnivāsāḥ pṛthivy asitajñūs tviṣīmantaṃ saṃśitaṃ mā kṛṇotu //21//
analyzed: agni vāsāḥ pṛthivī asitajñūḥ tviṣīmantam saṃśitam mā kṛṇotu

original: (AVŚ_12,1.22a) bhūmyāṃ devebhyo dadati yajñaṃ havyam araṃkṛtam /
analyzed: bhūmyām devebhyaḥ dadati yajñam havyam araṃkṛtam

original: (AVŚ_12,1.22c) bhūmyāṃ manuṣyā jīvanti svadhayānnena martyāḥ /
analyzed: bhūmyām manuṣyāḥ jīvanti svadhayā annena martyāḥ

original: (AVŚ_12,1.22e) sā no bhūmiḥ prāṇam āyur dadhātu jaradaṣṭiṃ mā pṛthivī kṛṇotu //22//
analyzed: sā naḥ bhūmiḥ prāṇam āyuḥ dadhātu jaradaṣṭim mā pṛthivī kṛṇotu

original: (AVŚ_12,1.23a) yas te gandhaḥ pṛthivi saṃbabhūva yaṃ bibhraty oṣadhayo yam āpaḥ /
analyzed: yaḥ te gandhaḥ pṛthivi saṃbabhūva yam bibhrati oṣadhayaḥ yam āpaḥ

original: (AVŚ_12,1.23c) yaṃ gandharvā apsarasaś ca bhejire tena mā surabhiṃ kṛṇu mā no dvikṣata kaś cana //23//
analyzed: yam gandharvāḥ apsarasaḥ ca bhejire tena mā surabhim kṛṇu mā naḥ dvikṣata kaḥ cana

original: (AVŚ_12,1.24a) yas te gandhaḥ puṣkaram āviveśa yaṃ saṃjabhruḥ sūryāyā vivāhe /
analyzed: yaḥ te gandhaḥ puṣkaram āviveśa yam saṃjabhruḥ sūryāyāḥ vivāhe

original: (AVŚ_12,1.24c) amartyāḥ pṛthivi gandham agre tena mā surabhiṃ kṛṇu mā no dvikṣata kaś cana //24//
analyzed: amartyāḥ pṛthivi gandham agre tena mā surabhim kṛṇu mā naḥ dvikṣata kaḥ cana

original: (AVŚ_12,1.25a) yas te gandhaḥ puruṣeṣu strīṣu puṃsu bhago ruciḥ /
analyzed: yaḥ te gandhaḥ puruṣeṣu strīṣu puṃsu bhagaḥ ruciḥ

original: (AVŚ_12,1.25c) yo aśveṣu vīreṣu yo mṛgeṣūta hastiṣu /
analyzed: yaḥ aśveṣu vīreṣu yaḥ mṛgeṣu uta hastiṣu

original: (AVŚ_12,1.25e) kanyāyāṃ varco yad bhūme tenāsmāṃ api saṃ sṛja mā no dvikṣata kaś cana //25//
analyzed: kanyāyām varcaḥ yat bhūme tena asmān api sam sṛja mā naḥ dvikṣata kaḥ cana

original: (AVŚ_12,1.26a) śilā bhūmir aśmā pāṃsuḥ sā bhūmiḥ saṃdhṛtā dhṛtā /
analyzed: śilā bhūmiḥ aśmā pāṃsuḥ sā bhūmiḥ saṃdhṛtā dhṛtā

original: (AVŚ_12,1.26c) tasyai hiraṇyavakṣase pṛthivyā akaraṃ namaḥ //26//
analyzed: tasyai hiraṇya vakṣase pṛthivyai akaram namaḥ

original: (AVŚ_12,1.27a) yasyāṃ vṛkṣā vānaspatyā dhruvās tiṣṭhanti viśvahā /
analyzed: yasyām vṛkṣāḥ vānaspatyāḥ dhruvāḥ tiṣṭhanti viśvahā

original: (AVŚ_12,1.27c) pṛthivīṃ viśvadhāyasaṃ dhṛtām achāvadāmasi //27//
analyzed: pṛthivīm viśva dhāyasam dhṛtām achāvadāmasi

original: (AVŚ_12,1.28a) udīrāṇā utāsīnās tiṣṭhantaḥ prakrāmantaḥ /
analyzed: udīrāṇāḥ uta āsīnāḥ tiṣṭhantaḥ prakrāmantaḥ

original: (AVŚ_12,1.28c) padbhyāṃ dakṣiṇasavyābhyāṃ mā vyathiṣmahi bhūmyām //28//
analyzed: padbhyām dakṣiṇa savyābhyām mā vyathiṣmahi bhūmyām

original: (AVŚ_12,1.29a) vimṛgvarīṃ pṛthivīm ā vadāmi kṣamāṃ bhūmiṃ brahmaṇā vāvṛdhānām /
analyzed: vimṛgvarīm pṛthivīm ā vadāmi kṣamām bhūmim brahmaṇā vāvṛdhānām

original: (AVŚ_12,1.29c) ūrjaṃ puṣṭaṃ bibhratīm annabhāgaṃ ghṛtaṃ tvābhi ni ṣīdema bhūme //29//
analyzed: ūrjam puṣṭam bibhratīm anna bhāgam ghṛtam tvā abhi ni sīdema bhūme

original: (AVŚ_12,1.30a) śuddhā na āpas tanve kṣarantu yo naḥ sedur apriye taṃ ni dadhmaḥ /
analyzed: śuddhāḥ naḥ āpaḥ tanve kṣarantu yaḥ naḥ seduḥ apriye tam ni dadhmaḥ

original: (AVŚ_12,1.30c) pavitreṇa pṛthivi mot punāmi //30// {3}
analyzed: pavitreṇa pṛthivi mā ud punāmi

original: (AVŚ_12,1.31a) yās te prācīḥ pradiśo yā udīcīr yās te bhūme adharād yāś ca paścāt /
analyzed: yāḥ te prācīḥ pradiśaḥ yāḥ udīcīḥ yāḥ te bhūme adharāt yāḥ ca paścāt

original: (AVŚ_12,1.31c) syonās tā mahyaṃ carate bhavantu mā ni paptaṃ bhuvane śiśriyāṇaḥ //31//
analyzed: syonāḥ tāḥ mahyam carate bhavantu mā ni paptam bhuvane śiśriyāṇaḥ

original: (AVŚ_12,1.32a) mā naḥ paścān mā purastān nudiṣṭhā mottarād adharād uta /
analyzed: mā naḥ paścāt mā purastāt nudiṣṭhāḥ mā uttarāt adharāt uta

original: (AVŚ_12,1.32c) svasti bhūme no bhava mā vidan paripanthino varīyo yāvayā vadham //32//
analyzed: svasti bhūme naḥ bhava mā vidan paripanthinaḥ varīyaḥ yāvaya vadham

original: (AVŚ_12,1.33a) yāvat te 'bhi vipaśyāmi bhūme sūryeṇa medinā /
analyzed: yāvat te bhi vipaśyāmi bhūme sūryeṇa medinā

original: (AVŚ_12,1.33c) tāvan me cakṣur mā meṣṭottarāmuttarāṃ samām //33//
analyzed: tāvat me cakṣuḥ mā meṣṭa uttarām uttarām samām

original: (AVŚ_12,1.34a) yac chayānaḥ paryāvarte dakṣiṇaṃ sakhyam abhi bhūme pārśvam uttānās tvā pratīcīṃ yat pṛṣṭībhir adhiśemahe /
analyzed: yat śayānaḥ paryāvarte dakṣiṇam sakhyam abhi bhūme pārśvam uttānāḥ tvā pratīcīm yat pṛṣṭībhiḥ adhiśemahe

original: (AVŚ_12,1.34c) mā hiṃsīs tatra no bhūme sarvasya pratiśīvari //34//
analyzed: mā hiṃsīḥ tatra naḥ bhūme sarvasya pratiśīvari

original: (AVŚ_12,1.35a) yat te bhūme vikhanāmi kṣipraṃ tad api rohatu /
analyzed: yat te bhūme vikhanāmi kṣipram tat api rohatu

original: (AVŚ_12,1.35c) mā te marma vimṛgvari mā te hṛdayam arpipam //35//
analyzed: mā te marma vimṛgvari mā te hṛdayam arpipam

original: (AVŚ_12,1.36a) grīṣmas te bhūme varṣāṇi śarad dhemantaḥ śiśiro vasantaḥ /
analyzed: grīṣmaḥ te bhūme varṣāṇi śarad hemantaḥ śiśiraḥ vasantaḥ

original: (AVŚ_12,1.36c) ṛtavas te vihitā hāyanīr ahorātre pṛthivi no duhātām //36//
analyzed: ṛtavaḥ te vihitāḥ hāyanīḥ ahorātre pṛthivi naḥ duhātām

original: (AVŚ_12,1.37a) yāpa sarpaṃ vijamānā vimṛgvarī yasyām āsann agnayo ye apsv antaḥ /
analyzed: yā apa sarpam vijamānā vimṛgvarī yasyām āsan agnayaḥ ye apsu antar

original: (AVŚ_12,1.37c) parā dasyūn dadatī devapīyūn indraṃ vṛṇānā pṛthivī na vṛtram śakrāya dadhre vṛṣabhāya vṛṣṇe //37//
analyzed: parā dasyūn dadatī deva pīyūn indram vṛṇānā pṛthivī na vṛtram śakrāya dadhre vṛṣabhāya vṛṣṇe

original: (AVŚ_12,1.38a) yasyāṃ sadohavirdhāne yūpo yasyāṃ nimīyate /
analyzed: yasyām sadaḥ havirdhāne yūpaḥ yasyām nimīyate

original: (AVŚ_12,1.38c) brahmāṇo yasyām arcanty ṛgbhiḥ sāmnā yajurvidaḥ yujyante yasyām ṛtvijaḥ somam indrāya pātave //38//
analyzed: brahmāṇaḥ yasyām arcanti ṛgbhiḥ sāmnā yajuḥ vidaḥ yujyante yasyām ṛtvijaḥ somam indrāya pātave

original: (AVŚ_12,1.39a) yasyāṃ pūrve bhūtakṛta ṛṣayo gā udānṛcuḥ /
analyzed: yasyām pūrve bhūta kṛtaḥ ṛṣayaḥ gāḥ udānṛcuḥ

original: (AVŚ_12,1.39c) sapta satreṇa vedhaso yajñena tapasā saha //39//
analyzed: sapta satreṇa vedhasaḥ yajñena tapasā saha

original: (AVŚ_12,1.40a) sā no bhūmir ā diśatu yad dhanaṃ kāmayāmahe /
analyzed: sā naḥ bhūmiḥ ā diśatu yat dhanam kāmayāmahe

original: (AVŚ_12,1.40c) bhago anuprayuṅktām indra etu purogavaḥ //40// {4}
analyzed: bhagaḥ anuprayuṅktām indraḥ etu purogavaḥ

original: (AVŚ_12,1.41a) yasyāṃ gāyanti nṛtyanti bhūmyāṃ martyā vyailabāḥ /
analyzed: yasyām gāyanti nṛtyanti bhūmyām martyāḥ vyailabāḥ

original: (AVŚ_12,1.41c) yudhyante yasyām ākrando yasyām vadati dundubhiḥ /
analyzed: yudhyante yasyām ākrandaḥ yasyām vadati dundubhiḥ

original: (AVŚ_12,1.41e) sā no bhūmiḥ pra ṇudatāṃ sapatnān asapatnaṃ mā pṛthivī kṛṇotu //41//
analyzed: sā naḥ bhūmiḥ pra nudatām sapatnān asapatnam mā pṛthivī kṛṇotu

original: (AVŚ_12,1.42a) yasyām annaṃ vrīhiyavau yasyā imāḥ pañca kṛṣṭayaḥ /
analyzed: yasyām annam vrīhi yavau yasyāḥ imāḥ pañca kṛṣṭayaḥ

original: (AVŚ_12,1.42c) bhūmyai parjanyapatnyai namo 'stu varṣamedase //42//
analyzed: bhūmyai parjanya patnyai namaḥ stu varṣa medase

original: (AVŚ_12,1.43a) yasyāḥ puro devakṛtāḥ kṣetre yasyā vikurvate /
analyzed: yasyāḥ puraḥ deva kṛtāḥ kṣetre yasyāḥ vikurvate

original: (AVŚ_12,1.43c) prajāpatiḥ pṛthivīṃ viśvagarbhām āśāmāśāṃ raṇyāṃ naḥ kṛṇotu //43//
analyzed: prajāpatiḥ pṛthivīm viśva garbhām āśām āśām raṇyām naḥ kṛṇotu

original: (AVŚ_12,1.44a) nidhiṃ bibhratī bahudhā guhā vasu maṇiṃ hiraṇyaṃ pṛthivī dadātu me /
analyzed: nidhim bibhratī bahudhā guhā vasu maṇim hiraṇyam pṛthivī dadātu me

original: (AVŚ_12,1.44c) vasūni no vasudā rāsamānā devī dadhātu sumanasyamānā //44//
analyzed: vasūni naḥ vasu dāḥ devī dadhātu sumanasyamānā

original: (AVŚ_12,1.45a) janaṃ bibhratī bahudhā vivācasaṃ nānādharmāṇaṃ pṛthivī yathaukasam /
analyzed: janam bibhratī bahudhā vivācasam nānā dharmāṇam pṛthivī yathaukasam

original: (AVŚ_12,1.45c) sahasraṃ dhārā draviṇasya me duhāṃ dhruveva dhenur anapasphurantī //45//
analyzed: sahasram dhārāḥ draviṇasya me duhām dhruvā iva dhenuḥ an apasphurantī

original: (AVŚ_12,1.46a) yas te sarpo vṛścikas tṛṣṭadaṃśmā hemantajabdho bhṛmalo guhā śaye /
analyzed: yaḥ te sarpaḥ vṛścikaḥ tṛṣṭa daṃśmā hemanta jabdhaḥ bhṛmalaḥ guhā śaye

original: (AVŚ_12,1.46c) krimir jinvat pṛthivi yadyad ejati prāvṛṣi tan naḥ sarpan mopa sṛpad yac chivaṃ tena no mṛḍa //46//
analyzed: krimiḥ jinvat pṛthivi yat yat ejati prāvṛṣi tat naḥ sarpat mā upa sṛpat yat śivam tena naḥ mṛḍa

original: (AVŚ_12,1.47a) ye te panthāno bahavo janāyanā rathasya vartmānasaś ca yātave /
analyzed: ye te panthānaḥ bahavaḥ janāyanāḥ rathasya vartmā anasaḥ ca yātave

original: (AVŚ_12,1.47c) yaiḥ saṃcaranty ubhaye bhadrapāpās taṃ panthānaṃ jayemānamitram ataskaraṃ yac chivaṃ tena no mṛḍa //47//
analyzed: yaiḥ saṃcaranti ubhaye bhadra pāpāḥ tam panthānam jayema anamitram a taskaram yat śivam tena naḥ mṛḍa

original: (AVŚ_12,1.48a) malvaṃ bibhratī gurubhṛd bhadrapāpasya nidhanaṃ titikṣuḥ /
analyzed: malvam bibhratī guru bhṛt bhadra pāpasya nidhanam titikṣuḥ

original: (AVŚ_12,1.48c) varāheṇa pṛthivī saṃvidānā sūkarāya vi jihīte mṛgāya //48//
analyzed: varāheṇa pṛthivī saṃvidānā sūkarāya vi jihīte mṛgāya

original: (AVŚ_12,1.49a) ye ta āraṇyāḥ paśavo mṛgā vane hitāḥ siṃhā vyāghrāḥ puruṣādaś caranti /
analyzed: ye te āraṇyāḥ paśavaḥ mṛgāḥ vane hitāḥ siṃhāḥ vyāghrāḥ puruṣa adaḥ caranti

original: (AVŚ_12,1.49c) ulaṃ vṛkaṃ pṛthivi duchunām ita ṛkṣīkāṃ rakṣo apa bādhayāsmat //49//
analyzed: ulam vṛkam pṛthivi duchunām itas ṛkṣīkām rakṣaḥ apa bādhaya asmat

original: (AVŚ_12,1.50a) ye gandharvā apsaraso ye cārāyāḥ kimīdinaḥ /
analyzed: ye gandharvāḥ apsarasaḥ ye ca arāyāḥ kimīdinaḥ

original: (AVŚ_12,1.50c) piśācānt sarvā rakṣāṃsi tān asmad bhūme yāvaya //50// {5}
analyzed: piśācān sarvā rakṣāṃsi tān asmat bhūme yāvaya

original: (AVŚ_12,1.51a) yāṃ dvipādaḥ pakṣiṇaḥ saṃpatanti haṃsāḥ suparṇāḥ śakunā vayāṃsi /
analyzed: yām dvipādaḥ pakṣiṇaḥ saṃpatanti haṃsāḥ suparṇāḥ śakunāḥ vayāṃsi

original: (AVŚ_12,1.51c) yasyāṃ vāto mātariśveyate rajāṃsi kṛṇvaṃś cyāvayaṃś ca vṛkṣān /
analyzed: yasyām vātaḥ mātariśvā īyate rajāṃsi kṛṇvan cyāvayan ca vṛkṣān

original: (AVŚ_12,1.51e) vātasya pravām upavām anu vāty arciḥ //51//
analyzed: vātasya pravām upavām anu vāti arciḥ

original: (AVŚ_12,1.52a) yasyāṃ kṛṣṇam aruṇaṃ ca saṃhite ahorātre vihite bhūmyām adhi /
analyzed: yasyām kṛṣṇam aruṇam ca saṃhite ahorātre vihite bhūmyām adhi

original: (AVŚ_12,1.52c) varṣeṇa bhūmiḥ pṛthivī vṛtāvṛtā sā no dadhātu bhadrayā priye dhāmanidhāmani //52//
analyzed: varṣeṇa bhūmiḥ pṛthivī vṛtā āvṛtā sā naḥ dadhātu bhadrayā priye dhāmani dhāmani

original: (AVŚ_12,1.53a) dyauś ca ma idaṃ pṛthivī cāntarikṣaṃ ca me vyacaḥ /
analyzed: dyauḥ ca me idam pṛthivī ca antarikṣam ca me vyacaḥ

original: (AVŚ_12,1.53c) agniḥ sūrya āpo medhāṃ viśve devāś ca saṃ daduḥ //53//
analyzed: agniḥ sūryaḥ āpaḥ medhām viśve devāḥ ca sam daduḥ

original: (AVŚ_12,1.54a) aham asmi sahamāna uttaro nāma bhūmyām /
analyzed: aham asmi sahamānaḥ uttaraḥ nāma bhūmyām

original: (AVŚ_12,1.54c) abhīṣāḍ asmi viśvāṣāḍ āśāmāśāṃ viṣāsahiḥ //54//
analyzed: abhīṣāh asmi viśvāṣāh āśām āśām viṣāsahiḥ

original: (AVŚ_12,1.55a) ado yad devi prathamānā purastād devair uktā vyasarpo mahitvam /
analyzed: adaḥ yat devi prathamānā purastāt devaiḥ uktā vyasarpaḥ mahi tvam

original: (AVŚ_12,1.55c) ā tvā subhūtam aviśat tadānīm akalpayathāḥ pradiśaś catasraḥ //55//
analyzed: ā tvā subhūtam aviśat tadānīm akalpayathāḥ pradiśaḥ catasraḥ

original: (AVŚ_12,1.56a) ye grāmā yad araṇyaṃ yāḥ sabhā adhi bhūmyām /
analyzed: ye grāmāḥ yat araṇyam yāḥ sabhāḥ adhi bhūmyām

original: (AVŚ_12,1.56c) ye saṃgrāmāḥ samitayas teṣu cāru vadema te //56//
analyzed: ye saṃgrāmāḥ samitayaḥ teṣu cāru vadema te

original: (AVŚ_12,1.57a) aśva iva rajo dudhuve vi tān janān ya ākṣiyan pṛthivīṃ yād ajāyata /
analyzed: aśvaḥ iva rajaḥ dudhuve vi tān janān ye ākṣiyan pṛthivīm yāt ajāyata

original: (AVŚ_12,1.57c) mandrāgretvarī bhuvanasya gopā vanaspatīnāṃ gṛbhir oṣadhīnām //57//
analyzed: mandrā agrā itvarī bhuvanasya gopāḥ vanaspatīnām gṛbhiḥ oṣadhīnām

original: (AVŚ_12,1.58a) yad vadāmi madhumat tad vadāmi yad īkṣe tad vananti mā /
analyzed: yat vadāmi madhumat tat vadāmi yat īkṣe tat vananti mā

original: (AVŚ_12,1.58c) tviṣīmān asmi jūtimān avānyān hanmi dodhataḥ //58//
analyzed: tviṣīmān asmi jūtimān ava anyān hanmi dodhataḥ

original: (AVŚ_12,1.59a) śantivā surabhiḥ syonā kīlālodhnī payasvatī /
analyzed: śantivā surabhiḥ syonā kīlāla udhnī payasvatī

original: (AVŚ_12,1.59c) bhūmir adhi bravītu me pṛthivī payasā saha //59//
analyzed: bhūmiḥ adhi bravītu me pṛthivī payasā saha

original: (AVŚ_12,1.60a) yām anvaichad dhaviṣā viśvakarmāntar arṇave rajasi praviṣṭām /
analyzed: yām anvaichat haviṣā viśvakarmā antar arṇave rajasi praviṣṭām

original: (AVŚ_12,1.60c) bhujiṣyaṃ pātraṃ nihitaṃ guhā yad āvir bhoge abhavan mātṛmadbhyaḥ //60//
analyzed: bhujiṣyam pātram nihitam guhā yat āvis bhoge abhavat mātṛmadbhyaḥ

original: (AVŚ_12,1.61a) tvam asy āvapanī janānām aditiḥ kāmadughā paprathānā /
analyzed: tvam asi āvapanī janānām aditiḥ kāmadughā paprathānā

original: (AVŚ_12,1.61c) yat ta ūnaṃ tat ta ā pūrayāti prajāpatiḥ prathamajā ṛtasya //61//
analyzed: yat te ūnam tat te ā pūrayāti prajāpatiḥ prathama jāḥ ṛtasya

original: (AVŚ_12,1.62a) upasthās te anamīvā ayakṣmā asmabhyaṃ santu pṛthivi prasūtāḥ /
analyzed: upasthāḥ te anamīvāḥ ayakṣmāḥ asmabhyam santu pṛthivi prasūtāḥ

original: (AVŚ_12,1.62c) dīrghaṃ na āyuḥ pratibudhyamānā vayaṃ tubhyaṃ balihṛtaḥ syāma //62//
analyzed: dīrgham naḥ āyuḥ pratibudhyamānāḥ vayam tubhyam bali hṛtaḥ syāma

original: (AVŚ_12,1.63a) bhūme mātar ni dhehi mā bhadrayā supratiṣṭhitam /
analyzed: bhūme mātar ni dhehi mā bhadrayā su pratiṣṭhitam

original: (AVŚ_12,1.63c) saṃvidānā divā kave śriyāṃ mā dhehi bhūtyām //63// {6}
analyzed: saṃvidānā divā kave śriyām mā dhehi bhūtyām

original: (AVŚ_12,2.1a) naḍam ā roha na te atra loka idaṃ sīsaṃ bhāgadheyaṃ ta ehi /
analyzed: naḍam ā roha na te atra lokaḥ idam sīsam bhāgadheyam te ehi

original: (AVŚ_12,2.1c) yo goṣu yakṣmaḥ puruṣeṣu yakṣmas tena tvaṃ sākam adharāṅ parehi //1//
analyzed: yaḥ goṣu yakṣmaḥ puruṣeṣu yakṣmaḥ tena tvam sākam adharāṅ parehi

original: (AVŚ_12,2.2a) aghaśaṃsaduḥśaṃsābhyāṃ kareṇānukareṇa ca /
analyzed: agha śaṃsa duḥśaṃsābhyām kareṇa anukareṇa ca

original: (AVŚ_12,2.2c) yakṣmaṃ ca sarvaṃ teneto mṛtyuṃ ca nir ajāmasi //2//
analyzed: yakṣmam ca sarvam tena itas mṛtyum ca niḥ ajāmasi

original: (AVŚ_12,2.3a) nir ito mṛtyuṃ nirṛtiṃ nir arātim ajāmasi /
analyzed: niḥ itas mṛtyum nirṛtim niḥ arātim ajāmasi

original: (AVŚ_12,2.3c) yo no dveṣṭi tam addhy agne akravyād yam u dviṣmas tam u te pra suvāmasi //3//
analyzed: yaḥ naḥ dveṣṭi tam addhi agne a kravyād yam u dviṣmaḥ tam u te pra suvāmasi

original: (AVŚ_12,2.4a) yady agniḥ kravyād yadi vā vyāghra imaṃ goṣṭhaṃ praviveśānyokāḥ /
analyzed: yadi agniḥ kravyād yadi vā vyāghraḥ imam goṣṭham praviveśa anyokāḥ

original: (AVŚ_12,2.4c) taṃ māṣājyaṃ kṛtvā pra hiṇomi dūraṃ sa gachatv apsuṣado 'py agnīn //4//
analyzed: tam māṣa ājyam kṛtvā pra hiṇomi dūram sa gacchatu apsuṣadaḥ pi agnīn

original: (AVŚ_12,2.5a) yat tvā kruddhāḥ pracakrur manyunā puruṣe mṛte /
analyzed: yat tvā kruddhāḥ pracakruḥ manyunā puruṣe mṛte

original: (AVŚ_12,2.5c) sukalpam agne tat tvayā punas tvod dīpayāmasi //5//
analyzed: su kalpam agne tat tvayā punar tvā ud dīpayāmasi

original: (AVŚ_12,2.6a) punas tvādityā rudrā vasavaḥ punar brahmā vasunītir agne /
analyzed: punar tvā ādityāḥ rudrāḥ vasavaḥ punar brahmā vasu nītiḥ agne

original: (AVŚ_12,2.6c) punas tvā brahmaṇas patir ādhād dīrghāyutvāya śataśāradāya //6//
analyzed: punar tvā brahmaṇaḥ patiḥ ādhāt dīrgha āyu tvāya śata śāradāya

original: (AVŚ_12,2.7a) yo agniḥ kravyāt praviveśa no gṛham imaṃ paśyann itaraṃ jātavedasam /
analyzed: yaḥ agniḥ kravyād praviveśa naḥ gṛham imam paśyan itaram jātavedasam

original: (AVŚ_12,2.7c) taṃ harāmi pitṛyajñāya dūraṃ sa gharmam indhāṃ parame sadhasthe //7//
analyzed: tam harāmi pitṛ yajñāya dūram sa gharmam indhām parame sadhasthe

original: (AVŚ_12,2.8a) kravyādam agniṃ pra hiṇomi dūram yamarājño gachatu ripravāhaḥ /
analyzed: kravya adam agnim pra hiṇomi dūram yama rājñaḥ gacchatu ripra vāhaḥ

original: (AVŚ_12,2.8c) ihāyam itaro jātavedā devo devebhyo havyaṃ vahatu prajānan //8//
analyzed: iha ayam itaraḥ jātavedāḥ devaḥ devebhyaḥ havyam vahatu prajānan

original: (AVŚ_12,2.9a) kravyādam agnim iṣito harāmi janān dṛṃhantaṃ vajreṇa mṛtyum /
analyzed: kravyādam agnim iṣitaḥ harāmi janān dṛṃhantam vajreṇa mṛtyum

original: (AVŚ_12,2.9c) ni taṃ śāsmi gārhapatyena vidvān pitṝṇāṃ loke 'pi bhāgo astu //9//
analyzed: ni tam śāsmi gārhapatyena vidvān pitṝṇām loke pi bhāgaḥ astu

original: (AVŚ_12,2.10a) kravyādam agniṃ śaśamānam ukthyaṃ pra hiṇomi pathibhiḥ pitṛyāṇaiḥ /
analyzed: kravyādam agnim śaśamānam ukthyam pra hiṇomi pathibhiḥ pitṛyāṇaiḥ

original: (AVŚ_12,2.10c) mā devayānaiḥ punar ā gā atraivaidhi pitṛṣu jāgṛhi tvam //10// {7}
analyzed: mā deva yānaiḥ punar ā gāḥ atra eva edhi pitṛṣu jāgṛhi tvam

original: (AVŚ_12,2.11a) sam indhate saṃkasukaṃ svastaye śuddhā bhavantaḥ śucayaḥ pāvakāḥ /
analyzed: sam indhate saṃkasukam svastaye śuddhāḥ bhavantaḥ śucayaḥ pāvakāḥ

original: (AVŚ_12,2.11c) jahāti ripram aty ena eti samiddho agniḥ supunā punāti //11//
analyzed: jahāti ripram ati enaḥ eti samiddhaḥ agniḥ supunā punāti

original: (AVŚ_12,2.12a) devo agniḥ saṃkasuko divas pṛṣṭhāny āruhat /
analyzed: devaḥ agniḥ saṃkasukaḥ divaḥ pṛṣṭhāni āruhat

original: (AVŚ_12,2.12c) mucyamāno nir eṇaso 'mog asmāṃ aśastyāḥ //12//
analyzed: mucyamānaḥ niḥ eṇasaḥ mok asmān aśastyāḥ

original: (AVŚ_12,2.13a) asmin vayaṃ saṃkasuke agnau riprāṇi mṛjmahe /
analyzed: asmin vayam saṃkasuke agnau riprāṇi mṛjmahe

original: (AVŚ_12,2.13c) abhūma yajñiyāḥ śuddhāḥ pra ṇa āyūṃṣi tāriṣat //13//
analyzed: abhūma yajñiyāḥ śuddhāḥ pra naḥ āyūṃṣi tāriṣat

original: (AVŚ_12,2.14a) saṃkasuko vikasuko nirṛtho yaś ca nisvaraḥ /
analyzed: saṃkasukaḥ vikasukaḥ nirṛthaḥ yaḥ ca nisvaraḥ

original: (AVŚ_12,2.14c) te te yakṣmaṃ savedaso dūrād dūram anīnaśan //14//
analyzed: te te yakṣmam sa vedasaḥ dūrāt dūram anīnaśan

original: (AVŚ_12,2.15a) yo no aśveṣu vīreṣu yo no goṣv ajāviṣu /
analyzed: yaḥ naḥ aśveṣu vīreṣu yaḥ naḥ goṣu aja aviṣu

original: (AVŚ_12,2.15c) kravyādaṃ nir ṇudāmasi yo agnir janayopanaḥ //15//
analyzed: kravyādam niḥ nudāmasi yaḥ agniḥ jana yopanaḥ

original: (AVŚ_12,2.16a) anyebhyas tvā puruṣebhyo gobhyo aśvebhyas tvā /
analyzed: anyebhyaḥ tvā puruṣebhyaḥ gobhyaḥ aśvebhyaḥ tvā

original: (AVŚ_12,2.16c) niḥ kravyādaṃ nudāmasi yo agnir jīvitayopanaḥ //16//
analyzed: niḥ kravyādam nudāmasi yaḥ agniḥ jīvita yopanaḥ

original: (AVŚ_12,2.17a) yasmin devā amṛjata yasmin manuṣyā uta /
analyzed: yasmin devāḥ amṛjata yasmin manuṣyāḥ uta

original: (AVŚ_12,2.17c) tasmin ghṛtastāvo mṛṣṭvā tvam agne divaṃ ruha //17//
analyzed: tasmin ghṛta stāvaḥ mṛṣṭvā tvam agne divam ruha

original: (AVŚ_12,2.18a) samiddho agna āhuta sa no mābhyapakramīḥ /
analyzed: samiddhaḥ agne āhuta sa naḥ mā abhyapakramīḥ

original: (AVŚ_12,2.18c) atraiva dīdihi dyavi jyok ca sūryaṃ dṛśe //18//
analyzed: atra eva dīdihi dyavi jyok ca sūryam dṛśe

original: (AVŚ_12,2.19a) sīse mṛḍḍhvaṃ naḍe mṛḍḍhvam agnau saṃkasuke ca yat /
analyzed: sīse mṛḍḍhvam naḍe mṛḍḍhvam agnau saṃkasuke ca yat

original: (AVŚ_12,2.19c) atho avyāṃ rāmāyāṃ śīrṣaktim upabarhaṇe //19//
analyzed: atha u avyām rāmāyām śīrṣaktim upabarhaṇe

original: (AVŚ_12,2.20a) sīse malaṃ sādayitvā śīrṣaktim upabarhaṇe /
analyzed: sīse malam sādayitvā śīrṣaktim upabarhaṇe

original: (AVŚ_12,2.20c) avyām asiknyāṃ mṛṣṭvā śuddhā bhavata yajñiyāḥ //20// {8}
analyzed: avyām asiknyām mṛṣṭvā śuddhāḥ bhavata yajñiyāḥ

original: (AVŚ_12,2.21a) paraṃ mṛtyo anu parehi panthāṃ yas ta eṣa itaro devayānāt /
analyzed: param mṛtyo anu parehi panthām yaḥ te eṣaḥ itaraḥ deva yānāt

original: (AVŚ_12,2.21c) cakṣuṣmate śṛṇvate te bravīmīheme vīrā bahavo bhavantu //21//
analyzed: cakṣuṣmate śṛṇvate te bravīmi iha ime vīrāḥ bahavaḥ bhavantu

original: (AVŚ_12,2.22a) ime jīvā vi mṛtair āvavṛtrann abhūd bhadrā devahutir no adya /
analyzed: ime jīvāḥ vi mṛtaiḥ āvavṛtran abhūt bhadrā deva hutiḥ naḥ adya

original: (AVŚ_12,2.22c) prāñco agāma nṛtaye hasāya suvīrāso vidatham ā vadema //22//
analyzed: prāñcaḥ agāma nṛtaye hasāya su vīrāsaḥ vidatham ā vadema

original: (AVŚ_12,2.23a) imaṃ jīvebhyaḥ paridhiṃ dadhāmi maiṣāṃ nu gād aparo artham etam /
analyzed: imam jīvebhyaḥ paridhim dadhāmi mā eṣām nu gāt aparaḥ artham etam

original: (AVŚ_12,2.23c) śataṃ jīvantaḥ śaradaḥ purūcīs tiro mṛtyuṃ dadhatām parvatena //23//
analyzed: śatam jīvantaḥ śaradaḥ purūcīḥ tiras mṛtyum dadhatām parvatena

original: (AVŚ_12,2.24a) ā rohatāyur jarasaṃ vṛṇānā anupūrvaṃ yatamānā yati stha /
analyzed: ā rohata āyuḥ jarasam vṛṇānāḥ anupūrvam yatamānāḥ yati stha

original: (AVŚ_12,2.24c) tān vas tvaṣṭā sujanimā sajoṣāḥ sarvam āyur nayatu jīvanāya //24//
analyzed: tān vaḥ tvaṣṭā su janimā sajoṣāḥ sarvam āyuḥ nayatu jīvanāya

original: (AVŚ_12,2.25a) yathāhāny anupūrvaṃ bhavanti yatha rtava ṛtubhir yanti sākam /
analyzed: yathā ahāni anupūrvam bhavanti yathā ṛtavaḥ ṛtubhiḥ yanti sākam

original: (AVŚ_12,2.25c) yathā na pūrvam aparo jahāty evā dhātar āyūṃṣi kalpayaiṣām //25//
analyzed: yathā na pūrvam aparaḥ jahāti eva dhātar āyūṃṣi kalpaya eṣām

original: (AVŚ_12,2.26a) aśmanvatī rīyate saṃ rabhadhvaṃ vīrayadhvaṃ pra taratā sakhāyaḥ /
analyzed: aśmanvatī rīyate sam rabhadhvam vīrayadhvam pra tarata sakhāyaḥ

original: (AVŚ_12,2.26c) atrā jahīta ye asan durevā anamīvān ut taremābhi vājān //26//
analyzed: atra jahīta ye asan durevāḥ anamīvān ud tarema abhi vājān

original: (AVŚ_12,2.27a) ut tiṣṭhatā pra taratā sakhāyo 'śmanvatī nadī syandata iyam /
analyzed: ud tiṣṭhata pra tarata sakhāyaḥ śmanvatī nadī syandate iyam

original: (AVŚ_12,2.27c) atrā jahīta ye asann aśivāḥ śivānt syonān ut taremābhi vājān //27//
analyzed: atra jahīta ye asan aśivāḥ śivān syonān ud tarema abhi vājān

original: (AVŚ_12,2.28a) vaiśvadevīṃ varcasā ā rabhadhvaṃ śuddhā bhavantaḥ śucayaḥ pāvakāḥ /
analyzed: vaiśvadevīm varcasā ā rabhadhvam śuddhāḥ bhavantaḥ śucayaḥ pāvakāḥ

original: (AVŚ_12,2.28c) atikrāmanto duritā padāni śataṃ himāḥ sarvavīrā madema //28//
analyzed: atikrāmantaḥ duritā padāni śatam himāḥ sarva vīrāḥ madema

original: (AVŚ_12,2.29a) udīcīnaiḥ pathibhir vāyumadbhir atikrāmanto 'varān parebhiḥ /
analyzed: udīcīnaiḥ pathibhiḥ vāyumadbhiḥ atikrāmantaḥ varān parebhiḥ

original: (AVŚ_12,2.29c) triḥ sapta kṛtva ṛṣayaḥ paretā mṛtyuṃ praty auhan padayopanena //29//
analyzed: tris sapta kṛtvas ṛṣayaḥ paretāḥ mṛtyum prati auhan pada yopanena

original: (AVŚ_12,2.30a) mṛtyoḥ padaṃ yopayanta eta drāghīya āyuḥ prataraṃ dadhānāḥ /
analyzed: mṛtyoḥ padam yopayantaḥ eta drāghīyaḥ āyuḥ prataram dadhānāḥ

original: (AVŚ_12,2.30c) āsīnā mṛtyuṃ nudatā sadhasthe 'tha jīvāso vidatham ā vadema //30// {9}
analyzed: āsīnāḥ mṛtyum nudata sadhasthe tha jīvāsaḥ vidatham ā vadema  /

original: (AVŚ_12,2.31a) imā nārīr avidhavāḥ supatnīr āñjanena sarpiṣā saṃ spṛśantām /
analyzed: imāḥ nārīḥ avidhavāḥ su patnīḥ āñjanena sarpiṣā sam spṛśantām

original: (AVŚ_12,2.31c) anaśravo anamīvāḥ suratnā ā rohantu janayo yonim agre //31//
analyzed: anaśravaḥ anamīvāḥ su ratnāḥ ā rohantu janayaḥ yonim agre

original: (AVŚ_12,2.32a) vyākaromi haviṣāham etau tau brahmaṇā vy ahaṃ kalpayāmi /
analyzed: vyākaromi haviṣā aham etau tau brahmaṇā vi aham kalpayāmi

original: (AVŚ_12,2.32c) svadhāṃ pitṛbhyo ajarāṃ kṛṇomi dīrgheṇāyuṣā sam imānt sṛjāmi //32//
analyzed: svadhām pitṛbhyaḥ ajarām kṛṇomi dīrgheṇa āyuṣā sam imān sṛjāmi

original: (AVŚ_12,2.33a) yo no agniḥ pitaro hṛtsv antar āviveśāmṛto martyeṣu /
analyzed: yaḥ naḥ agniḥ pitaraḥ hṛtsu antar āviveśa amṛtaḥ martyeṣu

original: (AVŚ_12,2.33c) mayy ahaṃ taṃ pari gṛhṇāmi devaṃ mā so asmān dvikṣata mā vayaṃ tam //33//
analyzed: mayi aham tam pari gṛhṇāmi devam mā saḥ asmān dvikṣata mā vayam tam

original: (AVŚ_12,2.34a) apāvṛtya gārhapatyāt kravyādā preta dakṣiṇā /
analyzed: apāvṛtya gārhapatyāt kravyādā preta dakṣiṇā

original: (AVŚ_12,2.34c) priyaṃ pitṛbhya ātmane brahmabhyaḥ kṛṇutā priyam //34//
analyzed: priyam pitṛbhyaḥ ātmane brahmabhyaḥ kṛṇuta priyam

original: (AVŚ_12,2.35a) dvibhāgadhanam ādāya pra kṣiṇāty avartyā /
analyzed: dvi bhāga dhanam ādāya pra kṣiṇāti avartyā

original: (AVŚ_12,2.35c) agniḥ putrasya jyeṣṭhasya yaḥ kravyād anirāhitaḥ //35//
analyzed: agniḥ putrasya jyeṣṭhasya yaḥ kravyād a nirāhitaḥ

original: (AVŚ_12,2.36a) yat kṛṣate yad vanute yac ca vasnena vindate /
analyzed: yat kṛṣate yat vanute yat ca vasnena vindate

original: (AVŚ_12,2.36c) sarvaṃ martyasya tan nāsti kravyāc ced anirāhitaḥ //36//
analyzed: sarvam martyasya tat na asti kravyād ced a nirāhitaḥ

original: (AVŚ_12,2.37a) ayajñiyo hatavarcā bhavati nainena havir attave /
analyzed: a yajñiyaḥ hata varcāḥ bhavati na enena haviḥ attave

original: (AVŚ_12,2.37c) chinatti kṛṣyā gor dhanād yaṃ kravyād anuvartate //37//
analyzed: chinatti kṛṣyāḥ goḥ dhanāt yam kravyād anuvartate

original: (AVŚ_12,2.38a) muhur gṛdhyaiḥ pra vadaty ārtim martyo nītya /
analyzed: muhur gṛdhyaiḥ pra vadati ārtim martyaḥ nītya

original: (AVŚ_12,2.38c) kravyād yān agnir antikād anuvidvān vitāvati //38//
analyzed: kravyād yān agniḥ antikāt anuvidvān vitāvati

original: (AVŚ_12,2.39a) grāhyā gṛhāḥ saṃ sṛjyante striyā yan mriyate patiḥ /
analyzed: grāhyā gṛhāḥ sam sṛjyante striyāḥ yat mriyate patiḥ

original: (AVŚ_12,2.39c) brahmaiva vidvān eṣyo yaḥ kravyādaṃ nirādadhat //39//
analyzed: brahmā eva vidvān eṣyaḥ yaḥ kravyādam nirādadhat

original: (AVŚ_12,2.40a) yad ripraṃ śamalaṃ cakṛma yac ca duṣkṛtam /
analyzed: yat ripram śamalam cakṛma yat ca duṣkṛtam

original: (AVŚ_12,2.40c) āpo mā tasmāc chumbhantv agneḥ saṃkasukāc ca yat //40// {10}
analyzed: āpaḥ mā tasmāt śumbhantu agneḥ saṃkasukāt ca yat

original: (AVŚ_12,2.41a) tā adharād udīcīr āvavṛtran prajānaitīḥ pathibhir devayānaiḥ /
analyzed: tāḥ adharāt udīcīḥ āvavṛtran prajānā etīḥ pathibhiḥ deva yānaiḥ

original: (AVŚ_12,2.41c) parvatasya vṛṣabhasyādhi pṛṣṭhe navāś caranti saritaḥ purāṇīḥ //41//
analyzed: parvatasya vṛṣabhasya adhi pṛṣṭhe navāḥ caranti saritaḥ purāṇīḥ

original: (AVŚ_12,2.42a) agne akravyān niḥ kravyādaṃ nudā devayajanaṃ vaha //42//
analyzed: agne a kravyād niḥ kravyādam nuda devayajanam vaha

original: (AVŚ_12,2.43a) imaṃ kravyād ā viveśāyaṃ kravyādam anv agāt /
analyzed: imam kravyād ā viveśa ayam kravyādam anu agāt

original: (AVŚ_12,2.43c) vyāghrau kṛtvā nānānaṃ taṃ harāmi śivāparam //43//
analyzed: vyāghrau kṛtvā nānānam tam harāmi śiva aparam

original: (AVŚ_12,2.44a) antardhir devānāṃ paridhir manuṣyāṇām agnir gārhapatya ubhayān antarā śritaḥ //44//
analyzed: antardhiḥ devānām paridhiḥ manuṣyāṇām agniḥ gārhapatyaḥ ubhayān antarā śritaḥ

original: (AVŚ_12,2.45a) jīvānām āyuḥ pra tira tvam agne pitṝṇāṃ lokam api gachantu ye mṛtāḥ /
analyzed: jīvānām āyuḥ pra tira tvam agne pitṝṇām lokam api gacchantu ye mṛtāḥ

original: (AVŚ_12,2.45c) sugārhapatyo vitapann arātim uṣāmuṣāṃ śreyasīṃ dhehy asmai //45//
analyzed: su gārhapatyaḥ vitapan arātim uṣām uṣām śreyasīm dhehi asmai

original: (AVŚ_12,2.46a) sarvān agne sahamānaḥ sapatnān aiṣām ūrjaṃ rayim asmāsu dhehi //46//
analyzed: sarvān agne sahamānaḥ sapatnān ā eṣām ūrjam rayim asmāsu dhehi

original: (AVŚ_12,2.47a) imam indraṃ vahniṃ paprim anvārabhadhvaṃ sa vo nir vakṣad duritād avadyāt /
analyzed: imam indram vahnim paprim anvārabhadhvam sa vaḥ niḥ vakṣat duritāt avadyāt

original: (AVŚ_12,2.47c) tenāpa hata śarum āpatantaṃ tena rudrasya pari pātāstām //47//
analyzed: tena apa hata śarum āpatantam tena rudrasya pari pāta astām

original: (AVŚ_12,2.48a) anaḍvāhaṃ plavam anvārabhadhvaṃ sa vo nir vakṣad duritād avadyāt /
analyzed: anaḍvāham plavam anvārabhadhvam sa vaḥ niḥ vakṣat duritāt avadyāt

original: (AVŚ_12,2.48c) ā rohata savitur nāvam etāṃ ṣaḍbhir urvībhir amatiṃ tarema //48//
analyzed: ā rohata savituḥ nāvam etām ṣaḍbhiḥ urvībhiḥ amatim tarema

original: (AVŚ_12,2.49a) ahorātre anv eṣi bibhrat kṣemyas tiṣṭhan prataraṇaḥ suvīraḥ /
analyzed: ahorātre anu eṣi bibhrat kṣemyaḥ tiṣṭhan prataraṇaḥ su vīraḥ

original: (AVŚ_12,2.49c) anāturānt sumanasas talpa bibhraj jyog eva naḥ puruṣagandhir edhi //49//
analyzed: anāturān sumanasaḥ talpa bibhrat jyok eva naḥ puruṣa gandhiḥ edhi

original: (AVŚ_12,2.50a) te devebhya ā vṛścante pāpaṃ jīvanti sarvadā /
analyzed: te devebhyaḥ ā vṛścante pāpam jīvanti sarvadā

original: (AVŚ_12,2.50c) kravyād yān agnir antikād aśva ivānuvapate naḍam //50// {11}
analyzed: kravyād yān agniḥ antikāt aśvaḥ iva anuvapate naḍam

original: (AVŚ_12,2.51a) ye 'śraddhā dhanakāmyā kravyādā samāsate /
analyzed: ye śraddhā dhana kāmyā kravyādā samāsate

original: (AVŚ_12,2.51c) te vā anyeṣāṃ kumbhīṃ paryādadhati sarvadā //51//
analyzed: te vai anyeṣām kumbhīm paryādadhati sarvadā

original: (AVŚ_12,2.52a) preva pipatiṣati manasā muhur ā vartate punaḥ /
analyzed: pra iva pipatiṣati manasā muhur ā vartate punar

original: (AVŚ_12,2.52c) kravyād yān agnir antikād anuvidvān vitāvati //52//
analyzed: kravyād yān agniḥ antikāt anuvidvān vitāvati

original: (AVŚ_12,2.53a) aviḥ kṛṣṇā bhāgadheyaṃ paśūnāṃ sīsaṃ kravyād api candraṃ ta āhuḥ /
analyzed: aviḥ kṛṣṇā bhāgadheyam paśūnām sīsam kravyād api candram te āhuḥ

original: (AVŚ_12,2.53c) māṣāḥ piṣṭā bhāgadheyaṃ te havyam araṇyānyā gahvaraṃ sacasva //53//
analyzed: māṣāḥ piṣṭāḥ bhāgadheyam te havyam araṇyānyāḥ gahvaram sacasva

original: (AVŚ_12,2.54a) iṣīkāṃ jaratīm iṣṭvā tilpiñjaṃ daṇḍanaṃ naḍam /
analyzed: iṣīkām jaratīm iṣṭvā tilpiñjam daṇḍanam naḍam

original: (AVŚ_12,2.54c) tam indra idhmam kṛtvā yamasyāgniṃ nirādadhau //54//
analyzed: tam indraḥ idhmam kṛtvā yamasya agnim nirādadhau

original: (AVŚ_12,2.55a) pratyañcam arkaṃ pratyarpayitvā pravidvān panthāṃ vi hy āviveśa /
analyzed: pratyañcam arkam pratyarpayitvā pravidvān panthām vi hi āviveśa

original: (AVŚ_12,2.55c) parāmīṣām asūn dideśa dīrgheṇāyuṣā sam imānt sṛjāmi //55// {12}
analyzed: parā amīṣām asūn dideśa dīrgheṇa āyuṣā sam imān sṛjāmi  /

original: (AVŚ_12,3.1a) pumān puṃso 'dhi tiṣṭha carmehi tatra hvayasva yatamā priyā te /
analyzed: pumān puṃsaḥ dhi tiṣṭha carma ihi tatra hvayasva yatamā priyā te

original: (AVŚ_12,3.1c) yāvantāv agre prathamaṃ sameyathus tad vāṃ vayo yamarājye samānam //1//
analyzed: yāvantau agre prathamam sameyathuḥ tat vām vayaḥ yama rājye samānam

original: (AVŚ_12,3.2a) tāvad vāṃ cakṣus tati vīryāṇi tāvat tejas tatidhā vājināni /
analyzed: tāvat vām cakṣuḥ tati vīryāṇi tāvat tejaḥ tatidhā vājināni

original: (AVŚ_12,3.2c) agniḥ śarīraṃ sacate yadaidho 'dhā pakvān mithunā saṃ bhavāthaḥ //2//
analyzed: agniḥ śarīram sacate yadā edhaḥ dhāḥ pakvāt mithunā sam bhavāthaḥ

original: (AVŚ_12,3.3a) sam asmiṃl loke sam u devayāne saṃ smā sametaṃ yamarājyeṣu /
analyzed: sam asmin loke sam u deva yāne sam sma sametam yama rājyeṣu

original: (AVŚ_12,3.3c) pūtau pavitrair upa tad dhvayethāṃ yadyad reto adhi vāṃ saṃbabhūva //3//
analyzed: pūtau pavitraiḥ upa tat dhvayethām yat yat retaḥ adhi vām saṃbabhūva

original: (AVŚ_12,3.4a) āpas putrāso abhi saṃ viśadhvam imaṃ jīvaṃ jīvadhanyāḥ sametya /
analyzed: āpaḥ putrāsaḥ abhi sam viśadhvam imam jīvam jīva dhanyāḥ sametya

original: (AVŚ_12,3.4c) tāsāṃ bhajadhvam amṛtaṃ yam āhur odanaṃ pacati vāṃ janitrī //4//
analyzed: tāsām bhajadhvam amṛtam yam āhuḥ odanam pacati vām janitrī

original: (AVŚ_12,3.5a) yaṃ vāṃ pitā pacati yaṃ ca mātā riprān nirmuktyai śamalāc ca vācaḥ /
analyzed: yam vām pitā pacati yam ca mātā riprāt nirmuktyai śamalāt ca vācaḥ

original: (AVŚ_12,3.5c) sa odanaḥ śatadhāraḥ svarga ubhe vy āpa nabhasī mahitvā //5//
analyzed: saḥ odanaḥ śata dhāraḥ svar gaḥ ubhe vi āpa nabhasī mahitvā

original: (AVŚ_12,3.6a) ubhe nabhasī ubhayāṃś ca lokān ye yajvanām abhijitāḥ svargāḥ /
analyzed: ubhe nabhasī ubhayān ca lokān ye yajvanām abhijitāḥ svargāḥ

original: (AVŚ_12,3.6c) teṣāṃ jyotiṣmān madhumān yo agre tasmin putrair jarasi saṃ śrayethām //6//
analyzed: teṣām jyotiṣmān madhumān yaḥ agre tasmin putraiḥ jarasi sam śrayethām

original: (AVŚ_12,3.7a) prācīṃprācīṃ pradiśam ā rabhethām etaṃ lokaṃ śraddadhānāḥ sacante /
analyzed: prācīm prācīm pradiśam ā rabhethām etam lokam śraddadhānāḥ sacante

original: (AVŚ_12,3.7c) yad vāṃ pakvaṃ pariviṣṭam agnau tasya guptaye daṃpatī saṃ śrayethām //7//
analyzed: yat vām pakvam pariviṣṭam agnau tasya guptaye daṃpatī sam śrayethām

original: (AVŚ_12,3.8a) dakṣiṇāṃ diśam abhi nakṣamāṇau paryāvartethām abhi pātram etat /
analyzed: dakṣiṇām diśam abhi nakṣamāṇau paryāvartethām abhi pātram etat

original: (AVŚ_12,3.8c) tasmin vāṃ yamaḥ pitṛbhiḥ saṃvidānaḥ pakvāya śarma bahulaṃ ni yachāt //8//
analyzed: tasmin vām yamaḥ pitṛbhiḥ saṃvidānaḥ pakvāya śarma bahulam ni yacchāt

original: (AVŚ_12,3.9a) pratīcī diśām iyam id varaṃ yasyāṃ somo adhipā mṛḍitā ca /
analyzed: pratīcī diśām iyam id varam yasyām somaḥ adhipāḥ mṛḍitā ca

original: (AVŚ_12,3.9c) tasyāṃ śrayethāṃ sukṛtaḥ sacethām adhā pakvān mithunā saṃ bhavāthaḥ //9//
analyzed: tasyām śrayethām su kṛtaḥ sacethām adhā pakvāt mithunā sam bhavāthaḥ

original: (AVŚ_12,3.10a) uttaraṃ rāṣṭraṃ prajayottarāvad diśām udīcī kṛṇavan no agram /
analyzed: uttaram rāṣṭram prajayā uttarāvat diśām udīcī kṛṇavat naḥ agram

original: (AVŚ_12,3.10c) pāṅktaṃ chandaḥ puruṣo babhūva viśvair viśvāṅgaiḥ saha saṃ bhavema //10// {13}
analyzed: pāṅktam chandaḥ puruṣaḥ babhūva viśvaiḥ viśva aṅgaiḥ saha sam bhavema  /

original: (AVŚ_12,3.11a) dhruveyaṃ virāṇ namo astv asyai śivā putrebhya uta mahyam astu /
analyzed: dhruvā iyam virāj namaḥ astu asyai śivā putrebhyaḥ uta mahyam astu

original: (AVŚ_12,3.11c) sā no devy adite viśvavāra irya iva gopā abhi rakṣa pakvam //11//
analyzed: sā naḥ devi adite viśva vāre iryaḥ iva gopāḥ abhi rakṣa pakvam

original: (AVŚ_12,3.12a) piteva putrān abhi saṃ svajasva naḥ śivā no vātā iha vāntu bhūmau /
analyzed: pitā iva putrān abhi sam svajasva naḥ śivāḥ naḥ vātāḥ iha vāntu bhūmau

original: (AVŚ_12,3.12c) yam odanaṃ pacato devate iha taṃ nas tapa uta satyaṃ ca vettu //12//
analyzed: yam odanam pacataḥ devate iha tam naḥ tapaḥ uta satyam ca vettu

original: (AVŚ_12,3.13a) yadyad kṛṣṇaḥ śakuna eha gatvā tsaran viṣaktaṃ bila āsasāda /
analyzed: yat yat kṛṣṇaḥ śakunaḥ ā iha gatvā tsaran viṣaktam bile āsasāda

original: (AVŚ_12,3.13c) yad vā dāsy ārdrahastā samaṅkta ulūkhalaṃ musalaṃ śumbhatāpaḥ //13//
analyzed: yat vā dāsī ārdra hastā samaṅkte ulūkhalam musalam śumbhata apaḥ

original: (AVŚ_12,3.14a) ayaṃ grāvā pṛthubudhno vayodhāḥ pūtaḥ pavitrair apa hantu rakṣaḥ /
analyzed: ayam grāvā pṛthu budhnaḥ vayodhāḥ pūtaḥ pavitraiḥ apa hantu rakṣaḥ

original: (AVŚ_12,3.14c) ā roha carma mahi śarma yacha mā daṃpatī pautram aghaṃ ni gātām //14//
analyzed: ā roha carma mahi śarma yaccha mā daṃpatī pautram agham ni gātām

original: (AVŚ_12,3.15a) vanaspatiḥ saha devair na āgan rakṣaḥ piśācāṃ apabādhamānaḥ /
analyzed: vanaspatiḥ saha devaiḥ naḥ āgan rakṣaḥ piśācām apabādhamānaḥ

original: (AVŚ_12,3.15c) sa uc chrayātai pra vadāti vācaṃ tena lokāṃ abhi sarvān jayema //15//
analyzed: saḥ ud śrayātai pra vadāti vācam tena lokān abhi sarvān jayema

original: (AVŚ_12,3.16a) sapta medhān paśavaḥ pary agṛhṇan ya eṣāṃ jyotiṣmāṃ uta yaś cakarśa /
analyzed: sapta medhān paśavaḥ pari agṛhṇan ye eṣām jyotiṣmān uta yaḥ cakarśa

original: (AVŚ_12,3.16c) trayastriṃśad devatās tānt sacante sa naḥ svargam abhi neṣa lokam //16//
analyzed: trayastriṃśat devatāḥ tān sacante sa naḥ svargam abhi lokam

original: (AVŚ_12,3.17a) svargaṃ lokam abhi no nayāsi saṃ jāyayā saha putraiḥ syāma /
analyzed: svargam lokam abhi naḥ nayāsi sam jāyayā saha putraiḥ syāma

original: (AVŚ_12,3.17c) gṛhṇāmi hastam anu maitv atra mā nas tārīn nirṛtir mo arātiḥ //17//
analyzed: gṛhṇāmi hastam anu mā etu atra mā naḥ tārīt nirṛtiḥ mā u arātiḥ

original: (AVŚ_12,3.18a) grāhiṃ pāpmānam ati tāṃ ayāma tamo vy asya pra vadāsi valgu /
analyzed: grāhim pāpmānam ati tām ayāma tamaḥ vi asya pra vadāsi valgu

original: (AVŚ_12,3.18c) vānaspatya udyato mā jihiṃsīr mā taṇḍulaṃ vi śarīr devayantam //18//
analyzed: vānaspatyaḥ udyataḥ mā jihiṃsīḥ mā taṇḍulam vi śarīḥ devayantam

original: (AVŚ_12,3.19a) viśvavyacā ghṛtapṛṣṭho bhaviṣyant sayonir lokam upa yāhy etam /
analyzed: viśva vyacāḥ ghṛta pṛṣṭhaḥ bhaviṣyan sa yoniḥ lokam upa yāhi etam

original: (AVŚ_12,3.19c) varṣavṛddham upa yacha śūrpaṃ tuṣaṃ palāvān apa tad vinaktu //19//
analyzed: varṣa vṛddham upa yaccha śūrpam tuṣam palāvān apa tat vinaktu

original: (AVŚ_12,3.20a) trayo lokāḥ saṃmitā brāhmaṇena dyaur evāsau pṛthivy antarikṣam /
analyzed: trayaḥ lokāḥ saṃmitāḥ brāhmaṇena dyauḥ eva asau pṛthivī antarikṣam

original: (AVŚ_12,3.20c) aṃśūn gṛbhītvānvārabhethām ā pyāyantāṃ punar ā yantu śūrpam //20// {14}
analyzed: aṃśūn gṛbhītvā anvārabhethām ā pyāyantām punar ā yantu śūrpam

original: (AVŚ_12,3.21a) pṛthag rūpāṇi bahudhā paśūnām ekarūpo bhavasi saṃ samṛddhyā /
analyzed: pṛthak rūpāṇi bahudhā paśūnām eka rūpaḥ bhavasi sam samṛddhyā

original: (AVŚ_12,3.21c) etāṃ tvacaṃ lohinīṃ tāṃ nudasva grāvā śumbhāti malaga iva vastrā //21//
analyzed: etām tvacam lohinīm tām nudasva grāvā śumbhāti malagaḥ iva vastrā

original: (AVŚ_12,3.22a) pṛthivīṃ tvā pṛthivyām ā veśayāmi tanūḥ samānī vikṛtā ta eṣā /
analyzed: pṛthivīm tvā pṛthivyām ā veśayāmi tanūḥ samānī vikṛtā te eṣā

original: (AVŚ_12,3.22c) yadyad dyuttaṃ likhitam arpaṇena tena mā susror brahmaṇāpi tad vapāmi //22//
analyzed: yat yat dyuttam likhitam arpaṇena tena mā susroḥ brahmaṇā api tat vapāmi

original: (AVŚ_12,3.23a) janitrīva prati haryāsi sūnuṃ saṃ tvā dadhāmi pṛthivīṃ pṛthivyā /
analyzed: janitrī iva prati haryāsi sūnum sam tvā dadhāmi pṛthivīm pṛthivyā

original: (AVŚ_12,3.23c) ukhā kumbhī vedyāṃ mā vyathiṣṭhā yajñāyudhair ājyenātiṣaktā //23//
analyzed: ukhā kumbhī vedyām mā vyathiṣṭhāḥ yajñāyudhaiḥ ājyena atiṣaktā

original: (AVŚ_12,3.24a) agniḥ pacan rakṣatu tvā purastād indro rakṣatu dakṣiṇato marutvān /
analyzed: agniḥ pacan rakṣatu tvā purastāt indraḥ rakṣatu dakṣiṇatas marutvān

original: (AVŚ_12,3.24c) varuṇas tvā dṛṃhād dharuṇe pratīcyā uttarāt tvā somaḥ saṃ dadātai //24//
analyzed: varuṇaḥ tvā dṛṃhāt dharuṇe pratīcyāḥ uttarāt tvā somaḥ sam dadātai

original: (AVŚ_12,3.25a) pūtāḥ pavitraiḥ pavante abhrād divaṃ ca yanti pṛthivīṃ ca lokān /
analyzed: pūtāḥ pavitraiḥ pavante abhrāt divam ca yanti pṛthivīm ca lokān

original: (AVŚ_12,3.25c) tā jīvalā jīvadhanyāḥ pratiṣṭhāḥ pātra āsiktāḥ pary agnir indhām //25//
analyzed: tāḥ jīvalāḥ jīva dhanyāḥ pratiṣṭhāḥ pātre āsiktāḥ pari agniḥ indhām

original: (AVŚ_12,3.26a) ā yanti divaḥ pṛthivīṃ sacante bhūmyāḥ sacante adhy antarikṣam /
analyzed: ā yanti divaḥ pṛthivīm sacante bhūmyāḥ sacante adhi antarikṣam

original: (AVŚ_12,3.26c) śuddhāḥ satīs tā u śumbhanta eva tā naḥ svargam abhi lokaṃ nayantu //26//
analyzed: śuddhāḥ satīḥ tāḥ u śumbhante eva tāḥ naḥ svargam abhi lokam nayantu

original: (AVŚ_12,3.27a) uteva prabhvīr uta saṃmitāsa uta śukrāḥ śucayaś cāmṛtāsaḥ /
analyzed: uta iva prabhvīḥ uta saṃmitāsaḥ uta śukrāḥ śucayaḥ ca amṛtāsaḥ

original: (AVŚ_12,3.27c) tā odanaṃ daṃpatibhyāṃ praśiṣṭā āpaḥ śikṣantīḥ pacatā sunāthāḥ //27//
analyzed: tāḥ odanam daṃpatibhyām praśiṣṭāḥ āpaḥ śikṣantīḥ pacata su nāthāḥ

analyzed: saṃkhyātāḥ stokāḥ pṛthivīm sacante prāṇa apānaiḥ saṃmitāḥ oṣadhībhiḥ

analyzed: a saṃkhyātāḥ opyamānāḥ su varṇāḥ sarvam vyāpuḥ śucayaḥ śuci tvam

original: (AVŚ_12,3.29a) ud yodhanty abhi valganti taptāḥ phenam asyanti bahulāṃś ca bindūn /
analyzed: ud yodhanti abhi valganti taptāḥ phenam asyanti bahulān ca bindūn

original: (AVŚ_12,3.29c) yoṣeva dṛṣṭvā patim ṛtviyāyaitais taṇḍulair bhavatā sam āpaḥ //29//
analyzed: yoṣā iva dṛṣṭvā patim ṛtviyāya etaiḥ taṇḍulaiḥ bhavata sam āpaḥ

original: (AVŚ_12,3.30a) ut thāpaya sīdato budhna enān adbhir ātmānam abhi saṃ spṛśantām /
analyzed: ud thāpaya sīdataḥ budhne enān adbhiḥ ātmānam abhi sam spṛśantām

original: (AVŚ_12,3.30c) amāsi pātrair udakaṃ yad etan mitās taṇḍulāḥ pradiśo yadīmāḥ //30// {15}
analyzed: amāsi pātraiḥ udakam yat etat mitāḥ taṇḍulāḥ pradiśaḥ yadi imāḥ

analyzed: pra yaccha parśum tvarayā harausam a hiṃsantaḥ oṣadhīḥ dāntu parvan

original: (AVŚ_12,3.31c) vāsāṃ somaḥ pari rājyaṃ babhūvāmanyutā no vīrudho bhavantu //31//
analyzed: vāsām somaḥ pari rājyam babhūva amanyutāḥ naḥ vīrudhaḥ bhavantu

original: (AVŚ_12,3.32a) navaṃ barhir odanāya stṛṇīta priyaṃ hṛdaś cakṣuṣo valgv astu /
analyzed: navam barhiḥ odanāya stṛṇīta priyam hṛdaḥ cakṣuṣaḥ valgu astu

original: (AVŚ_12,3.32c) tasmin devāḥ saha daivīr viśantv imaṃ prāśnantv ṛtubhir niṣadya //32//
analyzed: tasmin devāḥ saha daivīḥ viśantu imam pra aśnantu ṛtubhiḥ niṣadya

original: (AVŚ_12,3.33a) vanaspate stīrṇam ā sīda barhir agniṣṭobhaiḥ saṃmito devatābhiḥ /
analyzed: vanaspate stīrṇam ā sīda barhiḥ agniṣṭobhaiḥ saṃmitaḥ devatābhiḥ

original: (AVŚ_12,3.33c) tvaṣṭreva rūpaṃ sukṛtaṃ svadhityainā ehāḥ pari pātre dadṛśrām //33//
analyzed: tvaṣṭrā iva rūpam su kṛtam svadhityā enā ā īhāḥ pari pātre dadṛśrām

original: (AVŚ_12,3.34a) ṣaṣṭyāṃ śaratsu nidhipā abhīchāt svaḥ pakvenābhy aśnavātai /
analyzed: ṣaṣṭyām śaratsu nidhi pāḥ abhīchāt svar pakvena abhi aśnavātai

original: (AVŚ_12,3.34c) upainaṃ jīvān pitaraś ca putrā etaṃ svargaṃ gamayāntam agneḥ //34//
analyzed: upa enam jīvān pitaraḥ ca putrāḥ etam svargam gamaya antam agneḥ

original: (AVŚ_12,3.35a) dhartā dhriyasva dharuṇe pṛthivyā acyutaṃ tvā devatāś cyāvayantu /
analyzed: dhartā dhriyasva dharuṇe pṛthivyāḥ acyutam tvā devatāḥ cyāvayantu

original: (AVŚ_12,3.35c) taṃ tvā daṃpatī jīvantau jīvaputrāv ud vāsayātaḥ pary agnidhānāt //35//
analyzed: tam tvā daṃpatī jīvantau jīva putrau ud vāsayātaḥ pari agnidhānāt

original: (AVŚ_12,3.36a) sarvānt samāgā abhijitya lokān yāvantaḥ kāmāḥ sam atītṛpas tān /
analyzed: sarvān samāgāḥ abhijitya lokān yāvantaḥ kāmāḥ sam atītṛpaḥ tān

original: (AVŚ_12,3.36c) vi gāhethām āyavanaṃ ca darvir ekasmin pātre adhy ud dharainam //36//
analyzed: vi gāhethām āyavanam ca darviḥ ekasmin pātre adhi ud hara enam

original: (AVŚ_12,3.37a) upa stṛṇīhi prathaya purastād ghṛtena pātram abhi ghārayaitat /
analyzed: upa stṛṇīhi prathaya purastāt ghṛtena pātram abhi ghāraya etat

original: (AVŚ_12,3.37c) vāśrevosrā taruṇaṃ stanasyum imaṃ devāso abhihiṅkṛṇota //37//
analyzed: vāśrā iva usrā taruṇam stanasyum imam devāsaḥ abhihiṅkṛṇota

original: (AVŚ_12,3.38a) upāstarīr akaro lokam etam uruḥ prathatām asamaḥ svargaḥ /
analyzed: upāstarīḥ akaraḥ lokam etam uruḥ prathatām asamaḥ svargaḥ

original: (AVŚ_12,3.38c) tasmiṃ chrayātai mahiṣaḥ suparṇo devā enaṃ devatābhyaḥ pra yachān //38//
analyzed: tasmin śrayātai mahiṣaḥ suparṇaḥ devāḥ enam devatābhyaḥ pra yacchān

original: (AVŚ_12,3.39a) yadyaj jāyā pacati tvat paraḥparaḥ patir vā jāye tvat tiraḥ /
analyzed: yat yat jāyā pacati tvat paras paras patiḥ vā jāye tvat tiras

original: (AVŚ_12,3.39c) saṃ tat sṛjethāṃ saha vāṃ tad astu saṃpādayantau saha lokam ekam //39//
analyzed: sam tat sṛjethām saha vām tat astu saṃpādayantau saha lokam ekam

original: (AVŚ_12,3.40a) yāvanto asyāḥ pṛthivīṃ sacante asmat putrāḥ pari ye saṃbabhūvuḥ /
analyzed: yāvantaḥ asyāḥ pṛthivīm sacante asmat putrāḥ pari ye saṃbabhūvuḥ

original: (AVŚ_12,3.40c) sarvāṃs tāṃ upa pātre hvayethāṃ nābhiṃ jānānāḥ śiśavaḥ samāyān //40// {16}
analyzed: sarvān tām upa pātre hvayethām nābhim jānānāḥ śiśavaḥ samāyān

original: (AVŚ_12,3.41a) vasor yā dhārā madhunā prapīnā ghṛtena miśrā amṛtasya nābhayaḥ /
analyzed: vasoḥ yāḥ dhārāḥ madhunā prapīnāḥ ghṛtena miśrāḥ amṛtasya nābhayaḥ

original: (AVŚ_12,3.41c) sarvās tā ava rundhe svargaḥ ṣaṣṭyāṃ śaratsu nidhipā abhīchāt //41//
analyzed: sarvāḥ tāḥ ava rundhe svar gaḥ ṣaṣṭyām śaratsu nidhi pāḥ abhīchāt

original: (AVŚ_12,3.42a) nidhiṃ nidhipā abhy enam ichād anīśvarā abhitaḥ santu ye 'nye /
analyzed: nidhim nidhi pāḥ abhi enam ichāt anīśvarāḥ abhitas santu ye nye

original: (AVŚ_12,3.42c) asmābhir datto nihitaḥ svargas tribhiḥ kāṇḍais trīnt svargān arukṣat //42//
analyzed: asmābhiḥ dattaḥ nihitaḥ svar gaḥ tribhiḥ kāṇḍaiḥ trīn svargān arukṣat

original: (AVŚ_12,3.43a) agnī rakṣas tapatu yad videvaṃ kravyād piśāca iha mā pra pāsta /
analyzed: agniḥ rakṣaḥ tapatu yat videvam kravyād piśācaḥ iha mā pra pāsta

original: (AVŚ_12,3.43c) nudāma enam apa rudhmo asmad ādityā enam aṅgirasaḥ sacantām //43//
analyzed: nudāmaḥ enam apa rudhmaḥ asmat ādityāḥ enam aṅgirasaḥ sacantām

original: (AVŚ_12,3.44a) ādityebhyo aṅgirobhyo madhv idaṃ ghṛtena miśraṃ prati vedayāmi /
analyzed: ādityebhyaḥ aṅgirobhyaḥ madhu idam ghṛtena miśram prati vedayāmi

original: (AVŚ_12,3.44c) śuddhahastau brāhmaṇasyānihatyaitaṃ svargaṃ sukṛtāv apītam //44//
analyzed: śuddha hastau brāhmaṇasya a nihatya etam svargam su kṛtau apītam

original: (AVŚ_12,3.45a) idaṃ prāpam uttamaṃ kāṇḍam asya yasmāl lokāt parameṣṭhī samāpa /
analyzed: idam prāpam uttamam kāṇḍam asya yasmāt lokāt parameṣṭhī samāpa

original: (AVŚ_12,3.45c) ā siñca sarpir ghṛtavat sam aṅgdhy eṣa bhāgo aṅgiraso no atra //45//
analyzed: ā siñca sarpiḥ ghṛtavat sam aṅgdhi eṣa bhāgaḥ aṅgirasaḥ naḥ atra

original: (AVŚ_12,3.46a) satyāya ca tapase devatābhyo nidhiṃ śevadhiṃ pari dadma etam /
analyzed: satyāya ca tapase devatābhyaḥ nidhim śevadhim pari dadmaḥ etam

original: (AVŚ_12,3.46c) mā no dyūte 'va gān mā samityāṃ mā smānyasmā ut sṛjatā purā mat //46//
analyzed: mā naḥ dyūte gāt mā samityām mā sma anyasmai ud sṛjata purā mat

original: (AVŚ_12,3.47a) ahaṃ pacāmy ahaṃ dadāmi mamed u karman karuṇe 'dhi jāyā /
analyzed: aham pacāmi aham dadāmi mama id u karman karuṇe dhi jāyā

original: (AVŚ_12,3.47c) kaumāro loko ajaniṣṭa putro 'nvārabhethāṃ vaya uttarāvat //47//
analyzed: kaumāraḥ lokaḥ ajaniṣṭa putraḥ nu ārabhethām vayaḥ uttarāvat

original: (AVŚ_12,3.48a) na kilbiṣam atra nādhāro asti na yan mitraiḥ samamamāna eti /
analyzed: na kilbiṣam atra na ādhāraḥ asti na yat mitraiḥ samamamānaḥ eti

original: (AVŚ_12,3.48c) anūnaṃ pātraṃ nihitaṃ na etat paktāraṃ pakvaḥ punar ā viśāti //48//
analyzed: anūnam pātram nihitam naḥ etat paktāram pakvaḥ punar ā viśāti

original: (AVŚ_12,3.49a) priyaṃ priyāṇāṃ kṛṇavāma tamas te yantu yatame dviṣanti /
analyzed: priyam priyāṇām kṛṇavāma tamaḥ te yantu yatame dviṣanti

original: (AVŚ_12,3.49c) dhenur anaḍvān vayovaya āyad eva pauruṣeyam apa mṛtyuṃ nudantu //49//
analyzed: dhenuḥ anaḍvān vayaḥ vayaḥ āyat eva pauruṣeyam apa mṛtyum nudantu

original: (AVŚ_12,3.50a) sam agnayaḥ vidur anyo anyaṃ ya oṣadhīḥ sacate yaś ca sindhūn /
analyzed: sam agnayaḥ viduḥ anyaḥ anyam yaḥ oṣadhīḥ sacate yaḥ ca sindhūn

original: (AVŚ_12,3.50c) yāvanto devā divy ātapanti hiraṇyaṃ jyotiḥ pacato babhūva //50// {17}
analyzed: yāvantaḥ devāḥ divi ātapanti hiraṇyam jyotiḥ pacataḥ babhūva  /

original: (AVŚ_12,3.51a) eṣā tvacāṃ puruṣe saṃ babhūvānagnāḥ sarve paśavo ye anye /
analyzed: eṣā tvacām puruṣe sam babhūva anagnāḥ sarve paśavaḥ ye anye

original: (AVŚ_12,3.51c) kṣatreṇātmānaṃ pari dhāpayātho 'motaṃ vāso mukham odanasya //51//
analyzed: kṣatreṇa ātmānam pari dhāpaya atha u mā ūtam vāsaḥ mukham odanasya

original: (AVŚ_12,3.52a) yad akṣeṣu vadā yat samityāṃ yad vā vadā anṛtaṃ vittakāmyā /
analyzed: yat akṣeṣu vadāḥ yat samityām yat vā vadāḥ anṛtam vitta kāmyā

original: (AVŚ_12,3.52c) samānaṃ tantum abhi samvasānau tasmint sarvaṃ śamalaṃ sādayāthaḥ //52//

analyzed: diṣṭam naḥ atra jarase ni neṣat jarā mṛtyave pari naḥ dadātu atha pakvena saha sam bhavema

analyzed: diṣṭam naḥ atra jarase ni neṣat jarā mṛtyave pari naḥ dadātu atha pakvena saha sam bhavema

analyzed: diṣṭam naḥ atra jarase ni neṣat jarā mṛtyave pari naḥ dadātu atha pakvena saha sam bhavema

original: (AVŚ_12,3.58e) diṣṭaṃ no atra jarase ni neṣaj jarā mṛtyave pari ṇo dadātv atha pakvena saha saṃ bhavema //58//
analyzed: diṣṭam naḥ atra jarase ni neṣat jarā mṛtyave pari naḥ dadātu atha pakvena saha sam bhavema

original: (AVŚ_12,3.59e) diṣṭaṃ no atra jarase ni neṣaj jarā mṛtyave pari ṇo dadātv atha pakvena saha saṃ bhavema //59//
analyzed: diṣṭam naḥ atra jarase ni neṣat jarā mṛtyave pari naḥ dadātu atha pakvena saha sam bhavema

analyzed: dadāmi iti eva brūyāt anu ca enām abhutsata

original: (AVŚ_12,4.1c) vaśāṃ brahmabhyo yācadbhyas tat prajāvad apatyavat //1//

original: (AVŚ_12,4.4a) vilohito adhiṣṭhānāc chakno vindati gopatim /

original: (AVŚ_12,4.4c) tathā vaśāyāḥ saṃvidyaṃ duradabhnā hy ucyase //4//

original: (AVŚ_12,4.6a) yo asyāḥ karṇāv āskunoty ā sa deveṣu vṛścate /
analyzed: yaḥ asyāḥ karṇau āskunoti ā sa deveṣu vṛścate

original: (AVŚ_12,4.6c) lakṣma kurva iti manyate kanīyaḥ kṛṇute svam //6//
analyzed: lakṣma kurve iti manyate kanīyaḥ kṛṇute svam

original: (AVŚ_12,4.7a) yad asyāḥ kasmai cid bhogāya bālān kaś cit prakṛntati /
analyzed: yat asyāḥ kasmai cit bhogāya bālān kaḥ cit prakṛntati

original: (AVŚ_12,4.7c) tataḥ kiśorā mriyante vatsāṃś ca ghātuko vṛkaḥ //7//

original: (AVŚ_12,4.8a) yad asyā gopatau satyā loma dhvāṅkṣo ajīhiḍat /
analyzed: yat asyāḥ gopatau satyāḥ loma dhvāṅkṣaḥ ajīhiḍat

original: (AVŚ_12,4.8c) tataḥ kumārā mriyante yakṣmo vindaty anāmanāt //8//

original: (AVŚ_12,4.9a) yad asyāḥ palpūlanaṃ śakṛd dāsī samasyati /
analyzed: yat asyāḥ palpūlanam śakṛt dāsī samasyati

original: (AVŚ_12,4.9c) tato 'parūpaṃ jāyate tasmād avyeṣyad enasaḥ //9//

original: (AVŚ_12,4.10a) jāyamānābhi jāyate devānt sabrāhmaṇān vaśā /
analyzed: jāyamānā abhi jāyate devān sa brāhmaṇān vaśā

original: (AVŚ_12,4.10c) tasmād brahmabhyo deyaiṣā tad āhuḥ svasya gopanam //10// {19}

original: (AVŚ_12,4.11a) ya enāṃ vanim āyanti teṣāṃ devakṛtā vaśā /
analyzed: ye enām vanim āyanti teṣām deva kṛtā vaśā

original: (AVŚ_12,4.11c) brahmajyeyaṃ tad abruvan ya enāṃ nipriyāyate //11//

original: (AVŚ_12,4.12a) ya ārṣeyebhyo yācadbhyo devānāṃ gāṃ na ditsati /
analyzed: yaḥ ārṣeyebhyaḥ yācadbhyaḥ devānām gām na ditsati

original: (AVŚ_12,4.12c) ā sa deveṣu vṛścate brāhmaṇānāṃ ca manyave //12//

original: (AVŚ_12,4.13a) yo asya syād vaśābhogo anyām icheta tarhi saḥ /

original: (AVŚ_12,4.13c) hiṃste adattā puruṣaṃ yācitāṃ ca na ditsati //13//

original: (AVŚ_12,4.14a) yathā śevadhir nihito brāhmaṇānāṃ tathā vaśā /

original: (AVŚ_12,4.14c) tām etad achāyanti yasmin kasmiṃś ca jāyate //14//

original: (AVŚ_12,4.15c) yathainān anyasmin jinīyād evāsyā nirodhanam //15//

analyzed: caret evā traihāyaṇāt a vijñāta gadā satī

original: (AVŚ_12,4.17a) ya enām avaśām āha devānāṃ nihitaṃ nidhim /

original: (AVŚ_12,4.18a) yo asyā ūdho na vedātho asyā stanān uta /

original: (AVŚ_12,4.18c) ubhayenaivāsmai duhe dātuṃ ced aśakad vaśām //18//

original: (AVŚ_12,4.19a) duradabhnainam ā śaye yācitāṃ ca na ditsati /

original: (AVŚ_12,4.19c) nāsmai kāmāḥ sam ṛdhyante yām adattvā cikīrṣati //19//

original: (AVŚ_12,4.20a) devā vaśām ayācan mukhaṃ kṛtvā brāhmaṇam /
analyzed: devāḥ vaśām ayācan mukham kṛtvā brāhmaṇam

original: (AVŚ_12,4.20c) teṣāṃ sarveṣām adadad dheḍaṃ ny eti mānuṣaḥ //20// {20}

original: (AVŚ_12,4.21a) heḍaṃ paśūnāṃ ny eti brāhmaṇebhyo 'dadad vaśām /

original: (AVŚ_12,4.21c) devānāṃ nihitaṃ bhāgaṃ martyaś cen nipriyāyate //21//

original: (AVŚ_12,4.22a) yad anye śataṃ yāceyur brāhmaṇā gopatiṃ vaśām /

original: (AVŚ_12,4.22c) athaināṃ devā abruvann evaṃ ha viduṣo vaśā //22//

original: (AVŚ_12,4.23a) ya evaṃ viduṣe 'dattvāthānyebhyo dadad vaśām /
analyzed: yaḥ evam viduṣe dattvā atha anyebhyaḥ dadat vaśām

original: (AVŚ_12,4.23c) durgā tasmā adhiṣṭhāne pṛthivī sahadevatā //23//
analyzed: durgā tasmai adhiṣṭhāne pṛthivī saha devatā

original: (AVŚ_12,4.24a) devā vaśām ayācan yasminn agre ajāyata /
analyzed: devāḥ vaśām ayācan yasmin agre ajāyata

original: (AVŚ_12,4.24c) tām etāṃ vidyān nāradaḥ saha devair ud ājata //24//

original: (AVŚ_12,4.25a) anapatyam alpapaśuṃ vaśā kṛṇoti pūruṣam /
analyzed: anapatyam alpa paśum vaśā kṛṇoti pūruṣam

original: (AVŚ_12,4.25c) brāhmaṇaiś ca yācitām athaināṃ nipriyāyate //25//
analyzed: brāhmaṇaiḥ ca yācitām atha enām nipriyāyate

original: (AVŚ_12,4.26a) agnīṣomābhyāṃ kāmāya mitrāya varuṇāya ca /
analyzed: agnīṣomābhyām kāmāya mitrāya varuṇāya ca

original: (AVŚ_12,4.26c) tebhyo yācanti brāhmaṇās teṣv ā vṛścate 'dadat //26//
analyzed: tebhyaḥ yācanti brāhmaṇāḥ teṣu ā vṛścate dadat

original: (AVŚ_12,4.27a) yāvad asyā gopatir nopaśṛṇuyād ṛcaḥ svayam /
analyzed: yāvat asyāḥ gopatiḥ na upaśṛṇuyāt ṛcaḥ svayam

original: (AVŚ_12,4.27c) cared asya tāvad goṣu nāsya śrutvā gṛhe vaset //27//
analyzed: caret asya tāvat goṣu na asya śrutvā gṛhe vaset

original: (AVŚ_12,4.28a) yo asyā ṛca upaśrutyātha goṣv acīcarat /
analyzed: yaḥ asyāḥ ṛcaḥ upaśrutya atha goṣu acīcarat

original: (AVŚ_12,4.28c) āyuś ca tasya bhūtiṃ ca devā vṛścanti hīḍitāḥ //28//
analyzed: āyuḥ ca tasya bhūtim ca devāḥ vṛścanti hīḍitāḥ

original: (AVŚ_12,4.29a) vaśā carantī bahudhā devānāṃ nihito nidhiḥ /
analyzed: vaśā carantī bahudhā devānām nihitaḥ nidhiḥ

original: (AVŚ_12,4.29c) āviṣ kṛṇuṣva rūpāṇi yadā sthāma jighāṃsati //29//
analyzed: āvis kṛṇuṣva rūpāṇi yadā sthāma jighāṃsati

original: (AVŚ_12,4.30a) āvir ātmānaṃ kṛṇute yadā sthāma jighāṃsati /
analyzed: āvis ātmānam kṛṇute yadā sthāma jighāṃsati

original: (AVŚ_12,4.30c) atho ha brahmabhyo vaśā yāñcyāya kṛṇute manaḥ //30// {21}
analyzed: atha u ha brahmabhyaḥ vaśā kṛṇute manaḥ

original: (AVŚ_12,4.31a) manasā saṃ kalpayati tad devāṃ api gachati /
analyzed: manasā sam kalpayati tat devān api gacchati

original: (AVŚ_12,4.31c) tato ha brahmāṇo vaśām upaprayanti yācitum //31//
analyzed: tatas ha brahmāṇaḥ vaśām upaprayanti yācitum

original: (AVŚ_12,4.32a) svadhākāreṇa pitṛbhyo yajñena devatābhyaḥ /
analyzed: svadhākāreṇa pitṛbhyaḥ yajñena devatābhyaḥ

original: (AVŚ_12,4.32c) dānena rājanyo vaśāyā mātur heḍam na gachati //32//
analyzed: dānena rājanyaḥ vaśāyāḥ mātuḥ heḍam na gacchati

original: (AVŚ_12,4.33a) vaśā mātā rājanyasya tathā saṃbhūtam agraśaḥ /
analyzed: vaśā mātā rājanyasya tathā saṃbhūtam agraśas

original: (AVŚ_12,4.33c) tasyā āhur anarpaṇaṃ yad brahmabhyaḥ pradīyate //33//
analyzed: tasyāḥ āhuḥ an arpaṇam yat brahmabhyaḥ pradīyate

original: (AVŚ_12,4.34a) yathājyaṃ pragṛhītam ālumpet sruco agnaye /
analyzed: yathā ājyam pragṛhītam ālumpet srucaḥ agnaye

original: (AVŚ_12,4.34c) evā ha brahmabhyo vaśām agnaya ā vṛścate 'dadat //34//
analyzed: eva ha brahmabhyaḥ vaśām agnaye ā vṛścate dadat

original: (AVŚ_12,4.35a) puroḍāśavatsā sudughā loke 'smā upa tiṣṭhati /
analyzed: puroḍāśa vat sā sudughā loke smaḥ upa tiṣṭhati

original: (AVŚ_12,4.35c) sāsmai sarvān kāmān vaśā pradaduṣe duhe //35//
analyzed: sā asmai sarvān kāmān vaśā pradaduṣe duhe

original: (AVŚ_12,4.36a) sarvān kāmān yamarājye vaśā pradaduṣe duhe /
analyzed: sarvān kāmān yama rājye vaśā pradaduṣe duhe

original: (AVŚ_12,4.36c) athāhur nārakaṃ lokaṃ nirundhānasya yācitām //36//
analyzed: atha āhuḥ nārakam lokam nirundhānasya yācitām

original: (AVŚ_12,4.37a) pravīyamānā carati kruddhā gopataye vaśā /
analyzed: pravīyamānā carati kruddhā gopataye vaśā

original: (AVŚ_12,4.37c) vehataṃ mā manyamāno mṛtyoḥ pāśeṣu badhyatām //37//
analyzed: vehatam mā manyamānaḥ mṛtyoḥ pāśeṣu badhyatām

original: (AVŚ_12,4.38a) yo vehataṃ manyamāno 'mā ca pacate vaśām /
analyzed: yaḥ vehatam manyamānaḥ mā ca pacate vaśām

original: (AVŚ_12,4.38c) apy asya putrān pautrāṃś ca yācayate bṛhaspatiḥ //38//
analyzed: api asya putrān pautrān ca yācayate bṛhaspatiḥ

original: (AVŚ_12,4.39a) mahad eṣāva tapati carantī goṣu gaur api /
analyzed: mahat eṣā ava tapati carantī goṣu gauḥ api

original: (AVŚ_12,4.39c) atho ha gopataye vaśādaduṣe viṣaṃ duhe //39//
analyzed: atha u ha gopataye vaśā daduṣe viṣam duhe

original: (AVŚ_12,4.40a) priyaṃ paśūnāṃ bhavati yad brahmabhyaḥ pradīyate /
analyzed: priyam paśūnām bhavati yat brahmabhyaḥ pradīyate

original: (AVŚ_12,4.40c) atho vaśāyās tat priyaṃ yad devatrā haviḥ syāt //40// {22}
analyzed: atha u vaśāyāḥ tat priyam yat devatrā haviḥ syāt

original: (AVŚ_12,4.41a) yā vaśā udakalpayan devā yajñād udetya /
analyzed: yāḥ vaśāḥ udakalpayan devāḥ yajñāt udetya

original: (AVŚ_12,4.41c) tāsāṃ viliptyaṃ bhīmām udākuruta nāradaḥ //41//
analyzed: tāsām viliptyam bhīmām udākuruta nāradaḥ

original: (AVŚ_12,4.42a) tāṃ devā amīmāṃsanta vaśeyā3m avaśeti /
analyzed: tām devāḥ amīmāṃsanta avaśā iti

original: (AVŚ_12,4.42c) tām abravīn nārada eṣā vaśānāṃ vaśatameti //42//

original: (AVŚ_12,4.43a) kati nu vaśā nārada yās tvaṃ vettha manuṣyajāḥ /
analyzed: kati nu vaśāḥ nārada yāḥ tvam vettha manuṣya jāḥ

original: (AVŚ_12,4.43c) tās tvā pṛchāmi vidvāṃsaṃ kasyā nāśnīyād abrāhmaṇaḥ //43//

original: (AVŚ_12,4.44a) viliptyā bṛhaspate yā ca sūtavaśā vaśā /

original: (AVŚ_12,4.44c) tasyā nāśnīyād abrāhmaṇo ya āśaṃseta bhūtyām //44//
analyzed: tasyāḥ na aśnīyāt a brāhmaṇaḥ yaḥ āśaṃseta bhūtyām

original: (AVŚ_12,4.45a) namas te astu nāradānuṣṭhu viduṣe vaśā /
analyzed: namaḥ te astu nārada anuṣṭhu viduṣe vaśā

original: (AVŚ_12,4.45c) katamāsāṃ bhīmatamā yām adattvā parābhavet //45//
analyzed: katamāsām bhīmatamā yām a dattvā parābhavet

original: (AVŚ_12,4.46a) viliptī yā bṛhaspate 'tho sūtavaśā vaśā /
analyzed: viliptī yā bṛhaspate sūtavaśā vaśā

original: (AVŚ_12,4.46c) tasyā nāśnīyād abrāhmaṇo ya āśaṃseta bhūtyām //46//
analyzed: tasyāḥ na aśnīyāt a brāhmaṇaḥ yaḥ āśaṃseta bhūtyām

original: (AVŚ_12,4.47a) trīṇi vai vaśājātāni viliptī sūtavaśā vaśā /
analyzed: trīṇi vai vaśā jātāni viliptī sūta vaśā vaśā

original: (AVŚ_12,4.47c) tāḥ pra yached brahmabhyaḥ so 'nāvraskaḥ prajāpatau //47//
analyzed: tāḥ pra yacchet brahmabhyaḥ saḥ na avraskaḥ prajāpatau

original: (AVŚ_12,4.48a) etad vo brāhmaṇā havir iti manvīta yācitaḥ /
analyzed: etat vaḥ brāhmaṇāḥ haviḥ iti manvīta yācitaḥ

original: (AVŚ_12,4.48c) vaśāṃ ced enaṃ yāceyur yā bhīmādaduṣo gṛhe //48//
analyzed: vaśām ced enam yāceyuḥ yā bhīma adaduṣaḥ gṛhe

original: (AVŚ_12,4.49a) devā vaśāṃ pary avadan na no 'dād iti hīḍitāḥ /
analyzed: devāḥ vaśām pari avadan na naḥ dāt iti hīḍitāḥ

original: (AVŚ_12,4.49c) etābhir ṛgbhir bhedaṃ tasmād vai sa parābhavat //49//
analyzed: etābhiḥ ṛgbhiḥ bhedam tasmāt vai sa parābhavat

original: (AVŚ_12,4.50a) utaināṃ bhedo nādadād vaśām indreṇa yācitaḥ /
analyzed: uta enām bhedaḥ na adadāt vaśām indreṇa yācitaḥ

original: (AVŚ_12,4.50c) tasmāt taṃ devā āgaso 'vṛścann ahamuttare //50//

original: (AVŚ_12,4.51a) ye vaśāyā adānāya vadanti parirāpiṇaḥ /
analyzed: ye vaśāyāḥ a dānāya vadanti parirāpiṇaḥ

original: (AVŚ_12,4.51c) indrasya manyave jālmā ā vṛścante acittyā //51//
analyzed: indrasya manyave jālmā ā vṛścante acittyā

original: (AVŚ_12,4.52a) ye gopatiṃ parāṇīyāthāhur mā dadā iti /
analyzed: ye gopatim parāṇīya atha āhuḥ mā dadai iti

original: (AVŚ_12,4.52c) rudrasyāstāṃ te hetīṃ pari yanty acittyā //52//
analyzed: rudrasya astām te hetīm pari yanti acittyā

original: (AVŚ_12,4.53a) yadi hutaṃ yady ahutām amā ca pacate vaśām /
analyzed: yadi hutam yadi a hutām amā ca pacate vaśām

original: (AVŚ_12,4.53c) devānt sabrāhmaṇān ṛtvā jihmo lokān nir ṛchati //53// {23}
analyzed: devān sa brāhmaṇān ṛtvā jihmaḥ lokān niḥ ṛchati

original: (AVŚ_12,5.53a) śrameṇa tapasā sṛṣṭā brahmaṇā vittā rte śritā //1//
analyzed: śrameṇa tapasā sṛṣṭā brahmaṇā vittā ṛte śritā

original: (AVŚ_12,5.2a) satyenāvṛtā śriyā prāvṛtā yaśasā parīvṛtā //2//
analyzed: satyena āvṛtā śriyā prāvṛtā yaśasā parīvṛtā

original: (AVŚ_12,5.3a) svadhayā parihitā śraddhayā paryūḍhā dīkṣayā guptā yajñe pratiṣṭhitā loko nidhanam //3//
analyzed: svadhayā parihitā śraddhayā paryūḍhā dīkṣayā guptā yajñe pratiṣṭhitā lokaḥ nidhanam

original: (AVŚ_12,5.4a) brahma padavāyaṃ brāhmaṇo 'dhipatiḥ //4//
analyzed: brahma padavāyam brāhmaṇaḥ dhipatiḥ

original: (AVŚ_12,5.5a) tām ādadānasya brahmagavīṃ jinato brāhmaṇaṃ kṣatriyasya //5//

original: (AVŚ_12,5.6a) apa krāmati sūnṛtā vīryaṃ punyā lakṣmīḥ //6// {24}
analyzed: apa krāmati sūnṛtā vīryam punyā lakṣmīḥ

original: (AVŚ_12,5.7a) ojaś ca tejaś ca sahaś ca balaṃ ca vāk cendriyaṃ ca śrīś ca dharmaś ca //7//
analyzed: ojaḥ ca tejaḥ ca sahaḥ ca balam ca vāc ca indriyam ca śrīḥ ca dharmaḥ ca

original: (AVŚ_12,5.8a) brahma ca kṣatraṃ ca rāṣṭraṃ ca viśaś ca tviṣiś ca yaśaś ca varcaś ca draviṇaṃ ca //8//

analyzed: āyuḥ ca rūpam ca nāma ca kīrtiḥ ca prāṇaḥ ca apānaḥ ca cakṣuḥ ca śrotram ca

analyzed: payaḥ ca rasaḥ ca annam ca annādyam ca ṛtam ca satyam ca iṣṭam ca pūrtam ca prajā ca paśavaḥ ca

analyzed: tāni sarvāṇi apa krāmanti brahma gavīm ādadānasya jinataḥ brāhmaṇam kṣatriyasya

original: (AVŚ_12,5.17a) tasmād vai brāhmaṇānāṃ gaur durādharṣā vijānatā //17//

original: (AVŚ_12,5.18a) vajro dhāvantī vaiśvānara udvītā //18//
analyzed: vajraḥ dhāvantī vaiśvānaraḥ udvītā

analyzed: viṣam prayasyantī takmā prayastā

original: (AVŚ_12,5.47a) kṣipraṃ vai tasyāhanane gṛdhrāḥ kurvata ailabam //47//

analyzed: ādadānam āṅgirasi brahmajyam upa dāsaya

original: (AVŚ_12,5.53a) vaiśvadevī hy ucyase kṛtyā kūlbajam āvṛtā //53//

original: (AVŚ_12,5.54a) oṣantī samoṣantī brahmaṇo vajraḥ //54//

original: (AVŚ_12,5.55a) kṣurapavir mṛtyur bhūtvā vi dhāva tvam //55//
analyzed: kṣura paviḥ mṛtyuḥ bhūtvā vi dhāva tvam

original: (AVŚ_12,5.56a) ā datse jinatāṃ varca iṣṭaṃ pūrtaṃ cāśiṣaḥ //56//

original: (AVŚ_12,5.58a) aghnye padavīr bhava brāhmaṇasyābhiśastyā //58//

original: (AVŚ_12,5.59a) meniḥ śaravyā bhavāghād aghaviṣā bhava //59//

original: (AVŚ_12,5.60a) aghnye pra śiro jahi brahmajyasya kṛtāgaso devapīyor arādhasaḥ //60//

original: (AVŚ_12,5.61a) tvayā pramūrṇaṃ mṛditam agnir dahatu duścitam //61// {29}
analyzed: tvayā pramūrṇam mṛditam agniḥ dahatu duścitam

original: (AVŚ_12,5.62a) vṛśca pra vṛśca saṃ vṛśca daha pra daha saṃ daha //62//

original: (AVŚ_12,5.64a) yathāyād yamasādanāt pāpalokān parāvataḥ //64//
analyzed: yathā yāt yama sādanāt pāpa lokān parāvataḥ

analyzed: eva tvam devi aghnye brahmajyasya kṛta āgasaḥ deva pīyoḥ arādhasaḥ

original: (AVŚ_12,5.66a) vajreṇa śataparvaṇā tīkṣṇena kṣurabhṛṣṭinā //66//
analyzed: vajreṇa śata parvaṇā tīkṣṇena kṣura bhṛṣṭinā

original: (AVŚ_12,5.67a) pra skandhān pra śiro jahi //67//
analyzed: pra skandhān pra śiraḥ jahi

original: (AVŚ_12,5.68a) lomāny asya saṃ chindhi tvacam asya vi veṣṭaya //68//
analyzed: lomāni asya sam chinddhi tvacam asya vi veṣṭaya

original: (AVŚ_12,5.69a) māṃsāny asya śātaya snāvāny asya saṃ vṛha //69//
