analyzed: asthīni asya pīḍaya majjānam asya niḥ jahi

original: (AVŚ_12,5.71a) sarvāsyāṅgā parvāṇi vi śrathaya //71//
analyzed: sarvā asya aṅgā parvāṇi vi śrathaya

original: (AVŚ_12,5.72a) agnir enaṃ kravyāt pṛthivyā nudatām ud oṣatu vāyur antarikṣān mahato varimṇaḥ //72//
analyzed: agniḥ enam kravyād pṛthivyāḥ nudatām ud oṣatu vāyuḥ antarikṣāt mahataḥ varimṇaḥ

original: (AVŚ_12,5.73a) sūrya enaṃ divaḥ pra ṇudatāṃ ny oṣatu //73// {30}
analyzed: sūryaḥ enam divaḥ pra nudatām ni oṣatu

original: (AVŚ_13,1.1a) udehi vājin yo apsv antar idaṃ rāṣṭraṃ pra viśa sūnṛtāvat /
analyzed: udehi vājin yaḥ apsu antar idam rāṣṭram pra viśa sūnṛtāvat

original: (AVŚ_13,1.1c) yo rohito viśvam idaṃ jajāna sa tvā rāṣṭrāya subhṛtaṃ bibhartu //1//
analyzed: yaḥ rohitaḥ viśvam idam jajāna sa tvā rāṣṭrāya su bhṛtam bibhartu

original: (AVŚ_13,1.2a) ud vāja ā gan yo apsv antar viśa ā roha tvadyonayo yāḥ /
analyzed: ud vājaḥ ā gan yaḥ apsu antar viśaḥ ā roha tvad yonayaḥ yāḥ

original: (AVŚ_13,1.2c) somaṃ dadhāno 'pa oṣadhīr gāś catuṣpado dvipada ā veśayeha //2//
analyzed: somam dadhānā u paḥ oṣadhīḥ gāḥ catuṣpadaḥ dvipadaḥ ā veśaya iha

original: (AVŚ_13,1.3a) yūyam ugrā marutaḥ pṛśnimātara indreṇa yujā pra mṛṇīta śatrūn /
analyzed: yūyam ugrāḥ marutaḥ pṛśni mātaraḥ indreṇa yujā pra mṛṇīta śatrūn

original: (AVŚ_13,1.3c) ā vo rohitaḥ śṛṇavat sudānavas triṣaptāso marutaḥ svādusaṃmudaḥ //3//
analyzed: ā vaḥ rohitaḥ śṛṇavat sudānavaḥ triṣaptāsaḥ marutaḥ svādu saṃmudaḥ

original: (AVŚ_13,1.4a) ruho ruroha rohita ā ruroha garbho janīnāṃ januṣām upastham /
analyzed: ruhaḥ ruroha rohitaḥ ā ruroha garbhaḥ janīnām januṣām upastham

original: (AVŚ_13,1.4c) tābhiḥ saṃrabdham anv avindan ṣaḍ urvīr gātuṃ prapaśyann iha rāṣṭram āhāḥ //4//
analyzed: tābhiḥ saṃrabdham anu avindan ṣaḍ urvīḥ gātum prapaśyan iha rāṣṭram āhār

original: (AVŚ_13,1.5a) ā te rāṣṭram iha rohito 'hārṣīd vy āsthan mṛdho abhayaṃ te abhūt /
analyzed: ā te rāṣṭram iha rohitaḥ hārṣīt vi āsthan mṛdhaḥ abhayam te abhūt

original: (AVŚ_13,1.5c) tasmai te dyāvāpṛthivī revatībhiḥ kāmaṃ duhātām iha śakvarībhiḥ //5//
analyzed: tasmai te dyāvāpṛthivī revatībhiḥ kāmam duhātām iha śakvarībhiḥ

original: (AVŚ_13,1.6a) rohito dyāvāpṛthivī jajāna tatra tantuṃ parameṣṭhī tatāna /
analyzed: rohitaḥ dyāvāpṛthivī jajāna tatra tantum parameṣṭhī tatāna

original: (AVŚ_13,1.6c) tatra śiśriye 'ja ekapādo 'dṛṃhad dyāvāpṛthivī balena //6//
analyzed: tatra śiśriye jaḥ eka pādaḥ dṛṃhat dyāvāpṛthivī balena

original: (AVŚ_13,1.7a) rohito dyāvāpṛthivī adṛṃhat tena sva stabhitaṃ tena nākaḥ /
analyzed: rohitaḥ dyāvāpṛthivī adṛṃhat tena svar stabhitam tena nākaḥ

original: (AVŚ_13,1.7c) tenāntarikṣaṃ vimitā rajāṃsi tena devā amṛtam anv avindan //7//
analyzed: tena antarikṣam vimitā rajāṃsi tena devāḥ amṛtam anu avindan

original: (AVŚ_13,1.8a) vi rohito amṛśad viśvarūpaṃ samākurvāṇaḥ praruho ruhaś ca /
analyzed: vi rohitaḥ amṛśat viśva rūpam samākurvāṇaḥ praruhaḥ ruhaḥ ca

original: (AVŚ_13,1.8c) divaṃ rūḍhvā mahatā mahimnā saṃ te rāṣṭram anaktu payasā ghṛtena //8//
analyzed: divam rūḍhvā mahatā mahimnā sam te rāṣṭram anaktu payasā ghṛtena

original: (AVŚ_13,1.9a) yās te ruhaḥ praruho yās ta āruho yābhir āpṛṇāsi divam antarikṣam /
analyzed: yāḥ te ruhaḥ praruhaḥ yāḥ te āruhaḥ yābhiḥ āpṛṇāsi divam antarikṣam

original: (AVŚ_13,1.9c) tāsāṃ brahmaṇā payasā vavṛdhāno viśi rāṣṭre jāgṛhi rohitasya //9//
analyzed: tāsām brahmaṇā payasā vavṛdhānaḥ viśi rāṣṭre jāgṛhi rohitasya

original: (AVŚ_13,1.10a) yas te viśas tapasaḥ saṃbabhūvur vatsaṃ gāyatrīm anu tā ihāguḥ /
analyzed: yaḥ te viśaḥ tapasaḥ saṃbabhūvuḥ vatsam gāyatrīm anu tāḥ iha aguḥ

original: (AVŚ_13,1.10c) tās tvā viśantu manasā śivena saṃmātā vatso abhy etu rohitaḥ //10// {1}
analyzed: tāḥ tvā viśantu manasā śivena sam mātā vatsaḥ abhī etu rohitaḥ

original: (AVŚ_13,1.11a) ūrdhvo rohito adhi nāke asthād viśvā rūpāṇi janayan yuvā kaviḥ /
analyzed: ūrdhvaḥ rohitaḥ adhi nāke asthāt viśvā rūpāṇi janayan yuvā kaviḥ

original: (AVŚ_13,1.11c) tigmenāgnir jyotiṣā vi bhāti tṛtīye cakre rajasi priyāṇi //11//
analyzed: tigmena agniḥ jyotiṣā vi bhāti tṛtīye cakre rajasi priyāṇi

original: (AVŚ_13,1.12a) sahasraśṛṅgo vṛṣabho jātavedā ghṛtāhutaḥ somapṛṣṭhaḥ suvīraḥ /
analyzed: sahasra śṛṅgaḥ vṛṣabhaḥ jātavedāḥ ghṛta āhutaḥ soma pṛṣṭhaḥ su vīraḥ

original: (AVŚ_13,1.12c) mā mā hāsīn nāthito net tvā jahāni gopoṣaṃ ca me vīrapoṣaṃ ca dhehi //12//
analyzed: mā mā hāsīt nāthitaḥ na id tvā jahāni go poṣam ca me vīra poṣam ca dhehi

original: (AVŚ_13,1.13a) rohito yajñasya janitā mukhaṃ ca rohitāya vācā śrotreṇa manasā juhomi /
analyzed: rohitaḥ yajñasya janitā mukham ca rohitāya vācā śrotreṇa manasā juhomi

original: (AVŚ_13,1.13c) rohitaṃ devā yanti sumanasyamānāḥ sa mā rohaiḥ sāmityai rohayatu //13//
analyzed: rohitam devāḥ yanti sumanasyamānāḥ sa mā rohaiḥ sāmityaiḥ rohayatu

original: (AVŚ_13,1.14a) rohito yajñaṃ vy adadhād viśvakarmaṇe tasmāt tejāṃsy upa memāny āguḥ /
analyzed: rohitaḥ yajñam vi adadhāt viśvakarmaṇe tasmāt tejāṃsi upa mā imāni āguḥ

original: (AVŚ_13,1.14c) voceyaṃ te nābhiṃ bhuvanasyādhi majmani //14//
analyzed: voceyam te nābhim bhuvanasya adhi majmani

original: (AVŚ_13,1.15a) ā tvā ruroha bṛhaty uta paṅktir ā kakub varcasā jātavedaḥ /
analyzed: ā tvā ruroha bṛhatī uta paṅktiḥ ā kakubh varcasā jātavedaḥ

original: (AVŚ_13,1.15c) ā tvā rurohoṣṇihākṣaro vaṣaṭkāra ā tvā ruroha rohito retasā saha //15//
analyzed: ā tvā ruroha uṣṇihā akṣaraḥ vaṣaṭkāraḥ ā tvā ruroha rohitaḥ retasā saha

original: (AVŚ_13,1.16a) ayaṃ vaste garbhaṃ pṛthivyā divaṃ vaste 'yam antarikṣam /
analyzed: ayam vaste garbham pṛthivyāḥ divam vaste yam antarikṣam

original: (AVŚ_13,1.16c) ayaṃ bradhnasya viṣṭapi svar lokān vy ānaśe //16//
analyzed: ayam bradhnasya viṣṭapi svar lokān vi ānaśe

original: (AVŚ_13,1.17a) vācas pate pṛthivī naḥ syonā syonā yonis talpā naḥ suśevā /
analyzed: vācaḥ pate pṛthivī naḥ syonā syonā yoniḥ talpā naḥ su śevā

original: (AVŚ_13,1.17c) ihaiva prāṇaḥ sakhye no astu taṃ tvā parameṣṭhin pary agnir āyuṣā varcasā dadhātu //17//
analyzed: iha eva prāṇaḥ sakhye naḥ astu tam tvā parameṣṭhin pari agniḥ āyuṣā varcasā dadhātu

original: (AVŚ_13,1.18a) vācas pata ṛtavaḥ pañca ye nau vaiśvakarmaṇāḥ pari ye saṃbabhūvuḥ /
analyzed: vācaḥ pate ṛtavaḥ pañca ye nau vaiśvakarmaṇāḥ pari ye saṃbabhūvuḥ

original: (AVŚ_13,1.18c) ihaiva prāṇaḥ sakhye no astu taṃ tvā parameṣṭhin pari rohita āyuṣā varcasā dadhātu //18//
analyzed: iha eva prāṇaḥ sakhye naḥ astu tam tvā parameṣṭhin pari rohitaḥ āyuṣā varcasā dadhātu

original: (AVŚ_13,1.19a) vācas pate saumanasaṃ manaś ca goṣṭhe no gā janaya yoniṣu prajāḥ /
analyzed: vācaḥ pate saumanasam manaḥ ca goṣṭhe naḥ gāḥ janaya yoniṣu prajāḥ

original: (AVŚ_13,1.19c) ihaiva prāṇaḥ sakhye no astu taṃ tvā parameṣṭhin pary aham āyuṣā varcasā dadhātu //19//
analyzed: iha eva prāṇaḥ sakhye naḥ astu tam tvā parameṣṭhin pari aham āyuṣā varcasā dadhātu

original: (AVŚ_13,1.20a) pari tvā dhāt savitā devo agnir varcasā mitrāvaruṇāv abhi tvā /
analyzed: pari tvā dhāt savitā devaḥ agniḥ varcasā mitrāvaruṇau abhi tvā

original: (AVŚ_13,1.20c) sarvā arātīr avakrāmann ehīdaṃ rāṣṭram akaraḥ sunṛtāvat //20// {2}
analyzed: sarvāḥ arātīḥ avakrāman ehi idam rāṣṭram akaraḥ su nṛtāvat

original: (AVŚ_13,1.21a) yaṃ tvā pṛṣatī rathe praṣṭir vahati rohita /
analyzed: yam tvā pṛṣatī rathe praṣṭiḥ vahati rohita

original: (AVŚ_13,1.21c) śubhā yāsi riṇann apaḥ //21//
analyzed: śubhā yāsi riṇan apaḥ

original: (AVŚ_13,1.22a) anuvratā rohiṇī rohitasya sūriḥ suvarṇā bṛhatī suvarcāḥ /
analyzed: anuvratā rohiṇī rohitasya sūriḥ su varṇā bṛhatī su varcāḥ

original: (AVŚ_13,1.22c) tayā vājān viśvarūpāṃ jayema tayā viśvāḥ pṛtanā abhi ṣyāma //22//
analyzed: tayā vājān viśva rūpām jayema tayā viśvāḥ pṛtanāḥ abhi syāma

original: (AVŚ_13,1.23a) idaṃ sado rohiṇī rohitasyāsau panthāḥ pṛṣatī yena yāti /
analyzed: idam sadaḥ rohiṇī rohitasya asau panthāḥ pṛṣatī yena yāti

original: (AVŚ_13,1.23c) tāṃ gandharvāḥ kaśyapā un nayanti tāṃ rakṣanti kavayo 'pramādam //23//
analyzed: tām gandharvāḥ kaśyapāḥ ud nayanti tām rakṣanti kavayaḥ pramādam

original: (AVŚ_13,1.24a) sūryasyāśvā harayaḥ ketumantaḥ sadā vahanty amṛtāḥ sukhaṃ ratham /
analyzed: sūryasya aśvāḥ harayaḥ ketumantaḥ sadā vahanti amṛtāḥ sukham ratham

original: (AVŚ_13,1.24c) ghṛtapāvā rohito bhrājamāno divaṃ devaḥ pṛṣatīm ā viveśa //24//
analyzed: ghṛta pāvā rohitaḥ bhrājamānaḥ divam devaḥ pṛṣatīm ā viveśa

original: (AVŚ_13,1.25a) yo rohito vṛṣabhas tigmaśṛṅgaḥ pary agniṃ pari sūryaṃ babhūva /
analyzed: yaḥ rohitaḥ vṛṣabhaḥ tigma śṛṅgaḥ pari agnim pari sūryam babhūva

original: (AVŚ_13,1.25c) yo viṣṭabhnāti pṛthivīṃ divaṃ ca tasmād devā adhi sṛṣṭīḥ sṛjante //25//
analyzed: yaḥ viṣṭabhnāti pṛthivīm divam ca tasmāt devāḥ adhi sṛṣṭīḥ sṛjante

original: (AVŚ_13,1.26a) rohito divam āruhan mahataḥ pary arṇavāt /
analyzed: rohitaḥ divam āruhat mahataḥ pari arṇavāt

original: (AVŚ_13,1.26c) sarvo ruroha rohito ruhaḥ //26//
analyzed: sarvaḥ ruroha rohitaḥ ruhaḥ

original: (AVŚ_13,1.27a) vi mimīṣva payasvatīṃ ghṛtācīṃ devānāṃ dhenur anapaspṛg eṣā /
analyzed: vi mimīṣva payasvatīm ghṛtācīm devānām dhenuḥ anapaspṛś eṣā

original: (AVŚ_13,1.27c) indraḥ somaṃ pibatu kṣemo astv agniḥ pra stautu vi mṛdho nudasva //27//
analyzed: indraḥ somam pibatu kṣemaḥ astu agniḥ pra stautu vi mṛdhaḥ nudasva

original: (AVŚ_13,1.28a) samiddho agniḥ samidhāno ghṛtavṛddho ghṛtāhutaḥ /
analyzed: samiddhaḥ agniḥ samidhānaḥ ghṛta vṛddhaḥ ghṛta āhutaḥ

original: (AVŚ_13,1.28c) abhīṣāṭ viśvāṣāḍ agniḥ sapatnān hantu ye mama //28//
analyzed: abhīṣāh viśvāṣāh agniḥ sapatnān hantu ye mama

original: (AVŚ_13,1.29a) hantv enān pra dahatv arir yo naḥ pṛtanyati /
analyzed: hantu enān pra dahatu ariḥ yaḥ naḥ pṛtanyati

original: (AVŚ_13,1.29c) kravyādāgninā vayaṃ sapatnān pra dahāmasi //29//
analyzed: kravyādā agninā vayam sapatnān pra dahāmasi

original: (AVŚ_13,1.30a) avācīnān ava jahīndra vajreṇa bāhumān /
analyzed: avācīnān ava jahi indra vajreṇa bāhumān

original: (AVŚ_13,1.30c) adhā sapatnān māmakān agnes tejobhir ādiṣi //30// {3}
analyzed: adha sapatnān māmakān agneḥ tejobhiḥ ādiṣi

original: (AVŚ_13,1.31a) agne sapatnān adharān pādayāsmad vyathayā sajātam utpipānaṃ bṛhaspate /
analyzed: agne sapatnān adharān pādaya asmat vyathaya sajātam utpipānam bṛhaspate

original: (AVŚ_13,1.31c) indrāgnī mitrāvaruṇāv adhare padyantām apratimanyūyamānāḥ //31//
analyzed: indra agnī mitrāvaruṇau adhare padyantām apratimanyūyamānāḥ

original: (AVŚ_13,1.32a) udyaṃs tvaṃ deva sūrya sapatnān ava me jahi /
analyzed: udyan tvam deva sūrya sapatnān ava me jahi

original: (AVŚ_13,1.32c) avainān aśmanā jahi te yantv adhamaṃ tamaḥ //32//
analyzed: ava enān aśmanā jahi te yantu adhamam tamaḥ

original: (AVŚ_13,1.33a) vatso virājo vṛṣabho matīnām ā ruroha śukrapṛṣṭho 'ntarikṣam /
analyzed: vatsaḥ virājaḥ vṛṣabhaḥ matīnām ā ruroha śukra pṛṣṭhaḥ ntarikṣam

original: (AVŚ_13,1.33c) ghṛtenārkam abhy arcanti vatsaṃ brahma santaṃ brahmaṇā vardhayanti //33//
analyzed: ghṛtena arkam abhi arcanti vatsam brahma santam brahmaṇā vardhayanti

original: (AVŚ_13,1.34a) divaṃ ca roha pṛthivīṃ ca roha rāṣṭraṃ ca roha draviṇaṃ ca roha /
analyzed: divam ca roha pṛthivīm ca roha rāṣṭram ca roha draviṇam ca roha

original: (AVŚ_13,1.34c) prajāṃ ca rohāmṛtaṃ ca roha rohitena tanvaṃ saṃ spṛṣasva //34//
analyzed: prajām ca roha amṛtam ca roha rohitena tanvam sam spṛṣasva

original: (AVŚ_13,1.35a) ye devā rāṣṭrabhṛto 'bhito yanti sūryam /
analyzed: ye devāḥ rāṣṭra bhṛtaḥ bhitas yanti sūryam

original: (AVŚ_13,1.35c) taiṣ ṭe rohitaḥ samvidāno rāṣṭraṃ dadhātu sumanasyamānaḥ //35//
analyzed: taiḥ te rohitaḥ samvidānaḥ rāṣṭram dadhātu sumanasyamānaḥ

original: (AVŚ_13,1.36a) ut tvā yajñā brahmapūtā vahanty adhvagato harayas tvā vahanti /
analyzed: ud tvā yajñāḥ brahma pūtāḥ vahanti adhva gataḥ harayaḥ tvā vahanti

original: (AVŚ_13,1.36c) tiraḥ samudram ati rocase 'rṇavam //36//
analyzed: tiras samudram ati rocase rṇavam

original: (AVŚ_13,1.37a) rohite dyāvāpṛthivī adhi śrite vasujiti gojiti saṃdhanājiti /
analyzed: rohite dyāvāpṛthivī adhi śrite vasu jiti go jiti saṃdhanājiti

original: (AVŚ_13,1.37c) sahasraṃ yasya janimāni sapta ca voceyaṃ te nābhiṃ bhuvanasyādhi majmani //37//
analyzed: sahasram yasya janimāni sapta ca voceyam te nābhim bhuvanasya adhi majmani

original: (AVŚ_13,1.38a) yaśā yāsi pradiśo diśaś ca yaśāḥ paśūnām uta carṣaṇīnām /
analyzed: yaśāḥ yāsi pradiśaḥ diśaḥ ca yaśāḥ paśūnām uta carṣaṇīnām

original: (AVŚ_13,1.38c) yaśāḥ pṛthivyā adityā upasthe 'haṃ bhūyāsaṃ saviteva cāruḥ //38//
analyzed: yaśāḥ pṛthivyāḥ adityāḥ upasthe ham bhūyāsam savitā iva cāruḥ

original: (AVŚ_13,1.39a) amutra sann iha vetthetaḥ saṃs tāni paśyasi /
analyzed: amutra san iha vettha itas san tāni paśyasi

original: (AVŚ_13,1.39c) itaḥ paśyanti rocanaṃ divi sūryaṃ vipaścitam //39//
analyzed: itas paśyanti rocanam divi sūryam vipaścitam

original: (AVŚ_13,1.40a) devo devān marcayasy antaś carasy arṇave /
analyzed: devaḥ devān marcayasi antar carasi arṇave

original: (AVŚ_13,1.40c) samānam agnim indhate taṃ viduḥ kavayaḥ pare //40// {4}
analyzed: samānam agnim indhate tam viduḥ kavayaḥ pare

original: (AVŚ_13,1.41a) avaḥ pareṇa para enāvareṇa padā vatsaṃ bibratī gaur ud asthāt /
analyzed: avas pareṇa paras enā avareṇa padā vatsam bibratī gauḥ ud asthāt

original: (AVŚ_13,1.41c) sā kadrīcī kaṃ svid ardhaṃ parāgāt kva svit sūte nahi yūthe asmin //41//
analyzed: sā kadrīcī kam svid ardham parāgāt kva svid sūte nahi yūthe asmin

original: (AVŚ_13,1.42a) ekapadī dvipadī sā catuṣpady aṣṭāpadī navapadī babhūvuṣī /
analyzed: ekapadī dvipadī sā catuṣpadī aṣṭāpadī navapadī babhūvuṣī

original: (AVŚ_13,1.42c) sahasrākṣarā bhuvanasya paṅktis tasyāḥ samudrā adhi vi kṣaranti //42//
analyzed: sahasra akṣarā bhuvanasya paṅktiḥ tasyāḥ samudrāḥ adhi vi kṣaranti

original: (AVŚ_13,1.43a) ārohan dyām amṛtaḥ prāva me vacaḥ /
analyzed: ārohan dyām amṛtaḥ prāva me vacaḥ

original: (AVŚ_13,1.43c) ut tvā yajñā brahmapūtā vahanty adhvagato harayas tvā vahanti //43//
analyzed: ud tvā yajñāḥ brahma pūtāḥ vahanti adhva gataḥ harayaḥ tvā vahanti

original: (AVŚ_13,1.44a) veda tat te amartya yat ta ākramaṇaṃ divi /
analyzed: veda tat te amartya yat te ākramaṇam divi

original: (AVŚ_13,1.44c) yat te sadhasthaṃ parame vyoman //44//
analyzed: yat te sadhastham parame vyoman

original: (AVŚ_13,1.45a) sūryo dyāṃ sūryaḥ pṛṭhivīṃ sūrya āpo'ti paśyati /
analyzed: sūryaḥ dyām sūryaḥ pṛṭhivīm sūryaḥ āpa iti paśyati

original: (AVŚ_13,1.45c) sūryo bhūtasyaikaṃ cakṣur ā ruroha divaṃ mahīm //45//
analyzed: sūryaḥ bhūtasya ekam cakṣuḥ ā ruroha divam mahīm

original: (AVŚ_13,1.46a) urvīr āsan paridhayo vedir bhūmir akalpata /
analyzed: urvīḥ āsan paridhayaḥ vediḥ bhūmiḥ akalpata

original: (AVŚ_13,1.46c) tatraitāv agnī ādhatta himaṃ ghraṃsaṃ ca rohitaḥ //46//
analyzed: tatra etau agnī ādhatta himam ghraṃsam ca rohitaḥ

original: (AVŚ_13,1.47a) himaṃ ghraṃsaṃ cādhāya yūpān kṛtvā parvatān /
analyzed: himam ghraṃsam ca ādhāya yūpān kṛtvā parvatān

original: (AVŚ_13,1.47c) varṣājyāv agnī ījāte rohitasya svarvidaḥ //47//
analyzed: varṣa ājyau agnī ījāte rohitasya svar vidaḥ

original: (AVŚ_13,1.48a) svarvido rohitasya brahmaṇāgniḥ sam idhyate /
analyzed: svar vidaḥ rohitasya brahmaṇā agniḥ sam idhyate

original: (AVŚ_13,1.48c) tasmād ghraṃsas tasmād dhimas tasmād yajño 'jāyata //48//
analyzed: tasmāt ghraṃsaḥ tasmāt dhimaḥ tasmāt yajñaḥ jāyata

original: (AVŚ_13,1.49a) brahmaṇāgnī vāvṛdhānau brahmavṛddhau brahmāhutau /
analyzed: brahmaṇā agnī vāvṛdhānau brahma vṛddhau brahma āhutau

original: (AVŚ_13,1.49c) brahmeddhāv agnī ījāte rohitasya svarvidaḥ //49//
analyzed: brahma iddhau agnī ījāte rohitasya svar vidaḥ

original: (AVŚ_13,1.50a) satye anyaḥ samāhito 'psv anyaḥ sam idhyate /
analyzed: satye anyaḥ samāhitaḥ u psu anyaḥ sam idhyate

original: (AVŚ_13,1.50c) brahmeddhāv agnī ījāte rohitasya svarvidaḥ //50// {5}
analyzed: brahma iddhau agnī ījāte rohitasya svar vidaḥ

original: (AVŚ_13,1.51a) yaṃ vātaḥ pariśumbhati yaṃ vendro brahmaṇaspatiḥ /
analyzed: yam vātaḥ pariśumbhati yam vā indraḥ brahmaṇaspatiḥ

original: (AVŚ_13,1.51c) brahmeddhāvagnī ījāte rohitasya svarvidaḥ //51//
analyzed: brahma iddhau agnī ījāte rohitasya svar vidaḥ

original: (AVŚ_13,1.52a) vediṃ bhūmiṃ kalpayitvā divaṃ kṛtvā dakṣiṇām /
analyzed: vedim bhūmim kalpayitvā divam kṛtvā dakṣiṇām

original: (AVŚ_13,1.52c) ghraṃsaṃ tad agniṃ kṛtvā cakāra viśvam ātmanvad varṣeṇājyena rohitaḥ //52//
analyzed: ghraṃsam tat agnim kṛtvā cakāra viśvam ātmanvat varṣeṇa ājyena rohitaḥ

original: (AVŚ_13,1.53a) varṣam ājam ghraṃso agnir vedir bhūmir akalpata /
analyzed: varṣam ājam ghraṃsaḥ agniḥ vediḥ bhūmiḥ akalpata

original: (AVŚ_13,1.53c) tatraitān parvatān agnir gīrbhir ūrdhvāṃ akalpayat //53//
analyzed: tatra etān parvatān agniḥ gīrbhiḥ ūrdhvām akalpayat

original: (AVŚ_13,1.54a) gīrbhir ūrdhvān kalpayitvā rohito bhūmim abravīt /
analyzed: gīrbhiḥ ūrdhvān kalpayitvā rohitaḥ bhūmim abravīt

original: (AVŚ_13,1.54c) tvayīdaṃ sarvaṃ jāyatāṃ yad bhūtaṃ yac ca bhāvyam //54//

original: (AVŚ_13,1.55a) sa yajñaḥ prathamo bhūto bhavyo ajāyata /
analyzed: sa yajñaḥ prathamaḥ bhūtaḥ bhavyaḥ ajāyata

original: (AVŚ_13,1.55c) tasmād dha jajña idaṃ sarvaṃ yat kiṃ cedaṃ virocate rohitena ṛṣiṇābhṛtam //55//
analyzed: tasmāt ha jajñe idam sarvam yat kim ca idam virocate rohitena ṛṣiṇā ābhṛtam

original: (AVŚ_13,1.56a) yaś ca gāṃ padā sphurati pratyaṅ sūryaṃ ca mehati /
analyzed: yaḥ ca gām padā sphurati pratyaṅ sūryam ca mehati

original: (AVŚ_13,1.56c) tasya vṛścāmi te mūlaṃ na chāyāṃ karavo 'param //56//
analyzed: tasya vṛścāmi te mūlam na chāyām karavaḥ param

original: (AVŚ_13,1.57a) yo mābhichāyam atyeṣi māṃ cāgniṃ cāntarā /
analyzed: yaḥ mā abhichāyam atyeṣi mām ca agnim ca antarā

original: (AVŚ_13,1.57c) tasya vṛścāmi te mūlaṃ na chāyāṃ karavo 'param //57//
analyzed: tasya vṛścāmi te mūlam na chāyām karavaḥ param

original: (AVŚ_13,1.58a) yo adya deva sūrya tvāṃ ca māṃ cāntarāyati /
analyzed: yaḥ adya deva sūrya tvām ca mām ca antarā ayati

original: (AVŚ_13,1.58c) duṣvapnyaṃ tasmiṃ chamalaṃ duritāni ca mṛjmahe //58//

original: (AVŚ_13,1.59a) mā pra gāma patho vayaṃ mā yajñād indra sominaḥ /
analyzed: mā pra gāma pathaḥ vayam mā yajñāt indra sominaḥ

original: (AVŚ_13,1.59c) mānta sthur no arātayaḥ //59//
analyzed: mā antar sthuḥ naḥ arātayaḥ

original: (AVŚ_13,1.60a) yo yajñasya prasādhanas tantur deveṣv ātataḥ /
analyzed: yaḥ yajñasya prasādhanaḥ tantuḥ deveṣu ātataḥ

original: (AVŚ_13,1.60c) tam āhutam aśīmahi //60// {6}
analyzed: tam āhutam aśīmahi

original: (AVŚ_13,2.1a) ud asya ketavo divi śukrā bhrājanta īrate /
analyzed: ud asya ketavaḥ divi śukrāḥ bhrājantaḥ īrate

original: (AVŚ_13,2.1c) ādityasya nṛcakṣaso mahivratasya mīḍhuṣaḥ //1//
analyzed: ādityasya nṛ cakṣasaḥ mahi vratasya mīḍhuṣaḥ

original: (AVŚ_13,2.2a) diśāṃ prajñānāṃ svarayantam arciṣā supakṣam āśuṃ patayantam arṇave /
analyzed: diśām prajñānām svarayantam arciṣā su pakṣam āśum patayantam arṇave

original: (AVŚ_13,2.2c) stavāma sūryaṃ bhuvanasya gopāṃ yo raśmibhir diśa ābhāti sarvāḥ //2//
analyzed: stavāma sūryam bhuvanasya gopām yaḥ raśmibhiḥ diśaḥ ābhāti sarvāḥ

original: (AVŚ_13,2.3a) yat prāṅ pratyaṅ svadhayā yāsi śībhaṃ nānārūpe ahanī karṣi māyayā /
analyzed: yat prāṅ pratyaṅ svadhayā yāsi śībham nānārūpe ahanī karṣi māyayā

original: (AVŚ_13,2.3c) tad āditya mahi tat te mahi śravo yad eko viśvaṃ pari bhūma jāyase //3//
analyzed: tat āditya mahi tat te mahi śravaḥ yat ekaḥ viśvam pari bhūma jāyase

original: (AVŚ_13,2.4a) vipaścitaṃ taraṇiṃ bhrājamānaṃ vahanti yaṃ haritaḥ sapta bahvīḥ /
analyzed: vipaścitam taraṇim bhrājamānam vahanti yam haritaḥ sapta bahvīḥ

original: (AVŚ_13,2.4c) srutād yam attrir divam unnināya taṃ tvā paśyanti pariyāntam ājim //4//

original: (AVŚ_13,2.5a) mā tvā dabhan pariyāntam ājiṃ svasti durgāṃ ati yāhi śībham /
analyzed: mā tvā dabhan pariyāntam ājim svasti durgām ati yāhi śībham

original: (AVŚ_13,2.5c) divaṃ ca sūrya pṛthivīṃ ca devīm ahorātre vimimāno yad eṣi //5//

analyzed: svasti te sūrya carase rathāya yena ubhau antau pariyāsi sadyas

original: (AVŚ_13,2.6c) yaṃ te vahanti harito vahiṣṭhāḥ śatam aśvā yadi vā sapta bahvīḥ //6//

original: (AVŚ_13,2.7a) sukhaṃ sūrya ratham aṃśumantaṃ syonaṃ suvahnim adhi tiṣṭha vājinam /
analyzed: sukham sūrya ratham aṃśumantam syonam su vahnim adhi tiṣṭha vājinam

original: (AVŚ_13,2.7c) yaṃ te vahanti harito vahiṣṭhāḥ śatam aśvā yadi vā sapta bahvīḥ //7//

original: (AVŚ_13,2.8a) sapta sūryo harito yātave rathe hiraṇyatvacaso bṛhatīr ayukta /
analyzed: sapta sūryaḥ haritaḥ yātave rathe hiraṇya tvacasaḥ bṛhatīḥ ayukta

original: (AVŚ_13,2.8c) amoci śukro rajasaḥ parastād vidhūya devas tamo divam āruhat //8//

original: (AVŚ_13,2.9c) divyaḥ suparṇaḥ sa vīro vy akhyad aditeḥ putro bhuvanāni viśvā //9//
analyzed: divyaḥ suparṇaḥ sa vīraḥ vi akhyat aditeḥ putraḥ bhuvanāni viśvā

original: (AVŚ_13,2.10a) udyan raśmīn ā tanuṣe viśvā rupāṇi puṣyasi /
analyzed: udyan raśmīn ā tanuṣe viśvā rupāṇi puṣyasi

original: (AVŚ_13,2.10c) ubhā samudrau kratunā vi bhāsi sarvāṃl lokān paribhūr bhrājamānaḥ //10// {7}
analyzed: ubhā samudrau kratunā vi bhāsi sarvān lokān paribhūḥ bhrājamānaḥ

original: (AVŚ_13,2.11a) pūrvāparaṃ carato māyayaitau śiśū krīḍantau pari yāto 'rṇavam /
analyzed: pūrva aparam carataḥ māyayā etau śiśū krīḍantau pari yātaḥ rṇavam

analyzed: divi tvā atriḥ adhārayat sūrya māsāya kartave

analyzed: ubhau antau sam arṣasi vatsaḥ sam mātarau iva

analyzed: yat samudram anu śritam tat siṣāsati sūryaḥ

original: (AVŚ_13,2.14c) adhvāsya vitato mahān pūrvaś cāparaś ca yaḥ //14//

analyzed: ud u tyam jātavedasam devam vahanti ketavaḥ

analyzed: apa tye tāyavaḥ yathā nakṣatrāḥ yanti aktubhiḥ

original: (AVŚ_13,2.19c) viśvam ā bhāsi rocana //19//
analyzed: viśvam ā bhāsi rocana

original: (AVŚ_13,2.20a) pratyaṅ devānāṃ viśaḥ pratyaṅṅ ud eṣi mānuṣīḥ /
analyzed: pratyaṅ devānām viśaḥ pratyaṅ ud eṣi mānuṣīḥ

original: (AVŚ_13,2.20c) pratyaṅ viśvaṃ svar dṛśe //20// {8}

analyzed: yena pāvaka cakṣasā bhuraṇyantam janān anu

original: (AVŚ_13,2.21c) tvaṃ varuṇa paśyasi //21//
analyzed: tvam varuṇa paśyasi

original: (AVŚ_13,2.22a) vi dyām eṣi rajas pṛthv ahar mimāno aktubhiḥ /
analyzed: vi dyām eṣi rajaḥ pṛthu ahar mimānaḥ aktubhiḥ

original: (AVŚ_13,2.22c) paśyan janmāni sūrya //22//
analyzed: paśyan janmāni sūrya

original: (AVŚ_13,2.23a) sapta tvā harito rathe vahanti deva sūrya /
analyzed: sapta tvā haritaḥ rathe vahanti deva sūrya

original: (AVŚ_13,2.23c) śociṣkeśaṃ vicakṣaṇam //23//
analyzed: śociṣkeśam vicakṣaṇam

original: (AVŚ_13,2.24a) ayukta sapta śundhyuvaḥ sūro rathasya naptyaḥ /
analyzed: ayukta sapta śundhyuvaḥ sūraḥ rathasya naptyaḥ

original: (AVŚ_13,2.24c) tābhir yāti svayuktibhiḥ //24//

analyzed: rohitaḥ divam āruhat tapasā tapasvī

analyzed: yaḥ viśvacarṣaṇiḥ uta viśvatomukhaḥ yaḥ viśvataspāṇiḥ uta viśvataspṛthaḥ

analyzed: eka pād dvi padaḥ bhūyas vi cakrame dvi pād tri pādam abhī eti paścāt

original: (AVŚ_13,2.27c) dvipād dha ṣaṭpado bhūyo vi cakrame ta ekapadas tanvaṃ sam āsate //27//

original: (AVŚ_13,2.28a) atandro yāsyan harito yad āsthād dve rūpe kṛṇute rocamānaḥ /
analyzed: atandraḥ yāsyan haritaḥ yat āsthāt dve rūpe kṛṇute rocamānaḥ

original: (AVŚ_13,2.29a) baṇ mahāṃ asi sūrya baḍ āditya mahāṃ asi /
analyzed: baṭ mahān asi sūrya baṭ āditya mahān asi

original: (AVŚ_13,2.30a) rocase divi rocase antarikṣe pataṅga pṛthivyāṃ rocase rocase apsv antaḥ /
analyzed: rocase divi rocase antarikṣe pataṅga pṛthivyām rocase rocase apsu antar

original: (AVŚ_13,2.30c) ubhā samudrau rucyā vy āpitha devo devāsi mahiṣaḥ svarjit //30// {9}
analyzed: ubhā samudrau rucyā vi āpitha devaḥ deva asi mahiṣaḥ svar jit  /

original: (AVŚ_13,2.31a) arvāṅ parastāt prayato vyadhva āśur vipaścit patayan pataṅgaḥ /
analyzed: arvāṅ parastāt prayataḥ vyadhve āśuḥ vipaścit patayan pataṅgaḥ

original: (AVŚ_13,2.31c) viṣṇur vicittaḥ śavasādhitiṣṭhan pra ketunā sahate viśvam ejat //31//
analyzed: viṣṇuḥ vicittaḥ śavasā adhitiṣṭhan pra ketunā sahate viśvam ejat

original: (AVŚ_13,2.32a) citrāś cikitvān mahiṣaḥ suparṇa ārocayan rodasī antarikṣam /
analyzed: citrāḥ cikitvān mahiṣaḥ suparṇaḥ ārocayan rodasī antarikṣam

original: (AVŚ_13,2.32c) ahorātre pari sūryaṃ vasāne prāsya viśvā tirato vīryāṇi //32//
analyzed: ahorātre pari sūryam vasāne pra asya viśvā tirataḥ vīryāṇi

original: (AVŚ_13,2.33a) tigmo vibhrājan tanvaṃ śiśāno 'raṃgamāsaḥ pravato rarāṇaḥ /
analyzed: tigmaḥ vibhrājan tanvam śiśānaḥ raṃgamāsaḥ pravataḥ rarāṇaḥ

original: (AVŚ_13,2.33c) jyotiṣmān pakṣī mahiṣo vayodhā viśvā āsthāt pradiśaḥ kalpamānaḥ //33//
analyzed: jyotiṣmān pakṣī mahiṣaḥ vayodhāḥ viśvāḥ āsthāt pradiśaḥ kalpamānaḥ

original: (AVŚ_13,2.34a) citraṃ devānām ketur anīkaṃ jyotiṣmān pradiśaḥ sūrya udyan /
analyzed: citram devānām ketuḥ anīkam jyotiṣmān pradiśaḥ sūryaḥ udyan

original: (AVŚ_13,2.34c) divākaro 'ti dyumnais tamāṃsi viśvātārīd duritāni śukraḥ //34//
analyzed: divākaraḥ ti dyumnaiḥ tamāṃsi viśvā atārīt duritāni śukraḥ

original: (AVŚ_13,2.35a) citraṃ devānām ud agād anīkaṃ cakṣur mitrasya varuṇasyāgneḥ /
analyzed: citram devānām ud agāt anīkam cakṣuḥ mitrasya varuṇasya agneḥ

original: (AVŚ_13,2.35c) āprād dyāvāpṛthivī antarikṣaṃ sūrya ātmā jagatas tasthuṣaś ca //35//

original: (AVŚ_13,3.23c) kim abhy ārcan marutaḥ pṛśnimātaro yad rohitam ajanayanta devāḥ /
analyzed: kim abhī ārcan marutaḥ pṛśni mātaraḥ yat rohitam ajanayanta devāḥ

original: (AVŚ_13,3.23e) tasya devasya kruddhasyaitad āgo ya evaṃ vidvāṃsaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ jināti /
analyzed: tasya devasya kruddhasya etat āgaḥ yaḥ evam vidvāṃsam brāhmaṇam jināti

original: (AVŚ_13,3.24a) ya ātmadā baladā yasya viśva upāsate praśiṣaṃ yasya devāḥ /
analyzed: yaḥ ātma dāḥ bala dāḥ yasya viśve upāsate praśiṣam yasya devāḥ

original: (AVŚ_13,3.24c) yo 'syeśe dvipado yaś catuṣpadaḥ /
analyzed: yaḥ sya īśe dvipadaḥ yaḥ catuṣpadaḥ

original: (AVŚ_13,3.24e) tasya devasya kruddhasyaitad āgo ya evaṃ vidvāṃsaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ jināti /
analyzed: tasya devasya kruddhasya etat āgaḥ yaḥ evam vidvāṃsam brāhmaṇam jināti

original: (AVŚ_13,3.25a) ekapād dvipado bhūyo vi cakrame dvipāt tripādam abhy eti paścāt /
analyzed: eka pād dvi padaḥ bhūyas vi cakrame dvi pād tri pādam abhī eti paścāt

original: (AVŚ_13,3.25c) catuṣpāc cakre dvipadām abhisvare saṃpaśyan paṅktim upatiṣṭhamānaḥ /
analyzed: catuṣpād cakre dvipadām abhisvare saṃpaśyan paṅktim upatiṣṭhamānaḥ

original: (AVŚ_13,3.25e) tasya devasya kruddhasyaitad āgo ya evaṃ vidvāṃsaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ jināti /
analyzed: tasya devasya kruddhasya etat āgaḥ yaḥ evam vidvāṃsam brāhmaṇam jināti

original: (AVŚ_13,3.26a) kṛṣṇāyaḥ putro arjuno rātryā vatso 'jāyata /
analyzed: kṛṣṇāyaḥ putraḥ arjunaḥ rātryāḥ vatsaḥ jāyata

original: (AVŚ_13,3.26c) sa ha dyām adhi rohati ruho ruroha rohitaḥ //26// {14}
analyzed: sa ha dyām adhi rohati ruhaḥ ruroha rohitaḥ

original: (AVŚ_13,4.26a) sa eti savitā svar divas pṛṣṭhe 'vacākaśat //1//
analyzed: saḥ eti savitā svar divaḥ pṛṣṭhe vacākaśat

original: (AVŚ_13,4.2a) raśmibhir nabha ābhṛtaṃ mahendra ety āvṛtaḥ //2//
analyzed: raśmibhiḥ nabhaḥ ābhṛtam mahā indraḥ eti āvṛtaḥ

original: (AVŚ_13,4.3a) sa dhātā sa vidhartā sa vāyur nabha ucchritam //3//
analyzed: sa dhātā sa vidhartā sa vāyuḥ nabhaḥ ucchritam

original: (AVŚ_13,4.4a) so 'ryamā sa varuṇaḥ sa rudraḥ sa mahādevaḥ //4//
analyzed: saḥ ryamā sa varuṇaḥ sa rudraḥ sa mahādevaḥ

original: (AVŚ_13,4.5a) so agniḥ sa u sūryaḥ sa u eva mahāyamaḥ //5//
analyzed: saḥ agniḥ saḥ u sūryaḥ saḥ u eva mahā yamaḥ

original: (AVŚ_13,4.6a) taṃ vatsā upa tiṣṭhanty ekaśīrṣāṇo yutā daśa //6//
analyzed: tam vatsāḥ upa tiṣṭhanti eka śīrṣāṇaḥ yutāḥ daśa

original: (AVŚ_13,4.7a) paścāt prāñca ā tanvanti yad udeti vi bhāsati //7//
analyzed: paścāt prāñcaḥ ā tanvanti yat udeti vi bhāsati

original: (AVŚ_13,4.8a) tasyaiṣa māruto gaṇaḥ sa eti śikyākṛtaḥ //8//
analyzed: tasya eṣa mārutaḥ gaṇaḥ saḥ eti śikyā kṛtaḥ

original: (AVŚ_13,4.9a) raśmibhir nabha ābhṛtaṃ mahendra ety āvṛtaḥ //9//
analyzed: raśmibhiḥ nabhaḥ ābhṛtam mahā indraḥ eti āvṛtaḥ

original: (AVŚ_13,4.10a) tasyeme nava kośā viṣṭambhā navadhā hitāḥ //10//
analyzed: tasya ime nava kośāḥ viṣṭambhāḥ navadhā hitāḥ

original: (AVŚ_13,4.11a) sa prajābhyo vi paśyati yac ca prāṇati yac ca na //11//
analyzed: sa prajābhyaḥ vi paśyati yat ca prāṇati yat ca na

original: (AVŚ_13,4.12a) tam idaṃ nigataṃ sahaḥ sa eṣa eka ekavṛd eka eva //12//
analyzed: tam idam nigatam sahaḥ saḥ eṣaḥ ekaḥ ekavṛt ekaḥ eva

original: (AVŚ_13,4.13a) ete asmin devā ekavṛto bhavanti //13// {15}
analyzed: ete asmin devāḥ ekavṛtaḥ bhavanti

original: (AVŚ_13,4.14a) kīrtiś ca yaśaś cāmbhaś ca nabhaś ca brāhmaṇavarcasaṃ cānnaṃ cānnādyaṃ ca //14//
analyzed: kīrtiḥ ca yaśaḥ ca ambhaḥ ca nabhaḥ ca brāhmaṇa varcasam ca annam ca annādyam ca

original: (AVŚ_13,4.15a) ya etaṃ devam ekavṛtaṃ veda //15//
analyzed: yaḥ etam devam ekavṛtam veda

original: (AVŚ_13,4.16a) na dvitīyo na tṛtīyaś caturtho nāpy ucyate //16//
analyzed: na dvitīyaḥ na tṛtīyaḥ caturthaḥ na api ucyate

original: (AVŚ_13,4.17a) na pañcamo na ṣaṣṭhaḥ saptamo nāpy ucyate //17//
analyzed: na pañcamaḥ na ṣaṣṭhaḥ saptamaḥ na api ucyate

original: (AVŚ_13,4.18a) nāṣṭamo na navamo daśamo nāpy ucyate //18//
analyzed: na aṣṭamaḥ na navamaḥ daśamaḥ na api ucyate

original: (AVŚ_13,4.19a) sa sarvasmai vi paśyati yac ca prāṇati yac ca na //19//
analyzed: sa sarvasmai vi paśyati yat ca prāṇati yat ca na

original: (AVŚ_13,4.20a) tam idaṃ nigataṃ sahaḥ sa eṣa eka ekavṛd eka eva //20//
analyzed: tam idam nigatam sahaḥ saḥ eṣaḥ ekaḥ ekavṛt ekaḥ eva

original: (AVŚ_13,4.21a) sarve asmin devā ekavṛto bhavanti //21// {16}
analyzed: sarve asmin devāḥ ekavṛtaḥ bhavanti

original: (AVŚ_13,4.22a) brahma ca tapaś ca kīrtiś ca yaśaś cāmbhaś ca nabhaś ca brāhmaṇavarcasaṃ cānnaṃ cānnādyaṃ ca //2//
analyzed: brahma ca tapaḥ ca kīrtiḥ ca yaśaḥ ca ambhaḥ ca nabhaḥ ca brāhmaṇa varcasam ca annam ca annādyam ca

original: (AVŚ_13,4.23a) bhūtaṃ ca bhavyaṃ ca śraddhā ca ruciś ca svargaś ca svadhā ca //23//
analyzed: bhūtam ca bhavyam ca śraddhā ca ruciḥ ca svargaḥ ca svadhā ca

original: (AVŚ_13,4.24a) ya etaṃ devam ekavṛtaṃ veda //24//
analyzed: yaḥ etam devam ekavṛtam veda

original: (AVŚ_13,4.25a) sa eva mṛtyuḥ so 'mṛtaṃ so 'bhvaṃ sa rakṣaḥ //25//
analyzed: saḥ eva mṛtyuḥ saḥ mṛtam saḥ bhvam sa rakṣaḥ

original: (AVŚ_13,4.26a) sa rudro vasuvanir vasudeye namovāke vaṣaṭkāro 'nu saṃhitaḥ //26//

original: (AVŚ_13,4.27a) tasyeme sarve yātava upa praśiṣam āsate //27//
analyzed: tasya ime sarve yātavaḥ upa praśiṣam āsate

original: (AVŚ_13,4.28a) tasyāmū sarvā nakṣatrā vaśe candramasā saha //28// {17}
analyzed: tasya amū sarvā nakṣatrā vaśe candramasā saha

original: (AVŚ_13,4.29a) sa vā ahno 'jāyata tasmād ahar ajāyata //29//
analyzed: sa vai ahnaḥ jāyata tasmāt ahar ajāyata

original: (AVŚ_13,4.30a) sa vai rātryā ajāyata tasmād rātrir ajāyata //30//
analyzed: sa vai rātryāḥ ajāyata tasmāt rātriḥ ajāyata

original: (AVŚ_13,4.31a) sa vā antarikṣād ajāyata tasmād antarikṣam ajāyata //31//

original: (AVŚ_13,4.32a) sa vai vāyor ajāyata tasmād vāyur ajāyata //32//
analyzed: sa vai vāyoḥ ajāyata tasmāt vāyuḥ ajāyata

original: (AVŚ_13,4.33a) sa vai divo 'jāyata tasmād dyaur adhi ajāyata //33//

original: (AVŚ_13,4.34a) sa vai digbhyo 'jāyata tasmād diśo 'jāyanta //34//

original: (AVŚ_13,4.35a) sa vai bhūmer ajāyata tasmād bhūmir ajāyata //35//

original: (AVŚ_13,4.36a) sa vā agner ajāyata tasmād agnir ajāyata //36//
analyzed: sa vai agneḥ ajāyata tasmāt agniḥ ajāyata

original: (AVŚ_13,4.38a) sa vā ṛgbhyo 'jāyata tasmād ṛco 'jāyanta //38//

original: (AVŚ_13,4.39a) sa vai yajñād ajāyata tasmād yajño 'jāyata //39//
analyzed: sa vai yajñāt ajāyata tasmāt yajñaḥ jāyata

original: (AVŚ_13,4.40a) sa yajñas tasya yajñaḥ sa yajñasya śiras kṛtam //40//
analyzed: sa yajñaḥ tasya yajñaḥ sa yajñasya śiraḥ kṛtam

original: (AVŚ_13,4.41a) sa stanayati sa vi dyotate sa u aśmānam asyati //41//
analyzed: sa stanayati sa vi dyotate saḥ u aśmānam asyati

original: (AVŚ_13,4.42a) pāpāya vā bhadrāya vā puruṣāyāsurāya vā //42//
analyzed: pāpāya vā bhadrāya vā puruṣāya asurāya vā

original: (AVŚ_13,4.43a) yad vā kṛṇoṣy oṣadhīr yad vā varṣasi bhadrayā yad vā janyam avīvṛdhaḥ //43//
analyzed: yat vā kṛṇoṣi oṣadhīḥ yat vā varṣasi bhadrayā yat vā janyam avīvṛdhaḥ

original: (AVŚ_13,4.44a) tāvāṃs te maghavan mahimopo te tanvaḥ śatam //44//
analyzed: tāvān te maghavan mahimā upa u te tanvaḥ śatam

original: (AVŚ_13,4.45a) upo te badhve baddhāni yadi vāsi nyarbudam //45// {18}
analyzed: upa u te badhve baddhāni yadi vā asi nyarbudam

original: (AVŚ_13,4.46a) bhūyān indro namurād bhūyān indrāsi mṛtyubhyaḥ //46//

original: (AVŚ_13,4.47a) bhūyān arātyāḥ śacyāḥ patis tvam indrāsi vibhūḥ prabhūr iti tvopāsmahe vayam //47//

original: (AVŚ_13,4.48a) namas te astu paśyata paśya mā paśyata //48//
analyzed: namaḥ te astu paśyata paśya mā paśyata

original: (AVŚ_13,4.49a) annādyena yaśasā tejasā brāhmaṇavarcasena //49//

original: (AVŚ_13,4.52a) uruḥ pṛthuḥ subhūr bhuva iti tvopāsmahe vayam //52//
analyzed: uruḥ pṛthuḥ subhūḥ bhuvaḥ iti tvā upāsmahe vayam

original: (AVŚ_13,4.53a) pratho varo vyaco loka iti tvopāsmahe vayam //53//
analyzed: prathaḥ varaḥ vyacaḥ lokaḥ iti tvā upāsmahe vayam

original: (AVŚ_13,4.54a) bhavadvasur idadvasuḥ saṃyadvasur āyadvasur iti tvopāsmahe vayam //54//
analyzed: bhavat vasuḥ idadvasuḥ saṃyat vasuḥ āyat vasuḥ iti tvā upāsmahe vayam

original: (AVŚ_13,4.55a) namas te astu paśyata paśya mā paśyata //55//
analyzed: namaḥ te astu paśyata paśya mā paśyata

original: (AVŚ_13,4.56a) annādyena yaśasā tejasā brāhmaṇavarcasena //56// {20}
analyzed: annādyena yaśasā tejasā brāhmaṇa varcasena

original: (AVŚ_14,1.1a) satyenottabhitā bhūmiḥ sūryeṇottabhitā dyauḥ /
analyzed: satyena uttabhitā bhūmiḥ sūryeṇa uttabhitā dyauḥ

original: (AVŚ_14,1.1c) ṛtenādityās tiṣṭhanti divi somo adhi śritaḥ //1//
analyzed: ṛtena ādityāḥ tiṣṭhanti divi somaḥ adhi śritaḥ

original: (AVŚ_14,1.2a) somenādityā balinaḥ somena pṛthivī mahī /
analyzed: somena ādityāḥ balinaḥ somena pṛthivī mahī

original: (AVŚ_14,1.2c) atho nakṣatrāṇām eṣām upasthe soma āhitaḥ //2//
analyzed: atha u nakṣatrāṇām eṣām upasthe somaḥ āhitaḥ

original: (AVŚ_14,1.3a) somaṃ manyate papivān yat saṃpiṃṣanty oṣadhim /
analyzed: somam manyate papivān yat saṃpiṃṣanti oṣadhim

original: (AVŚ_14,1.3c) somaṃ yaṃ brahmāṇo vidur na tasyāśnāti pārthivaḥ //3//
analyzed: somam yam brahmāṇaḥ viduḥ na tasya aśnāti pārthivaḥ

original: (AVŚ_14,1.4a) yat tvā soma prapibanti tata ā pyāyase punaḥ /
analyzed: yat tvā soma prapibanti tatas ā pyāyase punar

original: (AVŚ_14,1.4c) vāyuḥ somasya rakṣitā samānāṃ māsa ākṛtiḥ //4//
analyzed: vāyuḥ somasya rakṣitā samānām māsaḥ ākṛtiḥ

original: (AVŚ_14,1.5a) āchadvidhānair gupito bārhataiḥ soma rakṣitaḥ /
analyzed: āchad vidhānaiḥ gupitaḥ bārhataiḥ soma rakṣitaḥ

original: (AVŚ_14,1.5c) grāvṇām ic chṛṇvan tiṣṭhasi na te aśnāti pārthivaḥ //5//
analyzed: grāvṇām id śṛṇvan tiṣṭhasi na te aśnāti pārthivaḥ

original: (AVŚ_14,1.6a) cittir ā upabarhaṇaṃ cakṣur ā abhyañjanam /
analyzed: cittiḥ āḥ upabarhaṇam cakṣuḥ āḥ abhyañjanam

original: (AVŚ_14,1.6c) dyaur bhūmiḥ kośa āsīd yad ayāt sūryā patim //6//
analyzed: dyauḥ bhūmiḥ kośaḥ āsīt yat ayāt sūryā patim

original: (AVŚ_14,1.7a) raibhy āsīd anudeyī nārāśaṃsī nyocanī /
analyzed: raibhī āsīt anudeyī nārāśaṃsī nyocanī

original: (AVŚ_14,1.7c) suryāyā bhadram id vāso gāthayati pariṣkṛtā //7//
analyzed: suryāyāḥ bhadram id vāsaḥ gāthayati pariṣkṛtā

original: (AVŚ_14,1.8a) stomā āsan pratidhayaḥ kurīraṃ chanda opaśaḥ /
analyzed: stomāḥ āsan pratidhayaḥ kurīram chandaḥ opaśaḥ

original: (AVŚ_14,1.8c) sūryāyā aśvinā varāgnir āsīt purogavaḥ //8//
analyzed: sūryāyāḥ aśvinā varā agniḥ āsīt purogavaḥ

original: (AVŚ_14,1.9a) somo vadhūyur abhavad aśvināstām ubhā varā /
analyzed: somaḥ vadhūyuḥ abhavat aśvinā āstām ubhā varā

original: (AVŚ_14,1.9c) sūryāṃ yat patye śaṃsantīṃ manasā savitādadāt //9//
analyzed: sūryām yat patye śaṃsantīm manasā savitā adadāt

original: (AVŚ_14,1.10a) mano asyā ana āsīd dyaur āsīd uta chadiḥ /
analyzed: manaḥ asyāḥ anaḥ āsīt dyauḥ āsīt uta chadiḥ

original: (AVŚ_14,1.10c) śukrāv anaḍvāhāv āstāṃ yad ayāt sūryā patim //10// {1}
analyzed: śukrau anaḍvāhau āstām yat ayāt sūryā patim

original: (AVŚ_14,1.11a) ṛksāmābhyām abhihitau gāvau te sāmanāv aitām /
analyzed: ṛk sāmābhyām abhihitau gāvau te sāmanau aitām

original: (AVŚ_14,1.11c) śrotre te cakre āstāṃ divi panthāś carācaraḥ //11//
analyzed: śrotre te cakre āstām divi panthāḥ cara acaraḥ

original: (AVŚ_14,1.12a) śucī te cakre yātyā vyāno akṣa āhataḥ /
analyzed: śucī te cakre yātyāḥ vyānaḥ akṣaḥ āhataḥ

original: (AVŚ_14,1.12c) ano manasmayaṃ sūryārohat prayatī patim //12//
analyzed: anaḥ manasmayam sūryā ārohat prayatī patim

original: (AVŚ_14,1.13a) sūryāyā vahatuḥ prāgāt savitā yam avāsṛjat /
analyzed: sūryāyāḥ vahatuḥ prāgāt savitā yam avāsṛjat

original: (AVŚ_14,1.13c) maghāsu hanyante gāvaḥ phalgunīṣu vy uhyate //13//
analyzed: maghāsu hanyante gāvaḥ phalgunīṣu vi uhyate

original: (AVŚ_14,1.14a) yad aśvinā pṛchamānāv ayātaṃ tricakreṇa vahatuṃ sūryāyāḥ /
analyzed: yat aśvinā pṛcchamānau ayātam tri cakreṇa vahatum sūryāyāḥ

original: (AVŚ_14,1.14c) kvaikaṃ cakraṃ vām āsīt kva deṣṭrāya tasthathuḥ //14//
analyzed: kva ekam cakram vām āsīt kva deṣṭrāya tasthathuḥ

original: (AVŚ_14,1.15a) yad ayātaṃ śubhas patī vareyaṃ sūryām upa /
analyzed: yat ayātam śubhaḥ patī vareyam sūryām upa

original: (AVŚ_14,1.15c) viśve devā anu tad vām ajānan putraḥ pitaram avṛṇīta pūṣā //15//
analyzed: viśve devāḥ anu tat vām ajānan putraḥ pitaram avṛṇīta pūṣā

original: (AVŚ_14,1.16a) dve te cakre sūrye brahmāṇa ṛtuthā viduḥ /
analyzed: dve te cakre sūrye brahmāṇaḥ ṛtuthā viduḥ

original: (AVŚ_14,1.16c) athaikaṃ cakraṃ yad guhā tad addhātaya id viduḥ //16//
analyzed: atha ekam cakram yat guhā tat addhātayaḥ id viduḥ

original: (AVŚ_14,1.17a) aryamaṇaṃ yajāmahe subandhuṃ pativedanam /
analyzed: aryamaṇam yajāmahe su bandhum pati vedanam

original: (AVŚ_14,1.17c) urvārukam iva bandhanāt preto muñcāmi nāmutaḥ //17//
analyzed: urvārukam iva bandhanāt pretaḥ muñcāmi na amutas

original: (AVŚ_14,1.18a) preto muñcāmi nāmutaḥ subaddhām amutas karam /
analyzed: pretaḥ muñcāmi na amutas su baddhām amutas karam

original: (AVŚ_14,1.18c) yatheyam indra mīḍhvaḥ suputrā subhagāsati //18//
analyzed: yathā iyam indra mīḍhvaḥ su putrā subhagā asati

original: (AVŚ_14,1.19a) pra tvā muñcāmi varuṇasya pāśād yena tvābadhnāt savitā suśevāḥ /
analyzed: pra tvā muñcāmi varuṇasya pāśāt yena tvā abadhnāt savitā suśevāḥ

original: (AVŚ_14,1.19c) ṛtasya yonau sukṛtasya loke syonaṃ te astu sahasaṃbhalāyai //19//
analyzed: ṛtasya yonau sukṛtasya loke syonam te astu saha saṃbhalāyai

original: (AVŚ_14,1.20a) bhagas tveto nayatu hastagṛhyāśvinā tvā pra vahatāṃ rathena /
analyzed: bhagaḥ tvā itas nayatu hasta gṛhya aśvinā tvā pra vahatām rathena

original: (AVŚ_14,1.20c) gṛhān gacha gṛhapatnī yathāso vaśinī tvaṃ vidatham ā vadāsi //20// {2}
analyzed: gṛhān gacha gṛha patnī yathā asaḥ vaśinī tvam vidatham ā vadāsi

original: (AVŚ_14,1.21a) iha priyaṃ prajāyai te sam ṛdhyatām asmin gṛhe gārhapatyāya jāgṛhi /
analyzed: iha priyam prajāyai te sam ṛdhyatām asmin gṛhe gārhapatyāya jāgṛhi

original: (AVŚ_14,1.21c) enā patyā tanvaṃ saṃ spṛśasvātha jirvir vidatham ā vadāsi //21//
analyzed: enā patyā tanvam sam spṛśasva atha jirviḥ vidatham ā vadāsi

original: (AVŚ_14,1.22a) ihaiva staṃ mā vi yauṣṭaṃ viśvam āyur vy aśnutam /
analyzed: iha eva stam mā vi viśvam āyuḥ vi aśnutam

original: (AVŚ_14,1.22c) krīḍantau putrair naptṛbhir modamānau svastakau //22//
analyzed: krīḍantau putraiḥ naptṛbhiḥ modamānau svastakau

original: (AVŚ_14,1.23a) pūrvāparaṃ carato māyaitau śiśū krīḍantau pari yāto 'rṇavam /
analyzed: pūrva aparam carataḥ māyā etau śiśū krīḍantau pari yātaḥ rṇavam

original: (AVŚ_14,1.23c) viśvānyo bhuvanā vicaṣṭa ṛtūṃr anyo vidadhaj jāyase navaḥ //23//
analyzed: viśvā anyaḥ bhuvanā vicaṣṭe ṛtūṃr anyaḥ vidadhat jāyase navaḥ

original: (AVŚ_14,1.24a) navonavo bhavasi jāyamāno 'hnāṃ ketur uṣasām eṣy agram /
analyzed: navaḥ navaḥ bhavasi jāyamānaḥ hnām ketuḥ uṣasām eṣi agram

original: (AVŚ_14,1.24c) bhāgaṃ devebhyo vi dadhāsy āyan pra candramas tirase dīrgham āyuḥ //24//
analyzed: bhāgam devebhyaḥ vi dadhāsi āyan pra candramaḥ tirase dīrgham āyuḥ

original: (AVŚ_14,1.25a) parā dehi śāmulyaṃ brahmabhyo vi bhajā vasu /
analyzed: parā dehi śāmulyam brahmabhyaḥ vi bhaja vasu

original: (AVŚ_14,1.25c) kṛtyaiṣā padvatī bhūtvā jāyā viśate patim //25//
analyzed: kṛtyā eṣā padvatī bhūtvā jāyā viśate patim

original: (AVŚ_14,1.26a) nīlalohitaṃ bhavati kṛtyāsaktir vy ajyate /
analyzed: nīla lohitam bhavati kṛtyā saktiḥ vi ajyate

original: (AVŚ_14,1.26c) edhante asyā jñātayaḥ patir bandheṣu badhyate //26//
analyzed: edhante asyāḥ jñātayaḥ patiḥ bandheṣu badhyate

original: (AVŚ_14,1.27a) aślīlā tanūr bhavati ruśatī pāpayāmuyā /
analyzed: aślīlā tanūḥ bhavati ruśatī pāpayā amuyā

original: (AVŚ_14,1.27c) patir yad vadhvo vāsasaḥ svam aṅgam abhyūrṇute //27//
analyzed: patiḥ yat vadhvaḥ vāsasaḥ svam aṅgam abhyūrṇute

original: (AVŚ_14,1.28a) āśasanaṃ viśasanam atho adhivikartanam /
analyzed: āśasanam viśasanam atha u adhivikartanam

original: (AVŚ_14,1.28c) sūryāyāḥ paśya rūpāṇi tāni brahmota śumbhati //28//
analyzed: sūryāyāḥ paśya rūpāṇi tāni brahmā uta śumbhati

original: (AVŚ_14,1.29a) tṛṣṭam etat kaṭukam apāṣṭhavad viṣavan naitad attave /
analyzed: tṛṣṭam etat kaṭukam apāṣṭhavat viṣavat na etat attave

original: (AVŚ_14,1.29c) sūryāṃ yo brahmā veda sa id vādhūyam arhati //29//
analyzed: sūryām yaḥ brahmā veda saḥ id vādhūyam arhati

original: (AVŚ_14,1.30a) sa it tat syonaṃ harati brahmā vāsaḥ sumaṅgalam /
analyzed: saḥ id tat syonam harati brahmā vāsaḥ su maṅgalam

original: (AVŚ_14,1.30c) prāyaścittiṃ yo adhyeti yena jāyā na riṣyati //30// {3}
analyzed: prāyaścittim yaḥ adhyeti yena jāyā na riṣyati

original: (AVŚ_14,1.31a) yuvaṃ bhagaṃ saṃ bharataṃ samṛddham ṛtaṃ vadantāv ṛtodyeṣu /
analyzed: yuvam bhagam sam bharatam samṛddham ṛtam vadantau ṛtodyeṣu

original: (AVŚ_14,1.31c) brahmaṇas pate patim asyai rocaya cāru saṃbhalo vadatu vācam etām //31//
analyzed: brahmaṇaḥ pate patim asyai rocaya cāru saṃbhalaḥ vadatu vācam etām

original: (AVŚ_14,1.32a) ihed asātha na paro gamāthemaṃ gāvaḥ prajayā vardhayātha /
analyzed: iha id asātha na paras gamātha imam gāvaḥ prajayā vardhaya atha

original: (AVŚ_14,1.32c) śubhaṃ yatīr usriyāḥ somavarcaso viśve devāḥ krann iha vo manāṃsi //32//
analyzed: śubham yatīḥ usriyāḥ soma varcasaḥ viśve devāḥ kran iha vaḥ manāṃsi

original: (AVŚ_14,1.33a) imaṃ gāvaḥ prajayā saṃ viśāthāyaṃ devānāṃ na mināti bhāgam /
analyzed: imam gāvaḥ prajayā sam viśātha ayam devānām na mināti bhāgam

original: (AVŚ_14,1.33c) asmai vaḥ pūṣā marutaś ca sarve asmai vo dhātā savitā suvāti //33//
analyzed: asmai vaḥ pūṣā marutaḥ ca sarve asmai vaḥ dhātā savitā suvāti

original: (AVŚ_14,1.34a) anṛkṣarā ṛjavaḥ santu panthano yebhiḥ sakhāyo yanti no vareyam /
analyzed: anṛkṣarāḥ ṛjavaḥ santu panthanaḥ yebhiḥ sakhāyaḥ yanti naḥ vareyam

original: (AVŚ_14,1.34c) saṃ bhagena sam aryamṇā saṃ dhātā sṛjatu varcasā //34//
analyzed: sam bhagena sam aryamṇā sam dhātā sṛjatu varcasā

original: (AVŚ_14,1.35a) yac ca varco akṣeṣu surāyāṃ ca yad āhitam /
analyzed: yat ca varcaḥ akṣeṣu surāyām ca yat āhitam

original: (AVŚ_14,1.35c) yad goṣv aśvinā varcas tenemāṃ varcasāvatam //35//
analyzed: yat goṣu aśvinā varcaḥ tena imām varcasā avatam

original: (AVŚ_14,1.36a) yena mahānaghnyā jaghanam aśvinā yena vā surā /
analyzed: yena mahānaghnyā jaghanam aśvinā yena vā surā

original: (AVŚ_14,1.36c) yenākṣā abhyaṣicyanta tenemāṃ varcasāvatam //36//
analyzed: yena akṣāḥ abhyaṣicyanta tena imām varcasā avatam

original: (AVŚ_14,1.37a) yo anidhmo dīdayad apsv antar yaṃ viprāsa īḍate adhvareṣu /
analyzed: yaḥ anidhmaḥ dīdayat apsu antar yam viprāsaḥ īḍate adhvareṣu

original: (AVŚ_14,1.37c) apāṃ napān madhumatīr apo dā yābhir indro vāvṛdhe vīryāvān //37//
analyzed: apām napāt madhumatīḥ apaḥ dāḥ yābhiḥ indraḥ vāvṛdhe vīryāvān

original: (AVŚ_14,1.38a) idam ahaṃ ruśantaṃ grābhaṃ tanūdūṣim apohāmi /
analyzed: idam aham ruśantam grābham tanū dūṣim apohāmi

original: (AVŚ_14,1.38c) yo bhadro rocanas tam ud acāmi //38//
analyzed: yaḥ bhadraḥ rocanaḥ tam ud acāmi

original: (AVŚ_14,1.39a) āsyai brāhmaṇāḥ snapanīr harantv avīraghnīr ud ajantv āpaḥ /
analyzed: ā asyai brāhmaṇāḥ snapanīḥ harantu a vīra ghnīḥ ud ajantu āpaḥ

original: (AVŚ_14,1.39c) aryamṇo agniṃ pary etu pūṣan pratīkṣante śvaśuro devaraś ca //39//
analyzed: aryamṇaḥ agnim pari etu pūṣan pratīkṣante śvaśuraḥ devaraḥ ca

original: (AVŚ_14,1.40a) śaṃ te hiraṇyaṃ śam u santv āpaḥ śaṃ methir bhavatu śaṃ yugasya tardma /
analyzed: śam te hiraṇyam śam u santu āpaḥ śam methiḥ bhavatu śam yugasya tardma

original: (AVŚ_14,1.40c) śaṃ ta āpaḥ śatapavitrā bhavantu śam u patyā tanvaṃ saṃ spṛśasva //40// {4}
analyzed: śam te āpaḥ śata pavitrāḥ bhavantu śam u patyā tanvam sam spṛśasva

original: (AVŚ_14,1.41a) khe rathasya khe 'nasaḥ khe yugasya śatakrato /
analyzed: khe rathasya khe nasaḥ khe yugasya śatakrato

original: (AVŚ_14,1.41c) apālām indra triṣ pūtvākṛṇoḥ sūryatvacam //41//
analyzed: apālām indra tris pūtvā akṛṇoḥ sūrya tvacam

original: (AVŚ_14,1.42a) āśāsānā saumanasaṃ prajāṃ saubhāgyaṃ rayim /
analyzed: āśāsānā saumanasam prajām saubhāgyam rayim

original: (AVŚ_14,1.42c) patyur anuvratā bhūtvā saṃ nahyasvāmṛtāya kam //42//
analyzed: patyuḥ anuvratā bhūtvā sam nahyasva amṛtāya kam

original: (AVŚ_14,1.43a) yathā sindhur nadīnāṃ sāmrājyaṃ suṣuve vṛṣā /
analyzed: yathā sindhuḥ nadīnām sāmrājyam suṣuve vṛṣā

original: (AVŚ_14,1.43c) evā tvaṃ samrājñy edhi patyur astaṃ paretya //43//
analyzed: eva tvam samrājñī edhi patyuḥ astam paretya

original: (AVŚ_14,1.44a) samrājñy edhi śvaśureṣu samrājñy uta devṛṣu /
analyzed: samrājñī edhi śvaśureṣu samrājñī uta devṛṣu

original: (AVŚ_14,1.44c) nanānduḥ samrājñy edhi samrājñy uta śvaśrvāḥ //44//
analyzed: nanānduḥ samrājñī edhi samrājñī uta śvaśrvāḥ

original: (AVŚ_14,1.45a) yā akṛntann avayan yāś ca tatnire yā devīr antāṃ abhito 'dadanta /
analyzed: yāḥ akṛntan avayan yāḥ ca tatnire yāḥ devīḥ abhitas dadanta

original: (AVŚ_14,1.45c) tās tvā jarase saṃ vyayantv āyuṣmatīdaṃ pari dhatsva vāsaḥ //45//
analyzed: tāḥ tvā jarase sam vyayantu āyuṣmatī idam pari dhatsva vāsaḥ

original: (AVŚ_14,1.46a) jīvaṃ rudanti vi nayanty adhvaraṃ dīrghām anu prasitiṃ dīdhyur naraḥ /
analyzed: jīvam rudanti vi nayanti adhvaram dīrghām anu prasitim dīdhyuḥ naraḥ

original: (AVŚ_14,1.46c) vāmaṃ pitṛbhyo ya idaṃ samīrire mayaḥ patibhyo janaye pariṣvaje //46//
analyzed: vāmam pitṛbhyaḥ ye idam samīrire mayaḥ patibhyaḥ janaye pariṣvaje

original: (AVŚ_14,1.47a) syonaṃ dhruvaṃ prajāyai dhārayāmi te 'śmānaṃ devyāḥ pṛthivyā upasthe /
analyzed: syonam dhruvam prajāyai dhārayāmi te śmānam devyāḥ pṛthivyāḥ upasthe

original: (AVŚ_14,1.47c) tam ā tiṣṭhānumādyā suvarcā dīrghaṃ ta āyuḥ savitā kṛṇotu //47//
analyzed: tam ā tiṣṭha anumādyā su varcāḥ dīrgham te āyuḥ savitā kṛṇotu

original: (AVŚ_14,1.48a) yenāgnir asyā bhūmyā hastaṃ jagrāha dakṣiṇam /
analyzed: yena agniḥ asyāḥ bhūmyāḥ hastam jagrāha dakṣiṇam

original: (AVŚ_14,1.48c) tena gṛhṇāmi te hastaṃ mā vyathiṣṭhā mayā saha prajayā ca dhanena ca //48//
analyzed: tena gṛhṇāmi te hastam mā vyathiṣṭhāḥ mayā saha prajayā ca dhanena ca

original: (AVŚ_14,1.49a) devas te savitā hastaṃ gṛhṇātu somo rājā suprajasaṃ kṛṇotu /
analyzed: devaḥ te savitā hastam gṛhṇātu somaḥ rājā suprajasam kṛṇotu

original: (AVŚ_14,1.49c) agniḥ subhagāṃ jatavedāḥ patye patnīṃ jaradaṣṭim kṛṇotu //49//
analyzed: agniḥ subhagām jata vedāḥ patye patnīm jaradaṣṭim kṛṇotu

original: (AVŚ_14,1.50a) gṛhṇāmi te saubhagatvāya hastaṃ mayā patyā jaradaṣṭir yathāsaḥ /
analyzed: gṛhṇāmi te saubhaga tvāya hastam mayā patyā jaradaṣṭiḥ yathā asaḥ

original: (AVŚ_14,1.50c) bhago aryamā savitā puraṃdhir mahyaṃ tvādur gārhapatyāya devāḥ //50// {5}
analyzed: bhagaḥ aryamā savitā puraṃdhiḥ mahyam tvā aduḥ gārhapatyāya devāḥ

original: (AVŚ_14,1.51a) bhagas te hastam agrahīt savitā hastam agrahīt /
analyzed: bhagaḥ te hastam agrahīt savitā hastam agrahīt

original: (AVŚ_14,1.51c) patnī tvam asi dharmaṇāhaṃ gṛhapatis tava //51//
analyzed: patnī tvam asi dharmaṇā aham gṛhapatiḥ tava

original: (AVŚ_14,1.52a) mameyam astu poṣyā mahyaṃ tvādād bṛhaspatiḥ /
analyzed: mama iyam astu poṣyā mahyam tvā adāt bṛhaspatiḥ

original: (AVŚ_14,1.52c) mayā patyā prajāvati saṃ jīva śaradaḥ śatam //52//
analyzed: mayā patyā prajāvati sam jīva śaradaḥ śatam

original: (AVŚ_14,1.53a) tvaṣṭā vāso vy adadhāc chubhe kaṃ bṛhaspateḥ praśiṣā kavīnām /
analyzed: tvaṣṭā vāsaḥ vi adadhāt śubhe kam bṛhaspateḥ praśiṣā kavīnām

original: (AVŚ_14,1.53c) tenemāṃ nārīṃ savitā bhagaś ca sūryām iva pari dhattāṃ prajayā //53//
analyzed: tena imām nārīm savitā bhagaḥ ca sūryām iva pari dhattām prajayā

original: (AVŚ_14,1.54a) indrāgnī dyāvāpṛthivī mātariśvā mitrāvaruṇā bhago aśvinobhā /
analyzed: indra agnī dyāvāpṛthivī mātariśvā mitrāvaruṇā bhagaḥ aśvinā ubhā

original: (AVŚ_14,1.54c) bṛhaspatir maruto brahma soma imāṃ nāriṃ prajayā vardhayantu //54//
analyzed: bṛhaspatiḥ marutaḥ brahma somaḥ imām nārim prajayā vardhayantu

original: (AVŚ_14,1.55a) bṛhaspatiḥ prathamaḥ sūryāyāḥ śīrṣe keśāṃ akalpayat /
analyzed: bṛhaspatiḥ prathamaḥ sūryāyāḥ śīrṣe keśān akalpayat

original: (AVŚ_14,1.55c) tenemām aśvinā nārīṃ patye saṃ śobhayāmasi //55//
analyzed: tena imām aśvinā nārīm patye sam śobhayāmasi

original: (AVŚ_14,1.56a) idaṃ tad rūpaṃ yad avasta yoṣā jāyāṃ jijñāse manasā carantīm /
analyzed: idam tat rūpam yat avasta yoṣā jāyām jijñāse manasā carantīm

original: (AVŚ_14,1.56c) tām anv artiṣye sakhibhir navagvaiḥ ka imān vidvān vi cacarta pāśān //56//
analyzed: tām anu sakhibhiḥ navagvaiḥ kaḥ imān vidvān vi cacarta pāśān

original: (AVŚ_14,1.57a) ahaṃ vi ṣyāmi mayi rūpam asyā vedad it paśyan manasaḥ kulāyam /
analyzed: aham vi syāmi mayi rūpam asyāḥ vedat id paśyan manasaḥ kulāyam

original: (AVŚ_14,1.57c) na steyam admi manasod amucye svayaṃ śrathnāno varuṇasya pāśān //57//
analyzed: na steyam admi manasā ud amucye svayam śrathnānaḥ varuṇasya pāśān

original: (AVŚ_14,1.58a) pra tvā muñcāmi varuṇasya pāśād yena tvābadhnāt savitā suśevāḥ /
analyzed: pra tvā muñcāmi varuṇasya pāśāt yena tvā abadhnāt savitā suśevāḥ

original: (AVŚ_14,1.58c) uruṃ lokaṃ sugam atra panthāṃ kṛṇomi tubhyaṃ sahapatnyai vadhu //58//
analyzed: urum lokam sugam atra panthām kṛṇomi tubhyam saha patnyai vadhu

original: (AVŚ_14,1.59a) ud yachadhvam apa rakṣo hanāthemaṃ nārīṃ sukṛte dadhāta /
analyzed: ud yacchadhvam apa rakṣaḥ hanātha imam nārīm su kṛte dadhāta

original: (AVŚ_14,1.59c) dhātā vipaścit patim asyai viveda bhago rājā pura etu prajānan //59//
analyzed: dhātā vipaścit patim asyai viveda bhagaḥ rājā puras etu prajānan

original: (AVŚ_14,1.60a) bhagas tatakṣa caturaḥ pādān bhagas tatakṣa catvāry uṣpalāni /
analyzed: bhagaḥ tatakṣa caturaḥ pādān bhagaḥ tatakṣa catvāri uṣpalāni

original: (AVŚ_14,1.60c) tvaṣṭā pipeśa madhyato 'nu vardhrānt sā no astu sumaṅgalī //60//
analyzed: tvaṣṭā pipeśa madhyatas nu vardhrān sā naḥ astu su maṅgalī

original: (AVŚ_14,1.61a) sukiṃśukaṃ vahatuṃ viśvarūpaṃ hiraṇyavarṇaṃ suvṛtaṃ sucakram /
analyzed: su kiṃśukam vahatum viśva rūpam hiraṇya varṇam suvṛtam su cakram

original: (AVŚ_14,1.61c) ā roha sūrye amṛtasya lokaṃ syonaṃ patibhyo vahatuṃ kṛṇu tvam //61//
analyzed: ā roha sūrye amṛtasya lokam syonam patibhyaḥ vahatum kṛṇu tvam

original: (AVŚ_14,1.62a) abhrātṛghnīṃ varuṇāpaśughnīṃ bṛhaspate /
analyzed: a bhrātṛ ghnīm varuṇa a paśu ghnīm bṛhaspate

original: (AVŚ_14,1.62c) indrāpatighnīm putriṇīm āsmabhyaṃ savitar vaha //62//
analyzed: indra a pati ghnīm putriṇīm ā asmabhyam savitar vaha

original: (AVŚ_14,1.63a) mā hiṃsiṣṭaṃ kumāryaṃ sthūṇe devakṛte pathi /
analyzed: mā hiṃsiṣṭam kumāryam sthūṇe deva kṛte pathi

original: (AVŚ_14,1.63c) śālāyā devyā dvāraṃ syonaṃ kṛṇmo vadhūpatham //63//
analyzed: śālāyāḥ devyāḥ dvāram syonam kṛṇmaḥ vadhū patham

original: (AVŚ_14,1.64a) brahmāparaṃ yujyatāṃ brahma pūrvaṃ brahmāntato madhyato brahma sarvataḥ /
analyzed: brahma aparam yujyatām brahma pūrvam brahma antatas madhyatas brahma sarvatas

original: (AVŚ_14,1.64c) anāvyādhāṃ devapurāṃ prapadya śivā syonā patiloke vi rāja //64// {6}
analyzed: an āvyādhām deva purām prapadya śivā syonā pati loke vi rāja

original: (AVŚ_14,2.1a) tubhyam agre pary avahant sūryāṃ vahatunā saha /
analyzed: tubhyam agre pari avahan sūryām vahatunā saha

original: (AVŚ_14,2.1c) sa naḥ patibhyo jāyāṃ dā agne prajayā saha //1//
analyzed: sa naḥ patibhyaḥ jāyām dāḥ agne prajayā saha

original: (AVŚ_14,2.2a) punaḥ patnīm agnir adād āyuṣā saha varcasā /
analyzed: punar patnīm agniḥ adāt āyuṣā saha varcasā

original: (AVŚ_14,2.2c) dīrghāyur asyā yaḥ patir jīvāti śaradaḥ śatam //2//
analyzed: dīrgha āyuḥ asyāḥ yaḥ patiḥ jīvāti śaradaḥ śatam

original: (AVŚ_14,2.3a) somasya jāyā prathamaṃ gandharvas te 'paraḥ patiḥ /
analyzed: somasya jāyā prathamam gandharvaḥ te paraḥ patiḥ

original: (AVŚ_14,2.3c) tṛtīyo agniṣ ṭe patis turīyas te manuṣyajāḥ //3//
analyzed: tṛtīyaḥ agniḥ te patiḥ turīyaḥ te manuṣya jāḥ

original: (AVŚ_14,2.4a) somo dadad gandharvāya gandharvo dadad agnaye /
analyzed: somaḥ dadat gandharvāya gandharvaḥ dadat agnaye

original: (AVŚ_14,2.4c) rayiṃ ca putrāṃs cādād agnir mahyam atho imām //4//
analyzed: rayim ca putrān ca adāt agniḥ mahyam atha u imām

original: (AVŚ_14,2.5a) ā vām agant sumatir vājinīvasū ny aśvinā hṛtsu kāmā araṃsata /
analyzed: ā vām agan sumatiḥ vājinīvasū ni aśvinā hṛtsu kāmāḥ araṃsata

original: (AVŚ_14,2.5c) abhūtaṃ gopā mithunā śubhas patī priyā aryamṇo duryāṃ aśīmahi //5//
analyzed: abhūtam gopā mithunā śubhaḥ patī priyāḥ aryamṇaḥ duryām aśīmahi

original: (AVŚ_14,2.6a) sā mandasānā manasā śivena rayiṃ dhehi sarvavīraṃ vacasyam /
analyzed: sā mandasānā manasā śivena rayim dhehi sarva vīram vacasyam

original: (AVŚ_14,2.6c) sugaṃ tīrthaṃ suprapāṇaṃ śubhas patī sthāṇuṃ pathiṣṭhām apa durmatiṃ hatam //6//
analyzed: su gam tīrtham su prapāṇam śubhaḥ patī sthāṇum pathiṣṭhām apa durmatim hatam

original: (AVŚ_14,2.7a) yā oṣadhayo yā nadyo yāni kṣetrāṇi yā vanā /
analyzed: yāḥ oṣadhayaḥ yāḥ nadyaḥ yāni kṣetrāṇi yāḥ vanā

original: (AVŚ_14,2.7c) tās tvā vadhu prajāvatīṃ patye rakṣantu rakṣasaḥ //7//
analyzed: tāḥ tvā vadhu prajāvatīm patye rakṣantu rakṣasaḥ

original: (AVŚ_14,2.8a) emaṃ panthām arukṣāma sugaṃ svastivāhanam /
analyzed: ā imam panthām arukṣāma su gam svasti vāhanam

original: (AVŚ_14,2.8c) yasmin vīro na riṣyaty anyeṣāṃ vindate vasu //8//
analyzed: yasmin vīraḥ na riṣyati anyeṣām vindate vasu

original: (AVŚ_14,2.9a) idaṃ su me naraḥ śṛṇuta yayāśiṣā daṃpatī vāmam aśnutaḥ /
analyzed: idam su me naraḥ śṛṇuta yayā āśiṣā daṃpatī vāmam aśnutaḥ

original: (AVŚ_14,2.9c) ye gandharvā apsarasaś ca devīr eṣu vānaspatyeṣu ye 'dhi tasthuḥ /
analyzed: ye gandharvāḥ apsarasaḥ ca devīḥ eṣu vānaspatyeṣu ye dhi tasthuḥ

original: (AVŚ_14,2.9e) syonās te asyai vadhvai bhavantu mā hiṃsiṣur vahatum uhyamānam //9//
analyzed: syonāḥ te asyai vadhvai bhavantu mā hiṃsiṣuḥ vahatum uhyamānam

original: (AVŚ_14,2.10a) ye vadhvaś candraṃ vahatuṃ yakṣmā yanti janāṃ anu /
analyzed: ye vadhvaḥ candram vahatum yakṣmāḥ yanti janān anu

original: (AVŚ_14,2.10c) punas tān yajñiyā devā nayantu yata āgatāḥ //10// {7}
analyzed: punar tān yajñiyāḥ devāḥ nayantu yatas āgatāḥ

original: (AVŚ_14,2.11a) mā vidan paripanthino ya āsīdanti daṃpatī /
analyzed: mā vidan paripanthinaḥ ye āsīdanti daṃpatī

original: (AVŚ_14,2.11c) sugena durgam atītām apa drāntv arātayaḥ //11//
analyzed: sugena durgam atītām apa drāntu arātayaḥ

original: (AVŚ_14,2.12a) saṃ kāśayāmi vahatuṃ brahmaṇā gṛhair aghoreṇa cakṣuṣā mitriyeṇa /
analyzed: sam kāśayāmi vahatum brahmaṇā gṛhaiḥ aghoreṇa cakṣuṣā mitriyeṇa

original: (AVŚ_14,2.12c) paryāṇaddhaṃ viśvarūpaṃ yad asti syonaṃ patibhyaḥ savitā tat kṛṇotu //12//
analyzed: paryāṇaddham viśva rūpam yat asti syonam patibhyaḥ savitā tat kṛṇotu

original: (AVŚ_14,2.13a) śivā nārīyam astam āgann imaṃ dhātā lokam asyai dideśa /
analyzed: śivā nārī iyam astam āgan imam dhātā lokam asyai dideśa

original: (AVŚ_14,2.13c) tām aryamā bhago aśvinobhā prajāpatiḥ prajayā vardhayantu //13//
analyzed: tām aryamā bhagaḥ aśvinā ubhā prajāpatiḥ prajayā vardhayantu

original: (AVŚ_14,2.14a) ātmanvaty urvarā nārīyam āgan tasyāṃ naro vapata bījam asyām /
analyzed: ātmanvatī urvarā nārī iyam āgan tasyām naraḥ vapata bījam asyām

original: (AVŚ_14,2.14c) sā vaḥ prajāṃ janayad vakṣaṇābhyo bibhratī dugdham ṛṣabhasya retaḥ //14//
analyzed: sā vaḥ prajām janayat vakṣaṇābhyaḥ bibhratī dugdham ṛṣabhasya retaḥ

original: (AVŚ_14,2.15a) prati tiṣṭha virāḍ asi viṣṇur iveha sarasvati /
analyzed: prati tiṣṭha virāj asi viṣṇuḥ iva iha sarasvati

original: (AVŚ_14,2.15c) sinīvāli pra jāyatāṃ bhagasya sumatāv asat //15//
analyzed: sinīvāli pra jāyatām bhagasya sumatau asat

original: (AVŚ_14,2.16a) ud va ūrmiḥ śamyā hantv āpo yoktrāṇi muñcata /
analyzed: ud vaḥ ūrmiḥ śamyāḥ hantu āpaḥ yoktrāṇi muñcata

original: (AVŚ_14,2.16c) māduṣkṛtau vyenasāv aghnyāv aśunam āratām //16//
analyzed: mā a duṣkṛtau vyenasau aghnyau aśunam āratām

original: (AVŚ_14,2.17a) aghoracakṣur apatighnī syonā śagmā suśevā suyamā gṛhebhyaḥ /
analyzed: aghora cakṣuḥ a pati ghnī syonā śagmā su śevā su yamā gṛhebhyaḥ

original: (AVŚ_14,2.17c) vīrasūr devṛkāmā saṃ tvayaidhiṣīmahi sumasyamānā //17//
analyzed: vīra sūḥ devṛ kāmā sam tvayā edhiṣīmahi sumasyamānā

original: (AVŚ_14,2.18a) adevṛghny apatighnīhaidhi śivā paśubhyaḥ suyamā suvarcāḥ /
analyzed: a devṛ ghnī a pati ghnī iha edhi śivā paśubhyaḥ su yamā su varcāḥ

original: (AVŚ_14,2.18c) prajāvatī vīrasūr devṛkāmā syonemam agniṃ gārhapatyaṃ saparya //18//
analyzed: prajāvatī vīrasūḥ devṛ kāmā syonā imam agnim gārhapatyam saparya

original: (AVŚ_14,2.19a) ut tiṣṭhetaḥ kim ichantīdam āgā ahaṃ tveḍe abhibhūḥ svād gṛhāt /
analyzed: ud tiṣṭha itas kim icchantī idam āgāḥ aham tvā īḍe abhibhūḥ svāt gṛhāt

original: (AVŚ_14,2.19c) śūnyaiṣī nirṛte yājaganthot tiṣṭhārāte pra pata meha raṃsthāḥ //19//
analyzed: śūnyaiṣī nirṛte yā ājagantha ud tiṣṭha arāte pra pata mā iha raṃsthāḥ

original: (AVŚ_14,2.20a) yadā gārhapatyam asaparyait pūrvam agniṃ vadhūr iyam /
analyzed: yadā gārhapatyam asaparyait pūrvam agnim vadhūḥ iyam

original: (AVŚ_14,2.20c) adhā sarasvatyai nāri pitṛbhyaś ca namas kuru //20// {8}
analyzed: adha sarasvatyai nāri pitṛbhyaḥ ca namaḥ kuru

original: (AVŚ_14,2.21a) śarma varmaitad ā harāsyai nāryā upastire /
analyzed: śarma varma etat ā hara asyai nāryai upastire

original: (AVŚ_14,2.21c) sinīvāli pra jāyatāṃ bhagasya sumatāv asat //21//
analyzed: sinīvāli pra jāyatām bhagasya sumatau asat

original: (AVŚ_14,2.22a) yaṃ balbajaṃ nyasyatha carma copastṛṇīthana /
analyzed: yam balbajam nyasyatha carma ca upastṛṇīthana

original: (AVŚ_14,2.22c) tad ā rohatu suprajā yā kanyā vindate patim //22//
analyzed: tat ā rohatu su prajāḥ yā kanyā vindate patim

original: (AVŚ_14,2.23a) upa stṛṇīhi balbajam adhi carmaṇi rohite /
analyzed: upa stṛṇīhi balbajam adhi carmaṇi rohite

original: (AVŚ_14,2.23c) tatropaviśya suprajā imam agniṃ saparyatu //23//
analyzed: tatra upaviśya suprajāḥ imam agnim saparyatu

original: (AVŚ_14,2.24a) ā roha carmopa sīdāgnim eṣa devo hanti rakṣāṃsi sarvā /
analyzed: ā roha carma upa sīda agnim eṣa devaḥ hanti rakṣāṃsi sarvā

original: (AVŚ_14,2.24c) iha prajāṃ janaya patye asmai sujyaiṣṭhyo bhavat putras ta eṣaḥ //24//
analyzed: iha prajām janaya patye asmai su jyaiṣṭhyaḥ bhavat putraḥ te eṣaḥ

original: (AVŚ_14,2.25a) vi tiṣṭhantāṃ mātur asyā upasthān nānārūpāḥ paśavo jāyamānāḥ /
analyzed: vi tiṣṭhantām mātuḥ asyāḥ upasthāt nānā rūpāḥ paśavaḥ jāyamānāḥ

original: (AVŚ_14,2.25c) sumaṅgaly upa sīdemam agniṃ saṃpatnī prati bhūṣeha devān //25//
analyzed: su maṅgalī upa sīda imam agnim saṃ patnī prati bhūṣa iha devān

original: (AVŚ_14,2.26a) sumaṅgalī prataraṇī gṛhāṇāṃ suśevā patye śvaśurāya śaṃbhūḥ /
analyzed: su maṅgalī prataraṇī gṛhāṇām su śevā patye śvaśurāya śaṃbhūḥ

original: (AVŚ_14,2.26c) syonā śvaśrvai pra gṛhān viśemān //26//
analyzed: syonā śvaśrvai pra gṛhān viśa imān

original: (AVŚ_14,2.27a) syonā bhava śvaśurebhyaḥ syonā patye gṛhebhyaḥ /
analyzed: syonā bhava śvaśurebhyaḥ syonā patye gṛhebhyaḥ

original: (AVŚ_14,2.27c) syonāsyai sarvasyai viśe syonā puṣṭāyaiṣāṃ bhava //27//
analyzed: syonā asyai sarvasyai viśe syonā puṣṭāya eṣām bhava

original: (AVŚ_14,2.28a) sumaṅgalīr iyaṃ vadhūr imāṃ sameta paśyata /
analyzed: su maṅgalīḥ iyam vadhūḥ imām sameta paśyata

original: (AVŚ_14,2.28c) saubhāgyam asyai dattvā daurbhāgyair viparetana //28//
analyzed: saubhāgyam asyai dattvā daurbhāgyaiḥ viparetana

original: (AVŚ_14,2.29a) yā durhārdo yuvatayo yāś ceha jaratīr api /
analyzed: yāḥ durhārdaḥ yuvatayaḥ yāḥ ca iha jaratīḥ api

original: (AVŚ_14,2.29c) varco nv asyai saṃ dattāthāstaṃ viparetana //29//
analyzed: varcaḥ nu asyai sam datta atha astam viparetana

original: (AVŚ_14,2.30a) rukmaprastaraṇaṃ vahyaṃ viśvā rūpāṇi bibhratam /
analyzed: rukma prastaraṇam vahyam viśvā rūpāṇi bibhratam

original: (AVŚ_14,2.30c) ārohat sūryā sāvitrī bṛhate saubhagāya kam //30// {9}
analyzed: ārohat sūryā sāvitrī bṛhate saubhagāya kam

original: (AVŚ_14,2.31a) ā roha talpaṃ sumanasyamāneha prajāṃ janaya patye asmai /
analyzed: ā roha talpam sumanasyamānā iha prajām janaya patye asmai

original: (AVŚ_14,2.31c) indrāṇīva subudhā budhyamānā jyotiragrā uṣasaḥ prati jāgarāsi //31//
analyzed: indrāṇī iva su budhā budhyamānā jyotiḥ agrāḥ uṣasaḥ prati jāgarāsi

original: (AVŚ_14,2.32a) devā agre ny apadyanta patnīḥ sam aspṛśanta tanvas tanūbhiḥ /
analyzed: devāḥ agre ni apadyanta patnīḥ sam aspṛśanta tanvaḥ tanūbhiḥ

original: (AVŚ_14,2.32c) sūryeva nāri viśvarūpā mahitvā prajāvatī patyā saṃ bhaveha //32//
analyzed: sūryā iva nāri viśva rūpā mahitvā prajāvatī patyā sam bhava iha

original: (AVŚ_14,2.33a) ut tiṣṭheto viśvāvaso namaseḍāmahe tvā /
analyzed: ud tiṣṭha itas viśvāvaso namasā īḍāmahe tvā

original: (AVŚ_14,2.33c) jāmim icha pitṛṣadaṃ nyaktāṃ sa te bhāgo januṣā tasya viddhi //33//
analyzed: jāmim icha pitṛṣadam nyaktām sa te bhāgaḥ januṣā tasya viddhi

original: (AVŚ_14,2.34a) apsarasaḥ sadhamādaṃ madanti havirdhānam antarā sūryaṃ ca /
analyzed: apsarasaḥ sadhamādam madanti havirdhānam antarā sūryam ca

original: (AVŚ_14,2.34c) tās te janitram abhi tāḥ parehi namas te gandharvartunā kṛṇomi //34//
analyzed: tāḥ te janitram abhi tāḥ parehi namaḥ te gandharva ṛtunā kṛṇomi

original: (AVŚ_14,2.35a) namo gandharvasya namase namo bhāmāya cakṣuṣe ca kṛṇmaḥ /
analyzed: namaḥ gandharvasya namase namaḥ bhāmāya cakṣuṣe ca kṛṇmaḥ

original: (AVŚ_14,2.35c) viśvāvaso brahmaṇā te namo 'bhi jāyā apsarasaḥ parehi //35//
analyzed: viśvāvaso brahmaṇā te namaḥ bhi jāyāḥ apsarasaḥ parehi

original: (AVŚ_14,2.36a) rāyā vayaṃ sumanasaḥ syāmod ito gandharvam āvīvṛtāma /
analyzed: rāyā vayam sumanasaḥ syāma ud itas gandharvam āvīvṛtāma

original: (AVŚ_14,2.36c) agant sa devaḥ paramaṃ sadhastham aganma yatra pratiranta āyuḥ //36//
analyzed: agan sa devaḥ paramam sadhastham aganma yatra pratirante āyuḥ

original: (AVŚ_14,2.37a) saṃ pitarāv ṛtviye sṛjethāṃ mātā pitā ca retaso bhavāthaḥ /
analyzed: sam pitarau ṛtviye sṛjethām mātā pitā ca retasaḥ bhavāthaḥ

original: (AVŚ_14,2.37c) marya iva yoṣām adhi rohayaināṃ prajāṃ kṛṇvāthām iha puṣyataṃ rayim //37//
analyzed: maryaḥ iva yoṣām adhi rohaya enām prajām kṛṇvāthām iha puṣyatam rayim

original: (AVŚ_14,2.38a) tāṃ pūṣaṃ chivatamām erayasva yasyāṃ bījaṃ manuṣyā vapanti /
analyzed: tām pūṣam śivatamām erayasva yasyām bījam manuṣyāḥ vapanti

original: (AVŚ_14,2.38c) yā na ūrū uśatī viśrayāti yasyām uśantaḥ praharema śepaḥ //38//
analyzed: yā naḥ ūrū uśatī viśrayāti yasyām uśantaḥ praharema śepaḥ

original: (AVŚ_14,2.39a) ā rohorum upa dhatsva hastaṃ pari ṣvajasva jāyāṃ sumanasyamānaḥ /
analyzed: ā roha ūrum upa dhatsva hastam pari svajasva jāyām sumanasyamānaḥ

original: (AVŚ_14,2.39c) prajāṃ kṛṇvāthām iha modamānau dīrghaṃ vām āyuḥ savitā kṛṇotu //39//
analyzed: prajām kṛṇvāthām iha modamānau dīrgham vām āyuḥ savitā kṛṇotu

original: (AVŚ_14,2.40a) ā vāṃ prajāṃ janayatu prajāpatir ahorātrābhyāṃ sam anaktv aryamā /
analyzed: ā vām prajām janayatu prajāpatiḥ ahar rātrābhyām sam anaktu aryamā

original: (AVŚ_14,2.40c) adurmaṅgalī patilokam ā viśemaṃ śaṃ no bhava dvipade śaṃ catuṣpade //40// {10}
analyzed: adurmaṅgalī pati lokam ā viśa imam śam naḥ bhava dvipade śam catuṣpade

original: (AVŚ_14,2.41a) devair dattaṃ manunā sākam etad vādhūyaṃ vāso vadhvaś ca vastram /
analyzed: devaiḥ dattam manunā sākam etat vādhūyam vāsaḥ vadhvaḥ ca vastram

original: (AVŚ_14,2.41c) yo brahmaṇe cikituṣe dadāti sa id rakṣāṃsi talpāni hanti //41//
analyzed: yaḥ brahmaṇe cikituṣe dadāti saḥ id rakṣāṃsi hanti

original: (AVŚ_14,2.42a) yaṃ me datto brahmabhāgaṃ vadhūyor vādhūyaṃ vāso vadhvaś ca vastram /
analyzed: yam me dattaḥ brahma bhāgam vadhūyoḥ vādhūyam vāsaḥ vadhvaḥ ca vastram

original: (AVŚ_14,2.42c) yuvaṃ brahmaṇe 'numanyamānau bṛhaspate sākam indraś ca dattam //42//
analyzed: yuvam brahmaṇe numanyamānau bṛhaspate sākam indraḥ ca dattam

original: (AVŚ_14,2.43a) syonād yoner adhi badhyamānau hasāmudau mahasā modamānau /
analyzed: syonāt yoneḥ adhi badhyamānau hasāmudau mahasā modamānau

original: (AVŚ_14,2.43c) sugū suputrau sugṛhau tarātho jīvāv uṣaso vibhātīḥ //43//
analyzed: sugū su putrau su gṛhau tarāthaḥ jīvau uṣasaḥ vibhātīḥ

original: (AVŚ_14,2.44a) navaṃ vasānaḥ surabhiḥ suvāsā udāgāṃ jīva uṣaso vibhātīḥ /
analyzed: navam vasānaḥ surabhiḥ su vāsāḥ udāgām jīvaḥ uṣasaḥ vibhātīḥ

original: (AVŚ_14,2.44c) āṇḍāt patatrīvāmukṣi viśvasmād enasas pari //44//
analyzed: āṇḍāt patatrī iva amukṣi viśvasmāt enasaḥ pari

original: (AVŚ_14,2.45a) śumbhanī dyāvāpṛthivī antisumne mahivrate /
analyzed: śumbhanī dyāvāpṛthivī antisumne mahi vrate

original: (AVŚ_14,2.45c) āpaḥ sapta susruvur devīs tā no muñcantv aṃhasaḥ //45//
analyzed: āpaḥ sapta susruvuḥ devīḥ tāḥ naḥ muñcantu aṃhasaḥ

original: (AVŚ_14,2.46a) sūryāyai devebhyo mitrāya varuṇāya ca /
analyzed: sūryāyai devebhyaḥ mitrāya varuṇāya ca

original: (AVŚ_14,2.46c) ye bhūtasya pracetasas tebhya idam akaraṃ namaḥ //46//
analyzed: ye bhūtasya pracetasaḥ tebhyaḥ idam akaram namaḥ

original: (AVŚ_14,2.47a) ya ṛte cid abhiśriṣaḥ purā jatrubhya ātṛdaḥ /
analyzed: yaḥ ṛte cit abhiśriṣaḥ purā jatrubhyaḥ ātṛdaḥ

original: (AVŚ_14,2.47c) saṃdhātā saṃdhiṃ maghavā purūvasur niṣkartā vihrutaṃ punaḥ //47//
analyzed: saṃdhātā saṃdhim maghavā purūvasuḥ niṣkartā vihrutam punar

original: (AVŚ_14,2.48a) apāsmat tama uchatu nīlaṃ piśaṅgam uta lohitaṃ yat /
analyzed: apa asmat tamaḥ uchatu nīlam piśaṅgam uta lohitam yat

original: (AVŚ_14,2.48c) nirdahanī yā pṛṣātaky asmin tāṃ sthāṇāv adhy ā sajāmi //48//
analyzed: nirdahanī yā pṛṣātakī asmin tām sthāṇau adhi ā sajāmi

original: (AVŚ_14,2.49a) yāvatīḥ kṛtyā upavāsane yāvanto rājño varuṇasya pāśāḥ /
analyzed: yāvatīḥ kṛtyāḥ upavāsane yāvantaḥ rājñaḥ varuṇasya pāśāḥ

original: (AVŚ_14,2.49c) vyṛddhayo yā asamṛddhayo yā asmin tā sthāṇāv adhi sādayāmi //49//
analyzed: vyṛddhayaḥ yāḥ asamṛddhayaḥ yāḥ asmin tā sthāṇau adhi sādayāmi

original: (AVŚ_14,2.50a) yā me priyatamā tanūḥ sā me bibhāya vāsasaḥ /
analyzed: yā me priyatamā tanūḥ sā me bibhāya vāsasaḥ

analyzed: ava dīkṣām asṛkṣata svāhā

original: (AVŚ_14,2.57a) bṛhaspatināvasṛṣṭāṃ viśve devā adhārayan /
analyzed: bṛhaspatinā avasṛṣṭām viśve devāḥ adhārayan

original: (AVŚ_14,2.61c) agniṣ ṭvā tasmād enasaḥ savitā ca pra muñcatām //61//
analyzed: agniḥ tvā tasmāt enasaḥ savitā ca pra muñcatām

original: (AVŚ_14,2.62a) yat te prajāyāṃ paśuṣu yad vā gṛheṣu niṣṭhitam aghakṛdbhir aghaṃ kṛtam /
analyzed: yat te prajāyām paśuṣu yat vā gṛheṣu niṣṭhitam agha kṛdbhiḥ agham kṛtam

analyzed: tat ekam abhavat tat lalāmam abhavat tat mahat abhavat tat jyeṣṭham abhavat tat brahma abhavat tat tapaḥ bhavat tat satyam abhavat

original: (AVŚ_15,2.2[2.9]a) sa ud atiṣṭhat sa dakṣiṇāṃ diśam anu vy acalat / [9]

analyzed: yajñāyajñiyāya ca vai sa vāmadevyāya ca yajñāya ca yajamānāya ca paśubhyaḥ ca ā vṛścate yaḥ evam vidvāṃsam vrātyam upavadati

original: (AVŚ_15,2.2[2.14]f) amāvāsyā ca paurṇamāsī ca pariṣkandau mano vipathaṃ mātariśvā ca pavamānaś ca vipathavāhau vātaḥ sārathī reṣmā pratodaḥ  #
analyzed: amāvāsyā ca paurṇamāsī ca pariṣkandau manaḥ vipatham mātariśvā ca pavamānaḥ ca vipatha vāhau vātaḥ sārathī reṣmā pratodaḥ  /

original: kīrtiś ca yaśaś ca puraḥsarau /
analyzed: kīrtiḥ ca yaśaḥ ca puraḥsarau

original: (AVŚ_15,2.2[2.14]g) ainaṃ kīrtir gachaty ā yaśo gachati ya evaṃ veda //2// [14]
analyzed: ā enam kīrtiḥ gacchati ā yaśaḥ gacchati yaḥ evam veda

original: (AVŚ_15,2.3[2.15]a) sa ud atiṣṭhat sa pratīcīṃ diśam anu vy acalat / [15]
analyzed: saḥ ud atiṣṭhat sa pratīcīm diśam anu vi acalat  /
