analyzed: vairūpāya ca vai sa vairājāya ca adbhyaḥ ca varuṇāya ca rājñe ā vṛścate yaḥ evam vidvāṃsam vrātyam upavadati

original: (AVŚ_15,2.3[2.18]d) vairūpasya ca vai sa vairājasya cāpāṃ ca varuṇasya ca rājñaḥ priyaṃ dhāma bhavati ya evaṃ veda / [18]
analyzed: vairūpasya ca vai sa vairājasya ca apām ca varuṇasya ca rājñaḥ priyam dhāma bhavati yaḥ evam veda

original: (AVŚ_15,2.3[2.19]e) tasya pratīcyāṃ diśīrā puṃścalī haso māgadho vijñānaṃ vāso 'har uṣṇīṣaṃ rātrī keśā haritau pravartau kalmalir maṇiḥ / [19]
analyzed: tasya pratīcyām diśi irā puṃścalī hasaḥ māgadhaḥ vijñānam vāsaḥ har uṣṇīṣam rātrī keśāḥ haritau pravartau kalmaliḥ maṇiḥ

original: (AVŚ_15,2.3[2.20]f) ahaś ca rātrī ca pariṣkandau mano vipathaṃ mātariśvā ca pavamānaś ca vipathavāhau vātaḥ sārathī reṣmā pratodaḥ kīrtiś ca  #
analyzed: ahar ca rātrī ca pariṣkandau manaḥ vipatham mātariśvā ca pavamānaḥ ca vipatha vāhau vātaḥ sārathī reṣmā pratodaḥ kīrtiḥ ca

original: yaśaś ca puraḥsarau /
analyzed: yaśaḥ ca puraḥsarau

original: (AVŚ_15,2.3[2.20]g) ainaṃ kīrtir gachaty ā yaśo gachati ya evaṃ veda //3// [20]
analyzed: ā enam kīrtiḥ gacchati ā yaśaḥ gacchati yaḥ evam veda

original: (AVŚ_15,2.4[2.21]a) sa ud atiṣṭhat sa udīcīṃ diśam anu vy acalat / [21]
analyzed: saḥ ud atiṣṭhat saḥ udīcīm diśam anu vi acalat  /

original: (AVŚ_15,2.4[2.22]b) taṃ śyaitaṃ ca naudhasaṃ ca saptarṣayaś ca somaś ca rājānuvyacalan / [22]
analyzed: tam śyaitam ca naudhasam ca sapta ṛṣayaḥ ca somaḥ ca rājā anuvyacalan

original: (AVŚ_15,2.4[2.23]c) śyaitāya ca vai sa naudhasāya ca saptarṣibhyaś ca somāya ca rājña ā vṛścate ya evaṃ vidvāṃsaṃ vrātyam upavadati / [23]
analyzed: śyaitāya ca vai sa naudhasāya ca saptarṣibhyaḥ ca somāya ca rājñe ā vṛścate yaḥ evam vidvāṃsam vrātyam upavadati

original: (AVŚ_15,2.4[2.24]d) śyaitasya ca vai sa naudhasasya ca saptarṣīṇāṃ ca somasya ca rājñaḥ priyaṃ dhāma bhavati ya evaṃ veda / [24]
analyzed: śyaitasya ca vai sa naudhasasya ca saptarṣīṇām ca somasya ca rājñaḥ priyam dhāma bhavati yaḥ evam veda

original: (AVŚ_15,2.4[2.25]e) tasyodīcyāṃ diśi vidyut puṃścalī stanayitnur māgadho vijñānaṃ vāso 'har uṣṇīṣaṃ rātrī keśā haritau pravartau kalmalir maṇiḥ
analyzed: tasya udīcyām diśi vidyut puṃścalī stanayitnuḥ māgadhaḥ vijñānam vāsaḥ har uṣṇīṣam rātrī keśāḥ haritau pravartau kalmaliḥ maṇiḥ

original: (AVŚ_15,2.4[2.26-27]f) śrutaṃ ca viśrutaṃ ca pariṣkandau mano vipathaṃ mātariśvā ca pavamānaś ca vipathavāhau vātaḥ sārathī reṣmā pratodaḥ  #
analyzed: śrutam ca viśrutam ca pariṣkandau manaḥ vipatham mātariśvā ca pavamānaḥ ca vipatha vāhau vātaḥ sārathī reṣmā pratodaḥ  /

original: kīrtiś ca yaśaś ca puraḥsarau / [26-27]
analyzed: kīrtiḥ ca yaśaḥ ca puraḥsarau

original: (AVŚ_15,2.4[2.28]g) ainaṃ kīrtir gachaty ā yaśo gachati ya evaṃ veda //4// [28]
analyzed: ā enam kīrtiḥ gacchati ā yaśaḥ gacchati yaḥ evam veda

original: (AVŚ_15,3.1a) sa saṃvatsaram ūrdhvo 'tiṣṭhat taṃ devā abruvan vrātya kiṃ nu tiṣṭhasīti //1//
analyzed: sa saṃvatsaram ūrdhvaḥ tiṣṭhat tam devāḥ abruvan vrātya kim nu tiṣṭhasi iti

original: (AVŚ_15,3.2a) so 'bravīd āsandīṃ me saṃ bharantv iti //2//
analyzed: saḥ bravīt āsandīm me sam bharantu iti

original: (AVŚ_15,3.3a) tasmai vrātyāyāsandīṃ sam abharan //3//
analyzed: tasmai vrātyāya āsandīm sam abharan

original: (AVŚ_15,3.4a) tasyā grīṣmaś ca vasantaś ca dvau pādāv āstāṃ śarac ca varṣāś ca dvau //4//
analyzed: tasyāḥ grīṣmaḥ ca vasantaḥ ca dvau pādau āstām śarad ca varṣāḥ ca dvau

original: (AVŚ_15,3.5a) bṛhac ca rathantaraṃ cānūcye āstāṃ yajñāyajñiyaṃ ca vāmadevyaṃ ca tiraścye //5//
analyzed: bṛhat ca rathantaram ca anūcye āstām yajñāyajñiyam ca vāmadevyam ca tiraścye

original: (AVŚ_15,3.6a) ṛcaḥ prāñcas tantavo yajūṃṣi tiryañcaḥ //6//
analyzed: ṛcaḥ prāñcaḥ tantavaḥ yajūṃṣi tiryañcaḥ

original: (AVŚ_15,3.7a) veda āstaraṇaṃ brahmopabarhaṇam //7//
analyzed: vedaḥ āstaraṇam brahma upabarhaṇam

original: (AVŚ_15,3.8a) sāmāsāda udgītho 'paśrayaḥ //8//
analyzed: sāma āsādaḥ udgītha u paśrayaḥ

original: (AVŚ_15,3.9a) tām āsandīṃ vrātya ārohat //9//
analyzed: tām āsandīm vrātyaḥ ārohat

original: (AVŚ_15,3.10a) tasya devajanāḥ pariṣkandā āsant saṃkalpāḥ prahāyyā viśvāni bhūtāny upasadaḥ //10//
analyzed: tasya deva janāḥ pariṣkandāḥ āsan saṃkalpāḥ prahāyyāḥ viśvāni bhūtāni upasadaḥ

original: (AVŚ_15,3.11a) viśvāny evāsya bhūtāny upasado bhavanti ya evaṃ veda //11//
analyzed: viśvāni eva asya bhūtāni upasadaḥ bhavanti yaḥ evam veda

original: (AVŚ_15,4.1[4.1]a) tasmai prācyā diśaḥ / [1]
analyzed: tasmai prācyāḥ diśaḥ

original: (AVŚ_15,4.1[4.2]b) vāsantau māsau goptārāv akurvan bṛhac ca rathantaraṃ cānuṣṭhātārau / [2]
analyzed: vāsantau māsau goptārau akurvan bṛhat ca rathantaram ca anuṣṭhātārau

original: (AVŚ_15,4.1[4.3]c) vāsantāv enaṃ māsau prācyā diśo gopāyato bṛhac ca rathantaraṃ cānu tiṣṭhato ya evaṃ veda //1// [3]
analyzed: vāsantau enam māsau prācyāḥ diśaḥ gopāyataḥ bṛhat ca rathantaram ca anu tiṣṭhataḥ yaḥ evam veda

original: (AVŚ_15,4.2[4.4]a) tasmai dakṣiṇāyā diśaḥ / [4]
analyzed: tasmai dakṣiṇāyāḥ diśaḥ

original: (AVŚ_15,4.2[4.5]b) graiṣmau māsau goptārāv akurvan yajñāyajñiyaṃ ca vāmadevyaṃ cānuṣṭhātārau / [5]
analyzed: graiṣmau māsau goptārau akurvan yajñāyajñiyam ca vāmadevyam ca anuṣṭhātārau

original: (AVŚ_15,4.2[4.6]c) graiṣmāv enaṃ māsau dakṣiṇāyā diśo gopāyato yajñāyajñiyaṃ ca vāmadevyaṃ cānu tiṣṭhato ya evaṃ veda //2// [6]
analyzed: graiṣmau enam māsau dakṣiṇāyāḥ diśaḥ gopāyataḥ yajñāyajñiyam ca vāmadevyam ca anu tiṣṭhataḥ yaḥ evam veda

original: (AVŚ_15,4.3[4.7]a) tasmai pratīcyā diśaḥ / [7]
analyzed: tasmai pratīcyāḥ diśaḥ

original: (AVŚ_15,4.3[4.8]b) vārṣikau māsau goptārāv akurvan vairūpaṃ ca vairājaṃ cānuṣṭhātārau / [8]
analyzed: vārṣikau māsau goptārau akurvan vairūpam ca vairājam ca anuṣṭhātārau

original: (AVŚ_15,4.3[4.9]c) vārṣikāv enaṃ māsau pratīcyā diśo gopāyato vairūpaṃ ca vairājaṃ cānu tiṣṭhato ya evaṃ veda //3// [9]
analyzed: vārṣikau enam māsau pratīcyāḥ diśaḥ gopāyataḥ vairūpam ca vairājam ca anu tiṣṭhataḥ yaḥ evam veda

original: (AVŚ_15,4.4[4.10]a) tasmā udīcyā diśaḥ / [10]
analyzed: tasmai udīcyāḥ diśaḥ

original: (AVŚ_15,4.4[4.11]b) śāradau māsau goptārāv akurvaṃ chyaitaṃ ca naudhasaṃ cānuṣṭhātārau / [11]
analyzed: śāradau māsau goptārau akurvam śyaitam ca naudhasam ca anuṣṭhātārau

original: (AVŚ_15,4.4[4.12]c) śāradāv enaṃ māsāv udīcyā diśo gopāyataḥ śyaitaṃ ca naudhasaṃ cānu tiṣṭhato ya evaṃ veda //4// [12]
analyzed: śāradau enam māsau udīcyāḥ diśaḥ gopāyataḥ śyaitam ca naudhasam ca anu tiṣṭhataḥ yaḥ evam veda

original: (AVŚ_15,4.5[4.13]a) tasmai dhruvāyā diśaḥ / [13]
analyzed: tasmai dhruvāyāḥ diśaḥ

original: (AVŚ_15,4.5[4.14]b) haimanau māsau goptārāv akurvan bhūmiṃ cāgniṃ cānuṣṭhātārau / [14]
analyzed: haimanau māsau goptārau akurvan bhūmim ca agnim ca anuṣṭhātārau

original: (AVŚ_15,4.5[4.15]c) haimanāv enaṃ māsau dhruvāyā diśo gopāyato bhūmiś cāgniś cānu tiṣṭhato ya evaṃ veda //5// [15]
analyzed: haimanau enam māsau dhruvāyāḥ diśaḥ gopāyataḥ bhūmiḥ ca agniḥ ca anu tiṣṭhataḥ yaḥ evam veda

original: (AVŚ_15,4.6[4.16]a) tasmā ūrdhvāyā diśaḥ / [16]
analyzed: tasmai ūrdhvāyāḥ diśaḥ

original: (AVŚ_15,4.6[4.17]b) śaiśirau māsau goptārāv akurvan divaṃ cādityaṃ cānuṣṭhātārau / [17]
analyzed: śaiśirau māsau goptārau akurvan divam ca ādityam ca anuṣṭhātārau

original: (AVŚ_15,4.6[4.18]c) śaiśirāv enaṃ māsāv ūrdhvāyā diśo gopāyato dyauś cādityaś cānu tiṣṭhato ya evaṃ veda //6// [18]
analyzed: śaiśirau enam māsau ūrdhvāyāḥ diśaḥ gopāyataḥ dyauḥ ca ādityaḥ ca anu tiṣṭhataḥ yaḥ evam veda

original: (AVŚ_15,5.1[5.1]a) tasmai prācyā diśo antardeśād bhavam iṣvāsam anuṣṭhātāram akurvan / [1]
analyzed: tasmai prācyāḥ diśaḥ antardeśāt bhavam iṣvāsam anuṣṭhātāram akurvan

original: (AVŚ_15,5.1[5.2-3]b) bhava enam iṣvāsaḥ prācyā diśo antardeśād anuṣṭhātānu tiṣṭhati nainaṃ śarvo na bhavo neśāno nāsya paśūn na samānān hinasti  #
analyzed: bhavaḥ enam iṣvāsaḥ prācyāḥ diśaḥ antardeśāt anuṣṭhātā anu tiṣṭhati na enam śarvaḥ na bhavaḥ na īśānaḥ na asya paśūn na samānān hinasti  /

original: ya evaṃ veda //1// [2-3]
analyzed: yaḥ evam veda

original: (AVŚ_15,5.2[5.4]a) tasmai dakṣiṇāyā diśo antardeśāc charvam iṣvāsam anuṣṭhātāram akurvan / [4]
analyzed: tasmai dakṣiṇāyāḥ diśaḥ antardeśāt śarvam iṣvāsam anuṣṭhātāram akurvan

original: (AVŚ_15,5.2[5.5]b) śarva enam iśvāso dakṣiṇāyā diśo antardeśād anuṣṭhātānu tiṣṭhati nainaṃ śarvo na bhavo neśāno nāsya paśūn na samānān hinasti  #
analyzed: śarvaḥ enam iśvāsaḥ dakṣiṇāyāḥ diśaḥ antardeśāt anuṣṭhātā anu tiṣṭhati na enam śarvaḥ na bhavaḥ na īśānaḥ na asya paśūn na samānān hinasti  /

original: ya evaṃ veda //2// [5]
analyzed: yaḥ evam veda

original: (AVŚ_15,5.3[5.6]a) tasmai pratīcyā diśo antardeśāt paśupatim iṣvāsam anuṣṭhātāram akurvan / [6]
analyzed: tasmai pratīcyāḥ diśaḥ antardeśāt paśupatim iṣvāsam anuṣṭhātāram akurvan

original: (AVŚ_15,5.3[5.7]b) paśupatir enam iṣvāsaḥ pratīcyā diśo antardeśād anuṣṭhātānu tiṣṭhati nainaṃ śarvo na bhavo neśāno nāsya paśūn na samānān  #
analyzed: paśupatiḥ enam iṣvāsaḥ pratīcyāḥ diśaḥ antardeśāt anuṣṭhātā anu tiṣṭhati na enam śarvaḥ na bhavaḥ na īśānaḥ na asya paśūn na samānān

original: hinasti ya evaṃ veda //3// [7]
analyzed: hinasti yaḥ evam veda

original: (AVŚ_15,5.4[5.8]a) tasmā udīcyā diśo antardeśād ugraṃ devam iṣvāsam anuṣṭhātāram akurvan / [8]
analyzed: tasmai udīcyāḥ diśaḥ antardeśāt ugram devam iṣvāsam anuṣṭhātāram akurvan  /

original: (AVŚ_15,5.4[5.9]b) ugra enaṃ deva iṣvāsa udīcyā diśo antardeśād anuṣṭhātānu tiṣṭhati nainaṃ śarvo na bhavo neśāno nāsya paśūn na samānān hinasti  #
analyzed: ugraḥ enam devaḥ iṣvāsaḥ udīcyāḥ diśaḥ antardeśāt anuṣṭhātā anu tiṣṭhati na enam śarvaḥ na bhavaḥ na īśānaḥ na asya paśūn na samānān hinasti  /

original: ya evaṃ veda //4// [9]
analyzed: yaḥ evam veda

original: (AVŚ_15,5.5[5.10]a) tasmai dhruvāyā diśo antardeśād rudram iṣvāsam anuṣṭhātāram akurvan / [10]
analyzed: tasmai dhruvāyāḥ diśaḥ antardeśāt rudram iṣvāsam anuṣṭhātāram akurvan

original: (AVŚ_15,5.5[5.11]b) rudra enam iṣvāso dhruvāyā diśo antardeśād anuṣṭhātānu tiṣṭhati nainaṃ śarvo na bhavo neśāno nāsya paśūn na samānān hinasti  #
analyzed: rudraḥ enam iṣvāsaḥ dhruvāyāḥ diśaḥ antardeśāt anuṣṭhātā anu tiṣṭhati na enam śarvaḥ na bhavaḥ na īśānaḥ na asya paśūn na samānān hinasti  /

original: ya evaṃ veda //5// [11]
analyzed: yaḥ evam veda

original: (AVŚ_15,5.6[5.12]a) tasmā ūrdhvāyā diśo antardeśān mahādevam iṣvāsam anuṣṭhātāram akurvan / [12]
analyzed: tasmai ūrdhvāyāḥ diśaḥ antardeśāt mahādevam iṣvāsam anuṣṭhātāram akurvan

original: (AVŚ_15,5.6[5.13]b) mahādeva enam iṣvāsa ūrdhvāyā diśo antardeśād anuṣṭhātānu tiṣṭhati nainaṃ śarvo na bhavo neśāno nāsya paśūn na samānān  #
analyzed: mahādevaḥ enam iṣvāsaḥ ūrdhvāyāḥ diśaḥ antardeśāt anuṣṭhātā anu tiṣṭhati na enam śarvaḥ na bhavaḥ na īśānaḥ na asya paśūn na samānān

original: hinasti ya evaṃ veda //6// [13]
analyzed: hinasti yaḥ evam veda

original: (AVŚ_15,5.7[5.14]a) tasmai sarvebhyo antardeśebhya īśānam iṣvāsam anuṣṭhātāram akurvan / [14]
analyzed: tasmai sarvebhyaḥ antardeśebhyaḥ īśānam iṣvāsam anuṣṭhātāram akurvan

original: (AVŚ_15,5.7[5.15-16]b) īśāna enam iṣvāsaḥ sarvebhyo antardeśebhyo 'nuṣṭhātānu tiṣṭhati nainaṃ śarvo na bhavo neśāno nāsya paśūn na samānān  #
analyzed: īśānaḥ enam iṣvāsaḥ sarvebhyaḥ antardeśebhyaḥ nuṣṭhātā anu tiṣṭhati na enam śarvaḥ na bhavaḥ na īśānaḥ na asya paśūn na samānān  /

original: hinasti ya evaṃ veda //7// [15-16]
analyzed: hinasti yaḥ evam veda

original: (AVŚ_15,6.1[6.1]a) sa dhruvāṃ diśam anu vy acalat / [1]
analyzed: sa dhruvām diśam anu vi acalat

original: (AVŚ_15,6.1[6.2]b) taṃ bhūmiś cāgniś cauṣadhayaś ca vanaspatayaś ca vānaspatyāś ca vīrudhaś cānuvyacalan / [2]
analyzed: tam bhūmiḥ ca agniḥ ca oṣadhayaḥ ca vanaspatayaḥ ca vānaspatyāḥ ca vīrudhaḥ ca anuvyacalan  /

original: (AVŚ_15,6.1[6.3]c) bhūmeś ca vai so 'gneś cauṣadhīnāṃ ca vanaspatīnāṃ ca vānaspatyānāṃ ca vīrudhāṃ ca priyaṃ dhāma bhavati ya evaṃ veda //1//
analyzed: bhūmeḥ ca vai saḥ gneḥ ca oṣadhīnām ca vanaspatīnām ca vānaspatyānām ca vīrudhām ca priyam dhāma bhavati yaḥ evam veda

original: (AVŚ_15,6.2[6.4]a) sa ūrdhvāṃ diśam anu vy acalat / [4]
analyzed: saḥ ūrdhvām diśam anu vi acalat

original: (AVŚ_15,6.2[6.5]b) tam ṛtaṃ ca satyaṃ ca sūryaś ca candraś ca nakṣatrāṇi cānuvyacalan / [5]
analyzed: tam ṛtam ca satyam ca sūryaḥ ca candraḥ ca nakṣatrāṇi ca anuvyacalan

original: (AVŚ_15,6.2[6.6]c) ṛtasya ca vai sa satyasya ca sūryasya ca candrasya ca nakṣatrāṇāṃ ca priyaṃ dhāma bhavati ya evaṃ veda //2// [6]
analyzed: ṛtasya ca vai sa satyasya ca sūryasya ca candrasya ca nakṣatrāṇām ca priyam dhāma bhavati yaḥ evam veda

original: (AVŚ_15,6.3[6.7]a) sa uttamāṃ diśam anu vy acalat / [7]
analyzed: saḥ uttamām diśam anu vi acalat

original: (AVŚ_15,6.3[6.8]b) tam ṛcaś ca sāmāni ca yajūṃṣi ca brahma cānuvyacalan / [8]
analyzed: tam ṛcaḥ ca sāmāni ca yajūṃṣi ca brahma ca anuvyacalan

original: (AVŚ_15,6.3[6.9]c) ṛcāṃ ca vai sa sāmnāṃ ca yajuṣāṃ ca brahmaṇaś ca priyaṃ dhāma bhavati ya evaṃ veda //3// [9]
analyzed: ṛcām ca vai sa sāmnām ca yajuṣām ca brahmaṇaḥ ca priyam dhāma bhavati yaḥ evam veda

original: (AVŚ_15,6.4[6.10]a) sa bṛhatīṃ diśam anu vy acalat / [10]
analyzed: sa bṛhatīm diśam anu vi acalat

original: (AVŚ_15,6.4[6.11]b) tam itihāsaś ca purāṇaṃ ca gāthāś ca nārāśaṃsīś cānuvyacalan / [11]
analyzed: tam itihāsaḥ ca purāṇam ca gāthāḥ ca nārāśaṃsīḥ ca anuvyacalan

original: (AVŚ_15,6.4[6.12]c) itihāsasya ca vai sa purāṇasya ca gāthānāṃ ca nārāśaṃsīnāṃ ca priyaṃ dhāma bhavati ya evaṃ veda //4// [12]
analyzed: itihāsasya ca vai sa purāṇasya ca gāthānām ca nārāśaṃsīnām ca priyam dhāma bhavati yaḥ evam veda

original: (AVŚ_15,6.5[6.13]a) sa paramāṃ diśam anu vy acalat / [13]
analyzed: sa paramām diśam anu vi acalat

original: (AVŚ_15,6.5[6.14]b) tam āhavanīyaś ca gārhapatyaś ca dakṣiṇāgniś ca yajñaś ca yajamānaś ca paśavaś cānuvyacalan / [14]
analyzed: tam āhavanīyaḥ ca gārhapatyaḥ ca dakṣiṇāgniḥ ca yajñaḥ ca yajamānaḥ ca paśavaḥ ca anuvyacalan  /

original: (AVŚ_15,6.5[6.15]c) āhavanīyasya ca vai sa gārhapatyasya ca dakṣiṇāgneś ca yajñasya ca yajamānasya ca paśūnāṃ ca priyaṃ dhāma bhavati ya evaṃ  #
analyzed: āhavanīyasya ca vai sa gārhapatyasya ca dakṣiṇāgneḥ ca yajñasya ca yajamānasya ca paśūnām ca priyam dhāma bhavati yaḥ evam
veda

original: (AVŚ_15,6.6[6.16]a) so 'nādiṣṭāṃ diśam anu vy acalat / [16]
analyzed: saḥ na ādiṣṭām diśam anu vi acalat

original: (AVŚ_15,6.6[6.17]b) tam ṛtavaś cārtavāś ca lokāś ca laukyāś ca māsāś cārdhamāsāś cāhorātre cānuvyacalan / [17]
analyzed: tam ṛtavaḥ ca ārtavāḥ ca lokāḥ ca laukyāḥ ca māsāḥ ca ardha māsāḥ ca ahar rātre ca anuvyacalan  /

original: (AVŚ_15,6.6[6.18]c) ṛtūnāṃ ca vai sa ārtavānāṃ ca lokānāṃ ca laukyānāṃ ca māsānāṃ cārdhamāsānāṃ cāhorātrayoś ca priyaṃ dhāma bhavati ya evaṃ  #
analyzed: ṛtūnām ca vai saḥ ārtavānām ca lokānām ca laukyānām ca māsānām ca ardha māsānām ca ahar rātrayoḥ ca priyam dhāma bhavati yaḥ evam
veda

original: (AVŚ_15,6.7[6.19]a) so 'nāvṛttāṃ diśam anu vy acalat tato nāvartsyann amanyata / [19]
analyzed: saḥ na āvṛttām diśam anu vi acalat tatas na āvartsyan amanyata

original: (AVŚ_15,6.7[6.20]b) taṃ ditiś cāditiś ceḍā cendrāṇī cānuvyacalan / [20]
analyzed: tam ditiḥ ca aditiḥ ca iḍā ca indrāṇī ca anuvyacalan

original: (AVŚ_15,6.7[6.21]c) diteś ca vai so 'diteś ceḍāyāś cendrāṇyāś ca priyaṃ dhāma bhavati ya evaṃ veda //7// [21]
analyzed: diteḥ ca vai saḥ diteḥ ca iḍāyāḥ ca indrāṇyāḥ ca priyam dhāma bhavati yaḥ evam veda

original: (AVŚ_15,6.8[6.22]a) sa diśo 'nu vy acalat taṃ virāḍ anu vy acalat sarve ca devāḥ sarvāś ca devatāḥ / [22]
analyzed: sa diśaḥ nu vi acalat tam virāj anu vi acalat sarve ca devāḥ sarvāḥ ca devatāḥ

original: (AVŚ_15,6.8[6.23]b) virājaś ca vai sa sarveṣāṃ ca devānāṃ sarvāsāṃ ca devatānāṃ priyaṃ dhāma bhavati ya evaṃ veda //8// [23]
analyzed: virājaḥ ca vai sa sarveṣām ca devānām sarvāsām ca devatānām priyam dhāma bhavati yaḥ evam veda

original: (AVŚ_15,6.9[6.24]a) sa sarvān antardeśān anu vy acalat / [24]
analyzed: sa sarvān antardeśān anu vi acalat

original: (AVŚ_15,6.9[6.25]b) taṃ prajāpatiś ca parameṣṭhī ca pitā ca pitāmahaś cānuvyacalan / [25]
analyzed: tam prajāpatiḥ ca parameṣṭhī ca pitā ca pitāmahaḥ ca anuvyacalan

original: (AVŚ_15,6.9[6.26]c) prajāpateś ca vai sa parameṣṭhinaś ca pituś ca pitāmahasya ca priyaṃ dhāma bhavati ya evaṃ veda //9// [26]
analyzed: prajāpateḥ ca vai sa parameṣṭhinaḥ ca pituḥ ca pitāmahasya ca priyam dhāma bhavati yaḥ evam veda

original: (AVŚ_15,7.1a) sa mahimā sadrur bhūtvāntaṃ pṛthivyā agachat samudro 'bhavat //1//
analyzed: sa mahimā sadruḥ bhūtvā antam pṛthivyāḥ agachat samudraḥ bhavat

original: (AVŚ_15,7.2a) taṃ prajāpatiś ca parameṣṭhī ca pitā ca pitāmahaś cāpaś ca śraddhā ca varṣaṃ bhūtvānuvyavartayanta //2//
analyzed: tam prajāpatiḥ ca parameṣṭhī ca pitā ca pitāmahaḥ ca āpaḥ ca śraddhā ca varṣam bhūtvā anuvyavartayanta

original: (AVŚ_15,7.3a) ainam āpo gachanty ainaṃ śraddhā gachaty ainaṃ varṣaṃ gachati ya evaṃ veda //3//
analyzed: ā enam āpaḥ gacchanti ā enam śraddhā gacchati ā enam varṣam gacchati yaḥ evam veda

original: (AVŚ_15,7.4a) taṃ śraddhā ca yajñaś ca lokaś cānnaṃ cānnādyaṃ ca bhūtvābhiparyāvartanta //4//
analyzed: tam śraddhā ca yajñaḥ ca lokaḥ ca annam ca annādyam ca bhūtvā abhiparyāvartanta

original: (AVŚ_15,7.5a) ainaṃ śraddhā gachaty ainaṃ yajño gachaty ainaṃ loko gachaty ainam annaṃ gachaty ainam annādyaṃ gachati ya evaṃ veda //5//
analyzed: ā enam śraddhā gacchati ā enam yajñaḥ gacchati ā enam lokaḥ gacchati ā enam annam gacchati ā enam annādyam gacchati yaḥ evam veda

original: (AVŚ_15,8.1a) so 'rajyata tato rājanyo 'jāyata //1//
analyzed: saḥ rajyata tatas rājanyaḥ jāyata

original: (AVŚ_15,8.2a) sa viśaḥ sabandhūn annam annādyam abhyudatiṣṭhat //2//
analyzed: sa viśaḥ sabandhūn annam annādyam abhyudatiṣṭhat

original: (AVŚ_15,8.3a) viśāṃ ca vai sa sabandhūnāṃ cānnasya cānnādyasya ca priyaṃ dhāma bhavati ya evaṃ veda //3//
analyzed: viśām ca vai sa sabandhūnām ca annasya ca annādyasya ca priyam dhāma bhavati yaḥ evam veda

original: (AVŚ_15,9.1a) sa viśo 'nu vy acalat //1//
analyzed: sa viśaḥ nu vi acalat

original: (AVŚ_15,9.2a) taṃ sabhā ca samitiś ca senā ca surā cānuvyacalan //2//
analyzed: tam sabhā ca samitiḥ ca senā ca surā ca anuvyacalan

original: (AVŚ_15,9.3a) sabhāyāś ca vai sa samiteś ca senāyāś ca surāyāś ca priyaṃ dhāma bhavati ya evaṃ veda //3//
analyzed: sabhāyāḥ ca vai sa samiteḥ ca senāyāḥ ca surāyāḥ ca priyam dhāma bhavati yaḥ evam veda

original: (AVŚ_15,10.1a) tad yasyaivaṃ vidvān vrātyo rājño 'tithir gṛhān āgachet //1//
analyzed: tat yasya evam vidvān vrātyaḥ rājñaḥ tithiḥ gṛhān āgacchet

original: (AVŚ_15,10.2a) śreyāṃsam enam ātmano mānayet tathā kṣatrāya nā vṛścate tathā rāṣṭrāya nā vṛścate //2//
analyzed: śreyāṃsam enam ātmanaḥ mānayet tathā kṣatrāya na ā vṛścate tathā rāṣṭrāya na ā vṛścate

original: (AVŚ_15,10.3a) ato vai brahma ca kṣatraṃ cod atiṣṭhatāṃ te abrūtāṃ kaṃ pra viśāveti //3//
analyzed: atas vai brahma ca kṣatram ca ud atiṣṭhatām te abrūtām kam pra viśāva iti

original: (AVŚ_15,10.4a) bṛhaspatim eva brahma praviśatv indraṃ kṣatraṃ tathā vā iti //4//
analyzed: bṛhaspatim eva brahma praviśatu indram kṣatram tathā vai iti

original: (AVŚ_15,10.5a) ato vai bṛhaspatim eva brahma prāviśad indraṃ kṣatram //5//
analyzed: atas vai bṛhaspatim eva brahma prāviśat indram kṣatram

original: (AVŚ_15,10.6a) iyaṃ vā u pṛthivī bṛhaspatir dyaur evendraḥ //6//
analyzed: iyam vai u pṛthivī bṛhaspatiḥ dyauḥ eva indraḥ

original: (AVŚ_15,10.7a) ayaṃ vā u agnir brahmāsāv ādityaḥ kṣatram //7//
analyzed: ayam vai u agniḥ brahma asau ādityaḥ kṣatram

original: (AVŚ_15,10.8a) ainaṃ brahma gachati brahmavarcasī bhavati //8//
analyzed: ā enam brahma gacchati brahmavarcasī bhavati

original: (AVŚ_15,10.9a) yaḥ pṛthivīṃ bṛhaspatim agniṃ brahma veda //9//
analyzed: yaḥ pṛthivīm bṛhaspatim agnim brahma veda

original: (AVŚ_15,10.10a) ainam indriyaṃ gachatīndriyavān bhavati //10//
analyzed: ā enam indriyam gacchati indriyavān bhavati

original: (AVŚ_15,10.11a) ya ādityaṃ kṣatraṃ divam indraṃ veda //11//
analyzed: yaḥ ādityam kṣatram divam indram veda

original: (AVŚ_15,11.1a) tad yasyaivaṃ vidvān vrātyo 'tithir gṛhān āgachet //1//
analyzed: tat yasya evam vidvān vrātyo tithiḥ gṛhān āgacchet

original: (AVŚ_15,11.2a) svayam enam abhyudetya brūyād vrātya kvāvātsīr vrātyodakaṃ vrātya
analyzed: svayam enam abhyudetya brūyāt vrātya kva avātsīḥ vrātya udakam vrātya

original: tarpayantu vrātya yathā te priyaṃ tathāstu vrātya yathā te vaśas tathāstu vrātya
analyzed: tarpayantu vrātya yathā te priyam tathā astu vrātya yathā te vaśaḥ tathā astu vrātya

original: yathā te nikāmas tathāstv iti //2 //
analyzed: yathā te nikāmaḥ tathā astu iti

original: (AVŚ_15,11.3a) yad enam āha vrātya kvāvātsīr iti patha eva tena devayānān ava rundhe //3//
analyzed: yat enam āha vrātya kva avātsīḥ iti pathaḥ eva tena deva yānān ava rundhe

original: (AVŚ_15,11.4a) yad enam āha vrātyodakam ity apa eva tenāva rundhe //4//
analyzed: yat enam āha vrātya udakam iti apaḥ eva tena ava rundhe

original: (AVŚ_15,11.5a) yad enam āha vrātya tarpayantv iti prāṇam eva tena varṣīyāṃsaṃ kurute //5//
analyzed: yat enam āha vrātya tarpayantu iti prāṇam eva tena varṣīyāṃsam kurute

original: (AVŚ_15,11.6a) yad enam āha vrātya yathā te priyaṃ tathāstv iti priyam eva tenāva rundhe //6//
analyzed: yat enam āha vrātya yathā te priyam tathā astu iti priyam eva tena ava rundhe

original: (AVŚ_15,11.7a) ainaṃ priyaṃ gachati priyaḥ priyasya bhavati ya evaṃ veda //7//
analyzed: ā enam priyam gacchati priyaḥ priyasya bhavati yaḥ evam veda

original: (AVŚ_15,11.8a) yad enam āha vrātya yathā te vaśas tathāstv iti vaśam eva tenāva rundhe //8//
analyzed: yat enam āha vrātya yathā te vaśaḥ tathā astu iti vaśam eva tena ava rundhe

original: (AVŚ_15,11.9a) ainaṃ vaśo gachati vaśī vaśināṃ bhavati ya evaṃ veda //9//
analyzed: ā enam vaśaḥ gacchati vaśī vaśinām bhavati yaḥ evam veda

original: (AVŚ_15,11.10a) yad enam āha vrātya yathā te nikāmas tathāstv iti nikāmam eva tenāva rundhe //10//
analyzed: yat enam āha vrātya yathā te nikāmaḥ tathā astu iti nikāmam eva tena ava rundhe

original: (AVŚ_15,11.11a) ainaṃ nikāmo gachati nikāme nikāmasya bhavati ya evaṃ veda //11//
analyzed: ā enam nikāmaḥ gacchati nikāme nikāmasya bhavati yaḥ evam veda

original: (AVŚ_15,12.1a) tad yasyaivaṃ vidvān vrātya uddhṛteṣv agniṣv adhiśrite 'gnihotre 'tithir gṛhān āgachet //1//
analyzed: tat yasya evam vidvān vrātyaḥ uddhṛteṣu agniṣu adhiśrite gnihotre tithiḥ gṛhān āgacchet

original: (AVŚ_15,12.2a) svayam enam abhyudetya brūyād vrātyāti sṛja hoṣyāmīti //2//
analyzed: svayam enam abhyudetya brūyāt vrātya ati sṛja hoṣyāmi iti

original: (AVŚ_15,12.3a) sa cātisṛjej juhuyān na cātisṛjen na juhuyāt //3//
analyzed: sa ca atisṛjet juhuyāt na ca atisṛjet na juhuyāt

original: (AVŚ_15,12.4a) sa ya evaṃ viduṣā vrātyenātisṛṣṭo juhoti //4//
analyzed: sa yaḥ evam viduṣā vrātyena atisṛṣṭaḥ juhoti

original: (AVŚ_15,12.5a) pra pitṛyāṇaṃ panthāṃ jānāti pra devayānam //5//
analyzed: pra pitṛyāṇam panthām jānāti pra deva yānam

original: (AVŚ_15,12.6a) na deveṣv ā vṛścate hutam asya bhavati //6//
analyzed: na deveṣu ā vṛścate hutam asya bhavati

original: (AVŚ_15,12.7a) pary asyāsmiṃl loka āyatanaṃ śiṣyate ya evaṃ viduṣā vrātyenātisṛṣṭo juhoti //7//
analyzed: pari asya asmin loke āyatanam śiṣyate yaḥ evam viduṣā vrātyena atisṛṣṭaḥ juhoti

original: (AVŚ_15,12.8a) atha ya evaṃ viduṣā vrātyenānatisṛṣṭo juhoti //8//
analyzed: atha yaḥ evam viduṣā vrātyena an atisṛṣṭaḥ juhoti

original: (AVŚ_15,12.9a) na pitṛyāṇaṃ panthāṃ jānāti na devayānam //9//
analyzed: na pitṛyāṇam panthām jānāti na deva yānam

original: (AVŚ_15,12.10a) ā deveṣu vṛścate ahutam asya bhavati //10//
analyzed: ā deveṣu vṛścate ahutam asya bhavati

original: (AVŚ_15,12.11a) nāsyāsmiṃl loka āyatanaṃ śiṣyate ya evaṃ viduṣā vrātyenānatisṛṣṭo juhoti //11//
analyzed: na asya asmin loke āyatanam śiṣyate yaḥ evam viduṣā vrātyena an atisṛṣṭaḥ juhoti

original: (AVŚ_15,13.1[13.1]a) tad yasyaivaṃ vidvān vrātya ekāṃ rātrim atithir gṛhe vasati / [1]
analyzed: tat yasya evam vidvān vrātyaḥ ekām rātrim atithiḥ gṛhe vasati

original: (AVŚ_15,13.1[13.2]b) ye pṛthivyāṃ puṇyā lokās tān eva tenāva rundhe //1// [2]
analyzed: ye pṛthivyām puṇyāḥ lokāḥ tān eva tena ava rundhe

original: (AVŚ_15,13.2[13.3]a) tad yasyaivaṃ vidvān vrātyo dvitīyāṃ rātrim atithir gṛhe vasati / [3]
analyzed: tat yasya evam vidvān vrātyaḥ dvitīyām rātrim atithiḥ gṛhe vasati

original: (AVŚ_15,13.2[13.4]b) ye 'ntarikṣe puṇyā lokās tān eva tenāva rundhe //2// [4]
analyzed: ye ntarikṣe puṇyāḥ lokāḥ tān eva tena ava rundhe

original: (AVŚ_15,13.3[13.5]a) tad yasyaivaṃ vidvān vrātyas tṛtīyāṃ rātrim atithir gṛhe vasati / [5]
analyzed: tat yasya evam vidvān vrātyaḥ tṛtīyām rātrim atithiḥ gṛhe vasati

original: (AVŚ_15,13.3[13.6]b) ye divi puṇyā lokās tān eva tenāva rundhe //3// [6]
analyzed: ye divi puṇyāḥ lokāḥ tān eva tena ava rundhe

original: (AVŚ_15,13.4[13.7]a) tad yasyaivaṃ vidvān vrātyaś caturthīṃ rātrim atithir gṛhe vasati / [7]
analyzed: tat yasya evam vidvān vrātyaḥ caturthīm rātrim atithiḥ gṛhe vasati

original: (AVŚ_15,13.4[13.8]b) ye puṇyānāṃ puṇyā lokās tān eva tenāva rundhe //4// [8]
analyzed: ye puṇyānām puṇyāḥ lokāḥ tān eva tena ava rundhe

original: (AVŚ_15,13.5[13.9]a) tad yasyaivaṃ vidvān vrātyo 'parimitā rātrīr atithir gṛhe vasati / [9]
analyzed: tat yasya evam vidvān vrātyo parimitāḥ rātrīḥ atithiḥ gṛhe vasati

original: (AVŚ_15,13.5[13.10]b) ya evāparimitāḥ puṇyā lokās tān eva tenāva rundhe //5// [10]
analyzed: ye eva aparimitāḥ puṇyāḥ lokāḥ tān eva tena ava rundhe

original: (AVŚ_15,13.6[13.11]a) atha yasyāvrātyo vrātyabruvo nāmabibhraty atithir gṛhān āgachet //6// [11]
analyzed: atha yasya a vrātyaḥ vrātyabruvaḥ nāma bibhrati atithiḥ gṛhān āgacchet

original: (AVŚ_15,13.7[13.12]a) karṣed enaṃ na cainaṃ karṣet //7// [12]
analyzed: karṣet enam na ca enam karṣet

original: (AVŚ_15,13.8[13.13]a) asyai devatāyā udakaṃ yācāmīmāṃ devatāṃ vāsaya imām imāṃ devatāṃ pari veveṣmīty enaṃ pari veviṣyāt //8// [13]
analyzed: asyai devatāyai udakam yācāmi imām devatām vāsaye imām imām devatām pari veveṣmi iti enam pari veviṣyāt

original: (AVŚ_15,13.9[13.14]a) tasyām evāsya tad devatāyāṃ hutaṃ bhavati ya evaṃ veda //9// [14]
analyzed: tasyām eva asya tat devatāyām hutam bhavati yaḥ evam veda

original: (AVŚ_15,14.1[14.1]a) sa yat prācīṃ diśam anu vyacalan mārutaṃ śardho bhūtvānuvyacalan mano 'nnādaṃ kṛtvā / [1]
analyzed: sa yat prācīm diśam anu vyacalat mārutam śardhaḥ bhūtvā anuvyacalat manaḥ nnādam kṛtvā

original: (AVŚ_15,14.1[14.2]b) manasānnādenānnam atti ya evaṃ veda //1// [2]
analyzed: manasā anna ādena annam atti yaḥ evam veda

original: (AVŚ_15,14.2[14.3]a) sa yad dakṣiṇāṃ diśam anu vyacalad indro bhūtvānuvyacalad balam annādaṃ kṛtvā / [3]
analyzed: sa yat dakṣiṇām diśam anu vyacalat indraḥ bhūtvā anuvyacalat balam anna ādam kṛtvā

original: (AVŚ_15,14.2[14.4]b) balenānnādenānnam atti ya evaṃ veda //2// [4]
analyzed: balena anna ādena annam atti yaḥ evam veda

original: (AVŚ_15,14.3[14.5]a) sa yat pratīcīṃ diśam anu vyacalad varuṇo rājā bhūtvānuvyacalad apo 'nnādīḥ kṛtvā / [5]
analyzed: sa yat pratīcīm diśam anu vyacalat varuṇaḥ rājā bhūtvā anuvyacalat apaḥ nnādīḥ kṛtvā

original: (AVŚ_15,14.3[14.6]b) adbhir annādībhir annam atti ya evaṃ veda //3// [6]
analyzed: adbhiḥ annādībhiḥ annam atti yaḥ evam veda

original: (AVŚ_15,14.4[14.7]a) sa yad udīcīṃ diśam anu vyacalat somo rājā bhūtvānuvyacalat saptarṣibhir huta āhutim annādīṃ kṛtvā / [7]
analyzed: sa yat udīcīm diśam anu vyacalat somaḥ rājā bhūtvā anuvyacalat saptarṣibhiḥ hute āhutim annādīm kṛtvā

original: (AVŚ_15,14.4[14.8]b) āhutyānnādyānnam atti ya evaṃ veda //4// [8]
analyzed: āhutyā annādyā annam atti yaḥ evam veda

original: (AVŚ_15,14.5[14.9]a) sa yad dhruvāṃ diśam anu vyacalad viṣṇur bhūtvānuvyacalad virājam annādīṃ kṛtvā / [9]
analyzed: sa yat dhruvām diśam anu vyacalat viṣṇuḥ bhūtvā anuvyacalat virājam annādīm kṛtvā

original: (AVŚ_15,14.5[14.10]b) virājānnādyānnam atti ya evaṃ veda //5// [10]
analyzed: virājā annādyā annam atti yaḥ evam veda

original: (AVŚ_15,14.6[14.11]a) sa yat paśūn anu vyacalad rudro bhūtvānuvyacalad oṣadhīr annādīḥ kṛtvā / [11]
analyzed: sa yat paśūn anu vyacalat rudraḥ bhūtvā anuvyacalat oṣadhīḥ anna ādīḥ kṛtvā

original: (AVŚ_15,14.6[14.12]b) oṣadhībhir annādībhir annam atti ya evaṃ veda //6// [12]
analyzed: oṣadhībhiḥ anna ādībhiḥ annam atti yaḥ evam veda

original: (AVŚ_15,14.7[14.13]a) sa yat pitṝn anu vyacalad yamo rājā bhūtvānuvyacalat svadhākāram annādaṃ kṛtvā / [13]
analyzed: sa yat pitṝn anu vyacalat yamaḥ rājā bhūtvā anuvyacalat svadhākāram anna adam kṛtvā

original: (AVŚ_15,14.7[14.14]b) svadhākāreṇānnādenānnam atti ya evaṃ veda //7// [14]
analyzed: svadhākāreṇa anna ādena annam atti yaḥ evam veda

original: (AVŚ_15,14.8[14.15]a) sa yan manuṣyān anu vyacalad agnir bhūtvānuvyacalat svāhākāram annādaṃ kṛtvā / [15]
analyzed: sa yat manuṣyān anu vyacalat agniḥ bhūtvā anuvyacalat svāhākāram anna ādam kṛtvā

original: (AVŚ_15,14.8[14.16]b) svāhākāreṇānnādenānnam atti ya evaṃ veda //8// [16]
analyzed: svāhākāreṇa anna ādena annam atti yaḥ evam veda

original: (AVŚ_15,14.9[14.17]a) sa yad ūrdhvāṃ diśam anu vyacalad bṛhaspatir bhūtvānuvyacalad vaṣaṭkāram annādaṃ kṛtvā / [17]
analyzed: sa yat ūrdhvām diśam anu vyacalat bṛhaspatiḥ bhūtvā anuvyacalat vaṣaṭkāram anna adam kṛtvā

original: (AVŚ_15,14.9[14.18]b) vaṣaṭkāreṇānnādenānnam atti ya evaṃ veda //9// [18]
analyzed: vaṣaṭkāreṇa anna ādena annam atti yaḥ evam veda

original: (AVŚ_15,14.10[14.19]a) sa yad devān anu vyacalad īśāno bhūtvānuvyacalan manyum annādaṃ kṛtvā / [19]
analyzed: sa yat devān anu vyacalat īśānaḥ bhūtvā anuvyacalat manyum anna ādam kṛtvā

original: (AVŚ_15,14.10[14.20]b) manyunānnādenānnam atti ya evaṃ veda //10// [20]
analyzed: manyunā anna ādena annam atti yaḥ evam veda

original: (AVŚ_15,14.11[14.21]a) sa yat prajā anu vyacalat prajāpatir bhūtvānuvyacalat prāṇam annādaṃ kṛtvā / [21]
analyzed: sa yat prajāḥ anu vyacalat prajāpatiḥ bhūtvā anuvyacalat prāṇam anna ādam kṛtvā

original: (AVŚ_15,14.11[14.22]b) prāṇenānnādenānnam atti ya evaṃ veda //11// [22]
analyzed: prāṇena anna ādena annam atti yaḥ evam veda

original: (AVŚ_15,14.12[14.23]a) sa yat sarvān antardeśān anu vyacalat parameṣṭhī bhūtvānuvyacalad brahmānnādaṃ kṛtvā / [23]
analyzed: sa yat sarvān antardeśān anu vyacalat parameṣṭhī bhūtvā anuvyacalat brahmā anna ādam kṛtvā

original: (AVŚ_15,14.12[14.24]b) brahmaṇānnādenānnam atti ya evaṃ veda //12// [24]
analyzed: brahmaṇā anna ādena annam atti yaḥ evam veda

original: (AVŚ_15,15.1a) tasya vrātyasya //1//
analyzed: tasya vrātyasya

original: (AVŚ_15,15.2a) sapta prāṇāḥ saptāpānāḥ sapta vyānāḥ //2//
analyzed: sapta prāṇāḥ sapta apānāḥ sapta vyānāḥ

original: (AVŚ_15,15.3a) yo 'sya prathamaḥ prāṇa ūrdhvo nāmāyaṃ so agniḥ //3//
analyzed: yaḥ sya prathamaḥ prāṇaḥ ūrdhvaḥ nāma ayam saḥ agniḥ

original: (AVŚ_15,15.4a) yo 'sya dvitīyaḥ prāṇaḥ prauḍho nāmāsau sa ādityaḥ //4//
analyzed: yaḥ sya dvitīyaḥ prāṇaḥ prauḍhaḥ nāma asau saḥ ādityaḥ

original: (AVŚ_15,15.5a) yo 'sya tṛtīyaḥ prāṇo 'bhyūḍho nāmāsau sa candramāḥ //5//
analyzed: yaḥ sya tṛtīyaḥ prāṇaḥ bhyūḍhaḥ nāma asau sa candramāḥ

original: (AVŚ_15,15.6a) yo 'sya caturthaḥ prāṇo vibhūr nāmāyaṃ sa pavamānaḥ //6//
analyzed: yaḥ sya caturthaḥ prāṇaḥ vibhūḥ nāma ayam sa pavamānaḥ

original: (AVŚ_15,15.7a) yo 'sya pañcamaḥ prāṇo yonir nāma tā imā āpaḥ //7//
analyzed: yaḥ sya pañcamaḥ prāṇaḥ yoniḥ nāma tāḥ imāḥ āpaḥ

original: (AVŚ_15,15.8a) yo 'sya ṣaṣṭhaḥ prāṇaḥ priyo nāma ta ime paśavaḥ //8//
analyzed: yaḥ sya ṣaṣṭhaḥ prāṇaḥ priyaḥ nāma te ime paśavaḥ

original: (AVŚ_15,15.9a) yo 'sya saptamaḥ prāṇo 'parimito nāma tā imāḥ prajāḥ //9//
analyzed: yaḥ sya saptamaḥ prāṇaḥ parimitaḥ nāma tāḥ imāḥ prajāḥ

original: (AVŚ_15,16.1a) yo 'sya prathamo 'pānaḥ sā paurṇamāsī //1//
analyzed: yaḥ sya prathamaḥ pānaḥ sā paurṇamāsī

original: (AVŚ_15,16.2a) yo 'sya dvitīyo 'pānaḥ sāṣṭakā //2//
analyzed: yā u sya dvitīyaḥ pānaḥ sā aṣṭakā

original: (AVŚ_15,16.3a) yo 'sya tṛtīyo 'pānaḥ sāmāvāsyā //3//
analyzed: yā sya tṛtīyaḥ pānaḥ sā amāvāsyā

original: (AVŚ_15,16.4a) yo 'sya caturtho 'pānaḥ sā śraddhā //4//
analyzed: yaḥ sya caturthaḥ pānaḥ sā śraddhā

original: (AVŚ_15,16.5a) yo 'sya pañcamo 'pānaḥ sā dīkṣā //5//
analyzed: yaḥ sya pañcamaḥ pānaḥ sā dīkṣā

original: (AVŚ_15,16.6a) yo 'sya ṣaṣṭho 'pānaḥ sa yajñaḥ //6//
analyzed: yaḥ sya ṣaṣṭhaḥ pānaḥ sa yajñaḥ

original: (AVŚ_15,16.7a) yo 'sya saptamo 'pānas tā imā dakṣiṇāḥ //7//
analyzed: yaḥ sya saptamaḥ pānaḥ tāḥ imāḥ dakṣiṇāḥ

original: (AVŚ_15,17.1a) yo 'sya prathamo vyānaḥ seyaṃ bhūmiḥ //1//
analyzed: yaḥ sya prathamaḥ vyānaḥ sā iyam bhūmiḥ

original: (AVŚ_15,17.2a) yo 'sya dvitīyo vyānas tad antarikṣam //2//
analyzed: yaḥ sya dvitīyaḥ vyānaḥ tat antarikṣam

original: (AVŚ_15,17.3a) yo 'sya tṛtīyo vyānaḥ sā dyauḥ //3//
analyzed: yaḥ sya tṛtīyaḥ vyānaḥ sā dyauḥ

original: (AVŚ_15,17.4a) yo 'sya caturtho vyānas tāni nakṣatrāṇi //4//
analyzed: yaḥ sya caturthaḥ vyānaḥ tāni nakṣatrāṇi

original: (AVŚ_15,17.5a) yo 'sya pañcamo vyānas ta ṛtavaḥ //5//
analyzed: yaḥ sya pañcamaḥ vyānaḥ te ṛtavaḥ

original: (AVŚ_15,17.6a) yo 'sya ṣaṣṭho vyānas ta ārtavāḥ //6//
analyzed: yaḥ sya ṣaṣṭhaḥ vyānaḥ te ārtavāḥ

original: (AVŚ_15,17.7a) yo 'sya saptamo vyānaḥ sa saṃvatsaraḥ //7//
analyzed: yaḥ sya saptamaḥ vyānaḥ sa saṃvatsaraḥ

original: (AVŚ_15,17.8a) samānam arthaṃ pari yanti devāḥ saṃvatsaraṃ vā etad ṛtavo 'nupariyanti vrātyaṃ ca //8//
analyzed: samānam artham pari yanti devāḥ saṃvatsaram vai etat ṛtavaḥ nupariyanti vrātyam ca

original: (AVŚ_15,17.9a) yad ādityam abhisaṃviśanty amāvāsyāṃ caiva tat paurṇamāsīṃ ca //9//
analyzed: yat ādityam abhisaṃviśanti amāvāsyām ca eva tat paurṇamāsīm ca

original: (AVŚ_15,17.10a) ekaṃ tad eṣām amṛtatvam ity āhutir eva //10//
analyzed: ekam tat eṣām amṛta tvam iti āhutiḥ eva

original: (AVŚ_15,18.1a) tasya vrātyasya //1//
analyzed: tasya vrātyasya

original: (AVŚ_15,18.2a) yad asya dakṣiṇam akṣy asau sa ādityo yad asya savyam akṣy asau sa candramāḥ //2//
analyzed: yat asya dakṣiṇam akṣi asau saḥ ādityaḥ yat asya savyam akṣi asau sa candramāḥ

original: (AVŚ_15,18.3a) yo 'sya dakṣiṇaḥ karṇo 'yaṃ so agnir yo 'sya savyaḥ karṇo 'yaṃ sa pavamānaḥ //3//
analyzed: yaḥ sya dakṣiṇaḥ karṇaḥ yam saḥ agniḥ yaḥ sya savyaḥ karṇaḥ yam sa pavamānaḥ

original: (AVŚ_15,18.4a) ahorātre nāsike ditiś cāditiś ca śīrṣakapāle saṃvatsaraḥ śiraḥ //4//
analyzed: ahar rātre nāsike ditiḥ ca aditiḥ ca śīrṣa kapāle saṃvatsaraḥ śiraḥ

original: (AVŚ_15,18.5a) ahnā pratyaṅ vrātyo rātryā prāṅ namo vrātyāya //5//
analyzed: ahnā pratyaṅ vrātyaḥ rātryā prāṅ namaḥ vrātyāya

original: (AVŚ_16,1.1a) atisṛṣṭo apāṃ vṛṣabho 'tisṛṣṭā agnayo divyāḥ //1//
analyzed: atisṛṣṭaḥ apām vṛṣabha u tisṛṣṭāḥ agnayaḥ divyāḥ

original: (AVŚ_16,1.2a) rujan parirujan mṛṇan pramṛṇan //2//
analyzed: rujan parirujan mṛṇan pramṛṇan

original: (AVŚ_16,1.3a) mroko manohā khano nirdāha ātmadūṣis tanūdūṣiḥ //3//
analyzed: mrokaḥ manaḥ hā khanaḥ nirdāhaḥ ātma dūṣiḥ tanū dūṣiḥ

original: (AVŚ_16,1.4a) idaṃ tam ati sṛjāmi taṃ mābhyavanikṣi //4//
analyzed: idam tam ati sṛjāmi tam mā abhyavanikṣi

original: (AVŚ_16,1.5a) tena tam abhyatisṛjāmo yo 'smān dveṣṭi yaṃ vayaṃ dviṣmaḥ //5//
analyzed: tena tam abhyatisṛjāmaḥ yaḥ smān dveṣṭi yam vayam dviṣmaḥ

original: (AVŚ_16,1.6a) apām agram asi samudraṃ vo 'bhyavasṛjāmi //6//
analyzed: apām agram asi samudram vaḥ bhyavasṛjāmi

original: (AVŚ_16,1.7a) yo 'psv agnir ati taṃ sṛjāmi mrokaṃ khaniṃ tanūdūṣim //7//
analyzed: yaḥ psu agniḥ ati tam sṛjāmi mrokam khanim tanū dūṣim

original: (AVŚ_16,1.8a) yo va āpo 'gnir āviveśa sa eṣa yad vo ghoraṃ tad etat //8//
analyzed: yaḥ vaḥ āpaḥ gniḥ āviveśa saḥ eṣa yat vaḥ ghoram tat etat

original: (AVŚ_16,1.9a) indrasya va indriyeṇābhi ṣiñcet //9//
analyzed: indrasya vaḥ indriyeṇa abhi siñcet

original: (AVŚ_16,1.10a) ariprā āpo apa ripram asmat //10//
analyzed: ariprāḥ āpaḥ apa ripram asmat

original: (AVŚ_16,1.11a) prāsmad eno vahantu pra duṣvapnyaṃ vahantu //11//
analyzed: pra asmat enaḥ vahantu pra duṣvapnyam vahantu

original: (AVŚ_16,1.12a) śivena mā cakṣuṣā paśyatāpaḥ śivayā tanvopa spṛśata tvacaṃ me //12//
analyzed: śivena mā cakṣuṣā paśyata apaḥ śivayā tanvā upa spṛśata tvacam me

original: (AVŚ_16,1.13a) śivān agnīn apsuṣado havāmahe mayi kṣatraṃ varca ā dhatta devīḥ //13//
analyzed: śivān agnīn apsuṣadaḥ havāmahe mayi kṣatram varcaḥ ā dhatta devīḥ

original: (AVŚ_16,2.1a) nir durarmaṇya ūrjā madhumatī vāk //1//
analyzed: niḥ ūrjā madhumatī vāc

original: (AVŚ_16,2.2a) madhumatī stha madhumatīṃ vācam udeyam //2//
analyzed: madhumatīḥ stha madhumatīm vācam udeyam

original: (AVŚ_16,2.3a) upahūto me gopāḥ upahūto gopīthaḥ //3//
analyzed: upahūtaḥ me gopāḥ upahūtaḥ gopīthaḥ

original: (AVŚ_16,2.4a) suśrutau karṇau bhadraśrutau karṇau bhadraṃ ślokaṃ śrūyāsam //4//
analyzed: su śrutau karṇau bhadra śrutau karṇau bhadram ślokam śrūyāsam

original: (AVŚ_16,2.5a) suśrutiś ca mopaśrutiś ca mā hāsiṣṭāṃ sauparṇaṃ cakṣur ajasraṃ jyotiḥ //5//
analyzed: su śrutiḥ ca mā upaśrutiḥ ca mā hāsiṣṭām sauparṇam cakṣuḥ ajasram jyotiḥ

original: (AVŚ_16,2.6a) ṛṣīṇāṃ prastaro 'si namo 'stu daivāya prastarāya //6//
analyzed: ṛṣīṇām prastaraḥ si namaḥ stu daivāya prastarāya

original: (AVŚ_16,3.1a) mūrdhāhaṃ rayīṇāṃ mūrdhā samānānāṃ bhūyāsam //1//
analyzed: mūrdhā aham rayīṇām mūrdhā samānānām bhūyāsam

original: (AVŚ_16,3.2a) rujaś ca mā venaś ca mā hāsiṣṭāṃ mūrdhā ca mā vidharmā ca mā hāsiṣṭām //2//
analyzed: rujaḥ ca mā venaḥ ca mā hāsiṣṭām mūrdhā ca mā vidharmā ca mā hāsiṣṭām

original: (AVŚ_16,3.3a) urvaś ca mā camasaś ca mā hāsiṣṭāṃ dhartā ca mā dharuṇaś ca mā hāsiṣṭām //3//
analyzed: urvaḥ ca mā camasaḥ ca mā hāsiṣṭām dhartā ca mā dharuṇaḥ ca mā hāsiṣṭām

original: (AVŚ_16,3.4a) vimokaś ca mārdrapaviś ca mā hāsiṣṭām ārdradānuś ca mā mātariśvā ca mā hāsiṣṭām //4//
analyzed: vimokaḥ ca mā ārdra paviḥ ca mā hāsiṣṭām ārdra dānuḥ ca mā mātariśvā ca mā hāsiṣṭām

original: (AVŚ_16,3.5a) bṛhaspatir ma ātmā nṛmaṇā nāma hṛdyaḥ //5//
analyzed: bṛhaspatiḥ me ātmā nṛmaṇāḥ nāma hṛdyaḥ

original: (AVŚ_16,3.6a) asaṃtāpaṃ me hṛdayam urvī gavyūtiḥ samudro asmi vidharmaṇā //6//
analyzed: asaṃtāpam me hṛdayam urvī gavyūtiḥ samudraḥ asmi vidharmaṇā

original: (AVŚ_16,4.1a) nābhir ahaṃ rayīṇāṃ nābhiḥ samānānāṃ bhūyāsam //1//
analyzed: nābhiḥ aham rayīṇām nābhiḥ samānānām bhūyāsam

original: (AVŚ_16,4.2a) svāsad asi sūṣā amṛto martyeśv ā //2//
analyzed: su āsad asi sūṣāḥ amṛtaḥ martya īśu ā

original: (AVŚ_16,4.3a) mā māṃ prāṇo hāsīn mo apāno 'vahāya parā gāt //3//
analyzed: mā mām prāṇaḥ hāsīt mā u apānaḥ vahāya parā gāt

original: (AVŚ_16,4.4a) sūryo māhnaḥ pātv agniḥ pṛthivyā vāyur antarikṣād yamo manuṣyebhyaḥ sarasvatī pārthivebhyaḥ //4//
analyzed: sūryaḥ mā ahnaḥ pātu agniḥ pṛthivyāḥ vāyuḥ antarikṣāt yamaḥ manuṣyebhyaḥ sarasvatī pārthivebhyaḥ

original: (AVŚ_16,4.5a) prāṇāpanau mā mā hāsiṣṭam mā jane pra meṣi //5//
analyzed: prāṇa apanau mā mā hāsiṣṭam mā jane pra meṣi

original: (AVŚ_16,4.6a) svasty adyoṣaso doṣasaś ca sarva āpaḥ sarvagaṇo aśīya //6//
analyzed: svasti adya uṣasaḥ doṣasaḥ ca sarve āpaḥ sarva gaṇaḥ aśīya

original: (AVŚ_16,4.7a) śakvarī stha paśavo mopa stheṣur mitrāvaruṇau me prāṇāpānāv agnir me dakṣaṃ dadhātu //7//
analyzed: śakvarīḥ stha paśavaḥ mā upa stha iṣuḥ mitrāvaruṇau me prāṇa apānau agniḥ me dakṣam dadhātu

original: (AVŚ_16,5.1a) vidma te svapna janitraṃ grāhyāḥ putro 'si yamasya karaṇaḥ /
analyzed: vidma te svapna janitram grāhyāḥ putraḥ si yamasya karaṇaḥ

original: (AVŚ_16,5.1b) antako 'si mṛtyur asi /
analyzed: antakaḥ si mṛtyuḥ asi

original: (AVŚ_16,5.1c) taṃ tvā svapna tathā saṃ vidma sa naḥ svapna duṣvapnyāt pāhi //1//
analyzed: tam tvā svapna tathā sam vidma sa naḥ svapna duṣvapnyāt pāhi

original: (AVŚ_16,5.2a) vidma te svapna janitraṃ nirṛtyāḥ putro 'si yamasya karaṇaḥ / [...] // 2 //
analyzed: vidma te svapna janitram nirṛtyāḥ putraḥ si yamasya karaṇaḥ

original: (AVŚ_16,5.3a) vidma te svapna janitraṃ abhūtyāḥ putro 'si yamasya [...] // 3 //
analyzed: vidma te svapna janitram abhūtyāḥ putraḥ si yamasya  /

original: (AVŚ_16,5.4a) vidma te svapna janitraṃ nirbhūtyāḥ putro 'si [...] // 4 //
analyzed: vidma te svapna janitram nirbhūtyāḥ putraḥ si  /

original: (AVŚ_16,5.5a) vidma te svapna janitraṃ parābhūtyāḥ putro 'si [...] // 5 //
analyzed: vidma te svapna janitram parābhūtyāḥ putraḥ si   /

original: (AVŚ_16,5.6a) vidma te svapna janitraṃ devajāmīnāṃ putro 'si yamasya karaṇaḥ /
analyzed: vidma te svapna janitram deva jāmīnām putraḥ si yamasya karaṇaḥ

original: (AVŚ_16,5.6b) antako 'si mṛtyur asi /
analyzed: antakaḥ si mṛtyuḥ asi

original: (AVŚ_16,5.6c) taṃ tvā svapna tathā saṃ vidma sa naḥ svapna duṣvapnyāt pāhi //6//
analyzed: tam tvā svapna tathā sam vidma sa naḥ svapna duṣvapnyāt pāhi

original: (AVŚ_16,6.1a) ajaiṣmādyāsanām adyāmūm anāgaso vayam //1//
analyzed: ajaiṣma adya asanām adya amūm anāgasaḥ vayam

original: (AVŚ_16,6.2a) uṣo yasmād duṣvapnyād abhaiṣmāpa tad uchatu //2//
analyzed: uṣaḥ yasmāt duṣvapnyāt abhaiṣma apa tat uchatu

original: (AVŚ_16,6.3a) dviṣate tat parā vaha śapate tat parā vaha //3//
analyzed: dviṣate tat parā vaha śapate tat parā vaha

original: (AVŚ_16,6.4a) yaṃ dviṣmo yaś ca no dveṣṭi tasmā enad gamayāmaḥ //4//
analyzed: yam dviṣmaḥ yaḥ ca naḥ dveṣṭi tasmai enat gamayāmaḥ

original: (AVŚ_16,6.5a) uṣā devī vācā saṃvidānā vāg devy uṣasā saṃvidānā //5//
analyzed: uṣāḥ devī vācā saṃvidānā vāc devī uṣasā saṃvidānā

original: (AVŚ_16,6.6a) uṣas patir vācas patinā saṃvidāno vācas patinā saṃvidānaḥ //6//
analyzed: uṣaḥ patiḥ vācaḥ patinā saṃvidānaḥ vācaḥ patinā saṃvidānaḥ

original: (AVŚ_16,6.7a) te 'muṣmai parā vahantv arāyān durṇāmnaḥ sadānvāḥ //7//
analyzed: te muṣmai parā vahantu arāyān durṇāmnaḥ sadānvāḥ

original: (AVŚ_16,6.8a) kumbhīkāḥ dūṣīkāḥ pīyakān //8//
analyzed: kumbhīkāḥ dūṣīkāḥ pīyakān

original: (AVŚ_16,6.9a) jāgradduṣvapnyaṃ svapneduṣvapnyam //9//
analyzed: jāgrat duḥṣvapnyam svapneduḥṣvapnyam

original: (AVŚ_16,6.10a) anāgamiṣyato varān avitteḥ saṃkalpān amucyā druhaḥ pāśān //10//
analyzed: an āgamiṣyataḥ varān avitteḥ saṃkalpān amucyāḥ druhaḥ pāśān

original: (AVŚ_16,6.11a) tad amuṣmā agne devāḥ parā vahantu vaghrir yathāsad vithuro na sādhuḥ //11//
analyzed: tat amuṣmai agne devāḥ parā vahantu vaghriḥ yathā asat vithuraḥ na sādhuḥ

original: (AVŚ_16,7.1a) tenainaṃ vidhyāmy abhūtyainaṃ vidhyāmi nirbhūtyainaṃ vidhyāmi parābhūtyainaṃ vidhyāmi grāhyainaṃ vidhyāmi tamasainaṃ vidhyāmi
analyzed: tena enam vidhyāmi abhūtyā enam vidhyāmi nirbhūtyā enam vidhyāmi parābhūtyā enam vidhyāmi grāhyā enam vidhyāmi tamasā enam vidhyāmi

original: (AVŚ_16,7.2a) devānām enaṃ ghoraiḥ krūraiḥ praiṣair abhipreṣyāmi //2//
analyzed: devānām enam ghoraiḥ krūraiḥ praiṣaiḥ abhipreṣyāmi

original: (AVŚ_16,7.3a) vaiśvānarasyainaṃ daṃṣṭrayor api dadhāmi //3//
analyzed: vaiśvānarasya enam daṃṣṭrayoḥ api dadhāmi

original: (AVŚ_16,7.4a) evānevāva sā garat //4//
analyzed: eva aneva ava sā garat

original: (AVŚ_16,7.5a) yo 'smān dveṣṭi tam ātmā dveṣṭu yaṃ vayaṃ dviṣmaḥ sa ātmānaṃ dveṣṭu //5//

original: (AVŚ_18,1.30c) dhūmaketuḥ samidhā bhāṛjīko mandro hotā nityo vācā yajīyān //30// {3}

original: (AVŚ_18,1.31a) arcāmi vāṃ vardhāyāpo ghṛtasnū dyāvābhūmī śṛṇutaṃ rodasī me /
analyzed: arcāmi vām vardhāya apaḥ ghṛtasnū dyāvābhūmī śṛṇutam rodasī me

original: (AVŚ_18,1.31c) ahā yad devā asunītim āyan madhvā no atra pitarā śiśītām //31//

original: (AVŚ_18,1.32c) viśve devā anu tat te yajur gur duhe yad enī divyaṃ ghṛtam vāḥ //32//
analyzed: viśve devāḥ anu tat te yajuḥ guḥ duhe yat enī divyam ghṛtam vār

original: (AVŚ_18,1.33a) kiṃ svin no rājā jagṛhe kad asyāti vrataṃ cakṛmā ko vi veda /
analyzed: kim svid naḥ rājā jagṛhe kad asya ati vratam cakṛma kaḥ vi veda

original: (AVŚ_18,1.33c) mitras cid dhi ṣmā juhurāṇo devāṃ chloko na yātām api vājo asti //33//
analyzed: mitraḥ cit hi sma juhurāṇaḥ devām ślokaḥ na yātām api vājaḥ asti

original: (AVŚ_18,1.34a) durmantv atrāmṛtasya nāma salakṣmā yad viṣurūpā bhavāti /
analyzed: durmantu atra amṛtasya nāma salakṣmā yat viṣurūpā bhavāti

original: (AVŚ_18,1.34c) yamasya yo manavate sumantv agne tam ṛṣva pāhy aprayuchan //34//
analyzed: yamasya yaḥ manavate sumantu agne tam ṛṣva pāhi aprayuchan

original: (AVŚ_18,1.35a) yasmin devā vidathe mādayante vivasvataḥ sadane dhārayante /
analyzed: yasmin devāḥ vidathe mādayante vivasvataḥ sadane dhārayante

original: (AVŚ_18,1.35c) sūrye jyotir adadhur māsy aktūn pari dyotaniṃ carato ajasrā //35//
analyzed: sūrye jyotiḥ adadhuḥ māsi aktūn pari dyotanim carataḥ ajasrā

original: (AVŚ_18,1.36a) yasmin devā manmani saṃcaranty apīcye na vayam asya vidma /
analyzed: yasmin devāḥ manmani saṃcaranti apīcye na vayam asya vidma

original: (AVŚ_18,1.36c) mitro no atrāditir anāgānt savitā devo varuṇāya vocat //36//
analyzed: mitraḥ naḥ atra aditiḥ anāgān savitā devaḥ varuṇāya vocat

original: (AVŚ_18,1.37a) sakhāya ā śiṣāmahe brahmendrāya vajriṇe /
analyzed: sakhāyaḥ ā śiṣāmahe brahma indrāya vajriṇe

original: (AVŚ_18,1.37c) stuṣa ū ṣu nṛtamāya dhṛṣṇave //37//
analyzed: stuṣe u su nṛtamāya dhṛṣṇave

original: (AVŚ_18,1.38a) śavasā hy asi śruto vṛtrahatyena vṛtrahā /
analyzed: śavasā hi asi śrutaḥ vṛtra hatyena vṛtrahā

original: (AVŚ_18,1.38c) maghair maghono ati śūra dāśasi //38//
analyzed: maghaiḥ maghonaḥ ati śūra dāśasi

original: (AVŚ_18,1.39a) stego na kṣām aty eṣi pṛthivīṃ mahī no vātā iha vāntu bhūmau /
analyzed: stegaḥ na kṣām ati eṣi pṛthivīm mahī naḥ vātāḥ iha vāntu bhūmau

original: (AVŚ_18,1.39c) mitro no atra varuṇo yujamāno agnir vane na vy asṛṣṭa śokam //39//
analyzed: mitraḥ naḥ atra varuṇaḥ yujamānaḥ agniḥ vane na vi asṛṣṭa śokam

original: (AVŚ_18,1.40a) stuhi śrutaṃ gartasadaṃ janānāṃ rājānaṃ bhīmam upahatnum ugram /
analyzed: stuhi śrutam garta sadam janānām rājānam bhīmam upahatnum ugram

original: (AVŚ_18,1.40c) mṛḍā jaritre rudra stavāno anyam asmat te ni vapantu senyam //40// {4}
analyzed: mṛḍā jaritre rudra stavānaḥ anyam asmat te ni vapantu senyam  /

original: (AVŚ_18,1.41a) sarasvatīṃ devayanto havante sarasvatīm adhvare tāyamāne /
analyzed: sarasvatīm devayantaḥ havante sarasvatīm adhvare tāyamāne

original: (AVŚ_18,1.41c) sarasvatīṃ sukṛto havante sarasvatī dāśuṣe vāryaṃ dāt //41//
analyzed: sarasvatīm su kṛtaḥ havante sarasvatī dāśuṣe vāryam dāt

original: (AVŚ_18,1.42a) sarasvatīṃ pitaro havante dakṣinā yajñam abhinakṣamāṇāḥ /
analyzed: sarasvatīm pitaraḥ havante dakṣinā yajñam abhinakṣamāṇāḥ

original: (AVŚ_18,1.42c) āsadyāsmin barhiṣi mādayadhvam anamīvā iṣa ā dhehy asme //42//
analyzed: āsadya asmin barhiṣi mādayadhvam anamīvāḥ iṣaḥ ā dhehi asme

original: (AVŚ_18,1.43a) sarasvati yā sarathaṃ yayāthokthaiḥ svadhābhir devi pitṛbhir madantī /
analyzed: sarasvati yā sa ratham yayātha ukthaiḥ svadhābhiḥ devi pitṛbhiḥ madantī

original: (AVŚ_18,1.43c) sahasrārgham iḍo atra bhāgaṃ rāyas poṣaṃ yajamānāya dhehi //43//
analyzed: sahasra argham iḍaḥ atra bhāgam rāyaḥ poṣam yajamānāya dhehi

original: (AVŚ_18,1.44a) ud īratām avara ut parāsa un madhyamāḥ pitaraḥ somyāsaḥ /
analyzed: ud īratām avare ud parāsaḥ ud madhyamāḥ pitaraḥ somyāsaḥ

original: (AVŚ_18,1.44c) asuṃ ya īyur avṛkā ṛtajñās te no 'vantu pitaro haveṣu //44//
analyzed: asum ye īyuḥ avṛkāḥ ṛta jñāḥ te naḥ vantu pitaraḥ haveṣu

original: (AVŚ_18,1.45a) āhaṃ pitṝnt suvidatrāṃ avitsi napātaṃ ca vikramaṇaṃ ca viṣṇoḥ /
analyzed: ā aham pitṝn suvidatrān avitsi napātam ca vikramaṇam ca viṣṇoḥ

original: (AVŚ_18,1.45c) barhiṣado ye svadhayā sutasya bhajanta pitvas ta ihāgamiṣṭhāḥ //45//
analyzed: barhiṣadaḥ ye svadhayā sutasya bhajanta pitvaḥ te iha āgamiṣṭhāḥ

original: (AVŚ_18,1.46a) idaṃ pitṛbhyo namo astv adya ye pūrvāso ye aparāsa īyuḥ /
analyzed: idam pitṛbhyaḥ namaḥ astu adya ye pūrvāsaḥ ye aparāsaḥ īyuḥ

original: (AVŚ_18,1.46c) ye pārthive rajasy ā niṣaktā ye vā nūnaṃ suvṛjanāsu dikṣu //46//
analyzed: ye pārthive rajasi ā niṣaktāḥ ye vā nūnam su vṛjanāsu dikṣu

original: (AVŚ_18,1.47a) mātalī kavyair yamo aṅgirobhir bṛhaspatir ṛkvabhir vāvṛdhānaḥ /
analyzed: mātalī kavyaiḥ yamaḥ aṅgirobhiḥ bṛhaspatiḥ ṛkvabhiḥ vāvṛdhānaḥ

original: (AVŚ_18,1.47c) yāṃś ca devā vāvṛdhur ye ca devāṃs te no 'vantu pitaro haveṣu //47//
analyzed: yān ca devāḥ vāvṛdhuḥ ye ca devān te naḥ vantu pitaraḥ haveṣu

original: (AVŚ_18,1.48a) svāduṣ kilāyaṃ madhumāṃ utāyaṃ tīvraḥ kilāyaṃ rasavāṃ utāyam /
analyzed: svāduḥ kila ayam madhumān uta ayam tīvraḥ kila ayam rasavān uta ayam

original: (AVŚ_18,1.48c) uto nv asya papivāṃsam indraṃ na kaś cana sahata āhaveṣu //48//
analyzed: uta u nu asya papivāṃsam indram na kaḥ cana sahate āhaveṣu

original: (AVŚ_18,1.49a) pareyivāṃsaṃ pravato mahīr iti bahubhyaḥ panthām anupaspaśānam /
analyzed: pareyivāṃsam pravataḥ mahīḥ iti bahubhyaḥ panthām anupaspaśānam

original: (AVŚ_18,1.49c) vaivasvataṃ saṃgamanaṃ janānāṃ yamaṃ rājānaṃ haviṣā saparyata //49//
analyzed: vaivasvatam saṃgamanam janānām yamam rājānam haviṣā saparyata

original: (AVŚ_18,1.50a) yamo no gātuṃ prathamo viveda naiṣā gavyūtir apabhartavā u /
analyzed: yamaḥ naḥ gātum prathamaḥ viveda na eṣā gavyūtiḥ apabhartavai u

original: (AVŚ_18,1.50c) yatrā naḥ pūrve pitaraḥ paretā enā jajñānāḥ pathyā anu svāḥ //50// {5}
analyzed: yatrā naḥ pūrve pitaraḥ paretāḥ enā jajñānāḥ pathyāḥ anu svāḥ  /

original: (AVŚ_18,1.51a) barhiṣadaḥ pitara ūty arvāg imā vo havyā cakṛmā juṣadhvam /
analyzed: barhiṣadaḥ pitaraḥ ūtī arvāk imā vaḥ havyā cakṛma juṣadhvam

original: (AVŚ_18,1.51c) ta ā gatāvasā śaṃtamenādhā naḥ śaṃ yor arapo dadhāta //51//
analyzed: te ā gata avasā śaṃtamena adha naḥ śam yos arapaḥ dadhāta

original: (AVŚ_18,1.52a) ācyā jānu dakṣiṇato niṣadyedaṃ no havir abhi gṛṇantu viśve /
analyzed: ācya jānu dakṣiṇatas niṣadya idam naḥ haviḥ abhi gṛṇantu viśve

original: (AVŚ_18,1.52c) mā hiṃsiṣṭa pitaraḥ kena cin no yad va āgaḥ puruṣatā karāma //52//
analyzed: mā hiṃsiṣṭa pitaraḥ kena cit naḥ yat vaḥ āgaḥ puruṣa tā karāma

original: (AVŚ_18,1.53a) tvaṣṭā duhitre vahatuṃ kṛṇoti tenedaṃ viśvaṃ bhuvanaṃ sam eti /
analyzed: tvaṣṭā duhitre vahatum kṛṇoti tena idam viśvam bhuvanam sam eti

original: (AVŚ_18,1.53c) yamasya mātā paryuhyamānā maho jāyā vivasvato nanāśa //53//
analyzed: yamasya mātā paryuhyamānā mahaḥ jāyā vivasvataḥ nanāśa

original: (AVŚ_18,1.54a) prehi prehi pathibhiḥ pūryāṇair yenā te pūrve pitaraḥ paretāḥ /
analyzed: prehi prehi pathibhiḥ pūryāṇaiḥ yena te pūrve pitaraḥ paretāḥ

original: (AVŚ_18,1.54c) ubhā rājānau svadhayā madantau yamaṃ paśyāsi varuṇaṃ ca devam //54//
analyzed: ubhā rājānau svadhayā madantau yamam paśyāsi varuṇam ca devam

original: (AVŚ_18,1.55a) apeta vīta vi ca sarpatāto 'smā etaṃ pitaro lokam akran /
analyzed: apeta vīta vi ca sarpata atas sma etam pitaraḥ lokam akran

original: (AVŚ_18,1.55c) ahobhir adbhir aktubhir vyaktaṃ yamo dadāty avasānam asmai //55//
analyzed: ahobhiḥ adbhiḥ aktubhiḥ vyaktam yamaḥ dadāti avasānam asmai

original: (AVŚ_18,1.56a) uśantas tvedhīmahy uśantaḥ sam idhīmahi /
analyzed: uśantaḥ tvā idhīmahi uśantaḥ sam idhīmahi

original: (AVŚ_18,1.56c) uśann uśata ā vaha pitṝn haviṣe attave //56//
analyzed: uśan uśataḥ ā vaha pitṝn haviṣe attave

original: (AVŚ_18,1.57a) dyumantas tvedhīmahi dyumantaḥ sam idhīmahi /
analyzed: dyumantaḥ tvā idhīmahi dyumantaḥ sam idhīmahi

original: (AVŚ_18,1.57c) dyumān dyumata ā vaha pitṝn haviṣe attave //57//
analyzed: dyumān dyumataḥ ā vaha pitṝn haviṣe attave

original: (AVŚ_18,1.58a) aṅgiraso naḥ pitaro navagvā atharvāṇo bhṛgavaḥ somyāsaḥ /
analyzed: aṅgirasaḥ naḥ pitaraḥ navagvāḥ atharvāṇaḥ bhṛgavaḥ somyāsaḥ

original: (AVŚ_18,1.58c) teṣāṃ vayaṃ sumatau yajñiyānām api bhadre saumanase syāma //58//
analyzed: teṣām vayam sumatau yajñiyānām api bhadre saumanase syāma

original: (AVŚ_18,1.59a) aṅgirobhir yajñiyair ā gahīha yama vairūpair iha mādayasva /
analyzed: aṅgirobhiḥ yajñiyaiḥ ā gahi iha yama vairūpaiḥ iha mādayasva

original: (AVŚ_18,1.59c) vivasvantaṃ huve yaḥ pitā te 'smin barhiṣy ā niṣadya //59//
analyzed: vivasvantam huve yaḥ pitā te smin barhiṣi ā niṣadya

original: (AVŚ_18,1.60a) imaṃ yama prastaram ā hi rohāṅgirobhiḥ pitṛbhiḥ saṃvidānaḥ /
analyzed: imam yama prastaram ā hi roha aṅgirobhiḥ pitṛbhiḥ saṃvidānaḥ

original: (AVŚ_18,1.60c) ā tvā mantrāḥ kaviśastā vahantv enā rājan haviṣo mādayasva //60//
analyzed: ā tvā mantrāḥ kavi śastāḥ vahantu enā rājan haviṣaḥ mādayasva

original: (AVŚ_18,1.61a) ita eta udāruhan divas pṛṣṭhānv āruhan /
analyzed: itas ete udāruhan divaḥ pṛṣṭhā anu āruhan

original: (AVŚ_18,1.61c) pra bhūrjayo yathā pathā dyām aṅgiraso yayuḥ //61// {6}
analyzed: pra bhūrjayaḥ yathā pathā dyām aṅgirasaḥ yayuḥ

original: (AVŚ_18,2.1a) yamāya somaḥ pavate yamāya kriyate haviḥ /
analyzed: yamāya somaḥ pavate yamāya kriyate haviḥ

original: (AVŚ_18,2.1c) yamaṃ ha yajño gachaty agnidūto araṃkṛtaḥ //1//
analyzed: yamam ha yajñaḥ gacchati agni dūtaḥ araṃkṛtaḥ

original: (AVŚ_18,2.2a) yamāya madhumattamaṃ juhotā pra ca tiṣṭhata /
analyzed: yamāya madhumattamam juhota pra ca tiṣṭhata

original: (AVŚ_18,2.2c) idaṃ nama ṛṣibhyaḥ pūrvajebhyaḥ pūrvebhyaḥ pathikṛdbhyaḥ //2//
analyzed: idam namaḥ ṛṣibhyaḥ pūrva jebhyaḥ pūrvebhyaḥ pathikṛdbhyaḥ

original: (AVŚ_18,2.3a) yamāya ghṛtavat payo rājñe havir juhotana /
analyzed: yamāya ghṛtavat payaḥ rājñe haviḥ juhotana

original: (AVŚ_18,2.3c) sa no jīveṣv ā yamed dīrgham āyuḥ pra jīvase //3//
analyzed: sa naḥ jīveṣu ā yamet dīrgham āyuḥ pra jīvase

original: (AVŚ_18,2.4a) mainam agne vi daho mābhi śūśuco māsya tvacaṃ cikṣipo mā śarīram /
analyzed: mā enam agne vi dahaḥ mā abhi śūśucaḥ mā asya tvacam cikṣipaḥ mā śarīram

original: (AVŚ_18,2.4c) śṛtaṃ yadā karasi jātavedo 'them enaṃ pra hiṇutāt pitṝṃr upa //4//
analyzed: śṛtam yadā karasi jātavedaḥ thā īm enam pra hiṇutāt pitṝn upa

original: (AVŚ_18,2.5a) yadā śṛtaṃ kṛṇavo jātavedo 'themam enaṃ pari dattāt pitṛbhyaḥ /
analyzed: yadā śṛtam kṛṇavaḥ jātavedaḥ thā imam enam pari dattāt pitṛbhyaḥ

original: (AVŚ_18,2.5c) yado gachāty asunītim etām atha devānāṃ vaśanīr bhavāti //5//
analyzed: yadā u gacchāti asunītim etām atha devānām vaśanīḥ bhavāti

original: (AVŚ_18,2.6a) trikadrukebhiḥ pavate ṣaḍ urvīr ekam id bṛhat /
analyzed: trikadrukebhiḥ pavate ṣaḍ urvīḥ ekam id bṛhat

original: (AVŚ_18,2.6c) triṣṭub gāyatrī chandāṃsi sarvā tā yama ārpitā //6//
analyzed: triṣṭubh gāyatrī chandāṃsi sarvā tā yame ārpitā

original: (AVŚ_18,2.7a) sūryaṃ cakṣuṣā gacha vātam ātmanā divaṃ ca gacha pṛthivīṃ ca dharmabhiḥ /
analyzed: sūryam cakṣuṣā gacha vātam ātmanā divam ca gacha pṛthivīm ca dharmabhiḥ

original: (AVŚ_18,2.7c) apo vā gacha yadi tatra te hitam oṣadhīṣu prati tiṣṭhā śarīraiḥ //7//
analyzed: apaḥ vā gacha yadi tatra te hitam oṣadhīṣu prati tiṣṭha śarīraiḥ

original: (AVŚ_18,2.8a) ajo bhāgas tapasas taṃ tapasva taṃ te śocis tapatu taṃ te arciḥ /
analyzed: ajaḥ bhāgaḥ tapasaḥ tam tapasva tam te śociḥ tapatu tam te arciḥ

original: (AVŚ_18,2.8c) yās te śivās tanvo jātavedas tābhir vahainaṃ sukṛtām u lokam //8//
analyzed: yāḥ te śivāḥ tanvaḥ jātavedaḥ tābhiḥ vaha enam su kṛtām u lokam

original: (AVŚ_18,2.9a) yās te śocayo raṃhayo jātavedo yābhir āpṛṇāsi divam antarikṣam /
analyzed: yāḥ te śocayaḥ raṃhayaḥ jātavedaḥ yābhiḥ āpṛṇāsi divam antarikṣam

original: (AVŚ_18,2.9c) ajaṃ yantam anu tāḥ sam ṛṇvatām athetarābhiḥ śivatamābhiḥ śṛtaṃ kṛdhi //9//
analyzed: ajam yantam anu tāḥ sam ṛṇvatām atha itarābhiḥ śivatamābhiḥ śṛtam kṛdhi

original: (AVŚ_18,2.10a) ava sṛja punar agne pitṛbhyo yas ta āhutaś carati svadhāvān /
analyzed: ava sṛja punar agne pitṛbhyaḥ yaḥ te āhutaḥ carati svadhāvān

original: (AVŚ_18,2.10c) āyur vasāna upa yātu śeṣaḥ saṃ gachatāṃ tanvā suvarcāḥ //10// {7}
analyzed: āyuḥ vasānaḥ upa yātu śeṣaḥ sam gacchatām tanvā su varcāḥ

original: (AVŚ_18,2.11a) ati drava śvānau sārameyau caturakṣau śabalau sādhunā pathā /
analyzed: ati drava śvānau sārameyau catur akṣau śabalau sādhunā pathā

original: (AVŚ_18,2.11c) adhā pitṝnt suvidatrāṃ apīhi yamena ye sadhamādaṃ madanti //11//
analyzed: adhā pitṝn suvidatrām apīhi yamena ye sadhamādam madanti

original: (AVŚ_18,2.12a) yau te śvānau yama rakṣitārau caturakṣau pathiṣadī nṛcakṣasā /
analyzed: yau te śvānau yama rakṣitārau catur akṣau pathiṣadī nṛ cakṣasā

original: (AVŚ_18,2.12c) tābhyāṃ rājan pari dhehy enaṃ svasty asmā anamīvaṃ ca dhehi //12//
analyzed: tābhyām rājan pari dhehi enam svasti asmai anamīvam ca dhehi

original: (AVŚ_18,2.13a) urūṇasāv asutṛpāv udumbalau yamasya dūtau carato janāṃ anu /
analyzed: uru nasau asu tṛpau udumbalau yamasya dūtau carataḥ janān anu

original: (AVŚ_18,2.13c) tāv asmabhyaṃ dṛśaye sūryāya punar dātām asum adyeha bhadram //13//
analyzed: tau asmabhyam dṛśaye sūryāya punar dātām asum adyā iha bhadram

original: (AVŚ_18,2.14a) soma ekebhyaḥ pavate ghṛtam eka upāsate /
analyzed: somaḥ ekebhyaḥ pavate ghṛtam eke upāsate

original: (AVŚ_18,2.14c) yebhyo madhu pradhāvati tāṃś cid evāpi gachatāt //14//
analyzed: yebhyaḥ madhu pradhāvati tān cit eva api gachatāt

original: (AVŚ_18,2.15a) ye cit pūrva ṛtasātā ṛtajātā ṛtāvṛdhaḥ /
analyzed: ye cit pūrve ṛta sātāḥ ṛta jātāḥ ṛtāvṛdhaḥ

original: (AVŚ_18,2.15c) ṛṣīn tapasvato yama tapojāṃ api gachatāt //15//
analyzed: ṛṣīn tapasvataḥ yama tapaḥ jām api gacchatāt

original: (AVŚ_18,2.16a) tapasā ye anādhṛṣyās tapasā ye svar yayuḥ /
analyzed: tapasā ye anādhṛṣyāḥ tapasā ye svar yayuḥ

original: (AVŚ_18,2.16c) tapo ye cakrire mahas tāṃś cid evāpi gachatāt //16//
analyzed: tapaḥ ye cakrire mahaḥ tān cit eva api gacchatāt

original: (AVŚ_18,2.17a) ye yudhyante pradhaneṣu śūrāso ye svar tanūtyajaḥ /
analyzed: ye yudhyante pradhaneṣu śūrāsaḥ ye svar tanūtyajaḥ

original: (AVŚ_18,2.17c) ye vā sahasradakṣiṇās tāṃ cid evāpi gachatāt //17//
analyzed: ye vā sahasra dakṣiṇāḥ tām cit eva api gacchatāt

original: (AVŚ_18,2.18a) sahasraṇīthāḥ kavayo ye gopāyanti sūryam /
analyzed: sahasraṇīthāḥ kavayaḥ ye gopāyanti sūryam

original: (AVŚ_18,2.18c) ṛṣīn tapasvato yama tapojāṃ api gachatāt //18//
analyzed: ṛṣīn tapasvataḥ yama tapaḥ jām api gacchatāt

original: (AVŚ_18,2.19a) syonāsmai bhava pṛthivy anṛkṣarā niveśanī /
analyzed: syonā asmai bhava pṛthivi anṛkṣarā niveśanī

original: (AVŚ_18,2.19c) yachāsmai śarma saprathāḥ //19//
analyzed: yaccha asmai śarma saprathāḥ

original: (AVŚ_18,2.20a) asaṃbādhe pṛthivyā urau loke ni dhīyasva /
analyzed: asaṃbādhe pṛthivyāḥ urau loke ni dhīyasva

original: (AVŚ_18,2.20c) svadhā yāś cakṛṣe jīvan tās te santu madhuścutaḥ //20// {8}
analyzed: svadhāḥ yāḥ cakṛṣe jīvan tāḥ te santu madhuścutaḥ

original: (AVŚ_18,2.21a) hvayāmi te manasā mana ihemān gṛhām upa jujuṣāṇa ehi /
analyzed: hvayāmi te manasā manaḥ iha imān gṛhān upa jujuṣāṇaḥ ehi

original: (AVŚ_18,2.21c) saṃ gachasva pitṛbhiḥ saṃ yamena syonās tvā vātā upa vāntu śagmāḥ //21//
analyzed: sam gacchasva pitṛbhiḥ sam yamena syonāḥ tvā vātāḥ upa vāntu śagmāḥ

original: (AVŚ_18,2.22a) ut tvā vahantu maruta udavāhā udaprutaḥ /
analyzed: ud tvā vahantu marutaḥ uda vāhāḥ uda prutaḥ

original: (AVŚ_18,2.22c) ajena kṛṇvantaḥ śītaṃ varṣeṇokṣantu bāl iti //22//
analyzed: ajena kṛṇvantaḥ śītam varṣeṇa ukṣantu bāl iti

original: (AVŚ_18,2.23a) ud ahvam āyur āyuṣe kratve dakṣāya jīvase /
analyzed: ud ahvam āyuḥ āyuṣe kratve dakṣāya jīvase

original: (AVŚ_18,2.23c) svān gachatu te mano adhā pitṝṃr upa drava //23//
analyzed: svān gacchatu te manaḥ adhā pitṝn upa drava

original: (AVŚ_18,2.24a) mā te mano māsor māṅgānāṃ mā rasasya te /
analyzed: mā te manaḥ mā asoḥ mā aṅgānām mā rasasya te

original: (AVŚ_18,2.24c) mā te hāsta tanvaḥ kiṃ caneha //24//
analyzed: mā te ha āsta tanvaḥ kim cana iha

original: (AVŚ_18,2.25a) mā tvā vṛkṣaḥ saṃ bādhiṣṭa mā devī pṛthivī mahī /
analyzed: mā tvā vṛkṣaḥ sam bādhiṣṭa mā devī pṛthivī mahī

original: (AVŚ_18,2.25c) lokaṃ pitṛṣu vittvaidhasva yamarājasu //25//
analyzed: lokam pitṛṣu vittvā edhasva yama rājasu

original: (AVŚ_18,2.26a) yat te aṅgam atihitaṃ parācair apānaḥ prāṇo ya u vā te paretaḥ /
analyzed: yat te aṅgam atihitam parācais apānaḥ prāṇaḥ yaḥ u vā te paretaḥ

original: (AVŚ_18,2.26c) tat te saṃgatya pitaraḥ sanīḍā ghāsād ghāsaṃ punar ā veśayantu //26//
analyzed: tat te saṃgatya pitaraḥ sanīḍāḥ ghāsāt ghāsam punar ā veśayantu

original: (AVŚ_18,2.27a) apemaṃ jīvā arudhan gṛhebhyas taṃ nir vahata pari grāmād itaḥ /
analyzed: apa imam jīvāḥ arudhan gṛhebhyaḥ tam niḥ vahata pari grāmāt itas

original: (AVŚ_18,2.27c) mṛtyur yamasyāsīd dūtaḥ pracetā asūn pitṛbhyo gamayāṃ cakāra //27//
analyzed: mṛtyuḥ yamasya āsīt dūtaḥ pracetāḥ asūn pitṛbhyaḥ gamayām cakāra

original: (AVŚ_18,2.28a) ye dasyavaḥ pitṛṣu praviṣṭā jñātimukhā ahutādaś caranti /
analyzed: ye dasyavaḥ pitṛṣu praviṣṭāḥ jñāti mukhāḥ ahuta adaḥ caranti

original: (AVŚ_18,2.28c) parāpuro nipuro ye bharanty agniṣ ṭān asmāt pra dhamāti yajñāt //28//
analyzed: parāpuraḥ nipuraḥ ye bharanti agniḥ tān asmāt pra dhamāti yajñāt

original: (AVŚ_18,2.29a) saṃ viśantv iha pitaraḥ svā naḥ syonaṃ kṛṇvantaḥ pratiranta āyuḥ /
analyzed: sam viśantu iha pitaraḥ svāḥ naḥ syonam kṛṇvantaḥ pratirantaḥ āyuḥ

original: (AVŚ_18,2.29c) tebhyaḥ śakema haviṣā nakṣamāṇā jyog jīvantaḥ śaradaḥ purūcīḥ //29//
analyzed: tebhyaḥ śakema haviṣā nakṣamāṇāḥ jyok jīvantaḥ śaradaḥ purūcīḥ

original: (AVŚ_18,2.30a) yāṃ te dhenuṃ nipṛṇāmi yam u kṣīra odanam /
analyzed: yām te dhenum nipṛṇāmi yam u kṣīre odanam

original: (AVŚ_18,2.30c) tenā janasyāso bhartā yo 'trāsad ajīvanaḥ //30// {9}
analyzed: tena janasya asaḥ bhartā yaḥ trāsat a jīvanaḥ

original: (AVŚ_18,2.31a) aśvāvatīṃ pra tara yā suśevā rkṣākaṃ vā prataraṃ navīyaḥ /
analyzed: aśvāvatīm pra tara yā su śevā rkṣākam vā prataram navīyaḥ

original: (AVŚ_18,2.31c) yas tvā jaghāna vadhyaḥ so astu mā so anyad vidata bhāgadheyam //31//
analyzed: yaḥ tvā jaghāna vadhyaḥ saḥ astu mā saḥ anyat vidata bhāgadheyam

original: (AVŚ_18,2.32a) yamaḥ paro 'varo vivasvān tataḥ paraṃ nāti paśyāmi kiṃ cana /
analyzed: yamaḥ paraḥ varaḥ vivasvān tatas param na ati paśyāmi kim cana

original: (AVŚ_18,2.32c) yame adhvaro adhi me niviṣṭo bhuvo vivasvān anvātatāna //32//
analyzed: yame adhvaraḥ adhi me niviṣṭaḥ bhuvaḥ vivasvān anvātatāna

original: (AVŚ_18,2.33a) apāgūhann amṛtāṃ martyebhyaḥ kṛtvā savarṇām adadhur vivasvate /
analyzed: apāgūhan amṛtām martyebhyaḥ kṛtvā savarṇām adadhuḥ vivasvate

original: (AVŚ_18,2.33c) utāśvināv abharad yat tad āsīd ajahād u dvā mithunā saraṇyūḥ //33//
analyzed: uta aśvinau abharat yat tat āsīt ajahāt u dvā mithunā saraṇyūḥ

original: (AVŚ_18,2.34a) ye nikhātā ye paroptā ye dagdhā ye coddhitāḥ /
analyzed: ye nikhātāḥ ye paroptāḥ ye dagdhāḥ ye ca uddhitāḥ

original: (AVŚ_18,2.34c) sarvāṃs tān agna ā vaha pitṝn haviṣe attave //34//
analyzed: sarvān tān agne ā vaha pitṝn haviṣe attave

original: (AVŚ_18,2.35a) ye agnidagdhā ye anagnidagdhā madhye divaḥ svadhayā mādayante /
analyzed: ye agni dagdhāḥ ye an agni dagdhāḥ madhye divaḥ svadhayā mādayante

original: (AVŚ_18,2.35c) tvaṃ tān vettha yadi te jātavedaḥ svadhayā yajñaṃ svadhitiṃ juṣantām //35//
analyzed: tvam tān vettha yadi te jātavedaḥ svadhayā yajñam svadhitim juṣantām

original: (AVŚ_18,2.36a) śaṃ tapa māti tapo agne mā tanvaṃ tapaḥ /
analyzed: śam tapa mā ati tapaḥ agne mā tanvam tapaḥ

original: (AVŚ_18,2.36c) vaṇeṣu śuṣmo astu te pṛthivyām astu yad dharaḥ //36//

original: (AVŚ_18,2.37a) dadāmy asmā avasānam etad ya eṣa āgan mama ced abhūd iha /
analyzed: dadāmi asmai avasānam etat yaḥ eṣaḥ āgan mama ca id abhūt iha

original: (AVŚ_18,2.37c) yamaś cikitvān praty etad āha mamaiṣa rāya upa tiṣṭhatām iha //37//
analyzed: yamaḥ cikitvān prati etat āha mama eṣa rāyaḥ upa tiṣṭhatām iha

original: (AVŚ_18,2.38a) imāṃ mātrāṃ mimīmahe yathāparaṃ na māsātai /
analyzed: imām mātrām mimīmahe yathā aparam na māsātai

original: (AVŚ_18,2.38c) śate śaratsu no purā //38//
analyzed: śate śaratsu na u purā

original: (AVŚ_18,2.39a) premāṃ mātrāṃ mimīmahe yathāparaṃ na māsātai /
analyzed: pra imām mātrām mimīmahe yathā aparam na māsātai

original: (AVŚ_18,2.39c) śate śaratsu no purā //39//
analyzed: śate śaratsu na u purā

original: (AVŚ_18,2.40a) apemāṃ mātrāṃ mimīmahe yathāparaṃ na māsātai /
analyzed: apa imām mātrām mimīmahe yathā aparam na māsātai

original: (AVŚ_18,2.40c) śate śaratsu no purā //40// {10}
analyzed: śate śaratsu na u purā

original: (AVŚ_18,2.41a) vīmāṃ mātrāṃ mimīmahe yathāparaṃ na māsātai /
analyzed: vi imām mātrām mimīmahe yathā aparam na māsātai

original: (AVŚ_18,2.41c) śate śaratsu no purā //41//
analyzed: śate śaratsu na u purā

original: (AVŚ_18,2.42a) nir imāṃ mātrāṃ mimīmahe yathāparaṃ na māsātai /
analyzed: niḥ imām mātrām mimīmahe yathā aparam na māsātai

original: (AVŚ_18,2.42c) śate śaratsu no purā //42//
analyzed: śate śaratsu na u purā

original: (AVŚ_18,2.43a) ud imāṃ mātrāṃ mimīmahe yathāparaṃ na māsātai /
analyzed: ud imām mātrām mimīmahe yathā aparam na māsātai

original: (AVŚ_18,2.43c) śate śaratsu no purā //43//
analyzed: śate śaratsu na u purā

original: (AVŚ_18,2.44a) sam imāṃ mātrāṃ mimīmahe yathāparaṃ na māsātai /
analyzed: sam imām mātrām mimīmahe yathā aparam na māsātai

original: (AVŚ_18,2.44c) śate śaratsu no purā //44//
analyzed: śate śaratsu na u purā

original: (AVŚ_18,2.45a) amāsi mātrāṃ svar agām āyuṣmān bhūyāsam /
analyzed: amāsi mātrām svar agām āyuṣmān bhūyāsam

original: (AVŚ_18,2.45c) yathāparaṃ na māsātai śate śaratsu no purā //45//
analyzed: yathā aparam na māsātai śate śaratsu na u purā

original: (AVŚ_18,2.46a) prāṇo apāno vyāna āyuś cakṣur dṛśaye sūryāya /
analyzed: prāṇaḥ apānaḥ vyānaḥ āyuḥ cakṣuḥ dṛśaye sūryāya

original: (AVŚ_18,2.46c) aparipareṇa pathā yamarājñaḥ pitṝn gacha //46//
analyzed: aparipareṇa pathā yama rājñaḥ pitṝn gacha

original: (AVŚ_18,2.47a) ye agravaḥ śaśamānāḥ pareyur hitvā dveṣāṃsy anapatyavantaḥ /
analyzed: ye agravaḥ śaśamānāḥ pareyuḥ hitvā dveṣāṃsi anapatyavantaḥ

original: (AVŚ_18,2.47c) te dyām udityāvidanta lokaṃ nākasya pṛṣṭhe adhi dīdhyānāḥ //47//
analyzed: te dyām uditya avidanta lokam nākasya pṛṣṭhe adhi dīdhyānāḥ

original: (AVŚ_18,2.48a) udanvatī dyaur avamā pīlumatīti madhyamā /
analyzed: udanvatī dyauḥ avamā pīlumatī iti madhyamā

original: (AVŚ_18,2.48c) tṛtīyā ha pradyaur iti yasyāṃ pitara āsate //48//

original: (AVŚ_18,2.49a) ye na pituḥ pitaro ye pitāmahā ya āviviśur urv antarikṣam /
analyzed: ye na pituḥ pitaraḥ ye pitāmahāḥ ye āviviśuḥ uru antarikṣam

original: (AVŚ_18,2.49c) ya ākṣiyanti pṛthivīm uta dyāṃ tebhyaḥ pitṛbhyo namasā vidhema //49//
analyzed: ye ākṣiyanti pṛthivīm uta dyām tebhyaḥ pitṛbhyaḥ namasā vidhema

original: (AVŚ_18,2.50a) idam id vā u nāparaṃ divi paśyasi sūryam /
analyzed: idam id vai u na aparam divi paśyasi sūryam

original: (AVŚ_18,2.50c) mātā putraṃ yathā sicābhy enaṃ bhūma ūrṇuhi //50// {11}
analyzed: mātā putram yathā sicā abhi enam bhūme ūrṇuhi

original: (AVŚ_18,2.51a) idam id vā u nāparaṃ jarasy anyad ito 'param /
analyzed: idam id vai u na aparam jarasi anyat itas param

original: (AVŚ_18,2.51c) jāyā patim iva vāsasābhy enaṃ bhūma ūrṇuhi //51//
analyzed: jāyā patim iva vāsasā abhi enam bhūme ūrṇuhi

original: (AVŚ_18,2.52a) abhi tvorṇomi pṛthivyā mātur vastreṇa bhadrayā /
analyzed: abhi tvā ūrṇomi pṛthivyāḥ mātuḥ vastreṇa bhadrayā

original: (AVŚ_18,2.52c) jīveṣu bhadraṃ tan mayi svadhā pitṛṣu sā tvayi //52//
analyzed: jīveṣu bhadram tat mayi svadhā pitṛṣu sā tvayi

original: (AVŚ_18,2.53a) agnīṣomā pathikṛtā syonaṃ devebhyo ratnaṃ dadhathur vi lokam /
analyzed: agnīṣomā pathikṛtā syonam devebhyaḥ ratnam dadhathuḥ vi lokam

original: (AVŚ_18,2.53c) upa preṣyantaṃ pūṣaṇaṃ yo vahāty añjoyānaiḥ pathibhis tatra gachatam //53//
analyzed: upa preṣyantam pūṣaṇam yaḥ vahāti añjoyānaiḥ pathibhiḥ tatra gachatam

original: (AVŚ_18,2.54a) pūṣā tvetaś cyāvayatu pra vidvān anaṣṭapaśur bhuvanasya gopāḥ /
analyzed: pūṣā tvā itas cyāvayatu pra vidvān a naṣṭa paśuḥ bhuvanasya gopāḥ

original: (AVŚ_18,2.54c) sa tvaitebhyaḥ pari dadat pitṛbhyo 'gnir devebhyaḥ suvidatriyebhyaḥ //54//
analyzed: sa tvā etebhyaḥ pari dadat pitṛbhyaḥ gniḥ devebhyaḥ suvidatriyebhyaḥ

original: (AVŚ_18,2.55a) āyur viśvāyuḥ pari pātu tvā pūṣā tvā pātu prapathe purastāt /
analyzed: āyuḥ viśvāyuḥ pari pātu tvā pūṣā tvā pātu prapathe purastāt

original: (AVŚ_18,2.55c) yatrāsate sukṛto yatra ta īyus tatra tvā devaḥ savitā dadhātu //55//
analyzed: yatra āsate su kṛtaḥ yatra te īyuḥ tatra tvā devaḥ savitā dadhātu

original: (AVŚ_18,2.56a) imau yunajmi te vahnī asunītāya voḍhave /
analyzed: imau yunajmi te vahnī asunītāya voḍhave

original: (AVŚ_18,2.56c) tābhyāṃ yamasya sādanaṃ samitiś cāva gachatāt //56//
analyzed: tābhyām yamasya sādanam samitiḥ ca ava gacchatāt

original: (AVŚ_18,2.57a) etat tvā vāsaḥ prathamaṃ nv āgann apaitad ūha yad ihābibhaḥ purā /
analyzed: etat tvā vāsaḥ prathamam nu āgan apa etat ūha yat iha abibhaḥ purā

original: (AVŚ_18,2.57c) iṣṭāpūrtam anusaṃkrāma vidvān yatra te dattaṃ bahudhā vibandhuṣu //57//
analyzed: iṣṭāpūrtam anusaṃkrāma vidvān yatra te dattam bahudhā vibandhuṣu

original: (AVŚ_18,2.58a) agner varma pari gobhir vyayasva saṃ prorṇuṣva medasā pīvasā ca /
analyzed: agneḥ varma pari gobhiḥ vyayasva sam pra ūrṇuṣva medasā pīvasā ca

original: (AVŚ_18,2.58c) net tvā dhṛṣṇur harasā jarhṛṣāṇo dadhṛg vidhakṣan parīṅkhayātai //58//
analyzed: na id tvā dhṛṣṇuḥ harasā jarhṛṣāṇaḥ dadhṛṣ vidhakṣan pari īṅkhayātai

original: (AVŚ_18,2.59a) daṇḍaṃ hastād ādadāno gatāsoḥ saha śrotreṇa varcasā balena /
analyzed: daṇḍam hastāt ādadānaḥ gatāsoḥ saha śrotreṇa varcasā balena

original: (AVŚ_18,2.59c) atraiva tvam iha vayaṃ suvīrā viśvā mṛdho abhimātīr jayema //59//
analyzed: atra eva tvam iha vayam su vīrāḥ viśvāḥ mṛdhaḥ abhimātīḥ jayema

original: (AVŚ_18,2.60a) dhanur hastād ādadāno mṛtasya saha kṣatreṇa varcasā balena /
analyzed: dhanuḥ hastāt ādadānaḥ mṛtasya saha kṣatreṇa varcasā balena

original: (AVŚ_18,2.60c) samāgṛbhāya vasu bhūri puṣṭam arvāṅ tvam ehy upa jīvalokam //60// {12}
analyzed: samāgṛbhāya vasu bhūri puṣṭam arvāṅ tvam ehi upa jīva lokam

original: (AVŚ_18,3.1a) iyaṃ nārī patilokaṃ vṛṇānā ni padyata upa tvā martya pretam /
analyzed: iyam nārī pati lokam vṛṇānā ni padyate upa tvā martya pretam

original: (AVŚ_18,3.1c) dharmaṃ purāṇam anupālayantī tasyai prajāṃ draviṇaṃ ceha dhehi //1//
analyzed: dharmam purāṇam anupālayantī tasyai prajām draviṇam ca iha dhehi

original: (AVŚ_18,3.2a) ud īrṣva nāry abhi jīvalokaṃ gatāsum etam upa śeṣa ehi /
analyzed: ud īrṣva nāri abhi jīva lokam gatāsum etam upa śeṣe ehi

original: (AVŚ_18,3.2c) hastagrābhasya dadhiṣos tavedaṃ patyur janitvam abhi saṃ babhūtha //2//
analyzed: hastagrābhasya dadhiṣoḥ tava idam patyuḥ janitvam abhi sam babhūtha

original: (AVŚ_18,3.3a) apaśyaṃ yuvatiṃ nīyamānāṃ jīvāṃ mṛtebhyaḥ pariṇīyamānām /
analyzed: apaśyam yuvatim nīyamānām jīvām mṛtebhyaḥ pariṇīyamānām

original: (AVŚ_18,3.3c) andhena yat tamasā prāvṛtāsīt prākto apācīm anayaṃ tad enām //3//
analyzed: andhena yat tamasā prāvṛtā āsīt prāktas apācīm anayam tat enām

original: (AVŚ_18,3.4a) prajānaty aghnye jīvalokaṃ devānāṃ panthām anusaṃcarantī /
analyzed: prajānatī aghnye jīva lokam devānām panthām anusaṃcarantī

original: (AVŚ_18,3.4c) ayaṃ te gopatis taṃ juṣasva svargaṃ lokam adhi rohayainam //4//
analyzed: ayam te gopatiḥ tam juṣasva svargam lokam adhi rohaya enam

original: (AVŚ_18,3.5a) upa dyām upa vetasam avattaro nadīnām /
analyzed: upa dyām upa vetasam avattaraḥ nadīnām

original: (AVŚ_18,3.5c) agne pittam apām asi //5//
analyzed: agne pittam apām asi

original: (AVŚ_18,3.6a) yaṃ tvam agne samadahas tam u nir vāpaya punaḥ /
analyzed: yam tvam agne samadahaḥ tam u niḥ vāpaya punar

original: (AVŚ_18,3.6c) kyāmbūr atra rohatu śāṇḍadūrvā vyalkaśā //6//
analyzed: kyāmbūḥ atra rohatu śāṇḍadūrvā vyalkaśā

original: (AVŚ_18,3.7a) idaṃ ta ekam pura ū ta ekaṃ tṛtīyena jyotiṣā saṃ viśasva /
analyzed: idam te ekam puras u te ekam tṛtīyena jyotiṣā sam viśasva

original: (AVŚ_18,3.7c) saṃveśane tanvā cārur edhi priyo devānāṃ parame sadhasthe //7//
analyzed: saṃveśane tanvā cāruḥ edhi priyaḥ devānām parame sadhasthe

original: (AVŚ_18,3.8a) ut tiṣṭha prehi pra dravaukaḥ kṛṇuṣva salile sadhasthe /
analyzed: ud tiṣṭha prehi pra dravaukaḥ kṛṇuṣva salile sadhasthe

original: (AVŚ_18,3.8c) tatra tvaṃ pitṛbhiḥ saṃvidānaḥ saṃ somena madasva saṃ svadhābhiḥ //8//
analyzed: tatra tvam pitṛbhiḥ saṃvidānaḥ sam somena madasva sam svadhābhiḥ

original: (AVŚ_18,3.9a) pra cyavasva tanvaṃ saṃ bharasva mā te gātrā vi hāyi mo śarīram /
analyzed: pra cyavasva tanvam sam bharasva mā te gātrā vi hāyi mā u śarīram

original: (AVŚ_18,3.9c) mano niviṣṭam anusaṃviśasva yatra bhūmer juṣase tatra gacha //9//

analyzed: apūpavān apavān caruḥ ā iha sīdatu

original: (AVŚ_18,4.24c) lokakṛtaḥ pathikṛto yajāmahe ye devānāṃ hutabhāgā iha stha //24//
analyzed: loka kṛtaḥ pathikṛtaḥ yajāmahe ye devānām huta bhāgāḥ iha stha

original: (AVŚ_18,4.25a) apūpāpihitān kumbhān yāṃs te devā adhārayan /
analyzed: apūpa apihitān kumbhān yān te devāḥ adhārayan

original: (AVŚ_18,4.25c) te te santu svadhāvanto madhumanto ghṛtaścutaḥ //25//
analyzed: te te santu svadhāvantaḥ madhumantaḥ ghṛtaścutaḥ

original: (AVŚ_18,4.26a) yās te dhānā anukirāmi tilamiśrāḥ svadhāvatīḥ /
analyzed: yāḥ te dhānāḥ anukirāmi tila miśrāḥ svadhāvatīḥ

original: (AVŚ_18,4.26c) tās te santūdbhvīḥ prabhvīs tās te yamo rājānu manyatām //26//
analyzed: tāḥ te santu udbhvīḥ prabhvīḥ tāḥ te yamaḥ rājā anu manyatām

original: (AVŚ_18,4.27a) akṣitiṃ bhūyasīm //27//
analyzed: akṣitim bhūyasīm

original: (AVŚ_18,4.28a) drapsaś caskanda pṛthivīm anu dyām imaṃ ca yonim anu yaś ca pūrvaḥ /
analyzed: drapsaḥ caskanda pṛthivīm anu dyām imam ca yonim anu yaḥ ca pūrvaḥ

original: (AVŚ_18,4.28c) samānaṃ yonim anu samcarantaṃ drapsam juhomy anu sapta hotrāḥ //28//
analyzed: samānam yonim anu samcarantam drapsam juhomi anu sapta hotrāḥ

original: (AVŚ_18,4.29a) śatadhāraṃ vāyum arkaṃ svarvidaṃ nṛcakṣasas te abhi cakṣate rayim /
analyzed: śata dhāram vāyum arkam svar vidam nṛ cakṣasaḥ te abhi cakṣate rayim

original: (AVŚ_18,4.29c) ye pṛnanti pra ca yachanti sarvadā te duhrate dakṣiṇāṃ saptamātaram //29//
analyzed: ye pṛnanti pra ca yacchanti sarvadā te duhrate dakṣiṇām sapta mātaram

original: (AVŚ_18,4.30a) kośaṃ duhanti kalaśaṃ caturbilam iḍāṃ dhenuṃ madhumatīṃ svastaye /
analyzed: kośam duhanti kalaśam catur bilam iḍām dhenum madhumatīm svastaye

original: (AVŚ_18,4.30c) ūrjaṃ madantīm aditiṃ janeṣv agne mā hiṃsīḥ parame vyoman //30// {22}
analyzed: ūrjam madantīm aditim janeṣu agne mā hiṃsīḥ parame vyoman

original: (AVŚ_18,4.31a) etat te devaḥ savitā vāso dadāti bhartave /
analyzed: etat te devaḥ savitā vāsaḥ dadāti bhartave

original: (AVŚ_18,4.31c) tat tvaṃ yamasya rājye vasānas tārpyaṃ cara //31//
analyzed: tat tvam yamasya rājye vasānaḥ tārpyam cara

original: (AVŚ_18,4.32a) dhānā dhenur abhavad vatso asyās tilo 'bhavat /
analyzed: dhānā dhenuḥ abhavat vatsaḥ asyāḥ tilaḥ bhavat

original: (AVŚ_18,4.32c) tāṃ vai yamasya rājye akṣitām upa jīvati //32//
analyzed: tām vai yamasya rājye a kṣitām upa jīvati

original: (AVŚ_18,4.33a) etās te asau dhenavaḥ kāmadughā bhavantu /
analyzed: etāḥ te asau dhenavaḥ kāmadughāḥ bhavantu

original: (AVŚ_18,4.33c) enīḥ śyenīḥ sarūpā virūpās tilavatsā upa tiṣṭhantu tvātra //33//
analyzed: enīḥ śyenīḥ sarūpāḥ virūpāḥ tila vatsāḥ upa tiṣṭhantu tvā atra

original: (AVŚ_18,4.34a) enīr dhānā hariṇīḥ śyenīr asya kṛṣṇā dhānā rohiṇīr dhenavas te /
analyzed: enīḥ dhānāḥ hariṇīḥ śyenīḥ asya kṛṣṇāḥ dhānāḥ rohiṇīḥ dhenavaḥ te

original: (AVŚ_18,4.34c) tilavatsā ūrjam asmai duhānā viśvāhā santv anapasphurantīḥ //34//
analyzed: tila vatsāḥ ūrjam asmai duhānāḥ viśvāhā santu an apasphurantīḥ

original: (AVŚ_18,4.35a) vaiśvānare havir idaṃ juhomi sāhasraṃ śatadhāram utsam /
analyzed: vaiśvānare haviḥ idam juhomi sāhasram śata dhāram utsam

original: (AVŚ_18,4.35c) sa bibharti pitaraṃ pitāmahān prapitāmahān bibharti pinvamānaḥ //35//
analyzed: sa bibharti pitaram pitāmahān prapitāmahān bibharti pinvamānaḥ

original: (AVŚ_18,4.36a) sahasradhāraṃ śatadhāram utsam akṣitaṃ vyacyamānaṃ salilasya pṛṣṭhe /
analyzed: sahasra dhāram śata dhāram utsam akṣitam vyacyamānam salilasya pṛṣṭhe

original: (AVŚ_18,4.36c) ūrjaṃ duhānam anapasphurantam upāsate pitaraḥ svadhābhiḥ //36//
analyzed: ūrjam duhānam an apasphurantam upāsate pitaraḥ svadhābhiḥ

original: (AVŚ_18,4.37a) idaṃ kasāmbu cayanena citaṃ tat sajātā ava paśyateta /
analyzed: idam kasāmbu cayanena citam tat sajātāḥ ava paśyata ita

original: (AVŚ_18,4.37c) martyo 'yam amṛtatvam eti tasmai gṛhān kṛṇuta yāvatsabandhu //37//
analyzed: martyaḥ yam amṛta tvam eti tasmai gṛhān kṛṇuta yāvatsabandhu

original: (AVŚ_18,4.38a) ihaivaidhi dhanasanir ihacitta ihakratuḥ /
analyzed: iha eva edhi dhana saniḥ ihacittaḥ ihakratuḥ

original: (AVŚ_18,4.38c) ihaidhi vīryavattaro vayodhā aparāhataḥ //38//
analyzed: iha edhi vīryavattaraḥ vayodhāḥ a parāhataḥ

original: (AVŚ_18,4.39a) putraṃ pautram abhitarpayantīr āpo madhumatīr imāḥ /
analyzed: putram pautram abhitarpayantīḥ āpaḥ madhumatīḥ imāḥ

original: (AVŚ_18,4.39c) svadhāṃ pitṛbhyo amṛtaṃ duhānā āpo devīr ubhayāṃs tarpayantu //39//
analyzed: svadhām pitṛbhyaḥ amṛtam duhānāḥ āpaḥ devīḥ ubhayān tarpayantu

original: (AVŚ_18,4.40a) āpo agniṃ pra hiṇuta pitṝṃr upemaṃ yajñaṃ pitaro me juṣantām /
analyzed: āpaḥ agnim pra hiṇuta pitṝn upa imam yajñam pitaraḥ me juṣantām

original: (AVŚ_18,4.40c) āsīnām ūrjam upa ye sacante te no rayiṃ sarvavīraṃ ni yachān //40// {23}
analyzed: āsīnām ūrjam upa ye sacante te naḥ rayim sarva vīram ni yacchān

original: (AVŚ_18,4.41a) sam indhate amartyaṃ havyavāhaṃ ghṛtapriyam /
analyzed: sam indhate amartyam havyavāham ghṛta priyam

original: (AVŚ_18,4.41c) sa veda nihitān nidhīn pitṝn parāvato gatān //41//
analyzed: sa veda nihitān nidhīn pitṝn parāvataḥ gatān

original: (AVŚ_18,4.42a) yaṃ te manthaṃ yam odananaṃ yan māṃsaṃ nipṛṇāmi te /
analyzed: yam te mantham yam odananam yat māṃsam nipṛṇāmi te

original: (AVŚ_18,4.42c) te te santu svadhāvanto madhumanto ghṛtaścutaḥ //42//
analyzed: te te santu svadhāvantaḥ madhumantaḥ ghṛtaścutaḥ

original: (AVŚ_18,4.43a) yās te dhānā anukirāmi tilamiśrāḥ svadhāvatīḥ /
analyzed: yāḥ te dhānāḥ anukirāmi tila miśrāḥ svadhāvatīḥ

original: (AVŚ_18,4.43c) tās te santūdbhvīḥ prabhvīs tās te yamo rājānu manyatām //43//
analyzed: tāḥ te santu udbhvīḥ prabhvīḥ tāḥ te yamaḥ rājā anu manyatām

original: (AVŚ_18,4.44a) idaṃ pūrvam aparaṃ niyānaṃ yenā te pūrve pitaraḥ paretāḥ /
analyzed: idam pūrvam aparam niyānam yena te pūrve pitaraḥ paretāḥ

original: (AVŚ_18,4.44c) purogavā ye abhisāco asya te tvā vahanti sukṛtām u lokam //44//
analyzed: purogavāḥ ye abhisācaḥ asya te tvā vahanti su kṛtām u lokam

original: (AVŚ_18,4.45a) sarasvatīṃ devayanto havante sarasvatīm adhvare tāyamāne /
analyzed: sarasvatīm devayantaḥ havante sarasvatīm adhvare tāyamāne

original: (AVŚ_18,4.45c) sarasvatīṃ sukṛto havante sarasvatī dāśuṣe vāryaṃ dāt //45//
analyzed: sarasvatīm su kṛtaḥ havante sarasvatī dāśuṣe vāryam dāt

original: (AVŚ_18,4.46a) sarasvatīṃ pitaro havante dakṣiṇā yajñam abhinakṣamāṇāḥ /
analyzed: sarasvatīm pitaraḥ havante dakṣiṇā yajñam abhinakṣamāṇāḥ

original: (AVŚ_18,4.46c) āsadyāsmin barhiṣi mādayadhvam anamīvā iṣa ā dhehy asme //46//
