original: (AVŚ_18,4.47a) sarasvati yā sarathaṃ yayāthokthaiḥ svadhābhir devi pitṛbhir madantī /
analyzed: sarasvati yā sa ratham yayātha ukthaiḥ svadhābhiḥ devi pitṛbhiḥ madantī

original: (AVŚ_18,4.47c) sahasrārgham iḍo atra bhāgaṃ rāyas poṣaṃ yajamānāya dhehi //47//
analyzed: sahasra argham iḍaḥ atra bhāgam rāyaḥ poṣam yajamānāya dhehi

original: (AVŚ_18,4.48a) pṛthivīṃ tvā pṛthivyām ā veśayāmi devo no dhātā pra tirāty āyuḥ /
analyzed: pṛthivīm tvā pṛthivyām ā veśayāmi devaḥ naḥ dhātā pra tirāti āyuḥ

original: (AVŚ_18,4.48c) parāparaitā vasuvid vo astv adhā mṛtāḥ pitṛṣu saṃ bhavantu //48//
analyzed: parāparā etāḥ vasu vid vaḥ astu adha mṛtāḥ pitṛṣu sam bhavantu

original: (AVŚ_18,4.49a) ā pra cyavethām apa tan mṛjethāṃ yad vām abhibhā atrocuḥ /
analyzed: ā pra cyavethām apa tat mṛjethām yat vām abhibhāḥ atra ūcuḥ

original: (AVŚ_18,4.49c) asmād etam aghnyau tad vaśīyo dātuḥ pitṛṣv ihabhojanau mama //49//
analyzed: asmāt etam aghnyau tat vaśīyaḥ dātuḥ pitṛṣu ihabhojanau mama

original: (AVŚ_18,4.50a) eyam agan dakṣiṇā bhadrato nā anena dattā sudughā vayodhāḥ /
analyzed: ā iyam agan dakṣiṇā bhadratas naḥ anena dattā su dughā vayodhāḥ

original: (AVŚ_18,4.50c) yauvane jīvān upapṛñcatī jarā pitṛbhya upasaṃparāṇayād imān //50// {24}
analyzed: yauvane jīvān upapṛñcatī jarā pitṛbhyaḥ upasaṃparāṇayāt imān

original: (AVŚ_18,4.51a) idaṃ pitṛbhyaḥ pra bharāmi barhir jīvaṃ devebhya uttaraṃ stṛṇāmi /
analyzed: idam pitṛbhyaḥ pra bharāmi barhiḥ jīvam devebhyaḥ uttaram stṛṇāmi

original: (AVŚ_18,4.51c) tad ā roha puruṣa medhyo bhavan prati tvā jānantu pitaraḥ paretam //51//
analyzed: tat ā roha puruṣa medhyaḥ bhavan prati tvā jānantu pitaraḥ paretam

original: (AVŚ_18,4.52a) edaṃ barhir asado medhyo 'bhūḥ prati tvā jānantu pitaraḥ paretam /
analyzed: ā idam barhiḥ asadaḥ medhyaḥ bhūḥ prati tvā jānantu pitaraḥ paretam

original: (AVŚ_18,4.52c) yathāparu tanvaṃ saṃ bharasva gātrāṇi te brahmaṇā kalpayāmi //52//
analyzed: yathāparu tanvam sam bharasva gātrāṇi te brahmaṇā kalpayāmi

original: (AVŚ_18,4.53a) parṇo rājāpidhānaṃ carūṇām ūrjo balaṃ saha ojo na āgan /
analyzed: parṇaḥ rājā apidhānam carūṇām ūrjaḥ balam sahaḥ ojaḥ naḥ āgan

original: (AVŚ_18,4.53c) āyur jīvebhyo vidadhad dīrghāyutvāya śataśāradāya //53//
analyzed: āyuḥ jīvebhyaḥ vidadhat dīrgha āyu tvāya śata śāradāya

original: (AVŚ_18,4.54a) ūrjo bhāgo ya imaṃ jajānāśmānnānām ādhipatyaṃ jagāma /
analyzed: ūrjaḥ bhāgaḥ yaḥ imam jajāna aśmā annānām ādhipatyam jagāma

original: (AVŚ_18,4.54c) tam arcata viśvamitrā havirbhiḥ sa no yamaḥ prataraṃ jīvase dhāt //54//
analyzed: tam arcata viśva mitrāḥ havirbhiḥ sa naḥ yamaḥ prataram jīvase dhāt

original: (AVŚ_18,4.55a) yathā yamāya harmyam avapan pañca mānavāḥ /
analyzed: yathā yamāya harmyam avapan pañca mānavāḥ

original: (AVŚ_18,4.55c) evā vapāmi harmyaṃ yathā me bhūrayo 'sata //55//
analyzed: eva vapāmi harmyam yathā me

original: (AVŚ_18,4.56a) idaṃ hiraṇyaṃ bibhṛhi yat te pitābibhaḥ purā /
analyzed: idam hiraṇyam bibhṛhi yat te pitā abibhar purā

original: (AVŚ_18,4.56c) svargaṃ yataḥ pitur hastaṃ nir mṛḍḍhi dakṣiṇam //56//
analyzed: svargam yataḥ pituḥ hastam niḥ mṛḍḍhi dakṣiṇam

original: (AVŚ_18,4.57a) ye ca jīvā ye ca mṛtā ye jātā ye ca yajñiyāḥ /
analyzed: ye ca jīvāḥ ye ca mṛtāḥ ye jātāḥ ye ca yajñiyāḥ

original: (AVŚ_18,4.57c) tebhyo ghṛtasya kulyaitu madhudhārā vyundatī //57//
analyzed: tebhyaḥ ghṛtasya kulyā aitu madhu dhārā vyundatī

original: (AVŚ_18,4.58a) vṛṣā matīnāṃ pavate vicakṣaṇaḥ sūro ahnāṃ pratarītoṣasāṃ divaḥ /
analyzed: vṛṣā matīnām pavate vicakṣaṇaḥ sūraḥ ahnām pratarītā uṣasām divaḥ

original: (AVŚ_18,4.58c) prāṇaḥ sindhūnāṃ kalaśāṃ acikradad indrasya hārdim āviśan manīṣayā //58//
analyzed: prāṇaḥ sindhūnām kalaśām acikradat indrasya hārdim āviśan manīṣayā

original: (AVŚ_18,4.59a) tveṣas te dhūma ūrṇotu divi ṣaṃ chukra ātataḥ /
analyzed: tveṣaḥ te dhūmaḥ ūrṇotu divi sam śukraḥ ātataḥ

original: (AVŚ_18,4.59c) sūro na hi dyutā tvaṃ kṛpā pāvaka rocase //59//
analyzed: sūraḥ na hi dyutā tvam kṛpā pāvaka rocase

original: (AVŚ_18,4.60a) pra vā etīndur indrasya niṣkṛtiṃ sakhā sakhyur na pra mināti saṃgiraḥ /
analyzed: pra vai eti induḥ indrasya niṣkṛtim sakhā sakhyuḥ na pra mināti saṃgiraḥ

original: (AVŚ_18,4.60c) marya iva yoṣāḥ sam arṣase somaḥ kalaśe śatayāmanā pathā //60// {25}
analyzed: maryaḥ iva yoṣāḥ sam arṣase somaḥ kalaśe śata yāmanā pathā  /

original: (AVŚ_18,4.61a) akṣann amīmadanta hy ava priyāṃ adhūṣata /
analyzed: akṣan amīmadanta hi ava priyām adhūṣata

original: (AVŚ_18,4.61c) astoṣata svabhānavo viprā yaviṣṭhā īmahe //61//
analyzed: astoṣata sva bhānavaḥ viprāḥ yaviṣṭhāḥ īmahe

original: (AVŚ_18,4.62a) ā yāta pitaraḥ somyāso gambhīraiḥ pathibhiḥ pitṛyāṇaiḥ /
analyzed: ā yāta pitaraḥ somyāsaḥ gambhīraiḥ pathibhiḥ pitṛyāṇaiḥ

original: (AVŚ_18,4.62c) āyur asmabhyaṃ dadhataḥ prajāṃ ca rāyaś ca poṣair abhi naḥ sacadhvam //62//
analyzed: āyuḥ asmabhyam dadhataḥ prajām ca rāyaḥ ca poṣaiḥ abhi naḥ sacadhvam

original: (AVŚ_18,4.63a) parā yāta pitaraḥ somyāso gambhīraiḥ pathibhiḥ pūryāṇaiḥ /
analyzed: parā yāta pitaraḥ somyāsaḥ gambhīraiḥ pathibhiḥ pūryāṇaiḥ

original: (AVŚ_18,4.63c) adhā māsi punar ā yāta no gṛhān havir attuṃ suprajasaḥ suvīrāḥ //63//
analyzed: adhā māsi punar ā yāta naḥ gṛhān haviḥ attum suprajasaḥ su vīrāḥ

original: (AVŚ_18,4.64a) yad vo agnir ajahād ekam aṅgaṃ pitṛlokaṃ gamayaṃ jātavedāḥ /
analyzed: yat vaḥ agniḥ ajahāt ekam aṅgam pitṛ lokam gamayan jātavedāḥ

original: (AVŚ_18,4.64c) tad va etat punar ā pyāyayāmi sāṅgāḥ svarge pitaro mādayadhvam //64//
analyzed: tat vaḥ etat punar ā pyāyayāmi sa aṅgāḥ svarge pitaraḥ mādayadhvam

original: (AVŚ_18,4.65a) abhūd dūtaḥ prahito jātavedāḥ sāyaṃ nyahna upavandyo nṛbhiḥ /
analyzed: abhūt dūtaḥ prahitaḥ jātavedāḥ sāyam nyahne upavandyaḥ nṛbhiḥ

original: (AVŚ_18,4.65c) prādāḥ pitṛbhyaḥ svadhayā te akṣann addhi tvaṃ deva prayatā havīṃṣi //65//
analyzed: prādāḥ pitṛbhyaḥ svadhayā te akṣan addhi tvam deva prayatā havīṃṣi

original: (AVŚ_18,4.66a) asau hā iha te manaḥ kakutsalam iva jāmayaḥ /
analyzed: asau hai iha te manaḥ kakutsalam iva jāmayaḥ

original: (AVŚ_18,4.66c) abhy enaṃ bhūma ūrṇuhi //66//
analyzed: abhi enam bhūme ūrṇuhi

original: (AVŚ_18,4.67a) śumbhantāṃ lokāḥ pitṛṣadanāḥ pitṛṣadane tvā loka ā sādayāmi //67//
analyzed: śumbhantām lokāḥ pitṛṣadanāḥ pitṛṣadane tvā loke ā sādayāmi

original: (AVŚ_18,4.68a) ye asmākaṃ pitaras teṣāṃ barhir asi //68//
analyzed: ye asmākam pitaraḥ teṣām barhiḥ asi

original: (AVŚ_18,4.69a) ud uttamaṃ varuṇa pāśam asmad avādhamaṃ śrathāya /
analyzed: ud uttamam varuṇa pāśam asmat ava adhamam śrathāya

original: (AVŚ_18,4.69c) adhā vayam āditya vrate tavānāgaso aditaye syāma //69//
analyzed: adha vayam āditya vrate tava anāgasaḥ aditaye syāma

original: (AVŚ_18,4.70a) prāsmat pāśān varuṇa muñca sarvān yaiḥ samāme badhyate yair vyāme /
analyzed: pra asmat pāśān varuṇa muñca sarvān yaiḥ samāme badhyate yaiḥ vyāme

original: (AVŚ_18,4.70c) adhā jīvema śaradaṃ śatāni tvayā rājan gupitā rakṣamāṇāḥ //70// {26}
analyzed: adhā jīvema śaradam śatāni tvayā rājan gupitāḥ rakṣamāṇāḥ

original: (AVŚ_18,4.71a) agnaye kavyavāhanāya svadhā namaḥ //71//
analyzed: agnaye kavyavāhanāya svadhā namaḥ

original: (AVŚ_18,4.72a) somāya pitṛmate svadhā namaḥ //72//
analyzed: somāya pitṛmate svadhā namaḥ

original: (AVŚ_18,4.73a) pitṛbhyaḥ somavadbhyaḥ svadhā namaḥ //73//
analyzed: pitṛbhyaḥ somavadbhyaḥ svadhā namaḥ

original: (AVŚ_18,4.74a) yamāya pitṛmate svadhā namaḥ //74//
analyzed: yamāya pitṛmate svadhā namaḥ

original: (AVŚ_18,4.75a) etat te pratatāmaha svadhā ye ca tvām anu //75//
analyzed: etat te pratatāmaha svadhā ye ca tvām anu

original: (AVŚ_18,4.76a) etat te tatāmaha svadhā ye ca tvām anu //76//
analyzed: etat te tatāmaha svadhā ye ca tvām anu

original: (AVŚ_18,4.77a) etat te tata svadhā //77//
analyzed: etat te tata svadhā

original: (AVŚ_18,4.78a) svadhā pitṛbhyaḥ pṛthiviṣadbhyaḥ //78//
analyzed: svadhā pitṛbhyaḥ pṛthiviṣadbhyaḥ

original: (AVŚ_18,4.79a) svadhā pitṛbhyo antarikṣasadbhyaḥ //79//
analyzed: svadhā pitṛbhyaḥ antarikṣa sadbhyaḥ

original: (AVŚ_18,4.80a) svadhā pitṛbhyo diviṣadbhyaḥ //80// {27}
analyzed: svadhā pitṛbhyaḥ diviṣadbhyaḥ

original: (AVŚ_18,4.81a) namo vaḥ pitara ūrje namo vaḥ pitaro rasāya //81//
analyzed: namaḥ vaḥ pitaraḥ ūrje namaḥ vaḥ pitaraḥ rasāya

original: (AVŚ_18,4.82a) namo vaḥ pitaro bhāmāya namo vaḥ pitaro manyave //82//
analyzed: namaḥ vaḥ pitaraḥ bhāmāya namaḥ vaḥ pitaraḥ manyave

original: (AVŚ_18,4.83a) namo vaḥ pitaro yad ghoraṃ tasmai namo vaḥ pitaro yat krūraṃ tasmai //83//
analyzed: namaḥ vaḥ pitaraḥ yat ghoram tasmai namaḥ vaḥ pitaraḥ yat krūram tasmai

original: (AVŚ_18,4.84a) namo vaḥ pitaro yac chivaṃ tasmai namo vaḥ pitaro yat syonaṃ tasmai //84//
analyzed: namaḥ vaḥ pitaraḥ yat śivam tasmai namaḥ vaḥ pitaraḥ yat syonam tasmai

original: (AVŚ_18,4.85a) namo vaḥ pitaraḥ svadhā vaḥ pitaraḥ //85//
analyzed: namaḥ vaḥ pitaraḥ svadhā vaḥ pitaraḥ

original: (AVŚ_18,4.86a) ye 'tra pitaraḥ pitaro ye 'tra yūyaṃ stha yuṣmāṃs te 'nu yūyaṃ teṣāṃ śreṣṭhā bhūyāstha //86//
analyzed: ye tra pitaraḥ pitaraḥ ye tra yūyam stha yuṣmān te nu yūyam teṣām śreṣṭhāḥ bhūyāstha

original: (AVŚ_18,4.87a) ya iha pitaro jīvā iha vayaṃ smaḥ /
analyzed: ye iha pitaraḥ jīvāḥ iha vayam smaḥ

original: (AVŚ_18,4.87c) asmāṃs te 'nu vayaṃ teṣāṃ śreṣṭhā bhūyāsma //87//
analyzed: asmān te nu vayam teṣām śreṣṭhāḥ bhūyāsma

original: (AVŚ_18,4.88a) ā tvāgna idhīmahi dyumantaṃ devājaram /
analyzed: ā tvā agne idhīmahi dyumantam deva ajaram

original: (AVŚ_18,4.88c) yad gha sā te panīyasī samid dīdayati dyavi /
analyzed: yat gha sā te panīyasī samidh dīdayati dyavi

original: (AVŚ_18,4.88e) iṣaṃ stotṛbhya ā bhara //88//
analyzed: iṣam stotṛbhyaḥ ā bhara

original: (AVŚ_18,4.89a) candramā apsv antar ā suparṇo dhāvate divi /
analyzed: candramāḥ apsu antar ā suparṇaḥ dhāvate divi

original: (AVŚ_18,4.89c) na vo hiraṇyanemayaḥ padaṃ vindanti vidyuto vittaṃ me asya rodasī //89// {28}
analyzed: na vaḥ hiraṇya nemayaḥ padam vindanti vidyutaḥ vittam me asya rodasī

original: (AVŚ_19,1.1a) saṃsaṃ sravantu nadyaḥ saṃ vātāḥ saṃ patatriṇaḥ /
analyzed: sam sam sravantu nadyaḥ sam vātāḥ sam patatriṇaḥ

original: (AVŚ_19,1.1c) yajñam imaṃ vardhayatā giraḥ saṃsrāvyeṇa haviṣā juhomi //1//
analyzed: yajñam imam vardhayata giraḥ saṃsrāvyeṇa haviṣā juhomi

original: (AVŚ_19,1.2a) imaṃ homā yajñam avatemaṃ saṃsrāvaṇā uta yajñam imaṃ vardhayatā giraḥ saṃsrāvyeṇa haviṣā juhomi //2//
analyzed: imam homāḥ yajñam avata imam saṃsrāvaṇāḥ uta yajñam imam vardhayata giraḥ saṃsrāvyeṇa haviṣā juhomi

original: (AVŚ_19,1.3a) rūpaṃrūpaṃ vayovayaḥ saṃrabhyainaṃ pari ṣvaje /
analyzed: rūpam rūpam vayaḥ vayaḥ saṃrabhya enam pari svaje

original: (AVŚ_19,1.3c) yajñam imaṃ catasraḥ pradiśo vardhayantu saṃsrāvyeṇa haviṣā juhomi //3//
analyzed: yajñam imam catasraḥ pradiśaḥ vardhayantu saṃsrāvyeṇa haviṣā juhomi

original: (AVŚ_19,2.1a) śaṃ ta āpo haimavatīḥ śam u te santūtsyāḥ /
analyzed: śam te āpaḥ haimavatīḥ śam u te santu utsyāḥ

original: (AVŚ_19,2.1c) śaṃ te saniṣyadā āpaḥ śam u te santu varṣyāḥ //1//
analyzed: śam te saniṣyadaḥ āpaḥ śam u te santu varṣyāḥ

original: (AVŚ_19,2.2a) śaṃ ta āpo dhanvanyāḥ śaṃ te santv anūpyāḥ /
analyzed: śam te āpaḥ dhanvanyāḥ śam te santu anūpyāḥ

original: (AVŚ_19,2.2c) śaṃ te khanitrimā āpaḥ śaṃ yāḥ kumbhebhir ābhṛtāḥ //2//
analyzed: śam te khanitrimāḥ āpaḥ śam yāḥ kumbhebhiḥ ābhṛtāḥ

original: (AVŚ_19,2.3a) anabhrayaḥ khanamānā viprā gambhīre apasaḥ /
analyzed: anabhrayaḥ khanamānāḥ viprāḥ gambhīre apasaḥ

original: (AVŚ_19,2.3c) bhiṣagbhyo bhiṣaktarā āpo achā vadāmasi //3//
analyzed: bhiṣagbhyaḥ bhiṣaktarāḥ āpaḥ achā vadāmasi

original: (AVŚ_19,2.4a) apām aha divyānām apāṃ srotasyānām /
analyzed: apām aha divyānām apām srotasyānām

original: (AVŚ_19,2.4c) apām aha praṇejane 'śvā bhavatha vājinaḥ //4//
analyzed: apām aha praṇejane śvā bhavatha vājinaḥ

original: (AVŚ_19,2.5a) tā apaḥ śivā apo 'yakṣmaṃkaraṇīr apaḥ /
analyzed: tāḥ apaḥ śivāḥ apaḥ yakṣmaṃkaraṇīḥ apaḥ

original: (AVŚ_19,2.5c) yathaiva tṛpyate mayas tās ta ā datta bhesajīḥ //5//
analyzed: yathā eva tṛpyate mayaḥ tāḥ te ā datta bhesajīḥ

original: (AVŚ_19,3.1a) divas pṛthivyāḥ pary antarikṣād vanaspatibhyo adhy oṣadhībhyaḥ /
analyzed: divaḥ pṛthivyāḥ pari antarikṣāt vanaspatibhyaḥ adhi oṣadhībhyaḥ

original: (AVŚ_19,3.1c) yatrayatra vibhṛto jātavedās tata stuto juṣamāṇo na ehi //1//
analyzed: yatra yatra vibhṛtaḥ jātavedāḥ tatas stutaḥ juṣamāṇaḥ naḥ ehi

original: (AVŚ_19,3.2a) yas te apsu mahimā yo vaneṣu ya oṣadhīṣu paśuṣv apsv antaḥ /
analyzed: yaḥ te apsu mahimā yaḥ vaneṣu yaḥ oṣadhīṣu paśuṣu apsu antar

original: (AVŚ_19,3.2c) agne sarvās tanvaḥ saṃ rabhasva tābhir na ehi draviṇodā ajasraḥ //2//
analyzed: agne sarvāḥ tanvaḥ sam rabhasva tābhiḥ naḥ ehi draviṇaḥ dāḥ ajasraḥ

original: (AVŚ_19,3.3a) yas te deveṣu mahimā svargo yā te tanuḥ pitṛṣv āviveśa /
analyzed: yaḥ te deveṣu mahimā svargaḥ yā te tanuḥ pitṛṣu āviveśa

original: (AVŚ_19,3.3c) puṣṭir yā te manuṣyeṣu paprathe 'gne tayā rayim asmāsu dhehi //3//
analyzed: puṣṭiḥ yā te manuṣyeṣu paprathe gne tayā rayim asmāsu dhehi

original: (AVŚ_19,3.4a) śrutkarṇāya kavaye vedyāya vacobhir vākair upa yāmi rātim /
analyzed: śrutkarṇāya kavaye vedyāya vacobhiḥ vākaiḥ upa yāmi rātim

original: (AVŚ_19,3.4c) yato bhayam abhayaṃ tan no astv ava devānāṃ yaja heḍo agne //4//
analyzed: yatas bhayam abhayam tat naḥ astu ava devānām yaja heḍaḥ agne

original: (AVŚ_19,4.1a) yām āhutiṃ prathamām atharvā yā jātā yā havyam akṛṇoj jātavedāḥ /
analyzed: yām āhutim prathamām atharvā yā jātā yā havyam akṛṇot jātavedāḥ

original: (AVŚ_19,4.1c) tāṃ ta etāṃ prathamo johavīmi tābhiṣ ṭupto vahatu havyam agnir agnaye svāha //1//
analyzed: tām te etām prathamaḥ johavīmi tābhiḥ tuptaḥ vahatu havyam agniḥ agnaye svāhā

original: (AVŚ_19,4.2a) ākūtiṃ devīṃ subhagāṃ puro dadhe cittasya mātā suhavā no astu /
analyzed: ākūtim devīm subhagām puras dadhe cittasya mātā su havā naḥ astu

original: (AVŚ_19,4.2c) yām āśām emi kevalī sā me astu videyam enāṃ manasi praviṣṭām //2//
analyzed: yām āśām emi kevalī sā me astu videyam enām manasi praviṣṭām

original: (AVŚ_19,4.3a) ākūtyā no bṛhaspata ākūtyā na upā gahi /
analyzed: ākūtyā naḥ bṛhaspate ākūtyā naḥ upa ā gahi

original: (AVŚ_19,4.3c) atho bhagasya no dhehy atho naḥ suhavo bhava //3//
analyzed: atha u bhagasya naḥ dhehi atha u naḥ su havaḥ bhava

original: (AVŚ_19,4.4a) bṛhaspatir ma ākūtim āṅgirasaḥ prati jānātu vācam etām /
analyzed: bṛhaspatiḥ me ākūtim āṅgirasaḥ prati jānātu vācam etām

original: (AVŚ_19,4.4c) yasya devā devatāḥ saṃbabhūvuḥ sa supraṇītāḥ kāmo anv etv asmān //4//
analyzed: yasya devāḥ devatāḥ saṃbabhūvuḥ sa su praṇītāḥ kāmaḥ anu etu asmān

original: (AVŚ_19,5.1a) indro rājā jagataś carṣaṇīnām adhi kṣami viṣurūpaṃ yad asti /
analyzed: indraḥ rājā jagataḥ carṣaṇīnām adhi kṣami viṣurūpam yat asti

original: (AVŚ_19,5.1c) tato dadāti dāśuṣe vasūni codad rādha upastutaś cid arvāk //1//
analyzed: tatas dadāti dāśuṣe vasūni codat rādhaḥ upastutaḥ cit arvāk

original: (AVŚ_19,6.1a) sahasrabāhuḥ puruṣaḥ sahasrākṣaḥ sahasrapāt /
analyzed: sahasra bāhuḥ puruṣaḥ sahasra akṣaḥ sahasra pād

original: (AVŚ_19,6.1c) sa bhūmiṃ viśvato vṛtvāty atiṣṭhad daśāṅgulam //1//
analyzed: sa bhūmim viśvatas vṛtvā ati atiṣṭhat daśa aṅgulam

original: (AVŚ_19,6.2a) tribhiḥ padbhir dyām arohat pād asyehābhavat punaḥ /
analyzed: tribhiḥ padbhiḥ dyām arohat pād asya iha abhavat punar

original: (AVŚ_19,6.2c) tathā vy akrāmad viṣvaṅ aśanānaśane anu //2//
analyzed: tathā vi akrāmat viṣvaṅ aśana anaśane anu

original: (AVŚ_19,6.3a) tāvanto asya mahimānas tato jyāyāṃś ca pūruṣaḥ /
analyzed: tāvantaḥ asya mahimānaḥ tatas jyāyān ca pūruṣaḥ

original: (AVŚ_19,6.3c) pādo 'sya viśvā bhūtāni tripād asyāmṛtaṃ divi //3//
analyzed: pādaḥ u sya viśvā bhūtāni tri pād asya amṛtam divi

original: (AVŚ_19,6.4a) puruṣa evedaṃ sarvaṃ yad bhūtaṃ yac ca bhāvyam /
analyzed: puruṣaḥ eva idam sarvam yat bhūtam yat ca bhāvyam

original: (AVŚ_19,6.4c) utāmṛtatvasyeśvaro yad anyenābhavat saha //4//
analyzed: uta amṛta tvasya īśvaraḥ yat anyena abhavat saha

original: (AVŚ_19,6.5a) yat puruṣaṃ vy adadhuḥ katidhā vy akalpayan /
analyzed: yat puruṣam vi adadhuḥ katidhā vi akalpayan

original: (AVŚ_19,6.5c) mukhaṃ kim asya kim bāhū kim ūrū pādā ucyate //5//
analyzed: mukham kim asya kim bāhū kim ūrū pādāḥ ucyate

original: (AVŚ_19,6.6a) brāhmaṇo 'sya mukham āsīd bāhū rājanyo 'bhavat /
analyzed: brāhmaṇaḥ sya mukham āsīt bāhū rājanyaḥ bhavat

original: (AVŚ_19,6.6c) madhyaṃ tad asya yad vaiśyaḥ padbhyāṃ śūdro ajāyata //6//
analyzed: madhyam tat asya yat vaiśyaḥ padbhyām śūdraḥ ajāyata

original: (AVŚ_19,6.7a) candramā manaso jātaś cakṣoḥ sūryo ajāyata /
analyzed: candramāḥ manasaḥ jātaḥ cakṣoḥ sūryaḥ ajāyata

original: (AVŚ_19,6.7c) mukhād indraś cāgniś ca prāṇād vāyur ajāyata //7//
analyzed: mukhāt indraḥ ca agniḥ ca prāṇāt vāyuḥ ajāyata

original: (AVŚ_19,6.8a) nābhyā āsīd antarikṣaṃ śīrṣṇo dyauḥ sam avartata /
analyzed: nābhyāḥ āsīt antarikṣam śīrṣṇaḥ dyauḥ sam avartata

original: (AVŚ_19,6.8c) padbhyāṃ bhūmir diśaḥ śrotrāt tathā lokāṃ akalpayan //8//
analyzed: padbhyām bhūmiḥ diśaḥ śrotrāt tathā

original: (AVŚ_19,6.9a) virāḍ agre sam abhavad virājo adhi pūruṣaḥ /
analyzed: virāj agre sam abhavat virājaḥ adhi pūruṣaḥ

original: (AVŚ_19,6.9c) sa jāto aty aricyata paścād bhūmim atho puraḥ //9//
analyzed: sa jātaḥ ati aricyata paścāt bhūmim atha u puras

original: (AVŚ_19,6.10a) yat puruṣeṇa haviṣā devā yajñam atanvata /
analyzed: yat puruṣeṇa haviṣā devāḥ yajñam atanvata

original: (AVŚ_19,6.10c) vasanto asyāsīd ājyaṃ grīṣma idhmaḥ śarad dhaviḥ //10//
analyzed: vasantaḥ asya āsīt ājyam grīṣmaḥ idhmaḥ śarad haviḥ

original: (AVŚ_19,6.11a) taṃ yajñaṃ prāvṛṣā praukṣan puruṣaṃ jātam agraśaḥ /
analyzed: tam yajñam prāvṛṣā praukṣan puruṣam jātam agraśas

original: (AVŚ_19,6.11c) tena devā ayajanta sādhyā vasavaś ca ye //11//
analyzed: tena devāḥ ayajanta sādhyāḥ vasavaḥ ca ye

original: (AVŚ_19,6.12a) tasmād aśvā ajāyanta ye ca ke cobhayādataḥ /
analyzed: tasmāt aśvāḥ ajāyanta ye ca ke ca ubhaya adataḥ

original: (AVŚ_19,6.12c) gāvo ha jajñire tasmāt tasmāj jātā ajāvayaḥ //12//
analyzed: gāvaḥ ha jajñire tasmāt tasmāt jātāḥ aja avayaḥ

original: (AVŚ_19,6.13a) tasmād yajñāt sarvahuta ṛcaḥ sāmāni jajñire /
analyzed: tasmāt yajñāt sarva hutaḥ ṛcaḥ sāmāni jajñire

original: (AVŚ_19,6.13c) chando ha jajñire tasmād yajus tasmād ajāyata //13//
analyzed: chandaḥ ha jajñire tasmāt yajuḥ tasmāt ajāyata

original: (AVŚ_19,6.14a) tasmād yajñāt sarvahutaḥ saṃbhṛtaṃ pṛṣadājyam /
analyzed: tasmāt yajñāt sarva hutaḥ saṃbhṛtam pṛṣadājyam

original: (AVŚ_19,6.14c) paśūṃs tāṃś cakre vāyavyān āraṇyā grāmyāś ca ye //14//
analyzed: paśūn tān cakre vāyavyān āraṇyāḥ grāmyāḥ ca ye

original: (AVŚ_19,6.15a) saptāsyāsan paridhayas triḥ sapta samidhaḥ kṛtāḥ /
analyzed: sapta asya āsan paridhayaḥ tris sapta samidhaḥ kṛtāḥ

original: (AVŚ_19,6.15c) devā yad yajñaṃ tanvānā abadhnan puruṣaṃ paśum //15//
analyzed: devāḥ yat yajñam tanvānāḥ abadhnan puruṣam paśum

original: (AVŚ_19,6.16a) mūrdhno devasya bṛhato aṃśavaḥ sapta saptatīḥ /
analyzed: mūrdhnaḥ devasya bṛhataḥ aṃśavaḥ sapta saptatīḥ

original: (AVŚ_19,6.16c) rājñaḥ somasyājāyanta jātasya puruṣād adhi //16//
analyzed: rājñaḥ somasya ajāyanta jātasya puruṣāt adhi

original: (AVŚ_19,7.1a) citrāṇi sākaṃ divi rocanāni sarīsṛpāṇi bhuvane javāni /
analyzed: citrāṇi sākam divi rocanāni sarīsṛpāṇi bhuvane javāni

original: (AVŚ_19,7.1c) turmiśaṃ sumatim ichamāno ahāni gīrbhiḥ saparyāmi nākam //1//
analyzed: turmiśam sumatim icchamānaḥ ahāni gīrbhiḥ saparyāmi nākam

original: (AVŚ_19,7.2a) suhavam agne kṛttikā rohiṇī cāstu bhadraṃ mṛgaśiraḥ śam ārdrā /
analyzed: su havam agne kṛttikā rohiṇī ca astu bhadram mṛgaśiraḥ śam ārdrā

original: (AVŚ_19,7.2c) punarvasū sūnṛtā cāru puṣyo bhānur āśleṣā ayanaṃ maghā me //2//
analyzed: punarvasū sūnṛtā cāru puṣyaḥ bhānuḥ āśleṣāḥ ayanam maghāḥ me

original: (AVŚ_19,7.3a) puṇyaṃ pūrvā phalgunyau cātra hastaś citrā śivā svāti sukho me astu /
analyzed: puṇyam pūrvā phalgunyau ca atra hastaḥ citrā śivā svāti sukhaḥ me astu

original: (AVŚ_19,7.3c) rādhe viśākhe suhavānurādhā jyeṣṭhā sunakṣatram ariṣṭa mūlam //3//
analyzed: rādhe viśākhe su havā anurādhā jyeṣṭhā su nakṣatram ariṣṭa mūlam

original: (AVŚ_19,7.4a) annaṃ pūrvā rāsatāṃ me aṣādhā ūrjaṃ devy uttarā ā vahantu /
analyzed: annam pūrvāḥ rāsatām me aṣādhāḥ ūrjam devī uttarāḥ ā vahantu

original: (AVŚ_19,7.4c) abhijin me rāsatāṃ puṇyam eva śravaṇaḥ śraviṣṭhāḥ kurvatāṃ supuṣṭim //4//
analyzed: abhijit me rāsatām puṇyam eva śravaṇaḥ śraviṣṭhāḥ kurvatām su puṣṭim

original: (AVŚ_19,7.5a) ā me mahac chatabhiṣag varīya ā me dvayā proṣṭhapadā suśarma /
analyzed: ā me mahat śata bhiṣaj varīyaḥ ā me dvayā proṣṭhapadā su śarma

original: (AVŚ_19,7.5c) ā revatī cāśvayujau bhagaṃ ma ā me rayiṃ bharaṇya ā vahantu //5//
analyzed: ā revatī ca āśvayujau bhagam me ā me rayim bharaṇyaḥ ā vahantu

original: (AVŚ_19,8.1a) yāni nakṣatrāṇi divy antarikṣe apsu bhūmau yāni nageṣu dikṣu /
analyzed: yāni nakṣatrāṇi divi antarikṣe apsu bhūmau yāni nageṣu dikṣu

original: (AVŚ_19,8.1c) prakalpayaṃś candramā yāny eti sarvāṇi mamaitāni śivāni santu //1//
analyzed: prakalpayan candramāḥ yāni eti sarvāṇi mama etāni śivāni santu

original: (AVŚ_19,8.2a) aṣṭāviṃśāni śivāni śagmāni saha yogaṃ bhajantu me /
analyzed: aṣṭāviṃśāni śivāni śagmāni saha yogam bhajantu me

original: (AVŚ_19,8.2c) yogaṃ pra padye kṣemaṃ ca kṣemaṃ pra padye yogaṃ ca namo 'horātrābhyām astu //2//
analyzed: yogam pra padye kṣemam ca kṣemam pra padye yogam ca namaḥ horātrābhyām astu

original: (AVŚ_19,8.3a) svastitaṃ me suprātaḥ susāyaṃ sudivaṃ sumṛgaṃ suśakunaṃ me astu /
analyzed: svastitam me su prātar su sāyam su divam su mṛgam su śakunam me astu

original: (AVŚ_19,8.3c) suhavam agne svasty amartyaṃ gatvā punar āyābhinandan //3//
analyzed: su havam agne svasti amartyam gatvā punar āya abhinandan

original: (AVŚ_19,8.4a) anuhavaṃ parihavaṃ parivādaṃ parikṣavam /
analyzed: anuhavam parihavam parivādam parikṣavam

original: (AVŚ_19,8.4c) sarvair me riktakumbhān parā tānt savitaḥ suva //4//
analyzed: sarvaiḥ me rikta kumbhān parā tān savitar suva

original: (AVŚ_19,8.5a) apapāpaṃ parikṣavaṃ puṇyaṃ bhakṣīmahi kṣavam /
analyzed: apapāpam parikṣavam puṇyam bhakṣīmahi kṣavam

original: (AVŚ_19,8.5c) śivā te pāpa nāsikāṃ puṇyagaś cābhi mehatām //5//
analyzed: śivā te pāpa nāsikām puṇyagaḥ ca abhi mehatām

original: (AVŚ_19,8.6a) imā yā brahmaṇas pate viṣucīr vāta īrate /
analyzed: imāḥ yāḥ brahmaṇas pate viṣucīḥ vāte īrate

original: (AVŚ_19,8.6c) sadhrīcīr indra tāḥ kṛtvā mahyaṃ śivatamās kṛdhi //6//
analyzed: sadhrīcīḥ indra tāḥ kṛtvā mahyam śivatamāḥ kṛdhi

original: (AVŚ_19,8.7a) svasti no astv abhayaṃ no astu namo 'horatrābhyām astu //7//
analyzed: svasti naḥ astu abhayam naḥ astu namaḥ horatrābhyām astu

original: (AVŚ_19,9.1a) śāntā dyauḥ śāntā pṛthivī śāntam idam urv antarikṣam /
analyzed: śāntā dyauḥ śāntā pṛthivī śāntam idam uru antarikṣam

original: (AVŚ_19,9.1c) śāntā udanvatīr āpaḥ śāntā naḥ santv oṣadhīḥ //1//
analyzed: śāntāḥ udanvatīḥ āpaḥ śāntāḥ naḥ santu oṣadhīḥ

original: (AVŚ_19,9.2a) śāntāni pūrvarūpāṇi śāntaṃ no astu kṛtākṛtam /
analyzed: śāntāni pūrvarūpāṇi śāntam naḥ astu kṛta akṛtam

original: (AVŚ_19,9.2c) śāntaṃ bhūtaṃ ca bhavyaṃ ca sarvam eva śam astu naḥ //2//
analyzed: śāntam bhūtam ca bhavyam ca sarvam eva śam astu naḥ

original: (AVŚ_19,9.3a) iyaṃ yā parameṣṭhinī vāg devī brahmasaṃśitā /
analyzed: iyam yā parameṣṭhinī vāc devī brahma saṃśitā

original: (AVŚ_19,9.3c) yayaiva sasṛje ghoraṃ tayaiva śāntir astu naḥ //3//
analyzed: yayā eva sasṛje ghoram tayā eva śāntiḥ astu naḥ

original: (AVŚ_19,9.4a) idaṃ yat parameṣṭhinaṃ mano vāṃ brahmasaṃśitam /
analyzed: idam yat parameṣṭhinam manaḥ vām brahma saṃśitam

original: (AVŚ_19,9.4c) yenaiva sasṛje ghoraṃ tenaiva śāntir astu naḥ //4//
analyzed: yena eva sasṛje ghoram tena eva śāntiḥ astu naḥ

original: (AVŚ_19,9.5a) imāni yāni pañcendriyāni manaḥṣaṣṭhāni me hṛdi brahmaṇā saṃśitāni /
analyzed: imāni yāni pañca indriyāni manaḥ ṣaṣṭhāni me hṛdi brahmaṇā saṃśitāni

original: (AVŚ_19,9.5c) yair eva sasṛje ghoraṃ tair eva śāntir astu naḥ //5//
analyzed: yaiḥ eva sasṛje ghoram taiḥ eva śāntiḥ astu naḥ

original: (AVŚ_19,9.6a) śaṃ no mitraḥ śaṃ varuṇaḥ śaṃ viṣṇuḥ śaṃ prajāpatiḥ /
analyzed: śam naḥ mitraḥ śam varuṇaḥ śam viṣṇuḥ śam prajāpatiḥ

original: (AVŚ_19,9.6c) śaṃ na indro bṛhaspatiḥ śaṃ no bhavatv aryamā //6//
analyzed: śam naḥ indraḥ bṛhaspatiḥ śam naḥ bhavatu aryamā

original: (AVŚ_19,9.7a) śaṃ no mitraḥ śaṃ varuṇaḥ śaṃ vivasvāṃ cham antakaḥ /
analyzed: śam naḥ mitraḥ śam varuṇaḥ śam vivasvān śam antakaḥ

original: (AVŚ_19,9.7c) utpātāḥ pārthivāntarikṣāḥ śaṃ no divicarā grahāḥ //7//
analyzed: utpātāḥ pārthiva āntarikṣāḥ śam naḥ divicarāḥ grahāḥ

original: (AVŚ_19,9.8a) śaṃ no bhūmir vepyamānā śam ulkā nirhataṃ ca yat /
analyzed: śam naḥ bhūmiḥ vepyamānā śam ulkā nirhatam ca yat

original: (AVŚ_19,9.8c) śaṃ gāvo lohitakṣīrāḥ śaṃ bhūmir ava tīryatīḥ //8//
analyzed: śam gāvaḥ lohita kṣīrāḥ śam bhūmiḥ ava tīryatīḥ

original: (AVŚ_19,9.9a) nakṣatram ulkābhihataṃ śam astu naḥ śaṃ no 'bhicārāḥ śam u santu kṛtyāḥ /
analyzed: nakṣatram ulkā abhihatam śam astu naḥ śam naḥ bhicārāḥ śam u santu kṛtyāḥ

original: (AVŚ_19,9.9c) śaṃ no nikhātā valgāḥ śam ulkā deśopasargāḥ śam u no bhavantu //9//
analyzed: śam naḥ nikhātāḥ valgāḥ śam ulkāḥ deśa upasargāḥ śam u naḥ bhavantu

original: (AVŚ_19,9.10a) śaṃ no grahāś cāndramasāḥ śam ādityaś ca rāhuṇā /
analyzed: śam naḥ grahāḥ cāndramasāḥ śam ādityaḥ ca rāhuṇā

original: (AVŚ_19,9.10c) śaṃ no mṛtyur dhūmaketuḥ śaṃ rudrās tigmatejasaḥ //10//
analyzed: śam naḥ mṛtyuḥ dhūmaketuḥ śam rudrāḥ tigma tejasaḥ

original: (AVŚ_19,9.11a) śaṃ rudrāḥ śaṃ vasavaḥ śam ādityāḥ śam agnayaḥ /
analyzed: śam rudrāḥ śam vasavaḥ śam ādityāḥ śam agnayaḥ

original: (AVŚ_19,9.11c) śaṃ no maharṣayo devāḥ śaṃ devāḥ śaṃ bṛhaspatiḥ //11//
analyzed: śam naḥ mahā ṛṣayaḥ devāḥ śam devāḥ śam bṛhaspatiḥ

original: (AVŚ_19,9.12a) brahma prajāpatir dhātā lokā vedāḥ saptaṛṣayo 'gnayaḥ /
analyzed: brahma prajāpatiḥ dhātā lokāḥ vedāḥ sapta ṛṣayaḥ gnayaḥ

original: (AVŚ_19,9.12c) tair me kṛtaṃ svastyayanam indro me śarma yachatu brahmā me śarma yachatu /
analyzed: taiḥ me kṛtam svastyayanam indraḥ me śarma yacchatu brahmā me śarma yacchatu

original: (AVŚ_19,9.12e) viśve me devāḥ śarma yachantu sarve me devāḥ śarma yachantu //12//
analyzed: viśve me devāḥ śarma yacchantu sarve me devāḥ śarma yacchantu

original: (AVŚ_19,9.13a) yāni kāni cic chāntāni loke saptaṛṣayo viduḥ /
analyzed: yāni kāni cit śāntāni loke sapta ṛṣayaḥ viduḥ

original: (AVŚ_19,9.13c) sarvāṇi śaṃ bhavantu me śaṃ me astv abhayaṃ me astu //13//
analyzed: sarvāṇi śam bhavantu me śam me astu abhayam me astu

original: (AVŚ_19,9.14a) pṛthivī śāntir antarikṣaṃ śāntir dyauḥ śāntir āpaḥ śāntir oṣadhayaḥ śāntir vanaspatayaḥ śāntir viśve me devāḥ śāntiḥ sarve me  #
analyzed: pṛthivī śāntiḥ antarikṣam śāntiḥ dyauḥ śāntiḥ āpaḥ śāntiḥ oṣadhayaḥ śāntiḥ vanaspatayaḥ śāntiḥ viśve me devāḥ śāntiḥ sarve me

original: devāḥ śāntiḥ śāntiḥ śāntiḥ śāntibhiḥ /
analyzed: devāḥ śāntiḥ śāntiḥ śāntiḥ śāntibhiḥ

original: (AVŚ_19,9.14c) yad iha ghoraṃ yad iha krūraṃ yad iha pāpaṃ tac chāntaṃ tac chivaṃ sarvam eva śam astu naḥ //14//
analyzed: yat iha ghoram yat iha krūram yat iha pāpam tat śāntam tat śivam sarvam eva śam astu naḥ

original: (AVŚ_19,10.1a) śaṃ na indrāgnī bhavatām avobhiḥ śaṃ na indrāvaruṇā rātahavyā /
analyzed: śam naḥ indra agnī bhavatām avobhiḥ śam naḥ indrāvaruṇā rāta havyā

original: (AVŚ_19,10.1c) śam indrāsomā suvitāya śaṃ yoḥ śaṃ na indrāpūṣaṇā vājasātau //1//
analyzed: śam indrāsomā suvitāya śam yos śam naḥ indrāpūṣaṇā vājasātau

original: (AVŚ_19,10.2a) śaṃ no bhagaḥ śam u naḥ śaṃso astu śaṃ naḥ puraṃdhiḥ śam u santu rāyaḥ /
analyzed: śam naḥ bhagaḥ śam u naḥ śaṃsaḥ astu śam naḥ puraṃdhiḥ śam u santu rāyaḥ

original: (AVŚ_19,10.2c) śaṃ naḥ satyasya suyamasya śaṃsaḥ śaṃ no aryamā purujāto astu //2//
analyzed: śam naḥ satyasya su yamasya śaṃsaḥ śam naḥ aryamā puru jātaḥ astu

original: (AVŚ_19,10.3a) śaṃ no dhātā śam u dhartā no astu śaṃ na urūcī bhavatu svadhābhiḥ /
analyzed: śam naḥ dhātā śam u dhartā naḥ astu śam naḥ urūcī bhavatu svadhābhiḥ

original: (AVŚ_19,10.3c) śaṃ rodasī bṛhatī śaṃ no adriḥ śaṃ no devānāṃ suhavāni santu //3//
analyzed: śam rodasī bṛhatī śam naḥ adriḥ śam naḥ devānām su havāni santu

original: (AVŚ_19,10.4a) śaṃ no agnir jyotiranīko astu śaṃ no mitrāvaruṇāv aśvinā śam /
analyzed: śam naḥ agniḥ jyotiḥ anīkaḥ astu śam naḥ mitrāvaruṇau aśvinā śam

original: (AVŚ_19,10.4c) śaṃ naḥ sukṛtāṃ sukṛtāni santu śaṃ na iṣiro abhi vātu vātaḥ //4//
analyzed: śam naḥ su kṛtām sukṛtāni santu śam naḥ iṣiraḥ abhi vātu vātaḥ

original: (AVŚ_19,10.5a) śaṃ no dyāvāpṛthivī pūrvahūtau śam antarikṣaṃ dṛśaye no astu /
analyzed: śam naḥ dyāvāpṛthivī pūrva hūtau śam antarikṣam dṛśaye naḥ astu

original: (AVŚ_19,10.5c) śaṃ na oṣadhīr vanino bhavantu śaṃ no rajasas patir astu jiṣṇuḥ //5//
analyzed: śam naḥ oṣadhīḥ vaninaḥ bhavantu śam naḥ rajasaḥ patiḥ astu jiṣṇuḥ

original: (AVŚ_19,10.6a) śaṃ na indro vasubhir devo astu śam ādityebhir varuṇaḥ suśaṃsaḥ /
analyzed: śam naḥ indraḥ vasubhiḥ devaḥ astu śam ādityebhiḥ varuṇaḥ su śaṃsaḥ

original: (AVŚ_19,10.6c) śaṃ no rudro rudrebhir jalāṣaḥ śaṃ nas tvaṣṭā gnābhir iha śṛṇotu //6//
analyzed: śam naḥ rudraḥ rudrebhiḥ jalāṣaḥ śam naḥ tvaṣṭā gnābhiḥ iha śṛṇotu

original: (AVŚ_19,10.7a) śaṃ naḥ somo bhavatu brahma śaṃ naḥ śaṃ no grāvāṇaḥ śam u santu yajñāḥ /
analyzed: śam naḥ somaḥ bhavatu brahma śam naḥ śam naḥ grāvāṇaḥ śam u santu yajñāḥ

original: (AVŚ_19,10.7c) śaṃ naḥ svarūnāṃ mitayo bhavantu śaṃ naḥ prasvaḥ śam v astu vediḥ //7//
analyzed: śam naḥ svarūnām mitayaḥ bhavantu śam naḥ prasvaḥ śam u astu vediḥ

original: (AVŚ_19,10.8a) śaṃ naḥ sūrya urucakṣā ud etu śaṃ no bhavantu pradiśaś catasraḥ /
analyzed: śam naḥ sūryaḥ uru cakṣāḥ ud etu śam naḥ bhavantu pradiśaḥ catasraḥ

original: (AVŚ_19,10.8c) śaṃ naḥ parvatā dhruvayo bhavantu śaṃ naḥ sindhavaḥ śam u santv āpaḥ //8//
analyzed: śam naḥ parvatāḥ dhruvayaḥ bhavantu śam naḥ sindhavaḥ śam u santu āpaḥ

original: (AVŚ_19,10.9a) śaṃ no aditir bhavatu vratebhiḥ śaṃ no bhavantu marutaḥ svarkāḥ /
analyzed: śam naḥ aditiḥ bhavatu vratebhiḥ śam naḥ bhavantu marutaḥ su arkāḥ

original: (AVŚ_19,10.9c) śaṃ no viṣṇuḥ śam u pūṣā no astu śaṃ no bhavitraṃ śam v astu vāyuḥ //9//
analyzed: śam naḥ viṣṇuḥ śam u pūṣā naḥ astu śam naḥ bhavitram śam u astu vāyuḥ

original: (AVŚ_19,10.10a) śaṃ no devaḥ savitā trāyamāṇaḥ śaṃ no bhavantūṣaso vibhātīḥ /
analyzed: śam naḥ devaḥ savitā trāyamāṇaḥ śam naḥ bhavantu uṣasaḥ vibhātīḥ

original: (AVŚ_19,10.10c) śaṃ naḥ parjanyo bhavatu prajābhyaḥ śaṃ naḥ kṣetrasya patir astu śaṃbhuḥ //10//
analyzed: śam naḥ parjanyaḥ bhavatu prajābhyaḥ śam naḥ kṣetrasya patiḥ astu śaṃbhuḥ

original: (AVŚ_19,11.1a) śaṃ naḥ satyasya patayo bhavantu śaṃ no arvantaḥ śam u santu gāvaḥ /
analyzed: śam naḥ satyasya patayaḥ bhavantu śam naḥ arvantaḥ śam u santu gāvaḥ

original: (AVŚ_19,11.1c) śaṃ na ṛbhavaḥ sukṛtaḥ suhastāḥ śaṃ no bhavatu pitaro haveṣu //1//
analyzed: śam naḥ ṛbhavaḥ su kṛtaḥ su hastāḥ śam naḥ bhavatu pitaraḥ haveṣu

original: (AVŚ_19,11.2a) śaṃ no devā viśvadevā bhavantu śaṃ sarasvatī saha dhībhir astu /
analyzed: śam naḥ devāḥ viśva devāḥ bhavantu śam sarasvatī saha dhībhiḥ astu

original: (AVŚ_19,11.2c) śam abhiṣācaḥ śam u rātiṣācaḥ śaṃ no divyāḥ pārthivāḥ śaṃ no apyāḥ //2//
analyzed: śam abhiṣācaḥ śam u rātiṣācaḥ śam naḥ divyāḥ pārthivāḥ śam naḥ apyāḥ

original: (AVŚ_19,11.3a) śaṃ no aja ekapād devo astu śam ahir budhnyaḥ śaṃ samudraḥ /
analyzed: śam naḥ ajaḥ ekapād devaḥ astu śam ahiḥ budhnyaḥ śam samudraḥ

original: (AVŚ_19,11.3c) śaṃ no apāṃ napāt perur astu śaṃ naḥ pṛṣṇir bhavatu devagopā //3//
analyzed: śam naḥ apām napāt peruḥ astu śam naḥ pṛṣṇiḥ bhavatu deva gopā

original: (AVŚ_19,11.4a) ādityā rudrā vasavo juṣantām idaṃ brahma kriyamāṇaṃ navīyaḥ /
analyzed: ādityāḥ rudrāḥ vasavaḥ juṣantām idam brahma kriyamāṇam navīyaḥ

original: (AVŚ_19,11.4c) sṛṇvantu no divyāḥ pārthivāso gojātā uta ye yajñiyāsaḥ //4//
analyzed: sṛṇvantu naḥ divyāḥ pārthivāsaḥ go jātāḥ uta ye yajñiyāsaḥ

original: (AVŚ_19,11.5a) ye devānām ṛtvijo yajñiyāso manor yajatrā amṛtā ṛtajñāḥ /
analyzed: ye devānām ṛtvijaḥ yajñiyāsaḥ manoḥ yajatrāḥ amṛtāḥ ṛta jñāḥ

original: (AVŚ_19,11.5c) te no rāsantām urugāyam adya yūyaṃ pāta svastibhiḥ sadā naḥ //5//
analyzed: te naḥ rāsantām uru gāyam adya yūyam pāta svastibhiḥ sadā naḥ

original: (AVŚ_19,11.6a) tad astu mitrāvaruṇā tad agne śaṃ yor asmabhyam idam astu śastam /
analyzed: tat astu mitrāvaruṇā tat agne śam yos asmabhyam idam astu śastam

original: (AVŚ_19,11.6c) aśīmahi gādham uta pratiṣṭhāṃ namo dive bṛhate sādanāya //6//
analyzed: aśīmahi gādham uta pratiṣṭhām namaḥ dive bṛhate sādanāya

original: (AVŚ_19,12.1a) uṣā apa svasus tamaḥ saṃ vartayati vartaniṃ sujātatā /
analyzed: uṣāḥ apa svasuḥ tamaḥ sam vartayati vartanim sujāta tā

original: (AVŚ_19,12.1c) ayā vājaṃ devahitaṃ sanema madema śatahimāḥ suvīrāḥ //1//
analyzed: ayā vājam deva hitam sanema madema śata himāḥ su vīrāḥ

original: (AVŚ_19,13.1a) indrasya bāhū sthavirau vṛṣāṇau citrā imā vṛṣabhau pārayiṣṇū /
analyzed: indrasya bāhū sthavirau vṛṣāṇau citrā imā vṛṣabhau pārayiṣṇū

original: (AVŚ_19,13.1c) tau yokṣe prathamo yoga āgate yābhyāṃ jitam asurāṇāṃ svar yat //1//
analyzed: tau prathamaḥ yogaḥ āgate yābhyām jitam asurāṇām svar yat

original: (AVŚ_19,13.2a) āśuḥ śiśāno vṛṣabho na bhīmo ghanāghanaḥ kṣobhaṇaś carṣaṇīnām /
analyzed: āśuḥ śiśānaḥ vṛṣabhaḥ na bhīmaḥ ghanāghanaḥ kṣobhaṇaḥ carṣaṇīnām

original: (AVŚ_19,13.2c) saṃkrandano 'nimiṣa ekavīraḥ śataṃ senā ajayat sākam indraḥ //2//
analyzed: saṃkrandanaḥ nimiṣaḥ eka vīraḥ śatam senāḥ ajayat sākam indraḥ

original: (AVŚ_19,13.3a) saṃkrandanenānimiṣeṇa jiṣṇunāyodhyena duścyavanena dhṛṣṇunā /
analyzed: saṃkrandanena animiṣeṇa jiṣṇunā ayodhyena duścyavanena dhṛṣṇunā

original: (AVŚ_19,13.3c) tad indreṇa jayata tat sahadhvaṃ yudho nara iṣuhastena vṛṣṇā //3//
analyzed: tat indreṇa jayata tat sahadhvam yudhaḥ naraḥ iṣu hastena vṛṣṇā

original: (AVŚ_19,13.4a) sa iṣuhastaiḥ sa niṣaṅgibhir vaśī saṃsraṣṭā sa yudha indro gaṇena /
analyzed: saḥ iṣu hastaiḥ sa niṣaṅgibhiḥ vaśī saṃsraṣṭā sa yudhaḥ indraḥ gaṇena

original: (AVŚ_19,13.4c) saṃsṛṣṭajit somapā bāhuśardhy ugradhanvā pratihitābhir astā //4//
analyzed: saṃsṛṣṭa jit soma pāḥ bāhuśardhī ugra dhanvā pratihitābhiḥ astā

original: (AVŚ_19,13.5a) balavijñāyaḥ sthaviraḥ pravīraḥ sahasvān vājī sahamāna ugraḥ /
analyzed: bala vijñāyaḥ sthaviraḥ pravīraḥ sahasvān vājī sahamānaḥ ugraḥ

original: (AVŚ_19,13.5c) abhivīro abhiṣatvā sahojij jaitram indra ratham ā tiṣṭha govidam //5//
analyzed: abhivīraḥ abhiṣatvā sahaḥ jit jaitram indra ratham ā tiṣṭha go vidam

original: (AVŚ_19,13.6a) imaṃ vīram anu harṣadhvam ugram indraṃ sakhāyo anu saṃ rabhadhvam /
analyzed: imam vīram anu harṣadhvam ugram indram sakhāyaḥ anu sam rabhadhvam

original: (AVŚ_19,13.6c) grāmajitaṃ gojitaṃ vajrabāhuṃ jayantam ajma pramṛṇantam ojasā //6//
analyzed: grāma jitam go jitam vajra bāhum jayantam ajma pramṛṇantam ojasā

original: (AVŚ_19,13.7a) abhi gotrāṇi sahasā gāhamāno 'dāya ugraḥ śatamanyur indraḥ /
analyzed: abhi gotrāṇi sahasā gāhamānaḥ dāyaḥ ugraḥ śata manyuḥ indraḥ

original: (AVŚ_19,13.7c) duścyavanaḥ pṛtanāṣāḍ ayodhyo 'smākaṃ senā avatu pra yutsu //7//
analyzed: duścyavanaḥ pṛtanāṣāh a yodhyaḥ smākam senāḥ avatu pra yutsu

original: (AVŚ_19,28.1c) darbhaṃ sapatnadambhanaṃ dviṣatas tapanaṃ hṛdaḥ //1//
analyzed: darbham sapatna dambhanam dviṣataḥ tapanam hṛdaḥ

original: (AVŚ_19,28.2a) dviṣatas tāpayan hṛdaḥ śatrūṇāṃ tāpayan manaḥ /
analyzed: dviṣataḥ tāpayan hṛdaḥ śatrūṇām tāpayan manaḥ

original: (AVŚ_19,28.2c) durhārdaḥ sarvāṃs tvaṃ darbha gharma ivābhīnt saṃtāpayan //2//
analyzed: durhārdaḥ sarvān tvam darbha gharme iva abhīn saṃtāpayan

original: (AVŚ_19,28.3a) gharma ivābhitapan darbha dviṣato nitapan maṇe /
analyzed: gharmaḥ iva abhitapan darbha dviṣataḥ nitapan maṇe

original: (AVŚ_19,28.3c) hṛdaḥ sapatnānāṃ bhinddhīndra iva virujaṃ balam //3//
analyzed: hṛdaḥ sapatnānām bhinddhi indraḥ iva virujam balam

original: (AVŚ_19,28.4a) bhinddhi darbha sapatnānāṃ hṛdayaṃ dviṣatāṃ maṇe /
analyzed: bhinddhi darbha sapatnānām hṛdayam dviṣatām maṇe

original: (AVŚ_19,28.4c) udyan tvacam iva bhūmyāḥ śira eṣāṃ vi pātaya //4//
analyzed: udyan tvacam iva bhūmyāḥ śiraḥ eṣām vi pātaya

original: (AVŚ_19,28.5a) bhinddhi darbha sapatnān me bhinddhi me pṛtanāyataḥ /
analyzed: bhinddhi darbha sapatnān me bhinddhi me pṛtanāyataḥ

original: (AVŚ_19,28.5c) bhinddhi me sarvān durhārdo bhinddhi me dviṣato maṇe //5//
analyzed: bhinddhi me sarvān durhārdaḥ bhinddhi me dviṣataḥ maṇe

original: (AVŚ_19,28.6a) chinddhi darbha sapatnān me chinddhi me pṛtanāyataḥ /
analyzed: chinddhi darbha sapatnān me chinddhi me pṛtanāyataḥ

original: (AVŚ_19,28.6c) chinddhi me sarvān durhārdo chinddhi me dviṣato maṇe //6//
analyzed: chinddhi me sarvān durhārdo chinddhi me dviṣataḥ maṇe

original: (AVŚ_19,28.7a) vṛśca darbha sapatnān me vṛśca me pṛtanāyataḥ /
analyzed: vṛśca darbha sapatnān me vṛśca me pṛtanāyataḥ

original: (AVŚ_19,28.7c) vṛśca me sarvān durhārdo vṛśca me dviṣato maṇe //7//
analyzed: vṛśca me sarvān durhārdaḥ vṛśca me dviṣataḥ maṇe

original: (AVŚ_19,28.8a) kṛnta darbha sapatnān me kṛnta me pṛtanāyataḥ /
analyzed: kṛnta darbha sapatnān me kṛnta me pṛtanāyataḥ

original: (AVŚ_19,28.8c) kṛnta me sarvān durhārdo kṛnta me dviṣato maṇe //8//
analyzed: kṛnta me sarvān durhārdaḥ kṛnta me dviṣataḥ maṇe

original: (AVŚ_19,28.9a) piṃśa darbha sapatnān me piṃśa me pṛtanāyataḥ /
analyzed: piṃśa darbha sapatnān me piṃśa me pṛtanāyataḥ

original: (AVŚ_19,28.9c) piṃśa me sarvān durhārdo piṃśa me dviṣato maṇe //9//
analyzed: piṃśa me sarvān durhārdaḥ piṃśa me dviṣataḥ maṇe

original: (AVŚ_19,28.10a) vidhya darbha sapatnān me vidhya me pṛtanāyataḥ /
analyzed: vidhya darbha sapatnān me vidhya me pṛtanāyataḥ

original: (AVŚ_19,28.10c) vidhya me sarvān durhārdo vidhya me dviṣato maṇe //10//
analyzed: vidhya me sarvān durhārdaḥ vidhya me dviṣataḥ maṇe

original: (AVŚ_19,29.1a) nikṣa darbha sapatnān me nikṣa me pṛtanāyataḥ /
analyzed: nikṣa darbha sapatnān me nikṣa me pṛtanāyataḥ

original: (AVŚ_19,29.1c) nikṣa me sarvān durhārdo nikṣa me dviṣato maṇe //1//
analyzed: nikṣa me sarvān durhārdaḥ nikṣa me dviṣataḥ maṇe

original: (AVŚ_19,29.2a) tṛnddhi darbha sapatnān me tṛnddhi me pṛtanāyataḥ /
analyzed: tṛnddhi darbha sapatnān me tṛnddhi me pṛtanāyataḥ

original: (AVŚ_19,29.2c) tṛnddhi me sarvān durhārdo tṛnddhi me dviṣato maṇe //2//
analyzed: tṛnddhi me sarvān durhārdaḥ tṛnddhi me dviṣataḥ maṇe

original: (AVŚ_19,29.3a) runddhi darbha sapatnān me runddhi me pṛtanāyataḥ /
analyzed: runddhi darbha sapatnān me runddhi me pṛtanāyataḥ

original: (AVŚ_19,29.3c) runddhi me sarvān durhārdo runddhi me dviṣato maṇe //3//
analyzed: runddhi me sarvān durhārdaḥ runddhi me dviṣataḥ maṇe

original: (AVŚ_19,29.4a) mṛṇa darbha sapatnān me mṛṇa me pṛtanāyataḥ /
analyzed: mṛṇa darbha sapatnān me mṛṇa me pṛtanāyataḥ

original: (AVŚ_19,29.4c) mṛṇa me sarvān durhārdo mṛṇa me dviṣato maṇe //4//
analyzed: mṛṇa me sarvān durhārdaḥ mṛṇa me dviṣataḥ maṇe

original: (AVŚ_19,29.5a) mantha darbha sapatnān me mantha me pṛtanāyataḥ /
analyzed: mantha darbha sapatnān me mantha me pṛtanāyataḥ

original: (AVŚ_19,29.5c) mantha me sarvān durhārdo mantha me dviṣato maṇe //5//
analyzed: mantha me sarvān durhārdaḥ mantha me dviṣataḥ maṇe

original: (AVŚ_19,29.6a) piṇḍḍhi darbha sapatnān me piṇḍḍhi me pṛtanāyataḥ /
analyzed: piṇḍḍhi darbha sapatnān me piṇḍḍhi me pṛtanāyataḥ

original: (AVŚ_19,29.6c) piṇḍḍhi me sarvān durhārdo piṇḍḍhi me dviṣato maṇe //6//
analyzed: piṇḍḍhi me sarvān durhārdaḥ piṇḍḍhi me dviṣataḥ maṇe

original: (AVŚ_19,29.7a) oṣa darbha sapatnān me oṣa me pṛtanāyataḥ /
analyzed: oṣa darbha sapatnān me oṣa me pṛtanāyataḥ

original: (AVŚ_19,29.7c) oṣa me sarvān durhārdo oṣa me dviṣato maṇe //7//
analyzed: oṣa me sarvān durhārdaḥ oṣa me dviṣataḥ maṇe

original: (AVŚ_19,29.8a) daha darbha sapatnān me daha me pṛtanāyataḥ /
analyzed: daha darbha sapatnān me daha me pṛtanāyataḥ

original: (AVŚ_19,29.8c) daha me sarvān durhārdo daha me dviṣato maṇe //8//
analyzed: daha me sarvān durhārdaḥ daha me dviṣataḥ maṇe

original: (AVŚ_19,29.9a) jahi darbha sapatnān me jahi me pṛtanāyataḥ /
analyzed: jahi darbha sapatnān me jahi me pṛtanāyataḥ

original: (AVŚ_19,29.9c) jahi me sarvān durhārdo jahi me dviṣato maṇe //9//
analyzed: jahi me sarvān durhārdaḥ jahi me dviṣataḥ maṇe

original: (AVŚ_19,30.1a) yat te darbha jarāmṛtyu śataṃ varmasu varma te /
analyzed: yat te darbha jarā mṛtyu śatam varmasu varma te

original: (AVŚ_19,30.1c) tenemaṃ varmiṇaṃ kṛtvā sapatnāṃ jahi vīryaiḥ //1//
analyzed: tena imam varmiṇam kṛtvā sapatnām jahi vīryaiḥ

original: (AVŚ_19,30.2a) śataṃ te darbha varmāṇi sahasraṃ vīryāṇi te /
analyzed: śatam te darbha varmāṇi sahasram vīryāṇi te

original: (AVŚ_19,30.2c) tam asmai viśve tvāṃ devā jarase bhartavā aduḥ //2//
analyzed: tam asmai viśve tvām devāḥ jarase bhartavai aduḥ

original: (AVŚ_19,30.3a) tvām āhur devavarma tvāṃ darbha brahmaṇas patim /
analyzed: tvām āhuḥ deva varma tvām darbha brahmaṇaḥ patim

original: (AVŚ_19,30.3c) tvām indrasyāhur varma tvaṃ rāṣṭrāṇi rakṣasi //3//
analyzed: tvām indrasya āhuḥ varma tvam rāṣṭrāṇi rakṣasi

original: (AVŚ_19,30.4a) sapatnakṣayaṇaṃ darbha dviṣatas tapanaṃ hṛdaḥ /
analyzed: sapatna kṣayaṇam darbha dviṣataḥ tapanam hṛdaḥ

original: (AVŚ_19,30.4c) maṇiṃ kṣatrasya vardhanaṃ tanūpānaṃ kṛṇomi te //4//
analyzed: maṇim kṣatrasya vardhanam tanū pānam kṛṇomi te

original: (AVŚ_19,30.5a) yat samudro abhyakrandat parjanyo vidyutā saha /
analyzed: yat samudraḥ abhyakrandat parjanyaḥ vidyutā saha

original: (AVŚ_19,30.5c) tato hiranyayo bindus tato darbho ajāyata //5//
analyzed: tatas hiranyayaḥ binduḥ tatas darbhaḥ ajāyata

original: (AVŚ_19,31.1a) audumbareṇa maṇinā puṣṭikāmāya vedhasā /
analyzed: audumbareṇa maṇinā puṣṭi kāmāya vedhasā

original: (AVŚ_19,31.1c) paśūṇāṃ sarveṣāṃ sphātiṃ goṣṭhe me savitā karat //1//
analyzed: paśūṇām sarveṣām sphātim goṣṭhe me savitā karat

original: (AVŚ_19,31.2a) yo no agnir gārhapatyaḥ paśūnām adhipā asat /
analyzed: yaḥ naḥ agniḥ gārhapatyaḥ paśūnām adhipāḥ asat

original: (AVŚ_19,31.2c) audumbaro vṛṣā maṇiḥ saṃ mā sṛjatu puṣṭyā //2//
analyzed: audumbaraḥ vṛṣā maṇiḥ sam mā sṛjatu puṣṭyā

original: (AVŚ_19,31.3a) karīṣiṇīṃ phalavatīṃ svadhām irāṃ ca no gṛhe /
analyzed: karīṣiṇīm phalavatīm svadhām irām ca naḥ gṛhe

original: (AVŚ_19,31.3c) audumbarasya tejasā dhātā puṣṭiṃ dadhātu me //3//
analyzed: audumbarasya tejasā dhātā puṣṭim dadhātu me

original: (AVŚ_19,31.4a) yad dvipāc ca catuṣpāc ca yāny annāni ye rasāḥ /
analyzed: yat dvipād ca catuṣpād ca yāni annāni ye rasāḥ

original: (AVŚ_19,31.4c) gṛhṇe 'haṃ tv eṣāṃ bhūmānaṃ bibhrad audumbaraṃ maṇim //4//
analyzed: gṛhṇe ham tu eṣām bhūmānam bibhrat audumbaram maṇim

original: (AVŚ_19,31.5a) puṣṭiṃ paśūnām pari jagrabhāhaṃ catuṣpadāṃ dvipadāṃ yac ca dhānyam /
analyzed: puṣṭim paśūnām pari jagrabhā aham catuṣpadām dvipadām yat ca dhānyam

original: (AVŚ_19,31.5c) payaḥ paśūnāṃ rasam oṣadhīnāṃ bṛhaspatiḥ savitā me ni yachāt //5//
analyzed: payaḥ paśūnām rasam oṣadhīnām bṛhaspatiḥ savitā me ni yacchāt

original: (AVŚ_19,31.6a) ahaṃ paśūnām adhipā asāni mayi puṣṭaṃ puṣṭapatir dadhātu /
analyzed: aham paśūnām adhipāḥ asāni mayi puṣṭam puṣṭa patiḥ dadhātu

original: (AVŚ_19,31.6c) mahyam audumbaro maṇir draviṇāni ni yachatu //6//
analyzed: mahyam audumbaraḥ maṇiḥ draviṇāni ni yacchatu

original: (AVŚ_19,31.7a) upa maudumbaro maṇiḥ prajayā ca dhanena ca /
analyzed: upa mā audumbaraḥ maṇiḥ prajayā ca dhanena ca

original: (AVŚ_19,31.7c) indreṇa jinvito maṇir ā māgant saha varcasā //7//
analyzed: indreṇa jinvitaḥ maṇiḥ ā mā agan saha varcasā

original: (AVŚ_19,31.8a) devo maṇiḥ sapatnahā dhanasā dhanasātaye /
analyzed: devaḥ maṇiḥ sapatna hā dhana sāḥ dhana sātaye

original: (AVŚ_19,31.8c) paśor annasya bhūmānaṃ gavāṃ sphātiṃ ni yachatu //8//
analyzed: paśoḥ annasya bhūmānam gavām sphātim ni yacchatu

original: (AVŚ_19,31.9a) yathāgre tvaṃ vanaspate puṣṭhyā saha jajñiṣe /
analyzed: yathā agre tvam vanaspate puṣṭhyā saha jajñiṣe

original: (AVŚ_19,31.9c) evā dhanasya me sphātim ā dadhātu sarasvatī //9//
analyzed: eva dhanasya me sphātim ā dadhātu sarasvatī

original: (AVŚ_19,31.10a) ā me dhanaṃ sarasvatī payasphātiṃ ca dhānyam /
analyzed: ā me dhanam sarasvatī payaḥ sphātim ca dhānyam

original: (AVŚ_19,31.10c) sinīvāly upā vahād ayaṃ caudumbaro maṇiḥ //10//
analyzed: sinīvālī upa ā vahāt ayam ca audumbaraḥ maṇiḥ

original: (AVŚ_19,31.11a) tvaṃ maṇīṇām adhipā vṛṣāsi tvayi puṣṭaṃ puṣṭapatir jajāna /
analyzed: tvam maṇīṇām adhipāḥ vṛṣā asi tvayi puṣṭam puṣṭa patiḥ jajāna

original: (AVŚ_19,31.11c) tvayīme vājā draviṇāni sarvaudumbaraḥ sa tvam asmat sahasvārād ārād arātim amatiṃ kṣudhaṃ ca //11//
analyzed: tvayi ime vājāḥ draviṇāni sarvā audumbaraḥ sa tvam asmat sahasva ārāt ārāt arātim amatim kṣudham ca

original: (AVŚ_19,31.12a) grāmaṇīr asi grāmaṇīr utthāya abhiṣikto 'bhi mā siñca varcasā /
analyzed: grāmaṇīḥ asi grāmaṇīḥ utthāya abhiṣiktaḥ bhi mā siñca varcasā

original: (AVŚ_19,31.12c) tejo 'si tejo mayi dhārayādhi rayir asi rayiṃ me dhehi //12//
analyzed: tejaḥ si tejaḥ mayi dhāraya adhi rayiḥ asi rayim me dhehi

original: (AVŚ_19,31.13a) puṣṭir asi puṣṭyā mā sam aṅgdhi gṛhamedhī gṛhapatiṃ mā kṛṇu /
analyzed: puṣṭiḥ asi puṣṭyā mā sam aṅgdhi gṛhamedhī gṛha patim mā kṛṇu

original: (AVŚ_19,31.13c) audumbaraḥ sa tvam asmāsu dhehi rayiṃ ca naḥ sarvavīraṃ ni yacha rāyas poṣāya prati muñce ahaṃ tvām //13//
analyzed: audumbaraḥ sa tvam asmāsu dhehi rayim ca naḥ sarva vīram ni yaccha rāyaḥ poṣāya prati muñce aham tvām

original: (AVŚ_19,31.14a) ayam audumbaro maṇir vīro vīrāya badhyate /
analyzed: ayam audumbaraḥ maṇiḥ vīraḥ vīrāya badhyate

original: (AVŚ_19,31.14c) sa naḥ saniṃ madhumatīṃ kṛṇotu rayiṃ ca naḥ sarvavīram ni yachāt //14//
analyzed: sa naḥ sanim madhumatīm kṛṇotu rayim ca naḥ sarva vīram ni yacchāt

original: (AVŚ_19,32.1a) śatakāṇḍo duścyavanaḥ sahasraparṇa uttiraḥ /
analyzed: śatakāṇḍaḥ duścyavanaḥ sahasraparṇaḥ uttiraḥ

original: (AVŚ_19,32.1c) darbho ya ugra oṣadhis taṃ te badhnāmy āyuṣe //1//
analyzed: darbhaḥ yaḥ ugraḥ oṣadhiḥ tam te badhnāmi āyuṣe

original: (AVŚ_19,32.2a) nāsya keśān pra vapanti norasi tāḍam ā ghnate /
analyzed: na asya keśān pra vapanti na urasi tāḍam ā ghnate

original: (AVŚ_19,32.2c) yasmā achinnaparṇena darbhena śarma yachati //2//
analyzed: yasmai a chinna parṇena darbhena śarma yacchati

original: (AVŚ_19,32.3a) divi te tūlam oṣadhe pṛthivyām asi niṣṭhitaḥ /
analyzed: divi te tūlam oṣadhe pṛthivyām asi niṣṭhitaḥ

original: (AVŚ_19,32.3c) tvayā sahasrakāṇḍenāyuḥ pra vardhayāmahe //3//
analyzed: tvayā sahasra kāṇḍena āyuḥ pra vardhayāmahe

original: (AVŚ_19,32.4a) tisro divo aty atṛṇat tisra imāḥ pṛthivīr uta /
analyzed: tisraḥ divaḥ ati atṛṇat tisraḥ imāḥ pṛthivīḥ uta

original: (AVŚ_19,32.4c) tvayāhaṃ durhārdo jihvāṃ ni tṛṇadmi vacāṃsi //4//
analyzed: tvayā aham durhārdaḥ jihvām ni tṛṇadmi vacāṃsi

original: (AVŚ_19,32.5a) tvam asi sahamāno 'ham asmi sahasvān /
analyzed: tvam asi sahamānaḥ ham asmi sahasvān

original: (AVŚ_19,32.5c) ubhau sahasvantau bhūtvā sapatnān sahiṣīvahi //5//
analyzed: ubhau sahasvantau bhūtvā sapatnān sahiṣīvahi

original: (AVŚ_19,32.6a) sahasva no abhimātiṃ sahasva pṛtanāyataḥ /
analyzed: sahasva naḥ abhimātim sahasva pṛtanāyataḥ

original: (AVŚ_19,32.6c) sahasva sarvān durhārdaḥ suhārdo me bahūn kṛdhi //6//
analyzed: sahasva sarvān durhārdaḥ suhārdaḥ me bahūn kṛdhi

original: (AVŚ_19,32.7a) darbheṇa devajātena divi ṣṭambhena śaśvad it /
analyzed: darbheṇa deva jātena divi stambhena śaśvat id

original: (AVŚ_19,32.7c) tenāhaṃ śaśvato janāṃ asanaṃ sanavāni ca //7//
analyzed: tena aham śaśvataḥ janān asanam sanavāni ca

original: (AVŚ_19,32.8a) priyaṃ mā darbha kṛṇu brahmarājanyābhyām śūdrāya cāryāya ca /
analyzed: priyam mā darbha kṛṇu brahma rājanyābhyām śūdrāya ca āryāya ca

original: (AVŚ_19,32.8c) yasmai ca kāmayāmahe sarvasmai ca vipaśyate //8//
analyzed: yasmai ca kāmayāmahe sarvasmai ca vipaśyate

original: (AVŚ_19,32.9a) yo jāyamānaḥ pṛthivīm adṛṃhad yo astabhnād antarikṣaṃ divaṃ ca /
analyzed: yaḥ jāyamānaḥ pṛthivīm adṛṃhat yaḥ astabhnāt antarikṣam divam ca

original: (AVŚ_19,32.9c) yaṃ bibhrataṃ nanu pāpmā viveda sa no 'yaṃ darbho varuṇo divā kaḥ //9//
analyzed: yam bibhratam nanu pāpmā viveda sa naḥ yam darbhaḥ varuṇaḥ divā kaḥ

original: (AVŚ_19,32.10a) sapatnahā śatakāṇḍaḥ sahasvān oṣadhīnāṃ prathamaḥ saṃ babhūva /
analyzed: sapatna hā śata kāṇḍaḥ sahasvān oṣadhīnām prathamaḥ sam babhūva

original: (AVŚ_19,32.10c) sa no 'yaṃ darbhaḥ pari pātu viśvatas tena sākṣīya pṛtanāḥ pṛtanyataḥ //10//
analyzed: sa naḥ yam darbhaḥ pari pātu viśvatas tena sākṣīya pṛtanāḥ pṛtanyataḥ

original: (AVŚ_19,33.1a) sahasrārghaḥ śatakāṇḍaḥ payasvān apām agnir vīrudhāṃ rājasūyam /
analyzed: sahasra arghaḥ śata kāṇḍaḥ payasvān apām agniḥ vīrudhām rājasūyam

original: (AVŚ_19,33.1c) sa no 'yaṃ darbhaḥ pari pātu viśvato devo maṇir āyuṣā saṃ sṛjāti naḥ //1//
analyzed: sa naḥ yam darbhaḥ pari pātu viśvatas devaḥ maṇiḥ āyuṣā sam sṛjāti naḥ

original: (AVŚ_19,33.2a) ghṛtād ullupto madhumān payasvān bhūmidṛṃho 'cyutaś cyāvayiṣṇuḥ /
analyzed: ghṛtāt ulluptaḥ madhumān payasvān bhūmidṛṃho cyutaḥ cyāvayiṣṇuḥ

original: (AVŚ_19,33.2c) nudant sapatnān adharāṃś ca kṛṇvan darbhā roha mahatām indriyeṇa //2//
analyzed: nudan sapatnān adharān ca kṛṇvan darbha ā roha mahatām indriyeṇa

original: (AVŚ_19,33.3a) tvaṃ bhūmim aty eṣy ojasā tvaṃ vedyāṃ sīdasi cārur adhvare /
analyzed: tvam bhūmim ati eṣi ojasā tvam vedyām sīdasi cāruḥ adhvare

original: (AVŚ_19,33.3c) tvāṃ pavitram ṛṣayo 'bharanta tvaṃ punīhi duritāny asmat //3//
analyzed: tvām pavitram ṛṣayaḥ bharanta tvam punīhi duritāni asmat

original: (AVŚ_19,33.4a) tīkṣṇo rājā viṣāsahī rakṣohā viśvacarṣaṇiḥ /
analyzed: tīkṣṇaḥ rājā viṣāsahī rakṣaḥ hā viśvacarṣaṇiḥ

original: (AVŚ_19,33.4c) ojo devānāṃ balam ugram etat taṃ te badhnāmi jarase svastaye //4//
analyzed: ojaḥ devānām balam ugram etat tam te badhnāmi jarase svastaye

original: (AVŚ_19,33.5a) darbheṇa tvaṃ kṛṇavad vīryāṇi darbhaṃ bibhrad ātmanā mā vyathiṣṭhāḥ /
analyzed: darbheṇa tvam kṛṇavat vīryāṇi darbham bibhrat ātmanā mā vyathiṣṭhāḥ

original: (AVŚ_19,33.5c) atiṣṭhāya varcasādhānyānt sūrya ivā bhāhi pradiśaś catasraḥ //5//
analyzed: atiṣṭhāya varcasā adhānyāt sūryaḥ iva ā bhāhi pradiśaḥ catasraḥ

original: (AVŚ_19,34.1a) jāṅgiḍo 'si jaṅgiḍo rakṣitāsi jaṅgidaḥ /
analyzed: jāṅgiḍaḥ si jaṅgiḍaḥ rakṣitā asi jaṅgidaḥ

original: (AVŚ_19,34.1c) dvipāc catuṣpād asmākaṃ sarvaṃ rakṣatu jaṅgidaḥ //1//
analyzed: dvipād catuṣpād asmākam sarvam rakṣatu jaṅgidaḥ

original: (AVŚ_19,34.2a) yā gṛtsyas tripañcāśīḥ śataṃ kṛtyākṛtaś ca ye /
analyzed: yāḥ gṛtsyaḥ tripañcāśīḥ śatam kṛtyā kṛtaḥ ca ye

original: (AVŚ_19,34.2c) sarvān vinaktu tejaso 'rasāṃ jaṅgidas karat //2//
analyzed: sarvān vinaktu tejasaḥ rasām jaṅgidaḥ karat

original: (AVŚ_19,34.3a) arasaṃ kṛtrimaṃ nādam arasāḥ sapta visrasaḥ /
analyzed: arasam kṛtrimam nādam arasāḥ sapta visrasaḥ

original: (AVŚ_19,34.3c) apeto jaṅgiḍāmatim iṣum asteva śātaya //3//
analyzed: apa itas jaṅgiḍā matim iṣum astā iva śātaya

original: (AVŚ_19,34.4a) kṛtyādūṣaṇa evāyam atho arātidūṣaṇaḥ /
analyzed: kṛtyā dūṣaṇaḥ eva ayam atha u arāti dūṣaṇaḥ

original: (AVŚ_19,34.4c) atho sahasvāñ jaṅgiḍaḥ pra na āyumṣi tāriṣat //4//
analyzed: atha u sahasvān jaṅgiḍaḥ pra naḥ āyumṣi tāriṣat

original: (AVŚ_19,34.5a) sa jaṅgiḍasya mahimā pari ṇaḥ pātu viśvataḥ /
analyzed: sa jaṅgiḍasya mahimā pari naḥ pātu viśvatas

original: (AVŚ_19,34.5c) viṣkandhaṃ yena sāsaha saṃskandham oja ojasā //5//
analyzed: viṣkandham yena sāsaha saṃskandham ojaḥ ojasā

original: (AVŚ_19,34.6a) triṣ ṭvā devā ajanayan niṣṭhitaṃ bhūmyām adhi /
analyzed: tris tvā devāḥ ajanayan niṣṭhitam bhūmyām adhi

original: (AVŚ_19,34.6c) tam u tvāṅgirā iti brāhmaṇāḥ pūrvyā viduḥ //6//
analyzed: tam u tvā aṅgirāḥ iti brāhmaṇāḥ pūrvyāḥ viduḥ

original: (AVŚ_19,34.7a) na tvā pūrvā oṣadhayo na tvā taranti yā navāḥ /
analyzed: na tvā pūrvāḥ oṣadhayaḥ na tvā taranti yāḥ navāḥ

original: (AVŚ_19,34.7c) vibādha ugro jaṅgiḍaḥ paripāṇaḥ sumaṅgalaḥ //7//
analyzed: vibādhaḥ ugraḥ jaṅgiḍaḥ paripāṇaḥ su maṅgalaḥ

original: (AVŚ_19,34.8a) athopadāna bhagavo jāṅgiḍāmitavīrya /
analyzed: atha upadāna bhagavaḥ jāṅgiḍa amita vīrya

original: (AVŚ_19,34.8c) purā ta ugrā grasata upendro vīryaṃ dadau //8//
analyzed: purā te ugrā grasataḥ upa indraḥ vīryam dadau

original: (AVŚ_19,34.9a) ugra it te vanaspata indra ojmānam ā dadhau /
analyzed: ugraḥ id te vanaspate indraḥ ojmānam ā dadhau

original: (AVŚ_19,34.9c) amīvāḥ sarvāś cātayaṃ jahi rakṣāṃsy oṣadhe //9//
analyzed: amīvāḥ sarvāḥ cātayam jahi rakṣāṃsi oṣadhe

original: (AVŚ_19,34.10a) āśarīkaṃ viśarīkaṃ balāsaṃ pṛṣṭyāmayam /
analyzed: āśarīkam viśarīkam balāsam pṛṣṭyāmayam

original: (AVŚ_19,34.10c) takmānaṃ viśvaśāradam arasāṃ jaṅgiḍas karat //10//
analyzed: takmānam viśva śāradam arasām jaṅgiḍaḥ karat

original: (AVŚ_19,35.1a) indrasya nāma gṛhṇanta ṛsayo jaṅgidaṃ daduḥ /
analyzed: indrasya nāma gṛhṇantaḥ ṛsayaḥ jaṅgidam daduḥ

original: (AVŚ_19,35.1c) devā yaṃ cakrur bheṣajam agre viṣkandhadūṣaṇam //1//
analyzed: devāḥ yam cakruḥ bheṣajam agre viṣkandha dūṣaṇam

original: (AVŚ_19,35.2a) sa no rakṣatu jaṅgiḍo dhanapālo dhaneva /
analyzed: sa naḥ rakṣatu jaṅgiḍaḥ dhana pālaḥ dhanā iva

original: (AVŚ_19,35.2c) devā yaṃ cakrur brāhmaṇāḥ paripāṇam arātiham //2//
analyzed: devāḥ yam cakruḥ brāhmaṇāḥ paripāṇam arātiham

original: (AVŚ_19,35.3a) durhārdaḥ saṃghoraṃ cakṣuḥ pāpakṛtvānam āgamam /
analyzed: durhārdaḥ saṃghoram cakṣuḥ pāpa kṛtvānam āgamam

original: (AVŚ_19,35.3c) tāṃs tvaṃ sahasracakṣo pratībodhena nāśaya paripāṇo 'si jaṅgiḍaḥ //3//
analyzed: tān tvam sahasra cakṣo pratībodhena nāśaya paripāṇaḥ si jaṅgiḍaḥ

original: (AVŚ_19,35.4a) pari mā divaḥ pari mā pṛthivyāḥ pary antarikṣāt pari mā vīrudbhyaḥ /
analyzed: pari mā divaḥ pari mā pṛthivyāḥ pari antarikṣāt pari mā vīrudbhyaḥ

original: (AVŚ_19,35.4c) pari mā bhūtāt pari mota bhavyād diśodiśo jaṅgiḍaḥ pātv asmān //4//
analyzed: pari mā bhūtāt pari mā uta bhavyāt diśaḥ diśaḥ jaṅgiḍaḥ pātu asmān

original: (AVŚ_19,35.5a) ya ṛṣṇavo devakṛtā ya uto vavṛte 'nyaḥ /
analyzed: ye deva kṛtāḥ yaḥ uta u vavṛte nyaḥ

original: (AVŚ_19,35.5c) sarvāṃ stān viśvabheṣajo 'rasāṃ jaṅgiḍas karat //5//
analyzed: sarvām stān viśva bheṣajaḥ rasām jaṅgiḍaḥ karat

original: (AVŚ_19,36.1a) śatavāro anīnaśad yakṣmān rakṣāṃsi tejasā /
analyzed: śata vāraḥ anīnaśat yakṣmān rakṣāṃsi tejasā

original: (AVŚ_19,36.1c) ārohan varcasā saha maṇir durṇāmacātanaḥ //1//
analyzed: ārohan varcasā saha maṇiḥ durṇāma cātanaḥ

original: (AVŚ_19,36.2a) śṛṅgābhyāṃ rakṣo nudate mūlena yātudhānyaḥ /
analyzed: śṛṅgābhyām rakṣaḥ nudate mūlena yātudhānyaḥ

original: (AVŚ_19,36.2c) madhyena yakṣmaṃ bādhate nainaṃ pāpmāti tatrati //2//
analyzed: madhyena yakṣmam bādhate na enam pāpmā ati tatrati

original: (AVŚ_19,36.3a) ye yakṣmāso arbhakā mahānto ye ca śabdinaḥ /
analyzed: ye yakṣmāsaḥ arbhakāḥ mahāntaḥ ye ca śabdinaḥ

original: (AVŚ_19,36.3c) sarvāṃ durṇāmahā maṇiḥ śatavāro anīnaśat //3//
analyzed: sarvām durṇāmahā maṇiḥ śata vāraḥ anīnaśat

original: (AVŚ_19,36.4a) śataṃ vīrān ajanayac chataṃ yakṣmān apāvapat /

original: (AVŚ_19,36.4c) durṇāmnaḥ sarvān hatvāva rakṣāṃsi dhūnute //4//
analyzed: durṇāmnaḥ sarvān hatvā ava rakṣāṃsi dhūnute

original: (AVŚ_19,36.5a) hiraṇyaśṛṅga ṛṣabhaḥ śātavāro ayaṃ maṇiḥ /
analyzed: hiraṇya śṛṅgaḥ ṛṣabhaḥ śātavāraḥ ayam maṇiḥ

original: (AVŚ_19,36.6a) śatam ahaṃ durṇāmnīnāṃ gandharvāpsarasāṃ śatam /
analyzed: śatam aham durṇāmnīnām gandharva apsarasām śatam

original: (AVŚ_19,36.6c) śatam śaśvanvatīnāṃ śatavāreṇa vāraye //6//

analyzed: idam varcaḥ agninā dattam āgan bhargaḥ yaśaḥ sahaḥ ojaḥ vayaḥ balam

analyzed: varcaḥ ā dhehi me tanvām sahaḥ ojaḥ vayaḥ balam

original: (AVŚ_19,37.2c) indriyāya tvā karmaṇe vīryāya prati gṛhṇāmi śataśāradāya //2//
analyzed: indriyāya tvā karmaṇe vīryāya prati gṛhṇāmi śata śāradāya

analyzed: ūrje tvā balāya tvā ojase sahase tvā

original: (AVŚ_19,37.4c) dhātre vidhātre samṛdhe bhūtasya pataye yaje //4//
analyzed: dhātre vidhātre samṛdhe bhūtasya pataye yaje

analyzed: nadyā ayam puruṣaḥ riṣat

original: (AVŚ_19,39.2e) yasmai paribravīmi tvā sāyaṃprātar atho divā //2//
analyzed: yasmai paribravīmi tvā sāyaṃprātar atha u divā

original: (AVŚ_19,39.3a) jīvalā nāma te mātā jīvanto nāma te pitā /
analyzed: jīvalā nāma te mātā jīvantaḥ nāma te pitā

original: (AVŚ_19,39.3c) nadyāyaṃ puruṣo riṣat /
analyzed: nadyā ayam puruṣaḥ riṣat

original: (AVŚ_19,39.3e) yasmai paribravīmi tvā sāyaṃprātar atho divā //3//
analyzed: yasmai paribravīmi tvā sāyaṃprātar atha u divā

original: (AVŚ_19,39.4a) uttamo asy oṣadhīnām anaḍvān jagatām iva vyāghraḥ śvapadām iva /
analyzed: uttamaḥ asi oṣadhīnām anaḍvān jagatām iva vyāghraḥ śvapadām iva

original: (AVŚ_19,39.4c) nadyāyaṃ puruṣo riṣat /
analyzed: nadyā ayam puruṣaḥ riṣat

original: (AVŚ_19,39.4e) yasmai paribravīmi tvā sāyaṃprātar atho divā //4//
analyzed: yasmai paribravīmi tvā sāyaṃprātar atha u divā

original: (AVŚ_19,39.5a) triḥ śāmbubhyo aṅgirebhyas trir ādityebhyas pari /
analyzed: tris śāmbubhyaḥ aṅgirebhyaḥ tris ādityebhyaḥ pari

original: (AVŚ_19,39.5c) trir jāto viśvadevebhyaḥ /
analyzed: tris jātaḥ viśvadevebhyaḥ

analyzed: sa kuṣṭhaḥ viśva bheṣajaḥ sākam somena tiṣṭhati

analyzed: aśvatthaḥ deva sadanaḥ tṛtīyasyām itas divi

original: (AVŚ_19,39.6c) tatrāmṛtasya cakṣaṇaṃ tataḥ kuṣṭho ajāyata /

analyzed: sa kuṣṭhaḥ viśva bheṣajaḥ sākam somena tiṣṭhati

original: (AVŚ_19,39.7a) hiraṇyayī naur acarad dhiraṇyabandhanā divi /
analyzed: hiraṇyayī nauḥ acarat hiraṇya bandhanā divi

original: (AVŚ_19,39.7c) tatrāmṛtasya cakṣaṇaṃ tataḥ kuṣṭho ajāyata /
analyzed: tatra amṛtasya cakṣaṇam tatas kuṣṭhaḥ ajāyata

original: (AVŚ_19,39.7e) sa kuṣṭho viśvabheṣajaḥ sākaṃ somena tiṣṭhati /
analyzed: sa kuṣṭhaḥ viśva bheṣajaḥ sākam somena tiṣṭhati

original: (AVŚ_19,39.8a) yatra nāvaprabhraṃśanaṃ yatra himavataḥ śiraḥ /
analyzed: yatra nāva prabhraṃśanam yatra himavataḥ śiraḥ

original: (AVŚ_19,39.8c) tatrāmṛtasya cakṣaṇaṃ tataḥ kuṣṭho ajāyata /
analyzed: tatra amṛtasya cakṣaṇam tatas kuṣṭhaḥ ajāyata

original: (AVŚ_19,39.8e) sa kuṣṭho viśvabheṣajaḥ sākaṃ somena tiṣṭhati /
analyzed: sa kuṣṭhaḥ viśva bheṣajaḥ sākam somena tiṣṭhati

analyzed: yam tvā veda pūrvaḥ ikṣvākaḥ yam vā tvā kuṣṭha kāmyaḥ

original: (AVŚ_19,39.9c) yaṃ vā vaso yam ātsyas tenāsi viśvabheṣajaḥ //9//

original: (AVŚ_19,39.10a) śīrṣaśokaṃ tṛtīyakaṃ sadaṃdir yaś ca hāyanaḥ /
analyzed: śīrṣaśokam tṛtīyakam sadaṃdiḥ yaḥ ca hāyanaḥ

original: (AVŚ_19,39.10c) takmānaṃ viśvadhāvīryādharāñcaṃ parā suva //10//
analyzed: takmānam viśvadhā vīrya adharāñcam parā suva

original: (AVŚ_19,40.1a) yan me chidraṃ manaso yac ca vācaḥ sarasvatī manyumantaṃ jagāma /
analyzed: yat me chidram manasaḥ yat ca vācaḥ sarasvatī manyumantam jagāma

original: (AVŚ_19,40.1c) viśvais tad devaiḥ saha saṃvidānaḥ saṃ dadhātu bṛhaspatiḥ //1//
analyzed: viśvaiḥ tat devaiḥ saha saṃvidānaḥ sam dadhātu bṛhaspatiḥ

original: (AVŚ_19,40.2a) mā na āpo medhāṃ mā brahma pra mathiṣṭana /
analyzed: mā naḥ āpaḥ medhām mā brahma pra mathiṣṭana

original: (AVŚ_19,40.2c) suṣyadā yūyaṃ syandadhvam upahūto 'haṃ sumedhā varcasvī //2//
analyzed: suṣyadā yūyam syandadhvam upahūtaḥ ham sumedhāḥ varcasvī

original: (AVŚ_19,40.3a) mā no medhāṃ mā no dīkṣāṃ mā no hiṃsiṣṭaṃ yat tapaḥ /
analyzed: mā naḥ medhām mā naḥ dīkṣām mā naḥ hiṃsiṣṭam yat tapaḥ

original: (AVŚ_19,40.3c) śivā naḥ śaṃ santv āyuṣe śivā bhavantu mātaraḥ //3//
analyzed: śivāḥ naḥ śam santu āyuṣe śivāḥ bhavantu mātaraḥ

original: (AVŚ_19,40.4a) yā naḥ pīparad aśvinā jyotiṣmatī tamas tiraḥ /
analyzed: yā naḥ pīparat aśvinā jyotiṣmatī tamaḥ tiras

original: (AVŚ_19,40.4c) tām asme rāsatām iṣam //4//
analyzed: tām asme rāsatām iṣam

original: (AVŚ_19,41.1a) bhadram ichanta ṛṣayaḥ svarvidas tapo dīkṣām upaniṣedur agre /
analyzed: bhadram ichantaḥ ṛṣayaḥ svar vidaḥ tapaḥ dīkṣām upaniṣeduḥ agre

original: (AVŚ_19,41.1c) tato rāṣṭraṃ balam ojaś ca jātaṃ tad asmai devā upasaṃnamantu //1//
analyzed: tatas rāṣṭram balam ojaḥ ca jātam tat asmai devāḥ upasaṃnamantu

original: (AVŚ_19,42.1a) brahma hotā brahma yajñā brahmaṇā svaravo mitāḥ /
analyzed: brahma hotā brahma yajñāḥ brahmaṇā svaravaḥ mitāḥ

original: (AVŚ_19,42.1c) adhvaryur brahmaṇo jāto brahmaṇo 'ntarhitaṃ haviḥ //1//
analyzed: adhvaryuḥ brahmaṇaḥ jātaḥ brahmaṇaḥ ntarhitam haviḥ

original: (AVŚ_19,42.2a) brahma sruco ghṛtavatīr brahmaṇā vedir uddhitā /
analyzed: brahma srucaḥ ghṛtavatīḥ brahmaṇā vediḥ uddhitā

original: (AVŚ_19,42.2c) brahma yajñasya tattvaṃ ca ṛtvijo ye haviṣkṛtaḥ /
analyzed: brahma yajñasya tattvam ca ṛtvijaḥ ye haviṣkṛtaḥ
