original: (AVŚ_19,48.3a) yat kiṃ cedaṃ patayati yat kiṃ cedaṃ sarīsṛpam /
analyzed: yat kim ca idam patayati yat kim ca idam sarīsṛpam

original: (AVŚ_19,48.3c) yat kiṃ ca parvatāyāsatvaṃ tasmāt tvaṃ rātri pāhi naḥ //3//
analyzed: yat kim ca parvata āyāsa tvam tasmāt tvam rātri pāhi naḥ

original: (AVŚ_19,48.4a) sā paścāt pāhi sā puraḥ sottarād adharād uta /
analyzed: sā paścāt pāhi sā puras sā uttarāt adharāt uta

original: (AVŚ_19,48.4c) gopāya no vibhāvari stotāras ta iha smasi //4//
analyzed: gopāya naḥ vibhāvari stotāraḥ te iha smasi

original: (AVŚ_19,48.5a) ye rātrim anutiṣṭhanti ye ca bhūteṣu jāgrati /
analyzed: ye rātrim anutiṣṭhanti ye ca bhūteṣu jāgrati

original: (AVŚ_19,48.5c) paśūn ye sarvān rakṣanti te na ātmasu jāgrati te naḥ paśuṣu jāgrati //5//
analyzed: paśūn ye sarvān rakṣanti te naḥ ātmasu jāgrati te naḥ paśuṣu jāgrati

original: (AVŚ_19,48.6a) veda vai rātri te nāma ghṛtācī nāma vā asi /
analyzed: veda vai rātri te nāma ghṛtācī nāma vai asi

original: (AVŚ_19,48.6c) tāṃ tvāṃ bharadvājo veda sā no vitte 'dhi jāgrati //6//
analyzed: tām tvām bharadvājaḥ veda sā naḥ vitte dhi jāgrati

original: (AVŚ_19,49.1a) iṣirā yoṣā yuvatir damūnā rātrī devasya savitur bhagasya /
analyzed: iṣirā yoṣā yuvatiḥ damūnāḥ rātrī devasya savituḥ bhagasya

original: (AVŚ_19,49.1c) aśvakṣabhā suhavā saṃbhṛtaśrīr ā paprau dyāvāpṛthivī mahitvā //1//
analyzed: aśva kṣabhā su havā saṃbhṛta śrīḥ ā paprau dyāvāpṛthivī mahitvā

original: (AVŚ_19,49.2a) ati viśvāny aruhad gambhiro varṣiṣṭham aruhanta śraviṣṭhāḥ /
analyzed: ati viśvāni aruhat gambhiraḥ varṣiṣṭham aruhanta śraviṣṭhāḥ

original: (AVŚ_19,49.2c) uśatī rātry anu sā bhadrābhi tiṣṭhate mitra iva svadhābhiḥ //2//
analyzed: uśatī rātrī anu sā bhadrā abhi tiṣṭhate mitraḥ iva svadhābhiḥ

original: (AVŚ_19,49.3a) varye vande subhage sujāta ājagan rātri sumanā iha syām /
analyzed: varye vande subhage sujāte ājagan rātri sumanāḥ iha syām

original: (AVŚ_19,49.3c) asmāṃs trāyasva naryāṇi jātā atho yāni gavyāni puṣṭyā //3//
analyzed: asmān trāyasva naryāṇi jātā atha u yāni gavyāni puṣṭyā

original: (AVŚ_19,49.4a) siṃhasya rātry uśatī pīṃṣasya vyāghrasya dvīpino varca ā dade /
analyzed: siṃhasya rātrī uśatī pīṃṣasya vyāghrasya dvīpinaḥ varcaḥ ā dade

original: (AVŚ_19,49.4c) aśvasya bradhnaṃ puruṣasya māyuṃ puru rūpāṇi kṛṇuṣe vibhātī //4//
analyzed: aśvasya bradhnam puruṣasya māyum puru rūpāṇi kṛṇuṣe vibhātī

original: (AVŚ_19,49.5a) śivāṃ rātrim anusūryaṃ ca himasya mātā suhavā no astu /
analyzed: śivām rātrim anusūryam ca himasya mātā su havā naḥ astu

original: (AVŚ_19,49.5c) asya stomasya subhage ni bodha yena tvā vande viśvāsu dikṣu //5//
analyzed: asya stomasya subhage ni bodha yena tvā vande viśvāsu dikṣu

original: (AVŚ_19,49.6a) stomasya no vibhāvari rātri rājeva joṣase /
analyzed: stomasya naḥ vibhāvari rātri rājā iva joṣase

original: (AVŚ_19,49.6c) asāma sarvavīrā bhavāma sarvavedaso vyuchantīr anūṣasaḥ //6//
analyzed: asāma sarva vīrāḥ bhavāma sarva vedasaḥ vyuchantīḥ anu uṣasaḥ

original: (AVŚ_19,49.7a) śamyā ha nāma dadhiṣe mama dipsanti ye dhanā /
analyzed: śamyā ha nāma dadhiṣe mama dipsanti ye dhanā

original: (AVŚ_19,49.7c) rātrīhi tān asutapā ya steno na vidyate yat punar na vidyate //7//
analyzed: rātrīhi tān a suta pāḥ yaḥ stenaḥ na vidyate yat punar na vidyate

original: (AVŚ_19,49.8a) bhadrāsi rātri camaso na viṣṭo viṣvaṅ gorūpaṃ yuvatir bibharṣi /
analyzed: bhadrā asi rātri camasaḥ na viṣṭaḥ viṣvaṅ go rūpam yuvatiḥ bibharṣi

original: (AVŚ_19,49.8c) cakṣuṣmatī me uśatī vapūmṣi prati tvaṃ divyā na kṣām amukthāḥ //8//
analyzed: cakṣuṣmatī me uśatī vapūmṣi prati tvam divyā na kṣām amukthāḥ

original: (AVŚ_19,49.9a) yo adya stena āyaty aghāyur martyo ripuḥ /
analyzed: yaḥ adya stenaḥ āyati aghāyuḥ martyaḥ ripuḥ

original: (AVŚ_19,49.9c) rātrī tasya pratītya pra grīvāḥ pra śiro hanat //9//
analyzed: rātrī tasya pratītya pra grīvāḥ pra śiraḥ hanat

original: (AVŚ_19,49.10a) pra pādau na yathāyati pra hastau na yathāśiṣat /
analyzed: pra pādau na yathā ayati pra hastau na yathā aśiṣat

original: (AVŚ_19,49.10c) yo malimlur upāyati sa saṃpiṣṭo apāyati /
analyzed: yaḥ malimluḥ upāyati sa saṃpiṣṭaḥ apāyati

original: (AVŚ_19,49.10e) apāyati svapāyati śuṣke sthāṇāv apāyati //10//
analyzed: apāyati su apāyati śuṣke sthāṇau apāyati

original: (AVŚ_19,50.1a) adha rātri tṛṣṭadhūmam aśīrṣāṇam ahiṃ kṛṇu /
analyzed: adha rātri tṛṣṭa dhūmam a śīrṣāṇam ahim kṛṇu

original: (AVŚ_19,50.1c) akṣau vṛkasya nir jahyās tena taṃ drupade jahi //1//
analyzed: akṣau vṛkasya niḥ jahyāḥ tena tam drupade jahi

original: (AVŚ_19,50.2a) ye te rātry anaḍvāhas tīkṣṇaśṛṅgāḥ svāśavaḥ /
analyzed: ye te rātri anaḍvāhaḥ tīkṣṇa śṛṅgāḥ su āśavaḥ

original: (AVŚ_19,50.2c) tebhir no adya pārayāti durgāṇi viśvahā //2//
analyzed: tebhiḥ naḥ adya pārayāti durgāṇi viśvahā

original: (AVŚ_19,50.3a) rātriṃrātrim ariṣyantas tarema tanvā vayam /
analyzed: rātrim rātrim a riṣyantaḥ tarema tanvā vayam

original: (AVŚ_19,50.3c) gambhīram aplavā iva na tareyur arātayaḥ //3//
analyzed: gambhīram aplavāḥ iva na tareyuḥ arātayaḥ

original: (AVŚ_19,50.4a) yathā śāmyākaḥ prapatann apavān nānuvidyate /
analyzed: yathā śāmyākaḥ prapatan apavān na anuvidyate

original: (AVŚ_19,50.4c) evā rātri pra pātaya yo asmāṃ abhyaghāyati //4//
analyzed: eva rātri pra pātaya yaḥ asmām abhyaghāyati

original: (AVŚ_19,50.5a) apa stenaṃ vāsayo goajam uta taskaram /
analyzed: apa stenam vāsayaḥ go ajam uta taskaram

original: (AVŚ_19,50.5c) atho yo arvataḥ śiro 'bhidhāya ninīṣati //5//
analyzed: atha u yaḥ arvataḥ śiraḥ bhidhāya ninīṣati

original: (AVŚ_19,50.6a) yad adya rātri subhage vibhajanty ayo vasu /
analyzed: yat adya rātri subhage vibhajanti ayaḥ vasu

original: (AVŚ_19,50.6c) yad etad asmān bhojaya yathed anyān upāyasi //6//
analyzed: yat etat asmān bhojaya yathā id anyān upāyasi

original: (AVŚ_19,50.7a) uṣase naḥ pari dehi sarvān rātry anāgasaḥ /
analyzed: uṣase naḥ pari dehi sarvān rātri anāgasaḥ

original: (AVŚ_19,50.7c) uṣā no ahne ā bhajād ahas tubhyaṃ vibhāvari //7//
analyzed: uṣāḥ naḥ ahne ā bhajāt ahar tubhyam vibhāvari

original: (AVŚ_19,51.1a) ayuto 'ham ayuto ma ātmāyutaṃ me cakṣur ayutaṃ me śrotram /
analyzed: ayutaḥ ham ayutaḥ me ātmā ayutam me cakṣuḥ ayutam me śrotram

original: (AVŚ_19,51.1c) ayuto me prāṇo 'yuto me 'pāno 'yuto me vyāno 'yuto 'haṃ sarvaḥ //1//
analyzed: ayutaḥ me prāṇaḥ yutaḥ me pānaḥ yutaḥ me vyānaḥ yutaḥ ham sarvaḥ

original: (AVŚ_19,51.2a) devasya tvā savituḥ prasave 'śvinor bāhubhyāṃ pūṣṇo hastābhyāṃ prasūta ā rabhe //2//
analyzed: devasya tvā savituḥ prasave śvinoḥ bāhubhyām pūṣṇaḥ hastābhyām prasūtaḥ ā rabhe

original: (AVŚ_19,52.1a) kāmas tad agre sam avartata manaso retaḥ prathamaṃ yad āsīt /
analyzed: kāmaḥ tat agre sam avartata manasaḥ retaḥ prathamam yat āsīt

original: (AVŚ_19,52.1c) sa kāma kāmena bṛhatā sayonī rāyas poṣaṃ yajamānāya dhehi //1//
analyzed: sa kāma kāmena bṛhatā sayoniḥ rāyaḥ poṣam yajamānāya dhehi

original: (AVŚ_19,52.2a) tvaṃ kāma sahasāsi pratiṣṭhito vibhur vibhāvā sakha ā sakhīyate /
analyzed: tvam kāma sahasā asi pratiṣṭhitaḥ vibhuḥ vibhāvā sakhaḥ ā sakhīyate

original: (AVŚ_19,52.2c) tvam ugraḥ pṛtanāsu sasahiḥ saha ojo yajamānāya dhehi //2//
analyzed: tvam ugraḥ pṛtanāsu sasahiḥ sahaḥ ojaḥ yajamānāya dhehi

original: (AVŚ_19,52.3a) dūrāc cakamānāya pratipāṇāyākṣaye /
analyzed: dūrāt cakamānāya pratipāṇāya a kṣaye

original: (AVŚ_19,52.3c) āsmā aśṛṇvann āśāḥ kāmenājanayant svaḥ //3//
analyzed: ā asmai aśṛṇvan āśāḥ kāmena ajanayan svar

original: (AVŚ_19,52.4a) kāmena mā kāma āgan hṛdayād dhṛdayaṃ pari /
analyzed: kāmena mā kāmaḥ āgan hṛdayāt hṛdayam pari

original: (AVŚ_19,52.4c) yad amīṣām ado manas tad aitūpa mām iha //4//
analyzed: yat amīṣām adaḥ manaḥ tat aitu upa mām iha

original: (AVŚ_19,52.5a) yat kāma kāmayamānā idaṃ kṛṇmasi te haviḥ /
analyzed: yat kāma kāmayamānāḥ idam kṛṇmasi te haviḥ

original: (AVŚ_19,52.5c) tan naḥ sarvaṃ sam ṛdhyatām athaitasya haviṣo vīhi svāhā //5//
analyzed: tat naḥ sarvam sam ṛdhyatām atha etasya haviṣaḥ vīhi svāhā

original: (AVŚ_19,53.1a) kālo aśvo vahati saptaraśmiḥ sahasrākṣo ajaro bhūriretāḥ /
analyzed: kālaḥ aśvaḥ vahati sapta raśmiḥ sahasra akṣaḥ ajaraḥ bhūri retāḥ

original: (AVŚ_19,53.1c) tam ā rohanti kavayo vipaścitas tasya cakrā bhuvanāni viśvā //1//
analyzed: tam ā rohanti kavayaḥ vipaścitaḥ tasya cakrā bhuvanāni viśvā

original: (AVŚ_19,53.2a) sapta cakrān vahati kāla eṣa saptāsya nābhīr amṛtaṃ nv akṣaḥ /
analyzed: sapta cakrān vahati kālaḥ eṣa sapta asya nābhīḥ amṛtam nu akṣaḥ

original: (AVŚ_19,53.2c) sa imā viśvā bhuvanāny añjat kālaḥ sa īyate prathamo nu devaḥ //2//
analyzed: saḥ imā viśvā bhuvanāni añjat kālaḥ saḥ īyate prathamaḥ nu devaḥ

original: (AVŚ_19,53.3a) pūrṇaḥ kumbho 'dhi kāla āhitas taṃ vai paśyāmo bahudhā nu santam /
analyzed: pūrṇaḥ kumbhaḥ dhi kāle āhitaḥ tam vai paśyāmaḥ bahudhā nu santam

original: (AVŚ_19,53.3c) sa imā viśvā bhuvanāni pratyaṅ kālaṃ tam āhuḥ parame vyoman //3//
analyzed: saḥ imā viśvā bhuvanāni pratyaṅ kālam tam āhuḥ parame vyoman

original: (AVŚ_19,53.4a) sa eva saṃ bhuvanāny ābharat sa eva saṃ bhuvanāni pary ait /
analyzed: saḥ eva sam bhuvanāni ābharat saḥ eva sam bhuvanāni pari ait

original: (AVŚ_19,53.4c) pitā sann abhavat putra eṣāṃ tasmād vai nānyat param asti tejaḥ //4//
analyzed: pitā san abhavat putraḥ eṣām tasmāt vai na anyat param asti tejaḥ

original: (AVŚ_19,53.5a) kālo 'mūṃ divam ajanayat kāla imāḥ pṛthivīr uta /
analyzed: kālaḥ mūm divam ajanayat kālaḥ imāḥ pṛthivīḥ uta

original: (AVŚ_19,53.5c) kāle ha bhūtaṃ bhavyaṃ ceṣitaṃ ha vi tiṣṭhate //5//
analyzed: kāle ha bhūtam bhavyam ca iṣitam ha vi tiṣṭhate

original: (AVŚ_19,53.6a) kālo bhūtim asṛjata kāle tapati sūryaḥ /
analyzed: kālaḥ bhūtim asṛjata kāle tapati sūryaḥ

original: (AVŚ_19,53.6c) kāle ha viśvā bhūtāni kāle cakṣur vi paśyati //6//
analyzed: kāle ha viśvā bhūtāni kāle cakṣuḥ vi paśyati

original: (AVŚ_19,53.7a) kāle manaḥ kāle prāṇaḥ kāle nāma samāhitam /
analyzed: kāle manaḥ kāle prāṇaḥ kāle nāma samāhitam

original: (AVŚ_19,53.7c) kālena sarvā nandanty āgatena prajā imāḥ //7//
analyzed: kālena sarvāḥ nandanti āgatena prajāḥ imāḥ

original: (AVŚ_19,53.8a) kāle tapaḥ kāle jyeṣṭham kāle brahma samāhitam /
analyzed: kāle tapaḥ kāle jyeṣṭham kāle brahma samāhitam

original: (AVŚ_19,53.8c) kālo ha sarvasyeśvaro yaḥ pitāsīt prajāpateḥ //8//
analyzed: kālaḥ ha sarvasya īśvaraḥ yaḥ pitā āsīt prajāpateḥ

original: (AVŚ_19,53.9a) teneṣitaṃ tena jātaṃ tad u tasmin pratiṣṭhitam /
analyzed: tena iṣitam tena jātam tat u tasmin pratiṣṭhitam

original: (AVŚ_19,53.9c) kālo ha brahma bhūtvā bibharti parameṣṭhinam //9//
analyzed: kālaḥ ha brahma bhūtvā bibharti parameṣṭhinam

original: (AVŚ_19,53.10a) kālaḥ prajā asṛjata kālo agre prajāpatim /
analyzed: kālaḥ prajāḥ asṛjata kālaḥ agre prajāpatim

original: (AVŚ_19,53.10c) svayaṃbhūḥ kaśyapaḥ kālāt tapaḥ kālād ajāyata //10//
analyzed: svayaṃbhūḥ kaśyapaḥ kālāt tapaḥ kālāt ajāyata

original: (AVŚ_19,54.1a) kālād āpaḥ sam abhavan kālād brahma tapo diśaḥ /
analyzed: kālāt āpaḥ sam abhavan kālāt brahma tapaḥ diśaḥ

original: (AVŚ_19,54.1c) kālenod eti sūryaḥ kāle ni viśate punaḥ //1//
analyzed: kālena ud eti sūryaḥ kāle ni viśate punar

original: (AVŚ_19,54.2a) kālena vātaḥ pavate kālena pṛthivī mahī /
analyzed: kālena vātaḥ pavate kālena pṛthivī mahī

original: (AVŚ_19,54.2c) dyaur mahī kāla āhitā //2//
analyzed: dyauḥ mahī kālaḥ āhitā

original: (AVŚ_19,54.3a) kālo ha bhūtaṃ bhavyaṃ ca putro ajanayat purā /
analyzed: kālaḥ ha bhūtam bhavyam ca putraḥ ajanayat purā

original: (AVŚ_19,54.3c) kālād ṛcaḥ sam abhavan yajuḥ kālād ajāyata //3//
analyzed: kālāt ṛcaḥ sam abhavan yajuḥ kālāt ajāyata

original: (AVŚ_19,54.4a) kālo yajñaṃ sam airayad devebhyo bhāgam akṣitam /
analyzed: kālaḥ yajñam sam airayat devebhyaḥ bhāgam akṣitam

original: (AVŚ_19,54.4c) kāle gandharvāpsarasaḥ kāle lokāḥ pratiṣṭhitāḥ //4//
analyzed: kāle gandharva apsarasaḥ kāle lokāḥ pratiṣṭhitāḥ

original: (AVŚ_19,54.5a) kāle 'yam aṅgirā devo 'tharvā cādhi tiṣṭhataḥ /
analyzed: kāle yam aṅgirāḥ devaḥ tharvā ca adhi tiṣṭhataḥ

original: (AVŚ_19,54.5c) imaṃ ca lokaṃ paramaṃ ca lokaṃ puṇyāṃś ca lokān vidhṛtīś ca puṇyāḥ /
analyzed: imam ca lokam paramam ca lokam puṇyān ca lokān vidhṛtīḥ ca puṇyāḥ

original: (AVŚ_19,54.5e) sarvāṃl lokān abhijitya brahmaṇā kālaḥ sa īyate paramo nu devaḥ //5//
analyzed: sarvān lokān abhijitya brahmaṇā kālaḥ saḥ īyate paramaḥ nu devaḥ

original: (AVŚ_19,55.1a) rātriṃrātrim aprayātaṃ bharanto 'śvāyeva tiṣṭhate ghāsam asmai /
analyzed: rātrim rātrim aprayātam bharantaḥ śvāyā iva tiṣṭhate ghāsam asmai

original: (AVŚ_19,55.1c) rāyas poṣeṇa sam iṣā madanto mā te agne prativeśā riṣāma //1//
analyzed: rāyaḥ poṣeṇa sam iṣā madantaḥ mā te agne prativeśāḥ riṣāma

original: (AVŚ_19,55.2a) yā te vasor vāta iṣuḥ sā ta eṣā tayā no mṛḍa /
analyzed: yā te vasoḥ vāte iṣuḥ sā te eṣā tayā naḥ mṛḍa

original: (AVŚ_19,55.2c) rāyas poṣeṇa sam iṣā madanto mā te agne prativeśā riṣāma //2//
analyzed: rāyaḥ poṣeṇa sam iṣā madantaḥ mā te agne prativeśāḥ riṣāma

original: (AVŚ_19,55.3a) sāyaṃsāyaṃ gṛhapatir no agniḥ prātaḥprātaḥ saumanasasya dātā /
analyzed: sāyam sāyam gṛhapatiḥ naḥ agniḥ prātar prātar saumanasasya dātā

original: (AVŚ_19,55.3c) vasorvasor vasudāna edhi vayaṃ tvendhānās tanvaṃ puṣema //3//
analyzed: vasoḥ vasoḥ vasu dānaḥ edhi vayam tvā indhānāḥ tanvam puṣema

original: (AVŚ_19,55.4a) prātaḥprātar gṛhapatir no agniḥ sāyaṃsāyaṃ saumanasasya dātā /
analyzed: prātar prātar gṛhapatiḥ naḥ agniḥ sāyam sāyam saumanasasya dātā

original: (AVŚ_19,55.4c) vasorvasor vasudāna edhīndhānās tvā śataṃhimā ṛdhema //4//
analyzed: vasoḥ vasoḥ vasu dānaḥ edhi indhānāḥ tvā śataṃhimāḥ ṛdhema

original: (AVŚ_19,55.5a) apaścā dagdhānnasya bhūyāsam /
analyzed: a paścā dagdha annasya bhūyāsam

original: (AVŚ_19,55.5c) annādāyānnapataye rudrāya namo agnaye /
analyzed: anna ādāya annapataye rudrāya namaḥ agnaye

original: (AVŚ_19,55.5e) sabhyaḥ sabhāṃ me pāhi ye ca sabhyāḥ sabhāsadaḥ //5//
analyzed: sabhyaḥ sabhām me pāhi ye ca sabhyāḥ sabhāsadaḥ

original: (AVŚ_19,55.6a) tvām indrā puruhūta viśvam āyur vy aśnavan /
analyzed: tvām indra puruhūta viśvam āyuḥ vi aśnavan

original: (AVŚ_19,55.6c) aharahar balim it te haranto 'śvāyeva tiṣṭhate ghāsam agne //6//
analyzed: ahar ahar balim id te harantaḥ śvāyā iva tiṣṭhate ghāsam agne

original: (AVŚ_19,56.1a) yamasya lokād adhy ā babhūvitha pramadā martyān pra yunakṣi dhīraḥ /
analyzed: yamasya lokāt adhi ā babhūvitha pramadā martyān pra yunakṣi dhīraḥ

original: (AVŚ_19,56.1c) ekākinā sarathaṃ yāsi vidvānt svapnaṃ mimāno asurasya yonau //1//
analyzed: ekākinā sa ratham yāsi vidvān svapnam mimānaḥ asurasya yonau

original: (AVŚ_19,56.2a) bandhas tvāgre viśvacayā apaśyat purā rātryā janitor eke ahni /
analyzed: bandhaḥ tvā agre viśva cayāḥ apaśyat purā rātryāḥ janitoḥ eke ahni

original: (AVŚ_19,56.2c) tataḥ svapnedam adhy ā babhūvitha bhiṣagbhyo rūpam apagūhamānaḥ //2//
analyzed: tatas svapnā idam adhi ā babhūvitha bhiṣagbhyaḥ rūpam apagūhamānaḥ

original: (AVŚ_19,56.3a) bṛhadgāvāsurebhyo 'dhi devān upāvartata mahimānam ichan /
analyzed: bṛhadgāvā asurebhyaḥ dhi devān upāvartata mahimānam ichan

original: (AVŚ_19,56.3c) tasmai svapnāya dadhur ādhipatyaṃ trayastriṃśāsaḥ svar ānaśānāḥ //3//
analyzed: tasmai svapnāya dadhuḥ ādhipatyam trayastriṃśāsaḥ svar ānaśānāḥ

original: (AVŚ_19,56.4a) naitāṃ viduḥ pitaro nota devā yeṣāṃ jalpiś caraty antaredam /
analyzed: na etām viduḥ pitaraḥ na uta devāḥ yeṣām jalpiḥ carati antarā idam

original: (AVŚ_19,56.4c) trite svapnam adadhur āptye nara ādityāso varuṇenānuśiṣṭāḥ //4//
analyzed: trite svapnam adadhuḥ āptye naraḥ ādityāsaḥ varuṇena anuśiṣṭāḥ

original: (AVŚ_19,56.5a) yasya krūram abhajanta duṣkṛto 'svapnena sukṛtaḥ puṇyam āyuḥ /
analyzed: yasya krūram abhajanta duṣkṛtaḥ svapnena su kṛtaḥ puṇyam āyuḥ

original: (AVŚ_19,56.5c) svar madasi parameṇa bandhunā tapyamānasya manaso 'dhi jajñiṣe //5//
analyzed: svar madasi parameṇa bandhunā tapyamānasya manasaḥ dhi jajñiṣe

original: (AVŚ_19,56.6a) vidma te sarvāḥ parijāḥ purastād vidma svapna yo adhipā ihā te /
analyzed: vidma te sarvāḥ parijāḥ purastāt vidma svapna yaḥ adhipāḥ iha ā te

original: (AVŚ_19,56.6c) yaśaśvino no yaśaseha pāhy ārād dviṣebhir apa yāhi dūram //6//
analyzed: yaśaśvinaḥ naḥ yaśasā iha pāhi ārāt dviṣebhiḥ apa yāhi dūram

original: (AVŚ_19,57.1a) yathā kalāṃ yathā śaphaṃ yathā rṇaṃ samnayanti /
analyzed: yathā kalām yathā śapham yathā ṛṇam samnayanti

original: (AVŚ_19,57.1c) evā duṣvapnyaṃ sarvam apriye saṃ nayāmasi //1//
analyzed: eva duṣvapnyam sarvam apriye sam nayāmasi

original: (AVŚ_19,57.2a) saṃ rājāno aguḥ sam ṛṇāmy aguḥ saṃ kuṣṭhā aguḥ saṃ kalā aguḥ /
analyzed: sam rājānaḥ aguḥ sam aguḥ sam kuṣṭhāḥ aguḥ sam kalāḥ aguḥ

original: (AVŚ_19,57.2c) sam asmāsu yad duṣvapnyaṃ nir dviṣate duṣvapnyaṃ suvāma //2//
analyzed: sam asmāsu yat duṣvapnyam niḥ dviṣate duṣvapnyam suvāma

original: (AVŚ_19,57.3a) devānāṃ patnīnāṃ garbha yamasya kara yo bhadraḥ svapna /
analyzed: devānām patnīnām garbha yamasya kara yaḥ bhadraḥ svapna

original: (AVŚ_19,57.3c) sa mama yaḥ pāpas tad dviṣate pra hiṇmaḥ /
analyzed: sa mama yaḥ pāpaḥ tat dviṣate pra hiṇmaḥ

original: (AVŚ_19,57.3e) mā tṛṣṭānām asi kṛṣṇaśakuner mukham //3//
analyzed: mā tṛṣṭānām asi kṛṣṇaśakuneḥ mukham

original: (AVŚ_19,57.4a) taṃ tvā svapna tathā saṃ vidma sa tvaṃ svapnāśva iva kāyam aśva iva nīnāham /
analyzed: tam tvā svapna tathā sam vidma sa tvam svapna aśvaḥ iva kāyam aśvaḥ iva nīnāham

original: (AVŚ_19,57.4c) anāsmākaṃ devapīyuṃ piyāruṃ vapa yad asmāsu duṣvapnyaṃ yad goṣu yac ca no gṛhe //4//
analyzed: anā asmākam deva pīyum piyārum vapa yat asmāsu duṣvapnyam yat goṣu yat ca naḥ gṛhe

original: (AVŚ_19,57.5a) anāsmākas tad devapīyuḥ piyārur niṣkam iva prati muñcatām /
analyzed: anāsmākaḥ tat deva pīyuḥ piyāruḥ niṣkam iva prati muñcatām

original: (AVŚ_19,57.5c) navāratnīn apamayā asmākaṃ tataḥ pari /
analyzed: nava aratnīn apamayā asmākam tatas pari

original: (AVŚ_19,57.5e) duṣvapnyaṃ sarvaṃ dviṣate nir dayāmasi //5//
analyzed: duṣvapnyam sarvam dviṣate niḥ dayāmasi

original: (AVŚ_19,58.1a) ghṛtasya jūtiḥ samanā sadevā saṃvatsaraṃ haviṣā vardhayantī /
analyzed: ghṛtasya jūtiḥ samanā sa devā saṃvatsaram haviṣā vardhayantī

original: (AVŚ_19,58.1c) śrotraṃ cakṣuḥ prāṇo 'chinno no astv achinnā vayam āyuṣo varcasaḥ //1//
analyzed: śrotram cakṣuḥ prāṇo chinnaḥ naḥ astu a chinnāḥ vayam āyuṣaḥ varcasaḥ

original: (AVŚ_19,58.2a) upāsmān prāṇo hvayatām upa prāṇaṃ havāmahe /
analyzed: upa asmān prāṇaḥ hvayatām upa prāṇam havāmahe

original: (AVŚ_19,58.2c) varco jagrāha pṛthivy antarikṣaṃ varcaḥ somo bṛhaspatir vidhattā //2//
analyzed: varcaḥ jagrāha pṛthivī antarikṣam varcaḥ somaḥ bṛhaspatiḥ vidhattā

original: (AVŚ_19,58.3a) varcaso dyāvāpṛthivī saṃgrahaṇī babhūvathur varco gṛhītvā pṛthivīm anu saṃ carema /
analyzed: varcasaḥ dyāvāpṛthivī saṃgrahaṇī babhūvathuḥ varcaḥ gṛhītvā pṛthivīm anu sam carema

original: (AVŚ_19,58.3c) yaśasam gāvo gopatim upa tiṣṭhanty āyatīr yaśo gṛhītvā pṛthivīm anu saṃ carema //3//
analyzed: yaśasam gāvaḥ gopatim upa tiṣṭhanti āyatīḥ yaśaḥ gṛhītvā pṛthivīm anu sam carema

original: (AVŚ_19,58.4a) vrajaṃ kṛṇudhvaṃ sa hi vo nṛpāṇo varmā sīvyadhvaṃ bahulā pṛthūni /
analyzed: vrajam kṛṇudhvam sa hi vaḥ nṛpāṇaḥ varmā sīvyadhvam bahulā pṛthūni

original: (AVŚ_19,58.4c) puraḥ kṛṇudhvam āyasīr adhṛṣṭā mā vaḥ susroc camaso dṛṃhata tam //4//
analyzed: puraḥ kṛṇudhvam āyasīḥ adhṛṣṭāḥ mā vaḥ susrot camasaḥ dṛṃhata tam

original: (AVŚ_19,58.5a) yajñasya cakṣuḥ prabhṛtir mukhaṃ ca vācā śrotreṇa manasā juhomi /
analyzed: yajñasya cakṣuḥ prabhṛtiḥ mukham ca vācā śrotreṇa manasā juhomi

original: (AVŚ_19,58.5c) imaṃ yajñaṃ vitataṃ viśvakarmaṇā devā yantu sumanasyamānāḥ //5//
analyzed: imam yajñam vitatam viśva karmaṇā devāḥ yantu sumanasyamānāḥ

original: (AVŚ_19,58.6a) ye devānām ṛtvijo ye ca yajñiyā yebhyo havyaṃ kriyate bhāgadheyam /
analyzed: ye devānām ṛtvijaḥ ye ca yajñiyāḥ yebhyaḥ havyam kriyate bhāgadheyam

original: (AVŚ_19,58.6c) imaṃ yajñaṃ saha patnībhir etya yāvanto devās taviṣā mādayantām //6//
analyzed: imam yajñam saha patnībhiḥ etya yāvantaḥ devāḥ taviṣāḥ mādayantām

original: (AVŚ_19,59.1a) tvam agne vratapā asi deva ā martyeṣv ā /
analyzed: tvam agne vrata pāḥ asi devaḥ ā martyeṣu ā

original: (AVŚ_19,59.1c) tvaṃ yajñeṣv īḍyaḥ //1//
analyzed: tvam yajñeṣu īḍyaḥ

original: (AVŚ_19,59.2a) yad vo vayaṃ pramināma vratāni viduṣāṃ devā aviduṣṭarāsaḥ /
analyzed: yat vaḥ vayam pramināma vratāni viduṣām devāḥ a viduṣṭarāsaḥ

original: (AVŚ_19,59.2c) agniṣ ṭad viśvād ā pṛṇātu vidvānt somasya yo brāhmaṇāṃ āviveśa //2//
analyzed: agniḥ tat viśvāt ā pṛṇātu vidvān somasya yaḥ brāhmaṇān āviveśa

original: (AVŚ_19,59.3a) ā devānām api panthām aganma yac chaknavāma tad anupravoḍhum /
analyzed: ā devānām api panthām aganma yat śaknavāma tat anupravoḍhum

original: (AVŚ_19,59.3c) agnir vidvānt sa yajāt sa id dhotā so 'dhvarānt sa ṛtūn kalpayāti //3//
analyzed: agniḥ vidvān sa yajāt saḥ id hotā saḥ dhvarān saḥ ṛtūn kalpayāti

original: (AVŚ_19,60.1a) vāṅ ma āsan nasoḥ prāṇaś cakṣur akṣṇoḥ śrotraṃ karṇayoḥ /
analyzed: vāc me āsan nasoḥ prāṇaḥ cakṣuḥ akṣṇoḥ śrotram karṇayoḥ

original: (AVŚ_19,60.1c) apalitāḥ keśā aśoṇā dantā bahu bāhvor balam //1//
analyzed: a palitāḥ keśāḥ a śoṇāḥ dantāḥ bahu bāhvoḥ balam

original: (AVŚ_19,60.2a) ūrvor ojo jaṅghayor javaḥ pādayoḥ /
analyzed: ūrvoḥ ojaḥ jaṅghayoḥ javaḥ pādayoḥ

original: (AVŚ_19,60.2c) pratiṣṭhā ariṣṭāni me sarvātmānibhṛṣṭaḥ //2//
analyzed: pratiṣṭhāḥ ariṣṭāni me sarva ātmā a nibhṛṣṭaḥ

original: (AVŚ_19,61.1a) tanūs tanvā me sahe dataḥ sarvam āyur aśīya /
analyzed: tanūḥ tanvā me sahe dataḥ sarvam āyuḥ aśīya

original: (AVŚ_19,61.1c) syonaṃ me sīda puruḥ pṛṇasva pavamānaḥ svarge //1//
analyzed: syonam me sīda puruḥ pṛṇasva pavamānaḥ svarge

original: (AVŚ_19,62.1a) priyaṃ mā kṛṇu deveṣu priyaṃ rājasu mā kṛṇu /
analyzed: priyam mā kṛṇu deveṣu priyam rājasu mā kṛṇu

original: (AVŚ_19,62.1c) priyaṃ sarvasya paśyata uta śūdra utārye //1//
analyzed: priyam sarvasya paśyataḥ uta śūdre uta ārye

original: (AVŚ_19,63.1a) ut tiṣṭha brahmaṇas pate devān yajñena bodhaya /
analyzed: ud tiṣṭha brahmaṇas pate devān yajñena bodhaya

original: (AVŚ_19,63.1c) āyuḥ prāṇaṃ prajāṃ paśūn kīrtiṃ yajamānaṃ ca vardhaya //1//
analyzed: āyuḥ prāṇam prajām paśūn kīrtim yajamānam ca vardhaya

original: (AVŚ_19,64.1a) agne samidham āhārṣaṃ bṛhate jātavedase /
analyzed: agne samidham āhārṣam bṛhate jātavedase

original: (AVŚ_19,64.1c) sa me śraddhāṃ ca medhāṃ ca jātavedāḥ pra yachatu //1//
analyzed: sa me śraddhām ca medhām ca jātavedāḥ pra yacchatu

original: (AVŚ_19,64.2a) idhmena tvā jātavedaḥ samidhā vardhayāmasi /
analyzed: idhmena tvā jātavedaḥ samidhā vardhayāmasi

original: (AVŚ_19,64.2c) tathā tvam asmān vardhaya prajayā ca dhanena ca //2//
analyzed: tathā tvam asmān vardhaya prajayā ca dhanena ca

original: (AVŚ_19,64.3a) yad agne yāni kāni cid ā te dārūṇi dadhmasi /
analyzed: yat agne yāni kāni cit ā te dārūṇi dadhmasi

original: (AVŚ_19,64.3c) sarvaṃ tad astu me śivaṃ taj juṣasva yaviṣṭhya //3//
analyzed: sarvam tat astu me śivam tat juṣasva yaviṣṭhya

original: (AVŚ_19,64.4a) etās te agne samidhas tvam iddhaḥ samid bhava /
analyzed: etāḥ te agne samidhaḥ tvam iddhaḥ samidh bhava

original: (AVŚ_19,64.4c) āyur asmāsu dhehy amṛtatvam ācāryāya //4//
analyzed: āyuḥ asmāsu dhehi amṛta tvam ācāryāya

original: (AVŚ_19,65.1a) hariḥ suparṇo divam āruho 'rciṣā ye tvā dipsanti divam utpatantam /
analyzed: hariḥ suparṇaḥ divam āruhaḥ rciṣā ye tvā dipsanti divam utpatantam

original: (AVŚ_19,65.1c) ava tāṃ jahi harasā jātavedo 'bibhyad ugro 'rciṣā divam ā roha sūrya //1//
analyzed: ava tām jahi harasā jātavedaḥ bibhyat ugraḥ rciṣā divam ā roha sūrya

original: (AVŚ_19,66.1a) ayojālā asurā māyino 'yasmayaiḥ pāśair aṅkino ye caranti /
analyzed: ayaḥ jālāḥ asurāḥ māyinaḥ yasmayaiḥ pāśaiḥ aṅkinaḥ ye caranti

original: (AVŚ_19,66.1c) tāṃs te randhayāmi harasā jātavedaḥ sahasraṛṣṭiḥ sapatnān pramṛṇan pāhi vajraḥ //1//
analyzed: tān te randhayāmi harasā jātavedaḥ sahasra ṛṣṭiḥ sapatnān pramṛṇan pāhi vajraḥ

original: (AVŚ_19,67.1a) paśyema śaradaḥ śatam //1//
analyzed: paśyema śaradaḥ śatam

original: (AVŚ_19,67.2a) jīvema śaradaḥ śatam //2//
analyzed: jīvema śaradaḥ śatam

original: (AVŚ_19,67.3a) budhyema śaradaḥ śatam //3//
analyzed: budhyema śaradaḥ śatam

original: (AVŚ_19,67.4a) rohema śaradaḥ śatam //4//
analyzed: rohema śaradaḥ śatam

original: (AVŚ_19,67.5a) pūṣema śaradaḥ śatam //5//
analyzed: pūṣā ima śaradaḥ śatam

original: (AVŚ_19,67.6a) bhavema śaradaḥ śatam //6//
analyzed: bhavema śaradaḥ śatam

original: (AVŚ_19,67.7a) bhūṣema śaradaḥ śatam //7//
analyzed: bhūṣema śaradaḥ śatam

original: (AVŚ_19,67.8a) bhūyasīḥ śaradaḥ śatam //8//
analyzed: bhūyasīḥ śaradaḥ śatam

original: (AVŚ_19,68.1a) avyasaś ca vyacasaś ca bilaṃ vi ṣyāmi māyayā /
analyzed: avyasaḥ ca vyacasaḥ ca bilam vi syāmi māyayā

original: (AVŚ_19,68.1c) tābhyām uddhṛtya vedam atha karmāṇi kṛṇmahe //1//
analyzed: tābhyām uddhṛtya vedam atha karmāṇi kṛṇmahe

original: (AVŚ_19,69.1a) jīvā stha jīvyāsaṃ sarvam āyur jīvyāsam //1//
analyzed: jīvāḥ stha jīvyāsam sarvam āyuḥ jīvyāsam

original: (AVŚ_19,69.2a) upajīvā sthopa jīvyāsaṃ sarvam āyur jīvyāsam //2//
analyzed: upajīvāḥ stha upa jīvyāsam sarvam āyuḥ jīvyāsam

original: (AVŚ_19,69.3a) saṃjīvā stha saṃ jīvyāsaṃ sarvam āyur jīvyāsam //3//
analyzed: saṃjīvāḥ stha sam jīvyāsam sarvam āyuḥ jīvyāsam

original: (AVŚ_19,69.4a) jīvalā stha jīvyāsaṃ sarvam āyur jīvyāsam //4//
analyzed: jīvalāḥ stha jīvyāsam sarvam āyuḥ jīvyāsam

original: (AVŚ_19,70.1a) indra jīva sūrya jīva devā jīvā jīvyāsam aham /
analyzed: indra jīva sūrya jīva devāḥ jīva jīvyāsam aham

original: (AVŚ_19,70.1c) sarvam āyur jīvyāsam //1//
analyzed: sarvam āyuḥ jīvyāsam

original: (AVŚ_19,71.1a) stutā mayā varadā vedamātā pra codayantāṃ pāvamānī dvijānām /
analyzed: stutā mayā vara dā veda mātā pra codayantām pāvamānī dvijānām

original: (AVŚ_19,71.1c) āyuḥ prāṇaṃ prajāṃ paśuṃ kīrtiṃ draviṇaṃ brahmavarcasam /
analyzed: āyuḥ prāṇam prajām paśum kīrtim draviṇam brahmavarcasam

original: (AVŚ_19,71.1e) mahyaṃ dattvā vrajata brahmalokam //1//
analyzed: mahyam dattvā vrajata brahma lokam

original: (AVŚ_19,72.1a) yasmāt kośād udabharāma vedaṃ tasminn antar ava dadhma enam /
analyzed: yasmāt kośāt udabharāma vedam tasmin antar ava dadhmaḥ enam

original: (AVŚ_19,72.1c) kṛtam iṣṭaṃ brahmaṇo vīryeṇa tena mā devās tapasāvateha //1//
analyzed: kṛtam iṣṭam brahmaṇaḥ vīryeṇa tena mā devāḥ tapasā avata iha

original: (AVŚ_20,1.1a) indra tvā vṛṣabhaṃ vayaṃ sute some havāmahe /
analyzed: indra tvā vṛṣabham vayam sute some havāmahe

original: (AVŚ_20,1.1c) sa pāhi madhvo andhasaḥ //1//
analyzed: sa pāhi madhvaḥ andhasaḥ

original: (AVŚ_20,1.2a) maruto yasya hi kṣaye pāthā divo vimahasaḥ /
analyzed: marutaḥ yasya hi kṣaye pāthāḥ divaḥ vimahasaḥ

original: (AVŚ_20,1.2c) sa sugopātamo janaḥ //2//
analyzed: sa sugopātamaḥ janaḥ

original: (AVŚ_20,1.3a) ukṣānnāya vaśānnāya somapṛṣṭhāya vedhase /
analyzed: ukṣa annāya vaśā annāya soma pṛṣṭhāya vedhase

original: (AVŚ_20,1.3c) stomair vidhemāgnaye //3//
analyzed: stomaiḥ vidhema agnaye

original: (AVŚ_20,2.1a) marutaḥ potrāt suṣṭubhaḥ svarkād ṛtunā somaṃ pibantu //1//
analyzed: marutaḥ potrāt suṣṭubhaḥ su arkāt ṛtunā somam pibantu

original: (AVŚ_20,2.2a) agnir āgnīdhrāt suṣṭubhaḥ svarkād ṛtunā somaṃ pibatu //2//
analyzed: agniḥ āgnīdhrāt suṣṭubhaḥ su arkāt ṛtunā somam pibatu

original: (AVŚ_20,2.3a) indro brahmā brāhmaṇāt suṣṭubhaḥ svarkād ṛtunā somaṃ pibatu //3//
analyzed: indraḥ brahmā brāhmaṇāt suṣṭubhaḥ su arkāt ṛtunā somam pibatu

original: (AVŚ_20,2.4a) devo draviṇodāḥ potrāt suṣṭubhaḥ svarkād ṛtunā somaṃ pibatu //4//
analyzed: devaḥ draviṇaḥ dāḥ potrāt suṣṭubhaḥ su arkāt ṛtunā somam pibatu

original: (AVŚ_20,3.1a) ā yāhi suṣumā hi ta indra somaṃ pibā imam /
analyzed: ā yāhi suṣuma hi te indra somam pibā imam

original: (AVŚ_20,3.1c) edaṃ barhiḥ sado mama //1//
analyzed: ā idam barhiḥ sadaḥ mama

original: (AVŚ_20,3.2a) ā tvā brahmayujā harī vahatām indra keśinā /
analyzed: ā tvā brahma yujā harī vahatām indra keśinā

original: (AVŚ_20,3.2c) upa brahmāṇi naḥ śṛṇu //2//
analyzed: upa brahmāṇi naḥ śṛṇu

original: (AVŚ_20,3.3a) brahmāṇas tvā vayaṃ yujā somapām indra sominaḥ /

original: (AVŚ_20,27.1a) yad indrāhaṃ yathā tvam īśīya vasva eka it /
analyzed: yat indra aham yathā tvam īśīya vasvaḥ ekaḥ id

original: (AVŚ_20,27.1c) stotā me goṣakhā syāt //1//
analyzed: stotā me go sakhā syāt

original: (AVŚ_20,27.2a) śikṣeyam asmai ditseyaṃ śacīpate manīṣiṇe /
analyzed: śikṣeyam asmai ditseyam śacīpate manīṣiṇe

original: (AVŚ_20,27.2c) yad ahaṃ gopatiḥ syām //2//
analyzed: yat aham gopatiḥ syām

original: (AVŚ_20,27.3a) dhenuṣ ṭa indra sūnṛtā yajamānāya sunvate /
analyzed: dhenuḥ te indra sūnṛtā yajamānāya sunvate

original: (AVŚ_20,27.3c) gām aśvaṃ pipyuṣī duhe //3//
analyzed: gām aśvam pipyuṣī duhe

original: (AVŚ_20,27.4a) na te vartāsti rādhasa indra devo na martyaḥ /
analyzed: na te vartā asti rādhasaḥ indra devaḥ na martyaḥ

original: (AVŚ_20,27.4c) yad ditsasi stuto magham //4//
analyzed: yat ditsasi stutaḥ magham

original: (AVŚ_20,27.5a) yajña indram avardhayad yad bhūmiṃ vy avartayat /
analyzed: yajñaḥ indram avardhayat yat bhūmim vi avartayat

original: (AVŚ_20,27.5c) cakrāṇa opaśaṃ divi //5//
analyzed: cakrāṇaḥ opaśam divi

original: (AVŚ_20,27.6a) vāvṛdhānasya te vayaṃ viśvā dhanāni jigyuṣaḥ /
analyzed: vāvṛdhānasya te vayam viśvā dhanāni jigyuṣaḥ

original: (AVŚ_20,27.6c) ūtim indrā vṛṇīmahe //6//
analyzed: ūtim indra vṛṇīmahe

original: (AVŚ_20,28.1a) vy antarikṣam atiran made somasya rocanā /
analyzed: vi antarikṣam atirat made somasya rocanā

original: (AVŚ_20,28.1c) indro yad abhinad valam //1//
analyzed: indraḥ yat abhinat valam

original: (AVŚ_20,28.2a) ud gā ājad aṅgirobhya āviṣ krṇvan guhā satīḥ /
analyzed: ud gāḥ ājat aṅgirobhyaḥ āvis krṇvan guhā satīḥ

original: (AVŚ_20,28.2c) arvāñcaṃ nunude valam //2//
analyzed: arvāñcam nunude valam

original: (AVŚ_20,28.3a) indreṇa rocanā divo dṛlhāni dṛṃhitāni ca /
analyzed: indreṇa rocanā divaḥ dṛlhāni dṛṃhitāni ca

original: (AVŚ_20,28.3c) sthirāṇi na parāṇude //3//
analyzed: sthirāṇi na parāṇude

original: (AVŚ_20,28.4a) apām ūrmir madann iva stoma indrājirāyate /
analyzed: apām ūrmiḥ madan iva stomaḥ indra ajirāyate

original: (AVŚ_20,28.4c) vi te madā arājiṣuḥ //4//
analyzed: vi te madāḥ arājiṣuḥ

original: (AVŚ_20,29.1a) tvaṃ hi stomavardhana indrāsy ukthavardhanaḥ /
analyzed: tvam hi stoma vardhanaḥ indra asi uktha vardhanaḥ

original: (AVŚ_20,29.1c) stotṝṇām uta bhadrakṛt //1//
analyzed: stotṝṇām uta bhadra kṛt

original: (AVŚ_20,29.2a) indram it keśinā harī somapeyāya vakṣataḥ /
analyzed: indram id keśinā harī soma peyāya vakṣataḥ

original: (AVŚ_20,29.2c) upa yajñaṃ surādhasam //2//
analyzed: upa yajñam su rādhasam

original: (AVŚ_20,29.3a) apāṃ phenena namuceḥ śira indrod avartayaḥ /
analyzed: apām phenena namuceḥ śiraḥ indra ud avartayaḥ

original: (AVŚ_20,29.3c) viśvā yad ajaya spṛdhaḥ //3//
analyzed: viśvāḥ yat ajayaḥ spṛdhaḥ

original: (AVŚ_20,29.4a) māyābhir utsisṛpsata indra dyām ārurukṣataḥ /
analyzed: māyābhiḥ utsisṛpsataḥ indra dyām ārurukṣataḥ

original: (AVŚ_20,29.4c) ava dasyūṃr adhūnuthāḥ //4//
analyzed: ava dasyūṃr adhūnuthāḥ

original: (AVŚ_20,29.5a) asunvām indra saṃsadaṃ viṣūcīṃ vy anāśayaḥ /
analyzed: asunvām indra saṃsadam viṣūcīm vi anāśayaḥ

original: (AVŚ_20,29.5c) somapā uttaro bhavan //5//
analyzed: soma pāḥ uttaraḥ bhavan

original: (AVŚ_20,30.1a) pra te mahe vidathe śaṃsiṣaṃ harī pra te vanve vanuṣo haryataṃ madam /
analyzed: pra te mahe vidathe śaṃsiṣam harī pra te vanve vanuṣaḥ haryatam madam

original: (AVŚ_20,30.1c) ghṛtaṃ na yo haribhiś cāru secata ā tvā viśantu harivarpasaṃ giraḥ //1//
analyzed: ghṛtam na yaḥ haribhiḥ cāru secate ā tvā viśantu hari varpasam giraḥ

original: (AVŚ_20,30.2a) hariṃ hi yonim abhi ye samasvaran hinvanto harī divyaṃ yathā sadaḥ /
analyzed: harim hi yonim abhi ye samasvaran hinvantaḥ harī divyam yathā sadaḥ

original: (AVŚ_20,30.2c) ā yaṃ pṛṇanti haribhir na dhenava indrāya śūśaṃ harivantam arcata //2//
analyzed: ā yam pṛṇanti haribhiḥ na dhenavaḥ indrāya śūśam harivantam arcata

original: (AVŚ_20,30.3a) so asya vajro harito ya āyaso harir nikāmo harir ā gabhastyoḥ /
analyzed: saḥ asya vajraḥ haritaḥ yaḥ āyasaḥ hariḥ nikāmaḥ hariḥ ā gabhastyoḥ

original: (AVŚ_20,30.3c) dyumnī suśipro harimanyusāyaka indre ni rūpā haritā mimikṣire //3//
analyzed: dyumnī su śipraḥ harimanyusāyakaḥ indre ni rūpā haritā mimikṣire

original: (AVŚ_20,30.4a) divi na ketur adhi dhāyi haryato vivyacad vajro harito na raṃhyā /
analyzed: divi na ketuḥ adhi dhāyi haryataḥ vivyacat vajraḥ haritaḥ na raṃhyā

original: (AVŚ_20,30.4c) tudad ahiṃ hariśipro ya āyasaḥ sahasraśokā abhavad dharimbharaḥ //4//
analyzed: tudat ahim hari śipraḥ yaḥ āyasaḥ sahasraśokāḥ abhavat harimbharaḥ

original: (AVŚ_20,30.5a) tvaṃtvam aharyathā upastutaḥ pūrvebhir indra harikeśa yajvabhiḥ /
analyzed: tvam tvam aharyathāḥ upastutaḥ pūrvebhiḥ indra hari keśa yajvabhiḥ

original: (AVŚ_20,30.5c) tvaṃ haryasi tava viśvam ukthyam asāmi rādho harijāta haryatam //5//
analyzed: tvam haryasi tava viśvam ukthyam asāmi rādhaḥ hari jāta haryatam

original: (AVŚ_20,31.1a) tā vajriṇaṃ mandinaṃ stomyaṃ mada indraṃ rathe vahato haryatā harī /
analyzed: tā vajriṇam mandinam stomyam made indram rathe vahataḥ haryatā harī

original: (AVŚ_20,31.1c) purūṇy asmai savanāni haryata indrāya somā harayo dadhanvire //1//
analyzed: purūṇi asmai savanāni haryate indrāya somāḥ harayaḥ dadhanvire

original: (AVŚ_20,31.2a) araṃ kāmāya harayo dadhamire sthirāya hinvan harayo harī turā /
analyzed: aram kāmāya harayaḥ dadhamire sthirāya hinvan harayaḥ harī turā

original: (AVŚ_20,31.2c) arvadbhir yo haribhir joṣam īyate so asya kāmaṃ harivantam ānaśe //2//
analyzed: arvadbhiḥ yaḥ haribhiḥ joṣam īyate saḥ asya kāmam harivantam ānaśe

original: (AVŚ_20,31.3a) hariśmaśārur harikeśa āyasas turaspeye yo haripā avardhata /
analyzed: hari śmaśāruḥ hari keśaḥ āyasaḥ turaspeye yaḥ hari pāḥ avardhata

original: (AVŚ_20,31.3c) arvadbhir yo haribhir vājinīvasur ati viśvā duritā pāriṣad dharī //3//
analyzed: arvadbhiḥ yaḥ haribhiḥ vājinīvasuḥ ati viśvā duritā pāriṣat harī

original: (AVŚ_20,31.4a) śruveva yasya hariṇī vipetatuḥ śipre vājāya hariṇī davidhvataḥ /
analyzed: śruvā iva yasya hariṇī vipetatuḥ śipre vājāya hariṇī davidhvataḥ

original: (AVŚ_20,31.4c) pra yat kṛte camase marmṛjad dharī pītvā madasya haryatasyāndhasaḥ //4//
analyzed: pra yat kṛte camase marmṛjat harī pītvā madasya haryatasya andhasaḥ

original: (AVŚ_20,31.5a) uta sma sadna haryatasya pastyor atyo na vājaṃ harivāṃ acikradat /
analyzed: uta sma sadna haryatasya pastyoḥ atyaḥ na vājam harivān acikradat

original: (AVŚ_20,31.5c) mahī cid dhi dhiṣaṇāharyad ojasā bṛhad vayo dadhiṣe haryatas cid ā //5//
analyzed: mahī cit hi dhiṣaṇā a haryat ojasā bṛhat vayaḥ dadhiṣe haryataḥ cit ā

original: (AVŚ_20,32.1a) ā rodasī haryamāṇo mahitvā navyaṃnavyaṃ haryasi manma nu priyam /
analyzed: ā rodasī haryamāṇaḥ mahitvā navyam navyam haryasi manma nu priyam

original: (AVŚ_20,32.1c) pra pastyam asura haryataṃ gor āviṣ kṛdhi haraye sūryāya //1//
analyzed: pra pastyam asura haryatam goḥ āvis kṛdhi haraye sūryāya

original: (AVŚ_20,32.2a) ā tvā haryantaṃ prayujo janānāṃ rathe vahantu hariśipram indra /
analyzed: ā tvā haryantam prayujaḥ janānām rathe vahantu hari śipram indra

original: (AVŚ_20,32.2c) pibā yathā pratibhṛtasya madhvo haryan yajñaṃ sadhamāde daśoṇim //2//
analyzed: pibāḥ yathā pratibhṛtasya madhvaḥ haryan yajñam sadhamāde daśa ūṇim

original: (AVŚ_20,32.3a) apāḥ pūrveṣāṃ harivaḥ sutānām atho idaṃ savanaṃ kevalaṃ te /
analyzed: apāḥ pūrveṣām harivas sutānām atha u idam savanam kevalam te

original: (AVŚ_20,32.3c) mamaddhi somaṃ madhumantam indra satrā vṛṣaṃ jathara ā vṛṣasva //3//
analyzed: mamaddhi somam madhumantam indra satrā vṛṣam jathare ā vṛṣasva

original: (AVŚ_20,33.1a) apsu dhūtasya harivaḥ pibeha nṛbhiḥ sutasya jaṭharaṃ pṛṇasva /
analyzed: apsu dhūtasya harivas piba iha nṛbhiḥ sutasya jaṭharam pṛṇasva

original: (AVŚ_20,33.1c) mimikṣur yam adraya indra tubhyaṃ tebhir vardhasva madam ukthavāhaḥ //1//
analyzed: mimikṣuḥ yam adrayaḥ indra tubhyam tebhiḥ vardhasva madam uktha vāhaḥ

original: (AVŚ_20,33.2a) progrāṃ pītiṃ vṛṣṇa iyarmi satyāṃ prayai sutasya haryaśva tubhyam /
analyzed: pra ugrām pītim vṛṣṇe iyarmi satyām prayai sutasya hari aśva tubhyam

original: (AVŚ_20,33.2c) indra dhenābhir iha mādayasva dhībhir viśvābhiḥ śacyā gṛṇānaḥ //2//
analyzed: indra dhenābhiḥ iha mādayasva dhībhiḥ viśvābhiḥ śacyā gṛṇānaḥ

original: (AVŚ_20,33.3a) ūtī śacīvas tava vīryeṇa vayo dadhānā uśija ṛtajñāḥ /
analyzed: ūtī śacīvas tava vīryeṇa vayaḥ dadhānāḥ uśijaḥ ṛta jñāḥ

original: (AVŚ_20,33.3c) prajāvad indra maṃso duroṇe tasthur gṛṇantaḥ sadhamādyāsaḥ //3//
analyzed: prajāvat indra maṃsaḥ duroṇe tasthuḥ gṛṇantaḥ sadhamādyāsaḥ

original: (AVŚ_20,34.1a) yo jāta eva prathamo manasvān devo devān kratunā paryamūṣat /
analyzed: yaḥ jātaḥ eva prathamaḥ manasvān devaḥ devān kratunā paryamūṣat

original: (AVŚ_20,34.1c) yasya śuṣmād rodasī abhyasetāṃ nṛmṇasya mahnā sa janāsa indraḥ //1//
analyzed: yasya śuṣmāt rodasī abhyasetām nṛmṇasya mahnā sa janāsaḥ indraḥ

original: (AVŚ_20,34.2a) yaḥ pṛthivīṃ vyathamānām adṛṃhad yaḥ parvatān prakupitāṃ aramṇāt /
analyzed: yaḥ pṛthivīm vyathamānām adṛṃhat yaḥ parvatān prakupitām aramṇāt

original: (AVŚ_20,34.2c) yo antarikṣaṃ vimame varīyo yo dyām astabhnāt sa janāsa indraḥ //2//
analyzed: yaḥ antarikṣam vimame varīyaḥ yaḥ dyām astabhnāt sa janāsaḥ indraḥ

original: (AVŚ_20,34.3a) yo hatvāhim ariṇāt sapta sindhūn yo gā udājad apadhā valasya /
analyzed: yaḥ hatvā ahim ariṇāt sapta sindhūn yaḥ gāḥ udājat apadhā valasya

original: (AVŚ_20,34.3c) yo aśmanor antar agniṃ jajāna saṃvṛk samatsu sa janāsa indraḥ //3//
analyzed: yaḥ aśmanoḥ antar agnim jajāna saṃvṛj samatsu sa janāsaḥ indraḥ

original: (AVŚ_20,34.4a) yenemā viśvā cyavanā kṛtāni yo dāsaṃ varṇam adharaṃ guhākaḥ /
analyzed: yena imā viśvā cyavanā kṛtāni yaḥ dāsam varṇam adharam guhā akaḥ

original: (AVŚ_20,34.4c) śvaghnīva yo jigīvāṃ lakṣam ādad aryaḥ puṣṭāni sa janāsa indraḥ //4//
analyzed: śvaghnī iva yaḥ jigīvām lakṣam ādat aryaḥ puṣṭāni sa janāsaḥ indraḥ

original: (AVŚ_20,34.5a) yaṃ smā pṛchanti kuha seti ghoram utem āhur naiṣo astīty enam /
analyzed: yam sma pṛcchanti kuha sa iti ghoram uta īm āhuḥ na eṣaḥ asti iti enam

original: (AVŚ_20,34.5c) so aryaḥ puṣṭīr vija ivā mināti śrad asmai dhatta sa janāsa indraḥ //5//
analyzed: saḥ aryaḥ puṣṭīḥ vijaḥ iva ā mināti śrath asmai dhatta sa janāsaḥ indraḥ

original: (AVŚ_20,34.6a) yo radhrasya coditā yaḥ kṛśasya yo brahmaṇo nādhamānasya kīreḥ /
analyzed: yaḥ radhrasya coditā yaḥ kṛśasya yaḥ brahmaṇaḥ nādhamānasya kīreḥ

original: (AVŚ_20,34.6c) yuktagrāvṇo yo 'vitā suśipraḥ sutasomasya sa janāsa indraḥ //6//
analyzed: yukta grāvṇaḥ yaḥ vitā su śipraḥ suta somasya sa janāsaḥ indraḥ

original: (AVŚ_20,34.7a) yasyāśvāsaḥ pradiśi yasya gāvo yasya grāmā yasya viśve rathāsaḥ /
analyzed: yasya aśvāsaḥ pradiśi yasya gāvaḥ yasya grāmāḥ yasya viśve rathāsaḥ

original: (AVŚ_20,34.7c) yaḥ sūryaṃ ya uṣasaṃ jajāna yo apāṃ netā sa janāsa indraḥ //7//
analyzed: yaḥ sūryam yaḥ uṣasam jajāna yaḥ apām netā sa janāsaḥ indraḥ

original: (AVŚ_20,34.8a) yaṃ krandasī saṃyatī vihvayete pare 'vare ubhayā amitrāḥ /
analyzed: yam krandasī saṃyatī vihvayete pare vare ubhayāḥ amitrāḥ

original: (AVŚ_20,34.8c) samānaṃ cid ratham ātasthivāṃsā nānā havete sa janāsa indraḥ //8//
analyzed: samānam cit ratham ātasthivāṃsā nānā havete sa janāsaḥ indraḥ

original: (AVŚ_20,34.9a) yasmān na ṛte vijayante janāso yaṃ yudhyamānā avase havante /
analyzed: yasmāt na ṛte vijayante janāsaḥ yam yudhyamānāḥ avase havante

original: (AVŚ_20,34.9c) yo viśvasya pratimānaṃ babhūva yo acyutacyut sa janāsa indraḥ //9//
analyzed: yaḥ viśvasya pratimānam babhūva yaḥ a cyuta cyut sa janāsaḥ indraḥ

original: (AVŚ_20,34.10a) yaḥ śasvato mahy eno dadhānān amanyamānāṃ charvā jaghāna /
analyzed: yaḥ śasvataḥ mahi enaḥ dadhānān a manyamānām śarvā jaghāna

original: (AVŚ_20,34.10c) yaḥ śardhate nānudadāti śṛdhyāṃ yo dasyor hantā sa janāsa indraḥ //10//
analyzed: yaḥ śardhate na anudadāti śṛdhyām yaḥ dasyoḥ hantā sa janāsaḥ indraḥ

original: (AVŚ_20,34.11a) yaḥ śambharaṃ parvateṣu kṣiyantaṃ catvāriṃśyāṃ śarady anvavindat /
analyzed: yaḥ śambharam parvateṣu kṣiyantam catvāriṃśyām śaradi anvavindat

original: (AVŚ_20,34.11c) ojāyamānaṃ yo ahiṃ jaghāna dānuṃ śayānaṃ sa janāsa indraḥ //11//
analyzed: ojāyamānam yaḥ ahim jaghāna dānum śayānam sa janāsaḥ indraḥ

original: (AVŚ_20,34.12a) yaḥ śambharaṃ paryatarat kasībhir yo 'cārukāsnāpibat sutasya /
analyzed: yaḥ śambharam paryatarat kasībhiḥ yaḥ cāru kāsnā apibat sutasya

original: (AVŚ_20,34.12c) antar girau yajamānaṃ bahuṃ janaṃ yasminn āmūrchat sa janāsa indraḥ //12//
analyzed: antar girau yajamānam bahum janam yasmin ā amūrchat sa janāsaḥ indraḥ

original: (AVŚ_20,34.13a) yaḥ saptaraśmir vṛṣabhas tuviṣmān avāsṛjat sartave sapta sindhūn /
analyzed: yaḥ sapta raśmiḥ vṛṣabhaḥ tuviṣmān avāsṛjat sartave sapta sindhūn

original: (AVŚ_20,34.13c) yo rauhiṇam asphurad vajrabāhur dyām ārohantaṃ sa janāsa indraḥ //13//
analyzed: yaḥ rauhiṇam asphurat vajra bāhuḥ dyām ārohantam sa janāsaḥ indraḥ

original: (AVŚ_20,34.14a) dyāvā cid asmai pṛthivī mamete śuṣmāc cid asya parvatā bhayante /
analyzed: dyāvā cit asmai pṛthivī mama ete śuṣmāt cit asya parvatāḥ bhayante

original: (AVŚ_20,34.14c) yaḥ somapā nicito vajrabāhur yo vajrahastaḥ sa janāsa indraḥ //14//
analyzed: yaḥ soma pāḥ nicitaḥ vajra bāhuḥ yaḥ vajra hastaḥ sa janāsaḥ indraḥ

original: (AVŚ_20,34.15a) yaḥ sunvantam avati yaḥ pacantaṃ yaḥ śaṃsantaṃ yaḥ śaśamānam ūtī /
analyzed: yaḥ sunvantam avati yaḥ pacantam yaḥ śaṃsantam yaḥ śaśamānam ūtī

original: (AVŚ_20,34.15c) yasya brahma vardhanaṃ yasya somo yasyedaṃ rādhaḥ sa janāsa indraḥ //15//
analyzed: yasya brahma vardhanam yasya somaḥ yasya idam rādhaḥ sa janāsaḥ indraḥ

original: (AVŚ_20,34.16a) jāto vy akhyat pitror upasthe bhuvo na veda janituḥ parasya /
analyzed: jātaḥ vi akhyat pitroḥ upasthe bhuvaḥ na veda janituḥ parasya

original: (AVŚ_20,34.16c) staviṣyamāṇo no yo asmad vratā devānāṃ sa janāsa indraḥ //16//
analyzed: staviṣyamāṇaḥ naḥ yaḥ asmat vratā devānām sa janāsaḥ indraḥ

original: (AVŚ_20,34.17a) yaḥ somakāmo haryaśvaḥ sūrir yasmād rejante bhuvanāni viśvā /
analyzed: yaḥ soma kāmaḥ hari aśvaḥ sūriḥ yasmāt rejante bhuvanāni viśvā

original: (AVŚ_20,34.17c) yo jaghāna śambaraṃ yaś ca śuṣṇaṃ ya ekavīraḥ sa janāsa indraḥ //17//
analyzed: yaḥ jaghāna śambaram yaḥ ca śuṣṇam yaḥ eka vīraḥ sa janāsaḥ indraḥ

original: (AVŚ_20,34.18a) yaḥ sunvate pacate dudhra ā cid vājaṃ dardarṣi sa kilāsi satyaḥ /
analyzed: yaḥ sunvate pacate dudhraḥ ā cit vājam dardarṣi sa kila asi satyaḥ

original: (AVŚ_20,34.18c) vayaṃ ta indra viśvaha priyāsaḥ suvīrāso vidatham ā vadema //18//
analyzed: vayam te indra viśvaha priyāsaḥ su vīrāsaḥ vidatham ā vadema

original: (AVŚ_20,35.1a) asmā id u pra tavase turāya prayo na harmi stomaṃ māhināya /
analyzed: asmai id u pra tavase turāya prayaḥ na harmi stomam māhināya

original: (AVŚ_20,35.1c) ṛcīṣamāyādhrigava oham indrāya brahmāṇi rātatamā //1//
analyzed: ṛcīṣamāya adhrigave oham indrāya brahmāṇi rātatamā

original: (AVŚ_20,35.2a) asmā id u praya iva pra yaṃsi bharāmy āngūṣaṃ bādhe suvṛkti /
analyzed: asmai id u prayaḥ iva pra yaṃsi bharāmi āngūṣam bādhe suvṛkti

original: (AVŚ_20,35.2c) indrāya hṛdā manasā manīṣā pratnāya patye dhiyo marjayanta //2//
analyzed: indrāya hṛdā manasā manīṣā pratnāya patye dhiyaḥ marjayanta

original: (AVŚ_20,35.3a) asmā id u tyam upamaṃ svarṣāṃ bharāmy āṅgūṣam āsyena /
analyzed: asmai id u tyam upamam svarṣām bharāmi āṅgūṣam āsyena

original: (AVŚ_20,35.3c) maṃhiṣṭham achoktibhir matīnāṃ suvṛktibhiḥ sūriṃ vāvṛdhadhyai //3//
analyzed: maṃhiṣṭham achoktibhiḥ matīnām suvṛktibhiḥ sūrim vāvṛdhadhyai

original: (AVŚ_20,35.4a) asmā id u stomaṃ saṃ hinomi rathaṃ na taṣṭeva tatsināya /
analyzed: asmai id u stomam sam hinomi ratham na taṣṭā iva tatsināya

original: (AVŚ_20,35.4c) giraś ca girvāhase suvṛktīndrāya viśvaminvaṃ medhirāya //4//
analyzed: giraḥ ca gir vāhase suvṛktī indrāya viśvaminvam medhirāya

original: (AVŚ_20,35.5a) asmā id u saptim iva śravasyendrāyārkaṃ juhvā sam añje /
analyzed: asmai id u saptim iva śravasyā indrāya arkam juhvā sam añje

original: (AVŚ_20,35.5c) vīram dānaukasaṃ vandadhyai purāṃ gūrtaśravasaṃ darmāṇam //5//
analyzed: vīram dānaukasam vandadhyai purām gūrta śravasam darmāṇam

original: (AVŚ_20,35.6a) asmā id u tvaṣṭā takṣad vajraṃ svapastamaṃ svaryaṃ raṇāya /
analyzed: asmai id u tvaṣṭā takṣat vajram su apastamam svaryam raṇāya

original: (AVŚ_20,35.6c) vṛtrasya cid vidad yena marma tujann īśānas tujatā kiyedhāḥ //6//
analyzed: vṛtrasya cit vidat yena marma tujan īśānaḥ tujatā kiyedhāḥ

original: (AVŚ_20,35.7a) asyed u mātuḥ savaneṣu sadyo mahaḥ pituṃ papivāṃ cārv annā /
analyzed: asya id u mātuḥ savaneṣu sadyas mahaḥ pitum papivān cārū annā

original: (AVŚ_20,35.7c) muṣāyad viṣṇuḥ pacataṃ sahīyān vidhyad varāhaṃ tiro adrim astā //7//
analyzed: muṣāyat viṣṇuḥ pacatam sahīyān vidhyat varāham tiras adrim astā

original: (AVŚ_20,35.8a) asmā id u gnāś cid devapatnīr indrāyārkam ahihatya ūvuḥ /
analyzed: asmai id u gnāḥ cit deva patnīḥ indrāya arkam ahi hatye ūvuḥ

original: (AVŚ_20,35.8c) pari dyāvāpṛthivī jabhra urvī nāsya te mahimānaṃ pari ṣṭaḥ //8//
analyzed: pari dyāvāpṛthivī jabhre urvī na asya te mahimānam pari staḥ

original: (AVŚ_20,35.9a) asyed eva pra ririce mahitvaṃ divas pṛthivyāḥ pary antarikṣāt /
analyzed: asya id eva pra ririce mahi tvam divaḥ pṛthivyāḥ pari antarikṣāt

original: (AVŚ_20,35.9c) svarāl indro dama ā viśvagūrtaḥ svarir amatro vavakṣe raṇāya //9//
analyzed: svarāj indraḥ dame ā viśva gūrtaḥ svariḥ amatraḥ vavakṣe raṇāya

original: (AVŚ_20,35.10a) asyed eva śavasā śuśantaṃ vi vṛścad vajreṇa vṛtram indraḥ /
analyzed: asya id eva śavasā śuśantam vi vṛścat vajreṇa vṛtram indraḥ

original: (AVŚ_20,35.10c) gā na vrāṇā avanīr amuñcad abhi śravo dāvane sacetāḥ //10//
analyzed: gāḥ na vrāṇāḥ avanīḥ amuñcat abhi śravaḥ dāvane sacetāḥ

original: (AVŚ_20,35.11a) asyed u tveṣasā ranta sindhavaḥ pari yad vajreṇa sīm ayachat /
analyzed: asya id u tveṣasā ranta sindhavaḥ pari yat vajreṇa sīm ayacchat

original: (AVŚ_20,35.11c) īśānakṛd dāśuṣe daśasyan turvītaye gādhaṃ turvaṇiḥ kaḥ //11//
analyzed: īśāna kṛt dāśuṣe daśasyan turvītaye gādham turvaṇiḥ kaḥ

original: (AVŚ_20,35.12a) asmā id u pra bharā tūtujāno vṛtrāya vajram īśānaḥ kiyedhāḥ /
analyzed: asmai id u pra bhara tūtujānaḥ vṛtrāya vajram īśānaḥ kiyedhāḥ

original: (AVŚ_20,35.12c) gor na parva vi radā tiraśceṣyann arṇāṃsy apāṃ caradhyai //12//
analyzed: goḥ na parva vi rada tiras ca iṣyan arṇāṃsi apām caradhyai

original: (AVŚ_20,35.13a) asyed u pra brūhi pūrvyāṇi turasya karmāṇi navya ukthaiḥ /
analyzed: asya id u pra brūhi pūrvyāṇi turasya karmāṇi navyaḥ ukthaiḥ

original: (AVŚ_20,35.13c) yudhe yad iṣṇāna āyudhāny ṛghāyamāṇo niriṇāti śatrūn //13//
analyzed: yudhe yat iṣṇānaḥ āyudhāni ṛghāyamāṇaḥ niriṇāti śatrūn

original: (AVŚ_20,35.14a) asyed u bhiyā girayaś ca dṛlhā dyāvā ca bhūmā januṣas tujete /
analyzed: asya id u bhiyā girayaḥ ca dṛlhāḥ dyāvā ca bhūmā januṣaḥ tujete

original: (AVŚ_20,35.14c) upo venasya joguvāna oṇiṃ sadyo bhuvad vīryāya nodhāḥ //14//
analyzed: upa u venasya joguvānaḥ oṇim sadyas bhuvat vīryāya nodhāḥ

original: (AVŚ_20,35.15a) asmā id u tyad anu dāyy eṣām eko yad vavne bhūrer īśānaḥ /
analyzed: asmai id u tyad anu dāyi eṣām ekaḥ yat vavne bhūreḥ īśānaḥ

original: (AVŚ_20,35.15c) praitaśaṃ sūrye paspṛdhānaṃ sauvaśvye suṣvim āvad indraḥ //15//
analyzed: pra etaśam sūrye paspṛdhānam sauvaśvye suṣvim āvat indraḥ

original: (AVŚ_20,35.16a) evā te hāriyojanā suvṛktīndra brahmāṇi gotamāso akran /
analyzed: eva te hāriyojana suvṛktī indra brahmāṇi gotamāsaḥ akran

original: (AVŚ_20,35.16c) aiṣu viśvapeśasaṃ dhiyaṃ dhāḥ prātar makṣū dhiyāvasur jagamyāt //16//
analyzed: ā eṣu viśva peśasam dhiyam dhāḥ prātar makṣū dhiyāvasuḥ jagamyāt

original: (AVŚ_20,36.1a) ya eka id dhavyaś carṣaṇīnām indraṃ taṃ gīrbhir abhy arca ābhiḥ /
analyzed: yaḥ ekaḥ id havyaḥ carṣaṇīnām indram tam gīrbhiḥ abhī arce ābhiḥ

original: (AVŚ_20,36.1c) yaḥ patyate vṛṣabho vṛṣṇyāvānt satyaḥ satvā purumāyaḥ sahasvān //1//
analyzed: yaḥ patyate vṛṣabhaḥ vṛṣṇyāvān satyaḥ satvā puru māyaḥ sahasvān

original: (AVŚ_20,36.2a) tam u naḥ pūrve pitaro navagvāḥ sapta viprāso abhi vājayantaḥ /
analyzed: tam u naḥ pūrve pitaraḥ navagvāḥ sapta viprāsaḥ abhi vājayantaḥ

original: (AVŚ_20,36.2c) nakṣaddābhaṃ taturiṃ parvateṣṭhām adroghavācaṃ matibhiḥ śaviṣṭham //2//
analyzed: nakṣat dābham taturim parvateṣṭhām adrogha vācam matibhiḥ śaviṣṭham

original: (AVŚ_20,36.3a) tam īmahe indram asya rāyaḥ puruvīrasya nṛvataḥ purukṣoḥ /
analyzed: tam īmahe indram asya rāyaḥ puru vīrasya nṛvataḥ purukṣoḥ

original: (AVŚ_20,36.3c) yo aṣkṛdhoyur ajaraḥ svarvān tam ā bhara harivo mādayadhyai //3//
analyzed: yaḥ aṣkṛdhoyuḥ ajaraḥ svarvān tam ā bhara harivas mādayadhyai

original: (AVŚ_20,36.4a) tan no vi voco yadi te purā cij jaritāra ānaśuḥ sumnam indra /
analyzed: tat naḥ vi vocaḥ yadi te purā cit jaritāraḥ ānaśuḥ sumnam indra

original: (AVŚ_20,36.4c) kas te bhāgaḥ kiṃ vayo dudhra khiduḥ puruhūta purūvaso 'suraghnaḥ //4//
analyzed: kaḥ te bhāgaḥ kim vayaḥ dudhra khiduḥ puruhūta purūvaso sura ghnaḥ

original: (AVŚ_20,36.5a) taṃ pṛchantī vajrahastaṃ ratheṣṭhām indraṃ vepī vakvarī yasya nū gīḥ /
analyzed: tam pṛcchantī vajrahastam ratheṣṭhām indram vepī vakvarī yasya nu gīḥ

original: (AVŚ_20,36.5c) tuvigrābhaṃ tuvikūrmiṃ rabhodāṃ gātum iṣe nakṣate tumram acha //5//
analyzed: tuvi grābham tuvikūrmim rabhaḥ dām gātum iṣe nakṣate tumram acha

original: (AVŚ_20,36.6a) ayā ha tyaṃ māyayā vāvṛdhānaṃ manojuvā svatavaḥ parvatena /
analyzed: ayā ha tyam māyayā vāvṛdhānam manaḥ juvā svatavaḥ parvatena

original: (AVŚ_20,36.6c) acyutā cid vīlitā svojo rujo vi dṛlhā dhṛṣatā virapśin //6//
analyzed: acyutā cit vīlitā su ojaḥ rujaḥ vi dṛlhā dhṛṣatā virapśin

original: (AVŚ_20,36.7a) tam vo dhiyā navyasyā śaviṣṭham pratnaṃ pratnavat paritaṃsayadhyai /
analyzed: tam vaḥ dhiyā navyasyā śaviṣṭham pratnam pratna vat paritaṃsayadhyai

original: (AVŚ_20,36.7c) sa no vakṣad animānaḥ suvahnendro viśvāny ati durgahāṇi //7//
analyzed: sa naḥ vakṣat animānaḥ su vahnā indraḥ viśvāni ati durgahāṇi

original: (AVŚ_20,36.8a) ā janāya druhvaṇe pārthivāni divyāni dīpayo 'ntarikṣā /
analyzed: ā janāya druhvaṇe pārthivāni divyāni dīpayaḥ ntarikṣā

original: (AVŚ_20,36.8c) tapā vṛṣan viśvataḥ śociṣā tān brahmadviṣe śocaya kṣām apaś ca //8//
analyzed: tapa vṛṣan viśvatas śociṣā tān brahma dviṣe śocaya kṣām apaḥ ca

original: (AVŚ_20,36.9a) bhuvo janasya divyasya rājā pārthivasya jagatas tveṣasaṃdṛk /
analyzed: bhuvaḥ janasya divyasya rājā pārthivasya jagataḥ tveṣa saṃdṛś

original: (AVŚ_20,36.9c) dhiṣva vajraṃ dakṣiṇa indra haste viśvā ajurya dayase vi māyāḥ //9//
analyzed: dhiṣva vajram dakṣiṇe indra haste viśvāḥ ajurya dayase vi māyāḥ

original: (AVŚ_20,36.10a) ā saṃyatam indra ṇaḥ svastiṃ śatrutūryāya bṛhatīm amṛdhrām /
analyzed: ā saṃyatam indra naḥ svastim śatru tūryāya bṛhatīm amṛdhrām

original: (AVŚ_20,36.10c) yayā dāsāny āryāṇi vṛtrā karo vajrint sutukā nāhuṣāṇi //10//
analyzed: yayā dāsāni āryāṇi vṛtrā karaḥ vajrin sutukā nāhuṣāṇi

original: (AVŚ_20,36.11a) sa no niyudbhiḥ puruhūta vedho viśvavārābhir ā gahi prayajyo /
analyzed: sa naḥ niyudbhiḥ puruhūta vedhaḥ viśva vārābhiḥ ā gahi prayajyo

original: (AVŚ_20,36.11c) na yā adevo varate na deva ābhir yāhi tūyam ā madryadrik //11//
analyzed: na yāḥ adevaḥ varate na devaḥ ābhiḥ yāhi tūyam ā madryadrik

original: (AVŚ_20,37.1a) yas tigmaśṛṅgo vṛṣabho na bhīmaḥ ekaḥ kṛṣṭīś cyavayati pra viśvāḥ /
analyzed: yaḥ tigma śṛṅgaḥ vṛṣabhaḥ na bhīmaḥ ekaḥ kṛṣṭīḥ cyavayati pra viśvāḥ

original: (AVŚ_20,37.1c) yaḥ śaśvato adāśuṣo gayasya prayantāsi suṣvitarāya vedaḥ //1//
analyzed: yaḥ śaśvataḥ a dāśuṣaḥ gayasya prayantāsi suṣvitarāya vedaḥ

original: (AVŚ_20,37.2a) tvaṃ ha tyad indra kutsam āvaḥ śuśrūṣamāṇas tanvā samarye /
analyzed: tvam ha tyad indra kutsam āvaḥ śuśrūṣamāṇaḥ tanvā samarye

original: (AVŚ_20,37.2c) dāsaṃ yac śuṣṇam kuyavaṃ ny asmā arandhaya ārjuneyāya śikṣan //2//
analyzed: dāsam yat śuṣṇam kuyavam ni asmai arandhayaḥ ārjuneyāya śikṣan

original: (AVŚ_20,37.3a) tvaṃ dhṛṣṇo dhṛṣatā vītahavyaṃ prāvo viśvābhir ūtibhiḥ sudāsam /
analyzed: tvam dhṛṣṇo dhṛṣatā vītahavyam prāvaḥ viśvābhiḥ ūtibhiḥ sudāsam

original: (AVŚ_20,37.3c) pra paurukutsiṃ trasadasyum āvaḥ kṣetrasātā vṛtrahatyeṣu pūrum //3//
analyzed: pra paurukutsim trasadasyum āvaḥ kṣetra sātā vṛtra hatyeṣu pūrum

original: (AVŚ_20,37.4a) tvaṃ nṛbhir nṛmaṇo devavītau bhūrīṇi vṛtrā haryaśva haṃsi /
analyzed: tvam nṛbhiḥ nṛmaṇaḥ deva vītau bhūrīṇi vṛtrā haryaśva haṃsi

original: (AVŚ_20,37.4c) tvaṃ ni dasyuṃ cumuriṃ dhuniṃ cāsvāpayo dabhītaye suhantu //4//
analyzed: tvam ni dasyum cumurim dhunim ca asvāpayaḥ dabhītaye su hantu

original: (AVŚ_20,37.5a) tava cyautnāni vajrahasta tāni nava yat puro navatiṃ ca sadyaḥ /
analyzed: tava cyautnāni vajrahasta tāni nava yat puras navatim ca sadyas

original: (AVŚ_20,37.5c) niveśane śatatamāviveṣīr ahaṃ ca vṛtraṃ namucim utāhan //5//
analyzed: niveśane śatatama aviveṣīḥ aham ca vṛtram namucim uta ahan

original: (AVŚ_20,37.6a) sanā tā ta indra bhojanāni rātahavyāya dāśuṣe sudāse /
analyzed: sanā tā te indra bhojanāni rāta havyāya dāśuṣe sudāse

original: (AVŚ_20,37.6c) vṛṣṇe te harī vṛṣaṇā yunajmi vyantu brahmāṇi puruśāka vājam //6//
analyzed: vṛṣṇe te harī vṛṣaṇā yunajmi vyantu brahmāṇi puruśāka vājam

original: (AVŚ_20,37.7a) mā te asyāṃ sahasāvan pariṣṭāv aghāya bhūma harivaḥ parādau /
analyzed: mā te asyām sahasāvan pariṣṭau aghāya bhūma harivas parādau

original: (AVŚ_20,37.7c) trāyasva no 'vṛkebhir varūthais tava priyāsaḥ sūriṣu syāma //7//
analyzed: trāyasva naḥ vṛkebhiḥ varūthaiḥ tava priyāsaḥ sūriṣu syāma

original: (AVŚ_20,37.8a) priyāsa it te maghavann abhiṣṭau naro madema śaraṇe sakhāyaḥ /
analyzed: priyāsaḥ id te maghavan abhiṣṭau naraḥ madema śaraṇe sakhāyaḥ

original: (AVŚ_20,37.8c) ni turvaśaṃ ni yādvaṃ śiśīhy atithigvāya śaṃsyaṃ kariṣyan //8//
analyzed: ni turvaśam ni yādvam śiśīhi atithigvāya śaṃsyam kariṣyan

original: (AVŚ_20,37.9a) sadyaś cin nu te maghavann abhiṣṭau naraḥ śaṃsanty ukthaśāsa ukthā /
analyzed: sadyas cit nu te maghavan abhiṣṭau naraḥ śaṃsanti uktha śāsaḥ ukthā

original: (AVŚ_20,37.9c) ye te havebhir vi paṇīṃr adāśann asmān vṛṇīṣva yujyāya tasmai //9//
analyzed: ye te havebhiḥ vi paṇīṃr adāśan asmān vṛṇīṣva yujyāya tasmai

original: (AVŚ_20,37.10a) ete stomā narāṃ nṛtama tubhyam asmadryañco dadato maghāni /
analyzed: ete stomāḥ narām nṛtama tubhyam asmadryañcaḥ dadataḥ maghāni

original: (AVŚ_20,37.10c) teṣām indra vṛtrahatye śivo bhūḥ sakhā ca śūro 'vitā ca nṛṇām //10//
analyzed: teṣām indra vṛtra hatye śivaḥ bhūḥ sakhā ca śūraḥ vitā ca nṛṇām

original: (AVŚ_20,37.11a) nū indra śūra stavamāna ūtī brahmajūtas tanvā vāvṛdhasva /
analyzed: nu indra śūra stavamānaḥ ūtī brahma jūtaḥ tanvā vāvṛdhasva

original: (AVŚ_20,37.11c) upa no vājān mimīhy upa stīn yuyaṃ pāta svastibhiḥ sadā naḥ //11//
analyzed: upa naḥ vājān mimīhi upa stīn yuyam pāta svastibhiḥ sadā naḥ

original: (AVŚ_20,38.1a) ā yāhi suṣumā hi ta indra somaṃ pibā imam /
analyzed: ā yāhi suṣuma hi te indra somam pibā imam

original: (AVŚ_20,38.1c) edaṃ barhiḥ sado mama //1//
analyzed: ā idam barhiḥ sadaḥ mama

original: (AVŚ_20,38.2a) ā tvā brahmayujā harī vahatām indra keśinā /
analyzed: ā tvā brahma yujā harī vahatām indra keśinā

original: (AVŚ_20,38.2c) upa brahmāṇi naḥ śṛṇu //2//
analyzed: upa brahmāṇi naḥ śṛṇu

original: (AVŚ_20,38.3a) brahmāṇas tvā vayaṃ yujā somapām indra sominaḥ /
analyzed: brahmāṇaḥ tvā vayam yujā soma pām indra sominaḥ

original: (AVŚ_20,38.3c) sutāvanto havāmahe //3//
analyzed: sutāvantaḥ havāmahe

original: (AVŚ_20,38.4a) indram id gāthino bṛhad indram arkebhir arkiṇaḥ /
analyzed: indram id gāthinaḥ bṛhat indram arkebhiḥ arkiṇaḥ

original: (AVŚ_20,38.4c) indraṃ vāṇīr anūṣata //4//
analyzed: indram vāṇīḥ anūṣata

original: (AVŚ_20,38.5a) indra id dharyoḥ sacā saṃmiśla ā vacoyujā /
analyzed: indraḥ id haryoḥ sacā saṃmiślaḥ ā vacaḥ yujā

original: (AVŚ_20,38.5c) indro vajrī hiraṇyayaḥ //5//
analyzed: indraḥ vajrī hiraṇyayaḥ

original: (AVŚ_20,38.6a) indro dīrghāya cakṣasa ā sūryaṃ rohayad divi /
analyzed: indraḥ dīrghāya cakṣase ā sūryam rohayat divi

original: (AVŚ_20,38.6c) vi gobhir adrim airayat //6//
analyzed: vi gobhiḥ adrim airayat

original: (AVŚ_20,39.1a) indraṃ vo viśvatas pari havāmahe janebhyaḥ /
analyzed: indram vaḥ viśvatas pari havāmahe janebhyaḥ

original: (AVŚ_20,39.1c) asmākam astu kevalaḥ //1//
analyzed: asmākam astu kevalaḥ

original: (AVŚ_20,39.2a) vy antarikṣam atiran made somasya rocanā /
analyzed: vi antarikṣam atirat made somasya rocanā

original: (AVŚ_20,39.2c) indro yad abhinad valam //2//
analyzed: indraḥ yat abhinat valam

original: (AVŚ_20,39.3a) ud gā ājad aṅgirobhya āviṣ kṛṇvan guhā satīḥ /
analyzed: ud gāḥ ājat aṅgirobhyaḥ āvis kṛṇvan guhā satīḥ

original: (AVŚ_20,39.3c) arvāñcaṃ nunude valam //3//
analyzed: arvāñcam nunude valam

original: (AVŚ_20,62.1c) vāje citraṃ havāmahe //1//
analyzed: vāje citram havāmahe

original: (AVŚ_20,62.2a) upa tvā karmann ūtaye sa no yuvograś cakrāma yo dhṛṣat /
analyzed: upa tvā karman ūtaye sa naḥ yuvā ugraḥ cakrāma yaḥ dhṛṣat

original: (AVŚ_20,62.2c) tvām id dhy avitāraṃ vavṛmahe sakhāya indra sānasim //2//

original: (AVŚ_20,62.3a) yo na idamidaṃ purā pra vasya ānināya tam u va stuṣe /

analyzed: haryaśvam satpatim carṣaṇīsaham sa hi sma yaḥ amandata

original: (AVŚ_20,62.4c) ā tu naḥ sa vayati gavyam aśvyaṃ stotṛbhyo maghavā śatam //4//

original: (AVŚ_20,62.5a) indrāya sāma gāyata viprāya bṛhate bṛhat /

original: (AVŚ_20,87.7a) bṛhaspate yuvam indraś ca vasvo divyasyeśāthe uta pārthivasya /
analyzed: bṛhaspate yuvam indraḥ ca vasvaḥ divyasya īśāthe uta pārthivasya

original: (AVŚ_20,87.7c) dhattaṃ rayiṃ stuvate kīraye cid yūyaṃ pāta svastibhiḥ sadā naḥ //7//
analyzed: dhattam rayim stuvate kīraye cit yūyam pāta svastibhiḥ sadā naḥ

original: (AVŚ_20,88.1a) yas tastambha sahasā vi jmo antān bṛhaspatis triṣadhastho raveṇa /
analyzed: yaḥ tastambha sahasā vi jmaḥ antān bṛhaspatiḥ triṣadhasthaḥ raveṇa

original: (AVŚ_20,88.1c) taṃ pratnāsa ṛṣayo dīdhyānāḥ puro viprā dadhire mandrajihvam //1//
analyzed: tam pratnāsaḥ ṛṣayaḥ dīdhyānāḥ puras viprāḥ dadhire mandra jihvam

original: (AVŚ_20,88.2a) dhunetayaḥ supraketaṃ madanto bṛhaspate abhi ye nas tatasre /
analyzed: dhunetayaḥ su praketam madantaḥ bṛhaspate abhi ye naḥ tatasre

original: (AVŚ_20,88.2c) pṛṣantaṃ sṛpram adabdham ūrvaṃ bṛhaspate rakṣatād asya yonim //2//
analyzed: pṛṣantam sṛpram adabdham ūrvam bṛhaspate rakṣatāt asya yonim

original: (AVŚ_20,88.3a) bṛhaspate yā paramā parāvad ata ā te ṛtaspṛśo ni ṣeduḥ /
analyzed: bṛhaspate yā paramā parāvat atas ā te ṛta spṛśaḥ ni seduḥ

original: (AVŚ_20,88.3c) tubhyaṃ khātā avatā adridugdhā madhva ścotanty abhito virapśam //3//
analyzed: tubhyam khātāḥ avatāḥ adri dugdhāḥ madhvaḥ ścotanti abhitas virapśam

original: (AVŚ_20,88.4a) bṛhaspatiḥ prathamaṃ jāyamāno maho jyotiṣaḥ parame vyoman /
analyzed: bṛhaspatiḥ prathamam jāyamānaḥ mahaḥ jyotiṣaḥ parame vyoman

original: (AVŚ_20,88.4c) saptāsyas tuvijāto raveṇa vi saptaraśmir adhamat tamāṃsi //4//
analyzed: sapta āsyaḥ tuvi jātaḥ raveṇa vi sapta raśmiḥ adhamat tamāṃsi

original: (AVŚ_20,88.5a) sa suṣṭubhā sa ṛkvatā gaṇena valaṃ ruroja phaligaṃ ravena /
analyzed: sa suṣṭubhā saḥ ṛkvatā gaṇena valam ruroja phaligam ravena

original: (AVŚ_20,88.5c) bṛhaspatir usriyā havyasūdaḥ kanikradad vāvaśatīr ud ājat //5//
analyzed: bṛhaspatiḥ usriyāḥ havyasūdaḥ kanikradat vāvaśatīḥ ud ājat

original: (AVŚ_20,88.6a) evā pitre viśvadevāya vṛṣṇe yajñair vidhema namasā havirbhiḥ /
analyzed: eva pitre viśva devāya vṛṣṇe yajñaiḥ vidhema namasā havirbhiḥ

original: (AVŚ_20,88.6c) bṛhaspate suprajā vīravanto vayaṃ syāma patayo rayīṇām //6//
analyzed: bṛhaspate su prajāḥ vīravantaḥ vayam syāma patayaḥ rayīṇām

original: (AVŚ_20,89.1a) asteva su prataraṃ lāyam asyan bhūṣann iva pra bharā stomam asmai /
analyzed: astā iva su prataram lāyam asyan bhūṣan iva pra bhara stomam asmai

original: (AVŚ_20,89.1c) vācā viprās tarata vācam aryo ni rāmaya jaritaḥ soma indram //1//
analyzed: vācā viprāḥ tarata vācam aryaḥ ni rāmaya jaritar some indram

original: (AVŚ_20,89.2a) dohena gām upa śikṣā sakhāyaṃ pra bodhaya jaritar jāram indram /
analyzed: dohena gām upa śikṣa sakhāyam pra bodhaya jaritar jāram indram

original: (AVŚ_20,89.2c) kośaṃ na pūrṇaṃ vasunā nyṛṣṭam ā cyāvaya maghadeyāya śūram //2//
analyzed: kośam na pūrṇam vasunā nyṛṣṭam ā cyāvaya magha deyāya śūram

original: (AVŚ_20,89.3a) kim aṅga tvā maghavan bhojam āhuḥ śiśīhi mā śiśayaṃ tvā śṛṇomi /
analyzed: kim aṅga tvā maghavan bhojam āhuḥ śiśīhi mā śiśayam tvā śṛṇomi

original: (AVŚ_20,89.3c) apnasvatī mama dhīr astu śakra vasuvidaṃ bhagam indrā bharā naḥ //3//
analyzed: apnasvatī mama dhīḥ astu śakra vasu vidam bhagam indra ā bhara naḥ

original: (AVŚ_20,89.4a) tvāṃ janā mamasatyeṣv indra saṃtasthānā vi hvayante samīke /
analyzed: tvām janāḥ mamasatyeṣu indra saṃtasthānāḥ vi hvayante samīke

original: (AVŚ_20,89.4c) atrā yujaṃ kṛṇute yo haviṣmān nāsunvatā sakhyaṃ vaṣṭi śūraḥ //4//
analyzed: atrā yujam kṛṇute yaḥ haviṣmān na a sunvatā sakhyam vaṣṭi śūraḥ

original: (AVŚ_20,89.5a) dhanaṃ na spandraṃ bahulaṃ yo asmai tīvrānt somāṃ āsunoti prayasvān /
analyzed: dhanam na spandram bahulam yaḥ asmai tīvrān somān āsunoti prayasvān

original: (AVŚ_20,89.5c) tasmai śatrūnt sutukān prātar ahno ni svaṣṭrān yuvati hanti vṛtram //5//
analyzed: tasmai śatrūn sutukān prātar ahnaḥ ni svaṣṭrān yuvati hanti vṛtram

original: (AVŚ_20,89.6a) yasmin vayaṃ dadhimā śaṃsam indre yaḥ śiśrāya maghavā kāmam asme /
analyzed: yasmin vayam śaṃsam indre yaḥ śiśrāya maghavā kāmam asme

original: (AVŚ_20,89.6c) ārāc cit san bhayatām asya śatrur ny asmai dyumnā janyā namantām //6//
analyzed: ārāt cit san bhayatām asya śatruḥ ni asmai dyumnā janyā namantām

original: (AVŚ_20,89.7a) ārāc chatrum apa bādhasva dūram ugro yaḥ śambaḥ puruhūta tena /
analyzed: ārāt śatrum apa bādhasva dūram ugraḥ yaḥ śambaḥ puruhūta tena

original: (AVŚ_20,89.7c) asme dhehi yavamad gomad indra kṛdhī dhiyaṃ jaritre vājaratnām //7//
analyzed: asme dhehi yavamat gomat indra kṛdhi dhiyam jaritre vāja ratnām

original: (AVŚ_20,89.8a) pra yam antar vṛṣasavāso ajman tīvrāḥ somā bahulāntāsa indram /
analyzed: pra yam antar vṛṣa savāsaḥ ajman tīvrāḥ somāḥ bahula antāsaḥ indram

original: (AVŚ_20,89.8c) nāha dāmānaṃ maghavā ni yaṃsan ni sunvate vahati bhūri vāmam //8//
analyzed: na aha dāmānam maghavā ni yaṃsat ni sunvate vahati bhūri vāmam

original: (AVŚ_20,89.9a) uta prahām atidīvā jayati kṛtam iva śvaghnī vi cinoti kāle /
analyzed: uta prahām atidīvāḥ jayati kṛtam iva śvaghnī vi cinoti kāle

original: (AVŚ_20,89.9c) yo devakāmo na dhanaṃ ruṇaddhi sam it taṃ rāyaḥ sṛjati svadhābhiḥ //9//
analyzed: yaḥ deva kāmaḥ na dhanam ruṇaddhi sam id tam rāyaḥ sṛjati svadhābhiḥ

original: (AVŚ_20,89.10a) gobhiṣ ṭaremāmatiṃ durevāṃ yavena vā kṣudhaṃ puruhūta viśve /
analyzed: gobhiḥ tarema amatim durevām yavena vā kṣudham puruhūta viśve

original: (AVŚ_20,89.10c) vayaṃ rājasu prathamā dhanāny ariṣṭāso vṛjanībhir jayema //10//
analyzed: vayam rājasu prathamā dhanāni ariṣṭāsaḥ vṛjanībhiḥ jayema

original: (AVŚ_20,89.11a) bṛhaspatir naḥ pari pātu paścād utottarasmād adharād aghayoḥ /
analyzed: bṛhaspatiḥ naḥ pari pātu paścāt uta uttarasmāt adharāt aghayoḥ

original: (AVŚ_20,89.11c) indraḥ purastād uta madhyato naḥ sakhā sakhibhyo varīyaḥ kṛṇotu //11//
analyzed: indraḥ purastāt uta madhyatas naḥ sakhā sakhibhyaḥ varīyaḥ kṛṇotu

original: (AVŚ_20,90.1a) yo adribhit prathamajā ṛtāvā bṛhaspatir āṅgiraso haviṣmān /
analyzed: yaḥ adri bhid prathama jāḥ ṛtāvā bṛhaspatiḥ āṅgirasaḥ haviṣmān

original: (AVŚ_20,90.1c) dvibarhajmā prāgharmasat pitā na ā rodasī vṛṣabho roravīti //1//
analyzed: dvibarhajmā prāgharmasad pitā naḥ ā rodasī vṛṣabhaḥ roravīti

original: (AVŚ_20,90.2a) janāya cid ya īvate u lokaṃ bṛhaspatir devahūtau cakāra /
analyzed: janāya cit yaḥ īvate u lokam bṛhaspatiḥ deva hūtau cakāra

original: (AVŚ_20,90.2c) ghnan vṛtrāṇi vi puro dardarīti jayaṃ chatrūṃr amitrān pṛtsu sāhan //2//
analyzed: ghnan vṛtrāṇi vi puraḥ dardarīti jayam śatrūṃr amitrān pṛtsu sāhan

original: (AVŚ_20,90.3a) bṛhaspatiḥ sam ajayad vasūni maho vrajān gomate deva eṣaḥ /
analyzed: bṛhaspatiḥ sam ajayat vasūni mahaḥ vrajān gomate devaḥ eṣaḥ

original: (AVŚ_20,90.3c) apaḥ siṣāsant svar apratīto bṛhaspatir hanty amitram arkaiḥ //3//
analyzed: apaḥ siṣāsan svar apratītaḥ bṛhaspatiḥ hanti amitram arkaiḥ

original: (AVŚ_20,91.1a) imāṃ dhiyaṃ saptaśīrṣṇīṃ pitā na ṛtaprajātāṃ bṛhatīm avindat /
analyzed: imām dhiyam sapta śīrṣṇīm pitā naḥ ṛta prajātām bṛhatīm avindat

original: (AVŚ_20,91.2a) ṛtaṃ śaṃsanta ṛju dīdhyānā divas putrāso asurasya vīrāḥ /
analyzed: ṛtam śaṃsantaḥ ṛju dīdhyānāḥ divaḥ putrāsaḥ asurasya vīrāḥ

original: (AVŚ_20,91.3a) haṃsair iva sakhibhir vāvadadbhir aśmanmayāni nahanā vyasyan /
analyzed: haṃsaiḥ iva sakhibhiḥ vāvadadbhiḥ aśmanmayāni nahanā vyasyan

original: (AVŚ_20,91.3c) bṛhaspatir abhikanikradad gā uta prāstaud uc ca vidvāṃ agāyat //3//
analyzed: bṛhaspatiḥ abhikanikradat gāḥ uta prāstaut ud ca vidvān agāyat

original: (AVŚ_20,91.4a) avo dvābhyāṃ para ekayā gā guhā tiṣṭhantīr anṛtasya setau /
analyzed: avas dvābhyām paras ekayā gāḥ guhā tiṣṭhantīḥ anṛtasya setau

original: (AVŚ_20,91.4c) bṛhaspatis tamasi jyotir ichan ud usrā ākar vi hi tisra āvaḥ //4//

analyzed: vibhidya puram śayatha īm apācīm niḥ trīṇi sākam udadheḥ akṛntat

original: (AVŚ_20,91.5c) bṛhaspatir uṣasaṃ sūryaṃ gām arkaṃ viveda stanayann iva dyauḥ //5//

original: (AVŚ_20,91.6c) svedāñjibhir āśiram ichamāno 'rodayat paṇim ā gā amuṣṇāt //6//

analyzed: saḥ īm satyebhiḥ sakhibhiḥ śucadbhiḥ godhāyasam vi dhanasaiḥ adardar

original: (AVŚ_20,91.7c) brahmaṇas patir vṛṣabhir varāhair gharmasvedebhir draviṇaṃ vy ānaṭ //7//

analyzed: yadā vājam asanat viśva rūpam ā dyām arukṣat uttarāṇi sadma

analyzed: bṛhaspatim vṛṣaṇam vardhayantaḥ nānā santaḥ bibhrataḥ jyotiḥ āsā

analyzed: satyam āśiṣam kṛṇutā vayodhai kīrim cit hi avatha svebhiḥ evaiḥ

original: (AVŚ_20,91.11c) paścā mṛdho apa bhavantu viśvās tad rodasī śṛṇutaṃ viśvaminve //11//

analyzed: indraḥ mahnā mahataḥ arṇavasya vi mūrdhānam abhinat arbudasya

original: (AVŚ_20,91.12c) ahann ahim ariṇāt sapta sindhūn devair dyāvāpṛthivī prāvataṃ naḥ //12//

original: (AVŚ_20,92.1a) abhi pra gopatiṃ girendram arca yathā vide /
analyzed: abhi pra go patim girā indram arca yathā vide

original: (AVŚ_20,92.1c) sūtuṃ satyasya satpatim //1//
analyzed: sūtum satyasya sat patim

original: (AVŚ_20,92.2a) ā harayaḥ sasṛjrire 'ruṣīr adhi barhiṣi /
analyzed: ā harayaḥ sasṛjrire ruṣīḥ adhi barhiṣi

original: (AVŚ_20,92.2c) yatrābhi saṃnavāmahe //2//
analyzed: yatra abhi saṃnavāmahe

original: (AVŚ_20,92.3a) indrāya gāva āśiraṃ duduhre vajriṇe madhu /
analyzed: indrāya gāvaḥ āśiram duduhre vajriṇe madhu

original: (AVŚ_20,92.3c) yat sīm upahvare vidat //3//
analyzed: yat sīm upahvare vidat

original: (AVŚ_20,92.4a) ud yad bradhnasya viṣṭapaṃ gṛham indraś ca ganvahi /
analyzed: ud yat bradhnasya viṣṭapam gṛham indraḥ ca ganvahi

original: (AVŚ_20,92.4c) madhvaḥ pītvā sacevahi triḥ sapta sakhyuḥ pade //4//
analyzed: madhvaḥ pītvā sacevahi tris sapta sakhyuḥ pade

original: (AVŚ_20,92.5a) arcata prārcata priyamedhāso arcata /
analyzed: arcata prārcata priyamedhāsaḥ arcata

original: (AVŚ_20,92.5c) arcantu putrakā uta puraṃ na dhṛṣṇv arcata //5//
analyzed: arcantu putrakāḥ uta puram na dhṛṣṇu arcata

original: (AVŚ_20,92.6a) ava svarāti gargaro godhā pari saniṣvaṇat /
analyzed: ava svarāti gargaraḥ godhā pari saniṣvaṇat

original: (AVŚ_20,92.6c) piṅgā pari caniṣkadad indrāya brahmodyatam //6//
analyzed: piṅgā pari caniṣkadat indrāya brahma udyatam

original: (AVŚ_20,92.7a) ā yat patanty enyaḥ sudughā anapasphuraḥ /
analyzed: ā yat patanti enyaḥ su dughāḥ an apasphuraḥ

original: (AVŚ_20,92.7c) apasphuraṃ gṛbhāyata somam indrāya pātave //7//
analyzed: apasphuram gṛbhāyata somam indrāya pātave

original: (AVŚ_20,92.8a) apād indro apād agnir viśve devā amatsata /
analyzed: apāt indraḥ apāt agniḥ viśve devāḥ amatsata

original: (AVŚ_20,92.8c) varuṇa id iha kṣayat tam āpo abhy anūṣata vatsaṃ saṃśiśvarīr iva //8//
analyzed: varuṇe id iha kṣayat tam āpaḥ abhī anūṣata vatsam saṃśiśvarīḥ iva

original: (AVŚ_20,92.9a) sudevo asi varuṇa yasya te sapta sindhavaḥ /
analyzed: su devaḥ asi varuṇa yasya te sapta sindhavaḥ

original: (AVŚ_20,92.9c) anukṣaranti kākudaṃ sūryaṃ suṣirām iva //9//
analyzed: anukṣaranti kākudam sūryam suṣirām iva

original: (AVŚ_20,92.10a) yo vyatīṃr aphāṇayat suyuktāṃ upa dāśuṣe /
analyzed: yaḥ vyatīṃr aphāṇayat su yuktām upa dāśuṣe

original: (AVŚ_20,92.10c) takvo netā tad id vapur upamā yo amucyata //10//
analyzed: takvaḥ netā tat id vapuḥ upamā yaḥ amucyata

original: (AVŚ_20,92.11a) atīd u śakra ohata indro viśvā ati dviṣaḥ /
analyzed: ati id u śakraḥ ohate indraḥ viśvāḥ ati dviṣaḥ

original: (AVŚ_20,92.11c) bhinat kanīna odanaṃ pacyamānaṃ paro girā //11//
analyzed: bhinat kanīnaḥ odanam pacyamānam paras girā

original: (AVŚ_20,92.12a) arbhako na kumārako 'dhi tiṣṭhann avaṃ ratham /
analyzed: arbhakaḥ na kumārakaḥ dhi tiṣṭhan avam ratham

original: (AVŚ_20,92.12c) sa pakṣan mahiṣaṃ mṛgaṃ pitre mātre vibhukratum //12//
analyzed: sa pakṣat mahiṣam mṛgam pitre mātre vibhu kratum

original: (AVŚ_20,92.13a) ā tū suśipra daṃpate rathaṃ tiṣṭhā hiraṇyayam /
analyzed: ā tū su śipra daṃpate ratham tiṣṭha hiraṇyayam

original: (AVŚ_20,92.13c) adha dyukṣaṃ sacevahi sahasrapādam aruṣaṃ svastigām anehasam //13//
analyzed: adha dyukṣam sacevahi sahasra pādam aruṣam svasti gām anehasam

original: (AVŚ_20,92.14a) tam ghem itthā namasvina upa svarājam āsate /
analyzed: tam gha īm itthā namasvinaḥ upa svarājam āsate

original: (AVŚ_20,92.14c) arthaṃ cid asya sudhitaṃ yad etave āvartayanti dāvane //14//
analyzed: artham cit asya sudhitam yat etave āvartayanti dāvane

original: (AVŚ_20,92.15a) anu pratnasyaukasaḥ priyamedhāsa eṣām /

analyzed: citram devānām ketuḥ anīkam jyotiṣmān pradiśaḥ sūryaḥ udyan

original: (AVŚ_20,107.13c) divākaro 'ti dyumnais tamāṃsi viśvātārīd duritāni śukraḥ //13//
analyzed: divākaraḥ ti dyumnaiḥ tamāṃsi viśvā atārīt duritāni śukraḥ

original: (AVŚ_20,107.14a) citraṃ devānām ud agād anīkaṃ cakṣur mitrasya varuṇasyāgneḥ /
analyzed: citram devānām ud agāt anīkam cakṣuḥ mitrasya varuṇasya agneḥ

original: (AVŚ_20,107.14c) āprād dyāvāpṛthivī antarikṣaṃ sūrya ātmā jagatas tasthuṣaś ca //14//
analyzed: āprāt dyāvāpṛthivī antarikṣam sūryaḥ ātmā jagataḥ tasthuṣaḥ ca

original: (AVŚ_20,107.15a) sūryo devīm uṣasaṃ rocamānāṃ maryo na yoṣām abhy eti paścāt /
analyzed: sūryaḥ devīm uṣasam rocamānām maryaḥ na yoṣām abhī eti paścāt

original: (AVŚ_20,107.15c) yatrā naro devayanto yugāni vitanvate prati bhadrāya bhadram //15//
analyzed: yatrā naraḥ devayantaḥ yugāni vitanvate prati bhadrāya bhadram

original: (AVŚ_20,108.1a) tvaṃ na indrā bharaṃ ojo nṛmṇaṃ śatakrato vicarṣaṇe /
analyzed: tvam naḥ indra ā bhara ojaḥ nṛmṇam śatakrato vicarṣaṇe

analyzed: ā vīram pṛtanāṣaham

original: (AVŚ_20,108.2a) tvaṃ hi naḥ pitā vaso tvaṃ mātā śatakrato babhūvitha /
analyzed: tvam hi naḥ pitā vaso tvam mātā śatakrato babhūvitha

original: (AVŚ_20,108.2c) adhā te sumnam īmahe //2//
analyzed: adhā te sumnam īmahe

original: (AVŚ_20,108.3a) tvāṃ śuṣmin puruhūta vājayantam upa bruve śatakrato /
analyzed: tvām śuṣmin puruhūta vājayantam upa bruve śatakrato

original: (AVŚ_20,108.3c) sa no rāsva suvīryam //3//
analyzed: sa naḥ rāsva su vīryam

analyzed: svādoḥ itthā viṣuvataḥ madhvaḥ pibanti gauryaḥ

original: (AVŚ_20,109.1c) yā indreṇa sayāvarīr vṛṣṇā madanti śobhase vasvīr anu svarājyam //1//
analyzed: yāḥ indreṇa sa yāvarīḥ vṛṣṇā madanti śobhase vasvīḥ anu sva rājyam

analyzed: tāḥ asya pṛśanāyuvaḥ somam śrīṇanti pṛśnayaḥ

original: (AVŚ_20,109.2c) priyā indrasya dhenavo vajraṃ hinvanti sāyakaṃ vasvīr anu svarājyam //2//

original: (AVŚ_20,109.3a) tā asya namasā sahaḥ saparyanti pracetasaḥ /
analyzed: tāḥ asya namasā sahaḥ saparyanti pracetasaḥ

original: (AVŚ_20,110.1a) indrāya madūne sutaṃ pari ṣṭobhantu no giraḥ /
analyzed: indrāya madūne sutam pari stobhantu naḥ giraḥ

original: (AVŚ_20,110.1c) arkam arcantu kāravaḥ //1//
analyzed: arkam arcantu kāravaḥ

original: (AVŚ_20,110.2a) yasmin viśvā adhi śriyo raṇanti sapta saṃsadaḥ /
analyzed: yasmin viśvāḥ adhi śriyaḥ raṇanti sapta saṃsadaḥ

original: (AVŚ_20,110.2c) indraṃ sute havāmahe //2//
analyzed: indram sute havāmahe

original: (AVŚ_20,110.3a) trikadrukeṣu cetanaṃ devāso yajñam atnata /
analyzed: trikadrukeṣu cetanam devāsaḥ yajñam atnata

original: (AVŚ_20,110.3c) tam id vardhantu no giraḥ //3//
analyzed: tam id vardhantu naḥ giraḥ

original: (AVŚ_20,111.1a) yat somam indra viṣṇavi yad vā gha trita āptye /
analyzed: yat somam indra viṣṇavi yat vā gha trite āptye

original: (AVŚ_20,111.1c) yad vā marutsu mandase sam indubhiḥ //1//
analyzed: yat vā marutsu mandase sam indubhiḥ

original: (AVŚ_20,111.2a) yad vā śakra parāvati samudre adhi mandase /
analyzed: yat vā śakra parāvati samudre adhi mandase

original: (AVŚ_20,111.2c) asmākam it sute raṇā sam indubhiḥ //2//
analyzed: asmākam id sute raṇa sam indubhiḥ

original: (AVŚ_20,111.3c) ukthe vā yasya raṇyasi sam indubhiḥ //3//
analyzed: ukthe vā yasya raṇyasi sam indubhiḥ

analyzed: yat adya kad ca vṛtrahan udagāḥ abhi sūrya

original: (AVŚ_20,112.1c) sarvaṃ tad indra te vaśe //1//
analyzed: sarvam tat indra te vaśe

analyzed: yat vā pravṛddha satpate na marai iti manyase

original: (AVŚ_20,112.2c) uto tat satyam it tava //2//
analyzed: uta u tat satyam id tava

original: (AVŚ_20,112.3a) ye somāsaḥ parāvati ye arvāvati sunvire /
analyzed: ye somāsaḥ parāvati ye arvāvati sunvire

analyzed: sarvān tām indra gacchasi

analyzed: ubhayam śṛṇavat ca naḥ indraḥ arvāk idam vacaḥ

analyzed: satrācyā maghavā soma pītaye dhiyā śaviṣṭhaḥ ā gamat

analyzed: a bhrātṛvyaḥ anā tvam an āpiḥ indra januṣā sanāt asi

analyzed: yudhā id āpi tvam ichase

analyzed: nakir revantam sakhyāya vindase pīyanti te surāśvaḥ

original: (AVŚ_20,115.1a) aham id dhi pituṣ pari medhām ṛtasya jagrabha /

analyzed: aham sūrye iva ajani

analyzed: aham pratnena manmanā giraḥ śumbhāmi kaṇva vat

analyzed: yena indraḥ śuṣmam id dadhe

original: (AVŚ_20,115.3a) ye tvām indra na tuṣṭuvur ṛṣayo ye ca tuṣṭuvuḥ /
analyzed: ye tvām indra na tuṣṭuvuḥ ṛṣayaḥ ye ca tuṣṭuvuḥ

original: (AVŚ_20,115.3c) mamed vardhasva suṣṭutaḥ //3//
analyzed: mama id vardhasva suṣṭutaḥ

analyzed: mā bhūma niṣṭyāḥ iva indra tvat araṇāḥ iva

analyzed: vanāni ni prajahitāni adrivas duroṣāsaḥ amanmahi

analyzed: sotuḥ bāhubhyām su yataḥ na arvā

analyzed: sa tvām indra prabhūvaso mamattu

original: (AVŚ_20,117.3c) imā brahma sadhamāde juṣasva //3//
analyzed: imā brahma sadhamāde juṣasva

analyzed: śagdhi u su śacīpate indra viśvābhiḥ ūtibhiḥ

analyzed: indram id devatātaye indram prayati adhvare

analyzed: aśvāyantaḥ maghavan indra vājinaḥ gavyantaḥ tvā havāmahe

analyzed: revatīḥ naḥ sadhamādaḥ indre santu tuvi vājāḥ

analyzed: kṣumantaḥ yābhiḥ madema

analyzed: ṛṇoḥ akṣam na cakrayoḥ

analyzed: ṛṇoḥ akṣam na śacībhiḥ

analyzed: tat sūryasya deva tvam tat mahi tvam madhyā kartoḥ vitatam sam jabhāra

analyzed: tat mitrasya varuṇasya abhicakṣe sūryaḥ rūpam kṛṇute dyoḥ upasthe

original: (AVŚ_20,123.2c) anantam anyad ruśad asya prājaḥ kṛṣṇam anyad dharitaḥ saṃ bharanti //2//

original: (AVŚ_20,124.1a) kayā naś citra ā bhuvad ūtī sadāvṛdhaḥ sakhā /
analyzed: kayā naḥ citraḥ ā bhuvat ūtī sadāvṛdhaḥ sakhā

original: (AVŚ_20,124.1c) kayā śaciṣṭhayā vṛtā //1//
analyzed: kayā śaciṣṭhayā vṛtā

original: (AVŚ_20,124.2a) kas tvā satyo madānāṃ maṃhiṣṭho matsad andhasaḥ /
analyzed: kaḥ tvā satyaḥ madānām maṃhiṣṭhaḥ matsat andhasaḥ

original: (AVŚ_20,124.2c) dṛlhā cid āruje vasu //2//
analyzed: dṛlhā cit āruje vasu

original: (AVŚ_20,124.3a) abhī ṣu naḥ sakhīnām avitā jaritṝṇām /
analyzed: abhī su naḥ sakhīnām avitā jaritṝṇām

original: (AVŚ_20,124.3c) śataṃ bhavāsy ūtibhiḥ //3//
analyzed: śatam bhavāsi ūtibhiḥ

original: (AVŚ_20,124.4a) imā nu kaṃ bhuvanā sīṣadhāmendraś ca viśve ca devāḥ /
analyzed: imā nu kam bhuvanā sīṣadhāma indraḥ ca viśve ca devāḥ

analyzed: ādityaiḥ indraḥ sa gaṇaḥ marudbhiḥ asmākam bhūtu avitā tanūnām

original: (AVŚ_20,124.5c) hatvāya devā asurān yad āyan devā devatvam abhirakṣamāṇāḥ //5//
analyzed: hatvāya devāḥ asurān yat āyan devāḥ deva tvam abhirakṣamāṇāḥ

analyzed: pratyañcam arkam anayam śacībhiḥ āt id svadhām iṣirām pari apaśyan

original: (AVŚ_20,124.6c) ayā vājaṃ devahitaṃ sanema madema śatahimāḥ suvīrāḥ //6//

analyzed: apa indra prācaḥ maghavan amitrān apa apācaḥ abhibhūte nudasva

original: (AVŚ_20,125.1c) apodīco apa śūrādharāca urau yathā tava śarman madema //1//
analyzed: apa udīcaḥ apa śūra adharācaḥ urau yathā tava śarman madema

original: (AVŚ_20,125.2a) kuvid aṅga yavamanto yavaṃ cid yathā dānty anupūrvaṃ viyūya /
analyzed: kuvid aṅga yavamantaḥ yavam cit yathā dānti anupūrvam viyūya

original: (AVŚ_20,125.2c) ihehaiṣāṃ kṛṇuhi bhojanāni ye barhiṣo namovṛktiṃ na jagmuḥ //2//
analyzed: iha iha eṣām kṛṇuhi bhojanāni ye barhiṣaḥ namovṛktim na jagmuḥ

analyzed: nahi sthūri ṛtuthā yātam asti na uta śravaḥ vivide saṃgameṣu

original: (AVŚ_20,125.3c) gavyanta indraṃ sakhyāya viprā aśvāyanto vṛṣaṇaṃ vājayantaḥ //3//
analyzed: gavyantaḥ indram sakhyāya viprāḥ aśvāyantaḥ vṛṣaṇam vājayantaḥ

original: (AVŚ_20,125.4a) yuvaṃ surāmam aśvinā namucāv āsure sacā /
analyzed: yuvam su rāmam aśvinā namucau āsure sacā

original: (AVŚ_20,125.4c) vipipānā śubhas patī indraṃ karmasv āvatam //4//
analyzed: vipipānā śubhaḥ patī indram karmasu āvatam

original: (AVŚ_20,125.5c) yat surāmaṃ vy apibaḥ śacībhiḥ sarasvatī tvā maghavann abhiṣṇak //5//

analyzed: pra dyumnāya pra śavase pra nṛṣāhyāya śarmaṇe

original: (AVŚ_20,142.5c) pra dakṣāya pracetasā //5//
analyzed: pra dakṣāya pracetasā

original: (AVŚ_20,142.6c) yad vā sumnebhir ukthyā //6//
analyzed: yat vā sumnebhiḥ ukthyā

original: (AVŚ_20,143.3a) ko vām adyā karate rātahavya ūtaye vā sutapeyāya vārkaiḥ /
analyzed: kaḥ vām adyā karate rāta havyaḥ ūtaye vā suta peyāya vā arkaiḥ

original: (AVŚ_20,143.3c) ṛtasya vā vanuṣe pūrvyāya namo yemāno aśvinā vavartat //3//
analyzed: ṛtasya vā vanuṣe pūrvyāya namaḥ yemānaḥ aśvinā vavartat

original: (AVŚ_20,143.4a) hiraṇyayena purubhū rathenemaṃ yajñaṃ nāsatyopa yātam /
analyzed: hiraṇyayena puru bhū rathena imam yajñam nāsatyā upa yātam

original: (AVŚ_20,143.4c) pibātha in madhunaḥ somyasya dadhatho ratnaṃ vidhate janāya //4//
analyzed: pibāthaḥ id madhunaḥ somyasya dadhathaḥ ratnam vidhate janāya

original: (AVŚ_20,143.5a) ā no yātaṃ divo acha pṛthivyā hiraṇyayena suvṛtā rathena /
analyzed: ā naḥ yātam divaḥ acha pṛthivyāḥ hiraṇyayena suvṛtā rathena

original: (AVŚ_20,143.5c) mā vām anye ni yaman devayantaḥ saṃ yad dade nābhiḥ pūrvyā vām //5//
analyzed: mā vām anye ni yaman devayantaḥ sam yat dade nābhiḥ pūrvyā vām

original: (AVŚ_20,143.6a) nū no rayiṃ puruvīraṃ bṛhantaṃ dasrā mimāthām ubhayeṣv asme /
analyzed: nu naḥ rayim puru vīram bṛhantam dasrā mimāthām ubhayeṣu asme

original: (AVŚ_20,143.6c) naro yad vām aśvinā stomam āvant sadhastutim ājamīlhāso agman //6//
analyzed: naraḥ yat vām aśvinā stomam āvan sadhastutim ājamīlhāsaḥ agman

original: (AVŚ_20,143.7a) iheha yad vāṃ samanā papṛkṣe seyam asme sumatir vājaratnā /
analyzed: iha iha yat vām samanā sā iyam asme sumatiḥ vāja ratnā

original: (AVŚ_20,143.7c) uruṣyataṃ jaritāraṃ yuvaṃ ha śritaḥ kāmo nāsatyā yuvadrik //7//
analyzed: uruṣyatam jaritāram yuvam ha śritaḥ kāmaḥ nāsatyā yuvadrik

original: (AVŚ_20,143.8a) madhumatīr oṣadhīr dyāva āpo madhuman no bhavatv antarikṣam /
analyzed: madhumatīḥ oṣadhīḥ dyāvaḥ āpaḥ madhumat naḥ bhavatu antarikṣam

original: (AVŚ_20,143.8c) kṣetrasya patir madhumān no astv ariṣyanto anv enaṃ carema //8//
analyzed: kṣetrasya patiḥ madhumān naḥ astu a riṣyantaḥ anu enam carema

original: (AVŚ_20,143.9a) panāyyaṃ tad aśvinā kṛtaṃ vāṃ vṛṣabho divo rajasaḥ pṛthivyāḥ /
analyzed: panāyyam tat aśvinā kṛtam vām vṛṣabhaḥ divaḥ rajasaḥ pṛthivyāḥ

original: (AVŚ_20,143.9c) sahasraṃ śaṃsā uta ye gaviṣṭau sarvāṃ it tāṃ upa yātā pibadhyai //9//
analyzed: sahasram śaṃsāḥ uta ye gaviṣṭau sarvām id tām upa yātā pibadhyai
